Nke e̱ nyi re-lo nzhwe Jesu Krristi, kow: Ibrrahin i nyi be̱ Ishaku,
Ishaku a nyi be̱ Yakubu,
Yakubu a nyi be̱ Yahuda ngbe re-gimbe ngu.
Yahuda i nyi be̱ Perre ngbe Zera (ne de̱ ngu i nyi Tama).
Perre i nyi be̱ Hezrro,
Hezrro a nyi be̱ Rrama,
Rrama a nyi be̱ Aminada,
Aminada a nyi be̱ Naashwo,
Naashwo a nyi be̱ Salmo,
Salmo a nyi be̱ Bowaza (ne de̱ ngu i nyi Rraha),
Bowaza a nyi be̱ Obida (ne de̱ ngu i nyi Ruti),
Obida a nyi be̱ Jese,
Jese a nyi be̱ Nggwe̱ Dooda.
Dooda i nyi be̱ Solomo (ne de̱ ngu i nyi mbrru Uriya),
Solomo a nyi be̱ Rrehobowa,
Rrehobowa a nyi be̱ Abija,
Abija a nyi be̱ Asa,
Asa a nyi be̱ Jehoshafa,
Jehoshafa a nyi be̱ Jehorra,
Jehorra a nyi be̱ Uzaya,
Uzaya a nyi be̱ Jota,
Jota a nyi be̱ Ahazi,
Ahazi e̱ nyi be̱ Hezekeya,
Hezekeya a nyi be̱ Manase,
Manase e̱ nyi be̱ Amo,
Amo a nyi be̱ Josiya,
Josiya a nyi be̱ Jekoniya
ngbe re-gimbe ngu a zhe ne i ko nné Isrreela
shi nné gyiaa re nzhi srra a Babila.
A zhe ne mbe i ya ning brru a Babila,
Jekoniya i nyi be̱ Sheltiye,
Sheltiye e̱ nyi be̱ Zerrubabe,
Zerrubabe e̱ nyi be̱ Abiyuda,
Abiyuda a nyi be̱ Eliyaki,
Eliyaki e̱ nyi be̱ Azo,
Azo a nyi be̱ Zadoka,
Zadoka a nyi be̱ Aki,
Aki e̱ nyi be̱ Eliyuda,
Eliyuda a nyi be̱ Eliyaza,
Eliyaza a nyi be̱ Matana,
Matana a nyi be̱ Yakubu,
Yakubu a nyi be̱ Usufu,
nto Merri ne ngu i bî Jesu, ne e ki ye he Krristi.

Aha nii, kya ngu pie a Ibrrahin re be cwu a Dooda, á nyi re-ze̱ shwa ne otu weni; kya ne ngu pie a Dooda re be cwu zhe ne i ko nné Isrreela shi nné gyiaa re nzhi Babila, a nyi re-ze̱ shwa ne otu weni wa; wire kya ne ngu pie a zhe ne i ya ning brru Babila re be a Krristi, a nyi re-ze̱ shwa ne otu weni wa.
Me̱di bî Jesu Krristi e̱ i shi he ni: De̱ ngu Merri e̱ i sa jee ngu shi rwe nyrra ne Usufu; me̱di we ne mbe rishi yaa ko, á timi ne ngu bi ehwie a yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri.
Aha ncwa ngu Usufu a nyi nze̱we ne ngu bi redziee, ko ce̱ he ngu ki ci nshwu we̱, ngu a hwie he ngu ki we ranranng.

Me̱di a zhe ne ngu shi hwie nka ni, ya njeli Brrabe̱ ya wre̱ nwie ngu a revi ngu a he ne ngu he, “Usufu, ewe Dooda, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci owu ne fo Merri re hwie̱ mbrru ngwe̱ we̱, aha ewe ne ngu shi hwie ngu a wru nwie Nshe Wiri.
A shi bî nze̱we, ngbe ngwe̱ ki ci lo he Jesu
Re-ankya ne̱ á ci zhwozhwo ni aha ngbe kya ne Brrabe̱ i he re ci rrurru shi ne nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he,
“Ri, ewena nna ri se̱ ehwie,
we̱ bî ewerento,
á ri ki ye he Imanuwe.”
Maana nna nyi nke he, “Be̱ne̱ shi ngbe nzhi.”
A zhe ne Usufu ngu shwo ndzie, ngu a nyi shi kya ne njeli Brrabe̱ ki heng he re nyi. Aa fo Merri hwie̱ mbrru ngu.
Me̱di koo ree nywe̱ ngbe ne ngu we̱ he̱rri aa ma bî ewe. Ngu a ki ci lo he Jesu.
A zhe ne e bî Jesu a Be̱talahami a ngwie̱ Yahudi, a i nyi Hirridu ngu nyi nggwe̱. Yá nné hu re̱nde̱ e̱ wru gbong a nva ze á be Urrushelima.
Á rin he, “Nggwe̱ nné Yahudi ne e bî e̱ shi he? Nzhi ri e̱nde̱ ngu a nva ze,
A zhe ne Nggwe̱ Hirridu ho ni, ngu a ne̱ ne bē ngbe ga nné Urrushelima zhwozhwo.
Aa ye nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ nneywí Nti Nka Musa zhwozhwo nwie we rinng he, “Ewie ne e shi ning bî Krristi
Á ki shing he, “A Be̱talahami a ngwie̱ Yahudi, aha nne ti re̱se̱ng i wie ye̱ye̱rri ni he,
‘Ngbe ngwe̱ kla Be̱talahami, a ngwie̱ Yahudi,
ko tsie̱ tsie̱ ko ngwe̱ nyi nyrru iishing a tsi re-ringgwe̱ Yahudi we̱;
aha ya nggwe̱ shi wru a yarri ngwe̱,
ne ngu cwo a cwo nné nje, nné Isrreela.’ ”
Wire Hirridu a ye nné hu re̱nde̱ nna a la la aha ngbe ngu hu ye̱ye̱rri zhe ne e̱nde̱ nna ngu i ning wru.
A zhe ne ngu shi we cire re nzhi Be̱talahami ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ywa, nyi ya kre ewe nna we sheng. We ne nyi ri ki she, nyi ning ting, aha ngbe n ya ki ye mbè ma.”
A zhe ne mbe ho nka nggwe̱, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ciee mbe, ngbe e̱nde̱ ne mbe ri ri a nva ze e̱ ngu a we kwa yincwuee, aa ma ya yo a nwie ne ewe nna ngu ning shi.
A zhe ne mbe ri e̱nde̱ nna, rehwie mbe kla, á nyi rekwi we yang.

A zhe ne mbe ngwie a zonggru nna, á ya she ewe nna ngbe de̱ ngu Merri, mbe e̱ hu be mbe e̱ ki ye mbè. Wire mbe e̱ kla re-lente mbe, mbe e̱ trru re-ankya mbe e̱ ki na, a ning bi zinarriya ngbe turraren libanu ngbe na murru.
Wire á ning brru cwo yaka rê re nzhi ngwie̱ mbe, aha á we ting a yarri revi he shi de̱ ré ning brru re nzhi nwie Hirridu wa we̱.

A zhe ne mbe ne̱, ya njeli Brrabe̱ ya wre̱ a nwie Usufu a revi. A he ne ngu he, “Deze ngwe̱ fo Kowe ne̱ ngbe de̱ ngu a nyi to re nzhi Masarr. Nyi srra miimi se zhe ne nje ri he nka ne ngwe̱, aha Hirridu shi ci rekre ewe nna he ré ki yhwe̱.”
Aha nii, ngu a deze ngu a fo ewe nna ngbe ne de̱ ngu a totu mbe e̱ ne̱ re nzhi Masarr.
Á srra miimi he̱rri zheng hu Hirridu. Aha ngbe nka ne Brrabe̱ i he ne nne ti re̱se̱ng re ci rrurru shi ne e wie he, “Nje ye Kowe nje re wru a Masarr.”

A zhe ne Hirridu ngu ya timi he nné hu re̱nde̱ ana á ki brra ne zentsi á ne̱, aa ci ehwie dzio we yang, ngu a ngwa nka he ré yhwi ga e̱we̱e̱ rewerento ne mbe bi rie wehwie re be be zhwozhwo a Be̱talahami ngbe re-nklang, ye̱ye̱rri ne zhe ne nné hu re̱nde̱ nna mbe i ki ting he mbe ning di e̱nde̱ nna.
Wire nka Brrabe̱ ne nne ti re̱se̱ng ne e ki ye he Irimiya ngu i he e̱ ci rrurru, shi ne ngu i he,
“Á hó cwue a Rrama,
a nyi nku ne e ti ngbe anaa riywe̱ we yang,
Rrahila
ko bi ré ki krru ehwie we̱,
aha koó ning shi we̱.”
A zhe ne Hirridu ngu hu, ya njeli Brrabe̱ ya wre̱ a nwie Usufu a yarri revi a zhe ne mbe shi Masarr,
a he ne ngu he, “Deze ngwe̱ fo ewe ne̱ ngbe de̱ ngu ngwe̱ ywa a ngwie̱ Isrreela, aha nné mbe i kre he mbe fo ce ewe nna á kwi.”
Aha ni ngu a deze, ngu a fo ewe nna ngbe de̱ ngu re nzhi ngwie̱ Isrreela.
Me̱di a zhe ne ngu ho he Arrkelawu shi ye ringgwe̱ a Yahudi, a nu be̱ ngu Hirridu, ngu a ci owu ne ywa miimi. Me̱di aha ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki ting a yarri revi, ngu a ne̱ re nzhi a nkla Galili.
Ngu a ya srra a ngwie̱ ne e ki ye he Nazarra. Aha nii, nka Be̱ne̱ ne nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe i he e̱ ci rrurru, shi ne mbe i he, “Á ri ki ye he Nne Nazarra.”
Á srra yá rotu, Yohana Nyi Batisma a be nwie brro nka a tsi yi a Yahudi.
A he ne nneywí he, “Nyi si ywe̱, aha Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ be dudu!”
Nyi ngu ne̱ ne Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he nka a zete rici ngu he,
“Riwie̱ng cwue ne ngu kyie̱
a tsi yi he,
‘Nyi nyi rê aha Brrabe̱,
nyi ci nhwie̱ rê ngu ré ci tsantsa.’ ”
Á nyi tago Yohana ne rehwe ronkomi, a bra bi ta ne ngu rwé a nti. A srrá re ye iigye re shwe rutonshwi.
Nneywí a Urrushelima ngbe ngwie̱ Yahudi zhwozhwo ngbe ga re-nkla Urrdu zhwozhwo á wru re be.
Á ya ne̱ ne he re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe, ngu a we nyi batisma a Brra Riywi Urrdu.
Me̱di a zhe ne ngu ri nné Farisi ngbe nné Sadukyi we yang mbe cwo re be he ngu we nyi batisma, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi zhwe kprre!
Nyi nyi re-ankya ne mbe ti he nyi se̱ ywe̱.
Shi de̱ nyi hwie he nyi shi drre̱ aha nyi nyí nzhwe Ibrrahin shi ne nyi he ana we̱. Nje níng ting he, Be̱ne̱ e̱ hung ko rahwan ne̱ re ning nyi Ibrrahin yaká rewe.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ sa okyo a nti rekwe, ko zohu ekwe ne ko ngu krró te̱nte̱ gbre we̱, we̱ tsa we̱ zhwu a nro.

Nje e̱ nje níng nyi batisma ne rishi aha re hwie̱ sheede he nyi se̱ ywe̱. Me̱di a merin nje a bi ya ne ngu cwo be, ne ngu bi igbe̱ re ning ne̱ ne ko tamri ngu ma ko shi n hung fong we̱. A cwo a níng nyi batisma ne Nshe Wiri ngbe ne ro.
A bi brra iibi ngu nva ne ngu ning wu zhwe yâ te̱nte̱ng ngbe iishíng, a shi tsu te̱nte̱ cwe yâ we̱ kro a aata, me̱di iishíng we̱ shwi a nro na ne ko ngu bi yu we̱.”
A zhe nna, Jesu a wru a Galili re be a Brra Riywi Urrdu aha Yohana re ki nyi batisma.
Me̱di Yohana bra kre rêng rang, a he, “Nyi nje ne nje ra be nwie ngwe̱ ngwe̱ ning nyi batisma, ngwe̱ bra be nwie nje e̱e̱?”
Jesu ki shing he, “Nde re shi ni a zhe ne ne̱, aha aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi nyi ni, ngbe ko zohu kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ re ci ye̱ye̱rri.”
A zhe ne e nyi Jesu batisma, we hwiehwie ngu a wru a rishi nna. Wire zinye̱ e̱ kla, ngu a ri Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu wro shi nyi jie̱riywi, ngu a ya kpe a zete ngu.
Ya cwue e̱ wru zinye̱ he, “Nke ne̱ nyi Kowe ce̱ nje, nje ho shwi ngu kpe̱kpe̱.”
Wire Nshe Wiri e̱ fo Jesu re nzhi a yarri yi aha Shetani re ki mwa ri.
A zhe ne ngu rwe onu rotu nshwa weni totu ne te̱ne̱, nzhwo a ki yhwe̱.
Wire Nne ki mwa ri a be nwie ngu, a he ne ngu he, “Kundu ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱, he ne rahwan ne̱ ré ci cwu yâ.”
Jesu ki shing he, “Á wie he: ‘Ko nyi cwu yâ nggaa ngu ngu ci nneywi re srra nce we̱, me̱di se ne ko zohu riti nka ne ngu wru a nu Be̱ne̱.’ ”
Wire Shetani e̱ ywa ne ngu a Urrushelima — brra ngwie̱ wiri, ngu a ki ci re yo a zete ewie ne ngu shi dede kaka a Brranyi,
ngu a he ne ngu he, “Kundu ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱, ma hru ngwe̱ ya kpe be. Aha á wie he:
‘A ri ngwa re-njeli ngu nka he ré re cwo rina rina,
á ri re bro zeteng a nva mbe
kishi ngwe̱ ri kpra ta a zahwan.’ ”
Jesu ki shing he, “Á wie he: ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ mwa Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ngwe̱ we̱.’ ”
Shetani e̱ ywa ne ngu a zete ya brra rugu dede wa, ngu a ya ki ti ga re-ringgwe̱ ebe ngwie̱ ngbe rina mbe zhwozhwo.
Ngu a he ne ngu he, “Kundu ngwe̱ hu be, ngwe̱ ning ye mbe, ma n re ngwa ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ne̱ nwie nje Shetani! Aha á wie he, ‘Ye Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ngwe̱ mbè, ngwe̱ bra ki nyi we ngu nggaa ngu cwuo.’ ”
Wire Shetani e̱ ne̱ ki we, re-njeli e̱ be á ya ne̱ ne ki sheng.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ho he á ci Yohana a uucwu gyiaa, ngu a ning brru re nzhi Galili.
Aa we Nazarra, ngu a ning brru re nzhi srra a Kafanahu ne ngu shi a rekyi nzhwo Galili a ngwie̱ Zebulu ngbe ngwie̱ Naftali,
aha ngbe kya ne Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng i he re ci rrurru shi ne ngu i he:
“Ngwie̱ Zebulu ngbe ngwie̱ Naftali,
a rê re nzhi brra nzhwo Galili, a nyie Brra Riywi Urrdu,
a Galili na Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.
Nné ne mbe shi nwie ywing,
á ri brra nse̱;
nné ne mbe srrá a rowúng hu,
nse̱ e̱ tsie̱ nwie mbe.”
Kya ngu pie a zhe ana, Jesu a ne̱ ne brro nka nwie he, “Nyi si ywe̱; aha Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ be dudu!”
A zhe ne Jesu shi cwo a rekyi Nzhwo Galili, ngu a ri re-gimbe komo wehwie, Sima ne e ki ye he Pita ngbe gimbe ngu Andrru. Á shi zi re̱ge̱ a yarri nzhwo, aha á nyi nné kwa hwen.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi be, nyi hwie̱ nné ning zhwe, nje shi níng ci nyi hwie̱ nné kwa nneywí.”
We zhe zunzrru mbe e̱ we re-re̱ge̱ mbe a miimi mbe e̱ ki zhwe.

A zhe ne ngu wara re nzhi ncwuee, ngu a she yá re-gimbe wehwie wa, Yakubu ne ngu nyi ewe Zebedi ngbe gimbe ngu Yohana. Á shi a yarri konkro ngbe ne be̱ mbe Zebedi nwie nyi re-re̱ge̱ mbe. Jesu a we ye,
mbe e̱ wre̱ ne we konkro mbe ngbe be̱ mbe a miimi, mbe e̱ ki zhwe.
Jesu grra a yarri Galili zhwozhwo nwie mie̱ nka a re-zonggrung mwe re brro Nka Rina Ringgwe̱,

Nka ngu a se̱ ngwie̱ yu a Sirriya zhwozhwo, nneywí be mi ne nné riywe̱ gbingbi ngbe nné ne mbe shi ge̱zhe̱ ne nzhwe ruhu kanka kanka, ngbe nné ne mbe shi re-cinci shi nné bi re-rije ngbe nné kpi ré kwi, ngbe nné ne mbe kwi nkye̱, ngbe Jesu a we kyia zhwozhwo mbe.
Brra rigwe̱ nné ne mbe wru a Galili, ngbe a Re-ngwie̱ Shwa, ngbe a Urrushelima, ngbe a Yahudi ngbe re-nkla a nyie Urrdu á ki zhwe.
A zhe ne Jesu ri nneywí ya tsu we yang, ngu a ngra a zete rugu ngu a srra be. Nné ki zhwe ngu a be nwie ngu.
Ngu a ne̱ ne we mie̱ nka:
“Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne mbe hu he mbe re̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱,
aha Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ nyi na mbe.
Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne mbe shi rana riywe̱,
aha á ri we krru rehwie.
Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne mbe bi ehwie sheng,
aha ebe ngwie̱ ri hwie̱ ngge mbe.
Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne nzhwo redziee we yhwe̱,
ncwue mbe bra hwe aha redziee,
aha á ri we ci rishwe.
Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne mbe bi naana,
aha á ri ri naana mbe.
Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne mbe shi wiri a yarri rehwie mbe,
aha á ri ri Be̱ne̱.
Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne mbe cí nneywí ré yaa srra rina,
aha á ri we ye he rewe Be̱ne̱.
Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne e we ngwá ge̱zhe̱ aha redziee mbe,
aha Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ nyi na mbe.
“Mwo rina nyi na nyi a zhe ne nneywí mbe níng cwi, mbe níng ngwa ge̱zhe̱, mbe ca re-rabrra nwie he re-nka e̱ngwie̱ a rici nyi aha nje.
Nyi nyi rekwi ngbe rehwie kla we yang aha lede nyi e̱ ri shi yang a zinye̱. Á i ngwa nné ti re̱se̱ng ne mbe i ke̱she be a ncwuee nyi ge̱zhe̱ we ni ma.

“Nyi nyi ncwua na ebe ngwie̱. Me̱di kundu ncwua ngu bru kpikpi ngu, wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré bra ki ci re shi kpikpi e̱ wa? Ko bra bi mpe̱ni ré ning nyi yankya we̱, se ka ré fo ré wa he̱rri nneywí ré shi ne nta.
“Nyi nyi nse̱ ebe ngwie̱. Nyi shi shi ngwie̱ ne ngu shi a zete rugu, ne ko ngu shi la la we̱.
Koó ci ro te̱le̱kyi ré ki cwugru ne grre we̱. Se ka ré ki gara a zete kyang sang, aha re tsie̱ nse̱ re nzhi nwie ko nye̱ a yarri eri nna.
Aha nii, nde nse̱ nyi re tsie̱ a nwie nneywí, ngbe ré ri re-cwuo rina nyi ré de Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi a zinye̱.
“Shi de̱ nyi hwie he nje be ngbe n ya rwi Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa ka na nné ti re̱se̱ng a be we̱. Ko nje be he n we ci ré ci shweni we̱, me̱di he ré ci rrurru.
Nje níng ting cence, se ka zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱ ré ci shweni, ne ya izhweng wie cwuo, ka ya e̱we̱ iishing a yarri Nti Nka ana re ci shweni; me̱di se ko nda a yarring ci ye̱ye̱rri ni.

Aha nii, ko nye̱ ne ngu hle̱ ya a tsi e̱we̱e̱ Nti Nka ne̱, ngu bra mie̱ yá nnéng he ré nyi ni ma, ko ri be ko yankya a yarri Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ we̱. Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu zhwé ngu bra mié̱ Nti Nka ne̱, á ri ki ye he brrankya a yarri Ringgwe̱ zinye̱.
Nje níng ting he kundu ne de̱ redziee nyi ngu ne̱ na nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe nné Farisi we̱, ko shi nyi she ngwie a Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱.
“Nyi ho he á i he ne nné tiya he, ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ yhwe̱ nne we̱, ko nye̱ ne ngu yhwe̱ nne, wé̱ ki nyi nka.’

Me̱di nje e̱ nje níng ting he: ko nye̱ ne ngu bi rimwi ne ya gimbe, á bi we ki nyi nka. Ko nye̱ ne ngu he ne gimbe ngu he ‘Ngwe̱ ci ke̱li!’ Á bi we ywa ne ngu a nyyi Rotsu Brrá Nné, ko nye̱ ne ngu bra he ne ya he, ‘Ngwe̱ nyi rumwa!’ a bi we ywa a ruvong ro.
“Aha nii, kundu ngwe̱ shi ci beeko a nwieng nyi teede a Brranyi ngwe̱ e̱ bra lu he gimbe ngwe̱ bi nka a rici ngwe̱,
we beeko ngwe̱ e̱ a miimi a nwieng nyi teede nna ngwe̱ ke̱she ywa ngwe̱ ya cwue̱ nka ngbe ngu, wire ngwe̱ ning brru ngwe̱ ya ngwa beeko ngwe̱ e̱ fa.

“Wre̱ ne cwue̱ nka ngbe rwinko ngwe̱ ne ngu ci kara ngwe̱ a zhe ne ngwe̱ shi rê ngbe ngu re nzhi nwie nné nyi nka. De̱e̱ ni wo, we̱ re ngwa a nva nne nyi nka, ngbe nne nyi nka we̱ ci polisi re re she̱ a uucwu gyiaa.
Cence, nje re ting he, ko shi ngwe̱ wru miimi we̱ se ne ngwe̱ trra kpara kovo ne e ré zhwe.
“Nyi ho he á i he, ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi njè we̱.’
Me̱di nje níng ting he: ko nye̱ ne ngu ci riyii ya mbrru ne ecwue, maahu aa nyi njè ne ngu a yarri hwie ngu.
Aha nii, kundu ne riyii nva nyye ngwe̱ re cí ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱, ki ti ngwe̱ zhwu. Canca ngwe̱ wi ya ekpri rwe̱ ngwe̱ ne rwe̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo re ywa a ruvong ro.
Kundu va nyye ngwe̱ re cí ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱, ki kpo ngwe̱ zhwu. Canca ngwe̱ wi ya ekpri rwe̱ ngwe̱ ne rwe̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo re ywa a ruvong ro.
“Á bra i he he: ko nye̱ ne ngu yu mbrru ngu se re ki ngwa krre̱de̱ng kpo nyrra!

Me̱di nje e̱ nje níng ting he: ko nye̱ ne ngu shi yu mbrru ngu, kundu ne de̱ ngu nyi aha mbrru nna nyi njè we̱, maahu nne ana ki ci hwie̱ mbrru nyi njè, kundu ngu ya drro. Ko nye̱ ne ngu ki fo ma, aa nyi njè.
“Nyi ho wa he á i he ne nné tiya he, ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ sa jee ngwe̱ bra we we̱sa nyi kya nna we̱, me̱di nyi kya ne ngwe̱ fo shí a nyyi Brrabe̱ he ngwe̱ shi nying.’
Me̱di nje níng ting he, shi de̱ nyi fo shí we̱ ko tsienzhwu a zhe ne nyi sa jee, ka re bra nyi ne zinye̱, aha a nyi ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱;
ka ne ebe ngwie̱, aha a nyi ncwung sa ta Be̱ne̱; ka ne lo Urrushelima, aha a nyi ngwie̱ Brra Nggwe̱.
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ shí ne rici ngwe̱ we̱, aha ko ngwe̱ hung bra ya nkwerici ngwe̱ zunzrru re ci kye̱ng ka ywing we̱.
Me̱di a yarri nka, nde ‘Ee’ ngwe̱ re nyi ‘Ee’, nde ‘Aawo’ ngwe̱ re nyi ‘Aawo’. Kundu ngu wara nke maahu aa wru nwie Nne Hwie̱.
“Nyi ho he á i he, ‘Riyii ne riyii; rinyii ne rinyii.’
Me̱di nje e̱ nje níng ting he: shi de̱ ngwe̱ kwe̱ ne nne ne ngu re nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Kundu ya nne re rwi a ushwo nva nyye, ki bra ushwo ya wa.
Kundu ya nne ci kara ngwe̱ aha ngu ce̱ se̱ tago ngwe̱, ki ngwa ngbe kuntu ngwe̱ wa.
Kundu ya nne re ci ne ce he ngwe̱ cwo ngbe ngu mili zunzrru, ywa ngbe ngu he̱rri re-mili wehwie.
Nne nke ne ngu re rin kya ne ngwe̱ bi, ki ngwa. Kundu ya nne be ce̱ kya a nwie ngwe̱, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ning zhwumi ne ngu we̱.”
Nyi ho he á i he, “Ce̱ we nné ngwe̱, ngwe̱ ra rwinkó ngwe̱.
Me̱di nje e̱ nje níng ting he: nyi ce̱ rwinkó nyi, nyi bra ku Be̱ne̱ aha nné ne mbe níng ngwa cinci,
ngbe nyi hwie̱ rewe Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi zinye̱. Aha a cí ne̱ re tsie̱ a nwie nné hwie̱ ngbe nwie nné rina, a bra cí nze re wie a nwie nné redziee ngbe nwie nné riywe̱ redziee.
Kundu nyi ce̱ we nné ne mbe níng ce̱ ma, lede nyi e̱ we̱ nyi nda? Ko nné si gondu a a nyi ni ma we̱ e̱e̱?
Ma kundu nyi dzie we re-gimbe nyi, we̱ nyi nda ne nyi shi nwie nying re ne̱ yá? Ko Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ á nyi ni ma we̱ e̱e̱?
Aha nii, nyi e̱ nyi shi tsantsa we shi Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi zinye̱ ngu shi tsantsa.
“Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ kishi nyi ri nyi re-cwuo redziee nyi a nyyi nneywí aha ré di ré níng de. Kundu nyi nyí ni, ko shi nyi she lede a nwie Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi zinye̱ we̱.

“Aha nii, kundu ngwe̱ shi she ya nneng ne yankya, shi de̱ ngwe̱ tsie̱ gbe shi nné brra ronu mbe nyi a re-zonggrung mwe ngbe a brrá re-rê we̱. Á nyi ni aha mbe she grime̱ a nwie nneywí. Nje níng ting cence, á she lede mbe zhwozhwo.
Me̱di, kundu ne ngwe̱ shi na ya nne yankya, shi de̱ ngwe̱ we va mie ngwe̱ re hu kya ne va nyye ngwe̱ shi mi we̱,
aha kya ne ngwe̱ ngwa re shi la la. Wire Be̱ ngwe̱ ne ngu ri kya ne ngwe̱ nyi a la la, we̱ re ngwa lede.

“Kundu nyi shi ku Be̱ne̱, shi de̱ nyi nyi shi nné brra ronu we̱, aha á kre ku Be̱ne̱ nwie yo yo a yarri re-zonggrung mwe ngbe a brrá re-gasire aha nneywí ré we ri. Nje níng ting cence, á se̱ lede mbe zhwozhwo.

Me̱di zhe ne ngwe̱ shi ku Be̱ne̱, ngwie a yarri e̱binyi ngwe̱, she̱ onusinye ngwe̱ ngbe ngwe̱ ku Be̱ne̱ re nzhi nwie Be̱ ne koó ki ri we̱; ngbe Be̱ ngwe̱ ne ngu ri kya ne nneywí mbe nyi a la la, we̱ re ngwa lede.
“Zhe ne ngwe̱ shi ku Be̱ne̱, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ke̱ we ne ning zhwo nka shweni shi nné tsi ngwie̱ mbe nyí we̱, aha ne mbe hwie he ka á shi we ho aha nti nka mbe piriri ne mbe he we he we he.
Shi de̱ nyi nyi shi mbe we̱, aha Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi zinye̱ e̱ hu kya ne nyi rā bi tu ne nyi rishi ki rinng.
Aha nii, nyi ri ma ku Be̱ne̱ he ni:
‘Be̱ nzhi ne ngwe̱ shi zinye̱,
ré ci lo wiri ngwe̱ grime̱.
Ringgwe̱ ngwe̱ re be;
ré nyi kya ce̱ ngwe̱ a be ngwie̱ shi ne e nyí a zinye̱.
Níng ngwa yâ ye nzhi ko zohu otu.
Níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi,
shi ne nzhi we nné ne mbe níng nyi e̱ngwie̱ng ma.
Níng kye̱ ne mwa ri.
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ níng we nzhi ngwie nva Nne Hwie̱ we̱.’
“Aha kundu ne nyi wé nneywí re-e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe níng nying, Be̱ nyi a zinye̱ e̱ we̱ níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi ma.
Me̱di kundu de̱ nyi wé nneywí re-e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe níng nying we̱, ko shi Be̱ nyi re níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi ma we̱.
“A zhe ne nyi shi rwe onu, shi de̱ nyi rwe riyii shi shi nné brra ronu mbe nyi we̱. Á rwe riyii aha nneywí ré hu he mbe shi rwe onu. Nje níng ting cence he á she lede mbe zhwozhwo.
Me̱di a zhe ne ngwe̱ shi rwe onu, kyu riyii, ngwe̱ e̱ kwe remie he̱rri rici,
kishi a ri shi gbeng a nyyi nneywí he ngwe̱ shi rwe onu. Me̱di se we Be̱ ngwe̱ ne koó ki ri we̱, we ze̱re̱ ngu ne ngu rí kya ne e nyí la la, we̱ re ngwa lede.
“Shi de̱ ngwe̱ tsu dukyie̱e̱ aha rici ngwe̱ a be ngwie̱ he we̱, ewie ne zhe ngu hung yeng, ka re bra rre ho, nné nca á bra ngwié wé̱ ko.
Me̱di nyi tsu dukyie̱e̱ nyi a zinye̱, ewie ne ko zhe yé we̱, ko bra rré we̱, ko nné nca bra hung ngwié ré nyi ncang we̱.
Aha ewie ne dukyie̱e̱ ngwe̱ ning shi, rie ngwe̱ we̱ shi miimi ma.
“Riyii shi shi nyi fitile̱ rwe̱. Kundu riyii ngwe̱ shi gbingbi, maahu nse̱ we̱ tsie̱ a yarri rwe̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo;
me̱di kundu de̱ riyii ngwe̱ shi gbingbi we̱, maahu rwe̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo we̱ shi we e̱ ywing. Kundu ne nse̱ a yarri ngwe̱ a nyi ewie ywi, maahu ewie ywi nna zhwo we zhwo!
“Ko bi nne re hung nyi re-be̱ri wehwie cwuo we̱. Se ka re ra ya re ce̱ ya, ka re bra ngwa rici a nwie ya, re dzie̱ ya. Ko shi nyi hung nyi Be̱ne̱ cwuo ne nyi sa riyii a ncwé̱ we̱.

“Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje níng tíng he, shi de̱ nyi bē aha kya ne nyi shi yeng ka nyi shi shweng a srra nce nyi, ka nyi bē aha kya ne nyi shi cing a re-rwe̱ nyi we̱. Ko ce e̱ ne̱ yâ ye we̱ e̱e̱? Ko rwe̱ e̱ ne̱ ankya ci we̱ e̱e̱?
Nyi ri re̱mie̱ e̱, koó kyé̱ we̱, koó bra cá yâ we̱, wire re ning hwie̱ cing a aata. Gbengbe ni, Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi zinye̱ e̱ we ngwá kya ye. Ko nyi e̱ nyi bi mpe̱ni re we ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Nyi nye̱ a tsi nyi ne̱ re hu ning bra we awa zunzrru
“Ma nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi bē aha re-ankya ci e̱? Nyi ri re-vooshwo ne mbe cí a yarri ntsi a yi: koó nyi cwuo ka ré yaa cwi ankya rina a mwa yi mbe we̱.
Gbengbe ni, nje níng tíng he ko ngbe Nggwe̱ Solomo ne risa ngu, koo cwu rina ya a tsi re-vooshwo ne̱ we̱.
Kundu Be̱ne̱ hung nyi ntsi yi risa ni, ne a cwu á ning shi, a encwe wé̱ kro a nro, ko nyi hwie he Be̱ne̱ we̱ níng ngwa kya ci rwe̱ re we ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Kei nyi ma, sa rie nyi a shi tsie̱nzhwu rimi ni!
“Aha nii, shi de̱ nyi bē he, ‘Nyi nda ne nje shi yeng?’ ka ‘Nyi nda ne nje shi shweng?’ ka ‘Nyi nda ne nje shi cing?’ we̱.
(A nyi zhwe re-ankya ne̱ ne nné tsi ngwie̱ mbe yú.) Me̱di Be̱ nyi a zinye̱ e̱ hu re̱se̱ng he nyi rā bi re-ankya ne̱.
Me̱di nyi ke̱she kre Ringgwe̱ ngu ngbe nyi cwuo redziee ngu, wire ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo wé̱ níng brang.
Aha nii, shi de̱ nyi bē aha encwe we̱, aha encwe ri be ne re-ankyang hwie nka na ngu. Ko zohu otu bi we zhwe cinci na ngu.
“Shi de̱ nyi nyi ya nne nka we̱, kishi Be̱ne̱ ri níng nyi nka ma.
Aha ye̱ye̱rri ne nyi nyí yaká nné nka, á ri níng nyi nka ma; ye̱ye̱rri kwrengyi ne nyi ning mwa yáng, nyi ngu ne e ri níng mwang ma.
Nyi nda ngu ci ne ngwe̱ ri e̱we̱ kya ne ngu shi riyii gimbe ngwe̱, me̱di ko ngwe̱ ci nkwile̱ ne ngba klankwe ne ngu shi riyii na ngwe̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Ngwe̱ e̱ ce̱ rimi ngwe̱ he ne gimbe ngwe̱ he, ‘Ning be n re ti e̱we̱ kya ne ngu shi riyii ngwe̱ ne̱,’ ne ngwe̱ bra bi ngba klankwe a riyii na ngwe̱ e̱ ye̱?
Ngwe̱ nne brra onu, ke̱she ti ngba klankwe ne ngu shi riyii ngwe̱, wire ngwe̱ hung ri ewie krrankrra ngbe ngwe̱ ti gimbe ngwe̱ kya a riyii ngu ma.
“Shi de̱ nyi ngwa rovu kya ngu shi wiri we̱, shi de̱ nyi bra ngwa re-lede zunkya nyi we̱, aha wé̱ shi ne nta mbe; ngbe mbiye ana wé̱ bra kpi nyi wé̱ níng ti ruhu.
“Rin, ngbe wé̱ re ngwa; kre, ngbe ngwe̱ e̱ she; cwe onusinye, ngbe wé̱ re klang.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu rin, wé̱ ki ngwa; ko nye̱ ne ngu kre, we̱ she; ko nye̱ ne ngu cwe ewie, wé̱ ki klang.
Nyi nye̱ a tsi nyi re-be̱ ne kundu ewe ngu ki rinng aha brredi, ngbe we̱ ki ngwa ngbaatsie e̱e̱?
Ka, kundu ngu ki rinng aha hwen, ngbe we̱ ki ngwa nshe e̱e̱?
Ma kundu nyi ne nyi bi hwie̱, nyi hung na rewe nyi ankya rina ni, ko nyi hwie he Be̱ nyi a zinye̱ e̱ kre we he ngu ngwa nné ne mbe ki rinng re-te̱nte̱ ankya wo ye̱?
“Aha nii, a yarri ko nda, nyi nyi yakáng ye̱ye̱rri ne kya nyi ce̱ he ré níng nying ma: nyi nke ne̱ ngu nyi kya ne Nti Nka Musa ngbe na nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe mié̱.
“Nyi ngwie a onusinye yhwen, aha onusinye ngbe rê na ne e ning cwo re nzhi nwieng ci shweni e̱ shi terere. Nneywí piriri shi ning cwo.
Me̱di onusinye re nzhi nwieng she ce e̱ shi yhwen, rê nna bra bi rwe̱. Ngbe nné mbe ne mbe ki shé e̱ á shi gyiegyie.
“Nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra ne mbe cwo nwie nyi a ikpe canvé, me̱di a yarring á nyi re-nyanya yi ne nzhwo we wie.
Nyi shi we hu a re-ankya ne mbe nyí. Á kpi ngbre roshwo me̱nte̱ a ekwe ze̱kye̱ e̱e̱? Ka á kpi riyhwietsie a ekwe eezhe e̱e̱?
A shi ni, ko zohu ekwe rina ngwa ngbre te̱nte̱ng, ko zohu ekwe ne ngu dzio ngwá ngbre ne mbe dzio ma.
Ko shi ekwe rina re ngwa gbre ne ngu dzio we̱, ko shi ekwe ne ngu dzio re bra ngwa te̱nte̱ gbre ma we̱.
Ko zohu ekwe ne ko ngu ngwá gbre rina we̱, á tsá wé̱ zhwu a nro.
Aha nii, nyi shi hu nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra a re-ankya ne mbe nyi.
“Ko nyi ko nye̱ ne ngu kyie̱ he, ‘Brrabe̱, Brrabe̱’ ne ngu ri ngwie a Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ we̱, me̱di se nne nke ne ngu nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ nje ne ngu shi zinye̱.
Nneywí piriri ri he ne nje a Tuuye he, ‘Brrabe̱, Brrabe̱! Ko nzhi i ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ a yarri lo ngwe̱, he̱rri nzhi trru re-rije nzhi bra nyi re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu ne lo ngwe̱ we̱ e̱e̱?’
Wire ma n we ting we gbeng he, ‘Ko nje sa níng hu we̱. Nyi ne̱ nwie nje, nyi nné e̱ngwie̱!’
“Aha nii, ko nye̱ ne ngu hó re-nka nje ne̱ ngu ning nyí cwuo mi, a shi shi nne bi zentsi ne ngu no eri a kprahwan.
Nze kpe be, rishi e̱ wru a re-yince, wu to ne igbe̱ nwie cwe eri nna; gbengbe ni koo gu we̱, aha ne á cwucwu riti nna a kprahwan.
“Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ho nti nka nje ne̱, ne ko ngu bra ning nyí cwuo mi we̱, a shi shi rumwa ne ngu no eri ngu a nzha.
Nze kpe be, re-yince e̱ shî ne rishi, wu to ne igbe̱ nwie cwe eri nna, ngu a gu wrrototo.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he re-nka ne̱ yhwe̱, rigwe̱ nné nna á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu aha zhwe nka ngu ne ngu mie̱,
aha aa we mie̱ nka shi shi nne ne ngu bi de̱me̱ rici ngu, ko shi shi na nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa we̱.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu cwucwu a zete rugu nna, rigwe̱ nné we yang á ki zhwe.
Ya nne bi ruhunzhwe̱ e̱ be ya hu be a nyyi ngu, a he, “Brrabe̱, kundu ngwe̱ shî, ning ci n ci gbingbi n bra ci wiri.”
Jesu na va ngu a re nne nna. Ngu a he, “Nje shî, ci gbingbi.” We zhe zunzrru ruhunzhwe̱ ngu a ne̱.
Wire Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ri, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ti ko ya nneng we̱. Me̱di ywa ngwe̱ ya ti rici ngwe̱ a nwie prristi, ngwe̱ bra ngwa beeko shi ne Musa i níng mie̱ng, ngbe re hwie̱ sheede a nwie nneywí.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ngwie a Kafanahu, ya shwa shezhi nné Rroma a be nwie ngu he re ki sheng.
A he, “Brrabe̱, hwie nje shi nywe̱ a ri, aa kwi nkye̱ a bra shi ge̱zhe̱ we yang.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nje cwo nzhi ki ci re ci gbingbi.”
Shwa shezhi e̱ ki shing he, “Ka, Brrabe̱! Ko nje be ngbe ngwe̱ ngwie ta ri nje we̱. Me̱di tsie we riti nka, ngbe hwie nje e̱ we̱ ci gbingbi.

Nje ne̱ nje nyi nne ne nje bi nné ne mbe shi ncwuee nje, nje bra bi re-shezhi ne mbe shi tahwie nje ma. Nje he ne nke he, ‘Ywa!’ ngbe we̱ ywa, ma n he ne ya he, ‘Be!’ ngbe we̱ be. Nje he ne hwie nje he, ‘Nyi nke!’ ngbe we̱ nyi.”
A zhe ne Jesu ho ni, ngu a nga we onu, ngu a he ne nné ne mbe ki zhwe he, “Nje níng ting cence, ko nje sa she ya nne a Isrreela ne ngu bi zhwe sa rie ne̱ we̱.
Nje níng ting he: nné piriri ri wru a nva ze ngbe nva ta, á ri ya she rewieng srra ngbe Ibrrahin, ngbe Ishaku, ngbe Yakubu a para a yarri Ringgwe̱ zinye̱.
Me̱di á ri zi rewe ri Ringgwe̱ nna a ci, a yarri ewie ywing, á ri ku rana a miimi re ye nnyi.”
Wire Jesu a he ne shwa shezhi nna he, “Ywa! Á shi re nying ye̱ye̱rri ne sa rie ngwe̱.”
Hwie ngu a ci gbingbi we zhe ana.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ywa a ri Pita, aa ya she de̱ mbrru ngu shi nywe̱ ne rwe kanka.
Ngu a ki re va, ngbe rwe̱ nna aa ki weni. Mbrru nna a cinye̱, ngu a kre Jesu rishi shwe.
A zhe ne ne̱hin ci, á be ne nné piriri ne mbe bi re-rije nwie Jesu, ngu a we trru re-rije nna we ne riti nka, ngu a bra kyia ga nné ruhu nna.
Aa nyi ni ngbe kya ne Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he re ci rrurru, shi ne ngu i he:
“Aa trru re-ruhu nzhi,
aa níng ci nzhi ci gbingbi ne
re-riywe̱ ho shwing nzhi.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ri rigwe̱ nné mbe ki grra, ngu a ngwa nné ki zhwe ngu nka he mbe tsa nzhwo rishi nna re nzhi nyie nke ncwi.
Wire ya nne mie̱ Nti Nka Musa a be nwie ngu. A he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nje shi re zhwe ko he ngwe̱ ning ywa.”
Jesu ki shing he, “Rovu yi e̱ á bi nvo mbe, re̱mie̱ yi á bi reri, me̱di ko Kowe Nneywi e̱ bi ewieng nywe̱ rici ngu we̱.”
Ya a tsi nné ne mbe ki zhwe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, nde n ke̱she n ya nyie̱ ho nne nje wire.”
Jesu he ne ngu he, “Ning zhwe! We nné kwi e̱ ré nyie̱ nkwe nné mbe.”
Wire ngu a ngwie a yarri konkro, nné ki zhwe ngu a á ngwie ngbe ngu.
Á srra we kpri, ya brra ncwu deze ne ren a yarri brra nzhwo rishi nna, he̱rri gu rishi ne̱ ne cwe re ngwie a yarri konkro nna. Me̱di Jesu shi ndzie.
Nné ki zhwe ngu a á ya ki shwo, á he, “Brrabe̱, níng kyia! Nzhi shi ci shweni!”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Aha nda nyi ci owu a? Sa rie nyi e̱ shi tsie̱nzhwu rimi ni e̱e̱? Wire ngu a deze ngu a ti ren ne wu ngbe gu rishi nna. Ko nda a nywe̱ cereng fa.”
Nné nna á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu nwie he, “Nyi zohu zhwe nne he ni e̱? He̱rri wu ngbe gu rishi á ki ho nka aa!”
A zhe ne ngu ya cwu a nyie rebe nné Gadarra.
Mbe e̱ wre̱ ne ci onu he, “Kowe Be̱ne̱! Nyi nda shwe nzhi ngbe ngwe̱ e̱e̱? Ngwe̱ ke̱nce̱ be ngbe ngwe̱ níng ngwa ge̱zhe̱ tu ne ko zhe nna ci we̱ e̱e̱?”
A bi ya brra ekpri re-lede ne mbe shi reye we ze̱nze̱ tsie̱,
Re-rije nna á cwe nva ne Jesu he, “Kusu, kundu ngwe̱ ri shi níng yu, ngwe̱ níng we nzhi ya ngwie a yarri ekpri re-lede ncwi e̱.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ywa!” Mbe e̱ wru mbe e̱ ya ngwie a yarri re-lede nna. Ngbe ekpri re-lede nna zhwozhwo á wrre a brraa á ya kpi a nzhwo rishi, á kwi miimi.
Nné cwo re-lede nna á ngwie yarri brra ngwie̱ ne re-ncii re nzhi ti ko nda ngbe kya ngu ci ne nné bi re-rije wehwie nna.
Ga nné ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo á nga re nzhi nyi ne Jesu. A zhe ne mbe ya ki she, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he kusu re ne̱ a ngwie̱ mbe.
Jesu ngwie a yarri konkro, ngu a ning brru tsa nyie re be a ngwie̱ ne ngu ning srra.
Yá nné e̱ be ne ya nne ne ngu kwi nkye̱ a nwie ngu, ne ngu nywe̱ a kpengye. Zhe ne Jesu ngu ri sa rie mbe ni, ngu a he ne nne nna he, “Kowe nje, shi de̱ ngwe̱ bē we̱, á re we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngwe̱.”
Aha nii, yá nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ne̱ ne he re nka we nci mbe he, “Nne ne̱ shi dzie̱ Be̱ne̱!”
Me̱di Jesu hu kya ne mbe shi heng, ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi hwie zhwe re-nka ne̱?
A nyi canca ré he rimi: ré he, ‘Á re we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngwe̱,’ ka ré he, ‘Deze ngwe̱ cwo ciee e̱e̱’?
Me̱di nje níng ting ngbe nyi hu he Kowe Nneywi e̱ bi de̱me̱ a be ngwie̱ ngbe re we nneywí re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe.” Ngu a he ne nne kwi nkye̱ nna he, “Deze, fo kpengye ngwe̱ ngwe̱ si ri.”
Nne nna a deze ngu a ne̱ re nzhi ri.
Zhe ne rigwe̱ nné mbe ri ni, rowu we yhwe̱, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne de Be̱ne̱, aha ngu ngwa nneywí zhwe de̱me̱ ne̱.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ne̱ miimi, ngu a ya she ya nne ne e ki ye he Mata ne ngu srra a wofing si gondu ngu. A he ne ngu he, “Ning zhwe.”
Mata a cinye̱ ngu a ki zhwe.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu shi ye yâ a ri Mata, nné si gondu ngbe “nné e̱ngwie̱” á be nwie ye yâ ngbe ngu, ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu.
Zhe ne nné Farisi mbe ri ni, mbe e̱ rin nné ki zhwe ngung he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne Nne Mie̱ Nka nyi e̱ ngu yé yâ ngbe nné si gondu ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu ho ni ngu a he, “Ko nyi nné gbingbi mbe kre nne rikye̱ we̱, se ka nné ruhu hoo.

Me̱di nyi ywa nyi ya ning bra hwieng ngbe nyi pie cwu kya ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he a nti nka ne̱: ‘Nje ce̱ he nyi bi naana nneywí re ne̱ re-teedeng shwi ankya rehwe ne nyi nyí aha nje.’ Ko nje be ye nné redziee we̱, nje be aha nné e̱ngwie̱.”
Wire nné zhwe Yohana á be ya rin Jesu nka he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nzhi ngbe nné Farisi nzhi rwe onu, me̱di ko nné re zhwe ngwe̱ á nyi we̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu we shing he, “Wé̱ ce̱ rimi re-yeva nne rwe nyrra ré cí rehwie dzio, ne nne rwe nyrra nna ngu shi ngbe mbe e̱e̱? Zhe cwo be ne á ri fo nne rwe nyrra nna, wire wé̱ rwe onu fa.
Ko bi ya nne ngu fo kla trro hwi re ning tsie ruba a tago reni we̱, aha ruba nna we̱ yaa hwrri we̱ fie̱ tago nna, he̱rri we̱ hla ne̱ ni.

Koó bra kro hwihwi rishi ruto a yarri re-gure kpe na rening we̱. Kundu ne nyi ni, re-gure kpe nna wé̱ srra, rishi ruto nna we̱ wa be, gure kpe nna we̱ bra dzio. Kya ne e nyi e̱ nyi nke, á kro hwihwi rishi ruto a yarri gure kpe hwi, wire zhwozhwo wehwie nna wé̱ srra rina.”
A zhe ne Jesu shi he re-nka ne̱, ya nnencwuee zonggrung mwe e̱ be, ngu a hu be a nyyi ngu, a he, “Ewena nje hu we zhe ne ne̱. Ning be ngwe̱ ya ki gara va ngbe re ci ce.”
Jesu deze ki zhwe re nzhi, nné ki zhwe ngu á ki zhwe ma.
We zhe nna, ya mbrru ne ngu ci re-rie shwa ne otu wehwie ne ruhu to roshwo aa ya wre̱ a merin ngu, ngu a re zhi tago ngu.
A hé we hwie ngu he, “Kundu nje re we tago ngu ne̱, ma n ci gbingbi.”
Jesu bra ki ri, ngu a he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ bē we̱, ewena, sa rie ngwe̱ a re kyia.” We zhe ana mbrru nna ci gbingbi.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ngwie a ri nnencwuee nna, ngu a ri nné tsie̱ uuzhwu, ngbe rigwe̱ nné riywe̱ ne ewie shwu.
Ngu a he, “Nyi wru! Ko ewena ne̱ e̱ hu we̱ — a shi we ndzie.” Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ki mi nhile̱ nhile̱.
A zhe ne e we trru ci fa, ngu a ngwie a yarri zonggru nna, ngu a pie ewena nna va, ewena a deze.
Nka nna se̱ ngwie̱ yu a re-nkla miimi zhwozhwo.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ne̱ miimi, nnencwué̱ wehwie á ki zhwé re ki kyie̱ nwie he, “Ri naana nzhi, Kowe Dooda!”
Zhe ne ngu ya ngwie zonggru, nnencwué̱ nna á be nwie ngu, ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi sa rie he ma n hung nying ni e̱e̱?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Ee, Brrabe̱!”
Ngu a we ria nyyi mbe, ngu a he, “Ye̱ye̱rri ne sa rie nyi, nde re ci ni.”
Ngbe nyyi mbe e̱ kla. Jesu we gara nka ne igbe̱ he, “Shi de̱ nyi ti ko ya nneng we̱.”
Me̱di á wru á ya grra ko he a ngwie̱ nna nwie ni nka nna.
A zhe ne mbe shi wru ci, yá nné e̱ be mi ne ya nne, ne rije ki ci ngu ci rumwa, a nwie Jesu.
We zhe ne Jesu ngu ki ti rije nna, ngu a ne̱ ne he nka we te̱rr. Ga nneywí ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu nwie he, “Koó sa ri zhwe ngge ne̱ a ngwie̱ Isrreela we̱.”
Me̱di nné Farisi e̱ á he he, “A trrú re-rije ne̱ ne igbe̱ nggwe̱ re-rije.”
Jesu grra a re-ngwie̱ ngbe nkla zhwozhwo nwie mie̱ nka a re-zonggrung mwe, a we brró Nka Rina na Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ re kyia nneywí ne re-nzhwe ruhu ngbe ko zohu riywe̱ gbingbi.
A zhe ne ngu ri rigwe̱ nné, naana ki pie, aha ngu ri mbe shi cinci we̱sa ne nne we sheng, shi shi nyi canvé we̱sa ne nne cwo.
Ngu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Ebe yâ a brri we brri, me̱di nné cang nna koó ning bing we̱.
Nyi cwe nva ne Brrabe̱ bi ebe e̱ ngbe re lu nnencwuó ré ya ca.”
Jesu ye nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu wehwie, ngu a we ngwa de̱me̱ ré trru re-rije ré bra kyia ko zohu zhwe ruhu ngbe riywe̱ gbingbi.
Re-lo nnenté ngu shwa ne otu wehwie nna nyi nke: na ce̱ucwung, a bi Sima (ne e ki ye he Pita) ngbe gimbe ngu Andrru, a bra bi Yakubu ngbe ne gimbe ngu Yohana ne mbe nyi rewe Zebedi;
a bi Filibu ngbe Batolomi, ngbe Toma ngbe Mata ne ngu nyi nne si gondu, a bi Yakubu ewe Alifayu, ngbe Tadiyu,
ngbe Sima ne ngu nyi Nne Ngwa Rici
Mbe nné shwa ne otu wehwie ne̱ Jesu we te, ngu a we gara nka he, “Shi de̱ nyi pie rê re nzhi nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ka nyi ngwie ya ngwie̱ nné Samariya we̱.
Me̱di nyi ywa nwie rewe Isrreela ne mbe shi shi canvé ne mbe bru.
Nyi ywa nyi ya we brro nka he, ‘Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ sa dudu!’
Nyi kyia nné ruhu, nyi deze nné ne mbe kwi, nyi ci nné ruhunzhwe̱ ré ci wiri, nyi trru re-rije. Nyi she we shweni, nyi ngwa we shweni ma.
Shi de̱ nyi fo cwe ncwe̱ zinarriya ka azrrufa ka pe̱me̱ a yarri re-de nyi we̱.
Shi de̱ nyi ko re-lente, ka re-tago wehwie wehwie, ka re-tamri, ka ngbó a ciee ne̱ we̱; aha aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nnencwuo re she yâ ye ngu.
“Ko zohu ngwie̱ ka kla ne nyi níng ngwie, nyi kre ya te̱nte̱ nne a miimi aha nyi srra a ri ngu, se zhe ne nyi ri ne̱.
A zhe ne nyi shi ngwie a ri nne, nyi ke̱she ci dzie.
Kundu ne nné ri nna mbe nyi te̱nte̱ng, nyi e̱ mwo he srra rina Be̱ne̱ re shi ngbe mbe. De̱e̱ ni wo, nyi e̱ ning brru ne srra rina nyi.
Kundu ne de̱ ya mbe níng se̱ ka ngu sa uucwu aha ngu níng ho we̱, nyi gbe̱ ruvu nta nyi a zhe ne nyi shi we eri nna ka ngwie̱ nna.
Nje níng ting cence, a ri nyi canca ngwie̱ Sodo ngbe Gomorra a tung nyi nka ne ngwie̱ ana.
“Nyi ri! Nje níng te shi nyi nyí canvé a yarri re-nyanya yi. Aha nii, nyi bi re-zentsi shi nshé me̱di nyi shi ranng shi jie̱riywí.
Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne nneywí, á ri níng prre wé̱ níng ngwa a nva nné nyi nka, he̱rri wé̱ níng cwe a re-zonggru rotsu mbe.
Aha nje, á ri níng kwa re be nyyi re-goona ngbe nggwé̱, ngbe nyi e̱ she riwie̱ng ti Nka Rina a nwie mbe ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.
Me̱di a zhe ne mbe ri níng prre, shi de̱ nyi bē aha kya ne nyi ri he, ka nyi ri he rimi ye̱ we̱. A zhe ana á ri níng ngwa kya ne nyi ri he.
Aha ko ri nyi nyi ne nyi ri he we̱, me̱di Nshe na Be̱ nyi ri he nka a yarri nyi.
“Gimbe ri ngwa gimbe ngu ré ki yhwe̱, be̱ ri ngwa ewe ngu ni ma, e̱we̱e̱ rewe ri ne̱ ne klo nci ne nné we bî, he̱rri wé̱ ci ré we yhwi.
Ga nné zhwozhwo ri níng ra aha nje, me̱di nne ne ngu ri yo gangga we̱ ri she drre̱.
Kundu ne e ri shi nwie níng ngwa ge̱zhe̱ a ya ngwie̱, nyi to re nzhi yaka. Nje níng ting cence he Kowe Nneywi e̱ cwo be tu we ne nyi rishi grra re-ngwie̱ Isrreela yhwe̱.
“Ko ewe ne e ki mie̱ nka né̱ nne ngu ki mie̱ng we̱; ko bi ya hwie re ne̱ be̱ri ngu we̱.
Ewe ne e ki mie̱ nka re nyi rekwi, aha ngu shi hwie̱ shi nne ngu ki mie̱ng, hwie re nyi rekwi aha ngu shi ci shi be̱ri ngu ma. Kundu ne e ye be̱ri eri he Beelzebu, ma wé̱ ngra ye nné ri nna he nda?
“Aha nii, shi de̱ nyi ci owu nneywí we̱. Ko bi yankya ne ngu shi ku ne ri we we̱sa klang ci we̱, ka kya ne ngu shi la la ne ri we̱sa hung we̱.
Kya ne nje níng ting a la la, nyi he a tsi te̱ne̱, kya ne nje níng heng ranranng a riti uucwu, nyi brro a re-zete zonggru.
Shi de̱ nyi to owu nné mbe ne mbe hung yhwe̱ we ikperwe̱ me̱di ko shi ré hung ci ce re ci shweni we̱. Canca, nyi to owu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu hung ci ce ngbe ikperwe̱ ré ci shweni a ruvong ro.
Koó rie̱ re-genshee wehwie a kovo zunzrru we̱ e̱e̱? Me̱di ko bi ko ya mbe ne ngu kpe be we̱sa ne Be̱ nyi ngu hu re̱se̱ng we̱.
Me̱di nyi e̱, ko ngbe nkwe rici nyi ma, aa hwie zhwozhwo.
Aha nii, shi de̱ nyi ci owu we̱, nyi bi mpe̱ni re ne̱ rekpri re-genshee we gbong.
“Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu ti we gbeng a nyyi nneywí he ngu nyi na nje, nje ri ti he nyi na nje we gbeng ni ma a nyyi Be̱ nje a zinye̱.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ti he ko ngu nyi na nje we̱ a nyyi nneywí, nje ri ti ni ma a nyyi Be̱ nje a zinye̱.
“Shi de̱ nyi hwie he nje be ne̱ aha n be mi ne srra rina a be ngwie̱ we̱. Ko nje be ne̱ aha n be mi ne srra rina we̱, me̱di aha n be mi ne ise̱nkeli.
Aha ne be nje ne̱,
‘Yá nné shi ce̱trri re-be̱ mbe,
yá rana shi ce̱trri dé̱ mbe,
kunvé shi ce̱trri kwé mbe.
Rwinkó nneywi shi nyi we re-gimbe ngu
a yarri ri mbe.’
“Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ be̱ ngu ka de̱ ngu re ning ne̱, ko shi re hung hwie̱ na nje we̱; ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ ewe ngu ka ewena ngu re ning ne̱, ko shi re hung hwie̱ na nje we̱;
ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu fo gasankwe ngu ngu ning zhwe we̱, ko shi re hung hwie̱ na nje we̱.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu cwo ce ngu ne rici ngu, we̱ wi; me̱di nne ne ngu ngwa ce ngu aha nje, we̱ she.
“Nne ne ngu níng se̱ nyi, aa ning se̱ nje, nne ne ngu ning se̱, maahu aa ki se̱ ngu ne ngu ning te ma.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu sé̱ nne ti re̱se̱ng aha ne ngu nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng, a ri she lede nne ti re̱se̱ng; ko nye̱ ne ngu sé̱ nne redziee aha ngu nyi nne redziee, a ri she lede nne redziee.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu bra ngwa ya a tsi e̱wé̱ nné mbe ne̱ kwrreshi rishi aha ngu nyi nne ning zhwe nje, nje níng ting cence he ko shi re we she lede ngu we̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ti nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu wehwie re-ankya ne mbe shi nying yhwe̱, ngu a ne̱ miimi re nzhi mie̱ nka re brro nka a re-ngwie̱ Galili.
A zhe ne Yohana shi a uucwu gyiaa, ngu a ho kya ne Jesu shi nying, ngu a te yá nné ki zhwe ngu re nzhi nwie ngu
ré ya ki rinng he, “Nyi ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ cwo be e̱ ka nzhi sa riyii a yaka aa?”
Jesu we shing he, “Nyi ning brru nyi ya ti Yohana kya ne nyi ho, ne nyi bra ri:
nnencwué̱ ne̱ ne ri ewie, nnenkú shi cwo ciee, nné ruhunzhwe̱ á ci wiri, nné re̱n á ho nka, nné ne mbe kwi shi nyinye̱, á bra shi brro yiriywé̱ Nka Rina.
Mwo rina shi zete nne nkiye ne ko ngu nyi jinji sa rie a nje we̱.”

A zhe ne nné zhwe Yohana mbe shi ne̱, Jesu ne̱ ne rin nneywíng he, “A zhe ne nyi ywa nwie Yohana a tsi yi e̱, a nyi nda ne nyi hwie nyi cwo a ring? Ya brra riti ntsi shi iica ngu gbe̱, ne wu ki yhwa aa?
Ma nyi ywa ri nda? Ya nne ne ngu ci ankya rina aa? Aawo, nné ne mbe ci re-ankya rina á srra a reri nggwé̱.
Ma nyi ywa ri nda aa na? Nne ti re̱se̱ng e̱e̱? Ee, nje níng ting he aa hle nne ti re̱se̱ng.
Nyi ngu ne̱ ne e wie aha ngu he,
‘Ri, nje shi te nnente nje a ncwuee ngwe̱,
a shi ke̱she ngwe̱ ngbe re ya re nyi rê.’
Nje níng ting cence he, a tsi rewe ne mbrrú nyi ne bîng, koó sa she ya ngu wru he̱rri ngu ne̱ Yohana Nyi Batisma we̱; gbengbe ni, ngu ne ngu nyi nyrru iishing a Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ e̱ ki ne̱.
Kya ne ngu pie a rotu Yohana Nyi Batisma re be wre̱ zhe ne, Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ a shwe cinci, ngbe nné ngwa rici e̱ á nyi kwe̱kwe̱ he mbe se̱ ne igbe̱.
Aha á nyi ne ti re̱se̱ nka Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ e̱ a re-krre̱de̱ nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe Nti Nka Musa he̱rri re be zhe Yohana.
Kundu nyi rā shî re-nka mbe, nyi e̱ shî he Yohana nyi Iliya ne i ti he cwo be e̱.
Nde nne bi re-uucwung hong re ho!
“Ma n fo nda n ning mwa yi ne nné nze̱ ne̱ e̱ ye̱? Á shi shi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne mbe srrá a kaawe̱ re e̱ kyie̱ he,
‘Nzhi níng tsie̱ uuzhwu,
nyi bra ra shwo rocwu!
Nzhi níng ve ve naana naana,
nyi bra ra ku rana riywe̱!’
Yohana be, ko yé we̱ ko shwé we̱, á he he bi rije.
Kowe Nneywi e̱ be, á he he nyi kroozhwo, he nyi rwi nné si gondu ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱. Gbengbe ni ma, raywrra na zentsi Be̱ne̱ shi we gbeng a yarri re-cwuo ngu.”
Wire Jesu a ne̱ ne yhwire nné re-ngwie̱ ne ngu ning nyi jie̱ re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu, aha ne ko mbe si ywe̱ we̱.

“Wuhu ne nyi nné ngwie̱ Korrazi! Wuhu ne nyi nné ngwie̱ Beseda! Kundu re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu ne e nyi a yarri nyi ra nyi a Taya ngbe Sido ne e ning nying, á ra ree ci re-igye̱ ankya gbangba nwie yaa krro nto prrumprruprru aha mbe ti zhwe si ywe̱ mbe.
Me̱di nje níng ting he, a ri nyi canca nné ngwie̱ Taya ngbe Sido a Tung Nyi Nka ne nyi!
Nyi nné Kafanahu, nyi hwie he á ri níng ko re nzhi zinye̱ e̱e̱? Hayi, á ri wro ne nyi re nzhi cwuncwuu ruvo ci yhwrro.
Me̱di nje níng ting he a ri nyi canca nné Sodo a Tung Nyi Nka ne nyi.”
A zhe ana Jesu he, “Be̱, Brrabe̱ zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱, nje re ci kijie̱ng aha
A shi ni Be̱, aha nke nyi kya ce̱ ngwe̱.

“Be̱ nje ne ngu shi zinye̱ ning ngwa ga re-ankya zhwozhwo a nva nje. Ko bi ya nne ngu hu Kowe we̱ se we Be̱, ko bra bi ya nne ngu hu Be̱ ma wo se we Kowe ngbe mbe ne Kowe ngu kyie he ngu we klang ngu.
“Nyi be nwie nje, ga nyi ne nyi rrwa ne nkpe ruvo, ngbe ma n níng ngwa srra cwu.
Nyi ngwa nci nyi nwie zhwe nti nka nje, nyi mie̱ ne nje; aha nje shi ranng nje bra yaa ci re̱, ngbe nyi e̱ she srra cwu.
Aha Nti Nka ne nje níng mie̱ng he nyi zhwe e̱ koó bi rwe̱ we̱, nkpe na nje e̱ bra shi haara.”
A zhe ana, a ya Kotung Srra Cwu nné Yahudi, mbe Jesu shi nwie cwo a yarri rebe alikama ne mbe shi wara. Nzhwo yhwe̱ nné ki zhwe ngu, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne kpi re-nci alikama nna ré te̱.
A zhe ne nné Farisi mbe ri ni, mbe e̱ he ne Jesu he, “Ri, nné re zhwe ngwe̱ á shi nyi kya ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni ne Kotung Srra Cwu!”
Ngu a we shing he, “Ko nyi hwie krre̱de̱ nyi ri kya ne Dooda ngu i nyi a zhe ne ngu i ho nzhwo ngbe nné ne mbe i shi ngbe ngu we̱ e̱e̱?
Aa ngwie a zonggru Be̱ne̱ ngbe nné ne mbe shi ngbe ngu, á ye cwu yâ na wiri ne ko ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ye we̱ se we re-prristi ré hung yeng.
Ko nyi hwie a yarri Nti Nka Musa ne e he ko ngbe ne re-prristi ne mbe nyi cwuo a Tung Srra Cwu a Brranyi e̱ he koó bi vini we̱ wo ye̱?
Nje níng ting he, ngu ne ngu ne̱ Brranyi nna a shi he.
Kundu nyi ra hu cwu kya ne nka ne̱ ngu he: ‘Nje ce̱ he nyi bi naana nneywí re ne̱ re-teedeng shwi ankya rehwe ne nyi nyí aha nje,’ ko nyi ra he he nné mbe rre̱, ne ko mbe bi vini we̱ ne̱, á brru we̱.
Aha Kowe Nneywi e̱ nyi Brrabe̱ Kotung Srra Cwu.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ne̱ nwie ana, ngu a ya ngwie a yarri zonggrung mwe mbe.
A bi ya nne a miimi ne va ngu hu. Yá nné ne mbe kre rê mbe ning ci Jesu nka, á ki rinng he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ré ci nne re ci gbingbi a Tung Srra Cwu aa?”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Kundu ya nyi bi canve ne ngu kpe ruvo a Tung Srra Cwu, ko we̱ ki ti wo ye̱,
wire re ya ning hwie̱ nneywi ne ngu ne̱ canve ye̱? Aha nii, maahu aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré nyi kya rina a Tung Srra Cwu.”
Wire ngu a he ne nne nna he, “Na va ngwe̱.”
Ngu a na, ngbe va ngu a ci rina we shi va na hwie nna.
Nné Farisi e̱ wru, á ya ne̱ ne kre re-rê mbe ning yhwe̱ Jesu.
Jesu hu kya ne mbe shi mi, ngu a ne̱ a nwie nna. Nneywí piriri ki zhwe, ngu a we kyia ne re-ruhu mbe zhwozhwo,
ngu a he ne mbe he shi de̱ ré ti re-ankya ne ngu nyi we̱.
Aa nyi ni ngbe kya ne Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he re ci rrurru, ne ngu he:
“Nke nyi Kowe nje ne nje kyie,
nyi ngu ne nje ki ce̱, nje ho shwi ngu kpe̱kpe̱.
Nje shi ci Nshe nje re cwo ne ngu,
ngbe we̱ ti Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ raywrra nka kyia Be̱ne̱.
Ko ri krro nka, ka re kyie̱ onu,
ka ré ho re̱zhe̱ ngu a re-gasire we̱.
Iica ne ngu shi brrubrru,
ko shi re ngra ki vu we̱;
ka te̱le̱kyi ne ngu shi yu,
ko shi re ngra ki yu we̱;
a shi yaa rwe se ngu ci redziee drre̱
re-cwuo hwie̱ zhwozhwo,
he̱rri ga Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ri sa riyii a ngu.”
Wire á ki be mi ne ya nne bi re-rije ne rije ki ci ngu ci rumwa ngbe cwue̱, he re ki kyia. Jesu a ki kyia, he̱rri aa ne̱ ne he nka nwie ri ewie we cwancwancwaa.
Ga nné zhwozhwo ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu nwie he, “Kat, ka nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi Kowe Dooda aa?”
A zhe ne nné Farisi mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ he, “Ko shi nne ne̱ re hung ti ko ya rije we̱, se ka ne igbe̱ Beelzebu, nggwe̱ re-rije.”
Jesu hu kya ne mbe shi hwieng, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ko zohu ringgwe̱ ngwie̱ ne ngu yaa kye ngu ci kanka, we̱ ci shweni; ko zohu ngwie̱ ka eri ne nné nna mbe yaa kye kanka, ko shi re yo we̱.
Kundu re-rije a ringgwe̱ Shetani mbe ne̱ ne trru re-rije, maahu Shetani e̱ yaa kye we rici ngu. Wé̱ ce̱ rimi ringgwe̱ ngu a re yo aa?
Ma kundu ne nje trru re-rije ne igbe̱ Beelzebu, ma nné nyi e̱ ma rre, á trru ne igbe̱ nye̱ ma? Aha nii, kya ne mbe nyí e̱ tí he nyi brru.
Kundu nje ri trru re-rije ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri Be̱ne̱, maahu Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ be nwie nyi.
“Ka wé̱ ce̱ rimi ya nne re ngwie a ri nne bi igbe̱
“Nne ne ko ngu nyi na nje we̱, a ning ra; nne ne ko ngu ning shé tsung we̱, maahu shi sē̱ng.
Aha nii, wé̱ hung we ko nye̱ e̱ngwie̱ ngu ka nka e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu he,
Ko nye̱ ne ngu cwi Kowe Nneywi wé̱ hung ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu, me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu cwi Nshe Wiri ko shi re ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu we̱, a zhe ne ne̱ he̱rri tiya.
“Ci ekwe re bi rina ngbe ngbre ngu wé̱ bi rina ma; ka ngwe̱ ci ekwe re dzio, ngbre ngu wé̱ dzio we ni ma. Á hú ekwe a ngbre ngu.
Nyi zhwe kprre! Wé̱ ce̱ rimi ngbe nyi ne nyi nyí nné e̱ngwie̱ nyi he kya ngu bi rina aa? Aha re-nka ne mbe wru a nu nneywi e̱ wru a yarri rigwe̱ ankya ne mbe shi a nu rie ngu.
Nne te̱nte̱ng hwié nka te̱nte̱ng, ngbe we̱ nyi ankya te̱nte̱ng, me̱di nne e̱ngwie̱ hwie nka me̱nkye̱ ngbe we̱ nyi ankya le̱le̱ ne mbe wru nu rie ngu.
“Nje níng ting he á ri he Tuuye ne e ri nyi nka, nneywí ri he ga re-nka shweni ne mbe i he a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Á ri re nyi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne nti nka nu ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ i he, ka ré he ngwe̱ nyi rinang, ka ré he ngwe̱ i nyi ngwie̱ngwie̱ng.”
Wire yá nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe nné Farisi á he ne ngu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nzhi ce̱ ngwe̱ nyi yá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ngbe nzhi ri.”
Ngu a we shing he, “Kaat! Zhwe ze̱ nné hwie̱ ne, nné riywe̱ to owu Be̱ne̱! Á kré he mbe di ya sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu; me̱di ko bi ko ya ne mbe shi ring we̱, se ka zhwe na Jona, nne ti re̱se̱ng, hoo.
Shi ne Jona ngu i ci rotu wetsie̱ totu ne te̱ne̱ a yarri hwie brra hwen, ye̱ye̱rri ni Kowe Nneywi shi ci rotu wetsie̱ totu ne te̱ne̱ a yarri cwuncwuu ebe.

Á ri he Tuuye ne e ri nyi nka, nné Nineva á ri cinye̱, ngbe wé̱ ne̱ nné nze̱ ne̱ ne nka, aha á i si ywe̱ á we ni re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe a zhe ne mbe i ho brro nka Jona. Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, ngu ne ngu ne̱ Jona a shi he.

Mbrru ringgwe̱ nva kudu ri deze a zheng nyi nka ngbe nné nze̱ ne̱ ngbe we̱ we ne̱ a nka, aha a i wru gbong a krruci ebe ngwie̱ aha ngu ya ho zhwe zentsi Solomo; me̱di ngu ne ngu ne̱ Solomo nyi nke ngu shi he ne!
“A zhe ne rije ngu wru a yarri nne, we̱ ne̱ re nzhi a rewie hwahwa nwie kre ewieng srra cwu, kundu de̱ ngu ya she we̱,
wire we̱ he, ‘Nje shi ning brru re nzhi ri nje ne nje ning wru.’ Zhe ne ngu ya ning brru we̱ ya she eri nna shi hwerri, ne á ko eri nna wiri á ning ta ko nda rina rina.

Wire we̱ ning brru we̱ ya ko yaká re-rije ngbe natsie̱ ne mbe bi hwie̱ kaka re ki ne̱, wé̱ be wé̱ ya srra a miimi. Ngbe emerin ngu we̱ ya bi ge̱zhe̱ re ne̱ ce̱ucwung. A shi ci ni ne nné nze̱ bi hwie̱ ne̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu shi he nka ngbe rigwe̱ nné, de̱ ngu ngbe re-gimbe ngu á ya yo tese, á ce̱ he nka ne ngu.
[Ya he ne ngu he, “Di, de̱ ngwe̱ ngbe re-gimbe ngwe̱ shi yo tese, á ce̱ he nka ne ngwe̱.”]
Jesu ki shing he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu nyi de̱ nje e̱e̱? Nyi mbe nye̱ mbe nyi re-gimbe nje e̱e̱?”
Ngu a na va re nzhi nwie nné ki zhwe ngu, ngu a he, “Ri, de̱ nje ngbe re-gimbe nje e̱ á nyi nke!”
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ nje ne ngu shi zinye̱ a nyi gimbe nje — ewerento ka ewerembrru, ka de̱ nje.
We tu ana, Jesu wru a ri, ngu a ya srra a rekyi nzhwo rishi.
Rigwe̱ nné we yang á ya tsu a nwie ngu, he̱rri á ki ci aa ngwie a yarri konkro, ngu a ning srra a yarring ne nneywí mbe yo a rekyi nzhwo rishi nna.
Ngu a we ti re-ankya we yang ne nka zhwebe.
A he, “Ya nne kaa ywa ni zhwe.
A zhe ne ngu shi ni zhwe nna, yá kpi a nhwie̱ rê, re̱mie̱ ya ta á ye.
Yá kpi a ne̱hwan ne ko ngu zhwo bi mbè we̱. We zhe zunzrru á wre̱ ne ta, aha ewie nna bi e̱we̱ mbè we shaala.
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ ngu ya cwucwu, á wre̱ ne yomi, he̱rri á hwe aha ko re-rinyie nna á ngwie be we̱.
Yá kpi a yarri re-ze̱kye̱, re-ze̱kye̱ nna ci ngbe mbe, mbe e̱ we rrwe.
Me̱di yá kpi a mbè rina, á ci riyii. He̱rri yá nci nna á ci ncwe nnywa nnywang, yá nshwa rritsie̱ rritsie̱, kpi ma á ci ncwe nshwa wetsie̱ wetsie̱.”
Jesu ngu a he, “Nde nne bi re-uucwung hong re ho.”
Nné ki zhwe á be nwie ngu, á ki rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne ngwe̱ he nka ne nneywí we ne re-nka zhwebe ne̱ ma?”
Ngu a he, “Be̱ne̱ níng ngwa hu re̱se̱ re-ankya la la na Ringgwe̱ zinye̱, we̱sa ne mbe.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu bi hu re̱se̱ng,
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje we héng ne nka zhwebe aha,
‘Ko ngbe ne mbe ri we ri,
ko shi ré di we̱;
ko ngbe ne mbe ho we ho,
ko shi ré ho wire re ya ning hwie̱ hung we̱.’
Ngbe re-nka Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng wé̱ ci rrurru a rici mbe, shi ne ngu he:
‘Nné mbe rre̱ á shi hong we ho,
me̱di koó shi hu kyang we̱;
á shi ring we ri,
me̱di koó shi ding gung we̱;
aha re-hwie nka nné mbe rre̱ shi tanda,
á ku re-uucwu mbe koó ho we̱,
á bra ku nyyi mbe;
kishi mbe ri di ne nyyi mbe,
ka mbe ho ne re-uucwu mbe,
ka mbe hu a yarri rehwie mbe,
ngbe re we ci mbe bra,
he̱rri n we kyia.’
Me̱di nyi e̱ nyi bi mwo rina aha nyi ri ne nyyi nyi, nyi bra ho ne re-uucwu nyi.
Cence, nje níng ting he nné ti re̱se̱ng we yang ngbe nné redziee á kre he mbe ri kya ne nyi ri ne̱, me̱di koó ri we̱, á ce̱ he mbe ho kya ne nyi ho ne̱, me̱di koó she hong we̱.
“Ma nyi tso uucwu nyi ho cwu kya ne nka zhwebe ne̱ ngu he.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ho nka Ringgwe̱ ne̱ ne ko ngu pie cwu nka nna we̱, Shetani be we̱ ya kara kya ne e tsi a yarri hwie ngu we̱ ne̱ mi. Ngu ne̱ shi shi zhwe na ngu kpe a nhwie̱ rê.
Zhwe na ngu kpe a ne̱hwan a shi shi nne ne ngu ho nka nna we ho, we̱ wre̱ ne se̱ng ne rekwi.
Me̱di aha ne ko ne ko ngu bi rinyie we̱, ko fo zhe we̱. Zhe ne ya cinci ri ki she ka á ri shi ki ngwa ge̱zhe̱ aha zhwe nka Be̱ne̱, we̱ wre̱ ne ning brru ne emerin.
Zhwe na ngu kpe a yarri ze̱kye̱ a shi shi nne ne ngu ho, me̱di re-hwie nka ankya na ze̱ ne̱, ngbe kre ncwé̱ we̱ ki rrwe, he̱rri ko nka ne ngu ho a we̱ ci mpe̱ni we̱.

Me̱di zhwe na ngu kpe a mbè rina a shi shi nne ne ngu ho, ngu bra pie cwu nka nna; a ning nyi mpe̱ni mi shi shi zhwe ne mbe ya ci riyii he̱rri yá ci ncwe nnywa nnywang, yá nshwa rritsie̱ rritsie̱, yá nshwa wetsie̱ wetsie̱.”
Jesu we ti yaka nka zhwebe he, “Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ shi he ni. Ya nne ni te̱nte̱ zhwe a ebe ngu.
Me̱di a zhe ne ko nye̱ ngu shi ndzie, ya rwinko ngu be ya ni zhwe ntsi a ebe alikama nna, ngu a ne̱ ne ciee ngu.
A zhe ne alikama nna ngu ya ne̱ ne trru nci, á timi ne nti ntsi nna mbe ya wre̱ ma.
Hwié nne bi ebe nna á be mbe e̱ ki rinng he, ‘Be̱ri, nzhi he ka nyi te̱nte̱ zhwe ne ngwe̱ i ni a ebe ngwe̱ ne̱ ye̱ e̱e̱, ma ntsi ne̱ á wru a he?’
“Ngu a we shing he, ‘A nyi ya rwinko ne ngu ya nyi ngge ne̱.’ Hwié ngu a mbe e̱ ki rinng he, ‘Ngwe̱ ce̱ nzhi ya nye ntsi nna aa?’
“Ngu a he, ‘Aawo, aha kundu nyi shi nye ntsi nna, kabeya nyi bra kwa ngbe alikama nna.

Nyi we we ré mwe ré ci gbengbe mbe re nzhi cwu zheng cang. Zhe nna ri ci, ma n he ne nné cang he ré ke̱she ré tsu ntsi nna re we rrwe nshwe nshweng ré níng ci ro, wire ré tsu alikama nna ré kro a yarri aata nje.’ ”
Aa cinga we ti yaka nka zhwebe wa he, “Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ shi he ni. Ya nne fo cwe musta tsi a ebe ngu.

A shi tsie̱nzhwu re ne̱ ga re-nzhwe ankya ne e tsi; me̱di kundu ngu ci, we̱ ya ci brrabrrang re ne̱ ankya ne e tsi a nhwie̱n. A cí ekwe, he̱rri re̱mie̱ yi wé̱ be wé̱ ya ne̱ ne ning no reri a re-nvang.”
He̱rri ne cwu Jesu we ti ya nka zhwebe wa he, “Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ shi shi nyi yisi ne ya mbrru ngu fo ngu ki krre a yarri kwrengyi ntsi felewa wetsie̱, he̱rri aa ci bacia ntsi felewa nna zhwozhwo hru.”
Jesu ti nneywí ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo ne re-nka zhwebe, koo we ti yankya we̱sa ne nka zhwebe we̱.
Aha ni nka ne nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he e̱ ci rrurru, shi ne e wie he:
“Nje ri we he nka ne re-nka zhwebe;
nje ri we trru re-ankya ne ko ya nne sa hung we̱
tu ne e nyi ebe ngwie̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu we rigwe̱ nné re nzhi a yarri ri, nné ki zhwe ngu be nwie ngu mbe e̱ he, “Níng ti cwu kya ne nka zhwebe ntsi a ebe ne̱ ngu he.”
Ngu a we shing he, “Nne ne ngu ni te̱nte̱ zhwe nna nyi Kowe Nneywi.
Ebe nna a nyi ebe ngwie̱, ngbe te̱nte̱ zhwe e̱ yo a nu nné Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱. Ntsi nna a nyi nné zhwe ankya Nne Hwie̱.
Rwinko ne ngu we ni mbe e̱ ma, a nyi Shetani. Ca yâ nna nyi krruci zhe, ngbe nné cang nna á nyi re-njeli.
“Shi shi ntsi ne e nye, á a tsu ning ci ro ana, a ri shi we ni a krruci zhe.
Kowe Nneywi ri te re-njeli ngu ngbe ré ya tsu ko nda ne ngu ci nneywí ré nyi e̱ngwie̱ ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱ a yarri Ringgwe̱ ngu ré we wa ci.
Á ri we zi a ruvong ro, a nwie ne mbe ri ku rana re ye nnyi kakaka.
Wire nné redziee wé̱ tsie̱ nse̱ shi ne̱ a yarri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ mbe. Nde nne bi re-uucwung hong, re ho!

“Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ shi he ni: ya nne she ya dukyie̱e̱ be ne ngu shi la la gbo be a ya kyie; ngu a ning bra lang, wire ngu a ne̱ nwie nyi rekwi we yang, ngu a ya rie̱ ko nda ne ngu bi, ngu a ya se̱ kyie nna.
“He̱rri ne cwu wa, Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ shi he ni: a bi ya nne kaawe̱ ne ngu kré rahwan bi grime̱.
A zhe ne ngu ya she ya na bi ncwé̱ we yang, ngu a ne̱ ngu a ya rie̱ ko nda ne ngu bi, ngu a ya ning se̱ng.
“He̱rri ne cwu wa, Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ e̱ shi shi ya re̱ge̱ ne e tsie a nzhwo rishi ne ngu ya prre ga re-nzhwe hwén.
A zhe ne hwen shî re̱ge̱ nna, nné kwa hwén nna á kwa re be mi rekyi ci. Wire mbe e̱ srra be nwie kyie re-te̱nte̱ng re kro a grre, mbe e̱ wa re-na ne ko mbe bi rina we̱.
A ri shi ni a krruci ebe ngwie̱. Re-njeli e̱ á ri ywa, wé̱ ya kyie nné e̱ngwie̱ a yarri nné redziee,
ngbe wé̱ we zi a yarri ruvong ro, a nwie ne mbe ri ning ku rana re ye nnyi kakaka.”
Jesu we rinng he, “Nyi pie re-ankya ne nje níng mie̱ng ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Mbe e̱ kara he, “Ee.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Aha nii, ko zohu nne mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ne e bra ki mie̱ re-ankya na Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ wa, a shi shi be̱ri bi eri ne ngu hung wru mi ne re-dukyie̱e̱ hwi ngbe re-rening a aata ngu.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu fro re-nka zhwebe ne̱, ngu a ne̱ miimi

re be a ngwie̱ ne ngu ning srra. Ngu a ya ne̱ ne mie̱ nneywí nka a re-zonggrung mwe. Ga nné ne mbe ho á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu nwie rinng he, “Aa she zhwe zentsi ngbe igbe̱ng nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu he ni ne̱ a he e̱e̱?
Ko nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi ewe kafinta we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi de̱ ngu ngu nyi Merri we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi re-gimbe ngu mbe nyi mbe Yakubu, ngbe Usufu, ngbe Sima, ngbe Yahuda we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko re-gimbe ngu rewerembrru shi ngbe ne nzhi we̱ e̱e̱? Ma nyi he ne ngu ning she zhwe zentsi ngbe igbe̱ ne̱?”
Aha nii, á ra nka ngu.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Á ngwá nne ti re̱se̱ng grime̱ ko he, me̱di we̱sa ne nné nkla ngu ngbe nné yarri ri ngu.”
Aha ni koo nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu piriri a miimi we̱ aha riywe̱ sa rie mbe.
A zhe ana, nggwe̱ Hirridu a ho re-nka a zete Jesu.
Ngu a he ne hwié ngu he, “Nne ne̱ nyi Yohana Nyi Batisma ne ngu deze nhu! Kya a nyi ngwiee ngu bi igbe̱ng nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu he ni ne̱.”
Aha á i ma ne Hirridu ngu pie Yohana ngu ki rrwe a uucwu gyiaa aha Hirridiya, mbrru gimbe ngu Fili.
Aha Yohana i nyi ne ki heng he, “A ci cinci ngbe ngwe̱ fo Hirridiya ngwe̱ ning nyi mbrru.”
Hirridu ce̱ yhwe̱ Yohana, me̱di a to owu nné, aha nneywí e̱ fo he Yohana nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng.
A otu bikying bî Hirridu, ewena Hirridiya shwo rocwu a nyyi nné ice, he̱rri aa kla Hirridu ehwie we yang.
Hirridu a i sa jee ne shí he ngu shi ki ngwa ko nda ne ngu ce̱.
De̱ ngu Hirridiya a ki cwua he re ya he, “Ma, ning ngwa rici Yohana Nyi Batisma we zhe ne ne̱ a zete trree!”
Ko nka nna kpe nggwe̱ rina we̱, me̱di aha shí ne ngu fo a nyyi nné ice ngu, ngu a ci he ré nyi kya ne ewena nna ngu he.
Aa ci he̱rri á ya ti rici Yohana ne ngu shi a uucwu gyiaa.
Á be mi ne rici Yohana a zete trree á ngwa ewena nna fa, ngu a ya ngwa de̱ ngu.
Nné zhwe Yohana á be ya fo kwe nna á ya nyie̱. Wire mbe e̱ ne̱ mbe e̱ ya ti Jesung.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ya ho kya ne ngu ci, ngu a ne̱ we nggaa ngu a yarri konkro re nzhi ya ewie cereng. Nneywí e̱ ho ni, mbe e̱ wru a re-ngwie̱ mbe, á ki zhwe ne nta.
Zhe ne Jesu ngu ya wru ci, ngu a ri rigwe̱ nné, naana mbe ki pie, ngu a kyia nné ruhu a tsi mbe.
A zhe ne ne̱hin ngu ci, nné ki zhwe ngu a be nwie ngu, mbe e̱ he, “Ewie ne̱ nyi eyi, zhe bra nyia. Lu nné ne̱ ré ne̱ re nzhi re-nkla ngbe ré ya kre kya ne mbe shi yeng we nci mbe.”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Ko se mbe ywa ya ewie we̱. Nyi e̱ nyi we ngwa yâ ré ye.”
Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “A he ne̱ nzhi bi we cwú brredi wecwuoo ne hwén wehwie.”
Ngu a he, “Nyi ning ngwa he n ri.”

Ngu a ci ko nye̱ re srra be a ntsi. Ngu a fo cwú brredi wecwuoo ngbe hwén wehwie ana, ngu a gbi riyii zinye̱, ngu a ci kijie̱ng. Wire ngu a hwin brredi nna, ngu a ngwa nné ki zhwe ngu, nné ki zhwe mbe e̱ kye nnéng ma.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo á ye, aa we be; nné ki zhwe ngu á tsu kya ne e ye we kpi, aa ci grré shwa ne otu wehwie.
Á hwie nné ntó ne mbe ye yâ nna á cwu weje ci wecwuoo we̱sa ne mbrrú ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe.
Jesu a wre̱ ne ci nné ki zhwe ngu ré ngwie a yarri konkro ré ka ne̱ ré tsa nyie, ne ngu shi cire rigwe̱ nné nna.
A zhe ne ngu we cire, ngu a cwugu rugu we nggaa ngu re nzhi ku Be̱ne̱. He̱rri ne̱hin maa ci ne ngu shi miimi we nggaa ngu.
Me̱di a zhe nna á ma ne konkro a shi gbong a zetsi nzhwo rishi nna
A brra totu weje ncwe̱ wetsie̱ re be ncwe̱ rritsie̱ a nyiencwe, Jesu ne̱ re nzhi we she nwie cwo a zete rishi.
A zhe ne nné ki zhwe ngu mbe ri ngu cwo a zete rishi, á cwuglu. Mbe e̱ kro nku ne owu nwie he, “A nyi rewienci!”
Me̱di Jesu wre̱ ne he ne mbe he, “Nyi yaa rwe! Nyi nje. Shi de̱ nyi ci owu wo.”
Pita a kara he, “Brrabe̱, kundu ngu ri nyi ngwe̱ cence, ma he nje he n be a zete rishi e̱ ma.”
Jesu a he, “Ning be!”
Pita a wru a yarri konkro, ngu a cwucwu a zete rishi, ngu a ne̱ ne cwo re be nwie Jesu.
Me̱di zhe ne ngu ne̱ ne ri wu ngu to ne igbe̱, owu ki yhwe̱ ngu a ne̱ ne ciywi. Ngu a ci onu he, “Brrabe̱, ning kyia!”
Jesu a wre̱ ne na va ngu a ki pie, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Sa rie ngwe̱ aa re̱, ngwe̱ nyi jinji aha nda?”
We zhe ne mbe ngwie yarri konkro, wu nna a yo.
Mbe ne mbe shi a yarri konkro a mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ki ye mbè, mbe e̱ he, “Cence, ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱.”
Mbe e̱ tsa nyie re be Jenazarra, mbe e̱ cwucwu miimi.
Nné nkla nna á hu Jesu, mbe e̱ te re nzhi re-nkla ne mbe grra. Nneywí e̱ be mi ne nné ruhu mbe zhwozhwo a nwie ngu.
Á cwe nva ne Jesu he re we nné ruhu nna ré re we zhi tago ngu, ga mbe ne mbe ki re e̱ á ci gbingbi.
Wire yá nné Farisi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ne mbe wru a Urrushelima re be nwie Jesu á ki rinng he,
“Nyi nda ngu ci ne nné re zhwe ngwe̱ mbe ra zhwe teede brrá nné e̱ ye̱? Koó kyú nva wire ré ye yâ we̱!”
Jesu we shing he, “Nyi e̱ ma rre, nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi ra zhwe Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ aha re-teede nyi e̱?
Aha Be̱ne̱ he, ‘Ci be̱ ngwe̱ ngbe de̱ ngwe̱ grime̱. Ko nye̱ ne ngu cwi be̱ ngu ka de̱ ngu, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ki yhwe̱.’
Me̱di nyi e̱ nyi he he ko nye̱ ne ngu bi kya ne ngu ra ning she be̱ ngung ka de̱ ngung, me̱di ngu he he ‘Nyi Na Be̱ne̱,’
he shi de̱ re ning ci be̱ ngu
Nyi nné brra ronu! Ishaya i ti re̱se̱ nka ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne ngu i he a rici nyi he,
‘Nné mbe rre̱ á ning ci grime̱ we re-ikpe nu mbe,
me̱di yaarri rehwie mbe e̱ shi ze̱nze̱ ne nje.
Á ning yé mbè we shweni,
aha á mié̱ re-teede nneywí
shi shi nyi Nti Nka Be̱ne̱!’ ”
Jesu a ye rigwe̱ nné nna re be nwie ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ho, ngbe nyi ning bra she hu re̱se̱ng!
Ko kya ngu ngwie a nu nneywi ki ci re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱, se ka kya ngu wru a nu ngu ho.”
Nné ki zhwe ngu a be nwie ngu, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ hu re̱se̱ng he nné Farisi ana á dzio rehwie a zhe ne mbe ho kya ne ngwe̱ he ana aa?”
Ngu a we shing he, “Ko zohu riti ekwe ne ko Be̱ nje ne ngu shi zinye̱ ngu tsi we̱, á ri nga ngbe re-rinyieng.
Nyi we we, á nyi nnencwué̱ ne mbe kwa yincwuee.
Pita a ki karang he, “Ma níng ti kya ne nka zhwebe ne̱ he.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “He̱rri ne cwu, nyi ke̱ ne shi zhizhi e̱e̱?
Ko nyi hu he ko nda ne ngu ngwie nu we̱ ya wara re nzhi hwie, wire wé̱ ya ki ti ci a uvu we̱ e̱e̱?
Me̱di ko nda ne ngu wrú a nu, a wru a yarri nu rie, nyi ngu ne ngu ci nneywi re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱.

Aha a nyi a yarri nu rie ne re-hwie nka le̱le̱ mbe ning wru shi shi yhwe̱ nne, njè ngbe mbrru ya nne ka nto ya mbrru, ngbe nyi njè ne ya ewena ka ya nze̱we, ngbe nca, ngbe sheede rabrra, ngbe kwe fe̱li.
Nyi mbe ne̱ ne mbe ci nne re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱. Me̱di ye yâ ne nva ywing ko ci nneywi re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ne̱ miimi, aa be a nkla Taya ngbe Sido.
Ya mbrru Kaana a be nwie ngu nwie ki kyie̱ he, “Ri naana nje, Brrabe̱, Kowe Dooda, ewena nje shi cinci we yang ne rije.”
Me̱di ko Jesu ki bra ko ya nka we̱, ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu á be nwie he ne ngu he, “Ki cire ni, kaat! A níng zhwe re níng rro uucwu ni aha nda?”
Jesu we shing he, “Á ning te re nzhi we nwie rewe Isrreela ne mbe shi shi canvé ne mbe bru.”
Mbrru nna a be ya hu be a nyyi ngu he, “Brrabe̱, ning sheng!”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ré fo yâ e̱we̱e̱ rewe ré ngwa rovu we̱.”
Ngu a he, “Ee, a shi ni, Brrabe̱, gbengbe ni ma, nje he ka rovu á ta re-ucwu yâ ne mbe kpi be a gumong ye yâ re-be̱ri mbe re ye ye̱ e̱e̱?”
Wire Jesu a ki shing he, “Kaat! A mbrru ne, ngwe̱ bi sa rie we yang! Ngwe̱ shi she kya ne ngwe̱ kre e̱.” We zhe ana ewena ngu a ci gbingbi.
Jesu we miimi ngu a cwo a rekyi Nzhwo Galili. Ngu a ya cwugu rugu, ngu a ya srra be a miimi.
Rigwe̱ nné be nwie ngu. Á be ne nné ne ko mbe hung cwo we̱, ngbe nnencwué̱, ngbe nnenkú, ngbe re-rumwa, ngbe kpi nné bi yaká re-nzhwe ruhu we yang a nwie ngu. Ngu a we kyia.

Nneywí hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu we yang a zhe ne mbe ri re-rumwa mbe he nka, ngbe nnenkú ne mbe ci gbingbi, ngbe nné ne ko mbe hung cwo ciee we̱ ne mbe cwo, ngbe nnencwué̱ ne mbe ri ewie. Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne de Be̱ne̱ na Isrreela.

Jesu ye nné ki zhwe ngu re be nwie ngu, ngu a he, “Nje ri naana nné mbe rre̱ ne mbe ci rotu wetsie̱ ngbe nje, mbe ya hwie̱ we̱sa ne kya ye ne̱. Ko nje ce̱ we cire ne nzhwo we̱, kishi á ri ya hwrra a rê.”
Nné ki zhwe ngu a he, “Nzhi cwo a she yâ a he a eyi ne̱ ne ngu shi be ngbe nzhi ngwa rugu nneywí ne̱?”
Jesu a we rinng he, “Nyi cwú brredi wema nyi bi e̱?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Natsie̱, ngbe e̱we̱ hwén we tsie̱nzhwu.”
Ngu a ci rigwe̱ nné nna ré yaa ta a be.
Wire ngu a fo cwú brredi natsie̱ ana ngbe hwén nna, aa ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ngu a hwin, ngu a ngwa nné ki zhwe ngu, ngbe mbe e̱ kye nnéng.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo á ye shwe. He̱rri nklanklang ne nné ki zhwe ngu mbe tsu ne ngu hwie̱ aa cwu grré natsie̱.
Nné ne mbe ye a nyi nné ntó ci weni we̱sa ne mbrrú ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu cire rigwe̱ nné nna, ngu a ngwie a yarri konkro re nzhi ngwie̱ Magada.
Yá nné Farisi ngbe nné Sadukyi á be nwie Jesu, á he ne ngu he re we wru mi ne yankyang hwie̱ nga onu a zinye̱. Á he ni aha mbe ce̱ ki mwa mbe ri.
Ngu a we shing he, [“Kundu ne̱hin ngu ci ne nyi ri zinye̱ shi zhauuu, nyi e̱ he he maahu ewie ri hwie̱ ne̱ a encwe.

A zhe mincwe wa, kundu nyi ri zinye̱ ngu ci zhauuu ne ewie ngu ywrre, nyi e̱ he, ‘Nze shi wie we wie we wie a cwu ne̱.’ Nyi hung hu re̱se̱ng ka ewie shi ci rimi ye̱ a zhe ne nyi ri zinye̱, ma ko shi nyi hung hu re̱se̱ sheede re-ankya na re-zhe ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?]
Nné nze̱ ne ne mbe nyi nné hwie̱ ngbe riywe̱ to owu Be̱ne̱! Nyi kre he nyi di ya sheede kyang hwie̱ nga onu; me̱di ko bi ko ya ne nyi shi ring we̱, se ka zhwe na Jona ho.”
Ngu a we we, ngu a ne̱ ne ciee ngu.
A zhe ne mbe tsa nzhwo rishi nna re nzhi yaka nyie, gaa bru nné ki zhwe koó fo brredi we̱.
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nyi ci nkwile̱, nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne yisi nné Farisi ngbe nné Sadukyi.”
Á ne̱ ne hwie re-nka a nci mbe he, “Ka nyi kya ne nzhi ne̱ we̱sa brredi e̱ rre.”
Jesu hu kya ne mbe shi heng, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Sa rie nyi e̱ shi tsie̱nzhwu rimi ni e̱? Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi shi he re-nka a nci nyi he ko nyi bi brredi we̱ e̱e̱?
He̱rri ne cwu ko nyi pie cwu kya ne nje he ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi lu ne cwú brredi wecwuoo ne nné ci wecwuoo mbe i ye ne grré piriri mbe i hwie̱ ana we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko nyi bra lu ne cwú brredi natsie̱ ne nné ci weni mbe i ye ne grré piriri mbe i hwie̱ ana we̱ e̱e̱?
Ma nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nyi hung hu re̱se̱ng he ko nyi brredi ne nje ning shi nka ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Nje he nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne yisi nné Farisi ngbe nné Sadukyi!”
Wire mbe e̱ pie cwu nka ngu a fa, he ko a he nka ne mbe he ré ci nkwile̱ aha yising nyi brredi we̱, me̱di a he ne mbe he ré nyi te̱nte̱ ne ankya ne nné Farisi ngbe nné Sadukyi mbe mie̱ nneywíng.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ya cwu dudu ne ngwie̱ Kesariya-Filibi, ngu a rin nné ki zhwe ngung he, “Nneywí e̱ he he nje Kowe Nneywi e̱, nje nyi nye̱ ma?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Yá he ngwe̱ nyi Yohana Nyi Batisma, yá he ngwe̱ nyi Iliya, yá a he ngwe̱ nyi Irimiya ka ya a tsi nné ti re̱se̱ng na tiya hoo.”
Jesu a we rinng he, “Ma nyi e̱ rre, nyi he nje nyi nye̱ ma?”
Sima Pita a ki shing he, “Ngwe̱ nyi Krristi,
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ Sima
Nje e̱ nje bra he ne ngwe̱ Pita
Nje shi re ngwa re-kyang kla Ringgwe̱ zinye̱, ko nda ne ngwe̱ rwe a be ngwie̱ he, á rwe a zinye̱; ko nda ne ngwe̱ bī a be ngwie̱ he, á bī a zinye̱.”
Ngu a gara nné ki zhwe ngu nka he shi de̱ re ti ko ya nneng he ngu nyi Krristi we̱.

Tu zhe ana Jesu ne̱ ne ti nné ki zhwe ngung we gbeng he se ngu ywa a Urrushelima ngu ya shwe re-ge̱zhe̱ we yang a nva brrá nné, ngbe nggwé̱ re-prristi, ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa, he̱rri se ne e ki yhwe̱, me̱di a otu na tsie̱ng we̱ ki deze nce.
Pita a ki fo re nzhi bamba, ngu a ne̱ ne ki yhwire he, “Ko tsie̱ tsie̱, Brrabe̱! Ko shi re ci ni we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱!”
Jesu bra ngu a he ne Pita he, “Shwo ning na rê ewie Shetani! Ngwe̱ nyi ngbaatsieng grre̱ a nwie nje. Zhwe hwie nka ngwe̱ ne̱ koo wru nwie Be̱ne̱ we̱, a nyi zhwe hwie nka nneywi.”
Wire Jesu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ ning zhwe, se re ra rici ngu, re fo gasankwe ngu, re ning zhwe.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ cwo ce ngu ne rici ngu, we̱ wi; me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ngwa ce ngu aha nje, we̱ she.
Rina nna nyi nda ne nneywi ri ning sheng, kundu ne ngu she ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ zhwozhwo, me̱di ngu bra wi ce ngu a ye̱? Ka bra nyi nda nneywi re hung ngwang a nu ce ngu aa?
Aha Kowe Nneywi e̱ cwo be a yarri grime̱ Be̱ ngu ngbe re-njeli ngu, ngbe we̱ ngwa ko nye̱ lede ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu nyi.
Nje níng ting cence he yá ne mbe yo a he ne ne̱, ko shwe̱ hu koó shi hong we̱, se ne mbe ri Kowe Nneywi ngu cwo re be ye ringgwe̱ ngu.”
Rotu rritsie̱ wara, Jesu a ko mbe Pita, ngbe Yakubu, ngbe gimbe Yakubu ne e ki ye he Yohana re nzhi a ya zete ya brra rugu we nggaa mbe.
Á srra ngbe ikpe rwe̱ Jesu a bra a nyyi mbe. Riyii ngu tsie̱ nse̱ shi ne̱, ankya ci rwe̱ ngu a ci kye̱kye̱ng zhanzhanzhaa shi shi nse̱.
We zhe ana, á srra mbe e̱ timi ne Musa ngbe Iliya mbe ya wre̱ mbe shi nka ngbe ne Jesu.
Pita a he ne Jesu he, “Brrabe̱, a bi rina ne nzhi shi he ne̱; kundu ngwe̱ ri ce̱, ma n nyi re-ndu wetsie̱, ya re nyi na ngwe̱, ya aha Musa, ya aha Iliya.”
We zhe ne ngu shi he nka, ya inyie̱ ne ngu tsie̱ nse̱ be ya we ku, ngbe ya cwue e̱ wru a yarri inyie̱ he, “Nke ne̱ nyi Kowe nje, na ce̱ nje, ne nje ho shwi ngu kpe̱kpe̱. Nyi ho nka ngu!”
A zhe ne nné ki zhwe e̱ mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ kpi be nwie cwugru nyyi mbe be, aha rowu we yhwe̱ we yang.
Me̱di Jesu be ya we ria ngu a he, “Nyi cinye̱, shi de̱ nyi ci rowu we̱!”
Zhe ne mbe gbi nyyi mbe ze, koó ri ko ya nne we̱ se we Jesu nggaa ngu.
A zhe ne mbe shi nwie wro a zete rugu nna re be be, Jesu a we gara nka he, “Shi de̱ nyi ti ko ya nne kya ne nyi ri ne̱ we̱, se ne e ri deze Kowe Nneywi nhu.”
Nné ki zhwe e̱ á ki rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa mbe hé, se Iliya re ke̱she be wire e̱e̱?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Cence, Iliya shi ke̱she be ngbe re ya ci ko nda re ci rina wire.
Me̱di nje níng ting he Iliya i ke̱she be, me̱di koó ru he nyi ngu we̱, he̱rri á ki nyi kya ne mbe ce̱. We ye̱ye̱rri ni ma, Kowe Nneywi e̱ shi shwe ge̱zhe̱ a nva mbe.”
Wire nné ki zhwe e̱ mbe hu he shi he nka ne mbe a rici Yohana Nyi Batisma.
A zhe ne mbe be nwie rigwe̱ nné nna, ya nne be ya hu be a nwie Jesu.
Ngu a he, “Brrabe̱, ri naana ewe nje, a bi ruhu kpi re kwi, a bra shi ge̱zhe̱ we yang. A srra re kpi a yarri nro ngbe rishi ko zohu zhe.
Nje be ne ngu a nwie nné re zhwe ngwe̱, me̱di koó hung ki kyia we̱.”
Jesu a he, “Ket! A nné mbe rre! Nyi nyi riywe̱ shî nka, nyi brru. Nje shi srra ngbe nyi nwie yaa rwe he̱rri re nzhi cwu rekpe e̱e̱? Be mi ne ewe nna a nwie nje he.”
Jesu a ti rije nna ne ren, rije e̱ wru a yarri ewe nna, we zhe ana ngu a ci gbingbi.
Wire nné ki zhwe ngu a be nwie ngu ranranng á ki rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nzhi hung ti rije ne̱ we̱ e̱?”

Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Aha sa rie nyi e̱ shi tsie̱nzhwu. Nje níng ting cence he kundu nyi bi sa rie tsie̱nzhwu le̱le̱ shi shi e̱we̱ cwe musta, nyi e̱ hung he ne rugu ne̱ he, ‘Shwo a he ne̱ re nzhi ye’ ngbe we̱ shwo. Ko bi ko yankya re níng drre̱ we̱.”
[Me̱di zhwe rije nke ne̱ ko wrú we̱ se ne nyi ku Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne rwe onu.]
A zhe ne nné ki zhwe mbe ya mwe zhwozhwo a Galili, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Á shi ngwa Kowe Nneywi a nva nné
ne mbe shi ki yhwe̱; me̱di a otu na tsie̱, Be̱ne̱ we̱ cinga ki deze nce.”
Nné ki zhwe á ci rehwie dzio we yang.
A zhe ne Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu mbe ya wre̱ a Kafanahu, nné si gondu na Brranyi
Ngu a he, “Ee, a trrá.”
A zhe ne Pita ngu ngwie a ri nna, Jesu ke̱she ki ce̱ nka, a ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ hwie rimi Sima, a nyi mbe nye̱ mbe trra nggwé̱ be ngwie̱ ne̱ gondu a? A nyi nné ngwie̱ mbe, ka nyi nné ice?”
Pita a he, “A nyi nné ice.” Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Maahu ko nné ngwie̱ mbe á trra we̱.

Me̱di kishi nzhi ri we ci ehwie dzio, ywa a nzhwo ngwe̱ ya tsie krrugyiaa ngwe̱. Fie̱ hwen na ne ngwe̱ ri ke̱she pie, kla onu ngu, ngwe̱ e̱ ning she ncwe̱ ne ngu be ngwe̱ ning trra na nje ngbe na ngwe̱. Fo ngwe̱ ning trra gondu na nzhi.”
A zhe ana, nné zhwe Jesu á be nwie ngu nwie ki rinng he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu nyi brrang a Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ e̱ ye̱?”
Ngu a ye ya e̱we̱we, ngu a ki ci re yo a zetsi mbe.
Ngu a he, “Nje níng ting cence he, kundu ne de̱ nyi bra nyi ci shi shi e̱we̱e̱ rewe we̱, ko shi nyi ngwie a yarri Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ we̱.
Aha nii, ko nye̱ ne ngu ci rici ngu re̱ shi shi e̱we̱we ne̱, a nyi ngu ngu nyi brrabrrang a Ringgwe̱ zinye̱.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu se̱ ya e̱we̱we shi nke ne̱ aha nje, maahu aa ning se̱ ma.
“Kundu ya nne ci ya a tsi e̱wé̱ nné ce̱ nka nje ne̱ ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱, we̱ nyi canca ré ria nne ana ya ngba itsieng hwie nkya a ncwue ré ki zhwu a yarri cwuncwuu brra nzhwo rishi.
Wuhu ne nneywí a be ngwie̱ aha ankyang grre̱! Re-ankyang grre̱ á shi bi we be, me̱di wuhu ne nne nke ne ngu ci yaka nne re grre̱!

“Kundu va ngwe̱ ka ta ngwe̱ re cí ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱, ki kpo ngwe̱ zhwu. Canca ngwe̱ ngwie a nce na he̱rri tiya we̱sa ne ya va ka ta ngwe̱, ka ngwe̱ ngwie ne ku, ne ngwe̱ bi nva ngwe̱ wehwie ngbe nta ngwe̱ wehwie ré bra re zhwu a nro ne ngu ye he̱rri tiya.
Kundu riyii ngwe̱ re cí ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱, ki ti ngwe̱ zhwu. Canca ngwe̱ ngwie a nce na he̱rri tiya ne riyii zunzrru, ne ngwe̱ bi nyyi ngwe̱ wehwie ré bra re zhwu a ruvong ro.
“Nyi ci nkwile̱, shi de̱ nyi dzie̱ ya a tsi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne̱ we̱. Nje níng ting he re-njeli mbe a zinye̱ á srra a nyyi Be̱ nje a zinye̱ ko zohu zhe.
[Kowe Nneywi e̱ be aha ngu kyia nné mbe ne mbe bru.]

“Nyi hwie he nyi zohu ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rr? Kundu ya nne bi canvé komo nnywa zunzrru, ngbe ya mbe e̱ bru, ko we̱ we canvé nshwa krruvaya ne otu krruvaya nna a ngbra ngbe we̱ ne̱ re nzhi kre na ne ngu bru a we̱ e̱e̱?
Nje níng ting cence he kundu ngu ki she, we̱ nyi rekwi aha canve zunzrru ana kaka re ne̱ canvé komo nshwa krruvaya ne otu krruvaya ne ko mbe bru we̱ ana.
A shi ni ma, Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi zinye̱ ko ce̱ he ko ya a tsi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne̱ re bru we̱.
“Kundu ya gimbe ngwe̱ re nyi e̱ngwie̱, ywa ngwe̱ ya ki ti brru ngu, me̱di re nyi we nyi nggaa nyi nné wehwie. Kundu ngu ri re hong, maahu ngwe̱ ki cire te̱nte̱.
Me̱di kundu de̱ ngu re hong we̱, fo ya nne zunzrru ka nné wehwie ngwe̱ ywa ngbe mbe, aha ngbe nné wehwie ka wetsie̱ ré ngwa sheede a zete ko nda ne e he.
Kundu ne ngu ri ra we hong, ti ekpri nné ce̱ nkang; he̱rri ne cwu kundu ngu ri ra ho nka ekpri nné ce̱ nka, ki we shi shi nyi nne tsi ngwie̱ ka nne si gondu hoo.
“Aha nii, nje níng ting cence he ko nda ne nyi rwe a be ngwie̱ he, á rwe a zinye̱; ko nda ne nyi bī a be ngwie̱, á bī a zinye̱.
“Nje bra níng ting wa he, kundu nné wehwie a tsi nyi a be ngwie̱ he mbe mwe mbe shî aha yankya, mbe ning ku Be̱ne̱, Be̱ nje ne ngu shi a zinye̱ we̱ we nying.
Ewie ne nné wehwie ka wetsie̱ mbe ya mwe a yarri lo nje, nje shi miimi a zetsi mbe.”
Wire Pita a be nwie Jesu ngu a ki rinng he, “Brrabe̱, kundu ya gimbe nje srrá re ning nyi e̱ngwie̱, a nyi cwoo maa ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri n ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu a? Ce natsie̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu ki shing he, “Aawo, nje he ne ngwe̱ he de̱ re nyi we ce natsie̱ we̱, me̱di ce nshwa natsie̱ ce natsie̱.
“Aha nii, Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ e̱ shi shi ya nggwe̱ ne ngu ce̱ hu onu ncwé̱ ngu ne ngu shi nva nnencwuó ngu.
A zhe ne ngu ne̱ ne hwieng, á ki be mi ne ya nne ne ngu bi tsie ngu he̱rri re-talenti
Me̱di tu ne ko nne nna bi ncwe̱ ne ngu shi hung trrang we̱, be̱ri nna ci he ré ki pie ngbe mbrru ngu ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe ngu ngbe ko nda ne ngu bi, ngbe ré rie̱ ré ning trra tsie nna.
“Me̱di nne nna hu be ne re-ruhuu a nyyi ngu nwie he, ‘Kusu, ci nkwirin ne nje, nje shi re trra ko nda.’
Be̱ri ngu a ri naana ngu, ngu a ki we tsie nna he de̱ re trra we̱, he̱rri aa ki we aa ne̱.
“Me̱di we zhe ne nne nna ngu wru miimi, ngu a ya she ya rwincwuo ngu ne ngu bi tsie ngu e̱we̱ denarri nnywa zunzrru. Ngu a ki kpe ncwue nwie ki ditiri he, ‘Se ngwe̱ ning trra ncwe̱ nje!’
“Rwincwuo ngu a hu be ne re-ruhuu nwie ki cwe nva he, ‘Ci nkwirin ne nje, nje shi re trrang!’
“Me̱di koo shî we̱, he̱rri aa ywa mi ne nne nna, aa ya ci á ki she̱ a uucwu gyiaa he se ne ngu trra tsie nna wire.
A zhe ne kpi rwincwuó ngu mbe ri kya ne ngu nyi ni, rehwie mbe dzio we yang; mbe e̱ ne̱ mbe e̱ ya ti be̱ri mbe ko nda ne ngu ci.
“Wire be̱ri nna a ye nne nna ngu a he ne ngu he, ‘Ngwe̱ nyi hwie bi hwie̱! Nje re we tsie nje ne ngu shi nva ngwe̱ zhwozhwo aha ngwe̱ cwe nva ne nje he n re weng.
Koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngwe̱ ra ri naana rwincwuo ngwe̱ ana shi ne nje ri naana ngwe̱ we̱ e̱e̱?’
Be̱ri ngu a dzio ehwie, ngu a ci he ré she̱ nne nna a uucwu gyiaa ré ki ngwa cinci se ne ngu ri trra tsie ngu ne e ki zhwe kpanggra.
“Be̱ nje ne ngu shi zinye̱ shi nyi ni ne ko nye̱ a tsi nyi, kundu de̱ ngu we gimbe ngu e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu ki nying ne ehwie zunzrru we̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu fro re-nka ne̱, ngu a we Galili ngu a ywa a yá re-nkla Yahudi ne mbe shi a nyie Brra Riywi Urrdu.
Brra rigwe̱ nné e̱ ki zhwe, ngu a we kyia a miimi.
Yá nné Farisi e̱ be nwie ngu aha mbe ki mwa. Á ki rinng he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nne re yu mbrru ngu kundu ngu bi kwiling e̱e̱?”
Jesu we shing he, “Ko nyi hwie krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi hu he tu ce̱ucwung, Be̱ne̱ we nyi nto ngbe mbrru we̱ e̱e̱?
Be̱ne̱ i he, ‘Aha nii, nne nto we̱ we be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu we̱ mwe ngbe mbrru ngu, ngbe mbe wehwie wé̱ ci rwe̱ zunzrru.’
Koó shi ré bra shi wehwie wa we̱, me̱di wé̱ ci zunzrru. Aha nii, kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu rwe gbengbe, shi de̱ ya nne re ka we̱.”
Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ma nyi nda ngu ci ne Musa i mie̱ nnéng he nne nto re ngwa mbrru ngu krre̱de̱ng kpo nyrra re ki cire e̱e̱?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Musa i níng we nyi yu mbrrú nyi aha klo nci nyi. Me̱di ko i shi ni tu ce̱ucwung we̱.
Nje níng ting he ko nye̱ ne ngu yu mbrru ngu, de̱ ngu nyi aha ne ngu ki pie a njè we̱ he̱rri ngu fo yaka mbrru, aa nyi njè.”
Nné ki zhwe ngu a á srra mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Kundu nka nna shi ni a zetsi nto ngbe mbrru ngu, maahu canca nne re srra we̱sa fo mbrru.”
Jesu a we shing he, “Ko nyi ko nye̱ re hung shî nka ne̱ we̱, se we nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ we ngwa hung.
A bi re-ankya kanka kanka ne mbe ci ko shi yá ntó ré hung fo mbrru we̱:
Wire á be mi ne e̱we̱e̱ rewe a nwie Jesu aha re we gara nva re bra we ku Be̱ne̱. Me̱di nné ki zhwe á ne̱ ne yhwire nné ne mbe be mi ne mbe.
Jesu a he, “Nyi we e̱we̱e̱ rewe re be nwie nje, shi de̱ nyi we yu we̱, aha Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ nyi na zhwe mbe ne̱.”
A zhe ne ngu we gara nva nwie we mwo rina, ngu a ne̱ miimi.
Á srra ya nne e̱ be nwie Jesu, ngu a he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nyi zohu kya rina ne nje shi nying ngbe n she ce he̱rri tiya aa?”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne ngwe̱ ning rinng aha kya rina aa? Ko bi ko ya ne ngu bi rina we̱ se we Be̱ne̱ nggaa ngu. Kundu ngwe̱ ce̱ she ce he̱rri tiya ngwe̱ e̱ zhwe Nti Nka Be̱ne̱.”
Nne nna a rin he, “Re-zohu Nti Nka?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “ ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ yhwe̱ nne we̱; de̱ ngwe̱ nyi njè we̱; de̱ ngwe̱ nyi nca we̱; de̱ ngwe̱ ngwa sheede rabrra we̱;
ci be̱ ngwe̱ ngbe de̱ ngwe̱ grime̱;’ ngbe ‘ngwe̱ ce̱ nné dudu ne ngwe̱ shi rici ngwe̱.’ ”
Nze̱we nna a he, “Ga re-mbe ne̱ zhwozhwo nje zhwe. Ma nyi zohu ngu hwie̱ wa?”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Kundu ngwe̱ ce̱ ci te̱nte̱ng wiriri, ywa ngwe̱ ya rie̱ ankya ngwe̱ zhwozhwo ngwe̱ ngwa yiriywé̱ ngbe ngwe̱ she dukyie̱e̱ a zinye̱. Wire ngwe̱ be, ngwe̱ ya ning zhwe.”
A zhe ne nze̱we nna ho ni, koo ki kpe rina we̱, ngu a ne̱ ne ciee ngu aha ne ngu bi dukyie̱e̱ we yang.
Jesu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Nje níng ting cence he: a bi rwe̱ ngbe nne bi ncwé̱ re ngwie a yarri Ringgwe̱ zinye̱.
Nje bra níng ting wa he: canca ronkomi re ngwie a nzhwu nuure ne nne bi ncwé̱ re ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
A zhe ne nné ki zhwe ngu ho ni, aa we ngwa owu we yang. Mbe e̱ he, “Ma nyi nye̱ re hung she kyia aa?”
Jesu we ri gbinnng ngu a he, “A nwie nneywí, ko shi re ci we̱; me̱di a nwie Be̱ne̱, ko bi ko yankya re ki drre̱ we̱.”
Wire Pita a ki karang he, “Ma ri, nzhi ne̱ nzhi we ko nda, nzhi re zhwe! Ma nzhi ri ning she nda?”

Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nje níng ting cence he: a ngwie̱ hwi ne ngu cwo be, zhe ne Kowe Nneywi ri srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ grime̱ ngu, nyi ne nyi ning zhwe nyi ri srra a ncwú ringgwe̱ komo shwa ne otu wehwie re ye ringgwe̱ a zete nkla na nné Isrreela shwa ne otu wehwie.

Ko nye̱ ne ngu we reri ngu, ka re-gimbe ngu rewerento, ka re-gimbe ngu rewerembrru, ka be̱, ka de̱, ka e̱we̱e̱ rewe, ka rebe aha nje, a ri she kya ne ngu ne̱ ni we gbong he̱rri nnywa nnywang re bra she ce he̱rri tiya.
Me̱di nné piriri ne mbe nyi na ce̱ucwung, á ri hwie̱ nné merin, nné merin wé̱ ya hwie̱ nné ce̱ucwung.
“Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ shi shi nne bi ebe, ne ngu wru a brra mincwe re nzhi ko re-lebrra ré ya ki nyi cwuo a nhwie̱n inebi ngu.
Aa shî he ngu shi we trra denarri zunzrru zunzrru a yering cwuo to zrru, ngu a we lu re nzhi a nhwie̱n nna.
“Re be a ncwe̱ krruvaya na mincwe, ngu a wru ci re nzhi nu kaawe̱, ngu a ya she yá, ne mbe shi yo we dede.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, ‘Nyi ywa nyi ya nyi cwuo a nhwie̱n inebi nje ma, ngbe n níng trra kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri.’
Mbe e̱ ne̱ re nzhi.
“Ngu a wru ci wa a ncwe̱ shwa ne otu wehwie na tsi te̱ne̱ ngbe ncwe̱ wetsie̱ na ne̱hin ngu a ya nyi we ni wa.
Re be a ncwe̱ wecwuoo na ne̱hin, aa wru ci wa, ngu a ya she gbre yá, ne mbe shi yo we dede. Ngu a we rinng he, ‘Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi shi yo a he nwie yeri we dede we̱sa ne cwuo nyi e̱e̱?’
“Mbe e̱ ki shing he, ‘Ko bi ko ya nne ngu níng fo ncwuo we̱.’
“Ngu a he ne mbe he, ‘Ma nyi cinye̱ nyi ywa nyi ya nyi cwuo a nhwie̱n nje.’
“A zhe ne ne̱hin ngu ci, be̱ri bi nhwie̱n nna ngu a he ne nnencwuee nnencwuó nna he, ‘Ye nnencwuó a ngbe n we trra ncwe̱ng cwuo mbe. Ce̱ ne nnencwuó na merin re be a na ce̱ucwung.’
“Nnencwuó na ne e we ko a ncwe̱ wecwuoo na ne̱hin e̱ be, ngu a we trra denarri zunzrru zunzrru.
Aha ni re-lebrra na ngu ri ke̱she we ko ncwuo á sa rie he mbe shi she ncwe̱ re ne̱ ni. Me̱di aa trra ko nye̱ mbe we denarri zunzrru ma.
A zhe ne mbe si ncwe̱ nna, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne krro nka ne be̱ri bi ebe nna he,
‘Nné mbe ne ngwe̱ we ko a ngrangrang ne̱ á ci we awa zunzrru, ngwe̱ bra we trrang ye̱ye̱rri ne nzhi ne nzhi yeri nwie nyi cwuo a ngba ro ne̱ ne̱!’
“Me̱di ngu a he ne ya mbe he, ‘A rwe, ko nje níng nyi hwie̱ we̱. Ko nyi shî he nyi shi nyi cwuo ne̱ a nu denarri zunzrru we̱ e̱e̱?
Nyi se̱ ncwe̱ nyi, nyi ne̱. Nje ce̱ ngwa nne nke ne nje ki fo a ngrangrang ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri shi kya ne nje re ngwa.
Ko nje bi de̱me̱ ngbe n nyi kya ne nje ce̱ ne ncwe̱ nje we̱ e̱e̱? Ka ngwe̱ yhwi aha na va nje e̱e̱?’
