“Aha nii, nné merin ri hwie̱ nné ncwuee, ngbe nné ncwuee wé̱ hwie̱ nné merin.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu cwugu re nzhi Urrushelima, ngu a ye nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu wehwie a bamba ngu a he ne mbe ranranng he,
“Nyi ri, nzhi cwugu ne̱ re nzhi a Urrushelima, á nzhi ngwa Kowe Nneywi a nva nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka. Á cwo a ki nyi nkang hu,
ngbe wé̱ ki ngwa a nva Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱, wé̱ ki kwa nka sha, wé̱ ki cwe, wé̱ ki ci gasankwe. Me̱di a otu na tsie̱, wé̱ ki deze nce!”
Wire de̱ rewe Zebedi be nwie Jesu ngbe rewe ngu, ngu a hu be a nyyi ngu, ngu a ki rinng aha yankya.
Jesu a ki rinng he, “Nyi nda ne ngwe̱ ce̱ e̱?”
Ngu a he, “Ci rewe nje ne̱ ré srra ngbe ngwe̱: ya a nva nyye ngwe̱, ya a nva mie ngwe̱ a zhe ne ngwe̱ ri shi ye Ringgwe̱ ngwe̱.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Ko nyi hu kya ne nyi shi rinng ne̱ we̱. Nyi e̱ hung shwe kwrreshi cinci ne nje shi shweng ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Nzhi e̱ hu.”

Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Cence nyi shi shwe a yarri kwrreshi nje e̱; me̱di ya nkang srra a nva nyye ka nva mie nje, ko nyi nje ne nje nyi nne ngwang we̱. Rewie ne̱ nyi ngge nné mbe ne Be̱ nje ngu sa aha mbe.”
A zhe ne kpi mbe komo shwa nna mbe ya ho ni, mbe e̱ mwi ne re-gimbe wehwie ana.
Jesu a we ye gbengbe mbe ngu a he, “Nyi hu he nggwé̱ Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ngbe nnencwueé mbe á ye ringgwe̱ a zete mbe ne igbe̱.
Shi de̱ re shi ni a yarri nyi we̱. Nde ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ hwie̱ brrabrrang a tsi nyi re hwie̱ nnencwuo nyi;
aha ko nye̱ ngu ce̱ hwie̱ na ce̱ucwung se re hwie̱ hwie —
we shi ne Kowe Nneywi ne ko ngu be aha ré ki nyi cwuo we̱, me̱di aha ngu nyi nneywí cwuo, ngu bra ngwa ce ngu aha ngu ning se̱ nneywí piriri.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu mbe shi ne̱ a Jerriko, rigwe̱ nné we yang á ki zhwe.
A zhe ne nnencwué̱ wehwie ne mbe shi srra a rekyi rê mbe ho he Jesu shi wara, mbe e̱ ci onu he, “Brrabe̱, Kowe Dooda, ri naana nzhi!”
Nneywí ne̱ ne we yhwire he ré we ni kyie̱ onu; me̱di á ning bra kyie̱ onu he, “Brrabe̱, Kowe Dooda, ri naana nzhi!”
Jesu a hwie̱ yo, ngu a we ye, ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nda ne nyi ce̱ he n níng nying?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Brrabe̱, nzhi ce̱ ri ewie.”
Jesu a ri naana mbe, ngu a ria nyyi mbe. We zhe zunzrru mbe e̱ ne̱ ne hung ri ewie, mbe e̱ ki zhwe.
A zhe ne mbe cwo re be wre̱ a Urrushelima ne mbe ya cwu a Betefaji a Rugu Bi Rekwe Rihwie̱n, Jesu a te nné ki zhwe ngu wehwie.
A he ne mbe he, “Nyi ywa a nkla ne ngu shi a ncwuee ncwi e̱. We zhe ne nyi shi ngwie we ngwie, nyi e̱ ri ya nze̱e̱kyi ne e rwe miimi ngbe ewe ngu. Nyi we bī nyi ning be mi ne mbe.
Kundu ya nne ri níng he nka, nyi e̱ he, ‘Brrabe̱ ce̱,’ ngbe we̱ níng we nyi ne̱ mi we hwiehwie.”
Nke e̱ ci ni aha ngbe nka ne nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he re ci rrurru, shi ne ngu i he:
“Ti nné ngwie̱ Siyona he,
‘Ri, nggwe̱ ngwe̱ ree be nwie ngwe̱!
Ko ne rogyrru we̱, me̱di a zete nze̱e̱kyi
a shi a zete ewe nze̱e̱kyi.’ ”
Nné ki zhwe á ywa á ya nyi ye̱ye̱rri shi ne Jesu we heng.
Á be mi ne nze̱e̱kyi ngbe ne eweng, á ning ta re-ankya rwe̱ mbe a zeteng, ngbe Jesu a ning ngra.
Brra rigwe̱ nneywí á ta re-ankya ci mbe a rê, kpi mbe kprre nva rekwe bi rohun á ta rê.
Rigwe̱ nné ne mbe cwo a ncwuee ngu ngbe na ne mbe ki zhwe a merin á ki be̱ lo ne cwue ze nwie he,
“Hosanna
Mwo rina a nwie ngu ne ngu be ne lo Brrabe̱!
Hosanna ne Brrabe̱ gbong a zeteng!”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ngwie a Urrushelima, ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo fo re̱zhe̱ nwie rin he, “Nke e̱ nyi nye̱ ne̱?”
Rigwe̱ nné nna á kara he, “Ngu ne̱ nyi Jesu, nne ti re̱se̱ng ne ngu wru a Nazarra a Galili.”
Jesu a ngwie a yarri agrraa Brranyi, ngu a yu ga nné ne mbe rie̱ re-ankya ngbe nné sing zhwozhwo. Aa ywrru re-tebrru nné ne mbe shi bra ncwé̱ ngbe re-benci nné rie̱ re-vie̱kye̱.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Á wie he: ‘Á ri ye zonggru nje he zonggrung ku Be̱ne̱,’ me̱di nyi ki ci aa hwie̱ brra uugoo nné nca.”
Nnencwué̱ ngbe nnenkú á be nwie ngu a Brranyi, ngu a we kyia.

Me̱di a zhe ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka mbe ri re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne ngu nyi, ngbe ne e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne mbe shi kyie̱ re̱zhe̱ a agrraa Brranyi ré he, “Hosanna ne Kowe Dooda,” rehwie mbe yhwi.
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ ho kya ne e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne̱ mbe he e̱e̱?”
Jesu we shing he, “Ee, ko nyi ree hwieng gung we̱ e̱e̱? Nka Be̱ne̱ he, ‘Nyi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ngbe rewe shwo ne ngwe̱ we mie̱ng ré re de.’ ”
Ngu a we we, ngu a wru ci a yarri ngwie̱ nna re nzhi a Betani, ngu a ya kywe miimi.
A brra nyiencwe ne Jesu ngu ya ning brru ngu cwo re be a yarri ngwie̱ nna, nzhwo ki yhwe̱.

Ngu a ri ekwe riyhwietsie a rekyi rê, ngu a ne̱ re nzhi ka ngu ya she bi gbre, me̱di aa ya she nyi we rohun. Ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ko ngwe̱ bra shi cinga yhwu gbre wa we̱!” We zhe zunzrru ekwe nna hwe.
A zhe ne nné ki zhwe ngu mbe ri ni, mbe e̱ hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu nwie rinng he, “Á ce̱ rimi ne ekwe riyhwietsie ne̱ ngu wre̱ ne hwe ni e̱e̱?”

Jesu he ne mbe he, “Cence nje níng ting he kundu nyi bi sa rie we̱sa ne nyi jinji, ko nyi we kya ne nje nyi ne ekwe riyhwietsie ne̱ ne nyi e̱ hung nying we̱, me̱di nyi e̱ hung he ne rugu ne̱ he, ‘Nga, ngwe̱ ya kpe a brra nzhwo rishi,’ ngbe we̱ ci ni.
Kundu nyi bi sa rie, ko nda ne nyi rin a zhe ne nyi shi ku Be̱ne̱ nyi e̱ she.”

Jesu a ngwie a yarri agrraa Brranyi; a zhe ne ngu shi mie̱ nka, nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe brrá nné Yahudi e̱ be nwie ngu, mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ she de̱me̱ ne ngwe̱ ning nyi re-ankya ne̱ a he? Nyi nye̱ ngu re ngwa zhwe de̱me̱ ne̱?”
Jesu we brang he, “Nje shi níng rin ya nka zunzrru. Kundu nyi ri ning shing, ma n níng ting ka nyi zohu de̱me̱ ne nje ning nyi re-cwuo ne̱ ye̱.
De̱me̱ ne Yohana i ning nyi batisma i wru a he? A i wru zinye̱ ka nwie nneywí?”
Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne yaa ti ronu ce we nci mbe, mbe e̱ he, “Kundu nzhi ri he he wru zinye̱, we̱ níng rinng he, ‘Ma nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nyi shî nka Yohana we̱ e̱ ye̱?’
Kundu nzhi ri bra he he wru nwie nneywí, nzhi bra to owu nneywí aha ko nye̱ fo Yohana a nu nne ti re̱se̱ng.”
Aha nii, mbe e̱ he ne Jesu he, “Ko nzhi hu ma we̱.” Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ko shi n níng ting ka nyi de̱me̱ nye̱ ne nje ning nyí re-ankya ne̱ ma we̱.”
“Ma nyi hwie rimi ne nka ne̱? A i bi ya nne ne ngu bi rewe wehwie. Aa ywa a nwie hong, ngu a he, ‘A ewe, ywa ngwe̱ ya nyi cwuo a nhwie̱n inebi a cwu ne̱.’
“Ngu a he, ‘Ko nje cwo nzhi we̱.’ Aa srra ngu a ya hwie nka te̱nte̱, ngu a ywa.
“Wire be̱ nna a ywa a nwie ya ewe nna, ngu a ya ki heng we shi ne ngu he ne na ce̱ucwung. Ngu a shî he, ‘Nje cwo nzhi,’ me̱di koo ywa we̱.
“Nyi zohu a zetsi mbe ne̱ ngu nyi kya ne be̱ mbe e̱ ce̱?”
Mbe e̱ shî he, “Na ce̱ucwung.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Cence, nje níng ting he: nné si gondu ngbe ntsie̱wenté á shi ke̱she nyi ré ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.
Aha Yohana Nyi Batisma be ngbe ngu níng ti rê redziee, ko nyi se̱ nka ngu we̱; me̱di nné si gondu ngbe ntsie̱wenté á se̱. Ko ngbe ne nyi zrre̱ ni, ko nyi hwie nka te̱nte̱ ngbe nyi se̱ nka ngu we̱.

“Ma nyi ho ya nka zhwebe wa: Ya be̱ri ne ngu bi rebe aa kye̱ inebi a nhwie̱n ngu, ngu a no garru ngu a ning grrang. Ngu a kwe̱ ruvong yhwi ngbre inebi nna a kprahwan, ngu a no eri dede nang cwo nhwie̱n nna. Wire ngu a ko re-lebrra ré srra re ki nyi cwuo a nhwie̱n inebi nna, ngu a nyi ciee.
A zhe ne ngbre nna sa dudu ré ne̱ ne kping, ngu a te yá hwié ngu a nwie re-lebrra nna he ré ya ki kpi ngbre na ngu.
“Me̱di re-lebrra nna á prre hwié nna, á cwe ya, á yhwe̱ ya, á ta ya ne ngbatsie.
He̱rri ne cwu aa te yá hwié nna wa re ne̱ na ce̱ucwung, re-lebrra á we nyi we shi na ce̱ucwung nna wa.
A ngrangrang, aa te ewe ngu nwie mbe, a he, ‘Nje hu he á cwo a to riyii ewe nje ne̱.’
“Me̱di a zhe ne re-lebrra nna mbe ri ewe nna, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne he we nci mbe he, ‘Yowe̱e̱! Ri nne ye gado nna nke. Nyi ning be nzhi ki yhwe̱ ngbe gado nna re hwie̱ ngge nzhi.’
Aha nii, á ki fo zhwu a teme nhwie̱n nna á ki yhwe̱.
“Ma kundu nne bi nhwie̱n ana ngu be, nyi hwie we̱ ya nyi rimi ne re-lebrra ana?”
Mbe e̱ he, “We̱ ci nné hwie̱ ana ré ci shweni, we̱ ngwa yaká re-lebrra nhwie̱n nna, ne mbe ri ma ki cwo mi ne ga na ngu, a zhe ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne e shi kpi ngbre nna.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Ko nyi sa hwie a yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Á wie he,
‘Ngbaatsie ne nné runo mbe zhwu;
aa bra ya hwie̱ te̱nte̱ ngbaatsie.
Nyi Brrabe̱ ngu ki nyi ni;
aa bra hwie̱ kyang nga onu a nwie nzhi.’
“Aha nii, nje níng ting he, á shi níng trru ci a yarri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱, ré ngwa nné mbiye ne mbe to owu Be̱ne̱ shi shi nné ne mbe shi be mi ne ngbre inebi ye̱ye̱rri.
[Nne ne ngu grre̱ a ngbaatsie ne̱, we̱ yaa kprre, me̱di nne nke ne ngbaatsie ne̱ kpe a zete ngu, we̱ ki mle̱ she̱she̱.”]
A zhe ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné Farisi mbe ho re-nka zhwebe Jesu, á hu he a he re-nka ne̱ a rici mbe.
Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne kre rê mbe ki pie, me̱di á to owu rigwe̱ nné aha nneywí e̱ fo Jesu a nu nne ti re̱se̱ng.
Jesu we he ya nka zhwebe wa he:
“Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ shi shi ya nggwe̱ ne ngu nyi ewe ngu bikyi nyrra.
Ngu a te hwié ngu he ré ya ye nné, ne ngu we ti nyrra, ngbe re be a nwie bikyi nna, me̱di á ra be.

Ngu a te yaká hwié ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he, ‘Nyi ya ti nné ne nje we ti bikyi ne̱ he nje nyi ko nda yhwe̱. Nje ca ngbá re-izhimi ngbe dé̱ nnywá, nje nyi re-yâ nna yhwe̱ zhwozhwo. Nyi be bikyi nyrra nna fa.’
“Me̱di koó ci nkwile̱ gung we̱. Ko nye̱ mbe ne̱ ne ciee ngu, yá ne̱ re nzhi re-eyi mbe, yá ne̱ re nzhi nyi re-kaawe̱ mbe,
yá mbe prre hwié nna á we cwe he̱rri á we yhwi.
Ehwie nggwe̱ nna ye gbushwo. Ngu a ci re-shezhi ngu á ywa á ya we yhwi á shwi ngwie̱ mbe.
“Wire ngu a he ne hwié ngu he, ‘Nje nyi ko nda na bikyi nyrra ne̱ yhwe̱ wiriri, me̱di nné ne nje i we ti nyrra ne̱ koó mwa ye̱ye̱rri re be we̱;
nyi ywa a re-gasire, ko nye̱ ne nyi ri ki she nyi ki ye.’
Aha nii, hwié ngu á wru ci re nzhi brrá re-rê á ya tsu nné ne mbe she, re-te̱nte̱ng ngbe re-dedeng gbengbe mbe, á ya shi brra zonggrung nyi bikyi nna.
“Me̱di a zhe ne nggwe̱ nna ngu ngwie, ngbe ngu ri nné ice nna, ngu a timi ne ya nne a miimi ne ko ngu ci ankya bikyi nyrra we̱.
Ngu a ki rinng he, ‘A nu, ngwe̱ ce̱ rimi ne ngwe̱ ngwie he ne̱ we̱sa ci ankya bikyi nyrra a?’ Ko nne nna bi kya he we̱.
Nggwe̱ nna a he ne nnencwuó ngu he, ‘Nyi ki rrwe nva ngbe nta zhwozhwo, nyi ki zhwu ci a nwie ne ngu shi ywing, ne e níng kyie̱ rana re ye nnyi.’
“Aha a nyi nné piriri ne e we ye, me̱di nyi nné tsie̱nzhwu ne e kyie.”
Nné Farisi e̱ wru ci, á ya ne̱ ne rwe re-nka aha mbe hu rê ne mbe shi ning pie Jesu a re-nka nu ngu.

Mbe e̱ te nné ne mbe we zhwe ngbe nné ce̱ ringgwe̱ Hirridu he ré ya he ne ngu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nzhi hu he ngwe̱ he we nka raywrra. Ngwe̱ mie̱ nneywí rê Be̱ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri. Ko ngwe̱ to riyii nneywí we̱, aha ko ngwe̱ ci nkwile̱ ne grime̱ nneywi we̱ ka re bra nyi nye̱.
Ma níng ting, a ri ngwe̱, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré trra Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma gondu aa? Nzhi trra ka de̱ nzhi trra we̱?”
Me̱di Jesu hu he nyi we nka igerri, ngu a he, “Nyi nné brra ronu, nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi ce̱ ning mwa ri e̱ ye̱?
Nyi be mi ne ya cwe ncwe̱ng trra gondu a n ri!”
Mbe e̱ ki be mi ne cwe denarri.
Ngu a we rinng he, “Nke e̱ nyi foto nye̱ ngbe lo nye̱ ne e ning wieng ne̱?”
Mbe e̱ he, “A nyi Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ngwa Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma kya ne ngu nyi na ngu; nyi ngwa Be̱ne̱ kya ne ngu nyi na Be̱ne̱.”
A zhe ne mbe ho ni, á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu. Mbe e̱ ne̱ ki we fa.
We tung ana nné Sadukyi ne mbe he ko bi deze nhu we̱, á be nwie ngu aha mbe ki rin nka.
Á he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, Musa he ne nzhi he kundu ya nne hu we̱sa ne e̱we̱e̱ rewe, se gimbe ngu re fo kpambrru ngu re hwie̱ mbrru ngu, aha re ki bî rewe.
A i bi yá re-gimbe komo natsie̱ ne mbe srra ngbe nzhi. Na ce̱ucwung fo mbrru, aa ma ya hu we̱sa she e̱we̱e̱ rewe, ngu a we gimbe ngu ne mbrru nna.
Nne na hwie nyi we ni ma, he̱rri ngbe na tsie̱, he̱rri kpi mbe natsie̱ e̱ zhwozhwo á ning zhweng.
A ngrangrang, mbrru nna ma ya hu.
Ma a zhe ne ne̱, a tung deze nhu a, a ri nyi mbrru nye̱ a tsi mbe nné natsie̱ ana, aha ko nye̱ mbe nyi nyrra ne ngu?”
Jesu we shing he, “Nyi brru aha riywe̱ hu krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe igbe̱ ngu.
A zhe ne nneywí ri deze nhu, ko ntó ri ko mbrrú ka mbrrú ré drro re nzhi nyrra we̱. Nneywí ri shi shi re-njeli zinye̱.
A nkang deze nhu a, ko nyi hwie kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i he ne nyi e̱ we̱ e̱e̱? A he,
‘Nje nyi Be̱ne̱ na Ibrrahin, ngbe Be̱ne̱ na Ishaku, ngbe Be̱ne̱ na Yakubu.’ Ko nyi Be̱ne̱ nné kwi we̱, me̱di a nyi Be̱ne̱ nné nce.”
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nné nna mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu ne mie̱ nka ngu.
A zhe ne nné Farisi mbe ho he Jesu drre̱ nné Sadukyi ne nka, mbe e̱ ya tsu.
Ya mbe ne ngu nyi nne hu re̱se̱ Nti Nka a ki rin nka aha ngu ki mwa ri.
A he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nyi zohu ngu nyi brrang a tsi Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu ki shing he, “ ‘Ce̱ Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ngwe̱ ne onu rie ngwe̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe ce ngwe̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe ehwie ngwe̱ zhwozhwo.’
Nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi brrang ngbe cwucwung a tsi Nti Nka Be̱ne̱.
Na hwie a srra shi we ni wa: ‘Ce̱ nne dudu ne ngwe̱ shi rici ngwe̱.’
Ga Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa ngbe na nné ti re̱se̱ng á ria a Nti Nka wehwie ne̱.”
Yá nné Farisi ya mwe gbengbe mbe, Jesu a we rinng he,
A ri nyi, nyi hwie he Krristi e̱ wru a he? A nyi Kowe nye̱?
Mbe e̱ he, “A nyi Kowe Dooda.”
Ngu a we rinng he, “Ma á ce̱ rimi ne Dooda i ki ye he ‘Brrabe̱’ ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nshe Wiri ki mie̱ng nna? A i he,
‘Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ i he ne Brrabe̱ nje he:
Srra a nva nyye ngwe̱ ye ringgwe̱ ngbe nje,
se nje ci rwinkó ngwe̱
ré hwie̱ tahwie ngwe̱.’
Kundu Dooda i ki ye he ‘Brrabe̱’, we̱ bra ce̱ rimi re nyi ewe ngu wa aa?”
Ko bi ya mbe ngu hung bra nka re ki shing we̱, gannyi tuuye fa ko bi ko ya mbe ngu matrra ki rin ko ya nka wa we̱.
Wire Jesu a he ne rigwe̱ nné nna ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu he,
“Nné mie̱ Nti Nka ngbe Nné Farisi e̱ á bi de̱me̱ng mie̱ nneywí Nti Nka Musa.
Aha nii, nyi we ho nka, nyi bra nyi ko nda ne mbe he nyi nyi. Me̱di shi de̱ nyi nyi re-ankya ne mbe nyi we̱, aha ko mbe e̱ á nyi kya ne mbe hé we̱.
Á rwe re-nkpe ruvo ne ko mbe bi kpe we̱
“Á nyi ko nda mbe we aha nneywí ré we ri. Á cí ngbá re-la na nti nka Be̱ne̱ baara baara a teyii,
Á kre we rewie bi grime̱ a rewie para ngbe te̱nte̱ rewieng srra a re-zonggrung mwe;
á kre he ré srra re we dzie a re-kaawe̱ ne grime̱ ne e we be̱ lo he ‘Nné mie̱ nka’.
“Me̱di shi de̱ ré ye ya nyi he ‘Nne Mie̱ Nka’ we̱, aha ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi nyí we re-gimbe, Nne Mie̱ Nka nyi shi we zunzrru.
Shi de̱ nyi ye ya nne a be ngwie̱ he ne̱ he ‘Be̱’ we̱, aha nyi bi we Be̱ zunzrru ne ngu shi zinye̱.
Shi de̱ ré ye ya nyi he Nnencwuee we̱, aha nyi bi we Nnencwuee zunzrru ne ngu nyi Krristi.
Nne ne ngu nyi brrang a tsi nyi re hwie̱ nnencwuo nyi.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu fo rici ngu ze, wé̱ ki ci re̱; nne nke ne ngu yaa ci re̱ ma, wé̱ ki fo ze.

“Wuhu ne nyi, nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe Nné Farisi! Nyi nyi nné brra ronu! Nyi be̱ nneywí onusinye Ringgwe̱ zinye̱. Nyi we nci nyi ko nyi ngwie we̱, ko nyi bra we nné ne mbe ce̱ ning ngwie ré ngwie we̱.

[Wuhu ne nyi, nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe nné Farisi! Nyi nyi nné brra ronu! Nyi shwe̱li kpambrrú re we ye ne le a reri mbe, wire nyi e̱ ya yo nwie ku Be̱ne̱ je̱je̱je̱ aha ré níng ri. Aha nii, á ri níng ngwa cinci we yang.]

“Wuhu ne nyi, nné mie̱ Nti Nka ngbe Nné Farisi! Nyi nyi nné brra ronu! Nyi tsie̱ brrá nzhwo rishi he̱rri nyi cwo cwu a krruci ngwie̱ nwie kre nne se ywe̱ re ci shi nyi, kundu ne nyi she nne zunzrru nyi e̱ ki ci re hwie̱ nne ngwie a ruvong ro re ning ne̱ nyi.”
“Wuhu ne nyi, nnencwué̱ kwa yincwuee! Nyi he, ‘Ko nye̱ ne ngu shí ne lo Brranyi, ko bi yankya we̱; me̱di kundu ne ngu shí ne zinarriya na Brranyi, maahu shí ngu a ki rrwe.’
Nyi mwa bi cwue̱! Nyi zohu ngu ne̱: nyi ngu zinarriya nna ka ngu Brranyi e̱ ne ngu ci ngu zinarriya nna re ci wiri e̱e̱?
Nyi bra he he, ‘Ko nye̱ ne ngu shí ne briing nyi teede, ko we̱ bi yankya we̱, me̱di kundu ne ngu shí ne beeko a nwie briing nyi teede, maahu shí ngu a ki pie.’
Nyi nnencwué̱! Nyi zohu ngu ne̱, nyi ngu beeko nna, ka ngu briing nyi teede e̱ ne ngu cí beeko nna re ci wiri e̱e̱?
Aha nii, ko nye̱ ne ngu shí ne briing nyi teede, aa shí ne ko nda ngu shi a ngu.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu bra shí ne Brranyi, aa shí ne ngu ngbe ne Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi a miimi.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu shí ne zinye̱, aa shí ne ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne ngu ne ngu ning srra a zeteng.

“Wuhu ne nyi, nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe nné Farisi! Nyi nyi nné brra ronu! Nyi trru zaka ga re-nzhwe rikwe bi shwe̱ rina shi shi mbe minti, ngbe dili, ngbe ne kumi zhwozhwo, me̱di ko nyi ci nkwile̱ nyi zhwe ngbá Nti Nka ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng mie̱ng shi shi e̱kpe̱e̱ raywrra, ngbe naana nneywí, ngbe sa rie we̱. A nyi mbe ne̱ ne mbe mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi rā nyi we̱sa ne we re-mbe ana.
Nnencwué̱ kwa yincwuee! Nyi zha se nyi ti e̱we̱ iizhi a rishi shwe nyi, me̱di nyi e̱ bra ngwrra ngba ronkomi!
“Wuhu ne nyi, nné mie̱ Nti Nka, ngbe nné Farisi! Nyi nyi nné brra ronu! Nyi kyu we teme kwrreshi ngbe onggo, me̱di a yarring á shî ne e̱kpe̱e̱ng si ankya nneywí ne igbe̱ ngbe ce̱ rici.
Nné Farisi bi cwue̱! Nyi ke̱she kyu yaarri kwrreshi ngbe onggo, wire re-teme nna wé̱ ci wiri ma!

“Wuhu ne nyi, nné mie̱ Nti Nka ngbe nné Farisi! Nyi nyi nné brra ronu! Nyi shi shi re-ria ne e we fu ne e̱vie̱e̱ kye̱, ne mbe bi re-rina ri a ci, me̱di yaarring nyi we uuku nku ngbe ga re-ankya ne mbe gwra.
Nyi shi he ni wa: a ci, nneywí e̱ á níng di nyi bi redziee; me̱di a yarring nyi nyí we uuku hwie̱ ngbe brra ronu.
“Wuhu ne nyi, nné mie̱ Nti Nka ngbe nné Farisi! Nyi nyi nné brra ronu! Nyi no re-ria nné ti re̱se̱ng, nyi bra nyi re-ria nné redziee risa;
nyi e̱ he, ‘Kundu nzhi i ra ning shi a rotu re-yo nzhi, ko nzhi i ra mwe va ngbe mbe nwie ywe̱ roshwo nné ti re̱se̱ng we̱.’
Aha ni nyi ti we gbeng we nci nyi he nyi nyí nzhwe nné mbe ne mbe i yhwi nné ti re̱se̱ng.
Ma nyi ning tu rici ho, ngbe nyi wo cwuo ne re-yo nyi e̱ mbe i nyi!
“Nshé! Zhwe kprre! Nyi e̱ ce̱ rimi nyi to nka ne e shi níng nying ré níng zi ruvong ro a nyi drre̱ e̱e̱?

Aha nii, nyi ri, nje shi níng te mi ne nné ti re̱se̱ng, ngbe nné bi zentsi, ngbe nné mie̱ nka. Kpi mbe, nyi shi we yhwi, nyi we ci gasankwe; kpi, nyi shi we cwe a yarri re-zonggrung mwe nyi; kpi, nyi shi we yu a ya ngwie̱ re nzhi ya ngwie̱ giriri giriri.

Aha nii, le̱e̱kyi ga nné redziee ne mbe i yhwi e̱ cwo a hwie̱ a rici nyi, kya ngu pie a Habila, nne redziee, re be cwu Zakariya ewe Berrekyia ne nyi i yhwe̱ a zetsi hwrre̱ ewie wiri Brranyi ngbe briing nyi teede.
Nje níng ting cence he le̱e̱kyi nné ne e yhwi ne̱ zhwozhwo shi hwie̱ a rici nné nze̱ ne̱.

“Hei nné Urrushelima! Nné Urrushelima! Nyi yhwi nné ti re̱se̱ng, nyi ta nnenté Be̱ne̱ ne ngbatsie! Aa ci ce maa ne nje ce̱ he n níng tsu gbengbe shi shi de̱ nngwie̱ ne ngu tsu rewe ngu a tahwie re-gahaa ngu, me̱di nyi ra aa!
Nyi ri, á shi níng we Brranyi nyi e̱ hwerri.
Nje níng ting he ko nyi bra bi ning ri wa we̱, se ne nyi ri he, ‘Mwo rina nyi na nne nke ne ngu be a yarri lo Brrabe̱.’ ”
Jesu wru Brranyi ne ngu nyia ne ciee, nné ki zhwe ngu á shwo re be dudu ne ngu he re ri zhwe re-runo Brranyi ne̱.
Ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi ri ga mbe ne̱ e̱e̱? Nje níng ting cence he ko bi ko ya ngbaatsie a he ne̱ ne e ri we a zete ya we̱; á ri we sē̱ zhwozhwo.”

A zhe ne Jesu shi srra a Rugu Bi Rekwe Rihwie̱n, nné ki zhwe ngu á be nwie ngu ranranng. Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Níng ting, re-ankya ne̱ á ri ci a rekpe? Nyi nda ngu ri nyi sheedeng be ngwe̱ ngbe na krruci ngwie̱ nna?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Nyi ci nkwile̱ shi de̱ ya nne re níng brra we̱.
Jie̱ nné á ri be a yarri lo nje, nwie he he, ‘Nje nyi Krristi,’ he̱rri á ri brra nneywí piriri.
Nyi ri ho re-nka cwe ngbe munci cwe, me̱di shi de̱ nyi kpi roshwo hwie we̱. Aha se re-ankya ne̱ mbe ci, me̱di gamang rishi be.
Ya ngwie̱ ri ne̱ ne kwe̱ cwe ngbe ne ya ngwie̱. Ya ringgwe̱ ri kwe̱ ngbe ya ringgwe̱. A ri bi nzhwo, ngbe re-ngwie̱gbe̱ a rewie kanka kanka.
Ga re-nke ne̱ á nyi we ce̱ucwung shi shi rwe̱ wie zheng bî ewe.
“Wire wé̱ níng ngwa a nva rwinkó nyi ngbe ré níng ngwa ge̱zhe̱ he̱rri wé̱ níng yhwi. Ga Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ri níng ra aha nje.
A zhe ana nneywí piriri ri kpi, wé̱ ne̱ ne nyi e̱ngwie̱; yá ri rie̱ yá re-gimbe a nva rwinkó, he̱rri wé̱ ne̱ ne yaa ra.
Nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra we yang á ri kpi ci, ngbe wé̱ brra nneywí piriri.
Aha hwie̱ ne ngu ri ci we yang, yaa ce̱ a nwie nneywí e̱ ri hli.
Me̱di nne ne ngu ri yo gangga he̱rri re nzhi cwu gamang we̱ ri drre̱.
Se ne e ri brro Nka Rina na Ringgwe̱ ne̱ ko he a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ngbe re hwie̱ sheede a re-ngwie̱, wire krruci ko nda we̱ be fa.
“Aha nii, a zhe ne nyi ri ri ‘nyrrukiki kya le̱le̱ na dzio ewie’ ngu yó a nwie wiri Brranyi shi ne Daniye nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he — nde nne hwie krre̱de̱ ne̱ re pie cwu nka ne̱.
A zhe ana, nde nné ne mbe ri shi a Yahudi ré to re nzhi ngbrá.
Shi de̱ nne nke ne ngu ri shi a zete zonggru ngu re cwucwu he ngu ya fo yankya a yarri zonggru nna we̱.
Shi de̱ nne nke ne ngu ri shi yi re ning brru re nzhi ri aha ngu ya fo kuntu ngu we̱.
A ri he rotu ana, wuhu ne mbrrú bi rehwie ngbe re-na mbe ri bi rewe shwo.
Nyi ku Be̱ne̱ he shi de̱ re-ncii nyi a zhe nna re ya kpe a zhe rikwi
Aha a zhe nna, a ri bi ge̱zhe̱ we yang zhwe na ne koó sa nying we̱ tu ce̱ucwu ebe ngwie̱ re be cwu zhe ne ne̱, koó bra bi nying wa we̱.
Kundu de̱ á ra ve rotu ana tsa we̱, koo ra bi ko ya nne ngu ri drre̱ we̱; me̱di aha nné ne e we kyie, Be̱ne̱ ri kpo rotu ana kunggu.
“A zhe ana, kundu ya nne ri he ne nyi he, ‘Ri, Krristi nna shi he!’ ka ‘A shi ye!’ Shi de̱ nyi shî we̱.
Aha re-Krristi rabrra ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra ri kpi ci ne ngbá re-sheede nwie nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu aha he ka mbe ra hung brra nné ne Be̱ne̱ we kyie, me̱di ko shi re hung we she we̱.
Nyi ri! Nje ke̱nce̱ níng ting ne zhe nna rishi ci.
“Aha nii, kundu mbe ri he ne nyi he, ‘Ri, a shi ye a tsi yi!’ — shi de̱ nyi wru re nzhi we̱; ka ré bra he, ‘A shi he a yarri zonggru ne,’ shi de̱ nyi shî we̱.
Aha we shi shi ne ewie ci mele a nva ze, ngbe we̱ tsie̱ nse̱ re nzhi cwu nva ta, be Kowe Nneywi e̱ ri shi we ni.
“Ko zohu ewie ne ngu ning bi kwe yankya, nggulú cwo tsu miimi.
“We zhe ne ge̱zhe̱ na rotu ana mbe ri wara
‘Ne̱ we̱ ci ywiriri,
ko yhwe̱ we̱ tsie̱ nse̱ ngu we̱,
ngbe re̱nde̱ wé̱ wru zinye̱ wé̱ kpi be,
ngbe wé̱ gbe̱ ngbá ankya zinye̱.’

Wire a zhe ana, sheede ne ngu ti be Kowe Nneywi we̱ ya wre̱ gbong a zeteng, wire ga nneywí a re-nkla a be ngwie̱ wé̱ ku rana, ne mbe ri Kowe Nneywi ngu wro re be a re-inyie̱ zinye̱ ne igbe̱ ngbe brra grime̱.
Á ri tsie̱ brra rigbe, ngbe we̱ te re-njeli ngu ré ya tsu nné ngu ne ngu kyie a re-nva weni na ebe ngwie̱, kya ngu pie gbong a nva zinye̱ ye re nzhi cwu gbong a nva ya.
“Nyi mie̱ yankya a nka zhwebe ekwe riyhwietsie ne̱: a zhe ne nva nna mbe ne̱ ne bra ikpe, mbe ne̱ ne yhwu rohun, nyi e̱ hu he rikwi be dudu.
We ye̱ye̱rri ni ma, a zhe ne nyi ri ri ga re-ankya ne̱, nyi e̱ hu he koo hwie̱ gbong we̱ — a shi gbundu.
Nje níng ting cence he ko nné nze̱ ne̱ á shi kwi yhwe̱ we̱ se re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo mbe ci.
Zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱ shi yhwe̱, me̱di ko nti nka nje bi ci shweni we̱.
“Ko bi ko ya nne, ka ya njeli a zinye̱ ne ngu hu otu ana ka zhe nna we̱, ngbe ne ngu Kowe a ma, se we Be̱ nggaa ngu.
We shi ne ngu i ci a rotu Nuhu, a cwo a shi we ni a be Kowe Nneywi.
A shi we shi rotu ne brra nze nna i rishi ce̱, nneywí i srra re ye re shwe, re rwe re-nyrra, nwie ci rana nyrra, he̱rri re be cwu zhe ne Nuhu ngu i ngwie yarri jirigi.
Koó i hu kya ne ngu shi ci we̱, se ne brra nze nna ngu maa ya kpe be hwe̱hwe̱hwe̱, he̱rri aa we ci á ci shweni. A cwo a shi ni a zheng be Kowe Nneywi.
Nné wehwie á ri shi kaa a yi; á ri fo ya, wé̱ we ya.
Mbrrú wehwie á ri shi hwie nkya a rukpa; á ri fo ya, wé̱ we ya.
“Aha nii, nyi srrante, aha ko nyi hu otu ne Brrabe̱ nyi e̱ shi ning be we̱.
Me̱di nyi hu he, kundu ne be̱ri eri a ra hu re̱se̱ zhe ne nne nca cwo be a totu, aa ra srrante, koo ra we nne nca re hwin eri ngu re ning ngwie we̱.
Aha nii, se nyi srrante, aha Kowe Nneywi e̱ cwo be a zhe ne ko nyi ning hwie yi we̱.
“Ma nyi zohu hwie ngu bi redziee ngbe zentsi e̱e̱? A nyi na ne be̱ri ngu a ki ci ncwuo he re srra re ri kpi hwié ngu, ne ngu we ngwá yâ a zhe ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri.
Ngu hwie ana cwo a nyi rekwi a zhe ne be̱ri ngu a ri be ngu ya ki she ngu shi nying ye̱ye̱rri ni.
Nje níng ting cence he, we̱ ki ngwa de̱me̱ re hwie̱ nne bro re-ankya ngu zhwozhwo.
Me̱di kundu hwie nna ngu nyi riywe̱ redziee, we̱ he we rici ngu he, ‘Be̱ri nje ne̱ fu ci zhe,’
ngbe we̱ ne̱ ne cwe rwincwuó ngu, nwie gye̱ re ye re shwe ankya ngbe nné hwieen.
Be̱ri ngu ri cwo a wre̱ a ya otu ne ko ngu ree ning hwie yi we̱, a zhe ne ko ngu ru we̱.
We̱ ya ki ca kpunkpu, we̱ kro a nwie nné brra ronu, ewie ne ngu shi ning ku anaa re ye nnyi.
“A zhe ana Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ e̱ ri shi shi rana komo shwa ne mbe ko re-fitile̱ mbe, mbe ywa nyi ne nne rwe nyrra.
Wecwuoo a tsi mbe á ti mwa, ngbe wecwuoo á a bi zentsi.
Mwa nna á ko re-fitile̱ mbe we̱sa ne remie na mbe ri ning brang.
Re-na bi zentsi nna á cwe re-remie a re-fitile̱ mbe we̱sa ne re-na mbe bro a re-tulu.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo kpi re-ndzie aha ko nne rwe nyrra nna be hwiehwie we̱.
“A tsi totu ya cwue e̱ ci ye he, ‘Nne rwe nyrra nna nyi nke! Nyi kpi ci, nyi ya ki nyire!’
“Wire ga rana nna zhwozhwo a deze, á ci re-ro a re-fitile̱ mbe.
Wecwuoo ne mbe nyi mwa ana mbe e̱ he ne re-na bi zentsi e̱ he, ‘Nyi níng na remie, re-fitile̱ nzhi e̱ á shi yu.’
“Re-na bi zentsi e̱ we shing he, ‘Aawo, ko shi re ning be zhwozhwo nzhi ngbe nyi we̱. Canca nyi ywa a nwie nné rie̱ng nyi ya se̱ na nyi.’
“A zhe ne mbe nyia re nzhi se̱ng, nne rwe nyrra a ya wre̱. Rana nke ne mbe shi srrante e̱ mbe e̱ ngwie yarring ngbe ngu. Mbe e̱ she̱ onusinye fa.
“Á srra tsie̱, rana riywe̱ zentsi nna á be nwie he, ‘Be̱ri! Be̱ri! Níng kla!’
“Nne rwe nyrra a we shing he, ‘Nje níng ting cence, ko nje níng hu we̱.’
“Aha nii, nyi srrante, ko nyi hu otu ka zhe nna we̱.
“Ringgwe̱ zinye̱ e̱ ri shi shi ya nne ne ngu shi nyi ciee, ngu a ye hwié ngu, ngu a we kye dukyie̱e̱ ngu.
Aa ngwa ya mbe ncwe̱ talenti
Nne na ngu se̱ talenti wecwuoo a wre̱ ne ya cing a kaawe̱, he̱rri aa ning she rruba ya talenti wecwuoo wa.
Ngu ne ngu se̱ talenti wehwie e̱ ma, aa ya ci na ngu a kaawe̱ ma he̱rri aa ning she rruba ya talenti wehwie wa.
Me̱di ngu nne ne ngu se̱ talenti zunzrru a ywa, ngu a ya kwe̱ ebe, ngu a ning la ncwe̱ be̱ri ngu a.
“Aa fo zhe we yang wire be̱ri mbe e̱ be ri, aha ko nye̱ mbe re ngwa kya ne ngu ning sheng.
Nne ne ngu i se̱ talenti wecwuoo a be mi ne na ngu ngbe yaka talenti wecwuoo wa. Ngu a he, ‘Be̱ri, ngwe̱ i ning ngwa talenti wecwuoo. Ri, nje ning she rruba yaka talenti wecwuoo a zeteng.’

“Be̱ri ngu a he ne ngu he, ‘Te̱nte̱ ni, hwie te̱nte̱ng, ngwe̱ nyi ye̱ye̱rri! Ngwe̱ nyi redziee a kya tsie̱nzhwu. Maahu nje shi re ci a ringgwe̱ re-ankya piriri. Ngwie ngbe ngwe̱ nyi rekwi ngbe nje be̱ri ngwe̱.’
“Nne na ngu i se̱ talenti wehwie e̱ be ma. Ngu a he, ‘Be̱ri, ngwe̱ i ning ngwa talenti wehwie. Ri, nje ning she rruba yaka talenti wehwie a zeteng.’
“Be̱ri ngu a he, ‘Te̱nte̱ ni, hwie te̱nte̱ng, ngwe̱ nyi ye̱ye̱rri! Ngwe̱ nyi redziee a kya tsie̱nzhwu. Maahu nje shi re ci ringgwe̱ re-ankya piriri. Ngwie ngbe ngwe̱ nyi rekwi ngbe nje be̱ri ngwe̱.’
“Wire nne ne ngu i se̱ talenti zunzrru a be ma fa. Ngu a he, ‘Be̱ri, nje hu he ngwe̱ nyi nne bi rwe̱; ngwe̱ cá yâ a nwie ne ko ngwe̱ kye̱ we̱, ngwe̱ ko yâ a ebe ne ko ngu nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ kye̱ we̱.
Aha nii, nje i ci owu, nje ne̱ nje ya la talenti ngwe̱ e̱ a yarri be. Ri, ngge ngwe̱ a nyi nke.’
“Be̱ri ngu a ki shing he, ‘Ngwe̱ hwie bi hwie̱ ngbe rê! He̱rri ngwe̱ hu he nje ca yâ a nwie ne ko nje kye̱ we̱, he nje bra ko yâ a ebe ne ko ngu nyi nje ne nje kye̱ we̱ e̱e̱?’
Ma ko ngwe̱ ra fo ncwe̱ nje e̱ ngwe̱ ya ngwa nné benkyi ré brra, aha nje ra be ri ne̱ ma ya she ngbe rruba we̱ e̱e̱?
Nyi se̱ talenti nna a nwie ngu a, nyi ngwa nne bi talenti shwa ana.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu bi, á ri ki bra kpi, ngbe we̱ she piriri. Me̱di nne nke ne ko ngu bi we̱, ngbe e̱we̱ kya ne ngu bi e̱, á ri se̱ a nva ngu.
Ngu hwie shweni ne̱, nyi ki zhwu ci, a yarri ewie ywi, ewie ne ngu shi ning ku anaa re ye nnyi.
“A zhe ne Kowe Nneywi ri be a yarri grime̱ ngu ngbe re-njeli ngu, a ri srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ ngu na grime̱ zinye̱.
Ga nneywí a re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ri ya tsu a nyyi ngu; a ri ka nneywí kanka kanka we shi ne nne cwo ngu ká canvé ngbe vé.
A ri sa canvé a nva nyye ngu, we̱ sa vé a nva mie ngu.

“Wire ngu Nggwe̱ nna we̱ he ne nné ne mbe shi a nva nyye ngu a he, ‘Nyi be, nyi ne nyi she mwo rina a nwie Be̱ nje! Nyi be nyi ya ye gado ringgwe̱ nyi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i níng ngwa tu ce̱ucwu ebe ngwie̱.
A zhe ne nje i shi ne nzhwo, nyi ning ngwa yâ. Nje i ho ne̱ rishi, nyi ning ngwa rishi shwe. Nje i be ice, nyi ning se̱.
Nje i shi ngbe̱we̱ng, nyi ning ci tago. Nje i shi ne ruhu, nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nje. Nje i shi a uucwu gyiaa, nyi ya ning dzie.’
“Wire nné redziee nna wé̱ ki shing he, ‘Brrabe̱, nyi rekpe ne nzhi i re ri ne nzhwo he̱rri nzhi re ngwa yâ aa, ka ne ne̱ rishi re hwe nzhi re ngwa rishi shwe e̱e̱?
Nyi rekpe ne ngwe̱ i be a ice ne nzhi re se̱ e̱e̱, ka ne ngwe̱ i shi ngbe̱we̱ng nzhi re ci tago aa?
Nyi rekpe ne nzhi i re di ngwe̱ shi ne ruhu, ka a yarri uucwu gyiaa he̱rri nzhi ya re dzie e̱e̱?’
“Ngbe Nggwe̱ nna we̱ we shing he, ‘Nje níng ting cence, ko nda ne nyi i nyi aha ya e̱we̱ gimbe nje ne̱, nyi i ning nyi njeng.’
“Wire we̱ he ne nné mbe shi a nva mie e̱ he, ‘Nyi ne nyi ci shweni, nyi ne̱ nwie nje re nzhi ruvong ro na ngu ye he̱rri tiya ne e nyi aha Shetani ngbe re-njeli ngu!
Aha nje i shi ne nzhwo ko nyi ning ngwa yâ we̱. Ne̱ rishi ning hwe, ko nyi ning ngwa rishi shwe we̱.
Nje i be ice, ko nyi ning se̱ we̱; nje i shi ngbe̱we̱ng, ko nyi ning ci tago we̱; nje i shi ne ruhu, nje bra shi a uucwu gyiaa ko nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nje we̱.’

“Wire wé̱ ki shing he, ‘Brrabe̱, nyi rekpe ne nzhi i re ri ne nzhwo ka ne̱ rishi re hwe, ka ne ngwe̱ be ice, ka ne ngwe̱ shi ngbe̱we̱ng, ka ne ngwe̱ shi ne ruhu, ka ne ngwe̱ shi a uucwu gyiaa, ne nzhi ra re sheng nna?’
“Wire ngu nggwe̱ nna we̱ we shing he, ‘Nje níng ting cence, kya ne ko nyi nyi aha ya e̱we̱ gimbe nje ne̱ we̱, nyi nje ne nyi ra ning nying.’
“Wire wé̱ we lu re nzhi nwie ge̱zhe̱ na he̱rri tiya, me̱di nné redziee wé̱ ngwie ce na he̱rri tiya.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he re-nka yhwe̱, ngu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he,
“Nyi hu he Para Paska a hwie̱ rotu wehwie ka rimi? Á shi ngwa Kowe Nneywi ngbe ré ki ci gasankwe.”
Wire nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe rotsu brrá nné Yahudi e̱ ya tsu a ri Brra Prristi ne e ki ye he Kayafa.
Mbe e̱ rwe nka he mbe nyi ya zentsi mbe ning pie Jesu ngbe mbe ki yhwe̱.
Mbe e̱ he, “Me̱di ko shi re nyi a zhe Para ne̱ we̱, kishi nneywí ri ci re̱zhe̱.”
Jesu i shi a Betani a ri ya nne ne e ki ye he Sima ne ngu shwe cinci ne ruhunzhwe̱.
Ya mbrru a nyi mi ne oshwo turraren bi ncwé̱ we yang, ngu a kro Jesung a rici a zhe ne ngu shi ye yâ.
A zhe ne nné ki zhwe ngu mbe ri ni, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne krro nka nwie he, “A shi dzio ngge ne̱ ni e̱ aha nda?
Kya ne wé̱ hung rie̱ng a nu ya ngba ncwe̱ ré kye yiriywé̱ng fang.”
Jesu hu re̱se̱ kya ne mbe shi heng, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi ki me̱ ni e̱e̱? Aa ning nyi kya rina.
Yiriywé̱ á shi ngbe ne nyi ko zohu zhe, me̱di ko nyi shi shi ngbe nje ko zohu zhe we̱.
Turraren ne ngu ning krong ne̱, aa ke̱nce̱ ning krong ni ye̱ye̱rri shi ne á ri ning krong a zhe ne e shi ning nyie̱.
Nje níng ting cence, ko he ne e ri ning brro Nka Rina ne̱ a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo, á ri ti kya ne ngu nyi ne̱ aha ré lu ne ngu.”
Wire ya a tsi nné ki zhwe shwa ne otu wehwie — na ne e ki ye he Yahuda Iskarriyoti — aa ne̱ re nzhi nwie nggwé̱ re-prristi.
Ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nda ne nyi shi ning trrang kundu ne nje ning ngwa ngu aa?” Aha ni mbe e̱ hwie onu ncwe̱ azrrufa nshwa wetsie̱ mbe e̱ ki ngwa.
Kya ngu pie a zhe ana, Yahuda a ne̱ ne kre riwie̱ ne ngu shi we ngwa ngu.
A otu ce̱ucwung na Para Brredi We̱sa Yisi, nné zhwe Jesu be nwie ngu, mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Nyi he ne ngwe̱ ce̱ he nzhi ya re nyi yâ Para Paska?”
Ngu a he, “Nyi ywa a yarri brra ngwie̱ a nwie nne ana; nyi e̱ he ne ngu he, ‘Nne Mie̱ Nka he, zhe nje be dudu, nje cwo a ye Bikyi Paska ngbe nné ning nzhwe nje a ri ngwe̱.’ ”
Aha nii, nné ki zhwe e̱ ya nyi ye̱ye̱rri shi ne Jesu we heng, á nyi yâ Para nna.
A zhe ne ne̱hin ngu ci, Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu wehwie á yaa ta a gumong ye yâ.
A zhe ne mbe shi nwie ye yâ, Jesu a he, “Nje níng ting cence, ya a tsi nyi ne̱ shi ning rie̱.”
Á ne̱ ne bē we yang, ko nye̱ a tsi mbe ne̱ ne ki rinng he, “Ket, Brrabe̱, nje hwie he ko nyi nje we̱ ka rimi?”
Jesu we shing he, “Nne ne ngu ci va a enjie yâ engbe nje, a nyi ngu ngu shi ning rie̱.
Kowe Nneywi shi hu we shi ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he shi hu. Me̱di wuhu ne nne ana ne ngu rie̱ Kowe Nneywi! Canca koó ra ki bî ma gung we̱.”
Wire Yahuda, nne ne ngu shi ki rie̱ e̱ he, “Cence, Nne Mie̱ Nka, ko nyi nje we̱ ka rimi?”
Jesu ki shing he, “Ngwe̱ ma ngwe̱ he nyi ngwe̱.”
A zhe ne mbe shi ye yâ, Jesu fo brredi ngu a ning ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ngu a hwin ngu a we kyeng, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ning ge nyi ye, nke ne̱ nyi rwe̱ nje.”
Wire ngu a fo kwrreshi rishi ruto, ngu a ning ci kijie̱ng ngu a we ngwa, ngu a he, “Nyi shwe zhwozhwo nyi.
Nke ne̱ nyi roshwo nje na jee Be̱ne̱, ne e wa aha we re-e̱ngwie̱ nneywí piriri.
Nje níng ting he ko nje bra bi shwe rishi ruto ne̱ wa wo, se tuuye ne nje ri shwe hwihwing ngbe ne nyi a yarri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ nje.”
A zhe ne mbe ce̱ ya ve, mbe e̱ wru re nzhi a Rugu Rekwe Rihwie̱n.
Wire Jesu a he ne mbe he, “A totu cwu ne̱ ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi shi kpi, aha á wie he, ‘Nje shi yhwe̱ nne cwo nna, ngbe ekpri canvé nna wé̱ yaa sē̱.’
Me̱di zhe ne nje ri deze nhu, nje ri ke̱she nyi re nzhi a Galili.”
Pita a ki shing he, “Ko ngbe ne zhwozhwo mbe ne̱ mbe shi kpi, ko shi n ree kpe we̱.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nje re ting cence, a totu cwu ne̱ ne gba rishi tsie̱, ngwe̱ shi klo ce tsie̱ he ko ngwe̱ ning hu we̱.”
Me̱di Pita ki karang he, “Ko ngbe ne nje shi hu ngbe ne ngwe̱, ko shi n klo we̱.”
Kpi nné ki zhwe e̱ zhwozhwo mbe e̱ he we ni ma.
Wire Jesu a ne̱ ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu re nzhi ya ewie ne e ki ye he Jesemani, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi srra he ngbe n ywa ye, n ya ku Be̱ne̱.”
Aa fo Pita ngbe rewe Zebedi wehwie re nzhi nwie ku Be̱ne̱ nna, ngu a ya ne̱ ne ehwie dzio nwie bē we yang.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ehwie dzio nje a zhe ne ne̱ he̱rri we̱ hu ning ci n hu. Nyi hwie̱ he, shi de̱ nyi ne̱ ndzie we̱.”

Aa shwo we tsie̱ ngu a hu be, ngu a cwugru riyii ngu be nwie ku Be̱ne̱ he, “Be̱ nje, kundu ngu ri mwa ye̱ye̱rri, ning ti kwrreshi cinci ne̱. Gbengbe ni ma, de̱ re nyi kya ce̱ nje wo, me̱di re nyi kya ce̱ ngwe̱.”
Ngu a ning brru re be nwie nné ki zhwe ngu wetsie̱ ana, aa ya we she ne mbe shi ndzie. Ngu a he ne Pita he, “Ko shi nyi hung srrante ngbe nje he̱rri awa zunzrru we̱ e̱e̱?
Nyi srrante ngbe nyi ku Be̱ne̱ kishi nyi ri kpe a zhe ne mwa ri ngu be. Nje hu a yarri rehwie nyi, nyi ce̱; me̱di a igbe̱ na ikpe rwe̱, nyi shi brrubrru.”
Aa ywa wa, na hwie, re nzhi ku Be̱ne̱, a he, “Be̱ nje, kundu de̱ ri mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ngwe̱ ning ti kwrreshi ne̱ we̱ se ne nje shwe, ma nde kya ce̱ ngwe̱ re ci.”
A zhe ne ngu ya ning brru, aa ya we she ne mbe shi ndzie wa, aha nyyi mbe shwo.
Aa we we ngu a ne̱ re nzhi ku Be̱ne̱ wa, na tsie̱, aa ya ku we shi kya ne ngu nyi ne kung.
Wire ngu a ning brru re nzhi she nné ki zhwe, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ke̱ we ne shi ndzie re srra cwu aa? Nyi ri, zhe nna sa dudu, á shi rie̱ Kowe Nneywi a nva nné e̱ngwie̱.
Nyi deze, nzhi ne̱! Ri, nne ning rie̱ e̱ nyi nke ngu sa dudu ne!”

We zhe ne Jesu shi nka, Yahuda ne ngu nyi ya a tsi nné ki zhwe shwa ne wehwie e̱ ya wre̱. A shi ngbe ya rigwe̱ nné ne mbe bro re-ise̱nkeli ngbe ngbó, ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe brrá nné ngwie̱ mbe we te.
Ngu nne ki rie̱ e̱ ke̱she we ting he, “Nne ne nje ri ki me ushwo, mahu nyi ngu. Nyi ki pie.”
Yahuda a ne̱ we te̱rr re nzhi nwie Jesu, ngu a he, “Bangga Nne Mie̱ Nka!” Ngu a ki me ushwo.
Jesu he ne ngu he, “A rwe, nyi we kya ne ngu be ne ngwe̱.”
Wire nné nna á shwo re be ncwuee, á kro nva a Jesu á ki pie.
Ya a tsi nné zhwe Jesu ri ni ngu a fie̱ ise̱nkeli ngu, ngu a ning tsa uucwu hwie Brra Prristi he̱rri aa ki kpo uucwu nna.
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ning brru mi ne ise̱nkeli ngwe̱ ngwe̱ sa nwieng, ko nye̱ ne ngu fie̱ ise̱nkeli, a ri hu ne ise̱nkeli.
Ko nyi hwie he ma n hung ye Be̱ nje, ngbe we zhe zunzrru we̱ ning te mi ne rekpri re-njeli ne mbe wara shwa ne otu wehwie we̱ e̱e̱?
Ma we̱ ce̱ rimi ngbe krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ re ci rrurru shi kya ne e wie he se re ci ni e̱?”
A zhe ana, Jesu he ne rigwe̱ nné nna he, “Nje nyi nne nca aa, ne nyi be ning pie ne re-ise̱nkeli ngbe ngbó a? Ko zohu otu nje srra be a Brranyi re mie̱ nka, ko nyi ning pie we̱.
Me̱di nke ne̱ zhwozhwo ci ni aha ngbe kya ne nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe i wie re ci rrurru.” Wire ga nné ki zhwe ngu zhwozhwo á to ki we.
Nné ne mbe pie Jesu á ywa ne ngu a nwie Kayafa, ne ngu nyi Brra Prristi, a nwie ne nné mie̱ Nti Nka ngbe rotsu brrá nné mbe ya tsu.
Me̱di Pita cwo re ki zhwe ze̱nze̱, he̱rri aa ya wre̱ tese ri Brra Prristi. Aa ngwie ngu a srra be ngbe nné cwo Brranyi aha ngu ri kya ne ngu shi ci.
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe Rotsu Brrá Nné zhwozhwo á ne̱ ne kre yá re-sheede rabrra a zete Jesu aha mbe ki yhwe̱.
Me̱di koó she ko ya gung we̱, ko ngbe ne nné piriri mbe be aha mbe ngwa re-sheede rabrra. A merinng, nné wehwie e̱ wru re be,
á he, “Nne ne̱ he ngu a hung gu Brranyi Be̱ne̱, ngu bra ki no te̱nte̱ a rotu wetsie̱.”
Ngbe Brra Prristi e̱ cinye̱ ngu a he ne Jesu he, “Ko ngwe̱ bi kya he a sheede ne nné mbe rre̱ mbe he a rici ngwe̱ ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?”
Gbengbe ni Jesu srra cereng.
Brra Prristi e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nje he ngwe̱ shí ne Be̱ne̱ bi ce, níng ting, cence, kundu ngu nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Krristi nna, ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱ e̱.”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Ee, ye̱ye̱rri ne ngwe̱ he. Me̱di nje níng ting zhwozhwo nyi he:
Re nzhi ncwuee, nyi ri ri Kowe Nneywi
ngu srra a nva nyye Be̱ne̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo
ne ngu wro a re-inyie̱ zinye̱ re be.”
Wire Brra Prristi a srra re-tago ne ngu ci, ngu a he, “Aa he nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱! Ma nzhi bra kre zohu sheede wa? A zhe ne ne̱ nyi ho nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ngu he ne̱.
Nyi hwie rimi?”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri re hu.”
Wire mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ki trru rencwi a riyii nwie ki cwe, ne kpi mbe mbe ki ta ne va.
Á he, “Níng ting, Krristi. Nyi nye̱ ngu re rwi e̱?”
A zhe nna Pita shi srra ci nkyie a tese ri nna, ya ewenancwuo a ri nna a be nwie ngu ngu a he, “Ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ ri shi ngbe ne Jesu nne Galili.”
Me̱di a klo a nyyi mbe zhwozhwo he, “Ko nje hu kya ne ngwe̱ he ne̱ we̱.”
Ngu a wru ci re nzhi a nu ri nna. Yaka ewena ki ri ngu a ti nné ne mbe shi miimi he, “Ngu ne̱ shi ngbe ne Jesu nne Nazarra.”
A klo nwie he, “Nje shí ko nje hu nne nna we̱!”
Á srra we tsie̱, nné ne mbe shi yo miimi á ywa nwie Pita á he, “Cence ngwe̱ nyi ya mbe, aha cwue ngwe̱ re tse.”
Wire ngu a ne̱ ne shí nwie he ne mbe he, “Cence, kundu nje ri hu nne ne̱, nde yankya re ning she!”
Gba a wre̱ ne tsie̱.
Wire Pita lu ne nka ne Jesu ri ki heng he, “Ne gba rishi tsie̱, ngwe̱ ri klo ce tsie̱ he ko ngwe̱ ning hu we̱.” Ngu a wru ci, ngu a ya ku we ku we ku.
A brra mincwe, nggwé̱ re-prristi zhwozhwo ngbe brrá nné Yahudi á rwe onu he mbe yhwe̱ Jesu.
Á ki rrwe, mbe e̱ ki kwa re nzhi ngwa Bilatu ne ngu nyi goona.
A zhe ne Yahuda, nne ne ngu rie̱ Jesu, ngu ri ne nyi Jesu nkang hu, ehwie ngu bra dzio ngu a ning brru mi ne ncwe azrrufa nshwa wetsie̱ nna re nzhi ngwa nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe brrá nné.
A he, “Nje nyi e̱ngwie̱ ne nje níng ngwa nne ne ko ngu ywe̱ we̱.”
Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nyi nda shwe nzhi, ywa we ne nkpe ngwe̱!”
Ngbe Yahuda a fo ncwe̱ nna ya wa a yarri Brranyi. Ngu a ne̱ ya ci ru.
Nggwé̱ re-prristi e̱ ko ncwe ncwé̱ nna, mbe e̱ he, “A shi wie̱e̱ni ne Nti Nka ngbe ré ci ncwe̱ ne̱ a aata Brranyi, aha a nyi ncwe̱ lede roshwo nneywi ne e yhwe̱.”
Aha ni mbe e̱ he canca mbe fo ncwe̱ nna mbe ning se̱ kyie nne no rondrro aha re hwie̱ ewieng nyie̱ nné ice.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne e ye kyie ana he “Kyie Roshwo” he̱rri ne cwu.
Wire kya ne Irimiya nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he e̱ ci rrurru, shi ngu i he, “Á ko ncwe azrrufa nshwa wetsie̱ nna, onu ncwe̱ ne nné Isrreela mbe shî he mbe shi ki trrang.
Á fo ning se̱ kyie nne no rondrro, ye̱ye̱rri ne nka Brrabe̱ he ne nje.”
A zhe ne Jesu shi yo a nyyi goona, goona ki rinng he, “Nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi nggwe̱ nné Yahudi e̱e̱?”
Jesu a he, “Ye̱ye̱rri ne ngwe̱ he.”
Me̱di koo he ko ya nka a zete re-nka ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe brrá nné mbe ki cing we̱, koo bra shwong ne kye̱ng we̱.
Bilatu a ki rinng he, “Ko ngwe̱ ho kya ne e he a rici ngwe̱ ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?”
Gbengbe ni ko Jesu bra ko ya nka we̱, ko riti zunzrru, he̱rri goona hwie̱ nga onu we yang.
A ko zohu zhe Teede Paska, goona ning mrrang ne ngu cire ya nne gyiaa zunzrru na ne nneywí mbe ce̱.
A zhe ana a i bi ya nne gyiaa ne e ki hu ne e ki ye he Barraba.
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nné mbe ya tsu, Bilatu a we rinng he, “Nyi zohu ne nyi ce̱ he n níng cire ngu, nyi Barraba ka nyi Jesu ne e ki ye he Krristi e̱?”
Aha aa hu re̱se̱ng he á be mi ne Jesu nwie ngu we aha ehwie shwo.
A zhe ne Bilatu shi srra a ncwung nyi nka, mbrru a ngu te re be nwie ngu he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ning re va a nne ana we̱, aha ko bi vini we̱, nje shwe cinci a revi a tehin aha ngu.”
Me̱di nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe brrá nné á cwua rigwe̱ nné nna he ré he re cire Barraba ngbe we̱ ci ré yhwe̱ Jesu.
Goona we rinng he, “Nyi nye̱ ne nyi ce̱ he n níng cire ngu ne̱ rri ii?”
Mbe e̱ shî he, “Barraba.”
Bilatu we rinng wa he, “Ma n nyi rimi ne Jesu ne e ki ye he Krristi e̱e̱?”
Zhwozhwo mbe mbe e̱ he, “Ki ci gasankwe!”
Me̱di Bilatu we rinng he, “Aha nda? Nyi nda ngu nyi?”
Á ning bra fo cwue ze nwie he, “Ki ci gasankwe!”
Aha ne Bilatu ri ko ngu shi hung nyi yankya ne mbe we̱, nneywí bra kre ewieng ci ko; ngu a fo rishi ngu a ning kyu nva a nyyi rigwe̱ nné, ngu a he, “Rici nje ngroo, ko nje bi le̱e̱kyi roshwo nne ne̱
Ga nné nna zhwozhwo mbe e̱ kara he, “Ee, nde le̱e̱kyi roshwo ngu re shi a rici nzhi ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe nzhi!”
Wire ngu a we cire Barraba. Aa ci á cwe Jesu, wire ngu a we ngwa ré ya ki ci gasankwe.
Wire re-shezhi goona fo Jesu re nzhi a brra eri goona
Á ki trru ankya, mbe e̱ ki ci ya brra tago shi na nggwé̱.

Mbe e̱ no vo shi na ringgwe̱ ne nva rekwe ze̱kye̱ mbe e̱ ki garang a rici. Mbe e̱ ki ci ngbo a nva nyye, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne hu be nyyi ngu nwie ki kwa sha ré he, “Hooo, ce ngwe̱ re ywa gbong Nggwe̱ nné Yahudi!”
Á ki ywe̱ rencwi, mbe e̱ se̱ ngbo nna, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ki cwe mi a rici.
A zhe ne mbe ki yarra yhwe̱ fa, mbe e̱ ki ti brra tago ringgwe̱ nna, mbe e̱ ki ci na ngu. Wire mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ngu re nzhi ki ci gasankwe.
A zhe ne mbe shi wru ci, mbe e̱ ya she ya nne Kurani, ne ye lo ngu he Sima, mbe e̱ ki ci ne ce he se re fo gasankwe Jesu.
Á ya cwu a nwie ne e ki ye he Golgota, ne maana nna a zhe nka mbe e̱ nyi “Ewie Iigre Rici”.
Nyi miimi ne mbe ngwa Jesu rishi gbre inebi ne e ki krre ngbe yankya ngu rro shi shi brra e̱e̱tsie̱; me̱di a zhe ne ngu re ngu ho, ngu a ra shweng.
Á ki ci gasankwe, mbe e̱ nyi aaca aha mbe yaa kye re-ankya rwe̱ ngu.
Wire mbe e̱ srra be nwie ki cwo.
Á wie kya ne mbe he he aa nyi, mbe e̱ rwi a zeteng ye̱ye̱rri ne ewie rici ngu he:
A bi nné nca wehwie ne e we ci gasankwe ngbe ne ngu, ya a nva nyye ngu, ya a nva mie ngu.
Nné ne mbe warra ki ta re-nka wie rie, nwie gbe̱ nci,
ré he, “Ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ shi gu Brranyi ne̱ ngbe ngwe̱ no a rotu wetsie̱, kyia rici ngwe̱ e̱ shi! Cwucwu a zete gasankwe ana, kundu ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱!”
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka ngbe brrá nné á ki ca ne ruto ni ma nwie he,
“Aa kyia yá, me̱di koo hung yaa kyia we rici ngu we̱! A he ngu nyi Nggwe̱ Isrreela! Ma re cwucwu a zete gasankwe ne̱ we zhe ne ne̱, wire nzhi e̱ shî nka ngu a!
Aa sa rie a Be̱ne̱. Kundu Be̱ne̱ ki ce̱ ma nde re ki sheng nzhi ri, tu ne ngu he he ngu nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱ e̱.”
Nné nca ne e we ci gasankwe ngbe ngu a á ne̱ ne ki ca ne ruto we ni ma.
A tsi te̱ne̱ re be ncwe̱ wetsie̱ na ne̱hin, ngwie̱ nna deze ci we e̱ ywing.
A weje ncwe̱ wetsie̱, Jesu ci ye ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he,
A zhe ne yá mbe ne mbe shi yo miimi mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ he, “A shi kyie̱ Iliya!”
We hwiehwie ya mbe wre̱ ne to ncii ya fo soso. Ngu a shwe̱ a yarri rishi serre, ngu a ki rwe a nu drre, ngu a ki nang he re shwe.
Me̱di kpi mbe he, “Ki we. Nde nzhi ri ka Iliya a cwo be re ya ki kyia.”
Wire Jesu a ci ye ne brra riwie̱ng cwue wa, ngu a zhwu cwue fa.
A zhe ana brra trro gbundu ewie wiri na Brranyi hla nke̱rrrr, aa ci ntsa wehwie a zeteng re be be. Ebe ngwie̱ gbe̱, ngbatsie hwin,
re-ria kla, he̱rri nkwe nné Be̱ne̱ piriri á deze nce.
Á wru a re-ria a zhe ne Jesu ngu deze nhu, mbe e̱ ywa a yarri brra ngwie̱ wiri, he̱rri nneywí piriri we ri.
A zhe ne shwa shezhi ngbe re-shezhi ne mbe shi ngbe ngu nwie cwo Jesu mbe ri ebe ngwie̱ ngu gbe̱ ni ngbe ko nda ne ngu ci, rowu we prre we yang, á he, “Cence, a nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱!”
Mbrrú piriri ne mbe i shi miimi nwie yo ze̱nze̱. Á nyi ne zhwe Jesu tu Galili nwie ki sheng.
A tsi mbe a ning bi Merri Madali, ngbe Merri de̱ Yakubu ngbe Josi, ngbe de̱ rewe Zebedi.
A zhe ne ne̱hin ngu ci, ya nne bi va ne e ki ye he Usufu, ne ngu wru a Arimatiya be. Ngu a ma we rici ngu a nyi ya nne zhwe Jesu.
Aa ywa a nwie Bilatu, ngu a ya rin aha kwe Jesu. Bilatu a ci he ré ki ngwa.
Usufu a fo kwe nna ngu a ki gye̱ ne ya trro kye̱ ne ngu shi wiriri,
ngu a ki nywe̱ a ria na ngu ne ngu kwe̱ we hwihwing a ya kprahwan. Ngu a kpri ngba iikye̱ ngbaatsie ngu a ning ku onu ria nna ngu a ne̱.
Merri Madali ngbe Merri nke ana á shi srra a nyyi ria nna.
Kotu na ngu ning zhweng, ne ngu nyi Kotung Srra Cwu, nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné Farisi á ya mwe a nwie Bilatu,
mbe e̱ he, “Be̱ri, nzhi lu he zhe ne Jesu — nne ca rabrra ana — ngu i shi nce, a i he, ‘Ngu ri ci rotu wetsie̱ ngu a bra deze.’

Aha nii, ci ré cwo ria nna he̱rri re nzhi cwu tu na tsie̱ng. De̱e̱ ni we̱, nné ki zhwe ngu wé̱ ya grra wé̱ ya nyi nca kwe nna, ngbe wé̱ ne̱ ne ti nneywíng he aa deze nhu, ngbe zhwe rabrra nke ana we̱ ya nyi nyrrukiking re ne̱ na ce̱ucwung.”
Bilatu a he ne mbe he, “Ma nyi ko re-shezhi ngbe nyi ya cwo ria nna gbagba shi ne nyi ri hung cwong.”
Mbe e̱ ywa mbe e̱ ya kpra lamba nggwe̱ a zete ngbaatsie nna kishi á ri ya shwo, mbe e̱ we re-shezhi nna ré srra ré cwong.
A zhe ne Kotung Srra Cwu wara, a nyiencwe a tu ce̱ucwung na se̱ti, Merri Madali ngbe Merri nke ana á ne̱ re nzhi ri ria nna.
Á srra, ebe ngwie̱ gbe̱ gburururu, ya njeli Brrabe̱ wru zinye̱ cwucwu re be nwie ria nna, ngu a ya kpri ngbaatsie a nu ria nna ngu a ning srra a zeteng.
Aa tsie̱ nse̱ shi shi ewie ne ngu ci mele, ankya rwe̱ ngu tsie̱ zhanzhanzhaa shi shi riklaa.
Nné cwo nna á ci owu ngu, he̱rri á ne̱ ne tsi rwe̱, á kpi shi nyi nkwe nné.
Njeli nna he ne mbrrú nna he, “Shi de̱ nyi ci rowu we̱, aha nje hu he nyi shi kre Jesu ne e ki ci a gasankwe.
Ko shi he we̱, aa deze shi ne ngu i he. Nyi be nyi ya ri ewie ne ngu i ning nywe̱.
Nyi wre̱ ne ne̱ ne̱ nyi ya ti nné ki zhwe ngung he, ‘Aa deze nhu, a cwo a ke̱she nyi re nzhi Galili. Nyi cwo a ki ri miimi!’ Nyi lu he nje níng ting ho.”
Aha ni mbrrú nna á wre̱ ne ne̱ a nwie ria nna hwrihwri, ne rowu ngbe rekwi ne ovu ncii re nzhi ti nné ki zhwe ngung.
Á srra, Jesu a ya nyi ngbe mbe. Ngu a he, “Nje níng ci e̱be̱.” Á be nwie ngu, mbe e̱ ya ki prre nta nwie ki ye mbe.
Wire Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi ci rowu we̱. Nyi ywa nyi ya ti re-gimbe njeng he ré ywa Galili ré ya ning ri a miimi.”
A zhe ne mbrrú nna mbe shi rê, yá re-shezhi cwo ria nna á ngwie a yarri ngwie̱ á ya ti nggwé̱ re-prristi ko nda ne ngu ci.
A zhe ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe brrá nné mbe ya mwe mbe e̱ rwe onu, mbe e̱ ya ngwa re-shezhi nna ncwé̱ we yang.
Mbe e̱ he ne mbe he, “Nyi he he nné ki zhwe ngu be a totu á ya nyi nca kwe nna a zhe ne nyi shi ndzie.
Kundu nka nna ri ya cwu a nwie goona, nzhi e̱ hu kya ne nzhi shi ki heng, ngbe ko nyi e̱ ngwie a ko ya cinci we̱.”
Aha nii, re-shezhi nna á se̱ ncwe̱ nna, mbe e̱ nyi ye̱ye̱rri shi kya ne e we heng. Nka nna se̱ ngwie̱ yu a yarri nné Yahudi he̱rri re be cwu cwu ne̱.
Wire nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu zunzrru ana á ne̱ re nzhi Galili a rugu ne Jesu ngu i he ne mbe he ré ning ywa.
A zhe ne mbe ki ri, mbe e̱ ki ye mbè, me̱di kpi mbe nyi jinji.
Wire Jesu a be nwie mbe ngu a he, “Á ning ngwa igbe̱ zhwozhwo a zinye̱ ngbe a be ngwie̱.
Aha ni nyi ywa a re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo, nyi ya ci nneywí ré hwie̱ nné ning zhwe, nyi we nyi batisma a yarri lo Be̱, ngbe Kowe, ngbe Nshe Wiri,
nyi we mie̱ng he ré zhwe re-ankya ne nje níng mie̱ng zhwozhwo. Cence, nje shi ngbe ne nyi ko zohu zhe he̱rri re nzhi cwu krruci zhe.”
Ce̱ucwu nka rina Jesu Krristi, Kowe Be̱ne̱.
A shi shi kya ne e wie yarri krre̱de̱ Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng he:
“ ‘Ri, nje shi te nnente nje a ncwuee ngwe̱,
ngbe re ya re nyi rê.’
Riwie̱ng cwue kyie̱ a tsi yi he,
‘Nyi nyi rê aha Brrabe̱,
nyi ci nhwie̱ rê ngu ré ci tsantsa.’ ”
Aha nii, Yohana be nwie nyi batisma a tsi yi. A brró nneywí nka he ré si ywe̱ ngbe ngu we nyi batisma, aha Be̱ne̱ re we we re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe ne mbe nyi.
Ga nné a re-nkla ngwie̱ Yahudi ngbe a Urrushelima á wrru re nzhi ki she. Á ya ne̱ ne he re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe, ngu a we nyi batisma a Brra Riywi Urrdu.
Yohana i ci ankya ne e nyi ne rehwe ronkomi ngbe ta ne ngu rwé a nti. A srrá re ye iigye re shwe rutonshwi a tsi yi.
A we brró nka re we ting he, “A merin nje, a bi ya ne ngu cwo be, ne ngu bi igbe̱ re ning ne̱. Ko nje be ngbe n hu be n bi ru tamri ngu we̱.
Nje níng nyi batisma ne rishi, me̱di a cwo a níng nying ne Nshe Wiri.”
A rotu ana, Jesu wru a Nazarra a ngwie̱ Galili aa be, ngbe Yohana a ki nyi batisma a Brra Riywi Urrdu.
We zhe ne Jesu shi wru ci a yarri rishi, ngu a ri zinye̱ ngu kla. Nshe Wiri wro ya kpe zete ngu shi nyi jie̱riywi.
Ya cwue e̱ wru zinye̱ he, “Ngwe̱ nyi Kowe ce̱ nje, nje ho shwi ngwe̱ kpe̱kpe̱.”
We hwiehwie Nshe Wiri lu Jesu re nzhi tsi yi.
Aa ya ci rotu nshwa weni ne Shetani shi ki mwa ri. Aa srra miimi ngbe nnyie̱ yi, me̱di re-njeli be ya ki sheng.
A zhe ne e ci Yohana a uucwu gyiaa, Jesu ywa a Galili ya ne̱ ne brro Nka Rina Be̱ne̱.
A he, “Zhe be! Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ be dudu. Nyi si ywe̱, nyi bra shî Nka Rina.”
A zhe ne Jesu shi nwie cwo a rekyi nzhwo Galili, ngu a ri Sima ngbe gimbe ngu Andrru ne mbe shi zi re-re̱ge̱ mbe a yarri nzhwo Galili, aha zhwozhwo mbe á nyi nné kwa hwén.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi be, nyi ning zhwe, nje shi ning ci nyi hwie̱ nné kwa nneywí.”
We hwiehwie á we re-re̱ge̱ mbe, á ki zhwe.
A zhe ne ngu shwo we tsie̱ re nzhi ncwuee, ngu a di Yakubu ewe Zebedi ngbe gimbe ngu Yohana a yarri konkro ne mbe shi nyi re-re̱ge̱ mbe.
We zhe ne ngu we ri, ngu a we ye. Mbe e̱ we be̱ mbe Zebedi ngbe nnencwuó mbe ne mbe ko a yarri konkro nna, mbe e̱ zhwe Jesu.
Jesu a ne̱ ngbe mbe re nzhi Kafanahu. Kotung Srra Cwu we she miimi, Jesu a ngwie zonggrung mwe, ngu a ne̱ ne we mie̱ nka.
Nneywí ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu aha zhwe re-ankya ne ngu we mie̱ng, aha a we mie̱ng shi shi nyi nne ne ngu bi igbe̱, ko shi shi na nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa we̱.
We zhe ana ya nne a yarri zonggrung mwe nna cwuhu rije, ngu a rwi ku
nwie he, “Jesu, nne Nazarra, nyi nda shwe nzhi ngbe ngwe̱? Ngwe̱ be ngbe ngwe̱ ya ning ci nzhi ci shweni e̱e̱? Nje re hu, nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Na Wiri Be̱ne̱.”
Jesu a ti rije nna ne ren he, “Ci cereng, nyi wrru a yarri ngu!”
Re-rije nna mbe e̱ gbe̱ nne nna zhugzhugzhug nwie ti nku mbe e̱ wru ki we.
Ga nné ne mbe shi miimi á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu nwie yaa rin re-nka a nci mbe he, “Nyi nda he ni e̱e̱? Nyi ya zhwe mie̱ nka hwi nda ni? He̱rri a bi de̱me̱ng yhwiré re-rije ngbe wé̱ ki shî nka fang!”
Aha nii, re-nka a rici Jesu ya cwu ko he a re-nkla Galili.
We zhe ne Jesu ngbe Yakubu ngbe Yohana mbe wru zonggrung mwe, mbe e̱ ngwie a ri mbe Sima ngbe Andrru.
A zhe nna de̱ mbrru Sima shi nywe̱ ne rwe̱ bra, á wre̱ ne ti Jesu ni.
Jesu a ngwie nwie ngu, ngu a ki pie va, ngu a ki fo ze. Ruhu nna wre̱ ne ki we ni, ngu a deze, ngu a we kre rishi shwe.
Re be zhe ne̱hin ne ne̱ ngu kpe be, nneywí be mi ne nné ruhu ngbe nné bi re-rije piriri a nwie Jesu.
Ga nné ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo á ya tsu a nu ri nna.
Jesu kyia nneywí piriri ne mbe bi re nzhwe ruhu kanka kanka, aa trru re-rije we yang. Koo we re-rije ré he ya nka we̱, aha mbe re-rije e̱ á ki hu.
Jesu shwo we brra nyiencwe ne ewie ngu rishi tsie̱, ngu a wru a ri nna re nzhi ya ewie ngu shi cereng, aa ya ku Be̱ne̱ miimi.
Me̱di Sima ngbe nné ne mbe shi ngbe ngu á wru re nzhi ki kre.
A zhe ne mbe ki she, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ko nye̱ shi nwie re kre.”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi ywa a yaká re-nkla, aha ngbe n ya brro nka a miimi wa. Aha nje be aha ni.”
Aha nii, ngu a grra ko he a Galili nwie brro nka a yarri re-zonggrung mwe re trru re-rije.
Ya nne ruhunzhwe̱ be nwie Jesu, ngu a ya hu be ne re-ruhuu nwie cwe nva ne ngu he, “Kusu, kundu ngwe̱ ri shî, ning ci n ci gbingbi n bra shi wiri.”
Naana pie Jesu, ngu a na va ngu a ki re. Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nje shî, ci gbingbi.”
We zhe zunzrru, ruhunzhwe̱ wre̱ ki we, ngu a ci gbingbi.
Jesu a wre̱ ne ki cire, me̱di zhe ne ngu shi ne̱, Jesu ki gara nka,

a he ne ngu he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ti ko ya nneng we̱. Me̱di se̱ we rê ngwe̱ ywa nwie prristi, ngbe ré re mwa ré ri; ngbe ngwe̱ bra ngwa kya ne teede he re ngwa ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka Musa, aha ngwe̱ ci wiri, ngbe re hwie̱ sheede a nwie nneywí.”
Me̱di nne nna ne̱ ya ne̱ ne ting ko he. He̱rri aa ci ko Jesu hung wru gbeng a yarri re-ngwie̱ nna wa we̱. Aha nii, a srrá a rewie cereng ne nneywí mbe wru rewie kanka kanka re cwo nwie ngu.
Aa fo e̱we̱ rotu tsie̱, Jesu a ning brru re nzhi Kafanahu. Nneywí ya ho he a shi ri.
Mbe e̱ ya tu, he̱rri ko bi ewieng sa ta a zonggru nna we̱, he̱rri re nzhi cwu tese ne Jesu shi we brro nka.
Yá nné be nwie ngu ne ya nne ngu kwi nkye̱, ne nné weni mbe ki bro.

Me̱di zhe ne mbe ri ko mbe shi hung ngwie mi ne ngu nwie Jesu we̱, aha rigwe̱ nneywí ne mbe shi miimi, mbe e̱ ya ti ya be̱e̱ne̱ zonggru ye̱ye̱rri ne ewie ne Jesu ning shi. Zhe ne mbe she riwie̱, mbe e̱ wro ne ngu re be be a kpengye ne ngu ning nywe̱.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ri sa rie mbe ni, ngu a he ne nne ruhu kwi nkye̱ nna he, “Ewe nje, á re we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngwe̱.”
Yá nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ne mbe shi srra miimi á ne̱ ne hwie nka a yarri rehwie mbe he,
“Aha nda ne nne ne̱ ngu he zhwe nka ne̱ e̱e̱? A dzié̱ Be̱ne̱. Nyi nye̱ ngu hung we nneywí re-e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe nyi we̱sa ne Be̱ne̱ we nggaa ngu a?”
We zhe ana Jesu hu nka ne mbe shi hwieng, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi hwie zhwe re-nka ne̱ e̱e̱?
Canca ré he rimi: re he ne nne kwi nkye̱ ne̱ he, ‘Á re we re-e̱ngwie̱ ne ngwe̱ nyi,’ ka re he ne ngu he, ‘Deze, ngwe̱ fo kpengye ngwe̱, ngwe̱ ne̱ ne ciee ngwe̱ e̱e̱?’
Nje ce̱ nyi hu he Kowe Nneywi e̱ bi igbe̱ a be ngwie̱ ngbe re we nneywí re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe.” A he ne nne kwi nkye̱ nna he,
“Nje he ne ngwe̱, deze, fo kpengye ngwe̱ ngwe̱ si ri!”
We a nyyi mbe, nne nna deze, ngu a fo kpengye ngu, ngu a ne̱ ne ciee ngu. Ga mbe zhwozhwo hwie̱ nye̱ ronu nwie de Be̱ne̱ he, “Kaat, ko nzhi sa ri yankya he ni ne̱ we̱.”
Jesu cinga ning brru re nzhi a rekyi nzhwo Galili. Rigwe̱ nné be nwie ngu, ngu a ne̱ ne we mie̱ nka.
A zhe ne ngu shi ciee, ngu a ya she Levi ne ngu nyi ewe Alifayu ngu shi srra a wofing si gondu ngu. Jesu he ne ngu he, “Ning zhwe.” Levi deze ngu a ki zhwe.
A zhe ne Jesu shi ye yâ a ri Levi, ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu, nné si gondu ngbe kpi nné e̱ngwie̱ piriri a tsi rigwe̱ nné ne mbe ri shi ngbe ngu, á ya ne̱ ne ye yâ a tebrru ngbe ngu.

Yá nné Farisi ne mbe nyi nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa á ri Jesu ngu shi ye yâ ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱ ngbe nné si gondu, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne rin nné ki zhwe ngu nka he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne Jesu ngu ye yâ ngbe zhwe nné ne̱ ye̱?”
Jesu ho kya ne mbe he, ngu a we shing he, “Ko nyi nné ne mbe shi gbingbi ne mbe kre nne rikye̱ we̱, se we nné ruhu. Ko nje be ye nné redziee we̱, nje be aha nné e̱ngwie̱.”
A ya otu, nné zhwe Yohana ngbe nné Farisi á shi rwe onu. Yá nné be ya rin Jesu nka he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nné zhwe Yohana ngbe na nné Farisi mbe rwé onu, me̱di ko na ngwe̱ á rwé we̱ e̱?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Wé̱ ce̱ rimi re-yeva nne rwe nyrra ré rwe onu a zhe ne nne rwe nyrra nna ngu shi ngbe mbe e̱e̱? Aawo, koó shi ré nyi ni we̱, aha nne rwe nyrra nna shi ngbe mbe.
Me̱di zhe cwo be ne á ri fo nne rwe nyrra nna, wé̱ we we, a zhe ana fa, wé̱ ne̱ ne rwe onu.
“Ko bi nne ngu fó kla trro hwi re ning tsie ruba a tago reni we̱. Kundu ngu nyi ni, hwihwing nna we̱ yaa hwrri, we̱ fie̱ rening nna he̱rri re ki hla, wire rening nna we̱ hla ne̱ ni.

Ko bra bi nne ngu kro hwihwi rishi ruto a yarri gure kpe na rening we̱, aha kundu ngu nyi ni, rishi ruto nna we̱ ho gure kpe nna. Wire rishi ruto ngbe gure kpe nna wé̱ ci shweni gbengbe mbe. Se ka re kro hwihwi rishi ruto a yarri hwihwi gure kpe.”
Jesu i shi ciee a ya Kotung Srra Cwu nné Yahudi, ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu, ne mbe shi wara a yarri rebe yâ a yi. A zhe ne mbe shi ciee, nné ki zhwe ngu mbe e̱ ne̱ ne kpi yá re-nci alikama.
Nné Farisi mbe e̱ he ne Jesu he, “Ri kya ne nné re zhwe ngwe̱ mbe shi mi ne̱, a shi ye̱ye̱rri ré nyi cwuo a Tung Srra Cwu aa?”
Jesu we shing he, “Ko nyi sa hwie kya ne Dooda ngu i nyi a zhe ne ngu ngbe nné ne mbe i shi ngbe ngu mbe i nyi a zhe ne mbe i ho nzhwo ne mbe kre kya ye we̱ e̱e̱?
A i ngwie a zonggru Be̱ne̱ a zhe ne Abiata ngu nyi Brra Prristi, aa ye yâ na ne e ngwá Be̱ne̱, ne se we re-prristi re ye, he̱rri aa ngwa nné ne mbe shi ngbe ngu.”
Wire Jesu he ne mbe he, “Á nyi Kotung Srra Cwu aha nneywi, koó nyi nneywi aha Kotung Srra Cwu we̱.
Aha nii, nyi hu he Kowe Nneywi nyi Brrabe̱ he̱rri ngbe na Kotung Srra Cwu.”
A yaka otu ne Jesu ywa a zonggrung mwe wa, a bi ya nne ne va ngu hu a miimi.
A bra bi yá nné a miimi ne mbe kre rê mbe ning ci Jesu nka. Aha nii, á sa riyii a ngu aha mbe ri ka a shi kyia nne nna a Tung Srra Cwu a.
Jesu he ne nne hu va nna he, “Cinye̱ ngwe̱ yo a cwe nkyie.”
Wire ngu a rin kpi nnéng he, “Nyi nda ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré nyi a Tung Srra Cwu a? Ré nyi kya rina ka ré nyi e̱ngwie̱ng? Ré kyia ce nneywi, ka ré yhwe̱?”
Me̱di á ci cereng.
Jesu bra we di ne rimwi, a dzio ehwie aha zhwe ehwie prrita mbe. Ngu a he ne nne nna he, “Na va ngwe̱.” Ngu a na. Va ngu a wre̱ ne ci gbingbi.
Nné Farisi mbe e̱ wre̱ ne wru a yarri zonggrung mwe nna re nzhi mwe ngbe yá nné Hirridu aha mbe nyi re-rê ne mbe shi ning yhwe̱ Jesu.
Jesu ne̱ ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu re nzhi rekyi nzhwo Galili. Rigwe̱ nné ne mbe wrru Galili ngbe na mbe wru Yahudi á ki zhwe.
Kpi wrru a Urrushelima, kpi a Idumiya, kpi a nyie Brra Riywi Urrdu, he̱rri ngbe kpi ne mbe wrru a ngwie̱ Taya ngbe Sido. Zhwozhwo rigwe̱ nné nna á be nwie ngu aha re-ankya ne mbe ho he shi nying.
Aha zhwe brri ne nné nna mbe brri, Jesu ci nné ki zhwe ngu ré ki kre ya konkro ngbe ngu ning ngwie, kishi nné nna á ri ki yhwi.
A zhe ana, á i ma ne Jesu ngu kyia nné ruhu we yang. Aha nii, ga nné ruhu ne mbe shi miimi á yaa ywrru we aha mbe ki re.
Ko zohu zhe ne nné bi re-rije mbe ki ri, wé̱ kpi be a nyyi ngu nwie kyie̱ ronu he, “Ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱!”
Me̱di Jesu we gara nka ne igbe̱ he shi de̱ ré ti ko ya nneng he ngu nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Jesu shi cwugu ya rugu, ngu a ye nné ne ngu ce̱. Á be nwie ngu,
ngu a kyie nné shwa ne otu wehwie he ré hwie̱ nnenté ngu, ré srra ngbe ngu aha ngu ri ma we te ré ya brro nka.
Aa we ngwa de̱me̱ ré ning trru re-rije.
Nné shwa ne otu wehwie ne ngu kyie e̱ nyi mbe Sima (ne ngu ki ye he Pita),
ngbe Yakubu, ngbe gimbe ngu Yohana ne mbe nyi rewe Zebedi (Jesu we ye he Banaji, ne ngu nyi he “Rewe Eze”
A ning bi Andrru, ngbe Fili, ngbe Batolomi, ngbe Mata, ngbe Toma, ngbe Yakubu kowe Alifayu, ngbe Tadiyu, ngbe Sima ne ngu nyi Nne Ngwa Rici.
ngbe Yahuda Iskarriyoti, ne ngu rie̱ Jesu.
Jesu a ne̱ re nzhi ya eri. He̱rri ne cwu, ya brra ekpri nné á ya tsu a ri nna, he̱rri aa ci ko Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu hung ye yâ we̱.
A zhe ne nné ngu mbe ya ho ni, mbe e̱ ywa he mbe ya ki fo, aha á he, “De̱e̱nte̱ wo rici ngu ne̱ ne dzio!”
Yá nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ne mbe wru a Urrushelima á ne̱ ne he, “Nyi Beelzebu nggwe̱ re-rije ne ngu ki ngwá igbe̱ ne ngu ning trru re-rije.”
Aha ni Jesu we ye, ngu a we he nka zhwebe he, “Shetani we̱ hung yu Shetani e̱e̱?
Kundu ne nné ngwie̱ mbe yaa hla mbe ci cwè we nci mbe, ringgwe̱ mbe e̱ we̱ gu.
Kundu ne nné ri mbe yaa hla mbe ci cwè we nci mbe, eri mbe e̱ we̱ gu.
Ma kundu Shetani ngu deze we rici ngu, ngu ci cwè ne ringgwe̱ ngu, maahu ringgwe̱ ngu a yhwe̱, aha ko shi re yo we̱.
“Ko bi nne re hung ngwie a ri nne bi igbe̱ ngbe re ko re-ankya ngu we̱, se re ke̱she rrwe nne bi igbe̱ nna wire we̱ hung ko re-ankya a ri ngu.
“Nje níng ting cence, wé̱ hung we nneywí ga re-nzhwe e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe nyi, he̱rri ngbe re-nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱ ne mbe he.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu dzie̱ Nshe Wiri, ko bi ré ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu we̱, aha aa nyi e̱ngwie̱ na he̱rri tiya.”
(Jesu he nka ne̱ aha yá shi he he, “A bi rije a yarri ngu.”)
Wire de̱ Jesu ngbe re-gimbe ngu ya wre̱. Á ya yo tese ri ne Jesu ngu ning shi, mbe e̱ te he ré ya ki ye.
Rotsu nné ne mbe shi srra ngbe ngu mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ri, de̱ ngwe̱ ngbe re-gimbe ngwe̱ rewerento ngbe rewerembrru á re kre a ci.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu nyi de̱ nje e̱? Nyi mbe nye̱ mbe nyi re-gimbe nje e̱?”
Ngu a ci riyii nwie di nné ne mbe srra mbe ki grra, ngu a he, “Ri! De̱ nje ngbe re-gimbe nje e̱ á nyi nke!
Nne nke ne ngu nyi kya ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱, nyi ngu ne ngu nyi gimbe nje ewerento ka ewerembrru ka de̱ nje.”

Jesu a ne̱ ne mie̱ nneywí nka a rekyi nzhwo Galili wa. Rigwe̱ nné ne mbe ya ki grra á brri we yang he̱rri se ne ngu ngwie konkro a yarri brra nzhwo rishi nna wire ngu a srra be miimi nwie mie̱ nneywí nka ne mbe yo a rekyi ci.
Aa we mie̱ re-ankya we yang ne re-nka zhwebe, a he ne mbe he,
“Nyi ho we̱! A bi ya nne kaa ne ngu ywa ni zhwe a yi.
A zhe ne ngu shi ni zhwe nna, yá kpi a nhwie̱ rê, re̱mie̱ be ya ta.
Yá kpi a ne̱hwan ne ko ngu zhwo bi mbe we̱. We zhe zunzrru á wre̱ ne ta, aha ewie nna bi e̱we̱ mbè e̱ we hwerere.
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ ngu ya cwucwu, á wre̱ ne yomi he̱rri á hwe, aha ko re-rinyie nna á ngwi be we̱.
Yá re-zhwe nna á kpi a yarri re-ze̱kye̱, re-ze̱kye̱ á ci á we rrwe he̱rri koó hung ci riyii we̱.
Me̱di yá re-zhwe nna á kpi a mbe rina, á ta, á ci he̱rri á ci riyii: yá nci nna á ci ncwe nshwa wetsie̱ wetsie̱, yá nshwa rritsie̱ rritsie̱, kpi ma he̱rri nnywa zunzrru zunzrru.”
Wire Jesu a he, “Nne ngu bi re-uucwung hong, nde re ho!”
A ya zhe ne Jesu shi nggaa ngu, nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu wehwie ngbe kpi nné ne mbe shi ngbe ngu a, á he ne ngu he re we kla re-nka zhwebe ne ngu we heng ana.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Á níng ngwa hu re̱se̱ng re-ankya la la na Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱. Me̱di nné ne ko mbe shi yarri nyi we̱ á hó ko nda a re-nka zhwebe.
Aha nii,
‘Ko ngbe mbe ri we ri,
ko shi ré di we̱;
ko ngbe mbe ho we ho,
ko shi ré bi hu re̱se̱ng we̱.
Kundu mbe rā she hu re̱se̱ng,
wé̱ ning brru re be nwie Be̱ne̱,
ngbe Be̱ne̱ we̱ we we re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe.’ ”
Wire Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Ko nyi pie ngba cwu nka zhwebe ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ma nyi ri ce̱ rimi nyi pie ya nka zhwebe e̱ ma?
Nne ni zhwe e̱ aa ni nka Be̱ne̱.
Yá nneywí e̱ á shi shi zhwe na mbe kpi a nhwie̱ rê. We zhe ne mbe ho nka ne e brro, ngbe Shetani we̱ wre̱ ne be, we̱ ya ti kya ne mbe ho a.
Yá nneywí e̱ á shi shi zhwe na mbe kpi a ne̱hwan. We zhe ne mbe ho nka ne e brro, wé̱ wre̱ ne se̱ng ne rekwi.
Me̱di ko nka nna we cwu ronu rie mbe we̱, aha ni ko fó zhe we̱. Zhe ne ya ge̱zhe̱ ri we she ka á ri shi we ngwa cinci aha zhwe nka Be̱ne̱, wé̱ wre̱ ne ning brru ne emerin.
Yá nneywí e̱ á shi shi zhwe na mbe kpi a yarri re-ze̱kye̱. Mbe ne̱, á nyi zhwe nné ne mbe hó nka,
me̱di re-hwie nka ankya na nze̱ ne̱, ngbe kre ncwé̱ ngbe ecwue kpi re-ankya we̱ we rrwe he̱rri ko nka ne mbe ho a we̱ ci mpe̱ni we̱.

Me̱di yá nneywí e̱ á shi shi zhwe na mbe kpi a mbe rina. Á hó nka Be̱ne̱, wé̱ se̱, wé̱ ning nyi re-cwuo rina ne Be̱ne̱ he ré nyi shi zhwe na ne yá mbe ci ncwe nshwa wetsie̱ wetsie̱, yá nshwa rritsie̱ rritsie̱, kpi ma he̱rri nnywa zunzrru zunzrru.”
Jesu he ne rigwe̱ nné he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu sa be ne te̱le̱kyi a zonggru we̱ ki cwugru ne grre ka re sa a tahwie gondo aa? Koó sa a zete kyang sang we̱ e̱e̱?
Aha ko nda ne ngu shi la la á ri wru mi cwe nkyie, ko nda ne e ku á ri kla gbeng.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu bi ucwung hong, nde re ho!”
A he ne mbe wa he, “Nyi ci nkwile̱ ne kya nyi ho! Ahwa ne ngwe̱ ning mwang, nyi ngu ne e ri re mwang ma, he̱rri ré re brang.
Aha nne nke ne ngu bi hu re̱se̱ng, á ri ki brang; nne nke ne ko ngu bi we̱, ngbe e̱we̱ kya ne ngu bi e̱ á ri se̱ ré ki we hwerri.”
Jesu a he wa he, “Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi shi zhwe ne ya nne ngu ni a ebe ngu.
Ka re shi ndzie a totu, ka re deze ngu shi nyi yaka yankya a te̱ne̱, zhwe ana we̱ shi nwie ci ne ko ngu hung nhwie̱ng we̱.
Ebe nna we rici ngu a ci yâ. Ce̱ucwung, zhwe ke̱she we̱ ta, we̱ ne̱ ne ci, wé̱ ya ne̱ ne si rehwie, he̱rri wé̱ ya trru nci, wé̱ ning ci riyii.
Zhe ne yâ nna ri ci ca, nne bi ebe nna we̱ he zheng ca yâ be, wire we̱ rwi rije̱e̱ nva fa, we̱ ne̱ ne cang.”
Jesu we rinng wa he, “Nyi nda nzhi ning mwa yi ne Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱? Ka nyi zohu nka zhwebe nzhi ning mwa yi mi e̱e̱?
A shi shi cwe musta ne ngu shi tsie̱nzhwu re ne̱ ga re-nzhwe ankya a be ngwie̱ ne e tsi a ebe.
Me̱di kundu ne e ki tsi, we̱ ci brrabrrang re ne̱ ga re-nzhwe ankya ne e tsí a nhwie̱n. A ci ngbá nva rekwe he̱rri re̱mie̱ yi wé̱ ya ne̱ ne ning srra a rowu ngu.”
Ne yá re-nka zhwebe shi nke ne̱ we yang Jesu we brro nka ye̱ye̱rri ne kya mbe ri hung hung.
Koo we ti yankya we̱sa ne re-nka zhwebe we̱. Me̱di zhe ne ngu shi nggaa ngu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu, we̱ we ti kya ne nka zhwebe nna ngu he.
We tu nna a zhe ne̱hin, Jesu he nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Nyi ning be nzhi tsa re nzhi nyie nke ncwi.”
Mbe e̱ we rigwe̱ nné nna, mbe e̱ ki fo a yarri konkro ne ngu ning shi. Me̱di a bi yá re-konkro ne mbe shi miimi wa.
Á srra, ya ngba ncwu ngbe wu a be ne igbe̱ nwie yhwa rishi re nzhi yarri konkro nna shi shi ngu shi ki ci re ciywi yarri rishi.
A zhe nna, Jesu sa rici a kyang sa rici a shi ndzie a merin konkro nna. Á ya ki shwo, á he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, ngwe̱ ke̱ we ne nywe̱ ne nzhi shi ci shweni ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu a deze ngu a tsa wu nna ne ren he, “We ni!” Ngu a he ne brra nzhwo rishi nna he, “Nywe̱ cereng!” Wu nna a we ni, brra nzhwo rishi e̱ ci cereng fa.
Wire Jesu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi bi owu ni e̱? He̱rri ne cwu ko nyi bi sa rie we̱ e̱e̱?”
Owu we prre á ne̱ ne yaa rin re-nka we nci mbe he, “Nke e̱ nyi nye̱ ni e̱? He̱rri wu ngbe nzhwo rishi e̱ á shî nka ngu uu!”
Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu á tsa nzhwo rishi Galili re be a nyie Garasi.
We zhe ne Jesu ngu wru a yarri konkro, ya nne ne ngu bi rije wru a nwie re-ria re be nyi ne ngu.
Nne nna srrá a nwie re-ria, ko bi ko ya nne ngu hung ki rrwe we̱, ka ré bra ki rrwe ne roonyo hoo.
Aha á nyi ne ki ci roonyo a nva ngbe ne re-kprincwe̱ a nta, me̱di a prre we̱ ca, we̱ kprre re-kprincwe̱ ne e ki cing a nta. He̱rri ko bi nne ngu bi igbe̱ re ki re we̱.
Totu ne te̱ne̱ a srra re kyie̱ onu a nwie re-ria a yarri ngbrá nwie yaa ca ne rahwan.
Zhe ne ngu ri Jesu we gbong, ngu a rwi ta be ncii re nzhi ki she, ngu a ya hu be a nyyi ngu.
Ngu a ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Jesu, Kowe Be̱ne̱ Bi Grime̱ Re Ne̱ Zhwozhwo! Nyi nda shwe nje ngbe ngwe̱ e̱e̱? Nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ a yarri lo Be̱ne̱ he shi de̱ ngwe̱ ning ngwa ge̱zhe̱ we̱!”
(A he ni aha á ri ma ne Jesu ngu he ne rije nna he, “Rije, wru a yarri nne ne̱!”)
Jesu a ki rinng he, “Á re ye he nye̱?” Ngu a ki shing he, “Á ning ye he ‘Piriri,’
Ngu a ne̱ ne cwe nva ne Jesu te̱nte̱ wa he shi de̱ re we yu a nkla nna we̱.
A bi ya brra ekpri re-lede dudu ne mbe shi reye a rekyi rugu.
Re-rije nna á ne̱ ne cwe nva ne Jesu he, “Níng trru re nzhi nwie re-lede ngbe nzhi ya ngwie a yarri mbe.”
Aa we shing, ngbe re-rije e̱ wru a yarri nne nna mbe e̱ ngwie a yarri re-lede. Ekpri re-lede nna á cwu ci wehwie. Zhwozhwo mbe á wrre a brraa, á ya kpi a nzhwo rishi á ci shweni.
Nné cwo re-lede á ri ni, mbe e̱ wre̱ ne to ncii re nzhi ti nneywíng a yarri ngwie̱ ngbe nkla, nneywí e̱ nga re nzhi ri kya ne ngu ci.
Zhe ne mbe ya wre̱ a nwie Jesu, mbe e̱ ya she nne bi re-rije nna ngu ci ankya, ngu srra be we rina rina. Rowu we prre.
Nné mbe ne mbe ri kya ne ngu ci e̱, á ne̱ ne ti nné kya ngu ci ne nne bi re-rije ngbe re-lede nna.
Nné nkla nna á ne̱ ne cwe nva ne Jesu he re ne̱ a nkla mbe.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu shi ngwie a konkro, nne ne ngu i bi re-rije nna ngu a ne̱ ne cwe nva ne ngu he ngu ne̱ ngbe ne ngu.
Me̱di ko Jesu ki shing we̱, a he ne ngu he, “Ywa a ri ngwe̱ ngwe̱ ya ti nné nva ngwe̱ng kya ne Brrabe̱ ngu re nying, ngbe naana ngwe̱ ne ngu ri.”
Aha nii, nne nna ne̱ ne grra re ting a Re-ngwie̱ Shwa kya ne Jesu ngu ki nying. Ga nneywí zhwozhwo a ne̱ ne nye̱ ronu.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ning brru tsa nzhwo rishi ne konkro re be a nyie ne ngu ri ning shi, nneywí nga gbungbungbu á ya ki grra we zhe ne ngu shi a rekyi nzhwo.
Ngbe ya nnencwuee zonggrung mwe nné Yahudi ne e ki ye he Yayirru, ngu a ya wre̱ ma. Zhe ne ngu ri Jesu, ngu a hu be a nyyi ngu.
Ngu a ne̱ ne cwe nva ne ngu nwie he, “E̱we̱ ewena nje nyia re nzhi hu, kusu be ngbe ngwe̱ ya ki gara va ngbe re ci gbingbi kishi ri hu!”
Aha nii, Jesu ne̱ ngbe ne ngu. Nné ne mbe ki zhwe e̱ á brri we yang ne mbe cwo re ki yhwi ko zohu eme.
A bi ya mbrru a miimi ne ngu nyi ne shwe cinci nwie to roshwo he̱rri re-rie shwa ne otu wehwie.
Aa bra shwe cinci we yang a nva nné re̱kye̱, he̱rri aa ywe̱ ncwé̱ ngu yhwe̱ wiriri. He̱rri ne cwu, koo ci gbingbi we̱. Ruhu ngu a ke̱ we ne ning brang we bra.
A ho re-ankya ne e he Jesu shi nying, ngu a kwe̱ a tsi rigwe̱ nné re be wre̱ a merin ngu, ngu a re zhi tago ngu.
A he we hwie ngu he, “Kundu nje re we zhi tago ngu ne̱, ma n ci gbingbi.”
We zhe zunzrru roshwo ngu a we ni to, ngu a ho ko nda ki ci rina a yarri rwe̱ ngu.
We zhe zunzrru ma, Jesu hu he igbe̱ wru yarri ngu, ngu a bra a tsi rigwe̱ nné, ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu re tago nje e̱?”
Nné ki zhwe ngu ki shing he, “Ngwe̱ ri zhwe rugu nné ne mbe re grra ne̱, ngwe̱ ce̱ rimi ngwe̱ rin he nyi nye̱ ngu re re ye̱ e̱e̱?”
Me̱di Jesu ke̱ we ne kye̱yi he ngu ri nne ne ngu ki re.
Wire mbrru nna, ne ngu hu kya ngu ci e̱, ngu a be ngu a ya hu be a nyyi ngu nwie tsi rwe̱ ne owu, ngu a ki ti ko nda ne ngu ci ye̱ye̱rri.
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ewena nje, sa rie ngwe̱ re ci ngwe̱ ci gbingbi. Ywa we rina, ngwe̱ she kyia ne ruhu ngwe̱.”
We zhe ne Jesu ngu shi nka, yá nné e̱ wru a ri Yayirru, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ewena ngwe̱ aa hu, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ngwa Nne Mie̱ Nka cinci ni we̱.”
Jesu ho kya ne mbe he, ngu a he ne Yayirru he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ dzio ehwie we̱, ke̱ we ne sa rie.”
Ko Jesu we ko ya nne re ki zhwe we̱, se we Pita, ngbe Yakubu ngbe Yohana ne ngu nyi gimbe Yakubu.
A zhe ne mbe ya wre̱ a ri Yayirru, Jesu ya she ewie shwu ne nneywí mbe cwe nku ngbe rana riywe̱.
Ngu a ngwie yarring, ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi cwe nku nwie kyie̱ rana ni e̱e̱? Ko ewena nna hu we̱, a shi ndzie!”
Á bra ne̱ ne ki mi. Zhe ne ngu we trru ci zhwozhwo mbe, ngu a fo be̱ng ngbe de̱ ewena nna ngbe nné ki zhwe ne mbe shi ngbe ne ngu, mbe e̱ ngwie a nwie ne ewena nna ngu ning shi.
Ngu a fo va ewena nna ngu a he ne ngu he,
We zhe zunzrru, ewena nna cinye̱ ngu a ne̱ ne cwo ciee. He̱rri ga nné ne mbe shi miimi zhwozhwo á hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu. (Ewena nna bi re-rie shwa ne otu wehwie.)
Jesu we gara nka ne igbe̱ he shi de̱ ré ti ko ya nne kya ne ngu ci we̱, ngu a he ne mbe he ré ki ngwa yâ ngbe re ye.
Jesu we miimi, ngu a ne̱ re nzhi ngwie̱ ne ngu ning srra ngbe ne nné ki zhwe ngu ne mbe ki ku teme.

A zhe ne Kotung Srra Cwu be, ngu a ya ne̱ ne mie̱ nneywí nka a zonggrung mwe. Ga nné ne mbe ho nka ngu a, á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu nwie rin he, “Nne ne̱ wru mi ne zhwe nti nka ne ngu he ne̱ a he e̱e̱? Aa she zhwe zentsi ne ngu ning nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne̱ a he?

Ko nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi kafinta ne ngu nyi ewe Merri we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi gimbe Yakubu, ngbe Usufu, ngbe Yahuda, ngbe Sima ne re-gimbe ngu rewerembrru mbe shi he ngbe ne nzhi ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?” Aha nii, á ra nka ngu.
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Á ngwá nne ti re̱se̱ng grime̱ ko he, me̱di we̱sa ne nné nkla ngu ngbe nné nzhwe ngu, ngbe nné yarri ri ngu.”
Aha nii, ko Jesu hung nyi ankyang hwie̱ nga onu piriri a miimi we̱, se we nné ruhu we tsie̱ ne ngu we gara nva ne mbe ci gbingbi.
Kyei! Jesu hwie̱ nga we onu aha zhwe riywe̱ sa rie mbe.
Wire Jesu ne̱ ne grra a re-nkla nkla nwie mie̱ nka.
Aa ye nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu wehwie ngu a we te wehwie wehwie, aa we ngwa de̱me̱ a zete re-rije.
Zhe ne mbe shi ne̱, aa we gara nka he, “Shi de̱ nyi ko ankya a ciee ne̱, ka nyi ko yâ, ka brrá re-lente, ka ncwé̱ a re-rujuhu nyi we̱, se ka ngbo hoo.
Nyi ci tamri, me̱di shi de̱ nyi ko yaká re-tago wa we̱.
Ko zohu ewie ne nyi ning ywa, nyi srra a ri ne e níng se̱, he̱rri re nzhi zhe ne nyi ri we ngwie̱ nna.
Ko zohu ewie ne nyi ning ngwie ne koó níng se̱ we̱, nyi gbe̱ ruvu nta nyi a zhe ne nyi shi ne̱, ngbe re hwie̱ sheede a rici mbe.”
Á wru á ya ne̱ ne brro nka aha nneywí ré si ywe̱.
Á yu re-rije we yang. Á ywi nné ruhu piriri remie á we ci ci gbingbi.
Nggwe̱ Hirridu
Kpi he, “A nyi Iliya.” Kpi ke̱ we̱ ne he he, “A nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng, shi yá nné ti re̱se̱ng na gbangba tiya.”
Me̱di zhe ne Hirridu ho ni, ngu a he, “Yohana aa, nne ne nje i ki ti rici e̱ aa deze nhu rri ii!”
Aha Hirridu we rici ngu i ngwa nka he ré pie Yohana, ré ki rrwe ré ki ci a uucwu gyiaa. A i nyi ni aha Hirridiya, mbrru gimbe ngu Filibu, ne ngu i fo ning nyi mbrru.
Aha a zhe nna Yohana i srra re he ne Hirridu he, “A ci cinci ngbe ngwe̱ fo mbrru gimbe ngwe̱ re hwie̱ mbrru ngwe̱.”
Aha nii, Hirridiya ne̱ ne ra Yohana he̱rri aa kre rê ngu ki yhwe̱, me̱di koo she riwie̱ we̱,

aha Hirridu to Yohana, a bra ki cwo aha ne ngu hu he nyi nne redziee, a bra shi wiri a nyyi Be̱ne̱. Ko zohu zhe ne Hirridu ho nka Yohana, owu we̱ ki yhwe̱, gbengbe ni a kré he ngu srra re ho re-nka ngu.
Otu be ne Hirridiya ngu she zhe fa. A nyi otu bikying bî Hirridu, aha ni Hirridu a nyi brra para ngbe brrá nné gonati ngu ngbe brrá nnencwueé re-shezhi ngu ngbe brrá nné ringgwe̱ na Galili.
Zhe ne ewena Hirridiya ngu ngwie ngu shwo rocwu, aa kla Hirridu ngbe nné ice ngu rehwie. Aha ni nggwe̱ Hirridu a he ne ewena nna he, “Ning rin ko nda ne ngwe̱ ce̱, ngbe ma n re ngwa.”
Ngu a ki sa jee ne shí he, “Ko nda ne ngwe̱ ning rinng, ma n re ngwa; ko ngu ra bra nyi kpirri ringgwe̱ nje ma ho.”
Ngu a wru ci re nzhi rin de̱ ngung he, “A de̱, n rin aha nda a?”
De̱ ngu a he, “Rin aha rici Yohana Nyi Batisma.”
We zhe zunzrru ewena nna rwi ta be re nzhi nwie nggwe̱ ne kya ngu ce̱ he, “Nje ce̱ ngwe̱ ning ngwa rici Yohana Nyi Batisma we zhe ne ne̱ a zete trree.”
Nggwe̱ ho ni, rwe̱ ngu a dzie. Me̱di aha ne ngu i sa jee ne shí a nyyi nné ice ngu, ko bi re bra bra nka nna we̱.
Aha ni ngu a wre̱ ne ci ya shezhi ngu re ya yhwe̱ Yohana re be mi ne rici ngu. Nne nna ywa a uucwu gyiaa ngu a ya ti rici Yohana,
ngu a be mi a zete trree. Ngu a ngwa ewena nna, wire ngu a ya ngwa de̱ ngu ma fa.
Zhe ne nné zhwe Yohana mbe ho he á yhwe̱ be̱ri mbe, mbe e̱ be mbe e̱ ya fo kwe ngu, mbe e̱ ya nyie̱.
Nnenté ya ning brru á ya mwe nwie Jesu, á ki ti ko nda ne mbe nyi, ngbe re-nka ne mbe mie̱.

Me̱di aha ne nneywí piriri mbe tsu nwie mbe, ne kpi shi ngwi kpi wé̱ shi nyia, he̱rri ko Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu á bi zheng ye yâ we̱. Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ning be we nggaa nyi ngbe nzhi ywa a ya ewie ne ngu shi cereng ngbe nzhi ya srra cwu.”
Aha ni mbe e̱ ngwie a yarri konkro we nggaa mbe ngbe Jesu re nzhi ya ewie ngu shi cereng.
Me̱di kpi nné we yang á we ri mbe e̱ hu he nyi mbe ne mbe nyia, mbe e̱ wru a re-nkla zhwozhwo nwie to re-ncii re nzhi nwie ne mbe nyia re nzhi, á ya ke̱she mbe.
Zhe ne Jesu ngu ya cwucwu, ngu a ri rigwe̱ nné, naana ki pie, aha á shi shi nyi canvé we̱sa ne nne cwo. Aha ni ngu a ne̱ ne we mie̱ re-ankya we yang.
A zhe ne ne̱ nyia re nzhi yhwe̱, nné ki zhwe ngu be nwie ngu, á he ne ngu he, “Ewie ne̱ nyi eyi, ne̱ bra yhwe̱.
Cire nné mbe rre̱ ngbe ré ywa ré ya grra a rebe ngbe re-nkla dudu ne̱ ka á ri she yá re-ankya ré si ré ye.”
Aa we shing he, “Nyi e̱ nyi we ngwa kya ne mbe shi yeng shi.” Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Ko nzhi ra bi denarri nnywa wehwie
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ywa nyi ya kre nyi ri, nyi cwú brredi wema ne nyi bi e̱?” Zhe ne mbe ya she, mbe e̱ he, “A bi cwú wecwuoo ngbe hwén wehwie.”
Wire Jesu a he ne mbe he ré ci ko mbe nye̱ re srra a rekpri rekpri a zete ntsi brrubrru.
Á yaa ta a rekpri rekpri, nnywa nnywang, ngbe nshwa wecwuoo wecwuoo.

Jesu a fo cwú brredi wecwuoo ngbe hwen wehwie ana, ngu a gbi riyii zinye̱, ngu a ci kijie̱ng. Wire ngu a hwin brredi nna, ngu a ngwa nné ki zhwe ngu ngbe ré kye nnéng. Ngu a bra kye hwén wehwie nna, ko nye̱ she.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo á ye á shwe.
Nné ki zhwe e̱ á tsu nkla brredi ngbe nkla hwén ne mbe hwie̱ aa ci grré shwa ne otu wehwie.
Nné ntó ne mbe ye yâ nna á cwu ci wecwuoo.
We zhe ana Jesu ci nné ki zhwe ngu ré ngwie a yarri konkro ré ka ne̱ re nzhi a nyie Beseda, ngbe ngu she cire rigwe̱ nné.
A zhe ne ngu we cire, ngu a cwugu re nzhi ku Be̱ne̱ a ya rugu.
A zhe ne ne̱hin ci, nné zhwe Jesu á shi yarri konkro a zetsi brra nzhwo rishi, Jesu a shi we nggaa ngu a zete rugu.

Ngu a we ri ne mbe shi cinci hwrre̱ konkro ne rekweng, aha wu ne ngu to re ning brru ne mbe ne emerin. A brra tsi totu weje ncwe̱ wetsie̱ re be ncwe̱ rritsie̱ na nyiencwe, aa ne̱ re nzhi we she nwie cwo a zete rishi. Aa be shi ngu shi we wara.
Zhe ne mbe ki ri ne ngu cwo a zete nzhwo rishi, á ra he nyi rewienci, mbe e̱ kro nku,
aha a zhe ne mbe ki ri, rwe̱ mbe dzie mie̱e̱li. We hwiehwie ngu a he nka ne mbe he, “Nyi yaa rwe! Nyi Nje, shi de̱ nyi ci rowu we̱.”
Wire ngu a ngra, ngu a ya we she a yarri konkro nna, ngbe wu nna a hwie̱ yo. Á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu,
aha a ke̱ we ne we shi ywing a yarri ronu rie mbe, koó hung hu re̱se̱ igbe̱ ngu ne ngu ning ngwa rigwe̱ nné cwú brredi wecwuoo ana we̱.
A zhe ne mbe tsa rishi yhwe̱, á ya yo a nyie Jenazarra, mbe e̱ rwe konkro mbe a miimi.
We zhe ne mbe wru ci a konkro nna, nneywí wre̱ ne hu he nyi Jesu.
Á ne̱ ne grra a re-nkla ne ovu ncii re kywo nné ruhu a re-kpengye re nzhi ko he ne mbe ho he ning shi.

Ko he ne Jesu ngu ning ywa a yarri nkla ngbe re-ngwie̱ ngbe a rebe, nneywí wé̱ ko nné ruhu mbe re cwo mi a rewie ne nneywí mbe ning tsu, nwie cwe nva ne ngu he re we we mbe re zhi tago ngu. Ga mbe ne mbe ki re, á ci gbingbi.
Yá nné Farisi ngbe yá nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ne mbe wru a Urrushelima á be ya tsu nwie Jesu.
Ngbe mbe e̱ di yá nné zhwe Jesu mbe shi ye yâ ne nva ywi, ne ko mbe kyu nva ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ne teede Nti Nka Musa he ré nyi we̱.
(Aha ko nné Farisi ngbe kpi nné Yahudi zhwozhwo ye yâ we̱sa ne kyu nva ye̱ye̱rri ne teede brrá nné tiya mbe we̱,
koó bra ye yankya ne e wru mi kaawe̱ we̱, se ne mbe ki kyu wire.
Aha nii, nné Farisi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka á rin Jesu he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nné re zhwe ngwe̱ mbe zhwe teede brrá nné tiya nzhi we̱, me̱di mbe ye yâ ne nva ywing e̱e̱?”
Jesu we shing he, “Kya ne Ishaya, nne ti re̱se̱ng, ngu i he ne nyi nné brra ronu a nyi cence, ne ngu wie he:
‘Nné mbe rre e̱ á ning ngwá grime̱ we ikpe nu,
me̱di ronu rie mbe shi ze̱nze̱ ne nje.
Á ning yé mbè we shweni,
aha á mie̱ re-teede nneywí
shi shi nyi Nti Nka Be̱ne̱!’
Nyi wé Nti Nka na Be̱ne̱, nyi yo we re-teede na nneywí.”
Wire ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi bi e̱we̱e̱ re-zentsing brri Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ be, aha nyi zhwe re-teede na nci nyi!
Musa i he, ‘Ci be̱ ngwe̱ ngbe de̱ ngwe̱ grime̱. Ko nye̱ ne ngu cwi be̱ ngu ka de̱ ngu, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ki yhwe̱.’
Me̱di nyi e̱ nyi he he, kundu nneywi bi kya ne ngu ra ning she be̱ ngung ka de̱ ngu, me̱di ngu he he ‘Nyi Na Be̱ne̱’ (woto, he nyi kya ne ngu kyie sa aha ngu ngwa Be̱ne̱),
maahu aa shwe ne she mbe be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngung.
Tu ne nyi nyí ni ngbe yá kpi re-ankya we yang wa, maahu nyi hle̱ kya ne Be̱ne̱ he ré nyi aha nyi cwo re-teede tiya nyi gbagba.”
Jesu ning brru ye kpi nneywí re be nwie ngu wa, a he ne mbe zhwozhwo he, “Ko nye̱ nyi re sa uucwu re ho re ning bra she hu re̱se̱ng.
Ko nyi kya ne nneywi ngu ye ne ngu ki cí re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱. Me̱di nyi kya ne ngu wru yarri hwie ngu, ne ngu ki ci re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱.”
[Ko nye̱ ne ngu ri bi uucwung hong, nde re ho.]
A zhe ne ngu ne̱ nwie nneywí re si ri, nné ki zhwe ngu be ya ki rinng he re we ti cwu kya ne nka zhwebe ana ngu he.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “He̱rri ne cwu nyi shi zhizhi e̱e̱? Ko nyi kya ne nneywi ngu ye, ne ngu ki cí re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Aha ko kya ne ngu ye e̱ cwo a yarri onu rie ngu we̱, me̱di a cwo yarri hwie ngu, wire we̱ ya ki ti ci a uvu.” (Aha ni Jesu ti he ga re-nzhwe yâ zhwozhwo shi wiri a nyyi Be̱ne̱.)
Ngu a wara ne we heng he, “A nyi kya ne ngu wrú a yarri hwie nka nneywi ne ngu ki ci re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Aha a nyi a yarri yarri ronu rie nneywí ne re-hwie nka re-ankya e̱ngwie̱ mbe ning wrú shi: njè ngbe ya ewena ka ya nze̱we, ngbe nyi nca, ngbe yhwi nné,

ngbe nyi njè ngbe mbrru ya nne ka nto ya mbrru, ngbe ecwue mbrrú ngbe ntó, ngbe nyi hwie̱, ngbe ca rabrra, ngbe re-gre shweni, ngbe riyii ankya nné, ngbe kwe fe̱li, ngbe kywo rici ze, ngbe riywe̱ hwie nka te̱nte̱ng.
Ga re-ankya e̱ngwie̱ ne̱ á wrú a yarri hwie nka nneywi; nyi mbe ne mbe ci nneywi re bi le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱.”
