Jesu deze miimi re nzhi a nva Taya ngbe Sido. Aa ngwie a ya eri. Ko zhwo ce̱ he nneywí ré hu he ngu shi miimi we̱. Gbengbe ni, nneywí ya ho.
We zhe ne ya mbrru ne e̱we̱ ewena ngu bi rije ya ho ni, ngu a wre̱ ne zhwu re be. Aa be ya hu be a nyyi ngu.
Ko mbrru nna nyi mbrru Yahudi we̱, á ki bî a nkla Finikyia a ngwie̱ Sirriya. A cwe nva ne Jesu he re ti rije ne ngu shi a yarri ewena ngu.
Me̱di Jesu he ne ngu he, “Nde e̱we̱e̱ rewe ré ke̱she ye ré shwe wire, aha koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ré fo yâ e̱we̱e̱ rewe ré ngwa rovu we̱.”
Mbrru nna ki shing he, “Ee, a shi ni, Brrabe̱, gbengbe ni ma nje he ka rovu a á ta re-uucwu yâ ne mbe kpi be a gumong ye yâ e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne mbe ye ye̱ e̱e̱?”
Aha ni Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Aha zhwe nka ngwe̱ ne̱, ywa ne ciee ngwe̱, rije nna wru, aa we ewena ngwe̱.”
Aa ywa a ri ngu a ya she ewena ngu ne ngu shi nywe̱ be a zete gondo ne rije e̱ wru.
Jesu we ngwie̱ Taya, aa cie̱ a Sido, ngu a ya cwo a Re-ngwie̱ Shwa, wire ngu a ya wro re be a Nzhwo Galili.
Nyi miimi ne yá nné mbe be nwie ngu ne ya rumwa ne ko ngu zhwo hung he nka we̱, mbe e̱ cwe nva ne ngu he re gara nne nna va re ki kyia.
Jesu a wru mi ne nne nna nwie rigwe̱ nné re nzhi yaka ewie we nggaa ngu, ngu a gara nne nna nva a re-uucwu. Ngu a tsie rencwi, ngu a re le nne nna.
Ngu a gbi riyii zinye̱, ngu a fie̱ ncie̱ ne naana we yang, ngu a he ne ngu he,
We hwiehwie re-uucwu nne nna kla, le ngu wara ne ci ywaywa ngu a ne̱ ne he nka we cwancwancwa.
Jesu we gara nka he shi de̱ re ti ko ya nneng we̱. Me̱di a shi shi kundu ngu we gara nka ni wé̱ ke̱ we ne ning bra ti nka nna.
Nneywí ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu we yang nwie he, “A nyi ko nda rina rina, he̱rri aa ci nné re̱n ré ho nka ngbe mwa ré he nka.”
A rotu ana ya brra ekpri nné á ya tsu. Zhe ne mbe ya hwie̱ we̱sa ne kya ye, Jesu a ye nné ki zhwe ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he,
“Nje ri naana nné mbe rre e̱ ne mbe ci rotu wetsie̱ ngbe nje, mbe ya hwie̱ we̱sa ne kya ye ne̱.
Kundu nje he ne mbe he ré si ri ne nzhwo, wé̱ ya hwie̱ rê, aha yá mbe wru rewie ze̱nze̱.”
Nné ki zhwe ngu a he, “Ngwe̱ hwie he nyi he a eyi ne̱ ngbe ré ning she yâ ngbe re be ga nné ne̱?”
Jesu we rinng he, “Nyi cwú brredi wema nyi bi e̱?” Mbe e̱ kara he, “Natsie̱.”
Aa ci ga nné ana zhwozhwo ré srra be. Zhe ne ngu fo cwú brredi natsie̱ ana ngu a ning ci kijie̱ng, ngu a hwin ngu a kye nné ki zhwe ngu ngbe ré kye nnéng, mbe e̱ kye.
Á bi yá e̱wé̱ hwén tsie̱nzhwu, aa ning ci kijie̱ng wa, ngu a ngwa nné ki zhwe ngu ré kye wa.
Nneywí ye yâ á shwe he̱rri kya ne nné ki zhwe ngu mbe tsu ne ngu hwie̱ e̱ cwu grré natsie̱.
Nyi nné ntó ci weni ne mbe i shi nwieng. Zhe ne ngu we cire,
ngu a ngwie a yarri konkro ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu re nzhi a nkla Dalmanuta.
Yá nné Farisi be nwie rin Jesu re-nka aha ne mbe ce̱ ki mwa mbe ri. Á he ne ngu he re we wru mi ne ya sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu a zinye̱.
Aa fie̱ ncie̱ ngu a he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nné nze̱ ne̱ mbe rin aha sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu aa? Nje níng ting cence, ko bi ko ya sheede ne e shi níng ngwa we̱.”
Wire ngu a we we, ngu a ngwie a konkro, ngu a tsa nyie re nzhi yaka eme.
Gaa bru nné zhwe Jesu koó fo brredi we̱, se we zunzrru ne mbe bi a yarri konkro.
Jesu we gara nka he, “Nyi ci nkwile̱, nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne yisi nné Farisi ngbe na Hirridu.
Á ne̱ ne he re-nka we nci mbe he, “Kabeya, a he nka ne̱ aha ne ko nzhi bi brredi we̱ rre ye̱?”

Jesu hu kya ne mbe shi heng, ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi shi nwie he ko nyi bi brredi we̱ e̱e̱? He̱rri ne cwu ko nyi hu kya ne nje he ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi pie cwu nka nna we̱ e̱e̱? A ke̱ we ne níng shi ywing a yarri rehwie nyi e̱e̱?
Nyi bi nyyi, me̱di ko nyi hung ring we̱ e̱e̱? Nyi bi re-uucwu, me̱di ko nyi ho we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi lu we̱ e̱e̱?
A zhe ne nje i hwin cwú brredi wecwuoo ne nné ci wecwuoo mbe i ye ana, a nyi grré wema mbe i hwie̱?”
Á ki shing he, “Shwa ne otu wehwie.”
Ngu a he, “A zhe ne nje i hwin cwú brredi natsie̱ ne nné ci weni mbe i ye, nkla na mbe i hwie̱ ne nyi tsu a i ci grré wema?”
Á shî he, “Natsie̱.”
A he ne mbe he, “He̱rri ne cwu ko nyi pie cwu nka nna fa we̱ e̱e̱?”
Á ya wre̱ a nkla Beseda, yá nné e̱ be mi ne ya nnencwue̱, mbe e̱ cwe nva ne Jesu he re ki re ngbe re ki kyia.
Aa pie va nnencwue̱ nna, ngu a ki kwa he̱rri á wru nkla nna. Zhe ne ngu tsie rencwi a riyii nne nna, ngu a ki gara va, wire ngu a ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ ri yankya aa?”
Aa gbi riyii ze ngu a he, “Nje ri nneywí, á shi shi nyi rekwe ne mbe cwo ciee re grra.”
Jesu cinga ki gara va a riyii ngu wa, wire nyyi ngu a kla fa, aa ne̱ ne ri ewie rina rina, he̱rri a ri ko nda krrankrrankrra.
Jesu he ne ngu he re se̱ we rê re si ri, ngu a ki gara nka he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ning brru re nzhi nkla nyi we̱.”
Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu á ne̱ re nzhi re-nkla dudu ne Kesariya-Filibi. Zhe ne mbe shi ciee ngu a we rinng he, “Nneywí e̱ he he nje nyi nye̱ ma?”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Yá he he ngwe̱ nyi Yohana Nyi Batisma, yá a he ngwe̱ nyi Iliya, yá bra he ngwe̱ nyi ya a tsi nné ti re̱se̱ng.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ma nyi e̱ rre, nyi he nje nyi nye ma?”
Pita a he, “Nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Krristi.”
Jesu a we gara nka he shi de̱ ré ti ko ya nneng aha ngu we̱.

Jesu ne̱ ne mie̱ nné ki zhwe ngu nka he se Kowe Nneywi re shwe ge̱zhe̱ we yang, he̱rri brrá nné, ngbe nggwé̱ re-prristi, ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka ré ki ra he̱rri ré ki yhwe̱. Me̱di we̱ ci rotu wetsie̱ wire we̱ cinga deze a nhu.
Jesu he nka ne̱ we gbeng. Aha ni Pita ki fie̱ re nzhi bamba ngu a ne̱ ne ki yhwire.
Me̱di Jesu bra, ngu a ri nné ki zhwe ngu, ngu a ti Pita ne ren he, “Shwo n na rê ewie Shetani!” Ngu a he, “Zhwe hwie nka ngwe̱ ne̱ koo wru nwie Be̱ne̱ we̱, a nyi zhwe hwie nka nneywi.”
Wire ngu a ye rigwe̱ nné ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu re be nwie ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ ning zhwe, se re ra rici ngu, re fo gasankwe
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ cwo ce ngu ne rici ngu we̱ wi, me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ngwa ce ngu aha nje ngbe aha Nka Rina, we̱ she.
Rina nna nyi nda ne nneywi re she ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo, me̱di re bra wi ce ngu a ye̱?
Ka nyi nda ne nneywi ngu hung ngwang aha ce ngu a rraa?

Ko nye̱ ne ngu to nshwu nje ngbe nti nka nje a zhwe ze̱ nné ne ko shi ré hung sa rie a mbe we̱, ze̱ nné e̱ngwie̱ ne̱, Kowe Nneywi ri to nshwu ngu ma a zhe ne ngu ri be a yarri grime̱ Be̱ ngu ngbe re-njeli wiri.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nje níng ting cence, yá ne mbe yo a he ne̱ koó bi ri hu we̱ se ne mbe ri ri be Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ne igbe̱.”
Rotu rritsie̱ wara, Jesu a ko mbe Pita, ngbe Yakubu, ngbe Yohana re nzhi a ya zete ya brra rugu we nggaa mbe. Zhe ne mbe shi miimi ikpe rwe̱ Jesu bra a nyyi mbe.
Re-ankya ci rwe̱ ngu ci kye̱kye̱ng á tsie̱ nse̱ zhanzhanzhaa shi ne ko ya nne a be ngwie̱ ne̱ srra kyu ankya kye̱ re si ni we̱.
Á srra á timi ne Iliya ngbe Musa mbe ya wre̱ nwie mbe, mbe shi nka ngbe ne Jesu.
Pita he ne Jesu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, a bi rina ne nzhi shi he ne̱. Nde nzhi nyi re-ndu wetsie̱: ya aha ngwe̱, ya aha Musa, ya aha Iliya.”
(Koo hu kya ngu he we̱, rowu we yhwe̱.)
Ya inyie̱ be ya we ku gbengbe mbe, ya cwue wru a yarri inyie̱ he, “Nke nyi Kowe ce̱ nje. Nyi ho nka ngu!”
We zhe zunzrru, á he mbe bra koó ri ya nne we̱ se we Jesu nggaa ngu ne ngu shi ngbe mbe.
Zhe ne mbe shi wro a zete rugu re be be, Jesu we gara nka he shi de̱ re ti ko ya nne kya ne mbe ri we̱, se zhe ne Kowe Nneywi ri deze nhu.
Á bro nka nna we yarri rehwie mbe, nwie yaa rinng he ma nyi nda ngu nyi deze nhu a?
Á srra mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa mbe he se Iliya re ke̱she be wire e̱e̱?”
Jesu we shing he, “A shi ni cence, se Iliya ke̱she be ya ci re-ankya ré ci rina wire. De̱e̱ ni wo, nyi nda ngu ci ma ne e wie he se ne Kowe Nneywi shwe ge̱zhe̱ we yang, nneywí ré bra ki ra aa?
Me̱di nje níng ting, Iliya be, á ki nyi ko nda ne mbe ce̱, ye̱ye̱rri shi ne e wie a rici ngu.”
A zhe ne mbe be a nwie kpi nné ki zhwe, mbe e̱ ya she rigwe̱ nné mbe we grra ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ne mbe shi yaa kwa be ngbe mbe.
We zhe ne nné nna mbe ri Jesu we ri, á hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu, mbe e̱ gu ne re-ncii re nzhi ki dzie.
Jesu a rin nné ki zhwe ngung he, “Nyi nda nyi shi yaa kwa be ngbe mbe ni e̱?”
Ya nne a tsi nné nna he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nje be mi ne ewe nje a nwie ngwe̱, aha a bi rije ne ngu ki ci re me̱nkye̱ng he nka.
Kundu ngu ki ce̱ we̱ fo we̱ ki tsie be. Ngbe we̱ ne̱ ne trru fwihi a nu nwie ye nnyi, we̱ yaa fie̱ we̱e̱ kanggri. Nje he ne nné re zhwe ngwe̱ ne̱ ré ki ti rije nna, me̱di koó hung ting we̱.”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Ket, a nné mbe rre! Nyi ri kywe kywe shî nka nje rekpe e̱e̱? Nje shi srra ngbe ne nyi he̱rri rekpe? Nje shi yaa rwe ngbe ne nyi he̱rri rekpe? Nyi ning be mi ne ewe nna.”
Aha nii, á be mi ne ngu nwie Jesu. Zhe ne rije ngu ri Jesu, ngu a wre̱ ne tsie ewe nna be, ngbe ngu a ne̱ ne kwí nwie kpri be nwie trru fwihi a nu ngu.
Jesu rin be̱ ewe nna he, “Aa i ce̱ ruhu ne̱ tu rekpe?” A he, “Tu ne ngu wru e̱we̱we.
A srra re ki zi a nro ngbe rishi aha ngu ki yhwe̱, me̱di kundu ngwe̱ ri hung nyi yankya, ning sheng, kusu ri naana nzhi.”
Jesu he ne ngu he, “Kundu nje ri hung nying rri ii? Nne nke ne ngu bi sa rie we̱ hung nyi ko nda.”
We hwiehwie be̱ ewe nna wre̱ ne ci onu he, “Nje bi sa rie tsie̱, ning sheng n ning bra sa rie!”

Zhe ne Jesu ri nné mbe to re-ncii re be nwie nna, ngu a ti ren ne rije nna he, “Ngwe̱ rije ne ngwe̱ ci ewe ne̱ ne ko ngu hung he nka ka re ho nka we̱, nje he ne ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ wru a yarri ngu, shi de̱ ngwe̱ cinga ning brru ngwie yarri ngu wa we̱.”
Rije nna kra ku ngu a ne̱ ne ki brri be ne igbe̱. Ewe nna ngu a nywe̱ be shi ngu hu. He̱rri nneywí ne̱ ne he, “Aa hu!”
Me̱di Jesu ki pie va, ngu a ki cinye̱, wire ewe nna ngu a deze yo yo ne nta ngu.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ngwie a ya eri, nné ki zhwe ngu ki rinng ranranng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nzhi hung ti rije ne̱ we̱ e̱?”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Zhwe rije ne̱ ko wrú we̱ se ne ku Be̱ne̱.”
Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu we ewie ana á ya wara a yarri Galili. Ko Jesu ce̱ he ya nne re hu ewie ne mbe ning shi we̱,
aha ngu shi nwie mie̱ nné ki zhwe ngu nka. Aa we ting he, “Á shi ngwa Kowe Nneywi a nva nné ne mbe shi ki yhwe̱, me̱di a ri ci rotu wetsie̱ we̱ deze.”
Koó pie cwu kya ne ngu he we̱, á bra to owu ki rinng.
Á ya wre̱ a Kafanahu, zhe ne mbe shi a yarri zonggru, ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nka nda ne nyi ri shi yaa kwa be a rê ana?”
Me̱di á ci cereng, aha á ri shi yaa ti ronu ce a zhe ne mbe shi rê a nka he nyi nye̱ a tsi mbe ngu nyi brrang ye̱.
Jesu srra be ngu a we ye, mbe nné shwa ne otu wehwie zhwozhwo, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ko nye̱ ngu ce̱ hwie̱ na ce̱ucwung, se re ci rici ngu merin, re bra hwie̱ hwie ko nye̱.”
Ngu a fo ya e̱we̱we ngu a ki ci re yo a zetsi mbe. Ngu a ki fo a nva ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he,
“Ko nye̱ ne ngu se̱ ya a tsi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne̱ a yarri lo nje maahu aa ning se̱ nje, nne ne ngu bra ning se̱ ma, maahu aa se̱ nne ne ngu ning te.”
Yohana a he ne ngu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nzhi she ya nne ne ngu shi trru re-rije ne lo ngwe̱, nzhi e̱ he ne ngu he re we ni, aha ko shi ngbe nzhi we̱.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi ki kpo we̱, aha ko bi ya nne ne ngu nyi yankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne lo nje ngbe re bra srra tsie̱ re he ya nka me̱nkye̱ a rici nje we̱.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ko ngu kwe̱ ne nzhi we̱, a nyi na nzhi.
Nje níng ting cence, ko nye̱ ne ngu níng ngwa kwrreshi rishi ne lo nje, aha nyi nyí na Krristi, ko ri wi lede ngu we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱.
“Kundu ya nne ci ya a tsi e̱wé̱ nné ce̱ nka nje ne̱ ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱, we̱ nyi canca ré hwrra nne ana itsieng hwie nkya a ncwue, ré ki zhwu a yarri brra nzhwo rishi.
Aha ni kundu va ngwe̱ re ci ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱, ki kpo. Canca ngwe̱ ngwie a nce na he̱rri tiya ne va zunzrru ne ngwe̱ ngwie a ruvong ro ne nva ngwe̱ wehwie, a nwie ne ro ngu ye we̱sa weni.
[A miimi iizhí ne mbe ri we ye koó kwí we̱, ko bra bi ré yu ro ne ngu ye a miimi ana we̱.]
Ka kundu ta ngwe̱ re ci ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱, ki kpo. Canca ngwe̱ ngwie a nce na he̱rri tiya ne ta nku ne ngwe̱ ngwie a ruvong ro ne nta wehwie.
[A miimi iizhí ne mbe ri we ye koó kwí we̱, ko bra bi ré yu ro ne ngu ye a miimi ana we̱.]
Ka ya riyii ngwe̱ re ci ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱, ki ti. Canca ngwe̱ ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ne riyii zunzrru ne ngwe̱ bi nyyi ngwe̱ wehwie gbengbe mbe, ré bra re zhwu a ruvong ro.
A miimi iizhí ne mbe ri we ye koó kwí we̱, ko bra bi ré yu ro ne ngu yé a miimi ana we̱.
“Á shi ci ko nye̱ re ci wiri ne ro shi shi kya ne e ning ci ncwua ngu shi kpikpi.
“Ncwua bi rina, me̱di kundu ne ngu bru kpikpi ngu; ngwe̱ ce̱ rimi ngwe̱ ki ci re bra ning brru ci kpikpi e̱ wa?
“Nyi bi ncwuang srra shwe̱ a yarri nyi ngbe nyi yaa srra rina a nci nyi.”
Wire Jesu we ewie ana ngu a se̱ rê re nzhi nva Yahudi, ngu a tsa Brra Riywi Urrdu. Rigwe̱ nné be nwie ngu, ngu a ne̱ ne we mie̱ nka shi ne ngu ning mrrang.
Yá nné Farisi be ngbe mbe ki mwa ri, á ki rinng he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri a yarri Nti Nka nzhi ngbe nne re yu mbrru ngu aa?”
Ne ngu shi we shing ngu a we rinng he, “Musa a he nyi rimi?”
Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Musa ngwa riwie̱ he nne re wie krre̱de̱ng kpo nyrra, we̱ cire mbrru ngu.”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nyi aha klo nci nyi ne Musa i níng mie̱ng he nyi nyi ni.
Me̱di tu ce̱ucwung ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i nyi ebe ngwie̱, Be̱ne̱ i nyi nto ngbe mbrru.
‘Aha nii, nne nto we̱ we be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu we̱ mwe ngbe mbrru ngu,
ngbe mbe wehwie e̱ wé̱ ci rwe̱ zunzrru.’
Aha ni kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu rwe gbengbe, shi de̱ ya nne re ka we̱.”
A zhe ne mbe ngwie ri, nné ki zhwe ngu a á ki rin nka ne̱ te̱nte̱ wa.
Ngu a we shing he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu yu mbrru ngu ngu fo yaka mbrru, aa nyi njè, aa bra nyi mbrru ce̱ucwung ngu hwie̱.
Kundu ya mbrru ngu we nto ngu ngu drro ne yaka nne, aa nyi njè ma.”
Nneywí ne̱ ne be mi ne e̱we̱e̱ rewe a nwie Jesu ngbe re we mwo rina, me̱di nné ki zhwe ngu á ne̱ ne we yhwire.
Zhe ne Jesu ri ni, aa dzio ehwie ne nné ki zhwe ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi we e̱we̱e̱ rewe re be nwie nje, shi de̱ nyi we yu we̱, aha Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ nyi na zhwe mbe ne̱.
Nje níng ting cence, ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu se̱ Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ shi e̱we̱we we̱, ko shi re she ning ngwie we̱.”
Ngu a ko e̱we̱e̱ rewe nna ne ngu we bro nva re we gara nva nwie we mwo rina.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu pie rê ngu shi ne̱, ya nne nyi ne ncii ngu a ya hu be a nyyi ngu. A ki rinng he, “Te̱nte̱ Nne Mie̱ Nka, nyi nda nje shi nying ngbe n she ce he̱rri tiya a?”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne ngwe̱ he nje nyi te̱nte̱ng nna? Ngwe̱ hu re̱se̱ng he ko bi ya te̱nte̱ng we̱ se we Be̱ne̱ nggaa ngu aa?

Ko ngwe̱ hu Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ wo oo? Shi de̱ ngwe̱ yhwe̱ nne we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ nyi njè we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ nyi nca we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ ngwa sheede rabrra we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ ye nné ne le we̱, ci be̱ ngwe̱ ngbe de̱ ngwe̱ grime̱.”
Ngu a he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nje nyi ne zhwe ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo tu zhe ne nje wru we e̱we̱we.”

Jesu ki ri gbinnng aha ne ngu ki ce̱, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Aa re hwie̱ kya zunzrru ngwe̱ nyi. Ywa ngwe̱ ya rie̱ ko nda ne ngwe̱ bi ngbe ngwe̱ ngwa yiriywé̱ aha ngwe̱ she dukyie̱e̱ a zinye̱, wire ngwe̱ be ngwe̱ ning zhwe fa.”
We ne nne nna ho ni ngu a rwe riyii, ngu a ne̱ ne ehwie dzio, aha a bi dukyie̱e̱ we yang.
Jesu bra ngu a ri nné ki zhwe ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he, “A bi rwe̱ ngbe nne bi va re ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱!”
Nné ki zhwe e̱ á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu aha nka ne̱. Me̱di Jesu ning brru he ne mbe wa he, “A rewe! Ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ bi rwe̱!
A nyi canca ronkomi re ngwie a yarri nzhwu nuurre ne nne bi va re ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Nné ki zhwe ngu a ning bra hwie̱ nye̱ ronu we yang, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne yaa rinng we nci mbe he, “Ma ngge ne̱ shi he ni, he̱rri nyi nye̱ ngu shi drre̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu we ri gbinnng ngu a he ne mbe he, “A nwie nneywí, ko shi re ci we̱; me̱di a nwie Be̱ne̱, ko bi rwe̱ we̱; aha ko bi ko yankya ngu drre̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
Pita he ne ngu he, “Ma ri, nzhi ne̱ nzhi we re-ankya nzhi zhwozhwo, nzhi re zhwe!”
Jesu ki shing he, “Nje ning ting cence, nne ne ngu we eri ngu, ka re-gimbe ngu rewerento, ka re-gimbe ngu rewerembrru, ka de̱ ngu, ka be̱ ngu, ka rewe ngu, ka rebe ngu, aha nje ngbe brro Nka Rina,
a shi she yá reri, ngbe re-gimbe, ngbe re-de̱, ngbe re-be̱, ngbe rewe, ngbe rebe, he̱rri ngbe re-ge̱zhe̱ ce nnywa nnywang piriri a nze̱ ne, ngbe a nze na ngu cwo be re bra ya she ce na he̱rri tiya.
Me̱di jie̱ng ne mbe nyi ce̱ucwung, á cwo a hwie̱ emerinng; nné merin á bra cwo a hwie̱ nnencwueé.”

A zhe ne mbe shi cwugu ré nzhi a Urrushelima ne Jesu ngu we kwa yincwuee. A nyi kyang hwie̱ nga onu a nwie nné ki zhwe, kpi nné ne mbe we zhwe e̱ ma, á cwo ne rowu. Jesu srra ngu a ye nné ki zhwe shwa ne otu wehwie ana re nzhi bamba, ngu a ne̱ ne we ti re̱se̱ kya ne ngu cwo a ki she.
Ngu a he, “Nyi ri, nzhi nyia re nzhi a Urrushelima. Á cwo a ngwa Kowe Nneywi a nva nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka. Á shi ki nyi nka hu, wire wé̱ ki ngwa a nva Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.
Á shi ki mi nka sha re ki trru rencwi. Á shi ki cwe we cwe we cwe, he̱rri wé̱ ki yhwe̱. Me̱di a ri ci rotu wetsie̱ we̱ deze nce.”
Wire Yakubu ngbe Yohana, rewe Zebedi, mbe e̱ be nwie Jesu, mbe e̱ he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, kusu nzhi ce̱ he ngwe̱ ning nyi kya ne nzhi shi re rinng ne̱.”
Ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nda ne nyi ce̱ he n ning nying nna?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Nde a zhe ne ngwe̱ ri srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ ngwe̱ ne ngu bi grime̱, ya nzhi re srra a nva nyye ngwe̱, ya we̱ srra a nva mie ngwe̱.”

Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Ko nyi hu kya ne nyi rin ne̱ we̱. Nyi e̱ hung shwe kwrreshi cinci ne nje shi shweng nna aa? Nyi e̱ hung yaa rwe ngbe ré níng nyi batisma shi zhwe batisma ne e shi ning nying nna aa?”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Ee, nzhi e̱ hung nying.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Cence nyi ri shwe kwrreshi ne nje shi shweng, á ri bra níng nyi batisma shi zhwe batisma ne e shi ning nying ne̱ ma.
Me̱di nkang srra a nva nyye ka nva mie nje, ko nyi nje ne nje ngwá we̱. Rewie ne̱ nyi ngge nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi aha mbe.”
A zhe ne kpi nné zhwe Jesu shwa ana mbe ya ho ni, mbe e̱ ci rehwie dzio ne Yakubu ngbe Yohana.
Jesu we ye gbengbe mbe ngu a he, “Nyi hu he nné mbe ne e we hu he á nyi nggwé̱ nné tsi ngwie̱ ngbe nnencwueé mbe e̱ á ye ringgwe̱ a zete mbe ne igbe̱.
Shi de̱ re shi ni a yarri nyi we̱. Nde ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ hwie̱ brrabrrang a tsi nyi re hwie̱ hwie.
Ko nye̱ ngu ce̱ hwie̱ nnencwuee, se re hwie̱ hwie ko nye̱.
Aha ko ngbe Kowe Nneywi e̱ ma koo be he ré ki nyi cwuo we̱, me̱di aha ngu nyi nneywí cwuo, ngu bra ngwa ce ngu aha ngu ning se̱ nneywí piriri.”

Mbe e̱ ya cwu a Jerriko. A zhe ne Jesu shi ne̱ ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu ngbe ne rigwe̱ nné ne mbe shi ngbe mbe, á she ya nnencwue̱ ne e ki ye he Barrtimawu, ewe Timawu, ne ngu nyi nne ce̱ ankya. A shi srra a rekyi rê.
Zhe ne ngu ho he nyi Jesu nne Nazarra, ngu a ne̱ ne ki kyie̱ nwie he, “Jesu! Kowe Dooda! Ri naana nje!”
Jie̱ mbe ne̱ ne ki trru ne ren he re ci cereng, me̱di aa ning bra kyie̱ onu he, “Kowe Dooda, ri naana nje!”
Jesu hwie̱ yo, ngu a he, “Nyi ki ye.”
Ngbe mbe e̱ ki ye, á he ne ngu he, “De̱ ngwe̱ dzio ehwie we̱, deze, Jesu re ye.”
Ngu a zhwu kuntu ngu be, ngu a wre̱ ne deze re be nwie Jesu.
Jesu ki rinng he, “Nyi nda ngwe̱ ce̱ he n re nying nna?” Nnencwue̱ nna ngu a he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nje ce̱ ri ewie.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ywa, sa rie ngwe̱ re kyia.” We zhe ana ngu a ne̱ ne ri ewie, ngu a kpe rê nwie zhwe Jesu ma.
A zhe ne mbe cwo re ya wre̱ a Urrushelima, dudu ne Betefaji ngbe Betani a Rugu Bi Rekwe Rihwie̱n, Jesu a te yá nnenté ngu wehwie.
A he ne mbe he, “Nyi ywa a nkla ne ngu shi a ncwuee ana. We ne nyi shi ngwie we ngwie, nyi e̱ ri ya ewe nze̱e̱kyi ne e rwe miimi, ne ko ya nne sa ning ngra we̱. Nyi ki bī nyi be mi he.
Kundu ya nne ri níng rinng he, ‘Nyi nda nyi shi nwie nying ne̱?’ Nyi ki ting he, ‘Brrabe̱ ce̱ ning nyi cwuo mi, a bra shi ning brru mi we zhe ne ne̱.’ ”
Á ywa, á ya she ya ewe nze̱e̱kyi a ci nkyie a nu brra rê ne e ki rwe dudu ne onusinye ya eri. A zhe ne mbe shi bing,
yá nné ne mbe shi yo miimi mbe e̱ we rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci e̱e̱? Nyi shi bi ewe nze̱e̱kyi ana aha nda a?”
Mbe e̱ we shing ye̱ye̱rri shi ne Jesu ngu ri we ting, ngbe nné nna mbe e̱ we we re ne̱ mi.
A zhe ne mbe ya wre̱ mi ne ewe nze̱e̱kyi nna a nwie Jesu, mbe e̱ ning ta re-ankya ci rwe̱ mbe a zeteng. Jesu a ning ngra.
Nneywí we yang á ta re-ankya ci rwe̱ mbe a rê, yá kprre nva rekwe bi rohun á ta rê.
Yá mbe cwo a ncwuee, yá mbe e̱ zhwe a merin re kyie̱ he,
“Hosanna!
Mwo rina Be̱ne̱ nyi na nne nke
ne ngu be a yarri lo Brrabe̱!
Mwo rina shi a ringgwe̱ be̱ nzhi Dooda
ne ngu cwo be!
Hosanna re nzhi nwie Be̱ne̱ a zeteng!”
Jesu ngwie Urrushelima, ngu a ywa a Brranyi. Ngu a yo gbinnng nwie ri ko nda. Me̱di tu ne ne̱ yhwe̱, ngu a wru re nzhi a Betani ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu wehwie.
Á shwo a tu ne ngu ning zhweng ne mbe wru a Betani, nzhwo yhwe̱ Jesu.

We ze̱nze̱ ngu a ri ekwe riyhwietsie ne rohun ki ku, ngu a ne̱ re nzhi dudu ka ngu ya she a ning bi gbre. Me̱di zhe ne ngu ya cwu nwie nna, koo ya she ko yankya we̱ se we rohun, aha ko zheng ci ngbre ngu ci we̱.
Ngu a he ne ekwe nna he, “He̱rri tiya koó bra shi ye gbre ngwe̱ wa we̱!” Nné ki zhwe ngu a á ho kya ne ngu he.

A zhe ne mbe ya cwu a Urrushelima, Jesu ngwie a agrraa Brranyi, ngu a ne̱ ne yu nné ne mbe shi rie̱ ankya rehwe ngbe nné ne mbe shi sing. Aa ywrru re-tebrru nné ne mbe shi bra ncwé̱ ngbe re-benci nné rie̱ re-vie̱kye̱.
Koo we ya nne re wara ne yankya a yarri agrraa Brranyi wa we̱.
Ngu a we mie̱ nka nwie he, “Á wie he:
‘Á ri ye zonggru nje he zonggrung ku Be̱ne̱,
aha nneywí a re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo.’
Me̱di nyi ki ci aa hwie̱ brra uugoo nné nca.”
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka ne mbe ho ni, á ci owu ngu, aha aa ve lo a nyyi nneywí zhwozhwo ne re-nka ngu mie̱, á ne̱ ne kre re-rê ngbe mbe ki yhwe̱.
A zhe ne ne̱hin ngu ci, mbe e̱ wru a ngwie̱ nna.
A mincwe, a zhe ne mbe shi wara, mbe e̱ ri ekwe riyhwietsie ana ngu hwe he̱rri re nzhi cwu rinyieng.
Pita lu ne kya ngu i ci shi rwi, ngu a he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, ri we̱! Ekwe riyhwietsie ne ngwe̱ i ki yhwire ana nyi nke ngu hwe ne̱!”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nyi sa rie a Be̱ne̱.

Nje níng ting cence, kundu ko nye̱ ngu he ne rugu ne̱ he, ‘Nga, ngwe̱ ya kpe a nzhwo rishi,’ we̱sa ne ngu nyi jinji a yarri hwie ngu, me̱di ngu shi he kya ne ngu he e̱ shi ci ni, wé̱ ki nying shi kya ne ngu he.
Aha nii, nje níng ting, ko nda ne nyi rin a zhe ne nyi shi ku Be̱ne̱, nyi sa rie he nyi she, ngbe wé̱ níng ngwa ko nda ne nyi rin.
A zhe ne ngwe̱ deze ngwe̱ shi nwie ku Be̱ne̱, kundu ngwe̱ bro ya gimbe ngwe̱ hwie, ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu, aha Be̱ ngwe̱ ne ngu shi zinye̱ re re we e̱ngwie̱ ne ngwe̱ nyi ma. [
Ma kundu de̱ ngwe̱ we kpi re-gimbe ngwe̱ re-e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe re nying we̱, ko shi Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi zinye̱ re re we re-e̱ngwie̱ ne ngwe̱ nyi ma we̱.”]
Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu ya wre̱ a Urrushelima wa, a zhe ne Jesu ngu shi ciee a agrraa Brranyi, nggwé̱ re-prristi, ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka ngbe brrá nné á be nwie ngu.
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ she de̱me̱ ne ngwe̱ ning nyi re-cwuo ne̱ a he? Nyi nye̱ ngu re ngwa de̱me̱ ngwe̱ ning nyi re-cwuo ne̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nje shi ning rin ya nka zunzrru ma. Nyi ning shing, wire ma n níng ting ka nyi zohu de̱me̱ ne nje ning nyi re-cwuo ne̱ ye̱.
De̱me̱ ne Yohana ngu i ning nyi batisma wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ka nwie nneywí? Nyi ning shing!”
Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne yaa ti ronu ce we nci mbe nwie he, “Kundu nzhi ri he he i wru zinye̱, we̱ níng rinng he, ‘Ma nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nzhi shî nka ngu we̱ e̱ ye̱?’
Me̱di kundu nzhi he he wru nwie nneywí wa rre.” (Á bra to owu nneywí aha ko nye̱ i fo Yohana a nu nne ti re̱se̱ng cence.)
Aha nii, mbe e̱ he ne Jesu he, “Ko nzhi hu we̱.” Jesu a he ne mbe ma he, “Ko nje shi ning ting ka nyi nye̱ ngu ning ngwa de̱me̱ ne nje ning nyi re-cwuo ne̱ ma we̱.”

Jesu a ne̱ ne we he nka zhwebe he, “Ya nne kye̱ inebi a yarri nhwie̱n ngu, ngu a no garru ngu a ning grrang. Ngu a kwe̱ ewieng yhwi ngbre inebi nna a kprahwan, ngu a no eri dede nang cwo nhwie̱n nna. Wire ngu a ko re-lebrra ré srra re ki nyi cwuo a nhwie̱n inebi nna, ngu a nyi ciee.
Zheng kpi ngbre inebi nna ci, ngu a lu ya hwie ngu re nzhi nwie re-lebrra ne mbe nyi cwuo a nhwie̱n nna ngbe ré ya ki ngwa yá ngbre inebi nna.
Me̱di re-lebrra ki pie, á ki cwe, á ki yu, he̱rri aa ne̱ ne nva hwerri.
Ngu a cinga te yaka hwie ngu wa, á ya ki rwi rici, mbe e̱ ki ngwa cinci he̱rri ki ci nshwu.
He̱rri ne cwu, aa te yaka wa, mbe e̱ ya ki yhwe̱. Gbengbe ni, ngu a te kpi mbe we gba, á ya cwe kpi á yhwi kpi mbe.
“Aa ya hwie̱ we nne zunzrru ngbe re ki te; a bra nyi Kowe ce̱ ngu. Aa ki te a ngrangrang, a he, ‘Ket, ko wé̱ ya to riyii ewe nje ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?’
“Me̱di re-lebrra nna á ne̱ ne he we nci mbe he, ‘Yowe̱e̱! Nyi ri nne se̱ va ngu a nyi nke. Nyi ning be nzhi ki yhwe̱, ngbe gado nna re hwie̱ ngge nzhi!’
Mbe e̱ pie ewe nna mbe e̱ ki yhwe̱, mbe e̱ zhwu kwe nna a teme garru nhwie̱n nna.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi hwie he nne bi nhwie̱n inebi ne̱ cwo a nyi rimi e̱? Ko nyi hwie he we̱ ya yhwi re-lebrra ne̱, we̱ fo cwuo nhwie̱n nna we̱ ngwa yaká nné we̱ e̱e̱?
‘Nje he ka nyi hwie krre̱de̱ e̱. Aha á wie he,
Ngbaatsie ne nné runo mbe ra
nyi ngu ngu hwie̱ te̱nte̱ ngbaatsie.
Nyi Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ngu nyi ni;
aa bra hwie̱ kyang nga onu a nyyi nzhi.’ ”
Nnencwueé nné Yahudi e̱ á ne̱ ne kre rê mbe pie Jesu aha ne mbe hu he a he re-nka ne̱ a rici mbe. Me̱di á bra to owu rigwe̱ nné. Aha nii, á ki we, mbe e̱ ne̱.
Á srra, nnencwueé nné Yahudi e̱ lu yá nné Farisi ngbe yá nné zhwe Hirridu re nzhi nwie Jesu ngbe ré ya ki pie a nti nka ngu.

Mbe e̱ be nwie ngu, mbe e̱ he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nzhi hu he ngwe̱ he we nka raywrra. Ko ngwe̱ to riyii nneywí we̱, aha ko ngwe̱ ci nkwile̱ ne grime̱ nneywi we̱ ka re bra nyi nye̱. Me̱di ngwe̱ mie̱ nneywí nka raywrra Be̱ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri. A ri ngwe̱, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré trra Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma gondu aa, nzhi trra ka de̱ nzhi trra we̱?”
Me̱di Jesu hu he nyi we nka igerri. Ngu a we rinng he, “Aha nda nyi ce̱ ning mwa ri e̱e̱? Nyi be mi ne ya cwe ncwe̱ nna ngbe n ri.”
Mbe e̱ be mi, ngu a we rinng he, “Nke e̱ nyi foto nye̱ ne̱? Nyi lo nye̱ ne e ning wieng ne̱?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Nyi Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma.”
Wire Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ngwa Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma kya ngu nyi na ngu, nyi bra ngwa Be̱ne̱ kya ngu nyi na Be̱ne̱.” Ga mbe zhwozhwo ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu ne re-nka ngu.
Wire nné Sadukyi ne mbe he ko bi deze nhu we̱ á be nwie Jesu nwie ki rin re-nka, á he,
“Nne Mie̱ Nka, Musa i ning wieng he, kundu gimbe ya nne hu we mbrru ngu we̱sa ne ewe, ngu nne nna we̱ fo kpambrru gimbe ngu a, aha re she rewe ne lo gimbe ngu.
A i bi yá re-gimbe komo natsie̱. Na ce̱ucwung fo mbrru, me̱di aa hu we̱sa she ewe.
Na hwie e̱ fo kpambrru nna ma, aa ma ya hu we̱sa ne ewe. Na tsie̱ ma ya nyi ni wa.
Zhwozhwo mbe nné natsie̱ ana ko bi ko ya mbe ngu she ewe ne kpambrru nna we̱. A ngrangrang zhwozhwo, mbrru nna ya hu ma.
Ma a ri he zheng deze nhu a ne mbe shi deze, ngu mbrru ne̱ ri nyi na nye̱ a tsi mbe e̱, ne ga mbe ngbe natsie̱ ana mbe nyi nyrra ne ngu aa?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ne̱ nyi brru aha riywe̱ hu krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne igbe̱ ngu?
A zhe ne nneywí ri deze nhu, ko ntó ri ko mbrrú ka mbrrú re drro re nzhi nyrra we̱, nneywí ri shi shi re-njeli zinye̱.
A nkang deze nhu, ko nyi hwie a yarri krre̱de̱ Musa a nka gbe̱e̱ ekwe ye lendo a we̱ e̱e̱? Be̱ne̱ i he ne ngu he, ‘Nje nyi Be̱ne̱ na Ibrrahin, ngbe Be̱ne̱ na Ishaku, ngbe Be̱ne̱ na Yakubu.’
Ko nyi Be̱ne̱ nkwe nné we̱, me̱di a nyi Be̱ne̱ nné nce. Nyi brru kpe̱kpe̱!”

Ya a zetsi nné mie̱ Nti Nka a be ya she ne mbe shi yaa kwa be ne re-nka. Ngu a ri ne Jesu ngu we shing ye̱ye̱rri, ngu a ki rinng he, “A tsi Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ ngu i ngwa Musa, a nyi zohu ngu nyi cwucwung nna?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Na ngu nyi cwucwung nna nyi nke: ‘Nyi ho, nyi nné Isrreela, Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi ne ngu nyi Brrabe̱, a shi zunzrru.
Ce̱ Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ngwe̱ ne ehwie ngwe̱ zhwozhwo, ne ce ngwe̱ zhwozhwo, ne hwie nka ngwe̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe ne igbe̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo.’
Na hwie nyi nke, ce̱ nne dudu ne ngwe̱ shi rici ngwe̱. Ko bi ya riti nka ne ngu ne̱ re-nke ne̱ we̱.”
Nne nna he ne Jesu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nka ngwe̱ e̱ bi rina, ngwe̱ he ye̱ye̱rri he Be̱ne̱ shi we zunzrru, ko bra bi ya we̱ se we ngu.

Ko nye̱ re ki ce̱ ne ehwie ngu zhwozhwo, ne hu re̱se̱ng ngu zhwozhwo, ne igbe̱ ngu zhwozhwo; ngbe re bra ce̱ nne dudu ne ngu shi rici ngu. Re-nke ne̱ á ne̱ ga re-ankya rehwe ne e shwí ngbe kpi re-teede zhwozhwo.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu zrre̱ aa ki shing ne zentsi, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ko ngwe̱ shi ze̱nze̱ ne Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
Kya ngu pie a zhe ana fa, ko bi ya ngu hung yaa rwe re ki rin ya nka wa we̱.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu shi mie̱ nka a agrraa Brranyi, ngu a rin he, “Á ce̱ rimi ne nné mie̱ Nti Nka mbe he Krristi e̱ nyi kowe Dooda aa?
Dooda we rici ngu a i he ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nshe Wiri ki ting he,
‘Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ he ne Brrabe̱ nje he:
Srra a nva nyye ngwe̱ ye ringgwe̱ ngbe nje,
se nje ci rwinkó ngwe̱ ré hwie̱ tahwie ngwe̱.’
Dooda we rici ngu a i ki ye he Brrabe̱. We̱ ce̱ rimi re bra nyi kowe ngu aa?” Brra ekpri nné nna á ho re-nka ngu ne ehwie kla.
A zhe ne Jesu shi we mie̱ nka, ngu a he, “Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne nné mie̱ Nti Nka. Á ce̱ he mbe grra ne brrá re-tago ne e we dzie re we ngwa grime̱ a re-kaawe̱.
Á bra kre re-te̱nte̱ rewieng srra a re zonggrung mwe ngbe ncwú na ne e sa aha brrá nné a rewie para.
Á shwe̱li kpambrrú a reri mbe re we ye ne le. Á ku Be̱ne̱ je̱je̱ aha re we ri. Zhwe nné ne̱ á ri we ngwa cinci kaka.”
Jesu srra be dudu ne ewie kyang si beeko a Brranyi ne nneywí mbe yaa zhwe re ning ci ncwe̱ a yarring. Nné bi ncwé̱ we yang á ning cing piriri.
Me̱di a bi ya kpambrru ne ngu nyi yiriywe̱ ngu be ma, aa ya ning tala ncwe kpirri kovo wehwie, ne ngu nyi we kovo zunzrru.
Jesu a ye nné ki zhwe ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nje níng ting cence, kpambrru bi riywe̱ ne̱ tala kya ne ngu ne̱ na ko nye̱ a yarri kyang ci beeko ana.
Aha ga mbe ne̱ á ti a tsi dukyie̱e̱ mbe ne ngu shi piriri á ngwa, me̱di ngu ne̱ a zetsi riywe̱ ngu aa ning tala e̱we̱ kya ne ngu bi zhwozhwo a srra ngu.”
A zhe ne Jesu shi wru Brranyi nna, ya a tsi nné ki zhwe ngu a he ne ngu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, ri zhwe ngbá ngbatsie ngbe zhwe re-runo mbe bi rina ne̱ we̱!”
Me̱di Jesu he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ ri zhwe brrá re-runo ne̱ e̱e̱? Ko bi ko ya ngbaatsie ne̱ ne e ri we a zete ya we̱, á ri we kro be zhwozhwo.”
A zhe ne Jesu shi srra a zete Rugu Rekwe Rihwie̱n a nyyi Brranyi, Pita, ngbe Yakubu, ngbe Yohana, ngbe Andrru mbe e̱ be ya ki rinng ranranng he,
“Níng ting, re-ankya ne ngwe̱ ning he nka ne̱ á rici a rekpe? Nyi nda nzhi ri di ngbe nzhi hu he zhe nna rikpa ci e̱?”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ shi de̱ ya nne re níng brra we̱.
Nné piriri ri be ne lo nje, ko nye̱ mbe we̱ he, ‘Nyi nje ne nje nyi Krristi,’ he̱rri wé̱ brra nneywí piriri.
A zhe ne nyi ri ho he á shi kwe̱ re-cwe ngbe re-nka cwe ne e he, shi de̱ nyi kpi roshwo hwie we̱. Aha se re-ankya ne̱ mbe ci, me̱di gamang rishi be.

Ya ngwie̱ ri ne̱ ne kwe̱ cwe ngbe ne ya ngwie̱. Ya ringgwe̱ ri kwe̱ ngbe ya ringgwe̱. A ri bi re-ngwie̱gbe̱ a rewie kanka kanka, ngbe nzhwo. Re-nke ne̱ á nyi we ce̱ucwung shi shi rwe̱ wie zheng bî ewe.

“Me̱di se nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nci nyi. Á ri níng ngwa a nva nné nyi nka, he̱rri wé̱ níng cwe we cwe we cwe a re-zonggrung mwe. Aha nyi shî nka nje, nyi ri yo a nyyi re-goona ngbe nggwé̱, a ri níng ngwa riwie̱ ngbe nyi hwie̱ sheede nje a nwie mbe.
Me̱di se nyi ke̱she brro Nka Rina a ko zohu ngwie̱ wire krrucing we̱ be.

A zhe ne e ri níng prre ne e be mi ne nyi aha ré níng nyi nka, shi de̱ nyi bē he ka nyi shi he rimi e̱ we̱. Me̱di nyi ri he we kya ne e níng ngwa a zhe ana, aha ko nyi nyi ne nyi ri shi nka we̱, a nyi Nshe Wiri ngu ri níng ti kya he.
Gimbe ri ngwa gimbe ngu ré ki yhwe̱, be̱ ri ngwa ewe ngu ni wa, e̱we̱e̱ rewe ri ne̱ ne klo nci he̱rri ré ngwa re-be̱ ngbe dé̱ mbe ré we yhwi.
Ko nye̱ ri níng ra aha nje, me̱di nne ne ngu ri yo gangga re nzhi cwu gamang we̱ ri drre̱.
“Kundu nyi ri ri nyrrukiki kya le̱le̱ na dzio ewie a nwie ne ko ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri we̱,
Shi de̱ nne ne ngu ri shi a zete zonggru re cwucwu ka re ngwie ri he ngu ya fo yankya we̱.
Shi de̱ nne nke ne ngu ri shi yi re ning brru re nzhi ri aha ngu ya fo kuntu ngu we̱.
Á ri he rotu ana, wuhu ne mbrrú bi rehwie ngbe re-na mbe ri bi rewe shwo.
Nyi ku Be̱ne̱ shi de̱ re ya ci a zhe nze ngbe wusrru we̱,
aha a ri nyi rotu ge̱zhe̱ zhwe na ne koó sa nying we̱ tu ce̱ucwung ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i nyi ebe ngwie̱ re be cwu zhe ne ne̱, koó bra bi nying wa we̱.
Kundu de̱ Brrabe̱ ra ve rotu nna tsa we̱, koo ra bi ko ya nne ngu ri drre̱ we̱. Me̱di aha nné ngu ne ngu kyie, aa ve rotu nna we gyiegyie.
“A zhe ana kundu ya nne he ne ngwe̱ he, ‘Ri, Krristi nna nyi nke,’ ka re bra he, ‘Ri, nyi ngu ncwi!’ Shi de̱ nyi shî we̱.

Aha re-Krristi rabrra ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra ri kpi ci nwie nyi ngbá re-sheede ngbe re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu aha he ka mbe rā hung brra nné ne Be̱ne̱ we kyie — me̱di ko shi ré hung we she we̱.
Aha nii, nyi nyi te̱nte̱, nje ke̱nce̱ níng ti ko nda ne zhe nna rishi ci.
“Me̱di á ri he rotu ana, a zhe ne ge̱zhe̱ nna ri wara,
á ri bra ne̱ re ci we e̱ ywing,
ko yhwe̱ ri bra tsie̱ nse̱ ngu we̱,
Re̱nde̱ zinye̱ ri kpi be,
á bra ri gbe̱ ngbá re-ankya ne mbe shi zinye̱.
“Wire wé̱ ri Kowe Nneywi ngu wru ngu cwo be a yarri inyie̱ ne igbe̱ we yang ngbe grime̱.
A ri te re-njeli ngu ré tsu nné ne ngu kyie a ko zohu hwrre̱ a be ngwie̱, kya ngu ce̱ a gama ebe ngwie̱ re nzhi gama zinye̱.
“Nyi mie̱ yankya a nwie ekwe riyhwietsie. We zhe ne ngu wru mi ne nva hwi, ne ngu klu rohun brrubrru, nyi e̱ hu he zhe rikwi be dudu.
Aha nii, zhe ne nyi ri ri re-ankya ne̱ mbe ne̱ ne ci ni, nyi hu he koo hwie̱ gbong we̱, a shi gbundu.
Nje níng ting cence he ko nné nze̱ ne̱ á shi kwi yhwe̱ we̱ se re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo mbe ci.
Zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱ shi yhwe̱, me̱di ko nti nka nje bi ci shweni we̱.
“Ko bi ko ya nne, ka ya njeli a zinye̱ ne ngu hu otu ana, ka zhe nna we̱, ngbe ne ngu Kowe e̱ ma, se we Be̱ nggaa ngu.
Nyi ci nkwile̱! Nyi srrante! Aha ko nyi hu zhe ne nje ri ning be we̱.
A ri shi shi nne ne ngu shi nyi ciee. A zhe ne ngu shi wru, we̱ we eri ngu a nva hwié ngu, we̱ we ko nye̱ ne cwuo ngu, wire we̱ he ne nne cwo eri re srrante.
“Aha nii, nyi srrante aha ko nyi hu zhe ne be̱ri eri e̱ ngu cwo a ning brru we̱, ka nyi ne̱hin, ka nyi tsi totu, ka zhe ne gba ngu tsie̱, ka a mincwe.
Kundu ngu ya wre̱ kprikpri, shi de̱ re ya re she ngwe̱ shi ndzie we̱.
Kya ne nje ning heng, nje he ko nye̱ng. Nyi srrante!”
A zhe ne Bikyi Paska ngbe Para Brredi We̱sa Yisi hwie̱ we rotu wehwie, nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie Nti Nka a ne̱ ne kre re-rê ngbe mbe ning pie Jesu mbe ki yhwe̱.
Me̱di mbe e̱ bra he, he ko shi nyi a rotu para ne̱ we̱ kishi nneywí ri ne̱ ne kwe̱ ngbe mbe.
A zhe ne Jesu shi a Betani ne ngu shi ye yâ a ri ya nne ne e ki ye he Sima Nne Ruhunzhwe̱, ya mbrru a nyi mi ne oshwo
Yá mbe ne mbe shi a miimi mbe e̱ ne̱ ne krro re-nka we nci mbe nwie he, “Aha nda ne mbrru ne̱ ngu dzio turraren ne̱ we dede he ni e̱?
Wé̱ hung rie̱ng a nu ncwe̱ denarri nnywa wetsie̱.
Me̱di Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nyi ki we mwa yi ngu, aha nda nyi ki me̱ ni e̱e̱? Aa ning nyi kya rina.
Yiriywé̱ e̱ á shi ngbe ne nyi ko zohu zhe, nyi e̱ hung we sheng ko zohu zhe ne nyi ce̱. Me̱di ko nyi shi shi ngbe nje ko zohu zhe we̱.
Aa nyi kya ne ngu hung nying. Aa ke̱nce̱ ning kro turraren ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri shi ne e ri ning krong a zhe ne e shi ning nyie̱.
Nje níng ting cence, ko he ne e ri ning brro Nka Rina ne̱ a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo, á ri ti kya ne ngu nyi ne̱ aha ré lu ne ngu.”
Wire Yahuda Iskarriyoti ne ngu nyi ya a tsi nné zhwe Jesu shwa ne otu wehwie e̱ ne̱ re nzhi nwie nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe ngu we rie̱ Jesu.
Á ho shwi kya ne ngu he ne mbe, mbe e̱ sa jee he mbe shi ki ngwa ncwe̱. Ngu a ne̱ ne kre riwie̱ ne ngu shi we ngwa ngu.
A otu ce̱ucwung na Para Brredi We̱sa Yisi, ne ngu nyi otung ca canvé na Teede Paska, nné zhwe Jesu á ki rinng he, “Nyi he ne ngwe̱ ce̱ he nzhi ya re nyi yâ Para Paska a?”
Ngu a te nné wehwie a tsi nné ki zhwe ngu. A he ne mbe he, “Nyi ngwie a ngwie̱ Urrushelima, ya nne ne ngu kpe gure rishi cwo a nyi ne nyi. Nyi ki zhwe.
Nyi e̱ he ne be̱ri eri ne ngu shi ning ngwie he, ‘Nne Mie̱ Nka rin he zonggru nné ice ne ngu cwo a ning ye yâ Para Paska ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a shi he?’
We̱ níng ti ya brra zonggru zeteng, ne e níng ta ankya. Nyi nyi ko nda a miimi aha nzhi.”
Nnenté nna á ne̱, á ya ngwie a ngwie̱ nna, á she ko nda ye̱ye̱rri shi ne Jesu ngu we ting. Mbe e̱ nyi yâ Para nna a miimi.
A zhe ne ne̱ ngu kpe be, Jesu a ya wre̱ ri nna ngbe kpi nné ki zhwe ngu shwa, á mwe á ci shwa ne otu wehwie.
A zhe ne mbe shi ye yâ a tebrru, Jesu a he, “Nje níng ting cence, ya a tsi nyi ne̱ shi ning rie̱, nyi ngu ne ngu shi ye yâ ngbe nje.”
Á ne̱ ne bē, ko nye̱ mbe ne̱ ne ki rinng he, “A nyi nje e̱e̱?”
Ngbe we̱ he ne mbe he, “A nyi ya a tsi nyi nné shwa ne otu wehwie ne̱, a nyi ngu ne ngu shi nwie ci va a enjie ngbe nje.
Kowe nneywi e̱ shi hu we shi ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ngu he shi hu. Me̱di wuhu ne nne ana ne ngu rie̱ Kowe Nneywi! Canca koó ra ki bî ma gung we̱.”
A zhe ne mbe shi ye yâ, Jesu a fo brredi, ngu a ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ngu a hwin ngu a we kye̱ng, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi níng ge, nke ne̱ nyi rwe̱ nje.”
Wire ngu a fo kwrreshi rishi ruto, ngu a ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng ngu a we ngwa, ngbe mbe e̱ shwe zhwozhwo mbe.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nke ne̱ nyi roshwo nje na jee Be̱ne̱, ne e wa aha nneywí piriri.
Nje níng ting cence, ko nje bra bi shwe rishi ruto ne̱ wa wo, se tuuye ne nje ri shwe hwihwing a yarri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Mbe e̱ ve ve, wire mbe e̱ wru zhwozhwo mbe re nzhi Rugu Rekwe Rihwie̱n.
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi shi to nyi ning we.
Me̱di zhe ne nje ri deze nhu, nje ri ke̱she nyi n ywa a Galili.”
Pita a wre̱ he ne ngu he, “Ko ngbe ne ga mbe zhwozhwo mbe shi kpi, nje nna ko nje shi kpe we̱.”
Jesu ki shing he, “Nje re ting cence, a totu cwu ne̱ ne gba ngu rishi tsie̱ ce hwie, ngwe̱ ne̱ we rici ngwe̱ ngwe̱ shi klo he ko ngwe̱ ning hu we̱ he̱rri ce tsie̱.”
Me̱di Pita ke̱ we ne wrre̱ we wrre̱ nwie he, “Ko ngbe ne nje shi hu ngbe ngwe̱, ko shi n klo we̱ rraa.”
Ga mbe zhwozhwo he we ni ma.
Á be ya ewie ne e ki ye he Jesemani, Jesu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Nyi srra he ngbe n ya ku Be̱ne̱.”
Ngu a fo Pita, ngbe Yakubu, ngbe Yohana, mbe e̱ ne̱ gbengbe, ngu a ne̱ ne bē we yang.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ehwie dzio nje a zhe ne ne̱ he̱rri we̱ hu ning ci n hu. Nyi hwie̱ he, shi de̱ nyi ne̱ ndzie we̱.”
A zhe ne ngu shwo we tsie̱ re nzhi ncwuee, ngu a hu be nwie ku Be̱ne̱ he shi de̱ rā bi zhe ge̱zhe̱ ne̱ we̱.

Ngu a he a zhe nka mbe he, “Abba, Be̱! Ko bi ko yankya ne ngu bi rwe̱ a nwie ngwe̱ we̱. Shi ngwe̱ rā ning fo kwrreshi cinci ne̱, Gbengbe ni ma, de̱ re nyi kya ce̱ nje wo, me̱di re nyi kya ce̱ ngwe̱.”
Ngu a ning brru re be nwie nné ki zhwe ngu wetsie̱ ana, aa ya she mbe shi ndzie. Ngu a he ne Pita he, “Sima, ngwe̱ shi ndzie e̱e̱? Ko shi ngwe̱ hung srrante he̱rri awa zunzrru we̱ e̱e̱?
Nyi srrante ngbe nyi ku Be̱ne̱ kishi nyi ri kpe a zhe ne mwa ri ngu be. Nje hu a yarri rehwie nyi, nyi ce̱; me̱di a igbe̱ na ikpe rwe̱ nyi shi brrubrru.”
Aa ning brru ne̱ re nzhi ku Be̱ne̱ shi na ce̱ucwung wa.
A zhe ne ngu ya ning brru, aa ya we she ne mbe shi ndzie wa, aha nyyi mbe shwo. Koó bra hu kya mbe ki heng we̱.
A zhe ne ngu ywa na tsie̱ ngu ya ning brru, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ke̱ we ne shi ndzie re srra cwu aa? Aa be ni! Zhe e̱ ci. Nyi ri, á shi rie̱ Kowe Nneywi a nva nné e̱ngwie̱.
Nyi cinye̱ nzhi ne̱! Ri nne ning rie̱ e̱ nyi nke ngu cwo re be dudu ne!”

We zhe ne ngu shi nka, Yahuda ne ngu nyi ya a tsi nné ki zhwe shwa ne otu wehwie e̱ ya wre̱. Aa be ngbe rigwe̱ nné ne mbe bró re-ise̱nkeli ngbe ngbó, ne nggwé̱ re-prristi, ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka, ngbe brrá nné Yahudi mbe we te.
Á ri ma ne ngu Yahuda a ke̱she we ting he, “Nne ne nyi ri ri nje ki me ushwo, maahu nyi ngu. Nyi ki pie nyi ne̱ ne ngu shi nyi nne gyiaa.”
We ne Yahuda ngu ya wre̱, ngu a wre̱ ne ywa nwie Jesu, ngu a he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka!” Ngu a ki me ushwo.
Nné nna mbe e̱ pie Jesu, mbe e̱ ki rrwe ne igbe̱.
Me̱di ya a tsi nné mbe ne mbe shi yo miimi fie̱ ise̱nkeli, ngu a ning tsa uucwu hwie Brra Prristi he̱rri aa ki kpo uucwu nna.
Jesu bra nka a he ne mbe he, “Nje nyi nne nca aa, ne nyi be ning pie ne re-ise̱nkeli ngbe ngbo aa?
Ko zohu otu nje shi ngbe ne nyi nwie mie̱ nka a yarri Brranyi, me̱di ko nyi ning pie we̱. Me̱di se kya ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he re ci ye̱ye̱rri ni.”
Wire ga nné ki zhwe ngu á to ki we fa.
A bi ya e̱we̱ nze̱we ne ngu ri shi zhwe Jesu ngbe̱we̱ng me̱di ngu yaa ku ne trro lili. A zhe ne e shi ki pie,
ngu a we we trro nna ngu a to ngbe̱we̱ng.
Á be ne Jesu nwie Brra Prristi; ngbe rotsu nggwé̱ re-prristi, ngbe brrá nné, ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka á ya mwe miimi.
Pita cwo re ki zhwe ze̱nze̱, he̱rri aa ya cwu a tese ri Brra Prristi nna. Ngu a srra be nwie wi ro ngbe nné cwo Brranyi.
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe Rotsu Brrá Nné zhwozhwo á ne̱ ne kre ya sheede mbe ning ci Jesu nka aha mbe ki yhwe̱, me̱di koó she ko yankya na mbe hung ki ci nka we̱.
Jie̱ mbe ca we re-rabrra a zete ngu, me̱di ko re-nka mbe e̱ she ngwie we̱.
Yá mbe e̱ deze nwie ngwa re-sheede rabrra a rici ngu he,
“Nzhi ho ngu he he ngu shi gu Brranyi ne nneywí mbe no ne̱, ngbe ngu no yaka a yarri rotu wetsie̱, ne ko ngu nyi runo va nneywi we̱.”
He̱rri ne cwu ko sheede rabrra mbe e̱ she ngwie we̱.
Brra Prristi e̱ deze a nyyi mbe ngu a rin Jesu he, “Ko ngwe̱ shi he ya nka we̱ e̱e̱? Ko ngwe̱ ho re-sheede ne mbe he a rici ngwe̱ ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?”
Gbengbe ni, Jesu srra cereng, koo bra ko ya riti nka we̱. Brra Prristi ki rinng wawa he, “Nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Krristi, ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱ Bi Grime̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu a he “Nyi nje ne nje nyi ngu. Nyi ri ri Kowe Nneywi ngu srra a nva nyye Be̱ne̱ Bi Igbe̱ Re Ne̱ Zhwozhwo ne ngu wró a re-inyie̱ zinye̱ re be.”
Brra Prristi e̱ hla tago ngu, ngu a he, “Kyei, nzhi bra te zohu sheede wa?”
“Nyi ho zhwe nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ngu he ne̱. Ma nyi hwie nzhi nyi rimi?”
Ga mbe zhwozhwo mbe e̱ kara he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ki yhwe̱.”
Yá mbe ne̱ ne ki trru rencwi, á ki ku riyii ne vatrro nwie ki ta ne va ré he, “Níng ting, nyi nye̱ ngu re rwi.” Nné cwo Brranyi e̱ ne̱ ne ngu nwie ki cwe.
A zhe ne Pita shi a tese ri nna, ya ewenancwuo a ri Brra Prristi e̱ be.
A zhe ne ngu ya she Pita ngu shi wi ro, ngu a ki ri gbinnng, ngu a he, “Ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ ri shi ngbe ne Jesu Nne Nazarra ana ma.”
Me̱di a klo, he̱rri a he, “Ko nje ki hu we̱, ko nje hu ngbe kya ne ngwe̱ he ne̱ we̱.” Ngu a ne̱ ne ciee re nzhi nu ri nna. [Gba a wre̱ ne tsie̱.]
Zhe ne ewena nna ki ri a miimi wa, ngu a ne̱ ne ti nné ne mbe shi yo miimi he, “Ngu ne̱ nyi ya mbe!”
Me̱di Pita klo wa.
Á srra we tsie̱, nné ne mbe shi yo dudu mbe e̱ he ne Pita he, “Cence, ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ nyi ya mbe, aha ngwe̱ nyi nne Galili.”
Ngu a ne̱ ne shí nwie he ne mbe he, “Cence, kundu nje ri hu nne ne nyi ning he nka ne̱, nde yankya re ning she!”

We zhe ana gba a tsie̱ na hwie. Wire Pita lu ne re-nka ne Jesu ngu ki heng he, “Ne gba ngu rishi tsie̱ ce hwie, ngwe̱ shi klo ce tsie̱ he ko ngwe̱ ning hu we̱.” Ehwie ngu rro we yang ngu a ku we ku we ku.
A brra mincwe we hwiehwie, nggwé̱ re-prristi, ngbe brrá nné, ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka — Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi zhwozhwo, á ya mwe mbe e̱ rwe nka. Á rrwe Jesu, mbe e̱ ki kwa re nzhi ngwa Bilatu.
Bilatu ki rinng he, “A nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi nggwe̱ nné Yahudi e̱e̱?”
Jesu ki shing he, “Ye̱ye̱rri ne ngwe̱ he.”
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ki ci re-nka we yang.
Aha ni Bilatu a ki rinng wa he, “Ko ngwe̱ shi shing we̱ e̱e̱? Ko ngwe̱ ho re-nka ne e shi heng a rici ngwe̱ ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?”
He̱rri ne cwu ko Jesu bra ko ya nka we̱, Bilatu hwie̱ nga we onu.
A ko zohu zhe Teede Paska, Bilatu ning mrrang ne ngu cire ya nne gyiaa na ne nneywí mbe kyie.
A zhe ana a bi ya nne ne e ki ye he Barraba ne i ki she̱ a uucwu gyiaa ngbe yá nné ne mbe i ci ko aha ne mbe ce̱ ti ringgwe̱ nné Rroma, he̱rri á yhwe̱ nne.
Brra ekpri nneywí e̱ be nyyi Bilatu nwie ki rinng he re we cire ya nne gyiaa shi ne ngu ning mrrang.
Bilatu a we rinng he, “Nyi ce̱ he n ning cire nggwe̱ nné Yahudi e̱e̱?”
Aa hu re̱se̱ng he nggwé̱ re-prristi e̱ á pie Jesu be mi ne ngu ana we aha ehwie shwo.
Me̱di nggwé̱ re-prristi e̱ á cwua nneywí we yang he ré me̱ Bilatu ngbe re cire Barraba.
Bilatu a cinga we rinng wa, a he ne mbe he, “Ma a zhe ne ne̱ nyi ce̱ he n nyi rimi ne nne nyi ki ye he nggwe̱ nné Yahudi ne̱?”
Mbe e̱ kro re̱zhe̱ nwie he, “Ki ci gasankwe!”
Bilatu a we rinng he, “Aha nda? Nyi zohu e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu nyi?”
Gbengbe ni, á ning bra kyie̱ ronu nwie he, “Ki ci gasankwe.”
Me̱di Bilatu ce̱ we kla ehwie, ngu a we cire Barraba. Ngu a ci á cwe Jesu, wire ngu a we ngwa ré ki ci gasankwe.
Re-shezhi ne̱ mi ne Jesu re nzhi a tese brra eri goona, a nwie ne mbe ki ye he Prretoriya
Á ki ci ya brra tago shi na nggwé̱,
Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ki be̱ lo nwie he, “Hooo, ce ngwe̱ re ywa gbong, nggwe̱ nné Yahudi!”
Á ki cwe we cwe we cwe ne ngbo a rici nwie ki trru rencwi. He̱rri á hú be ne cwuhu nwie ki dzie re ki ci grime̱ nhile̱ nhile̱.
A zhe ne mbe ki yarra yhwe̱ fa, mbe e̱ ki ti brra tago nna, mbe e̱ ki ci na ngu. Wire mbe e̱ wru ne ngu re nzhi ki ci gasankwe.
A zhe ne mbe shi rê, mbe e̱ ya nyi ne Sima, nne Kurani, ne ngu nyi be̱ Alezanda ngbe Rrufu, ne ngu wru we ciee ngu a nva yi. Á ki ci ne ce he se re fo gasankwe nna.
Á be mi ne Jesu a nwie ne e ki ye he Golgota (Ne maana nna ngu nyi “Ewie Iigre Rici”).
Á ki ngwa ya rishi ruto ne e ki krre ne ya rikye̱ ne e ki ye he murru
Wire á ki ci gasankwe. Mbe e̱ nyi aaca ne tago ngu ngbe mbe ri ka nyi nye̱ ngu shi she ga zohu ye̱ aha mbe yaa kyeng.
A ncwe̱ krruvaya na mincwe, á ki ci gasankwe.
Mbe e̱ wie kya ne mbe he aa nyi a klankwe he:
A bra bi yá nné nca wehwie ne e we ci gasankwe ngbe ngu, ya a nva nyye ya a nva mie ngu. [
Aha ni Nti Nka Brrabe̱ e̱ ci rrurru shi ne i wie he, “Á ki hwie a tsi nné e̱ngwie̱.”]
Nné ne mbe warra á ki ri re ki ta re-nka me̱nkye̱ ré he ne ngu he, “Hooo! Ngwe̱ ne ngu shi gu Brranyi ngu bra no yaka a rotu wetsie̱!
Ma yaa kyia we rici ngwe̱ ngbe ngwe̱ cwucwu a gasankwe e̱ shi!”
He̱rri ngbe nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka á ne̱ ne ki ca ne ruto nwie he, “Aa kyia yá, me̱di koo hung kyia rici ngu we̱!
Nde Krristi ne̱ ne ngu nyi nggwe̱ nné Isrreela ne̱ re cwucwu a gasankwe ne̱ we zhe ne ne̱ ngbe nzhi ri, nzhi bra shî he nyi ngu.”
Nné mbe ne e we ci a gasankwe ngbe ne ngu a á ne̱ ne ki ca ne ruto ma.
A zhe ne ne̱ ngu ya cwucwu, ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo a ci ywing he̱rri re nzhi cwu a ncwe̱ wetsie̱ na ne̱hin.
A ncwe̱ wetsie̱ ana, Jesu a ci ye ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he,
A zhe ne yá ne mbe shi yo dudu a miimi e̱ mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ he, “Nyi ho we̱, a shi nwie kyie̱ Iliya!”
Ya mbe e̱ wre̱ ne ne̱ ne ncii, aa ya shwe̱ soso a rishi seerre, aa ki rwe a ngbo, ngu a na re be nwie onu Jesu he re shwe. Ngu a he, “Nde nzhi ri ka Iliya a cwo be re ya ki cwucwu a miimi e̱.”
Jesu ci ye ne brra riwie̱ng cwue, ngu a zhwu cwue.
Brra trro gbundu ewie wiri na Brranyi e̱ hla nke̱rrrr, aa ci ntsa wehwie a zeteng re be be.
Shwa shezhi ne ngu shi yo nwie nna ri zhwe hu ngbe zhwe cwue ne Jesu ngu ning ci ye ana, ngu a he, “Cence nne ne̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱.”
Yá mbrrú i shi yo ze̱nze̱ re ring. A tsi mbe e̱ ning bi Merri Madali, ngbe Merri de̱ mbe Yakubu na ngu nyi iishing ngbe Josi, ngbe Salomi.
Mbrrú ne̱ á i ce̱ zhwe Jesu tu Galili re ci nkwile̱ ne ngu. Kpi mbrrú piriri ne mbe wru a Urrushelima ngbe ngu a shi miimi ma.
A zhe ne̱hin a Tung Nyi shiri (ne otu na ngu ning zhweng cwo a nyi Kotung Srra Cwu
Usufu ne ngu nyi nne Arimatiya, ngu bra nyi ya brrang a yarri Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi, ne ngu srra re tsio be Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu; aa ywa a nwie Bilatu we̱sa ne owu he ré ki ngwa kwe Jesu.
Bilatu hwie̱ nga we onu ne ngu ho he Jesu hu. Ngu a ye shwa shezhi, ngu a ki rinng he ka Jesu a hu gbangba ye̱.
A zhe ne ngu ho cwu nka nna a nwie shwa shezhi e̱ he shi ni cence, ngu a ngwa Usufu kwe nna.
Usufu a se̱ trro kye̱, ngu a trro kwe nna, ngu a ki gye̱ ne trro nna, wire ngu a ya nyie̱ a ya ria ne ru a kprahwan. Ngu a kpri ya ngbaatsie ngu a ning ku onu ria nna.
Merri Madali ngbe Merri de̱ Josi á ri ewie ne e ki nyie̱.
Zhe ne Kotung Srra Cwu wara, Merri Madali ngbe Merri de̱ Yakubu ngbe Salomi e̱ se turraren aha mbe ya kwe a kwe Jesu.
A nyiencwe a tu na zrru na se̱ti, we zhe ne ne̱ ngu shi wru, á ne̱ re nzhi ria nna.
Á zhe ne mbe shi cwo re yaa rin re-nka he, “Ma nyi nye̱ ngu shi ning kpri ngbaatsie nu ria ana?”
Á bra he mbe rwi riyii mbe e̱ timi ne e kpri ngbaatsie nna. Ngbaatsie nna nyi ngbangbang we yang.
Zhe ne mbe ngwie nwie ria nna, mbe e̱ ri ya nze̱we ngu srra ne brrá ankya kye̱ zhanzhanzhaa a nva nyye. Rowu we prre.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi ci rowu we̱, nje hu he nyi shi nwie kre Jesu nne Nazarra, ne i ki ci gasankwe. Aa deze! Ko shi he we̱. Nyi ri ewie ne i ki nyie̱.
Me̱di nyi ning brru nyi ya ti Pita ngbe kpi nné ki zhwe ngung. Jesu a shi ncwuee nyi re nzhi Galili. Nyi cwo a ki she miimi, shi ne ngu i níng heng.”
Rowu we prre he̱rri á ne̱ ne tsi rwe̱, mbe e̱ wru nwie ria nna nwie to re-ncii. Koó ya ti ko ya nneng we̱, aha a we bi owu.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu deze nhu a nyiencwe a tu ce̱ucwung na se̱ti, aa ke̱she ya wre̱ a nwie Merri Madali ne ngu i ki trru re-rije natsie̱.
Aa ne̱ ya ti ga nné ne mbe ri shi ngbe ne Jesu, ne mbe shi riywe̱ re ku rana.
Zhe ne mbe ho he Jesu shi nce, he he̱rri ngu Merri e̱ ki ri, koó shî nka nna gung we̱.
A merin re-nke, Jesu a ya wre̱ a yaka e̱e̱kpe̱ a nwie ne wehwie a tsi mbe, a zhe ne mbe nyia re nzhi nva yi.
Á ning brru re nzhi ti kpi mbeng, he̱rri ne cwu koó shî nka nna we̱.

A merinng zhwozhwo, Jesu a ya wre̱ a nwie nné ki zhwe shwa ne otu zunzrru a zhe ne mbe shi ye yâ, ngu a we yhwire aha riywe̱ sa rie mbe a ngu, ngbe ne rici klo mbe, ne mbe ra shi nka nné ne mbe ke̱she mbe mbe ki di a zhe ne ngu deze.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ywa ko he a be ngwie̱ ngbe nyi ya brro nneywí zhwozhwo Nka Rina.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu se̱ nka ne e bra ki nyi batisma, we̱ she kyia; me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ra se̱ng, Be̱ne̱ ri ki nyi nka aha re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu.
Nné ce̱ nka nje e̱ ri she igbe̱ng nyi ngbá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu. Á ri trru re-rije a yarri lo nje, á ri he yá re-nka hwi.
Á ri ko nshé ne nva mbe; ko ngbe mbe shwe ya rikye̱ yhwi nné, ko we̱ we nyi ko yankya we̱; á ri gara nva a zete nné ruhu, ngbe wé̱ we ci ré ci gbingbi.”
A zhe ne Brrabe̱ Jesu ngu fro nka ngu ne mbe, á ki fo re nzhi zinye̱, aa ya srra a nva nyye Be̱ne̱.
Wire nné ki zhwe ngu a wru ci nwie brro nka ko he. Brrabe̱ nyi cwuo ne mbe, aa ti he nka ne mbe brro a shi ye̱ye̱rri aha ngbá re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu ne mbe nyi.]
Nné piriri fo he mbe wie re-ankya ne mbe ke̱she ci yarri nzhi.
Á wie shi kya nné ne mbe i ri ne nyyi mbe, ne mbe bra hwie̱ nné brro nka na ce̱ucwung mbe he, á níng ngwa a nva nzhi.
Aha nii, nje we rici nje, nje yaa we we sheng nje kre ko nda ne ngu wru a ce̱ucwung. A nwie nje a nyi kya rina ngbe n re wieng ye̱ye̱rri re-ankya ne e nyi ne nying, brra be̱ri Tiyofilu,
aha ngbe ngwe̱ hu re̱se̱ng cence re-ankya ne ngwe̱ nyi ne hong.
A zhe ne Hirridu i nyi nggwe̱ nné Yahudi, a i bi ya prristi ne e ki ye he Zakariya, ne ngu i shi ekpri re-prristi mbe Abija. Mbrru ngu Lisabatu a wru a nzhwe mbe Arruna.
Zhwozhwo mbe á shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱, nwie zhwe nti nka Brrabe̱ ye̱ye̱rri ngbe re-ankya ne ngu he ré nyi.
Me̱di koó bi ewe we̱, aha ko Lisabatu sé̱ ehwie we̱, á bra kwe we yang.
Aa be zhe ne ekpri mbe Zakariya á shi ncwuo mbe na re-prristi, ne nyi ngu ngu shi ncwuo prristi a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Á ki kyie ye̱ye̱rri ne teede mbe na re-prristi ngbe re ywa a yarri ewie wiri a Brranyi Brrabe̱ aha re ya shwi turraren.
A zhe ana ga nné ye Brrabe̱ mbe á ya tsu nwie ku Be̱ne̱ a Brranyi.
Wire ya njeli Brrabe̱ ya wre̱ nwie Zakariya, aa ya yo a nva nyye ewieng shwi turraren.
We zhe ne ngu ki ri we ri, aa cwuglu, owu ki yhwe̱.
Me̱di njeli he ne ngu he: “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci owu we̱ Zakariya, Be̱ne̱ ho rumwo ngwe̱. Mbrru ngwe̱ Lisabatu a shi bî nze̱we, ngwe̱ shi ki ye he Yohana.
A shi hwie̱ kya rekwi ngbe ehwie kla a nwie ngwe̱, nneywí piriri ri nyi rekwi we yang aha bî ngu,
aha a shi hwie̱ brra nne a nyyi Brrabe̱. Ko ri shwe rishi ruto
A ri ning brru mi ne nné Isrreela we yang re be nwie Brrabe̱, Be̱ne̱ mbe.
A shi ke̱she Brrabe̱
Zakariya rin njeling he, “Ma n ce̱ rimi n hu cence he shi ni e̱e̱? Nje nyi ho nne, mbrru nje e̱ bra kwe we yang.”
Njeli e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nyi nje Jibrreelu, nje nyi nnencwuo Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ning te n ya he nka ne ngwe̱, ngbe n re ti nka rina ne̱.
A zhe ne ne̱, onu ngwe̱ shi hwie̱n, ko ngwe̱ shi hung he nka we̱, se we tu ne nka ne̱ ri ci rrurru ni wire, aha ko ngwe̱ shî nka nje we̱, ne ngu cwo a ci cence a zhe ne e ning sang.”
A zhe ana nneywí shi nwie srra re te Zakariya re hwie he, ma nyi nda ngu ci ne ngu fo zhe a yarri Brranyi e̱ ni e̱e̱?
A zhe ne ngu wru ci, koo hung he nka ne mbe we̱. Ngbe mbe e̱ hu re̱se̱ng he mahu Be̱ne̱ ki ti yankya a yarri Brranyi, ngu a ne̱ ne we he nka ne va, koo hung bra nka we̱.
A zhe ne cwuo ngu yhwe̱ a Brranyi, ngu a ning brru re nzhi ri.
A merin nke, mbrru ngu Lisabatu a she ehwie, ngu a ne̱ ne srra we ri he̱rri nyhwe̱ wecwuoo.
A he, “Brrabe̱ ning nyi kya rina he ni, a rotu ne̱ aa ning ti ce̱ ngu, aa bra ning ti nshwu a yarri nneywí.”
A nyhwe̱ na rritsie̱, Be̱ne̱ te njeli Jibrreelu re nzhi ngwie̱ Nazarra a mbè Galili,
re nzhi nwie ya ewena ne ngu sa jeeng rwe nyrra ngbe ya nne ne e ki ye he Usufu, ne ngu nyi nzhwe
Njeli e̱ ywa nwie ngu, a he, “Dzie, ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ she rinang! Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ shi ngbe ne ngwe̱.”
Roshwo a ki ye ehwie we yang, ngu a ne̱ ne hwie nka he, “Ket, nyi zohu zhwe dzie he ni e̱!”
Me̱di njeli he ne ngu he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci owu wo, Merri, ngwe̱ she rinang a nwie Be̱ne̱.
Ngwe̱ shi se̱ ehwie ngwe̱ ning bî ewerento, ngwe̱ ki ci lo he Jesu.
A cwo a hwie̱ brrang, wé̱ ki ye he Kowe Brrabe̱ Bi Grime̱ Zhwozhwo. Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ri ki ngwa ringgwe̱ be̱ ngu Dooda.
A ri ye ringgwe̱ eri Yakubu
Merri ki rinng he, “Wé̱ ce̱ rimi re ci ni e̱, ne ko nje sa hu nne nto we̱ e̱e̱?”
Njeli e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nshe Wiri cwo be a ngwe̱, igbe̱ Brrabe̱ Bi Grime̱ Zhwozhwo shi re ku ne rowu ngu. Aha nii, ewe wiri ne ngwe̱ shi bîng, á shi ki ye he Kowe Be̱ne̱.
Di, gimbe ngwe̱ Lisabatu a shi bî ewe a rikwe ngu, ngu ne á he ko bî rewe we̱, a zhe ne ne̱ a bi ehwie nyhwe̱ rritsie̱.
Aha ko bi ko yankya ne ngu drre̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
Merri e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nje nyi hwie Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱, nde re ci shi kya ne ngwe̱ ning heng.” Wire njeli e̱ ne̱ ki we.
A rotu ana Merri ne̱ we hwiehwie re nzhi ya ngwie̱ a re-rugu Yahudi.
Aa ya ngwie a ri Zakariya, ngu a dzie Lisabatu.
A zhe ne Lisabatu ho dzie Merri, ewe a yarri hwie ngu yaa gbe̱. Lisabatu a shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri.
Lisabatu ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue, a he, “Ngwe̱ she mwo rina a yarri mbrrú, ewe ne ngwe̱ shi bîng, a bi mwo rina!
Kei, he̱rri nyi nda ngu ci ne de̱ Brrabe̱ nje be nwie nje he ni e̱?
Di, we zhe ne ngwe̱ ci dzie, cwue ngwe̱ ya ning kpe uucwu, ngbe ewe a yarri hwie nje e̱ yaa gbe̱ aha rekwi.
Ngwe̱ bi mwo rina Be̱ne̱, aha ngwe̱ shî he kya ne Brrabe̱ sa jee e̱ shi ci ni cence!”
Wire Merri e̱ he,
“Nje cí Brrabe̱ grime̱.
Nje nyi rekwi a yarri hwie nje
aha Be̱ne̱, Nnenkyia nje,
aha aa ci nkwile̱ ne nje
hwie ngu ne ko nje be ko yankya we̱.
Kya ngu pie a zhe ne re nzhi cwu re-zhe,
ga nneywí shi he Be̱ne̱ e̱ ning mwo rina.
Aha ngbá re-ankya ne Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo ning nying,
lo ngu ne̱ re-lo zhwozhwo.
A ri naana nné mbiye ne mbe to owu ngu,
a ga re-zhe zhwozhwo.
Aa nyi ngbá re-cwuo ne va ngu,
ne ngu sē̱ nné kywo nci ze
a yarri hwie nka shweni mbe.
Aa trro brrá nggwé̱ be a ncwú ringgwe̱ mbe,
ngu a fo nné yaa ci re̱ ze.
Aa ngwa nné ne mbe shi ne nzhwo ankya rina,
me̱di nné bi va á ne̱ ne nva hwerri.
Aa she hwie ngu Isrreelang
ne ngu lu ne naana ngu
re be nwie Ibrrahin ngbe nzhwe ngu he̱rri tiya,
ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu i he ne re-be̱ nzhi.”
Merri srra ngbe Lisabatu weje nyhwe̱ wetsie̱ wire ngu a ning brru re nzhi ri.
A zhe ne bî ewe Lisabatu ci, aa bî ewerento.
Nné dudu ngbe nzhwe ngu a á ho he Brrabe̱ ri naana ngu we yang, mbe e̱ nyi rekwi ngbe ne ngu.
A otu na klanva, á be he mbe cie̱ ewe nna ikpe rwe̱ ntó
me̱di de̱ ngu he ne mbe he, “Aawo! Á shi ki ye he Yohana.”
Á ning brru he ne ngu he, “Ko bi ya nne a nzhwe nyi ne ngu bi lo ana we̱.”
Mbe e̱ nyi be̱ ngu va he re we ti lo ne ngu ce̱ ré ye ewe nna.
Ngu a we nyi va he ré ki ngwa tekpeng wie krre̱de̱, ko nye̱ nga we onu a zhe ne ngu wie he, “Lo ngu nyi Yohana.”
We zhe zunzrru, onu a ngu kla, ngbe le ngu a bī fa, ngu a ne̱ ne he nka re de Be̱ne̱.
Owu prre nné dudu ne mbe zhwozhwo. Ga re-ankya ne mbe ci e̱ zhwozhwo, nka nna a sē̱ ko he a ngwie̱ re-rugu Yahudi.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ho nka nna ne̱ we̱ ne̱ ne ning hwie nka a yarri hwie ngu nwie rin he, “Ngu zhwe ewe ne̱ shi hwie̱ nda aa? Aha va Brrabe̱ shî ngbe ne ngu.”
Nshe Wiri be zete Zakariya be̱ ewe nna, ngu a ne̱ ne ti re̱se̱ng he:
“De nyi ngge Brrabe̱, Be̱ne̱ Isrreela,
aha ne ngu be ngu ya se̱ nné ngu.
Aa níng ngwa ya Brra Nnenkyia,
a ri hwie ngu Dooda.
Shi shi ne ngu i he ne nné wiri ngu, nné ti re̱se̱ng a tiya,
he ngu ri níng kyia a nva rwinkó nzhi,
ngbe nva ga nné ne mbe níng ra zhwozhwo,
he ngu ri ri naana re-be̱ nzhi,
ngu bra lu ne jee wiri ne ngu i we sang we rici ngu.
A i fo shí ne be̱ nzhi Ibrrahin
he ngu ri níng se̱ a nva rwinkó nzhi,
ngbe nzhi ki nyi cwuo we̱sa ne owu.
Ngbe nzhi bi redziee, nzhi bra hwie̱ nné ngu ko zohu zhe a srra nce nzhi.
Ngwe̱ ewe nje, á ri re ye he nne ti re̱se̱ng na Brrabe̱ Bi Grime̱ Zhwozhwo.
Ngwe̱ shi ke̱she Brrabe̱ be ngbe ngwe̱ ya nyi rê aha ngu.
Ngwe̱ ri ngwa nné ngu hu re̱se̱ nka kyia,
aha we re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe.
Aha brra naana Be̱ne̱ nzhi,
ne̱ tsie̱ ri wru zinye̱ re be nwie nzhi,
re si a zete nné mbe ne mbe srra nwie ywing,
ngbe yarri rowung hu.
A ri cwo nta nzhi re nzhi rêng srra rina.”
Ewe nna ci brrang ngbe ne igbe̱ a yarri Nshe Wiri. Aa ya srra a yarri yi he̱rri zhe ne ngu ya ne̱ ne brro nné Isrreela nka.
A rotu ngwiee, Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma, Agustu
(Nke ne̱ nyi hwie nné na ce̱ucwung a zhe ne Kwirriniyu ngu i nyi goona na Sirriya.)
Ko nye̱ e̱ ne̱ re nzhi ngwie̱ ngu, ngbe ré ya wie lo ngu.
Aha ni Usufu a wru a ngwie̱ Nazarra a yarri Galili re nzhi Yahudi. Aa cwugu re be Be̱talahami a ngwie̱ Dooda, aha a nyi nne ri mbe Dooda ngbe nzhwe mbe.
Aa ywa miimi ngbe Merri ne ngu nyi ewena ne ngu shi fong, a zhe nna ne Merri shi hwie nkang bî ewe.
Zhe ne mbe shi a miimi, zheng bî ewe ngu a ci.
Aa bî nze̱we na ce̱ucwung ngu. Aa ki ku ne nkla trro, ngu a ki nywe̱ a nwieng ci ankya rehwe yâ. A zhe ana ko bi ewieng srra a zonggrung cwucwu nné ice we̱.
A bi yá nné cwo ne mbe shi a nkyie dudu miimi, ne mbe shi cwo canvé mbe a totu.
Ya njeli Brrabe̱ ya wre̱ nwie mbe, nse̱ grime̱ Brrabe̱ tsie̱ a nwie mbe, owu we yhwe̱.
Me̱di njeli he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi ci owu wo, nje níng be mi ne Nka Rina ne ngu ri ngwa nneywí zhwozhwo ehwie kla we yang.
A cwu ne̱, a ngwie̱ Dooda á níng bî Nnenkyia, nyi ngu ngu nyi Krristi Brrabe̱.
Nyi ri di sheede ne: nyi ri ya she ewe ne e ki ku ne nkla trro ngu nywe̱ a nwieng ci ankya rehwe yâ.”
Á srra á she brra ekpri re-njeli zinye̱ mbe ya nyi ngbe njeli na ce̱ucwung ana nwie de Be̱ne̱ re he,
“Grime̱ nyi ngge Be̱ne̱ gbong zete zinye̱,
a be ngwie̱, srra rina nyi ngge nné mbe ne mbe she mwo rina ngu.”
Zhe ne re-njeli mbe we we mbe níng brru re nzhi zinye̱, nné cwo á ne̱ ne he we nci mbe he, “Nyi níng be nzhi ywa a Be̱talahami ngbe nzhi ya ri kya ne ngu ci ne Brrabe̱ ngu níng heng ne̱.”
Aha nii, mbe e̱ wre̱ ne ne̱ we hwiehwie. Á ya she Merri ngbe Usufu, ne ewe ngu nywe̱ a nwieng ci ankya rehwe yâ.
Zhe ne mbe ri ewe nna, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne brro kya ne e we ting a rici ewe nna.
Ko nye̱ ngu ho ni we̱ ne̱ ne nga we onu a kya ne nné cwo nna mbe he.
Me̱di Merri la re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo nwie níng hwie nka a yarri hwie ngu.
Nné cwo a ning brru, nwie ci Be̱ne̱ grime̱ re ki de aha ga re-ankya ne mbe ho mbe bra ri, a shi ye̱ye̱rri we shi kya ne re-njeli ri we heng.
A tu na klanva ne zhe ki cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó ngu ci, á ki ci lo he Jesu, lo ne njeli ngu i ngwa tu zhe ne e rishi se̱ ehwie ngu.
Zhe ne otung we ci ré ci wiri ya cwu, ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa,
(shi ne e wie a yarri Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Brrabe̱ he, “Ko zohu nze̱we ngu nyi birina a nyi na Brrabe̱.”
Á ywa he ngbe mbe bra nyi teede ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ne Nti Nka Brrabe̱ he, “Ka re-jie̱riywi wehwie ka re-vie̱kye̱ wehwie.”
A zhe ana, a i bi ya nne a Urrushelima ne e ki ye he Simiyo, ne ngu bi redziee ne ngu ngwa Be̱ne̱ rici ngu. A i shi srra re te Nne ngu cwo a krru rehwie nné Isrreela. Nshe Wiri i shi ngbe ngu.
Nshe Wiri i ki ting he ko shi hu we̱ se ne ngu ri Krristi Brrabe̱.
Nshe Wiri e̱ ki kpra, ngu a ywa a Brranyi a zhe ne mbe Merri ngbe Usufu mbe be mi ne Jesu ne ngu nyi oko shwo ngbe ré ki nyi kya ne teede na Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka he.
Simiyo a ki fo a nva ngu nwie de Be̱ne̱. A he:
“Brrabe̱, a zhe ne,
ning cire rina, nje hwie ngwe̱,
ye̱ye̱rri ne sa jee ngwe̱.
Aha riyii nje ri Nnenkyia nna,
ne ngwe̱ be mi a nyyi nneywí zhwozhwo,
nse̱ ne ngu shi ti Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ re-rê ngwe̱,
re bra ci nné ngwe̱ nné Isrreela grime̱.”
Mbe Usufu ngbe Merri e̱ ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu aha kya ne Simiyo he a ngu.
Wire Simiyo a we mwo rina, ngu a he ne de̱ ngu he, “Merri, á ci ewe ne̱ ngbe re hwie̱ kyang kpi ngbe nang deze nné piriri a Isrreela, re bra hwie̱ sheede ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ne nneywí ri ce̱trri.
(Ngwe̱ ri dzio ehwie shi shi ise̱nkeli cwu rie ngwe̱ ma.) Ngbe we̱ ci ré ri zhwe re-hwie nka nneywí piriri we gbeng.”
A bra bi ya mbrru ti re̱se̱ng ne e ki ye he Anna, ewena Fanuwe, a nkla Asha, ne ngu kwe we yang. A zhe ne ngu i rwe nyrra, á srra re-rie natsie̱, nto ngu a hu.
Ngu a hwie̱ kpambrru he̱rri ngu a ma ya cwu re-rie nshwa klanva ne otu weni. Koo sa we Brranyi we̱, me̱di a yé mbe totu ne te̱ne̱ nwie rwe onu re mwo rumwo.
We zhe ana, aa be nwie mbe, ngu a ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ngu a bra he nka a rici ewe nna ne ga nné ne mbe bi sa rie he Be̱ne̱ ri se̱ nné Urrushelima.
A zhe ne Usufu ngbe Merri nyi ko nda yhwe̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nti Nka Brrabe̱ he ré nyi, mbe e̱ ning brru re nzhi Galili a ngwie̱ mbe Nazarra.
Ewe nna a ci brrabrrang, aa bra ci igbe̱ ngbe zentsi, ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ shi a ngu.
Ko zohu rie, mbe be̱ Jesu ngbe de̱ ngu á cwo Urrushelima aha Para Paska.
A zhe ne ngu ci re-rie shwa ne otu wehwie, á ywa nwie para nna ye̱ye̱rri ne teede mbe.
A zhe ne e wo para ne mbe de̱ ngu mbe shi ning brru re be ri, Jesu a hwie̱ a Urrushelima, ko nné mbe e̱ á ru we̱.
Á ra he ka shi ngbe mbe, he̱rri á cwo ciee na to zrru. Wire mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ki kre a nwie re-gimbe ngbe rwí mbe.
A zhe ne ko mbe ki ri we̱, mbe e̱ ning brru re nzhi Urrushelima nwie ki kre.
A otu na tsie̱ wire mbe e̱ ki she a yarri Brranyi ngu srra zetsi brrá nné mie̱ nka re tsio uucwu re bra we rin re-nka.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ho nka ngu we̱ nga we onu ne zhwe hu re̱se̱ng ngu, ngbe re-nka ne ngu we shing.
Zhe ne be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu mbe ki she, á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu. De̱ ngu a he ne ngu he, “Kowe, rimi ne ngwe̱ níng nyi he ni e̱? Nje ngbe be̱ ngwe̱ e̱ nzhi shi cinci nwie re kre gance̱ fang.”
A we rinng he, “Aha nda nyi ning kre ni e̱? Ko nyi hu he aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri n shi a zonggru Be̱ nje we̱ e̱e̱?”
Me̱di koó pie cwu kya ne ngu he ne mbe we̱.
Wire ngu a ne̱ re nzhi a Nazarra ngbe ne mbe de̱ ngu. A we hó nka. De̱ ngu a bro re-ankya ne̱ a yarri hwie ngu.
Jesu ci brrabrrang ngbe ne zentsi ngbe ne ehwie rina nwie Be̱ne̱ ngbe nneywí.

A yarri rie na shwa ne otu wecwuoo na ringgwe̱ Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma ne e ki ye he Tiberria, zhe ne Pontu Bilatu ngu i nyi goona nné Yahudi, Hirridu i shi ye ringgwe̱ Galili, gimbe ngu Fili e̱ shi ye ringgwe̱ Iturriya ngbe Tarakuniti, Lisaniya a shi ye ringgwe̱ Abiliya —
a nyi yarri rotu nna ne Anasi ngbe Kayafa mbe i nyi Brrá re-Prristi.
Aa grra a re-nkla ne mbe grra Brra Riywi Urrdu nwie brro nka he ré si ywe̱ ngbe ré we nyi batisma aha we re-e̱ngwie̱
shi ne i wie a yarri krre̱de̱ Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng he,
“Riwie̱ng cwue ne ngu kyie̱ a tsi yi he,
‘Nyi nyi rê aha Brrabe̱,
nyi ci nhwie̱ rê ngu ré ci tsantsa.
Ko zohu kuru ri shî ne mbè,
ko zohu rugu ngbe ngbra ri ci cwe nkyie.
Re-rê gweegwe ri ci te̱rr,
re-rê nyanya ri ci hleehlee.
Ga nneywí zhwozhwo ri ri kyia ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱.’ ”
Yohana he ne rigwe̱ nneywí ne mbe wru aha ngu we nyi batisma ana he, “Nyi zhwe kprre! Nyi nye̱ ngu níng ting he nyi e̱ hung to ren Be̱ne̱ ne ngu cwo be e̱ ni e̱e̱?
Nyi nyi re-ankya na mbe ti he nyi se̱ ywe̱. Shi de̱ nyi ne̱ ne he a nci nyi he, ‘Nzhi bi be̱ nzhi Ibrrahin’ we̱. Nje ce̱ níng ting he a yarri rahwan ne̱ Be̱ne̱ hung nyi yá rewe aha Ibrrahin.
Be̱ne̱ sa okywo a nti rekwe, ko zohu ekwe ne ko ngu krro te̱nte̱ gbre we̱, we̱ tsa we̱ zhwu a nro.”
Nné nna á ne̱ ne ki rinng he, “Ma nzhi nyi rimi e̱?”
Yohana a we karang he, “Nne bi re-tago wehwie re na ya nne ne ko ngu bi we̱, nne bi yâ ye re nyi ni ma.”
Nné si gondu be ngbe ré we nyi batisma ma. Á rin he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nzhi nyi rimi e̱?”
A he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi si gondu re ne̱ kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi si we̱.”
Yá re-shezhi be nwie ngu, mbe e̱ rin he, “Ma nzhi ne̱ nzhi nyi rimi ma a?”
A he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi si ncwé̱ nneywí ne igbe̱ ka nyi ci ya nne nka we dede we̱, nyi ci nkwirin ne kya ne e níng trrang.”
Nneywí shi srra re teng, nwie hwie nka a yarri rehwie mbe he ma ka nyi Yohana ne ngu nyi Krristi nna rre.

Yohana a he ne mbe zhwozhwo he, “Nje níng nyi batisma ne rishi. Me̱di ngu ne ngu bi igbe̱ re ning ne̱ e̱ cwo be, ko ru tamri ngu ma ko shi n hung bing we̱. A cwo a níng nyi batisma ne Nshe Wiri ngbe ro.
A bi brra iibi ngu nva ne ngu níng wu zhwe yâ te̱nte̱ng ngbe iishíng, te̱nte̱ cwe yâ we̱ kro a aata, me̱di iishíng we̱ shwi a nro na ne ko ngu bi yu we̱.”
Yohana a ning bra he yá re-nka yang, aa brro nneywí Nka Rina.
Me̱di a zhe ne Yohana ngu yhwire nggwe̱ Hirridu aha ngu fo Hirridiya, mbrru gimbe ngu, ngbe yá re-ankya e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu nyi.
Gbengbe ni, aa ning bra nyi e̱ngwie̱, he̱rri aa pie Yohana ki she̱ a uucwu gyiaa.
A zhe ne e nyi nneywí batisma zhwozhwo, á nyi Jesung ma. A zhe ne ngu shi ku Be̱ne̱, á srra á she zinye̱ kla.
Ngbe Nshe Wiri e̱ be ya kpe a ngu shi shi nyi jie̱riywi. Ya cwue e̱ wru zinye̱ he, “Ngwe̱ nyi Kowe ce̱ nje, nje ho shwi ngwe̱ kpe̱kpe̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu bi re-rie weje nshwa wetsie̱, aa ce̱ nyi re-cwuo ngu. Nneywí fo he nyi kowe Usufu,
kowe Heli,
kowe Matati,
kowe Levi, kowe Melkyi,
kowe Yanayi, kowe Usufu,
kowe Matatiya, kowe Emosi,
kowe Nahu, kowe Esli,
kowe Nagayi,
kowe Maati,
kowe Matatiya, kowe Seme,
kowe Yoseki, kowe Joda,
kowe Yona, kowe Rresa,
kowe Zerrubabe, kowe Sheltiye,
kowe Nerri,
kowe Melkyi,
kowe Addi, kowe Kosa,
kowe Elmada, kowe Erri,
kowe Joshwua, kowe Eliyeza,
kowe Jorri, kowe Matati,
kowe Levi,
kowe Sima,
kowe Yahuda, kowe Usufu,
kowe Jonami, kowe Eliyaki,
kowe Meliya, kowe Menna,
kowe Mataata, kowe Nata,
kowe Dooda,
kowe Jese,
kowe Obida, kowe Bowaza,
kowe Salmo, kowe Nashwo,
kowe Aminada, kowe Arrni,
kowe Hezrro, kowe Perreza,
kowe Yahuda,
kowe Yakubu,
kowe Ishaku, kowe Ibrrahin,
kowe Terra, kowe Naho,
kowe Serru, kowe Rriyu,
kowe Pele, kowe Eba,
kowe Shela,
kowe Kayina,
kowe Arrifaza, kowe Shem,
kowe Nuhu, kowe Lame,
kowe Metusela, kowe Eno,
kowe Jarre, kowe Mahalale,
kowe Kena,
kowe Enoshi,
kowe Seti, kowe Domu,
kowe Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ya ning brru a Urrdu, aa shî ne Nshe Wiri. Nshe Wiri e̱ ki fo re nzhi a tsi yi,
a nwie ne ngu ya ci rotu nshwa weni ne Shetani shi ki mwa ri. Koo ye ko yankya a rotu nna we̱. A ngrrang, nzhwo ki yhwe̱.
Shetani e̱ he ne ngu he, “Kundu ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱, he ne zahwan ne̱ re ci cwu yâ.”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Á wie a Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, ‘Ko nneywi ne̱ srra nce aha cwu yâ nggaa ngu wo.’ ”
Shetani e̱ ywa ne ngu a zete ya ewie ne ngu shi dede, ngu a wre̱ ne ki ti ga re-ringgwe̱ ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo.
Ngu a he ne ngu he, “Nje shi re ngwa igbe̱ ngbe grime̱ na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ zhwozhwo, aha á ning ngwa a nva nje, nje hung ngwa ko nye̱ ne nje ce̱.
Aha nii, kundu ngwe̱ ning ye mbè, we̱ hwie̱ ngge ngwe̱ zhwozhwo.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Á wie he, ‘Ye Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ngwe̱ mbè, ngwe̱ bra ki nyi we ngu nggaa ngu cwuo.’ ”
Wire Shetani e̱ ki fo re nzhi a Urrushelima, aa ya ki sa gbong a zete Brranyi. A he ne ngu he, “Kundu ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱, hru a he ne̱ ngbe ngwe̱ ya kpe be,
aha á wie he:
‘A ri ngwa re-njeli ngu nka aha ngwe̱
ngbe ré re cwo rina rina;
á shi re bro a nva mbe,
kishi ngwe̱ ri kpra ta ngwe̱ a zahwan.’ ”
Jesu ki shing he, “Á wie he, ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ mwa Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ngwe̱ we̱.’ ”
A zhe ne Shetani ngu wo re-mwa ri ngu zhwozhwo, aa ne̱ ki we miimi, se ya ka zhe.
Jesu ning brru re nzhi Galili a yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri, re-nka ngu se̱ ngwie̱ yu ko he a yarri re-ngwie̱ dudu.
Aa mie̱ nka a re-zonggrung mwe, ko nye̱ ki de.
Aa ne̱ re nzhi Nazarra a ngwie̱ ne ngu ning ci brrang, ngbe a Tung Srra Cwu nné Yahudi, ngu a ya ngwie a zonggrung mwe shi ne ngu ning mrrang. Aa deze aha ngu hwie krre̱de̱.
Á ki ngwa krre̱de̱ Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng. Aa kla she ewie ne e wie he,
“Nshe Brrabe̱ shi a nje,
aha aa ning mia,
ngbe n brro Nka Rina a nwie yiriywé̱.
Aa ning te ngbe n ya trru nné gyiaa
ré she srra srra nci mbe,
n ya ci nnencwué̱ ré ri ewie,
n deze nné ne e we yhwi be,
n bra ngwa nka he rie Brrabe̱ ci, ne ngu shi kyia nneywí.”
Wire aa krru krre̱de̱ nna, ngu a ngwa nne brong, ngu a srra be. Ko nye̱ yarri zonggrung mwe nna a sa riyii a ngu.
Ngu a ne̱ ne he ne mbe he, “A cwu, kya ne nyi ho ne re-uucwu nyi ne̱ ci rrurru shi ne i wie a yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Ko nye̱ he nka rina a zete ngu nwie nye̱ we ronu aha re-nka rina ne mbe wrru nu ngu. Á rin he, “Ko nyi ewe Usufu ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Cence nyi shi ning he nka zhwebe ne̱ ne e he, ‘Nne rikye̱, kyia rici ngwe̱! Nyi a ngwie̱ ngwe̱ kya ne nzhi ho he ngwe̱ nyi a Kafanahu.’ ”
Jesu a wara ne we ting he, “Nje níng ting cence, ko bi ya nne ti re̱se̱ng ne e ki se̱ a ngwie̱ ngu we̱.
Nje níng ting cence he a i bi kpambrrú piriri a Isrreela a zhe Iliya nne ti re̱se̱ng, zhe ne i she̱ re-inyie̱ re-rie wetsie̱ ne kpirring ne nzhwo ngu i kpe ngwie̱ we yang.
Gbengbe ni, koó i ci Iliya re ywa nwie ya mbe we̱, se we nwie kpambrru a Zarrefa a ngwie̱ Sido.
A i bi nné ruhunzhwe̱ piriri a Isrreela a zhe Ilisha nne ti re̱se̱ng, gbengbe ni ko bi ya mbe ne i ki ci ci wiri we̱ se we Naama nne Sirriya.”
Ga nné mbe shi a zonggrung mwe e̱ á dzio rehwie ne ngu, a zhe ne mbe ho re-nka ngu.
Á deze á ki yu a yarri ngwie̱, á ki fo re nzhi zete rugu ne e ning no ngwie̱ aha mbe ki lu re kpri a iigyie nna re ya kpe be.
Me̱di Jesu maa cwo a zetsi mbe, aa ne̱ ne ciee ngu.
Wire aa ne̱ re nzhi Kafanahu, ngwie̱ ne ngu shi Galili, aa ya ne̱ ne we mie̱ nka a Tung Srra Cwu nné Yahudi.
Nneywí ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu a re-nka ne ngu we mie̱ng, aha re-nka ngu a á bi igbe̱.
A yarri zonggrung mwe nna, a bi ya nne ne ngu bi rije. Aa ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he,
“Ka! Nyi nda ngwe̱ kre nwie nzhi e̱e̱? Nje re hu. Ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Wiri na Be̱ne̱!”
Jesu ki ti ne ren he, “Ci cereng! Wru a yarri ngu!” Wire rije tsie nne nna a be a nyyi nneywí zhwozhwo, ngu a wru we̱sa ne ki ci ruhu.
Ga nné zhwozhwo ne̱ ne nye̱ ronu nwie he re-nka he, “Nyi zohu zhwe nka he ni e̱e̱? A hé nka ne igbe̱ ngbe de̱me̱ ngu ngbe he̱rri re-rije wé̱ wrru fa.”
Nka kya ne Jesu ngu nyi e̱ se̱ ngwie̱ yu.
Jesu wru zonggrung mwe, ngu a ngwie a ri Sima. A zhe ana de̱ mbrru Sima shi ne rwe̱ bra we yang, ngbe mbe e̱ he ne Jesu re ki sheng.
Jesu a hu be nwie ngu, ngu a yhwire ruhu nna, ngbe rwe̱ bra a ki we ni. Ngu a wre̱ ne cinye̱, ngu a ne̱ ne we kre yâ.
A zhe ne ne̱ nyia re nzhi kpe be, nneywí be mi ne nné ruhu kanka kanka nwie Jesu, aa ne̱ ne we gara nva, aa we kyia.
Yá mbe i bi re-rije, re-rije nna á wrru nwie kyie̱ ronu he, “Ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱!” Me̱di aa we ti ne ren, koo we ngwa zhe ré ning he nka we̱, aha á hu he nyi ngu ngu nyi Krristi nna.
A zhe ne ewie tsie̱, Jesu ywa a ya ewie nggaa ngu. Nné ne̱ ne ki kre, a zhe ne mbe ya ki she a nwie ngu ning shi, á kre rê ngbe mbe ki ci de̱ re ne̱ we̱.
Me̱di a he ne mbe he, “Se nje brro Nka Rina na Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ a yaká re-ngwie̱ ma, aha kya ne e ning te he n ya nyi e̱ nyi ngwiee.”
Ngu a wara nwie grra re brro nka a re-zonggrung mwe a Yahudi.
A ya otu ne Jesu shi yo a rekyi nzhwo Jenazarra,
Aa rwi riyii a ri yá re-konkro wehwie a rekyi nzhwo ne nné kwa hwén mbe we, mbe shi zrra re-re̱ge̱ mbe.
Jesu a ngwie a yarri ya konkro nna ne ngu nyi na Sima, ngu a he ne ngu he re ning bra ki shwo tsie̱ re nzhi yarri nzhwo nna. Wire ngu a srra be a yarri konkro, ngu a ne̱ ne mie̱ nneywí nka.
A zhe ne ngu mie̱ nka yhwe̱, ngu a he ne Sima he, “Shwo konkro nna re nzhi a nwie cwuncwuu ngbe nyi ta re-re̱ge̱ nyi e̱ nyi ning prre hwén.”
Sima a he ne ngu he, “Be̱ri, nzhi kywe kywe nwie kreng ko nzhi she ko yankya we̱. Me̱di tu ne ngwe̱ he ni, nje shi ning zi re-re̱ge̱ nna wa.”
A zhe ne mbe nyi ni, á prre hwén we yang he̱rri re-re̱ge̱ mbe e̱ á ne̱ ne srra.
Á ye rwí mbe ne mbe shi a yaka konkro ngbe ré be ré ya we sheng. Mbe e̱ be, mbe e̱ kro hwén a yarri re-konkro wehwie ana á shî he̱rri á ne̱ ne ciywi.
A zhe ne Sima Pita ri ni, ngu a hu be ne ruhuu a nyyi Jesu, ngu a he, “Ne̱ nwie nje Brrabe̱, aha nje nyi nne e̱ngwie̱!”
Sima ngbe rwí ngu a á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu ne zhwe hwén ne mbe prre.

He̱rri mbe Yakubu ngbe Yohana, rewe Zebedi, ne mbe nyi rwincwuó Sima á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu ma. Wire Jesu a he ne Sima he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci owu wo, kya ngu pie e cwu re nzhi ncwuee ngwe̱ shi ne̱ ne kwa nneywí.”
Aha nii, mbe e̱ trru re-konkro mbe re be rekyi nzhwo, mbe e̱ we ko nda a miimi, mbe e̱ zhwe Jesu.

A zhe ne Jesu shi a ya ngwie̱, ya nne ne ruhunzhwe̱ e̱ ki ye yhwe̱ be nwie ngu. Zhe ne ngu ri Jesu, ngu a hu be lielie nwie cwe nva ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, kundu ngwe̱ shî, ning ci n ci gbingbi ngbe n bra ci wiri.”
Jesu na va ngu a ki re, ngu a he, “Nje shî, ci gbingbi!” We zhe zunzrru ruhunzhwe̱ e̱ ki we.

Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ti ya nneng we̱, me̱di ywa ngwe̱ ya ti rici ngwe̱ a nwie prristi ngwe̱ bra ngwa kyang nyi teede ye̱ye̱rri ne Musa i he, aha ne ngwe̱ ci wiri, ngbe re hwie̱ sheede a nwie nneywí.”
Me̱di he̱rri ne cwu, nka nna ke̱ we ne sē̱ re nzhi cwu ko he, he̱rri rigwe̱ nneywí nga re be nwie ngu ngbe mbe ning bra ho re-nka ngu, ngbe re bra we kyia ne re-nzhwe ruhu mbe.
Me̱di a yá re-zhe Jesu srra we̱ yaa fie̱ re nzhi ya ewie cereng aha ku Be̱ne̱.
A ya otu ne Jesu shi mie̱ nka, nné Farisi
Yá nné e̱ ya wre̱ ne ya nne ne ngu kwi nkye̱ a kpengye, á nyi kwe̱kwe̱ he mbe ngwie mi ne ngu zonggru a nwie Jesu.
Me̱di koó she rêng ngwie we̱ aha ne nneywí mbe zhwo. Mbe e̱ ngra a zeteng, mbe e̱ ya ti be̱e̱ne̱ zonggru, wire mbe e̱ wro ne ngu a kpengyeng nywe̱ ngu we sheng a yarri nneywí re be nyyi Jesu.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ri sa rie mbe ni, ngu a he, “A rwe, á re we e̱ngwie̱ ngwe̱.”
Nné Farisi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa á ne̱ ne hwie nka a nci mbe he, “Nyi nye̱ ne ngu he nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱ ne̱? Nyi nye̱ ngu hung we e̱ngwie̱ we̱sa ne Be̱ne̱ nggaa ngu aa?”
Jesu hu kya ne mbe shi hwieng, ngu a we rinng he, “Aha nda ne nyi shi hwie re-nka a yarri rehwie nyi ni e̱e̱?
Nyi zohu ngu bi rwe̱: ré he, ‘Á re we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngwe̱,’ ka ré he, ‘Cinye̱ ngwe̱ cwo ciee e̱e̱?’
Me̱di nje ce̱ níng ting he Kowe Nneywi
Ngu a wre̱ ne cinye̱ a nyyi mbe, ngu a ko ankyang nywe̱ be ngu re nzhi ri nwie de Be̱ne̱.
Ko nye̱ hwie̱ nga we onu nwie de Be̱ne̱. Owu we yhwe̱, á ne̱ ne he, “Nzhi ri ngbá re-ankya a cwu ne̱.”
A merin nke Jesu wru ci, ngu a ya she ya nne si gondu ne e ki ye he Levi ngu shi srra a wofing si gondu ngu, Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ning zhwe.”
Levi deze ngu a we ko nda a miimi, ngu a ki zhwe.
Wire Levi e̱ nyi brra bikyi aha Jesu a ri ngu. Nné si gondu we yang á be ngbe kpi nné á ya ye yâ ngbe mbe.
Me̱di nné Farisi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa na mbe á ne̱ ne krro re-nka a nwie nné zhwe Jesu he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi ye re shwe ngbe nné si gondu
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “A nyi nné ruhu ne mbe kre nne rikye̱, ko nyi nné gbingbi we̱.
Ko nje be ye nné redziee we̱, me̱di aha nné e̱ngwie̱ ré si ywe̱.”
Ya mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nné zhwe Yohana á srra re rwe onu ko zohu zhe re ku Be̱ne̱, nné zhwe nné Farisi e̱ á nyi ni ma, ma nyi nda ngu ci ne nné na ngwe̱ e̱ mbe srra re ye re shwe e̱e̱?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Ko shi nyi hung ci re-yeva nne rwe nyrra ré rwe onu zhe ne mbe shi ngbe ngu we̱.
Me̱di zhe cwo be ne e ri fo nne rwe nyrra nna a nwie mbe, a rotu ana wé̱ rwe onu fa.”
Ngu a we he nka zhwebe ne̱ he, “Ko bi ya nne ngu cie̱ tago hwi re ning tsie ruba a rening we̱. Kundu ngu nyi ni, tago hwi nna we̱ dzio, ko ruba nna we̱ bra mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne tago reni nna we̱.
Ko bra bi nne ngu kro hwihwi rishi ruto a yarri gure kpe
Koó nyi ni we̱, se ré kro rishi ruto hwi a yarri gure kpe hwi.
Ko bra bi nne ngu shwe rishi ruto reni re bro ce̱ hwing we̱, aha á hé rening bi rina re ne̱.”
A ya Otung Srra Cwu nné Yahudi, Jesu ya grra a ya ebe alikama. Ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a ne̱ ne kping re hwili a yarri nva mbe re te̱ng.
Yá nné Farisi e̱ ne̱ ne we rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi nyí kya ngu shi wie̱e̱ni ne Kotung Srra Cwu aa?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Ko nyi sa hwie yarri krre̱de̱ nyi ho kya ne Dooda ngbe nné ngu mbe i nyi a zhe ne mbe i ho nzhwo we̱ e̱e̱?
Dooda i ngwie a Zonggru Be̱ne̱, ngu a fo cwu yâ wiri na ne se we re-prristi re hung yeng, aa ye, he̱rri aa ngwa nné ngu kpi.”
Jesu a ning brang he, “Kowe Nneywi e̱ nyi Brrabe̱ he̱rri ngbe na Kotung Srra Cwu.”
A yaka Otung Srra Cwu wa, Jesu a ya ngwie a yarri zonggrung mwe nwie mie̱ nka. A bi ya nne ne ngu shi miimi ne va nyye ngu hu.
Nné Farisi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa á ne̱ ne ki gyirri he mbe ri ka a shi ki kyia a Tung Srra Cwu ye̱, aha ngbe mbe she kya ne mbe shi ki ci nka.
Me̱di Jesu hu kya ne mbe shi hwieng, ngu a he ne nne hu va nna he, “Deze a nyyi ko nye̱.” Aha ni aa deze yo yo a miimi.
Jesu a ning brru he ne mbe he, “Nje níng rinng, nyi zohu ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne Otung Srra Cwu a? Ré nyi kya rina ka ré nyi ngwie̱ngwie̱ng, ré kyia ce ka ré yhwe̱ ye̱?”
Aa ci riyii we ri zhwozhwo mbe, ngu a he ne nne nna he, “Na va ngwe̱.” Ngu a na; ngbe va ngu a ci rina.
Ngbe mbe e̱ ci rehwie dzio we yang, á ne̱ ne hwie kya ne mbe shi nying ne Jesu.
A ya otu, Jesu wru ci re nzhi a zete rugu aha ngu ya ku Be̱ne̱, aa fo totu zhwozhwo nwie ku Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne mincwe kla, aa ye nné ki zhwe ngu, ngu a kyie nné shwa ne otu wehwie a tsi mbe he ré hwie̱ nnenté ngu.
A bi Sima (ne Jesu ki ye he Pita) ngbe gimbe ngu Andrru, ngbe Yakubu, ngbe Yohana, ngbe Fili, ngbe Batolomi,
ngbe Mata, ngbe Toma, ngbe Yakubu ewe Alifayu, ngbe Sima ne e ki ye he Nne Ngwa Rici,
ngbe Yahuda kowe Yakubu, ngbe Yahuda Iskarriyoti, ne ngu cwo a hwie̱ nne ki rie̱.
Jesu wro ngbe mbe, ngu a ya yo a cwe nkyie. Brra ekpri nné ki zhwe e̱ á shi miimi ngbe nneywí piriri ne mbe wru ga re-ngwie̱ Yahudi ngbe Urrushelima, ngbe rekyi brra nzhwo Taya ngbe Sido,
ne mbe be aha mbe ya ki ho, ngbe mbe bra she ci gbingbi ne re-ruhu mbe. Nné mbiye ne re-rije we yarra, á she kyia.
Ga nné zhwozhwo nyi kwe̱kwe̱ he mbe ki re, aha igbe̱ Nshe Wiri wrú a yarri ngu nwie we kyia zhwozhwo.
Jesu sa riyii a nné ki zhwe ngu ngu a he,
“Mwo rina nyi ngge nyi,
nyi ne nyi nyí yiriywé̱,
aha Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ nyi na nyi.
Mwo rina nyi ngge nyi,
nyi ne nyi ho nzhwo a zhe ne,
aha á ri níng ci rishwe,
Mwo rina nyi ngge nyi,
nyi ne nyi shi rana a zhe ne,
aha nyi ri mi rimrraa.
Mwo rina nyi ngge nyi
a zhe ne nneywí mbe níng ra,
ne mbe níng trru ci nwie níng cwi,
nwie he nyi nyí nné e̱ngwie̱ aha Kowe Nneywi.
“Nyi nyi rekwi re hrru kundu re-ankya ne̱ mbe níng she ni, aha lede nyi shi we yang a zinye̱. Aha re-yo mbe i nyi ni ne nné ti re̱se̱ng.
Me̱di wuhu ne nyi nné bi ncwe̱
aha nyi ke̱she she ho shwing na nyi.
Wuhu ne nyi, nyi ne nyi she rishwe we yang a zhe ne,
aha nyi ri ho nzhwo.
Wuhu ne nyi, nyi ne nyi ta rimrraa a zhe ne,
aha nyi ri ku rana ne rehwie dzio.
Wuhu ne nyi kundu nneywí mbe he re-nka rina a zete nyi,
aha yó mbe i nyi ni ne nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra.”
“Me̱di nje he ne nyi ne nyi ho nka nje e̱ he nyi ce̱ rwinkó nyi. Nyi nyi nné mbe ne mbe níng ra rina.
Nyi mwo nné mbe ne mbe níng cwi rina, nyi ku Be̱ne̱ aha nné mbe ne mbe níng ngwa ge̱zhe̱.
Kundu ya nne re tsie ne va a ushwong va ya, ki bra ushwong va ya wa. Kundu ya nne se̱ kuntu ngwe̱, ki ngwa ngbe tago ngwe̱ wa.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu cé̱ kya a nwie ngwe̱, ki ngwa. Kundu ya nne se̱ kya ngwe̱ ne ce, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ki zhwe we̱.
Nyi nyi nneywíng ye̱ye̱rri ne kya nyi ce̱ he ré níng nying ma.
“Kundu ngwe̱ ce̱ we nné ne mbe re ce̱ ma, nyi nye̱ we̱ re de aha ni? Ko nné e̱ngwie̱ cé̱ we nné ne mbe we ce̱ ma we̱ e̱e̱?
Kundu ngu nyi we nné ne mbe níng nyi rina ne nyi we nying ma, nyi nye̱ we̱ níng de aha ni? Ko ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱ nyi ni ma.
Kundu ngu nyi we nné ne nyi hwie he á ri níng trrang ne nyi we kwa tsie, nyi nye̱ we̱ níng de aha ni? Ko ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱ nyi ni ma, aha mbe ce̱ he á ri we trrang ye̱ye̱rri.

Me̱di nyi ce̱ rwinkó nyi, nyi bra we nyi gbagba. Nyi ngwa tsie we̱sa ne to owu he ka de̱ á ri níng trrang zhwozhwo we̱ rre ye̱. Wire lede nyi we̱ ci piriri, nyi e̱ hwie̱ rewe Brrabe̱ Bi Grime̱ Zhwozhwo, aha a nyi nné riywe̱ ci kijie̱ng ngbe nné hwie̱ rina.
Nyi bi naana we shi ne Be̱ nyi ngu bi naana.
