“Shi de̱ nyi nyi ya nne nka ka nyi bra dzio ya nne we̱, kishi á ri níng nying ni ma. Nyi we nné re-e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe níng nying ngbe we̱ níng we na nyi ma.
Nyi ngwa, ngbe we̱ níng ngwa ma; a kwrengyi rina ne e ki zhwa á bra ki gbe̱, aa shî he̱rri a to be, wé̱ níng krong zhwozhwo. Aha a nyi kwrengyi ne nyi ning mwang ne e ri níng mwang ma.”
Ngu a bra we he nka zhwebe he, “Kundu nnencwue̱ re kwa nnencwue̱ e̱e̱? Ko gbengbe mbe wé̱ kpi ruvo we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko ewe ne e ki mie̱ nka ne̱ nne ngu ki mie̱ng we̱, me̱di kundu ne ngu mie̱ yhwe̱, we̱ ci shi nne ne ngu ki mie̱ng.
“Rimi ne ngwe̱ ri e̱we̱ kya ngu shi riyii gimbe ngwe̱, me̱di ko ngwe̱ ci nkwile̱ ne klankwe ngu shi riyii ngwe̱ we̱ e̱e̱?

Ngwe̱ ce̱ rimi ngwe̱ he ne ngu he, ‘Gimbe, kande n re ti e̱we̱ kya ne ngu shi riyii ngwe̱,’ me̱di ngwe̱ we rici ngwe̱ ko ngwe̱ ri klankwe ne ngu shi riyii na ngwe̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ngwe̱ nne brra onu, ke̱she ngwe̱ ti klankwe ne ngu shi riyii ngwe̱, wire ngwe̱ hung ri ewie rina ngwe̱ ti e̱we̱ kya ne ngu shi riyii gimbe ngwe̱ ma.
“Ko te̱nte̱ ekwe ngwa ngbre ngu dzio we̱, ko ekwe ngu dzio bra krro te̱nte̱ gbre ma wo.
Á hú ko zohu ekwe ne zhwe ngbre ngu, koó kpi riyhwietsie a rekwe ze̱kye̱ we̱, ka ngbre roshwo me̱nte̱ a rekwe ze̱kye̱ we̱.

Te̱nte̱ nne nyi ankya rina ne mbe shi a yarri ehwie rina ngu, me̱di nne e̱ngwie̱ nyi re-ankya e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe shi a yarri ehwie e̱ngwie̱ ngu ma. Aha re-nka ne nneywi ngu he wrú a yarri rigwe̱ ankya ne mbe shi a nu rie ngu.
“Rimi nyi ning ye he, ‘Brrabe̱, Brrabe̱,’ me̱di ko nyi nyí kya ne nje he we̱ e̱e̱?
Nje shi níng ti e̱kpe̱e̱ nne ne ngu cwo nwie nje, ngu hó nka nje, ngu bra ning nyí cwuo mi e̱.
A shi shi nne ne ngu shi no eri, ngu a ru ebe cwuncwuu, wire ngu ning sa riti runo a zete ngbaatsie. A zhe ne nze ngu be ngbe brra wu, ko runo nna ree gbe̱ we̱, aha aa ki no rina.

Me̱di nne nke ne ngu hó nka nje, ko ngu bra ning nyí cwuo a yarring we̱, a shi shi nne ne ngu no eri a be hwerri we̱sa ne sa riti runo. A zhe ne nze ngu be ngbe ne brra wu, runo a gu wrrototo, aa ywa be zhwozhwo.”
A zhe ne Jesu fro re-nka ngu zhwozhwo a nwie nneywí, ngu a ngwie a Kafanahu.
A miimi a bi ya shwa shezhi nné Rroma ne ko hwie ngu shi gbingbi we̱, he̱rri a shi nung hu, be̱ri ngu a ki ce̱ we yang.
Shwa shezhi e̱ ho re-ankya ne Jesu shi nying, ngu a te yá brrá nné Yahudi a nwie ngu he re be re ya kyia hwie ngu.
A zhe ne mbe ya wre̱ a nwie Jesu, mbe e̱ cwe nva ne ngu naana naana he, “Kusu aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngwe̱ she nne ne ne̱ng,
aha a ce̱ mbè ngwie̱ nzhi ne̱, aa bra níng no zonggrung mwe.”
Aha ni Jesu a we zhwe, aa ne̱ ngbe mbe.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu be dudu ne eri nna, shwa shezhi e̱ lu yá rwí ngu he ré ya he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, shi de̱ ngwe̱ yaa ngwa cinci ni we̱, ko nje be ngbe ngwe̱ ngwie a yarri eri nje we̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee nje ri ko nje be ngbe n be nwie ngwe̱ ne rici nje we̱. Me̱di tsie we riti nka, ngbe hwie nje e̱ we̱ ci gbingbi.

Nje we rici nje ne̱ nje shi tahwie nnencwuee nje, a bi yá re-shezhi ne mbe shi tahwie nje ma. Nje he ne ya he, ‘Ywa,’ we̱ ywa; ma n he ne ya re be, we̱ be. Nje he ne hwie nje he, ‘Nyi nke,’ we̱ nyi.”

A zhe ne Jesu ho ni, ngu a hwie̱ nga we onu, ngu a bra re nzhi nwie rotsu nné ne mbe ki zhwe, ngu a he, “Nje níng ting he, ko nje sa ri zhwe sa rie ngu bi igbe̱ shi nke ne̱ we̱, he̱rri ngbe a yarri Isrreela.”
Wire nné mbe ne e we te a nwie Jesu a á ya ning brru re be ri, á ya she hwie nna ngu ci gbingbi fa.
Á srra we tsie̱, Jesu a ywa a ya ngwie̱ ne e ki ye he Neyi, nné ki zhwe ngu ngbe rigwe̱ nné á ki zhwe.
A zhe ne ngu ya cwu a brra onusinyeng ngwie e ngwie̱ nna, aa ya she ya kwe ewe ne e nyia mi ne de̱ ngu nyi kpambrru, a bra ki bi we ngu nggaa ngu. Nné ngwie̱ nna á nga á shi ngbe de̱ nna.
A zhe ne Brrabe̱ ki ri, naana ki pie, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ku we̱.”
Wire ngu a ne̱ ngu a ya re kyikwe̱ kwe nna, nné fong nna mbe e̱ hwie̱ yo. Ngu a he, “Nze̱we, nje he ngwe̱ deze!”
Kwe nne nna a deze ngu a ne̱ ne he nka. Wire Jesu ki ngwa de̱ ngu fa.
Owu we yhwe̱ zhwozhwo mbe, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne de Be̱ne̱ nwie he, “Brra nne ti re̱se̱ng be ngwie̱ nzhi, Be̱ne̱ be she nné ngung.”
Nka kya ne Jesu ngu nyi e̱ ywa ko he a Yahudi ngbe yá re-ngwie̱ ne mbe shi dudu.
Nné zhwe Yohana á be ya ki ti ga re-ankya ne Jesu ngu nyi zhwozhwo. Yohana a ye nné wehwie a tsi mbe.
Aa we te nwie Brrabe̱ he ré ya ki rinng he, “A nyi ngwe̱ ne i he ngwe̱ cwo be e̱ ka nzhi sa riyii a yaka aa?”
A zhe ne mbe be nwie Jesu, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Yohana Nyi Batisma níng te nwie ngwe̱ he nzhi ya re rinng he, ‘Nyi ngwe̱ ne i he ngwe̱ cwo be e̱, ka nzhi sa riyii a yaka aa?’ ”
We zhe ana Jesu kyia nné ruhu, ngu a trru re-rije, aa ci nnencwué̱ piriri á ri ewie.

Aha ni ngu a he ne nnenté Yohana he, “Nyi ning brru nyi ya ti Yohana kya ne nyi ri, ne nyi bra ho: nnencwué̱ ri ewie, nnenkú cwó ciee, nné ruhunzhwe̱ á she kyia, nnenré̱n á ho nka, nkwe nné cinye̱, yiriywé̱ bra shi ho Nka Rina.
Mwo rina nyi na nne nke ne ko ngu kpe aha nka nje we̱.”

A zhe ne nnenté Yohana mbe ne̱, Jesu a ne̱ ne he ne nneywí nka a zete Yohana he, “A zhe ne nyi ywa nwie Yohana a tsi yi, a nyi nda ne nyi i ywa ring? A nyi ya riti ntsi shi shi iica ne wu ki gbé̱ e̱e̱?
Ka nyi nda ne nyi i ywa ring? A nyi ya nne ne ngu ci ankya rina aa? Aawo, nné ne mbe cí re-ankya rina á srra a reri brrá nggwé̱ re ho shwing.
Ma nyi nda ne nyi i ywa ring? A nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng e̱e̱? Ee, cence, nje níng ting he he̱rri aa hle nne ti re̱se̱ng.
Nyi ngu ne̱ ne e wie nka ngu he,
‘Nje shi te nnente nje a ncwuee ngwe̱,
a ri ke̱she ngwe̱ re ya re nyi rê.’
Nje níng ting he a tsi rewe ne mbrrú nyi ne bîng, koó she ya ne ngu ne̱ Yohana we̱. Gbengbe ni, nne ne ngu nyi iishing a yarri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ki ne̱.”
Ga nné zhwozhwo he̱rri ngbe nné si gondu, a zhe ne mbe ho re-nka Jesu á shî he re-nka Be̱ne̱ shi ye̱ye̱rri, aha Yohana we nyi batisma.
Me̱di nné Farisi ngbe nné hu Nti Nka Musa á ra kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ngu rwe aha mbe, aha á bra ra ngbe batisma na Yohana.
Jesu a he, “Ma n fo nda n ning mwa yi ne nné nze̱ ne̱ ye̱? Á shi rimi ni e̱?
Á shi shi ne e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne mbe srra a nu kaawe̱ nwie yaa kyie̱ he,
‘Nzhi níng tsie̱ uuzhwu,
nyi bra ra shwo rocwu!
Nzhi níng ve ve naana naana,
nyi bra ra ku rana!’
Yohana Nyi Batisma be ko yé we̱ ko shwé we̱, nyi he he bi rije.
Kowe Nneywi e̱ be, a yé re shwe, nyi e̱ he he nyi kroozhwo, he nyi rwi nné si gondu ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱.
Me̱di nné mbe ne mbe she zentsi na Be̱ne̱ á shî he nka ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri.”
Ya nne Farisi ye Jesu he re ya ye yâ a ta ri ngu, Jesu ywa aa ya srra be a gumong ye yâ.
Ya mbrru ne ngu i nyi te̱le̱kyi ne ngu srra a ngwie̱ nna a ho he Jesu be ye yâ a ri nne Farisi nna, ngu a be mi ne oshwo turraren bi ncwé̱.
Aa ya yo a merin Jesu, dudu ne nta ngu nwie ku anaa re ki krro reyii a nta. Ngu a hu be nwie ying ne nkwe rici ngu re ki me ngu ne onu, ngu a ning kro turraren ana.
Zhe ne nne Farisi ngu ri ni, ngu a he we hwie ngu he, “Kundu nne ne̱ rā nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng aa rā hu zhwe mbrru ne ngu shi ki ria ne̱, aha a nyi mbrru nyi e̱ngwie̱.”
Jesu ki shing he, “Sima, nje shi re ti ya nka.”
Sima a he, “Ning ting, Nne Mie̱ Nka.”
Jesu a he, “Nné wehwie á fie̱ tsie nwie ya nne. Ya mbe bi tsie ngu onu ncwe̱ re-denarri nnywa wecwuoo,
Ko bi ya mbe ngu bi ncwe̱ng trrang we̱, aha nii, nne kwa tsie e̱ we we ntsie mbe e̱. A tsi mbe nné wehwie ana, ngwe̱ hwie nyi nye̱ ngu shi ki ce̱ kaka?”
Sima a he, “Nje hwie he nyi nne nke ne tsie ngu i zhwo we zhwo.”
Jesu a he, “Ngwe̱ he ye̱ye̱rr.”

Ngu a bra re nzhi nwie mbrru nna, ngu a he ne Sima he, “Ngwe̱ ri mbrru ne̱ e̱e̱? Nje be ri ngwe̱, ko ngwe̱ ning ngwa rishing kyu nta we̱, me̱di aa ning kyu nta ne reyii ngu nwie ning yi ngu ne nkwe rici ngu.
Ko ngwe̱ ning dzie ngwe̱ ning me ushwo we̱, me̱di mbrru ne̱ tu zhe ne nje ri ngwie he ne̱, aa ning me nta we̱sa ne kpo.
Ko ngwe̱ ning mia we̱, me̱di ngu a, aa ning kro turraren a nta.
Aha nii, nje re ting he, mbrru ne̱ ning ce̱ we yang aha ne nje ki we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu ne mbe zhwo we zhwo, me̱di nne ne e ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu tsie̱nzhwu, a ning ce̱ tsie̱nzhwu.”
Jesu a he ne mbrru nna he, “Á re we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngwe̱.”
Yá a tsi nné ne mbe shi ye yâ ngbe ngu a á ne̱ ne he nka a nci mbe he, “Nke e̱ nyi nye̱ he̱rri ne ngu we e̱ngwie̱ ne̱ e̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbrru nna he, “Ce̱ nka ngwe̱ re kyia; ywa we rina.”
Á srra tsie̱, Jesu a ne̱ re nzhi grra a yá re-ngwie̱ ngbe re-nkla re brro Nka Rina Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱. Nné ki zhwe shwa ne otu wehwie á shi ngbe ngu,
ngbe yá mbrrú ne e we trru re-rije, ne á bra we kyia ne nzhwe ruhu mbe. A ning bi Merri na nkla Magadali ne i ki trru re-rije komo natsie̱,
ngbe Yuwana mbrru Kuza, ne nto ngu nyi nnencwuee nné nyi cwuo a ri Hirridu ngbe Suzana ngbe kpi mbe piriri. Mbrrú ne̱ á ngwa re-ankya mbe ngbe ré ning she Jesung ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu.
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nné mbe shi nwie wrru re-ngwie̱ kanka kanka re be tsu a nwie Jesu. Aa we he ya nka zhwebe he,
“A bi ya nne kaa ne ngu ywa ni zhwe. A zhe ne ngu shi ni zhwe nna, yá kpi a nhwie̱ rê, á we shi be, re̱mie̱ yi á ta yhwe̱ wiriri.
Ngbe yá a kpi a ne̱hwan, zhe ne mbe ta á wre̱ ne hwe, aha ko zhwo bi mbè cancaa we̱.
Yá kpi a yarri re-ze̱kye̱, re-ze̱kye̱ ci ngbe mbe, mbe e̱ we rrwe.
He̱rri ne cwu yá kpi a mbè rina. Á wrru rina rina á ya ci riyii piriri re ne̱ na ce̱ucwung he̱rri ci nnywa zunzrru zunzrru.”
Zhe ne ngu he nka ne̱, ngu a he, “Nde nne bi re-uucwung hong re ho.”
Nné ki zhwe e̱ á ki rinng he nka zhwebe ne̱ he rimi ma?
Ngu a he, “Be̱ne̱ níng ngwa hu re̱se̱ng re-ankya la la na Ringgwe̱ ngu, me̱di a nwie yá, nje we heng ne re-nka zhwebe, aha,
‘Ko ngbe ne mbe ri, ko shi ré di we̱;
ko ngbe ne mbe ho, ko shi ré hu we̱.’
“Kya nka zhwebe nna ngu he e̱ nyi nke: zhwe nna nyi nka Be̱ne̱.
Re-na mbe kpi a nhwie̱ rê e̱ nyi zhwe nné ne mbe hó nka Be̱ne̱, ngbe Shetani we̱ be, we̱ ya ti kya ne mbe ho a a yarri rehwie mbe we̱ ne̱ mi, kishi á ri se̱ nka re she kyia.
Zhwe na ne mbe kpi a ne̱hwan a nyi zhwe nné ne mbe hó nka wé̱ wre̱ ne se̱ng ne ehwie kla, me̱di koó bi riti we̱. Á sé̱ a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu, me̱di zhe ne mwa ri ngu be, wé̱ kpi.

Zhwe na ngu kpi a yarri ze̱kye̱ ma, a nyi zhwe nné ne mbe sé̱ nka, me̱di zhe ne mbe shi ciee, wé̱ srra re-hwie nka ankya ebe ngwie̱ ngbe kre ncwe̱ ngbe ecwue ngwie̱ we̱ we rrwe, he̱rri wé̱ me̱nkye̱ng ci brrabrrang.
Me̱di zhwe na mbe kpi a mbè rina a nyi zhwe nné ne mbe hó, wé̱ bro gangga a yarri re-te̱nte̱ ronu rie rina mbe, ngbe wé̱ yaa rwe nwie nyi re-cwuo rina shi shi zhwe na mbe krro gbre we yang ana.
“Ko bi nne ngu cí ro te̱le̱kyi re bra ki ku ne onggo ka re sa a tahwie gondo we̱. Ne re nyi ni se re sa a kyang yo ngu aha nné ne mbe ngwie ré ri ewie si.
Ko bi yankya ngu shi la la ne á ri we we̱sa ting ci we̱; ko nda ne e ku, á ri hu a zhe ne e ki kla gbeng.

Aha nii, nyi ci nkwile̱ nyi ning bra hong. Nne ne ngu bi hu re̱se̱ng, á ri ki brang ngbe re ci piriri. Nne nke ne ko ngu bi hu re̱se̱ nka raywrra we̱, ngbe e̱we̱ kya ne ngu hwie he ngu bi e̱, á ri ngra se̱ a nva ngu.”
De̱ Jesu ngbe re-gimbe ngu a be nwie ngu, me̱di koó hung be dudu ne ngu we̱ aha rigwe̱ nneywí.
Ya nne e̱ he ne ngu he, “De̱ ngwe̱ ngbe re-gimbe ngwe̱ á shi tese á ce̱ re ri.”
Jesu a he, “De̱ nje ngbe re-gimbe nje e̱ á nyi nné ne mbe hó nka Be̱ne̱ re ning nyi cwuo a yarring.”
A ya otu, Jesu he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Nyi ning be nzhi tsa nzhwo rishi ne̱ re nzhi nyie ncwi.” Á ngwie a yarri konkro mbe e̱ ne̱.
A zhe ne mbe shi ciee, Jesu a ne̱ ndzie. Ya ngba ncwu a nyi ne igbe̱ nwie we gbe̱, he̱rri rishi ne̱ ne ngwie a yarri konkro nna. Ga mbe zhwozhwo a ngwie a yarri ge̱zhe̱.
Nné ki zhwe ngu a ywa á ya ki shwo, á he, “Be̱ri, Be̱ri nzhi shi ci shweni!” Aa cinye̱ ngu a ti ren ne ngba ncwu ngbe ne rishi ne ngu gbe̱ nna, wire wu a hwie̱ yo, ko nda a ci cereng.
Ngu a rin nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Ce̱ nka nyi e̱ shi he?” Owu we yhwe̱, á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu nwie yaa rin re-nka he, “Nyi nye̱ he ni e̱, he̱rri ne wu ngbe rishi mbe ki hó nka he ni e̱?”
Ngbe mbe e̱ tsa nyie a konkro re nzhi a nkla Garasi ne ngu shi a nyie Galili.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu cwucwu a rekyi nzhwo rishi, aa ya nyi ne ya nne bi rije ne ngu wru a yarri ngwie̱ nna. Aa fo zhe we yang ne ngu srra ngbe̱we̱ng ko bra srra a ri we̱, a srra a re-ria.

A zhe ne ngu ri Jesu, ngu a ya kpe a nyyi ngu, ngu a ci onu janjanja ne cwue ze nwie he, “Jesu Kowe Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱, nyi nda shwe nje ngbe ne ngwe̱ e̱e̱? Nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ he shi de̱ ngwe̱ ning ngwa cinci we̱.”

A he ni aha á ri ma ne Jesu ngu ti ren ne rije he re wru a yarri nne nna. Jie̱ re-zhe, re-rije e̱ á ki rrwe, ko ngbe ne e ki ci re-roonyo a nva ngbe nta ne e ki cwo, we̱ ca re-roonyo nna, ngbe re-rije wé̱ ki yu re nzhi gbong a tsi yi.
Jesu a ki rinng he, “Á re ye he nye̱?”
Ngu a he, “Piriri.
Re-rije e̱ ne̱ ne cwe nva ne Jesu he, shi de̱ re we yu re nzhi a ruvo we̱sa krrucing we̱.
A bi brra ekpri re-lede ne mbe shi reye a kpa, re-rije e̱ cwe nva ne Jesu he re we we ngbe mbe ya ngwie a yarri re-lede nna, Jesu a we shing.
A zhe ne re-rije nna mbe wrru a yarri nne nna, á ya ngwie a yarri re-lede he̱rri á kpri a brraa re nzhi kpi a yarri nzhwo rishi, á kwi.
A zhe ne nné cwo re-lede nna mbe ri kya ngu ci, mbe e̱ wre̱ ne to ncii re nzhi ting a yarri ngwie̱ ngbe nkla.
Nneywí wru re be ri kya ngu ci, a zhe ne mbe ya wre̱ nwie Jesu, á ya she nne ne e ki trru re-rije nna ngu srra dudu ne Jesu ne á ki ci ankya, ngu bra ci gbingbi. Owu we yhwe̱.
Nné ne mbe ri kya ngu ci e̱ á ning brru á ne̱ ne ti nneywí rê ne nne bi rije nna ngu ning she kyia.
Ga nné ngwie̱ Garasi e̱ á he he Jesu re ne̱ a ngwie̱ mbe, aha owu we yhwe̱. A zhe ne Jesu ngu ngwie a yarri konkro ngu shi ne̱,
nne ne e ki trru re-rije nna cwe nva ne Jesu he ngu shi ne̱ ngbe ne ngu, me̱di Jesu ki cire, a he ne ngu he,
“Ning brru ngwe̱ si ri ngbe ngwe̱ ya ti kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu re nying.” Aha ni ngu a ning brru re nzhi a yarri ngwie̱ nwie brro re̱se̱ kya ne Jesu ngu ki nying.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ya ning brru, rigwe̱ nneywí ya ki nyi rê, aha ga mbe zhwozhwo shi ki te.
Ngbe ya nne ne e ki ye he Yayirru ne ngu nyi nnencwuee a zonggrung mwe e̱ be ya hu be a nyyi Jesu nwie cwe nva ne ngu he re be ri ngu,
aha ewena zunzrru ngu ne ngu bi rie shwa ne otu wehwie shi nung hu.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu shi rê, rigwe̱ nneywi ya ki gbo.
A bi ya mbrru ne ngu nyi ne to roshwo he̱rri re-rie shwa ne otu wehwie, me̱di ko bi nne ngu hung ki kyia we̱.
Aa wre̱ ngu a ya yo a merin Jesu, ngu a re zhi tago ngu. We zhe zunzrru roshwo ngu a yo.
Jesu a rin he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu ning re?”
A zhe ne ga mbe zhwozhwo mbe klo, Pita ngu a he, “Ket, a Be̱ri, ngwe̱ hu he nneywí re grra ree yhwi.”
Me̱di Jesu he, “Ya ning re rra! Nje ho igbe̱ wru a yarri nje.”

A zhe ne mbrru nna ngu ri ko ngu ri hung ne̱ ranranng we̱, ngu a be ne tsi rwe̱, ngu a ya hu be a nyyi Jesu, a nyyi nné zhwozhwo, ngu a we ti kya ngu ci ne ngu ki re, ngbe rê ne ngu ning ci gbingbi we zheng.
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ka, a ro! Ce̱ nka ngwe̱ re kyia, ywa we rina.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu shi nwie he nka, ya nne ne ngu wru a ri Yayirru ne ngu nyi nnencwuee a zonggrung mwe e̱ be, ngu a he, “Ewena ngwe̱ e̱ hu, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ke̱ we ne yarra Nne Mie̱ Nka a ni we̱.”
Me̱di zhe ne Jesu ho ni, ngu a he ne Yayirru he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci owu wo, bi sa rie ngbe we̱ ci gbingbi.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ya wre̱ a ri Yayirru, koo we ya nne re ngwie ngbe ne ngu we̱ se we Pita, ngbe Yohana, ngbe Yakubu, ngbe be̱ng, ngbe de̱ng.
A zhe ana ga nné zhwozhwo shi riywe̱ nwie ku rana aha ngu. Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi we ni anaa, koo hu we̱, nyi ndzie ngu shi mi.”
Á ne̱ ne ki mi aha mbe hu he aa hu.
Jesu a ki pie va, ne brra riwie̱ng cwue ngu a he, “Ewena, cinye̱!”
Nshe ngu a ning brru, we zhe zunzrru ngu a deze. Wire Jesu a he ré ki ngwa yâ re ye.
Mbe be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu a hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu, me̱di Jesu he ne mbe he shi de̱ re ti ko ya nne kya ngu ci we̱.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ye nné ki zhwe shwa ne otu wehwie gbengbe, aa we ngwa de̱me̱ ngbe ne igbe̱ ré ning trru re-rije zhwozhwo ré bra ning kyia re-nzhwe ruhu.
Aa we te ré ywa ré ya brro nka Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ré kyia nné ruhu.
A he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi fo ko yankya a ciee ne̱ we̱ — ka ngbo, ka lente, ka brredi, ka ncwe̱, ka yaka tago.
Ka nyi zohu eri ne nyi ning ngwie, nyi srra miimi se otung deze nyi.
Kundu de̱ nneywí mbe níng se̱ we̱, nyi gbe̱ ruvu nta nyi a zhe ne nyi shi we ngwie̱ nna, a ri hwie̱ sheede a rici mbe.”
Aha nii, á kpi ci nwie grra re-nkla re brro Nka Rina re kyia nné ko he.
A zhe ne nggwe̱ Hirridu ho re-ankya ne Jesu shi nying, aa ki rwe rici, aha yá shi nwie he he nyi Yohana ngu dezeng hu.
Yá bra he nyi Iliya nne ti re̱se̱ng ne ngu be. Gbengbe ni, kpi ke̱ we ne he he nyi ya nne ti re̱se̱ng na tiya ne ngu vu.
Me̱di Hirridu he, “Nje ti Yohana rici. Ma nke e̱ nyi nye̱ ne nje ho zhwe re-nka ne̱ a rici ngu ne̱ e̱e̱?” Ngu a kre rê he ngu ki ri.
A zhe ne nnenté mbe ya ning brru re be nwie Jesu, á ki ti kya ne mbe ya nyi. Wire ngu a we ko we nggaa mbe re nzhi ya ngwie̱ ne e ki ye he Beseda.
Me̱di zhe ne rigwe̱ nneywí mbe ya ho ni, mbe e̱ ki zhwe. Aa we se̱, ngu a ne̱ ne we ti re̱se̱ nka Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱, re kyia nné ne mbe ce̱ re we kyia.

A zhe ne̱hin, nnenté shwa ne otu wehwie ana á be nwie ngu mbe e̱ he, “Ci rê rigwe̱ nné ne̱ ngbe ré ya grra a re-nkla ngbe rebe dudu ne̱ ré kre yâ ngbe rewieng srra, aha ewie ne nzhi níng shi ne̱ nyi eyi.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi we ngwa yâ ré ye shi.” Mbe e̱ he, “Nzhi bi we cwu brredi wecwuoo ngbe hwén wehwie — se ka nzhi ya se̱ yâ aha rugu nné ne̱ hoo.”
A tsi mbe e̱ a ning bi nné ntó weje ci wecwuoo. Me̱di a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he “Nyi we ci ré srra be a rekpri rekpri nshwa wecwuoo wecwuoo.”
Á nyi ni, ko nye̱ srra be.
A zhe ngu fo cwú brredi wecwuoo ngbe hwén wehwie, ngu a gbi riyii zinye̱, ngu a níng ci kijie̱ng, wire ngu a hwin ngu a ngwa nné ki zhwe ngu ré kye nnéng.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo á ye shwe, he̱rri nné ki zhwe ngu a á ko kpirri kya ngu hwie̱, aa ci grré shwa ne otu wehwie.
Ya zhe ne Jesu ngu i shi nwie ku Be̱ne̱ we nggaa ngu, nné ki zhwe ngu shi miimi, ngu a we rinng he, “Nneywí e̱ he nje nyi nye̱?”
Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Yá he ngwe̱ nyi Yohana Nyi Batisma, yá he ngwe̱ nyi Iliya, he̱rri ne cwu kpi he ngwe̱ nyi ya nne ti re̱se̱ng na tiya tiya ne ngu vu.”
Ngu a we rinng he “Ma nyi e̱ rre, nyi he nje nyi nye̱ ma?” Pita a wre̱ ne he, “Ngwe̱ nyi Krristi ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱.”
Jesu we gara nka ne igbe̱ he shi de̱ ré ti ko ya nneng we̱.
Ngu a he, “Se Kowe Nneywi
Ngu a he ne mbe zhwozhwo he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ ning zhwe, se re ra rici ngu, re fo gasankwe ngu ko zohu otu, ngbe re ning zhwe.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ cwo ce ngu we rici ngu, we̱ wi, me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ngwa ce ngu aha nje, we̱ she.
Rina nna nyi nda ne nneywi re she ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo, me̱di re bra wi ce ngu aa?
Ko nye̱ ne ngu to nshwu nje ngbe nti nka nje, Kowe Nneywi ri to nshwu ngu ma a zhe ne ngu ri be a yarri grime̱ ngu ngbe ne grime̱ Be̱ ngu ngbe na re-njeli wiri.
Nje níng ting cence he yá nné ne mbe yó a he ne ne̱, koó bi hu we̱ se ne mbe ri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Aa ci weje rotu klanva ne Jesu ngu he nka ne̱, ngu a fo Pita ngbe Yohana ngbe Yakubu re nzhi a zete ya rugu aha mbe ya ku Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne ngu shi ku Be̱ne̱, riyii ngu bra ngu a tsie̱ nse̱, ngbe tago ngu a ci kye̱kye̱ng nwie si zhanzhanzhaa.
Á srra yá nné wehwie e̱ ya ne̱ ne he nka ngbe ne ngu. A nyi Musa ngbe Iliya.
Á ya wre̱ a yarri grime̱ na zinye̱ nwie he nka ne ngu aha zhwe hu ne ngu shi hu a Urrushelima ye̱ye̱rri ne nka Be̱ne̱.
Pita ngbe re-nda ngu a á shi we ngba ndzie, me̱di zhe ne mbe shwo ndzie ne nyyi mbe ci prrita, á ri grime̱ Jesu ngbe ne nné wehwie ana mbe yo ngbe ne ngu.

A zhe ne nné wehwie nna mbe shi ne̱ mbe we Jesu, Pita a he ne ngu he, “Be̱ri, a bi rina ne nzhi shi he ne̱, nde nzhi nyi re-ndu wetsie̱, ya re nyi na ngwe̱, ya aha Musa, ya aha Iliya. A nyí ana koo hu kya ngu shi heng we̱.”
A zhe ne ngu shi nka, ya inyie̱ be ya we ku, he̱rri owu we yhwe̱ a zhe ne mbe shi a yarring.
Ya cwue e̱ wru a yarri inyie̱ he, “Nke e̱ nyi Kowe nje ne nje kyie, nyi ho nka ngu.”
A zhe ne cwue ana ngu ci cereng, á timi Jesu shi we nggaa ngu. Nné ki zhwe ngu a á bro kya ne mbe ri e̱ a rehwie mbe we nggaa mbe, koó ti ko ya nneng a zhe ana we̱.
A zhe ne mbe wro zete rugu re be be, rigwe̱ nneywí ya tsu nwie ngu.
Ya nne a tsi mbe ngu a ci onu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱, ri e̱we̱we nje ne nje ki bi we nggaa ngu ne̱.
Ya rije srrá we̱ ki me̱, we̱ kra ku, we̱ ki tsie be, ngbe we̱ ne̱ ne kwi, he̱rri fwihi we̱ ne̱ ne wru a nu ngu. Kundu ngu ki ce̱, ko ki we hwiehwie we̱, we̱ ki ci re-ruhu.
Nje cwe nva ne nné re zhwe ngwe̱ he ré ki kyia, me̱di á me̱nkye̱.”
Jesu a he, “Ket! A nné mbe rre! Nyi nyi riywe̱ shî nka, nyi brru. Nje shi srra ngbe nyi nwie yaa rwe he̱rri re nzhi cwu rekpe? Be mi ne ewe ngwe̱ e̱ he.”
We zhe ne nze̱we nna shi cwo re be nwie Jesu, rije nna ki tsie be, ngu a ne̱ ne kwi. Me̱di Jesu ti rije nna ne ren, ewe nna a ci gbingbi. Ngu a ki fo ngwa be̱ ngu.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu aha igbe̱ Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne ko nye̱ shi nga onu aha kya ne Jesu ngu nyi, ngu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he,
“Nyi sa uucwu nyi ho kya ne nje shi níng ting ne̱: á shi ngwa Kowe Nneywi a nva rwinkó ngu.”
Me̱di koó hu kya ne ngu he we̱. A we shi ywing, koó hung pie kya ne ngu ning shi nka we̱, a bra we bi owu ngbe mbe ki rinng.
Onu ce deze a yarri nné ki zhwe he nyi nye̱ a tsi mbe ne ngu shi hwie̱ brrang.
Jesu ne ngu hu hwie nka mbe, ngu a fo ya e̱we̱we, ngu a ki sa dudu ne ngu.

Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu se̱ e̱we̱we ne̱ a yarri lo nje, mahu aa ning se̱ nje, ko nye̱ ne ngu ning se̱ ma, aa se̱ nne ngu ning te. Nne ngu nyi iishing a yarri nyi zhwozhwo, nyi ngu ngu nyi brrabrrang.”
Yohana a he ne ngu he, “Be̱ri, nzhi she ya nne ne ngu shi yu re-rije ne lo ngwe̱, nzhi he ne ngu he re we ni aha ko nyi ya nzhi we̱.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Shi de̱ nyi ki yu we̱, nne nke ne ko ngu nyi rwinko nyi we̱, a nyi rwi nyi.”
A zhe ne zheng ne̱ Jesu re nzhi zinye̱ be dudu, Jesu rwe ehwie, ngu a pie rê re nzhi a Urrushelima.
Aa ke̱she lu nnenté ré ywa a ya kla a Samariya ngbe ré ya ne̱ ne ka nyi yá re-ankya ne mbe ri shi be.
Me̱di ko nné miimi e̱ á ki se̱ we̱ aha ne ngu nyia re nzhi Urrushelima.
A zhe ne mbe Yakubu ngbe Yohana mbe ri ni, mbe e̱ rin Jesu he, “Brrabe̱, ngwe̱ ce̱ nzhi ye ro re wru zinye̱ ngbe re we ye e̱e̱?”
Jesu bra ngu a we yhwire,
mbe e̱ wara re nzhi a yaka kla.
A zhe ne mbe shi cwo ciee a rê, ya nne he ne ngu he, “Nje shi re zhwe ko he ngwe̱ ning ywa.”
Jesu a ki shing ne nka zhwebe he, “Rovu yi bi nvo mbe, re̱mie̱ yi e̱ a bi reri, me̱di ko Kowe Nneywi e̱ bi ewieng nywe̱ rici ngu we̱.”
Ngu a he ne yaka nne he, “Ning zhwe.” Me̱di nne nna a shî he, “Brrabe̱, nde n ke̱she n ya nyie̱ ho nne nje wire.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “We nkwe nné ré yaa nyie̱ we nci mbe, me̱di ngwe̱ e̱ ywa ngwe̱ ya brro nka Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Gbengbe ni ya he, “Nje shi re zhwe, Brrabe̱, me̱di kande n ya ci nné nva nje ywaho.”
Jesu a he, “Nne ne ngu ci va a kaa, ngu bra bra ngu ri emerin, koo be ngbe re nyi cwuo na Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
A merin nke Brrabe̱ kyie yaká nné nshwa natsie̱ ne wehwie
A he ne mbe he, “Ebe yâ a brri we brri, me̱di nné cang nna koó ning bing we̱. Nyi cwe nva ne Brrabe̱ bi ebe e̱ ngbe re lu nnencwuó ré ya ca.
Nyi ywa! Nje níng te shi nyi nyí canvé a yarri re-nyanya yi.
Shi de̱ nyi fo ya e̱we̱ lente, ka brrabrrang, ka yaka tamri we̱. Shi de̱ nyi dzie ya nne a rê we̱.
“Ko zohu eri ne nyi níng ngwie, nyi ke̱she he, ‘Be̱ne̱ re níng mwo rina.’
A ri bi ya nne ce̱ srra rina a ri nna, mwo rina nyi e̱ we̱ hwie̱ a ngu, de̱ ni we̱, nyi e̱ ning brru mi ne ngge nyi.
Nyi srra a ri ne e níng se̱, nyi ye nyi shwe ko nda ne e níng ngwa, aha aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nnencwuo re she lede ngu. Shi de̱ nyi grra reri reri we̱.
“Kundu nyi ngwie a ngwie̱ ne e níng se̱, nyi ye ko nda ne e níng ngwa.
Nyi kyia nné ruhu ne nyi we she miimi, nyi we ting he, ‘Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ be dudu ne nyi.’
Me̱di kundu nyi ngwie a ya ngwie̱ ne e ra níng se̱, nyi ywa a brra re-rê, ngbe nyi e̱ he,
‘Ko ngbe ruvu mbè ngwie̱ nyi ne ngu shi a nta nzhi, nzhi níng gbe̱ ngge nyi. Me̱di gbengbe ni, nyi bi hu re̱se̱ng he Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ be dudu.’
Nje níng ting he á ri he tuuye, a ri nyi canca Sodo ne ngwie̱ ana.

“Wuhu ne nyi nné ngwie̱ Korrazi! Wuhu ne nyi nné ngwie̱ Beseda! Kundu re-cwuong nga onu ne e nyi a yarri nyi rā nyi a Taya ngbe Sido ne e ning nying, á rā re si ywe̱ gbangba nwie srra ne re-igye̱ ankya a zete rugu nto.
Me̱di a ri nyi canca Taya ngbe Sido ne nyi a Tung Nyi Nka.
Ngbe nyi nné ngwie̱ Kafanahu, nyi hwie he á ri níng ko re nzhi zinye̱ e̱e̱? Hayi! Á ri wro ne nyi re nzhi cwuncwuu ruvo ci yhwrro.
“Nne ne ngu hó nka nyi, a hó nka nje; nne ne ngu níng rá, a ning rá; me̱di nne ne ngu ning rá maahu a rá nne ne ngu ning te ma.”
Nné nshwa natsie̱ ne wehwie
Jesu he, “Nje ri Shetani ngu wru zinye̱ ngu kpe be shi nyi ewie ngu ci mele.
Nje níng ngwa de̱me̱ nyi ning shi nshé ngbe nnywá te nné ngbe ko zohu igbe̱ rwinko, ko bi ko yankya re níng she we̱.
Gbengbe ni, shi de̱ rekwi nyi re shi he nyi drre̱ re-rije wo, me̱di rekwi nyi re shi aha he á wie re-lo nyi a zinye̱.”

A zhe ana Jesu nyi rekwi we yang a yarri Nshe Wiri, a he, “Nje re de Be̱, Brrabe̱ zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱, aha ngwe̱ la nné bi zentsi ngbe nné hu re̱se̱ng re-ankya ne̱, ngwe̱ kla e̱we̱e̱ reweng. A shi ni Be̱, aha nke nyi kya ce̱ ngwe̱.
Be̱ nje ne ngu shi zinye̱ e̱ ning ngwa ga re-ankya zhwozhwo a nva nje. Ko bi ya nne ngu hu Kowe we̱ se we Be̱, ko bra bi ya nne ngu hu Be̱ we̱ se we Kowe ngbe nné mbe ne Kowe ngu we ti ngu.”
Aa bra re nzhi nwie nné ki zhwe ngu, ngu a we ting ranranng he, “Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne mbe rí kya ne nyi ri ne̱.
Nje níng ting he nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe nggwé̱ á ce̱ he mbe ri re-ankya ne nyi ri ne̱, me̱di koó she we̱; á ce̱ ho kya ne nyi ho ne̱, me̱di koó she we̱.”
A ya zhe, ya nne hu re̱se̱ Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa deze ngbe ngu mwa Jesu. A ki rinng he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, n nyi rimi ngbe n she ce na he̱rri tiya aa?”
Jesu ki rinng he, “Nyi nda ne e wie a yarri krre̱de̱ng Nti Nka Musa? Ngwe̱ ki hwie rimi?”

Ngu a kara he, “ ‘Ce̱ Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ngwe̱ ne ehwie ngwe̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe ce ngwe̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe ne igbe̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe yarri hwie ngwe̱ zhwozhwo,’ ngwe̱ bra ‘Ce̱ nne dudu ne ngwe̱ shi rici ngwe̱.’ ”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ he ye̱ye̱rri, nyi ni ngbe ngwe̱ she ce.”
Me̱di a ce̱ ti rici ngu; aha nii, a rin Jesu he, “Ma nyi nye̱ ngu nyi nne dudu ne nje e̱e̱?”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ya nne wru ciee a Urrushelima ngu wro re nzhi Jerriko, ngu a ya ngwie a nva nné nca. Á ki cwe ki trru ankya, á ne̱ ki we a nung hu.
Ya prristi i nyi ne ciee ngu, aa ya timi ne ngu nywe̱. Ngu a cie̱ a bamba ngu a wara ne ciee ngu.
Ya nne Levi
Me̱di ya nne Samariya

Ngu a be nwie ngu, ngu a ya ne̱ ne ki kyu ngbé̱ nna ne rishi ruto nwie ki ywi remie, ngu a ki rwe ngu. Wire ngu a ki fo a zete nze̱e̱kyi ngu re nzhi a ya ering cwucwu nné ice ngbe ré ci nkwile̱ ne ngu.
Aa shwo mincwe ngu a ti cwe ncwe̱ denarri wehwie
“A tsi mbe nné wetsie̱ ne̱, ngwe̱ hwie he nyi nye̱ ngu shi dudu ne nne ngu ngwie a nva nné nca ne̱ e̱?”
Nne hu re̱se̱ Nti Nkang mie̱ nka Musa nna he, “Nyi nne nke ne ngu ri naana ngu.” Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ywa ngwe̱ ya nyi ni ma.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu mbe shi ciee, á ya wre̱ a ya kla. Ya mbrru ne e ki ye he Marrta a se̱ Jesu a ri ngu.
A bi gimbe ngu ewerembrru ne e ki ye he Merri. Aa srra be dudu nwie ho re-nka ne Jesu ngu he.

Me̱di Marrta ke̱ we ne ci nkwile̱ ne re-cwuo ngu shi nying. Ngu a be nwie Jesu, ngu a he, “Brrabe̱, ngwe̱ ri aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne Merri e̱ ning we nje shi yaa ta nwie nyi re-cwuo ne̱ we nggaa nje e̱e̱? He ne ngu he re ning sheng we̱!”
Brrabe̱ e̱ he, “Marrta, Marrta, rimi ne ngwe̱ ke̱ we ne bē aha re-ankya yang, he̱rri ehwie ngwe̱ rro aa?
Me̱di a nyi we kya zunzrru ne ngu bi mpe̱ni, Merri e̱ kyie kya rina, ko bra bi ré se̱ a nwie ngu we̱.”
A ya otu Jesu shi ku Be̱ne̱ a ya ewie. A zhe ne ngu ku yhwe̱, ya nne ki zhwe ngu a he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, níng mie̱ ku Be̱ne̱ shi ne Yohana ngu ki mie̱ nné ki zhwe ngung ma.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “A zhe ne nyi shi ku Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi he,
ré ci lo wiri ngwe̱ grime̱,
ringgwe̱ ngwe̱ re be.
Níng ngwa yâ ye nzhi ko zohu otu.
Níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi,
shi ne nzhi we nné mbe níng nyi e̱ngwie̱ ma.
Níng kye̱ ne mwa ri.’ ”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi nye̱ a tsi nyi ne ngu bi rwi, ngu a ywa a nwie ngu a tsi totu ngu a he ne ngu he, ‘A rwi, ning fie̱ tsie cwu brredi wetsie̱,
aha ya rwi nje nyi ciee aa be nwie nje, ko nje bi ko yankya ne nje shi ki ngwa we̱.’
“Rwi ngu ne ngu shi yarring nna a kara he, ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ning rro uucwu ni we̱. Onusinye shi she̱, nje ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe nje e̱ nzhi bra shi ndzie. Ko shi n hung deze n re ngwa yankya we̱.’
Nje shi níng ting he ko ngbe ne ko ngu shi deze ngu ki ngwa yankya aha iirwi we̱ me̱di aha me̱ ne ngu ki me̱ we̱ deze we̱ ki ngwa kya ne ngu ce̱.
“Aha nii, nje he ne nyi he: nyi rin, wé̱ níng ngwa; nyi kre, nyi e̱ she; nyi cwe ewie, wé̱ níng klang.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu rin, wé̱ ki ngwa; nne ne ngu kre, we̱ she; nne ngu cwe onusinye, wé̱ ki klang.
Nyi nye̱ a tsi nyi re-be̱, kundu ewe ngwe̱ rin aha hwen, ngbe ngwe̱ ki ngwa nshe e̱e̱?
Ka rin aha ricii nngwie̱ ngbe ngwe̱ e̱ ki ngwa nnywa te nné e̱e̱?
Ce̱ rimi nyi ne nyi nyí nné e̱ngwie̱ nyi hung ngwa rewe nyi te̱nte̱ ankya, wire re ning hwie̱ Be̱ ne ngu shi zinye̱! Ko nyi hwie he we̱ ngwa nné mbe ne mbe ki rin aha Nshe Wiri we̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu i shi ti ya rije ne ngu be̱ ya nne onu. Zhe ne rije nna ngu wru rumwa nna a ne̱ ne he nka he̱rri nneywí nye̱ we ronu.
Yá mbe he, “Jesu trrú re-rije ne igbe̱ Beelzebu, nggwe̱ re-rije.”
Yá mbe be he ngbe mbe ki mwa, á he re we wru mi ne yankyang hwie̱ nga onu a zinye̱.
Jesu hu kya ne mbe shi hwieng, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ko zohu ringgwe̱ ne ngu ci kanka he̱rri ngu hla nsa wehwie we̱ se̱; eri ne ngu hla ngu ci kanka ma we̱ gu.
Nyi he he nje trru re-rije ne igbe̱ Beelzebu. Kundu Shetani we rici ngu ngu yaa kye kanka wé̱ ce̱ rimi ringgwe̱ ngu a re yo aa?
Aha nii, kundu nje trru re-rije ne igbe̱ Beelzebu, ma nné e nyi e̱ rre, á trru na mbe e̱ ne nda? Maahu mbe e̱ shi níng nyi nka.
Me̱di kundu nje ri trru re-rije e̱ ne igbe̱ Be̱ne̱, maahu Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ be nwie nyi.
“Kundu nne bi igbe̱ ngu hwrra ankyang ko ngu cwo eri ngu, ko shi yankya ngu re ci shweni we̱.
Me̱di kundu ya nne ngu bi igbe̱ re ki ne̱, ngu kwe̱ ngu shwe igbe̱ ngu, we̱ si re-ankyang ko ngu ne ngu ning sa rie, we̱ kye re-ankya nna.
“Nne ne de̱ ngu shi ngbe nje we̱, maahu a ning ra. Nne nke ne ngu ra tsung ngbe nje, maahu shi sē̱ng.”
“A zhe ne rije ngu wru a yarri nne, we̱ ne̱ re nzhi a rewie hwahwa nwie kre ewieng srra cwu, de̱ ngu ya she we̱, wire we̱ he, ‘Nje shi ning brru re nzhi a ri ne nje we.’
Zhe ne ngu ya ning brru, we̱ ya she ne e ko eri nna wiri á ning ta ko nda rina.
Wire we̱ ning brru re nzhi ko yá re-rije natsie̱ ne mbe bi hwie̱ kaka re ki ne̱ ngu a, wé̱ be wé̱ ya srra a miimi. Emerin ngu we̱ ya bi ge̱zhe̱ re ne̱ ce̱ucwung.”
Zhe ne Jesu shi he re-nka ne̱, ya mbrru ci onu a yarri nné he, “Mwo rina shi ngbe de̱ ne ngu re bî ne ngu bra re bro.”
Jesu a he, “Mwo rina shi yang a nwie nné mbe ne mbe ho nka Be̱ne̱ re ning nyi cwuo.”
A zhe ne nneywí mbe cwoo ci piriri, Jesu ne̱ ne he ne mbe he, “Nné a nze̱ ne̱ á bi hwie̱. A kre kyang hwie̱ nga onu, me̱di ko bi ya ne shi we nying we̱ we̱sa ne na Jona.
Ye̱ye̱rri shi ne Jona ngu i hwie̱ e̱ sheede a nwie nné Nineva. Kowe Nneywi ri shi ni a nze̱ ne ma.

Mbrru ringgwe̱ nva kudu ri deze a tung nyi nka ngbe nné na nze̱ ne̱ we̱ we ye ne nka, aha a i wru a krruci ebe ngwie̱ ngbe ngu ya ho zentsi Solomo. Me̱di a bi ya ne ngu yo a yarri nyi he ne̱, ne ngu ne̱ Solomo.
Nné Nineva a ri deze a tung nyi nka ngbe nné a nze̱ ne̱ wé̱ we ye ne nka, aha á i si ywe̱ a zhe ne Jona ngu we brro nka. A zhe ne ne̱, ya ne ngu ne̱ Jona shi he.
“Ko bi ya nne ngu ci ro a fitile̱ re sa a nwie la la, ka re ki cwugru ne grre we̱. Se ka re sa a zete kyang sang ngbe ko nye̱ ngu ngwie we̱ ri nse̱ ngu si.
Riyii ngwe̱ nyi fitile̱ rwe̱ ngwe̱. Kundu riyii ngwe̱ bi rina maahu rwe̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo tsie̱ nse̱ e̱ ke̱sss. Me̱di kundu riyii ngwe̱ e̱ she ruhu, rwe̱ ngwe̱ e̱ we̱ shi we̱e̱ ywing.
Aha nii, yaa mwa ngwe̱ ri ka nse̱ ngu shi a yarri ngwe̱ e̱ nyi ewie ywi.
Aha nii, kundu rwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo tsie̱ nse̱ ke̱sss we̱sa ne ya ewie ngu shi ywing, zhwozhwo rwe̱ ngwe̱ e̱ we̱ si shi nse̱ fitile̱ ne ngu re tsie̱ ngwe̱ nse̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he nka yhwe̱, ya nne Farisi i ki ye he re ya ye yâ ngbe ngu, ngu a ywa ngu a ya srra be a gumong ye yâ.
Me̱di nne Farisi e̱ hwie̱ nga onu aha ngu ri ko Jesu ke̱she kyu nva wire ngu ce̱ ye yâ ye̱ye̱rri ne teede mbe we̱.
Brrabe̱ e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nyi nné Farisi nyi kyu we teme kwrreshi ngbe teme onggong ye yâ, me̱di a yarring, nyi si ankya nneywí ne igbe̱, nyi bi hwie̱.
Nyi nné riywe̱ zentsi! Ko nyi hu he nne ne ngu nyi temeng, nyi ngu ne ngu bra nyi yarring wo ye̱?
Nyi ngwa yiriywé̱ kya rina ne ngu shi a yarring, wire ko nda we̱ ci wiri a yarri nyi.

“Wuhu ne nyi nné Farisi! Nyi ngwá Be̱ne̱ zaka na re-rikwe bi shwe̱ rina he̱rri ngbe yaká re-nzhwe rikwe zhwozhwo. Me̱di nyi ra raywrra Be̱ne̱ ngbe ce̱ ngu. A nyi mbe ne̱ ne mbe mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne nyi ra nyi we̱sa ne we mbe ncwi e̱.
“Wuhu ne nyi nné Farisi, aha nyi ce̱ te̱nte̱ rewieng srra a re-zonggrung mwe. Nyi ce̱ he e ri ma níng dzie a kaawe̱.
“Wuhu ne nyi aha nyi shi shi re-ria ne koó ri we̱,
Ya nne hu re̱se̱ Nti Nka Musa ki shing he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, re-ankya ne ngwe̱ he ne̱ ngwe̱ shi níng cwi ma.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi nné hu re̱se̱ Nti Nka Musa, wuhu ne nyi, aha nyi kpe nneywí re-nkpe ruvo, me̱di nyi we nci nyi ko nyi re reng ma gung we̱.
“Wuhu ne nyi, nyi no re-ria nné ti re̱se̱ng ne re-yo nyi mbe i we yhwi.
Aha nii, nyi ngwá sheede he nyi shî kya ne re-yo nyi mbe i nyi e̱, á yhwi nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe nyi e̱ no re-ria mbe.
Be̱ne̱ a zetsi hu re̱se̱ng ngu a he, ‘Nje ri we te mi ne nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe nnenté, á ri yhwi kpi mbe, wé̱ ngwa kpi mbe cinci.’
Aha nii, á ri nyi nné nze̱ ne̱ nka aha roshwo nné ti re̱se̱ng zhwozhwo ne á nyi ne wang tu ce̱ucwu ebe ngwie̱,
kya ngu ce̱ a roshwo Habila re nzhi roshwo Zakariya ne i ki yhwe̱ a zetsi ewie briing nyi teede ngbe ewie wiri na Brranyi. Cence, nje níng ting he se ne e nyi nné nze̱ ne̱ nka aha ni.
“Wuhu ne nyi nné hu re̱se̱ Nti Nka Musa, aha nyi hwie̱n nneywí rêng hu re̱se̱ng, ko nyi we nci nyi nyi ngwie we̱, nyi bra kpo nne ne mbe ce̱ ning ngwie.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu wru miimi, nné Farisi ngbe nné hu re̱se̱ Nti Nka Musa a ne̱ ne ki kwa be, á ki me̱ firiri nwie ki rin re-nka,
aha mbe she rê mbe ki pie a yarri re-nka ngu.
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nne we yang mbe ya tsu, he̱rri a ne̱ ne yaa shi nta, Jesu ke̱she he nka ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne brra onu nné Farisi, ne ngu shi shi ne yisti.
Ko bi yankya ne ngu shi ku ne e ri we we̱sa klang, ka ngu shi la la ne ri we we̱sa hung we̱.
Kya ne nyi he a nwie ywing á ri ho a tsi te̱ne̱, kya ne nyi he ranranng gbong a yarri e̱binyi, á ri kyie̱ a zete re-zonggru.
“Nje níng ting, rwí nje, he shi de̱ nyi to owu nné mbe ne mbe hung yhwe̱ we ikpe rwe̱, me̱di koó hung nyi yankya ne̱ ni we̱.
Me̱di nde n níng ti nne ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi to owu ngu a. Nyi to owu Be̱ne̱ ne kundu ngu yhwe̱ ikpe rwe̱, a bra bi igbe̱ re ki zhwu a ruvong ro. Cence, nje níng ting he nyi to owu ngu.
“Ko rie̱ re-genshee wecwuoo a kovo wehwie we̱ e̱e̱? Gbengbe ni, ko ga bru Be̱ne̱ ne ko ya mbe we̱.
Cence, Be̱ne̱ hu he̱rri ngbe piriri nkwe rici nyi zhwozhwo. Shi de̱ nyi ci owu wo, nyi bi mpe̱ni re ne̱ ngbá rekpri re-genshee we gbong.
“Nje níng ting he, ko nye̱ ne ngu ti we gbeng a nyyi nneywí he ngu nyi na nje, Kowe Nneywi ri ti we gbeng ni ma a nyyi re-njeli Be̱ne̱.
Nne ne ngu ti we gbeng he ko ngu nyi na nje we̱ a nyyi nneywí, nje ri ti ni ma he ko nyi na nje we̱ a nyyi re-njeli Be̱ne̱.
“Ko nye̱ ne ngu he nka e̱ngwie̱ a zete Kowe Nneywi wé̱ hung ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu, me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu he nkang dzie̱ Nshe Wiri, ko shi ré ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu we̱.
“Kundu ne e níng prre ne be mi ne nyi a zonggrung mwe, ka a nyyi nggwé̱, ka a nyyi brrá nnencwueé, shi de̱ nyi bē aha kya ne nyi ri nyi ka nyi ri he we̱.
Aha Nshe Wiri shi níng mie̱ kya ne nyi shi heng a zhe ana.”
Ya nne a yarri ekpri nneywí nna he ne Jesu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, he ne gimbe nje he re kye gado be̱ nzhi re ning ngwa na nje.”
Jesu he ne ngu he, “Ka a rwe! Nyi nye̱ ngu ning ci he n hwie̱ nne níng nyi nka, ka nne níng kye ankya aa?”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ci nkwile̱! Nyi yaa cwo ne re-nzhwe ecwue. Ko ce nneywi ne̱ shi aha re-ankya ne ngu brri mi we̱.”
Wire ngu a we ti nka zhwebe he, “Ebe ya nne bi va ci yâ we yang.
Ngu a hwie a yarri hwie ngu he, ‘Nje shi nyi rimi ne̱? Ko nje bi ewie ngu be ngbe n ning sa yâ nje ne̱ we̱.’
“Ngu a he, ‘Kya ne nje shi nying nna nyi nke, nje shi hwin re-aata nje ne̱ ngbe n no brrabrráng, wire ma n kro yâ nje ngbe re-ankya nje a yarring fa.
Wire ma n he ne ce nje he ngwe̱ bi ko nda rina ne ngwe̱ ce̱ he̱rri re-rie we yang, nywe̱ we dengge, ngwe̱ ye, ngwe̱ shwe ngwe̱ nyi rekwi.’
“Me̱di Be̱ne̱ he ne ngu he, ‘Ngwe̱ rumwa! A totu ne̱ ngwe̱ shi hu. Wire nyi nye̱ ngu ri hwie̱ ne ankya ne ngwe̱ tsu aa?’
“Aha nii, a shi ni ne ko nye̱ ne ngu tsu dukyie̱e̱ aha rici ngu, me̱di ko bi ko yankya a nwie Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
Jesu he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Aha nii, nje níng ting, shi de̱ nyi bē aha srra nyi we̱, aha kya ne nyi shi yeng ka ankya ne nyi shi cing a re-rwe̱ nyi.
Aha ce nyi e̱ ne̱ yâ ye, rwe̱ nyi e̱ bra ne̱ ankya ci.
Nyi di gwrré, koó kye̱ we̱, koó bra ca yâ we̱, koó bra bi uucwu vie̱ ka aata we̱, gbengbe ni Be̱ne̱ we ngwa yâ. Ko nyi e̱ nyi ne̱ re̱mie̱ yi we̱ e̱e̱?
Nyi nye̱ a tsi nyi ne kundu ngu srra re bē he̱rri we̱ hu ning bra awa zunzrru a nce ngu aa?
Tu ne ko shi nyi hung nyi e̱we̱ kya tsie̱nzhwu ni we̱, aha nda ne nyi srra re bē ne kpi re-ankya ni e̱?
Nyi ri re-vooshwo ne mbe ci, koó nyi cwuo we̱, koó bra yaa cwi ankya á mwa yi mbe we̱. Nje níng ting he ko nggwe̱ Solomo ne grime̱ ngu a, ko risa ngu i cwu na ya mbe ne̱ we̱.
Kundu ngu Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci ntsi yi ankya rina ni ne a cwu á we ri á bi ke̱, me̱di a encwe wé̱ hwe, wé̱ e̱ bra wa a nro, we̱ ce̱ rimi we̱ níng we nyi e̱ ni e̱e̱? Hei nyi ma! Nyi nné riywe̱ sa rie!
Shi de̱ nyi srra re hwie nka aha kya ne nyi shi yeng ka nyi shi shweng we̱; de̱ nyi bē wo.
Ga nné tsi ngwie̱ e̱ á kre zhwe re-ankya ne̱, Be̱ nyi ne ngu shi zinye̱ e̱ hu he nyi ce̱ ma.
Aha nii, nyi ke̱she kre Ringgwe̱ ngu, wire we̱ níng ngwa ga re-ankya ne̱.
“Shi de̱ nyi ci owu we̱, e̱we̱ ekpri canvé nje, Be̱ nyi e̱ bi ehwie kla ngbe ngu níng ngwa Ringgwe̱ ngu.
Nyi rie̱ ko nda ne nyi bi, nyi ngwa yiriywé̱ ncwe̱ nna. Nyi sa ncwé̱ nyi a nwie ne ko ngu rre we̱, nyi sa dukyie̱e̱ nyi a zinye̱ a nwie ne ko ngu vie sa we̱, ko nnencá á hwan we̱, ko zhe bra ye we̱.
Aha ewie ne dukyie̱e̱ nneywi ning shi, rie ngu we̱ shi miimi ma.
“Nyi yaa sha nyi srrante aha cwuo, re-fitile̱ nyi re bra tsie̱ nse̱
shi shi nné ne mbe srra re te be̱ri mbe ne ngu fu a nwie bikyi nyrra, aha we zhe ne ngu ya ning brru ngu cwe gbundu ré wre̱ ne ki klang we hwiehwie.

Mwo rina nyi na nnencwuó ne be̱ri mbe ngu ya we she mbe shi srrante a zhe ne ngu be. Nje níng ting cence he, a ri ci ankyang cwuo ne rici ngu aha ngu we nyi cwuo, a ri we ci ré srra be a tebrru ne ngu we kyé ya.
Mwo rina nyi na nnencwuó ne be̱ri mbe ngu be ngu ya we she ne mbe shi srrante a tsi totu ka brra nyiencwe.
Me̱di nyi hu re̱se̱ng he kundu be̱ri eri ra hu zhe ne nne nca ngu cwo be, koo ra we ngbe ré ya hwin eri ngu he̱rri ré ning ngwie we̱.
Aha nii, se nyi ma nyi srrante aha ko nyi hu zhe ne Kowe Nneywi ngu cwo be we̱.”
Pita rin he, “Brrabe̱, nyi nzhi ne ngwe̱ shi níng he nka zhwebe ne̱ ka nyi ko nye̱ e̱e̱?”

Brrabe̱ ki shing he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu nyi nnencwuee a nwieng cwuo ne ngu bi zentsi ngbe ré hung sa rie a ngu a? Nyi ngu ne be̱ri ngu ki ngwa ruhong ri nnencwuó ngu, ne ngu srra re we ngwa yâ, re we trra ncwé̱ a zhe ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri.
A ri nyi kya rina kundu ne be̱ri ngu a ya ning brru ngu ya ki she ngu shi nying ye̱ye̱rri ni.
Nje níng ting cence, we̱ ki ngwa de̱me̱ re hwie̱ nne bro re-ankya ngu zhwozhwo.
Me̱di kundu ngu nnencwuee nna ngu hwie nka a hwie ngu he, ‘Be̱ri nje ne̱ fo zhe we yang, ko cwo be ri hwiehwie we̱,’ we̱ ne̱ ne cwe hwié nna ntó ngbe mbrrú, we̱ ne̱ ne ye re shwe re dzio rici.
Be̱ri ngu a ri shi ya wre̱ a ya otu ne ko ngu ning hwie yi we̱, a zhe ne ko ngu ru we̱. We̱ ya ki ca re-ukuukung we̱ kro a nwie nné ra nka.
“Ngu hwie ne ngu hu kya ce̱ be̱ri ngu, me̱di ko ngu ci nkwile̱ we̱, ko ngu bra nyi kya ne be̱ri ngu a ngu ce̱ we̱, wé̱ ki cwe we te̱nte̱ cwe.

Me̱di nne nke ne ko ngu hu kya ce̱ be̱ri ngu we̱, ne ngu nyi kya ré ki cwe we re̱n, wé̱ ki cwe tsie̱nzhwu. Nne ne e ki ngwa piriri, á ri kre piriri a nwie ngu; nne ne e ki ngwa piriri re ne̱, á ri ce̱ re be mi piriri re ne̱ ma.
“Nje be mi ne ro a be ngwie̱, nje ce̱ he aa ra shi ye.
Me̱di nje bi ya batisma na cinci ne nje shi nying. Nje ho a ning ruvo a yarri rwe̱ nje se ne ngu ri wara wire!
Nyi hwie he nje be mi ne srra rina a be ngwie̱ e̱e̱? Aawo, nje níng ting he nje be mi ne srra kanka.
Kya ngu pie a zhe ne ne̱, a shi bi nné wecwuoo a yarri eri nne zunzrru ne mbe shi yaa kye kanka, wetsie̱ á ri bra a nné wehwie, wehwie wé̱ bra a nné wetsie̱.
Á ri yaa kye, be̱ ri ce̱trri ewe ngu,
ewe we̱ ce̱trri be̱ ngu;
de̱ ri ce̱trri ewena ngu,
ewena we̱ ce̱trri de̱ ngu;
kwe ri ce̱trri kunve ngu,
kunve we̱ ce̱trri kwe ngu.”
Jesu a he ne rigwe̱ nné he, “A zhe ne nyi ri inyie̱ ngu ci ri a nva ta, we hwiehwie nyi e̱ he, ‘Nze shi wie,’ we̱ shi ni.
Zhe ne wu ngu wru a nva kudu ngu yhwa nyi e̱ he, ‘Ewie shi yhwi,’ we̱ shi ni.
Nné brra ronu! Nyi hung ti re-zhe na ebe ngwie̱ ngbe zinye̱. Rimi ne nyi me̱nkye̱ng ti re-ankya mbe shi ci a re-zhe ne e̱e̱?
“Nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nyi hu yaa nyi nka we nci nyi ngbe nyi nyi kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri we̱ ye̱?

Zhe ne ngwe̱ shi ciee ngbe rwinko ngwe̱ re nzhi nwieng nyi nka, nyi kwe̱kwe̱ ngwe̱ cwue̱ nka ngbe ngu a rê, kishi a ri re kwa re nzhi nwie nne nyi nka, nne nyi nka we̱ re ngwa a nva re-ukungbo ngbe ré re ci uucwu gyiaa.
Nje re ting he, ko shi ngwe̱ wru we̱ se ngwe̱ trra kpara kovo ne ré zhwe.”
A zhe ana, a i bi yá nné ne mbe shi miimi ne mbe ti Jesu he Bilatu i yhwi yá nné Galili a zhe ne mbe shi nyi teede mbe.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi hwie he nné Galili ne á ki yhwi ana á nyi nyrrukiki nné e̱ngwie̱ re ne̱ ga kpi nné Galili e̱ zhwozhwo aha ne mbe shwe ge̱zhe̱ ni e̱e̱?
Aawo, ko shi ni we̱! Nje níng ting he se nyi se̱ ywe̱, de̱ ni wo nyi e̱ ci shweni zhwozhwo nyi ma.
Ka nyi hwie he nné shwa ne otu klanva ne brra runo dede a Silo ngu i gu ngu we nyie̱ he̱rri mbe kwi ana, re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe e̱ á ne̱ na ga nné ne mbe srra a Urrushelima a zhwozhwo aa?
Aawo, ko shi ni we̱! Nje he ne nyi he se nyi se̱ ywe̱, de̱ ni wo nyi e̱ ci shweni zhwozhwo nyi ma.”
Ngu a we ti nka zhwebe he, “Ya nne i bi ekwe riyhwietsie ne ngu tsi a nhwie̱n ngu, ngu a ywa ngu ya ri ka aa ci gbre. Koo ya she yankya we̱.
Aha nii, ngu a he ne nnencwuo ngu he, ‘Aa ci re-rie wetsie̱ ne nje cwo kre gbre a ekwe ne̱, me̱di ko bi ko yankya we̱. Ki tsa ngwe̱ zhwu! We̱ dzio ewie e̱ we shweni ni e̱ aha nda?’
“Nne nna ngu a he, ‘Be̱ri, ki we he̱rri yaka rie wa, ngbe n ki cwue̱ n ning ci rivi.
Kundu ngu ri ci gbre a rie ngu cwo be we̱ bi rina, de̱ ni we̱, nzhi e̱ tsa nzhi zhwu.’ ”
Jesu i shi mie̱ nka a ya zonggrung mwe a Tung Srra Cwu,
A bi ya ho mbrru ne rije ki ci rugu teme he̱rri re-rie shwa ne otu klanva. Aa ki krru koo hung yaa cwucwu we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱.
Zhe ne Jesu ki ri, aa ki ye re be ncwuee. Ngu a he ne ngu he, “A ho mbrru, á re ti ruhu ngwe̱.”
Ngu a ki gara va. We hwiehwie ngu a yaa na, ngu a deze nwie de Be̱ne̱.

Me̱di nnencwuee na zonggrung mwe e̱ dzio ehwie aha ne Jesu ngu kyia nne a Tung Srra Cwu. Ngu a he ne nneywí he, “A bi rotung nyi cwuo ngbe rritsie̱. Aha nii, nyi be a rotu ana ngbe ré níng kyia, we̱sa ne Otung Srra Cwu!”
Me̱di Brrabe̱ ki shing he, “Nyi nné brra ronu! Nje he ka ko nye̱ nyi bí nnywa ngu ka nze̱e̱kyi ngu a nru we̱ ya ki ngwa rishi a Tung Srra Cwu a?
Aha ni ma ko bi he ngu mbrru ne̱ ne ngu nyi zhwe Ibrrahin ne Shetani i ki rrwe he̱rri re-rie shwa ne otu klanva ne̱ ngbe re she ci gbingbi ne ruhu ngu a a Tung Srra Cwu we̱ e̱e̱?”
A zhe ne Jesu he ni, ga nné ne mbe ki ra nka á shwe nshwu me̱di rehwie nneywí kla ne re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne ngu nyi.
Wire Jesu we rinng he, “Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi rimi? N ning mwa yi ngbe nda?
A shi shi nyi cwe musta ne ya nne ngu tsi a nhwie̱n ngu. A shi tsie̱nzhwu le̱le̱ me̱di aa ci brra ekwe he̱rri re̱mie̱ yi á ning no reri mbe a nvang.”
Jesu we rinng wa he, “Ma n fo Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ n ning mwa yi ne nda?
A shi shi nyi yisti ne ya mbrru ngu fo ngu ki krre a yarri kwrengyi ntsi felewa wetsie̱, he̱rri aa ci bacia ntsi felewa nna zhwozhwo hru.”
Jesu grra a brrá re-ngwie̱ ngbe re-nkla re nzhi Urrushelima ne ngu cwo re mie̱ nka.
Ya nne ki rinng he, “Brrabe̱, nyi e̱we̱ nné tsienzhwu ne mbe ri she kyia aa?”
Ngu a he ne mbe he,
“Ko nye̱ re nyi kwe̱kwe̱ re ngwie a onusinye na ngu shi yhwen, aha nje níng ting he nné piriri ri kre he mbe ngwie, me̱di koó ri she ngwie we̱.
Be̱ri bi eri ri deze we̱ she̱ onusinye, wire nyi e̱ yo ci re cwe ewie nwie cwe nva he, ‘Brrabe̱, kusu níng kla onusinye.’ Me̱di a ri he ne nyi he, ‘Ko nje níng hu we̱, ka ewie ne nyi níng wru.’
“Wire nyi ri he he, ‘Nzhi i ye re shwe ngbe ne ngwe̱, ngwe̱ bra níng mie̱ nka a ngwie̱ nzhi.’
“Me̱di a ri he, ‘Ko nje níng hu we̱, ka ewie ne nyi níng wru. Nyi ne̱ nwie nje, ga nyi nné e̱ngwie̱!’
“Nyi ri ku rana a miimi re ye nnyi a zhe ne nyi ri ri Ibrrahin, ngbe Ishaku ngbe Yakubu ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ng zhwozhwo a yarri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱, me̱di wé̱ níng zi nyi e̱ a ci.
Nneywí ri wru a nva ze ngbe nva ta ngbe nva arewa ngbe nva kudu re be para a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.
Cence, a bi nné ne mbe shi merin ne mbe ri hwie̱ nné ncwuee, a bi yá nné mbe shi ncwuee ne mbe ri hwie̱ nné merin ma.”
A zhe ana yá nné Farisi i be nwie Jesu, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ne̱ nwie ne̱ re nzhi yaka ewie, aha Hirridu ce̱ re yhwe̱.”
Aa we brang he, “Nyi ywa nyi ya he ne Hirridu ca rabrra shi ovu yi ana he, ‘Nje shi yu re-rije ma n kyia nné a cwu ngbe a encwe, wire a otu natsie̱ ma n fro cwuo nje.’
Gbengbe ni ma, se n wara ne ciee nje a cwu ngbe encwe ngbe nyiee, aha ko bi ko ya nne ti re̱se̱ng re hu a ci we̱sa ne a Urrushelima we̱!

“Kei! Nyi nné Urrushelima, nyi nné Urrushelima, nyi ne nyi yhwi nné ti re̱se̱ng, nyi bra ta nné ne e we te nwie nyi ne ngbatsie! Aa ci cwoo maa ne nje ce̱ níng tsu gbengbe shi shi de̱ nngwie̱ ne ngu tsu rewe ngu a tahwie gahaa ngu, me̱di ko nyi shî we̱ e̱e̱!
Nyi ri, Brranyi i nyi e̱ cwo a hwie̱ e̱ hwerri. Nje níng ting he ko nyi bra bi níng ri wa we̱ se nyi ri he, ‘Mwo rina shi a zete nne nke ne ngu be a yarri lo Brrabe̱.’ ”
A ya Otung Srra Cwu nné Yahudi, Jesu ywa ye yâ a ri ya nnencwuee nné Farisi, nneywí sa riyii a ngu dudu dudu.
A bi ya nne ngu be a nwie Jesu ne nta ngu ngbe nva ngu mbe mwi.
Jesu rin nné hu re̱se̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe nné Farisi he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri a yarri Nti Nka ngbe ré kyia nne a Tung Srra Cwu a, ka aawo?”
Me̱di á ci cereng, ngu a pie nne nna ngu a ki kyia, ngu a ki cire.
Wire ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi nye̱ a zetsi nyi ne kundu ngu bi nze̱we ka nnywa a ngu, ne ngu kpe a ruvo a Tung Srra Cwu ngbe ko we̱ wre̱ ne ki ti we hwiehwie we̱ e̱e̱?”
Koó bra hu kya he we̱.
A zhe ne ngu ri nné ice ne mbe be mbe shi kre rewie te̱nte̱ng, ngu a we ti nka zhwebe ne̱, a he:
“Kundu ne e re ye a nwie bikyi nyrra, shi de̱ ngwe̱ be ngwe̱ ya ke̱she srra a nwie te̱nte̱ng we̱, aha kabeya a bi ya nne bi grime̱ re re ne̱ ngwe̱ e̱ ne e ki ye ma.
Kishi nne ne ngu níng ye nné wehwie nyi e̱ re be re bra ya he ne ngwe̱ he, ‘Deze ngwe̱ we nne ne̱ ncwu ngwe̱.’ Wire nshwu we̱ re yhwe̱ kaka, se ngwe̱ bra ya kre yaka ewie gbong ngwe̱ ning srra.

Me̱di kundu ne e re ye, ywa ngwe̱ ya srra gbong, aha kundu ne nne bi i bikyi e̱ ngu be we̱ he ne ngwe̱ he, ‘A rwi, deze ngwe̱ ya srra a nwie te̱nte̱ng.’ Wire ngwe̱ e̱ she grime̱ a nyyi ko mbe nye̱ ne mbe shi miimi e̱ fa.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu fo rici ngu ze, wé̱ ki ci re̱; ko nye̱ ne ngu ci rici ngu re̱, wé̱ ki fo ze.”

Wire Jesu he ne be̱ bi eri nna he, “Kundu ne ngwe̱ shi ye nné a para, ka re nyi te̱ne̱ ka ne̱hin, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ye we rwí ngwe̱, ka re-gimbe ngwe̱, ka nzhwe ngwe̱, ka nné bi ncwé̱ dudu ne ngwe̱ we̱. Kishi á ri re ye ma, re bra ci shi á ning brru re trrang.
Me̱di zhe ne ngwe̱ shi ye nné a para, kre yiriywé̱ ngbe nnenkú ngbe nnencwué̱,
wire ngwe̱ e̱ she mwo rina. Ko ngbe ne ko mbe shi hung re trrang we̱, Be̱ne̱ ri re trrang a tung deze nné redziee.”
Ya ne ngu shi srra a tebrru ho ni, ngu a he ne Jesu he, “Mwo rina shi a zete nne nke ne ngu ri ya ye a para na Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ya nne ye nné ice we yang ngbe ré be a ya brra para.
A zhe ne e shi níng ce̱ para nna, ngu a te ya hwie ngu he re ywa re ya ye ga nné ne ngu we ti bikyi nna he, ‘Nyi be, aha ko nda dzie yhwe̱.’
“Ko nye̱ ne e ywa ki ye we̱ ngwa e̱we̱e̱ re-kwili kya ngu ci ne ko shi ngu hung be we̱. Nne na ce̱ucwung he, ‘A nyi we zhe ne ne̱ ne nje se̱ kyie, se nje ywa nje ya ri wire. Kusu ning ngwa zhe.’
“Ya mbe he, ‘A nyi we zhe ne ne̱ ne nje si nnywang kye̱ kaa komo shwa, nje nyia re nzhi we mwa n ri. Kusu ning ngwa zhe.’
“He̱rri ne cwu ya mbe he, ‘A nyi we zhe ne ne̱ ne nje fo mbrru, aha nii ko shi n hung be we̱.’

“Hwie nna a ya ning brru, ngu a ya ti be̱ri ngu kya ne ngu ci. Be̱ri ngu a dzio hwie ngu a he ne hwie ngu a he, ‘Wre̱ ne ne̱ we hwiehwie re nzhi a yarri ngwie̱ ngwe̱ ya grra a brra re-rê ngbe re-hwrre̱ ngwe̱ kyie̱ ga yiriywé̱, ngbe nnenkú, ngbe nnencwué̱ ré be.’
“Hwie nna a ya ning brru, a he ne ngu he, ‘Be̱ri, nje nyi kya ne ngwe̱ he n nyi e̱, me̱di a ke̱ ne bi kpi ewie.’
“Wire be̱ri hwie nna he ne ngu wa he, ‘Ywa a re-nkla ngwe̱ ya zhwe re-rê ngbe nhwie̱ rê ngbe ngwe̱ ya ye yaká nné re be, aha eri nje re shî.
Nje níng ting he ko bi ko ya a zetsi brrá nné ne i we ye ana ne ngu ri ye ko yankya a nwie para nje we̱.’ ”
A ya otu, rigwe̱ nné e shi zhwe Jesu, zhe ne ngu bra ngu we ri, ngu a he ne mbe he,

“Kundu ko nye̱ ngu ce̱ ning zhwe de̱ ngu ning ce̱ re ne̱ be̱ ngu, ngbe de̱ ngu, ngbe mbrru ngu, ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe ngu, ngbe re-gimbe ngu ntó ngbe mbrrú, he̱rri ngbe ce ngu we̱, cence ko shi re hung hwie̱ nné ning zhwe we̱.
Nne ne ko ngu hung fo gasankwe ngu, ngu ning zhwe we̱, koo be re hwie̱ nne ning zhwe we̱.
“Kundu ya nyi hwie no eri, ko ke̱she srra be we̱ ri ncwe̱ ne ngu bi e̱, ka ri ki be ngbe ngu ning ngra runo nna ka de̱ ri ki be we̱ wo ye̱?
Kundu ngu ma we dede ngu ce̱ riti runo wire ko ngu bra no yhwe̱ we̱, ko nye̱ ne ngu shi cie̱ we̱ ki mi,
nwie he, ‘Nyi ri ya nne ne ngu ce̱ runo me̱di koo bra hung frong we̱.’
“Nyi zohu nggwe̱ ne kundu ngu nyia re nzhi cwe ne yaka nggwe̱ ko we̱ ke̱she srra be we̱ ri ka re-shezhi ngu komo shwa ci á ri hung ya kwe̱ ne re-shezhi na rwinko ngu nshwa ci wehwie we̱ ye̱?
Kundu ngu hu he ko ngu ri hung kwe̱ng we̱, we̱ ke̱nce̱ te re nzhi a nwie nggwe̱ nke ncwi e̱ ne mbe shi rê re be aha ngbe mbe cwue̱ nkang srra rina.
Aha nii, ko nye̱ a zetsi nyi ne ngu me̱nkye̱ng we ko nda ngu, ko shi re hung hwie̱ nne ning zhwe we̱.
“Ncwua bi rina, me̱di kundu ngu bru kpikpi ngu, wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré bra ki ci re shi kpikpi e̱ wa?
Ko bi mpe̱ni a ebe ka a rivi ne e tsu we̱, se ré fo ré wa. Ko nye̱ ne ngu bi re-uucwung hong, nde re ho.”
Wire ga nné si gondu
Me̱di nné Farisi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa a á ne̱ ne krro nka nwie he, “He̱rri nne ne̱ a sí nné e̱ngwie̱ ne̱ re ye yâ ngbe mbe fang!”
Jesu a we he nka zhwebe he:
“A nyi nye̱ a zetsi nyi, kundu ngu bi canvé komo nnywa zunzrru ne ya bru, ko we̱ we nshwa krruvaya ne otu krruvaya ana a tsi yi, we̱ kpe kreng se ngu ri she wire wo ye̱?
Kundu ne ngu she, we̱ fo ne rekwi a ritengbraa ngu
re si ri. Wire we̱ ye rwí ngu ngbe nné dudu ne eri ngu, gbengbe we̱ he ne mbe he, ‘Nyi ning she nyi rekwi. Nje she canve nje ne ngu i bru.’
Nje níng ting he a shi ni ma, á ri nyi rekwi we yang a zinye̱ aha nne zunzrru ne ngu se̱ ywe̱ re ne̱ nné redziee komo nshwa krruvaya ne otu krruvaya ne ko mbe bra bi nkang se̱ ywe̱ we̱.
“Ka nyi zohu mbrru ne ngu bi cwe azrrufa komo shwang ne ya bru, ko we̱ ci ro fitile̱, we̱ ko ewie a ri ngu nwie kreng wesheng wesheng we̱ e̱e̱?
Kundu ngu she, we̱ ye re-la ngu ngbe nné dudu ne eri ngu gbengbe, we̱ he, ‘Nyi ning she nyi rekwi. Nje she cwe ncwe̱ azrrufa nje ne ngu ri bru.’
A shi ni ma, nje níng ting, a bi rekwi a nyyi re-njeli Be̱ne̱ aha nne e̱ngwie̱ zunzrru ne ngu se̱ ywe̱.”
Jesu ning brang he, “Ya nne bi zrre̱we wehwie.
Iishi nna ngu a he ne be̱ ngu he, ‘Be̱, níng kye dukyie̱e̱ ngwe̱, ngbe ngwe̱ ning ngwa na nje.’ Be̱ nna a we kyeng.
“Á srra yá e̱wé̱ rotu tsie̱, iishi nze̱we nna a tsu re-ankya ngu zhwozhwo, ngu a nyi ciee re nzhi ya ngwie̱ gbong. Aa ya srra nwie nyi wu, aa se̱ dukyie̱e̱ ngu yhwe̱ wiriri.
A zhe ne ngu ye ko nda ngu yhwe̱ fa, wire ya brra nzhwo kpe a ngwie̱ nna. Riywe̱ ki pie.
Aa ne̱ ya kre cwuo a nwie ya nne ngwie̱ nna. Nne nna a ki fo ncwuo cwo re-lede a yi.
A ce̱ he ngu ra she fenfe yâ re-lede ngu ye, me̱di ko bi ya nne ngu ki ngwa we̱.
“A zhe ne nka ki be hwie, ngu a he, ‘Ka! Ga hwié be̱ nje e̱ á nke mbe brri mi ne yâ. Nje e̱ nyi nke nje bra shi hu we dede ne nzhwo ne!
Nje shi deze a he ne̱ n ning brru re nzhi nwie be̱ nje, ma n ya he ne ngu he: Be̱, nje nyi Be̱ne̱ e̱ngwie̱, nje bra re nyi e̱ngwie̱ ma.
A zhe ne ko nje be he ré bra ning ye he ewe ngwe̱ wa we̱. Ning fo n hwie̱ shi ya hwie ngwe̱.’
“Ngu a deze ngu a ning brru re nzhi nwie be̱ ngu.
“We zhe ne ngu shi we gbong, be̱ ngu ki ri, naana ki pie ngu a rwi ta be re nzhi nyi ne ngu, ngu a ya ki krru ngu a ki me ushwo.
“Ewe nna he ne ngu he, ‘Be̱, nje nyi Be̱ne̱ e̱ngwie̱, nje bra re nyi e̱ngwie̱ ma. Ko nje be ré bra cinga ning ye he ewe ngwe̱ wa we̱.’
Me̱di be̱ nna he ne hwié e ngu he, ‘Nyi cwo wehwie nyi be mi ne brra te̱nte̱ tago hwi nyi ki cing, nyi ki ci ewema a nva ngbe tamri a nta.
Nyi be mi ne ngba wu izhimi ana nyi cie̱ ngbe nzhi ye re nyi rekwi,
aha kowe nje ne̱ i hu, a bra shi nce; a i bru, á bra ki she.’ Ngbe mbe e̱ ne̱ ne nyi re-rekwi.
“A zhe ana, ho nze̱we nna ywa yi, a cwo re be ri. A zhe ne ngu be dudu ne eri ngu a ho ne e cwe re-ankya re shwo rocwu.
Aa ye ya hwie, ngu a ki rinng he, ‘Nyi nda ne e shi mi he e̱e̱?’
“Hwie e̱ ki shing he, ‘Nyi iishi ngwe̱ ngu be ri, kya a nyi ngwiee ne be̱ ngwe̱ ki cie̱ ngba wu izhimi ana, aha aa be ri rina rina.’
“Ho nze̱we nna a dzio ehwie, he̱rri a ra ngwie e ri. Be̱ ngu a wru, ngu a ya ne̱ ne ki krru ehwie.
Me̱di aa ki karang he, ‘Di, ga re-rie ne̱ nje re nyi cwuo shi ya hwie, ko nje sa ra nyi yankya ne ngwe̱ he n nyi we̱. Me̱di ko ngwe̱ re ning ngwa ko ve ngbe n cie̱ n ning rre ngbe rwí nje we̱.
Me̱di a zhe ne ewenwu ngwe̱ ne̱ ngu ya yhwe̱ dukyie̱e̱ ngwe̱ we shweni a nwie ntsie̱wenté ngu be ri, ngwe̱ ki cie̱ ngba wu izhimi!’
“Be̱ nna a he ne ngu he, ‘Ewe nje, ko zohu zhe ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ shi ngbe ne nje. Ko nda ne nje bi nyi na ngwe̱.
Me̱di aa ye nzhi nyi rekwi ne ehwie kla aha gimbe ngwe̱ ne̱. A i hu, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ a shi nce; aa ki bru, me̱di nzhi ki she.’ ”
Jesu he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “A bi ya nne bi va ne ngu fo ya nne re hwie̱ nne ki ci nkwile̱ ne re-cwuo ngu. Á ki ting he nne nna sé̱ dukyie̱e̱ ngu we dede.
A zhe ne ngu ki ye, a ki rinng he, ‘Nyi nda ne nje ho a rici ngwe̱ he ni e̱e̱? Ning hwie nhwie̱ ne ngwe̱ ning cwo mi ne cwuo nje e̱, aha nje shi re ti ncwuo.’

“Nnencwuo nna ngu a yaa rinng we rici ngu he, ‘Ma, a zhe ne ne̱ nyi nda ne nje shi nying? Be̱ri nje e̱ nyi nke ngu shi ning ti ncwuo ne. Ko nje bi igbe̱ n ning kye̱ kaa we̱. A bra nyi kya nshwu n ne̱ ne gye̱ re ce̱ ankya.
E̱nhe̱n! Nje hu kya ne nje shi nying fa ngbe nneywí ri ning se̱ a reri mbe, kundu ne e ri ning yu ncwuo.’
“Aa ye ko zohu nne bi tsie be̱ri ngu. A rin nne na ce̱ucwung he, ‘A nyi tsie nda ne be̱ri nje e̱ re zhwe?’
Aa ki shing he, ‘Nyi re-grre̱we̱n remie nnywa zunzrru.’
“Nnencwuo nna a he ne ngu he, ‘Ning ge krre̱de̱. Wie he nyi re-grre̱we̱n nshwa wecwuoo.’

Ngu a rin nne na hwie he, ‘Ngwe̱ e̱ rre, nyi wema ne e re zhwe?’ Ngu a he, ‘Á ning zhwe re-katanko alikama nnywa zunzrru.’ Nnencwuo nna a he ne ngu he, ‘Ning ge krre̱de̱ ngwe̱. Wie he nyi re-katanko nshwa klanva.’
Be̱ri ngu a be ya ki de aha zhwe zentsi ne ngu bi. Aha nné tsi ngwie̱ ne̱ á bi zentsing cwo ne ankya ngwie̱ ne̱ re ne̱ nné na ewie si.”
Jesu a he, “Nje níng ting he, nyi nyi cwuo ne dukyie̱e̱ nyi nwie ning kre rwí a be ngwie̱ aha nci nyi, aha kundu ngu yhwe̱, nyi e̱ ri she eri na he̱rri tiya.

Nne ne e hung sa rie a ngu a kya ngu shi tsie̱nzhwu, wé̱ hung sa rie a ngu a kya ngu shi piriri. Me̱di nne ne koó hung sa rie ngu a kya ngu shi tsie̱nzhwu we̱, ko shi ré hung sa rie a ngu a kya ngu shi piriri we̱.
Ma kundu ne koó hung sa rie a ngwe̱ a kya ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ we̱, wé̱ ce̱ rimi wé̱ re ngwa te̱nte̱ dukyie̱e̱ e̱?
Ka kundu ne de̱ ngwe̱ hung bro kya ya nne we̱, we̱ nyi nye̱ ngu shi re ngwa kya na rici ngwe̱ e̱e̱?

“Ko shi ya hwie re hung nyi re-be̱ri wehwie cwuo we̱. Se ka re ce̱ ya we̱ ra ya, ka re ngwa rici nwie ya we̱ we ya. Ko shi ngwe̱ hung hwie̱ hwie Be̱ne̱, ngwe̱ bra hwie̱ hwie ncwe̱ a zhe zunzrru we̱.”
Nné Farisi á ho re-ankya ne Jesu he zhwozhwo, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne kwa ncie̱ nwie ta rimrraa, aha ne mbe bi riyii ncwé̱.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi tiyi shi nyi nyí nné redziee a nyyi nneywí, me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ hu yarri rehwie nyi. Kya ne nneywí mbe ki ngwa grime̱ he nyi te̱nte̱ng, a nyi kya le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱.

“Á nyi ne brro nka a yarri Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa ngbe na nné ti re̱se̱ng re be cwu zhe Yohana Nyi Batisma. Kya ne ngu ce̱ a zhe ana, á brro Nka Rina Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱, ko nye̱ bra shi kwe̱kwe̱ he ngu ngwie.
A nyi canca zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱ ré bru ne ya e̱we̱ izhweng wie cwuo a yarri Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa re bru.
“Ko nye̱ ne ngu yu mbrru ngu ngu fo yaka, aa nyi nje; ko zohu nne ne ngu fo mbrru ne e ki yu, aa nyi njè ma.
“A i bi ya nne bi va ne ngu srra re ci brra re-ankya bi ncwé̱. A srra we ehwie kla nwie ye re-yâ rina ko zohu otu.
A onusinye eri nne bi va nna, a bi ya yiriywe̱ ne e ki ye he Lie̱zurru ngu nywe̱ ne nhwe ki ku rwe̱ re ce̱ ncwé̱.
A srra re tsio re-uucwu yâ ne mbe kpi be a zete tebrru nne bi va nna. Rovu bra srra re cwo le nhwe ngu.
“A zhe ne yiriywe̱ nna ngu hu, re-njeli e̱ ki fo re nzhi nwie Ibrrahin. Nne bi va nna a hu ma, á ki nyie̱.
A zhe ne ngu shi shwe ge̱zhe̱ a ruvo ci yhwrro, aa fo riyii ze ngu a di Ibrrahin gbong ngbe ne Lie̱zurru ngu srra a bamba ngu.
Aa ki ye, a he, ‘Be̱, Ibrrahin, ri naana nje ngwe̱ te Lie̱zurru re ya tala rici ewenva ngu rishi ngbe re be re ya ning hli le, aha nje shi nwie shwe ge̱zhe̱ a yarri ro ne̱.’

“Me̱di Ibrrahin he ne ngu he, ‘Kowe, lu he a zhe ne ngwe̱ i shi nce, ngwe̱ i she re-ankya rina ne ngwe̱ ce̱, Lie̱zurru i shi cinci. Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ a shi ho shwing a he, ngwe̱ e̱ shi shwe ge̱zhe̱ ngwe̱ a zhe ne.
We̱sa a ni, a zetsi nzhi ngbe nyi e̱ a bi brra hla, ko bi nne re hung sa nyie nwie nyi re be nwie nzhi we̱.’
“Aa ning brru he, ‘Ma nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱, be̱, te Lie̱zurru re nzhi ri be̱ nje,
aha nje bi re-gimbe rewerento wecwuoo, ngbe re ywa re ya we ting, kishi á ri ya ngwie a nwieng shwe ge̱zhe̱ ne̱.’
“Ibrrahin he, ‘Re-gimbe ngwe̱ e̱ á bi re-krre̱de̱ng mie̱ nka Musa ngbe na nné ti re̱se̱ng. Re we ngbe ré ho nka mbe.’
“Aa ning brru he ne Ibrrahin he, ‘Aawo, be̱, ko shi ré ci nkwile̱ we̱, me̱di kundu ya nne e wru yarri ria ya we ting, wé̱ si ywe̱.’
“Ibrrahin he ne ngu he, ‘Kundu ne de̱ mbe ho nka Musa ngbe na nné ti re̱se̱ng we̱, ko shi ré shî nka nne ne ngu deze a ria we̱.’ ”
Jesu he ne nné ki zhwe he, “Ko re-ankya ci nneywí ré nyi e̱ngwie̱ e̱ á shi we be we̱. Me̱di, wuhu ne nne ngu hwie̱ kyang grre̱.
Canca ré ki rwe itsieng hwie nkya a ncwue ré ki zhwu a yarri brra nzhwo rishi, ne re ci ya a zetsi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne̱ re nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Aha nii, nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nci nyi!
“Kundu gimbe ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱, ki yhwire; a ri se̱ ywe̱, ki we nyi e̱ngwie̱ ngu.
Kundu ngu re nyi e̱ngwie̱ ce natsie̱ a to zrru, ngu bra ning brru re be nwie ngwe̱ ce natsie̱ he ngwe̱ ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu, ki weng.”
Nnenté e̱ he ne Brrabe̱ he, “Ning bra níng ci nzhi bi sa rie.”

A he ne mbe he, “Kundu nyi bi sa rie tsie̱nzhwu le̱le̱ shi e̱we̱ cwe musta, nyi e̱ hung he ne brra ekwe ne̱ he, ‘Yaa nga ngbe re-rinyie ngwe̱ yaa tsi a yarri brra nzhwo rishi,’ ngbe we̱ nyi shi nyi he.
“Kundu ya nyi bi hwie ne ngu srrá re ki kye̱ kaa, ka cwo canvé, ne kundu ngu ya ning brru a yi, we̱ wre̱ ne he ne ngu he re be re ya srra be re ye yâ aa?
Ko se ka re he ne ngu he, ‘Ning nyi yâ ne̱hin ngbe ngwe̱ ning be ming n ye n shwe, wire ngwe̱ ye na ngwe̱ ma wo ye̱?’
We̱ ci hwie ngu a kijie̱ng aha ne ngu nyi kya ne he he re nyi e̱e̱?
Aha nii, nyi ma, kundu ne nyi nyi ko nda ne e he nyi nyi, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi he, ‘Nzhi nyi we hwié ne nzhi re̱, a nyi we cwuo nzhi ne nzhi nyi.’ ”
A zhe ne Jesu nyia re nzhi Urrushelima, aa cwo a zaga Samariya ngbe Galili.
Zhe ne ngu shi ngwie a ya kla, ngu a she yá nné ruhunzhwe̱ komo shwa ne mbe yo ze̱nze̱,
mbe e̱ ki ye ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Jesu! Be̱ri, ri naana nzhi!”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu we ri, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ywa nyi ya ti nci nyi a nwie re-prristi.”
We zhe ne mbe ne̱ mbe e̱ timi mbe ci gbingbi ne mbe shi wiri.
A zhe ne ya mbe ri ngu ci wiri, ngu a ning brru nwie de Be̱ne̱ ne brra riwie̱ng cwue.
Ngu a ya hu be a nyyi Jesu nwie ki ci kijie̱ng. Ngu a nyi nne Samariya.
Jesu a rin he, “Ko nyi nné shwang ne e we kyia we̱ e̱e̱, ma kpi nné krruvaya nna á shi he?
Ko bi ko nne zunzrru ne ngu ning brru re de Be̱ne̱ we̱ se we nne ice ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Deze ngwe̱ ne̱ ne ciee ngwe̱, sa rie ngwe̱ e̱ re ci ngwe̱ ci gbingbi.”
A zhe ne yá nné Farisi mbe ki rinng he nyi zohu zhe ne Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ngu shi ning be ye̱, Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Ko Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ cwo be a zhe ne nyi ning hwie yi we̱.
Ko bi ya nne re he he, ‘Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ nyi nke,’ ka re he, ‘nyi nke ncwi’ we̱, aha a shi a yarri nyi.”
Jesu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Zhe cwo be ne nyi ri ce̱ he nyi ri ya otu a tsi rotu Kowe Nneywi, me̱di ko nyi ri she ring we̱.
Nneywí ri he ne nyi he, ‘Ri, a shi ye,’ ka ‘A shi he!’ Shi de̱ nyi to re we zhwe we̱.
Aha otung be Kowe Nneywi e̱ ri shi shi ne ewie ngu ci mele a zinye̱ ngu tsié̱ nse̱ a be ngwie̱ gbong a nva ya re nzhi gbong nva nke ncwi.
Me̱di se ngu ke̱she shwe ge̱zhe̱ nzhwenzhweng wire, he̱rri nné a nze̱ ne̱ re ki ra.
“Ye̱ye̱rri shi a rotu Nuhu, a ri shi ni a rotung be Kowe Nneywi.
Nneywí i ye re shwe, re rwe re-nyrra, nwie ci rana nyrra, he̱rri re be zhe ne Nuhu ngu i ngwie a yarri jirigi rishi. Wire brra nze e wie we wie we wie he̱rri aa we ci á ci shweni zhwozhwo mbe.
A i shi ni zhe Lutu wa, nneywí i ye re shwe re si re-ankya ngbe rie̱ng re kye̱ kaa re bra no reri.
Me̱di otu ne Lutu we ngwie̱ Sodo, ro ngbe rahwan ro wru zinye̱, á we ci ci shweni zhwozhwo mbe.
A ri shi ye̱ye̱rri ni a tung be Kowe Nneywi.
“A tuuye, shi de̱ nne ngu ri shi a zete zonggru re cwucwu he ngbe ngu ya ko ankya ngu a yarri ri we̱, shi de̱ nne nke ne ngu ri shi yi ma re si ri he ngu ya ko ankya ngu we̱.
Nyi lu aha mbrru Lutu!
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ he ngu cwo ce ngu we̱ wi, me̱di ko nye̱ ngu ngwa ce ngu, we̱ she ngge ngu.
Nje níng ting a totu tuuye, nné wehwie e ri shi zete gondo, á ri fo ya wé̱ we ya.
Mbrrú wehwie e ri shi hwie nkya gbengbe, á ri fo ya wé̱ we ya.
[Nné Ntó wehwie e ri shi yi, á ri fo ya wé̱ we ya.]”
Nné ki zhwe ngu mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Re-ngge ne̱ á ri ci a he e̱ Brrabe̱?” Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ewie ne ngu ning bi kwe yankya, nyi miimi ne e ning she nggulú.”
Jesu he ne nné ki zhwe ngu ya nka zhwebe ngbe ré hu he ko zohu zhe ré srra re ku Be̱ne̱ we̱sa ne kpo.
A he, “A ya ngwie̱ a bi ya nne nyi nka ne ko ngu ree to owu Be̱ne̱ we̱, ko bra ho ne ya nne we̱.
A bi ya kpambrru a ngwie̱ nna ne ngu srra re cwo nwie ngu re cwe nva he, ‘Ning sheng ngwe̱ ngwie zetsi nje ngbe rwinkó nje.’
Aa fo zhe ne nne nyi nka a ra ki sheng. Me̱di a ngrangrang ngu a he we rici ngu he, ‘Ko ngbe ne ko nje to owu Be̱ne̱ we̱, ko nje bra ho ne ya nne we̱,
gbengbe ni, aha ne kpambrru ne̱ ngu ning me̱ he ni ne̱, nje shi ki sheng ngbe re she kya ne ngu kre, aha ngbe re ning we n kle nshe.’ ”
Brrabe̱ ngu a he, “Ko nyi ho kya ne nne nyi nka bi riywe̱ redziee ne̱ ngu he we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko nyi hwie he Be̱ne̱ we̱ nyi nné e ngu ne ngu we kyie rina we̱ e̱e̱? Nyi hwie he we̱ nyi de̱tiri nwie we sheng e̱e̱?
Nje níng ting he we̱ we nyi rina we hwiehwie. Gbengbe ni ma, a zhe ne Kowe Nneywi ri be, he̱rri a ri ya she a bi nné sa rie a ngu a be ngwie̱ e̱e̱?”
Aha nné mbe ne mbe yaa kywo he mbe nyi nné redziee, ne mbe bra dzie̱ ko nye̱, Jesu he nka zhwebe he,
“Nné wehwie e cwugu re nzhi ku Be̱ne̱ a Brranyi, ya nyi nne Farisi ya a nyi nne si gondu.
Nne Farisi e̱ deze aa ku Be̱ne̱ aha rici ngu he, ‘Be̱ne̱, nje re ci kijie̱ng aha ne ko nje shi shi kpi nné we̱, ne mbe nyi nca, mbe nyi hwie̱, mbe nyi njè, ka shi shi nne si gondu ne̱.
Nje rwe onu ce hwie a se̱ti, nje bra ngwa Be̱ne̱ kya zunzrru a zetsi shwa na ko nda ne nje she.’
“Me̱di nne si gondu yo gbong. Koo hung gbi riyii ze re ri zinye̱ we̱, aa fo va gara zewe a he, ‘Ka! Be̱ne̱, ri naana nje, nje nyi nne e̱ngwie̱.’
“Nje níng ting he, nne si gondu ne̱ aa wro re si ri ne Be̱ne̱ ki we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu re ne̱ nne Farisi ana. Ko nye̱ ne ngu fo rici ngu ze, á ri ki ci re̱; nne ne ngu ci rici ngu re̱, á ri ki fo ze.”
Nneywí be mi ne e̱we̱e̱ rewe mbe a nwie Jesu aha re we mwo rina. A zhe ne nné ki zhwe ngu ri ni, á ne̱ ne we yhwire.
Me̱di Jesu ye e̱we̱e̱ rewe re be nwie ngu. A he, “Nyi we e̱we̱e̱ rewe re be nwie nje shi de̱ nyi we yu we̱, aha Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ nyi na zhwe mbe ne̱.
Nje níng ting cence, ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu se̱ Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ shi shi nyi e̱we̱we we̱, ko shi re ree ning ngwie we̱.”
Ya nnencwuee nné Yahudi rin Jesu he, “Te̱nte̱ Nne Mie̱ Nka, nyi nda ne nje shi nying ngbe n she ce na he̱rri tiya a?”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne ngwe̱ ning ye he te̱nte̱ng nna? Ko bi ya te̱nte̱ng we̱, se we Be̱ne̱ nggaa ngu.
Ko ngwe̱ hu nti nka Be̱ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi njè we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ yhwe̱ nne we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ nyi nca we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ ngwa sheede rabrra we̱, ci be̱ ngwe̱ ngbe de̱ ngwe̱ grime̱.’ ”
A he, “Nje nyi ne zhwe ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo tu zhe ne nje nyi e̱we̱we.”

A zhe ne Jesu ho ni, ngu a he ne ngu he, “He̱rri ne cwu, aa re hwie̱ kya zunzrru. Rie̱ ko nda ne ngwe̱ bi ngbe ngwe̱ kye yiriywé̱ ncwé̱ nna, aha ngwe̱ she dukyie̱e̱ a zinye̱. Wire ngwe̱ be ngwe̱ ning zhwe.”
Zhe ne ngu ho ni, ngu a ci ehwie dzio we yang, aha ne ngu nyi nne bi dukyie̱e̱ piriri.
Jesu ki ri ngu a he, “A bi rwe̱ we yang ngbe nne bi va re she ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱!
Cence, he̱rri canca ronkomi re ngwie a nzhwu nuurre ne nne bi va re ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Nné ne mbe ho nka ne̱ ni, á ki rinng he, “Ma ngge ne̱ shi he ni, he̱rri nyi nye̱ ngu ri she kyia a?”
Jesu he, “Kya ne ngu drre̱ nneywí, ko shi re drre̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
Pita he ne ngu he, “Ma ri, nzhi ne̱ nzhi we ko nda ne nzhi bi, nzhi re zhwe!”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nje níng ting cence he ko bi ya nne ne ngu we eri, ka mbrru, ka re-gimbe, ka be̱ ngbe de̱, ka rewe aha Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱
ngbe re ning rin she ankya piriri a zhe ne ne̱ he̱rri re bra she ce he̱rri tiya a zhe ngu cwo be we̱.”
Jesu ye Nnenté ngu a bamba ngu a he ne mbe he, “Di, nzhi shi cwugu re nzhi a Urrushelima, ko nda ne nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe i wie a rici Kowe Nneywi cwo a ci rrurru.
Á shi ki pie re ngwa nné tsi ngwie̱. Á shi ki mi nka sha, ré ki cwi, ré ki trru rencwi.
Á shi ki cwe, ré ki yhwe̱, me̱di a otu na tsie̱ we̱ deze.”
Ko nné ki zhwe ngu a hu kya ne ngu he ne mbe we̱. Cwu nka nna we shi ywing, he̱rri koó hu kya ne Jesu shi heng we̱.
A zhe ne Jesu rikpa ya cwu a Jerriko, a bi ya nnencwue̱ ngu srra a rekyi rê re ce̱ ankya.
Zhe ne ngu ho rogyrru rigwe̱ nné, ngu a rin kya ne ngu shi ci.
Á he ne ngu he, “Nyi Jesu nne Nazarra ne ngu shi wara.”
Ngu a ci onu he, “Jesu, Kowe Dooda, ri naana nje.”
Nné ne mbe shi ncwuee ne̱ ne ki yhwire he re ci cereng, me̱di aa ning bra kyie̱ onu gbangba he, “Kowe Dooda, ri naana nje!”
Jesu hwie̱ yo, ngu a ci he ré be mi ne nne nna a nwie ngu. Zhe ne ngu be dudu, Jesu a ki rinng he,
“Nyi nda ngwe̱ ce̱ he n re nying nna?”
Ngu a he, “Brrabe̱, nje ce̱ ri ewie.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ne̱ ne ri ewie! Sa rie ngwe̱ e̱ re kyia.”
We zhe zunzrru ngu a ne̱ ne ri ewie, nwie zhwe Jesu re de Be̱ne̱. Zhe ne nné mbe ri ni, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne de Be̱ne̱ ma.
Jesu ngwie a Jerriko, ne ngu shi wara.
A bi ya nne a miimi ne e ki ye he Zaka, ne ngu nyi nggwe̱ nné si gondu, a bra bi dukyie̱e̱.
A ce̱ he ngu ri Jesu, me̱di koo hung ki ri we̱, aha ne ngu shi kunggu, nné e bra zhwo we zhwo.
Aa wre̱ ne to to ya ngra a ya ngba ekwe
A zhe ne Jesu ya cwu ye̱ye̱rri ne ewie nna, ngu a gbi riyii ze ngu a he ne ngu he, “Zaka, wre̱ ne cwucwu. A cwu ne̱ se nje kywe ta ri ngwe̱.”
Aha nii, aa cwucwu we hwiehwie ngu a ki se̱ ne rekwi.
Ga ne nné mbe ri ni, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne krro re-nka ranranng nwie he, “Aa ne̱ re nzhi hwie̱ nne ice nne e̱ngwie̱ fa.”

A zhe ne mbe ya cwu ri nna, Zaka a deze yooyo ngu a he ne Brrabe̱ he, “Ri, a zhe ne ne̱ nje shi ngwa yiriywé̱ kpirri ankya nje, kundu nje sa ye kya ya nne ne le, nje shi ning brru n ki trrang he̱rri ce ni.”
Jesu he ne ngu he, “A cwu kyia be a ri ne̱, aha ngu ne̱ nyi ya nne nzhwe Ibrrahin e̱ ma.
Kowe Nneywi i be aha ngu kre ngu bra kyia nné bru.”
A zhe ne mbe shi ho nka ne̱, ngu a wara ne we ti ya nka zhwebe, aha aa sa dudu ne Urrushelima, nné ne mbe shi ngbe ne ngu a á ne̱ ne hwie he ka Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ cwo be we zhe ana.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “A bi ya nne ne e ki bî a ri ringgwe̱, a zhe ne ngu shi nyi ciee re nzhi gbong ya ngwie̱ ngbe ré ya ki ci ringgwe̱ wire ngu ya ning brru.
Aa ye hwié ngu ngbe shwa ngu a ngwa ko nye̱ tsi mbe ncwe̱ ne ngu be ré ning trra nnencwuó he̱rri nyhwe̱ wetsie̱, ngu a he ne mbe he, ‘Nyi fo ncwe̱ ne̱ nyi ka brrang ne nje cwo a ning brru.’
“Me̱di ko nné ngu a á ki ce̱ we̱, mbe e̱ te yá nné a merin ngu ngbe ré ya he he, ‘Ko nzhi ce̱ nne ne̱ re hwie̱ nggwe̱ nzhi we̱.’
“Gbengbe ni, á ki ngwa ringgwe̱ nna, ngu a ning brru re be ri. Ngu a te ne hwié ngu ne ngu ri we ngwa ncwe̱ e̱ he ré be mi ngbe ngu ri kya ne ko nye̱ mbe ngu ning sheng a zeteng.
Nne na ce̱ucwung be ngu a he, ‘Be̱ri, ncwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa a ngra ce shwang.’
Be̱ri ngu a he ne ngu he, ‘Te̱nte̱ ni, hwie rina nje! Aha ngwe̱ bi redziee a e̱we̱ kya tsienzhwu, nje re ngwa ringgwe̱ brrá re-ngwie̱ shwang.’
Nne na hwie e be ngu a he, ‘Be̱ri, ncwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa n brra a ngra ce cwuoo.’
Be̱ri ngu a he, ‘Nje re ngwa ringgwe̱ brrá re-ngwie̱ wecwuoo.’
“Wire na tsie̱ e̱ be ma ngu a he, ‘Be̱ri, ri ncwe̱ ngwe̱ e̱ nyi nke, nje fo nje ki rwe a yarri kla trro nje sa.
Nje to owu ngwe̱, aha ngwe̱ bi rwe̱. Nje hu he ngwe̱ kre we ankya shweni, ngwe̱ ca yâ ne ko ngwe̱ kye̱ we̱.’
“Be̱ri ngu a he ne ngu he, ‘Nje shi re nyi nka aha nka nu ngwe̱, ngwe̱ hwie bi hwie̱! Ngwe̱ hu he nje bi rwe̱, nje kre we ankya shweni, nje ca yâ ne ko nje kye̱ we̱.
Aha nda ne ko ngwe̱ sa ncwe̱ nje e̱ a benkyi, ngbe nje ri ya ning brru n ya she rruba a zeteng we̱ e̱e̱?’
“Ngu a he ne nné mbe shi yo a miimi e̱ he, ‘Nyi se̱ zunzrru na ngu a nyi ngwa nne na ne ncwe̱ ngu ngra ce shwa ana.’
“Mbe e̱ ki shing he, ‘Be̱ri, nje he ka a bi shwang ye̱ e̱e̱!’
“Ngu a he, ‘Nje níng ting he ko nye̱ ne ngu bi, á ri ki brang piriri; me̱di nne ne ko ngu bi ko yankya we̱, ngbe e̱we̱ kya ne ngu bi e̱, á ri se̱ a nva ngu.
Me̱di rwinkó nje ne ko mbe ce̱ he n hwie̱ nggwe̱ mbe ana we̱, nyi be ne mbe he nyi we yhwi a nyyi nje.’ ”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he nka ni, ngu a wara re nzhi a Urrushelima.
Zhe ne ngu cwo re be dudu ne Betefaji ngbe Betani, re-nkla ne mbe shi dudu ne Rugu Bi Rekwe Rihwie̱n, aa te yá nné ki zhwe ngu wehwie
he, “Nyi ywa a nkla ne ngu shi ncwuee nyi ana. A zhe ne nyi ri ngwie, nyi e̱ ri ya e̱we̱ nze̱e̱kyi ne e ki rwe miimi, ne ko ya nne sa ning ngra we̱. Nyi ki bi nyi be mi he.
Kundu ya nne níng rinng he, ‘Nyi shi bing aha nda aa?’ Nyi he ne ngu he, ‘Brrabe̱ ce̱.’
Nné ne e we te e̱, á ywa á ya timi a shi we shi ne ngu ri we heng.
A zhe ne mbe shi bing, nné ne mbe bi nze̱e̱kyi nna á we rinng he, “Aha nda nyi shi bi nze̱e̱kyi ne̱?”
Á we shing he, “Brrabe̱ ce̱.”
Á be mi ne nze̱e̱kyi nna nwie Jesu, mbe e̱ ning ta re-ankya ci rwe̱ mbe a zeteng, wire mbe e̱ fo Jesu mbe e̱ ki gara a zeteng.
A zhe ne ngu shi ciee, nneywí ne̱ ne ta re-ankya ci rwe̱ mbe a rê.
A zhe ne ngu be dudu ne gasire ngu ka ngu wro a Rugu Bi Rekwe Rihwie̱n re nzhi Urrushelima, rigwe̱ nné ne mbe shi ki zhwe á ne̱ ne nyi rekwi re de Be̱ne̱ ne cwue ze aha re-ankyang nga onu ne mbe ri.
Á he,
“Mwo rina nyi ngge ngu ne ngu be a yarri lo Brrabe̱!
Srra rina zinye̱ be nwie nzhi,
nzhi ngwa Brrabe̱ grime̱!”
Yá nné Farisi a yarri rigwe̱ nné e̱ he ne Jesu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, yhwire nné re zhwe ngwe̱ ne̱ ngbe ré dzie̱ cereng.”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nje níng ting, kundu mbe ci cereng, ko we rahwan wé̱ ne̱ ne ti nku.”
A zhe ne ngu sa dudu ne Urrushelima ngu ri ngwie̱ nna, ngu a ti reyii aha ngwie̱ nna.
Ngu a he, “Ka! A cwu ne̱, shi nyi ra hu kya ne ngu shi níng be mi ne srra rina! Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, ko nyi ri we̱.
Rotu nna cwo be ne rwinkó nyi ri no re-garru ngbe wé̱ níng grra wé̱ níng ci zetsi ko zohu eme.
Á ri níng ywrru ré níng kro be ré níng yhwi ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe nyi a yarring. Koó ri we ya ngbaatsie a zete ya we̱, aha ko nyi shî he Be̱ne̱ e̱ be ya níng kyia we̱.”
Wire ngu a ngwie a yarri Brranyi ngu a ne̱ ne yu nné mbe shi rie̱ ankya.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Á wie he, ‘Eri nje e̱ ri hwie̱ zonggrung ku Be̱ne̱,’ me̱di nyi ki fo aa hwie̱ brra rieng srra nnencá!”
Ko zohu otu a mie̱ nka a Brranyi, me̱di nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ nti nka Musa ngbe nnencwueé á kre rê he mbe ki yhwe̱.
Me̱di koó she rê mbe ki yhwe̱ we̱, aha ga nné zhwozhwo á zhwe nka ngu.
A ya otu ne Jesu shi mie̱ nné nka a yarri Brranyi re brro Nka Rina, nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe brrá nné á be nwie ngu.
Á he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ she de̱me̱ ne ngwe̱ ning nyi re-cwuo ne̱ a he? Nyi nye̱ ngu re ngwa de̱me̱ng nyi re-cwuo ne̱?”
A he ne mbe he, “Ma nde n níng rin nka ma. Nyi ning ting,
de̱me̱ ne Yohana ngu i ning nyi batisma i wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ka nwie nneywí?”
Á ne̱ ne yaa rin re-nka a nci mbe he, “Kundu nzhi ri he aa wru nwie Be̱ne̱, we̱ níng rinng he ma nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nzhi se̱ nka ngu we̱ e̱ ye̱?
Me̱di kundu nzhi ri he, aa wru a nwie nneywí, ga nné zhwozhwo wé̱ níng ta ne rahwan aha mbe fo Yohana a nu nne ti re̱se̱ng.”
Aha nii, mbe e̱ he ne Jesu he, “Ko nzhi hu ka de̱me̱ ngu a i wru he we̱.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Ko shi n níng ting ka nyi nye̱ ngu ning ngwa de̱me̱ ne nje ning nyi re-cwuo ne̱ ma we̱.”
Ngu a wara ne we ti nka zhwebe he: “Ya nne kye̱ inebi
A zhe ne ngbre inebi nna a ya ci kpi, ngu a te ya hwie ngu a nwie nné ne ngu we ngwa ebe nna aha re ya ki kpi yá ngbre inebi nna. Me̱di nné nna á ya cwe hwie nna, á ki cire ne nva hwerri.
Aa cinga te yaka hwie. Nke e̱ wa, á ya ki cwe, á ki ci nshwu, á ning brru mi ne ngu ne nva hwerri.
He̱rri ne cwu, aa te hwie na tsie̱ wawa, á ki ci ruhu á ki zhwu ci.
Wire be̱ri bi nhwie̱n inebi nna he, ‘Nje shi nyi rimi ne̱? Nje shi te ewe ce̱ nje, kabeya ré ya to riyii ngu.’
Me̱di zhe ne nné ne ngu we ngwa ebe nna mbe ki ri we ri, á wre̱ ne rwe nka he, ‘Nke e̱ nyi ngu ngu nyi ewe ye gado nna, nyi ning be nzhi ki yhwe̱ ngbe ankya nna ré hwie̱ ngge nzhi.’
Aha nii, mbe e̱ ki ti ci a yarri nhwie̱n nna, wire mbe e̱ ki yhwe̱.
“Ma nyi hwie nyi nda ne nne bi nhwie̱n ne̱ ri we nying?
Ko ri be we̱ ya we yhwi, ngbe we̱ ngwa yaká nné nhwie̱n nna we̱ e̱e̱?”
A zhe ne nné mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ he, “Ka! Shi de̱ re ci ni we̱!”
Jesu we di te̱nte̱ ngu a we rinng he, “Ma nka ne e wie a yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ne̱ he rimi? Ne e wie he,
‘Ngbaatsie ne nné runo mbe ra,
nyi nke ngu hwie̱ te̱nte̱ng.’
Ko nye̱ ne ngu grre̱ a ngbaatsie ana we̱ yaa kprre, me̱di nne nke ne ngbaatsie ana a kpe a zete ngu we̱ ki mle̱ she̱she̱.”
Nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe nggwé̱ re-prristi e̱ á ne̱ ne kre rê ngbe mbe ki pie we hwiehwie, aha á hu he Jesu he nka zhwebe ne̱ a rici mbe. Me̱di á to owu nné.

Á ne̱ ne ning sa riyii ngu dudu. Á te yá nné ne mbe tiyi shi mbe nyi te̱nte̱ nné re grra ranranng, aha ne mbe sa rie he mbe shi ki pie a ya nka ne ngu shi heng, ngbe mbe ki ngwa a nva goona ne ngu bi de̱me̱ re ki nyi nka.

Aha nii, nné ne e we te e̱ á rin Jesu nka á he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, nzhi hu he ko nda ne ngwe̱ he ngbe ne ankya ne ngwe̱ mie̱ á shi ye̱ye̱rri, ko ngwe̱ bra ce̱ rici we̱, me̱di ngwe̱ mie̱ nné rê Be̱ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne nka raywrra.
Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi trra Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma gondu a, ka de̱ nzhi trra we̱?”
Jesu hu he nyi nka igerri mbe rin, ngu a he ne mbe he,
“Nde n ri cwe ncwe̱ nna, nyi foto nye̱ ngbe lo nye̱ ngu shi a zete ncwe̱ ne̱?”
Mbe e̱ shî he, “Nyi Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Aha ni nyi ngwa Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma kya ngu nyi na ngu, nyi bra ngwa Be̱ne̱ kya ngu nyi na Be̱ne̱.”
Á me̱nkye̱ng ki pie a kya ne ngu he a nyyi nneywí, á ne̱ ne nye̱ ronu aha re-shî nka ne ngu we shing, he̱rri á dzie̱ cereng.
Yá nné Sadukyi
“Nne Mie̱ Nka, Musa i níng wieng he kundu gimbe ya nne hu we mbrru ngu we̱sa ne ewe, ngu nne nna we̱ fo kpambrru gimbe ngu a, aha re she rewe ne lo gimbe ngu.
A i bi yá re-gimbe komo natsie̱. Nne na ce̱ucwung fo mbrru me̱di aa hu we̱sa she ewe.
Nne na hwie e fo ma, koo ning she ewe we̱.
Na tsie̱ e̱ ki fo ma, he̱rri zhwozhwo mbe natsie̱ e̱ á ma nyi nyrra ne mbrru zunzrru ana, á kwi we̱sa she ewe.
A krrucing, mbrru nna a ya hu ma.
Aha nii, a tung deze nhu a a ri nyi mbrru nye̱ a zetsi mbe nné natsie̱ ana?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nneywí a be ngwie̱ ne̱ á srra re rwe re-nyrra.
Me̱di mbrrú ngbe ntó ne mbe ri mwa ye̱ye̱rri re deze a nhu a á ri srra nce, koó ri bi rwe nyrra a ngwie̱ hwi ne ngu cwo be e̱ we̱.
Á ri shi shi re-njeli, koó bi kwi we̱. Á nyi rewe Be̱ne̱, aha ne mbe deze a nhu.
Ko ngbe Musa a ma, aa ti he bi deze nkwe nné a nhu re nzhi nce. A yarri nka gbe̱e̱ ekwe ye lendo, a he he Brrabe̱ nyi Be̱ne̱ na Ibrrahin ngbe na Ishaku ngbe na Yakubu.
Ko nyi Be̱ne̱ nkwe nné we̱, a nyi Be̱ne̱ nné nce, aha a nwie ngu ga mbe zhwozhwo á shi nce.”
Yá nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ he ye̱ye̱rri, Nne Mie̱ Nka!”
Ko bra bi ya mbe ngu cinga ki rin nka wa we̱.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Á ce̱ rimi ne e he Krristi nna nyi ewe Dooda?
Dooda we rici ngu he a yarri krre̱de̱ Re-ve ngu a he,
‘Brrabe̱ he ne Brrabe̱ nje he:
Srra a nva nyye nje,
se ne nje re ci ngwe̱ hle̱ rwinkó ngwe̱.’
Dooda i ki ye he ‘Brrabe̱,’ wé̱ bra ce̱ rimi ré he he nyi we ewe Dooda?”
A zhe ne nné zhwozhwo mbe shi hong ni, Jesu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu a nyyi nné he,

“Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa. Á ce̱ he mbe ci brrá re-tago re ning gye̱ mi, á ce̱ he ré srra re we dzie a yarri kaawe̱, á ce̱ he mbe ri ma srra a te̱nte̱ rewieng srra a re-zonggrung mwe ngbe rewie bi grime̱ a nwie para.
Á shwe̱li kpambrrú a reri mbe re we ye ne le, á ku Be̱ne̱ je̱je̱ aha re we ri. Zhwe mbe ana á ri we ngwa cinci yang.”
Jesu rwi riyii a yarri Brranyi ngu a ri nné bi ncwé̱ mbe shi ci ncwe̱ a onggong si beeko.
Ngu a ri ya kpambrru ne ngu nyi yiriywe̱ ngu ning tala kpirri kovo wehwie ne ngu bi.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Cence, nje níng ting, beeko ne yiriywe̱ ne̱ ngu ngwa a ne̱ na ko nye̱ a he ne ne̱.
Ga nné ne̱ á ti we tsie̱nzhwu a tsi dukyie̱e̱ mbe ne ngu shi piriri á ngwa, me̱di ngu ne̱ a yarri riywe̱ ngu aa ngwa ko nda ne ngu bi zhwozhwo.”
Yá kpi nné ki zhwe ngu ne̱ ne he nka aha rina Brranyi ngbe risa ne e ki nying ne rahwan bi rina ngbe re-ankya rina ne nneywí mbe ngwa Be̱ne̱ a Brranyi. Jesu a he ne mbe he,
“Kya ne nyi ri ne̱, zhe cwo be ne ko ngbaatsie zunzrru ko ri hwie̱ a zete ya we̱, á ri we gywi zhwozhwo.”
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, re-ankya ne̱ á ri ci a rekpe e̱e̱? A bra nyi nda nzhi ri ri ngbe nzhi hu he zhe nna rikpa ci e̱e̱?”
A he ne mbe he, “Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ shi de̱ ré níng brra we̱. Nneywí piriri ri be ne lo nje he, ‘Nyi nje nje nyi ngu,’ wé̱ bra he, ‘Zhe e be dudu.’ De̱ nyi we zhwe we̱.
A zhe ne nyi ri ho nka re-cwe ngbe bra re-ringgwe̱ ne rogyrru, shi de̱ nyi ci owu we̱. Se re-ankya ne̱ mbe ke̱she ci wire, me̱di ko krruci ebe ngwie̱ e̱ be we̱.”
Ngu a bra he ne mbe he, “Re-ngwie̱ ri ne̱ ne kwe̱ cwe ngbe ne yá re-ngwie̱, ya ringgwe̱ ri kwe̱ ne ya ringgwe̱.
A ri bi ngbá re-ngwie̱gbe̱, ngbe nzhwo ngbe re-nzhwe ruhu a rewie kanka kanka, nyi ri di re-ankyang ngwa owu ngbe ngbá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu mbe wrru a zinye̱.
“A zhe ne re-ankya ne̱ mbe rishi ci, á ri níng prre re níng ngwa ge̱zhe̱. Á ri be ne nyi a re-zonggrung nyi nka, wé̱ níng she̱ a re-uucwu gyiaa. Á ri be ne nyi a nyyi nggwé̱ ngbe re-goona aha lo nje.
Nke ri ci nyi e̱ she zheng brro nka nje.
Me̱di nyi rwe rie ne zhe nna rishi, shi de̱ nyi ri bē he nzhi shi he rimi e̱ we̱.
Nje ri níng ngwa nti nka ngbe zentsi na ne ko ya rwinko nyi ri hung yo ngbe re níng drre̱ we̱.
Re-be̱ nyi ngbe re-de̱ nyi ngbe re-gimbe nyi ngbe nzhwe nyi ngbe rwí nyi á ri níng ngwa a nva rwinkó nyi, he̱rri ré yhwi ya nyi ma.
Ko nye̱ ri níng ra aha nje.
