Me̱di ko bi ko ya nkwe rici ya nyi ne ngu ri ci i shweni we̱.
Kundu nyi ri yo gangga nyi e̱ she ce.
“A zhe ne nyi ri ri re-shezhi mbe grra Urrushelima, nyi hu he kpe ngu be dudu.
Aha nii, se nné ne mbe shi a Yahudi ré to re nzhi re-rugu, nné ne mbe shi a brrá re-ngwie̱ ré wru, shi de̱ nné ne mbe shi a e̱we̱e̱ re-nkla ré to re be a brra ngwie̱ we̱.
A ri nyi rotu ne Be̱ne̱ shi na nneywí uucwu ye̱ye̱rri ne re-ankya zhwozhwo ne i wie.
A ri nyi ngba kya bi owu a rotu ana ne mbrrú bi rehwie ngbe mbrrú bi rewe shwo. A ri bi ge̱zhe̱ we yang a ngwie̱, ngbe ren Be̱ne̱ a zete nneywí.
Á ri yhwi yá ne ise̱nkeli, wé̱ ko yá mbe shi nné gyiaa re nzhi yaká re-ngwie̱. Nné tsi ngwie̱ ri hwin Urrushelima he̱rri se ne zhe mbe ri ci rrurru.
“A ri bi yá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu a ne̱, ngbe yhwe̱, ngbe re̱nde̱. A be ngwie̱, nneywí a re-ngwie̱ ri ci rowu aha brrá re-nzhwo rishi i ri yhwi nwie kpe ru.
Nneywí ri ne̱ ne kwi ne rowu aha re-ankya ne mbe shi ci a be ngwie̱. Ngba re-ankya ne mbe shi a zinye̱ e̱ ri gbe̱.
Wire wé̱ ri Kowe Nneywi ngu ya wre̱ re be a yarri inyie̱ ne igbe̱ ngbe grime̱ we yang.
A zhe ne re-ankya ne̱ ri ne̱ ne ci, nyi deze nyi bra yo gangga aha kyia nyi e̱ sa dudu.”
Aa we ti nka zhwebe ne̱ he, “Nyi ri ekwe riyhwietsie ngbe rekwe zhwozhwo.
A zhe ne mbe ne̱ ne yhwu rohun, nyi hung ding ne nyyi nyi he̱rri nyi hu he zhe rikwi i be dudu.
Aha nii, kundu nyi ri di re-ankya ne̱ mbe shi ci, nyi hu he Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ sa dudu.
“Nje níng ting cence, ko nné nze̱ ne̱ e̱ shi kwi yhwe̱ we̱ se re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo mbe ci.
Zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱ shi yhwe̱, me̱di ko nti nka nje bi ci shweni we̱.
“Nyi nyi te̱nte̱, shi de̱ nyi ngwa rehwie nyi nwie ye re shwe re-ankyang dzio nci ngbe ankyang ho shwi ebe ngwie̱ he̱rri otu tuuye re ya níng hu kprikpri
we̱sa ne srrante we̱. Aha a cwo be a zete nneywí zhwozhwo ne mbe srra ko he a be ngwie̱.
Ko zohu zhe nyi srrante re ku Be̱ne̱ ngbe nyi ri she nyi to nyi drre̱ re-nzhwe ankya ne mbe ri ci, aha ngbe nyi she nyi yo a nyyi Kowe Nneywi.”
Ko zohu otu, Jesu cwo mie̱ nka a Brranyi, ko zohu ne̱hin we̱ wru re nzhi kywe a Rugu Bi Rekwe Rihwie̱n.
A brra mincwe nneywí zhwozhwo cwo nwie ngu a Brranyi aha mbe ho re-nka ngu.
A zhe ne Para Brredi We̱sa Yisti i be dudu, ne e ki ye he Para Paska.
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa mbe e̱ ne̱ ne kre re-rê ne mbe shi ning yhwe̱ Jesu a la la, aha ne mbe to owu nné ne mbe shi miimi.
Shetani e̱ ngwie a yarri Yahuda ne e ki ye he Iskarriyoti ne ngu nyi ya a tsi nné zhwe Jesu shwa ne otu wehwie.
Ngu a wre̱ ne ne̱ re nzhi rwe nka ngbe nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nnencwueé nné cwo Brranyi re̱se̱ rê ngu shi we rie̱ Jesu.
Á nyi rekwi we yang, mbe e̱ shî he mbe shi ki trra ncwe̱.
Aha nii, Yahuda a shî, ngu a ne̱ ne kre rê ngu we ngwa Jesu ne ko nneywí mbe ru we̱.
A zhe ne otu Parang Ye Brredi We̱sa Yisti i be, ne e shi ca canvé na Para Paska,
Jesu te mbe Pita ngbe Yohana, a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ywa nyi ya nyi yâ Paska ngbe nzhi ye.”
Á ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ ce̱ he nzhi ya nyi a he?”
A he ne mbe he, “We zhe ne nyi ri ngwie a ngwie̱ Urrushelima, ya nne ne ngu kpe ondrro rishi cwo a nyi ne nyi, nyi ki zhwe re nzhi ri ne ngu shi ning ngwie.
Nyi e̱ he ne nne bi eri nna he, ‘Nne Mie̱ Nka a níng te he zonggru nné ice ne ngu cwo a ning ye yâ Paska ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a shi he?’
We̱ níng ti ya brra zonggru zeteng ne e ning ta ankya, nyi e̱ nyi ko nda a miimi.”
Á wre̱ ne ne̱ re nzhi, á ya she ko nda shi we ye̱ye̱rri shi kya ne Brrabe̱ he ne mbe, mbe e̱ nyi yâ Para Paska a miimi.
Ne zhe ngu ya cwu, Jesu ya srra be a gumong ye yâ ngbe nnenté ngu.
A he ne mbe he, “Nje ce̱ he nje ra ye yâ Para Paska ne̱ ngbe ne nyi wire n shwe ge̱zhe̱.
Nje níng ting he, ko nje bra bi ye bikyi ne̱ engbe ne nyi wa we̱, se we a tu ne ngu ri ya ci rrurru ni a yarri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
A zhe ne ngu fo kwrreshi, ngu a ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ngu a he, “Nyi ning ge nyi yaa kyeng.
Nje níng ting cence he ko nje bra bi shwe rishi ruto ne̱ ngbe ne nyi wa we̱ se Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ri be.”
Wire ngu a fo brredi. Re̱se̱ ne ngu ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ngu a hwin ngu a we ngwa nwie he ne mbe he, “Nke ne̱ nyi rwe̱ nje ne e ngwa aha nyi, nyi srra re yeng re lu aha nje.”
A merin nke aa fo kwrreshi rishi ruto, a he, “Kwrreshi ne̱ a nyi na jee hwi ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng sang, á nyi ne roshwo nje ne ngu shi wa aha nyi.
Me̱di nyi ri, va nne ne ngu shi ning rie̱ e̱ a shi yarri enjie yâ engbe na nje!
Cence, Kowe Nneywi e̱ shi hu ye̱ye̱rri ne Be̱ne̱ i he, me̱di wuhu ne nne ngu ki rie̱!”
Nné ki zhwe ngu á ne̱ ne yaa rin re-nka we nci mbe he ma a nyi nye̱ a tsi mbe ne ngu shi nyi zhwe ngge ne̱.
Onu ce e̱ deze a tsi mbe he ka nyi nye̱ ne ngu shi hwie̱ brrang ye̱.
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nggwé̱ nné tsi ngwie̱ á ti nné mbe he mbe bi igbe̱ a zete rici mbe, nnencwueé mbe e̱ á bra ce̱ he re we ye he ‘Nné She Nneywíng.’
Me̱di shi de̱ re shi ni a tsi nyi we̱. Nne nke ne ngu nyi brrang a tsi nyi re hwie̱ shi ngu nyi iishing; nnencwuee a tsi nyi re hwie̱ shi ngu nyi hwie.

Nyi nye̱ ngu nyi brrang, nyi nne nke ne ngu srra be nwie ye yâ aa, ka nne nke ne ngu shi ncwuong kye yâ? Ko nyi nne nke ne ngu srra be nwie yeng we̱ e̱e̱? Me̱di nje shi tsi nyi he ne̱ shi nyi nnencwuo kye yâ.
“A nyi nyi ne̱ ne nyi yaa rwe nyi yo ngbe nje a re-mwa ri nje.
We shi shi ne Be̱ nje ngu ning ngwa ye ringgwe̱, nje níng ngwa ma.
Nyi ri ye nyi shwe ngbe nje a gumo nje a Ringgwe̱ nje. Nyi ri srra a ncwú ringgwe̱ re ye ringgwe̱ re-nkla shwa ne otu wehwie na rewe Isrreela.
“Sima, Sima! Di! Shetani i rin Be̱ne̱ he ngu níng mwa ri zhwozhwo nyi shi shi shwunshwu alikama ne e klo.
Me̱di nje ku Be̱ne̱ aha ngwe̱ Pita, kishi sa rie ngwe̱ e̱ ri re̱. Zhe ne ngwe̱ ri ning brru re be nwie nje, ngwe̱ shwe̱ re-gimbe ngwe̱ e̱ rehwie ma.”
Pita a ki shing he, “Brrabe̱, nje yaa rwe he n re zhwe he̱rri uucwu gyiaa, ka ri bra nyi hu ma ho!”
Jesu he ne ngu he, “Pita, nje re ting he, kya ngu pie a totu cwu ne̱, koó ri ma ne gba tsie̱ we̱, ngwe̱ ri klo he ko ngwe̱ ning hu we̱ ce tsie̱.”
Jesu a we rin nka he, “A zhe ne nje i níng te we̱sa ne lente ncwe̱, ka brra lente yâ, we̱sa ne tamri wa, nyi ki kre yankya wenywa aa?”
Á he ne ngu he, “Aawo, Brrabe̱.”
Wire ngu a he ne mbe he, “Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, nne ne ngu bi lente ncwé̱ re fo, nne ngu bi lenteng ci yâ re fo, nne de̱ ngu bi ise̱nkeli we̱ re rie̱ kuntu ngu re ning se̱ ya.
Nje níng ting he riti nka Be̱ne̱ ne e wie he, ‘Á ki hwie a tsi nné e̱ngwie̱ e̱,’ se ngu ci rrurru a rici nje. Ee! Kya ne e wie a rici nje e̱ a shi ci rrurru.”
Wire nné ki zhwe ngu a á he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, di nzhi bi re-ise̱nkeli komo wehwie a he ne̱.”
A he ne mbe he, “Mbe ana á be.”
Jesu wru re nzhi Rugu Rekwe Rihwie̱n shi ne ngu ning mrrang. Nné ki zhwe ngu a á ki zhwe re nzhi.
A zhe ne ngu ya cwu miimi, a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ku Be̱ne̱ kishi nyi ri kpe a mwa ri.”
Wire ngu a ne̱ re nzhi ncwuee mbe we tsie̱ shi shi tsie ngbaatsie, ngu a hu be, ngu a ne̱ ne ku Be̱ne̱.
A he, “Be̱, kundu ngwe̱ shî, ning fo kwrreshi cinci ne̱. Gbengbe ni, ko nyi kya ce̱ nje we̱, se we na ngwe̱ re ci.”
Ya njeli i wru zinye̱ be ya ne̱ ne ki bra igbe̱.
Aha ne ngu shi cinci we yang, aa ning bra ku Be̱ne̱ we yang, he̱rri aa krro ci we yang, ci nna kpi be shi shi nyi roshwo.
A zhe ne ngu deze nwie ku Be̱ne̱, aa ning brru re nzhi nwie nné ki zhwe ngu. Aa ya we she ne mbe shi ndzie aha ne mbe rwe̱ ne rehwie dzio.
Wire ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi shi ndzie e̱e̱? Nyi deze nyi ku Be̱ne̱ kishi nyi ri kpe a zhe ne mwa ri ngu be.”
We ne ngu shi we nka, brra ekpri nneywí ya wre̱ ngbe ya a tsi nné ki zhwe shwa ne otu wehwie ne e ki ye he Yahuda, ne ngu we kwa yi ncwuee. Aa be nwie Jesu, aa ki dzie ne me ushwo.
Me̱di Jesu he ne ngu he, “Yahuda, ngwe̱ shi rie̱ Kowe Nneywi e̱ ne me ushwo aa?”
Re̱se̱ ne kpi nné ki zhwe ngu a á zrre̱ ni, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, nzhi kwe̱ ne re-ise̱nkeli nzhi ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Ya mbe fie̱ ce e ning tsa uucwu nva nyye hwie Brra Prristi he̱rri aa ki kpo uucwu nna.
Me̱di Jesu he, “We ni! Aa be ni!” Wire Jesu re uucwu nne nna, aa ki kyia.
Jesu a he ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nnencwueé nné cwo Brranyi ngbe brrá nné ne mbe be ki pie he, “Nje nyi nne nca aa, ne nyi be ning pie ne re-ise̱nkeli ngbe ne ngbó ni e̱e̱?
Nje shi ngbe ne nyi a Brranyi ko zohu otu, ko nyi ree na va he nyi ning pie we̱. Me̱di nke e̱ nyi zhe nyi, zhe ne rewienci mbe shi ning ye ringgwe̱.”
Wire á pie Jesu, á ne̱ ne ngu re nzhi mi a ri Brra Prristi, me̱di Pita we zhwe ze̱nze̱.
A zhe ne mbe yhwa ro mbe shi wing a tese ri nna, Pita ya ne̱ ne wing ngbe ne mbe.
Ya ewena ne ngu nyi cwuo a ri nna a di Pita we gbinnng a zhe ne ngu shi srra dudu ne ro nna ngu a he, “Nne ne̱ i shi ngbe Jesu ma!”
Me̱di Pita klo nwie he, “Kei ewena ne! Ko nje ki hu we̱!”
Á srra we tsie̱, ya nne ki ri ngu a he ne ngu he, “Cence, ngwe̱ nyi ya mbe!”
Me̱di Pita ki shing he, “Kei rwe! Ko nyi nje we̱.”
Á srra á ci awa zunzrru, ya mbe ngu a he wa he, “Nyi cence, nne ne̱ i shi ngbe Jesu, aha a nyi nne Galili.”
Me̱di Pita he, “Ka, a rwe! Ko nje hu ngbe kya ne ngwe̱ he ne̱ we̱!” We ne ko ngu ku onu we̱, gba wre̱ ne tsie̱.
Wire Brrabe̱ bra di Pita, Pita ngu a lu ne kya ne Brrabe̱ he ne ngu he, “Koó ri ma ne gba tsie̱ a totu cwu ne̱ we̱, ngwe̱ ri klo he ko ngwe̱ ning hu we̱ ce tsie̱.”
Wire Pita a wru ci i ya ku we ku we ku.
Nné ne mbe shi cwo Jesu á ne̱ ne ki he re-nkang wie rie re ning be̱ va ngu.
Á ki gye̱ riyii nwie ki rin re-nka he, “Ning ting, a nyi nye̱ ngu re rwi ne̱?”
Á ki he yá re-nka we yang nwie ki cwi.
A nyiencwe, nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi zhwozhwo, á ya mwe gbengbe, mbe e̱ ci Jesu re yo a ncwuee.
Á ki rinng he, “Níng ting, nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Krristi
Aa we shing he, “Ko ngbe ne nje níng ting, ko shi nyi shî we̱,
ko nje bra níng rin nka, ko shi nyi ning shing wa we̱.
Me̱di kya ngu pie zhe ne, Kowe Nneywi cwo a srra a nva nyye Be̱ne̱ bi igbe̱ zhwozhwo.”
Ga mbe zhwozhwo mbe e̱ he, “Ohoo! Ma ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Aa we shing he, “Nyi he ye̱ye̱rri he Nje Nyi Ngu.”
Mbe e̱ he, “A nyi zembe sheede ne nzhi kre wa ye̱, ne nzhi ho we nci nzhi kya ne ngu wru nu ngu ne̱!”
Wire ekpri brrá nné zhwozhwo mbe e̱ deze á be mi ne Jesu a nwie Bilatu.

Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne he re-nka rabrra a rici ngu he, “Nzhi she nne ne̱ ngu shi cwua nneywí re nyi kya ne ko ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱. A he ne mbe he de̱ re trra Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma gondu we̱, nwie he he nyi ngu ngu nyi Krristi, he ngu nyi nggwe̱.”
Bilatu ki rinng he, “Nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi nggwe̱ nné Yahudi e̱e̱?”
Jesu ki shing he, “Ye̱ye̱rri shi ne ngwe̱ he.”
Wire Bilatu he ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe ne ekpri nné nna he, “Ko nje she nne ne̱ ne ya ywe̱ we̱.”
Me̱di á ke̱ ne nyie̱ ne ce he, “A mie̱ nka re zhwe̱ nneywí a Yahudi zhwozhwo, kya ngu pie a Galili re be wre̱ a he.”
Me̱di zhe ne Bilatu ho ni, ngu a we rinng he, “Nne ne̱ nyi nne Galili e̱e̱?”
Re̱se̱ ne ngu she he shi a tahwie ringgwe̱ Hirridu, ngu a ki lu re nzhi nwie Hirridu, ne ngu shi a Urrushelima a rotu ana.

Hirridu nyi rekwi we yang a zhe ne ngu ri Jesu, aha aa fo zhe we yang ne ngu ce̱ he ngu ra ki ri. Aha ne ngu nyi ne ho re-nka ngu gbangba, ngu a bra ce̱ he ngu ra ri yá re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu ne ngu shi nying.
Aa ki me̱ nwie ki rin re-nka, me̱di ko Jesu bra shwong ne kye̱ng we̱.
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa á yo miimi nwie ca yá ngbá re-rabrra aha mbe ki kwe fe̱li.
Wire Hirridu ngbe re-shezhi ngu a á ne̱ ne ki mi re ki he re-nka shweni. Á ki ci ya brra tago na nggwé̱, á ning brru mi ne ngu re nzhi nwie Bilatu.
A tuuye, Hirridu ngbe Bilatu á hwie̱ rwí, aha á i ma mbe nyi rwinkó.
Bilatu ye nggwé̱ re-prristi, ngbe nné ye ringgwe̱ ngbe nneywí,
ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi be ne nne ne̱, nyi e̱ he he nyi ngu ngu zhwe̱ nneywí ngbe re ci ko. Me̱di nje ki sa be a nyyi nyi, nje kre ko nje ki she ne yankya ngu shi me̱nkye̱ shi ne nyi he ne̱ we̱.
Ko ngbe Hirridu ma koo ki she ne yankya ngu shi yè we̱, aha aa ning brru mi ne ngu re be nwie nzhi. Ko nne ne̱ e̱ nyi yankya ne ngu be re ki yhwe̱ we̱.
Aha nii, nje shi ki cwe, ma n ki cire.”
[A ko zohu Para Paska, nné Yahudi kyie nne gyiaa zunzrru ngbe Bilatu we̱ we cire ngu.]
Ne riwie̱ng cwue ze a zhe zunzrru á ci onu he, “Yhwe̱ nne ne̱! Níng cire Barraba!”
(Á ki ci aa cire Barraba ne ngu i shi uucwu gyiaa aha ne ngu zhwe̱ nneywí ré ci ko a brra ngwie̱, ne ngu bra yhwe̱ nne.)
Bilatu ye nné nna aa we he nka wa aha ne ngu ce̱ we Jesu re ne̱.
Me̱di á ke̱ ne kyie̱ ronu he, “Ki ci gasankwe! Ki ci gasankwe!”
Bilatu we rinng na tsie̱, a he, “Aha nda? Nyi zohu e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu nyi e̱e̱? Ko nje she yankya a yarri ngu ne ngu be ngbe ré ki yhwe̱ we̱. Aha nii, nje shi ci ré ki cwe, wé̱ ki cire.”
Me̱di á gwra ewie nna ne re̱zhe̱ nwie kyie̱ ronu he se ré ki ci gasankwe, ronu mbe e̱ zhwo.
He̱rri Bilatu shî, ngu a we nyi kya ne mbe ce̱.
Aa we cire Barraba, nne ne i ki she̱ a uucwu gyiaa aha ngu zhwe̱ nneywí re ci ko ne ngu bra yhwe̱ nne, aa we ngwa Jesu ré ki nyi kya ne mbe ce̱.
A zhe ne mbe nyia ne ngu, á pie Sima nne Kurani ne ngu wru we ciee ngu a nkla mbe, á ki ci re se̱ gasankwe a nwie Jesu re hwrra re ki zhwe merin.
Rigwe̱ nneywí ki zhwe ngbe ne mbrrú ne mbe cwo re ku.
Jesu bra ngu a he ne mbe he, “A mbrrú Urrushelima, shi de̱ nyi ku aha nje we̱, nyi ku aha nci nyi ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe nyi.
Aha zhe cwo be ne nneywí ri he, ‘Mwo rina shi a zete mbrrú ne ko mbe si rehwie we̱, ne ko mbe sa bi rewe we̱, ne ko mbe bra sa bro rewe shwo we̱!’
A zhe ana nneywí ri he ne brrá re-ngbra he, ‘Nyi kpi a zete nzhi!’ Wé̱ he ne re-rugu he, ‘Nyi níng ku!’
Kundu ne mbe nyi zhwe re-ngge ne̱ ne ekwe hlimi, á ri ngra ki nyi rimi a zhe ne ngu hwe?”
A bra bi yá nné e̱ngwie̱ wehwie ne e nyia re nzhi we yhwi ngbe ne Jesu.
A zhe ne mbe ya cwu a nwie ne e ki ye he “Iigre Rici,” á ki ci gasankwe a miimi, ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱ ana — ya a nva nyye ngu, ya a nva mie ngu.
Jesu he, “Be̱, we we e̱ngwie̱ mbe, aha koó hu kya ne mbe shi mi we̱.”
Á nyi aaca aha mbe yaa kye re-ankya rwe̱ e̱ ngu.
Nneywí ne̱ ne yo nwie ring ne nné ye ringgwe̱ mbe ki ca ne ruto. Á he, “A kyia yá, ma re kyia rici ngu, kundu a ri nyi ngu ngu nyi Krristi, Na Be̱ne̱ Ngu Kyie.”
Re-shezhi i be ma nwie ki he re-nka shweni. Á ki ngwa rishi seerre,
mbe e̱ he, “Kundu ngwe̱ ri nyi nggwe̱ nné Yahudi, kyia rici ngwe̱!”
A zete ngu, á wie he,
Ya a tsi nné ne we ci gasankwe ngbe ngu ne̱ ne ca Jesu ne ruto he, “Ko nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Krristi e̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Kyia rici ngwe̱ ngwe̱ níng kyia ma!”
Me̱di nne na hwie nna ne̱ ne ki yhwire he, “Ko ngwe̱ to owu Be̱ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱, ngwe̱ ne e re nyi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne ngu a?
Á níng nyi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne e̱ngwie̱ ne nzhi nyi. Me̱di nne ne̱ koo nyi ko ya e̱ngwie̱ we̱.”
Ngu a he, “Jesu, lu aha nje a zhe ne ngwe̱ ri be a yarri ringgwe̱ ngwe̱.”
Jesu ki shing he, “Nje re ting cence, a cwu ngwe̱ shi shi ngbe nje a zinye̱.”
A ncwe̱ shwa ne otu wehwie na te̱ne̱. Ewie ywi e̱ ku ngwie̱ zhwozhwo he̱rri re nzhi cwu ncwe̱ wetsie̱ na ne̱hin.
Ne̱ e̱ weni si. Brra trro gbundu ewie wiri Brranyi e̱ hla zetsi nke̱rrrr.
Ne brra riwie̱ng cwue Jesu he, “Be̱, nje ngwa nshe nje a nva ngwe̱.” Zhe ne ngu he ni, ngu a zhwu cwue.
Ya shwa shezhi na Rroma ri kya ne ngu ci ni, ngu a de Be̱ne̱ nwie he, “Cence, nne ne̱ i nyi nne redziee!”
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nné ne mbe ya tsu miimi nwie ri kya ne ngu ci mbe ri ni, mbe e̱ ning brru nwie gara nva a zewe.
Me̱di ga nné mbe ki hu, ngbe mbrrú ne mbe wru a Galili nwie ki zhwe, á yo ze̱nze̱ re ri kya ngu shi ci.
A miimi, a bi ya nne ne e ki ye he Usufu, ne ngu shi a Ekpri Brrá Nné Yahudi, a nyi te̱nte̱ nne, a bra bi redziee.
Koo shi re-ankya ne e nyi ne Jesu we̱, a srrante re tsio Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱. A nyi nne Arimatiya — ya ngwie̱ a Yahudi.
Aa ywa nwie Bilatu ya rin aha kwe Jesu.
Wire ngu a trro kwe nna a zete gasankwe e̱, ngu a ki gye̱ ne trro kye̱, ngu a ya sa a ria ne e ru a kprahwan ne koó sa ning nywe̱ ya nne we̱.
A nyi Kotung Nyi Shiri aha Kotung Srra Cwu, a zhe nna Kotung Srra Cwu rikpa ci.
Mbrrú ne mbe wru ngbe Jesu a Galili a zhwe Usufu, á ya ri ria nna ngbe re̱se̱ rê ne e ning nywe̱ Jesu a yarring.
Wire mbe e̱ ning brru re nzhi ri, mbe e̱ ya kre turraren ngbe remie, me̱di á srra cwu a Tung Srra Cwu ye̱ye̱rri ne nti nka Musa.
A otu na ce̱ucwung a se̱ti a nyiencwe, mbrrú ko re-turraren ne mbe nyi, á ne̱ re nzhi a ria.
Á ya she ne e kpri ngbaatsie ne e ning ku onu ria nna.
Mbe e̱ ngwie, me̱di koó she kwe Jesu Brrabe̱ we̱.
Á ne̱ ne bē nwie hwie nka. We zhe ana, yá nné wehwie á ya yo dudu ne mbe ne brra re-tago mbe si gelgelgel.
Mbrrú nna á cwugru nci mbe aha rowu we prre, me̱di nné wehwie ana á we rinng he, “Rimi ne nyi kre nne nce a yarri nkwe nné e̱?
Ko shi he we̱, aa cinye̱! Ko nyi lu ne kya ne ngu i ning ting a Galili he
se ne e ngwa Kowe Nneywi a nva nné e̱ngwie̱ ré ki ci gasankwe wire we̱ cinga deze a otu na tsie̱ we̱ e̱e̱?”
A zhe ne mbe e̱ lu ne re-nka ngu fa.
Mbe Merri Madali, ngbe Yuwana, ngbe Merri de̱ Yakubu, ngbe kpi mbrrú ne mbe ywa ria nna á ya ti Nnenté shwa ne otu zunzrru ngbe kpi nné zhwozhwo re-ankya ne mbe ci.
Me̱di koó shî kya ne mbrrú nna mbe he we̱, aha nka mbe e̱ we shi shi nyi we ya nkaashwe.
Gbengbe ni, Pita a cinye̱ ne ncii re nzhi ria nna. Aa ya hu be ngu a na cwue a yarring, ngu a ri we re-nkla trro lili mbe nywe̱ we nggaa mbe, ngu a ning brru nwie hwie nka a kya ne ngu ci.
We tuuye ana, nné wehwie a yarri nné zhwe Jesu á nyia re nzhi ya kla ne e ki ye he Imawu, a nyi weje re-kyilomita shwa ne otu zunzrru ne e wru a Urrushelima.
Á shi cwo re he re-nka aha kya ne ngu ci.
A zhe ne mbe shi kprre rabrra re he re-nka ni, Jesu we rici ngu be ya ne̱ ne cwo ngbe mbe.
Me̱di koó ru he nyi ngu we̱.
A we rinng he, “Nyi nda ne nyi cwo re heng we nggaa nyi ni e̱?” Mbe e̱ hwie̱ yo cak, ne rehwie dzio.
Yaa mbe ne e ki ye he Kleyopa ki rinng he, “Ko ngwe̱ hu kya ne ngu ci a he a rotu ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ngwe̱ nyi nne ice a Urrushelima aa?”
A we rinng he, “Ankya nda?” Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nyi nka Jesu nne Nazarra. A nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng, re-nka ngu ngbe re-cwuo ngu bi igbe̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ngbe nneywi zhwozhwo.
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nnencwueé nzhi á ngwa he ré ki yhwe̱, he̱rri á ki ci gasankwe.
Me̱di nzhi i bi sa rie he nyi ngu ngu cwo a se̱ nne Isrreela. We̱sa ne re-nke, a nyi otu na tsie̱ a cwu ne re-ankya ne̱ mbe ci.
We̱sa ni wa, yá mbrrú nzhi á níng ci nzhi hwie̱ nga onu. Á ywa a ria nna a brra mincwe cwu,
me̱di koó ya she kwe ngu we̱. Á be ya níng ting he mbe ri re-njeli ne mbe we ting he a ning shi nce.
Wire yá nzhi ywa a ria nna, á ya she a shi we shi kya ne mbrrú nna mbe he, koó ki ri we̱.”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Kei nyi ma! Ko nyi bi hu re̱se̱ng we̱ e̱e̱? Ronu rie nyi e̱ shi de̱tiri nwie shî re-ankya ne nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe he.
Ko se Krristi nna re shwe re-ge̱zhe̱ ne̱ wire re ning brru she grime̱ ngu we̱ e̱e̱?”
Wire Jesu we brro kya ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he a rici ngu. Aa ce̱ ne re-nka Musa re nzhi cwu na nné ti re̱se̱ng zhwozhwo.
A zhe ne mbe sa dudu ne kla ne mbe nyia re nzhi e̱, Jesu nyi shi ngu shi wara re nzhi gbong.
Me̱di á he ne ngu he, “Hwie̱ ngbe nzhi aha ne̱hin ci, ne̱ e̱ yhwe̱.” Aha nii, aa hwie̱ ngbe mbe.
A zhe ne ngu srra be ngu shi ye yâ ngbe mbe, ngu a fo brredi, ngu a ci kijie̱ng, ngu a ne̱ ne hwinng re we kyeng.
Wire nyyi mbe kla fa, mbe e̱ hu he nyi ngu. Me̱di aa srra ngu a bru a nyyi mbe.
Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne yaa rinng a nci mbe he, “Ko rehwie nzhi kla a zhe ne ngu cwo re níng he nka, re ning bra níng kla rici a yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ a zhe ne nzhi shi rê ana we̱ e̱e̱?”
Á wre̱ ne deze, á ning brru re nzhi a Urrushelima. Á ya she nné ki zhwe ngu shwa ne otu zunzrru ngbe ne kpi nné ne mbe yaa tsu gbengbe
nwie he, “Nyi cence! Brrabe̱ deze. Aa ya wre̱ a nwie Sima.”
Wire mbe nné wehwie ana á brro kya ngu ci a rê e̱, ngbe rê ne mbe ning hu he nyi Jesu a zhe ne ngu we kye brredi e̱.
We zhe ne mbe shi kprre rabrra ni, Jesu a ya yo a zetsi mbe, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Srra rina re shi ngbe nyi.”
Á Cwuglu, rowu we yhwe̱, á ra he nyi wu ya nne.
Me̱di a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ci rowu aha nda? Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi nyí jinji a yarri rehwie nyi e̱e̱?
Nyi ri nva nje ngbe nta nje. A nyi nje ne rici nje! Nyi re nyi ho, ko wu bi rwe̱ ngbe nku shi ne nyi ri nje bi ne̱ we̱.”
A zhe ne ngu he ni, ngu a we ti nva ngu ngbe nta ngu.
Á hwie̱ nye̱ ronu ne rehwie kla, me̱di koó shî re yhwe̱ we̱ he̱rri ne cwu. Zhe ne Jesu ri ni ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi bi yankya ye a he ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Mbe e̱ ki ngwa hwen ne e shwi.
Aa fo ye we nyyi mbe.

Jesu a he ne mbe he, “A nyi we re-ankya ne̱ ne nje i níng ting a zhe ne nje i shi ngbe ne nyi, he se ko nda ci rrurru shi ne e wie a rici nje a yarri Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa, ngbe na nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe Re-ve Dooda.”
Wire ngu a we kla ronu rie mbe ngbe re hu Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱.
A he ne mbe he, “Kya ne e wie e̱ nyi nke: Krristi nna shi shwe ge̱zhe̱ we̱ bra deze nhu a otu na tsie̱.
Wire wé̱ brro nkang si ywe̱ ngbe we re-e̱ngwie̱ a yarri lo ngu ko he a yarri re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo, wé̱ ce̱ a Urrushelima.
Nyi nyí re-sheede re-ankya ne̱.
Nje nyia re nzhi níng te mi ne Nshe Be̱ nje ne ngu i níng sa jee e̱, me̱di nyi ka srra a brra ngwie̱ se ne e ri níng kro igbe̱ ne ngu wru zeteng.”
Jesu we ko re nzhi ya ewie dudu ne Betani, ngu a kywo nva a ze ngu a we mwo rina.
Zhe ne ngu shi we mwo rina, ngu a we we, á ki fo ze re nzhi zinye̱.
Mbe e̱ ki ye mbè wire mbe e̱ ning brru re nzhi Urrushelima ne rekwi we yang.
Á fo re-zhe ne mbe cwo srra a Brranyi nwie de Be̱ne̱.
Tu ce̱ucwung, a i bi Riti Nka, Riti Nka nna a i shi ngbe Be̱ne̱, Riti Nka nna nyi Be̱ne̱.
A i shi ngbe Be̱ne̱ tu we ce̱ucwung.
Be̱ne̱ i nyi ko nda ne ngu. Ko bra bi yankya ne i nyi we̱sa ne ngu we̱.
Nyi ngu ngu nyi riting ce, ce nna nyi kya si nwie nneywí.
Kya si nna tsié̱ nse̱ a yarri ewie ywi, me̱di ko ewie ywi e̱ hung ki drre̱ we̱.
A bi ya nne ne Be̱ne̱ i ki te, ne e ki ye he Yohana.
Aa be he ngu ya ngwa sheede aha kya si, ngbe aha ngu nneywí zhwozhwo ré ning sa rie.
Ko nyi ngu ne ngu nyi kya si nna we̱, me̱di aa be he ngu ngwa sheede aha kya si e̱.
Te̱nte̱ kya si ne ngu tsie̱ nse̱ a nwie nneywí zhwozhwo cwo be a ngwie̱.
Riti Nka nna i shi be ngwie̱, á bra nyi ebe ngwie̱ aha ngu, gbengbe ni ko nné be ngwie̱ ki hu we̱.
Aa be a ngwie̱ ngu, me̱di ko nné ngu ki se̱ we̱.
Me̱di re̱se̱ nné mbiye ne mbe ki se̱, ne mbe bra shî nka ngu, aa we ngwa de̱me̱ ré hwie̱ rewe Be̱ne̱,
rewe ne koó bî ne roshwo we̱, ne ko bra nyi aha ce̱ na ikpe rwe̱, ka ce̱ nne nto we̱, me̱di Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu we ci á hwie̱ rewe ngu.
Riti Nka nna a ci nneywi, aa srra a yarri nzhi. Nzhi ri grime̱ ngu, grime̱ na Kowe zunzrru ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ we ze̱re̱ ngu, a bi ehwie rina ngbe raywrra we yang.
Yohana he nka aha ngu, he̱rri a kyie̱ onu nwie he, “Nke ne̱ nyi ngu ne nje i níng he nka he, ‘Ngu ne ngu cwo be a merin nje e̱ ning ne̱ aha a i ning shî tu ne rishi ning bî.’ ”
A nyi aha piriri ehwie rina ngu we yang ne nzhi she mwo rina zhwozhwo nzhi.
Be̱ne̱ i níng ngwa Nti Nka a nva Musa, me̱di ehwie rina ngu ngbe raywrra be nwie nzhi a nva Jesu Krristi.
Ko ya nne sa ri Be̱ne̱ we̱, se we Be̱ne̱ we ze̱re̱ ngu zunzrru
Nke e̱ nyi sheede ne Yohana i ngwa a zhe ne nné Yahudi ne mbe shi Urrushelima mbe i te yá re-prristi ngbe nné Levi he ré ya ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ nyi nye̱?”
Yohana a we ting koo we la mi we̱, aa we ting we gbeng he, “Ko nyi nje ne nje nyi Krristi nna we̱.”
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Ma ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ nyi nye̱? Ngwe̱ nyi Iliya aa?”
Ngu a he, “Aawo, ko nje nyi ngu we̱.”
Á ki rinng wa he, “Ma ngwe̱ nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng ana aa?”
Aa we shing he, “Aawo.”
Aha ni mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ma ngwe̱ nyi nye̱? Nzhi ce̱ hu kya ne nzhi cwo a he ne nné ne mbe níng te, ngwe̱ hwie he ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ nyi nye̱?”
Ngu a he,
“Nje nyi cwue ne ngu kyie̱ a tsi yi he,
‘Nyi ci rê Brrabe̱ re ci tsantsa,’ ”
shi ne Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng i he.
Yá nné Farisi ne e we te e̱
á ki rinng he, “Ma ne ko nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Krristi, ka Iliya, ka ngu nne ti re̱se̱ng ana we̱, nyi nda ngu ci ne ngwe̱ nyi nneywí e̱ batisma?”
Yohana a we shing he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi batisma ne rishi,
A nyi ngu ne ngu cwo be a merin nje, me̱di ko nje be ngbe n hung bī ko ru tamri ngu we̱.”
Á nyi ga re-ankya mbe ne̱ a Betani
A otu na ngu ning zhweng, Yohana ri Jesu ngu cwo re be nwie ngu, ngu a he, “Nyi ri Kowe Canve Be̱ne̱, ne ngu yí e̱ngwie̱ ebe ngwie̱!
Ngu ne̱ nyi ngu ne nje i ning he nka he, ‘Nne ne ngu cwo be a merin nje e̱ a ning ne̱, aha a i ning shî tu ne e rishi ning bî.’
Ko nje i zhwo ki hu ma we̱, me̱di aha ngbe n ci nné Isrreela ré ki hu, nje be nwie nyi batisma ne rishi.”
Ngbe Yohana a ngwa sheede he, “Nje zrre̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu wru zinye̱ ngu wro shi shi vie̱kye̱, aa ya srra a ngu.

Ko nje i zhwo ki hu ma we̱, me̱di Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ning te he n nyi nneywí batisma ne rishi e̱ aa ning ting he, ‘Nne ne ngwe̱ ri di Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu wro ngu ya srra a ngu, mahu nyi ngu ne ngu cwo a nyi batisma ne Nshe Wiri.’
Nje ri kya ngu ci e̱, nje bra nyi sheede he ngu a nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱.”
A otu na ngu ning zhweng wa, Yohana shi yo ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu wehwie,
a zhe ne ngu ri Jesu ngu shi ciee, ngu a he, “Di, Kowe Canve Be̱ne̱.”
Nné ki zhwe ngu wehwie e̱ á ho ne ngu he ni, mbe e̱ zhwe Jesu.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu bra ngu ri ne mbe ki zhwe, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi kre nda?”
Á he ne ngu he, “Rrabbi” (ne a zhe nka mbe e̱ he, Nne Mie̱ Nka), “Ngwe̱ srra a he?”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ning be nyi ya ri.” (A zhe nna a nyi weje ncwe̱ weni na ne̱hin.) Á ywa á ya ri ewieng srra ngu, he̱rri á ngra yeri ngbe ngu.
Andrru, gimbe Sima Pita, nyi ya a tsi nné wehwie ne ngu ho kya Yohana he, ngu a zhwe Jesu a.
Aa ke̱she she gimbe ngu Sima, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Nzhi she Masiha nna” (ne a zhe nka mbe e̱ á he “Krristi”.)
Aa be ne ngu nwie Jesu.
Jesu ki ri, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ nyi Sima, ewe Yohana. Á shi re ye he Kyefa” (ne zhe nka mbe e̱ nyi Pita
A otu na ngu ning zhweng ne Jesu ce̱ ne̱ re nzhi Galili, aa ya she Fili. Ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ning zhwe!”
(Fili e̱ nyi nne Beseda, a ngwie̱ mbe Andrru ngbe Pita.)
Fili i ya she Nataniye, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Nzhi she nne ne Musa i wie re̱se̱ ngu a Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka, ne nné ti re̱se̱ng i wie aha ngu wa — Jesu Kowe Usufu, nne Nazarra.”
Nataniye e̱ he ne ngu he, “He̱rri yankya rina hung wru a Nazarra aa?”
Fili e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ning be ngwe̱ ya ri.”
Jesu ri Nataniye ngu cwo re be nwie ngu, ngu a he nka a rici ngu he, “Nyi ri te̱nte̱ nne Isrreela; ko bi koo rabrra a yarri ngu we̱!”
Nataniye ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ ning hu he?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Tu ne Fili rishi re ye, nje re di ne ngwe̱ shi riti ekwe riyhwietsie.”
Nataniye e̱ he ne ngu he, “Rrabbi, ngwe̱ nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱, nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi nggwe̱ nné Isrreela!”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Ngwe̱ sa rie a nje aha ne nje he nje ri re di a riti ekwe riyhwietsie e̱e̱?” Ngwe̱ shi ri ngbá re-ankya na mbe ne̱ nke ne ngwe̱ ri ne̱.
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Cence, cence, nje he ne nyi he, nyi ri di zinye̱ ngu kla ne re-njeli Be̱ne̱ mbe ngrra re cwucwu a zete Kowe Nneywi.”
A otu na tsie̱ng, á rwe ya nyrra a Kana, ya kla a Galili, ngbe de̱ Jesu a shi miimi.
Á ye Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu zhwozhwo a nyrra nna ma.
A zhe ne rishi ruto a yhwe̱, de̱ Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ko bi rishi ruto we̱ fang.”
Ngbe Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ka! A ho mbrru, nyi nda rishwe ngwe̱ ngbe ne nje a nka ne̱? Zhe nje e̱ rishi be.”
Ngbe de̱ ngu a he ne nnencwuó nna he, “Nyi nyi ko nda ne ngu he nyi nyi.”
A miimi e̱ a bi yá roshwu ne e nyi ne ngbaatsie na teedeng kyu ankya nné Yahudi komo rritsie̱, ko zohu we̱ hung ye re-gure rishi nshwa wehwie re nzhi cwu nshwa wetsie̱.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ci rishi a re-tulu ne̱ ré shî.” Mbe e̱ níng cwe re-rishi á shî ya cwu we nung.
Wire ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ve nyi ya ngwa be̱ri bikyi nna.”
Mbe e̱ ya ki ngwa.
We ne be̱ri bikyi nna ngu ci rishi ne e ki bra ci rishi ruto ana a nu ngu ho, koo hu ka á wru mi he we̱, me̱di nnencwuó ne mbe cwi rishi nna á hu. Ngu a ye nne rwe nyrra nna re be bamba,

ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ko nye̱ ke̱she we̱ ngwa rishi ruto na ne ngu bi rina kaka a ce̱ucwung wire re ya wru mi ne zhwe nke ana a merinng a zhe ne nneywí mbe e shwe te̱nte̱ng nna we shwe we shwe; me̱di ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ bra sa te̱nte̱ng nna se zhe ne wire e̱e̱!”
Nke ne̱ nyi sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu na ce̱ucwung ne Jesu ngu i nyi a Kana a Galili. Aha ni aa ti grime̱ ngu, ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a sa rie a ngu.
Wire Jesu ngbe de̱ ngu, ngbe re-gimbe ngu, ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a á ne̱ re nzhi Kafanahu á ya ci yá e̱wé̱ rotu tsie̱.
A zhe ne Para Paska nné Yahudi i sa dudu, Jesu a cwugu re nzhi Urrushelima.
Ngu a ya timi ne nné rie̱ nnywá, ngbe canvé, ngbe re-vie̱kye̱, ngbe yá ne mbe srra a re-tebrrung bra ncwé̱ mbe a yarri agrraa Brranyi.
Ngu a nyi frii ne ndu, ngu a we yu zhwozhwo mbe a Brranyi nna, ngbe ne canvé, ngbe nnywá nna; aa nyugru re-tebrru nné bra ncwé̱ aa sē̱ ncwé̱ mbe.
Ngu a he ne nné rie̱ e̱ re-vie̱kye̱ he, “Nyi wrru mi ne re-ngge ne̱ a he ne̱! Shi de̱ nyi ci zonggru Be̱ nje re hwie̱ zonggrung rie̱ ankya we̱!”
Ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a lu he krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, “Ngwa rici nje aha zonggru ngwe̱, Be̱ne̱, a yé shi le ndo a nu rie nje.”
Aha ni nné Yahudi e̱ ki rinng he, “Nyi zohu kyang hwie̱ nga onu ne ngwe̱ shi nying ngbe re níng ting he ngwe̱ bi de̱me̱ng nyi re-ankya ne ngwe̱ nyi ne̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi gu Brranyi ne̱ ngbe ma n cinga ki deze a rotu wetsie̱.”
Nné Yahudi e̱ he, “Á no Brranyi ne̱ a re-rie nshwa weni ne otu rritsie̱, ngbe ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ e̱ hung dezeng a rotu wetsie̱ e̱e̱?”
Me̱di Brranyi nke ne ngu ning shi nka ana nyi rwe̱ ngu.
Aha ni a zhe ne i deze Jesu nhu, nné ki zhwe ngu a lu ne kya ngu i he, ngbe mbe e̱ ning bra sa rie a Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe nka ne Jesu ngu i he.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu shi a Urrushelima a rotu Para Paska, nné piriri sa rie a ngu
Me̱di ko Jesu sa rie a mbe we̱, aha aa hu nneywí zhwozhwo.
Ko kre he ya nne re ki ngwa sheede a rici ya nne we̱. Aha aa hu kya ne ngu shi nu rie nneywi.
A i bi ya brra nne ringgwe̱ Yahudi ne e ki ye he Nikodimu ne ngu nyi nne Farisi.
Aa ywa nwie Jesu a totu, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Rrabbi
Jesu a ki shing he, “Cence, cence, nje re ting he, ko bi nne re hung ngwie ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱, se ka ne e ning brru ki bî te̱nte̱
Nikodimu a ki rinng he, “Wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré ning brru bî nne ne ngu kwe e̱ te̱nte̱ e̱e̱? He̱rri we̱ hung ning brru ngwie hwie de̱ ngu a ngbe re bra ki bî na hwie wa aa?”
Jesu ki shing he, “Nje he ne ngwe̱ he cence ko bi nne re hung ngwie ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱ se ka á ki bî ne rishi ngbe ne Nshe Be̱ne̱.
Nneywi bî we nneywi, me̱di Nshe Be̱ne̱ bî na Nshe Be̱ne̱.
Shi de̱ re re hwie̱ kyang hwie̱ nga onu ne nje he ne ngwe̱ he se ne e níng bî te̱nte̱ we̱.
Wu a to re nzhi ko zohu ewie ne ngu ce̱; ngwe̱ hung hong, me̱di ko ngwe̱ hu ka aa wru a he ka a nyia re nzhi he we̱. A shi we ni ma ne ko nye̱ ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ ki bî.”
Nikodimu a ki rinng he, “Wé̱ ce̱ rimi re shi ni e̱e̱?”
Jesu he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ nyi nne mie̱ nka nné Isrreela, ma rimi ne ko ngwe̱ hu re-ankya ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Cence, nje he ne ngwe̱ he, a nyi kya ne nzhi hu ne nzhi he, nzhi bra ngwa sheede kya ne nzhi ri. He̱rri ne cwu ko nyi shî sheede nzhi e̱ we̱.
Kundu de̱ nyi shî re-ankya na ebe ngwie̱ ne nje níng ting nna we̱; kundu nje níng ti re-ankya na zinye̱, nyi e̱ ce̱ rimi nyi shî e̱e̱?
Ko bi ya nne ngu sa ngra re nzhi zinye̱ we̱ se we Kowe Nneywi, ne ngu wru miimi.
“We shi Musa ne ngu i fo nshe e ze a yi, á ri fo Kowe Nneywi i ze we ni ma,
aha ngbe ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a ngu re she ce he̱rri tiya.
“Aha Be̱ne̱ ce̱ nneywí a be ngwie̱ ne̱ we yang, he̱rri aa ngwa Kowe zunzrru ngu he ngbe ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a ngu, ko shi re ci shweni we̱, me̱di we̱ bi ce he̱rri tiya.
Ko Be̱ne̱ e̱ te Kowe ngu a be ngwie̱ aha re ya nyi ngwie̱ nka we̱, me̱di aha ebe ngwie̱ re she kyia aha ngu.
Nne nke ne ngu sa rie a ngu, ko shi ré ki nyi nka we̱; me̱di nne nke ne ko ngu sa rie a ngu we̱, á a ki nyi nka, aha koo sa rie a lo Kowe zunzrru Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Cwu nkang nyi nka nna nyi nke: kya si e̱ be be ngwie̱, me̱di nneywí bra ce̱ ewie ywi re ne̱ ewie si, aha ne mbe ce̱ srra re nyi hwie̱.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu nyí kya ne ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱, a ra ewie si; ko shi re bra be a nwie si we̱ aha a to shi á ri kla re-cwuo ngwie̱ngwie̱ ngu gbeng.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu nyí kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri, a cwo a nwie si, aha ngbe ré di re-cwuo rina ne ngu nyí a yarri zhwe Be̱ne̱.”
Wire a merin re-nke ne̱, Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a á ywa a nva re-nkla Yahudi, aa ya srra miimi ngbe mbe nwie nyi nneywí batisma.
A zhe ana wa, Yohana shi a Ino dudu ne Salimi, aha a brri mi ne rishi a nwie nna, nneywí cwo nwie ngu ne ngu we nyi batisma.
(A zhe nna koó i ma ne e ci Yohana a uucwu gyiaa we̱.)
Yá nné zhwe Yohana a ne̱ ne yaa ti ronu ce ngbe ya nne Yahudi

Mbe e̱ be nwie Yohana mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Rrabbi, ngwe̱ lu ne nne ngwe̱ i shi ngbe ne ngu a nyie Brra Riywi Urrdu ne ngwe̱ i ngwa sheede a rici ngu ana aa? A shi nwie nyi nneywí batisma, ga nneywí e̱ á shi cwo nwie ngu.”
Yohana a we shing he, “Ko bi nne re hung she yankya we̱, se ne e ki ngwa a zinye̱.”
Nyi ma nyi hu he nje i níng ting he, “Ko nyi nje ne nje nyi Krristi
Nne bi mbrru hwi e̱ nyi nne rwe nyrra, me̱di yeva nne rwe nyrra a bi ehwie kla a zhe ne ngu yó re hó cwue nne rwe nyrra nna. Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje bi rekwi we yang.
Aha aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe re ning bra ci brrang, ngbe nje e̱ n ning bra hwie̱ tsie̱nzhwu.
“Ngu ne ngu wru zinye̱ e̱ a ne̱ ko nye̱. Ngu ne ngu wru be ngwie̱ e̱ a nyi na ebe ngwie̱, a bra he re-ankya na ebe ngwie̱, me̱di ngu ne ngu wru zinye̱ e̱ a ne̱ ko nye̱.
A ngwá sheede a zete kya ne ngu ri ne ngu bra ho. Gbengbe ni ko bi nne ngu shî nka ngu a we̱.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu shî nka ngu a ti he ngu sa rie he nka Be̱ne̱ nyi cence.
Ngu ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki te e̱ a hé nka Be̱ne̱, aha Nshe Wiri ne Be̱ne̱ ngwá a ko bi gamang we̱.
Be̱ e̱ ce̱ Kowe nna, aa bra we ko nda a nva ngu.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a Kowe nna bi ce he̱rri tiya, me̱di nne nke ne ngu ra Kowe nna, ko ri bi ce we̱, aha ren Be̱ne̱ ri e̱ hwie̱ a zete ngu.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ya hu re̱se̱ng he nné Farisi e̱ á ho he ngu a ngu shi she nné ki zhwe kaka re ne̱ Yohana ne ngu bra we nyi batisma,
me̱di ko nyi Jesu we rici ngu ne ngu nyi nneywí batisma nna we̱, a nyi nné ki zhwe ngu,
Jesu a we Yahudi, aa ning brru re nzhi Galili wa.
Me̱di se ngu bra cwo a Samariya.
A zhe ne ngu ya cwu a ya ngwie̱ Samariya ne e ki ye he Sika, dudu ne ebe ne Yakubu i ngwa ewe ngu, Usufu.
Ruvo rishi Yakubu shi miimi. A zhe nna, Jesu ne ngu rwe̱ a ciee e̱, ngu a srra be a nu ruvo nna, ne zhe nna nyi brra tsi te̱ne̱.
Ya mbrru Samariya a be to rishi a ruvo nna. Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ning na rishi n shwe.”
(A zhe nna nné ki zhwe ngu a á ne̱ re nzhi yarri ngwie̱ nna mbe ya se̱ yâ.)
Mbrru nna a ki shing he, “Ngwe̱ nyi nne Yahudi, nje e̱ nyi mbrru Samariya. Ma rimi ne ngwe̱ ning rinng aha rishi shwe e̱e̱?” (Ko nné Yahudi i mwe rici ngbe nné Samariya we̱.)
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Kundu ngwe̱ rā hu kya ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱ re na, ngbe ngu nne ne ngu he ngwe̱ ki ngwa rishi ne̱, ngwe̱ rā he ne ngu he re re ngwa rishing she ce ngbe we̱ re ngwa.”
Mbrru nna a he ne ngu he, “Ka, a brra nne, ko ngwe̱ bi guga we̱, ruvo ne̱ bra shi cwuncwuu. Ngwe̱ shi she rishing she ce e̱ a he?
Ngwe̱ ne̱ brra yo nzhi Yakubu ne ngu i níng we ne ruvo ne̱, ne ngu we rici ngu a ngu i ning shwe rishi ngbe nné nva ngu, ngbe ankya rehwe ngu aa?”
Jesu ki shing he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu shwe rishi ne̱, ne̱ rishi we̱ ki hwe wa,

me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu shwe rishi ne nje shi ki ngwa, ko shi ne̱ rishi re bra ki hwe wa we̱ he̱rri tiya; me̱di rishi ne nje ki ngwa we̱ hwie̱ ruvo ne rishi ning ta a yarri ngu, ne ngu ki ngwa ce he̱rri tiya.”
Mbrru nna a he ne ngu he, “Be̱ri, kusu n na zhwe rishi ana, ngbe de̱ n bra ree ho ne̱ rishi n be to rishi a he ne̱ wa we̱.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ywa ngwe̱ ya ye nto ngwe̱ ngbe nyi be.”
Mbrru a ki shing he, “Ko nje bi nto we̱.”
Jesu he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ he ye̱ye̱rri shi ne ngwe̱ he ko ngwe̱ bi nto a we̱,
aha ngwe̱ nyi nyrra ne ntó wecwuoo, nto ne ngwe̱ shi ngbe ne ngu a zhe ne̱ ko nyi na ngwe̱ we̱. Kya ne ngwe̱ he e̱ a nyi cence.”
Mbrru a he ne ngu he, “Be̱ri, nje zrre̱ shi ngwe̱ nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng.
Re-yo nzhi e̱ á i ye mbè a rugu ne̱, me̱di nyi nné Yahudi e̱ nyi he he nyi we Urrushelima ngu nyi ewieng ye mbè.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “A mbrru, shî nka nje, zhe cwo be ne ko nyi ri ye Be̱ mbè a rugu ne̱ ka a Urrushelima we̱.
Nyi nné Samariya nyi yé kya ne ko nyi ki hu we̱ mbè, me̱di nzhi nné Yahudi e̱ nzhi hu Be̱ne̱ ne nzhi ki ye mbè. Aha a nyi nwie nné Yahudi ne kyia a shi ning wru.
Me̱di zhe cwo be, he̱rri ma aa a be, ne te̱nte̱ nné ye Be̱ mbè mbe shi ki ye mbè ne igbe̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngbe a yarri raywrra. A nyi zhwe nné ne mbe yé mbè e ni ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱.
Koó ri Be̱ne̱ we̱, aha ni nné mbe ne mbe ki ye mbè, se ré ki ye mbè a yarri igbe̱ Nshe ngu ne raywrra.”
Mbrru nna a he ne ngu he, “Nje hu he Mezaya ne e ki ye he Krristi e̱ cwo be, kundu ngu ri be, we̱ níng ti ko nda.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nje ne nje shi nka ne ngwe̱ ne̱, nyi nje ne nje nyi ngu.”
We zhe ana, nné zhwe Jesu a ya ning brru, á ya ne̱ nye̱ we ronu ne mbe ri Jesu shi nka ne mbrru etsi.
Mbrru a we ondrro rishi ngu, ngu a rwi ta be ncii re nzhi yarri ngwie̱. Ngu a ya he ne nneywí he,
“Nyi ning be nyi ya ri ya nne ne ngu ning ti ko nda ne nje sa nyi! Ka nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi Krristi e̱ rre.”
Mbe e̱ wrru a yarri ngwie̱ gbungbungbu re be.
A zhe ana, nné ki zhwe ngu a á shi he ne ngu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, ma ye yâ a shi.”
Me̱di a he ne mbe he, “Nje bi yâ na ne ko nyi hu ko yankya a zeteng we̱.”
Nné ki zhwe ngu a á ne̱ ne yaa rin re-nka we nci mbe he, “Ka ya nne ya ki ngwa yâ ye̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Yâ ye nje e̱ nyi nke he n nyi kya ce̱ ngu nne ngwiee ne ngu ning te, ngbe n bra fro cwuo ngu!
Nje he ka nyi sa he, ‘Aa hwie̱ nyhwe̱ weni wire zheng ca nyya re be.’ Me̱di nje he nyi ci riyii nyi ri, nyya a dzie, á tsio we cang!
Nne ca yâ shé lede ngu; shi shi nne ca yâ ne ngu tsu cwe yâ, a tsú nné she ce na he̱rri tiya; aha ngbe nne ni zhwe ngbe nne cang ré nyi rekwi gbengbe mbe.
Aha nii, nka ne̱ nyi cence, ‘Ya nyi nne tsing, ya a nyi nne cang.’
Nje níng te he nyi ya ca kya ne ko nyi nyi cincing we̱; yá nyi cinci cwuo nna, nyi e̱ nyi she lede a yarri cwuo mbe.”
Nné Samariya piriri ne mbe wru a ngwie̱ nna á sa rie a Jesu aha kya ne mbrru nna ngu we heng he, “Nne ne̱ e̱ ning ti ko nda ne nje sa nyi.”
A zhe ne nné Samariya mbe be nwie ngu a á cwe nva ne ngu he re hwie̱ ngbe mbe, ngbe ngu a ci rotu wehwie a miimi.
Kpi nné Samariya piriri á sa rie a Jesu aha re-nka ngu.
Á he ne mbrru nna he, “A zhe ne ne̱ ko nzhi sa rie a Jesu ne̱ aha kya ne ngwe̱ he we̱. Nzhi ho ne re-uucwu nzhi, nzhi hu cence he nyi ngu ngu nyi Nnenkyia ebe ngwie̱.”
Rotu wehwie nna á wara, wire Jesu a ne̱ re nzhi Galili.
Jesu we rici ngu sa he, “Ko nne ti re̱se̱ng bi grime̱ a ngwie̱ na ngu we̱.”
A zhe ne ngu ya cwu Galili, nné Galili e̱ á ki se̱ ne rekwi, aha á i ywa Para Paska a Urrushelima ma, á ri ga re-ankya ne ngu nyi a zhe Para nna.
Jesu a ning brru re nzhi Kana a Galili wa, ewie ne ngu i ning bra rishi ngu ci rishi ruto. A a bi ya brra nne ringgwe̱ ne ewe ngu shi nywe̱ a Kafanahu ne riywe̱ gbingbi.
A zhe ne nne nna ho he Jesu wru a Yahudi i be, ngu a ywa ngu a ya cwe nva ne ngu he re be re ya kyia ewe ngu ne ngu shi nu nhu.
Jesu he ne ngu he, “Ko shi nyi sa rie e̱ we̱ se nyi ri re-sheede ngbe ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ye̱!”
Nne nna a he ne ngu he, “Be̱ri, kusu be kishi ewe nje e̱ ri hu.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ywa, ewe ngwe̱ e̱ shi drre̱!”
Nne nna a shî nka ne Jesu ngu he ne ngu, ngu a ne̱.
We zhe ne ngu shi rê re be ri, yá hwié ngu ya cigerri ne ngu, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ewe ngwe̱ shi ci ce.”
Ngu a we rin zhe ne ewe nna ngu ning ci gbingbi, mbe e̱ he, “Rwe̱ bra nna i ki we ni a ncwe̱ zunzrru na te̱ne̱ a rwi.”
Be̱ ewe nna ngu a lu he nyi ye̱ye̱rri a zhe nna ne Jesu i he ne ngu he, “Ewe ngwe̱ shi drre̱!” Nne nna ngbe nné nva ngu zhwozhwo mbe e̱ sa rie a Jesu.
Nke nyi kyang nga onu na hwie ne Jesu ngu nyi a zhe ne ngu wru Yahudi re be Galili.
Wire Jesu a cwugu re nzhi Urrushelima aha ya bikyi nné Yahudi.
A yarri Urrushelima, a bi ya nzhwo rishi dudu ne brra onusinye canvé ne e ki ye zhe Ibrrani he Bezata
Nné ruhu we yang á cwo nywrra miimi. Nné ncwue̱, ngbe nnenkú, ngbe nné kwi nkye̱ e̱ [á srra nwie te rishi nna re gbe̱,
aha ya njeli Brrabe̱ cwucwú we̱ ya gbe̱ rishi nna. Kundu ngu ki gbe̱, ko nye̱ ne ngu ke̱she ngwie a yarri rishi nna we̱ ci gbingbi ne ko zembe zhwe ruhu ne ngu ri ki wie.]
A a bi ya nne a miimi ne ngu ci re-rie nshwa wetsie̱ ne otu klanva nwie nywe̱ brrubrrubrru.
A zhe ne Jesu ri nne nna ngu nywe̱, ngu a hu he aa fo zhe we yang ne ruhu nna, Jesu ngu a ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ ce̱ ci gbingbi e̱e̱?”
Nne nna a ki shing he, “Ka! Be̱ri, ko nje bi nne re ning sheng ngbe n ngwie a rishi nna a zhe ne e ki gbe̱ we̱. Me̱di ko zohu zhe ne e gbe̱ rishi nna ne nje ce̱ ning ngwie ngbe ya we̱ ke̱she nje.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Deze, fo kpengye ngwe̱ ngwe̱ ne̱ ne cwo ciee.”
We zhe zunzrru nne nna a ci gbingbi, aa fo kpengye ngu, ngu a ne̱ ne cwo ciee.
Me̱di otu nna a i nyi Otung Srra Cwu,
aha ni nné Yahudi e̱ he ne nne ne e ki kyia nna he, “A cwu ne̱ nyi Otung Srra Cwu, koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngwe̱ fo kpengye ngwe̱ we̱.”
Me̱di a he ne mbe he, “Nne ne ngu ning kyia a he n fo kpengye nje n ne̱ ne cwo ciee.”
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu he ngwe̱ fo kpengye ngwe̱ ngwe̱ cwo ciee e̱?”
Ko nne nna bra hu ka nyi nye̱ ngu ki kyia we̱, aha Jesu wre̱ ne bru a zetsi rigwe̱ nné ne mbe shi nwie nna.

Á srra tsie̱, Jesu a ya she nne nna a Brranyi, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ri, a zhe ne ne̱ ngwe̱ ning brru ngwe̱ ci gbingbi; shi de̱ ngwe̱ bro nyi e̱ngwie̱ wa we̱, kishi yankya ne ngu ne̱ nke ne̱ ri bra re she.”
Nne nna a ne̱, ngu a ya ti brrá nné Yahuding he nne ne ngu ki kyia a nyi Jesu.
Brrá nné Yahudi mbe e ne̱ ne kre Jesu ne nka, aha ne ngu kyia nne a Tung Srra Cwu.
Me̱di Jesu he ne mbe he, “Be̱ nje shi we ncwuo he̱rri ne cwu, nje e̱ ma, nje shi ncwuo.”

Aha ne Jesu he ne mbe ni, brrá nné Yahudi e̱ á ning bra ne̱ ne kre nhwie̱ ne mbe shi ki yhwe̱; aha ko nyi we teede Otung Srra Cwu ne ngu dzio we̱, he̱rri a bra he he Be̱ne̱ nyi Be̱ ngu, woto aa ci rici ngu ye̱ye̱rri ne Be̱ne̱.
Jesu we shing, a he, “Nje níng ting cence, ko shi Kowe re hung nyi yankya we rici ngu we̱, se we kya ne ngu ri Be̱ ngu shi nying. Aha ko nda ne Be̱ shi nying, nyi ngwiee ne Kowe shi nying ma.
Be̱ ce̱ Kowe, a bra ki tí ko nda ne ngu we rici ngu ngu shi nying. A bra shi ki ti ngbá re-ankya re nyi na ne mbe ne̱ re-nke ne̱, ngbe nyi e̱ hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu.
We shi ne Be̱ ngu dezé nné ne mbe kwi ne ngu we cí ré srra nce; we ye̱ye̱rri ni, Kowe cí nné mbiye ne ngu ce̱ ré srra nce.
Ko Be̱ bro nyi ya nne nka we̱, me̱di aa ngwa ngu Kowe e̱ de̱me̱ng nyi nka zhwozhwo,
aha ngbe ko nye̱ re ngwa Kowe e̱ grime̱ shi ne e ngwá Be̱ grime̱. Ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu ngwá Kowe grime̱ we̱, mahu ko ngwá Be̱ ne ngu ki te grime̱ ma we̱.
“Nje níng tíng cence, ko nye̱ ne ngu hó re-nka nje, ngu bro sa rie a ngu ne ngu ning te e̱ a bi ce na he̱rri tiya. Koó ri ki nyi nka we̱, aa a hle hu re nzhi srra nce.
Nje níng ting cence, zhe cwo be — zhe nna a be — ne nné kwi mbe ri ho cwue Kowe Be̱ne̱, nné mbiye ne mbe ho a, wé̱ deze re nzhi srra nce.
We shi ne Be̱ e̱ bi de̱me̱ng ngwa ce, aa ngwa Kowe e̱ de̱me̱ng ngwa ce ye̱ye̱rri ni ma,
aa bra ki ngwa de̱me̱ng nyi ko nye̱ nka, aha a nyi Kowe Nneywi.
Shi de̱ re níng hwie̱ kyang nga onu we̱! Zhe cwo be ne nné kwi mbe ri ho cwue ngu,
ngbe wé̱ kpi ci a re-ria mbe. Nné ne mbe nyi rinang wé̱ deze nce, me̱di nné mbiye ne mbe nyi ngwie̱ngwie̱ng, á ri deze ré we nyi nka ngbe wé̱ we ci ré ci shweni.

“Ko nje hung nyi yankya we nggaa nje we̱. Nje nyí nka we ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ne nje hó, nyi nka nje e̱ bra shi ye̱ye̱rri, aha ko nyi kya ce̱ na rici nje ne nje kre we̱, me̱di kya ce̱ ngu nne ngwiee ne ngu ning te.
“Kundu ngu nyi we nje ne rici nje ne nje ngwá sheede aha rici nje, mahu ko sheede nje e̱ nyi cence we̱.
Me̱di a bi ya ne ngu ngwá sheede a rici nje, nje bra hu he kya ne ngu he a rici nje e̱ a nyi cence.
“Nyi i te re nzhi nwie Yohana, ngbe ngu a ya ngwa sheede raywrra.
Ko nje yó we kya ne nneywi hé a rici nje we̱, me̱di nje níng tsie nke ne̱ aha ngbe nyi she kyia.
Yohana a i shi shi te̱le̱kyi ne ngu ye ro nwie tsie̱ nse̱, nyi bra i ce̱ he nyi ho shwi nse̱ ngu a a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu.
“Me̱di nje bi sheede na rici nje ne ngu drre̱ na Yohana ana: re-cwuo ne nje nyí ne̱ ne Be̱ ngu ning ngwa he n nyi, mbe ana á ngwá sheede he Be̱ ning te.
Ngu Be̱ ne ngu ning te e̱ we rici ngu a ngwá sheede a rici nje. Ko nyi sa ho cwue ngu ka nyi ri shî ngu we̱,
ko nyi bra bró nka ngu a yarri rehwie nyi we̱, aha ko nyi sá rie a nne ne ngu ki te we̱.
Nyi hwié Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ cwuncwuu aha ne nyi hwie he kundu nyi nyi ni, nyi e̱ she ce na he̱rri tiya. A bra nyi we ngu Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ne̱ ne ngu ngwá sheede a rici nje!
He̱rri ne cwu nyi ra be nwie nje ngbe nyi she ce na he̱rri tiya.
“Ko nje kre he nneywí ré ning ngwa grime̱ we̱,
me̱di nje níng hu he ko nyi ce̱ Be̱ne̱ a yarri rehwie nyi we̱.
Nje be a yarri lo Be̱ nje, ko nyi ning se̱ we̱. Me̱di kundu yaka nne e be we ne rici ngu, nyi e̱ ki se̱.
Wé̱ ce̱ rimi nyi sa rie a nje e̱ ne nyi ce̱ he nyi yaa de we nci nyi e̱. Ko nyi bra kre he ngu Be̱ne̱ we nggaa ngu re níng de we̱.
“Shi de̱ nyi hwie he ka nyi nje ne nje ri níng tse a nyyi Be̱ we̱. A nyi ngu Musa ne nyi sa rie a ngu a ne ngu ri níng tse.
Kundu nyi rā shî nka Musa, nyi rā sa rie a nje, aha a i wie a rici nje.
Me̱di tu ne ko nyi shî kya ne ngu wie e̱ we̱, nyi e̱ shi ce̱ rimi nyi shî kya ne nje he e̱?”
Wire a merin re-nke ne̱, Jesu a tsa nzhwo Galili (ne e ki ye he nzhwo Tiberriya).
Ya brra rigwe̱ nné e̱ ki zhwe, aha ne mbe ri re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne ngu nyi nné ruhung.
Jesu a ngra zete rugu, ngu a ya srra be ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu.
A zhe nna Teede Paska, ne ngu nyi ya para nné Yahudi i sa dudu.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu wo riyii ngu ri rigwe̱ nné ne mbe cwo re be nwie ngu, ngu a he ne Fili he, “Nzhi shi she yâ he ngbe nzhi se̱ nzhi we ngwa ne̱ e̱e̱?”
(Aa he ni aha ngu mwa Fili ngu ri, aha ngu we rici ngu a hu kya ngu shi nying.)
Fili e̱ ki shing he, “Ko ncwe̱ng yeri ncwuo nyhwe̱ klanva,
Ya a tsi nné ki zhwe ngu, ne e ki ye he Andrru, ne ngu nyi gimbe Sima Pita a he ne ngu he,
“A bi ya e̱we̱we a he ne̱ ne ngu bi e̱wé̱ cwú brredi wecwuoo ne e nyi ne ntsi uru
Jesu a he, “Nyi ci nné nna ré srra be.” A bi ntsi brrubrru a nwie nna, ngbe nneywí e̱ yaa ta a be bererere, ntó nna á cwu ci wecwuoo.
Jesu a fo brredi nna, ngu a ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, wire ngu a kye nné ne mbe yaa ta a be ana, ngu a nyi we ni wa ne hwén nna, he̱rri ko nye̱ mbe she kya ne ngu shi ki be.
A zhe ne mbe ye zhwozhwo mbe mbe shwe, ngu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Nyi tsu nkla na mbe hwie̱ e̱ kishi á ri dzio.”
Ngbe mbe e̱ tsu nkla brredi ne nné nna mbe ye ngu hwie̱ zhwozhwo, aa ci grré shwa ne otu wehwie.
A zhe ne mbe di kyang hwie̱ nga onu ne Jesu ngu nyi ni, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne he, “Cence, nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng
Jesu hu re̱se̱ng he á shi ra he mbe ki ci ne ce ngbe ngu hwie̱ nggwe̱ mbe, ngu a ning brru wa re nzhi zete rugu we nggaa ngu.
A zhe ne ne̱hin ci, nné zhwe Jesu a wro re nzhi brra nzhwo rishi,
mbe e̱ ya ngwie a yarri konkro ngbe mbe tsa nyie re nzhi Kafanahu. Totu ma we ci ne mbe shi ciee ne ko Jesu ya we she we̱.
Ya ngba wu a deze nwie gbe̱ rishi nna he̱rri rishi nna ne̱ ne kpe rogyrru.
A zhe ne mbe ywrru konkro a weje re-mili wetsie̱ ka wetsie̱ ne kpirring
Me̱di a he ne mbe he, “A nyi nje; shi de̱ nyi ci owu we̱!”
Wire mbe e̱ shî re ngwie a yarri konkro nna, we hwiehwie mbe e̱ ya cwu a rekyi rishi nna a nwie ne mbe ri nyia re nzhi e̱.

A otu na ngu ning zhweng, nné mbiye ne mbe i hwie̱ a nyie nkeng á hu he nyi we e̱we̱ konkro zunzrru ngu i shi miimi, he ko Jesu bra i ning ngwie ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu we̱, me̱di he á i ne̱ we nggaa mbe.
Yá re-konkro ne mbe i wru Tiberriya á i be a nwie ne rigwe̱ nné nna mbe i ning ye brredi a zhe ne Brrabe̱ i ning ci kijie̱ng ana.
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nné nna mbe ya hu he ko Jesu ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a á shi miimi we̱, mbe e̱ ngwie a yarri re-konkro re nzhi kre Jesu a Kafanahu.
A zhe ne mbe ya ki she a yaka nyie brra nzhwo rishi nna, á ki rinng he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, ngwe̱ ya wre̱ he e̱ a zhe nda?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Nje níng ting cence, ko nyi ning kre ne̱ aha ne nyi ri re-sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu ne nje nyi we̱, me̱di aha ne nyi ye yâ ana nyi shwe.
Shi de̱ nyi nyi cinci kre yâ ne ngu shi dzio we̱, me̱di se ka na ne ngu ngwá ce na he̱rri tiya ne Kowe Nneywi shi níng ngwa. Aha nyi a ngu ne Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ning kpra va he ngu shî ne ngu.”
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Ma nyi nda ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi nyi ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ce̱ he nzhi nyi e̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Kya ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱ he nyi nyi e̱ nyi nke: nyi shî nka nne nke ne ngu ki te.”
Aha ni mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ma nyi zohu kyang hwie̱ nga onu ne ngwe̱ shi nying aha nzhi sa rie a ngwe̱ e̱? Nyi nda ne ngwe̱ shi nying?
Yó nzhi e̱ á i ye manna
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Cence, cence, nje níng ting, ko nyi Musa ngu i níng ngwa yâ ne ngu i wru zinye̱ ana we̱, me̱di nyi Be̱ nje ne ngu níng ngwá te̱nte̱ yâ ne ngu wru zinye̱.
Aha yâ ne Be̱ne̱ ngwá a nyi ngu nne nke ne ngu wru zinye̱ ne ngu ngwá ebe ngwie̱ ce.”
Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Be̱ri, ne̱ we ne níng ngwa zhwe yâ ne̱ ko zohu zhe.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi nje ne nje nyi cwu yâ nce! Ko nye̱ ne ngu be nwie nje ko shi re ho nzhwo we̱; ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a nje ko shi ne̱ rishi re ki hwe we̱.
Me̱di nje níng ting he, nyi ning ri, gbengbe ni ko nyi sa rie a nje we̱.
Ko nda ne Be̱ nje ning ngwa shi cwo be nwie nje, ko nye̱ ne ngu be nwie nje ko shi n ki yu we̱.”
Aha ko nje wru zinye̱ re be be he aha n nyi kya ce̱ nje we̱, me̱di he n nyi kya ce̱ ngu Be̱ ne ngu ning te.
Kya ce̱ ngu ne ngu ning te e̱ nyi nke: he de̱ koo ya a tsi mbe ne ngu ning ngwa re bru we̱, me̱di he nje ri we deze nce a tu krrucing.
Aha kya ce̱ Be̱ e̱ nyi nke he ko nye̱ ne ngu ning di ne ngu bra sa rie a nje re bi ce he̱rri tiya, ngbe nje ri ki deze nce a tu krrucing.
Aha ni nné Yahudi i ne̱ ne krro re-nka aha kya ne Jesu ngu he e̱, aha a he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi cwu yâ ne ngu i wru zinye̱.”
Mbe e̱ he, “Ko nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi Jesu, ewe Usufu, ne nzhi hu be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu a we̱ e̱e̱? We̱ ce̱ rimi re he he ngu wru zinye̱ e̱?”
Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nyi we ni krro re-nka a nci nyi!
Ko bi nne re hung be a nwie nje we̱, se ka Be̱ ne ngu ning te e̱ ki kwa re be nwie nje, nje e̱ bra ri ki deze nce a tu krrucing.
Á i wie a re-krre̱de̱ nné ti re̱se̱ng he, ‘Be̱ne̱ ri we mie̱ng zhwozhwo mbe.’ Ko nye̱ ne ngu ho ngu bra mie̱ a nwie Be̱, we̱ be nwie nje.
Me̱di ko bi nne ngu sa di Be̱ e̱ we̱, se we ngu ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱, nyi we ngu ne ngu sa ri Be̱ e̱.
Nje níng ting cence he ko nye̱ ne ngu sá rie a nje, a bi ce na he̱rri tiya.
Nje e̱ nje nyi cwu yâ nce.
Yó nyi e̱ á i ye manna
Me̱di cwu yâ na wru zinye̱ re be be e̱ nyi nke, aha ngbe ko nye̱ ne ngu ye ko shi re hu we̱.

Nje e̱ nje nyi cwu yâ nce ne ngu wru zinye̱! Ko nye̱ ne kundu ngu ye cwu yâ ne̱, we̱ shi bi ce he̱rri tiya. Cwu yâ ne nje shi ki ngwa a nyi rwe̱ nje, ne nje shi ngwang aha nneywí a be ngwie̱ ré she ce.”
Ngbe nné Yahudi e̱ ne̱ ne yaa ti ronu ce he, “Wé̱ ce̱ rimi nne ne̱ re níng ngwa rwe̱ ngu a nzhi ye e̱e̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Cence, cence, nje he ne nyi he kundu de̱ nyi ye rwe̱ Kowe Nneywi, nyi bra shwe roshwo ngu we̱, mahu ko nyi bi ce a yarri nyi we̱.
Nne nke ne ngu ye rine̱ rwe̱ nje ngu bra shwe roshwo nje, a bi ce he̱rri tiya, nje e̱ bra ri ki deze nce a tu krrucing.
Aha rwe̱ nje e̱ nyi te̱nte̱ yâ, roshwo nje e̱ bra nyi te̱nte̱ kya shwe.
Nne nke ne ngu yé rwe̱ nje ngu bra shwé roshwo nje, a srrá yarri nje, nje e̱ srrá yarri ngu ma.
We shi ne Be̱ bi ce e̱ ning te, nje bra srrá nce aha Be̱; we ni ma, nne nke ne ngu yé rwe̱ nje e̱ shi srrá nce aha nje.
Nyi ngu nje ne̱ ne nje nyi cwu yâ na ngu i wru zinye̱. Yó nyi e̱ á i ye manna á bra kwi, me̱di nne nke ne ngu yé brredi nke ne̱ we̱ shi bi ce he̱rri tiya.”
Jesu he re-ankya ne̱ a zhe ne ngu shi nwie mie̱ nka a zonggrung mwe a Kafanahu.
A zhe ne mbe ho ni, nné zhwe Jesu we yang mbe e̱ he, “Nka ne̱ bi igbe̱. Nyi nye̱ ngu shi hung ho zhwe nka ne̱?”
Jesu a hu he nné ki zhwe ngu a á shi nwie krro nka we nci mbe, ngu a he, “Nka ne̱ e̱ níng dzio ehwie e̱e̱?
Ma kundu nyi rā timi ne Kowe Nneywi e̱ ngra zeteng re nzhi nwie ne ngu ning wru ma rre?
Nyi Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu ngwá ce, ko igbe̱ rwe̱ nneywi e̱ ngwá ya mpe̱ni we̱. Nka ne nje he ne nyi ne̱ nyi ngu ne ngu ngwá Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngbe ce.
He̱rri ne cwu a, a bi yá nyi ne ko mbe shî we̱.” (Tu we ce̱ucwung á ma ne Jesu ngu hu nné na ne mbe shi ra shî nka ngu ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe shi ki rie̱.)
Ngu a he, “Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje níng ting he ko bi nne re hung be nwie nje we̱, se ka Be̱ ki sheng.”
Aha ni jie̱ nné zhwe Jesu a á ne̱ á we ni ki zhwe.
Jesu ngu a rin nné ki zhwe ngu Shwa Ne Wehwie e̱ he, “Nyi e̱, ka nyi ce̱ ne̱ ma aa?”
Sima Pita a ki shing he, “Brrabe̱, ngbe nzhi ywa a he e̱? Nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ bi nti nka ngwá ce na he̱rri tiya.
Nzhi sa rie a ngwe̱, nzhi bra hu he nyi ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ nyi Na Wiri ne ngwe̱ wru nwie Be̱ne̱.”
Jesu a we shing he, “Nje níng kyie nyi nné Shwa Ne Otu Wehwie, ka de̱ shi ni we̱ e̱e̱? Gbengbe ni, ya a tsi nyi ne̱ nyi shetani!”
(Saahoyo, a he nka ne̱ a rici Yahuda, ne ngu nyi ewe Sima Iskarriyoti, ne ngu nyi ya a tsi nné Shwa Ne Otu Wehwie nna, me̱di ngu bra cwo a ki rie̱.)
Wire Jesu grra a yarri ngwie̱ Galili, ko ce̱ ywa a ngwie̱ Yahudi we̱ aha nné Yahudi e̱ á i shi ki kre ngbe mbe ki yhwe̱.
Me̱di a zhe ne Para re-Ndu nné Yahudi i be dudu,
ngbe re-gimbe Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngwe̱ deze e he ne̱ re nzhi Yahudi ngbe ga nné re zhwe ngwe̱ ana ré zrre̱ re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ngwe̱ e̱ ne ngwe̱ shi nying.
Nne ne ngu ce̱ he nneywí ré ki hu a a nyí ankya a la la aa? Tu ne ngwe̱ nyí re-ankya he ni, ma ci ebe ngwie̱ e̱ zhwozhwo re re hu shi!”
(Á nyi ana ko re-gimbe ngu a á sa rie ngu we̱.)
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Ko zhe na nje e̱ ci we̱, me̱di a nwie nyi ko zohu zhe e̱ mwa ye̱ye̱rri.
Ko shi ebe ngwie̱ re níng ra nyi e̱ we̱, me̱di a ning ra nje e̱, aha nje tí he re-cwuo ngu a á shi ngwie̱ngwie̱.
Nyi e̱ nyi ywa nwie Para nna. Ko nje cwo nzhi Para nna a zhe ne
A zhe ne ngu he ni, ngu a hwie̱ we Galili.
A zhe ne re-gimbe ngu a mbe ne̱ re nzhi Para nna yhwe̱, wire ngu a cwugu re nzhi ma. Koo ywa a nyyi nneywí we̱, me̱di aa ywa a la la aha de̱ nneywí ré ki hu we̱.
Nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi e̱ á ya ne̱ ne ki kre a nwie Para nwie rin he, “Nne ana shi he ne̱ e̱e̱?”
A yarri rigwe̱ nné nna, á he re-nka ranranng ranranng a rici ngu. Yá he, “A nyi nne te̱nte̱ng.” Yá a he, “Aawo, a shi brra nneywí.”
Me̱di ko bi ya mbe ngu hung yo gbeng re he nka a rici ngu we̱, aha á to owu nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi.
Se zhe ne para nna ngu ya cwu zetsi, wire Jesu a ywa Brranyi ngu a ya ne̱ ne mie̱ nka.
Nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi e̱ á hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu, mbe e̱ he, “Nne ne̱ e̱ she zhwe hu re̱se̱ng nke e̱ a he ne ko ngu nyi makrranta we̱ e̱e̱?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Nka ne nje mie̱ e̱ ko nyi ngge nje we̱, a wrru nwie Ngwiee ne ngu ning te.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱, we̱ hu ka kya ne nje mie̱ e̱ a wrru nwie Be̱ne̱ ka nje he we aha rici nje.
Nne nke ne ngu he nka we aha rici ngu a ce̱ ve lo. Me̱di nne nke ne ngu kre he ré ngwa nne ne ngu ki te grime̱ e̱ a bi raywrra, ko bra bi rabrra a yarri ngu we̱.”
Ko Musa a i níng mie̱ Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Gbengbe ni ko bi ko ya nyi ngu zhwe ye̱ye̱rri we̱. Aha nda nyi ce̱ ning yhwe̱ e̱?
Rigwe̱ nné nna á he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ bi rije! Nyi nye̱ ngu ce̱ re yhwe̱ e̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nje nyi we kya zunzrru, nyi e̱ hwie̱ nye̱ ronu zhwozhwo nyi.
Musa a i níng be ne teedeng ca e̱we̱e̱ rewe ikpe rwe̱ ntó, aha ni nyi e̱ ne̱ ne we cang he̱rri ngbe a Tung Srra Cwu (wire ko bra nyi ngu Musa a ngu i be mi we̱, a nyi yó nyi).
Ma he̱rri kundu ne e hung cie̱ ewe ikpe rwe̱ ntó a Tung Srra Cwu ne e to kishi á ri hle̱ teede Musa, ma aha nda nyi dzio rehwie aha ne nje ci ngu rwe̱ nneywi e̱ zhwozhwo ci wiri a Tung Srra Cwu a?
Shi de̱ nyi nyi ya nne nka we aha kya ne nyi ning hwie yi we̱, me̱di nyi nyi nka a rê te̱nte̱ng.”
Yá nné Urrushelima mbe e̱ he, “Ko nyi nne ne̱ ne e shi ki kre he ré ki yhwe̱ e̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Ri! Nyi nke ne ngu shi nka we gbeng ne̱, koó bra he koo ya nka ne ngu we̱, ma nggwé̱ e̱ á shî he nyi Krristi e̱ cence e̱e̱?
Me̱di nzhi bra hu ewie ne nne ne̱ ngu ning wru. Ngu Krristi e̱ a zhe ne ngu ri be, ko bi nne ngu ri hu ewie ne ngu ning wru we̱.”

Me̱di a zhe ne Jesu shi mie̱ nka a agrraa Brranyi, ngu a he ne mbe ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Ee, nje e̱ nyi ning hu ngbe ewie ne nje ning wru. Me̱di ko nje be we ne igbe̱ rici nje we̱, ngu ne ngu ning te e̱ bi raywrra. Ko nyi ki hu we̱,
me̱di nje e̱ nje ki hu, aha nje wru nwie ngu, a nyi ngu ne ngu ning te.”
Aha ni á ne̱ ne kre rê mbe ki pie, me̱di ko bi nne ngu ci va he ngu ki pie we̱, aha zhe ngu rishi ci.
Gbengbe ni yá piriri a yarri rigwe̱ nné nna á sa rie a ngu, mbe e̱ he, “He̱rri ngu Krristi nna ri be we̱ ya nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu re ne̱ nne ne̱ e̱e̱?”
A zhe ne nné Farisi mbe ho rigwe̱ nné nna mbe yaa he re-nka ranranng a rici Jesu ni, ngbe mbe e̱, ngbe nggwé̱ re-prristi mbe e̱ te nné cwo Brranyi ré ya ki pie.
Jesu a he, “Nje shi shi ngbe nyi a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu, wire ma n ning brru re nzhi nwie nne ngu ning te.
Nyi shi ning kre, me̱di ko nyi shi ning she we̱; aha ewie ne nje shi ning shî e̱, ko shi nyi hung be we̱.”

Nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi e̱ ne̱ ne he we nci mbe he, “A nyi he ngu ce̱ ning ywa, ne ko shi nzhi hung ki she we̱ e̱? A cwo nzhi nwie nné nzhi ne mbe yaa se̱ a yarri re-ngwie̱ nné Heleni, re ya ne̱ ne mie̱ nné Helening ye̱?
Ma nyi nda ngu ning hwie yi ne ngu he he nzhi shi ki kre, me̱di ko nzhi shi ki she we̱ e̱? Ngbe he ewie ne ngu shi ning shî ko shi nzhi hung ywa we̱ e̱?”
A brra otung fro Para nna, Jesu a ya yo ngu a he ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Ko nye̱ ne ne̱ rishi ki hwe re be nwie nje re ya shwe.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a nje, ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, ‘Brrá re-yince rishi nce wé̱ ne̱ ne wru yarri ngu ne mbe to.’ ”
Jesu he nka ne̱ aha Nshe Wiri ne nné ne mbe sa rie a ngu mbe shi sheng, aha a zhe ana á i ma ne koó we ngwa Nshe Wiri we̱ aha koó deze Jesu ne grime̱ we̱.
Yá ne mbe shi a yarri rigwe̱ nné nna á ho re-nka ne̱ ni, mbe e̱ he, “Nyi nne ne̱ ngu nyi Nne Ti Re̱se̱ng ana cence.”
Yá mbe e̱ he, “A nyi Krristi.”
Me̱di yá mbe he, “Wé̱ ce̱ rimi Krristi nna re wru Galili e̱?
Ko Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he nyi a nzhwe Dooda, a Be̱tlahami a nkla Dooda ne Krristi nna shi ning wru we̱ e̱e̱?”
Aha ni rigwe̱ nné nna á ci ronu kanka aha Jesu.
Yá mbe ce̱ ki pie, me̱di ko bi nne ngu hung ci va a ngu re ki pie we̱.
Aha nii, zhe ne nné cwo Brranyi mbe ning brru re nzhi nwie nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné Farisi, á a we rinng he, “Nyi nda ngu ci ne ko nyi be ne ngu we̱ e̱e̱?”
Nné cwo Brranyi e̱ mbe e̱ he, “Kai! Ko nzhi sa ho ya nne ngu brro nka shi nne ne̱ we̱.”
Nné Farisi mbe e̱ we shing he, “He̱rri ngbe nyi e̱ aa níng brra ma aa?
Nyi sa ho he ya nne ringgwe̱ ka nne Farisi i sa rie a ngu aa?
Me̱di rigwe̱ nné ana koó hu Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa a we̱, á nyi we nné shweni!”
Nikodimu ne ngu i ree ywa nwie Jesu a ya otu ana, ne ngu bra nyi ya a tsi mbe e̱, ngu a rin he,
“A shi ye̱ye̱rri a yarri Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka nzhi e̱ ngbe nzhi ngwa nneywi i vini we̱sa ne ho nka a nu ngu, ka aa brru a yarri kya ne ngu nyi e̱e̱?”
Ngbe mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ nyi nne Galili e̱ ma aa? Hwie ngwe̱ ri, ko ya nne ti re̱se̱ng shi wru Galili we̱.” [
Wire ko nye̱ mbe e̱ ne̱ re nzhi ta ri ngu.
Ngbe Jesu a ne̱ re nzhi Rugu Rekwe Rihwie̱n.
A nyiencwe, ngu a be a Brranyi wa, ngbe nneywí e̱ ya tsu a nwie ngu. A zhe ne ngu srra be, ngu a ne̱ ne we mie̱ nka.
Ngbe nné mie Nti Nka Musa ngbe nné Farisi á a be mi ne ya mbrru ne e ki pie ngu shi nyi njè, á ki ci re yo zetsi,
mbe e̱ he ne Jesu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka, mbrru ne̱, á ki hu ngu shi nyi njè.
A yarri Nti Nka nzhi e̱, Musa i níng ngwa nka he nzhi ta zhwe mbrru ne̱ ne rahwan re hu. A zhe ne̱ ngwe̱ he rimi?”
Á ki rin nka ne̱ aha mbe ki mwa, ngbe mbe she rê ki ci nka.
Me̱di Jesu hu be ngu a ne̱ ne wie cwuo a be ne ewe nva.
A zhe ne mbe shi yo nwie rin Jesu re-nka ni, ngu a cinye̱ ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nne ngwiee a tsi nyi ne ko ngu sa nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱ re ke̱she re ki tsie ne ngbaatsie.”
Ngu a hu be ngu a ne̱ ne wie cwuo a be wa.
Á ho ni, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne nyia zunzrru zunzrru kya ngu pie a hong re be cwu a iishing, he̱rri á ya we Jesu we nggaa ngu ngbe mbrru nna ne ngu yo miimi.
Jesu a deze ngu a he ne ngu he, “A ro, á shi he e̱? Ko bi ya mbe ngu re nyi nka we̱ e̱e̱?”
Mbrru nna a shî he, “Ko bi ya we̱, be̱ri.”
Jesu a he, “Ko nje shi re nyi nka ma we̱. Ywa, shi de̱ ngwe̱ bra nyi e̱ngwie̱ wa we̱.”]
Jesu he nka ne nné Farisi wa he, “Nje nyi nse̱ ebe ngwie̱, ko nye̱ ne ngu ning zhwé ko shi re cwo a nwie ywi we̱, me̱di we̱ bi nse̱ ne ngu ngwá ce.”
Nné Farisi e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ri we̱, ngwe̱ shi ngwa sheede ne̱ a rici ngwe̱, sheede ngwe̱ bra nyi we rabrra.”

Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Ko ngbe ne nje rā ngwa sheede a rici nje, sheede nje e̱ nyi cence; aha nje hu ewie ne nje ning wru ngbe ewie ne nje nyia re nzhi. Me̱di ko nyi e̱ nyi hu ewie ne nje ning wru ka ewie ne nje nyia re nzhi we̱.
Nyi nyí nka a yarri hwie nka nneywi, me̱di ko nje e̱ nje nyi ya nne nka we̱.
Me̱di ko ngbe nje rā nyi ya nne nka, nyi nka nje e̱ we̱ shi ye̱ye̱rri, aha ko nje nyí nggaa nje we̱. Be̱ ne ngu ning te e̱ shi ngbe nje.
A yarri Nti Nka nyi e̱ á wie he kundu nné wehwie mbe ngwa sheede mahu nyi cence.
Nje e̱ nje ngwá sheede aha rici nje, Be̱ ne ngu ning te e̱ nyi sheede nje na hwie.”
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Be̱ ngwe̱ nna shi he?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Ko nyi ning hu we̱, ko nyi hu Be̱ nje we̱; kundu nyi rā ning hu, nyi rā hu Be̱ nje.”
Jesu he re-nka ne̱ ne ngu shi mie̱ nka dudu ne zonggrung sa ncwé̱ a Brranyi. Gbengbe ni ko bi ya nne ngu ki pie we̱, aha ko zhe ngu ci we̱.
Jesu a he ne mbe wa he, “Nje e̱ nje shi ne̱. Nyi shi ning kre he̱rri nyi ya kwi a yarri re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi. Ewie ne nje shi ning ywa, ko shi nyi hung be we̱.”
Nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi e̱ he, “A ce̱ ya ci ru! Ko nyi kya a nyi ngwiee ne ngu he he ko shi nzhi hung ywa a nwie ne ngu cwo nzhi we̱ e̱ wo ye̱?”
Ngbe Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi e̱ nyi wru be ngwie̱ he, nje e̱ nje wru zeteng. Nyi e̱ nyi nyí na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱, me̱di nje e̱ ko nje nyi na ebe ngwie̱ we̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje he nyi shi kwi a yarri re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi. Kundu de̱ nyi ri sa rie he nyi Nje ne Nje nyi ngu
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ nyi nye̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nje nyi ngu nne ne nje shi níng ting tu ce̱ucwung.
Nje bi nka ne nje shi níng nying piriri. Me̱di ngu ngwiee ne ngu ning te e̱ a bi raywrra, a bra nyi kya ne nje ho nwie ngu ne nje ti ebe ngwie̱ng.”
Koó ru he nyi Be̱ ne Jesu ning shi nka ana we̱.
Aha ni ngu a he ne mbe he, “Kundu nyi ri fo Kowe Nneywi ze, wire nyi e̱ hu he nyi Nje ne Nje nyi ngu, he ko nje bra nyi yankya we nggaa nje we̱, me̱di he nje hé we kya ne Be̱ ning mie̱ng.
Ngu ngwiee ne ngu ning te e̱ a shi ngbe nje, koo ning we nggaa nje we̱, aha nje nyi ankya ne mbe ki kla ehwie ko zohu zhe.”
A zhe ne ngu shi he re-nka ne̱, nneywí piriri e̱ sa rie a ngu.
Jesu a he ne nné Yahudi ne mbe sa rie a ngu he, “Kundu nyi ri nyi re-ankya ne nje níng mie̱ nna, mahu cence nyi nyí nné ning zhwe.
Wire nyi e̱ hu raywrra, ngbe raywrra nyi e̱ we̱ níng ci ko nyi e̱ bra hwie̱ hwié wa we̱.”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Nzhi nyi nzhwe Ibrrahin, ko nzhi sa ree hwie̱ hwié ya nne we̱. Rimi ne ngwe̱ he ko shi nzhi bra hwie̱ hwié wa we̱ e̱ ye̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Cence nje níng ting he ko nye̱ ne ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱ a nyi hwie e̱ngwie̱.
Ko hwie nyi ewe a ri ncwuo ngu he̱rri ya otu we̱, me̱di ewe ri nna nyi na eri nna he̱rri tiya.
Aha nii, kundu ngu Kowe ri e̱ re ngwa de̱me̱ng hwie̱ nne ri nna, mahu ngwe̱ she srra srra rici ngwe̱ kpe̱kpe̱.
Nje hu nyi nyí nzhwe Ibrrahin, gbengbe ni nyi shi nwie kre rê nyi ning yhwe̱, aha ko nyi ce̱ shî nka nje we̱.
Nje níng tí kya ne nje di a nyyi Be̱, me̱di nyi e̱ nyi nyí kya ne nyi ho a nwie be̱ nyi.”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Be̱ nzhi e̱ nyi Ibrrahin.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Kundu nyi rā nyi rewe Ibrrahin, nyi rā nyi zhwe re-cwuo ne Ibrrahin i nyi.
A zhe ne ne̱ nyi shi kre rê ning yhwe̱; ngu nje ne nje shi níng ti nka raywrra ne nje ho a nwie Be̱ne̱ fa. Ko Ibrrahin i nyi zhwe re-ankya ne̱ we̱.
Nyi shi nwie nyi re-ankya ne be̱ nyi e̱ ngu nyí.”
Mbe e̱ ya kara he, “Koó níng bî a njè we̱. A nyi we Be̱ne̱ nggaa ngu ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Kundu Be̱ne̱ e̱ rā nyi Be̱ nyi cence, nyi rā ning ce̱, aha nje wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ne nje shi he ne̱. Ko nje be we ne rici nje we̱; me̱di aa ning te.
A nyi nda ngu ci ne nka nje e̱ ke̱ we ne níng shi ywi e̱e̱? A nyi kya ne ko nyi hung sa uucwu nyi ho nka nje we̱.

Nyi nyí na be̱ nyi Shetani, nyi bra ce̱ nyi re-ankya ce̱ be̱ nyi e̱. Tu we ce̱ucwung, a i nyi nne yhwi nné; ko yó a kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri gung we̱, aha ko bi raywrra a yarri ngu we̱ ko tsie̱tsie̱. Kundu ne ngu ve rabrra, a shi ti we e̱kpe̱e̱ ngu, aha a nyi nne ca rabrra, a bra nyi be̱ rabrra.
Me̱di aha ne nje e̱ nje níng ti kya ne ngu shi cence, ko nyi sa rie a nje we̱.
A bi ya a tsi nyi ne̱ ne ngu ri hung ting ka nje ree nyi e̱ngwie̱ e̱e̱? Ma kundu ne nje he kya ne ngu shi cence, nyi nda ngu ci ne ko shi nyi sa rie a nje we̱ e̱.
Nne nke ne ngu nyi na Be̱ne̱ e̱ a hó kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu he. Kya ngu ci ne ko nyi ho kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu he we̱ e̱ nyi aha ne ko nyi nyí na Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
Nné Yahudi e̱ ki shing he, “Aahoo, nzhi brru ne nzhi he he ngwe̱ nyi nne Samariya he ngwe̱ bi rije e̱e̱?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Ko nje bi rije we̱. Nje cí Be̱ nje grime̱, me̱di nyi e̱ ko nyi ning cí grime̱ we̱.
Ko nje shi yaa kre grime̱ ne rici nje we̱, me̱di a bi ya ne ngu shi ning kreng ne ngu bra nyi nka aha nje.
Nje níng ting cence, ko nye̱ ne ngu zhwé kya ne nje níng mie̱ng, ko bi hu we̱ he̱rri tiya.”

Mbe e̱ ya kara he, “E̱e̱nhe̱e̱e̱n, a zhe ne ne̱ nzhi hu he ngwe̱ bi rije fa. Ibrrahin i hu, nné ti re̱se̱ng nna á i kwi ma, me̱di ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ he he ko nye̱ ne ngu zhwé kya ne ngwe̱ mié̱ he ko shi re hu we̱ he̱rri tiya aa?
Ngwe̱ ne̱ be̱ nzhi Ibrrahin e̱e̱? A i hu. Nné ti re̱se̱ng i kwi ma. Ngwe̱ hwie he ngwe̱ nyi nye̱ ma?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Kundu ne nje yaa ci grime̱, ngu grime̱ nna ma we̱ nyi we shwening. Be̱ nje ne nyi he he nyi Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi e̱ nyi ngu ne ngu ning cí grime̱.
Ko nyi ki hu we̱, me̱di nje e̱ nje ki hu. Kundu ne nje rā he he ko nje ki hu we̱, mahu nje rā hwie̱ nne ca rabrra shi shi nyi ma; me̱di nje ki hu, nje e̱ bra zhwé nka ngu.
Be̱ nyi Ibrrahin e̱ i nyi rekwi he ka ngu rā di zhe nje; a i ri, ehwie ngu a kla.”
Nné Yahudi mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ko ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ cwu re-rie nshwa wecwuoo we̱, ngwe̱ e̱ ri Ibrrahin e̱e̱?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nje níng ting cence, tu ne e rishi bî Ibrrahin, Nje ning shi.”
Ngbe mbe e̱ ko ngbatsie he mbe shi ki ta; me̱di Jesu ci mri, ngu a wru a Brranyi nna.
A zhe ne Jesu shi ciee, ngu a ri ya nne ne ngu bi cwue̱ tu zheng ki bî.
Nné ki zhwe ngu a á ki rinng he, “Rrabbi, a nyi nye̱ ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu ci ne e bî nne ne̱ ne cwue̱ e̱, nyi ngu nna aa, ka nyi nné ki bî e̱?”
Jesu a shî he, “Ko cwue̱ ngu a nyi aha e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu nyi ka na nné ki bî we̱. Me̱di aa ci ni aha ngbe nneywí ré di cwuo Be̱ne̱ a rici ngu.
Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi nyi cwuo nne ngu níng te ne ewie e̱ ka nyi te̱ne̱; totu cwo be ne ko ya nne ri hung nyi cwuo wa we̱.
A zhe ne̱ ne nje ning shi a be ngwie̱, nje nyi nse̱ ebe ngwie̱.”
We ne ngu he ni, ngu a trru rencwi i be, ngu a ki krre ngbe mbè, ngu a ki kweng a riyii.
Ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ywa ngwe̱ ya kyu a nzhwo Silo.” (“Silo” a zhe Ibrrani e̱ nyi “te”.) Aha ni aa ywa a ya kyu, ngu a ya ning brru nwie ri ewie.
Nné dudu ne ngu ngbe nné ne mbe i srra re ki di ngu ce̱ ankya a, á rin he, “Ko nyi nne ne̱ ngu i shi srra re ce̱ ankya ana we̱ e̱e̱?”
Yá mbe he, “Nyi ngu.”
Me̱di yá he, “Aawo, ko nyi ngu we̱, aa ki ti we ti.”
Nne nna a kara he, “A nyi nje nne nna.”
Á ki rinng he, “Ma á ce̱ rimi ne riyii ngwe̱ e̱ ngu kla a?”
Ngu a shi he, “Nne ne e ki ye he Jesu ana a krre rwe̱ aa ning kweng a riyii, ngu a he ne nje he n ywa n ya kyu a nzhwo Silo. Nje e̱ ywa, we ne nje kyu we kyu nje e̱ ne̱ ne ri ewie.”
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Nne nna shi he?”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ko nje hu we̱.”
Á ywa mi ne nne ne ngu i bi cwue̱ nna a nwie nné Farisi.
Otu ne Jesu ngu i krre rwe̱ ngu ning kla nne nna riyii e̱ nyi Otung Srra Cwu.
Aha ni nné Farisi á ki rinng wa he aa ce̱ rimi ne ngu hung ri ewie e̱ ye̱. Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Aa ning kwe rwe̱ a riyii ngbe nje e̱ ya kyu; nje e̱ ne̱ ne ri ewie.”
Yá nné Farisi nna mbe e̱ he, “Mahu nne ne̱ koo wru nwie Be̱ne̱ we̱, aha ko zhwé teede Otung Srra Cwu we̱.”
Me̱di yá mbe e̱ he, “Ma wé̱ ce̱ rimi nne e̱ngwie̱ re hung nyi zhwe re-ankyang nga onu ne̱ e̱e̱?” Ngbe mbe e̱ ci ronu kanka we nci mbe.
Gbengbe ni nné Farisi e̱ á rin nne nnang te̱nte̱ wa he, “Ma ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ he rimi ne nne ne̱, aha ngwe̱ he he e re kla riyii ngwe̱?”
Ngu a kara he, “A nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng.”
He̱rri ne cwu ko nné Yahudi e̱ á shî he á i bî nne nna ne cwue̱ wire he á ya ki klang we̱, mbe e̱ te he be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu ré be.
Á we rinng he, “A nyi ewe nyi ne̱ e̱e̱? Ma nyi he he nyi ki bî ne cwue̱ rri ii? Ma aa ce̱ rimi ne ngu hung ri ewie a zhe ne ne̱?”
Mbe be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu a mbe e̱ he, “Nzhi hu he nyi ewe nzhi, nzhi ki bî ne ngu bi cwue̱.
Me̱di ko nzhi hu ka aa ce̱ rimi zhe ne̱ ne ngu hung ri ewie ne̱ we̱, ko nzhi bra hu ka nyi nye̱ ngu ki kla riyii nna we̱. Nyi ki rinng; ko nyi e̱we̱we we̱, we̱ hung heng we rici ngu.”
Mbe be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu a á he ni aha ne mbe to owu nné Yahudi, aha á i ma ne nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi mbe e rwe he ko nye̱ ne e ki she ngu shi he he Jesu nyi Krristi, wé̱ ki yu a zonggrung mwe.
Kya a nyi ngwiee mbe he he ko nyi e̱we̱we we̱, ré ki rinng we ngu nna.
Nné Farisi e̱ á ye nne ne ngu i bi cwue̱ nna te̱nte̱ wa, á he ne ngu he, “Ci Be̱ne̱ grime̱.
Nne ne ngu i bi cwue̱ e̱ ngu a he, “Ka re nyi nne e̱ngwie̱ ka de̱ re nyi nne e̱ngwie̱ we̱, ko nje hu we̱. Kya zunzrru ne nje hu a nyi nke: nje i nyi nnencwue̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ nje ri ewie.”
Á ki rinng he, “Aa re nyi rimi e̱? Aa ce̱ rimi ngu re kla riyii ngwe̱?”
Aa we shing he, “Nje e níng ting, ko nyi ning sa uucwu we̱. Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi ce̱ hong te̱nte̱ wa a? Ka nyi ce̱ hwie̱ nné ki zhwe ngu a ma aa?”
Á ne̱ ne ki cwi nwie he, “Se ka ngwe̱ ngwe̱ zhwe nne ne̱ ho! Me̱di nzhi e̱ nzhi nyi nné zhwe Musa!
Nzhi hu he nyi Musa ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i he nka ne ngu, me̱di ngu nne ne̱ ko nzhi hu ka aa wru he we̱.”
Nne nna a we shing he, “Ngge ne̱ nyi ya ngba kyang hwie̱ nga onu: Ko nyi hu ewie ngu ning wru we̱, me̱di aa ning kla riyii!
Nzhi hu he ko Be̱ne̱ ho rumwo nne e̱ngwie̱ we̱. A hó we rumwo nne ne ngu to owu ngu ne ngu bra nyi kya ce̱ ngu.
Gannyi ce̱ucwung koó sa ho he á kla ya nne ne e ki bî ne cwue̱ riyii we̱.
Kundu de̱ nne ne̱ e̱ rā wru nwie Be̱ne̱ we̱, koo rā hung nyi ko yankya we̱.”
Á ki shing he, “Ngwe̱ ne̱ ne e re bî a yarri e̱ngwie̱ e̱ he̱rri ngwe̱ shi níng mie̱ nzhi nna aa?” Mbe e̱ ki ti ci a zonggrung mwe nna.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ho he á ti nne nna a ci, aa ki she ngu a ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ sa rie a Kowe Nneywi e̱e̱?”
Nne nna a ki rinng he, “Be̱ri, a nyi zohu nne e̱? Ning ti ngu ngbe n sa rie a ngu!”
Jesu he ne ngu he, “Nyi ngu ne ngwe̱ ki ri ne̱, nyi ngu ne ngu shi nka ngbe ngwe̱ ne̱.”
Nne nna a hu be nyyi ngu nwie he, “Brrabe̱, nje sa rie ngwe̱.”
Jesu a he, “Nje be a be ngwie̱ ne̱ aha n nyi nneywí nka, aha ngbe nnencwué̱ ré ri ewie ngbe nné mbe ne mbe yaa kywo he mbe ri ewie ré ci ncwué̱.”
Yá nné Farisi ne mbe shi miimi e̱ á ho ni mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Nda aa? Nzhi ne̱ nzhi nyi nnencwué̱ ma aa?”
Jesu a he, “Kundu nyi rā bi cwue̱, ko nyi rā nyi nné e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ ne nyi yaa kywo shi nyi ri, re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi e̱ á ning shi.”
“Nje níng ting cence, nne ne ko ngu ngwié a agrraa canvé e̱ a nusinyeng we̱, me̱di ngu ngrá re ngwie a yaka rê, a nyi nne nca a bra nyi nne nywrra nné rê.
Nne nkiye ne ngu ngwié a nusinyeng, nyi ngu ne ngu nyi nne cwo canvé nna.
Nne cwo onusinye nna ki kláng; canvé nna á bra hu cwue ngu. A yé canvé ngu ne re-lo mbe ngbe we̱ we kwa re be ci.
A zhe ne ngu trru re-na ngu ci zhwozhwo, ngbe we̱ se̱ yincwuee ne mbe ki zhwe. Canvé ngu a á ki zhwe aha ne mbe hu cwue ngu.
Me̱di ko shi ré zhwe ya nne ice we̱, se ka ré to ré yaa se̱ hoo, aha koó hu cwue nne ice we̱.”
Jesu we mie̱ nka zhwebe ne̱, me̱di koó hu cwu kya ne ngu he we̱.
Aha ni Jesu ning brru he ne mbe he, “Nje níng ting cence, nyi nje ne nje nyi onusinyeng ngwie canvé nna.
Ko mbe nye̱ ne mbe i ke̱she nje mbe be á nyi nné nca, á nyi nné nywrra nné rê. Ko canvé nna á i we ho we̱.
Nyi nje ne nje nyi onusinye! Ko nye̱ ne ngu ngwie a yarri nje we̱ she kyia; we shi canve ne ngu ngwié re wru ne ngu bra she reye ngu.
Nne nca a cwo we aha ngu ya nyi nca, ngu yhwe̱ nne, ngu bra dzio ko nda; me̱di nje e̱ nje be aha ngbe ré she ce, ngbe ré ki she zhwozhwo.
“Nje nyi te̱nte̱ nne cwo. Te̱nte̱ nne cwo a ngwá ce ngu aha canvé ngu.

Ko nyi nne nke ne e ki fo we ncwuo a ngu nyi nne bi canvé nna we̱, aha a zhe ne ngu ri ya nyanya yi ngu to re be we̱ we canvé nna we̱ to. Ngbe nyanya yi nna we̱ ya pie ya we̱ we sē̱ zhwozhwo mbe nse̱rinnse̱rin.
Nne ne e ki fo we ncwuo a we̱ to aha á ki fo we fo he re ya nyi cwuo, ko shi re bē aha canvé nna we̱.
“Nje e̱ nje nyi te̱nte̱ nne cwo; Nje hu canvé nje, canvé nje e̱ ma á ning hu —
we shi ne ngu Be̱ e̱ ning hu, nje e̱ ma nje ki hu — nje ngwa ce nje aha canvé nje.
Nje bi yá canvé nna ne ko mbe shi a yarri ekpri ne̱ we̱. Se nje be mi ne mbe ma. Mbe e̱ ma á shi ho cwue nje, ngbe wé̱ ci ekpri zunzrru, ne nne cwo mbe zunzrru.
“Kya ngu ci ne Be̱ e̱ ning ce̱ e̱ nyi aha ne nje ngwá ce nje — ngbe ma n ning brru n fo wa.
Ko bi nne re hung fo ce nje we̱, me̱di nje ngwá ce nje we rici nje. Nje bi igbe̱ng ngwang, ngbe igbe̱ n ning brru n fo wa. Kya ne Be̱ nje ngu he n nyi e̱ nyi nke ne̱.”
Aha re-nka ne̱, nné Yahudi i ci ronu kanka wa.
Jie̱ mbe e̱ he, “Nne ne̱ bi rije, a kpinzhwu! Nyi ke̱ we ne ki ho aha nda aa?”
Me̱di yá mbe he, “Ko re-nka ne̱ nyi re-nka nne bi rije we̱, We̱ ce̱ rimi rije re hung kla riyii nnencwue̱?”
A zhe nna nyi zhe nze ne wu srru ne e shi Parang Kla Brranyi a Urrushelima.
Ngbe Jesu a shi cwo a Farranda Solomo a Brranyi,
nné Yahudi mbe e̱ ya ki grra nwie he ne ngu he, “He̱rri se rekpe wire ngwe̱ níng ting ye̱? A ri nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Krristi e̱, níng ting we wang.”
Jesu a we shing he, “Nje níng heng, me̱di ko nyi shî we̱. Re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu ne nje nyi a yarri lo Be̱ nje á ngwa sheede a rici nje.
Me̱di ko nyi sa rie a nje we̱, aha ko nyi nyí canvé nje we̱.
Canvé nje e̱ á hó cwue nje; nje we hu, mbe e̱ á ning zhwé.
Nje we ngwa ce na he̱rri tiya, ko shi ré ci shweni we̱; ko bi ya nne re hung we trru a nva nje we̱.
Be̱ nje ne ngu ning ngwa mbe e̱ a ne̱ ko nye̱,
Nje ngbe Be̱ nje e̱ nzhi shi zunzrru.”
Ngbe nné Yahudi á a ko rahwan he mbe shi ki ta.
Me̱di Jesu he ne mbe he, “Nje níng nyi re-cwuo rina piriri ne Be̱ ning ci n nyi. A nyi zohung ngu ci ne nyi ce̱ ning ta ne rahwan a?”
Nné Yahudi e̱ ki shing he, “Ko nzhi ce̱ re ta ne rahwan ne̱ aha ko yankya ana we̱, me̱di aha ngwe̱ dzie̱ Be̱ne̱, ngwe̱ nyi we nneywi, me̱di ngwe̱ ci rici ngwe̱ shi ngwe̱ nyi Be̱ne̱!”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Koó wie a yarri Nti Nka nyi e̱ he, ‘Nje e̱ nje he nyi nyí re-be̱ne̱’
Ma kundu ngu ye nné mbiye ne mbe i be mi ne nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ he ‘re-be̱ne̱’, ne he̱rri koo dzio nka Be̱ne̱ we̱,
ngu na wiri ne Be̱ e̱ ngu kyie ngu bra ki te a be ngwie̱ e̱ ma rre? Aha nda nyi he nje dzie̱ Be̱ne̱ aha ne nje he ‘Nje nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱ e̱’?
Ma shi de̱ nyi sa rie a nje we̱, kundu de̱ ri nyi re-cwuo Be̱ nje e̱ ne nje shi nying we̱.
Me̱di kundu nje ri shi nying, ko de̱ nyi ri shi sa rie a nje we̱, nyi sa rie a re-cwuo nna, ngbe nyi hu, nyi bra pie cwu kya nna he Be̱ e̱ shi yarri nje, nje e̱ bra shi yarri ngu.”
Ngbe mbe e̱ ne̱ we he mbe ki pie wa, me̱di aa yaa fie̱ ngu a wru a nva mbe.
Jesu a ning brru tsa nyie Brra Riywi Urrdu re nzhi nwie ne Yohana ngu i shi ning nyi nneywí batisma a ce̱ucwung. Aa ya srra miimi.
Nneywí piriri e̱ be nwie ngu. Á he, “Ko Yohana a nyi yankyang hwie̱ nga onu we̱, me̱di ko nda ne ngu i he a rici nne ne̱ nyi cence.”
A miimi ana nneywí piriri á a sa rie a ngu.
Ya nne ne e ki ye he Lie̱zurru a Betani i nyi ruhu. Betani e̱ nyi kla mbe Merri ngbe gimbe ngu Marrta.
Ngu Merri ne gimbe ngu Lie̱zurru nywe̱ ne ruhu ne̱ nyi ngu ne ngu i kro Brrabe̱ turraren ne ngu bra i ki yi nta ne nkwe rici ngu.
Re-gimbe ngu rewerembrru a á te nwie Jesu he, “Brrabe̱, brra rwi ngwe̱ e̱ ko shi gbingbi we̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ho ni, ngu a he, “Ko ruhu ne̱ shi ki yhwe̱ we̱; me̱di aha grime̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe ré ning ci Kowe Be̱ne̱ grime̱.”
Jesu cé̱ Marrta ngbe re-gimbe ngu, Merri ngbe Lie̱zurru.
Gbengbe ni a zhe ne ngu ho he ko Lie̱zurru shi gbingbi we̱, aa srra a nwie ne ngu ning shi he̱rri rotu wehwie.
Wire ngu a he ne nné ki zhwe ngu he, “Nyi ning be nzhi ning brru re nzhi Yahudi.”
Me̱di nné ki zhwe ngu a á he, “Rrabbi, we kenke ne nné Yahudi ne̱ á ce̱ re ta ne ngbatsie; he̱rri ne cwu ngwe̱ ce̱ ywa miimi e̱ wa aa?”
Jesu a he, “Otu a bi re-awa shwa ne otu wehwie, ka de̱ shi ni we̱ e̱e̱? Aha ni ko nye̱ ne ngu cwo ciee e̱ a te̱ne̱ ko shi re klu ta we̱, aha a ri nse̱ ebe ngwie̱ ne̱.
Me̱di nne nke ne ngu cwo ciee a totu we̱ klu ta aha ko bi ewie si we̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he ni ngu a ning brru ngu a he ne mbe he, “Rwi nzhi Lie̱zurru a fu ndzie; me̱di nje cwo a ki shwo.”
Nné ki zhwe ngu a mbe e̱ he, “Brrabe̱, kundu ngu ri shi ndzie mahu a shi ki ci rina.”
Jesu shi nka ana he Lie̱zurru a hu, me̱di mbe e̱ á ra he ka nyi we ndzie dede ne Lie̱zurru a shi mi.
Ngbe ngu a we ting we gbeng he, “Lie̱zurru a hu.
Me̱di aha nyi, nje bi rekwi aha ko nje shi miimi a zhe ne ngu hu a we̱, aha ngbe nyi sa rie a nje. Nyi ning be nzhi ywa.”
Ngbe Toma (ne e ki ye he reyhwii) ngu a he ne kpi mbe he, “Nyi ning be nzhi ywa ma, ngbe nzhi ya hu ngbe ne ngu.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ya cwu, aa ya she Lie̱zurru ngu ci rotu weni a ria.
Gbong Betani ngbe Urrushelima a koo cwu re-kyilomita wetsie̱ we̱.
Á i ma a zhe nna ne nné Yahudi piriri mbe e ya dzie Marrta ngbe Merri aha hu gimbe mbe.
A zhe ne Marrta ngu ho he Jesu re e be, ngu a wru ci aha ngu a ki nyire, me̱di Merri hwie̱ yarri ri.
Marrta a he ne Jesu he, “Ka, Brrabe̱, kundu ngwe̱ rā shi he, ko gimbe nje rā hu we̱!
Me̱di nje hu he ko we zhe ne ne̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱ re ngwa ko nda ne ngwe̱ ki rinng.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Gimbe ngwe̱ e̱ shi deze nce.”
Marrta a ki shing he, “Ee, nje hu he a ri deze a tu krrucing ne e ri vu nné kwi.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nyi nje ne nje nyi vu ngbe ce. Nne nke ne ngu sa rie a nje, ko ngu hu a ri srra nce;
nne nke ma ne ngu shi nce ne ngu sa rie a nje ko bi hu we̱. Ngwe̱ sa rie he shi ni e̱e̱?”
Marrta a he ne ngu he, “Ee, Brrabe̱, nje sa rie he nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi Krristi Kowe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu cwo be be ngwie̱.”
A zhe ne Marrta ngu he ni, ngu a ning brru ngu a ya ye gimbe ngu Merri a bamba ngu a he ne ngu he, “Nne Mie̱ Nka shi he, a shi rin aha ngwe̱.”
A zhe ne Merri ho ni ngu a wre̱ ne deze re nzhi nwie ngu.
(Koó ma ne Jesu ngu ya cwu a nkla nna we̱, a shi we nwie ne Marrta ngu ri ya ki she.)
A zhe ne nné Yahudi ne mbe ri shi ngbe Merri nwie ki krru ehwie mbe ri ne ngu deze ngu wru brimbri brimbri ni á ki zhwe, á ra he ka a fu ku anaa a ria nna.
A zhe ne Merri ngu ya cwu nwie ne Jesu ning shi, ngu a hu be a nyyi ngu, ngu a he, “Brrabe̱, kundu ngwe̱ rā shi he, ko gimbe nje rā hu we̱!”
Jesu ki di ne ngu ku anaa ngbe nné Yahudi ne mbe ki zhwe nwie ku rana ma; ehwie ngu yhwi, aa dzio ehwie we yang.
Ngu a he, “Nyi ki nyie̱ a he?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Ning be ngwe̱ ya ri, Brrabe̱.”
Jesu a ti reyii.
Ngbe nné Yahudi e̱ he, “Ri zhwe ce̱ ne ngu ki ce̱ ne̱ we̱!”
Me̱di yá mbe e̱ he, “Ko nyi ngu ngu kla riyii nnencwue̱ ana we̱ e̱e̱? Ma koo ci nne ne̱ re drre̱ we̱ aha nda ma?”
Jesu ne ngu shi a ehwie dzio a, ngu a ywa a ria nna. Ria nna nyi ya rie a ngbra ne e ki hwie̱n ne ya ngbaatsie baara.
Ngu a he, “Nyi lu ngbaatsie nna.”
Ngbe Marrta ne ngu nyi gimbe nne hu nna ngu a ki shing he, “Brrabe̱, a zhe ne̱ aa a gwra, aha aa ci rotu weni ne e ki nyie̱!”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ko nje re ting he kundu ngwe̱ bi sa rie, ngwe̱ e̱ ri grime̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?”
Mbe e̱ lu ngbaatsie nna. Ngbe Jesu a gbi riyii ze ngu a he, “Be̱, nje re ci kijie̱ng aha ngwe̱ ning ho.
Nje hu he ngwe̱ ning hó ko zohu zhe, me̱di nje he nke ne̱ aha nné ne mbe yó a he ne̱, aha ngbe ré sa rie he ngwe̱ ning te.”
A zhe ne ngu he ni, ngu a ci ye ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Lie̱zurru, wru ci!”
Ngbe nne hu a wru ci ne nva ngbe nta ne e ki gye̱ ngu ne trrong nyie̱ nné, ne riyii ne e ki gye̱ ngu ne kla trro.
Jesu ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ki trru ankya ne̱ ngbe re ne̱.”
Aha ni, jie̱ nné Yahudi ne mbe be dzie Merri ne mbe ri kya ne Jesu ngu nyi e̱, á sa rie a ngu.
Me̱di yá mbe ning brru ywa nwie nné Farisi á ya we ti kya ne Jesu ngu nyi.
Wire nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné Farisi mbe e̱ ye mwe rotsu brrá nné Yahudi.
