Á rin he, “Ket, kya ne nzhi shi nyi nna nyi nda? Nne ne̱ nyi nke ngu shi nwie nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne!
Kundu nzhi ri ki we ngu ne̱ mi we ni, ko nye̱ we̱ sa rie a ngu, ngbe nné Rroma wé̱ be wé̱ ya se̱ ewie nzhi
Ngbe ya mbe ne e ki ye he Kayafa ne ngu i nyi Brra Prristi a zhe nna, ngu a he, “Ko nyi hu yankya we̱!
Ko nyi hwie he nyi canca nne zunzrru re hu aha nneywí ne nneywí zhwozhwo a ngwie̱ ne̱ ré ci shweni we̱ e̱e̱?”
A nyi ana koo he nka ana ne ru ngu we̱, me̱di aha ne ngu nyi Brra Prristi a zhe ana, aa ti re̱se̱ng he Jesu shi hu aha nné Yahudi,
kei, ko aha ngwie̱ nné Yahudi nggaa mbe we̱, me̱di aha re tsu rewe Be̱ne̱ ne mbe yaa sē̱ kanka ngbe ré ci zunzrru.
Kya ngu pie a tu ana, á ne̱ ne kre rê mbe ki yhwe̱.
Aha ni, ko Jesu grra gbeng a nyyi nné Yahudi wa we̱. Aa yaa fie̱ re nzhi ya kla ne e ki ye he Ifrreemu ne ngu shi dudu ne tsi yi. Aa ya srra miimi ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu.
A zhe ne Para Paska nné Yahudi i sa dudu, nné piriri wru a re-nkla mbe re nzhi Urrushelima ngbe mbe yaa ci ci wiri aha teede Paska.
Á kre Jesu we kre we kre, á yo a Brranyi nwie yaa rinng he, “Nyi ri rimi e̱? Ko cwo be Para nna gung we̱ e̱e̱?”
Á ma ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné Farisi mbe e ngwa nka he nne ne ngu ri hu ewie ne Jesu ning shî re ti ngbe mbe ki pie.
A zhe ne Paska hwie̱ rotu rritsie̱, Jesu a be a Betani a nwie ne Lie̱zurru ne ngu i ki deze nhu ana ngu ning srrá.
Á ki nyi yâ totu a miimi. A nyi Marrta ngu i shi kye yâ nna, Lie̱zurru a shi a tsi nné ne mbe shi srra a gumong ye yâ ngbe ne Jesu.

Ngbe Merri e̱ fo ya oshwo turraren bi ncwé̱ we yang ne e nyi ne te̱nte̱ narrdi, ngu a ki krong a rebenta wire ngu a ne̱ ne ki yi nta nna ne nkwe rici ngu; ngbe shwe̱ turraren nna a se̱ eri nna zhwozhwo.
Me̱di ya a tsi nné zhwe Jesu ne e ki ye he Yahuda Iskarriyoti, ne ngu cwo a ki rie̱, ngu a he,
“Nyi nda ngu ci ne ko shi ré rie̱ turraren ne ngu cwu denarri nnywa wetsie̱
(Koo he ni aha ne ngu ce̱ she yiriywé̱ng we̱, me̱di aha ne ngu nyi nne nca. A nyi ngu ne ngu bró lente ncwé̱ mbe, a srrá re trrung nwie ning nyi ankya na rici ngu.)
Me̱di Jesu he ne ngu he, “Ki we ngbe re sa turraren ne̱ ni aha otu ne e ri ning nyie̱.
Yiriywé̱ e̱ á shi shi ngbe ne nyi ko zohu zhe, ko nje e̱ nje shi ngbe ne nyi ko zohu zhe we̱.”
A zhe ne nné Yahudi piriri mbe ya hu he Jesu shi Betani, mbe e̱ be; ko aha ngu nggaa ngu we̱, me̱di aha mbe ya di Lie̱zurru ne i ki deze nhu a.
Aha ni nggwé̱ re-prristi e̱ ne̱ ne kre rê mbe ning yhwe̱ Lie̱zurru ma,
aha nyi aha ngu ne nné Yahudi piriri mbe we we mbe ne̱ ne sa rie a Jesu.
A otu na ngu ning zhweng, rigwe̱ nné ne mbe be Para nna á ho he Jesu nyia re nzhi Urrushelima.
Mbe e̱ kprre nva rekwe iigle, á ya ki nyi rê nwie kyie̱ ronu he,
“Hosanna!
Mwo rina nyi na nne nke
ne ngu be a yarri lo Brrabe̱!
Mwo rina nyi na nggwe̱ Isrreela!”
Jesu she ya ewe nze̱e̱kyi, ngu a ning ngra a zeteng we shi kya ne e wie he,
“Shi de̱ nyi to owu we̱,
nyi nné ngwie̱ Siyona!
Nyi ri nggwe̱ nyi e̱ nyi ngwiee
ne ngu cwo re be a zete ewe nze̱e̱kyi.”
A ce̱ucwung, nné ki zhwe ngu a koó i hu re̱se̱ ga re-ankya ne̱ we̱, se zhe ne e ya deze Jesu a yarri grime̱, wire mbe ya lu he á i wie re-ankya ne̱ a rici ngu, he mbe bra ki nyi re-ankya ne̱.
Ekpri nné ne mbe i shi ngbe ne Jesu a zhe ne ngu i ye Lie̱zurru a ria ngu ki deze a nhu a á ne̱ ne ting.
Aha ni nné piriri ne mbe ho kyang hwie̱ nga onu ne ngu nyi ne̱, mbe e̱ nga re be ki nyi rê.
Nné Farisi mbe e̱ he we nci mbe he, “Ri we̱, ko nzhi cwo a cwu ko ya ewie we̱; aha ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo nga nwie ki zhwe.”
A zhe ana a bi yá nné Heleni ne mbe shi tsi nné ne mbe be ye Be̱ne̱ mbè a Para nna.
Á be nwie Fili ne ngu nyi nne Beseda a Galili, mbe e̱ he, “Be̱ri, nzhi ce̱ ri Jesu.”
Fili e̱ ya ti Andrrung, ngbe mbe nné wehwie e̱ ya ti Jesung.
Jesu a we shing he, “Zhe e be ne e shi ci Kowe Nneywi grime̱.
Nje níng ting cence, kundu de̱ cwe alikama ngwie be ngu hu we̱, we̱ srra we cwe zunzrru. Me̱di kundu ngu hu, wire we̱ ci riyii piriri.
Nne nke ne ngu ce̱ ce ngu, we̱ wi; me̱di nne nke ne ngu ra ce ngu a be ngwie̱ ne̱, mahu a cwó ce ngu gbagba he̱rri tiya.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ ning nyi cwuo se re ning zhwe; ngbe ewie ne nje ning shi, ngu nnencwuo nje e̱ we̱ ning shi ma. Be̱ nje shi ci ko nye̱ ne ngu ning nyi cwuó grime̱.
“A zhe ne ne̱, nje bē we yang a yarri hwie nje. Ma n he rimi? N he, ‘Be̱, n kye̱ a zhe ne ne̱’ e̱e̱? Aawo, a nyi aha zhe ne ne̱ ne nje be.
Be̱, ci lo ngwe̱ grime̱!”
Wire ya cwue e̱ wru zinye̱ he, “Nje ki ci grime̱; nje bra shi ki cing wa.”
Rigwe̱ nné ne mbe shi yo miimi á ho, mbe e̱ he he eeze kpra ru; yá mbe e̱ he he nyi ya njeli ngu he nka ne ngu.
Me̱di Jesu he ne mbe he, “Cwue ne̱ e̱ he nka aha nyi, ko nyi aha nje we̱.
Zhe e be ne e shi nyi ngwie̱ ne̱ nka; a zhe ne á shi trro nggwe̱ ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ a ringgwe̱.
Me̱di nje e̱, kundu ne e ri ning fo be ngwie̱ ne̱ re nzhi zeteng, nje ri kwa nneywí zhwozhwo re be nwie nje.”
Aa he ni aha ngu ti zhwe hu ne ngu shi hu.
Rigwe̱ nné nna á he, “Nzhi hu a yarri Nti Nka nzhi e̱ he Krristi nna ri srra he̱rri tiya. Rimi ne ngwe̱ he he se ne e fo Kowe Nneywi nna a ze e̱ ye̱? Nyi nye̱ ngu nyi Kowe Nneywi nna?”

Wire Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nse̱ nna shi srra ngbe nyi a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu. Nyi cwo ciee nyi a yarri nse̱ ne ewie ywi rishi be re ya níng ku. Nne nke ne ngu cwo a nwie ywi, koo hu ewie ne ngu nyia re nzhi we̱.
Nyi sa rie a nse̱ nna a zhe ne nyi ki bi, aha ngbe nyi hwie̱ nné ewie si.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu fro re-nka ne̱, aa ne̱ ya srra a nwie ne ko mbe hu we̱.
Ko ngbe ne re-sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu ne Jesu ngu nyi zhwozhwo a nyyi mbe, koó sa rie a ngu we̱,
aha ngbe nka Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he re ci rrurru, a i he:
“Brrabe̱, nyi nye̱ ngu sa rie a nka nzhi e̱?
Nyi nye̱ ne Brrabe̱ ki ti igbe̱ ngu a?”
Aha ni koó bi sa rie we̱, aha Ishaya i he wa he:
“Aa ci nyyi mbe ci ncwue̱
a bra we shi ywing a yarri ronu rie mbe,
aha ngbe de̱ ré ri ne nyyi mbe we̱,
de̱ ré bra hu a yarri ronu rie mbe we̱
kishi á ri ning brru re be nwie nje — ngbe ma n we kyia.”
Ishaya i he nka ne̱ aha ne ngu i ri grime̱ Jesu, ngu a he nka a rici ngu.
Gbengbe ni, nné piriri he̱rri ngbe yá nnencwueé nné Yahudi á sa rie a ngu; me̱di aha ne mbe to owu nné Farisi, koó hung heng he mbe shî nka ngu we̱, kishi á ri we yu a zonggrung mwe.
Á ce̱ he nneywí ré we de kaka re ne̱ de na Be̱ne̱.
Wire Jesu a ci onu he, “Nne nke ne ngu sa rie a nje, ko sá rie we a nje we̱, me̱di a sa rie a nne ngwiee ne ngu ning te.
Kundu ngu ning rí, a rí nne ngwiee ne ngu ning te.
Nje be be ngwie̱ shi shi nyi nse̱, aha ngbe ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a nje, ko shi re srra a nwie ywi we̱.
“Me̱di ngu nne nke ne ngu hó nka nje ne ko ngu ning nyi cwuó we̱, ko nje ki nyí nka we̱; aha ko nje be nyi ebe ngwie̱ nka we̱, me̱di he n kyia ebe ngwie̱.
Nne nke ne ngu ning ra ne ko ngu sé̱ nka nje we̱, a bi we nne ne ngu shi ki nyi nka; nka nje ne nje he e̱ ri hwie̱ kya ne e shi ki nyi nka a tu krrucing.
Aha ko nje hé nka ne igbe̱ rici nje we̱, me̱di ngu Be̱ ne ngu ning te e̱ ning ti kya ne nje shi heng, se ne nje bra he.
Nje bra hu he nka ngu a ngwá ce na he̱rri tiya. Aha nii, ko nda ne nje he e̱ nyi we kya ne Be̱ he n he.”

A zhe ne Para Paska ngu hwie̱ otu zunzrru, Jesu hu re̱se̱ng he zhe e be ne ngu shi ning we ebe ngwie̱ re nzhi nwie Be̱. Jesu ce̱ nné mbiye ne mbe nyi na ngu ne mbe shi a be ngwie̱, aa we ti zhwe ce̱ ne ngu we ce̱ zhwozhwo.
A zhe ne mbe shi ye yâ totu, á ma ne shetani i ci hwie nkang rie̱ Jesu a nu rie Yahuda ne ngu nyi ewe Sima Iskarriyoti.
Jesu hu he Be̱ ki ngwa ko nda a nva ngu; he ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱, ngu bra shi ning brru re nzhi nwie Be̱ne̱.
Ngu a deze nwieng ye yâ nna, ngu a ti kuntu ngu, ngu a rwe taweli a nti.
Wire ngu a ci rishi a perewe ngu a ne̱ ne kyu nné ki zhwe ngu nta nwie we yi ngu ne taweli ne ngu rwe a nti e̱.
A zhe ne ngu ya cwu a nwie Sima Pita, Sima Pita he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ shi ning kyu nta aa?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “A zhe ne ne̱ ko ngwe̱ hu kya ne nje shi mi ne̱ we̱, me̱di re nzhi ncwuee ngwe̱ cwo a hung.”
Pita a he ne ngu he, “Aawo, ko shi ngwe̱ ning kyu nta nje we̱ rraa!”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Kundu de̱ nje re kyung we̱, mahu ko shi yankya re ning mwe ngbe ngwe̱ we̱.”
Sima Pita a he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, ma kundu ngu ri shi ni, ko nyi we nta nje ngwe̱ shi kyung we̱, kyu he̱rri ngbe nva ngbe rici nje zhwozhwo!”

Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Nne ngwiee ne ngu ngwie rishi, ko se re bra ngwie rishi wa we̱, se ka re kyu we nta hoo, aha rwe̱ ngu a zhwozhwo shi wiriri. Nyi e̱ nyi shi wiriri, me̱di ko nyi zhwozhwo nyi we̱.”
Aha aa hu nne nke ne ngu shi ki rie̱, kya a nyi ngwiee ngu he he ko nyi zhwozhwo mbe ne mbe shi wiriri we̱.
A zhe ne ngu we kyu nta nna yhwe̱, ngu a ci kuntu ngu, ngu a ning brru re nzhi nwieng srra ngu a tebrru. Ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi hu cwu kya ne nje níng nying ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Nyi ning ye he Nne Mie Nka, nyi bra ning ye he Brrabe̱; a shi ye̱ye̱rri ne nyi ning ye ni e̱, aha a shi ni cence.
A zhe ne ne̱ tu ne nje Brrabe̱ nyi ngbe Nne Mie Nka nyi e̱ nje níng kyu nta, mahu aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi yaa kyu nta ma.
Nje níng nying ni aha ngbe n níng ti kya ne nyi ri ma nyi.
Nje níng ting cence, ko hwie ne̱ be̱ri ngu we̱, ko nnente e̱ bra ne̱ nne ne ngu ki te we̱.
Ma tu nyi hu re̱se̱ng he ni ne̱, nyi e̱ shi she mwo rina, kundu nyi nyi ni.
“Ko nje he nka ne̱ ne nyi zhwozhwo we̱; nje hu nné ne nje we kyie. Me̱di aha ngbe nka Be̱ne̱ ne e wie re ci rrurru: ‘Nne nke ne ngu ye a enjie zunzrru ngbe nje e̱ ning brru bra rikwe̱ ning ngwa.’
“Nje níng ting a zhe ne ne̱ ne ngu rishi ci, aha kundu ngu ri ci ni, nyi e̱ shî he nyi Nje ne Nje nyi ngu.
Nje níng ting cence he ko nye̱ ne ngu se̱ nne ne nje ki te, mahu aa ning se̱ nje; ko nye̱ ne ngu ning se̱ ma, mahu aa se̱ Be̱ ne ngu ning te.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he re-nka ne̱, ngu a ngwie cinci a yarri hwie ngu we yang, ngu a he we gbeng he, “Nje níng heng cence ya a tsi nyi ne̱ shi ning rie̱.”
Nné ki zhwe e̱ á ne̱ ne brra nwie yaa di re hwie nka we̱sa ne hung ka nyi nye̱ ne ngu ning shi nka ye̱?
Ya a tsi mbe, nne nke ne Jesu cé̱, shi srra dudu ne ngu.
Sima Pita a he ne ngu nne nke ne Jesu cé̱ e̱ a riti uucwu he, “Ki rinng he nyi nye̱ ne ngu ning he nka ne̱ ye̱?”
Ngbe ngu nne ki zhwe ana ngu a shwo re be dudu ne Jesu, ngu a ki rinng he, “Brrabe̱, a nyi nye̱ e̱?”
Jesu a shî he, “Nne nke ne nje ri tala brredi ne̱ a yarri onggo ne nje ki ngwa, mahu nyi ngu.” Zhe ne ngu ning talang, ngu a ngwa Yahuda Iskarriyoti ne ngu nyi ewe Sima.
We zhe ne Yahuda ngu se̱ kla brredi nna, Shetani e̱ ngwie a yarri ngu.
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Wre̱ ne nyi kya ne ngwe̱ ce̱ nying nna.”
Ko bi ya mbe a nwieng ye yâ nna ngu hu re̱se̱ kya ngu ci ne Jesu he ne ngu ni we̱.
Tu ne Yahuda nyi nne bro lente ncwé̱, yá mbe ra he ka Jesu he re ning si ankya na Para nna, ka re ngwa yiriywé̱ hoo.
We zhe ne Yahuda ngu se̱ brredi ana, ngu a wre̱ ne wru ci mri. A zhe nna nyi totu.
A zhe ne Yahuda ne̱, Jesu a he, “A zhe ne ne̱ á shi ci Kowe Nneywi grime̱, Be̱ne̱ shi she grime̱ aha ngu.
[Kundu Be̱ne̱ she grime̱ aha Kowe], mahu Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu shi wre̱ ne ngwa Kowe grime̱ we hwiehwie.
“A rewe, ko nje shi ci zhe piriri ngbe nyi we̱. Nyi shi ning kre. We shi ne nje i ti nné ringgwe̱ Yahuding, ‘Ko shi nyi hung be a nwie ne nje cwo nzhi we̱.’
“Nje níng ngwa ya Riti Nka hwi: nyi yaa ce̱. We shi ne nje níng ce̱, nyi yaa ce̱ a nci nyi ma.
Kundu nyi yaa ce̱ a nci nyi, ngbe ko nye̱ we̱ hu he nyi nyi nné ning zhwe nje.”
Sima Pita a ki rinng he, “Brrabe̱, nyi he ngwe̱ nyia re nzhi e̱?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Ewie ne nje nyia re nzhi e̱ ko shi ngwe̱ hu ning be a zhe ne we̱, me̱di ngwe̱ ri hung be a ya otu.”
Pita a ning brru ki rinng wa he, “Brrabe̱, nyi nda ngu ci ko shi n hung re zhwe a zhe ne̱ we̱ e̱? Nje shi ngwa rici nje aha ngwe̱ ko ngu ra bra nyi hu.”
Wire Jesu a ki shing he, “He̱rri ngwe̱ ri hung ngwa rici ngwe̱ aha nje e̱ rri ii? Nje re ting cence, ngwe̱ shi klo kpe̱kpe̱ he̱rri ce tsie̱ he ko ngwe̱ ning hu we̱ ne gba rishi tsie̱.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi bē we̱, nyi bi sa rie a Be̱ne̱ nyi bra sa rie a nje ma.
A bi rewieng srra piriri a ri Be̱ nje; de̱e̱ ni we̱, nje rā níng ting. Nje cwo nzhi nyi ewie aha nyi.
Kundu nje ri e̱ nyi ewie aha nyi, wire ma n bro be n ya níng ko re be nwie nje, aha ngbe nyi shi a nwie ne nje ning shi.
Nyi e̱ nyi hu rê ewie ne nje nyia re nzhi.”
Toma a he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, ma ko nzhi hu ewie ne ngwe̱ nyia re nzhi e̱ we̱, nzhi e̱ ce̱ rimi nzhi hu rê nna?”
Jesu a we shing he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi rê, nje nyi raywrra, nje bra nyi ce. Ko bi nne re hung be nwie Be̱ we̱ se ne nje.
Kundu nyi rā ning hu, nyi rā hu Be̱ nje. Me̱di kya ngu pie a zhe ne ne̱, nyi ki hu, nyi bra ki ri.”
Fili e̱ he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱, níng ti Be̱ nna, ngbe we̱ níng be ni.”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Kyet, a Fili, ngbe brra zhe ne nje ci ngbe ne nyi ne̱, ko ngwe̱ ning hu we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nye̱ ne ngu ning di, aa di Be̱. Ngwe̱ bra ce̱ rimi ngwe̱ he he n níng ti Be̱ e̱?
Fili ko ngwe̱ sa rie he nje shi a yarri Be̱ nna, ngu a ma a shi a yarri nje we̱ e̱e̱? Nti nka ne nje he ne nyi ne̱ koó wrru nwie nje we̱, a nyi ngu Be̱ ne ngu shi a yarri nje ne ngu shi ncwuo ngu.
Nyi shî nka nje ne̱ ne nje he he nje shi a yarri Be̱, he ngu Be̱ e̱ a shi a yarri nje ma; ka nyi shî nka nje aha re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu ne nje nyi ne̱ hoo.
Nje níng ting cence, ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a nje, we̱ nyi re-ankya ne nje nyí, he̱rri ma we̱ nyi re-ankya na ne mbe ne̱ re-nke ne̱, aha nje nyia re nzhi a nwie Be̱.
Ngbe ko nda ne nyi rin a yarri lo nje ma n nyi, aha ngbe Be̱ re she grime̱ a Kowe.
Ko nda ne nyi ning rinng a yarri lo nje, ma n níng nying.
“Kundu nyi ning ce̱, nyi e̱ zhwe Nti Nka nje.
Ngbe nje e̱ ma n rin Be̱ng, ngbe we̱ níng ngwa ya ne ngu ri níng sheng, ne ngu ri srra ngbe ne nyi he̱rri tiya.
Nyi Nshe Wiri ne ngu ri níng ti raywrra. Nné ngwie̱ ri me̱nkye̱ ki se̱, aha koó ki ri we̱ wire re ning hwie̱ ré ki hu. Me̱di nyi e̱ nyi ki hu, aha a shi ngbe nyi a bra shi srra a yarri nyi.
“Ko nje shi níng we shi re-iina we̱; nje cwo a ning brru n be nwie nyi.
Ko shi fo zhe we̱, ko nné ngwie̱ ne̱ á shi ning ri we̱, me̱di nyi e̱ nyi shi ning ri. Aha ne nje ning shi nce, nyi shi ning shi nce ma.
Á ri he tuuye, nyi ri hu re̱se̱ng he nje shi a yarri Be̱, nyi ma nyi shi a yarri nje, nje e̱ shi a yarri nyi ma.
“Ko nye̱ ne ngu hu nti nka nje ne ngu bra zhwé, a nyi ngu ne ngu ning ce̱. Nne nke ne ngu ning ce̱, Be̱ nje we̱ ki ce̱ ma, nje e̱ ma n ki ce̱ ma, he̱rri ma n ki ting ka nje nyi nye̱ ye̱.”
Wire Yahuda (ko Yahuda Iskarriyoti we̱ fang) ngu a he, “Brrabe̱, ma nyi nda ngu ci ne ko ngwe̱ shi ti ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo rici ngwe̱ we̱ se we nzhi e̱?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu ning ce̱ we̱ zhwe nka nje. Be̱ nje we̱ ki ce̱, ngbe nzhi e̱ be nwie ngu nzhi e̱ ya srra ngbe ngu.
Nne nke ne ko ngu ning ce̱ we̱, ko shi re zhwe nka nje we̱. Nka ne nyi ho ne̱ ko nyi na nje we̱, á wrru nwie Be̱ ne ngu ning te.
“Nje níng ti ga re-ankya ne̱ ne nje ka shi ngbe nyi.
Nshe Wiri ne ngu cwo a níng sheng ne Be̱ shi ki te a yarri lo nje e̱ ri níng mie̱ ko nda; a ri bra níng lu ne ko nda ne nje i níng heng.
“Nje níng we ne srra rina; srra rina nje, nyi ngu ne nje níng ngwa. Ko nje níng ngwa shi shi ne ebe ngwie̱ ngu ngwá we̱. Shi de̱ nyi bē we̱, shi de̱ nyi bra ci owu we̱.
“Nyi i ho ne nje he he nje shi ne̱, ngbe n bra ya ning brru re be nwie nyi. Kundu nyi rā ning ce̱, nyi e̱ bi rekwi aha ne nje nyia re nzhi nwie Be̱, aha ngu Be̱ e̱ ning ne̱.
Nje níng ting tu we zhe ne ne̱ ne ngu rishi ci, aha kundu ngu ri ci nyi e̱ shî nka nje.
Ko nje bra shi he ya nka a je̱je̱ ne nyi we̱, aha nne bro ringgwe̱ ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ a re e be, me̱di ko bi ko yankya re hung nyi ne nje we̱.
Me̱di aha ngbe ebe ngwie̱ re hu he nje ce̱ Be̱, he nje bra nyi ye̱ye̱rri kya ne Be̱ ngu ning ci n nyi, nyi deze nzhi ne̱ a he ne̱.
“Nje e̱ nje nyi te̱nte̱ ekwe inebi, Be̱ nje e̱ nyi nne kye̱ng.
A kpó ko zohu ge̱se̱ a nje ne ko ngu cí gbre we̱, ngbe we̱ zhwu, me̱di ge̱se̱ nke ne ngu krró gbre we̱ ki nyi rina rina aha re ning bra krro gbre.
Nyi e̱ á níng ci nyi ci wiriri ne ko nda ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱, aha nka ne nje níng heng.

Nyi srra a yarri nje, ngbe ma n shi a yarri nyi ma. Ko bi ya va ekwe inebi re hung ci gbre we̱sa ne ngu yaa tsio a riti inebi nna we̱. A shi we ni ma, ko shi nyi hung nyi yankya we̱sa ne nyi she igbe̱ng nying a nwie nje we̱.

“Nyi nje ne nje nyi riti ekwe inebi, nyi e̱ nyi nyi nvang. Nne nke ne ngu shi a yarri nje ne nje bra shi yarri ngu ma, we̱ hung nyi re-cwuo rina we shi shi ekwe inebi ne ngu krro ngbre piriri; we̱sa ne nje ko shi nyi hung nyi re-cwuo rina we̱.
Nne nke ne ko ngu shi a yarri nje we̱, a shi shi va ekwe nke ne e zhwu ngu hwe, zhwe va ekwe ana á fó wé̱ zhwu a nro ngbe ro we̱ ye.
Kundu nyi srra a yarri nje ne nka nje shi yarri nyi, wire nyi e̱ hung rin ko nda ne nyi ce̱, ngbe nyi e̱ she.
Kundu nyi nyi re-cwuo ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱, nyi e̱ ti he nyi nyi nné ning zhwe, ngbe Be̱ nje we̱ she grime̱ aha ni.
We shi ne Be̱ ning ce̱, nje e̱ ma nje níng ce̱. Nyi srra a yarri ce̱ nje.
Kundu nyi zhwe Nti Nka nje, nyi e̱ hwie̱ a yarri ce̱ nje we shi ne nje zhwe Nti Nka Be̱ nje, ne ngu shi nwie ning ce̱ ne̱.
“Nje níng he re-nka ne̱ aha ngbe rekwi nje re shi a yarri nyi, ngbe ehwie kla nyi re shi piriri.
Riti Nka nje ne nje níng ngwa a nyi nke: nyi yaa ce̱ we shi ne nje níng ce̱ ma.
Ko bi ya ce̱ ne ngu ne̱ nke e̱ we̱, he: ya re ngwa ce ngu aha rwí ngu.
Nyi nyí rwí nje kundu nyi nyí kya ne nje ce̱.
Ko nje bra níng ye he hwié wa we̱, aha ko hwié e̱ á hu kya ne be̱ri mbe shi nying we̱. Me̱di nje níng ye he rwí, aha ga re-ankya ne nje ho a nwie Be̱ nje zhwozhwo, nje níng ting.

Ko nyi nyi ne nyi ning kyie we̱, a nyi nje ne nje níng kyie, nje bra níng ci he nyi ya nyi re-cwuo rina shi shi ekwe ne ngu krro ngbre piriri, he ngbre na nyi e̱ de̱ ré dzio we̱ he̱rri tiya. Ngbe Be̱ we̱ níng ngwa ko nda ne nyi ki rinng a yarri lo nje.
Riti Nka nje re be nwie nyi e̱ nyi nke: nyi yaa ce̱.
“Kundu ebe ngwie̱ níng ra, nyi lu he aa ke̱she ning ra nje wire.
Kundu nyi ri nyi na ebe ngwie̱, ebe ngwie̱ e̱ we̱ níng ce̱ aha nyi nyi na ngu: me̱di aha ne nje níng kyie a be ngwie̱, ko nyi nyi na ebe ngwie̱ we̱, kya a nyi ngwiee ne ebe ngwie̱ e̱ níng ra.
Nyi lu ne kya ne nje níng ting: ‘Ko hwie ne̱ be̱ri ngu we̱.’ Kundu ne mbe ning ngwa cinci, mahu á shi níng ngwa cinci ma. Kundu mbe rā ho nka ne nje we mie̱ng, wé̱ ho na nyi ma.
Me̱di á ri níng ngwa re-cinci ni aha lo nje, aha koó hu Ngwiee ne ngu ning te we̱.
Kundu de̱ ne nje rā be nje ya we he nka we̱, koo rā bi nka e̱ngwie̱ a rici mbe we̱. Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ koó bi ya riwie̱ we̱ na ré he he ko mbe i ru ne e̱ngwie̱ mbe e̱ we̱.
Nne nke ne ngu ning rá, a rá Be̱ nje ma.

Kundu de̱ ne nje rā nyi ngbá re-ankya ne ko ya nne e sa nyi we̱, koó rā hu he mbe nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Me̱di a zhe ne á ri zhwe ngbá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne̱, gbengbe ni á ke̱ ne ning ra, á ra ngbe Be̱ nje.
Me̱di nke e̱ ci ni aha ngbe kya ne i wie a yarri Nti Nka mbe e̱ re ci rrurru, shi ne e wie he: ‘Á ning rá we̱sa ne kwiling.’
“Nje cwo a te ne Nshe Wiri Be̱ne̱ a nwie Be̱ re be re ya níng sheng. Nyi ngu ne ngu tí raywrra, a ri ngwa sheede aha nje.
Ngbe nyi ma nyi e̱ ngwa sheede aha nje, aha nyi i shi ngbe nje tu ce̱ucwung.
“Nje níng he re-nka ne̱ aha ngbe de̱ nyi grre̱ we̱.
Á ri níng yu a re-zonggrung mwe, me̱di zhe cwo be ne nné ne mbe ri níng yhwi mbe ri ra he ka nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ ne mbe shi nying.
Á ri nyi zhwe re-ankya ne̱ aha ne ko mbe hu Be̱ ka nje nna we̱.
Me̱di nje níng ti re-ankya ne̱, aha kundu zhe nna ri be, nyi e̱ lu he nje i ke̱she níng ting. Ko nje i níng ti re-nka ne̱ a ce̱ucwung we̱ aha ne nje shi ngbe ne nyi.
“A zhe ne ne̱ nje shi ning brru re nzhi nwie ngu ne ngu ning te, gbengbe ni ko ya nyi ning rinng aha ewie ne nje nyia re nzhi we̱.
Aha ne nyi dzio rehwie aha re-nka ne nje níng ting ne̱.

Me̱di nje níng ting cence: a nyi kya rina a nwie nyi kundu ne nje ne̱, aha kundu de̱ ne nje ne̱ we̱, ko shi ngwiee ne ngu cwo a níng sheng nna re be we̱; me̱di kundu ne nje ne̱, ma n ya ki te re be nwie nyi.
Kundu ngu ri be, we̱ ya ti nné ngwie̱ re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe ngbe riywe̱ redziee mbe ngbe riywe̱ hu nka ne e shi we nying.
A cwo a we ti re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe aha koó sa rie a nje we̱;
we̱ we ti riywe̱ redziee mbe, aha ne nje cwo nzhi a nwie Be̱, a nwie ne ko nyi bra shi ning di wa we̱;
we̱ we ti riywe̱ hu nka ne e shi we nying, aha áa nyi nggwe̱ ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ nka.
“Nje bi nka we yang ne nje ce̱ níng heng, me̱di aa shwe igbe̱ nyi a zhe ne ne̱.

Me̱di a zhe ne Nshe Wiri ne ngu tí raywrra Be̱ne̱ ri be, we̱ níng kwa a yarri raywrra ngu zhwozhwo. Ko shi re he nka we ne igbe̱ na rici ngu we̱, me̱di we̱ he we kya ne ngu hó a nwie Be̱ne̱, ngbe we̱ níng ti re-ankya ne mbe cwo a ci.
We̱ ning ci grime̱, aha a ri níng ti kya ne ngu ho ne nje he.
Ko nda ne Be̱ bi nyi na nje. Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje he a ri fo kya ne ngu ho ne nje he we̱ níng ting.
“Aa hwie̱ tsie̱, ko nyi shi ning ri we̱; ngbe a bra ri ci e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱ wa, nyi e̱ ning ri.”

Yá nné ki zhwe ngu á a ne̱ ne yaa rin re-nka we nci mbe he, “Ma nyi nda ngu ning hwie yi ne ngu he he aa hwie̱ tsie̱ ko nzhi shi ki ri we̱; he a bra ri ci e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱, nzhi e̱ ki ri e̱ ye̱? Ne ngu bra he wa he aha ne ngu cwo nzhi a nwie Be̱ e̱?”
Mbe e̱ ning bra ne̱ ne yaa rin re-nka nwie he, “Nyi nda ngu ning hwié yi ne ‘e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱’ ne̱? Ko nzhi pie nka ne̱ we̱!”

Jesu hu he á ce̱ ki rin nka ne̱, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi shi nwie yaa rin re-nka aha ne nje ri he he, ‘aa hwie̱ tsie̱, ko nyi shi ning ri we̱; ngbe a bra ri ci e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱ wa, nyi e̱ ning ri’ e̱e̱?
Nje níng ting cence, nyi ri ku rana nwie dzio rehwie ne nné ngwie̱ mbe shi nyi re-rekwi; nyi cwo a dzio rehwie, me̱di dzio rehwie nyi e̱ cwo a bra re ci rehwie kla.
Mbrru ne ngu shi bî ewe ho wieng we yang aha nyi zhe nna ngu ci; me̱di zhe ne ngu ri bî ewe nna ngbe ga we̱ ki bru ne wieng nna, aha ne ngu shi rekwi he nne hwi be ngwie̱.
A shi ni a nwie nyi ma, zhe ne ne̱ nyi zheng dzio rehwie nyi, me̱di nje ri bra níng ri te̱nte̱ wa ngbe nyi e̱ nyi rekwi, he̱rri ko bi ya nne ngu ri hu níng ci nyi we ni rekwi we̱.
“A tuuye ko nyi ri bra ning rinng aha ko yankya wa we̱. Nje níng ting cence, Be̱ ri níng ngwa ko nda ne nyi ki rinng a yarri lo nje.
He̱rri ne cwu ko nyi rin aha yankya a yarri lo nje we̱. Nyi rin ngbe nyi e̱ she, ngbe nyi e̱ bi rehwie kla kpe̱kpe̱.
“Nje níng ti re-ankya ne̱ ne re-nka zhwebe. Me̱di zhe cwo be ne ko nje ri níng heng ne re-nka zhwebe wa we̱, nje ri níng ti re-ankya ne Be̱ ce̱ we gbeng.
A tuuye nyi ri ki rinng a yarri lo nje, ko nje he he nje ri cwe nva ne ngu aha nyi we̱.
Aawo, ngu Be̱ we rici ngu níng ce̱ nyi e̱; aha nyi ning ce̱ ma, nyi bra sa rie he nje wru a nwie Be̱ne̱.
Nje wru a nwie Be̱ nje re be be ngwie̱, nje bra shi we ebe ngwie̱ n ning brru re nzhi nwie Be̱ wa.”
Ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a mbe e̱ he, “Yowe̱e̱, a zhe ne̱ ngwe̱ shi nwie níng he nka gbeng fa we̱sa ne re-nka zhwebe.
A zhe ne ne̱ nzhi hu re̱se̱ng fa he ngwe̱ hu ko nda. Ko ngwe̱ tsio he se ré rin nka wire we̱. Aa níng ci nzhi shî he ngwe̱ wru a nwie Be̱ne̱.”
Jesu a we shing he, “Ohoo, wire nyi shî a zhe ne̱ fa aa?
Zhe cwo be, he̱rri ma aa a be, ne nyi shi yaa se̱ kanka kanka ko nye̱ re nzhi ta ri ngu. Nyi shi ning we nggaa nje. Gbengbe ni, ko nje shi nggaa nje we̱, aha Be̱ shi ngbe nje.
“Nje níng ti re-ankya ne̱ aha ngbe a yarri nje, nyi she srra rina. A yarri ebe ngwie̱ ne̱, nyi shi shwe re-cinci; me̱di nyi rwe rie! Nje drre̱ ebe ngwie̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he re-nka ne̱, ngu a fo riyii ze e ri zinye̱, ngu a he, “Be̱, zhe e be, ci Kowe ngwe̱ grime̱, ngbe Kowe ngwe̱ we̱ re ci grime̱.
We shi ne ngwe̱ ki ngwa igbe̱ a zete nneywí zhwozhwo aha ngbe re ngwa nné mbiye ne ngwe̱ ki ngwa ce na he̱rri tiya.
Me̱di ce na he̱rri tiya nna nyi nke he ré re hu, he nyi we ngwe̱ nggaa ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ nyi Be̱ne̱ cence, ngbe Jesu Krristi ne ngwe̱ ki te.
Nje re ngwa grime̱ a be ngwie̱ ne nje fro cwuo ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa.
A zhe ne ne̱, Be̱, ning ci grime̱ a shî nje ngbe ne ngwe̱, zhwe grime̱ ne nje i bi ngbe ne ngwe̱ tu ne koó nyi ebe ngwie̱ we̱.
“Nje ti nné mbiye ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa a be ngwie̱ shî ngwe̱. Á i nyi na ngwe̱; ngwe̱ ning ngwa mbe, mbe e̱ á zhwe nka ngwe̱.
A zhe ne ne̱ á hu re̱se̱ng he ko nda ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa a wru a nwie ngwe̱.
Nje we ngwa nka ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa, mbe e̱ se̱. Á hu he cence nje wru nwie ngwe̱, á bra shî he nyi ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ning te.
“Nje cwe nva aha mbe, ko aha nné ngwie̱ we̱, me̱di aha nné mbiye ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa, aha á nyi na ngwe̱.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo ne mbe nyi na nje á nyi na ngwe̱, ga mbe zhwozhwo ne mbe nyi na ngwe̱ á nyi na nje. Nje bra she grime̱ aha mbe.

Ko nje shi fo zhe a be ngwie̱ we̱, me̱di mbe e̱ á shi ning shi be ngwie̱, nje e̱ nje bra shi cwo be a nwie ngwe̱. Be̱ Wiri, we kye̱ ne igbe̱ lo ngwe̱ — lo ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa — aha ngbe ré shi zunzrru we shi ne nje ngbe ngwe̱ nzhi shi zunzrru.

A zhe ne nje i shi ngbe mbe, nje we kye̱ a yarri lo ngwe̱ — lo ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa — nje we cwo rina rina, ko bi ko ya mbe ngu ci shweni we̱, se we nne nke ne ngu nyi nne ci shweni, aha ngbe kya ne e wie re ci rrurru.
“A zhe ne ne̱ nje cwo be a nwie ngwe̱, me̱di nje he re-nka ne̱ ne nje ka rishi a be ngwie̱ aha ngbe ré bi zhwe ehwie kla nje zhwozhwo a yarri rehwie mbe.
Nje we ngwa nka ngwe̱, me̱di ebe ngwie̱ we ra, aha ne ko mbe nyi na ebe ngwie̱ we̱, we shi ne ko nje nyi na ebe ngwie̱ we̱.
Ko nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ we trru a be ngwie̱ we̱, me̱di he ngwe̱ we kye̱ a nva Nne Hwie̱.
Koó nyi na ebe ngwie̱ we̱, we shi ne ko nje nyi na ebe ngwie̱ we̱.
We ci ré shi wiri ne raywrra, nka ngwe̱ nyi raywrra.
We shi ne ngwe̱ ning te a be ngwie̱, nje we te a be ngwie̱ we ni ma.
Nyi aha mbe ne nje ngwa rici nje, aha ngbe mbe e̱ ma, ré ngwa nci mbe a yarri raywrra ngwe̱.
“Ko nje ku aha mbe nggaa mbe we̱, me̱di aha ga nné mbiye ne mbe cwo a se̱ nka nje aha nka mbe.
Aha ngbe ga mbe zhwozhwo ré shi zunzrru we shi ne ngwe̱ Be̱ ngwe̱ shi yarri nje, nje e̱ shi yarri ngwe̱ ma. Nde ré shi yarri nzhi, aha ngbe nné ngwie̱ ré shî he nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ ning te.
Nje we ngwa zhwe grime̱ ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa, aha ngbe ré shi zunzrru we shi ne nzhi shi zunzrru:
n shi yarri mbe, ngwe̱ e̱ shi yarri nje. Nde ré mwe ré ci zunzrru, aha ngbe nné ngwie̱ ré hu he ngwe̱ ning te, he ngwe̱ bra we ce̱ we shi ne ngwe̱ ning ce̱ ma.
“Be̱, nje ce̱ he nné mbe ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa ré shi ngbe nje a nwie ne nje ning shi, ngbe ré ri grime̱ nje, grime̱ ne ngwe̱ i ning ngwa aha ne ngwe̱ ning ce̱ tu ne e rishi nyi ebe ngwie̱.
Be̱ Redziee, ko nné ngwie̱ re hu we̱, me̱di nje e̱ nje re hu, nné mbe ne̱ á hu he nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ ning te.
Nje we ci á re hu, nje bra shi ke̱ we ci ré re hu aha ngbe zhwe ce̱ ne ngwe̱ ning ce̱ re shi a yarri mbe, ngbe nje e̱ ma n shi a yarri mbe.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he re-nka ne̱ yhwe̱, ngu a tsa nshwa Kyidrro ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu re nzhi nyie ne ngu bi nhwie̱n rekwe rihwie̱n.
A zhe nna Yahuda ne ngu ki rie̱ e̱ hu ewie nna ma, aha Jesu ning mrrang ne ngu cwo mwe ngbe nné ki zhwe ngu a nwie nna.
Ngbe Yahuda a ywa a nhwie̱n nna ne ekpri re-shezhi ngbe yá nné cwo Brranyi ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné Farisi mbe we te; á ya wre̱ ne re-te̱le̱kyi ngbe re-toci ngbe ne ankyang ko.
Jesu ne ngu hu ko nda ne ngu shi ki she, ngu a ya yo ngu a he ne mbe he, “A nyi nye̱ ne nyi ki kre?”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Jesu nne Nazarra.”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “A nyi nje.” (Yahuda ne ngu ki rie̱ e̱ a shi yo miimi ngbe mbe.)
A zhe ne Jesu he ne mbe he, “A nyi nje” ana, á ning brru ne emerin he̱rri á kpi.
Jesu a we rinng wa he, “Nyi he nyi nye̱ ne nyi ki kre ne̱ rri ii?”
Mbe e̱ he, “Jesu nne Nazarra.”
Jesu ngu a he, “Nje he ne nyi he nyi nje. A ri nyi nje e̱ ne nyi ning kre, ma nyi we nné mbe rre̱ re ne̱.”
(Aa ci ni aha ngbe kya ne ngu ri he re ci rrurru, shi ne ngu he, “Ga mbe ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa, ko bi ko ya ngu ci shweni we̱.”)
Ngbe Sima Pita ne ngu bi ise̱nkeli, ngu a fie̱ ngu a ning tsa uucwu nva nyye hwie Brra Prristi he̱rri aa ki kpo uucwu nna. (Á yé lo hwie nna he Maliku.)
Jesu a he ne Pita he, “Ning brru mi ne ise̱nkeli ngwe̱ e̱ re nzhi bii ngu! Ko nje shi shwe kwrreshi cinci ne Be̱ e̱ ning ngwa a we̱ e̱e̱?”
Ngbe ekpri re-shezhi nna ngbe be̱ri mbe ngbe nné cwo Brranyi nné Yahudi mbe e̱ pie Jesu. Á ki rrwe,
mbe e̱ ke̱she ywa mi ne ngu a nwie Anasi aha ne ngu nyi be̱ mbrru Kayafa ne ngu i nyi Brra Prristi a rie nna.
A nyi ngu Kayafa ne ngu i he ne nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi he nyi canca nne zunzrru re hu aha ga nneywí zhwozhwo.
Sima Pita ngbe yaka nne zhwe Jesu wa á zhwe Jesu. Ngu nne nke ana a zhwe Jesu re nzhi wre̱ he̱rri tese ri Brra Prristi nna, aha Brra Prristi e̱ ki hu.
Me̱di Pita hwie̱ yo ci a nusinye. Nne zhwe Jesu nke ne Brra Prristi i ki hu a ning brru ya he nka ne ewenancwuo a nusinye e̱, wire ngu a ngwie mi ne Pita.
Ewenancwuo nusinye nna he ne Pita he, “Ko ngwe̱ nyi ya nne zhwe nne ne̱ we̱ ka rimi?”
Pita a he, “Aawo, ko nje nyi ya we̱.”
A zhe nna wu srru, ngbe nnencwuó ngbe nné cwo Brranyi e̱ yhwa ro rice̱ ne mbe shi wing. Pita a ya yo miimi nwie wing ma.
Brra Prristi i rin Jesu re-nka aha nné ki zhwe ngu ngbe nka ne ngu mié̱.
Jesu ki shing he, “Nje he re-nka we gbeng a nyyi ko nye̱ nwie mie̱ nka ko zohu zhe a re-zonggrung mwe ngbe a Brranyi, ne nné Yahudi zhwozhwo mbe cwo tsu. Ko nje he ko ya nka a la la we̱.
Ma aha nda ngwe̱ ning rin re-nka a ni e̱? Rin nné ne mbe ho nka nje e̱. Ri, mbe ne̱ á hu re-nka ne nje he e̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu he ni, ya a tsi nné cwo Brranyi ne mbe shi yo miimi ngu a ki tsa ne va, ngu a he, “He̱rri nyi ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ he nka ne Brra Prristi e̱ ni e̱e̱?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Kundu ne nje ri ywe̱ a nka nje ne̱, ti ewie ne nje ning brru a; ma kundu ne nka nje e̱ shi ye̱ye̱rri, ngwe̱ ning rwi aha nda?”
Ngbe Anasi a ci ré ywa mi ne ngu a nwie Kayafa ne ngu nyi Brra Prristi.
Sima Pita a shi we nwie yo re wi ro. Á a he ne ngu he, “Cence ko ngwe̱ nyi nne zhwe nne ne̱ ma we̱ ka rimi?”
Pita klo wa he, “Aawo, ko bi nje we̱.”
Ya a tsi hwié Brra Prristi ne nyi gimbe ngu ne Pita i ki kpo uucwu ana ngu a he ne Pita he, “Ko nje i re ri a nhwie̱n ana we̱ e̱e̱?”
Pita klo wawa, we zhe nna gba tsie̱.

Wire mbe e̱ fo Jesu nwie Kayafa re nzhi ri goona. A zhe nna nyi brra mincwe. Me̱di ko nné Yahudi i shî mbe ngwie a ri goona we̱, aha mbe ce̱ shi wiriri ye̱ye̱rri ne teede mbe, aha ngbe mbe hung ye Para Paska.
Ngbe Bilatu a wru re be we she a ci, ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi he nne ne̱ e̱ nyi nda ne nyi be ne ngu a he ne̱ rri ii?”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “De̱ nne ne̱ rā nyi yankya me̱nkye̱ we̱, ko nzhi rā be ne ngu a nwie ngwe̱ we̱.”
Bilatu a he ne mbe he, “Ma nyi ywa nyi ya ki nyi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka na nyi e̱.”
Mbe nné Yahudi e̱ mbe e̱ he, “Ko nzhi bi de̱me̱ng nyi ya nne nka hu we̱.”
(Nke e̱ ci ni aha ngbe nka ne Jesu ngu i he re ci rrurru, ne ngu i ti zhwe hu ne ngu shi hu.)
Bilatu ning brru ngwie yarri ri, ngu a ye Jesu ngu a ki rinng he, “Nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi nggwe̱ nné Yahudi e̱e̱?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Nka ne ngwe̱ ning rinng ne̱ nyi hwie nka na ngwe̱ ka nyi yá mbe ne mbe re ting ni a rici nje e̱e̱?”
Bilatu a he ne ngu he, “Nje nyi nne Yahudi e̱e̱? Nyi we nné na ngwe̱ ngbe nggwé̱ re-prristi nyi ne mbe be mi ne ngwe̱ a nwie nje. A nyi nda ne ngwe̱ nyi e̱?”

Jesu a he, “Ko ringgwe̱ nje e̱ nyi na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ we̱, aa rā nyi na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱, nnencwuó nje e̱ á rā kwe̱ kishi nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi e̱ á ri ning pie. Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ ringgwe̱ nje e̱ ko nyi na he we̱.”
Aha ni Bilatu ki rinng he, “Ma ngwe̱ nyi nggwe̱ e̱e̱?”

Jesu a ki shing he, “Ngwe̱ ne rici ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ he he nje nyi nggwe̱. A nyi aha ni ne i ning bî, kwili be nje a be ngwie̱ e̱ nyi nke ne̱, aha n ngwa sheede ne raywrra. Ko nye̱ ne ngu nyi na raywrra, a sá uucwu a nka nje.”
Bilatu a he ne ngu he, “Ne nyi nda ngu nyi raywrra?”
A zhe ne Bilatu ngu he ni, ngu a wru ci wa re nzhi he ne nné Yahudi he, “Ko nje ki she ne ya vini we̱.
Me̱di nyi bi teede na ne nje níng cire nne gyiaa zunzrru a ko zohu zhe Para Paska. Nyi ce̱ n níng cire ‘Nggwe̱ nné Yahudi’ e̱e̱?”
Á kro nku wa nwie he, “Aawo, ko nyi ngu we̱! Níng cire Barraba!” (Ngu Barraba a bra i nyi brra nne nca.)
Wire Bilatu a ci á cwe Jesu.
Re-shezhi e̱ no vo shi nyi na ringgwe̱ ne nva rekwe ze̱kye̱ mbe e̱ ki cing a rici, mbe e̱ ki ci brra tago shwo na ringgwe̱,
mbe e̱ ne̱ ne cwo nwie ngu re cwo ki dzie hile̱ hile̱ he, “Hooo nggwe̱ nné Yahudi, ce ngwe̱ re ywa gbong!” Á ywá wé̱ ya ki tsa ne va.
Bilatu srra ngu a wru ci wa, ngu a ya he ne nné Yahudi he, “Nyi ri, nje shi ki ti ci n níng be mi ne ngu, ngbe nyi hu he ko nje ki she ne ya vini we̱.”
A zhe ne Jesu ngu wru ci ne vo ze̱kye̱ a rici ngbe brra tago ringgwe̱ ne e ki cing. Bilatu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ri! Nne nna nyi nke!”
We zhe ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nné cwo Brranyi mbe ki ri we ri, mbe a kro nku nwie he, “Ki ci gasankwe! Ki ci gasankwe!”
Bilatu a we shing he, “Ma nyi ne̱ mi ne ngu nyi ya ki ci gasankwe e̱ nggaa nyi, aha ko nje ki she ne ya vini we̱.”
Me̱di nné Yahudi i ke̱ ne he, “Nzhi e̱ nzhi bi nti nkang nyi nka, a yarri nti nka nzhi e̱ aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri re hu, aha aa yaa fo he ngu nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱.”
A zhe ne Bilatu ho ni, ngu a ning bra ci owu.
Ngu a ning brru ngwie e ri, ngu a rin Jesu he, “Ngwe̱ wru he?”
Me̱di ko Jesu bra nka we̱.
Bilatu a he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ ra he nka ngbe nje e̱e̱? Ko ngwe̱ hu he nje bi igbe̱ n re cire ka n ci ré re ci a gasankwe we̱ e̱e̱.”
Jesu ngu a he ngu he, “Ko shi ngwe̱ bi igbe̱ a rici nje we̱sa ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ re ngwa we̱. Aha ni nne nke ne ngu be mi ne nje a nwie ngwe̱ e̱ aa nyi e̱ngwie̱ kaka re e ne̱.”

A zhe ne Bilatu ho ni, ngu a ne̱ ne kre rê ngu ning cire Jesu, me̱di nné Yahudi á ke̱ ne kyie̱ ronu he, “Kundu ngwe̱ ri ki cire, mahu ko ngwe̱ nyi rwi Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma we̱. Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu yaa fo he ngu nyi nggwe̱ mahu a dzié̱ Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma!”
A zhe ne Bilatu ho ni, ngu a wru mi ne Jesu re be ci, ngu a ya srra a ncwung nyi nka ne e ki ye he “Kre Rahwan”. (A nka Ibrrani á ki ye he Gabata).
A zhe nna nyi brra tsi te̱ne̱ a tu ne otu na ngu ning zhweng cwo a nyi otu Para Paska. Bilatu a he ne nné Yahudi he, “Nggwe̱ nyi e̱ nyi nke!”
Mbe a kro nku nwie he, “Ne̱ ne ngu! Ne̱ ne ngu! Ki ci gasankwe!”
Bilatu a we rinng he, “N ci nggwe̱ nyi e̱ a gasankwe e̱e̱?”
Nggwé̱ re-prristi e̱ shî he, “Ko nzhi bi ya nggwe̱ we̱sa ne Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma we̱!”
Wire Bilatu a we ngwa Jesu ngbe ré ya ki ci gasankwe.
Re-shezhi e̱ ne̱ mi ne Jesu.
Jesu ne ngu hwrra gasankwe e̱ cwo mi re nzhi nwie ne e ki ye he “Ewie Iigre Rici”. (A nka nné Yahudi á ki ye he “Golgota”.)
Á ya ki ci gasankwe a miimi ngbe ne yaká nné wehwie, ya a nva nyye ya a nva mie.
Bilatu a wie yá nti nka a klankwe, á a rwi a zete gasankwe nna he,

Nné Yahudi piriri hwie kya ne e rwi a gasankwe nna, aha ewie ne e ning ci Jesu a gasankwe nna ko shi ze̱nze̱ ne ngwie̱ nna we̱. Á wie nka nna a zhe Ibrrani, ngbe a zhe nka nné Rroma, ngbe zhe nka nné Heleni.
Nggwé̱ re-prristi Yahudi mbe e̱ ya ra he de̱ Bilatu re wie he “Nggwe̱ nné Yahudi” we̱, me̱di he re wie he “Nne ne̱ yaa kywo he ngu nyi nggwe̱ nné Yahudi.”
Bilatu we shing he, “Kya ne nje wie e̱, nje e wie.”

A zhe ne re-shezhi mbe ci Jesu a gasankwe, mbe e̱ trru re-ankya ne ngu ci, mbe e̱ ki kye ntsa weni, ko zohu shezhi ne na ngu. Aa hwie̱ tago na yarring, ne koó cwi cwi we̱, me̱di á ki no no kya ngu pie zeteng re be be.
Mbe e̱ he a nci mbe he, “Shi de̱ nzhi ki hla hla we̱. Nyi ning be nzhi nyi aaca nzhi ri ka nyi nye̱ ngu shi fong ye̱.”
Aa ci ni ngbe kya ne krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he re ci rrurru, shi ne e wie he:
“Á yaa kye ankya ci rwe̱ nje,
á bra fo ning nyi aaca.”
Kya ne re-shezhi nna mbe nyi e̱ nyi ngwiee.
A tsi nné ne mbe shi yo dudu ne gasankwe Jesu a ning bi de̱ ngu, ngbe gimbe de̱ ngu ewerembrru, ngbe Merri mbrru Kleyopa, ngbe Merri Madali.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu ri de̱ ngu ngbe ne nne ki zhwe ngu na ne ngu ce̱ ana ne mbe yo nwie nna, ngu a he ne de̱ ngu he, “A ho mbrru, ngu ana nyi ewe ngwe̱!”
Wire ngu a he ne nne ki zhwe nna he, “Ngu ana nyi de̱ ngwe̱.” Tu zhe ana nne ki zhwe nna a fo de̱ Jesu re nzhi ta ri ngu.
Jesu hu he ngu fro ko nda, ngbe aha ngu fro kya ne e wie a yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱, ngu a he, “Ne̱ rishi ning hwe.”
A a bi ya gure rishi serre a miimi, mbe e̱ ning shwe̱ soso a yarring, mbe e̱ ki gye̱ a nu ya zhwe ekwe ne e ki ye he hiso, wire mbe e̱ na re nzhi mi a nu ngu.
A zhe ne Jesu ngu shwe, ngu a he, “Aa yhwe̱!”
Wire aa cwugru rici ngu a zhwu cwue.

Otu nna nyi Otu na ne e ri shwo we̱ nyi Otung Srra Cwu. Ko nné Yahudi i ce̱ nkwe nné nna ré srra a gasankwe re nzhi cwu Tung Srra Cwu we̱, mbe e̱ rin Bilatu he re we we mbe we kprre nta ngbe ré we cwucwu. Aha Otung Srra Cwu nna cwo a nyi brra otu.
Aha ni re-shezhi i ywa á ya kprre nta nne ce̱ucwung ngbe nta nne nke ne e ki ci gasankwe dudu ne Jesu.
Me̱di zhe ne mbe be a nwie Jesu á ya she aa a hu, ko á a kprre nta ngu we̱.
Gbengbe ni ya shezhi i ya cwu Jesu a igyee ne rikpe̱e̱, roshwo ngbe rishi e̱ ne̱ ne to.
(Nne nke ne ngu ri kya ngu ci e̱, aa ngwa sheede, sheede ngu a nyi cence. Aa hu he sheede ngu a nyi na raywrra, aha ngbe nyi e̱ ma nyi ning sa rie.)
Aa ci ni aha krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ re ci rrurru, shi kya ne e wie he, “Ko bi ko ya ku ngu ne e ri vu we̱.”
Shi yaka ewie a yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ngu he wa he, “Á ri ri nne ne mbe ki cwu.”

A zhe ne re-ankya ana ci wara, Usufu nne Arimatiya ne ngu nyi ya nne zhwe Jesu a la la aha ne ngu to owu nné Yahudi, ngu a ywa a nwie Bilatu, ngu a ya rin he ré ki ngwa kwe Jesu ngbe ngu ya nyie̱. Bilatu ki ngwa de̱me̱, ngu a fo kwe nna.
A i shi ngbe Nikodimu, nne ne ngu sa ywa a nwie Jesu a totu. Nikodimu ywa mi ne turraren ne e ki ye he murru na ne e ki krre ngbe ne ya remie ne e ki ye he alu, aa cwu re-kilo nshwa wetsie̱.
Mbe nne wehwie ana á fo kwe Jesu mbe e̱ ki gye̱ ne nkla trro kye̱ re ning yhwu turraren nna ye̱ye̱rri ne teedeng nyie̱ nné Yahudi.
A bi ya nhwie̱n a nwie ne e ning ci Jesu a gasankwe ana ne ngu ning bi ya ria
Tu ne ngu nyi otu na ne e ri shwo we̱ nyi Otung Srra Cwu ne ria nna shi dudu a, mbe e̱ ya nywe̱ Jesu a miimi.
A nyiencwe ne ewie rishi tsie̱, a otu na ce̱ucwung a se̱ti, Merri Madali e̱ ywa a ria nna, ngu a ya she ne e kpri ngbaatsie ne i ning ku onu ria nna.
Ngu a ning brru ne ovu ncii re nzhi nwie Sima Pita ngbe nne zhwe Jesu nke ne Jesu ki ce̱ e̱, ngu a ya he ne mbe he, “Á fo Brrabe̱ a ria nna, ko nzhi bra hu ewie ne mbe ki sa we̱!”
Wire Pita ngbe nne zhwe Jesu nke ana mbe e̱ ne̱ re nzhi ria nna.
Gbengbe mbe á to ncii re nzhi, me̱di nne zhwe Jesu nke ana ke̱she Pita aa ya cwu ria nna.
Ngu a hu be, ngu a ri we nkla trro kye̱, me̱di koo ngwie a yarring we̱.
Wire Sima Pita ne ngu ki zhwe a merin e̱ ya wre̱, ngu a ngwie a yarri ria nna; ngu a ri nkla trro kye̱ nna ne mbe nywe̱ hwerri.
Va trro nke ne e ning gye̱ Jesu rici e̱ aa krru, ne ngu nywe̱ nggaa ngu a yaka ewie ne nkla trro kye̱ nna mbe ning shi.
Wire nne zhwe Jesu nke ana, ne ngu ri ke̱she ya cwu nwie ria nna, ngu a ngwie a yarring ma. Aa ri, ngu a shî he shi ni.
(He̱rri ne cwu koó hu nka ne e wie yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he se ngu deze nhu we̱.)
Wire nné ki zhwe e̱ mbe e̱ ning brru re si ri.
Merri yo a nwie ria nna nwie ku anaa. A zhe ne ngu shi ku, ngu a hu be he ngu ri yaarri ria nna,
ngu a ri yá re-njeli wehwie mbe ci ankya kye̱ zhanzhanzhaa ne mbe srrá a nwie ne kwe Jesu i ning shi, ya shi a ga ricing ngbe ya a shi a ga ntang.
Mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “A mbrru, ngwe̱ ku aha nda?”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Á fo Brrabe̱ nje á ne̱ mi, ko nje hu ewie ne mbe ki sa we̱!”
We ne ngu he ni, ngu a shi bra ngu a timi ne Jesu ngu yo a miimi, me̱di ko ru he nyi Jesu we̱.
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “A mbrru, nyi nda ngu ci ngwe̱ ku anaa? Nyi nye̱ ngwe̱ ki kre e̱?”
A ra he ka nyi nne bi nhwie̱n nna, ngu a he, “Be̱ri, kundu a ri nyi ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ki fo, kusu ning ti ewie ne ngwe̱ ki sa, ngbe n ya ki fo.”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Merri!”
Ngbe Merri e̱ bra re nzhi nwie ngu, ngu a he a zhe Ibrrani he, “Rrabboni!” (Nke he “Nne Mie̱ Nka”.)

Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ning pie we̱, aha ko nje e ning brru re nzhi nwie Be̱ we̱. Me̱di ywa a nwie re-gimbe nje ngwe̱ ya we ting he nje he, ‘Nje shi ning brru re nzhi nwie Be̱ nje ne ngu nyi Be̱ nyi, Be̱ne̱ nje ne ngu nyi Be̱ne̱ nyi.’ ”
Aha ni Merri Madali e̱ ya ti nné zhwe Jesu he ngu ri Brrabe̱, ngu a bra we ti ga re-ankya ne Brrabe̱ ki heng.

Re be zhe ne̱hin we tu ce̱ucwung a se̱ti nna, ne nné zhwe Jesu mbe ya tsu gbengbe, á yaa she̱ a yarri zonggru nna, aha ne mbe to owu nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi. Jesu a be ngu a ya yo a tsi mbe, ngu a we ci dzie he, “Srra rina re shi ngbe nyi!”
A zhe ne ngu he ni, ngu a we ti nva ngu ngbe re-igyee ngu. Nné ki zhwe e̱ á nyi rekwi we yang a zhe ne mbe ri Brrabe̱.
Jesu a he ne mbe wa he, “Srra rina re shi ngbe nyi! We shi ne Be̱ nje ning te, nje níng te ma.”
A zhe ne ngu he ne mbe ni, ngu a we yhwa nshe ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nje níng ngwa Nshe Wiri.
Kundu nyi we nne re-e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu nyi, á ki weng; kundu de̱ nyi ki we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu we̱, koó ki weng we̱.”
Toma ne ngu nyi ya a tsi nné zhwe Jesu shwa ne otu wehwie e̱ (ne e ki ye he Eeyhwii), ko i shi miimi a zhe ne Jesu ngu i be we̱.
Aha ni kpi nné zhwe Jesu mbiye ana á ki ting he mbe ri Brrabe̱.
Me̱di Toma he ne mbe he, “Kundu de̱ nje ri rewie ngbé̱ ne e ki cwe gyé̱, he̱rri nje ning re va, ne nje bra ning re va a bamba igyee ngu we̱, ko shi n shî we̱.”
A otu na klanva ne ngu ning zhweng ne nné zhwe Jesu mbe shi gbengbe a zonggru wa ne Toma shi ngbe mbe, á yaa she̱. Me̱di Jesu be ya yo a tsi mbe, ngu a we dzie he, “Srra rina re shi ngbe nyi!”
Ngu a he ne Toma he, “Ci ewe nva ngwe̱ a he; ri nva nje. Na va ngwe̱ ngwe̱ ning re re-igyee nje. Shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi jinji we̱, me̱di sa rie!”
Toma ngu a he ne ngu he, “Brrabe̱ nje ngbe Be̱ne̱ nje!”
Jesu ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ sa rie aha ne ngwe̱ ning ri e̱e̱? Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne ko mbe ning ri we̱, me̱di mbe sa rie a nje!”
Jesu nyi yaká re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu we yang a nyyi nné ki zhwe ngu ne koó wie a yarri krre̱de̱ ne̱ we̱.
Me̱di re-nke ne̱ á wie aha ngbe nyi shî he
A merin re-nke, Jesu ya wre̱ a nwie nné ki zhwe ngu wa a rekyi Brra Nzhwo Tiberria
Sima Pita, ngbe Toma (ne e ki ye he Eeyhwii), ngbe Natanie (na ngu wru a ngwie̱ Kana a Galili), ngbe rewe Zebedi ngbe yá nné zhwe Jesu wehwie á shi gbengbe.
Sima Pita a he ne mbe he, “Nje cwo nzhi kwa hwen.”
Ngbe mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nzhi shi ywa ngbe ngwe̱.” Aha ni, mbe e̱ ne̱ mbe e̱ ya ngwie konkro re nzhi. Me̱di koó ya pie ko yankya a totu ana we̱.
We ne mincwe shi kla, Jesu a ya yo a rekyi rishi, me̱di nné ki zhwe ngu a koó ru he nyi ngu we̱.
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “A werre, ko nyi pie ko ya we̱ e̱e̱?”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Aawo.”
Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ma nyi tsie re̱ge̱ nyi e̱ a nva nyye konkro ngbe nyi prre yá.” A zhe ne mbe tsie re̱ge̱ nna, koó hung fie̱ng re be mi yarring we̱ we aha hwén piriri ne mbe prre.

Nne zhwe Jesu nke ne Jesu ki ce̱ e̱ ngu a he ne Pita he, “A nyi Brrabe̱!” We ne Pita ho he nyi Brrabe̱, ngu a wre̱ ne yaa ku ne brra tago ngu (aha á ri ma ne ngu ti tago nna), ngu a hru kpe a yarri rishi.

Kpi nné zhwe Jesu nna mbe e̱ ngwie konkro re be ki she, ne mbe kwa re̱ge̱ hwén nna ngbe hwen ne ngu shî dororo. Koó ri ma ne mbe shi gbong ne rekyi ci we̱. Gbong ewie nna we̱ hung cwu re-mita nnywa zunzrru.
A zhe ne mbe ya wru ci, mbe e̱ timi ne ce̱ndo nye̱sh a miimi ngbe hwén a zeteng ngbe cwu yâ.
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi be mi ne yá re-hwen ne nyi prre ana he.”
Ngbe Sima Pita a ngwie a yarri konkro nna, ngu a ya kwa re̱ge̱ hwén nna re be mi ci. Aa shî ne ngbá hwen komo nnywa zunzrru ne nshwa wecwuoo ne otu wetsie̱. Gbengbe ni ko re̱ge̱ nna a hla we̱.
Jesu ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ning be nyi ya ci zhibi.” Ko bi ya a tsi mbe ne ngu hung ki rinng he, “Ngwe̱ nyi nye̱ ye̱ we̱?” Aha á hu he nyi Brrabe̱.
Aha ni Jesu a ya fo cwu yâ nna ngu a we ngwa, ngu a we ngwa hwén nna wa.
Nke ne̱ nyi na tsie̱ng ne Jesu ngu cwo wre̱ a nwie nné ki zhwe ngu a zhe ne ngu deze a nhu.
A zhe ne mbe e ci zhibi, Jesu ngu a he ne Sima Pita he, “Sima ewe Yohana, ngwe̱ ning ce̱ kaka re ne̱ na nné mbe rre̱ e̱e̱?”
Ngu a he, “Ee, Brrabe̱, ngwe̱ hu he nje re ce̱.”
Jesu ngu a he, “Ci nkwile̱ ne rewe canvé nje.”
Jesu a ki rinng na hwie wa, “Sima ewe Yohana, ngwe̱ ning ce̱ rri ii?”
Ngu a ki shing he, “Ee, Brrabe̱, ngwe̱ hu he nje re ce̱”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Cwo canvé nje.”
Jesu ki rinng na tsie̱ wa he, “Sima ewe Yohana, ngwe̱ ning ce̱ rri ii?”
Pita a dzio ehwie aha ne Jesu ki rinng ce tsie̱ he ki ce̱ ye̱?
Ngu a he, “Brrabe̱, ngwe̱ hu ga ankya zhwozhwo, ngwe̱ hu he nje re ce̱!”
Jesu a he ne ngu he, “Ci nkwile̱ ne canvé nje.

Nje re ting cence, a zhe gbangba ne ngwe̱ i nyi nze̱we, ngwe̱ i nyi risa ngwe̱, ngwe̱ ywa ko zohu ewie ne ngwe̱ ce̱; me̱di zhe ne ngwe̱ ri ya kwe, ngwe̱ ri kywo nva ne yaka nne re cí ankya ci ci, we̱ re kwa re nzhi nwie ne ko ngwe̱ ce̱ ning ywa we̱.”
(Jesu he nke ne̱ aha ngu ti zhwe hu ne Pita cwo a hu, aha a cwo a ngwa Be̱ne̱ grime̱.) Ngbe Jesu ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ning zhwe!”

Pita a bra ngu a ri nne zhwe Jesu nke ne Jesu ce̱ e̱ ngu we zhwe merin. (A nyi ngu ne ngu i yaa nyenyi a Jesu a zhe ne mbe i shi ye yâ totu, ne ngu ki rinng he, “Brrabe̱, a nyi nye̱ ngu shi re rie̱ e̱?”)
A zhe ne Pita ngu ki ri, ngu a rin Jesung he, “Brrabe̱, nne nke e̱ ma rre?”
Jesu a ki shing he, “Kundu nje ce̱ he re srra nce se zhe ne nje ri e̱ ning brru, nyi nda rishwe ngwe̱? Ngwe̱ e̱, ning zhwe e̱ oo!”

Aha ni nka nna sē̱ a tsi nné zhwe Jesu he ko nne zhwe Jesu nke ana shi hu we̱. Me̱di ko Jesu he he shi we̱sa hu we̱; a he we he, “Kundu ne nje ce̱ he re srra nce se zhe ne nje ri ya ning brru a, nyi nda shwe ngwe̱?”
Nyi ngu ne̱ ngu nyi nne zhwe Jesu nke ne ngu ngwa sheede re-ankya ne̱, ne ngu bra wie sa. Nzhi hu he sheede ngu a nyi cence.
A bi re-ankya piriri ne Jesu ngu nyi, kundu ne e rā shi wie ko zohu, nje hwie he ko ebe ngwie̱ rā bi ewie ne e shi ning sa re-krre̱de̱ nna we̱.
Be̱ri Tiyofilu:
A krre̱de̱ na ne nje i ke̱she re wieng, nje i wie ga re-ankya ne Jesu ngu i nyi tu zhe ne ngu i ce̱ mie̱ nka ngbe re-cwuo ngu
he̱rri re be tu ne i ki fo re nzhi zinye̱. A zhe ne e rishi ki fo, a i ngwa nnenté ngu ne ngu i we kyie nka ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri.

A merin ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu ya ning hu, aa ya we ti rici ngu a re-rê kanka kanka, ngbe ré hu he cence ngu shi nce. A i fo rotu nshwa weni ne ngu srra re cwo wre̱ nwie mbe ne ngu we trru re-ankya na Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.
A ya zhe ne mbe shi ye yâ gbengbe
Yohana i níng nyi batisma ne rishi, me̱di a rotu tsie̱ ne ngu cwo be, á shi níng nyi batisma ne Nshe Wiri.”
Aha ni a zhe ne mbe ya mwe gbengbe, ngbe mbe e̱ ki rinng he, “Brrabe̱, a nyi a zhe ne ne̱ ne ngwe̱ shi ning brru mi ne ringgwe̱ re be a nva nné Isrreela fa aa?”
Jesu a he ne mbe he, “Hu re̱se̱ re-zhe ngbe rotu ne Be̱ ngu sa ne igbe̱ rici ngu a ko nyi na nyi we̱.
Me̱di nyi ri she igbe̱ a zhe ne Nshe Wiri ngu be a nyi; ngbe nyi e̱ hwie̱ nné ngwa sheede a rici nje a Urrushelima, ngbe yarri Yahudi ngbe Samariya zhwozhwo he̱rri re nzhi cwu krruci ebe ngwie̱.”
A zhe ne ngu he ni, mbe e̱ kro nyyi nwie ki ri, á a ki fo zeteng re nzhi zinye̱, ngbe ya inyie̱ e̱ ki ku he̱rri aa ma ya ciywi.
A zhe ne mbe shi we nwie gbi riyii ze nwie ki ri ne ngu nyia, á srra á she yá nné wehwie ne mbe ci ankya kye̱ mbe yo dudu ne mbe

nwie he ne mbe he, “Nné Galili, nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi yó nwie gbi nyyi re ri zinye̱ ni e̱? Ngu Jesu ne̱, ne á ki fo nwie nyi re nzhi zinye̱ ne̱, a ri ning brru re be we shi ne nyi ki ri ngu nyia re nzhi a zinye̱ ne̱.”
Wire mbe e̱ ning brru a Rugu Rekwe Rihwie̱n re be a Urrushelima ne gbong ewie nna we̱ hung cwu kyilomita zunzrru.

A zhe ne mbe ya cwu a Urrushelima, mbe e̱ ngwie zonggru zeteng, a nwie ne mbe ning srrá. A tsi nné ne mbe shi miimi e̱ a bi Pita, ngbe Yohana, ngbe Yakubu, ngbe Andrru, ngbe Fili, ngbe Toma, ngbe Batolomi, ngbe Mata, ngbe Yakubu ne ngu nyi ewe Alifayu, ngbe Sima Nne Ngwa Rici, ngbe ne Yahuda ewe Yakubu.
Zhwozhwo mbe á mwe á ci onu zunzrru, á srra re ku Be̱ne̱ gbengbe ko zohu zhe ngbe yá mbrrú ngbe Merri de̱ Jesu ngbe re-gimbe Jesu.
A rotu ana, Pita a deze a tsi ekpri nné ce̱ nka
A he, “Re-gimbe, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ re ci rrurru shi ne Nshe Wiri i he gbangba tiya a nu Dooda a rici Yahuda ne ngu i nyi nne kwa nné ne mbe i pie Jesu.
Yahuda i nyi ya a tsi nzhi ne̱, he̱rri a i ning bi va ngu a cwuo nzhi ne̱ ma.”
(Ne ncwé̱ cwuo hwie̱ ngu ne ngu nyi, Yahuda a se̱ ebe; ewie ne ngu ya ning kpe ngu hu, he̱rri ehwie ngu a tsa, re-rinyie hwie ngu ya wa ci.
Ga nné ne mbe shi a Urrushelima a á ho nka nna. Aha ni, á ci lo ewie nna a zhe nka mbe he Akeldama, nke ngu nyi he “Ebe Roshwo”)
Pita ngu a he, “Á wie a yarri krre̱de̱ Re-ve Dooda he,
‘Nde eri ngu re hwie̱ hwerri,
shi de̱ ya nne re ning shi we̱.’
Á wie wa he:
Nde yaka nne re fo cwuo ngu.
“Aha ni aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe nzhi kyie ya nne a tsi nné ne mbe nyi ne shi ngbe nzhi a ga re-zhe ne Jesu ngu grra ragrra ngbe nzhi,
kya ngu pie a zhe ne Yohana ngu i ce̱ nyi batisma re be cwu zhe ne e ma ya fo Jesu a nwie nzhi re nzhi zinye̱, ngbe ya mbe re hwie̱ nne ngwa sheede vu Jesu a nhu ngbe ne nzhi.”
Ngbe mbe e̱ trru nné wehwie: Usufu ne e ki ye he Barrsaba (ne e ye ya lo ngu he Yustu), ngbe ne Mataya.
Mbe e̱ ku Be̱ne̱ he, “Brrabe̱, ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ hu onu rie ko nye̱, níng ti nne ne ngwe̱ ki kyie a tsi nné wehwie ne̱,
ngbe re fo cwuo nnenté na ne Yahuda ngu we re nzhi nwie ne ngu ning shi ne̱.”
Wire mbe ta kwrridi, ngbe aa ya kpe a rici Mataya, ngbe mbe e̱ ki ci a ekpri nnenté shwa ne otu zunzrru mbe ana.
A zhe ne otu Penteko ngu be, ga nné ce̱ nka á ya tsu gbengbe a nwie zunzrru.
We kpri, á srra mbe e̱ ho ya rogyrru shi nyi brra wu ngu wru zinye̱ ngu yhwa, aa ya shî eri ne mbe shi ning srra zhwozhwo.
Mbe e̱ ri yankya shi shi nyi lendo ne ngu sé̱, aa ya srra a rici ko nye̱ mbe.
Ngbe ga mbe zhwozhwo a shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri, ngbe mbe e̱ ne̱ ne he nka a zhe nka na yaká re-ngwie̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu we ngwa hung heng.
A zhe nna a bi nné Yahudi na ne mbe nyi nné to owu Be̱ne̱ ne mbe wru ko zohu ngwie̱ a be ngwie̱ ne mbe shi srra a Urrushelima.
A zhe ne mbe ho rogyrru ni, rigwe̱ nné e̱ ya tsu. Aa bra we ci zhizhi zhwozhwo mbe aha ne ko nye̱ mbe ho ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka nna mbe he nka a zhe ngwie̱ mbe.
Á hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu we yang nwie he, “Ko nné mbe rre̱ ne mbe he nka ne̱ á nyi nné Galili we̱ e̱e̱?
Ma á ce̱ rimi ne ko nye̱ nzhi ho ne mbe he nka a zhe ngwie̱ ne nzhi ning wru a?
Yá nzhi wru a ngwie̱ Perriti, yá a Mede, yá a wru a Ela, ngbe yá ne mbe nyi nné a Mesopotamia; yá wru a Yahudi, yá a Kapadokyia, yá a Pontu, yá a Asia,
yá a wru a Frrijiya ngbe Panfiliya, yá wru a Masarr, ngbe a re-nkla Libia dudu ne Kurani. Yá nzhi e̱ nyi nné ice ne mbe wru a Rroma.

A tsi nzhi e̱ a ning bi nné Yahudi ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ na ne mbe si ywe̱ a teede nné Yahudi, he̱rri ngbe yá nzhi ne mbe wru a Karrita ngbe nné Arrabiya zhwozhwo, nzhi ho mbe he re-nka na re-ngwie̱ nzhi nwie ti ngbá re-ankya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi!”
Aa we rwe rici zhwozhwo mbe, á hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu nwie yaa rinng we nci mbe he, “Ma nke e̱ nyi nda ne̱ ma?”
Me̱di yá fo ne̱ ne ning kwa hwie̱n he, “Nyi rishi ruto ne mbe shwe ngu we prre.”

Wire Pita a cinye̱ ngbe kpi nnenté shwa ne otu zunzrru nna, ngu a fo cwue ze nwie he nka ne rigwe̱ nné nna he: “Re-gimbe, nné Yahudi ngbe zhwozhwo nyi ne nyi srra a Urrushelima, nyi sa uucwu nyi ho; nje shi níng ti kya ne ngu ci e̱ ho.
Ko nné mbe rre̱ á shwe yankya we prre shi ne nyi ning hwie yi e̱ we̱ ho. Ka! Ne ewie nyi we ncwe̱ krruvaya na mincwe ne̱ e̱e̱?
Me̱di, nke e̱ nyi kya ne Yowe nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i ning he nka he:
‘Be̱ne̱ he:
nje ri kro nneywí zhwozhwo Nshe Wiri nje.
Ngbe rewerento ngbe rewerembrru nyi wé̱ ti re̱se̱ng nka nje,
zrre̱we nyi wé̱ ri re-ankya ne nje we ting,
hó rewe nyi wé̱ ri re-ankya ne nje we ting a revi.
Ee, he̱rri ngbe hwié nje ntó ngbe mbrrú,
nje ri we kro Nshe Wiri nje a rotu ana,
ngbe wé̱ ti re̱se̱ nka nje.
Nje ri nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu a zete zinye̱,
ngbe re-sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu a bebeng a be ngwie̱.
A ri bi roshwo, ngbe ro, ngbe ncwu be̱mbe̱mbe̱;
Ne̱ ri bra re ci ywing,
ngbe yhwe̱ we̱ bra we̱ ci zhwuuzhwuuzhwuu shi nyi roshwo,
wire brra otu grime̱ Brrabe̱ we̱ be.
Wire ko nye̱ ne ngu kyié̱ Brrabe̱ we̱ she drre̱.’

“Re-gimbe, nné Isrreela, nyi sa uucwu nyi ho nka ne̱! Jesu, nne Nazarra a nyi ngu ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i níng ting we gbeng he ngu ki te ne igbe̱ ngu na Be̱ne̱ ne re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu, ngbe ngbá re-ankya, ngbe re-sheede ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i nyi nwie nyi a yarri ngu, we shi ne nyi hu re̱se̱ng we nci nyi.
Ngu ne á i níng ngwa ngu ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ke̱nce̱ rweng ngbe ne ke̱nce̱ hu re̱se̱ng na ngu, nyi ki yhwe̱ a nva nné e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe ki cwe gyé̱ a gasankwe.
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki deze a nhu, aa ki ti a nva igbe̱ ge̱zhe̱ hu, aha ko shi hu re ki drre̱ we̱.
Dooda i he nka a rici ngu he:
‘Nje ke̱nce̱ ri Brrabe̱ ko zohu zhe a ncwuee nje,
aha a shi a nva nyye nje, ngbe de̱ n ci owu we̱.
Aha nii, nje nyi rekwi he̱rri nti nka ne mbe wrru nu nje e̱ nyi na ehwie kla,
he̱rri nje shi srra nwie sa riyii a kya ne Be̱ne̱ shi ning nying;
aha ko ngwe̱ ri we wu nje a nwie nné kwi we̱,
aha ko ngwe̱ ri we Nne Wiri ngwe̱ re vi we̱.
Ngwe̱ ning ti rêng she ce;
a nyyi ngwe̱, ngwe̱ ri ning ngwa ehwie kla kpe̱kpe̱.’
“Re-gimbe nje, nné Isrreela, nje níng ting we dengge he yo nzhi Dooda i hu á bra ki nyie̱. Ria ngu a ning shi he̱rri re be wre̱ cwu ne̱.
Me̱di a i nyi nne ti re̱se̱ng, aa bra i hu he Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki sa jee ne shí he ngu shi ci ya a tsi nzhwe ngu a ncwu ringgwe̱ ngu.
Dooda ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ ring, aa ti vu Krristi nhu he:
‘Koó ki we a nwie nné kwi we̱,
ko rwe̱ ngu vi we̱.’
Be̱ne̱ i deze Jesu a nce, ga nzhi ne̱ zhwozhwo nzhi nyi re-sheede kya ngu ci e̱.
Á ki deze ne grime̱ re nzhi nva nyye Be̱ne̱, aa ya se̱ Nshe Wiri ne ngu i ning sa jee a nwie Be̱, aa níng krong, kya a nyi ngwiee nyi ri re-ankya ne nzhi nyi, nyi bra ho re-nka ne nzhi he ne̱.
Aha ko nyi Dooda ngu i ngra re nzhi zinye̱ e̱ we̱, me̱di a i he,
‘Brrabe̱ he ne Brrabe̱ nje:
Srra a nva nyye nje,
Se nje ci rwinkó ngwe̱
ré hwie̱ a tahwie ngwe̱.’
“Aha nii, nde nné Isrreela zhwozhwo ré hu cence he Be̱ne̱ ci ngu Jesu ne nyi ki ci gasankwe e̱ aa hwie̱ Brrabe̱ ngbe Krristi.”
A zhe ne nné nna mbe ho ni, aa we cwu ronu rie mbe, ngbe mbe e̱ he ne Pita ngbe kpi nnenté nna he, “Re-gimbe, kya ne nzhi shi nying nna nyi nda?”
Pita a we shing he, “Ko nye̱ nyi re se̱ ywe̱ ré ki nyi batisma a yarri lo Jesu Krristi aha ngbe ré níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi ne nyi nyi, ngbe nyi e̱ she kya na na Be̱ne̱, ne ngu nyi Nshe Wiri.
Jee ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i níng sang nna nyi na nyi ngbe rewe nyi, ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe shi ze̱nze̱ zhwozhwo — ga mbe zhwozhwo ne Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi shi we ye.”
Pita a we brro nka we brro we brro nwie we shwe̱ rehwie; aa cwe nva ne mbe he, “Nyi yaa kye̱ a nze̱ bi hwie̱ ne̱!”
Nné mbe ne mbe se̱ nka ngu, á we nyi batisma, ngbe nné weje ci wetsie̱ e̱ ning brang a zete nné ce̱ nka.
Á ngwa nci mbe nwie ho nka ne nnenté mbe we mie̱ng, nwie mwe rici ngbe ne re-gimbe ne mbe hwin brredi re ye, nwie ku Be̱ne̱ gbengbe.
Ko nye̱ ci owu aha zhwe ngbá re-sheede ngbe re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu piriri ne nnenté nna mbe nyi.
Ga nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo srrá we gbengbe nwie yaa sheng ne ko nda mbe bi ne onu zunzrru.
Á srra ngbe ya we̱ rie̱ ebe ka yankya ngu, ngbe wé̱ yaa kyeng ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ne ko nye̱ rā bi.
Ko zohu otu á srra re mwe gbengbe a agrraa Brranyi. Á hwín brredi nwie yeng gbengbe a reri mbe, á ye re shwe ne rekwi ne rehwie sheng.
Á srra re de Be̱ne̱, he̱rri á bi roshwo rina a nwie ga nné zhwozhwo. Ko zohu otu Brrabe̱ cwo we ci re ning bra ci piriri ne nné ne mbe cwo she kyia.
A ya otu Pita ngbe Yohana á shi ciee re nzhi Brranyi a ncwe̱ wetsie̱ na ne̱hin, a zheng ku Be̱ne̱.

A a bi ya nne ne de̱ ngu i ki bî ne ku. Á ki ko re cwo mi Brranyi ko zohu otu, wé̱ ki sa a brra onusinye ne e ki ye he Brra Onusinye Rina aha re srra miimi re ce̱ ankya a nwie nné ne mbe ngwi a Brranyi.
A zhe ne ngu ri Pita ngbe Yohana mbe shi ngwie, ngu a we cwe nva he ka ré ki na ncwe̱.
Pita ngbe Yohana mbe e̱ ki ri we gbing, ngbe Pita a he ne ngu he, “Níng ri!”
Nne nna a ci nkwile̱ nwie mbe he ka ngu shi she yankya a nwie mbe.
Wire Pita a he ne ngu he, “Ko nje bi ko ya ncwe̱ ngbe n re ngwa we̱, me̱di kya ne nje bi e̱ nyi nke: a yarri lo Jesu Krristi nne Nazarra nje he ngwe̱ deze ngbe ngwe̱ cwo ciee!”
Pita a ki pie va nyye, ngu a ki sheng ngbe re deze. We zhe zunzrru rebenta ngu ngbe re-dundu ngu á ci igbe̱.
Ngu a hru deze nwie yo yo ne nta ngu, ngu a ne̱ ne cwo ciee. Ngu a we zhwe re nzhi yarri Brranyi nwie cwo re hrru re de Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne nneywí zhwozhwo mbe ki ri ngu cwo ciee re de Be̱ne̱ ni,
á hu he nyi ngu ne ngu srra a brra onusinye Brranyi ne e ki ye he Brra Onusinye Rina re ce̱ ankya, ga mbe zhwozhwo ne̱ ne yo nwie nye̱ we ronu aha kya ne ngu ci ne nne nna.
A zhe ne nne nna ngu shi we nwie krru Pita ngbe Yohana, ga nneywí zhwozhwo kro nta be ncii re be nwie mbe a nwie ne e ki ye he Farranda Solomo nwie nye̱ we ronu.

A zhe ne Pita ngu ri ni, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nné Isrreela, ngge ne̱ e̱ níng ci nyi hwie̱ nye̱ ronu aha nda? Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi kro nyyi nwie níng di ni e̱? Ka nyi hwie shi shi nyi ne igbe̱ rici nzhi ka e̱kpe̱e̱ wiri nzhi ne nzhi ki ci ngu ne̱ ne cwo ciee ne̱ e̱e̱?
Be̱ne̱ Ibrrahin ngbe na Ishaku ngbe na Yakubu, Be̱ne̱ re-yo nzhi e̱ ci hwie ngu Jesu grime̱. Nyi i ki ngwa ngbe ré ki yhwe̱, nyi ki ra a nyyi Bilatu, ko ngbe ne Bilatu a i ce̱ ki cire.
Nyi ra Nne Wiri, Nne Redziee, nyi he re níng cire nne yhwi nné.
Nyi yhwe̱ nne ngwa ce, me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki deze a nhu. Nzhi ne̱ nzhi nyi re-sheede kya ngu ci e̱.

A nyi aha sa rie a lo Jesu ne nne nyi ki zrre̱ ne nyi bra ki hu ne̱ ngu she igbe̱. A nyi lo Jesu ngbe sa rie ne ngu wru a nwie ngu ne ngu ci nne ne̱ ngu she kyia zhwozhwo we shi ne ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi ri ne̱.
“A zhe ne ne̱, re-gimbe, nje hu he nyi i nyi ngge ne̱ ne riywe̱ hung we shi nnencwueé nyi.
Me̱di kya ne Be̱ne̱ i ke̱nce̱ ting we gbangba a nu nné ti re̱se̱ng zhwozhwo he Krristi ngu a ri shwe cinci, nyi nke ngu ci aa ci rrurru he ni ne̱.
Aha nii, nyi se̱ ywe̱ nyi ning brru re be nwie Be̱ne̱ aha ngbe re níng yi re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi,
aha ngbe Brrabe̱ re níng be mi ne zheng srra cwu ngbe nyi she igbe̱ a yarri ronu rie nyi; ngbe we̱ bra te Jesu ne ngu nyi Krristi na ne ngu ki kyie aha nyi e̱.
A shi srra we zinye̱ se zhe ne Be̱ne̱ ri shi ci ko nda re ci hwing, shi ne ngu i he a nu nné ti re̱se̱ng ngu na wiri gbangba tiya.
Musa i he, ‘Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ nyi e̱ ri níng te ne ya nne ti re̱se̱ng shi shi nje a tsi nné na nyi, nyi ri sa uucwu nyi ho ko nda ne ngu ri níng ting ho.
Á ri he zhe nna, ko nye̱ ne ngu ri ra ki ho nka, wé̱ ki ka ka ne nné ngu ngbe re ci shweni.’
“Cence, ga nné ti re̱se̱ng zhwozhwo kya ngu pie a Samela ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe ya be a merin ngu á i ke̱nce̱ he nka aha rotu ne̱.

A nyi nyi ne nyi nyi (Ga re-jee ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i sa a nu nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe re-na ne ngu i sa yó nying zhwozhwo á nyi na nyi) rewe ye gado nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe jee ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i sa yó nying. A i he ne Ibrrahin he, ‘Aha nzhwe ngwe̱ ga nneywí a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo shi she mwo rina.’
Aha ni Be̱ne̱ e̱ kyie Kowe ngu
A zhe ne Pita ngbe Yohana mbe shi we nwie he nka ne nneywí, ngbe re-prristi, ngbe nnencwuee nné cwo Brranyi, ngbe nné Sadukyi e̱ ya wre̱ nwie mbe.
Rehwie mbe dzio we yang aha nnenté wehwie ne̱ á shi nwie mie̱ nneywí nka re we ting he a bi deze nhu aha Jesu deze nhu.
Aha ni mbe e̱ pie Pita ngbe Yohana, mbe e̱ we ci a uucwu gyiaa se tu na ngu ning zhweng aha a zhe nna ne̱ e̱ yhwe̱.
Me̱di nneywí piriri ne mbe ho nka nna, á ning sa rie. Ngbe nné ce̱ nka a ning bra ci piriri, he̱rri á cwu weje ci wecwuoo.
A tu na ngu ning zhweng, nné ringgwe̱ Yahudi, ngbe brrá nné, ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka á a ya tsu a Urrushelima.
Á ya mwe ngbe Anasi ne ngu nyi Brra Prristi, ngbe Kayafa, ngbe ya ne e ki ye he Yohana, ngbe Alezanda, ngbe yá nné ri Brra Prristi.
Mbe e̱ ci ré be mi ne Pita ngbe Yohana ré ya yo nyyi mbe. Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne we rin re-nka he: “A nyi zohu zhwe igbe̱, ka nyi ne lo nye̱ nyi ning nyi ngge ne̱?”
Wire Pita ne ngu shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nggwé̱ ngbe brrá nné nzhi:
kundu ne a cwu ne̱ á níng ye ngbe ré níng rinng aha cwuo redziee ne e nyi nnenkung ne̱, he ka aa ce̱ rimi ngu ci gbingbi ye̱,

nde ga nyi ngbe nné Isrreela a zhwozhwo nyi hu he: a nyi a yarri lo Jesu Krristi nne Nazarra ne nyi i ki ci gasankwe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning brru ki deze nhu ana, ne nne ngu yó a nyyi nyi ne̱ ngu ning ci gbingbi.
A nyi ngu Jesu ne̱ ne krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he:
‘Ngbaatsie ne nyi nné runo nyi ra,
nyi ngu ne ngu bra ya hwie̱ te̱nte̱ ngbaatsie.’
Ko bi ya nne ré hung she kyia nwie yaka ya nne we̱, aha ko bi yaka lo ne e ngwa nneywí a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ngbe ré ning she kyia we̱, se we nwie ngu.”
A zhe ne mbe ri zhwe rwe rie Pita ngbe Yohana mbe bra timi he koó nyi makrranta we̱, he á nyi we nné dede, mbe e̱ hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu. Mbe e̱ lu he á i shi ngbe ne Jesu.
Me̱di koó bi kya he we̱, aha á rí nne ne e ki ci ngu ci gbingbi e̱ ngu yó miimi ngbe Pita ngbe Yohana.
Aha ni mbe e̱ we ci ré wrru ci a zonggru rotsu nna, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne prre re-nka we nci mbe.
Mbe e̱ he, “A nyi nda nzhi shi nying ne nné mbe rre̱?” Aha ko nye̱ a Urrushelima a hu he á nyi ya ngba yankyang hwie̱ nga onu, ko shi nzhi bra hung klo we̱.
Me̱di aha nzhi we kpo kishi nka ne̱ ri se̱ ngwie̱ yu, nzhi we ngwa nka he shi de̱ ré bra he nka ne ya nne a yarri lo nne ne̱ wa we̱.
Wire mbe e̱ ning brru we ye ré ngwie yarring wa, mbe e̱ we ngwa nka he shi de̱ ré he ya nne nka, ka ré mie̱ nka a yarri lo Jesu wa we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱.
Me̱di Pita ngbe Yohana a we shing he, “Nyi shwe̱ riyii nyi ri, a nyi zohu ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri a nyyi Be̱ne̱ e̱: nzhi zhwe nka nyi ka nzhi zhwe na Be̱ne̱?
Aha ko shi nzhi hung we ni ti kya ne nzhi ri nzhi bra ho we̱.”
Ngbe brrá nné rotsu nna a ning bra we nye̱ yi, wire mbe e̱ we cire. Mbe e̱ ri ko bi rê mbe we ngwa ge̱zhe̱ we̱, aha ga nneywí e̱ shi we nwie de Be̱ne̱ aha kya ne ngu ci e̱.
Aha ngu nne ne ngu she kyia nang hwie̱ nga onu ana aa hle re-rie nshwa weni.
A zhe ne e cire mbe Pita ngbe Yohana, mbe e̱ wre̱ ne ning brru re nzhi nwie nné na mbe. Mbe e̱ ya ne̱ ne we ti kya ne nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe rotsu brrá nné mbe we heng.
A zhe ne mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ fo cwue ze gbengbe nwie ku Be̱ne̱ he, “Brrabe̱, ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ nyi zinye̱, ngbe ebe ngwie̱, ngbe brrá nzhwó rishi ngbe ga re-ankya ne mbe shi yarring zhwozhwo!
Ne Nshe Wiri, ngwe̱ i he nka a nu hwie ngwe̱, brra yo nzhi Dooda he:
‘Rimi ne Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ ti re̱me̱ e̱e̱?
Aha nda nné tsi ngwie̱ mbe prre re-nka we shweni e̱e̱?
Nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱ e̱ á ci eyi,
nné ringgwe̱ e̱ ya mwe gbengbe,
a rici Brrabe̱ ngbe Krristi ngu.’
Cence Hirridu ngbe Buntu Bilatu i mwe gbengbe ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱, ngbe nné Isrreela a brra ngwie̱ ne̱ nwie rwe onu a rici Kowe wiri ngwe̱ Jesu, ne ngwe̱ ki mia.
Á i nyi we kya ce̱ ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ i ke̱she rwe sa ne igbe̱ ngwe̱ tu we gbangba he re ya ci ni.
A zhe ne ne̱, Brrabe̱, ri zhwe nye̱ yi ne mbe níng nye̱ yi ne̱ ngbe ngwe̱ níng sheng, nzhi hwié ngwe̱, ngbe nzhi he nka ngwe̱ we dengge.
Na va ngwe̱ ngbe ngwe̱ ning kyia nné ruhu, ngwe̱ nyi ngbá re-sheede ngbe re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu a yarri lo hwie wiri ngwe̱ Jesu.”
A zhe ne mbe ku Be̱ne̱ yhwe̱, ewie ne mbe ning mwe e̱ gbe̱ zhwuzhwuzhwu. Ngbe mbe e̱ shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ti nka Be̱ne̱ we dengge.
Ga nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo ci onu zrru; hwie nka mbe shi zunzrru. Ko bi ko ya mbe ngu hwie he shi kya ngu bi e̱ nyi we na ngu nggaa ngu we̱, me̱di á yaa kyé ko nda ne mbe bi gbengbe.
Nnenté e̱ á ngwá sheede deze nhu Brrabe̱ Jesu ne igbe̱ we yang, ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ we yang shi zete mbe zhwozhwo.
Ko bi ko ya mbe ngu nyi riywe̱ yankya we̱. Aha á srra ya zhe ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe bi rebe ka reri wé̱ rie̱ wé̱ be mi ne ncwe̱ nna
wé̱ ya tsu a nwie nnenté, ngbe wé̱ kye ko nye̱ng ye̱ye̱rri ne ngu shi ki be.
Usufu ne nnenté ki ye he Barrnaba (ne a zhe nka mbe e̱ he Ewe Shwe̱ Nneywí Rehwie) ne ngu nyi nne Levi a ngwie̱ Kuprru,
aa rie̱ ebe ngu, ngbe ngu a be mi ne ncwe̱ nna a nwie nnenté.
Me̱di a i bi ya nne ne e ki ye he Ananiya ngbe mbrru ngu Safirra, aa rie̱ ebe ngu ma.
Aa vie kpi ncwe̱ nna ngu a sa aha rici ngu, mbrru ngu a hu re̱se̱ng kpe̱kpe̱, wire ngu a be mi ne re̱se̱ kya ngu hwie̱ e̱, ngu a ya ngwa nnenté fa.
Wire Pita a he ne ngu he, “Ananiya, rimi ngwe̱ we Shetani i ngwie hwie ngwe̱ he̱rri ngwe̱ cie̱ Nshe Wiri rabrra, ngwe̱ vie kpi ncwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ning rie̱ ebe e̱?

Ne ngwe̱ rishi rie̱ ebe e̱, ko i nyi na ngwe̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ma a zhe ne ngwe̱ rie̱, ko ncwe̱ nna nyi ngge ngwe̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ma aha nda ngwe̱ hwie nkang nyi zhwe ngge ne̱? Ko nyi nneywí ngwe̱ we brra we̱, a nyi Be̱ne̱ ngwe̱ ki brra!”
We ne Ananiya ho ni, ngu a gu kpe e hu. Ngbe brra owu a pie ko nye̱ ne ngu ho kya ngu ci e̱.
Zrre̱we e̱ be e̱ ya gye̱ kwe nna, mbe e̱ fo mbe e̱ ya ki nyie̱.
Á ci weje awa wetsie̱, mbrru ngu a ya wre̱ we̱sa ne hu re̱se̱ kya ngu ci.
Pita a ki rinng he, “Ning ting, a nyi kya ne nyi ning rie̱ ebe ne̱ nke e̱e̱?”
Ngu a ki shing he, “Ee, ncwe̱ nna nyi nke ana.”
Ngbe Pita a he ne ngu he, “Nyi ce̱ rimi nyi mwe onu aha nyi mwa Nshe Wiri Brrabe̱ e̱? Ri, nné ne mbe ya nyie̱ nto ngwe̱ e̱ á nyi nkiye a nusinye, á shi re fo re nzhi ci we ni ma!”
We zhe zunzrru, aa gu kpe a nyyi ngu, aa hu. Ngbe zrre̱we nna mbe e̱ ngwie, mbe e̱ ya timi ne ngu hu, mbe e̱ fo kwe nna re nzhi ci, mbe e̱ ya ki nyie̱ dudu ne nto ngu.
Brra owu pie ekpri nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo ngbe ko nye̱ ne ngu ho kya ngu ci e̱.
Nnenté e̱ nyi ngbá re-sheede ngbe re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu we yang a tsi nneywí. Nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo cwo mwe gbengbe a Farranda Solomo.
Me̱di ko yaká nné ci e̱ hung yaa rwe ré mwe ngbe mbe we̱, ko ngbe ne nneywí e̱ á we ngwá grime̱ we yang.
Gbengbe ni nneywí we yang ntó ngbe mbrrú ne mbe sa rie a Brrabe̱ cwo ne ning brang we bra.
Aha re-ankya ne nnenté nna mbe i shi nying, nneywí wrrú mi ne nné ruhu re be mi a brrá re-rê, nwie we nywrra a re-katifa ngbe re-kpengye he ka rowu Pita re cie̱ a zete yá mbe a zhe ne ngu shi wara.
Rigwe̱ nneywí wrrú a re-ngwie̱ ne mbe grra Urrushelima nwie cwo mi ne nné ruhu mbe, ngbe nné ne re-rije we yarra, ga mbe zhwozhwo á ci gbingbi.
Wire Brra Prristi i deze ngbe re̱se̱ nné ne mbe shi ngbe ngu, ne mbe shi a ekpri nné Sadukyi ne ehwie rro.
Á prre nnenté nna mbe e̱ we ci a uucwu gyiaa.
Me̱di a zhe totu, njeli Brrabe̱ ya kla re-nusinye uucwu gyiaa nna, ngu a we kwa re be ci, ngu a he ne mbe he,
“Nyi ywa nyi ya yo a Brranyi nyi ti nneywí re̱se̱ nka ce hwi ne̱ zhwozhwo.”
A zhe mincwe we hwiehwie, mbe e̱ ya ngwie a Brranyi shi kya ne e we heng, ngbe mbe e̱ ne̱ ne mie̱ nneywí nka.
Brra Prristi ngbe nné ne mbe shi ngbe ngu mbe e̱ ya wre̱, mbe e̱ ye mwe Rotsu Brrá Nné — brra mwe na brrá nné Isrreela zhwozhwo — ngbe mbe e̱ te re nzhi uucwu gyiaa he re be mi ne nnenté nna.
Me̱di a zhe ne nnencwuó nna mbe ywa, koó ya we she miimi we̱. Mbe e̱ ning brru re be ting he,
“Nzhi ya she ronusinye uucwu gyiaa shi we she̱ ne re-ankyang hwie̱nng nna zhwozhwo ne nné cwong nna mbe yó a ronusinye; me̱di zhe nzhi kla ko nzhi bra she ko ya nne a yarring we̱.”
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nnencwuee nné cwo Brranyi e̱ ho nka ne̱, aa we rwe rici we yang, á ne̱ ne hwie he, “Ma ngge ne̱ nyi nda ngu shi ci?”
Wire ya nne e̱ be ngu a he ne mbe he, “Ri, nné ne nyi we ci a uucwu gyiaa ana á shi yo a agrraa Brranyi nwie mie̱ nneywí nka!”
Aha ni, nnencwuee nné cwo Brranyi e̱ ko nnencwuó ngu, ngbe ngu ya be mi ne nnenté nna. Me̱di koó we kwa ne igbe̱ we̱, aha á to owu kishi nneywí ri we ta ne rahwan.
A zhe ne mbe ya wre̱ mi ne nnenté nna, á we ci ré yo a nyyi Rotsu Brrá Nné nna aha ngbe Brra Prristi re we rin nka.

A he ne mbe he, “Nzhi níng ngwa nka ne igbe̱ he shi de̱ nyi bra mie̱ nka a yarri lo ne̱ wa we̱, me̱di he̱rri ne cwu nyi se̱ ngwie̱ Urrushelima a yu ne mie̱ nka nyi ne̱, he̱rri nyi bra kre rê nyi níng ci nka he nyi nzhi ne nzhi ki yhwe̱.”
Pita ngbe kpi nnenté nna mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Nzhi e̱ nzhi zhwé kya ne Be̱ne̱ he, ko nzhi zhwé na nneywi we̱!
Be̱ne̱ na yó nzhi e̱ i deze Jesu ne nyi i ki yhwe̱ a nwie ne nyi ki ria a gasankwe e̱.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki fo ze re nzhi nva nyye ngu, aa ki ngwa grime̱ ngu na ringgwe̱ ngbe Nnenkyia, aha ngbe re ngwa nné Isrreela riwie̱ng si ywe̱ ngbe ré we we re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe.
Nzhi e̱ nzhi nyi re-sheede re-ankya ne̱, ngu Nshe Wiri ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ngwa nné mbe ne mbe zhwe nka ngu a nyi sheede ma.”
Rotsu Brrá Nné e̱ ne mbe ho ni, rehwie mbe yhwi we yang, he̱rri á ne̱ ne kre he mbe we yhwi.

Me̱di ya nne Farisi a tsi mbe ne e ki ye he Gamaliye, ne ngu nyi nne mie̱ Nti Nka ne ga nné nna zhwozhwo ki ngwa grime̱, ngu a cinye̱ a yarri Rotsu Brrá Nné nna, ngu a ci he ré ka wru mi ne nnenté nna.
Wire ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nné Isrreela, nyi hwie nka te̱nte̱ a kya ne nyi ce̱ nying ne nné mbe rre̱.

A rotu ncwuee, ya nne ne i ki ye he Tiuda i wru nwie yaa kywo he ngu be nne, he̱rri nné weje nnywa weni á ne̱ ne ki zhwe. Me̱di ko i ya cwu ya ewie we̱, aha a zhe ne i ya ki yhwe̱, ga nné ki zhwe ana á yaa se̱.
A merin ngu, Yahuda Galili i wru a zheng hwie nné, aa kwa nné piriri. Ngu a ma a zhe ne i ya ki yhwe̱, ga nné ki zhwe e̱ á yaa se̱ zhwozhwo.
Aha nii, a nka ne̱, nje he ne nyi he nyi we we a mwa yi mbe! Nyi we we ré ne̱ ne ciee mbe! Aha kundu kya ne mbe rwe e̱ ka kya ne mbe shi mi ne̱ ri wru nwie nneywí, mahu a cwo a ci shweni.
Me̱di kundu ngu ri wru nwie Be̱ne̱, ko shi nyi hung we drre̱ we̱; se ka nyi bra timi nyi shi we nko ne Be̱ne̱.”
Ngbe mbe e̱ shî kya ne Gamaliye ngu he,
wire mbe e̱ ci ré ngwie mi ne nnenté nna, á a we kra we kra we kra, á a we gara nka he shi de̱ ré bra ree he nneywí nka a yarri lo Jesu wa we̱. Wire mbe e̱ we cire.
Nnenté e̱ á wrru nwie Rotsu Brrá Nné nna ne rekwi aha ne Be̱ne̱ we ngwa riwie̱ng shwe cinci aha lo Jesu.
Ko zohu otu á shi a agrraa Brranyi re bra grra a reri nwie ke̱ we ne mie̱ nneywí nka re brro Nka Rina he nyi Jesu ngu nyi Krristi.

A zhe ana, re̱se̱ ne nné zhwe Jesu mbe cwo ning bra ci piriri, nné Yahudi mbiye ne mbe he nka Heleni á ne̱ ne krro nka ne nné na mbe he nka Ibrrani aha ne ko mbe ci nkwile̱ ne kpambrrú mbe a zheng kye yâ we̱ ko zohu otu.
Aha ni, nnenté shwa ne otu wehwie nna mbe e̱ ye nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo, mbe e̱ he, “Ko shi ye̱ye̱rri ngbe nzhi ne̱ nzhi we cwuong brro nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ nzhi ne̱ ne kye yâ we̱.
Aha nii, re-gimbe, nyi e̱ nyi kyie nné natsie̱ a tsi nyi ne e we hu he á shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri ngbe zentsi, ngbe nzhi we we mi ne cwuo nke ne̱.
Wire nzhi e̱ nzhi e̱ ning tu rici a mwo rumwo ngbe cwuong brro nka.”

Nka nna a kla ekpri nné nna zhwozhwo rehwie, ngbe mbe e̱ kyie Sitivi ne ngu nyi nne bi sa rie gbangba ne ngu bra shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri; mbe e̱ kyie Fili, ngbe Prrokorru, ngbe Nikano, ngbe Timo, ngbe Pamena, ngbe ne Nikola nne Antakyia ne ngu i ke̱she bra ngu ne̱ ne zhwe teede nné Yahudi.
Ngbe mbe e̱ be ne mbe a nwie nnenté nna. Nnenté e̱ we ku Be̱ne̱ nwie we gara nva.
Ngbe nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ ning bra ywa ncwuee. Nné zhwe Jesu a Urrushelima a á cwo ne ning bra ci piriri we yang; he̱rri re-prristi we yang á ne̱ ne se̱ nka Jesu.
Sitivi ne ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ngbe igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ shî a ngu a nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ngbe ngbá re-sheede a nyyi nneywí.
Me̱di yá nné zonggrung mwe na ne e ki ye he zonggrung mwe nné srra srra nci mbe
Me̱di koó hung drre̱ Sitivi ne nka we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱ aha zhwe zentsi ngbe Nshe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi a ngu.
Ngbe mbe e̱ ngwa yá nné ncwé̱ ranranng he ré ya he he mbe ho Sitivi ngu cwí Musa nwie he nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱;
he̱rri á cwua nneywí, ngbe brrá nné, ngbe nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ré deze ne re̱zhe̱. Á pie Sitivi mbe e̱ ki kwa re be nwie Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi.
Mbe e̱ be mi ne nné ngwa sheede rabrra, mbe e̱ he, “Ngu nne ne̱ srrá re he we nkang dzie̱ Brranyi wiri nzhi ngbe Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa.
Aha nzhi ho ngu he he ngu Jesu nne Nazarra ana shi gu Brranyi ne̱, ngbe we̱ ning brru bra ga re-teede nzhi ne Musa i níng ngwa.”
Ga nné ne mbe shi srra be a Rotsu Brrá Nné nna zhwozhwo á rwi riyii mbe e̱ ri riyii Sitivi shi shi nyi na ya njeli.
Ngbe Brra Prristi e̱ rin Sitiving he, “Re-nka ne e he ne̱ nyi cence e̱e̱?”
Sitivi e̱ ki shing he, “Re-gimbe ngbe re-be̱ nje! Nyi sa uucwu nyi ho! Be̱ne̱ bi brra grime̱ i ya wre̱ nwie be̱ nzhi Ibrrahin ne ngu ka shi we Mesopotamia ne ngu rishi ya srra a Harra.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ he ne ngu he, ‘We ngwie̱ ngwe̱ ngbe nné ngwe̱ ne̱, ngbe ngwe̱ ywa a ngwie̱ ne nje shi re ting.’
“Aha ni ngu a we ngwie̱ Kaldiya, ngu a ya srra a Harra. A zhe ne be̱ ngu ya hu, Be̱ne̱ e̱ be ne ngu a ngwie̱ ne nyi ning shî ne̱.

Me̱di ko Be̱ne̱ i ki ngwa yankya na rici ngu we̱ ko ngbe mbè na nyie nta zunzrru. Me̱di Be̱ne̱ i sa jee he mbè ngwie̱ ne̱ ri ya hwie̱ na ngu ngbe ne nzhwe ngu, ko ngbe ne a zhe nna ko Ibrrahin e̱ i bi ko ewe we̱.
Be̱ne̱ i he ne ngu he: ‘Nzhwe ngwe̱ e̱ á cwo a hwie̱ nné ice a yaka ngwie̱; á cwo a hwie̱ hwié, he̱rri á ri we ngwa cinci re-rie nnywa weni.
Me̱di nje ri nyi nné ngwie̱ ne mbe cwo a hwie̱ hwié mbe e̱ nka n we na uucwu; wire a merin nke, wé̱ wru a ngwie̱ nna re be ning ye mbè a nwie ne̱.’

Ngbe Be̱ne̱ e̱ sa jee ngbe ne Ibrrahin ne sheedeng ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó. A zhe ne Ibrrahin e̱ bî Ishaku, ngu a ki cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó a otu na klanva. Re be merin, Ishaku a ya bî Yakubu, ngbe Yakubu a ya hwie̱ be̱ brrá yó nzhi tiya komo shwa ne otu wehwie.
“He̱rri aha ne brrá yó nzhi e̱ rehwie mbe i rro ne gimbe mbe Usufu, á ki rie̱ re ya hwie̱ hwie a ngwie̱ Masarr. Me̱di Be̱ne̱ i shi ngbe ne ngu,
aa ki kye̱ a yarri re-cinci zhwozhwo. Aa ngwa Usufu zentsi ngbe e̱kpe̱e̱ng srra shwe̱ a nyyi Frrahona nggwe̱ Masarr. Aha ni Frrahona a ki ngwa ringgwe̱ ngwie̱ Masarr ngbe ne eri ngu zhwozhwo.
“Wire ya brra nzhwo a ya kpe a ngwie̱ Masarr ngbe a ngwie̱ Kaana zhwozhwo, aa be ne cinci we yang he̱rri ko yó nzhi e̱ á ya hung she kya ye we̱.
A zhe ne Yakubu ngu ya ho he bi yâ a Masarr, ngu a te yó nzhi e̱. Nke e̱ i nyi ywa mbe na ce̱ucwung.
A ywa mbe na hwie, Usufu a ti re-gimbe ngu rici ngu, wire Frrahona a hu re-gimbe Usufu fa.
Aha ni Usufu a te ré ya he ne be̱ ngu ngbe nné nva ngu zhwozhwo nshwa natsie̱ ne otu wecwuoo ré be.
Wire Yakubu a ne̱ re nzhi Masarr, ewie ne ngu ya hu a miimi ngbe yó nzhi e̱ zhwozhwo.
Á a ning brru mi ne nkwe mbe re be Shekye, á ya nyie̱ a ria ne Ibrrahin ngu i se̱ a nwie rewe Hamo a onu cwe ncwe̱.
“Re̱se̱ ne zhe ya cwu dudu ngbe Be̱ne̱ re nyi kya ne ngu i ning sa Ibrrahin jee e̱, ngbe nné nzhi a Masarr e̱ mbe e̱ ning bra ci piriri we yang.
Ngbe yaka nggwe̱ ne ko ngu hu ko yankya a rici Usufu we̱ ngu a ya se̱ ringgwe̱.
Ngu a brra nné nzhi e̱ ne zentsi, aa ngwa yó nzhi e̱ ge̱zhe̱, aa we ci ne ce ré zi re-birina mbe ne mbe nyi rewe shwo aha ngbe ré kwi.
A nyi a zheng ana ne i ning bî Musa. Ewe nna bi rina kpe̱kpe̱. Á ki bro a ri be̱ ngu he̱rri nyhwe̱ wetsie̱.
A zhe ne e ya wru mi ne ngu ci, ewena Frrahona a ya ki fo, ngu a ya ne̱ ne ki bro shi nyi ewe ngu.
Musa a mie̱ ga re-zentsi nné Masarr zhwozhwo, aa ya ci a bi igbe̱ a yarri re-nka ngbe ne re-cwuo.
“A zhe ne Musa ngu ya cwu re-rie nshwa weni, ehwie e̱ ki kpra he re ya dzie re-gimbe ngu nné Isrreela.
Ngu a ya timi ne ya nne Masarr shi ci ya mbe ruhu. Ngu a ywa he ngu ya ki sheng ngbe ngu ki trrang, ngu a yhwe̱ nne Masarr nna.
(Musa ra he ka nné na ngu a á shi hu re̱se̱ng he Be̱ne̱ shi nyi cwuo ne ngu ngbe ngu we kyia, me̱di koó hu we̱.)

A otu na ngu ning zhweng, aa ya timi ne nné Isrreela wehwie mbe shi nko we nci mbe. Ngu a ne̱ he ngu shi we ka, ngu a he ne mbe he, ‘Kyet, a wene! We nyi re-gimbe e̱ nyi nda ngu ci nyi shi yaa ti re-ruhu he ni e̱?’
“Me̱di nne bi vini ne ngu shi ci gimbe ngu a ruhu a, aa lu Musa re nzhi bamba, ngu a he, ‘Hooda, nyi nye̱ ngu re ci ngwe̱ hwie̱ nggwe̱ ngbe nne níng nyi nzhi e̱ nka a?
Ngwe̱ ce̱ ning yhwe̱ shi ne ngwe̱ i yhwe̱ nne Masarr ana a rwi e̱e̱?’
A zhe ne Musa ho ni, ngu a to a Masarr re nzhi Midia, ewie ne ngu ya ning srra he̱rri ngu a she rewerento wehwie.
“A zhe ne ngu a ci re-rie nshwa weni, ngbe ya njeli e̱ ya wre̱ a nwie ngu a yarri lendo ne ngu yé gbe̱e̱ ekwe a tsi yi dudu ne Ngbra Sine.
A zhe ne ngu rí ni, ngu a hwie̱ nga we onu aha kya ne ngu ri. Ngu a ne̱ re nzhi ring dudu, ngbe ngu a ho cwue Brrabe̱ ngu he:
‘A nyi nje Be̱ne̱ yó ngwe̱, Be̱ne̱ Ibrrahin, ngbe Ishaku, ngbe Yakubu.’ Musa a ne̱ ne tsi rwe̱ gbe̱gbe̱gbe̱, ko bra ce̱ fo riyii ze re ri wa we̱.
“Wire Brrabe̱ e̱ he ne ngu he, ‘Trru re-tamri ngwe̱ aha ewie ne ngwe̱ shi ning yo ana nyi ewie wiri.
Nje shwe̱ riyii nje rí zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne nné nje shi shweng a Masarr. Nje hó ruhu mbe ne mbe ku, nyi ngwiee nje wro re be we trru. Be we zhe ne ne̱, nje shi re te a ngwie̱ Masarr.’

“A bra nyi we ngu Musa ne̱ ne nné Isrreela i ki ra nwie he ne ngu he, ‘Nyi nye̱ ngu re ci ngwe̱ hwie̱ nggwe̱ nzhi ngbe nne níng nyi nka aa?’ Nyi ngu a ne Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu ya wre̱ nwie ngu shi shi nyi ya njeli a gbe̱e̱ ekwe ye lendo ngu ki te re ya hwie̱ nggwe̱ mbe ngbe nne we kyia.
Aa ya we kwa wru mi ne mbe Masarr. Aa nyi ngbá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ngbe re-sheede a Masarr, ngbe a Brra Nzhwo Shwo, ngbe a tsi yi ne mbe ning ci re-rie nshwa weni.
“A nyi ngu Musa ne̱ ngu i he ne nné Isrreela he, ‘Be̱ne̱ ri níng wru mi ne ya nne ti re̱se̱ng shi ne ngu ning te nje ne̱
Nyi ngu ne ngu i shi ngbe rotsu nné Isrreela a tsi yi, a i shi ngbe yó nzhi, ngbe ne njeli ne ngu i he nka ne ngu a brra Ngbra Sine ana, he̱rri ngu se̱ nti nka nce nwie Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa.
“Me̱di ko yó nzhi e̱ i ce̱ ki ho nka we̱, á i ki ra kpe̱kpe̱, he̱rri a yarri rehwie mbe á ne̱ ne hwie we nka ning brru re nzhi Masarr.
Á he ne Arruna he, ‘Níng nyi yá re-kpanshwu ne mbe shi níng kwa. Aha ngu Musa ne ngu wru ne nzhi a Masarr ne̱, ko nzhi hu kya ne ngu ki ci we̱!’
A nyi a zhe ana ne mbe i nyi kpanshwu shi shi nyi ya ewe nnywa. Á ne̱ ne ki nyi re-teede nwie nyi re-para re ngwa kya ne mbe nyi ne nva mbe grime̱.
Aha ni Be̱ne̱ e̱ nga nva a we we á ne̱ ne ye re̱nde̱ zinye̱ mbè shi shi kya ne e wie a yarri krre̱de̱ nné ti re̱se̱ng he:
‘Nyi nné Isrreela! A re-rie nshwa weni ne nyi i shi a tsi yi e̱,
nyi nje ne nyi i ning be ne ankya
nwie nyi re-teedeng shwi ankya rehwe e̱e̱?
Ko nyi brranyi Moleki ne nyi i ko re gye̱ mi
he̱rri ngbe ne e̱nde̱ kpanshwu Rrefa
A nyi re-kpanshwu ne̱ ne i nyi aha nyi we ye mbè.
Aha nii, nje shi níng yu
he̱rri nyi ya wara ngwie̱ Babila
nwie srra shi nné gyiaa.’
“Yó nzhi e̱ á i bi Ndu na sheede shî Be̱ne̱ ngbe mbe a tsi yi. Á i ki nyi we shi kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ti Musang, we ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu Musa i ri.

Re be merin, yó nzhi nkiye ne mbe i se̱ ndu nna a zhe Joshwua, á be mi a ngwie̱ Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne Be̱ne̱ i we yu we nyyi mbe ngu we we mi ne re-ngwie̱ nna. A i shi nva yó nzhi e̱ he̱rri re be zhe Dooda.
Dooda a she ehwie rina Be̱ne̱, ngu a rin he ngu ra no Be̱ne̱ Yakubu eri.
Me̱di nyi Solomo ngu i ya ki no eri nna.
“Me̱di ngu Brrabe̱ Bi Grime̱ Zhwozhwo a ko srra a eri ne nneywi ngu no we̱. We shi ne nne ti re̱se̱ng ngu i he he:
‘Nyi zinye̱ ngu nyi ncwu ringgwe̱ nje,
ngbe ebe ngwie̱ e̱ nyi ncwung sa ta nje.
A nyi zohu zhwe eri nyi shi hung nong aha nje e̱e̱?
Brrabe̱ he ni!
Ewieng srra nje e̱ we̱ shi a heng?
Ko nyi nje ne nje nyi ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo ne va nje we̱ e̱e̱?’
“Nyi nné klo nci! Nyi ne nyi nyí nné tsi ngwie̱ a yarri rehwie nyi, ko re-uucwu nyi e̱ á ho nka Be̱ne̱ we̱! Ko zohu zhe nyi ra Nshe Wiri we shi yó nyi e̱!
Á sa she ya nne ti re̱se̱ng ne̱ ne yó nyi e̱ á we̱sa ki ngwa ge̱zhe̱ e̱e̱? He̱rri á yhwi ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe ti re̱se̱ be Nne Redziee. Nyi ngwiee nyi e̱ ma nyi ki rie̱, nyi ki yhwe̱.
A nyi nyi ne nyi i se̱ Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Be̱ne̱ ne re-njeli i ngwa, me̱di ko nyi e̱ nyi zhwe we̱!”
Re̱se̱ ne Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi i ho ni, á dzio rehwie we yang nwie ye nnyi kakaka nwie ki ri.
Me̱di Sitivi ne ngu shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri e̱ ngu a rwi riyii ri zinye̱, ngu a ri grime̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe Jesu ne ngu yo a nva nyye Be̱ne̱.
Ngu a he, “Ri, nje ri zinye̱ ngu kla ne Kowe Nneywi ngu yo a nva nyye Be̱ne̱!”
Ne mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ ku re-uucwu mbe, mbe e̱ kro nku ne brrá re-riwie̱ng cwue. We zhe zunzrru mbe e̱ gu rrutututu mbe e̱ ya kpe ngu,
á ki kwa, mbe e̱ wru mi ne ngu a yarri ngwie̱ nna, mbe e̱ ya ne̱ ne ki ta ne ngbatsie. A zhe nna, nné bi nka a rici ngu a
A zhe ne mbe shi ki ta, Sitivi e̱ ku Be̱ne̱ he, “Brrabe̱ Jesu, fo nshe nje!”
Ngbe ngu a hu be ne re-ruhu, ngu a ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Brrabe̱, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ke̱ ne lu ne e̱ngwie̱ mbe ne̱ we̱.” A zhe ne ngu he ni, ngu a zhwu cwue.
Ngbe Shawulu a yó miimi nwie shing he ré ki yhwe̱.
A tuuye ya brra ge̱zhe̱ e̱ deze a rici ekpri nné ce̱ nka a Urrushelima. Ga nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo, á we se̱ kakap a re-nkla ngwie̱ Yahudi ngbe Samariya, se we nnenté.
Ngbe yá nné to owu Be̱ne̱ e̱ ya nyie̱ Sitivi nwie ku rana riywe̱ we yang.
Me̱di Shawulu a ne̱ ne ci ekpri nné ce̱ nka brrine̱. A ngwi reri reri ne ngu prre ntó ngbe mbrrú re we kwa re cwo cing a uucwu gyiaa.
Nné ce̱ nka ne mbe yaa sē̱, á ya ne̱ ne brro Nka Rina nna ko he ne mbe ning ywa.
Fili e̱ wro re nzhi yarri ngwie̱ Samariya, ngu a ya ne̱ ne we brro nka Krristi a miimi.
