A zhe ne rigwe̱ nneywí mbe hó nka ne Fili ngu brro, ne mbe bra rí re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne ngu nyí, mbe e̱ ning bra tso re-uucwu nwie ho kya ne ngu he.
Ngbe nné piriri ne mbe bi re-rije, re-rije mbe e̱ á wrru nwie kyie̱ re̱zhe̱ gbangba, he̱rri nné kwi nkye̱ ngbe nnenkú piriri á she kyia.
Aha ni rehwie nné ngwie̱ nna á kla we yang.
A a bi ya krrootu ne e ki ye he Sima ne ngu srra a ngwie̱ nna. Aa fo zhe ne ngu nyi re-ankya ci nné Samariya ré hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu. He̱rri a yaa kywo he ngu a ma ngu be nne.
Ga nné ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo brrabrráng ngbe iishíng á tso re-uucwu nwie ki ho nka ngbe wé̱ he, “Nke ne̱ nyi igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ ne e ki ye he Brra Igbe̱.”
Á ki ho nka ni aha aa fo zhe we yang ne ngu srra re nyi re-ankya ne ngu we ci ré hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu ne ankya krrootu krrootu.
Me̱di a zhe ne mbe ya shî Nka Rina Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe nka Jesu Krristi ne Fili ngu we brrong, á a we nyi batisma zhwozhwo mbe ntó ngbe mbrrú.
Ga ngbe Sima we rici ngu a ma aa shî, á a ki nyi batisma. Ngu a ne̱ ne zhwe Fili ko zohu ewie ne ngu ning ywa nwie nga we onu aha ngbá re-sheede ngbe re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne ngu ri.
A zhe ne nnenté a Urrushelima mbe ya ho he nné Samariya á se̱ nka Be̱ne̱, mbe e̱ te Pita ngbe Yohana re nzhi nwie mbe.
A zhe ne mbe ya cwu a nwie nna, mbe e̱ we ku Be̱ne̱ aha ngbe ré she Nshe Wiri,
aha koó ma ne Nshe Wiri be a zete ya mbe we̱ wire; á ma ne nyi we batisma ne e we nying a yarri lo Brrabe̱ Jesu.
Pita ngbe Yohana a we gara nva, ngbe mbe e̱ she Nshe Wiri.
Re̱se̱ ne Sima ri he nné mbiye ana á she Nshe Wiri aha ne nnenté e̱ we gara nva, ngu a we ngwa ncwe̱.
Ngu a he ne Pita ngbe Yohana he, “Nyi ning ngwa zhwe igbe̱ ne̱ ma aha ngbe ko nye̱ ne nje ki gara nva re she Nshe Wiri.”
Me̱di Pita a ki shing he, “Nde ngwe̱ ngbe ncwe̱ ngwe̱ e̱ nyi mwe nyi ci shweni! Ngwe̱ hwie he á sé̱ kya na na Be̱ne̱ e̱ ne ncwe̱ e̱e̱?
Ko ning bi va ngwe̱ a ncwuo nzhi ne̱ we̱, aha ko ehwie ngwe̱ shi tsantsa a nwie Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Se̱ ywe̱ ne zhwe e̱ngwie̱ ne̱ ngbe ngwe̱ cwe nva ne Brrabe̱, de̱e̱nte̱ wo we̱ re we e̱ngwie̱ ngwe̱ ne zhwe hwie nka a nu rie ngwe̱ ne̱.
Aha nje ri ngwe̱ bi ehwie rro we yang ne e̱ngwie̱ re rrwe.”
Sima a he ne Pita ngbe Yohana he, “Kusu, cwe nva ne Brrabe̱ aha nje, aha ngbe de̱ ga re-ankya ne nyi he ne̱ ré ning she we̱.”
Re̱se̱ ne Pita ngbe Yohana mbe ngwa sheede nwie ti nka Brrabe̱, mbe e̱ ning brru re nzhi Urrushelima nwie cwo re brro Nka Rina a re-nkla Samariya piriri.
Ya njeli Brrabe̱ e̱ he ne Fili he, “Deze ngwe̱ wro a nva kudu a rê Urrushelima re nzhi Gaza ne ngu grra a tsi yi ana.”
Aha nii, aa deze ngu a pie rê, ngu a ya she ya brra nne ringgwe̱ Itopia
ne ngu ning brru ngu nyia re si ri nwie to a zete eekyie ntsié̱ re hwie
Ngbe Nshe Wiri e̱ he ne Fili he, “Ywa, cwo re nzhi dudu ne eekyie ntsié̱ ncwi e̱.”
Fili e̱ wre̱ ne ywa nwie nna ne ncii, ngu a ho nne nna ngu hwie krre̱de̱ Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng. Fili e̱ ki rinng he, “Ma ngwe̱ hu re̱se̱ kya ne ngwe̱ hwié ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Ngu a ki shing he, “Ma n ce̱ rimi n hu a? Se ka ya nne re bra ning ting wire.” Ngbe ngu a he ne Fili he re ngra re ya srra ngbe ne ngu.
Ewie ne nne nna ngu ri shi hwieng nna he:
“Á ki kwa shi nyi canve ne e nyia re nzhi cie̱ng,
cereng shi shi ewe canve a nwie nné ki hlu rehwe,
koo bra ko riti nka we̱.
Á ki ci nshwu, koó ki nyi nka tsantsa we̱.
Nyi nye̱ re he nka aha nné nva ngu a?
Srra ngu a be ngwie̱ e̱ ya cwu gamang.”
Ngbe nne nna a rin Filing he, “Kusu ning ting, ngu nne ti re̱se̱ng ne̱ a he nka ne̱ a rici nye̱ ma? A he nka ne̱ aha rici ngu, ka a rici yaka ya nne ye̱?”
Wire Fili e̱ ce̱ we ne ewie ne nne nna ngu hwie a krre̱de̱ ana, ngu a ki ti Nka Rina Jesu Krristi.
A zhe ne mbe shi ciee a rê nna, mbe e̱ ya cwu nwie ne ngu bi nzhwo rishi, ngbe nne ringgwe̱ nna ngu a he, “Ko nyi rishi ne̱ oo? Nyi nda we̱ ci ko wé̱ ning nyi batisma a he e̱ we̱ e̱?”
Fili e̱ he ne ngu he, “Wé̱ hung re nyi batisma kundu ngwe̱ shî a nu rie ngwe̱ zhwozhwo.”
Ngbe nne nna a ki shing he, “Nje shî he Jesu Krristi nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱.”]
Nne ringgwe̱ nna a he ré ci eekyie ntsié̱ nna ré hwie̱ yo. Ngu a wru ngbe ne Fili, ngbe mbe e̱ wro gbengbe re nzhi kuru rishi. Fili e̱ ya ki nyi batisma a miimi.
Me̱di re̱se̱ ne mbe wru rishi mbe cwugu re be ci, Nshe Wiri Brrabe̱ e̱ wre̱ ne fo Fili ne̱ mi. Ko nne ringgwe̱ nna bra kara ki ri wa we̱, me̱di aa wara we ne ciee ngu nwie nyi rekwi.
Fili e̱ ya she rici ngu a ya ngwie̱ ne e ki ye he Azotu; ngu a ne̱ we ne cwo re brro Nka Rina a ga re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo he̱rri ngu ma ya cwu Kesariya.
Me̱di Shawulu ke̱ ne yhwi we fufufu he ngu shi yhwi nné zhwe Brrabe̱. Aa ywa a nwie Brra Prristi,
ngu a ya rin he ré ki ngwa krre̱de̱ sheede re nzhi a re-zonggrung mwe a Damaska, aha kundu ngu ri ya she ya nne ne ngu zhwe Rê ne̱, ka re nyi nto ka mbrru, ngu a we rrwe re be mi a Urrushelima.
A zhe ne ngu cwo re be wre̱ dudu ne Damaska, we zhe zunzrru nse̱ e̱ wru zinye̱ ngu a tsie̱ a nwie ngu ke̱sss.
Ngu a gu kpe, ngbe ngu a ho ya cwue ngu he ne ngu he, “Shawulu, Shawulu, ngwe̱ ning ngwa cinci ni e̱ aha nda?”
Ngbe Shawulu a he, “Ngwe̱ nyi nye̱, Brrabe̱?”
Cwue nna a shî he, “A nyi nje Jesu ne ngwe̱ ning ngwa cinci ne̱.
Me̱di deze ngwe̱ ngwie a ngwie̱ nna, á shi re ti kya ne se ngwe̱ nyi.”
Nné ne mbe shi ciee ngbe Shawulu a á hwie̱ yo ranng koó bra nka we̱; á ho cwue nna, me̱di koó ri ko ya nne we̱.
Shawulu a he ngu deze ngu kla riyii, koo hung ri ko yankya we̱. Mbe e̱ ki kwa va re nzhi Damaska.
Aa ci rotu wetsie̱ ngu shi ncwue̱, koo ye ka re shwe yankya we̱.
A a bi ya nne ce̱ nka a Damaska ne e ki ye he Ananiya. Brrabe̱ ki ye a yarri revi he, “Ananiya!”
Ngu a shî he, “Ri, nje ne Brrabe̱.”
Ngbe Brrabe̱ e̱ he ne ngu he, “Deze ngwe̱ ywa a ri Yahuda ne ngu shi a brra rê ne e ki ye he Rê Te̱rr ngbe ngwe̱ ya rin aha nne Tarrusu ne e ye lo ngu he Shawulu. A shi nwie ku Be̱ne̱.
A yarri revi Shawulu a ri ya nne ne ye lo ngu he Ananiya ne ngu be ngu ya ki gara va aha ngbe re she ri ewie.”
Ananiya a he, “Brrabe̱, nje nyi ne ho re-nka a rici nne ne̱, ngbe zhwe hwie̱ ne ngu nyi nné wiri ngwe̱ng a Urrushelima.
Aa bra be a he ne ne̱ ne de̱me̱ ne ngu she a nwie nggwé̱ re-prristi aha ngbe ngu ya prre ga nné re ye mbè zhwozhwo.”
Me̱di Brrabe̱ he ne Ananiya he, “Ywa, aha nne ne̱ nje ki kyie ngbe re hwie̱ kyang cwuo nje, ngbe re ci ga Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱, ngbe nggwé̱ mbe, ngbe nné Isrreela ré hu lo nje.
Nje we rici nje e̱ nje shi ki ti zhwe cinci ne se ngu shwe aha lo nje.”

Wire Ananiya a ne̱ re nzhi, ngu a ya ngwie a ri nna. Ngu a ya gara Shawulu nva, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Gimbe, Shawulu, Brrabe̱ ning te. Ngu Jesu ne ngu ya wre̱ nwie ngwe̱ a zhe ne ngwe̱ shi rê re be ana nyi ngu ne ngu ning te aha ngwe̱ she ri ewie wa, ngbe ngwe̱ bra shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri.”
We zhe zunzrru yankya wru a riyii ngu shi shi nyi uhwrro teme hwen, aa kpe be, ngu a ne̱ ne ri ewie fa. Wire ngu a deze, á a ki nyi batisma.
A zhe ne ngu ye yâ, ngu a she igbe̱.
Shawulu a ci e̱we̱ rotu tsie̱ ngbe nné ce̱ nka ne mbe shi Damaska.
We̱sa ne dzio zhe, ngu a ne̱ we ne ngwi a re-zonggrung mwe re brro nka he Jesu nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱.

Ga nné ne mbe ki ho a á ne̱ ne nye̱ we ronu nwie rin he, “Ko nyi ngu ne̱ ngu gye̱ re yhwi nné ye Jesu mbè a Urrushelima we̱ e̱e̱? Koo be a he ne̱ aha ngu ya we prre ngu we kwa re nzhi ngwa nggwé̱ re-prristi we̱ ka rimi?”
Gbengbe ni Shawulu cwo we ne ning brang we bra nwie brro nka ne igbe̱, he̱rri aa ci nné Yahudi ne mbe srra Damaska zhizhi aha zhwe re-nhwie̱ ne ngu we ci ré hu he Jesu a nyi Krristi.
Rotu piriri wara, ngbe nné Yahudi e̱ ya mwe onu he mbe ki yhwe̱,
me̱di Shawulu ya hu kya ne mbe ce̱ nying. Totu ne te̱ne̱ á srra re tso a brra onusinye ngwie̱ aha mbe ki yhwe̱.
Me̱di nné ki zhwe e̱ á ya wru mi ne ngu a wundo garru a zhe totu, á wro ne ngu a yarri brra grre re be be.
A zhe ne Shawulu ngu ya ywa Urrushelima, a ce̱ mwe rici ngbe nné zhwe Jesu, me̱di ga mbe zhwozhwo to owu ngu, koó shî he cence ngu a nyi nne zhwe Jesu ma we̱.

Me̱di Barrnaba a ki fo be ne ngu a nwie nnenté. Aa we ti zhwe rê ne Shawulu ngu ning ri Brrabe̱ a rê re nzhi Damaska, he̱rri Brrabe̱ e̱ he nka ne ngu, ngbe zhwe nka ne ngu brro a Damaska we̱sa ne owu a yarri lo Jesu.
Ngbe Shawulu a srra ngbe mbe nwie grra we te̱s a Urrushelima re brro nka a yarri lo Brrabe̱ we̱sa ne owu.
Aa he nka nwie yaa nyigbe ngbe ne nné Yahudi na mbe he nka Heleni he̱rri á ne̱ ne kre rê mbe ki yhwe̱.
Me̱di zhe ne re-gimbe ya hu re̱se̱ng ni, mbe e̱ wro ne ngu re nzhi Kesariya, ngbe mbe e̱ ya ki ci re ne̱ re nzhi ngwie̱ Tarrusu.
Wire ekpri nné ce̱ nka a Yahudi, ngbe Galili, ngbe na Samariya zhwozhwo she hung srra dengge. Á ci igbe̱; Nshe Wiri we shwe̱ rehwie; á ci piriri, á to owu Brrabe̱ a yarri srra mbe.
Re̱se̱ ne Pita i shi grra ga rewie, aa ya ywa dzie nné wiri Be̱ne̱ a Lida.
Aa ya she ya nne ne e ki ye he Iniyasi a miimi ne ngu ci re-rie klanva nwie nywe̱ we nywe̱ kpengye aha ngu kwi nkye̱.
Pita a he ne ngu he, “Iniyasi, Jesu Krristi re kyia. Deze ngwe̱ nyi ewieng nywe̱ ngwe̱.” We zhe zunzrru, Iniyasi e̱ deze.
Ga nné ne mbe shi Lida ngbe a Sharro ne mbe ki ri ni, mbe e̱ klu re be nwie Brrabe̱.
A i bi ya mbrru zhwe Jesu a Jopa ne e ye lo ngu he Tabita (ne a nka Heleni á ye lo nna he Dokasi);
Ngbe a rotu ana ngu a ya kpe ruhu, ngu a hu. Á a kyu kwe nna, á ya sa a zonggru zeteng.
Ko kla Lida shi gbong ne Jopa we̱; aha ni nné ce̱ nka a ya ho he Pita shi Lida, mbe e̱ te nné wehwie he ré ya he ne ngu he kusu re be we hwiehwie!

Ngbe Pita a deze ngbe mbe re nzhi. A zhe ne ngu ya cwu, á a ki fo re nzhi zonggru zeteng. Ga kpambrrú a ya ki grra nwie ku rana re ki ti re-tago ngbe kpi re-ankya ne Dokasi i no a zhe ngu i shi ngbe mbe.
Pita a we trru ci zhwozhwo a zonggru nna; ngu a hu be ne re-ruhu ngu a ku Be̱ne̱. Wire ngu a bra re be nwie kwe mbrru nna, ngu a he, “Tabita, deze!” Aa kla riyii ri Pita, ngu a cinye̱ ngu a srra be.
Pita a ci va ngu a ki sheng ngbe re deze. Wire ngu a ye nné ce̱ nka ngbe kpambrrú nna ngu a we ngwa ngu ne ngu shi nce.
Nka nna a se̱ ngwie̱ yu ko he a Jopa, ngbe nneywí piriri mbe e̱ sa rie a Brrabe̱.
Pita a ning bra srra a Jopa a rotu piriri ngbe ya nne ne e ki ye he Sima, ne ngu nyi re-ankya kpe.
A i bi ya nne a Kesariya ne e ki ye he Koniliyu, ne ngu i nyi shwa shezhi
A nyi nne ye Be̱ne̱ mbè, a to owu Be̱ne̱ ngbe ga nné nva ngu zhwozhwo. A i shi ngwa yiriywé̱ we wang, a srra re ku Be̱ne̱ ko zohu zhe.
A ya otu a weje ncwe̱ wetsie̱ na te̱ne̱, aa ria revi; a ri njeli Be̱ne̱ krrankrrankrra ne ngu be nwie he nka ne ngu he, “Koniliyu!”
Koniliyu a sa riyii nwie ki ri ne owu, ngu a ki rinng he, “A nyi nda a, Brrabe̱?”
Njeli e̱ ki shing he, “Re-rumwo ngwe̱, ngbe re-ankya ne ngwe̱ na yiriywé̱ e̱ á ya cwu zeteng, á nyi ankya na ré lu a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne ne̱, te yá nné re nzhi Jopa, ngbe ré ya be ne ya nne ne e ye lo ngu he Sima ne e bra ki ye he Pita.
Aa be ice a ri ya Sima ne ngu nyi re-ankya kpe, ne eri ngu shi rekyi brra nzhwo rishi.”
A zhe ne njeli ngu ki he nka nna ngu ne̱, Koniliyu a ye nnencwuó ri ngu wehwie ngbe ya shezhi ngu ne ngu srra re ki nyi cwuo ne ngu ye Be̱ne̱ mbè.
Ngu a we ti ko nda ne ngu ci, wire ngu a we te re nzhi Jopa.
A otu na ngu ning zhweng a zhe te̱ne̱ ne mbe shi ciee re be wre̱ dudu ne ngwie̱ nna, Pita a ngra a zete zonggru aha ngu ya ku Be̱ne̱.
Ngu a bra ho nzhwo ki wie, a ce̱ he ngu ra she yankya ngu ye. A zhe ne e shi nyi yâ nna, ngu a ngwie ria revi.
Ngu a ri zinye̱ e̱ kla ne yankya shi shi nyi brra kla trro ne ronu weni nna shi shi we prre ne ngu wró re be be ngwie̱.
A yarring a ning bi ga re-nzhwe nnyié̱ ngbe ankya kwa rehwie be ngbe re̱mie̱ yi.
Wire ngu a ho riwie̱ng cwue ngu he ne ngu he, “Pita, deze ngwe̱ yhwe̱ ngbe ngwe̱ ye.”
Me̱di Pita he ne ngu he, “Aawo, Brrabe̱! Ko nje sa ye yankya ne ngu bi le̱le̱ ka ngu we̱sa shi wiri we̱.”
Cwue nna a he nka ne ngu wa a na hwie he, “Kya ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci ci wiri, shi de̱ ngwe̱ fo he bi le̱le̱ we̱.”
Á nyi ni he̱rri ce tsie̱, wire á a wre̱ ne ning brru mi ne re-ankya nna re nzhi zinye̱.

A zhe ne Pita shi we nwie hwie nka aha zhwe revi ne ngu ria ka nyi cwu ndang ye̱, ngbe nné ne Koniliyu ngu we te e̱ á a ya she ewie eri Sima nyi ankya nkpe, mbe e̱ hwie̱ yo a brra onusinye onu ri nna.
Ngbe mbe e̱ ci dzie nwie rin he, “Sima ne e ki ye he Pita shi he e̱e̱?”
A zhe ne Pita shi nwie hwie nka aha revi nna, Nshe Wiri e̱ he ne ngu he, “Sima, yá nné wetsie̱ á shi re kre.
Aha ni deze ngwe̱ wro re nzhi be, shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi de̱tiri we zhwe we̱, aha nje we te.”
Pita a wro re nzhi be, ngu a he ne nné nna, “A nyi nje ne nyi ning kre, nyi be aha nda?”

Nné nna mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Nzhi wru nwie Koniliyu ne ngu nyi shwa shezhi. A nyi nne redziee, a bra nyi nne to owu Be̱ne̱ he̱rri ga nné Yahudi e̱ ki ngwa grime̱ we yang. Ya njeli Be̱ne̱ ya he ne ngu he re te ré ya re ye ngbe ngwe̱ be ta ri ngu, aha ngbe re ho kya ne ngwe̱ shi ki ting.”
Wire Pita a ngwie ne nné ice nna, mbe e̱ kywe miimi.
Á shwo mincwe, Pita a deze ngu a pie rê ngbe mbe; yá kpi re-gimbe a Jopa mbe e̱ ne̱ re nzhi ngbe ne ngu.
A otu na ngu ning zhweng, ngu a ya cwu a Kesariya, aa ya she Koniliyu ngu ye nné nva ngu ngbe brrá rwí ngu mbe shi nwie ki te.
We ne Pita shi ngwie a ri nna, Koniliyu a ya nyi ngbe ne ngu, ngu a hu be a nyyi ngu nwie ki ngwa grime̱.
Me̱di Pita he ne ngu he, “Deze, nje nyi we nneywi shi ngwe̱ ma.”
Pita shi we nwie he nka ngbe ne Koniliyu, ngu a ngwie yarring, ngu a she nneywí piriri ne mbe ya tsu.

Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ma nyi hu he ko shi ye̱ye̱rri a teede nzhi ngbe nne Yahudi re mwe rici ngbe nne yaka ngwie̱ ka re ya ki dzie we̱. Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ning ting he shi de̱ n he he ya nne nyi riywe̱ wiri ka a bi le̱le̱ we̱.
Aha nii, a zhe ne ngwe̱ te he n be, ko nje ra we̱, nje be. Ma a zhe ne ne̱, nje ce̱ hu kya ngu ci ne ngwe̱ he n be e̱?”
Koniliyu a ki shing he, “Nje shi nwie ku Be̱ne̱
Ngbe ngu a he ne nje he, ‘Koniliyu, á ho re-rumwo ngwe̱, re-ankya ne ngwe̱ bra na yiriywé̱ e̱ nyi kya ré lu a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Te ne Sima ne e ki ye he Pita. A shi ice a Jopa a ri Sima ne ngu nyi re-ankya kpe, ne ngu srra ye̱ye̱rri ne brra nzhwo rishi.’
Kya a nyi ngwiee nje wre̱ ne te ne ngwe̱, a bra ning bi rina ne ngwe̱ be ne̱. A zhe ne ne̱ ga nzhi ne̱ nzhi yaa tsu a nyyi Be̱ne̱ he ngbe nzhi ho ko nda ne Brrabe̱ re te he ngwe̱ ya níng ting.”
Pita a kla onu nwie he ne mbe he, “A zhe ne ne̱ nje ning bra hung he cence ko Be̱ne̱ kyie nné kyie kyie we̱,
me̱di a sé̱ ko nye̱ ne ngu to owu ngu, ngu bra bi redziee, ko ngu rā wru a zohu ngwie̱.
Aa te ne re̱se̱ brro Nka Rina re be nwie nné Isrreela ne ngu nyi nkang srra rina ne e she a yarri Jesu Krristi ne ngu nyi Brrabe̱ ko nye̱.
Nyi hu kya ngu i ci a Yahudi zhwozhwo, ne ngu i ce̱ a Galili a zhe ne Yohana i fro cwuong brro nkang nyi batisma.

Nyi hu rê ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ning mia Jesu nne Nazarra ne Nshe Wiri ngbe igbe̱, ngbe zhwe ragrra ne ngu i grra re nyi re-cwuo rina nwie kyia nné ne mbe shi tahwie igbe̱ Shetani. A i nyi ni aha Be̱ne̱ shi ngbe ne ngu.
“Nzhi nyi re-sheede ga re-ankya ne ngu i nyi a ngwie̱ nné Yahudi ngbe a Urrushelima zhwozhwo. Á i ki ria a gasankwe he̱rri ki yhwe̱.
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki deze nhu a otu na tsie̱ng, ngu a ci ré ki ri.
Ko nyi nné zhwozhwo mbe i ki ri we̱, a nyi we re-sheede na ne Be̱ne̱ i ke̱she kyie — nzhi ne̱ ne nzhi ye nzhi bra shwe ngbe ne ngu a zhe ne ngu i deze nhu.
Aa níng ngwa nka he nzhi brro nneywí nka, nzhi we ting he nyi ngu ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki ci re hwie̱ nne nyi nka nné nce ngbe nné ne mbe kwi.
Ga nné ti re̱se̱ng zhwozhwo ngwá sheede a rici ngu he ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a ngu wé̱ ki we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu a yarri igbe̱ lo ngu.”
We ne Pita shi we nwie he re-nka ne̱, Nshe Wiri e̱ be a zete ko nye̱ mbe ne ngu ho nka nna.
Nné ce̱ nka na mbe nyi nné Yahudi ne mbe be ngbe Pita a á hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu aha ne he̱rri á kro ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ kya na na Nshe Wiri ma.
Aha mbe hó ne mbe he yá re-nka ne ko mbe mie̱ we̱
Ngbe Pita ngu a he,
“Nyi nye̱ re he de̱ ré nyi nné mbe rre̱ batisma na rishi we̱ e̱, ne mbe she Nshe Wiri we shi nzhi ma ne̱?”
Ngbe ngu a ci ré we nyi batisma a yarri lo Jesu Krristi. Wire mbe e̱ he ne Pita he re ning bra ci e̱we̱ rotu ngbe mbe.
Nnenté ngbe re-gimbe a Yahudi zhwozhwo á ya ho he ga ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ma.
Aha ni a zhe ne Pita ngu ya cwugu re nzhi Urrushelima, nné ce̱ nka nke ne e we ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó a á ya ne̱ ne krro nka ne ngu
he, “Ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ ywa ice nwie nné riywe̱ ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó
Aha ni Pita a ne̱ ne we brro re̱se̱ ko nda we ye̱ye̱rri ne ngu ning ci, a he:

“Nje i shi nwie ku Be̱ne̱ a ngwie̱ Jopa, nje e̱ timi nje shi ria revi. Nje e̱ ri yankya ngu wro re be be shi nyi kla trro ne ronu weni nna shi shi á we prre, ngbe ngu a wro re be nwie ne nje ning shi.
Nje rwi riyii yarring nwie ring we gbing, nje e̱ ri ankya rehwe, ngbe nnyié̱ yi, ngbe ne ankya kwa rehwie be, ngbe re̱mie̱ yi.
Wire nje e̱ ho ya cwue ngu he nka ne nje he, ‘Pita, deze; yhwe̱ ngbe ngwe̱ ye!’
“Me̱di nje ki shing he, ‘Koo tsie̱ tsie̱, Brrabe̱! Ko yankya riywe̱ wiri ka ne ngu bi le̱le̱ sa ngwie nu nje we̱.’
“Cwue nna ning brru wru zinye̱ wa na hwie he, ‘Kya ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci ci wiri, shi de̱ ngwe̱ fo he bi le̱le̱ we̱.’
Á nyi ni he̱rri ce tsie̱, wire á a fie̱ re nzhi mi zinye̱.
“We zhe ana, nné wetsie̱ ne mbe wru a Kesariya ne e we te nwie nje á ya hwie̱ yo a nu ri ne nje ning shi.
Nshe Wiri e̱ he ne nje he shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi de̱tiri we̱ we zhwe we̱. Re-gimbe rritsie̱ ne̱ á ywa ngbe nje, he̱rri ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi ngwie a ri nne nna.
Ngu a níng ti rê ne ngu ri njeli ngu ya wre̱ a ri ngu, ngu he ne ngu he, ‘Te ne Sima ne e ki ye he Pita a Jopa.
A shi re be ne nka na ne ngwe̱ ngbe ne nné nva ngwe̱ zhwozhwo nyi shi ning she kyia.’
“We zhe ne nje ya ne̱ ne he nka, Nshe Wiri e̱ be a mbe we shi ne ngu i be a nzhi tu ce̱ucwung.
Ngbe nje e̱ lu kya ne Brrabe̱ i he he, ‘Yohana i nyi batisma ne rishi
Aha ni kundu Be̱ne̱ e̱ we ngwa kya na na we ye̱ye̱rri shi ne ngu i níng ngwa nzhi ma, nzhi ne nzhi sa rie a Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi, a nyi nje nye̱ ngbe n he aawo ne Be̱ne̱?”
A zhe ne mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ dzie̱ ni ne krro nka mbe e̱, mbe e̱ ne̱ we ne de Be̱ne̱ nwie he, “Mahu shi ni, Be̱ne̱ e̱ ngwa ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ riwie̱ng si ywe̱ ré she ce!”
Yá nné ce̱ nka ne mbe yaa se̱ kanka aha ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu i deze a zheng yhwe̱ Sitivi e̱ á ya cwu he̱rri Finikyia, ngbe Kuprru, ngbe Antakyia nwie brro we nné Yahudi nka.
Me̱di yá mbe ne mbe nyi nné Kuprru ngbe nné Kurani á ywa a Antakyia, mbe e̱ ya ne̱ ne brro nné Heleni
Igbe̱ Brrabe̱ shi ngbe ne mbe, rigwe̱ nneywí we yang á ning sa rie he̱rri á klu re be nwie Brrabe̱.
Nka nna ya kpe uucwu ekpri nné ce̱ nka na Urrushelima, mbe e̱ te ne Barrnaba re nzhi Antakyia.
A zhe ne ngu ya cwu ne ngu ri zhwe ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ a zete mbe, ehwie ngu kla; ngu a we shwe̱ rehwie zhwozhwo mbe he ré ning tu rici nwie zhwe Brrabe̱ ne rehwie mbe zhwozhwo.
Barrnaba a nyi te̱nte̱ nne ne ngu shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri ngu bra bi sa rie we yang, ngbe á a ning bra kwa nneywí piriri re be nwie Brrabe̱.
Wire Barrnaba a ne̱ re nzhi kre Shawulu a Tarrusu.

A zhe ne ngu ya ki she, ngu a be ne ngu Antakyia. He̱rri Barrnaba ngbe Shawulu fo rie zhwozhwo ne mbe mwe ngbe ne brra ekpri nné ce̱ nka re we mie̱ nka. A nyi a Antakyia a miimi ne i ke̱she ye nné zhwe Jesu he Krrista.
A rotu ana yá nné ti re̱se̱ng ne mbe wru Urrushelima á wro re be Antakyia.
Ya mbe ne e ki ye he Agabu deze ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri, ngu a ti re̱se̱ brra nzhwo ne ngu cwo a kpe a ngwie̱ nné Rroma zhwozhwo, he̱rri re se̱ ngwie̱ yu. (Nke ne̱ i ci a zhe ringgwe̱ Kladiyu.)
Ngbe ga nné zhwe Jesu ko nye̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne igbe̱ ngu mbe e̱ fo he mbe she re-gimbe nné ce̱ nkang ne mbe shi a Yahudi.
Á nyi ni, he̱rri á te ne re-ankya na na a nva Barrnaba ngbe Shawulu ré ya ngwa brrá nné ce̱ nka.
A nyi a zhe ana ne Nggwe̱ Hirridu
He̱rri aa ci á yhwe̱ Yakubu ne ngu nyi gimbe Yohana ne ise̱nkeli.
A zhe ne ngu ri he ngu kla nné Yahudi rehwie, ngu a wara ne pie Pita wa. (Re-ankya ne̱ i ci a rotu Para Brredi We̱sa Yisi.)

A zhe ne ngu pie Pita, ngu a ki ci a uucwu gyiaa, ngbe ngu a ci rekpri re-shezhi weni ne ko zohu ekpri nna bi re-shezhi weni ré srra re ki cwo. Hirridu ce̱ he kundu ne e ri ti Para Paska wire ngu a be ne ngu a nyyi nneywí ngu a ki nyi nka we gbeng.
Aha ni aa she̱ Pita a uucwu gyiaa, me̱di ekpri nné ce̱ nka á tu rici nwie ku Be̱ne̱ aha ngu.
A zhe totu ne e ri shwo ngbe Hirridu we̱ wru ne ngu re ki nyi nka, Pita a shi ndzie a zetsi re-shezhi wehwie, ne e ki ci re-gyiaa wehwie, ne nné cwong mbe yo a nusinye re ki cwo.

We kpri ya njeli Brrabe̱ e̱ ya wre̱, nse̱ e̱ tsie̱ a yarri uucwu gyiaa nna. Ngu a kpra Pita a bamba ngu a ki shwo ndzie. Ngu a he ne ngu he, “Deze we hwiehwie!” Ngbe re-gyiaa a wru a nva ngu kpi be kpacaca.
Wire njeli e̱ he ngu he, “Ci re-ankya ngwe̱ ngbe tamri ngwe̱.” Pita a ci ankya. Njeli e̱ he ne ngu wa he, “Yaa ku ne kuntu ngwe̱ ngwe̱ ning zhwe.”
Pita a ki zhwe re nzhi ci, me̱di ko ru he kya ne njeli ana shi mi e̱ shi nwie ci ni cence we̱, a ra he ka nyi revi ne ngu shi riang.

Á wara ewie re-shezhi na zrru ngbe na hwie he̱rri á ya cwu a brra onusinye kprincwe̱ ne ngu fu yarri ngwie̱; onusinye e̱ kla we nggaa ngu aha mbe, ngbe mbe e̱ wru ci. Á maa cwo a brra rê na zrru á ya wo, ngbe we kpri, njeli e̱ ne̱ we Pita nggaa ngu.

Wire Pita a hu re̱se̱ kya ne ngu shi nwie ci fa. Ngu a he we rici ngu he, “A zhe ne ne̱ nje hu he nyi cence! Brrabe̱ te njeli ngu re be re ya ning ti a nva Hirridu ngbe ko nda ne nné Yahudi mbe ri shi hwie he shi ci.”
A zhe ne ngu ya hu he shi ni, ngu a ywa a ri Merri de̱ Yohana ne e ki ye he Marrku, ne ngu ning bi nné piriri ne mbe ya tsu nwie ku Be̱ne̱.
Pita a cwe ewie a brra onusinye na nu ri, ngbe ya ewenancwuo ne e ki ye he Rroda ngu a ywa he ngu ya ho ka nyi nye̱ ye̱.
A zhe ne ngu ho cwue Pita, ngu a ning brru we̱sa klang ne ovu ncii nwie nyi rekwi. Ngu a he, “A nyi Pita ngu shi a nusinye ana!”
Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Rici ngwe̱ shi dzio aa!” Me̱di aa ning ci shwo riyii. Aha ni mbe e̱ he ngu he, “Mahu nyi njeli ngu.”
Ngbe Pita a ke̱ we ne cwe ewie, a zhe ne mbe ya kla ewie nna mbe ki ri, mbe e̱ hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu.

Pita a we nyi va he ré dzie̱ cereng, ngbe ngu a we brro re̱se̱ rê ne Brrabe̱ ning wru mi ne ngu a uucwu gyiaa nna. Ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nyi ti Yakubu ngbe kpi re-gimbe nka ne̱.” Ngu a ne̱ re nzhi yaka ewie.
Mincwe he ngu kla, re̱zhe̱ ne ngu deze a yarri re-shezhi e̱ ko shi tsie̱nzhwu we̱, á he ma nyi nda ngu ci ne Pita?
Hirridu a ngwa nka he ré ki kre, me̱di koó she Pita we̱. Ngu a rin nné cwo nna nka me̱me̱ me̱me̱, wire ngu a ci he ré we yhwi.
Wire Hirridu a ne̱ a ngwie̱ Yahudi re nzhi Kesariya, ngu a ya ci e̱we̱ rotu a miimi.

A zhe nna Hirridu bi rimwi we yang ne nné Taya ngbe nné Sido. Ngbe nné Taya ngbe Sido mbe e̱ ci ekpri re nzhi nwie Hirridu ne onu zrru. Me̱di á ke̱she ve iirwi ngbe ne Bilasta ne ngu nyi ya nne ringgwe̱ na ngu she nggwe̱ng. Á ywa he mbe ya rwe nkang srra rina, aha re-ngwie̱ na mbe e̱ á she yâ ye a ngwie̱ na nggwe̱ Hirridu.
Á otu na ne e sa, Hirridu a ci brrá ankya ringgwe̱, ngu a ya srra a ncwung nyi nka ngu, ngu a ngwa nka ngu a nyyi ko nye̱.
Ngbe rotsu nné e̱ kro nku he, “Nke ne̱ nyi cwue ya be̱ne̱, ko nyi cwue nneywi we̱.”
We zhe zunzrru, njeli Brrabe̱ ki rwi, aha koo ngwa Be̱ne̱ grime̱ we̱. Ngbe iizhí e̱ ki ye he̱rri aa hu.
Me̱di nka Be̱ne̱ ke̱ we ne ning brang we bra re nzhi cwu ko he.
A zhe ne Barrnaba ngbe Shawulu mbe fro cwuo mbe, mbe shi ne̱ a Urrushelima, mbe e̱ fo Yohana ne e ki ye he Marrku.
A i bi yá nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe nné mie̱ nka a ekpri nné ce̱ nka na Antakyia — mbe Barrnaba, ngbe Simiyo ne e ki ye he Nne Ywi, ngbe Lusiyu nne Kurani, ngbe Manaye ne ngu ci brrang ngbe nggwe̱ Hirridu
A zhe ne mbe shi ye Brrabe̱ mbè re rwe onu, ngbe Nshe Wiri e̱ he ne mbe he, “Nyi ning kyie Barrnaba ngbe Shawulu aha cwuo ne nje we ye ré nyi.”
Mbe e̱ rwe onu nwie ku Be̱ne̱ re we gara nva, wire mbe e̱ we cire fa.
Barrnaba ngbe Shawulu ne Nshe Wiri we te e̱ á a wro re nzhi a Selukyia, mbe e̱ ya cwo jirigi rishi re nzhi Kuprru.
A zhe ne mbe ya cwu a Salami, mbe e̱ brro nka Be̱ne̱ a re-zonggrung mwe nné Yahudi. Yohana

Á maa cie̱ a yarri ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo, ngwie̱ ne brra nzhwo rishi ki grra, he̱rri á ya cwu Pafo. Mbe e̱ ya she ya nne Yahudi a miimi ne ngu nyi nne rekpree ngu bra ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra ne e ki ye he Bajesu.
Nne nna i nyi nnencwuo nne ringgwe̱ ne e ki ye he Sajiu Bulu. Nne ringgwe̱ nna nyi nne bi hu re̱se̱ng, ngu a te ne mbe Barrnaba ngbe Shawulu aha ne ngu kre he ngu ho nka Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di Elima ne ngu nyi nne rekpree (ye̱ye̱rri ne kya lo ngu a he), aa ne̱ he ngu we kpo kishi nne ringgwe̱ nna ri sa rie a nka nna.
Ngbe Shawulu, ne e bra ki ye he Bulu, ne ngu shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri, ngu a sa riyii a nne rekpree nna,

ngu a he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ shwe ne ko zohu zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ rabrra ngbe na nca, ngwe̱ nyi ewe Nne Hwie̱ ngwe̱ bra nyi rwinko na ko nda ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri. Ko ngwe̱ shi we ni brri re-nka raywrra Brrabe̱ ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Ri, a zhe ne ne̱, va Brrabe̱ shi bra rici ngwe̱, ngwe̱ shi ci cwue̱, ngwe̱ shi fo zhe we̱sa ne hung ri ewie si ne̱.”
We zhe zunzrru, vie̱ ngbe ewie ywi e̱ ki ku, ngu a ne̱ ne ba va nwie kre nne ki kwa va.
A zhe ne nne ringgwe̱ nna ri kya ne ngu ci ni, ngu a sa rie, aha nka Brrabe̱ ne e ki mie̱ng nna a ki ci aa hwie̱ nga we onu.
Bulu ngbe nné ne mbe shi ngbe ngu a mbe e̱ ngwie jirigi rishi a Pafo re nzhi Parrga a ngwie̱ Panfiliya, a nyi miimi ne Yohana a ya we we ning brru re nzhi Urrushelima.
Á ya ne̱ a Parrga re nzhi Antakyia na ngu shi dudu ne Pisidiya. Mbe e̱ ya ngwie a zonggrung mwe a Tung Srra Cwu mbe e̱ srra be.

A zhe ne mbe hwie krre̱de̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe na nné ti re̱se̱ng, ngbe nnencwueé zonggrung mwe mbe e̱ te re nzhi nwie mbe he, “Re-gimbe, kusu kundu nyi ri bi ya nka ne nyi ce̱ he nnéng aha nyi we shwe̱ rehwie, nyi he.”
Bulu a cinye̱ ngu a we nyi va. Wire ngu a he: “Nné Isrreela ngbe nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne nyi yé Be̱ne̱ mbè, nyi sa uucwu nyi ho!
Be̱ne̱ nné Isrreela i kyie yó nzhi; ngu a ci nné nzhi á ci piriri a zhe ne mbe i srra a ngwie̱ Masarr; ngu a ya wru mi ne mbe a ngwie̱ nna ne brra igbe̱ ngu.
Aa yaa rwe we rwe ne mbe he̱rri re-rie weje nshwa weni a tsi yi nwie ci nkwile̱ ne mbe.
Aa ci re-ngwie̱ natsie̱ a Kaana á ci shweni, ngu a ngwa nné ngu rebe mbe ré hwie̱ na mbe.
Ga re-ankya ana zhwozhwo fo re-rie weje nnywa weni ne nshwa wecwuoo.
“Wire Be̱ne̱ e̱ we ngwa nné nyi nka he̱rri re be zhe Samela nne ti re̱se̱ng.
Ngbe mbe e̱ ne̱ ne kre he ré we ngwa nggwe̱. Be̱ne̱ e̱ we ngwa nggwe̱ ne i ki ye he Shawulu, ewe Kish a nzhwe Benjemi, ne ngu i ye ringgwe̱ mbe re-rie nshwa weni.

A zhe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ti Shawulu a ringgwe̱, ngu a ci Dooda re hwie̱ nggwe̱ mbe; ngu a ngwa sheede a rici Dooda he, ‘Nje she ngu Dooda ewe Jese e̱ nyi zhwe nne na ne nje ce̱ a yarri hwie nje, a shi nyi ko nda ne nje ce̱ he re nyi.’
“A nyi a yarri nzhwe ngu Dooda ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning wru mi ne nné Isrreela Nnenkyia ne ngu nyi Jesu, ye̱ye̱rri ne jee ne ngu i sa.
A zhe ne Jesu rishi be, Yohana a brro ga nné Isrreela zhwozhwo nkang si ywe̱ ngbe batisma.

Re̱se̱ ne Yohana shi fro cwuo ngu, ngu a he ne nneywí he, ‘Nyi hwie shi nje ne̱ nje nyi nye̱ ma? Ko nyi nje ne nje nyi nne nke ana we̱. Aawo, ngu a cwo be a merin nje, ko ru tamri ngu ko nje be ngbe n bī we̱.’
“Re-gimbe, rewe Ibrrahin, ngbe nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne nyi to owu Be̱ne̱, a nyi nzhi ne e níng te mi ne nka kyia ne̱!
Ko nné Urrushelima ngbe nggwé̱ mbe e̱ i hu Jesu a he nyi Nnenkyia we̱, gbengbe ni yhwe̱ ne mbe ki yhwe̱ e̱ ci nti nka nné ti re̱se̱ng ne e yeri yeri hwieng ko zohu Otung Srra Cwu a ci rrurru.
Ko ngbe ne ko mbe she cwu kya ngu shi ci ré ki yhwe̱ we̱, á ra we he se Bilatu re ci ré ki yhwe̱.
A zhe ne mbe e ki nyi ko nda shi ne e wie a rici ngu, wire mbe e̱ ki cwucwu a gasankwe nna, á a ya ki nyie̱ a ria.
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki deze nhu.
Aa a fo rotu piriri ne nné mbe ne mbe i wru Galili re be Urrushelima ngbe ne ngu a mbe srra ré ki ri. A nyi mbe ne mbe hwie̱ re-sheede ngu a nwie nné nzhi.
“Nyi ngwiee nzhi níng brro Nka Rina he: kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ning sa yó nzhi jee e̱,
aa ci kya ana a ci rrurru a zhe nzhi — nzhi rewe mbe e̱, a Jesu ne ngu ki deze nhu. A shi shi kya ne e wie a ve Dooda na hwie he:
Ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ nyi Kowe nje,
a cwu ne̱, nje hwie̱ Be̱ ngwe̱.
Ngbe deze ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki deze nhu he de̱ re vi we̱ e̱, a i he he:
‘Ga re-mwo rina ne nje i ning sa Dooda jee,
ne ko bi kpo we̱ e̱, nje ri níng ngwa.’
Aha ni á wie a yaka ewie wa he:
‘Ko shi ngwe̱ we Nne Wiri ngwe̱ re vi we̱.’
“Me̱di re̱se̱ ne Dooda i nyi re-ankya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ a zhe na ngu a yhwe̱, ngu a hu, á ya ki nyie̱ a nwie ne e ning nyie̱ yó ngu, he̱rri kwe ngu a vi.
Me̱di nne nke ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki deze nhu ana, koo vi we̱.
“Aha nii, re-gimbe, nje ce̱ nyi hu he nyi aha Jesu ne e níng brro nkang we re-e̱ngwie̱ ne̱.
A bra nyi aha ngu ne ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a ngu a á ki ci aa ci tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ a yarri ko nda, ne we̱sa ni ko Nti Nka Musa ra ki ci re ci tsantsa we̱.
Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ kishi kya ne nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe i he ne̱ ri ci a rici nyi.
‘Nyi ri, nyi ne nyi dzie̱ kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu he,
nyi hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu, he̱rri nyi ci shweni!
Aha nje shi nwie nyi yankya a rotu nyi ne̱,
ne ko shi nyi shî we̱ ko ngbe ne ya nne e níng ting!’ ”
A zhe ne Bulu ngbe Barrnaba mbe shi wru a zonggrung mwe nna, nné nna á cwe nva ne mbe he re be a Tung Srra Cwu na ngu ning zhweng ngbe ré ya ning bra we brro re-nka ne̱ te̱nte̱ wa.

A zhe ne e cire nné nna, ngbe nné Yahudi ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ nke ne mbe zhwe teede nné Yahudi mbe e̱ zhwe Bulu ngbe Barrnaba; ngbe mbe Bulu a ya ning bra we he nka re we shwe̱ rehwie ré yo gangga a yarri ehwie rina Be̱ne̱.
Otung Srra Cwu he ngu ya grra ngu be, jie̱ nné ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo ya tsu nwie ho nka Brrabe̱.
A zhe ne nné Yahudi mbe ri nné mbe brri, rehwie mbe rro. Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ti onu ce ne kya ne Bulu shi heng nwie cwing.

Ngbe Bulu ngbe Barrnaba a we shing we dengge he, “Nka Be̱ne̱ ne̱ aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi ke̱she nzhi níng brro nying wire, me̱di tu ne nyi ra, nyi yaa fo he ko nyi be ngbe nyi she ce na he̱rri tiya we̱; mahu nzhi shi klu re nzhi nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.
Aha nka ne Brrabe̱ níng ngwa a nyi nke:
‘Nje re ci ngwe̱ hwie̱ nse̱ a nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱,
Aha ngbe ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo re she kyia.’ ”
Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ á ho ni, rehwie mbe kla mbe e̱ ngwa nka Brrabe̱ grime̱. Ngbe ga nné mbe ne e we kyie aha re she ce na he̱rri tiya a mbe e̱ sa rie.
Ngbe nka Brrabe̱ e̱ se̱ ngwie̱ yu a nkla nna zhwozhwo.

Me̱di nné Yahudi e̱ á cwua yá brrá mbrrú ngwie̱ nna na ne mbe yé Be̱ne̱ mbè ngbe yá brrá nné ne e ho ne mbe a ngwie̱ nna. Ngbe mbe e̱ ya cwua nneywí ré ne̱ ne ngwa Bulu ngbe Barrnaba cinci, he̱rri á we yu a nkla nna.
Aha ni nnenté e̱ á gbe̱ ruvu nta mbe ngbe re hwie̱ sheede a rici nné ngwie̱ nna. Mbe e̱ ne̱ re nzhi Ikoniya.
Ngbe nné ce̱ nka a Ikoniya mbe e̱ nyi rekwi we yang, á bra shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri.
A Ikoniya, Bulu ngbe Barrnaba á ya ngwie zonggrung mwe nné Yahudi, mbe e̱ he nka he̱rri nné Yahudi ngbe nné Heleni we yang á ning sa rie.
Me̱di nné Yahudi na mbe ra we ho nka á zhwe̱ Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ aha ngbe mbe we ci ré ci kanka ngbe ne re-gimbe.

Gbengbe ni Bulu ngbe Barrnaba á srra miimi rotu piriri nwie brro nka Brrabe̱ we dengge. Brrabe̱ we ngwa igbe̱ng nyi ngbá re-sheede ngbe re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu aha ngu ti he nka ehwie rina ngu ne mbe brro a nyi cence.
Nné ngwie̱ nna á yaa kye kanka, yá shi ngbe nné Yahudi, yá a shi ngbe ne nnenté.
Yá Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ngbe yá nné Yahudi mbe e̱ ya mwe onu ngbe ne nnencwueé mbe he mbe yarra nnenté nna mbe we ta ne rahwan.
Me̱di zhe ne nnenté nna mbe ya hu ni, mbe e̱ to re nzhi Likoniya, ngwie̱ ne ngu ning bi ngwie̱ Listrra ngbe Derribi ngbe yá re-nkla ne mbe ki grra.
Mbe e̱ ya brro Nka Rina a miimi.
Ya nne i srra a Listrra ne gannyi ngu ne e ki bî ne ku, nta ngu a shi brrubrru, koo sa cwo ciee we̱.
Aa sa uucwu nwie ho Bulu ngu shi he nka. Bulu a ki ri gbinnng, ngu a ri a bi sa rie he̱rri ngbe re she ci gbingbi.
Bulu a ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Deze ngwe̱ yo ne nta ngwe̱!” Nne nna a hru ngu a ne̱ ne cwo ciee.
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nné nna mbe ri kya ne Bulu ngu nyi, mbe e̱ kro nku a zhe nka mbe na Likoniya nwie he, “Re-be̱ne̱ e̱ be nwie nzhi a e̱kpe̱e̱ nneywi.”
Mbe e̱ ci Barrnaba lo he Ziyu, mbe e̱ ci Bulung he Heme, aha nyi ngu ngu nyi nggwe̱ nka.
Ngbe nne teede Ziyu ne brranyi ngu shi we teme ngwie̱ ngu a be mi ne re-izhimi ngbe ne rangra ne e nyi ne vooshwo
Me̱di zhe ne Barrnaba ngbe Bulu mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ srra re-ankya ci rwe̱ mbe, mbe e̱ rwi ta be re nzhi tsi nné nwie we kyie̱ he,

“A wene, rimi nyi shi nyi he ni e̱? Nzhi nyi we nneywí shi nyi ma. Nzhi níng be mi ne Nka Rina, nzhi níng ting he nyi we re-ankya shweni ne̱, nyi ning brru re be nwie Be̱ne̱ bi ce ne ngu nyi zinye̱, ngbe ebe ngwie̱, ngbe nzhwó rishi, ngbe ne ko nda ngu shi yarri mbe.
A re-zhe mbe wara, a i we nneywí a re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ko nye̱ re vie we rê ngu.

Me̱di koo sa we we̱sa ngwa sheede shî ngu we̱: aa níng ti ehwie rina ngu nwie níng ngwa nze, ne ngu wrú zinye̱ nwie wie, ngbe ankya ne nzhi kye̱, ne ko zohu a zhe ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri; a níng ngwá yâ ye piriri, a bra níng ci nyi shî ne ehwie kla.”
Ko ngbe ne re-nka ne̱, nnenté e̱ á ki she ne rwe̱ng ngbe mbe ci de̱ rigwe̱ nné nna re we nyi teede we̱.
Wire yá nné Yahudi ne mbe wru a Antakyia na nva Pisidiya ngbe a Ikoniya, mbe e̱ cwua rigwe̱ nné nna re be nwie na mbe. Ngbe mbe e̱ ta Bulu ne ngbatsie, á ki kwa re nzhi teme ngwie̱, á ra he ka aa hu.
Me̱di zhe ne nné ce̱ nka mbe ya ki grra, ngu a cinye̱ ngu a ning brru re nzhi yarri ngwie̱ nna. A otu na ngu ning zhweng, ngu ngbe Barrnaba mbe e̱ ne̱ re nzhi Derribi.
Bulu ngbe Barrnaba mbe e̱ brro Nka Rina a Derribi, he̱rri á she nné zhwe Jesu piriri. Wire mbe e̱ ning brru re nzhi Listrra, ngbe Ikoniya re nzhi wre̱ Antakyia na nva Pisidiya.
Á shwe̱ nné ce̱ nka rehwie aha ré ning bra ci igbe̱ nwie yo ne igbe̱ a kya ne mbe ning sa rie, nwie he ne mbe he, “Se nzhi shwe re-cinci we yang wire nzhi ngwie yarri Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Á kyié yá nné ne mbe bi sa rie ngbe we̱ we ci ré hwie̱ ekpri brrá nné a ko zohu ekpri nné ce̱ nka, ngbe wé̱ kú Be̱ne̱ ne rwe onu nwie we ngwa a nva Brrabe̱.
Á cie̱ a ngwie̱ Pisidiya re nzhi Panfiliya.
Mbe e̱ brro nka a Parrga, mbe e̱ wro re nzhi Ataliya.
Mbe e̱ ya deze a miimi a jirigi rishi re nzhi Antakyia, ewie ne i ku Be̱ne̱ aha mbe ne e we ngwa a nva Be̱ne̱ ngbe ehwie rina ngu re shi ngbe mbe a cwuo ne mbe fro ne̱.
We ne mbe ya cwu miimi, mbe e̱ tsu ekpri nné ce̱ nka, mbe e̱ we ti kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi ne mbe, ngbe rê ne ngu ning kla rê ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ré ning sa rie.
Mbe e̱ ci zhe we yang nwie srra ngbe nné ce̱ nka a miimi.
Yá nné ne mbe wru Yahudi re be Antakyia á ya ne̱ mie̱ re-gimbe nka he kundu de̱ ne e we ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka Musa we̱, ko shi ré she kyia we̱.

Nka nna a ci Bulu ngbe Barrnaba á ci kanka ngbe ne nné nna nwie yaa nyi ronu ce zinzinzi. Aha nii, á a ci Bulu ngbe Barrnaba ngbe yá kpi nné ce̱ nka ré ywa Urrushelima ré ya ri nnenté ngbe brrá nné aha ngbe ré ya cwue̱ nka nna.
Ekpri nné ce̱ nka a we cire. A zhe ne mbe shi ciee a Finikyia ngbe Samariya, á we ti zhwe bra ne mbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ mbe bra re be nwie Be̱ne̱. Nka nna a kla ga re-gimbe rehwie.
A zhe ne mbe ya wre̱ Urrushelima, ekpri nné ce̱ nka, ngbe nnenté, ngbe brrá nné á we se̱ ne rekwi, mbe e̱ we ti ko nda ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi ne mbe.
Ngbe yá nné ce̱ nka na ekpri nné Farisi mbe e̱ cinye̱ nwie he, “Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ca Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó ngbe ré bra zhwe Nti Nka Musa.”
Nnenté ngbe brrá nné e̱ mwe aha mbe cwue̱ nka nna.

A zhe ne mbe he re-nka nwie yaa ti ronu ce we yang, Pita a deze ngu a he, “Re-gimbe nje, nyi hu re̱se̱ng he a rotu ncwuee, Be̱ne̱ i ning kyie a tsi nyi aha ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ré ho Nka Rina a a nu nje ré bra ning sa rie.
Be̱ne̱ ne ngu hu onu rie ko nye̱ e̱ ti he ngu we se̱, aha aa we ngwa Nshe Wiri, we shi ne ngu níng ngwa nzhi e̱.
Koo we fo shi á shi ka ne nzhi we̱, aha aa kyu ronu rie mbe aha sa rie mbe.
Aha ni ma nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi ce̱ mwa Be̱ne̱ ri, nwie gara nné zhwe Brrabe̱ e̱ nkpe ne ko ngbe yó nzhi, ngbe nzhi e̱, ko nzhi hung kpeng we̱ e̱e̱?
Aawo! Nzhi bi sa rie he nyi aha ehwie rina Brrabe̱ Jesu ne nzhi she kyia, we shi mbe e̱ ma.”
Ngbe ga nné nna mbe e̱ dzie̱ cereng nwie ho Barrnaba ngbe Bulu mbe ti zhwe ngbá re-sheede ngbe re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi a tsi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne mbe.
A zhe ne mbe he yhwe̱, Yakubu a he: “Re-gimbe, nyi ho nka nje ne̱!
Sima a níng ti re̱se̱ zhwe rê ne Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu ngu ke̱she ning kyie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ré hwie̱ nné na ngu.
Nka ne̱ e̱ ngwie ye̱ye̱rri ne nti nka nné ti re̱se̱ng, shi ne e wie he,
‘Wire a merin re-nke ne̱, ma n bra ning brru re be
ma n ya no ndu Dooda ne ngu gu.
Ma n no re-ibe̱ nna te̱nte̱,
ma n ki ci re yo ne igbe̱.
Aha ngbe ga kpi nneywí e̱ ré ning kre, nje Brrabe̱ e̱ —
ga nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne nje we ye ré hwie̱ na nje.
Kya ne Brrabe̱ i he gannyi we gbangba aha ré hu a nyi ngwiee.’
“Aha nii, a ri nje, koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi ci Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne mbe shi nwie klu re be nwie Be̱ne̱ re we bi rwe̱ we̱.
Me̱di nzhi we wie krre̱de̱ he de̱ ré ye yâ na ne e ngwá kpanshwu we̱, aha ko shi wiri a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱, ré we ni e̱ngwie̱ njè, ré we ni ye rine̱ kya ne e ki ci cwue ci ci, ré we ni ye roshwo.
Aha á nyi ne hwie krre̱de̱ Nti Nka Musa a tu we gbangba a re-zonggrung mwe a ko zohu Kotung Srra Cwu, á bra brro nka nna a ko zohu ngwie̱.”

Wire nnenté, ngbe brrá nné ngbe ekpri nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo mbe e̱ shî he aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri mbe trru yá nné a tsi ekpri na mbe, mbe we te re nzhi Antakyia ngbe Bulu ngbe Barrnaba. Mbe e̱ kyie Yahuda ne e ki ye Barrsaba ngbe Sila ne mbe shi tsi nnencwueé nné ce̱ nka.
Krre̱de̱ ne e we te mi e̱ he:
“Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie nnenté ngbe brrá nné — re-gimbe nyi, re nzhi nwie nné ce̱ nka a yarri Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ a ngwie̱ Antakyia, ngbe Sirriya ngbe a Kyilikyia:
“Nzhi níng dzie.
Nzhi ho he yá nné ne mbe i wru nwie nzhi ne ko nzhi we te we̱, á ya ne̱ ne níng krre a yarri rehwie nyi ne re-nka, nwie níng ci re níng ci zhizhi.
Kya a nyi ngwiee nzhi mwe zhwozhwo ne onu zrru nzhi e̱ kyie yá nné a tsi nzhi, nzhi we te re be nwie nyi ngbe ne brrá rwí nzhi, Barrnaba ngbe Bulu —
mbe ne mbe ngwa nci mbe aha lo Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi.
Aha ni nzhi te Yahuda ngbe Sila ngbe mbe aha ré ya ning bra níng ti kya ne nzhi wie ne̱ ne ronu mbe.
A shi ye̱ye̱rri a nwie Nshe Wiri ngbe nwie nzhi e̱ ma he de̱ nzhi níng ngwa ya nkpe ruvo we̱, se we nti nka nke ne mbe mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi zhwe:
shi de̱ nyi ye yâ ne e wru mi nwie teede kpanshwu we̱, ka nyi ye roshwo, ka rine̱ kya ne e ki ci cwue ci ci we̱; de̱ nyi bra nyi e̱ngwie̱ nje we̱, wire nyi e̱ nyi ye̱ye̱rri fa.
Nyi hwie̱ srra rina!”
Á cire nné ne e we te e̱ ngbe mbe e̱ ywa Antakyia, mbe e̱ ya ye rotsu nné ce̱ nka gbengbe, mbe e̱ we ngwa krre̱de̱ nna.
A zhe ne nné nna mbe hwie krre̱de̱ nna, rehwie mbe kla aha nka nna ning bra we shwe̱ rehwie.
Yahuda ngbe Sila ne we nci mbe e̱ mbe nyi nné ti re̱se̱ng e̱, mbe e̱ we he nka we yang aha mbe we shwe̱ rehwie ngbe ré ning bra she igbe̱.
A zhe ne mbe ning bra ya rotu a miimi, á a we cire rina rina. Wire mbe e̱ ning brru re be nwie nné ne mbe we te e̱. [
Me̱di Sila a hwie̱ miimi.]
Bulu ngbe Barrnaba á a hwie̱ srra we Antakyia a miimi nwie mie̱ nka ré brro Nka Rina Brrabe̱ ngbe yá nné piriri.
Ya zhe he ngu a grra, Bulu a he ne Barrnaba he, “Ning be nzhi ya grra a ga re-ngwie̱ ne nzhi ning brro nka Brrabe̱ ngbe nzhi dzie re-gimbe nzhi ri ka á shi nyi rimi ye̱.”
Barrnaba a ce̱ fo Yohana ne e ki ye he Marrku re we zhwe.
Me̱di Bulu a hwie he ko shi re shi ye̱ye̱rri mbe ki fo we̱ aha Yohana i to we we a ngwie̱ Pamfiliya, ko i ce̱ ywa ncwuo ngbe mbe we̱.
Onu ce e̱ ngwie yarri mbe gbangba he̱rri á yaa kye kanka. Barrnaba a fo Marrku mbe e̱ ngwie jirigi rishi re nzhi Kuprru,
me̱di Bulu kyie Sila; re-gimbe e̱ we ngwa a nva Brrabe̱ ngbe ehwie rina ngu re shi ngbe mbe, mbe e̱ ne̱.
Ngu a ciga re-ngwie̱ Sirriya ngbe Kyilikyia nwie ci rekpri nné ce̱ nka ré ning bra ci igbe̱.
Bulu a ya cwu Derribi ngu a ya wara re be Listrra, ewie ne ya nne zhwe Brrabe̱ ne e ki ye he Timoti ngu ning srra; de̱ ngu a nyi mbrru Yahudi a bra ce̱ nka, me̱di be̱ ngu a nyi nne Heleni.
Ga nné ce̱ nka a Listrra ngbe Ikoniya a á ngwa sheede rina a rici Timoti e̱.
Bulu ce̱ ki fo a ciee nna, ngu a ke̱she ki cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó wire aha ga nné Yahudi ne mbe srra a re-ngwie̱ nna á hu he be̱ Timoti e̱ nyi nné Heleni.
Re̱se̱ ne mbe shi ciee nwie grra re-ngwie̱, á ti nneywí nti nka ne nnenté ngbe brrá nné ce̱ nka a Urrushelima mbe i ngwa, aha ngbe nneywí ré zhwe.
Aha ni rekpri nné ce̱ nka á ning bra she igbe̱ a yarri ce̱ nka, á ning bra ci piriri ko zohu otu.
Bulu ngbe re-nda ngu a mbe e̱ grra re-ngwie̱ Frrijiya ngbe Galati zhwozhwo, aha ko Nshe Wiri we shing ngbe ré brro nka a ngwie̱ Asia we̱.
Me̱di zhe ne mbe ya cwu gama ngwie̱ Misiya, mbe e̱ ce̱ ngwie a ngwie̱ Bitiniya, me̱di ko Nshe Jesu we we ré ywa we̱.
Aha ni mbe e̱ cie̱ a Misiya mbe e̱ wro re nzhi wre̱ Tarruwasa.
A totu tung nna, Bulu a ria revi he ya nne Makyidoniya yó re cwe nva ne ngu he, “Be Makyidoniya ngwe̱ ya níng sheng!”
A zhe ne Bulu ngu ri a revi ni, nzhi e̱ wre̱ ne kre rêng ne̱ re nzhi Makyidoniya, aha nzhi hu cence he nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ye he nzhi ya brro nné miimi Nka Rina.
Nzhi deze a Tarruwasa nzhi e̱ ngwie jirigi rishi, nzhi e̱ tsa re nzhi Samotrresi. Nzhi e̱ ya wara a tu na ngu ning zhweng re nzhi Niyapoli.
A miimi nzhi e̱ ya pie ciee re nzhi Filibi, ne ngu nyi brra ngwie̱ a Makyidoniya ne ngu i shi tahwie ringgwe̱ nné Rroma. Nzhi e̱ ya ci e̱we̱ rotu a miimi.
A Tung Srra Cwu, nzhi e̱ ya wru a brra onusinye ngwie̱ nna re nzhi nu nce, nzhi ra he ka nzhi cwo a she bi ewieng ku Be̱ne̱ nné Yahudi. Nzhi e̱ srra be nwie he nka ngbe mbrrú ne mbe tsu a miimi.

Ya mbe ne ngu sa uucwu nwie ho nka nzhi e̱ nyi ya mbrru rie̱ re-trro shwo bi ncwé̱ ne e ki ye he Lidiya ne ngu wru a ngwie̱ Tiyatirra. Mbrru nna yé Be̱ne̱ mbè. Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki kla onu rie ngu ngbe re hu re̱se̱ng, ngu a sa uucwu nwie ho kya ne Bulu he.

A zhe ne e ki nyi batisma ngbe nné ri ngu, ngu a níng ye re be ta ri ngu, ngu a he, “Kundu nyi ri ning fo he nje hwie̱ nne ce̱ nka Brrabe̱ cence, nyi e̱ ngwie ta ri nje ngbe nyi srra he.” Ngu a ning ci he̱rri nzhi shî.

Ngbe a ya otu ne nzhi nyia re nzhi nwieng ku Be̱ne̱, nzhi e̱ ya cigerri ne ya ewena hwie ne ngu bi rije na ngu ki ci re hung ti kya ne ngu cwo a ci a ncwuee. He̱rri re-nka ngu a á hwie̱ rê ne re-be̱ri ngu a á ning she ncwé̱ we yang.
Ewena nna zhwé Bulu ga ngbe nzhi e̱ zhwozhwo nwie kyie̱ onu he, “Nné mbe rre̱ á nyi hwié Be̱ne̱ Bi Grime̱ Re Ne̱ Zhwozhwo. Á shi níng ti rêng she kyia!”
Aa fo rotu we yang nwie nyi ni. He̱rri ehwie Bulu ya dzio, ngu a bra ngu a he ne rije nna he, “A yarri lo Jesu Krristi nje he ngwe̱ wru yarri ngu!” We zhe nna rije e̱ wru.
A zhe ne re-be̱ri ngu a mbe ri rêng she ncwé̱ mbe e̱ hwie̱n, mbe e̱ pie Bulu ngbe Sila, mbe e̱ we kwa he̱rri re nzhi nwie nné nyi nka a nu kaawe̱.
Á be ne mbe a nyyi brrá nné nyi nka, mbe e̱ he, “Nné mbe rre̱ á nyi nné Yahudi, á bra ce̱ deze ne ko a yarri ngwie̱ nzhi.
Á shi nwie mie̱ nneywí yá re-teede ne ko mbe shi ye̱ye̱rri ne nti nkang nyi nka nzhi we̱, nzhi nyi nné Rroma ko shi nzhi se̱ zhwe re-teede ana nzhi ning nyi cwuo we̱.”
Ngbe rigwe̱ nné e̱ a ya tu a rici Bulu ngbe Sila; brrá nné nyi nka a ci he re we trru ankya re we cwe.
A zhe ne e we kra we kra we kra, á a we ci a uucwu gyiaa, á a ci nne cwong nna re we cwo rina rina.
Re̱se̱ ne nne cwong nna ho nka ne̱ ni, ngu a we she̱ a uucwu gyiaa na yarri yarring, ngu a we rrwe nta a ekpri nkwe.
Me̱di a brra tsi totu ne Bulu ngbe Sila mbe shi ku Be̱ne̱ nwie ce̱ re-veng de Be̱ne̱, kpi nné gyiaa nna mbe e̱ shi nwie we ho.
We kpri, ebe ngwie̱ e̱ gbe̱ gbururu he̱rri uucwu gyiaa nna a gbe̱ ya cwu we riti runo nna. We zhe zunzrru, ronusinye uucwu gyiaa a kla wanwanwa, ko nye̱ e̱ timi ne re-gyiaa ngu wrru.
Nne cwo uucwu gyiaa he ngu shwo ndzie ngu timi ne ronusinye e shi gang, ngu a fie̱ ise̱nkeli he ngu shi yaa yhwe̱, aha ne ngu ra he ka ga nné gyiaa nna á to.
Me̱di Bulu a ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ yaa yhwe̱ we̱! Nzhi ning shi zhwozhwo nzhi!”
Nne cwo uucwu gyiaa ngu a ci he ré be mi ne re-ro, ngu a ngwie ne ncii ngu a ya kpe a nyyi Bulu ngbe Sila nwie tsi rwe̱ gbe̱gbe̱gbe̱.
Ngu a we kwa re be ci, ngu a we rinng he, “A mbe be̱ri, nyi nda ne nje shi nying ngbe n she kyia a?”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Sa rie a Brrabe̱ Jesu, ngbe ngwe̱ e̱ she ce — ngwe̱ ngbe nné nva ngwe̱ e̱.”
Wire mbe e̱ ki brro nka Brrabe̱ ngbe kpi nné nva ngu zhwozhwo.
We zhe totu ana, aa we ko ngu a ya we kyu ngbé̱ nna, ngbe á a wre̱ ne ki nyi batisma ngbe nné nva ngu zhwozhwo.
Ngu a fo Bulu ngbe Sila re nzhi ta ri ngu, ngu a ya we ngwa yâ ré ye. Ehwie ngu a kla aha ne ngu sa rie a Be̱ne̱ — ngu ngbe ne nné nva ngu a zhwozhwo.
Mincwe he ngu kla, ngbe brrá nné nyi nka mbe e̱ te re-polisi re nzhi nwie nne cwo uucwu gyiaa nna he re cire nné ana.
Ngbe nne cwo uucwu gyiaa nna ngu a he ne Bulu he, “Brrá nné nyi nka a á ngwa nka he ré re we ngwe̱ ngbe Sila nyi ne̱. Aha ni nyi e̱ hung wrru we zhe ne ne̱ nyi ne̱; ywa nyi e̱ ngwie rina.”

Me̱di Bulu he ne mbe he: “Á níng cwe a nyyi nneywí we̱sa ne níng nyi nka wire, ko ngbe ne nzhi nyi nné Rroma ma, he̱rri á níng ko níng ci a uucwu gyiaa. Wire a zhe ne ne̱ á bra ce̱ níng trru ranranng a? Aawo, ko shi ni we̱; se mbe e̱ ré be we nci mbe ré ya níng cire.”
Re-polisi mbe e̱ ning brru mbe e̱ ya ti brrá nné nyi nkang, a zhe ne mbe ho he Bulu ngbe Sila a á nyi nné Rroma, owu we yhwe̱.
Ngbe mbe e̱ ywa mbe e̱ ya cwe nva ne mbe ré ci nkwirin, wire mbe e̱ we trru a gyiaa nna re be ci, mbe e̱ he ne mbe he ré ne̱ a ngwie̱ nna.
A zhe ne Bulu ngbe Sila mbe wru a gyiaa nna, mbe e̱ ywa a ri Lidiya, mbe e̱ ya she re-gimbe zhwozhwo a miimi. Mbe e̱ we shwe̱ rehwie, wire mbe e̱ ne̱ fa.
A zhe ne mbe ya cie̱ a Anfipoli ngbe Apoloniya, á ya wre̱ a Tasalonika ne ngu ning bi zonggrung mwe nné Yahudi.
Bulu a ne̱ re nzhi zonggrung mwe shi ne ngu ning mrrang. A Rotung Srra Cwu wetsie̱, a cwo he nka ngbe ne mbe a yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱,
nwie we mie̱ng ne ngu ning bra we kla rici ré hu he á wie he se Krristi re shwe cinci re bra vu a nhu. A he ne mbe he, “Ngu Jesu ne nje níng he nka ne̱ nyi ngu ngu nyi Krristi nna.”
Yá nné Yahudi nna á shî mbe e̱ mwe ngbe ne Bulu ngbe Sila we shi nné Heleni na ne mbe to owu Be̱ne̱ piriri, he̱rri ngbe brrá mbrrú we yang.

Me̱di yá nné Yahudi e̱ rehwie mbe rro aha ni, mbe e̱ tsu yá reweng wu a kaawe̱ á ci ngba ekpri he ré deze ne re̱zhe̱ a yarri ngwie̱ nna. Mbe e̱ ngwie a ri Yaso kprokprokpro nwie kre Bulu ngbe Sila aha mbe be ne mbe a nwie rotsu nné.

Me̱di koó ya we she we̱, mbe e̱ pie Yaso mbe e̱ ki kwa ngbe ne yá re-gimbe re be nwie brrá nné ngwie̱ nwie kyie̱ ronu he, “Nné mbe rre̱ á krre ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ zhwozhwo, nyi ngwiee mbe e̱ wre̱ ngwie̱ nzhi he ne̱,
he̱rri Yaso we sa tari ngu. Á hle̱ nti nka Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma nwie mie̱ nneywíng he bi yaka nggwe̱ ne e ki ye he Jesu.”
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nné ngwie̱ nna ngbe brrá nné ngwie̱ mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ rwi re̱zhe̱.
Mbe e̱ ci Yaso ngbe kpi nné nna ré ngwa ncwe̱, wire mbe e̱ we cire.
We ne totu shi ci we ci, ngbe re-gimbe e̱ wre̱ ne ci Bulu ngbe Sila ré ne̱ re nzhi Birriya. A zhe ne mbe ya cwu, mbe e̱ ya ngwie zonggrung mwe nné Yahudi.
Nné Birriya a á shi wang re ne̱ nné Tasalonika, aha á we shi we te̱te̱ he mbe ho nka nna, he̱rri á ne̱ ne hwie Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ko zohu otu aha ngbe mbe ri ka kya ne Bulu ngu he e̱ nyi cence.
Nné Yahudi piriri e̱ sa rie, we shi brrá mbrrú ngbe nné ntó we yang a tsi nné Heleni.
Me̱di re̱se̱ ne nné Yahudi ne mbe shi Tasalonika mbe ya ho he Bulu shi nwie brro nka Be̱ne̱ a Birriya, mbe e̱ ywa miimi wa, mbe e̱ ya ne̱ ne cwua ekpri nné ré deze ne re̱zhe̱.
Ngbe re-gimbe e̱ wre̱ ne ci Bulu re ne̱ re nzhi rekyi brra nzhwo rishi, Sila ngbe Timoti e̱ hwie̱ ka srra a Birriya.
Nné ne mbe ya cire Bulu a á ya cwu mi ne ngu a ngwie̱ Atina wire mbe ning brru re be Birriya. Bulu a we te he ré ya he Sila ngbe Timoti ré wre̱ ne ya ki she we hwiehwie.
A zhe ne Bulu shi nwie we tsio a Atina, ehwie ngu a furu we yang aha rigwe̱ re-kpanshwu ne ngu ri a ngwie̱ nna.
Aha ni ngu a ya ngwie cwue̱ re-nka a zonggrung mwe ngbe ne nné Yahudi ngbe yá nné Heleni ne mbe yé Be̱ne̱ mbè. Ko zohu otu á mwé ngbe nné a kaawe̱ nwie cwue̱ re-nka ngbe mbe.
Ngbe yá re-shwa zentsi na nka Epikurriya
Yá mbe e̱ he wa he, “Shi shi a shi nka ne yá re-be̱ne̱ na yá re-ngwie̱.” (Á he ni aha ne Bulu shi nwie brro Nka Rina Jesu ngbe deze nhu
Wire mbe e̱ fo Bulu re be mi a nwie rotsu ngwie̱ a Ngbra Arresa, mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nzhi ce̱ ning bra hu nka hwi ne ngwe̱ shi mie̱ nneywíng ne̱.
Yá re-ankya ne nzhi ho ngwe̱ he ne̱ á nyi ankya hwi, nzhi ce̱ ning bra hung.”
(Ga nné Atina zhwozhwo ngbe nné ice ne mbe srra miimi á kre we he mbe srra re ho re-ankya hwi re kprre rabrra a zeteng re ne̱ ko nda.)
Bulu a deze e yo yo a nyyi rotsu nna, ngu a he, “Nné Atina, nje shwe̱ riyii nje ri ko he a ngwie̱ nyi ne̱ nje e̱ ri nyi nyi nné zhwe teede we yang.

Aha a zhe ne nje shi grra, nje e̱ ri re-ankya ne nyi we yé mbè, he̱rri nje ya she ya zahwanng nyi teede ne e ning wieng he, ‘Nke e̱ nyi na Be̱ne̱ na ne koó ki hu we̱.’ Ngwiee ne nyi ki ye mbè we̱sa ne ki hu ana, nyi ngu ne nje ning brrong ne̱.
“Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi ebe ngwie̱ ngbe ko nda ne ngu ning shi e̱ nyi ngu ngu nyi Brrabe̱ zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱, ko srra a re-brranyi ne nneywí mbe no ne nva mbe we̱.
Ko shi nva nneywi re hung ki nyi kya ne ngu ce̱ we̱, aha nyi ngu we rici ngu ne ngu ngwá ko nye̱ ce ngbe nshe ne ngu she, ngu bra ngwá ko nye̱ ko nda.
Ne nne zunzrru ne ngu nyi, aa ning wru mi ne nneywí a brrá re-ngwie̱ he ngbe ré shî ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo; a bra nyi ngu we rici ngu ne ngu we sa re-zhe ngbe rewie ne mbe ning srra.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi ni aha ngbe nneywí ré ki kre, de̱e̱nte̱ wo ka ré ki she. Gbengbe ni ma, ko bra shi gbong ne ko nye̱ nzhi we̱;
shi ne e he,
‘Nyi aha ngu ne nzhi srra nce, nzhi gye̱ re̱gye̱,
nzhi bra shi shi ne nzhi ning shî ne̱.’
We shi ne yá nné ve ve nyi mbe he,
‘Nzhi e̱ ma nzhi nyi rewe ngu.’
Aha nii, tu ne nzhi nyi rewe Be̱ne̱, shi de̱ nzhi hwie he shî ngu a shi shi na zinarriya ka azrrufa ka zahwan ne nneywi ngu nyi ne va ngu ngbe zentsi ngu we̱.
A re-zhe ne mbe wara, ko Be̱ne̱ i ci nkwile̱ ne re-ankya ne nneywí mbe i nyi a yarri riywe̱ hung we̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ aa ngwa nka he nneywí ko he ré si ywe̱.
Aha aa a sa otu ne ngu shi ning nyi ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo nka a yarri redziee ne nne nke ne ngu kyie. Aa ngwa nneywí zhwozhwo sheede nna a deze ne ngu ki deze nhu.”
A zhe ne mbe ho Bulu ngu he nka aha deze nhu, yá mbe e̱ ne̱ ne ning kwa hwie̱n, me̱di yá mbe he, “Nzhi ce̱ ning bra ho nka ne̱ te̱nte̱ wa.”
Wire Bulu a ne̱ a nwie rotsu nna.
Me̱di yá mbe ne̱ ne mbe ki zhwe he̱rri á sa rie Brrabe̱. A tsi mbe e̱ a bi Diyonisu ne ngu shi a yarri rotsu Arresa, ngbe ya mbrru ne e ki ye he Damarri, ngbe yá kpi mbe wa.
Wire Bulu a deze a Atina re nzhi Korrinti.

Ngu a ya she ya nne Yahudi a miimi ne e ki ye he Akyila, ne ngu nyi nne Pontu, ngu wru a ngwie̱ Italiya we zheng nna ngbe mbrru ngu Prriska, aha ne brra nggwe̱ Kladiyu ngu ngwa nka he nné Yahudi zhwozhwo ré we ngwie̱ Rroma. Bulu a ne̱ re nzhi we ri.
Aa ya srra nwie nyi cwuo miimi ngbe mbe aha ga mbe e̱ á nyi nné nyi re-ndu.
Ko zohu Otung Srra Cwu, a cwo cwue̱ nka ngbe ne nné Yahudi ngbe nné Heleni aha ngbe ngu we ci ré sa rie.
A zhe ne Sila ngbe Timoti mbe wru Makyidoniya mbe e̱ wre̱, Bulu a tu we rici nwie brro nka re ti nné Yahuding he nyi Jesu ngu nyi Krristi.

Me̱di zhe ne nné Yahudi mbe ne̱ ne ki ti onu ce ne ren nwie ki cwi, ngu a gbe̱ ruvu tago ngu, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Nde le̱e̱kyi roshwo nyi re hwie̱ we nci nyi! Nje e̱ rici nje ngroo! Kya ngu pie a zhe ne ne, nje shi ne̱ re nzhi we nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.”
Wire ngu a wru miimi ngu a ngwie a ri ya nne ne e ki ye he Titiyu Yustu ne ngu nyi nne ye Be̱ne̱ mbè, eri ngu a shi dudu ne zonggrung mwe nna.
Krrispu ne ngu nyi nnencwuee na zonggrung mwe ngbe nné nva ngu zhwozhwo mbe e̱ sa rie a Brrabe̱; ga ngbe nné Korrinti piriri ne mbe ho nka Bulu a á sa rie he̱rri á we nyi batisma.
A ya totu Be̱ne̱ e̱ he nka ne Bulu a yarri revi he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci owu we̱, ke̱ we ne brro nka, de̱ ngwe̱ we ni we̱.
Aha nje shi ngbe ngwe̱, ko bi nne re hung kpe ngwe̱ re re nyi yankya we̱, aha nje bi nné piriri a ngwie̱ he ne̱.”
Aha ni Bulu a srra miimi he̱rri rie zunzrru ne kpirring nwie we mie̱ nka Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne nné Rroma mbe ya ngwa Galiyo ringgwe̱ ngwie̱ Akaya, nné Yahudi e̱ ya mwe onu mbe e̱ ya kpe a Bulu mbe e̱ ki fo re nzhi nwie nné nyi nka.
Mbe e̱ he, “Nne ne̱ shi nwie cwua nneywí ré ye Be̱ne̱ mbè a rê na ne ko ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka we̱!”
We zhe ne Bulu ce̱ bra nka, Galiyo a he ne nné Yahudi he, “Kundu nyi nné Yahudi e̱ nyi rā bi nka aha ya e̱we̱ vini ka ya ngba yankya me̱nkye̱ ne ngu nyi, wire nje rā bi zheng ho nka nyi ne̱.
Me̱di tu ne ngu nyi we onu ce a zete yá re-nka ngbe re-lo ankya teede nti nka na nyi, nyi cwue̱ nka nna we nci nyi. Ko nje ce̱ nyi nka a zete zhwe re-ankya ana we̱.”
Ngu a we yu a zonggrung nyi nka nna.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo mbe e̱ bra a rici Sositene ne ngu nyi nnencwuee na zonggrung mwe, mbe e̱ ki cwe a nwie zonggrung nyi nka nna. Me̱di ko Galiyo ci nkwile̱ ne mbe gung we̱.

Bulu a ci rotu nwie srra ngbe re-gimbe a Korrinti, wire ngu a we we ngu a ngwie a jirigi rishi re nzhi Sirriya ngbe ne Prriska ngbe Akyila. Ne mbe rishi deze, Bulu ngu a ya cwuku rici a Kenkrra ye̱ye̱rri ne jee ne ngu i sa.
Ngbe mbe e̱ ya cwu Afisa, Bulu a we Prriska ngbe Akyila a miimi. Ngu a ngwie a zonggrung mwe ngu a ya ne̱ ne cwue̱ nka ngbe yá nné Yahudi.
Yá mbe e̱ he ne ngu he re ning bra ci rotu ngbe mbe, me̱di koo shî we̱.
A zhe ne ngu re nyia, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Kundu Be̱ne̱ ri shî, ma n ya ning brru re be wa.” Wire ngu a deze a Afisa a jirigi rishi.
A zhe ne ngu ya cwu Kesariya, ngu a cwugu re nzhi dzie ekpri nné ce̱ nka a Urrushelima, wire ngu ya wro re nzhi Antakyia.
A zhe ne ngu ya ci e̱we̱ zhe a Antakyia, ngu a wara a miimi nwie grra re-nkla Galati ngbe Frrijiya re ci nné ce̱ nka ré ning bra she igbe̱.
A zhe nna, ya nne Yahudi ne e ki ye he Apolo ne i ki bî a ngwie̱ Alezandrra a be Afisa. A nyi nne hung he nka rina rina, a bra bi hu re̱se̱ Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ kpe̱kpe̱.
Á ki mie̱ nka a yarri rê na Brrabe̱; aha ehwie ngu yhwi, ngu a ne̱ ne brro nka re mie̱ nneywí nka Jesu ye̱ye̱rri; me̱di bra nyi we batisma ne Yohana i nyi nneywíng ne ngu hu.
Ngu a ne̱ ne he nka we dengge a zonggrung mwe. A zhe ne Prriska ngbe Akyila mbe ya ho, mbe e̱ ki ye re be ta ri mbe, mbe e̱ ya ning bra ki ti re-ankya na rê Be̱ne̱ tsantsa.

Re̱se̱ ne Apolo ce̱ tsa re nzhi Akaya, ngbe re-gimbe e̱ ki shwe̱ ehwie, mbe e̱ wie krre̱de̱ e̱ ki ngwa re nzhi nwie nné zhwe Brrabe̱ na miimi he ré ki se̱ ne rekwi. A zhe ne ngu ya cwu, ngu a ya ne̱ ne she nné mbe ne ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ e̱ we sheng he̱rri mbe sa rie.
Ne ngbá re-nka ngu a, aa nyi onu ce ngbe ne nné Yahudi a nyyi nneywí ne ngu we ting a yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he Jesu a nyi Krristi he̱rri aa we drre̱.
A zhe ne Apolo ka shi a Korrinti, Bulu a cie̱ we yarri ngwie̱ nna ngu a ya wro re be wre̱ Afisa. Ngu a ya she yá nné zhwe Brrabe̱ a miimi.
Ngu a we rinng he, “Nyi i she Nshe Wiri a zhe ne nyi i sa rie a Brrabe̱ e̱e̱?”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Aawo, ko nzhi sa ho he bi Nshe Wiri we̱.”
Bulu a we rinng wa he, “Ma nyi zohu zhwe batisma ne e níng nying nna?”
Mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “A nyi zhwe batisma na Yohana.”
Bulu a he ne mbe he, “E̱i Yohana i nyi batisma ana aha ngbe nneywí ré si ywe̱. A i ti nneywíng nna he ré sa rie a nne nke ne ngu cwo be, a nyi Jesu ngu i ning he nka ana.”
A zhe ne mbe ho ni, á a we nyi batisma a yarri lo Brrabe̱ Jesu.
Ngbe Bulu a we gara nva ngu, Nshe Wiri e̱ be a mbe, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne he nka ne yaká re-le nwie ti nné re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱.
Zhwozhwo nné nna wé̱ hung cwu shwa ne otu wehwie.
Bulu a ngwie a zonggrung mwe; aa fo nyhwe̱ wetsie̱ ne ngu he nneywí nka we dengge ne ngu nyi onu ce ngbe mbe nwie we ci ré shî nka Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.

Me̱di yá mbe klo nci, á ra ning sa rie a nka ngu, he̱rri á ne̱ ne he re-nka me̱nkye̱ aha Rê Brrabe̱ a nyyi ko nye̱. Aha ni, Bulu a we we, ngu a ne̱ ngbe ne nné zhwe Brrabe̱, ngu a ya ne̱ ne srra re mie̱ nka ko zohu otu
Aa ci re-rie wehwie nwie nyi we ni, he̱rri nné a ngwie̱ Asia zhwozhwo — nné Yahudi ngbe nné Heleni — á ho nka Brrabe̱.
Be̱ne̱ nyi ngbá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne Bulu,
he̱rri ko we nva trrong yi riyii ngbe re-tago ne mbe ria rwe̱ ngu, á ywa mi nwie nné ruhu he̱rri á ci gbingbi, ga ngbe re-rije mbe wrru.
Ngbe yá nné Yahudi ne mbe gye̱ re trru re-rije, mbe e̱ ya mwa he mbe shi trru yá re-rije ne lo Brrabe̱ Jesu. Mbe e̱ he, “A yarri lo Jesu ne Bulu ning brro nka ne̱, nje he ne nyi he nyi wrru.”
Nné nyi zhwe ngge ne̱ i nyi rewe Siva komo natsie̱ ne be̱ mbe nyi Brra Prristi.
Me̱di a ya otu, rije e̱ we shing he, “Nje hu Jesu, nje bra hu Bulu, ma nyi e̱ nyi nyi mbe nye̱?”
Ngbe nne bi rije e̱ cinye̱ ngu a ngra mbe, aa shwe igbe̱ mbe zhwozhwo, he̱rri á to free free ne ngu we ti re-ruhu.
A zhe ne ga nné Yahudi ngbe nné Heleni ne mbe srra a Afisa mbe ya ho ni, owu we prre; ngbe mbe e̱ ngwa lo Brrabe̱ Jesu grime̱ we yang.
Nné piriri ne mbe sa rie a Brrabe̱ mbe e̱ wru we gbeng mbe e̱ he re-ngwie̱ngwie̱ mbe ne mbe nyi.

Nné nyi ankya krrootu krrootu we yang ma á tsu re-krre̱de̱ng cwuo mbe zhwozhwo á be ya shwi a nyyi ko nye̱. Ncwe̱ re-krre̱de̱ nna zhwozhwo ne e hwie we̱ hung cwu ncwe̱ng yering cwuo na rotu ci nshwa wecwuoo
We ni we ni nka Brrabe̱ cwo we ne ning bra se̱ ngwie̱ yu, ne ngu bra cwo ne ning bra ci igbe̱.

Re̱se̱ ne re-ankya ne̱ mbe ci ni, Bulu a fo a hwie ngu he ngu shi cie̱ a Makyidoniya ngbe Akaya re nzhi Urrushelima. Ngu a he aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri kundu ngu ri ywa miimi, ngu a ya wara re nzhi dzie a Rroma wa.
Aha ni ngu a te nné ki sheng wehwie, Timoti ngbe Errastu, re nzhi Makyidoniya; ngu a ka srra tsie̱ a ngwie̱ Asia.
Ngbe ya re̱zhe̱ e̱ deze a Afisa aha Rê Brrabe̱.
A bi ya nne cwu ankya azrrufa ne e ki ye he Demetrru ne ngu cwu e̱we̱e̱ re-brranyi Arritemi
Aa ye nnencwuó ngu gbengbe ngbe yaká nné nyi yá zhwe re-cwuo nna, ngu a he ne mbe he, “A wene, nyi hu he a nyi cwuo ne̱ ne nzhi ning ci ncwé̱ ka rimi?

A zhe ne ne̱ nyi hó, nyi bra rí zhwe rê ne nne ne e ki ye he Bulu ne̱ ngu shi nwie cwua nneywí, ko nyi we a Afisa he we̱, me̱di he̱rri ngbe a ngwie̱ Asia zhwozhwo. Ko nyi nné tsie̱nzhwu ne ngu we klu we̱; a he ne mbe he ga re-be̱ne̱ na ngu nyi cwuong va nneywi koó nyi re-be̱ne̱ gung we̱.

Ko nyi we ike̱ cwuo nzhi ne̱ ne ngu shi ci shweni we̱, me̱di ga ngbe brranyi brra be̱ne̱ nzhi Arritemi e̱, á shi dziong, wire ngu be̱ne̱ nzhi e̱ ne e ki ye mbè a ngwie̱ Asia ngbe a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ne̱ ko we̱ bra bi grime̱ ngu a we̱.”
A zhe ne mbe ho ni, rehwie mbe yé gbushwo we yang, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne kyie̱ ronu nwie he, “Grime̱ nyi ngge Arritemi nné Afisa!”

Re̱zhe̱ e̱ mwe e̱ kpe a ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo. Rigwe̱ nné e pie Gayu ngbe Arristaku, nné ne mbe wru Makyidoniya nwie zhwe Bulu, á we kwa ne onu zrru á ngwie mi ne mbe a ya brra zonggru rotsu nné ngwie̱ nna.
Bulu ce̱ he ngu ngwie a nwie rotsu nna ma me̱di ko nné zhwe Brrabe̱ ki we we̱.
He̱rri ngbe yá brrá nné ngwie̱ nna ne mbe nyi rwí Bulu, á te ne ngu nwie cwe nva ne ngu he shi de̱ re ngwie a brra zonggru rotsu nna we̱.

A zhe nna re̱zhe̱ zhwo we zhwo a yarri rotsu nné nna ne mbe he re-nka kanka kanka: mbe nke shi kyie̱ ronu we nggaa mbe, yá wé̱ shi we na mbe ka ma. Jie̱ nné nna koó bra hu ka nyi nda ngu be ne mbe miimi e̱ we̱.
Ngbe yá nné Yahudi e̱ lu Alezanda re nzhi ncwuee nwie he ne ngu he re ya he kya ne ngu ci e̱. Ngu a we nyi va ngbe ré ci cereng aha ngu we he nka.
Me̱di zhe ne mbe timi he nyi nne Yahudi, zhwozhwo mbe mbe e̱ kro nku nwie he we kya zunzrru he, “Grime̱ nyi ngge Arritemi nné Afisa!” Á kyie̱ ronu ni he̱rri weje re-awa wehwie.

Wire nne wie krre̱de̱ na ngwie̱ nna ci rigwe̱ nné nna á ci cereng, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Re-gimbe, nné Afisa, nyi nye̱ a be ngwie̱ ne̱ ne ko ngu hu he nyi ngwie̱ Afisa ngu bi de̱me̱ng bro brranyi brra Arritemi ngbe ngbaatsie ngu ne ngu wru zinye̱ ngu ya kpe he e̱ we̱ e̱?
Ma tu ne ko bi nne re klo aha ni we̱, mahu aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi ci cereng kishi nyi ri nyi yankya hwrihwri we dede.
Ko nyi nca ne nné mbe rre̱ mbe nyi a brranyi nzhi ka ré he á cwi be̱ne̱ nzhi we̱, me̱di nyi we ko re be mi he.
Kundu Demetrru ngbe nné cwu ngu a á ri bi nka a rici ya nne, koó hung ngwie a nwie nné nyi nka we̱ e̱e̱? Ronusinye ering nyi nka a á shi gang, ré ywa ne nka mbe e̱ a nwie nné nyi nka.
Me̱di kundu ngu ri bi yaka nka ne nyi bi, mahu se ré cwue̱ nka nna a rotsu ngwie̱.
Aha kya ne ngu ci a cwu ne̱, wé̱ hu níng ci nka he nzhi be mi ne ko. De̱e̱ ni we̱, ma nyi nda nzhi e̱ he a zete zhwe re̱zhe̱ ne̱? Nyi nda ngu nyi kwiling nna?”
A zhe ne ngu he ni, ngu a cire rotsu nné nna.
A zhe ne e we ni re̱zhe̱ nna, Bulu a ye nné zhwe Brrabe̱ gbengbe ngu a we shwe̱ rehwie. Wire ngu a we ci ywaho, ngu a ne̱ re nzhi Makyidoniya.
Aa ya grra a re-nkla nna nwie shwe̱ nneywí rehwie ne re-nka we yang, wire ngu ya wre̱ a ngwie̱ Heleni.
Ngu a ci nyhwe̱ wetsie̱ a miimi. A zhe ne ngu shi nwie hwie nkang ne̱ re nzhi Sirriya, ngu a ya timi he a bi kya ne nné Yahudi mbe rwe a rici ngu, ngu a ning brru cie̱ a Makyidoniya.

Sopata ewe Pirru ne ngu nyi nne Birriya, ngbe Arristaku ngbe Sakundu ne mbe nyi nné Tasalonika, ngbe Gayu nne Derribi, ngbe Tikyiku ngbe Trrofimu ne mbe nyi nné Asia, ngbe Timoti, zhwozhwo mbe e̱ ki zhwe re nzhi.
Ga mbe ne̱ á ke̱she ne̱ á ya ne̱ níng tsio a Tarruwasa.
Nzhi e̱ ngwie jirigi rishi a Filibi a zhe ne Para Brredi We̱sa Yisi i wara; a otu na cwuoong nzhi e̱ ya nyi ngbe ne mbe a Tarruwasa. Nzhi e̱ ci rotu natsie̱ a miimi.
A tu na ce̱ucwung a se̱ti, nzhi ya mwe nwie hwin brredi gbengbe. Ngbe Bulu a brro nka we brro we brro he̱rri re nzhi cwu tsi totu aha ne ngu hwie he ngu ri ne̱ a tu na ngu ning zhweng.
A bi re-fitile̱ piriri ne mbe si a zonggru zeteng a nwie ne nzhi shi ning srra.

Ya nze̱we ne e ki ye he Yutikyi e̱ shi srra a kre wundo, ngbe ndzie e̱ ne̱ ne ki bi he̱rri aa ngwie we ngba ndzie ne Bulu shi we nka; ngu a wru gbo zete eri zeteng a ntsa na tsie̱ ngu a ya kpe be, á ki fo kwe kweng.
Ngbe Bulu a wro ngu a ya nywe̱ a zete ngu, ngu a ki krru, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Shi de̱ nyi bē we̱ ho, a ning shi nce!”
Wire ngu a ngra re nzhi zeteng wa, ngu a hwin brredi nzhi e̱ ye, ngu a we he nka we he we he he̱rri ewie maa tsie̱, wire ngu a ne̱.
Mbe e̱ fo nze̱we nna nce re si ri, aa we krru rehwie we yang.
Nzhi e̱ pie ciee re nzhi nwie jirigi rishi, nzhi e̱ ya ning ngwie re nzhi Aso aha ngbe nzhi ya fo Bulu a miimi. Ngu a i he nzhi nyi ni aha ngbe ngu ka ne̱ ne ta.
A zhe ne ngu ya níng she a Aso, nzhi e̱ ki fo miimi a jirigi rishi re nzhi Mitili.

Nzhi e̱ pie rê a jirigi rishi a miimi nzhi ya wre̱ a Kyiyosi a otu na ngu ning zhweng. Nzhi he nzhi shwo yaka otu wa nzhi e̱ tsa nyie re nzhi Samosi, nzhi e̱ ya wre̱ a Miletu a otu na ngu ning zhweng.
Á ma ne Bulu ngu rwe he ko ngu shi ta a ngwie̱ Afisa we̱ kishi ngu ri dzio zhe piriri a Asia, aha ne ngu nyi brimbri he ka ngu ya wre̱ Urrushelima a tu Penteko, kundu ngu ri shi hung ci.
A Miletu, Bulu te re nzhi Afisa he brrá nné ekpri nné ce̱ nka ré ya ki she.
A zhe ne mbe be, ngu a he ne mbe he: “Nyi we nci nyi nyi hu zhwe srra ne nje srra ngbe nyi ga re-zhe zhwozhwo tu we tu ne nje i ke̱she ya sa ta a mbè ngwie̱ Asia.
Nje nywe̱ rici nje nwie nyi Brrabe̱ cwuo he̱rri ngbe ne reyii, nje yaa rwe ne re-mwa ri mbe ning she aha re-ankya ne nné Yahudi mbe nyi ne rweng a rici nje.
Nyi hu he ko nje ree níng la mi ne yankya ne ngu shi níng sheng we̱, me̱di nje níng brro nka re níng mie̱ ko nda we gbeng ne nje bra grra he̱rri ngbe a reri reri.
Nje brro nné Yahudi ngbe nné Helening he ré si ywe̱ ré bra re be nwie Be̱ne̱ ré bra sa rie a yarri Brrabe̱ Jesu.
“A zhe ne ne̱, ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nshe Wiri he n nyi, nje cwo nzhi Urrushelima, gbengbe ni ko nje hu kya ne ngu cwo a ning she a miimi we̱.
Me̱di nje hu he ko zohu ngwie̱ ne nje ning ywa, Nshe Wiri srra re ning gara nka he uucwu gyiaa ngbe re-nzhwe cinci shi ning te.

Me̱di a nwie nje, ko nje hwie he ce nje e̱ be yankya we̱, aha nje ce̱ we he nje ra fro ga re-ankya ne nje ce̱ nying ngbe re-cwuo ne Brrabe̱ Jesu ngu ning ngwa, ne ngu nyi cwuong ngwa sheede re̱se̱ Nka Rina na ehwie rina Be̱ne̱.
“Nyi ri, a zhe ne ne̱ nje hu he ga nyi ne nje gye̱ re̱gye̱ nwie níng brro nka Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ne̱, ko ya nyi bra shi kara ning ri we̱.
Aha ni nje níng ting cence a cwu ne̱, ko nje bi koo le̱e̱kyi roshwo ya nne we̱.
Aha nje níng ti re̱se̱ kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo.
Aha ni nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nci nyi ngbe ne ekpri ne Nshe Wiri ci ré shi tahwie nyi, ngbe nyi cwo ekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱
Nje hu he kundu nje ri ne̱, yá ne mbe shi shi re-nyanya yi bi ren ri ngwi tsi nyi, he̱rri koó ri we ekpri nna canca we̱.
Zhe cwo be ne yá a tsi nyi ri deze ré ne̱ ne bra nka raywrra ne̱ aha mbe cwua yá nné ce̱ nka ré ne̱ ne we zhwe mbe.
Aha nii, nyi srrante! Nyi lu he a yarri re-rie wetsie̱ ne̱ totu ne te̱ne̱, ko nje sa we ni níng gara nka we̱, he̱rri ngbe ne reyii.
“A zhe ne ne̱, nje níng we a nva Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne nka ehwie rina ngu ne ngu hu níng ci nyi ci igbe̱, re bra níng ngwa re-mwo rina ne Be̱ne̱ ngu sa nné wiri ngung zhwozhwo.
Ko nje ree ci riyii a ncwe̱ ka ankya ci rwe̱ ya nne we̱.
Nyi we nci nyi nyi hu re̱se̱ng he nyi we ne nva nje ne nje i ning nyi cwuo aha ngbe n she ko nda ne nje ce̱ ngbe na nné ne mbe shi ngbe nje.

Nje nyi ko nda ni aha ngbe nyi hu he aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi yaa rwe ncwuo ni, wire nzhi e̱ hung she nné mbe ne mbe shi brrubrrung. Nyi ri ma lu ne nti nka Brrabe̱ Jesu ne ngu i he he, ‘Ngwang bi mwo rina re ne̱ se̱ng.’ ”
A zhe ne Bulu ngu he ni, ngu a hu be ne re-ruhuu ngbe mbe zhwozhwo ngu a ku Be̱ne̱.
Ngbe ga mbe zhwozhwo a ku rana we yang, á ki krru nwie ki me ushwo.
Kya ngu we dzio rehwie kaka a nyi nka ngu he he koó bra bi ri riyii ngu wa we̱. Wire mbe e̱ ya ki cire a nwie jirigi rishi.
A zhe ne nzhi we ci ywa ho, nzhi e̱ ngwie jirigi rishi nzhi e̱ tsa nyie we te̱rr re nzhi Kosi. Mincwe he ngu ya kla nzhi e̱ ya wre̱ Rrode, nzhi e̱ wara re nzhi Patarra.
Nzhi e̱ ya she ya jirigi rishi ne ngu shi tsa re nzhi Finikyia, nzhi e̱ ning ngwie re nzhi.
A zhe ne nzhi rwi riyii nzhi ri ngwie̱ Kuprru, nzhi e̱ ka nzhi ki we nva mie. Nzhi e̱ wro re nzhi Sirriya. Nzhi ya cwu Taya ne ngu nyi miimi ne e shi ning trro nkpe ne ngu shi jirigi e̱.
Nzhi e̱ she yá nné ce̱ nka a miimi, ngbe nzhi e̱ ci rotu natsie̱ ngbe mbe. Mbe nné ce̱ nka ne̱ Nshe Wiri we kpe rehwie, mbe e̱ he ne Bulu he de̱ re wara ne ciee ne̱ re nzhi Urrushelima we̱.

Me̱di a zhe ne rotu ana a wara, nzhi e̱ deze ne ciee nzhi e̱ wa. Ga nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo ngbe mbrrú mbe, ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe mbe á wru yarri ngwie̱ nna á ya níng cire, nzhi e̱ ya hu be ne re-ruhuu zhwozhwo nzhi a nzha rekyi brra ta nce, nzhi e̱ ku Be̱ne̱.
Wire nzhi e̱ yaa ci ywa ho, nzhi e̱ ngwie jirigi rishi, mbe e̱ ning brru re si ri ma.
Nzhi e̱ ce̱ ciee a Taya nzhi ya cwu a Pitolemayi, nzhi e̱ dzie re-gimbe a miimi, ngbe nzhi e̱ ci otu zunzrru ngbe mbe.
Nzhi shwo a mincwe nzhi e̱ ne̱ nzhi ya cwu a Kesariya. Nzhi e̱ hwie̱ srra a ri Fili, nne brro nka, ne ngu nyi ya a tsi nné natsie̱ ne i we kyie a Urrushelima.
A i bi rana weni ne ko mbe drro we̱ ne mbe ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne nzhi ci rotu a miimi, ya nne ti re̱se̱ng ne e ki ye he Agabu ne ngu wru Yahudi e̱ ya wre̱.

Aa be nwie nzhi ngu a fo bie̱li Bulu, ngu a yaa rrwe nva ngbe nta, ngu a he, “Nshe Wiri he: Nné Yahudi a Urrushelima á ri rrwe nne bi bie̱li ne̱ we he ni ne̱ ma, ngbe wé̱ ki ngwa a nva Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.”
A zhe ne nzhi ho ni, ga nzhi zhwozhwo ngbe nné miimi e̱ nzhi e̱ cwe nva ne Bulu he shi de̱ re cwugu re nzhi Urrushelima we̱.

Me̱di aa níng shing he, “Aha nda nyi ku rana nwie ning dzio ehwie ni e̱e̱? Nje e̱ nje yaa rwe he de̱ re nyi we rrwe ne e cwo a ning rrwe a Urrushelima we̱, me̱di he he̱rri n ya hu a miimi aha lo Brrabe̱ Jesu.”
Re̱se̱ ne nzhi ri ko nzhi shi hung ki drre̱ ngbe re we ywa we̱, nzhi e̱ ki we, nzhi e̱ he, “Ma nde kya ce̱ Brrabe̱ re ci.”
Nzhi ci yá rotu wire nzhi e̱ yaa tsu, nzhi e̱ deze re nzhi Urrushelima.
Yá nné ce̱ nka a Kesariya mbe e̱ ya níng cire, he̱rri á ya cwu a ri Manaso nne Kuprru ne nzhi shi srra ta ri ngu, ne ngu shi a tsi nné ce̱ nka na ce̱ucwung.
A zhe ne nzhi ya cwu Urrushelima, re-gimbe e̱ níng se̱ ne ehwie kla.
Nzhi shwo mincwe ngbe nzhi e̱ ne̱ ngbe Bulu re nzhi nwie Yakubu; ngbe ga rotsu brrá nné ekpri nné ce̱ nka na miimi e̱ á ning shî zhwozhwo.
Bulu a we dzie, ngu a we brro re̱se̱ ko nda ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi a tsi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ aha cwuo ne ngu shi nwie nying.
A zhe ne mbe ho ni, mbe e̱ de Be̱ne̱. Wire mbe e̱ he ne Bulu he, “Gimbe, ri, nné Yahudi ne mbe bi sa rie e̱ á brri we brri we yang, ga mbe zhwozhwo á ngwa nci mbe nwie zhwe Nti Nka Musa.

Á we ting he ngwe̱ shi nwie mie̱ ga nné Yahudi ne mbe srra a yarri Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ zhwozhwo he ré we ni zhwe Nti Nka Musa, he shi de̱ ré ca e̱we̱e̱ rewe mbe ikpe rwe̱ ntó wa we̱, he de̱ ré bra zhwe re-teede na nzhi wa we̱.
Nzhi nyi rimi? Aha koó shi we̱sa hong cence he ngwe̱ be he e̱ we̱.
Aha ni kya ne ngwe̱ shi nying nna nyi nke: a bi nné weni ne mbe shi ngbe nzhi ne mbe fo jee a nyyi Be̱ne̱.

We zhwe, ngbe nyi ywa ngwe̱ ya nyi teedeng yaa ci ci wiri, ngwe̱ bra we trra ncwé̱ na mbe; wire wé̱ hung ca nkwe rici mbe e̱ fa. Ngbe ko nye̱ we̱ hu he nka ne e he a rici ngwe̱ e̱ nyi rabrra, me̱di he ngwe̱ shi nwie srra re zhwe Nti Nka ye̱ye̱rri.
Me̱di mbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne mbe hwie̱ nné ce̱ nka ana, nzhi we wie krre̱de̱ nzhi we ngwa nka he shi de̱ ré ye yankya ne e ngwa aha teede kpanshwu

Ngbe Bulu a shwo mincwe ngu a ko nné nna, ngu a nyi teedeng yaa ci ci wiri ngbe mbe zhwozhwo. Wire ngu a ywa Brranyi ngu a ya ti otu ne zheng ci wiri mbe cwo a ci, ngbe ré ngwa kyang nyi teede aha ko zohu nne nna.
Me̱di a zhe ne rotu natsie̱ ana á sa dudu ne yhwe̱, yá nné Yahudi ne mbe wru a nva Asia á ri Bulu a Brranyi. Mbe e̱ mwe á krre rigwe̱ nné nna zhwozhwo, mbe e̱ pie Bulu

nwie kyie̱ re̱zhe̱ he: “Nné Isrreela, nyi níng sheng! Nne ne̱ nyi ngu ne ngu grrá ko he re mie̱ nneywí nka re cwi nné nzhi, ngbe Nti Nka Musa, ngbe Brranyi ne̱. We̱sa a ni, aa be mi ne yá nné Heleni a yarri Brranyi, aa ya ning dzio ewie wiri ne̱!”
(Á he ni aha ne mbe i ri Trrofimu nne Afisa a yarri ngwie̱ nna ngbe ne Bulu, mbe e̱ fo he Bulu ngwie mi ne ngu yarri Brranyi.)
Ngbe re̱zhe̱ng ko a deze a ngwie̱ nna zhwuzhwuzhwu ne nneywí mbe to re-ncii re be. Á pie Bulu mbe e̱ ki kwa á wru mi ne ngu a Brranyi nna. Mbe e̱ wre̱ ne hwie̱n ronusinye nna.
A zhe ne rigwe̱ nné nna mbe ce̱ yhwe̱ Bulu, á a she nka a ya cwu a nwie be̱ri re-shezhi Rroma he nné ngwie̱ Urrushelima zhwozhwo shi nko.
We zhe zunzrru ngu a ko re-shezhi ngbe yá brrá re-shwa re-shezhi mbe e̱ rwi ta be re nzhi. Re̱se̱ ne nné nna mbe ri be̱ri re-shezhi ngbe re-shezhi ngu, mbe e̱ we ni cwe Bulu.
Be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ ywa nwie Bulu, ngu a ki pie, ngu a ci ré ki rrwe ne re-roonyo wehwie. Wire ngu a we rinng ka nyi nye̱ ye̱ ngbe kya ne ngu nyi.

Ngbe mbe e̱ ne̱ ne kyie̱ ronu kanka kanka ko mbe nye̱ shi we nka na mbe we ka. Me̱di tu ne ko be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ hung pie cwu nka nna we̱ aha re̱zhe̱, ngu a ci ré ne̱ mi ne Bulu re nzhi Barra re-shezhi.
A zhe ne mbe ya cwu a nwie re-matakala, re-shezhi nna mbe e̱ fo Bulu fo fo aha re̱kwe̱ rigwe̱ nné nna a zhwo we zhwo.
Aha ga mbe zhwozhwo zhwé nwie kyie̱ ronu he, “Nyi ki yhwe̱!”
A zhe ne re-shezhi nna mbe shi ngwie mi ne Bulu a yarri Barra, Bulu ngu a he ne be̱ri re-shezhi nna he, “N re he ya nka aa?”
Be̱ri nna a ki rinng he, “Á nyi ne̱ ngwe̱ hé nka Heleni e̱e̱?
Ko nyi ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ nyi nne Masarr ne ngu i deze ne ko ngu kwa nné yhwi nné komo ci weni re nzhi tsi yi a yá re-zhe ne mbe i wara ana we̱ e̱e̱?”
Bulu a ki shing he, “Aawo, nje nyi nne Yahudi, á ning bî a Tarrusu a ngwie̱ Kyilikyia. Ko nje wru ya ngwie̱ dede we̱. Nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ nde n he nka ngbe nné ne̱.”
Wire ngu a ki ngwa zhe fa, Bulu ngu a yo a matakala, ngu a we nyi va ngbe ré ci cereng. A zhe ne mbe dzie̱ cereng, ngu a we he nka a zhe Ibrrani.
Bulu a he, “Re-gimbe ngbe re-be̱ nje, nyi ho nka nje ne̱ ngbe nyi hu he ko nje bi vini we̱!”
A zhe ne mbe ho ngu we hé nka a zhe Ibrrani, mbe e̱ ning bra dzie̱ cereng.
Ngbe Bulu a he:

“Nje nyi nne Yahudi, á ning bî a Tarrusu a ngwie̱ Kyilikyia, me̱di nje ci brrang a Urrushelima ne̱, nje nyi makrranta a nwie Gamaliye. Aa ning mie̱ ko nda ne ngu shi yarri Nti Nka yó nzhi e̱ wiriri. Ehwie nje bra ye le ndo aha n nyi Be̱ne̱ cwuo we shi ne nyi shi mi a cwu ne̱.
Nje i ngwa nné mbe ne mbe zhwe Rê ne̱ ge̱zhe̱ he̱rri á kwi. Nje i prre ntó ngbe mbrrú nwie we zi a uucwu gyiaa.

Brra Prristi ngbe Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi e̱ zhwozhwo wé̱ hung ngwa sheede he kya ne nje he ne̱ nyi cence. He̱rri mbe e̱ á i ning ngwa re-krre̱de̱ re nzhi nwie re-gimbe nzhi nné Yahudi ne mbe shi a Damaska, aha ngbe n ywa a miimi e̱ n ya prre nné zhwe Rê ne̱ shi nné gyiaa n be mi ne mbe Urrushelima ngbe ré we ngwa cinci.
“Me̱di zhe ne nje i shi ciee ne nje sa dudu ne ngwie̱ Damaska, re be brra tsi te̱ne̱, ya brra nse̱ e̱ wru zinye̱ e̱ tsie̱ nwie si re ning grra we zhe zunzrru.
Nje kpe, ngbe nje e̱ ho riwie̱ng cwue ne ngu he ne nje he, ‘Shawulu, Shawulu, aha nda ngwe̱ ning ngwa ge̱zhe̱ ni e̱?’
“Nje e̱ rin he, ‘Nyi ngwe̱ nye̱ e̱, Brrabe̱?’
“Ngu a he ne nje he, ‘Nyi nje Jesu nne Nazarra ne ngwe̱ shi nwie ning ngwa ge̱zhe̱.’
Nné ne mbe shi ngbe nje e̱ á ri nse̱ nna, me̱di koó ho riwie̱ng cwue ne ngu shi nka ngbe nje e̱ we̱.
“Nje e̱ rin he, ‘Ma n nyi rimi e̱, Brrabe̱?’
“Ngbe Brrabe̱ e̱ shî he, ‘Deze ngwe̱ ywa Damaska. A miimi e̱ á cwo a re ti ko nda ne e re ci ngwe̱ nyi.’
Nné ne mbe shi ngbe nje e̱ á ning kwa va kwa kwa aha grime̱ nse̱ ana a ning ci nje ci cwue̱.
“A a bi ya nne a ngwie̱ nna ne e ki ye he Ananiya ne ngu nyi nne zhwe Nti Nka tsantsa. Ga nné Yahudi ne mbe srra miimi e̱ zhwozhwo ki ngwa grime̱ we yang.
Aa be ya yo nwie nje, ngu a he, ‘Gimbe nje Shawulu, ne̱ ne ri ewie!’ We zhe ana, nje e̱ ne̱ ne ki ri we krrankrra.
“Wire ngu a he, ‘Be̱ne̱ yó nzhi e̱ re kyie aha ngbe ngwe̱ hu kya ce̱ ngu, ngwe̱ bra hung ri Nne Redziee ana, ngbe ngwe̱ bra ho nka a nu ngu.
Aha ngwe̱ shi hwie̱ sheede ngu ngbe ngwe̱ ti ko nye̱ ko nda ne ngwe̱ ri ngwe̱ bra ho.
Ma ngwe̱ bra tsio nda wa ne̱? Deze ngwe̱ ye lo Brrabe̱ ngbe ré re nyi batisma ré re kyu re-e̱ngwie̱ ngwe̱.’
“A zhe ne nje ning brru re be Urrushelima, ne nje shi nwie ku Be̱ne̱ a Brranyi nje e̱ ne̱ ne ria revi.
A yarri revi nna nje e̱ ri Brrabe̱ ngu he nka ne nje he, ‘Wru a Urrushelima we hwiehwie, aha ko nné he ne̱ á shi se̱ nka ne ngwe̱ we ting a rici we̱.’
“Nje e̱ ki shing he, ‘Brrabe̱, nné mbe rre̱ á hu re̱se̱ng he nje cwo a re-zonggrung mwe nwie prre nné ne mbe sa rie a ngwe̱ re we ci gyiaa nwie we cwe.
Ga ngbe zhe ne i yhwe̱ Sitivi nne ngwa sheede ngwe̱, nje we rici nje e̱ nje i shi nwieng nwie shing he ré ki yhwe̱, he̱rri nje i srra nwie cwo re-tago nné ki yhwe̱ e̱.’
“Ngbe Brrabe̱ e̱ he ne nje he, ‘Ywa, nje shi re te gbong a yarri Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.’ ”
Rigwe̱ nné nna á srra cereng nwie hong he̱rri se ne Bulu ngu ya tsie riti nka ne̱. Wire mbe e̱ kro nku nwie kyie̱ ronu he, “Ki yhwe̱! Koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri nne ne̱ re ke̱ we ne ning shi nce we̱!”
A zhe ne mbe shi kyie̱ ronu nwie trru ankya ci rwe̱ mbe re zi re ywe̱ nzha zeteng,
ngbe be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ ngwa nka he ré ngwie mi ne Bulu a yarri Barra re-shezhi. Ngu a ci ré ki cwe, ngbe ré ki rin nka ka nyi nda ngu ci ne nné Yahudi mbe kyie̱ ronu ni ye̱.

Me̱di zhe ne mbe ki rwe mbe shi ne̱ ne ki cwe, Bulu a he ne shwa shezhi ne ngu yo miimi e̱ he, “A shi ye̱ye̱rri ne teede nné Rroma ngbe ré cwe nne bi de̱me̱ng srra a Rroma we̱sa ne e ki nyi nka á ki she ne vini e̱e̱?”
A zhe ne shwa shezhi nna ngu ho ni, ngu a ne̱ re nzhi rin i be̱ri re-shezhi nna he, “Ngwe̱ shi nyi rimi zhe ne ne̱? Aha nne ne̱ nyi nne bi de̱me̱ng srra a Rroma.”
Be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ ywa a ya rin Bulung he, “A she ngwe̱ nyi nne bi de̱me̱ng srra a Rroma aa?”
Bulu a ki shing he, “Ee, a shi ni.”
Be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nje ne̱ nje bi de̱me̱ng srra a Rroma aha nje trra rigwe̱ ncwe̱ we yang wire.”
Bulu a ki shing he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi nne Rroma tu zhe ne i ning bî.”
Ngbe nné ne e ri ma mbe shi ki rin nka a mbe e̱ wre̱ ne ki we. Be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ ne ngu timi he Bulu a nyi nne bi de̱me̱ng srra a Rroma, owu a ki yhwe̱, aha ne ngu ci á ki rrwe.

Á shwo mincwe, be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ ce̱ hu cwu nka ne nné Yahudi e̱ mbe bi a rici Bulu, ngu a ki ti a gyiaa, ngu a ngwa nka he ga nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi zhwozhwo ré ya mwe. Ngu a be mi ne Bulu, ngu a ki ci re yo a nyyi mbe.
Bulu a rwi riyii ri Brrá Nné Rotsu nna, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Re-gimbe, a ning shi we wang a yarri hwie nje aha zhwe srra ne nje srra a nyyi Be̱ne̱ he̱rri re be wre̱ cwu ne̱.”
Ananiya ne ngu nyi Brra Prristi ho ni ngu a ci nné ne mbe shi yo dudu ne ngu ré ki rwi onu.

Ngbe Bulu a kara he, “Ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ shi shi iibe̱ ne e ki fu ne e̱vie̱e̱ kye̱, Be̱ne̱ shi re rwi ngwe̱ e̱ ma! Ngwe̱ srra miimi he ngwe̱ shi ning nyi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka me̱di ngwe̱ e̱ we rici ngwe̱ ngwe̱ hle̱ Nti Nka nna ne ngwe̱ he ne mbe he ré ning rwi ne̱!”
Nné ne mbe shi yo dudu ne Bulu mbe e̱ he ne ngu he, “He̱rri ngwe̱ shi cwi Brra Prristi Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱?”
Bulu ngu a we shing he, “Re-gimbe, ko nje ru he nyi ngu ngu nyi Brra Prristi we̱. Aha á wie he, ‘Shi de̱ ngwe̱ cwi nnencwuee nné nyi we̱.’ ”

Me̱di re̱se̱ ne Bulu ngu a timi he kpi nné nna á nyi nné Sadukyi kpi mbe e̱ nyi nné Farisi, ngu a ci onu a yarri Rotsu Brrá Nné nna he, “Re-gimbe, nje nyi nne Farisi, nje bra nyi kowe nne Farisi. Á shi nwie ning nyi nka ne̱ aha ne nje sa riyii he á ri he ya otu nné ne mbe kwi ri deze nce!”
We ne ngu he ni, ngbe nné Farisi ngbe nné Sadukyi e̱ ne̱ ne yaa ti ronu ce; ngbe mbe e̱ ci kanka.
(Aha mbe nné Sadukyi e̱ koó shî nka he nné ne mbe kwi bi deze nce we̱, koó bra shi he bi re-njeli ngbe re-wu we̱, me̱di mbe nné Farisi e̱ á shî he bi re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo.)

Re̱zhe̱ mbe e̱ cwo we ni ya zhwo we zhwo, ngbe yá nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa ne mbe nyi nné Farisi mbe e̱ nyi nye̱ nwie ti onu ce ne igbe̱ he ko mbe she nne ne̱ bi koo ya vini we̱! Á he, “Ma ka ya wu ka ya njeli i he nka ne ngu rre!”
Ronu ce mbe e̱ ci we zinzi he̱rri be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ ci owu kishi á ri nyi Bulu nse̱rinnse̱rin, ngu a ci re-shezhi ré wro ré ya fo Bulu a tsi nné nna ne igbe̱ re nzhi yarri barra nna.
A totu tu nna Brrabe̱ e̱ ya yo dudu ne Bulu, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Yo gbe̱ngbe̱! We shi ne ngwe̱ brro nka nje a Urrushelima, ngwe̱ shi brrong we ni wa a Rroma.”
Mincwe he ngu kla wa, nné Yahudi e̱ mwe gbengbe mbe e̱ rwe onu ne shí he ko mbe bi ye ko yankya ka mbe shwe yankya we̱ se mbe yhwe̱ Bulu wire.
Nné ne mbe rwe nka ne̱ á hle nshwa weni.
Mbe e̱ ywa nwie nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe brrá nné mbe e̱ ya he ne mbe he, “Nzhi fo brra shí he ko nzhi bi ye ko yankya ka nzhi shwe yankya we̱ se ne nzhi yhwe̱ Bulu wire.

Aha ni nyi te re nzhi nwie be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ we zhe ne ne̱ he re be ne Bulu a nyyi nyi, nyi tiyi shi nyi ce̱ ning bra ki rinng ngbe nyi ning bra hu rici nka ngu a. Me̱di nzhi e̱ nzhi yaa rwe ngbe nzhi ki yhwe̱ ne ko ngu ya cwu he we̱.”
Me̱di zhe ne ewe gimbe Bulu ewerembrru ya ho kya ne e rwe ni, ngu a ywa a barra nna ngu a ya ti Bulung.
Ngbe Bulu ngu a ye ya shwa shezhi nna ngu a he ne ngu he, “Fo nze̱we ne̱ re nzhi nwie be̱ri re-shezhi, a bi kya ngu ce̱ ki heng.”
Aha ni, ngu a fo nze̱we nna re nzhi nwie be̱ri re-shezhi, ngu a he ne ngu he, “Bulu nne gyiaa ning ye he n be ne nze̱we ne̱ a nwie ngwe̱, aha he bi kya ne ngu ce̱ re heng.”
Be̱ri re-shezhi ngu a pie nze̱we nna va ngu a ki fo re nzhi bamba, ngu a ki rinng he, “Nyi nda ngwe̱ ce̱ ning heng nna?”
Ngu a he, “Nné Yahudi mwe onu he mbe cwo a he ne ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ be ne Bulu a nyyi Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi a encwe, he mbe shi tiyi shi mbe ce̱ ning bra ki rinng ngbe mbe hu rici nka ngu a.

Shi de̱ ngwe̱ shî nka mbe we̱, aha a bi yá mbe ne mbe hle nshwa weni ne mbe fo shí he ko mbe bi ye ko yankya ka mbe shwe yankya we̱ se mbe yhwe̱ Bulu wire. Á shi nwie nywrra a la la nwie teng aha mbe ki yhwe̱. A zhe ne ne̱ á yaa rwe nwie te we nka ngwe̱.”
Ngbe be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ he ne ngu he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ti ko ya nneng he ngwe̱ ning ting we̱.” Wire ngu a ki cire fa.

Wire be̱ri re-shezhi ngu a ye yá re-shwa shezhi wehwie ngu a we ngwa nka he, “Nyi trru re-shezhi nnywa wehwie ngbe re-shezhing ko ne ntsie̱ komo nshwa natsie̱, ngbe re-na kwe̱ ko ne re-rikpe̱e̱ komo nnywa wehwie, aha a totu cwu ne̱ a ncwe̱ krruvaya nyi shi pie rê re nzhi Kesariya.
Nyi kre yá ntsie̱ ngbe Bulu re ning cwo, aha ngbe nyi ywa ne ngu rina rina nyi ya ki ngwa a nva goona Feliku.”
Wire ngu a wie krre̱de̱ he ni, ngu a we ngwa ré ywa mi:
“Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Kladiyu Lisiya,
Re nzhi nwie brra be̱ri, goona Feliku.
Nje re dzie.
Nne ne̱, nné Yahudi ki pie he̱rri á srra ki yhwe̱, me̱di nje be ngbe ne re-shezhi nje nje ya ki se̱, aha nje she he nyi nne bi de̱me̱ng srra a ngwie̱ Rroma.
