Nje ce̱ he n hu nka ne mbe bi a rici ngu, nje ywa ne ngu a nyyi Rotsu Brrá Nné Yahudi.
Nje e̱ timi he kya ngu ci mbe ki pie e̱ nyi aha yá re-ankya na nti nka teede mbe, me̱di nka ne mbe bi rici ngu a ko nyi yankya ngu nyi na he̱rri ré ki yhwe̱ ka ré ki ci uucwu gyiaa gung we̱.
Me̱di zhe ne nje ya ho kya ne e rwe a rici ngu, nyi ngwiee nje wre̱ ne te ne ngu re be nwie ngwe̱. Nje e̱ he ne nné bi nka a rici ngu a he ré be ne nka mbe e̱ a nwie ngwe̱.”
Re-shezhi e̱ nyi shi kya ne e we heng, á fo Bulu a totu á cwo he̱rri ya wre̱ a Antipatrri.
Á shwo mincwe mbe e̱ we re-shezhi kwe̱ ne ntsié̱ ré ywa ne ngu, kpi mbe e̱ ning brru re be Barra.
A zhe ne re-shezhi to ntsié̱ e̱ mbe ya wre̱ Kesariya, mbe e̱ ngwa goona krre̱de̱ ne e we te mi, mbe e̱ we Bulu a nva ngu.
Goona a hwie krre̱de̱ nna, ngu a rin Bulung, “Ngwe̱ wru zohu kla?” A zhe ne ngu a hu re̱se̱ng he aa wru nkla Kyilikyia,
ngu a he, “Mahu nje shi ning bra ho nka ne̱ kundu nné bi nka a rici ngwe̱ e̱ mbe ri be.” Ngu a ngwa nka he ré cwo Bulu rina rina we yarri brra eri ringgwe̱ Hirridu.
Rotu wecwuoo wara, ngbe Brra Prristi, Ananiya a wro re nzhi Kesariya ngbe yá brrá nné ngbe ya loya ne e ki ye he Tatulu, aha mbe ywa ne nka a rici Bulu a nwie goona Feliku.
Á a ngwie mi ne Bulu, ngbe Tatulu a ne̱ ne he re-nka a rici Bulu a nyyi goona Feliku he:
“Brra be̱ri! Nyi ngwe̱ ne zentsi ringgwe̱ ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ci re-ankya á ci rina a ngwie̱ nzhi ne̱, he̱rri aa ci nzhi fo zhe we yang nwie srra rina rina.
Ga nné nzhi e̱ zhwozhwo ko he ko zohu zhe á re ci kijie̱ng we yang.
Be̱ri, ko nje ce̱ fo zhe ngwe̱ piriri we̱, me̱di nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ fo ehwie sheng ngbe ngwe̱ ho e̱we̱ kya ne nzhi ce̱ re heng ne̱.
“Nzhi she nne ne̱ nyi nne bi ruwu, a grrá re deze ko a yarri nné Yahudi ko he a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo. Nyi ngu ngu nyi nné kwa yincwuee ekpri nné Nazarra.
He̱rri aa kre he ngu dzio Brranyi, kya a nyi ngwiee nzhi ki pie, [nzhi ce̱ ki nyi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka nzhi,
Me̱di Lisiya, be̱ri re-shezhi be ya ki se̱ nva nzhi ne igbe̱.
Ngu a ci ko nye̱ ngu ri bi nka a rici ngu re be mi nwie ngwe̱.] Kundu ngwe̱ rin nne ne̱ nka we rici ngwe̱, ngwe̱ e̱ hu he ga re-nka ne nzhi he a rici ngu ne̱ nyi cence.”
Ngbe ga nné Yahudi e̱ shî he ga re-nka ne̱ zhwozhwo nyi cence.
Wire goona a nyi Bulu va he re he nka.
Bulu ngu a he, “Nje hu he ngwe̱ ci re-rie piriri nwie nyi nneywí nka a ngwie̱ ne̱. Aha ni, nje shi re ti kya ngu ci e̱ we dengge.
Kundu ngwe̱ rin we rici ngwe̱, ngwe̱ e̱ hu re̱se̱ng he koo hle rotu shwa ne otu wehwie we̱ ne nje cwugu re nzhi ye Be̱ne̱ mbè a Urrushelima.
Ko bi ko ya mbe ne̱ ne ngu ning she nje shi onu ce ngbe ya nne a Brranyi, he ka nje deze ne ko a zonggrung mwe, ka a ya ewie a yarri ngwie̱ ana we̱.
Koó bra bi kyang ngwa sheede he re-nka ne mbe he a rici nje ne̱ nyi cence we̱.
Me̱di nje hu he nje yé Be̱ne̱ yó nzhi mbè ye̱ye̱rri ne Rê ne mbe ki ye he na ya ekpri. Nje sa rie a yarri ko nda ne e wie a yarri krre̱de̱ Nti Nka Musa ngbe na nné ti re̱se̱ng.
Nje bra bi sa riyii we shi mbe ne̱ ma he Be̱ne̱ ri deze nné kwi zhwozhwo ga nné redziee ngbe nné hwie̱.
Aha ni nje kwe̱ he ngbe n she onu rie nje shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ngbe a nwie nneywí.
“Nje ci re-rie piriri ne nje shi ci, wire nje ya ywa Urrushelima aha ngbe n ya ngwa nné nje ne mbe nyi yiriywé̱ ankya, ngbe n bra nyi teede a Brranyi.
Mbe e̱ ya ning she a Brranyi ne nje shi wiriri ye̱ye̱rri ne teede nzhi ne nje shi nyi kya ne ngu be ne nje. Ko bra bi ngbe nné piriri a zhe nna we̱, wire re ning hwie̱ he nje we ci ré ci ko.
Me̱di yá nné Yahudi ne mbe wru nva Asia á i shi miimi. Nyi mbe ana ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré be ne mbe a he ne̱ ngbe ré ya ngwa sheede a nyyi ngwe̱ kundu mbe ri bi ya nka a rici nje.
Ka nné mbe rre̱ ne mbe shi he ne̱ ré ti ka bi yankya me̱nkye̱ ne i she he nje nyi a zhe ne nje i yo a nyyi Rotsu Brrá Nné e̱ —
se ka riti nka zunzrru ne̱ hoo ne nje i yo nje he ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he: ‘Á shi nwie ning nyi nka a cwu ne̱ aha ne nje sa rie he nné ne mbe kwi e̱ á bi deze nce.’ ”
Wire Feliku ne ngu bi hu re̱se̱ nka Rê Jesu a, ngu a hwie̱n nka nna se yaka otu, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Se ne Lisiya be̱ri re-shezhi e̱ ri be wire ma n cie̱ nka ne̱.”
Ngu a ngwa shwa shezhi e̱ nka he re cwo Bulu, me̱di he shi de̱ re ki me̱ we̱, ré ki we ngbe rwí ngu ré hung be ré ya ci nkwile̱ ne ngu.
Yá rotu wara, wire Feliku a be ngbe mbrru ngu Drrusila, ne ngu nyi mbrru Yahudi. Ngu a te re be mi ne Bulu, ngu a sa uucwu nwie ho kya ne Bulu ngu he a zete sa rie a Krristi Jesu.

Me̱di zhe ne Bulu ngu shi nka a zete shi tsantsa nyyi Be̱ne̱, ngbe e̱kpe̱e̱ng yaa rwe, ngbe nyi nka Be̱ne̱ ne ngu cwo be, owu a yhwe̱ Feliku, ngbe ngu a he, “Aa be ni fa, ywa! Nje ri bra she zhe ma n te ré re ye te̱nte̱.”
A zhe ana a hwie he ka Bulu a shi ki ngwa ncwe̱; aha ni a srrá re ki ye cwucwu nwie he nka ne ngu.
Re-rie wehwie maa wara, ngbe Pokyio Festu a se̱ ringgwe̱ a nva goona Feliku. Feliku a i ce̱ she ehwie rina a nwie nné Yahudi, kya a nyi ngwiee ngu we Bulu we gyiaa.
A zhe ne Festu ngu ci rotu wetsie̱ ne pie cwuo goona, ngu a cwugu a Kesariya re nzhi Urrushelima.
Nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe nnencwueé nné Yahudi mbe e̱ ya ki she miimi nwie be ne re-nka a rici Bulu. Á cwe nva ne ngu he
re we nyi ehwie rina ngbe re ci ré ning brru mi ne Bulu re be Urrushelima. Á he ni aha ne mbe sa yá nné ré nywrra rê nwie tsiong ngbe ré yhwe̱ Bulu a zhe ne ngu ri shi rê re be.
Festu a we shing he, “Bulu a shi nwie hwie̱n a uucwu gyiaa a Kesariya, nje e̱ we rici nje nje shi ning brru re nzhi miimi we̱sa ne dzio zhe.
Nde yá nnencwueé nyi e̱ ré ywa a Kesariya ngbe nje, ngbe ré ya ngwa nka a rici ngu a miimi kundu ngu ri bi ya vini.”
Festu a ci yá rotu klanva re nzhi cwu shwa zunzrru ngbe mbe, wire ngu a wro re nzhi Kesariya. A otu na ngu ning zhweng, ngu a ya srra a ncwung nyi nka, ngu a ci ré ngwie mi ne Bulu.

We ne Bulu ngu ya wre̱ we wre̱, ga nné Yahudi ne mbe wru Urrushelima mbe e̱ ya ki grra nwie he yá ngbá re-ankya me̱nkye̱ a rici ngu he e nyi we yang, koó bra bi ya sheede na ngu ti he kya mbe he e̱ shi ni cence we̱.
Wire Bulu a we shing he, “Ko nje nyi yankya me̱nkye̱ ne Nti Nka nzhi nné Yahudi, ka ne Brranyi, ka ne Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma we̱.”

Me̱di Festu ce̱ he nné Yahudi ré ki ce̱, aha ni ngu a rin Bulung he, “Ngwe̱ shî he ré ywa mi ne ngwe̱ a Urrushelima ngbe ré ya re nyi nka a nyyi nje a zete re-ankya ne e he a rici ngwe̱ ne̱ a miimi e̱e̱?”

Bulu a he, “Ewie nje ning yó ne̱ nyi ewieng nyi nka Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma, a nyi a he ne ne̱ ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ning nyi nka. Ko nje nyi nné Yahudi ko yankya me̱nkye̱ we̱, shi ne ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ hu ma we rici ngwe̱.

Kundu nje ri nyi yankya wie̱e̱ni, ne he̱rri ngu ya cwu na ré ning yhwe̱, ko nje to hu a we̱. Me̱di kundu de̱ ri bi raywrra a yarri re-nka ne mbe be mi a rici nje ne̱ we̱, mahu ko bi nne ngu bi de̱me̱ re ning ngwa a nva mbe we̱. Aha nii, nje ce̱ ré fo nka nna re nzhi nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma!”
A zhe ne Festu ngu he nka ngbe ekpri nné ki she nyi nka, ngu a he: “Tu ne ngwe̱ fo nka re nzhi nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma, mahu ngwe̱ cwo nzhi nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma.”
Yá rotu a wara tsie̱, nggwe̱ Agrripa a be Kesariya ngbe Banisi aha mbe ya dzie Festu.
Tu ne mbe ci rotu a mi piriri, Festu a ti nggwe̱ Agrripa re̱se̱ nka Bulu he, “A bi ya nne a he ne ne̱ ne Feliku i we a uucwu gyiaa.
A zhe ne nje i ywa a Urrushelima, ngbe nggwé̱ re-prristi ngbe brrá nné Yahudi e̱ be mi ne re-nka a rici ngu nwie he he n ki nyi nka hu.
“Me̱di nje he ne mbe he, ko shi ye̱ye̱rri a teede nzhi nné Rroma ngbe nzhi ngwa ya nne a nva nné ne mbe ki ci nka we̱sa ne á ho nka a nu ngu a nyyi mbe a zete nka ne e he a rici ngu a we̱.
A zhe ne mbe i be a he ne̱ ngbe nje, ko nje dzio zhe we̱, nje tsu rotsung nyi nka a otu na ngu ning zhweng, nje e̱ ci ré be mi ne nne nna.
A zhe ne nné bi nka a rici ngu a mbe deze, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne he re-nka, koó hung ngwa cwu yankya me̱nkye̱ ne nje ning hwie yi he ka a nyi e̱ we̱,
se ka we ronu ce mbe ne mbe bi a zete re-ankya na teede mbe, ngbe nka ya nne ne e ki ye he Jesu ne ngu i hu ne ngu Bulu a ngu ke̱ we ne he he shi nce.
Aa ning ci zhizhi ne kya nje shi nying ngbe n she rici re-nka nna. Aha ni nje e̱ rin Bulung nna ka ri shî ngbe re ywa a Urrushelima re ya yo ré ki nyi nka nna a miimi a zete re-ankya ne̱.
Me̱di ngu Bulu a fo nka nna re nzhi nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma he ré ki cwo se we kya ne ngu ri ya he. Aha ni nje ci ré ki cwo rina rina ne nje shi te ne ngu re nzhi nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma.”
Ngbe Agrripa a he ne Festu he, “Nje ce̱ ho nka a nu nne ne̱ ma we rici nje.”
Festu a ki shing he, “Mahu ngwe̱ ri ki ho a encwe.”
Á shwo mincwe, Agrripa ngbe ne Banisi e̱ ya wre̱ luuu ringgwe̱ ringgwe̱ a brra zonggrung nyi nka ngbe brrá nggwé̱ re-shezhi ngbe brrá nnencwueé na ngwie̱. Ngbe Festu a ngwa nka, á a ngwie mi ne Bulu.

Festu ngu a he, “Nggwe̱ Agrripa, ngbe ga nné zhwozhwo ne nyi shi he ngbe nzhi, nyi ri nne ne̱ e̱e̱! Ga nné Yahudi zhwozhwo a Urrushelima ngbe a Kesariya he ne̱, á be ne nka a rici ngu nwie nje. Á kyie̱ ronu wonnng nwie he de̱ ré ki we nce we̱.
Me̱di ko nje she yankya me̱nkye̱ ne ngu nyi ne he̱rri ré ki yhwe̱ we̱. Me̱di tu ne ngu we rici ngu a ngu fo nka nna re nzhi nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma, nje e̱ he mahu nje shi te ne ngu re nzhi Rroma.

Me̱di ko nje bi cwu yankya ne nje shi wieng a rici ngu re nzhi nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma we̱. Aha ni, nje be ne ngu a nyyi nyi zhwozhwo, he̱rri ngbe a nyyi ngwe̱, ngwe̱ Nggwe̱ Agrripa! Aha de̱e̱nte̱ wo, kundu nzhi ri cwue̱ nka ngu ne̱, ma n she kya wie.
Aha a ri nje, koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré te ne nne gyiaa we̱sa ne ti kya ne e he aa nyi we̱.”
Agrripa a he ne Bulu he, “Á re ngwa zheng he nka aha rici ngwe̱.”
Aha ni Bulu a na va, ngu a ce̱ nka aha ngu ti rici ngu, a he:
“Nggwe̱ Agrripa! Nje bi kywe we yang a cwu ne̱, tu ne nje shi yo a nyyi ngwe̱ ngbe n kye̱ rici nje ne ga re-ankya ne nné Yahudi ne̱ mbe he a rici nje,
ngba cwu kya nna nyi aha ne ngwe̱ hu re-teede nzhi nné Yahudi ngbe rewie ne nzhi ning bi ronu ce zhwozhwo. Aha ni nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ fo ehwie sheng ngwe̱ ho nka nje ne̱.
“Ga nné Yahudi e̱ zhwozhwo á hu zhwe srra ne nje srra tu ne nje wru we e̱we̱ nze̱we, tu we ce̱ucwu srra nce nje a ngwie̱ nzhi ngbe a Urrushelima.
Á ning hu gannyi we gbangba, wé̱ bra hung ngwa sheede nna kundu mbe ce̱, he nje e̱ nje i shi a ekpri nné zhwe teede nzhi e̱ cwuncwuu, nje i nyi nne Farisi.
Me̱di a cwu ne̱, nje yó he ne ne̱ ngbe ré ning nyi nka aha ne nje sa riyii a kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ning sa yó nzhi jee.

A nyi ngu jee ne̱ ne ga re-nkla nzhi shwa ne otu wehwie zhwozhwo mbe ning sa riyii he mbe ri ngu ci rrurru, kya a nyi ngwiee mbe srra re ye Be̱ne̱ mbè totu ne te̱ne̱. A bra nyi we aha kya ne nzhi ning sa riyii ne̱, Brra Be̱ri, ne mbe nné Yahudi ne̱ mbe bra bi nka a rici nje!
Nyi nda ngu ci ne nyi e̱ nyi ra shing he Be̱ne̱ hung deze nné kwi e̱ ye̱?
“Nje ne̱ we rici nje ma, nje i fo he ka shi ye̱ye̱rri, nje nyi ko nda ne nje hung nying nwie ce̱trri lo Jesu nne Nazarra ne̱.

Kya ne nje i srra re nying a Urrushelima a nyi ngwiee ana. Nggwé̱ re-prristi e̱ i ning ngwa de̱me̱ ne nje prre nné Be̱ne̱ piriri re we ci uucwu gyiaa. He̱rri kundu ne e we yhwi, ma n yo re shing he shi ye̱ye̱rri.

He̱rri a re-zhe piriri, nje i we ngwa cinci a re-zonggrung mwe nwie we nyie̱ ne ce ré he nkang dzie̱ lo Jesu. Aha ehwie shwo nje ne mbe, he̱rri nje i cwo re-ngwie̱ ne mbe shi gbong we aha n ya we ngwa ge̱zhe̱.
“A nyi aha ni ne nje i nyia re nzhi Damaska ne nggwé̱ re-prristi mbe ning ngwa de̱me̱ ngbe re-krre̱de̱ igbe̱ng nyi cwuo nna.
Brra Be̱ri, a i nyi we brra tsi te̱ne̱ ne nje shi rê, nje e̱ ri nse̱ ngu tsie̱ ke̱sss, a si re ne̱ ne̱, nse̱ nna a wru zinye̱ ngu a si re ning grra ngbe nné ne mbe shi ciee ngbe nje.

Ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi kpi be, ngbe nje e̱ ho ya cwue ngu he nka ne nje a zhe Ibrrani he, ‘Shawulu, Shawulu! Aha nda ngwe̱ ning ngwá ge̱zhe̱ ni e̱? Ngwe̱ shi nwie yaa ngwa cinci we rici ngwe̱ shi shi izhimi ne ngu ci ta re ning le ekwe rre̱rre̱ nne ki cwo.’
“Nje e̱ ki rinng he, ‘Nyi ngwe̱ nye̱ e̱, Brrabe̱?’
“Brrabe̱ ngu a shî he, ‘Nyi nje Jesu ngwe̱ shi ning ngwa ge̱zhe̱ ne̱.
Me̱di deze ngwe̱ yo yo ne nta ngwe̱. Nje be nwie ngwe̱ ne̱ aha ngbe n re ci ngwe̱ hwie̱ nnencwuo nje ngbe sheede nje a ko nda ne ngwe̱ ri a nje ngbe re-ankya ne nje shi re ting.
Nje shi re kye̱ ne nné ngwe̱, nné Isrreela, ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne nje re te nwie mbe.

Ngwe̱ shi we kla nyyi, ngwe̱ we klu a nwie ywing re be nwie si, ngwe̱ we trru a nva igbe̱ Shetani re be nwie Be̱ne̱, ngbe aha sa rie mbe a nje, ma n we we re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe, ngbe wé̱ she ewie a nwie nné ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ we ci ré hwie̱ nné ngu.’
“Aha nii, Nggwe̱ Agrripa, ko nje ra shî nka ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ting a yarri revi e̱ we̱.

Nje ce̱ ce̱ucwung a Damaska re nzhi Urrushelima ngbe ga re-nkla ngwie̱ Yahudi zhwozhwo he̱rri re nzhi nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ma. Nje we brrong he ré si ywe̱ ré bra re be nwie Be̱ne̱, ré bra nyi re-ankya na mbe ti he mbe si ywe̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nné Yahudi e̱ mbe ning pie a Brranyi e̱ he mbe shi ning yhwe̱.

Gannyi zheng ana re be tu cwu ne̱ nyi we Be̱ne̱ ngu shi ning sheng. Aha ni nje yó he ne̱ nwie ngwa sheede re nzhi nwie iishíng ngbe brráng zhwozhwo. Ko kya ne nje he e̱ shi ka we̱, nyi we ngwiee ne nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe Musa mbe i he cwo a ci
he: ngu Krristi e̱ ri shwe ge̱zhe̱ ngbe we̱ hwie̱ na ce̱ucwung ne deze nhu, ngbe we̱ ti nné ngu ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ewie si.”
A zhe ne Bulu ngu ya cwu a nka ne̱ ni, ngbe Festu a ki ti ne ren he, “Bulu, rici ngwe̱ dzio! Brra hu re̱se̱ng ngwe̱ ne̱ shi re ci ngwe̱ kpi nzhwu!”
Bulu a ki shing he, “Brra be̱ri Festu, ko rici nje dzio we̱! Nka ne nje hé ne̱ nyi cence, a bra nyi cwu nka.
Ngu nggwe̱ e̱ hu ga re-ankya ne̱, kya nke ngu ci nje hung ki heng we dengge. Nje hu cence he ko nyi riywe̱ hu ko yankya a tsi re-ankya ne̱ we̱, aha ko bi ko ya ne i nyi a la la a ya hwrre̱ we̱.
Nggwe̱ Agrripa, ko ngwe̱ shî nka nné ti re̱se̱ng na we̱ e̱e̱? Nje hu he ngwe̱ shî!”
Agrripa ngu a he ne Bulu he, “Ngwe̱ hwie he a e̱we̱ zhe kunggu ne̱, ngwe̱ shi ning ci n hwie̱ Krrista aa?”

Ngbe Bulu a ki shing he, “Ka zhe nna re shi kunggu ka re shi je̱je̱ — nje ku Be̱ne̱ he shi de̱ re nyi we ngwe̱ nggaa ngwe̱ we̱, me̱di he ga nné ne mbe shi nwie ning ho a cwu ne̱ ré ci shi nje we̱sa ne re-roonyo ne̱!”
Ngbe nggwe̱ e̱ deze ngbe goona ngbe Banisi, ngbe re̱se̱ nné zhwozhwo.
A zhe ne mbe shi wrru a zonggrung nna, á he nka we nci mbe he, “Ko nne ne̱ e̱ nyi ko yankya na ré ki yhwe̱ ka ré ki ci uucwu gyiaa we̱.”
Agrripa a he ne Festu he, “Kundu de̱ nne ne̱ e̱ rā fo nka ne̱ re nzhi nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma we̱ á ra ki we re ne̱ ne ciee ngu.”
A zhe ne e ya rwe nka he nzhi shi ngwie jirigi rishi re nzhi Italiya, á a ngwa Bulu ngbe yá nné gyiaa a nva ya shwa shezhi ne e ki ye he Julio, a brra rotsu shezhi na Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma.

Nzhi e̱ ngwie jirigi rishi na ngwie̱ Adrramitiyo ne ngu shi pie ciee re nzhi yá re-tasha jirigi rishi na nva Asia nzhi e̱ pie ciee. Arristaku ne ngu nyi nne Tasalonika a ngwie̱ Makyidoniya i shi ngbe nzhi.
Á shwo mincwe, nzhi e̱ ya cwucwu a Sido. Julio a nyi Bulu rina, he̱rri aa ki we re ya ri rwí ngu ngbe ré ki sheng.
Nzhi e̱ deze a miimi ne ciee a jirigi rishi wa re nzhi teme ngwie̱ Kuprru, aha wu yhwá re ning brru mi ne nzhi.
Nzhi e̱ tsa brra nzhwo rishi Kyilikyia ngbe Panfiliya, nzhi e̱ ya cwucwu a Mirra a ngwie̱ Likyia.
Ngbe shwa shezhi e̱ she ya jirigi ne ngu wru Alezandrra ne ngu nyia re nzhi Italiya, ngu a níng ci yarring.

Nzhi e̱ to we sheng nzhi ci rotu piriri wire nzhi ya wre̱ a ngwie̱ Kinidu ne rwe̱e̱rwe̱ng. A zhe ne nzhi ri he ko wu a shi níng we nzhi cwo rina rina we̱, nzhi e̱ cie̱ cie̱ a teme ngwie̱ Karrita dudu ne Salimoni.
Nzhi e̱ ne̱ ne hwan dudu ne rekyi brra nzhwo rishi ne rwe̱e̱rwe̱ng he̱rri nzhi ya cwu ya ewie ne e ki ye he Ewie Rina ne ngu shi dudu ne ngwie̱ Laseya.
Nzhi e̱ ci zhe a miimi we yang he̱rri aa níng rwe̱ ngbe nzhi wara ne ciee, aha zhe e wara we yang a zhe ana, he̱rri Kotu Teedeng Yi Re-e̱ngwie̱ wara. Aha ni Bulu a he ne mbe he:
“A wene, nje ri ciee nzhi ne̱ shi ci me̱nkye̱, a shi níng ci nzhi bru ankya nzhi we yang, de̱e̱nte̱ wo he̱rri ngbe nci nzhi ma.”
Me̱di ko shwa shezhi ning sa uucwu a nka Bulu we̱, aa ning nyi cwuo we ne nka nne to jirigi nna ngbe na nne bing.

Tu ne rekyi nzhwo na ngwie̱ Laseya ko bi rina ré ning srra a zhe nze we̱, jie̱ mbe e̱ shî he canca ré wara we ne ciee ngbe ré ya cwu Finikyi wire mbe hwie̱ srra miimi. Finikyi nyi ya tasha jirigi a Karrita ne ngu ri eeze tsantsa ne nva arewa ngbe ne ga ta tsantsa ne nva kudu.

Ngbe ya e̱we̱ wu ne ngu wru nva kudu a ne̱ ne to we sheng ngbe mbe e̱ ne̱ ne hwie he mbe shi hung nyi kya ne mbe ce̱ nying nna fa. Mbe e̱ kwa re-kprincwe̱ng bro jirigi mbe e̱ ne̱ ne to dudu ne rekyi nzhwo na Karrita.
Me̱di koo ci kpe̱ we̱, ya brra wu ne e ki ye he, “Wu nva ze na arewa” ngu wru Karrita a ne̱ ne yhwa re cwi ne igbe̱.
Ngbe ngu a ya rwi jirigi nna, jirigi e̱ me̱nkye̱ng to a nyyi wu, nzhi e̱ ne̱ we ne ning brru ne emerin ne wu nna níng yrru re cwi.

A zhe ne nzhi ya cwu shi nzhi shi wara teme ya e̱we̱ ngwie̱ ne ngu shi zetsi brra nzhwo rishi nna á ye ngwie̱ nna he Kooda. Nzhi ning rwe̱ rwe̱ wire nzhi ning brru mi ne konkrong cwucwu re be mi jirigi nna.

A zhe ne mbe kwa konkro nna re be mi zete jirigi, mbe e̱ nyi zentsi mbe e̱ ci ndu a tahwie jirigi nna mbe e̱ ning rrweng kishi jirigi nna ri kprre. Á to kishi mbe ri ya ngwie a yarri nzha a rekyi ngwie̱ Libia. Ngbe mbe e̱ trru re-kprincwe̱ng bro jirigi mbe e̱ ria, wire mbe e̱ we wu re yrru jirigi nna we ni.
Brra ncwu a nyi ta gbe̱ jirigi nna we ni, ngbe a tu na ngu ning zhweng, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne trru nkpe ne ngu shi yarri jirigi nna re ywe̱ yarri rishi.
A otu na ngu ning zhweng wa, mbe e̱ we nci mbe á zi yá re-ankyang cwuo na jirigi nna a yarri rishi.
Nzhi ci rotu piriri ko nzhi hung ri ne̱ ka ya e̱nde̱ we̱, se we brra wu ne ngu ning yarra we yang, nzhi e̱ yaa zhwu we he ko nzhi shi drre̱ we̱.

Bulu ri he nné nna á fo zhe we yang koó ye yâ we̱, ngu a cinye̱ a tsi mbe ngu a he, “Wene, kundu nyi rā ho nka nje ko nyi ra deze a Karrita we̱, wire ko re-ankya á ra cwu he ni ne̱ ka nzhi zhwu yankya we̱.
Me̱di a zhe ne̱ nje cwe nva ne nyi he nyi yaa rwe, ko bi ko ya nyi ngu shi ci shweni we̱. A nyi we jirigi ne̱ ngu shi ci shweni.
Aha a tehin, ya njeli Be̱ne̱ — ne nje nyi na ngu, ne nje bra ki yé mbè — a i be ya yo dudu ne nje,

ngu a he ne nje he, ‘Bulu, shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci owu we̱! Aha cence ngwe̱ cwo a yo a nyyi Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma. Aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re be nwie ngwe̱, a shi ci ga nné ne mbe shi ciee ngbe ne ngwe̱ ne̱ ré drre̱.’
Aha nii, nyi rwe rie wene, nje sa rie a Be̱ne̱ he kya ne ngu ning heng ne̱ shi ci we ye̱ye̱rri ni.
Nzhi shi bi we ya hwie̱ a nzha a ya ngwie̱ ne brra nzhwo rishi ne̱ ki grra.”
A otu na shwa ne otu weni a totu ne wu shi we nwie níng yrru a yarri Brra Nzhwo Rishi Zetsi, re be brra tsi totu, ngbe nné to jirigi nna mbe e̱ hwie he nzhi sa dudu ne rekyi ci.
Ngbe mbe e̱ mwa cwuncwuu rishi nna ne kyang ming, mbe e̱ she aa cwu re-mita nshwa weni. Mbe e̱ srra tsie̱ mbe e̱ mwa cwuncwuu nna wa, mbe e̱ she nyi re-mita nshwa wetsie̱.

Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne hwie he ka jirigi nna cwo a kpra ya kprahwan, owu a we yhwe̱. Mbe e̱ trru re-kprincwe̱ng bro jirigi komo weni a merin jirigi nna, mbe e̱ ci yarri rishi. Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne mwo he ewie re tsie̱.
Ngbe nné to jirigi e̱ ne̱ ne kre rêng to mbe we jirigi nna, mbe e̱ wru mi ne konkro re be mi zete rishi nwie tiyi shi mbe ce̱ ci ya kprincwe̱ng bro jirigi wa a ncwuee jirigi nna.
Ngbe Bulu a he ne shwa shezhi ngbe kpi re-shezhi he, “Kundu de̱ nné mbe rre̱ mbe srra we yarri jirigi ne̱ we̱, ko shi nyi drre̱ we̱.”
Aha ni re-shezhi e̱ ca ndu ne mbe bro konkro nna, mbe e̱ ki we re kpe yarri rishi nna.
Tu we ne ewie rishi tsie̱, Bulu a ne̱ ne we shwe̱ rehwie he ré ye yâ, a he ne mbe he, “Aa ci rotu shwa ne otu weni ne nyi shi nwie srra we ne nzhwo re tsio, ko nyi ci ko yankya nu we̱.
Nje cwe nva ne nyi, nyi ye yankya a zhe ne̱ aha ngbe nyi she drre̱, ko bi koo ya nyi ne nkwe rici ngu zunzrru shi ci shweni we̱.”
A zhe ne Bulu ngu he ni, ngu a fo brredi ngu a ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng a nyyi mbe zhwozhwo, ngu a ne̱ ne yeng.
Wire aa we ci tundu he̱rri ko nye̱ mbe e̱ ye yâ ma.
Zhwozhwo nzhi a yarri jirigi nna nzhi cwu nné nnywa wehwie ne nshwa natsie̱ ne otu rritsie̱.
A zhe ne ko nye̱ mbe ngu ye ngu shwe, wire mbe e̱ trru re-buhu alikama mbe e̱ ywe̱ a yarri brra nzhwo rishi aha ngbe jirigi nna re hwie̱ haara.

A zhe ne ewie tsie̱, ko nné to jirigi nna á hu ka nyi zohu ewie ne mbe ning shi we̱, me̱di á ri ya ewie ne ngu ya ci nnywua a brra nzhwo rishi nna ne nzha rekying nna ngu ya wre̱, ngbe mbe e̱ rwe he canca mbe ne̱ ne jirigi nna re ya hwie̱ a nzha nna kundu ngu ri shi hung ci ni.

Aha ni mbe e̱ ca ndu na re-kprincwe̱ng bro jirigi nna mbe e̱ we yarri rishi, mbe e̱ ning brru bi ndu na mbe bro kyang to jirigi nna. Wire mbe e̱ fo kla trro na ncwuee jirigi nna a zeteng ngbe wu re ywrru jirigi nna re nzhi ncwuee, wu a níng lu re nzhi rekyi ci.

Me̱di zhe ne nzhi ya cwu nwie rugu nzha a yarri rishi nna, jirigi e̱ ya rwi nzha ning ngwie. Yincwuee nna a ngwie yarri nzha koo hung shwo we̱. Ngbe emerinng nna a kprre nklanklang aha gu rishi ne mbe ki kpé ne ren.
Re-shezhi e̱ rwe onu he mbe shi yhwi nné gyiaa kishi á ri wa ruwaa ré to drre̱.
Me̱di shwa shezhi nna ce̱ kyia Bulu, aha ni koo we we ré we yhwi we̱, me̱di a he ne mbe he nne nke ngu ri hung kpe yarri rishi re wa ruwaa re nzhi ci re ke̱she wru;
wire kpi mbe wé̱ ngrra nkla nkwe ka yá re-nkla jirigi nna ho re nzhi ci. Á nyi ni ngbe ko nye̱ e̱ ya wru ci rina rina.
A zhe ne nzhi ya wre̱ ci rina rina, nzhi e̱ timi ngwie̱ nna nyi ya ngwie̱ ne brra nzhwo rishi ki grra ne e ye ngwie̱ nna he Malita.
Nné ngwie̱ nna á níng nyi rina we yang. Á níng se̱ ne nva wehwie he̱rri á níng yhwa ro ngbe nzhi wi aha nze ne ngu shi nwie wie ne wu bra srru.
Bulu a ya tsu nkwe nwie cing a yarri ro nna, ngbe ya kprre ne ngu ho ro ki kpre ngu a wru ngu a ya gye̱ Bulu a nva, ngu a ki tsa.
A zhe ne nné ngwie̱ nna mbe ri nshe a nva Bulu, mbe e̱ ne̱ ne he we nci mbe he, “Mahu nne ne̱ nyi nne yhwi nné, ko ngbe ne ngu drre̱ a yarri brra nzhwo rishi ne̱, he̱rri ne cwu ko Le̱e̱kyi
Me̱di Bulu zi va ngu, ngu a zhwu nshe nna a yarri ro. Koo she ruhu gung we̱.

Nné nna á sa riyii nwie tsio mbe ri ka rwe̱ Bulu shi mwi, ka re gu kpe we zhe zunzrru re hu; me̱di aa fo zhe we yang koó ri yankya me̱nkye̱ ki she we̱, mbe e̱ hwie nka te̱nte̱ mbe e̱ he, “Kaat, mahu nne ne̱ nyi ya be̱ne̱!”
We dudu ne ewie nna a bi rebe Pobliyu ne ngu nyi nggwe̱ ngwie̱ nna. Ngbe ngu a níng ko re nzhi ice a ta ri ngu. Ngu a ya níng bro a ta ri ngu rina rina he̱rri rotu wetsie̱.
A zhe ana be̱ ngu shi nywe̱ ne rwe̱ bra ngbe torri. Ngbe Bulu a ngwie zonggru ngu ki dzie, aa ki ku Be̱ne̱, ngu a ki gara va ngu a ki kyia.
Re̱se̱ ne ngu ci ni, ngbe ga kpi nné ruhu zhwozhwo a ngwie̱ nna mbe e̱ ne̱ ne cwo ne e cwo we kyia.
Nné nna á níng ngwa grime̱ we yang. Aa be zhe ne nzhi shi ngwie jirigi rishi nzhi ne̱, á níng be mi ne ko nda nzhi ce̱.
A zhe ne nzhi ci nyhwe̱ wetsie̱, wire nzhi e̱ ngwie jirigi rishi na ne e ki ye he “Reyhwii Kpanshwu” ne ngu wru a Alezandrra ngu srra a ngwie̱ nna ngbe zhe wu srru ngbe nze re wara wire, nzhi e̱ ne̱.
Nzhi ya cwu a ngwie̱ Sirrakusa, nzhi e̱ ci rotu wetsie̱ a miimi.
Nzhi e̱ deze a miimi nzhi e̱ ya wre̱ a Rrigu. A otu na ngu ning zhweng, wu na wru nva kudu a ne̱ ne yhwa, a otu na hwieng nzhi e̱ ya cwu ngwie̱ Putioli.
Nzhi e̱ she yá nné ce̱ nka a miimi. Mbe e̱ cwe nva ne nzhi he nzhi ci se̱ti zunzrru ngbe mbe. Wire nzhi cwo nzhi ya wre̱ Rroma fa.

A zhe ne nné ce̱ nka na miimi mbe ya ho he nzhi shi rê re be, mbe e̱ pie ciee gbong re be nyi ne nzhi a kaawe̱ Apiu ngbe Reri Nné Ice Wetsie̱. A zhe ne Bulu ngu we ri, aa ning bra ki shwe̱ ehwie, ngu a ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng.
A zhe ne nzhi ya cwu Rroma, á we Bulu re srra we srra ngu ne ya shezhi ngu ki cwo.

A zhe ne nzhi ci rotu wetsie̱, Bulu a ye nnencwueé nné Yahudi. A zhe ne mbe ya mwe, ngu a he ne mbe he, “Re-gimbe, ko ngbe ne ko nje nyi nné nzhi e̱ yankya me̱nkye̱ we̱, ko nje bra nyi yankya me̱nkye̱ ne re-teede yó nzhi we̱, me̱di á ning pie a Urrushelima á ning ngwa a nva nné Rroma.
Á ning rin re-nka, ngbe mbe e̱ ce̱ ning cire, aha koó ning she nje bi ya vini a yankya ne nje nyi he̱rri ré ning yhwe̱.
Me̱di zhe ne nné Yahudi mbe ra shing, nje e̱ fo nka nna re be nwie Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma, ko nyi aha he nje bi ya nka a rici nné nje e̱ we̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje ce̱ níng ri ngbe n bra he nka ne nyi. Cwu nka nna nyi nke: a nyi aha nne nke ne nné Isrreela mbe sa riyii a be ngu ne nje shi gyiaa ne̱.”
Mbe e̱ ki shing he, “Ko nzhi she ya krre̱de̱ ne wru Yahudi aha ngwe̱ we̱, ko bra bi ya gimbe ne ngu wru miimi e̱ ngu ya níng ti yankya me̱nkye̱ a rici ngwe̱ we̱.
Me̱di nzhi ce̱ ho kya ne ngwe̱ ning hwie yi e̱, aha nzhi hu he nneywí ko he á ce̱trri ekpri nke ne ngwe̱ ning shi ne̱.”

Aha ni mbe e̱ sa otu ne mbe cwo a ning mwe ngbe Bulu. Ngbe mbe e̱ ya be gbungbungbu a nwie ne Bulu ning srra. Á ce̱ we mincwe re nzhi cwu totu ne Bulu shi nwie we ti nka Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱. Aa nyi koori he ngu we kwa re be nwie Jesu ne Nti Nka Musa ngbe ne re-krre̱de̱ nné ti re̱se̱ng.
Yá mbe e̱ shî kya ne ngu we heng nna, me̱di yá ra shing.
Aha ni mbe e̱ mwe mbe e̱ yaa ra nka we nci mbe, ngbe mbe e̱ wrru nyia a zhe ne Bulu ngu we he nkang frong he, “Nshe Wiri e̱ i he cence ne yó nyi a zhe ne ngu i he nka ne Ishaya nne ti re̱se̱ng he:
‘Ywa nwie nné mbe rre̱ ngwe̱ he ne mbe he:
“Nyi ri ho we ho, me̱di ko nyi ri hu re̱se̱ng we̱.
Nyi ri ri we ri, me̱di ko nyi ri di gung we̱.”
Aha ronu rie mbe e̱ á klo.
A bra we bi rwe̱ ré ho ne re-uucwu mbe,
á bra ku nyyi mbe.
De̱e̱ ni we̱, á ra hung ring ne nyyi mbe,
re-uucwu mbe wé̱ bra ho,
ngbe ronu rie mbe wé̱ she hu re̱se̱ng,
he̱rri wé̱ bra re be nwie nje,
ngbe ma n we kyia.’
“Aha ni nje ce̱ nyi hu re̱se̱ng he nka kyia Be̱ne̱ e̱ á ngwa Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱, mbe e̱ á shi hong!” [
A zhe ne Bulu ngu he ni, nné Yahudi e̱ wrru nwie yaa ti ronu ce we nggaa mbe zhwuzhwuzhwu.]
Bulu ci re-rie wehwie nwie srra a miimi a zonggru haya ne ngu pie, ne ngu srra re si nné ice ne mbe cwo ki dzie.
A brró nka Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ nwie mie̱ nneywí nka Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi we dengge, koó ki yú we̱.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Bulu ne ngu nyi hwie Jesu Krristi, ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ki ye, ngu bra ki kyie re hwie̱ nnente, ngbe re brro Nka Rina Be̱ne̱.
Nka Rina ne̱ Be̱ne̱ i ning sa jee gannyi tiya a nu nné ti re̱se̱ng shi ne e wie yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱
a rici Kowe ngu. Ngu Kowe nna, a shî ngu na nneywi, á i ki bî a nzhwe Dooda.
A shî ngu na Be̱ne̱, Nshe Wiri ti ne igbe̱ he nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱ a deze ne ngu deze nhu. Jesu Krristi nyi Brrabe̱ nzhi.
Nyi aha Jesu Krristi ne nje she ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ aha ngbe n hwie̱ nnente, n kwa Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ngbe ré sa rie a ngu, ré bra zhwe nka ngu.
Nyi e̱ ma nyi shi tsi nné ne Be̱ne̱ ngu we ye ré hwie̱ na Jesu Krristi.
Aha ni nje wie krre̱de̱ ne̱ re nzhi nwie nné ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱ ne mbe shi Rroma zhwozhwo ne ngu we ye ré hwie̱ nné ngu.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ nzhi ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe nyi, ngbe nyi bra she srra rina.
Na zrru, nje ci Be̱ne̱ nje kijie̱ng ne nyi zhwozhwo aha kya ne Jesu Krristi ngu nyi aha nzhi, aha nka a se̱ ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo yu he nyi bi sa rie.
Ngu Be̱ne̱ ne nje shi ncwuong brro Nka Rina Kowe ngu ne ehwie nje zhwozhwo a nyi sheede nje, aa hu he nje srra re lu aha nyi we̱sa ne kpo
ko zohu zhe ne nje shi ku Be̱ne̱. Nje kú Be̱ne̱ he ka a zhe ne ne̱, kundu ngu ri nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ ya rê re kla ngbe n hung be nwie nyi.
Nje ku ucwua nyi we yang. Nje ce̱ he nje ra be ngbe n ya níng ci nyi she ya mwo rina nwie Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngbe nyi ning bra ci igbe̱.
Ngbe aha n níng shwe̱ rehwie ne sa rie nje, nyi e̱ nyi ning shwe̱ ehwie ne sa rie nyi ma.
Re-gimbe, nje ce̱ nyi hu he nje nyi ne hwie nkang be nwie nyi, me̱di ko nje she riwie̱ we̱. Nje ce̱ he nje ra she yá a tsi nyi ne mbe shi si ywe̱, we shi ne nje nyi a tsi yá Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.
Nje bi tsie ko nye̱ a rici nje aha n ki brro nka: ka re nyi nne Heleni ka re nyi nne ne ko ngu nyi nne Heleni we̱; ka re nyi nné zentsi ka nné riywe̱ zentsi.
Kya a nyi nke ne nje nyí we te̱te̱ he n ya brro Nka Rina a nwie nyi ne nyi shi a Rroma.
Ko nje to nshwu brro Nka Rina we̱, aha nyi ngu ne ngu nyi igbe̱ na ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning kyia ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a ngu. Aa ke̱she be nwie nné Yahudi, wire ngu ya be nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.
Aha ngu Nka Rina ne̱ tí redziee na ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱. Ngu zhwe redziee ne̱ nyi sa rie kya ngu ce̱ a ce̱ucwung ngu re nzhi cwu we gamang, shi ne e wie he, “Nne redziee
Á ti ren Be̱ne̱ ne ngu wru a zinye̱ a zete ko zohu zhwe nne e̱ngwie̱ ngbe nne riywe̱ redziee. Aha re-e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe nyí e̱ ci ko shi kpi nné ré hu raywrra Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Aha ko nda ne ngu ye ré hu a rici Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi we gbeng a nwie mbe, aha Be̱ne̱ we ko nda we cwe nkyie.

Gannyi zheng nyi ebe ngwie̱, e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe igbe̱ ngu na he̱rri tiya ne koó ri ne riyii we̱ e̱ á ri we gbeng. Á hung hu shî ngu a re-ankya ne ngu nyi, aha ni ko bi nne re he ngu nyí riywe̱ hung we̱.

Ko ngbe ne mbe hu Be̱ne̱ e̱, koó ki ngwa grime̱ ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ki ngwa we̱ wire re ning hwie̱ ré ki ci kijie̱ng. Me̱di re-hwie nka mbe á shi we dede, ronu rie mbe e̱ á shi we hwerri we e̱ ywing.
Á hwié he mbe bi zentsi me̱di á ti mwa.
Ne na ré ye Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ning shi he̱rri tiya mbè, á bra ne̱ ne ye re-ankya na ne mbe kwi mbè, shi re-kpanshwu ne e nyi shi shi nneywi, ngbe re̱mie̱ ngbe nnyié̱ ngbe ankya kwa rehwie be.
Aha ni Be̱ne̱ nga nva we we ngbe ré tu rici nwie nyi re-ankya le̱le̱ ne ronu rie mbe ce̱, mbe e̱ ning cwuvu nwie nyi re-ankya bi nshwu ne re-rwe̱ mbe.

Á ra raywrra Be̱ne̱, á ce̱ rabrra nwie ye re-ankya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi mbè, nwie we nyi cwuo ne na mbe ra ye Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyí Nne Nying nna mbè. A nyi ngu ne ngu be ré ki de he̱rri tiya. Nde re shi ni.
Aha ni Be̱ne̱ nga nva we we ne re-cwuo bi nshwu, he̱rri mbrrú mbe e̱ á yaa kre we nci mbe ne ko ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱.

We ni wa, ntó we ni nywrra ne mbrrú shi kya ne e nyi, á ne̱ ne bi recwue nné ntó we nci mbe. Ntó nywrra ngbe ntó, kya le̱le̱, aha ni we nci mbe á ne̱ ne yaa be mi ne ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu nyi lede re-cwuo le̱le̱ mbe.
Aha ni tu ne mbe fo he hu Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi we cwuo shweni, aa nga nva we we re nyi kya ne ronu rie le̱le̱ mbe e̱ mbe hwié, nwie nyi re-ankya ne ko mbe ra nyi we̱.
Rehwie mbe e̱ shwe ne ga re-nzhwe riywe̱ redziee, ngbe hwie̱, ngbe ecwue, ngbe le̱le̱, ngbe ne ehwie ra, ngbe yhwi nné, ngbe ko, ngbe rabrra, ngbe ra ya nne hwie, ngbe he nné.
Á hé nkang dzio nné, á ra Be̱ne̱, á cwi nné, á yaa kywo, á yaa de we nggaa mbe, á kré we re-rê hwie̱, á ra ho nka nné we bî.
Á nyi riywe̱ rici, koó bro jee we̱, koó bi rie wie we̱ wire re ning hwie̱ ré bi naana.
Ko ngbe ne mbe hu he Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ he nné nyi zhwe ankya ne̱ á mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré kwi, gbengbe ni ko nyi we nying ne mbe yaa sa nwie nying we̱, á si ma nné nying.

Aha nii, ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ nyi yaká nné nka, ko ngwe̱ bi kya he we̱, ko ngwe̱ ra bra nyi nye̱. Aha a zhe ne ngwe̱ nyi yaká nné nka, ngwe̱ yaa nyi we rici ngwe̱ng tu ne ngwe̱ shi nwie nyi re-ankya ne mbe nyi e̱ ma.
Nzhi hu he nyi nka Be̱ne̱ a zete nné nyi zhwe re-ankya ana shi ye̱ye̱rri.
Kei rwe! Ngwe̱ e̱ ne ngwe̱ nyi zhwe re-ankya ana, ngwe̱ bra nyi yaká nné nka. Ngwe̱ hwie he ngwe̱ ri to drre̱ nyi nka Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱?
Ka ngwe̱ dzie̱ ehwie rina Be̱ne̱, ngbe ehwie sheng ngu, ngbe rwe ehwie ngu aa? Ko ngwe̱ hu cence he nyi aha ehwie rina ngu ne̱ ne ngu re kwá ngbe ngwe̱ se̱ ywe̱ wo ye̱?
Me̱di aha klo rici ngbe gbanggrraang ra se̱ ywe̱, ngwe̱ yaa bra cinci we rici ngwe̱ a zheng nyi nka Be̱ne̱ a Tu ne Be̱ne̱ ri ti ren ngu ngbe nyi nka ngu ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri.
Be̱ne̱ ri ngwa ko nye̱ lede ngu ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu nyi.
Nné mbe ne mbe yaa rwe nwie nyi cwuo rina, á kre brra grime̱ ngbe ce ne ko ngu bi gama we̱. Mbe ana Be̱ne̱ ri we ngwa ce he̱rri tiya.
Me̱di nné mbe ne mbe ce̱ we nci mbe, ne mbe ra raywrra nwie zhwe e̱ngwie̱, Be̱ne̱ ri we kro brra ren ngu ngbe cinci.
A ri bi ge̱zhe̱ ngbe ci yhwrro aha ko zohu nne nyi e̱ngwie̱, shi ngra nyi nné Yahudi we̱, ga ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ zhwozhwo.
Me̱di a ri bi brra grime̱, ngbe srra rina aha ko nye̱ ne ngu nyi rina, shi ngra nyi nné Yahudi we̱, ga ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ zhwozhwo.
Aha ko Be̱ne̱ kyie nné kyie kyie we̱.
Ga nné mbe nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱sa ne hu Nti Nka Musa, á ci shweni we̱sa ne hu Nti Nka Musa. Ga nné ne mbe nyi e̱ngwie̱ ne hu re̱se̱ Nti Nka Musa, á ri we nyi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka Musa.
Ko nyi nné ho Nti Nka nna mbe bi redziee a nyyi Be̱ne̱ e̱ we̱, me̱di nyi nné ne mbe nyi kya ne Nti Nka nna he.

Ko Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ á bi Nti Nka we̱, me̱di kundu kya ne mbe nyí shi ne rehwie mbe we mie̱ng nna shi ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nti Nka hé, mahu á hu kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri ngbe kya ne ko ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱ we nci mbe, ko ngbe ne riywe̱ Nti Nka.
Re̱kpe̱e̱ mbe e̱ tí he á wie Nti Nka nna a yarri rehwie mbe, ne ronu rie mbe e̱ bra tí he shi ni cence, tu ne re-hwie nka mbe e̱ srra ya zhe we̱ we ti brru mbe, ya zhe we̱ we ting he koó brru we̱.
Aha ni we shi Nka Rina ne nje brró, a cwo a ci we ye̱ye̱rri ni a Tuuye ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ri ci Krristi Jesu re nyi nneywí nka aha re-ankya ne mbe shi la la a yarri rehwie nka mbe.
Ma ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ yé rici ngwe̱ he nne Yahudi, ngwe̱ sa rici a Nti Nka Musa; he̱rri ngwe̱ cwe zewe he ngwe̱ shi ngbe Be̱ne̱.
Ngwe̱ hu kya ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱ he ngwe̱ nyi; he̱rri ngwe̱ bra mie̱ a Nti Nka, ngwe̱ bra hung kyie kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri.
Ngwe̱ hu he cence ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ shi shi nne kwa nnencwué̱, he ngwe̱ nyi kya si a nwie nné ne mbe shi nwie ywing,
he ngwe̱ bra nyi nne mie̱ nné riywe̱ zentsi ngbe nné riywe̱ hung. Aha ne a yarri Nti Nka, ngwe̱ bi hu re̱se̱ ko nda ngbe raywrra ngu.
Ma ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ mié̱ yakáng, rimi ngwe̱ bra me̱nkye̱ yaa mie̱ng we rici ngwe̱ e̱ ye̱? Ngwe̱ brro nka he de̱ ré nyi nca we̱, ko ngwe̱ nyi nca wo oo?
Ngwe̱ he de̱ ré nyi njè we̱, ko ngwe̱ nyi we̱ e̱e̱? Ngwe̱ ra kpanshwu, ko ngwe̱ nyi nca a re-brranyi wo ye̱?
Ngwe̱ yaa kywo he ngwe̱ bi Nti Nka Be̱ne̱, ngwe̱ bra ti Be̱ne̱ nshwu nwie hle Nti Nka ngu aa?
Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he, “Nyi nné Yahudi e̱ nyi ci Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ á he nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱.”
Kundu ngwe̱ zhwé Nti Nka, mahu nyi sheede he ngwe̱ shi tsi nné Be̱ne̱ ne mbe bi teedeng ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó a, me̱di kundu de̱ ngwe̱ zhwe Nti Nka we̱, mahu ko cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó ngwe̱ e̱ bi mpe̱ni we̱.
Kundu Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne koó we ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó a we̱ mbe zhwe Nti Nka, ko Be̱ne̱ we̱ we ri shi á we cang we̱ e̱e̱?

Aha ni Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne koó we ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó a we̱ ne mbe zhwe Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ á ri níng ting, nyi nné Yahudi e̱, he nyi brru. Aha ko ngbe ne nyi bi Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ ne e wie e̱, ko nyi zhwé we̱.
Te̱nte̱ nné Yahudi na Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi nné nyi teedeng ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó aha mbe ti he mbe nyi nné Yahudi e̱e̱? Aawo, ca ikpe rwe̱ e̱ nyi kya ne e nyí we teme ci.

Me̱di te̱nte̱ nne Yahudi e̱ nyi nne nke ne ngu nyi te̱nte̱ng a yarring, cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó na ngu a nyi e̱ngwie̱ ne e trru a nu rie ngu. Nke ana nyi cwuo Nshe Wiri, ko nyi na Nti Nka ne e wie we̱. Zhwe nne nke ne̱ nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu ki de, ko nyi nneywí we̱.
Aha ni, ma nné Yahudi e̱ á ne̱ kpi nné e̱ a nda, ka ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó nna shi we shweni?
Aawo, a bi mpe̱ni we yang! Aha tu ce̱ucwung, Be̱ne̱ i ke̱she we ngwa re-nka ngu ré bro.
Ma kundu aa ra bi kpi mbe ne mbe i ra sa rie a ngu rre? We̱ ci Be̱ne̱ re kpo jee ne ngu i we sang nna aa?
Ko tsie̱ tsie̱ ko shi ni we̱! Ko ngbe ne ga nneywí zhwozhwo ra nyi nné rabrra, ko shi re bra raywrra nka Be̱ne̱ we̱. A shi we shi kya ne e wie he,
“Brrabe̱, nka ngwe̱ e̱ tí he ko nda ngwe̱ he e̱ shi we ye̱ye̱rri,
ngwe̱ bra drré̱ ko nye̱ a nwieng nyi nka.”

Me̱di kundu riywe̱ redziee nzhi e̱ ci nneywí ré di redziee na Be̱ne̱ e̱ krrankrrankrra, ma nzhi e̱ bra he rimi wa? Nzhi e̱ hung he he Be̱ne̱ e̱ brru aha ne ngu níng kro brra ren ngu aa? (Me̱di nje rin nke e̱ a hwie nka na nneywi.)
Aawo, ko shi ni we̱ ko tsie! Kundu de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ ra bi redziee we̱, we̱ ce̱ rimi re nyi ebe ngwie̱ nka?
Ya we̱ hung he, “Ma kundu riywe̱ raywrra nje e̱ ci á rí raywrra na Be̱ne̱ e̱ we gbeng, he̱rri aa ci á dé Be̱ne̱ e̱, ma aha nda ne ngu cwo a ning ngwa cinci aha re-e̱ngwie̱ nje e̱?”

A ri shi ni ma ko nzhi e̱ he, “Nde nzhi ke̱ we ne nyi e̱ngwie̱ aha ngbe ré hung ri rinang nna wo ye̱?” He̱rri yá nné e̱ á ning cwi nwie ning ci nka he nje he zhwe nka ne̱. Zhwe nné ana á ri we ngwa cinci shi kya ngu we mwa ye̱ye̱rri.
Ma a zhe ne ne̱ rre? Nzhi nné Yahudi e̱ nzhi ne̱ kpi nné e̱e̱? Aawo, ko tsie̱nzhwu! Nzhi ke̱she he he, ga nné Yahudi ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ zhwozhwo á nyi e̱ngwie̱.
A shi we shi kya ne e wie he,
“Ko bi nne redziee we̱, ko zunzrru.
Ko bi nne hu re̱se̱ng we̱,
ko bra bi nne ngu kré rê Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Ko nye̱ bra teme e ngwa Be̱ne̱,
ga mbe zhwozhwo á mwe e dzio,
ko bi nne nyi re-cwuo rina we̱,
ko zunzrru ko bi gung we̱.
Re-nka mbe e̱ gwra shi nyi re-ria ne mbe shi gang,
ko nda ne re-le mbe hé nyi we rabrra,
re-nka nu mbe e̱ kpre shi defi kprre.
A nyi we re-nka wie rie
ngbe cwi nné mbe wrru nu mbe.
Nta mbe e̱ á shi we hooro
re nzhi wa roshwo.
Ko he mbe ning ywa
á cí nneywí ruhu nwie we ngwa cinci.
Koó hu srra rina gung we̱.
Koó bra hu to owu Be̱ne̱ a srra mbe we̱.”
Me̱di nzhi hu he ko nda ne Nti Nka ne̱ hé, a hé re nzhi nwie nné mbe ne e we ngwa Nti Nka nna, aha ngbe ko nye̱ re hu he ngu brru, ngbe ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo re bra hu he Be̱ne̱ bi nyi nka.
Aha kundu ngu nyi we nkang zhwe Nti Nka ne̱ ko bi nne re shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱. Cwuo Nti Nka nke he re ti he nneywíng he mbe nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, Be̱ne̱ e̱ ti yaka rêng ci nneywí ré shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu we̱sa ne Nti Nka Musa. Nti Nka Musa ngbe re-nka nné ti re̱se̱ng nna á ngwa sheede he shi ni.
Be̱ne̱ cí nneywí ré shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu aha ne mbe sa rie a Jesu Krristi. A sé̱ ko nye̱ ne ngu se̱ Krristi, ko kyie kyie we̱.
Aha ga nné zhwozhwo nyi e̱ngwie̱ á re̱ re nzhi cwu grime̱ Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱, aa ngwa kya na na ngu, ne ngu ci ko nye̱ re ci tsantsa a nyyi ngu, ne cwuo ne Krristi Jesu ngu nyi aha ngbe ko nye̱ re she drre̱.

Be̱ne̱ ci Jesu re hwie̱ teedeng kyu re-e̱ngwie̱. Ngbe aha roshwo Jesu ne e wa, ré we ko nye̱ re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu ne ngu nyi aha sa rie ngu. Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi ni aha ngu bra ti redziee ngu ngbe ehwie sheng ngu, shi ne ngu i we nné re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe a tiya we̱sa ne we ngwa cinci.
Be̱ne̱ i ti zhwe ehwie sheng ngu ni aha ngbe ngu ti redziee ngu a zhe ne ne̱. Aha ni aa ci ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a Jesu re shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu.
Ma kyang cwe zewe nzhi e̱ nyi nda? Ko bi we̱! Ma nyi nda ngu ci ne ngu shi ni e̱? Nyi aha ne nzhi zhwe Nti Nka Musa aa? Aawo, nyi aha sa rie nzhi.
Aha nzhi shî he nneywi e̱ shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha sa rie ngu, ko nyi aha zhwe Nti Nka Musa we̱.
Ka Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi na nné Yahudi we nggaa mbe e̱e̱? Ko nyi na Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ ma we̱ e̱e̱? Ee, a nyi na Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ma.
Tu ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi we zunzrru, a shi ci nné Yahudi ré shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu ne sa rie mbe, a bra shi ci Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ re shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu ne sa rie mbe ma.
A ri shi ni, ma aa ci shi nzhi rwi Nti Nka a be aha sa rie e̱e̱? Aawo, ko shi ni we̱, se ka nzhi ci Nti Nka re ning bra ci igbe̱.
Ma nzhi he rimi ne Ibrrahin, brra yo ho nné nzhi e̱? Nyi nda ngu i mie̱ a nka sa rie e̱?
Kundu Ibrrahin e̱ i rā shi tsantsa aha re-cwuo ne ngu i nyi, mahu a i ra bi kyang cwe zewe, me̱di ko a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he rimi? A he, “Ibrrahin i shî nka Be̱ne̱, ngbe aha sa rie ngu Be̱ne̱ e̱ he shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu.”
Nne nke ne ngu nyi cwuo a, ko ledeng cwuo ngu a nyi kya ne e ki na na we̱, me̱di nyi kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ki trrang.
Nne nke ne ko ngu sa we rici nwie nyi re-cwuo we̱, ngu sa rie a Be̱ne̱ ne ngu cí nné e̱ngwie̱ ré shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu, Be̱ne̱ we̱ he sa rie ngu a nyi redziee.
Ga ngbe Dooda i he nka aha zhwe mwo rina na nne ne Be̱ne̱ he shi tsantsa aha sa rie we̱sa ne re-cwuo ne ngu nyi e̱. A i he,
“Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne e we we re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe,
he̱rri ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ci ga bru
ne re-ngwie̱ngwie̱ mbe zhwozhwo!
Mwo rina nyi na nne nke
ne ko Brrabe̱ shi nwie bro re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu hwie we̱.”

Ma ngu mwo rina nke ne Dooda ning he nka ne̱ nyi we na nné Yahudi e̱e̱, ka ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ zhwozhwo? Kya ne nzhi shi nwie heng nna nyi nke he: a nyi aha sa rie ne Be̱ne̱ i he he Ibrrahin e̱ shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu.
A i nyi a zhe nda? A zhe ne i rishi cie̱ Ibrrahin e̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó, ka ne e ki cie̱ng? Á i ma ne e rishi, ko nyi zhe ne e ki cie̱ng we̱.

Wire á ya ki cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó a merinng, cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó ne e ki cie̱ng ne̱ nyi sheede redziee ngu aha sa rie ngu a Be̱ne̱, tu ne ngu ka rishi we yarri ngwie̱ ne koó ki cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó we̱. Aha ni Ibrrahin e̱ hwie̱ be̱ na ga nné ne mbe sa rie a Be̱ne̱, ne Be̱ne̱ he á hwie̱ nné redziee, ko ngbe ne koó we ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó we̱.
Aa bra hwie̱ be̱ na ga nné ne e we cang, ne ko bra nyi we nka he á we ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó a we̱. Me̱di á zhwe hwie̱ be̱ nzhi Ibrrahin e̱ ne zhwe sa rie ngu tu we ne e rishi ki cie̱ng.
Ko nyi aha zhwe Nti Nka ne Be̱ne̱ i sa Ibrrahin ngbe nzhwe ngu jee he ebe ngwie̱ shi hwie̱ ngge mbe we̱. Me̱di nyi aha ne ngu i sa rie, ngu a hwie̱ nne redziee a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Kundu ne e shi ngwa nné zhwe Nti Nka kya ne Be̱ne̱ i ning sa jee e̱, mahu ko sa rie nneywi e̱ bi mpe̱ni we̱, ngbe jee Be̱ne̱ e̱ we̱ nyi we shwening.
Aha Nti Nka a cwo mi ne ge̱zhe̱. Ewie ne ko ngu ning bi Nti Nka we̱, ko bi he á ra zhwe Nti Nka we̱.

Be̱ne̱ i sa jee ne̱ aha sa rie. A i ci ni aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱, ngbe re ti he cence jee nna nyi kya na na Be̱ne̱ re nzhi nwie nzhwe Ibrrahin zhwozhwo. Ko nyi we na nné zhwe Nti Nka we̱, me̱di ngbe ga nné ne mbe bi sa rie shi Ibrrahin. Aha Ibrrahin e̱ nyi be̱ nzhi zhwozhwo.

A shi we shi ne e wie yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, “Nje re ci ngwe̱ hwie̱ be̱ na re-ngwie̱ piriri.” Mahu aa ti cence he a shi ye̱ye̱rri a nyyi Be̱ne̱ he Ibrrahin e̱ nyi be̱ nzhi aha sa rie ngu a Be̱ne̱ ne ngu bi igbe̱ng ci nné ne mbe kwi re ning brru re be nce, ne ngu bra wú ankya hwi we ne riti nka ngu.

Ibrrahin e̱ i ning sa rie a nka Be̱ne̱, ngu a sa riyii he cwo a ci ni, ko ngbe ne ko ngu ri yankyang sa riyii we̱. Aha ni ngu a hwie̱ “be̱ re-ngwie̱ piriri” we shi kya ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ he ne ngu he, “Nzhwe ngwe̱ e̱ shi hla we̱ ci piriri.”
A zhe ana Ibrrahin e̱ nyia re nzhi cwu re-rie nnywa zunzrru, gbengbe ni ko sa rie ngu a hli we̱. Koo hwie nka he a zhe ana rwe̱ ngu nyia re nzhi hu, he zheng bî ewe Sarra a nyia re nzhi wara ma we̱.
Ko i nyi jinji ne sa rie a jee Be̱ne̱ we̱, sa rie ngu a ning bra ci igbe̱, aa ngwa Be̱ne̱ grime̱.
A i shî cence he Be̱ne̱ shi nyi kya ne ngu ki sa jee e̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne Be̱ne̱ i he Ibrrahin e̱ shi tsantsa aha sa rie ngu.
Ko nka ne i wie he, “A shi tsantsa aha sa rie ngu” ne̱, á i wie we aha Ibrrahin nggaa ngu we̱.
Me̱di á i wie aha nzhi ne Be̱ne̱ ri he nzhi nyi nné redziee aha ne nzhi sa rie a ngu ne ngu deze Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi a nhu.
A nyi aha re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi ne i ki ci re hu, ne e bra i ki deze nce aha ré níng ci nzhi shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Aha ni tu ne e níng ci nzhi shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha sa rie, mahu nzhi bi srra rina ngbe Be̱ne̱ aha Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi.
Nyi aha ngu ne a zhe ne ne̱ nzhi she ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ aha sa rie nzhi ne nzhi bi. Nzhi bra cwe zewe aha ne nzhi sa riyii he nzhi cwo a she grime̱ Be̱ne̱.
Nzhi bra cwe zewe ne re-ge̱zhe̱ nzhi, aha nzhi hu he ge̱zhe̱ e̱ ci nzhi yaa rwe.
Kundu nzhi yaa rwe, ngbe nzhi e̱ she te̱nte̱ e̱kpe̱e̱ ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱, ngbe te̱nte̱ e̱kpe̱e̱ nzhi e̱ we̱ ci nzhi e̱ sa riyii a kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning sang.
Kundu nzhi bra sa riyii a kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng sang, ko shi nzhi shwe nshwu we̱; aha Be̱ne̱ níng ting we gbeng he ngu níng ce̱ ne ngu níng ngwa Nshe Wiri ngu a yarri ronu rie nzhi.
Tu we zhe ne ko nzhi i hung yaa sheng we̱, Krristi hu aha nné e̱ngwie̱ a zhe ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri.
A bi rwe̱ ngbe ya nne re shî he ngu shi hu aha nne redziee, me̱di kabeya ya re hung yaa rwe he ngu hu aha nne bi te̱nte̱ e̱kpe̱e̱.
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ti ce̱ ngu aha nzhi he ni: tu ne nzhi i shi we yarri e̱ngwie̱, Krristi hu aha nzhi!
Me̱di aa hle ni! Aha roshwo ngu, a zhe ne ne̱ á níng ci nzhi shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱, a bra ri níng kyia ne cinci ren Be̱ne̱.
Nzhi i nyi rwinkó Be̱ne̱, me̱di aa níng ci nzhi she srra shwe̱ ngbe ngu aha hu Kowe ngu. A zhe ne̱ ne nzhi she srra shwe̱ ngbe Be̱ne̱, mahu nzhi ri she kyia aha Krristi shi nce!
Me̱di ko nyi ngbarang ne̱ we̱, nzhi cwe zewe ne Be̱ne̱ aha Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi, ne ngu níng ci nzhi she srra shwe̱ ngbe Be̱ne̱.
Domu i nyi e̱ngwie̱, ngbe e̱ngwie̱ e̱ ngwie be ngwie̱. E̱ngwie̱ Domu a be mi ne hu. Aha ni hu a shi rici ko nye̱, tu ne ko nye̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Nneywí e̱ i nyi e̱ngwie̱ tu ne e rishi ngwa Nti Nka Musa. Ko i bi Nti Nka ngbe ré he ya nne hle̱ we̱, tu ne i ma ne e rishi ngwang.
Me̱di kya ngu pie a zhe Domu re be zhe Musa, ga nneywí e̱ á i kwi ko ngbe ne mbe i nyi riywe̱ hu Nti Nka wire re ning hwie̱ ré he he á hle̱ shi shi ngu Domu ne ngu i hle̱ Riti Nka Be̱ne̱.
Domu a nyi zhwe nne nke ne ngu cwo a be a merin ne ngu shi ka.

Wehwie mbe ana koó shi ye̱nyye̱ we̱, aha ko kya na na Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi shi kya ne e̱ngwie̱ Domu i be mi we̱. E̱ngwie̱ ngu nggaa ngu a ci nneywí piriri kwi, me̱di ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu zhwo we zhwo a ci nneywí piriri she mwo rina ne ngu nyi kya na na Be̱ne̱ ne ngu be aha nne zunzrru, Jesu Krristi.

Kya na na Be̱ne̱ e̱ be mi ne kya ngu shi ka ne na e̱ngwie̱ nne zunzrru ana. E̱ngwie̱ nne zunzrru ana i be mi ne nyi nka Be̱ne̱ he̱rri ci nneywí piriri kwi, me̱di kya na na Be̱ne̱ e̱ be merin re-e̱ngwie̱ piriri ne e nyi, ngu a bra ya níng ci nzhi ci tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱.

A shi ni cence he e̱ngwie̱ nne zunzrru a ci hu ne̱ ne ye ringgwe̱ a rici ko nye̱. Me̱di kya ne ngu nne zunzrru nke, Jesu Krristi, ngu be mi e̱ ne̱ na nne zunzrru nke ana we gbong. Nyi aha ngu ne ko nye̱ ne ngu she ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ we shweni hwie̱ nne redziee a nyyi Be̱ne̱, ngu a bra shi ye ringgwe̱ a nce he̱rri tiya aha Jesu Krristi.
Aha nii, we shi ne e̱ngwie̱ nne zunzrru ana i be mi ne nyi nka hu a rici ko nye̱, cwuo redziee na nne zunzrru ma aa ci nneywí zhwozhwo ré she ce aha ne mbe ci tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
We shi ne nné piriri mbe hwie̱ nné e̱ngwie̱ aha nne zunzrru ra ho nka. We ni wa, nné piriri hwie̱ nné redziee aha ho nka nne zunzrru.
Á i be mi ne Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ aha ré ti kya ne ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ we gbeng. Me̱di zhe ne e̱ngwie̱ bra ning bra ci piriri, ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ e̱ ning bra ci piriri ma.
Aha we shi ne e̱ngwie̱ ye ringgwe̱ ne hu, we ni wa ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ we̱ ye ringgwe̱ ne redziee, ngbe we̱ ci nneywí ré she ce he̱rri tiya aha Jesu Krristi Brrabe̱ nzhi.
Ma nzhi bra he rimi wa? Nzhi ke̱ we ne nyi e̱ngwie̱ aha ngbe ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ e̱ re ning brang brang aa?
Hayi! A nka e̱ngwie̱ ana nzhi ci shi nzhi nyi nkweng, nzhi e̱ bra ce̱ rimi nzhi ke̱ we ne nyi e̱ngwie̱ e̱ wa?
Ka de̱ nyi ru he nzhi ne e níng nyi batisma a yarri Krristi Jesu a, á níng nying aha nzhi ci zunzrru ngbe ngu a yarri hu ngu we̱ e̱e̱?
Aha ni zhe ne e níng nyi batisma, a shi shi á níng nyie̱ ngbe ne ngu a yarri hu ngu, ngbe we shi ne á i deze Krristi nhu ne brra grime̱ igbe̱ Be̱, nzhi e̱ ma nzhi srrá yaka srra hwi.
Aha ni tu ne nzhi ci zunzrru ngbe ngu a yarri hu ngu ni, mahu nzhi shi ci zunzrru ngbe ngu a deze nhu ngu wa.
Nzhi bra hu he á i ci re̱kpe̱e̱ reni nzhi a gasankwe ngbe ngu, aha ngbe ré ci igbe̱ e̱ngwie̱ a re-rwe̱ nzhi ré ci shweni, ngbe de̱ nzhi srra shi nzhi nyi hwié e̱ngwie̱ wa we̱.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu hu, mahu aa shwe ne nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Tu ne nzhi hu ngbe ne Krristi, mahu nzhi sa rie he nzhi bi srra nce ngbe ngu.
Aha ni nzhi hu he cence Krristi e̱ deze nhu, ko bra bi hu wa we̱, ko hu a bra bi ye ringgwe̱ a rici ngu we̱.
Aha hu ngu ne ngu hu a, ko e̱ngwie̱ bi igbe̱ a rici ngu we̱ he̱rri tiya; a zhe ne ne̱ srra ne ngu srra a, a srra a yarri mwe rici ngbe Be̱ne̱.
We ni ma, nyi e̱ nyi yaa fo shi nyi nyi nkweng a nyi e̱ngwie̱, he me̱di nyi shi nce a yarri Be̱ne̱ aha Krristi Jesu.
Shi de̱ nyi we e̱ngwie̱ re ye ringgwe̱ a yarri re-rwe̱ nyi ne mbe bi kwi ne̱ we̱, he̱rri re níng ci nyi ne̱ ne zhwe re-ankya ecwue na ikpe rwe̱ we̱.

Shi de̱ nyi bra fo ya ekpri rwe̱ nyi nyi ning nyi e̱ngwie̱ ka re hwie̱ kyang nyi cwuo hwie̱ we̱. Me̱di nyi ngwa Be̱ne̱ nci nyi shi nné ne e ri ma mbe kwi ne e we cinye̱ nce. Nyi ngwa Be̱ne̱ rekpri rwe̱ nyi e̱ ngbe ré hwie̱ nang nyi re-cwuo redziee.
Shi de̱ e̱ngwie̱ re ye ringgwe̱ a nyi we̱, aha ko nyi shi tahwie Nti Nka we̱, me̱di nyi shi yarri ehwie rina Be̱ne̱.
Ma rimi rri ii? Nzhi ke̱ we ne nyi e̱ngwie̱ aha ne ko nzhi shi tahwie Nti Nka we̱, ne nzhi shi a yarri ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱? Aawo, ko tsie̱ tsie̱!

Ko nyi ru he kundu nyi ngwa nci nyi nwie ya nne nwie ki ho nka shi nyi nyi hwié ngu, nyi e̱ hwie̱ hwié ngu cence we̱ e̱e̱? Aha ni kundu nyi hwie̱ hwié e̱ngwie̱, we̱ níng kwa re nzhi kwi; me̱di kundu nyi hwie̱ hwié Be̱ne̱ nwie ki ho nka, we̱ níng ci nyi hwie̱ nné redziee.
Me̱di nzhi ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng! Aha nyi i nyi hwié e̱ngwie̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ nyi se̱ kya ne e níng mie̱ng a yarri ronu rie nyi zhwozhwo nwie zhweng.
Á níng trru a yarri e̱ngwie̱, nyi hwie̱ hwié na nyi re-cwuo redziee.

(Nje he re-nka nke ne̱ re ning mwa yi ni ngbe nyi wre̱ ne pieng, aha nyi shi brrubrru.) Gbangba a nyi i ngwa nci nyi, nyi hwie̱ hwié nyi re-cwuo le̱le̱ ngbe re-nzhwe cwuo hwie̱ piriri. A zhe ne ne̱, se nyi ngwa nci nyi ngbe nyi hwie̱ hwié nyi re-cwuo redziee ngbe nyi shi wiri.
A zhe ne nyi i nyi hwié e̱ngwie̱, ko nyi i bi nkang nyi ya cwuo redziee we̱.
Nyi nda ne nyi i ning sheng a re-ankya nke ne nyi i nyi ne ngu bra níng bi nshwu a zhe ne ne̱ ye̱? Zhwe re-ankya ana se ré níng ci nyi kwi!
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ á níng trru a yarri e̱ngwie̱, nyi hwie̱ hwié Be̱ne̱. Kya ne nyi shi ning sheng nna nyi e̱kpe̱e̱ wiri ne ngu shi níng ci nyi she ce he̱rri tiya.
Lede e̱ngwie̱ e̱ nyi hu, me̱di kya na na Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi ce he̱rri tiya a yarri Krristi Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi.
Re-gimbe, ka de̱ nyi hu we̱ e̱e̱? Nje he nka ne̱ ne nné ne mbe hu Nti Nka, aha ni nje hu he nyi shi hu kya ne nje ning shi nka ne̱. Se nneywi shi nce wire we̱ shi tahwie ringgwe̱ Nti Nka.
A shi ni, mbrru nyrra, kundu nto ngu a shi nce, ko bi de̱me̱ re kpo nyrra a we̱. Me̱di kundu nto ngu a hu wire we̱ she de̱me̱ng drro ne yaka nne.

Aha ni, kundu ngu drro ne yaka nne, ne nto ngu a shi nce, wé̱ he aa hwie̱ mbrru njè. Me̱di kundu nto ngu a hu, nka nyrra ana a wru ncwue ngu, ko shi ré he nyi mbrru njè we̱ ko ne ngu drro ne yaka nne.

A shi we ni, re-gimbe, nyi e̱ nyi ci shi nyi nyi nkweng a nwie Nti Nka aha nyi hu ngbe Krristi, a zhe ne ne̱ nyi hwie̱ na ngu. Nyi hwie̱ na Krristi ne i ki deze nhu, aha ngbe nzhi nyi re-cwuo rina Be̱ne̱.
Aha a zhe ne nzhi i srra a yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ na ikpe rwe̱, re-rwe̱ nzhi e̱ bí ecwue re-cwuo e̱ngwie̱ ne Nti Nka i be mi, he̱rri ga re-ankya nzhi i nyi e̱ nyi we na ne mbe shi níng ci nzhi kwi.

Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, á níng trru a tahwie ringgwe̱ Nti Nka, aha nzhi hwie̱ shi nzhi nyi nkweng a nwie kya ne ngu i níng ci nzhi hwie̱ shi nné gyiaa. Ko nzhi bra srra zhwe srra na gbangba ne nzhi i shi tahwie Nti Nka ne e wie ana wa we̱, me̱di nzhi shi srra yaka srra hwi ne Nshe Be̱ne̱.

Ma nzhi bra he rimi wa? Nzhi he Nti Nka a shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ e̱e̱? Aawo, ko tsie̱ tsie̱! We̱sa ne Nti Nka a ko nje ra hu e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Kundu de̱ Nti Nka a ra he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci riyii a kya ya nne we̱,” ko nje ra ru he nyi ni e̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱.
Me̱di aha Riti Nka ana, e̱ngwie̱ e̱ she riwie̱ ning zhwe̱ ngbe n ci riyii a ga re-nzhwe ankya ecwue na rici nje. Aha we̱sa ne Nti Nka, e̱ngwie̱ e̱ hwie̱ kweng.
Nje i shi nce we̱sa ne Nti Nka nna, me̱di zhe ne Nti Nka a ya be, nje e̱ timi nje ne̱ ne nyi e̱ngwie̱,
nje e̱ hwie̱ kweng. Aa ci shi Nti Nka ne ngu ra ning ngwa ce e̱ bra ning ci nje hu.
Hwie nka he nti nka ne e ngwa a shi ning ci n she ce ning brra, aa ci e̱ngwie̱ she riwie̱ a nwie nje, aa ning yhwe̱.
Aha ni Nti Nka a shi wiri; nka ne e ngwa bra shi wiri ma, á shi tsantsa, á bra bi rina.

Ma a ci shi kya ne ngu bi rina a ning ci nje hu aa? Aawo, ko tsie̱ tsie̱! Me̱di e̱ngwie̱ e̱ ti he ngu shi wie̱e̱ni, aha a yarri zhwe Nti Nka ne ngu bi rina, e̱ngwie̱ e̱ ning ci nje hu. Aha ni, re-nka ne e ngwa á ti he e̱ngwie̱ shi wie̱e̱ni.
Nzhi hu he Nti Nka wru nwie Be̱ne̱, me̱di nje e̱ nje shi ikpe rwe̱, tu ne nje hwie̱ hwie e̱ngwie̱.
Ko nje hu re̱se̱ kya ne nje shi mi we̱. Kya ne nje ce̱ nying, ko nje bra nyí we̱. Kya nke ne nje ra, a bra nyi ngu ne nje nyí.
Ma kundu ne nje shi nyi kya ne ko nje ce̱ nying we̱, mahu nje shî he Nti Nka a shi ye̱ye̱rri.
Aha ni ko nyi nje e̱ ne nje nyi zhwe ankya ne̱ we̱, a nyi e̱kpe̱e̱ e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu shi yarri nje.
Nje e̱ hu he ko e̱kpe̱e̱ rina a srra yarri nje we̱, ne nje shi a ikpe rwe̱. Aha nje ce̱ nyi kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri, me̱di ko nje bra hung nying we̱.
Kya ne nje nyí e̱, ko nyi kya rina nke ne nje ce̱ nying we̱. E̱ngwie̱ ne ko nje ce̱ nying we̱, a bra nyi ngu ne nje shi nying.
Ma kundu nje nyi kya ne ko nje ce̱ nying we̱, mahu ko nyi nje ne nje shi nwie nying we̱, me̱di nyi e̱kpe̱e̱ e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu shi yarri nje ne ngu shi nying.
Nje e̱ timi he kya ne ngu shi nwie ci a yarri nje nyi nke: a zhe ne nje ce̱ nyi kya rina, ma n she nje shi we yarri e̱ngwie̱.
A yarri hwie nje, a ning bi ehwie kla ngbe n zhwe Nti Nka Be̱ne̱.

Me̱di nje e̱ bra ri rekpri rwe̱ nje e̱ á bra shi nwie nyi yaká re-ankya ne mbe shi we ka ne kya ehwie nje fo. Aa ning rrwe shi nje nyi nne gyiaa a tahwie igbe̱ e̱ngwie̱ ne rekpri rwe̱ nje shi ncwuo ngu.
Yooho nje, ma nje shi nyi rimi! Nyi nye̱ ngu shi ning kyia ne ikpe rwe̱ ne ngu nyia mi ne nje re nzhi ning yhwe̱ ne̱?
Me̱di nje ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ne ngu nyi cwuo ne̱ a yarri Jesu Krristi Brrabe̱ nzhi!
Aha nii, nje e̱ we rici nje, a yarri hwie nje, nje nyi hwie na Nti Nka Be̱ne̱, me̱di a yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ nje na ikpe rwe̱, nje nyi hwie na e̱ngwie̱.
Aha ni mahu a zhe ne ne̱ ko bi nyi nka hu a rici nné mbe ne mbe shi yarri Krristi Jesu we̱.
Aha Nti Nka na Nshe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ning ngwá ce a yarri Krristi Jesu, aa níng trru a nva ringgwe̱ e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu shi níng ci nzhi kwi.

Kya ne ko Nti Nka i hung nying we̱, aha e̱kpe̱e̱ e̱ngwie̱ i ci nneywi shi brrubrru, nyi ngwiee ne Be̱ne̱ nyi a Kowe ngu ne ngu ki te a shî nne e̱ngwie̱ ngbe re ya hwie̱ teedeng yi re-e̱ngwie̱. Aha ni aa ci igbe̱ e̱ngwie̱ a yarri nne e̱ngwie̱ e̱ ci shweni.
Be̱ne̱ nyi ni aha ngbe nzhi ne nzhi cwo ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nshe Wiri ce̱, we̱sa ne na ikpe rwe̱, nzhi hung nyi ga re-cwuo redziee ne mbe shi yarri Nti Nka zhwozhwo.
Nné mbe ne mbe srra a yarri ikpe rwe̱, á hwie we nka ankya na ikpe rwe̱. Me̱di nné mbe ne mbe srra ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nshe Wiri he, á hwie we nka ankya na Nshe Wiri.
Kundu ngwe̱ sa hwie nka ngwe̱ a ankya na ikpe rwe̱, we̱ re yhwe̱; me̱di kundu ngwe̱ sa hwie nka ngwe̱ a ankya na Nshe Wiri, we̱ re ngwa ce ngbe srra rina.
Aha nné mbe ne mbe sa hwie nka mbe a ankya na ikpe rwe̱ wé̱ hwie̱ rwinkó Be̱ne̱, aha koó zhwe Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ we̱, ko shi ré bra hung zhweng we̱.
Nné mbe ne mbe srra yarri ikpe rwe̱ ko shi ré hung kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie we̱.
Me̱di nyi e̱ ko nyi shi yarri ikpe rwe̱ we̱, nyi Nshe Wiri ngu cwo ne nyi, kundu Nshe Wiri e̱ shi yarri nyi. Ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu bi Nshe Krristi we̱, mahu ko nyi na Krristi we̱.
Me̱di kundu Krristi shi yarri nyi, ko ngbe ne re-rwe̱ nyi e̱ á shi kwi aha e̱ngwie̱, gbengbe ni ce nyi e̱ shi drre̱, aha Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ci nyi hwie̱ nné redziee.
Kundu ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu deze Jesu nhu shi yarri nyi, ngu ne ngu deze Krristi nhu a, we̱ ri ngwa re-rwe̱ nyi ne mbe kwi e̱ ce ne Nshe ngu ne ngu shi yarri nyi.
Aha ni re-gimbe, a bi kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne se nzhi nyi, ko nyi srra zhwe srra na ne e̱kpe̱e̱ nneywi ce̱ we̱.
Aha kundu ne nyi srra re nyi kya na ne e̱kpe̱e̱ nneywi ce̱, nyi e̱ shi kwi; me̱di kundu nyi ci e̱kpe̱e̱ e̱ngwie̱ ci shweni ne igbe̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱, nyi e̱ she ce.
Nné mbe ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ we kwa a nyi rewe Be̱ne̱.
Aha ko Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ngwa Nshe ngu a aha nyi bra srra ne owu shi nyi nyi hwié wa we̱, me̱di aha nyi hwie̱ rewe ngu. Aha ni nyi hung ki kyie̱ he, “Be̱.”
Nshe Be̱ne̱ mwe ngbe na nzhi nwie ngwa sheede he nzhi nyi rewe Be̱ne̱.

Ma tu ne nzhi nyi rewe Be̱ne̱, mahu nzhi ri she ga re-ankya ne ngu ning sa nné ngu jee, ngbe we̱ níng ngwa ko nda ne ngu shi ngwa Krristi. Kundu nzhi shwe ge̱zhe̱ ngbe Krristi, nzhi e̱ bra ri she grime̱ ngbe ngu.
Nje hwie he ge̱zhe̱ ne nzhi shi nwie shweng a zhe ne ne̱ koo be ko yankya we̱ ne grime̱ ne Be̱ne̱ ri níng ngwa.
Ga re-ankya ne Be̱ne̱ nyi zhwozhwo á te we te ngbe Be̱ne̱ re ti grime̱ rewe na ngu.
Aha ga re-ankya ne Be̱ne̱ nyi zhwozhwo á shwe ge̱zhe̱ we̱sa ne ce̱ mbe, me̱di nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ he re shi ni, ne sa riyii
he á ri he ya otu ga re-ankya ne̱ á ri we ci ré ci hwihwíng ko bra bi nkang vi we̱. Ko nda ri she zhwe grime̱ na rewe Be̱ne̱.
Nzhi hu he gannyi we gbangba he̱rri re be wre̱ cwu ne̱ ga re-ankya ne̱ á kú ruhu ne rwe̱ wie shi nyi rwe̱ wieng bî ewe.

Me̱di ko nyi we re-ankya ne̱ we̱, ga ngbe nzhi ne e níng ngwa Nshe Wiri ne ngu nyi kya na na Be̱ne̱ na ce̱ucwung, nzhi ku ruhu we nci nzhi nwie te we te ngbe Be̱ne̱ re níng ci nzhi hwie̱ rewe ngu, a zhe ne ngu ri bra re-rwe̱ nzhi.
A nyi aha sa riyii nzhi ne̱ ne nzhi she kyia. Kundu ngwe̱ sa riyii a kya aha ne ngwe̱ ri ri, ko nke ana nyi sa riyii e̱ ma gung we̱. Wé̱ ce̱ rimi ngwe̱ ri kya ne ngwe̱ ning sa riyii e̱ ri ri e̱e̱?
Me̱di kundu nzhi sa riyii a kya ne ko nzhi ri ri we̱, wire nzhi e̱ hung teng ne ehwie sheng.

A nyi we ni ne Nshe Wiri níng sheng a yarri re̱ nzhi. Aha ko nzhi hung ku Be̱ne̱ shi ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi ku we̱. Me̱di Nshe Wiri we rici ngu a cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi ne rugwrraa na ne ko nti nka hung heng we̱.
Be̱ne̱ ne ngu rí yaarri rehwie nzhi e̱ aa hu kya ne Nshe Wiri e̱ ning hwie yi, aha Nshe Wiri e̱ cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ aha nné wiri ngu ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱.
Nzhi hu he a yarri ko nda, Be̱ne̱ nyí re-ankya rina aha nné ne mbe ki ce̱, nné ne ngu we ye ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu rwe nying.
Nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ke̱nce̱ we kyie, a nyi mbe ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ rwe nka a rici mbe he ré ya ci shi Kowe ngu, he ngbe ngu Kowe ngu a re hwie̱ ce̱ucwung a tsi re-gimbe piriri.
Aha ni nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu rwe nka a rici mbe ana nyi mbe ne ngu we ye; mbe ne ngu we ye ana ma, nyi mbe ne ngu we ci á ci tsantsa, ngu a we ngwa grime̱ ngu.
Ma nzhi fro re-nka ne̱ rimi? Tu ne Be̱ne̱ shi ngbe nzhi, nyi nye̱ re hu níng drre̱ e̱?
Cence, ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ko ngu we Kowe ngu we̱, me̱di ngu ngwa aha nzhi zhwozhwo, we̱ ce̱ rimi re we̱sa níng ngwa ko nda we shweni he̱rri ngbe ne Kowe ngu a zhwozhwo aa?
Nyi nye̱ re hung ci nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu we kyie e̱ nka aa? A nyi Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu ngu we ci mbe ci tsantsa.
Nyi nye̱ re bra hung we nyi nka hu a? Aha Krristi Jesu a hu aha mbe, we̱sa a ni, á bra ki deze nhu, a bra srrá a nva nyye Be̱ne̱ re cwe nva ne ngu aha nzhi!
Nyi nye̱ re hu níng ka ne ce̱ ne Krristi níng ce̱ e̱e̱? A nyi cinci e̱e̱, ka ge̱zhe̱, ka aha ne e níng yarra aa, ka nyi nzhwo aa, ka nyi riywe̱ e̱e̱, ka ewieng she ruhu aa, ka nyi ise̱nkeli?
A shi shi ne e wie yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he,
“Aha ngwe̱, á níng yhwí ko zohu zhe;
á níng yarrá shi canvé ne e nyia mi re nzhi cang.”
Aawo, a tsi ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo, nzhi she drre̱ kpe̱kpe̱ aha ngu nne nke ne ngu níng cé̱!
Aha nje hu re̱se̱ng cence he ko bi kya re ning ka ne ce̱ Krristi we̱: ka n hu ka n shi nce, ko bra nyi re-njeli ka yá rewienci, ka yá re-ringgwe̱ igbe̱, ka a zhe ne, ka a ncwuee we̱;
ko shi re bra nyi yankya be ngwie̱ gbong a zeteng ka gbong tancwong cwuncwuu we̱. Ko bi yankya ne e nyi re hu níng ka ka ne ce̱ ne Be̱ne̱ níng ce̱ a yarri Krristi Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi we̱.
Nje níng ting cence, ko nyi rabrra we̱, aha nje shi yarri Krristi. Nshe Wiri ngwá sheede a nu rie nje he shi ni.
Nje bi ehwie dzio gbangba, nje bē we yang he̱rri bē nje e̱ ko bi gamang we̱
aha nné na nje, re-gimbe nje! A ning shi canca aa ra nyi nje e̱ ne nje hwie̱ kya shweni ré ning ka ka ne Krristi aha mbe.

Nyi mbe ne mbe nyí nné Isrreela; Be̱ne̱ e̱ we fo á hwie̱ rewe ngu; aa we ti grime̱ ngu; ngu a rwe nka ngbe ne mbe ne shí, ngu a we ngwa Nti Nka ngu, wire ngu a we mie̱ te̱nte̱ mwo rumwo a Brranyi; ngu a bra we sa re-jee.
Á wru a nzhwe brrá hó nné Ibrrani, a nhwie̱ ne e ning bî Krristi a rwe̱ nneywi. Nde ko nye̱ re ki de we ngu ne ngu nyi Be̱ne̱ ne ngu yé ringgwe̱ a rici ko nye̱ he̱rri tiya. Nde re shi ni.
Ko nje he he Be̱ne̱ e̱ we̱sa nyi kya ne ngu ning sa jee we̱; aha ko nyi ko zohu nne Isrreela ne ngu nyi cwu nne Isrreela we̱.
Ko bra nyi ga nné ne mbe wru nzhwe Ibrrahin zhwozhwo ne mbe nyi rewe Be̱ne̱ we̱. Aha Be̱ne̱ i he ne Ibrrahin he, “A nyi we nzhwe na Ishaku ne nje ri we fo he e nyi na ngwe̱.”
Mahu aa ci shi rewe nke ne e bî we shi ne e ning bî rewe e̱ koó nyi rewe Be̱ne̱ we̱. A nyi rewe nke ne e ning sa jee e̱ ne mbe nyi te̱nte̱ rewe Ibrrahin.
Nti nka jee nna i shi he ni: “Kundu zhe ne nje sa a ri ya cwu ye̱ye̱rri, ma n ning brru n be, ngbe Sarra we̱ she ewerento.”
Ko nyi ngbeng ne̱ we̱. Rrebeka i bi rewe wehwie a nwie be̱ nzhi Ishaku.
Gbengbe ni, a zhe ne e rishi bî reyhwii nna, ne ko mbe e nyi ko yankya rina ka me̱nkye̱ng we̱, me̱di aha kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ke̱nce̱ rweng re ci ne nne nke ne ngu kyie,
ko aha ne ya mbe e nyi yankya we̱, me̱di Be̱ne̱ ne ngu rwe he re shi ni e̱ he ne Rrebeka he, “Hong ri hwie̱ hwie iishing.”
A shi we shi ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he,
“Yakubu, nje i ki ce̱
me̱di Isuwa, nje i ki ra.”
Ma nzhi he Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyí riywe̱ redziee e̱e̱? Aawo, ko tsie̱ tsie̱!
Aha a i he ne Musa he,
“Nje ri she nne nke ne nje ce̱ ki sheng,
ma n ri naana nne nke ne nje rí naana ngu.”
Aha nii, kundu Be̱ne̱ ce̱ kyie nne, ko nyi aha he nyi kya ce̱ nne nna ka aha yankya ne ngu nyi we̱, me̱di nyi we aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱.
Aha Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he ne nggwe̱ Masarr he, “Nje re ci ringgwe̱ aha ngbe n ti igbe̱ nje a ngwe̱, aha ngbe ré bra ho lo nje ko he a be ngwie̱.”
Aha ni Be̱ne̱ ri naana nne ne ngu ce̱ ri naana ngu, nne nke ne ngu ce̱ re bi gbanggrraa we̱ ki ci re bi gbanggrraa.
Me̱di ya nyi we̱ hung he ne nje he, “Kundu ri shi ni, ma á ce̱ rimi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu bra ri vini nzhi e̱ ye̱? Nyi nye̱ re hung ra kya ce̱ ngu a?”
Me̱di nyi ngwe̱ nye̱, ngwe̱ nneywi e̱, ngbe ngwe̱ rin Be̱ne̱ zhwe nka ne̱ e̱e̱? He̱rri kya ne e ki nyi we nyi e̱ we̱ hung he ne nne ngu ki nyi e̱ he, “Aha nda ne ngwe̱ ning nyi he ni ye̱ e̱e̱?”

Ko nne no rondrro a bi de̱me̱ng nyi kya ne ngu ce̱ ne rwe̱ ngu we̱ e̱e̱? Koo hung vie rigbre rwe̱ re ki kye ngbe we̱ fo kpirring we̱ ning nyi ya te̱nte̱ kya bi mpe̱ni we yang, ngbe we̱ fo kpi we̱ ning nyi ya dedeng wo ye̱?

A shi we ni ne Be̱ne̱ ma. A cé̱ ti nneywí ren ngu, ngbe ré bra hu igbe̱ ngu wa. Me̱di a i yaa rwe ne ehwie sheng we yang ne nné mbe ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngu kla ren ngu a rici mbe ngu we ci ré ci shweni.
Aa bra i nyi ni aha ngu ti brra grime̱ ngu a nwie nné ne ngu ri naana mbe, ne ngu nyi nzhi ne̱ ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ rweng he ngu ri níng ngwa grime̱ ngu.
A tsi nzhi ne ngu níng ye e̱ ko nyi we nné Yahudi we̱, me̱di ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ zhwozhwo.
A shi we shi kya ne ngu he a yarri krre̱de̱ Hosiya he:
“Nné ne ko mbe i nyi na nje we̱,
nje ri we ye he ‘Nné nje’.
Ngwie̱ ne ko nje i ce̱ we̱,
Nje ri we ye he, ‘Nné ce̱ nje’.
Ngbe we nwie ne i he ne mbe he, ‘Ko nyi nyi nné nje we̱,’
we miimi e̱ wé̱ we ye he rewe Be̱ne̱ bi ce.”
Ishaya i fo cwue ze aa he nka a rici nné Isrreela he,
“Ko ngbe ne nné Isrreela a ra brri shi nyi nzha ta nce,
gbengbe ni a nyi we nné tsie̱nzhwu mbe ri she kyia.
Aha Be̱ne̱ ri nyi ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo nka
we̱sa ne dzio zhe.”
A bra shi we shi kya ne Ishaya i ke̱she he he,
“Kundu de̱ Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo
ra we kpi nzhwe nzhi we̱,
nzhi ra ci shi Sodo,
nzhi ra shi shi Gomorra.”
Ma nzhi he rimi wa? Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ne ko mbe i kre he mbe shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱, á we ci á shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha sa rie.
Me̱di nné Isrreela ne mbe i kre he mbe shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha zhwe Nti Nka, koó she we̱.
Aha nda? Aha koó i kre ne sa rie we̱, á i kre ne re-ankya ne mbe nyi. Aha ni á grre̱ a “ngbaatsieng grre̱.”
A shi we shi kya ne e wie he,
“Ri, nje sa ngbaatsie a Siyona,
ne nneywí ri ning grre̱,
a nyi ngbaatsie ne ngu ri we ci ré kpi.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ri ki se̱ ko shi re shwe nshwu we̱.”
Re-gimbe, ngba cwu kya ne nje kre a yarri hwie nje ne nje ning cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ aha nné Isrreela
Nje níng ting cence he á ngwa nci mbe we yang a nwie Be̱ne̱, me̱di koó nyi ne te̱nte̱ hu re̱se̱ng we̱.
Aha koó hu rê ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ci nneywí ré shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu we̱, mbe e̱ kre rê na nci mbe, aha ni koó hung ngwa rici a rê na ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ci nneywí ré shi tsantsa a we̱.
Krristi e̱ i rwi Nti Nka ana a be, aha ngbe ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie re shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
A nkang shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha zhwe Nti Nka, Musa i wie he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu nyí re-ankya ne Nti Nka ne̱ hé, we̱ she drre̱ aha zhwe Nti Nka nna.”

Me̱di a nkang shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ne sa rie, Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ hé, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ yaa rinng we rici ngwe̱ he, ‘Nyi nye̱ ngu shi ngra re nzhi zinye̱ e̱e̱?’ we̱,” (mahu he ngbe re ya be mi ne Krristi).
“Shi de̱ ngwe̱ bra yaa rinng he, ‘Nyi nye̱ ngu shi wro re nzhi nwie nné kwi ye̱?’ we̱,” (he ngbe re ya deze Krristi nhu).

Kya ne nkang shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ne sa rie ngu he e̱ a nyi nke he, “Nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi we dudu ne ngwe̱, he̱rri ma a shi we rekyi nu ngwe̱ ngbe a nu rie ngwe̱.” Nyi ngwiee ngu nyi nkang sa rie ne nzhi brró a.
Kundu ngwe̱ he we gbeng ne onu ngwe̱ he Jesu nyi Brrabe̱, ngwe̱ bra sa rie he Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki deze nhu, ngwe̱ e̱ she kyia.
Nyi yarri ronu rie ne nzhi ning sá rie ngbe wé̱ níng ci nzhi shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱; a bra nyi ne ronu ne nzhi hé we gbeng ngbe nzhi e̱ she kyia.
Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a ngu, ko shi re shwe nshwu we̱.”

Mahu a hé a rici ko nye̱. Ko bi nka he nne nke nyi nné Yahudi, nke ncwi e̱ nyi Nne Nzhwe Ngwie̱ we̱. A nyi we Brrabe̱ zunzrru ne ngu nyi Brrabe̱ na ga nné zhwozhwo. Ga nné ne mbe ki kyie̱ e̱ zhwozhwo, a we mwo rina piriri.
Aha Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu kyie̱ Brrabe̱ e̱ we̱ she kyia.”
Ma wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré kyie̱ nne ne ko mbe sa rie a ngu we̱ e̱ ye̱? Wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré sa rie a ngu ne ko mbe ho nka ngu we̱ e̱ ye̱? Ka wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré ho ne ko ya nne e we brro nka we̱ e̱ ye̱?
Ka wé̱ bra ce̱ rimi ya nne re we brro nka we̱sa ne e ki te e̱ ye̱? A shi we shi ne e wie he, “Kundu ne nné brro Nka Rina mbe e ya wre̱, a nyi kya rina kpe̱kpe̱!”
Me̱di ko nyi ga nné Isrreela zhwozhwo ne mbe se̱ Nka Rina nna we̱. Ishaya i he he, “Brrabe̱, nyi nye̱ ngu shî nka nzhi e̱?”
Aha ni ga nné ne mbe sa rie e̱ á sa rie aha ne mbe ho nka ne e we brrong, nka ne e we brrong nna nyi nka Krristi.
Me̱di nje rin he: Nyi cence he ko á i ho we̱ e̱e̱? Á i ho shi. Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he,
“Nka mbe e̱ se̱ ngwie̱ yu zhwozhwo,
he̱rri nka mbe e̱ ya cwu krruci ngwie̱.”
Nje bra rin te̱nte̱ wa: Ko nné Isrreela i hu re̱se̱ng we̱ e̱e̱? Musa i ke̱she shî Be̱ne̱ng he,
“Nje ri ci rehwie mbe ré yhwi
aha nné mbe ne ko mbe nyi nné nje we̱;
rehwie mbe ri ye gbushwo
aha nné re-ngwie̱ riywe̱ zentsi.”
Ishaya i he we gbeng he,
“Nné ne ko mbe ning kre we̱, á ning she;
Nné ne ko mbe rin aha nje we̱, nje we ti rici nje.”
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ he nka a rici nné Isrreela he, “Nje yerí yeri nwie nyie̱ va he n se̱ nné nje ne mbe ra ning ho nka ne mbe bra ning klo rici.”
Aha ni nje rin he: Ma Be̱ne̱ e̱ ra nne ngu aa? Aawo, ko tsie̱nzhwu! Nje we rici nje e̱ nje nyi nne Isrreela, a nzhwe Ibrrahin, nje wru a nkla Benjemi.
Ko Be̱ne̱ ra nné ngu ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ we kyie we̱. Ko nyi hu kya ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he ne Iliya a zhe ne ngu i cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ a rici nné Isrreela we̱ e̱e̱? A i he,
“Brrabe̱, á yhwi nné ti re̱se̱ng ngwe̱, á gywi re-briing nyi teede ngwe̱. A nyi we nje nggaa nje ne nje hwie̱, á bra shi kre rê ré ning yhwe̱ ma?”
Be̱ne̱ i ki shing he rimi? A i he, “A bi nné ci natsie̱ ne nje yaa sang ne ko mbe sa hu be ngbe ré ye kpanshwu ne e ki ye he Baali e̱ mbè we̱.”
A shi we ni a zhe ne ne̱ wa: a bi kpi mbe tsie̱ ne Be̱ne̱ ngu kyie ngu we aha ehwie rina ngu.
Ma kundu ngu kyie we aha ehwie rina ngu, mahu ko bra bi nkang nyi re-cwuo nna we̱. Aha kundu Be̱ne̱ e̱ ra kyie aha re-cwuo ne nne ngu nyi, mahu ko ehwie rina ngu a nyi ehwie rina ma we̱ dei.
Ma shi rimi rri ii? Kya ne nné Isrreela mbe i ning tu rici nwie kreng ne ko mbe she we̱, nyi ngwiee ne nné na ne Be̱ne̱ ngu kyie mbe she. Kpi mbe hwie̱ we nné klo nci.
A shi we shi ne e wie he,
“Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci rehwie mbe ci we̱e̱ ywing ne riywe̱ hung,
á bi nyyi me̱di koó ri ewie we̱,
á bi re-uucwu, me̱di koó ho nka we̱,
he̱rri re be wre̱ cwu.”
Dooda i bra he wa he,
“Nde rewie para mbe ré we hwie̱ etsie;
ré we hwie̱ ankyang grre̱.
Nde ré we hwie̱ rewie ne mbe shi ning shwe cinci!
Nde nyyi mbe ré ci ywing he̱rri ré me̱nkye̱ng ri ewie;
ngbe re-teme mbe ré gwe he̱rri tiya aha ge̱zhe̱.”

Nje bra rin wa he, Nné Isrreela i grre̱ kpi we kprrenkprrenkprre he̱rri ko bi na ré bra cinye̱ wa wo ye̱? Aawo, ko tsie̱nzhwu! E̱ngwie̱ mbe e̱ ci kyia be nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ aha ngbe re ci rehwie nné Isrreela ré yhwi.

Ma kundu e̱ngwie̱ mbe e̱ ngwa ebe ngwie̱ mwo rina, ne ywe̱ mbe e̱ ci Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ shwe rishwe ni, ma kundu ga nné Yahudi ne e kyie e̱ mbe ri she ngwie ngbe re-mwo rina nna wé̱ ngra brri we brri rimi!
Nje shi nka a zhe ne ne̱ ne nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱, tu ne nje nyi nnente re be nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱. Nje ning cwé zewe ne cwuo nje ne̱,
he ka de̱e̱nte̱ wo, n ci rehwie nné na nje e̱ ré yhwi, he ngbe n ci yá mbe ré she kyia.
Aha a zhe ne i we ra, ngbe nné be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo a she riwie̱ng she srra shwe̱ ngbe Be̱ne̱. Ma rinang nna ri ngra shi rimi a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ ri we se̱ e̱? We̱ shi shi nné kwi ne e we deze nce!
Ma nzhi ning mwa yi ne nda? Tu ne cwe yâ nke ne e vie ngwa Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi wiri, mahu re̱se̱ kya ngu hwie̱ e̱ shi wiri ma. Kundu ne riti ekwe e̱ shi wiri, mahu ga re-nva nna zhwozhwo wé̱ shi wiri ma.

Mbe nné Yahudi e̱ á shi shi yá nva ekwe rihwie̱n na ne e kye̱ ne e bra kprre nva nna á wa, wire á a nyi mi ne nyi ne nyi shi shi nva rekwe na rihwie̱n yi, á a ya ning rwe nyrra mi. A zhe ne ne̱ nyi e̱ shi nwie ho shwi rishi ruto na te̱nte̱ ekwe rihwie̱n nke ne e kye̱ e̱ ne ngu kwa ne re-rinyie ngu.

Aha ni shi de̱ ngwe̱ we dzie̱ mbe ne mbe shi shi nva ekwe nke ne e kprre wa a we̱. Shi de̱ ngwe̱ cwe zewe we̱. Ngwe̱ nyi we vang, ko nyi ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ bro riti ekwe nna we̱, a nyi riting nna ngu re bro ngwe̱ e̱.
Me̱di ngwe̱ bra hung he he, “Ee, nje he ka á i kprre nva ekwe nna aha ngbe nje e̱ n she ngwie ye̱ e̱e̱.”
A shi ni cence. Á i we kprre mbe e̱ á wa aha riywe̱ sa rie mbe, ngbe ngwe̱ e̱ she ngwie aha sa rie ngwe̱. Me̱di shi de̱ ngwe̱ bra ne̱ ne kywo rici ze we̱, yo ne owu.
Kundu ne ko Be̱ne̱ i we nné Yahudi ne mbe shi shi te̱nte̱ nva rekwe we̱, ngwe̱ hwie he we̱ re we ngwe̱ e̱e̱?

Aha ni ri zhwe ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ngbe ren ngu ne̱. Aa ngwa nné mbe ne mbe ra sa rie a ngu cinci, ngu a re nyi ngwe̱ e̱ rina, me̱di se ne ngwe̱ ke̱ we ne yo we yarri ehwie rina ngu wire. De̱e̱ ni we̱, wé̱ re tsa wé̱ zhwu ma.
Kundu mbe nné Yahudi e̱ mbe ning brru sa rie a ngu, we̱ ning brru ne mbe re be riting nna, aha Be̱ne̱ e̱ hu ning brru ne mbe te̱nte̱ wa.

Ma he̱rri kundu ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ shi shi ngwe̱ nyi va ekwe rihwie̱n yi ne Be̱ne̱ i re fo bia a te̱nte̱ ekwe rihwie̱n, ne ngu bi rwe̱ ré nyi ni e̱, we̱ ce̱ rimi re me̱nkye̱ ning brru mi ne nva rekwe na te̱nte̱ ekwe rihwie̱n nna aa?

Re-gimbe, ko nje ce̱ nyi nyi riywe̱ hu nka ne ngu shi la la ne̱ we̱, kishi nyi ri ne̱ ne yaa kywo he nyi bi zentsi. Kpi nné Isrreela a á ci gbanggrraa aha se ne rigbre Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ nke ne mbe shi ngwie nwie Be̱ne̱ e̱ ri ya cwu ye̱ye̱rri wire.
Wire ga nné Isrreela zhwozhwo ri she kyia, shi ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he:
“Nnenkyia a ri wru a Siyona
ngbe we̱ yi ga re-ngwie̱ngwie̱ nzhwe Yakubu.
Jee nje ngbe mbe e̱ nyi nke:
á ri he zhe ana nje ri we we re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe.”
Aha ne nné Yahudi e̱ mbe ra Nka Rina ne̱, á hwie̱ rwinkó Be̱ne̱, aa a bra hwie̱ rinang a nwie nyi, nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱. Me̱di a nka kyie ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i we kyie, a we cé̱ aha brrá re-yo mbe na tiya.
Aha kya na na Be̱ne̱ re be nwie mbe ngbe ye ne ngu we ye e̱, ko shi re bra we we̱.
Aha we shi nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ nyi i ra ho Be̱ne̱ nka gbangba tiya a, a zhe ne ne̱ a rí naana nyi aha riywe̱ ho nka nné Yahudi.
A shi we ni wa, shi ne nyi i ra ho Be̱ne̱ nka, ngu a ri naana nyi, nné Yahudi e̱ á ra ki ho nka, ngbe Be̱ne̱ we̱ ri naana mbe shi ne ngu ri naana nyi ma.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci ga nneywí zhwozhwo á hwie̱ shi nné gyiaa aha riywe̱ ho nka, aha ngbe ngu ri naana ko nye̱ mbe.
Ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ e̱ zhwo we zhwo!
Zentsi ngu a shi cwuncwuncwuu!
Hu re̱se̱ng na ngu a ko bi krrucing we̱!
Nyi nye̱ re hung hu re-kyankya ne ngu rwe e̱e̱?
Nyi nye̱ re hung hu nhwie̱ ngu aa?
“Nyi nye̱ ngu sa hu kya ne ngu shi nu rie Brrabe̱ e̱?
Nyi nye̱ re hung ki sheng ne nka aa?
Nyi nye̱ ngu sa ki ngwa yankya,
he̱rri ngbe ré he re trra aa?”
Aha nyi ngu ne ngu nyi ko nda,
a bra nyi ngu ne ngu ci ko nda ning shi,
ko nda bra ning shi we aha grime̱ ngu.
Grime̱ nyi ngge ngu he̱rri tiya! Nde re shi ni.

Aha nii, re-gimbe, nje cwe nva ne nyi aha Be̱ne̱ e̱ ri naana nzhi we yang, he nyi ngwa nci nyi shi nyi kyang nyi teede nke ne ngu shi nce, ne ngu shi wiri ngu bra klá Be̱ne̱ ehwie. Nyi ngwiee ngu nyi te̱nte̱ ye mbè ne nyi ye Be̱ne̱ng.

Shi de̱ nyi fo e̱kpe̱e̱ nné riywe̱ hu Be̱ne̱ a nze̱ ne̱ we̱, me̱di nde Be̱ne̱ re níng bra ngbe nyi ci hwihwíng a yarri rehwie nyi. Wire nyi e̱ hung hu ka nyi nda ngu nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱, ne ngu nyi kya te̱nte̱ng, kya ne ngu ki kla ehwie, ne ngu shi tsantsa a nyyi ngu.

Aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re be nwie nje, nje he ne ko nye̱ a tsi nyi he: shi de̱ ya nyi re yaa fo shi ngu wara kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne ngu we̱. Me̱di ko nye̱ re nywe̱ rici a yarri hwie nka ngu, re ri rici ngu we ye̱ye̱rri ne ewie Be̱ne̱ ngu ki sa a yarri ce̱ nka.
A shi we shi ne ko nye̱ nzhi bi rekpri rwe̱ piriri a rwe̱ ngu, ko rekpri rwe̱ nna zhwozhwo nyi we zhwe cwuo zunzrru we̱.
Aha ni a yarri Krristi e̱ nzhi brri we brri, me̱di nzhi shi zunzrru, ko zohu ekpri rwe̱ nna a mwe ngbe ya.
Aha ni nzhi bi re-beewa kanka kanka ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa a yarri ehwie rina ngu. Kundu ya ri bi beewang ti re̱se̱ng, we̱ ti re̱se̱ng ye̱ye̱rri ne sa rie ngu.
A ri nyi nang nyi cwuong she nnéng, we̱ nyi cwuong she nnéng; a ri nyi nang mie̱ nka, we̱ mie̱ nka;

a ri nyi nang shwe̱ nneywí rehwie, we̱ shwe̱ nneywí rehwie; a ri nyi nang ngwang aha ré she nnéng, we̱ ngwa ne ehwie zunzrru; a ri nyi nang kwa nneywí yincwuee, we̱ ning tu rici kwa yincwuee e̱ rina rina; a ri nyi nang she yiriywé̱ng a yarri naana, we̱ we sheng ne ehwie kla.
Nde ce̱ ne nyi yaa ce̱ e̱ re nyi cence. Nyi ce̱trri kya ne ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱, nyi bro we kya ne ngu nyi te̱nte̱ng.
We shi re-gimbe, nyi yaa ce̱ gbagba. Ngwa nné grime̱ shi á re ne̱.
Shi de̱ nyi we we̱sa ning tu rici ncwuo we̱, nde rehwie nyi ré yhwi aha cwuo Be̱ne̱.
Nde nyi bi rehwie kla aha kya ne nyi ning sa riyii, nyi bi rehwie sheng a yarri re-cinci nyi, nyi ke̱ we ne ku Be̱ne̱ ko zohu zhe.
Nyi ri ma kye kya ne nyi bi e̱ ngbe nyi na nné ce̱ nka nke ne ko mbe bi we̱, nyi se̱ nné ice ne nva wehwie.
Nyi mwo nné ne mbe níng ngwa cinci rina. We mwo rina, shi de̱ nyi mwo he ré ngwie ge̱zhe̱ we̱.
Nyi nyi rekwi ngbe nné ne mbe shi rekwi, nyi bra ku rana ngbe nné ne mbe shi rana.
Nyi srra rina ngbe ko nye̱. Shi de̱ nyi yaa kywo we̱, me̱di nyi shî ngbe nyi mwe rici ngbe nné mbe ne mbe re̱. Shi de̱ nyi hwie he nyi ne̱ nné e̱ ne zentsi we̱.
Shi de̱ nyi trra e̱ngwie̱ ne e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Nyi ci nkwile̱ ngbe nyi nyi kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri a nwie ko nye̱.
Nyi nyi ko nda ne nyi ri hung nying aha ngbe nyi srra rina ngbe ko nye̱.
Nné ce̱ nje, shi de̱ nyi trra e̱ngwie̱ we̱, me̱di nyi we Be̱ne̱ re níng trrang ne ren ngu. Aha á wie he: “Trrang nyi ngge nje, nje ri trra, kya ne Brrabe̱ e̱ he e̱ nyi ngwiee.”
Me̱di shi kya ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he,
“Kundu rwinko ngwe̱ shi ne nzhwo,
ki ngwa yâ ye.
Kundu ne̱ rishi ki hwe,
ki ngwa rishi shwe.
Kundu ngwe̱ nyi ni, ngwe̱ e̱ ki ci nshwu
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ we e̱ngwie̱ re shwe igbe̱ ngwe̱ we̱, me̱di nyi shwe igbe̱ e̱ngwie̱ ne re-cwuo rina.
Se ko nye̱ re ngwa ringgwe̱ ngwie̱ grime̱, aha ko bi ya ringgwe̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu we̱sa cing we̱. Ga re-ringgwe̱ ne nzhi bi ne̱ nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu ci.
Aha ni ko nye̱ ne ngu ra ho nka ringgwe̱, mahu a ce̱trri kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu rwe sa; ko nye̱ ne ngu bra nyi ni e̱ shi yaa be mi ne nyi nka a rici ngu.
Ko nnencwueé e̱ á nyi kya owu a nwie nné nyi kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱. Ngwe̱ cé̱ srra we dengge we̱sa ne owu nné ringgwe̱ e̱e̱? Ma nyi kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri, ngbe wé̱ re de.

Aha á nyi nnencwuó Be̱ne̱ ngbe ré re nyi ngwe̱ e̱ rinang. Me̱di kundu ngwe̱ ywe̱, ci owu mbe, aha koó bro re-ise̱nkeli mbe e̱ we shweni we̱. Aha á nyi nnencwuó Be̱ne̱ aha ngbe ré ngwa nné bi vini cinci shi kya Be̱ne̱ cé̱.
Aha ni, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi ho nka ringgwe̱ ngwie̱ e̱, ko we aha ne nyi to shwe cinci we̱, me̱di aha de̱ nyi bi vini a yarri ronu rie nyi we̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nyi trra gondu a, aha nnencwuo gonati e̱ á nyi nnencwuó Be̱ne̱, ne mbe ngwa zhe mbe zhwozhwo aha cwuo ringgwe̱ ngwie̱.

Aha ni nyi trra ko nye̱ kya ne ngu níng zhwe: nne nke ne ngu si gondu, ki trrang; nne nke ne ngu si ncwe̱ng ankya, ki trrang; nne nke ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngwe̱ to owu ngu, to owu ngu, nne nke ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngwe̱ ki ngwa grime̱, ki ngwa.
Shi de̱ nyi bro tsie ya nne we̱sa trrang we̱; se ka tsie nke ne e zhwe ko nye̱, nyi ngwiee ngu nyi he nyi yaa ce̱. Ko nye̱ ne ngu nyí nke ne̱ mahu a zhwé Nti Nka ye̱ye̱rri.

Ga re-nka ne e ngwa he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi njè we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ yhwe̱ nne we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ nyi nca we̱, de̱ ngwe̱ ci riyii yankya ya nne we̱,” ngbe re̱se̱ re-nka ne e ngwa a zhwozhwo á mwe á shi we yarri zunzrru ne̱ he: “Ce̱ nne dudu ne ngwe̱ shi rici ngwe̱.”
Ko ce̱ e̱ nyi nke he ngwe̱ nyi nne dudu ne ngwe̱ hwie̱ we̱. Mahu kundu ngwe̱ ce̱ nne dudu ne ngwe̱ e̱, ngwe̱ e̱ zhwe Nti Nka zhwozhwo.
Aha ni, se nyi nyi ni, aha nyi hu zhwe zhe ne nzhi ning shi ne̱. Zhe e̱ be ngbe nyi shwo ndzie. Zhe ne e shi níng kyia a sa dudu re ne̱ zhe ne nzhi i ning si ywe̱.
Totu a nyia, mincwe e̱ ri kpa kla. Aha ni nzhi we ni re-cwuo na ewie ywing ngbe nzhi hwrra ankyang ko na ewie si.

Nde nzhi srra zhwe srra te̱nte̱ng shi nné ne mbe srra a nwie si brra te̱ne̱ — ko a re-parang shwe ankyang dzio nci we̱, ka shwe ankyang ci zhing we̱, ka le̱le̱ njè we̱, ka nyi ankya nshwu we̱, ka yaa ti ka we̱, ka ci riyii a ankya nné we̱.
Me̱di nyi yaa sha ne e̱kpe̱e̱ Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi. Shi de̱ nyi hwie nkang ho shwi ankya ecwue na ikpe rwe̱ we̱.
Nne nke ne sa rie ngu a shi brrubrru, nyi ki se̱; shi de̱ nyi ki ti onu ce nwie he e brru aha kya ne ngu ning hwie yi e̱ shi ka ne na nyi we̱.
Yá mbe bi sa rie he mbe e̱ hung ye ko nda ne mbe ce̱, me̱di ya ne sa rie ngu a shi brrubrru we̱ ce̱ ye we ankya mbe ne e tsi a nhwie̱n.

Shi de̱ nne nke ne ngu hung ye ko nda re dzie̱ nne ne ngu ra ye kpi re-ankya we̱; shi de̱ nne nke ne ngu yé we kya ne e tsi tsi a nhwie̱n ma re dzie̱ nne ne ngu yé ko nda we̱, aha ga mbe zhwozhwo Be̱ne̱ we ce̱.
Nyi ngwe̱ nye̱ ngwe̱ nyi hwie yaka ya nne nka aa? A nyi we be̱ri ngu a ngu hung he aa nyi ye̱ye̱rri ka aa ywe̱. Aha nyi Brrabe̱ ngu hung ki ci re yo tsantsa.
Ya nne e̱ fo ya otu a ki ne̱ kpi rotu a zhwozhwo, ya a ri ga rotu a zhwozhwo ki nyi we zunzrru. Nde ko nye̱ re fo kya ne ngu hu he shi tsantsa a yarri hwie ngu.

Nne nke ne ngu fo he ya otu ki ne̱ kpi rotu a, aa ki fo ni aha grime̱ Brrabe̱. Nne nke ne ngu bra yé ko nda a wa, a nyi ni aha grime̱ Brrabe̱, aha a cí Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng. Nne nke ma ne ngu rá ye yá re-ankya, a nyi ni aha grime̱ Be̱ne̱, aha ngu a ma a cí Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng.
Ko bi ya nzhi ne ngu srra we aha rici ngu we̱; ko bra bi nne ngu shi hu we aha rici ngu wa we̱.
Kundu nzhi shi nce, we̱ nyi we aha grime̱ Brrabe̱ ne nzhi shi nce; kundu ne nzhi bra kwi, nzhi e̱ kwi we aha grime̱ Brrabe̱. Aha ni ka nzhi shi nce ka nzhi kwi, nzhi nyi we na Brrabe̱.
A nyi aha ni ne Krristi i hu, ngu bra ning brru deze nce, aha ngu hwie̱ Brrabe̱ na nné nce ngbe nné kwi.
Ma aha nda ne ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ ri vini gimbe ngwe̱ e̱e̱? Ngwe̱ e̱ ma, aha ngwe̱ dzie̱ gimbe ngwe̱ e̱ ma aa? Ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi ri yo a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ngbe re níng nyi nka.
Aha á wie he,
“Nje Brrabe̱ bi ce e̱ nje he,
ko nye̱ ri hu be ne re-ruhuu ngu a nyyi nje,
ko nye̱ we̱ he we ne onu ngu he nje nyi Be̱ne̱.”
Mahu ko nye̱ nzhi ri yo re he kya ne ngu nyi a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Aha ni, nzhi we ni yaa nyie̱ nva re he nne nke ka nke bi vini. Ne re shi ni, canca ngwe̱ ngwe̱ fo a yarri ngwe̱ he ko shi ngwe̱ nyi yankya he̱rri re ci ya gimbe re grre̱ re kpe yarri e̱ngwie̱ we̱.
Nje hu cence he shi ni, aha nje shi yarri Brrabe̱ Jesu, nje hu he ko bi ko ya yâ ne ngu we̱sa shi wiri we̱; me̱di kundu ya hwié he ko ya yâ we̱sa shi wiri we̱, mahu ko shi wiri we̱ a nwie ngu.
