Me̱di kundu aha kya ne ngwe̱ yé e̱ ngwe̱ shi ci ya gimbe re dzio ehwie, mahu kya ngwe̱ nyi e̱ tí he ko ngwe̱ ki ce̱ we̱. Shi de̱ kya ne ngwe̱ yé e̱ re hwie̱ kya ngu shi ci ya gimbe ne Krristi ngu hu aha ngu re ci shweni we̱.
Shi de̱ kya ne ngwe̱ hwie he bi rina a ré he he shi me̱nkye̱ we̱.
Aha ko Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi nkang ye re shwe we̱, me̱di nyi nka redziee, ngbe srra rina, ngbe ehwie kla ne Nshe Wiri ngu ngwa.
Kundu nneywí nyí Krristi cwuo ni, mahu wé̱ kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie, nneywí wé̱ bra he kya mbe nyi e̱ bi rina.
Aha ni, nde nzhi yaa rwe nwie nyi kya ne ngu shi be mi ne srra rina ngbe yaa ci cwo a nci nzhi.
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ dzio kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi aha kya ne ngwe̱ yé we̱. Ko bi ya yâ ne ngu we̱sa shi wiri we̱, me̱di a shi wie̱e̱ni ngbe ya nne re ye kya ne ngu shi ci ya re grre̱.
A nyi canca de̱ ngwe̱ ye ya rine̱, ka ngwe̱ shwe ya rishi ruto, ka ngwe̱ nyi yankya ne ngu shi ci ya gimbe re kpe yarri e̱ngwie̱ we̱.
Bro kya ne ngwe̱ ning hwie yi a nka ne̱ we hwie ngwe̱ ngbe Be̱ne̱. Mwo rina nyi na nne nke ne ko ngu ho a hwie ngu a he kya ne ngu nyi e̱ shi wie̱e̱ni we̱.

Me̱di nne nke ne ngu ki shi jinji a nka kya ne ngu ye e̱, mahu nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu ki ting he yeng nna shi wie̱e̱ni, aha kya ne ngu yé e̱ ko shi ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu ning sa rie we̱. Ko nda ne e nyi we̱sa ne sa rie e̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi ne sa rie nzhi e̱ bi igbe̱ nzhi she nné mbe ne sa rie mbe e̱ shi brrubrru ne re-brru mbe. Shi de̱ nzhi nyi we kya ne ngu shi ning ngwa nzhi e̱ ehwie kla we̱.
Nde ko nye̱ nzhi re nyi nne dudu ne ngu rina nwie ki kla ehwie, re ki ci cwo.
Aha ko ngbe Krristi e̱ ma ko i nyi yankya aha ngu yaa ngwa ehwie kla we rici ngu we̱. Me̱di a i ci we shi kya ne e wie he: “Ga re-cwi ne e re cwi ngwe̱ e̱ hwie̱ we rici nje.”
Ko nda ne i wie a yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ á i wie aha re níng mie̱ng, re bra níng shwe̱ rehwie aha ngbe nzhi hung yaa rwe nwie sa riyii a re-ankya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng sa jee.
Nde Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng shwé̱ rehwie re níng sheng ngbe nyi hung yaa rwe aha nyi mwe rici a nci nyi nwie mie̱ zhwe srra na Krristi Jesu,
aha ngbe ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi ci onu zrru nwie de Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi a yarri ronu rie nyi.
Ko nye̱ ri ma si re-gimbe a yarri Krristi ne nva wehwie we shi ne Krristi ngu níng se̱ aha grime̱ Be̱ne̱ ma.
Nje níng ting he kya ngu i ci ne Krristi e̱ hwie̱ nnencwuo nné Yahudi e̱ nyi aha ngu ti raywrra Be̱ne̱, ngbe ngu bra ti he re-jee ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i sa brrá re-yo mbeng nna koo kpo we̱.
Aa bra i nyi ni aha ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ re de Be̱ne̱ aha naana ngu re be nwie mbe, shi ne e wie he,
“Aha ni, nje shi re de a tsi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱;
Nje bra shi ce̱ re-veng de lo ngwe̱.”
Á bra wie wa he,
“Nyi nyi rekwi,
nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱, ngbe nné na Be̱ne̱!”
A bra he wa he,
“Nyi de Brrabe̱, ga nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ zhwozhwo;
nyi ki de, ga nyi nneywí zhwozhwo!”
Ishaya bra i he wa he,
“Ya ri wru a nzhwe Jese;
ngbe we̱ ye ringgwe̱ a zete Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱,
Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ wé̱ sa riyii a ngu.”
Nde Be̱ne̱ ne nzhi sa riyii a ngu re níng ngwa ehwie kla ngbe srra rina aha ne nyi sá rie a ngu, aha ngbe nyi ke̱ we ne ning bra sa riyii a ngu ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri ne ngu níng sheng.
Re-gimbe, nje we rici nje e̱ nje hu cence he nyi bi e̱kpe̱e̱ rina, nyi bra bi hu re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ we yang, he nyi bra hung yaa mie̱ng we nci nyi.
Nje níng he yá re-nka a yarri krre̱de̱ ne̱ we dengge aha ne nje ce̱ níng lu te̱nte̱. A ning shi we dengge ni aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ shi ngbe nje,

ngbe n hwie̱ nnencwuo Krristi Jesu re nzhi nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱. Nje shi ncwuo shi nyi ya prristi aha ngbe n brro re̱se̱ Nka Rina Be̱ne̱; ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ré ci shi nyi ya teede na ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri Be̱ne̱ re se̱, ne Nshe Wiri we ko á hwie̱ na Be̱ne̱.
Aha ni nje cwe zewe ne cwuo Be̱ne̱ ne nje shi mi a yarri Krristi Jesu.
Ko shi n mahwie̱ he nje shi he ya nka we̱, se we kya ne Krristi ngu nyi a yarri nje aha ngu kwa Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ré ne̱ ne nyi kya ne Be̱ne̱ he aha re-nka ne nje we heng ngbe re-ankya ne nje nyi,
ne igbe̱ ngbá re-sheede ngbe re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu ne igbe̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱. Nyi aha ni ne nje ce̱ ciee a Urrushelima he̱rri re nzhi wre̱ Ilirriku nwie brro Nka Rina Krristi zhwozhwo.
Ngba cwu kya ne nje i ce̱ e̱ nyi nke he n brro Nka Rina nna a nwie ne koó ning hu Krristi gung we̱, kishi nje ri shi shi nne ne ngu shi runo a zete riti runo na yaka ya nne ngu sa.
Me̱di a shi we shi ne e wie he,
“Nné mbe ne koó i we ting aha ngu we̱, á ri ri,
ngbe nné mbe ne ko mbe i ho we̱ wé̱ she hu re̱se̱ng.”
A nyi aha ni ne ngu ning fo zhe we yang ne nje ce̱ be nwie nyi, me̱di koo ci we̱.
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ tu ne nje fro re-cwuo nje a re-ngwie̱ nke ne̱, ne nje bra fo re-rie we yang nwie ku ucwua nyi he nje ra be n ya níng ri,

nje hwie he nje cwo be a zhe ne ne̱. Nje sa riyii he kundu nje ri shi rê re nzhi Sipaniya, ma n ta n níng dzie. Kundu nje ri ci e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱ ngbe ne nyi, nyi e̱ ning sheng a ciee nje re nzhi miimi e̱ fa.
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ nje shi rê re nzhi Urrushelima aha a bi ankya ne nje cwo a ngwa nné Be̱ne̱ a miimi.
Aha rekpri nné ce nka a Makyidoniya ngbe Akaya á ngwa nci mbe nwie tsu ncwé̱ aha yiriywé̱ ne mbe shi tsi nné Be̱ne̱ na Urrushelima.

A nyi kya ne mbe rwe nying we mwa yi mbe, wire ma aa bra mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ré we sheng. Tu ne Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ mbe she mwo rina na nka Be̱ne̱ aha nné Yahudi, mahu aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ré we sheng ne kya mbe bi ma.
Kundu nje ri fro cwuong ywa mi ne ankya ne̱, ne nje hu cence he aa ngwie nva mbe, wire ma n pie rê re nzhi Sipaniya, ma n ta n níng dzie wire n wara.
Nje hu he nje ri shi ya wre̱ nwie nyi e̱, ma n ya wre̱ ne re-mwo rina Krristi we yang.
Re-gimbe, nje cwe nva ne nyi aha Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ngbe ce̱ ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu ci nzhi yaa ce̱: he nyi kwe̱ ngbe nje a yarri ku Be̱ne̱ aha nje.
Nyi ku he Be̱ne̱ re ning kye̱ a nva nné ra nka a Yahudi, he ngbe nné Be̱ne̱ ne mbe shi Urrushelima a ré bra ya se̱ kya ne nje cwo a we ngwa;
he kundu ngu ri bra nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ wa, ma n ya wre̱ nwie nyi e̱ ne ehwie kla we yang, ngbe ma n she e̱we̱ srra cwu ngbe ne nyi.
Nde Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ngwá srra rina re shi ngbe ne nyi zhwozhwo. Nde re shi ni.
Nje bra ce̱ nyi hu Fibi, ne ngu nyi gimbe nzhi ewerembrru, ne ngu nyi nnencwuo Be̱ne̱ a yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka na Kenkrra.
Nyi ki se̱ a yarri lo Brrabe̱ shi ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ning se̱ nne Be̱ne̱. Nyi bra ki sheng ne ko nda ne ngu ri kre a nwie nyi; aha aa nyi ne she nné piriring ga ngbe nje ma.
Nyi ning dzie Prriska ngbe Akyila, ne mbe nyi rwincwuó nje a yarri Krristi Jesu.
Á i ngwa nci mbe shi mbe shi ning kwi kwi aha nje. Nje we ci kijie̱ng, ko nyi we nje nggaa nje we̱, me̱di ga ngbe rekpri nné ce̱ nka Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ zhwozhwo.
Nyi ning dzie ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe mwé a ri mbe wa.
Nyi ning dzie brra rwi nje Epenetu, ne ngu i ke̱she se̱ nka Krristi a mbè ngwie̱ Asia.
Nyi ning dzie Merri ne ngu i nyi cwuo we yang aha nyi.
Nyi ning dzie re-gimbe nje nné Yahudi, Andrroniku ngbe Juniya, ne mbe i shi uucwu gyiaa ngbe nje. Á we hu we yang a tsi nnenté, á bra i ke̱she nje hwie̱ nné ce̱ nka Krristi.
Nyi ning dzie Ampiliyatu, brra rwi nje a yarri Brrabe̱.
Nyi ning dzie Ubanu ne ngu nyi rwincwuo nzhi a yarri Krristi, ngbe brra rwi nje Stakyi.
Nyi ning dzie Apele, á ki hu aha sa rici ngu nwie Krristi.
Nyi ning dzie nné ri Aristobulu.
Nyi ning dzie Herrodiyo, ya gimbe nje nne Yahudi, ga ngbe nné ri Nasisu ne mbe shi yarri Brrabe̱.
Nyi ning dzie Trrifana ngbe Trrifosa, ne mbe nyi mbrrú ne mbe i nyi cwuo Brrabe̱ we yang.
Nyi ning dzie brra la nje Pesi, ne ngu i nyi cwuo Brrabe̱ we yang.
Nyi ning dzie Rrufu, ya brra nnencwuo Brrabe̱ ne e ki hu, ngbe de̱ ngu ne ngu i ning fo shi nje nyi ewe ngu.
Nyi ning dzie Asinkrritu, ngbe Filigo, ngbe Heme, ngbe Patrroba, ngbe Hama, ngbe ga re-gimbe ne mbe shi ngbe mbe zhwozhwo.
Nyi ning dzie Filologu ngbe Juliya, ngbe Nerru ngbe gimbe ngu ewerembrru, ngbe Olumpa, ngbe ga nné Be̱ne̱ ne mbe shi ngbe mbe zhwozhwo.
Nyi yaa dzie nwie yaa nyi gbagba.
Ga rekpri nné ce̱ nka Krristi zhwozhwo níng dzie.
Nje cwe nva ne nyi re-gimbe, he nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne nné ci ré srra kanka ana. Á ci nneywí ré grre̱, á bra ce̱trri kya ne e níng mie̱ng. Nyi to ze̱nze̱ ne mbe!
Aha zhwe nné ana, ko nyi Krristi Brrabe̱ nzhi ne mbe ki nyí cwuo we̱, á kre we kya rehwie mbe ce̱. Á brrá nné ne ko mbe hwie nka cwuncwuu we̱ nwie we be̱ lo ne re-nkang shwe̱li nné.

Nka a se̱ ngwie̱ yu he nyi se̱ Nka Rina a ne nva wehwie wehwie. Aha ni a ning bi rekwi we yang. Nje ce̱ nyi bi zentsi nwie hu kya ne ngu bi rina, me̱di ré ning she ko nyi bi vini a kya ne ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ we̱.
Wire Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ngwá srra rina a ri hle̱ Shetani, we̱ níng ngwa igbe̱ a rici ngu. Ko shi fo zhe we̱.
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu re shi ngbe ne nyi.
Timoti ne ngu nyi rwincwuo nje e̱ níng dzie, ga ngbe Lusiyu ngbe Jaso, ngbe Sosipata, ne mbe nyi re-gimbe nje nné Yahudi.
Nje Tetiyu ne Bulu ngu ning ci n níng wie krre̱de̱ ne̱, nje níng dzie a yarri Brrabe̱.
Gayu ne nje shi yarri eri ngu ngbe ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe mwe ri ngu a a níng dzie.
Errastu ne ngu bró aata brra ngwie̱, ga ngbe gimbe nzhi Kwarrtu á níng dzie.
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe ne nyi zhwozhwo. Re shi ni.
Nde nzhi de Be̱ne̱! Nyi ngu ngu hu níng ci nyi yo gangga ne sa rie nyi, ye̱ye̱rri ne Nka Rina Jesu Krristi ne nje brro ye̱ye̱rri ne raywrra nke ne ngu i shi la la gannyi tiya ne e ti.

A zhe ne ne̱ á wru mi ci we cwe nkyie a yarri re-krre̱de̱ ne nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe wie, aa ci nzhi hu raywrra we gbeng. A nyi ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu wru gannyi tiya he̱rri tiya ne ngu ngwa nka ne̱. Aa a ci ga re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo á hu he shi ni, aha ngbe ga nné zhwozhwo ré ning sa rie ré bra zhwe.
Grime̱ nyi ngge Be̱ne̱ we nggaa ngu, ne ngu bi zentsi zhwozhwo, aha Jesu Krristi he̱rri tiya! Nde re shi ni.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie nje Bulu ne e ning ye n hwie̱ nnente Krristi Jesu ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe ne Sositene gimbe nzhi,

re nzhi nwie ekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ne mbe shi Korrinti, ne Be̱ne̱ ngu we kyie ré hwie̱ nné wiri ngu a yarri Krristi Jesu, ngbe ga nneywí zhwozhwo ko he ne mbe yé Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi mbè, Krristi e̱ nyi Brrabe̱ mbe ngbe na nzhi.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ nzhi ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe ne nyi ngbe nyi bra she srra rina.
Nje ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha nyi ko zembe zhe aha ehwie rina ngu re be nwie nyi a yarri Krristi Jesu.
Aha a yarri ngu, nyi shwe rishwe a yarri ko nda — a tsi re-nka ne nyi he ngbe hu re̱se̱ng nyi.
Aha nka Krristi ne nzhi brro a ci riti a yarri nyi.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne ko nyi we̱sa bi yankya na na ne Nshe Wiri ngwá we̱, shi ne nyi shi nwie srrante re tsio be Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ne̱.
A shi níng bro gangga he̱rri re nzhi cwu krrucing, kishi á ri níng she ne ya vini a Tuuye ne Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi ri be.
Ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ye ngbe nyi mwe rici ngbe ne Kowe ngu Jesu Krristi Brrabe̱ nzhi e̱, ko we̱sa nyí kya ne ngu ning sa jee we̱.

Re-gimbe, nje cwe nva ne nyi a yarri lo Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi he nyi ci onu zrru. Shi de̱ nyi bi ronu kanka a nci nyi we̱, me̱di nyi mwe rici, ngbe hwie nka nyi ngbe kya ne nyi hwie nying re shi zunzrru.
Re-gimbe nje, nje ho a nwie nné ri Klowe he nyi yaa ti ronu ce we nci nyi.
Kya ne nje ning shi nka a nyi nke: ko nye̱ nyi bi we nka ngu ka, ya he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi na Bulu”; ya we̱ he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi na Apolo”; ngbe ya we̱ he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi na Kyefa
Á kye Krristi e̱ kanka aa? Nyi Bulu ne i ki ci gasankwe aha nyi e̱e̱? Ka á i níng nyi batisma a yarri lo Bulu aa?
Nje ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha ko nje i nyi ko ya nyi batisma we̱ se we Krrispu ngbe Gayu.
Aha ni ko bi nne re he á i ki nyi batisma a yarri lo nje we̱.
(E̱nhe̱n, nje lu, a bi ngbe nné ri Sitifana ne nje i we nyi batisma wa. A ning shi we̱sa ne mbe ne̱ ko bra bi ko ya nyi ne nje i ki nyi batisma wa we̱.)
Aha ko Krristi i ning te he ngbe n ya nyi nneywí batisma we̱, me̱di he n ya brro Nka Rina we̱sa ne nti nka na zentsi nneywi, kishi igbe̱ hu Krristi a gasankwe ri hwie̱ kya shweni.
Nka hu Krristi a gasankwe e̱ nyi we cwuo shweni a nwie nné mbiye ne mbe nyia re nzhi ci shweni; me̱di a nwie nzhi ne nzhi nyia re nzhi she kyia, nyi ngu a ngu nyi igbe̱ Be̱ne̱.
Aha á wie he:
“Nje ri ci zentsi nné ne mbe hwie he mbe bi zentsi re ci shweni,
ngbe ma n ci nné ne mbe hwie he mbe bi hu re̱se̱ng re we ci zhizhi.”
Ma nné bi zentsi e̱ á shi he? Nné mie̱ Nti Nka Musa a á shi he? Ga ngbe nné hung he nka a zhe ne ne̱ á shi he? Ko Be̱ne̱ e̱ ti he zentsi ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ nyi we cwuo shweni we̱ e̱e̱?

Aha Be̱ne̱ a yarri zentsi na ngu, aa ci ko shi nneywi re hung ki hu ne zentsi na rici ngu we̱, me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ kyie brro nka ne e ri shi shi nyi cwuo shweni ngbe re hwie̱ rê ne nné ce̱ nka mbe shi ning she kyia.
Mbe nné Yahudi e̱ á kre he mbe ri sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu; mbe nné Heleni e̱ ma á kre he mbe she zentsi.
Me̱di nyi nka Krristi ne e ki ci gasankwe ne nzhi brro, ne a nwie nné Yahudi e̱ a nyi kya ne ngu we ra ehwie, a nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ ma a nyi we cwuo shweni.
Me̱di a nwie nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ we ye, ka ré nyi nné Yahudi ka ré nyi nné Heleni, nka nna nyi we nka Krristi ne ngu nyi igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe zentsi Be̱ne̱.
Aha kya ne e fo he nyi riywe̱ zentsi a nwie Be̱ne̱, aa hle zentsi nneywi we gbong; ewie ne e ri shi shi Be̱ne̱ e̱ ning re̱, aa wara igbe̱ na nneywi we gbong.

Re-gimbe, nyi lu ka nyi i shi rimi ye̱ a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ i níng ye. Ko ngbe a hwie nka na nneywi e̱ ma, a nyi nné wemwa ne i we ri shi a bi zentsi e̱? A nyi nné wemwa mbe i bi igbe̱ ringgwe̱ e̱? A i nyi nné wemwa ne e we bî a ri ringgwe̱ e̱?
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ kyie kya ne ngu nyi cwuo shweni a be ngwie̱, aha ngbe ngu ning ci nné zentsi nshwu. Be̱ne̱ kyie ankya brrubrru a be ngwie̱ aha ngu ning ci nné bi igbe̱ nshwu.
Aa kyie kya ne e ri shi de̱ bi mpe̱ni we̱ a be ngwie̱, ne e bra ce̱trri, ngbe kya na ne e dzie̱ dzie̱, aha ngbe ngu ning ci kya ne nneywí hwie he nyi zunkya re ci shweni.
Aha ni ko bi nne re hung cwe zewe a nyyi ngu we̱.
Me̱di nyi e̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ be ne nyi a yarri Krristi Jesu, aa níng ngwa zentsi na ngu a yarri Krristi. A nyi aha ngu ne nzhi hwie̱ nné redziee, nzhi ci wiri, nzhi bra she drre̱.
Aha ngbe re ci we shi ne e wie he: “Nde nne nke ne ngu cwe zewe, re cwe aha kya ne Brrabe̱ ne ngu nyi.”
Re-gimbe, a zhe ne nje i be nwie nyi nwie níng ti re-ankya la la ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ting nna, ko nje i be ne ngbá nti nka ka yá re-nka na zentsi zentsi we̱.
Aha a zhe ne nje i shi ngbe ne nyi e̱, nje i rwe a hwie nje e̱ he ko shi n he ko yaka nka we̱ se we nka Jesu Krristi; ngu ne e ki ci gasankwe.
He̱rri nje i be brrubrrubrru a yarri owu ngbe ne rwe̱ tsi.
A zhe ne nje i he nka ne nyi nwie níng brro nka, ko nje i he nka ne re-nka zentsi zentsi aha n níng cwua we̱, me̱di nka nje e̱ i ti igbe̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱ we gbeng.
Aha ngbe de̱ sa rie nyi e̱ re yo a zentsi nneywi we̱, me̱di re yo a igbe̱ Be̱ne̱.
Gbengbe ni nzhi hé nka ne nné mbe ne mbe ci brráng a yarri ce̱ nka ne zentsi, me̱di ko nyi zhwe zentsi na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ ka na zhwe igbe̱ ringgwe̱ ngwie̱ ne ngu shi ci shweni ne̱ we̱.
Me̱di zentsi na ne nje brro a nyi zhwe zentsi na Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi la la, ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ke̱she rwe sa aha nzhi tu ne ngu rishi nyi ebe ngwie̱ ngbe nzhi ning she grime̱.
Ko bi ya nne ringgwe̱ na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ ngu hu we̱, aha kundu mbe ra hu, koó ra ci Brrabe̱ bi grime̱ a gasankwe we̱.
Me̱di we shi ne e wie:
“Ko riyii ya nne sa ri we̱;
ko uucwu ya nne sa ho we̱;
ko ehwie ya nne sa hwie nka a zeteng we̱;
a nyi kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu rwe sa aha nné ne mbe ki ce̱.”
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ting ne Nshe Wiri ngu. Nshe Wiri e̱ hu ko nda, he̱rri ngbe re-hwie nka cwuncwuu na Be̱ne̱.
Aha a nyi nye̱ re hu hwie nka ne ngu shi yarri hwie yaka nne e̱? Ko bi we̱ se we ehwie ngu nne nna. A shi we ni wa, ko bi nne re hu hwie nka Be̱ne̱ we̱ se we Nshe Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di nzhi nné ce̱ nka, ko nyi zhwe hwie nka na ngu wru be ngwie̱ ne e níng ngwa we̱, a nyi Nshe Wiri ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱, aha ngbe nzhi hung hu ko nda ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa we shweni.
Kya ne nzhi he e̱ ko nyi kya ne nzhi mie̱ mie̱ ne zentsi nneywi we̱, me̱di nyi nti nka ne Nshe Wiri níng mie̱ng, nyi ngwiee nzhi mie̱ nné mbiye ne mbe bi Nshe Wiri raywrra na Nshe Wiri.
Me̱di nne nke ne ko ngu bi Nshe Wiri we̱, ko sé̱ kya ne ngu wru nwie Nshe Be̱ne̱ we̱, aha a nwie zhwe nne ana a ki nyi we cwuo shweni, ko shi re hung hung we̱, aha se nne bi Nshe Wiri re hung pieng.
Me̱di nne nke ne Nshe Wiri ki kwá a hu mpe̱ni ko nda ne Nshe Wiri mié̱, ko shi nne nke ne ngu nyi riywe̱ Nshe Wiri re bra hung he aa nyi ye̱ye̱rri ka aa brru we̱,
shi ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he:
“Nyi nye̱ re hung hu hwie nka Brrabe̱ e̱?
He̱rri nyi nye̱ re hung ki ti nka a?”
Me̱di nzhi e̱ hwie nka na nzhi nyi na Krristi.
Re-gimbe, ko nje i hung he nka ne nyi shi nyi nyi nné bi Nshe Wiri we̱, nje i he nka ne nyi shi nyi nyi nné tsi ngwie̱, shi nyi nyi e̱we̱e̱ rewe a yarri Krristi.
Nje i cwo ne nyi shi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne e we ngwá madrra, we̱sa ne cwu yâ, aha ko nyi i ci igbe̱ ré níng ngwa kya ngu klo we̱. He̱rri ne cwu ne̱ ko nyi bra ci igbe̱ we̱,

aha nyi shi nwie srra shi nyi nyi nné tsi ngwie̱ he̱rri ne cwu. Kundu nyi bi rehwie rro nwie yaa ti ronu ce we nci nyi, mahu ko he̱rri ne cwu nyi shi tsi ngwie̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi shi nwie srra yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ nneywi we̱ e̱e̱?
Kundu ne ya he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi na Bulu,” ngbe ya we̱ he, “Nje e̱ nje nyi na Apolo,” ko nyi e̱ ti he nyi shi yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ nneywi we̱ e̱e̱?

Gbengbe ni ma nyi nye̱ ngu nyi Apolo a? Ka nyi nye̱ ngu nyi Bulu a? Ko ga nzhi gbengbe nzhi nyi we nnencwuó Be̱ne̱ ne nzhi níng kwa ngbe nyi sa rie a yarri Krristi we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nye̱ nzhi nyi we cwuo na ngu ne Be̱ne̱ ki ngwa re nyi.
Nje e̱ nje tsi zhwe e̱, ngbe Apolo a ning ti rishi, me̱di nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu ci zhwe nna re ci.
Aha ni nne nke ne ngu tsi ngbe ne nke ne ngu ning ti rishi e̱ koó shi nu yankya we̱, se we ngu Be̱ne̱ nggaa ngu ne ngu ci zhwe nna re ci.
Nne nke ne ngu tsi e̱ ko shi ka ne nne nke ne ngu ning ti rishi we̱, aha Be̱ne̱ shi ngwa ko nye̱ mbe lede ngu ye̱ye̱rri ne cwuo ngu ne ngu nyi.
Aha ga nzhi nzhi nyi rwincwuó a ncwuo Be̱ne̱, nyi e̱ nyi nyi ebe Be̱ne̱. Nyi bra nyi runo Be̱ne̱.
Nje i sa riti runo nna ne ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi rici nje shi nne ne ngu nyi shwa a ncwuo runo, ngbe yaka nne e̱ no runo nna. Me̱di ko nye̱ re nyi te̱nte̱ ne zhwe runo ne ngu shi nong.
Aha Be̱ne̱ e̱ ke̱she ci Jesu Krristi we rici ngu re hwie̱ riti runo nna, ko bra bi ya nne re sa yaka riti runo ne ngu shi ka we̱.
Me̱di yá nné no runo nna á shi nong a zete riti runo nna ne zinarriya, yá ne azrrufa, yá ne rahwan bi grime̱, yá ne rekwe, yá ne ntsi, yá ne tehwrree.
Á ri ri cwuo ko nye̱ ka shi rimi ye̱ a Tu ne Krristi ri ti ko nda ci a cwe nkyie. Aha á ri he Tuuye, á ri mwa cwuo ko nye̱ ne ro, ngbe ro a we̱ ti ka cwuo ko nye̱ shi rimi ye̱.
Kundu ne e she cwuo ne nne ngu nyi e̱ drre̱ a yarri ro nna, we̱ she lede.
Me̱di nné nke ne ro ri ye na ngu, we̱ wi lede nna, me̱di ngu nna we̱ she kyia we shi nne ne e ki ti yarri nro.
Ko nyi ru he nyi e̱ nyi nyi brranyi Be̱ne̱, he Nshe Be̱ne̱ e̱ srra yarri nyi we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko nye̱ ne ngu dzio brranyi Be̱ne̱, Be̱ne̱ ri ki ci re ci shweni, aha brranyi Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi wiri, a bra nyi nyi we nci nyi ne nyi nyi brranyi nna.
Shi de̱ ya nne re yaa brra we rici ngu we̱, kundu ya nyi hwie he ngu bi zhwe zentsi na ngwie̱ ne̱, nde re ci rici ngu shi ngu nyi rumwa, aha ngbe re she zentsi.
Aha zentsi na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ nyi we cwuo shweni a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we shi ne e wie he,
“Nné mbe ne mbe hwie he mbe bi zentsi,
zentsi mbe e̱ nyi eetsie ne Be̱ne̱ we prré.”
Á bra wie wa he,
“Brrabe̱ hu re-hwie nka nné bi zentsi e̱,
he á nyi we cwuo shweni.”
Aha ni shi de̱ ya nne re cwe zewe ne ya nne we̱. Ko nda shi nva nyi:
ka re nyi Bulu, ka Apolo, ka Kyefa,
nyi e̱ nyi na Krristi, Krristi e̱ nyi na Be̱ne̱.
Aha nii, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ning ri nzhi nyi nnencwuó Krristi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ngwa cwuong brro nka raywrra ngu ne ngu shi la la a nva nzhi.
We̱sa ni, aa bra mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré she nne nke ne e ki ngwa cwuo a nyi nne ré hung sa rie a ngu.
Me̱di nje e̱ ko ning kpi roshwo hwie we̱, he ya nyi ka yaka ya nne re he he nje nyi cwuo nje e̱ ye̱ye̱rri ka de̱ nje nyi ye̱ye̱rri we̱; ko ngbe nje e̱ ma ko nje yaa nyi nka we rici nje we̱.
A nwie nje, onu rie nje e̱ shi wiriri, a ni e̱ koo ci shi nje we̱sa brru we̱. Me̱di nyi Brrabe̱ ngu hung nyi nka a rici nje.

Aha ni shi de̱ nyi nyi ya nne nka ne zhe nna rishi we̱, nyi te se zhe Brrabe̱ ri be wire. A ri be we̱ ya wru mi ne ko nda ne ngu shi la la a nwie ywing ci, ngbe we̱ kla re-ankya ne nneywí mbe i rwe a re-hwie nka ronu rie mbe we gbeng. Wire a zhe ana Be̱ne̱ we̱ de ko nye̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne cwuo ngu ne ngu nyi.

Me̱di, re-gimbe, re-ankya ne̱ nje ning mwa yi a rici nje ngbe ne Apolo aha nyi, aha ngbe nyi mie̱ yankya a nka ne e he: “Shi de̱ nyi he yankya ka nyi nyi yankya he̱rri re hle kya ne e wie we̱.” Wire ko nyi e̱ cwe zewe ne ya nne mie̱ nka nyi bra ce̱trri ya we̱.

Nyi nye̱ ngu re ti ka he ngwe̱ ne̱ kpi nné e̱? Nyi nda ngwe̱ bi ne ko ngu nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu re ngwa we̱ e̱? Ma kundu ko nda ne ngwe̱ bi e̱ á re ngwa ngwa, aha nda ngwe̱ ning cwe zewe shi de̱ nyi kya na na we̱ e̱?

Á nyi ne̱ he̱rri nyi i she ko nda ne nyi ce̱ e̱e̱? Á nyi ne̱ he̱rri nyi i shwe rishwe ni ii? Á nyi ne̱ he̱rri nyi shi nwie ye ringgwe̱ we̱sa ne nzhi ne ee? Ka, shi nyi ra shi nwie ye ringgwe̱ e̱ cence, ngbe nzhi mwe ye ringgwe̱ nna ngbe ne nyi!

He̱rri a bra ning shi shi Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ci nzhi nnenté e̱ nzhi hwie̱ nné merin a ko nda shi shi nné ne e we nyi nkang hu a nkyieng rre. Á níng ci nzhi hwie̱ kya ne ngwie̱ zhwozhwo shi yo re ring, ga ngbe re-njeli ngbe nneywí.
Nzhi hwie̱ mwa aha Krristi, me̱di a yarri Krristi nyi e̱ nyi nyi nné bi zentsi! Nzhi e̱ nzhi shi brrubrru, me̱di nyi e̱ nyi bi igbe̱! Nyi e̱ á níng ngwá grime̱, me̱di nzhi e̱ á níng dzié̱!
He̱rri re be cwu zhe ne ne̱ nzhi shi ne nzhwo ngbe ne̱ rishi, nwie srra ne re-igye̱ ankya, á bra shi níng ngwa cinci, ko nzhi bi rering srra we̱.
Nzhi shi we cinci ncwuo ne nva nzhi. Ko ngbe ne ya nne níng cwi, nzhi e̱ ki mwo rina; ko ngbe ne e shi níng ngwa ge̱zhe̱, nzhi e̱ shi we nwie yaa rwe;
ko ngbe ne e níng dzio lo, nzhi e̱ he nka we ne ehwie sheng; a nyi nzhi nzhi hwie̱ ankya ne e ywe̱ a ngwie̱, nzhi hwie̱ ko nda ne e ywe̱ a tanda he̱rri re be cwu zhe ne.
Ko nje wie krre̱de̱ ne̱ re be nwie nyi e̱ he aha n níng ci nshwu we̱, me̱di he ngbe n níng yhwire a nu rewe nje ne nje we ce̱.
Ko ngbe ne nyi ra bi nné mie̱ nka piriri he̱rri ko shi ré hung hwieng we̱, ko nyi bi re-be̱ piriri we̱. Me̱di a yarri Krristi Jesu a nje hwie̱ be̱ nyi aha Nka Rina ne nje níng brrong.
Aha ni nje cwe nva ne nyi he nyi mie̱ zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ nje.

A nyi aha ni ne nje shi te Timoti re be nwie nyi, ngu a nyi ewe ce̱ nje, a bra nyi nne ré hung sa rie a ngu a yarri Brrabe̱. A cwo a níng lu ne zhwe srra nje a yarri Krristi Jesu, ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri ne kya nje mié̱ ko he a ko zohu ekpri nné ce̱ nka.
Yá nyi e̱ á ne̱ ne kywo nci ze, aha nyi hwie he ko nje bra bi be nwie nyi wa we̱.
Me̱di kundu Be̱ne̱ ri ce̱, ko shi ci kpe we̱ nyi e̱ she nje ya wre̱ nwie nyi, wire ko nyi we zhwe nka nné kywo nci ze ana ne nje ri ho we̱, me̱di ma n ri ngbe zhwe igbe̱ mbe ne mbe bi e̱.
Aha ko ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi re-nka nu we̱, me̱di nyi igbe̱ ngu ne ngu shi nzhi.
A nyi nda nyi ce̱ nje ri ya níng nying? Nje ri be ne frii e̱e̱, ka nje ri níng ti ce̱ ngbe ne ehwie sheng?
Cence, nje ho he a bi re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè a tsi nyi, zhwe na ne ko ngbe nné tsi ngwie̱ ma koó nyi we̱: he̱rri ya nne nywe̱ ne mbrru be̱ ngu.
He̱rri nyi bra kywo nci ze! Koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi ra dzio rehwie he̱rri nyi ti nne ne ngu nyi zhwe ngge ne̱ a yarri ekpring mwe rici nyi e̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko ngbe ne ko nje shi dudu ne nyi a rwe̱ we̱, me̱di onu rie nje shi ngbe ne nyi, he̱rri nje ke̱nce̱ nyi nne ne ngu nyi ngge ne̱ nka, we shi shi nje ra shi miimi ngbe ne nyi.
A zhe ne nyi ri ya mwe gbengbe a yarri lo Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu, ne onu rie nje shi ngbe ne nyi, ne igbe̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu shi ngbe ne nzhi,
nyi ngwa nne ana a nva Shetani aha ngbe e̱kpe̱e̱ e̱ngwie̱ ngu a re ci shweni, ngbe ce ngu re she kyia a Tung be Brrabe̱.
Ko bi rina nyi yaa kywo we̱. Ko nyi ru he e̱we̱ ntsi yisti tsie̱nzhwu cí ngba cwu brredi re hru we̱ e̱e̱?

Nyi wru mi ne yisti reni na e̱ngwie̱ ana, aha ngbe nyi hwie̱ shi cwu brredi hwi na Paska ne ko ngu bi yisti we̱, nyi e̱ bra shi ni e̱ cence. Aha ngu Krristi e̱ i hu aha nzhi we shi ewe canve teede Paska.

Aha nii, shi de̱ nzhi srra shi nzhi shi para ne brredi bi yisti reni we̱, nje he nka ne ngwie̱ngwie̱ ngbe hwie̱, me̱di re shi shi nzhi shi nyi para ne brredi we̱sa yisti, woto e̱kpe̱e̱ rina ngbe raywrra.
A krre̱de̱ nke ne nje i níng wieng ana, nje i he de̱ nyi mwe rici ngbe ne nné bi e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ njè we̱.
Ko tsie̱ tsie̱ ko nje i he nka ne̱ ne nné tsi ngwie̱ bi e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱, ka riyii, ka nca, ka nné ye kpanshwu mbè we̱. Aa ra shi ni mahu se nyi we ebe ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo.

Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ nje níng wie krre̱de̱ ne̱ he de̱ nyi mwe rici ngbe ne nne nke ne ngu yé rici ngu he nne ce̱ nka me̱di ngu bra bi e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ njè, ka ne ngu bi riyii, ka ne ngu ye kpanshwu mbè, ka nne kwe nneywí fe̱li, ka ne ngu shwe ankya, ka ne ngu nyi nca we̱. Shi de̱ nyi srra be nwie ye yâ ngbe zhwe nne ana gung we̱.
Nyi nda shwe nje ne nné ne ko mbe shi yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka we̱ he̱rri n he nzhi we nyi nka? Ko nyi nné ne mbe shi yarri nzhi ne nzhi shi we nyi nka we̱ e̱e̱?
A nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu shi nyi nné mbe ne ko mbe shi yarri nzhi we̱ nka. “Ngu nne hwie̱ ne ngu shi yarri nyi e̱, nyi ki ti ci.”
Rimi ne kundu ya nyi bi nka a rici ya, we̱ bra fo nka nna re nzhi nwie nné nyi nka ne ko mbe hu Be̱ne̱ we̱, ne na ngu ra ywa mi a nwie nné Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱?

Ko nyi ru he a nyi nné wiri Be̱ne̱ mbe ri nyi ngwie̱ ne̱ nka we̱ e̱e̱? Kundu ne nyi nyi e̱ nyi ri nyi ngwie̱ ne̱ nka, ma ko shi nyi hung yaa nyi nka a e̱we̱e̱ re-ankya tsie̱nzhwu tsie̱nzhwu nyi ana we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko nyi ru he nyi nzhi ne nzhi ri nyi re-njeli nka we̱ e̱e̱, wire re ning hwie̱ re-ankya na srra nzhi a zhe ne?
Kundu ya nyi bi nka, ko shi nyi hung ci ko we yá a tsi nyi nné ce̱ nka na ne ko mbe be ko yankya we̱ ngbe ré cwue̱ nka nna we̱ e̱e̱?
Nje he ni ngbe nyi shwe nshwu. Woto nyi hwie he ko bi ko nne zunzrru a tsi nyi e̱ ne ngu bi zentsi he̱rri re hung cwue̱ nka a tsi nyi nné ce̱ nka we̱ e̱e̱?
Me̱di ne na aa ra shi ni, gimbe fo nka a rici ya gimbe we̱ ywa mi he nné ra nka ré ki nyi nka nna!
Tu ne cence nyi ko nka re cwo mi nwie nné nyi nka, mahu nyi ti he á níng drre̱ wiriri. Ko canca ré níng cwuce we̱ e̱e̱? Ko canca nyi fo ehwie sheng ko ngbe ne e se̱ kya nyi ne igbe̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Me̱di nyi e̱ we nci nyi nyi yaa cwuce nyi bra si ankya yá ne igbe̱, he̱rri a bra nyi re-gimbe nyi ne nyi we nyi zhwe ngge ne̱.

Nje he ka nyi bi hu re̱se̱ng he ko nné riywe̱ redziee e̱ bi ngwie Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱! Shi de̱ nyi yaa brra we̱! Ko bi nne bi e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱, ka nne yé kpanshwu mbè, ka nne nyi njè, ka nne nto ne ngu hwie̱ shi ewerembrru a nyi njè, ka nne nto ne ngu nyi njè ne nne nto,
ka nne nca, ka nne bi riyii, ka nne shwe ankya, ka nne dzio nné lo, ka nne nywrra nné rê — ko bi ko ya mbe ne ngu ri ngwie Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Yá nyi i shi ni ma. Me̱di á níng kyu, á níng ci nyi hwie̱ na Be̱ne̱, á bra níng ci nyi hwie̱ nné redziee nyyi Be̱ne̱ a yarri lo Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi ngbe ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ nzhi.

Yá nyi he, “Ko nje bi de̱me̱ ngbe n nyi ko nda ne nje ce̱ we̱ e̱e̱?” Ee; me̱di ko nyi ko nda ngu bi mpe̱ni nwie nyi we̱. Nyi he, “Nje bi de̱me̱ ngbe n nyi ko nda ne nje ce̱.” Ee, me̱di ko nje shi hwie̱ hwie nwie yankya we̱.

Yá wé̱ he, “Koó nyi yâ aha ehwie wo ye̱? Ko ehwie e̱ nyi na yâ we̱ e̱e̱?” Ee, me̱di Be̱ne̱ shi we ci gbengbe mbe wehwie e̱ ré ci shweni. Koó nyi rwe̱ aha le̱le̱ njè we̱, me̱di aha cwuo Brrabe̱, a nyi Brrabe̱ ngu nyi Be̱ri bi re-rwe̱ nzhi e̱.
Be̱ne̱ deze Brrabe̱ nzhi nhu, a bra ri níng deze nzhi e̱ we ni ma ne igbe̱ ngu.
Ko nyi ru he re-rwe̱ nyi e̱ á nyi rekpri rwe̱ na Krristi wo ye̱? Ko shi n fo ekpri rwe̱ Krristi n ki mwe ngbe rwe̱ te̱le̱kyi we̱? Ko tsie̱ tsie̱!
Ka de̱ nyi ru he nne nke ne ngu mwe rwe̱ ngbe ne te̱le̱kyi e̱ ci rwe̱ zunzrru ne ngu wo ye̱? Aha Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, “Mbe wehwie e̱ á ri ci rwe̱ zunzrru.”
Me̱di nne nke ne ngu mwe ngbe ne Brrabe̱, mahu aa ci zunzrru ngbe ne ngu a nu rie ngu.
Nyi to gbong ne le̱le̱ njè. Ko zembe e̱ngwie̱ ne nne ngu nyi, ko shi yarri rwe̱ ngu we̱, me̱di nne nke ne ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱ njè, aa nyi rwe̱ ngu e̱ngwie̱.
Ko nyi ru he re-rwe̱ nyi e̱ á nyi brranyi Nshe Wiri ne ngu shi yarri nyi we̱ e̱e̱? Nyi ngu ne nyi she a nwie Be̱ne̱. Ko re-rwe̱ nyi e̱ á nyi na nyi we̱, á nyi na Be̱ne̱.
Aa níng se̱, he̱rri aa trra. Aha ni se nyi ci Be̱ne̱ grime̱ ne re-rwe̱ nyi.
Me̱di a nka nke ne nyi rin shi ne nyi wie ana: a bi we rina kundu nne nto ce̱ srra we̱sa ne mbrru.
Me̱di aha ngbe ré to gbong ne e̱ngwie̱ njè, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ko zohu nne nto re bi mbrru na ngu, ko zohu mbrru ma re bi nto na ngu.
Nne nto re ngwa mbrru ngu kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne mbrru ngu, mbrru ma re nyi we ni ne nto ngu.
Ko rwe̱ mbrru a nyi ngge ngu nggaa ngu we̱, a nyi na nto ngu ma; a shi we ni ma, ko rwe̱ nto a nyi ngge ngu nggaa ngu we̱, me̱di nyi na mbrru ngu ma.

Shi de̱ ya nyi re ning zhwumi ne ya we̱, se ka kundu ne e ri ma nyi shî he re shi ni gbengbe nyi aha nyi fo ya zhe nwie ku Be̱ne̱. Me̱di nyi ning brru nyi mwe gbengbe kishi Shetani ri níng ci nyi kpe mwa ri aha riywe̱ yaa rwe nyi.
Ko nje he nke ne̱ he se re shi ni we̱, me̱di nyi e̱ hung nyi ni e̱.
Kundu ngu nyi we ike̱ nje, ma n he ko nye̱ ra shi we shi nje.
Me̱di nné mbe ne ko mbe rwe nyrra we̱ ngbe kpambrrú, ma n he a nyi canca ré srra we̱sa rwe nyrra we shi nje.
Me̱di kundu de̱ mbe ri hung yaa rwe we̱, ré rwe nyrra. Aha canca ré rwe nyrra ne na ecwue nna re shwe rici mbe.
Me̱di nné mbe ne mbe rwe nyrra, nje we ngwa nka (ko nyi nje we̱, me̱di nyi Brrabe̱) he: shi de̱ mbrru re we nto ngu we̱.
Me̱di kundu ngu we nto ngu, mahu se re srra nggaa ngu ka re ning brru re be nwie nto ngu a; shi de̱ nne nto re yu mbrru ngu we̱.
Me̱di ne kpi nné e̱ nje he (ko nyi Brrabe̱ ngu he nke e̱ we̱): kundu ya gimbe bi mbrru ne ko ngu cé̱ nka we̱, me̱di mbrru nna a shî he ngu shi srra ngbe ne ngu, shi de̱ re ki yu we̱.
Kundu ya mbrru bra bi nto ne ko ngu cé̱ nka we̱ ne nto nna a shî he ngu shi srra ngbe ne ngu, shi de̱ re to nwie ngu we̱.

Aha ngu nto nna a hwie̱ na Be̱ne̱ aha mbrru ngu, mbrru ne ko ngu cé̱ nka we̱ e̱ hwie̱ na Be̱ne̱ aha nto ngu ma. Kundu de̱ e̱ ra shi ni we̱, e̱we̱e̱ rewe mbe e̱ wé̱ hwie̱ rewe tsi ngwie̱; me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ á hwie̱ na Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di kundu nne nke ne ko ngu ce̱ nka we̱ ce̱ ka, ré yaa ka. Kundu ngu shi ni, mahu ko shi ré ci nne ka mbrru ce̱ nka ne ce re nyi nyrra ne ngu we̱. Me̱di nyi aha srra rina ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ye.
Ngwe̱ mbrru ce̱ nka ngwe̱ hu aa, ka ngwe̱ ri kyia nto ngwe̱ e̱ rre? Ngbe ngwe̱ nne ce̱ nka ngwe̱ hu aa, ka ngwe̱ ri kyia mbrru ngwe̱ e̱ rre?
Me̱di nde ko nye̱ a tsi nyi re srra ye̱ye̱rri ne ewie Brrabe̱ ki sa, a nwie ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki ye re ning shî. Nka ne nje ngwa a ko zohu ekpri nné ce̱ nka a nyi nke.
Nne nke ne i ma á ki cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ nto wire Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki ye, de̱ re kre he ngu ra nyi riywe̱ cie̱ng we̱; nne nke ma ne i ma ko á ki cie̱ng we̱, de̱ re kre he ré ki cie̱ng we̱.
Aha cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó ne riywe̱ cie̱ng nna ko shi nu yankya we̱. Kya ngu bi mpe̱ni e̱ nyi zhwe nti nka Be̱ne̱.
Ko nye̱ re hwie̱ we nwie ngu i ning shî a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ i ki ye.
Kundu ngwe̱ i nyi hwie a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ i re ye, shi de̱ ngwe̱ bē we̱; me̱di kundu ngwe̱ ri hung she srra srra rici ngwe̱, nyi mpe̱ni ne riwie̱ nna.
Nne nke ne ngu i nyi hwie a zhe ne Brrabe̱ i ki ye, ko bra nyi hwie wa we̱, a nyi na Brrabe̱; we ni ma, nne nke ne ko ngu i nyi hwie we̱ a zhe ne i ki ye, a nyi hwie Krristi.
Be̱ne̱ i níng se̱ se̱ he̱rri aa trra; aha ni shi de̱ nyi hwie̱ hwié ya nne we̱.
Re-gimbe, nde ko nye̱ re srra a nwie ngu i ning shi a zhe ne i ki ye, re srra ngbe ne Be̱ne̱.

Me̱di a nka nné mbe ne ko mbe shi nyrra we̱: ko Brrabe̱ ning ngwa ya nka aha ni we̱, me̱di nje níng ti kya ne nje ning hwie yi shi nne ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi hung sa rie a nka ngu aha naana Brrabe̱ re be nwie nje.
Aha zhwe ge̱zhe̱ na zhe ne ne̱, nje ri a bi rina nne re srra we shi ne ngu ning shi.
Kundu ngwe̱ bi mbrru, shi de̱ ngwe̱ kre he ngwe̱ kpo nyrra we̱. Kundu de̱ ngwe̱ bi mbrru we̱, shi de̱ ngwe̱ kre he ngwe̱ bi mbrru we̱.

Me̱di kundu ne e ma ngwe̱ bi mbrru, ko ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱; kundu ewena drro ma, koo nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Me̱di nné mbe ne mbe shi nyrra a á shi bi cinci a srra mbe na zhe ne̱, nje ce̱ níng kye̱ ne cinci ne̱.
Kya nje ning shi nka a nyi nke: re-gimbe, ko zhe nzhi ne̱ e̱ hwie̱ piriri we̱. Aha ni nde nne nke ne ngu bi mbrru re srra shi de̱ ngu bi we̱.

Nné mbe ne mbe shi rehwie dzio ré srra shi de̱ mbe shi rehwie dzio we̱; nné mbe ne mbe shi rehwie kla ma shi de̱ mbe shi rehwie kla we̱; nné mbe ne mbe si ankya ma ré srra ma shi de̱ mbe bi yankya we̱.
Nné mbe ne mbe shi ho shwi ankya ngwie̱ ne shi de̱ ré ning rwe shwe a mbe we̱, aha ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ shi ne ngu ning shi ne̱, a shi yhwe̱.
Me̱di nje ce̱ nyi we ni srra re bē. Nne nke ne ko ngu bi mbrru we̱ hwie nka ngu a shi a ncwuo Be̱ne̱, aha a kre he ngu kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie.
Me̱di nne nke ne ngu bi mbrru, hwie nka ngu a shi a ankya na ngwie̱ ne̱, aha a kre he ngu kla mbrru ngu ehwie;

hwie nka ngu a hla ci ga wehwie. Mbrru ne ko ngu shi nyrra we̱, ka ewena, hwie nka ngu a shi a ncwuo Be̱ne̱, a kré he ngu srra wiri a yarri rwe̱ ngu ngbe yarri hwie ngu a zhwozhwo. Me̱di mbrru nyrra hwie nka ngu a shi a ankya na ngwie̱, aha ngu kla nto ngu ehwie.
Nje he ni aha n níng sheng, ko aha n ci srra re níng bi rwe̱ we̱; me̱di aha nyi srra ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu shi tsantsa nwie Brrabe̱ ngbe nyi ki ngwa nci nyi zhwozhwo we̱sa ne yaa kye a ga wehwie.

Me̱di kundu nze̱we sa jee ne ya ewena he ngu shi ki fo, ne ngu bra hwie he ko ngu shi nyi kya ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱ ne zheng drro ewena nyia re nzhi hle, ne ngu bra hwie he ka ngu ra ning brru ki fo, re nyi shi ne ngu ning hwie yi e̱. Koo nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Ré yaa ko.
Me̱di kundu nze̱we e̱ bra ning brru rwe a hwie ngu, ne ko á ki ci ne ce we̱, ne ngu yaa rwe ngu fo a hwie ngu he ko ngu shi fo ewena nna we̱, koo ywe̱ we̱.
Aha ni nne nke ne ngu fo mbrru, aa nyi ye̱ye̱rri; me̱di nne nke ne ko ngu fo mbrru we̱, aa nyi ye̱ye̱rri re ne̱.
Mbrru nyrra se re srra ngbe nto ngu kundu nto ngu a shi nce; me̱di kundu nto ngu a hu, we̱ hung drro ne yaka nne ne ngu ce̱, me̱di re nyi nne ce̱ nka Brrabe̱.
Me̱di kundu ngu hwie̱ ni, we̱ bi ehwie kla re ne̱, nje hwie ni, nje bra hwie he nje e̱ ma nje bi Nshe Be̱ne̱ yarri nje.
A nka yâ teede kpanshwu a: nzhi hu he ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi bi hu re̱se̱ng. Hu re̱se̱ng cwo mi ne kywo rici ze, me̱di yaa ce̱ cí nzhi yaa ci cwo.
Nne nke ne ngu hwie he ngu hu yankya, koo hu ye̱ye̱rri shi kya ne ngu ra hu we̱.
Me̱di nne nke ne ngu ce̱ Be̱ne̱, Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki hu.
Aha ni a nka yâ teede kpanshwu: nzhi hu he ko kpanshwu a shi nu yankya a be ngwie̱ ne̱ we̱, ko tsie̱nzhwu, ko bra bi ya be̱ne̱ we̱, se we Be̱ne̱ we nggaa ngu.
Aha ko ngbe ne ngu bi yá ne e we ye he re-be̱ne̱ a zinye̱ ngbe be ngwie̱, we shi ne zhwe re-be̱ne̱ ngbe re-brrabe̱ ne̱ mbe brri we brri;

gbengbe ni, a nwie nzhi Be̱ne̱ shi we zunzrru; a nyi ngu ngu nyi Be̱; ko nda wru nwie ngu; a bra nyi aha ngu ne nzhi shi nce. A bi Brrabe̱ we zunzrru; a nyi ngu ngu nyi Jesu Krristi; á nyi ko nda ne ngu; nzhi bra srra nce aha ngu.

Me̱di ko nyi ko nye̱ ngu hu nka ne̱ we̱. Yá nné e̱ á ning mrrang ne teede kpanshwu a he̱rri ne cwu, he̱rri kundu mbe ye zhwe yâ nna we̱ we shi shi mbe nyi teede kpanshwu. Tu ne re-hwie nka mbe e̱ á shi brrubrru, á hwie he mbe yaa dzio.
Me̱di ko shi yâ re be ne nzhi dudu ne Be̱ne̱ we̱; kundu de̱ nzhi ye we̱, ko nzhi e̱ re̱ we̱; kundu nzhi bra ye, ko shi re níng bra yankya we̱.
Me̱di nyi nyi te̱nte̱, shi de̱ de̱me̱ng nyi kya ne nyi ce̱ re hwie̱ kyang grre̱ a nwie nné mbe ne mbe shi brrubrru we̱.
Aha kundu ya nne ne hwie nka ngu shi brrubrru re ri ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ bi hu re̱se̱ng nna ngwe̱ shi nwie ye yâ a brranyi kpanshwu, ko we̱ ki ci re ye yâ na teede kpanshwu we̱ e̱e̱?
Ngbe aha ni ngu gimbe ne Krristi ngu hu aha ngu ne hwie nka ngu shi brrubrru ne̱ we̱ ci shweni aha hu re̱se̱ng ne ngwe̱ bi!
Kundu nyi nyí re-gimbe e̱ngwie̱ ni he̱rri nyi we cí ré hwie̱ bē aha ne hwie nka mbe shi brrubrru, a nyi Krristi nyi ki nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Aha nii, kundu kya ne nje yé e̱ cí ya gimbe nje re grre̱, mahu ko shi n ye zhwe rine̱ ana we̱ he̱rri tiya kishi nje ri ci gimbe nje re grre̱.
Ko nje bi srra srra rici nje we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nje nyi nnente we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nje ri Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi e̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi ne̱ nyi shi yarri Brrabe̱ aha cwuo nje we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko ngbe ne ko nje ra nyi nnente Jesu a nwie yá we̱, a nwie nyi e̱ nje nyi nnente ngu, aha nyi e̱ nyi nyi sheede he nje nyi nnente Brrabe̱.
A nwie nné mbe ne mbe kre he mbe ri ka nje nyi nnente e̱ cence ye̱, nje we shing he:
ko nzhi bi de̱me̱ ré níng ngwa kya ye ngbe na shwe we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko ko nye̱ nzhi bi de̱me̱ng fo mbrru a yarri ce̱ nka shi yá nnenté ngbe re-gimbe Brrabe̱ ngbe Pita
Ka nyi we nje ngbe Barrnaba ne se nzhi nyi cwuo ne nva nzhi aha nzhi ning she kyang srra aa?
Nyi zohu shezhi ne ngu yaa trrang we rici ngu a ncwuo shezhi e̱? Nyi zohu nne kaa ne ko ngu ye ngbre ankya ebe ngu a we̱ e̱? Nyi zohu nne cwo nnywá ne ko shi re shwe radziaa nna we̱ e̱?
Ko nje he nka ne̱ we aha re-ankya ne nneywí mbe hu ana we̱! Ko ngbe Nti Nka a koo he ni we̱ e̱e̱?
Aha á wie yarri Nti Nka Musa he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ rwe onu nnywa a zhe ne ngu shi she nkya we̱.”

Ko nyi aha nzhi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning he nka ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Cence á i wie nka ne̱ aha nzhi. Aha kundu nne kaa shi kaa, ne nne cang shi cang ma, aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ga mbe gbengbe ré sa riyii he mbe cwo a ning she na mbe a yâ ne e ca.
Ma kundu nzhi tsi ankya ne ngu wru nwie Nshe Be̱ne̱ a yarri ronu rie nyi shi shi zhwe ne e tsi, shi nne tsi zhwe ngu ca yâ ngu a kundu nzhi she ankya na ngwie̱ a nwie nyi, aa zhwo aa?
Kundu he̱rri yá mbe bi de̱me̱ng she kyang srra a nwie nyi, ko nzhi bi de̱me̱ na nzhi ning sheng a nwie nyi e̱ re ne̱ ni we̱ e̱e̱?
Gbengbe ni ko nzhi i níng rinng he nyi níng ngwa yankya ni we̱, me̱di nzhi yaa rwe yarri ko nda kishi a ri hwie̱ kya ngu shi ci nyi we̱sa ho Nka Rina Krristi.
Ko nyi ru he nnencwuó a Brranyi e̱ á she yâ ye mbe a Brranyi we̱ e̱e̱? Ko nyi ru he mbe nnencwuó nwieng nyi teede e̱, nyi a tsi ankya na teede e̱ ne mbe ning she na mbe we̱ e̱e̱?
A shi we ni wa, Brrabe̱ ngwa nka he nné brro Nka Rina ré she kyang srra mbe a ncwuong brro Nka Rina.

Me̱di ko nje i níng rin aha kya ne nje bi de̱me̱ n níng rinng ne̱ we̱. Ko nje bra wié krre̱de̱ ne̱ he aha nyi ning ngwa kya ana ma wo. Aha he̱rri canca n hu ne ya nne re ning dzio kyang cwe zewe nje ne̱!
Aha kundu nje brro Nka Rina ne̱, ko shi n cwe zewe aha ni we̱, aha a nyi cwuo ne se nje nyi. Wuhu ne nje kundu de̱ nje brro Nka Rina we̱!
Aha kundu nje brro Nka Rina ne̱ he aha nyi kya ne nje kyie ne rici nje, ma n kre he ré ning trrang; me̱di ko nyi kya ne nje kyie ne rici nje we̱, a nyi cwuo ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ngwa n nyi.
Ma nyi nda ngu nyi lede nje e̱? A nyi nke he nje she riwie̱ng brro Nka Rina nna we shweni we̱sa ne kre he ré ning trrang aha cwuong brro nka ne nje bi.
Ko ngbe ne ko nje nyi hwie ya nne we̱, aha nje srra we srra rici nje, me̱di nje hwie̱ hwie ko nye̱ aha ngbe n kwa nné piriri.

A nwie nné Yahudi, nje i hwie̱ shi nje nyi nne Yahudi, aha ngbe n kwa nné Yahudi. Ko ngbe ne ko nje shi tahwie ringgwe̱ Nti Nka Musa we̱, me̱di nje i hwie̱ shi ya nne ne ngu ning shi, aha ngbe n kwa nné mbe ne mbe shi tahwie ringgwe̱ Nti Nka.
A nwie nné mbe ne ko mbe shi tahwie ringgwe̱ Nti Nka we̱, nje i hwie̱ shi ya mbe, aha ngbe n kwa nné mbe ne ko mbe shi tahwie ringgwe̱ Nti Nka we̱
A nwie nné ne mbe shi brrubrru, nje i hwie̱ brrubrru ma, aha ngbe n kwa nné ne mbe shi brrubrru.
Nje nyi ga re-ankya ne̱ aha ywa ncwuee Nka Rina, aha ngbe n shi a tsi nné she re-mwo rina nna.
Ko nyi ru he a nwie rreng to ncii e̱ ko nye̱ to ncii nna me̱di nyi we nne zunzrru ngu cwo she lede nna we̱ e̱e̱? Aha ni nyi to zhwe ncii na ne nyi cwo a ning she lede.
A nwie rreng mwa nné to ncii e̱ ko zohu nne nna yaa rwe nwie ngwa rici ngu yarri ko nda aha ngu ning she lede ne ngu dzió,
Kya a nyi ngwiee ko nje to ncii nje e̱ shi nne ne ngu to we dede we̱. Ko nje kwe̱ ko a shi nne ne ngu cwe we wu we̱.
Aawo, nje yaa cwe ngbe rwe̱ nje re hwie̱ tahwie ringgwe̱ nje, kishi kundu nje ri brro yaká nné nka, nje we rici nje e̱ n bra ya wi lede nna.
Re-gimbe, nje ce̱ nyi lu he ga yó nzhi e̱ zhwozhwo á i shi tahwie inyie̱ ana, ga mbe zhwozhwo bra i tsa Brra Nzhwo Shwo ana a be hwerri.
A yarri inyie̱ ana ngbe Brra Nzhwo Rishi nna á i we nyi batisma ré hwie̱ nné zhwe Musa.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo i ye yâ na igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ ana,
á bra i shwe rishi na igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ ana, á i shwe rishi a zahwan na igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ngu i cwo ngbe mbe, zahwan nna nyi Krristi.
Gbengbe ni, ko Be̱ne̱ i ho shwi jie̱ mbe we̱, he̱rri á se̱ nkwe mbe a tsi yi nse̱rinnse̱rin.
Ga re-ankya ne̱ á i ci ni ngbe nzhi ning mie̱ yankya kishi nzhi ri sa hwie nka nzhi a zete re-ankya e̱ngwie̱ shi ne mbe i nyi.
Shi de̱ nyi hwie̱ nné ye kpanshwu mbè shi kpi mbe mbe i nyi we̱, shi ne e wie he, “Nné nna á i srra be nwie ye re shwe, ngbe mbe e̱ cinye̱ ne re-rre bi nshwu.”
Shi de̱ nzhi ngwie nyi re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè shi ne yá mbe i nyi we̱, ne he̱rri nné ci nshwa wehwie ne wetsie̱ a tsi mbe i kwi we tozrru.
Shi de̱ nzhi mwa Brrabe̱ ri we̱, shi ne yá mbe i nyi ni nshé e̱ we yhwi.
Shi de̱ nyi krro nka shi ne yá mbe i krro we̱, Njeli Na Hu i we yhwi.
Ga re-ankya ne̱ i ci ni aha ngbe re hwie̱ kya ne kpi nné e ri ning mie̱ yankya, á bra i wie aha ré ke̱nce̱ níng gara nzhi e̱ nka, nzhi ne krruci ngwie̱ be a zhe nzhi.
Aha nii, nne nke ne ngu hwie he ngu yo gangga re nyi te̱nte̱ kishi ri kpe!

Ko bi ya mwa ri ngu sa be nwie ya nne we̱sa ne yá kpi nné mbe sa ri we̱. Ko Be̱ne̱ kpó jee ngu we̱, ko shi re re we ngwe̱ ngwie ya mwa ri ne ngu shi shwe igbe̱ ngwe̱ we̱. Me̱di kundu ngwe̱ ngwie mwa ri, we̱ re ngwa rêng to drre̱ ngbe ngwe̱ hung yaa rwe.
Aha nii, nné ce̱ nje, nyi to ze̱nze̱ ne ye kpanshwu mbè.
Nje he nka ne nyi ni aha nyi bi hu re̱se̱ng, nyi shwe̱ riyii nyi ri kya ne nje he ne̱ we nci nyi.

A zhe ne nzhi shwé a yarri kwrreshing ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng nwie ki ci kijie̱ng, ko nzhi mwe rici gbengbe aha re-mwo rina ne nzhi she nwie roshwo Krristi we̱ e̱e̱? Ko cwú brredi ne nzhi yaa hwinng ne̱ nyi mwe rici aha mwo rina ne nzhi she a rwe̱ Krristi we̱ e̱e̱?
Aha a bi cwu brredi zunzrru, nzhi e̱ nzhi shi piriri me̱di nzhi nyi rwe̱ zunzrru, aha ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi ye ngu cwu brredi zunzrru ana.
Nyi ri nzhwe nné Isrreela; ko nyi nné mbe ne mbe ye kya ne e ning nyi teede e̱ mbe mwe rici ncwuo a nwieng nyi teede Be̱ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Ko nje bra he ma he ngu kpanshwu a ka yâ teede kpanshwu a shi nu yankya we̱.
Ee, nje he teede nné tsi ngwie̱ e̱ nyi rewienci mbe we nying, ko nyi Be̱ne̱ we̱. Ko nje bra ce̱ nyi mwe rici ngbe rewienci we̱.
Ko shi re ci nyi shwe a kwrreshi Brrabe̱ nyi bra shwe a na rewienci wa we̱; ko shi re ci nyi ye a tebrru Brrabe̱ nyi bra ye a tebrru na rewienci wa we̱.
Ka nzhi ce̱ ci Brrabe̱ e̱ ehwie ngu re yhwi e̱e̱? Nzhi ki ne̱ ne igbe̱ e̱e̱?
Yá he, “Nzhi bi de̱me̱ng nyi ko nda.” Ee, me̱di ko nyi ko nda ngu bi mpe̱ni we̱. Á he, “Nzhi bi de̱me̱ng nyi ko nda.” Ee, me̱di ko nyi ko nda ngu shi re sheng we̱.
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ kre we kya na rici ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ce̱ we̱, me̱di ci nkwile̱ ne kpi re-gimbe.
Nyi ye ko nda ne e rie̱ a kaawe̱ rine̱ we̱sa ne rin nka aha nyi to kishi nyi ri ne̱ ne bē a yarri rehwie nyi.
Aha á wie he, “Ebe ngwie̱ ngbe ko nda ngu ning shi nyi na Brrabe̱.”
Kundu ya nne tsi ngwie̱ níng ye he nyi ya ye yâ ngbe ngu he̱rri nyi shî nyi ywa, nyi ye ko nda ne ngu níng ngwa we̱sa ne rin nka aha nyi to kishi nyi ri ne̱ ne bē a yarri rehwie nyi.
Me̱di kundu ya nne he ne nyi he, “Yâ ne̱ nyi na teede kpanshwu.” Shi de̱ nyi ye yâ ana we̱ aha ngu nne ne ngu níng ting ni e̱, kishi a ri ki ci me̱nkye̱ a yarri rehwie ngu;
ko nyi aha ne nyi e̱ nyi hwie he shi wie̱e̱ni we̱, me̱di aha ne ngu nne nna ngu hwie ni.
Me̱di ya nyi hung he, “Aha nda hwie nka yaka nne re ning ci n me̱nkye̱ng nyi kya ne nje ce̱ nying nna aa?
Kundu nje ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha kya nje shi yeng ka shweng, aha nda ya nne re ning cwi ne kya nje ning ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng nna?”
Aha nii, ko nda nyi shi yeng ka shweng ka re bra nyi nda nyi ce̱ nying, nyi nyi zhwozhwo aha grime̱ Be̱ne̱.
Shi de̱ nyi hwie̱ kyang grre̱ a nwie ya nne Yahudi, ka ya Nne Nzhwe Ngwie̱, ka ya a tsi ekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Nyi nyi we shi nje. Nje kre he n kla ko nye̱ ehwie a yarri ko nda ne nje nyi, ko nje kre rinang na rici nje we̱ me̱di kya ne ngu shi bi rina a nwie nné piriri, aha ngbe ré she kyia.
Nyi mie̱ a nwie nje, shi ne nje mie̱ a nwie Krristi ma.
Nje níng de aha nyi lú ne nje a ko zohu zhe, nyi bra bro nka ne nje i níng mie̱ng ye̱ye̱rri.
Me̱di nje ce̱ nyi hu re̱se̱ng he nyi Krristi ngu nyi rici ko zohu nne nto, a a nyi nne nto ngu nyi rici mbrru, Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi rici Krristi.
Ko zohu nne nto ne ngu kú Be̱ne̱ ka ngu tí re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ne rici ngu shi ku, mahu ko ngwá Krristi ne ngu nyi rici ngu grime̱ we̱.
Ko zohu mbrru ne ngu kú Be̱ne̱, ka ngu tí re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ne rici ngu gang ma, ko ngwá nto ngu ne ngu nyi rici ngu grime̱ we̱; ko shi ka ne mbrru nke ne ngu cwuku rici ngu we̱.
Kundu de̱ mbrru shi ku rici ngu we̱, mahu se re cwuku rici ngu. Me̱di kundu a ri nyi kya nshwu ngbe mbrru re ca nkwe rici ngu ka re cwuku rici ngu, mahu se re ki ku.
Ko se nne nto re ku rici ngu we̱, aha a tí shî Be̱ne̱ ngbe grime̱ ngu, me̱di mbrru a tí grime̱ nne nto.
Koó i wru mi ne nne nto a mbrru we̱, me̱di á i wru mi ne mbrru a nto;
ko á bra i nyi nne nto aha mbrru we̱, me̱di á i nyi mbrru aha nne nto.
Ma tu ne ngu shi nii, mahu mbrru a re ku rici ngu a nyyi re-njeli, aha ngbe re ti he ngu shi tahwie ringgwe̱ nto ngu.
Gbengbe ni a srra nzhi yarri Brrabe̱ e̱, ko bi re bi mbrrú we̱sa ne ntó we̱, ko bra bi re bi ntó we̱sa ne mbrrú we̱.
Aha we shi ne á i wru mi ne mbrru a yarri nne nto, a nyi mbrrú mbe bî nné ntó. Me̱di ko nda wru nwie Be̱ne̱.
Nyi shwe̱ riyii we nci nyi nyi ri, a bi rina mbrru re ku Be̱ne̱ we̱sa ne ku rici ngu aa?
Ko ngbe a shî ankya ngwie̱ e̱, koo ti we gbeng he nyi kya nshwu ngbe nne nto re we nkwe rici ngu je̱je̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Me̱di nkwe rici je̱je̱ a nwie mbrru a a nyi kya rina. Á ngwa mbrru a nkwe rici je̱je̱ aha re hwie̱ kyang ku rici.
Me̱di kundu ri bi nne ngu ce̱ ti onu ce a zete nka ne̱, ko nzhi bi yaka e̱kpe̱e̱ng srra ne ngu shi ka ne nke ne̱ we̱, ga ngbe kpi rekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo.
Me̱di a zete re-nka nke ne̱, ko nje níng de gung we̱, aha a zhe ne nyi mwé gbengbe ko nyi kya rina ne nyi nyí we̱, a nyi kpe̱ng.
Na ce̱ucwung: nje ho he a zhe ne nyi mwe gbengbe na ekpri nné ce̱ nka, nyi yaa kyé a rekpri rekpri, he̱rri nje shî nka ne̱ re nzhi cwu ya gbo.
Cence a bi re-rekpri a tsi nyi, aha ngbe ré hu nné mbe ne mbe shi tsantsa.
Aha ni a zhe ne nyi mwé gbengbe nwie zunzrru, ko nyi Bikyi Brrabe̱ ne nyi yé ana we̱.
Aha a zhe ne nyi shi yeng, yá nyi ke̱she wé̱ ce̱ we̱sa ne te kpi nné. Aha ni yá ri shi ne nzhwo, yá á a shwe rishi ruto nna he̱rri aa we zhwo we zhwo.

Ko nyi bi reri ngbe nyi ye nyi bra shwe a reri nyi we̱ e̱e̱? Ka nyi ekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ne nyi dzie̱ he̱rri nyi ce̱ ci nné mbe ne ko mbe bi yankya we̱ nshwu aa? A nyi nda nyi ce̱ n he ne nyi aha ni e̱? He̱rri nyi ce̱ n níng de e̱e̱? Ko tsie̱ tsie̱ ko shi n níng de we̱!
Kya ne nje níng mie̱ng nna nje se̱ a nwie Brrabe̱, nyi ngwiee nje níng ngwa: he ngu Brrabe̱ Jesu, a totu tu ne i ki rie̱, a i fo cwu brredi,
a zhe ne ngu ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ngu a ho ngu a he, “Nke ne̱ nyi rwe̱ nje, ne ngu nyi na nyi, nyi ri ma nyi ni ngbe nyi lu aha nje.”

We ni wa, a zhe ne mbe ye zhibi e̱, ngu a fo kwrreshi nna, ngu a he, “Kwrreshi rishi ruto ne̱ nyi jee hwi ne e nyi ne roshwo nje. Ko zohu zhe ne nyi ri ma shi shweng, nyi nyi ni ngbe nyi lu aha nje.”
Aha ko zohu zhe ne kundu nyi ye brredi ne̱, ka nyi shwe kya ne ngu shi kwrreshi ne̱, mahu nyi ti nka hu Brrabe̱ he̱rri re nzhi cwu zhe ne ngu ri be.
Aha ni ko nye̱ ne ngu yé brredi Brrabe̱ ka kya ngu shi yarri kwrreshi ne̱ ne ngu nyi na Brrabe̱ e̱ a rê ne ko ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱, mahu aa nyi rwe̱ ngbe roshwo Brrabe̱ e̱ngwie̱.
Aha ni ko zohu nne re ke̱she mwa rici ngu wire re ye brredi nna re bra shwe rishi ruto a kwrreshi nna.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu ye ngu bra shwe we̱sa ne ci nkwile̱ ne grime̱ rwe̱ Brrabe̱, mahu Be̱ne̱ shi ki nyi nka aha ne ngu ye ngu bra shwe ni.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne jie̱ng a tsi nyi mbe shi brrubrru ngbe ne re-riywe̱ gbingbi, he̱rri kpi nyi we yang á kwi.
Me̱di kundu nzhi yaa mwa we nci nzhi wire, ko shi Be̱ne̱ re níng nyi nka we̱.
Kundu Brrabe̱ níng nyi nzhi e̱ nka ni, mahu a shi nwie níng na uucwu, kishi a ri mwe re níng nyi nka ngbe ne ebe ngwie̱.
Aha nii, re-gimbe nje, a zhe ne nyi ri ma ya mwe nwie yeng, nyi yaa te.
Kundu ya nyi ho nzhwo, nde re ye yâ a ta ri ngu, kishi mwe gbengbe nyi e̱ ri be mi ne nyi nka Be̱ne̱ a rici nyi.
Me̱di se nje ri be wire ma n ya níng ngwa nka a zete kpi re-ankya mbiye ana.
Re-gimbe, ko nje ce̱ nyi srra we re̱n a nka re-beewa Nshe Wiri e̱ we̱.
Nyi hu he a zhe ne nyi i shi tsi ngwie̱, á i níng ci he̱rri nyi ne̱ ne ye re-kpanshwu ne ko mbe bi ce we̱ mbè.
Aha nii, nje ce̱ nyi hu he ko bi ya nne ne he̱rri Nshe Be̱ne̱ ki kwá re he he, “Jesu nyi nne shweni” we̱! Ko bra bi nne re he, “Jesu nyi Brrabe̱”, we̱ se ne Nshe Wiri ki kwá.
A bi re-nzhwe beewa kanka kanka, me̱di a nyi we Nshe Be̱ne̱ nggaa ngu ngu ngwá zhwozhwo.
A bi re-rê kanka kanka ré hu níng nyi Be̱ne̱ cwuo, me̱di a nyi we Brrabe̱ nggaa ngu ne e ki nying.
A bi re-cwuo kanka kanka ne e nyi, me̱di a nyi we Be̱ne̱ nggaa ngu ne ngu ngwá igbe̱ng nying zhwozhwo.
Á ngwa ko zohu nne kya ngu shi nying ngbe re ti he Nshe Wiri shi yarri ngu, kya ne ngu nyi e̱ bi mpe̱ni nwie ko nye̱.
Ya, Nshe Wiri e̱ ki ngwa beewa nka na zentsi. Ya, Nshe Wiri e̱ ki ngwa beewa nka na hu re̱se̱ng.
Ya, Nshe Wiri e̱ ki ngwa sa rie. Ya, aa ki ngwa igbe̱ng kyia nné ruhu.

Ya, á ki ngwa igbe̱ng nyi ankyang hwie̱ nga onu. Ya, á ki ngwa ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱. Ya, á ki ngwa hu re̱se̱ kya ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ngbe na ne ko ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱ we̱. Ya, á ki ngwa hung he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱. Ya, á a ki ngwa hung bra kya ne e he a yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱ ngbe re ti kya ne e he.
Ga re-ankya ne̱ nyi we ze̱nggre̱ ngu Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu ngwá zhwozhwo, a bra ngwá ko zohu nne we ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu ce̱ ki ngwa.
We shi ne rwe̱ e̱ mwe gbengbe nyi kya zunzrru ne rekpri kanka, ko ngbe ne rekpri nna á brri, me̱di á mwe gbengbe ci zunzrru. Krristi e̱ shi we ni ma.

Aha á i níng nyi batisma zhwozhwo nzhi we ne ngu Nshe Wiri zunzrru ngbe nzhi ci zunzrru, ka aa ra bra nyi nne Yahudi ka Nne Nzhwe Ngwie̱, ka hwie ka nne ne ngu bi srra srra rici ngu, ga nzhi zhwozhwo á níng kro we ngu Nshe Be̱ne̱ zunzrru a yarri rehwie nzhi.
Ko rwe̱ e̱ nyi we ekpri zunzrru we̱, me̱di bi rekpri piriri.
Kundu ebe nta ra he, “Tu ne ko nje nyi va we̱, ko nje ning shi a rwe̱ nna we,” ko shi re we̱sa ning shi a rwe̱ nna aha ni we̱.
Kundu ne uucwu ra he, “Tu ne ko nje nyi riyii we̱, ko nje ning shi a rwe̱ nna we̱,” ko shi re we̱sa ning shi a rwe̱ nna aha ni we̱.
Kundu ne rwe̱ zhwozhwo ra nyi we riyii, we̱ ce̱ rimi re ho nka a? Kundu ne rwe̱ zhwozhwo ra nyi we uucwu, we̱ ce̱ rimi re ho shwe̱ e̱?
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ ci rekpri rwe̱ e̱ ko zohu we ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu ce̱ re ning shi.
Kundu rwe̱ e̱ ra nyi we ekpri zunzrru, á ra she ngu rwe̱ nna rimi?
Me̱di shi ne ngu ning shi e̱, a bi rekpri rwe̱ piriri, me̱di a nyi we rwe̱ zunzrru.
Ko riyii bi de̱me̱ re he ne va he, “Ko nje re ce̱ we̱!” Ko rici ma we̱ hung he ne rebe nta he, “Ko nje níng ce̱ we̱!”
Me̱di wire re bra ning hwie̱ ma, ko bra bi ya na ne e we dzie̱ dzie̱ ana ne ngu we̱sa bi mpe̱ni we̱,
ngbe re-na ne e we ri koó zhwo bi grime̱ we̱, nyi mbe ne nzhi ci nkwile̱ ne mbe kaka; rekpri rwe̱ mbiye ne ko mbe zhwo bi rina ri we̱, nyi mbe ne nzhi we nyi rina rina.
Me̱di re-na ne mbe bi rina ri e̱ ko se ne á bra we nyi yankya we̱. Be̱ne̱ mwe nyi rwe̱ e̱ gbengbe a nrê na ne rekpri rwe̱ mbiye ne koó we di ne grime̱ we̱ á nyi re-na bi mpe̱ni kaka.
Aha ni ko bi srra kanka a rwe̱ we̱, me̱di ga rekpri rwe̱ zhwozhwo á yaa sheng.
Kundu ya ekpri rwe̱ nna shi ge̱zhe̱, ga mbe zhwozhwo wé̱ shi ge̱zhe̱ ngbe ne ngu. Kundu ne e de ya ekpri rwe̱ nna, ga rwe̱ nna zhwozhwo we̱ se̱ ne rekwi.
A zhe ne ne̱ ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi nyi rwe̱ Krristi, ko nye̱ a tsi nyi bra nyi ya ekpri rwe̱ nna.

A yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka, Be̱ne̱ e̱ ke̱she ci nnenté ré hwie̱ na ce̱ucwung; na hwie, ngu a ci nné ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱; na tsie̱, ngu a ci nné mie̱ nka, wire nné nyi re-cwuong nga onu, ngbe nné kyia nné ruhu, ngbe nné she nnéng, ngbe nné kwa yincwuee, ngbe nné hung he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo nyi nnenté e̱e̱? Ga mbe zhwozhwo nyi nné ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱? Ga mbe zhwozhwo nyi nné mie̱ nka aa? Ga mbe zhwozhwo hung nyi re-cwuong nga onu aa?
Ga mbe zhwozhwo hung kyia nné ruhu aa? Ga mbe zhwozhwo hung he yaká re-nka aa? Ka ga mbe zhwozhwo hung bra re-nka ré ti kya ngu he e̱e̱?
Me̱di nyi kre re-beewa na mbe bi grime̱.
Nje shi níng ti te̱nte̱ng na ne ngu ne̱ zhwozhwo a.
Kundu nje hung he re-nka na nneywí ngbe na re-njeli zhwozhwo, me̱di ko nje ce̱ nné we̱, mahu nka nje e̱ shi we shi re̱zhe̱ onggo ka rwa ne e cwe.

Kundu nje hung ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱, ne he̱rri nje hung ri ga re-ankya ne mbe shi la la, ne nje bra bi ko zohu hu re̱se̱ng, ko ngbe ne nje ra bi sa rie he̱rri n hung gywi re-rugu, me̱di ne ko nje ce̱ nné we̱, mahu ko nje be ko yankya we̱.
Kundu ne nje ngwa yiriywé̱ ga re-ankya nje zhwozhwo, ne nje bra ngwa rwe̱ nje he̱rri á ning shwi ne ro, me̱di ne ko nje ce̱ nné we̱, ko shi n ning she ko yankya we̱.
Ce̱ e̱ nyi rwe rie ngbe nyi nné rina; ko bi ehwie yhwi we̱, ko cwe zewe we̱, ko kywo rici ze we̱.
Ko ce̱ e̱ klo rici we̱, ko cé̱ rici we̱, ko wré̱ ne dzio ehwie we̱, ko bró rimwi kya ne e ki nying a hwie we̱.
Ko ce̱ e̱ nyi rekwi ne cwuo hwie̱ we̱, me̱di a bi ehwie kla ne cwuo raywrra.
A bi ehwie sheng a yarri ko nda, a bi sa rie yarri ko nda, a bi sa riyii yarri ko nda, a yaa rwe yarri ko nda.
Ko ce̱ e̱ yhwe̱ we̱. A bi ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱, me̱di a cwo a yhwe̱; a bi hung he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱, me̱di a cwo a we ni; a bra bi hu re̱se̱ng, me̱di a cwo a yhwe̱.
Aha hu re̱se̱ng ne nzhi bi e̱ nyi we kpirri kpirring, re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ne nzhi tí e̱ bra nyi we kpirri kpirring wa,
me̱di zhe ne ko nda ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi ri ya wre̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe re-kpirri kpirring ne̱ wé̱ ci shweni.
A zhe ne nje i nyi e̱we̱we, nje i he nka shi e̱we̱we, nje hwie nka shi e̱we̱we, nje i shwe̱ riyii n ri kya we shi e̱we̱we. Me̱di zhe ne nje ya ci nneywi, nje we ni nyi zhwe ankya na e̱we̱e̱ rewe e̱.

Kya ne nzhi hung ring a zhe ne ne̱ shi we ywiriri shi kya ne e ri a ngge̱ni, me̱di á ri he Tuuye nzhi ri ki ri riyii ne riyii. Kya ne nje hu a zhe ne ne̱ nyi we kpirri kpirring, me̱di nje ri hu ko nda, we shi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning hu wiriri.
A zhe ne ne̱ re-ankya wetsie̱ ne̱ á ning shi: sa rie, ngbe sa riyii a jee Be̱ne̱, ngbe yaa ce̱; me̱di na ngu ne̱ kaka a tsi mbe e̱ nyi yaa ce̱.
Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi kwe̱ ngbe nyi bi yaa ce̱, nyi bra kre he nyi bi re-beewa Nshe Wiri, shi ngra nyi na nti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ne̱ we̱.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu hé yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱, ko hé nka ne nneywí we̱, me̱di hé ne Be̱ne̱, aha ko bi nne ngu hu kya ne ngu hé we̱. A hé yá re-ankya la la na raywrra ne igbe̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di nne nke ne ngu ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ he nka ne nneywí aha ngu we sheng, ka ngu we shwe̱ rehwie, ka ngu we krru rehwie.
Nne nke ne ngu hé yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱ e̱ a yaa shé we ngung nggaa ngu, me̱di nne nke ne ngu tí re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ shé ekpri nné ce̱ nkang zhwozhwo.

Nje ce̱ he ko nye̱ nyi ra hung he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱; me̱di a ning nyi canca nyi ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱. Nne ne ngu ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ a né̱ nne nke ne ngu hé yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱, se ka ngu bra nka nna ngu ti kya ngu he e̱, aha ngbe re she ekpri nné ce̱ nkang zhwozhwo.

Re-gimbe, a zhe ne ne̱ kundu nje be nje ya ne̱ ne níng he yá re-nka ne ko nyi hu we̱, we̱ ning bi mpe̱ni nda? Se ka kundu nje ya níng ti yankya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ting, ka ya nka na hu re̱se̱ng, ka nje níng brro re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱, ka nje ya níng mie̱ yankya hoo.
Ko ngbe ankyang ve ve ne ko mbe bi ce we̱ me̱di mbe bi ncwue shi shi she̱riwe̱ ngbe grinye e̱, wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré hu cwueng ve nna kundu de̱ ncwue nna wru rina rina we̱ e̱e̱?
Ka kundu de̱ á tsie̱ rigbe e̱ rina rina we̱, wé̱ ce̱ rimi ngbe nné kwe̱ cwe e̱ ré hu kya ne e ce̱ ré nyi e̱e̱?
A shi we ni ne nyi. Kundu de̱ nyi he nti nka ne nneywí mbe hu we̱, wé̱ ce̱ rimi ya nne re hu kya ne nyi he e̱? Ngbe nka nyi e̱ we̱ ne̱ we nwu!
A bi re-nka piriri ne e he ko he a be ngwie̱, me̱di ko bi ko ya ne e we̱sa hu kya ne e he e̱ we̱.
Me̱di kundu de̱ nje pie kya ne yá nné mbe he we̱, mahu á nyí yingwié̱ a nwie nje, nje e̱ nyi nne ice a nwie mbe ma.
Aha ni nyi e̱ ma, tu ne nyi kre he nyi bi re-beewa Nshe Wiri, nyi ning tu rici kpe̱kpe̱ nwie ning nyi cwuo ne re-na ne mbe she ekpri nné ce̱ nkang zhwozhwo.
Aha ni ko nye̱ ne ngu hung he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱ re ku Be̱ne̱ he re ki ngwa hung brang ngbe re ti kya ne ngu he e̱.
Aha kundu ne nje ku Be̱ne̱ a yaká re-nka ne ko nje hu we̱, mahu nje kú ne nshe na nje, me̱di a hu re̱se̱ng na ehwie nje ko we̱ ning bi mpe̱ni we̱.
Ma nje shi nyi rimi? Nje shi ku Be̱ne̱ ne nshe na nje e̱, me̱di nje shi kung ne hu re̱se̱ng na ehwie nje wa; nje shi ve ve ne nshe na nje e̱, nje bra shi veng ne hu re̱se̱ng na ehwie nje wa.

Kundu ngwe̱ de Be̱ne̱ we yarri nshe na ngwe̱ e̱, wé̱ ce̱ rimi nné mbe ne mbe shi miimi me̱di ko mbe hu kya ne ngwe̱ he e̱ we̱ ré shî he, “Nde re shi ni,” a nkya ne ngwe̱ ning ci kijie̱ng nna, tu ne ko mbe hu kya ngwe̱ he e̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
Kabeya cence ngwe̱ ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng rina rina, me̱di nne nke ne ngu shi miimi e̱ ko ngwe̱ ki sheng we̱.
Nje ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha nje hung he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱ kaka re níng ne̱ zhwozhwo nyi.
Me̱di a yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka canca n he ya re-nti nka wecwuoo na ne kpi nné ri hung hung ngbe n we mie̱ yankya ne na n he yá re-nka ne ko mbe hu we̱ rigwe̱ rigwe̱ng.
Re-gimbe, shi de̱ nyi ke̱ we ne hwie nka shi nyi nyi e̱we̱e̱ rewe we̱. Me̱di a nka nyi e̱ngwie̱, nyi ci shi nyi nyi re-oko shwo; me̱di hwie nka nyi e̱ re nyi na brrá nné.
A yarri Nti Nka á wie he:
“Nje ri he nka ne nné mbe rre̱
ne nné ne mbe he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱,
ngbe a ronu nné ice,
me̱di gbengbe ni, koó ri ning sa uucwu we̱.”
Brrabe̱ he ni.
Aha nii, he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱ e̱ ko nyi sheede a nwie nné ce̱ nka we̱, se we nwie nné ra nka; me̱di a nyi ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ ngu nyi na nné ce̱ nka, ko nyi na nné ra nka we̱.

Ma he̱rri kundu ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo ya mwe gbengbe ne ko nye̱ shi nwie he yá re-nka ne koó hu we̱, ngbe yá nné riywe̱ hung, ka nné ra nka a ya ngwie miimi e̱, ko wé̱ he nci nyi dzio we̱ e̱e̱?
Me̱di kundu a zhe ne nyi shi nwie ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ngbe ya nne ra nka ka ya nne riywe̱ hung a nyi ya ngwie, ko nda ne nyi he e̱ we̱ ki cwu ehwie, he á cwo a ki nyi nka ne ko nda nyi he e̱,
ngbe wé̱ wrru mi ne re-ankya ne mbe shi la la a nu rie ngu we gbeng, he̱rri we̱ hu be we̱ cwugru riyii be nwie ye Be̱ne̱ mbè re he, “Cence, Be̱ne̱ shi ngbe nyi!”

Re-gimbe, kya ne nje ning shi nka a nyi nke: a zhe ne nyi ri ma mwe gbengbe, ko nye̱ ne ngu bi ya ve ne ngu ce̱ veng, ka ya riti nka ne ngu ce̱ mie̱ nnéng, ka ngu ce̱ ti yankya ne Be̱ne̱ ki ting, ka ngu ce̱ he yá re-nka ne koó hu we̱ ka ne ngu ce̱ brang ngu ti kya ne ngu he, ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo nyi we nyi a rê ne mbe shi she ekpri nné ce̱ nkang zhwozhwo.
Kundu a ri bi nne ne ngu ce̱ he yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱, ma nde re nyi nné wehwie, shi de̱ re hle wetsie̱ we̱, ne mbe he re yaa we zhe, me̱di re bi nne ne ngu shi brang re ti kya ne ko nye̱ mbe he.
Me̱di kundu de̱ ri bi nne ne ngu shi brang re ti kya ne mbe he we̱, nde nne heng nna re dzie̱ cereng a yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka, re he we yarri hwie ngu re nzhi nwie Be̱ne̱.
Nde nné ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ wehwie ka wetsie̱ ré he nka, ngbe kpi nné e̱ wé̱ cwue̱ nka ne e he e̱ ré ri.
Me̱di kundu ya nne ne ngu shi nwie srra be e̱ she nka ne ngu wru a nwie Be̱ne̱, nde nne nke ne ngu shi nka re srra be.
Aha ko nye̱ a tsi nyi we̱ hung brro re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ e̱, ne e he nwie yaa we zhe, aha ngbe ko nye̱ re ning mie̱ yankya, nyi bra yaa shwe̱ rehwie.
Nne bi beewang ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ hung yaa tarra a zhe ne ngu shi nka,
aha ko Be̱ne̱ ce̱ he nzhi nyi re-ankya we dede we̱, me̱di he nzhi nyi rina rina.
We shi ne ngu ning shi a ga rekpri nné wiri Be̱ne̱,
nde mbrrú a ré dzie̱ cereng a yarri rekpri nné ce̱ nka. Koó we ngwa de̱me̱ng he nka we̱, me̱di ré ngwa nci mbe ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nti Nka hé.
Kundu mbe ce̱ hu yankya, ré rin ntó mbeng a reri mbe, aha a nyi kya nshwu ngbe mbrru re he nka a yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka.
Nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ ke̱she wru nwie nyi e̱e̱? Ka nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ ke̱she be nwie nyi?
Kundu a ri bi ya nyi ne ngu hwie he ngu nyi nne ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱, ka ngu bi ya beewa Nshe Wiri, nde re hu he kya ne nje níng wieng ne̱ nyi riti nka ne Brrabe̱ ngwa re be nwie nyi.
Me̱di kundu de̱ ngu ri ci nkwile̱ ne nka ne̱ we̱, shi de̱ nyi ci nkwile̱ ne ngu we̱.
Aha ni re-gimbe, nyi ngwa nci nyi nwie ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱; ngbe nne nke ne ngu bra hé yaká re-nka ne koó hu we̱ e̱ ma, shi de̱ nyi he ne ngu he re we ni we̱.
Me̱di a yarri ko nda ne nyi shi nying, nde re nyi a rê rina ngbe a rê ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri re ning shi.
A zhe ne ne̱ re-gimbe, nje ce̱ níng lu ne Nka Rina ne nje i níng brrong, ne nyi i se̱, ne nyi bra ning yo.
A nyi aha Nka Rina ne̱ ne nyi ning she kyia, kundu nyi bro nka ne nje i níng brrong gangga; de̱e̱ ni we̱, sa rie ne nyi i bi e̱ nyi we cwuo shweni.
Kya ne i ning ngwa, ne ngu nyi brra kya bi mpe̱ni, nyi ngwiee ne nje i níng ngwa ma, he Krristi hu aha re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi shi ne e wie a yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱
he á i ki nyie̱, he a otu na tsie̱ng á ki deze nhu shi ne e wie yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱,
he aa ya wre̱ nwie Pita, wire ngu a ya wre̱ nwie nné ki zhwe shwa ne otu wehwie.
Wire ngu a ya wre̱ nwie re-gimbe ne mbe wara nnywa wecwuoo we zhe zunzrru, ne jie̱ mbe e̱ ning shi nce re be zhe ne̱, me̱di yá mbe e kwi.
Wire ngu a ya wre̱ a nwie Yakubu, wire ngu a ya wre̱ nwie ga nnenté zhwozhwo.
A ngrangrang, he̱rri aa ya wre̱ nwie nje ma, ko ngbe ne nje e̱ nje shi shi nyi ya ehwie wru.
Aha nyi nje ne nje nyi nyrru iishing a tsi nnenté e̱, ko nje bra be re ning ye he nnente ma gung we̱, aha nje i ngwa ekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ cinci.

Me̱di aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱, nje hwie̱ kya ne nje hwie̱ ne̱, ehwie rina ngu a ma koo be nwie nje e̱ shweni we̱. He̱rri nje bra nyi cwuo a re ne̱ kpi nnenté e̱ zhwozhwo — gbengbe ni ko nyi nje ne nje nyi we̱, a nyi ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi ngbe nje.
Aha nii, ka aa ra nyi nje, ka aa ra nyi mbe e̱ ne mbe i níng brrong: kya ne nzhi brró a nyi ngwiee, kya ne nyi bra i ning sa rie e̱ nyi ngwiee.
Ma kundu ne e brro nka he Krristi e̱ deze nhu, rimi yá nyi bra he he ko bi deze nhu we̱ e̱e̱?
Kundu de̱ ra bi deze nhu we̱, mahu ga ngbe Krristi e̱ koó ki deze nhu we̱.
Kundu de̱ á ra deze Krristi a nhu we̱, mahu brro nka nzhi e̱ nyi we cwuo shweni ga ngbe sa rie nyi e̱ ma.
He̱rri ma aa hle ni, mahu nzhi e̱ hwie̱ nné ngwa sheede rabrra ne Be̱ne̱, kundu de̱ bi deze nné kwi we̱, aha nzhi ngwa sheede he aa deze Krristi nhu, aa ci shi koo ki deze we̱.
Kundu de̱ bi deze nné kwi we̱, mahu ko ngbe Krristi e̱ ma koó ki deze nhu we̱.
Wire wa kundu de̱ á deze Krristi nhu we̱, mahu sa rie nyi e̱ nyi we cwuo shweni; nyi e̱ shi we yarri e̱ngwie̱ nyi he̱rri ne cwu.
Mahu nné mbiye ne mbe shi yarri Krristi ne mbe kwi e̱ á a ci shweni.
Ka kundu á ra ma ne sa riyii nzhi a Krristi e̱ nyi we aha srra nzhi na zhe ne ne, mahu nzhi nyi kya naana re ne̱ ga nné zhwozhwo a be ngwie̱.
Me̱di cence á deze Krristi nhu; a nyi ngu ngu nyi na ce̱ucwung a tsi nné deze nhu.
Aha tu ne hu a i be aha nneywi, deze nhu a be aha nneywi wa.
Aha we shi ne ga nneywí e̱ á kwi aha mbe wru a Domu, we ni wa, á ri we deze nce zhwozhwo aha mbe shi yarri Krristi.
Me̱di á ri deze ko nye̱ shi ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri re ning shi. A nyi Krristi ngu nyi ce̱ucwung; wire a zhe ne ngu ri be, nné mbe ne mbe nyi na ngu wé̱ ning zhweng.
Wire krruci nna we̱ be, a zhe nna we̱ ngwa Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ringgwe̱ a zhe ne ngu shwe igbe̱ rewienci ye ringgwe̱ ngbe re-na bi de̱me̱ng ye ringgwe̱, ngbe re-na ye ringgwe̱ igbe̱.
Aha a shi ye ringgwe̱ se ngu hle̱ ga re-rwinko ngu zhwozhwo ne ta ngu.
Rwinko nang ngrrang ne e ri ki ci re ci shweni e̱ nyi hu.
Aha krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, “Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci ko nda a tahwie ringgwe̱ ngu.” Me̱di kundu ngu he aa ci

Me̱di a zhe ne ngu ci ko nda tahwie ringgwe̱ Krristi ni, wire ngu Kowe e̱ we rici ngu we̱ yaa sa a tahwie Be̱ne̱ ne ngu we ko nda a nva ngu, ngbe ngu Be̱ne̱ e̱ we̱ ye ringgwe̱ a zete ga re-ankya zhwozhwo.

De̱e̱ ni we̱, ma nné mbiye ana ré nyi rimi, mbe ne e we nyi batisma aha nné ne mbe kwi e̱? A nyi nda mbe sa riyii he mbe shi ning sheng, kundu de̱ bi deze nné ne mbe kwi e̱ gung we̱? Rimi ne e nyi nneywí batisma aha nné ne mbe kwi e̱?
Ma nzhi e̱ ma rre, aha nda nzhi ngwa nci nzhi he̱rri nu nhu ko zohu zhe e̱?
Re-gimbe, ko zohu otu nje rí hu! We shi ne cence nje cwe zewe aha nyi aha srra nzhi a yarri Krristi Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi.
He̱rri kundu a nyi we aha zhwe hwie nka na nneywi ne nje kwe̱ shi shi nje kwe̱ ngbe ngbá nnyié̱ yi a Afisa, ne de̱ nné kwi e̱ á bra deze nce we̱, ma nyi nda nje ning sheng? Mahu we shi ne e he e̱,
“Nde nzhi ye nzhi bra shwe,
aha á ri he encwe nzhi e̱ kwi.”
Shi de̱ ré níng brra we̱,
“Srra ngbe rwí bi hwie̱ e̱ dzió e̱kpe̱e̱ te̱nte̱ng.”
Nyi ning brru nyi hwie nka te̱nte̱, nyi cwo tsantsa ngbe nyi we ni nyi e̱ngwie̱; aha a bi yá ne ko mbe hu Be̱ne̱ we̱. Nje he ni aha re níng bi nshwu.
Me̱di ya we̱ hung rinng he, “Wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré deze nné ne mbe kwi e̱e̱? We̱ nyi zohu zhwe rwe̱ mbe shi ning wru aa?”
Ngwe̱ nne riywe̱ hwie nka! Kundu ngwe̱ tsi kya ko tsié aaka we̱ se ne ngu hu wire.
A zhe ne ngwe̱ tsi kya, ko nyi rwe̱ na ngu shi ning ci e̱ ngwe̱ tsi we̱, me̱di nyi we cwe nzhwe e̱ ka re nyi zhwe alikama ka yaka yankya.
Ngbe Be̱ne̱ we̱ ki ngwa zhwe rwe̱ na ngu ce̱ ki ngwa; a ngwá ko zohu cwe nzhwe ne e tsi e̱ we zhwe rwe̱ na ngu.
Ga ngbe re-rwe̱ re-ankya bi ce e̱ koó nyi we zhwe zunzrru we̱: nneywí bi we zhwe rwe̱ na mbe, nnyié̱ yi bi na mbe we ka, re̱mie̱ e̱ bi na mbe ka ma, ga ngbe hwén e̱ á bi zhwe na mbe ka ma.
A bi ankya na zinye̱ ne zhwe shî mbe, a bra bi ankya na be ngwie̱ ne zhwe shî mbe ma; me̱di zhwe grime̱ na e̱kpe̱e̱ re-ankya zinye̱ e̱ shi ka, grime̱ na e̱kpe̱e̱ re-ankya ebe ngwie̱ e̱ shi ka ma.
Grime̱ na ne̱ shi ka, grime̱ na yhwe̱ shi ka, grime̱ na re̱nde̱ e̱ á shi ka ma; ko ngbe a tsi re̱nde̱ e̱ ma, re-grime̱ mbe shi kanka.
Deze nhu a ri shi we ni ma. We shi cwe nzhwe ne e tsí ngu ke̱she vi wire re vu ne yaka rwe̱, rwe̱ nke ne e nyie̱ e̱ a ví, wire a ri bra deze ne rwe̱ na ne ko ngu ví we̱.
A zhe ne e ki nyié̱ ko bi rina ri we̱, me̱di á ri ki deze ne grime̱; á ki nyié̱ ne ngu shi brrubrru, me̱di á ri ki deze ne igbe̱.
Á ki nyié̱ ne rwe̱ na ebe ngwie̱, me̱di á ri ki deze ne yaka rwe̱ ne Nshe Wiri ning ci nshe ngu.
Tu ne a bi rwe̱ na ebe ngwie̱, mahu a bi rwe̱ nang srra zinye̱ ma.
Aha á wie ni he, “Domu ne ngu nyi nne na ce̱ucwung nna i hwie̱ nne bi ce”; me̱di Domu na merin i hwie̱ nne ngwa ce nang srra zinye̱.
Ko nyi rwe̱ nang srra zinye̱ e̱ ngu ke̱she be, a nyi na be ngwie̱ e̱, wire na zinye̱ e̱ ya be.
Nne na ce̱ucwung nna i wru a ruvu mbè na ebe ngwie̱, me̱di nne na hwie nna wru zinye̱.
Nné ne mbe nyi na ebe ngwie̱ e̱ á shi we shi nne ne ngu i wru be ngwie̱, me̱di nné ne mbe nyi na zinye̱ e̱ á shi we shi nne nke ne ngu i wru zinye̱.
We shi ne nzhi bi e̱kpe̱e̱ nne na ebe ngwie̱ e̱, we ni wa, nzhi ri bi e̱kpe̱e̱ nne na ngu wru zinye̱.
Kya ne nje ning shi nka a nyi nke re-gimbe, ko shi rwe̱ ngbe roshwo ne̱ ré she ngwie a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱; ko shi kya ne ngu hung hu re she riywe̱ hu we̱.
Nyi sa uucwu nyi ho nka raywrra nke ne ngu shi la la ne̱: ko ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi shi kwi we̱, me̱di á ri níng bra
we kpri, we shi vu riyii, a zhe ne e ri tsie̱ rigbe na gamang. Aha á ri tsie̱ rigbe, ngbe wé̱ deze nné ne mbe kwi, ko wé̱ bra bi hu wa we̱, wire wé̱ níng bra nzhi e̱.
Aha se kya ne ngu ví re bra re ci kya ne ko ngu ví we̱, ngbe kya ne ngu hú re bra re ci kya ne ko ngu hú we̱.

A zhe ne rwe̱ ne ngu ví ne̱ ri bra ngu ci na ne ko ngu ví we̱, ne rwe̱ ne ngu hú ne̱ ngu ci na ne ko ngu hú we̱, wire we̱ ci shi ne e wie yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he: “Á ci hu ci shweni, á shwe igbe̱ ngu!”
“Kei Hu, ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ drre̱ nné zhwozhwo ma ngwe̱ shi he?
Kei Hu, igbe̱ ngwe̱ e̱ shi he?”
Hu a shé igbe̱ ngu a e̱ngwie̱, e̱ngwie̱ e̱ shé igbe̱ ngu a Nti Nka ma.
Me̱di nzhi cí Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng ne ngu níng ci nzhi she drre̱ aha Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi!

Aha nii, re-gimbe nje nné ce̱ nje, nyi yo gangga. Shi de̱ yankya re níng gbe̱ we̱. Nyi ngwa nci nyi a ncwuo Brrabe̱ ko zohu zhe, tu ne nyi hu he cwuo ne nyi nyi a yarri Brrabe̱ e̱ ko nyi cwuo shweni we̱.
Me̱di a nkang tsu ncwé̱ aha ré ning she nné wiri Be̱ne̱ na Yahudi ana, nyi nyi shi kya ne nje i ti rekpri nné ce̱ nka Galating.
Ko zohu otu na ce̱ucwung a se̱ti, ko nye̱ nyi re sa ya ncwe̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu shé, nyi tsu nyi sa sa kishi nje ri be wire ré ne̱ ne he á shi tsung tsu.
Kundu nje ri ya wre̱, ma n ngwa nné mbe ne nyi we kyie re-krre̱de̱ na ré we hu, ngbe ma n we te Urrushelima ne kya nyi tsu a.
Kundu a ri ning bi rina ngbe n ywa ma, ngbe wé̱ ya ning pie.
Kundu nje ri ya grra a Makyidoniya, ma n be nwie nyi — aha nje hwie ya grra a Makyidoniya.
De̱e̱nte̱ wo, nje ri ya ci zhe ngbe ne nyi, he̱rri n srra ngbe nyi zhe nze ngbe wu srru re wara, aha ngbe nyi ning sheng a ciee nje, ka re nyi he ne nje ri shi wara re nzhi.
Ko nje ce̱ he n ya níng ri we piau n wara we̱. Nje hwie he nje ri ya ci zhe ngbe ne nyi kundu Be̱ne̱ ri ce̱.
Me̱di nje ri ya hwie̱ a Afisa he̱rri re nzhi cwu tu Penteko.
Aha nje she ya brra riwie̱ ngu kla ngbe n ning nyi cwuo rina rina, a bra bi nné ce̱trring we yang.
Kundu Timoti ri be ne ngu shi ngbe ne nyi he̱e̱n, nyi ci shi de̱ re ci owu a srra nyi ngbe nyi we̱, aha a shi ncwuo Brrabe̱ we shi ne nje shi mi ma.
Aha ni shi de̱ ya nyi re ki dzie̱ we̱, me̱di nyi ri ki ci rê rina, aha ngbe re hu ning brru re be nwie nje. Aha nje shi nwie ki tsio re ya wre̱ ngbe kpi re-gimbe.
Me̱di a nka gimbe nzhi Apolo a: nje ki shwé̱ ehwie we yang he re be nwie nyi e̱ ngbe yá re-gimbe. Me̱di ko zhwo ce̱ be a zhe ne ne̱ we̱, a ri be a zhe ne ngu she ya riwie̱.
Nyi srrante; nyi yo gangga a yarri sa rie; nyi yaa rwe; nyi yo ne igbe̱.
Nyi nyi ko nda a yarri yaa ce̱.
Nyi hu re̱se̱ng he nné ri Sitifana á nyi na ce̱ucwung ne mbe i hwie̱ nné ce̱ nka a Akaya, á bra ngwa nci mbe kpe̱kpe̱ nwie nyi re-cwuo nang she nné Be̱ne̱ng. Aha ni nje cwe nva ne nyi re-gimbe,
he nyi nywe̱ nci nyi a nwie zhwe nné ana ngbe a nwie ko nye̱ ne ngu ning ci va a ncwuo nna ngu bra shi mi ngbe mbe.
Nje nyi rekwi a zhe ne mbe Sitifana, ngbe Fotunatu, ngbe Akayiku mbe i ya wre̱, aha a i ning shi shi nyi ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi be.
Aha aa ning ngwa ehwie kla we shi ne ngu i ning kla nyi e̱ rehwie ma. Zhwe mbe ana a bi rina ré we ngwa grime̱.
Rekpri nné ce̱ nka na Asia á níng dzie. Akyila ngbe Prriska ngbe ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe mwe a ri mbe e̱ á níng dzie we yang a yarri lo Brrabe̱.
Ga re-gimbe ne mbe shi he zhwozhwo á níng dzie.
Nyi yaa dzie nwie yaa nyi gbagba.
Nje wie nke ne̱ ne va nje:
Ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu ce̱ Brrabe̱ we̱, nde re hwie̱ nne ci shweni!
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ Jesu re shi ngbe nyi.
Nje níng ce̱ zhwozhwo nyi ne nyi shi yarri Krristi Jesu. [A shi ni.]
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ wru nwie Bulu, nnente Krristi Jesu ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe ne gimbe nzhi Timoti,
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe ne nyi ngbe nyi bra she srra rina.
Nde nzhi de Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi, Be̱ ne naana ngu zhwo we zhwo, ne ngu bra nyi Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng shwé̱ rehwie ko zohu zhe.
A níng shwé̱ rehwie a zhe ne nzhi shi yarri ga re-nzhwe cinci, aha ngbe nzhi hung shwe̱ kpi nné ne mbe shi yarri cinci rehwie ma, ne zhwe shwe̱ ehwie ne nzhi we nci nzhi nzhi she a nwie Be̱ne̱.
Aha we shi ne nzhi shi nwie shwe ge̱zhe̱ we yang shi ne Krristi ngu i shwe ne̱, ngbe we ni wa, aha Krristi e̱, Be̱ne̱ re níng shwe̱ rehwie.

Kundu nzhi shwe ge̱zhe̱, a nyi aha ré níng shwe̱ nyi e̱ rehwie ngbe nyi she drre̱. Kundu ne e níng shwe̱ nzhi e̱ rehwie, a nyi aha ré níng shwe̱ nyi e̱ rehwie, ne ngu shi níng ci nyi yaa rwe ne ehwie sheng a yarri zhwe cinci ne nzhi shi nwie shweng ne̱.
Nzhi bi sa riyii a nyi we̱sa ne kpi roshwo hwie, aha nzhi hu he we shi ne nyi shi nwie shwe cinci ngbe ne nzhi ne̱, Be̱ne̱ ri mwe re níng krru rehwie ngbe ne nzhi.
Re-gimbe, ko nzhi ce̱ he nyi srra we re̱n ne zhwe cinci ne nzhi shwe a ngwie̱ Asia we̱. Ge̱zhe̱ ne nzhi shwe e̱ shwe igbe̱ nzhi, he̱rri nzhi ning ti rie he ko nzhi shi drre̱ we̱.
He̱rri ma nzhi fo we he nzhi kwi nzhi kwi e. Me̱di aa ci ni aha ngbe de̱ nzhi sa rie a igbe̱ na rici nzhi we̱, me̱di nzhi sa rie a Be̱ne̱ ne ngu dezé nné kwi nhu.
Ngu ne ngu níng kyia a yarri zhwe cinci na nhu ana, a bra ri níng kyia wa. A nyi a ngu ne nzhi ning sa riyii he a ri níng kyia,
we shi ne nyi srra re níng sheng a yarri ku Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi. Aha ni nneywí piriri ri ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha nzhi, ne re-mwo rina ne nzhi shi sheng aha re-rumwo nyi piriri ne Be̱ne̱ ngu hó.

Kyang cwe zewe nzhi e̱ nyi nke: nzhi hu a yarri ronu rie nzhi e̱ we wang he a yarri srra nzhi a be ngwie̱ ne̱, shi ngra nyi re be nwie nyi we̱, nzhi srra e̱kpe̱e̱ wiri nwie nyi ko nda ne ehwie zunzrru zhwe na Be̱ne̱, ko nzhi nyi ni ne zentsi na rici nzhi we̱, me̱di ne ehwie rina Be̱ne̱.
Ko nzhi níng wie yankya ne nyi shi we̱sa hung hwieng ngbe nyi hu re̱se̱ng we̱; nje hwie he nyi shi hung zhwozhwo,
we shi ne nyi hu re̱se̱ nka nzhi kpirri kpirring ne̱, nyi ri cwo nyi e̱ ya hu re̱se̱ng zhwozhwo. Wire nyi e̱ ri cwe zewe ne nzhi, we shi ne nzhi ri cwe zewe ne nyi a Tung be Brrabe̱ Jesu ma.
Aha ne nje hu ni, nje i ce̱ ke̱she n be nwie nyi, aha ngbe nyi she mwo rina he̱rri ce hwie.
Aha nje i rwe he zhe ne nje ri nyia re nzhi a Makyidoniya, ma n ta n níng dzie, he ngbe zhe ne nje ri ya ning brru, ma n ta wa, aha ngbe nyi ning cire a ciee nje re nzhi Yahudi.

Ka nyi hwie he tu ne ko nje i hung be shi ne nje rwe e̱ we̱, he mahu ko nje shi tsantsa a kya ne nje rwe nying we̱ e̱e̱? Ka nyi hwie he nje nyí ankya shi nné ngwie̱ ne mbe hung he “Ee, ee” ne saahoyo á shi nwie he “Aawo, aawo” aa?
Me̱di cence we shi ne nzhi hung sa rie a Be̱ne̱, we ni wa, ko nka nzhi re be nwie nyi e̱ i nyi “Ee” ngbe “Aawo” we zhe zunzrru we̱.
Aha ngu Jesu Krristi Kowe Be̱ne̱, ne nje ngbe Sila ngbe Timoti nzhi i níng brro nka a rici ngu a, ko ning bi “Ee” ngbe “Aawo” a yarri ngu we̱, me̱di gannyi re-zhe “Ee” ngu nyi we “Ee.”
Aha ga re-jee we yang ne Be̱ne̱ ngu sa, zhwozhwo cwo cí rrurru a ngu Krristi. Kya a nyi ngwiee ne aha ngu, nzhi shî he “A shi ni” aha grime̱ Be̱ne̱.
A a nyi ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ci, nzhi ngbe nyi e̱ zhwozhwo, nzhi yó gangga a yarri Krristi. Aa níng mia,
aa níng ci ce̱e̱le̱ na ngu, ngu a níng ngwa Nshe ngu a yarri rehwie nzhi ngbe re hwie̱ sheede kya ne ngu ning sa jee aha nzhi.
Me̱di nje ning ci lo Be̱ne̱, a nyi ngu ngu nyi sheede nje, he kwili riywe̱ ning brru nje re be Korrinti e̱ i nyi aha ne ko nje ce̱ ya níng bra ya cinci wa we̱.
Ko nyi nka he nzhi ce̱ níng ci ne ce a kya ne nyi shi ning sa rie we̱, me̱di nzhi nyí cwuo ngbe ne nyi aha ngbe nyi bi rehwie kla. A nyi aha sa rie nyi ne nyi yo ne igbe̱.
Aha ni nje rwe a hwie nje he ko nje cwo a níng dzie ngbe n níng bra ya ehwie dzio wa we̱.
Aha kundu nje níng dzio rehwie, wire we̱ bra nyi nye̱ ngu shi ning ngwa ehwie kla, we̱sa ne nyi ne nje níng dzio rehwie e̱?

Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje i níng wie krre̱de̱ ana, aha kishi nje ri be, ngbe nné mbe ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rr ré ning kla ehwie ré bra ya ning dzio ehwie, aha nje hu he cence kundu ne nje bi ehwie kla, ngbe we̱ níng ngwa nyi e̱ ehwie kla ma.
Nje i níng wie krre̱de̱ ana a yarri cinci ne ehwie dzio ngbe ne reyii we yang, ko aha n níng dzio rehwie we̱, me̱di aha ngbe nyi hu zhwe ce̱ ne nje níng ce̱ we yang.
Me̱di kundu ya nyi yankya ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni, ko nyi nje ne ngu ning nying we̱, a ya eme ma n he aa níng nying ga nzhi zhwozhwo ngbe nyi, ko nka nje ne̱ e̱ wara kya ne ngu ci e̱ we̱.
Na uucwu ne jie̱ nyi mbe ki nang ana aa ki be ni.
A zhe ne ne̱ canca nyi ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu ngbe nyi ki shwe̱ ehwie, kishi rwe̱ ngu ri ngra cie̱ aha ehwie dzio we yang.
Aha ni nje cwe nva ne nyi he nyi ki ting he cence nyi ki ce̱.
Kya ngu ci ne nje i níng wie krre̱de̱ ana nyi aha ngbe n ning mwa n ri ka nyi shi ning ho nka a yarri ko nda.
Ko nye̱ ne nyi ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu, mahu nje ki weng ma. Kundu nje we ngu nne ana e̱ngwie̱ ngu, kundu ne ngu ri bi ya e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rr ré ki weng, mahu nje ki weng aha nyi, a nyyi Krristi,
kishi Shetani ri she riwie̱ a yarri nzhi. Aha ko nzhi shi re̱n ne re-zentsi ngu we̱.
A zhe ne nje i ywa Tarruwasa aha n ya brro Nka Rina Krristi, nje ya she Brrabe̱ ning kla ya riwie̱.
Me̱di nje i bē we yang ne ko nje ya she gimbe nje Titu a miimi we̱. Aha ni nje e̱ we ci ywaho, ngbe nje e̱ wara re nzhi Makyidoniya.

Me̱di nje cí Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, aha ne ngu níng kwá nzhi ne nzhi shi yarri Krristi ko zohu zhe shi nné ne mbe she drre̱. A nyí cwuo ne nzhi shi shi ya remie bi shwe̱ rina ne e yhwu, nwie ci nneywí ko he ré hu Krristi.
Aha Krristi nzhi hwie̱ shi ya remie bi shwe̱ rina a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ne shwe̱ nna ngu ya cwu a nwie nné mbiye ne mbe shi nwie she kyia ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe shi nwie ci shweni.
A nwie nné mbe ne mbe cwo a ci shweni, nzhi we nushwe̱ hu; me̱di a nwie nné mbe ne mbe cwo a she kyia, nzhi we bi shwe̱ rina na ce. He̱rri a nyi nye̱ re hung nyi zhwe cwuo ne̱!

Nzhi ne̱ ko nzhi shi shi nné piriri ne brro nka Be̱ne̱ we hwie̱ kyang kre ncwé̱ we̱, me̱di nzhi e̱ tu ne nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu níng te, nzhi brro nka a yarri raywrra a nyyi Be̱ne̱, aha nzhi nyi nnencwuó Krristi.
Ka nyi hwie he nzhi ne̱ ne yaa de we nci nzhi e̱e̱? Nyi ri shi nzhi kre he ya nne re wie ya krre̱de̱ aha nzhi re be nwie nyi, ka ya nyi re wie aha nzhi shi kpi nné e̱ mbe nyi e̱e̱?
Nyi we nci nyi e̱ nyi nyi krre̱de̱ aha nzhi, ne e wie yarri ronu rie nzhi aha ngbe ko nye̱ re ri, ngbe re bra hwie.

A bra shi we gbeng he nyi e̱ nyi nyi krre̱de̱ ne ngu wru nwie Krristi ne nyi nzhi e̱ nzhi i be mi, ko nyi krre̱de̱ na ne e wie ne inkyi we̱, me̱di á wie ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ bi ce, koó wie a zahwan baara nang wie cwuo we̱, me̱di á wie yarri ronu rie nneywí.
Nzhi hé nka ne̱ we dengge a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha Krristi níng sheng.
Ko nzhi bi yankya a mwa yi nzhi he ngbe nzhi ning cwe zewe he nzhi hung nyi cwuo ne̱ we̱, me̱di nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwá hung nying.
A nyi ngu ngu níng ci nzhi hung hwie̱ nnencwuó jee hwi ne ngu sa, ko jee na nti nka ne e wie we̱, me̱di na Nshe Be̱ne̱; aha Nti Nka ne e wie ana cwo mi ne hu, me̱di Nshe Be̱ne̱ e̱ ngwá ce.

Á i wie Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa a re-baara ngbaatsie, a a ya wre̱ ne grime̱ Be̱ne̱ he̱rri ko nné Isrreela i hung ri riyii Musa we̱ we aha nse̱ ngu, wire grime̱ ngu a ya yhwe̱. Ma kundu ngu kya ne ngu i be mi ne hu ana i be ne grime̱ ni,
mahu grime̱ na cwuo Nshe Be̱ne̱ e̱ ri ngra shi rimi?
Kundu ne he̱rri kya ne ngu be mi ne hu a i be ne grime̱ ni, mahu grime̱ na cwuo redziee e̱ ri cwandrra ngwiee ana we gbong.
Cence nzhi e̱ hung he kya ne ngu i bi grime̱ tiya a ko bra bi grime̱ wa we̱, kundu ne e ning mwa yi ngbe ne hwihwing.
Aha kundu kya ne ko ngu i fo zhe we̱ i be ne grime̱, mahu kya ne ngu ning shi he̱rri tiya a ki cwandrrá ne grime̱ we gbong.
Tu ne nzhi sa riyii he shi ni, mahu a níng shi we dengge.
Ko nzhi shi shi Musa ne a zhe ana se ngu ku riyii ngu ne kla trro kishi rewe Isrreela á ri ri grime̱ nse̱ nna we̱. Ngu grime̱ ana i nyia re nzhi yhwe̱ we̱.

Me̱di a ke̱ we ne we shi ywing a yarri ronu rie mbe, he̱rri ne cwu ko ngbe ne mbe hwie krre̱de̱ jee reni ana, ngbe we̱ shi shi ngu kla trro ne ngu we be̱ ronu rie mbe ana koó ki ti we̱. Ko bra bi ré hung ting we̱ se we ne sa rie a Krristi.
He̱rri ne cwu ko ngbe ne e we hwie Nti Nkang Mie̱ Nka Musa, ngbe kla trro ana we̱ be̱ ronu rie mbe he̱rri ko wé̱ hung hung we̱.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu be nwie Brrabe̱, wé̱ ki ti kla trro nna.
Ngu Brrabe̱ e̱ nyi ngu ngu nyi Nshe Be̱ne̱ e̱, ko zohu ewie ne Nshe Brrabe̱ ning shi, a ngwá ko nye̱ srra srra rici ngu.

Me̱di ga nzhi zhwozhwo ne ko yankya ku nyyi nzhi we̱, ne nzhi rí nzhi bra tí grime̱ Brrabe̱, Nshe Brrabe̱ cwo we ne níng bra, ngbe nzhi ci we shi ngu, he̱rri nse̱ grime̱ nna cwo we ne ning brang we bra a nzhi re nzhi cwu we cwu. Nke ne̱ nyi cwuo Brrabe̱ ne ngu nyi Nshe Be̱ne̱.
Aha ni tu ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa cwuo ne̱ a yarri naana ngu, ko shi rwe̱ nzhi re cie̱ we̱.
