Nzhi ra ankya nshwu ne e nyi a la la, ko nzhi gyé̱ nwie he rabrra, ka nzhi ning ci rabrra a nka ne nzhi brró we̱, me̱di nzhi brró raywrra nka Be̱ne̱ he̱rri ga nné zhwozhwo hu re̱se̱ng he nzhi brro nka tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Kundu a ri bi yankya ne ngu shi la la a Nka Rina ne nzhi brró a, mahu a shi la la we nwie nné mbe ne mbe cwo a ci shweni.
Mbe e̱, Shetani ne ngu nyi be̱ne̱ na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ aa be̱ ronu rie mbe ne ko mbe ce̱ nka we̱, kishi á ri ri nse̱ Nka Rina na grime̱ Krristi, ne nyi ngu ngu nyi shî Be̱ne̱.
Aha nka ne nzhi brró a, ko nzhi brró aha nci nzhi we̱, me̱di nzhi brró he Jesu Krristi nyi Brrabe̱, he nzhi e̱ nzhi nyi nnencwuó nyi aha Jesu.
Ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu he, “Nde nse̱ re wru nwie ywing re tsie̱,” a nyi ngu ne ngu ci nse̱ re tsie̱ yarri ronu rie nzhi, aha ngu níng ngwa hu re̱se̱ grime̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ngu tsie̱ nse̱ a nyyi Krristi.
Me̱di nzhi ne nzhi bi dukyie̱e̱ Nka Rina ne̱ nzhi shi shi rondrro rwe̱, aa ci ni aha ngbe ré ti he igbe̱ ne ngu ne̱ ko zohu igbe̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Be̱ne̱, koo wru nwie nzhi we̱.
Á níng ngwa cinci a ko zohu eme, me̱di koó níng drre̱ we̱; nzhi bē, me̱di ko rwe̱ nzhi cie̱ we̱.
Á níng ngwa ge̱zhe̱, me̱di ko Be̱ne̱ níng we we̱; á níng cwe shi á shi níng yhwi, me̱di ko nzhi ci shweni we̱.
Ko zohu zhe nzhi srra re gye̱ we nu nhu shi shi Jesu, aha ngbe nneywí ré ri igbe̱ ce Jesu a re-rwe̱ nzhi.
Aha ko zohu zhe ne nzhi shi nce, nzhi srra re ri hu aha Jesu, aha ngbe nneywí ré ri igbe̱ ce Jesu a re-rwe̱ nzhi ne mbe kwí ne̱.
Aha ni nzhi srra re ri hu, aha ngbe nyi she ce.
Á wie he, “Nje bi sa rie, aha ni nje he.” Tu ne nzhi bi sa rie we shi ngu nne wie riti nka ne̱, nyi ngwiee nzhi he ma.
Nzhi hu he Be̱ne̱ ne ngu deze Brrabe̱ Jesu nhu a ri níng deze ngbe ne Jesu, ngbe we̱ be ne nzhi ngbe ne nyi a nyyi ngu.

Ga nke ne̱ zhwozhwo nyi we aha nyi she rinang, aha ngbe ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu cwo we ne ning brang re nzhi nwie nneywí piriri, re we ci ré ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng we yang, ngbe Be̱ne̱ we̱ ning bra ning she grime̱.
A nyi aha ni ne ko rwe̱ nzhi ree cie̱ we̱. Ko ngbe ne re-rwe̱ nzhi e̱ á cwo we ne ci rening, gbengbe ni ko zohu otu nzhi cwo we ne ci hwihwíng a yarri hwie.
Aha e̱we̱ cinci ne ko ngu shi ci zhe piriri we̱ ne nzhi shi nwie shweng ne̱, a shi níng be mi ne ya brra grime̱ na he̱rri tiya ne ko bi kya re níng mwa yi mi we̱.
Aha ko nzhi sa riyii a kya ne e ri ri we̱, me̱di nzhi sa riyii a kya ne koó ri we̱, aha kya ne e ri ri e̱ ko fo zhe we̱, me̱di kya ne koó ri we̱ e̱ a nyi na he̱rri tiya.

Aha nzhi hu re̱se̱ng he á ri he zhe ne re-rwe̱ nzhi ne̱, ne mbe nyi re-ndu na re-ce nzhi a be ngwie̱ he ne̱, mbe ri ci shweni, nzhi bi eri ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng nong a zinye̱, ne ko nyi runo nneywi we̱, a nyi na he̱rri tiya.
A zhe ne ne̱ nzhi kwá ncie̱ nwie teng we te he ré níng ngwa re-rwe̱ nzhi na zinye̱,
aha a zhe ne nzhi ri shi yarri re-rwe̱ hwi ana, ko nzhi e̱ shi ngbe̱we̱ng we̱.

A zhe ne, ne nzhi shi yarri re-ndu ne̱, nzhi kwá ncie̱ ne nkpe na re-rwe̱ ne̱, ko aha nzhi hwie̱ we̱sa rwe̱ we̱, me̱di aha nzhi ce̱ ré níng ci re-rwe̱ na zinye̱, aha ngbe ré níng ngwa ce na he̱rri tiya ne na nzhi shi yarri re-rwe̱ nke ne mbe kwí ne̱.
A nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu níng nyi he nzhi ri ci ni, aa níng ngwa Nshe ngu ngbe re hwie̱ sheede kya ne ngu ning sa jee aha nzhi.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne ko zohu zhe nzhi shi we dengge. Nzhi hu he shi ne nzhi ka shi yarri re-rwe̱ ne̱, ko nzhi shi a ri ye ngbe ne Brrabe̱ we̱.
Nzhi srra ne sa rie, ko aha kya ne nzhi ri ri we̱.
A níng shi we dengge, he̱rri ma canca nzhi drro nzhi we ikpe rwe̱ ne̱, ngbe nzhi shi ri ye ngbe ne Brrabe̱.
Aha ni ka nzhi shi he a ikpe rwe̱ ne̱, ka nzhi drro, kya ne nzhi kre e̱ nyi nke he nzhi ki kla ehwie.
Aha ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi bi we yo a nyyi brra ncwung nyi nka Krristi, aha ngbe ko nye̱ re se̱ lede kya ne ngu nyi a ikpe rwe̱ ne̱ ka re nyi rinang ka re nyi ngwie̱ngwie̱ng.

Tu ne nzhi hu re̱se̱ kya ne e ki ye he to owu Brrabe̱, kya a nyi ngwiee ne nzhi nyi koori he nzhi kwa kpi nné. A nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu hu re̱se̱ng ka nzhi shi rimi ye̱, nje bra hwie he nyi hu re̱se̱ng ni e̱ ma a yarri ronu rie nyi.

Aawo, ko nzhi shi koori ne̱ he nzhi bra yaa de we nci nzhi wa we̱, me̱di nzhi níng ngwa we riwie̱ ngbe nyi she kyang cwe zewe ne nzhi, aha ngbe nyi hu kya he a nyyi nné mbiye ne mbe cwé zewe aha ankya ngwie̱, ko aha e̱kpe̱e̱ te̱nte̱ng we̱.
Ka nci nzhi dzio aa? A ri shi ni mahu a nyi aha Be̱ne̱; ka nci nzhi e̱ shi tsantsa aa? Mahu a nyi aha nyi.
A nyi ce̱ ne Krristi níng ce̱ ne ngu níng kwá, aha nzhi hu cence he tu nne zunzrru hu aha ko nye̱, mahu ko nye̱ e̱ hu ne zhwe srra reni.
Aa hu aha ko nye̱, aha ngbe ga nné mbiye ne mbe she ce nwie ngu, ko shi ré srra we aha nci mbe wa we̱ me̱di aha ngu, ngu ne ngu hu ngu bra deze aha mbe.
Aha ni kya ne ngu pie a zhe ne, ko nzhi ri ya nne a hwie nka na nneywi wa we̱, ko ngbe ne a zhe gbangba, nzhi i ri Krristi e̱ ni, ko nzhi bra ki rí ni a zhe ne̱ wa we̱.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu shi yarri Krristi, aa ci nne hwi; ga re-ankya reni e̱ á wara, ko nda bra ci hwihwing!
Ga nke ne̱ zhwozhwo wru nwie Be̱ne̱, ne aha Krristi, ngu we rici ngu ngu níng ngwa srra shwe̱ ne ngu, ngu a bra níng ngwa cwuong ci nneywí ré she srra shwe̱ ne ngu.

Kya ne nzhi he e̱ nyi nke he Be̱ne̱ i shi yarri Krristi nwie ci ebe ngwie̱ re she srra shwe̱ ne ngu. Ko bra bro ya nne hwie aha e̱ngwie̱ ngu wa we̱. Aa níng ngwa nkang ci nneywí ré she srra shwe̱ ne ngu.
Aha ni nzhi hwie̱ nné he nka a nu Krristi, ne Be̱ne̱ hé nka ngu a yarri nzhi. Nzhi cwé nva ne nyi a yarri lo Krristi he nyi kre srra shwe̱ ngbe ne Be̱ne̱.
A nyi aha nzhi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ci Krristi ne ko ngu sa nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱ re hwie̱ teede e̱ngwie̱ aha e̱ngwie̱ nzhi, ngbe nzhi hwie̱ nné redziee Be̱ne̱ aha ngu.
Shi rwincwuó Be̱ne̱, nzhi cwe nva ne nyi, nyi ne nyi she ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ he shi de̱ nyi fo re hwie̱ kya shweni we̱.
Aha Be̱ne̱ i he,
“Ne zhe ngu i ya ci ye̱ye̱rri ngbe n re nyi ehwie rina,
nje e̱ re ho.
A zhe ne otu re kyia ngu i ya ci,
nje e̱ re sheng.”
Ri, zheng she ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi nke; otung she kyia a nyi nke ne̱.
Ko nzhi hwie̱ kyang grre̱ a nwie ya nne we̱, kishi á ri she yankya ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni a ncwuo nzhi.
Me̱di a yarri ko nda, nzhi ti rici nzhi he nzhi nyi te̱nte̱ hwié Be̱ne̱, a yarri yaa rwe we yang, ngbe yarri re-ge̱zhe̱, ngbe yarri re-cinci, ngbe yarri ngbá re-ankya ne mbe níng she,
ngbe re-cwe ne e níng cwe, ngbe re-uucwu gyiaa ne e níng ci, ngbe re-cinci re̱zhe̱ng ko re-rigwe̱ nné ne nzhi shwe, nzhi rrwa ncwuo, nzhi kywi we̱sa ndzie ngbe ne nzhwo.
Nzhi ti ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ wiri nzhi, ngbe ne hu re̱se̱ng nzhi, ngbe ne rehwie sheng nzhi, ngbe ne ehwie rina nzhi, a yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri, ngbe ne te̱nte̱ ce̱ ne nzhi ce̱ nné,
ngbe a yarri nka raywrra nzhi, ngbe a yarri igbe̱ Be̱ne̱. A nyi e̱kpe̱e̱ redziee ngu nyi ankyang ko nzhi a nva nyye ngbe nva mie̱ nzhi.
Á níng ngwa grime̱, á bra níng ci nshwu; á níng cwi, á bra níng de; nzhi shi tsantsa, me̱di á níng ci rabrra;
shi shi koó níng hu we̱, me̱di á níng hu; shi shi nzhi shi kwi, me̱di nzhi ke̱ we ne ning shi nce; á níng cwe, me̱di koó níng yhwi we̱;
nzhi dzio rehwie ko zohu zhe, me̱di nzhi shi we ehwie kla; nzhi srra yarri riywe̱, me̱di nzhi ngwa nné piriri dukyie̱e̱ na Nshe Be̱ne̱; shi shi ko nzhi bi ko yankya we̱, me̱di nzhi bi ko nda.
Re-gimbe nné Korrinti, nzhi níng he nka we gbeng, nzhi níng ting he nzhi níng ce̱ we yang.
Ko nzhi we̱sa níng ce̱ we̱, me̱di ko nyi e̱ nyi níng se̱ a yarri rehwie nyi we̱.
Nje hé nka ne nyi shi nyi nyi e̱we̱e̱ rewe nje, he nyi e̱ ma, nyi níng se̱ a yarri rehwie nyi.
Shi de̱ nyi mwe rici ngbe nné tsi ngwie̱ we̱. A nyi nda ngu mwe redziee ngbe ne hwie̱ e̱e̱? Ka nyi zohu mwe rici ngu shi zetsi nse̱ ngbe ne ewie ywing e̱e̱?
Ka bi ya iirwi ngu shi zetsi Krristi ngbe ne Shetani e̱e̱? Ka bi yankya ngu mwe nné ce̱ nka ngbe nne tsi ngwie̱ e̱e̱?
Ka bi ya yankya ne ngu mwe brranyi Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne re-kpanshwu aa? Aha nzhi e̱ nzhi nyi brranyi Be̱ne̱ bi ce! A shi we shi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i he,
“Nje ri srra yarri mbe,
ma n cwo yarri mbe,
ma n hwie̱ Be̱ne̱ mbe,
ngbe wé̱ hwie̱ nné nje ma.”
A nyi ngwiee ne Brrabe̱ hé,
“Aha ni nyi wru a yarri mbe,
ngbe nyi shi ka ne mbe.
Shi de̱ nyi re yankya ne ngu bi le̱le̱ nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱,
ngbe ma n níng se̱.
Ma n hwie̱ Be̱ nyi,
ngbe nyi e̱ hwie̱ rewe nje mbrrú ngbe ntó.
A nyi Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo ngu he ni.”

Nné ce̱ nje, tu ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng sa re-jee ne̱, nde nzhi yaa ci nzhi shi wiriri ne ko nda ne ngu níng bé ne le̱le̱ a re-rwe̱ nzhi ngbe a yarri rehwie nzhi, ngbe nzhi shi tsantsa ne e̱kpe̱e̱ wiri a yarri to owu Be̱ne̱.
Nyi ti he nyi níng ce̱; ko nzhi nyi ya nyi yankya me̱nkye̱ we̱, ko nzhi bra dzio ya nyi, ka nzhi brra ya nyi aha re níng ngwa yankya we̱.
Ko nje hé nka ne̱ he ngbe n ti he nyi bi vini we̱. We shi ne nje ke̱she he, nyi shi yarri hwie nzhi, nyi shi ngbe ne nzhi ka re nyi nhu ka a nce.
Nje bi sa rie a nyi we yang; nje cwé zewe ne nyi kpe̱kpe̱! Nyi ning shwé̱ ehwie we yang, nje shî ne ehwie kla ne ko ngu bi gamang we̱, ko ngbe ne ga re-ge̱zhe̱ ne nzhi shi nwie shweng zhwozhwo ne̱.

Aha ko ngbe zhe ne nzhi i ya wre̱ a Makyidoniya, ko nzhi i she srra cwu we̱, ko zohu eme ne nzhi ning bra nzhi e̱ she we cinci — cinci a re̱kwe̱ nka ngbe nné ne mbe ce̱trri nka nzhi, nzhi e̱ bra shi nwie bē a yarri rehwie nzhi wa.
Me̱di ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shwé̱ nné mbe ne mbe re̱ rehwie, a i níng shwe̱ rehwie a zhe ne Titu ngu i ya wre̱.

Ko nyi we be ngu a ngu i níng shwe̱ rehwie we̱, me̱di ngbe nka ne ngu níng ting he nyi ki shwe̱ ehwie. Aa níng ti zhwe ucwua nje ne nyi ku, ngbe ne rehwie dzio nyi aha kya ne ngu i ci, ngbe ne zhwe ngwa nci nyi re be nwie nje, he̱rri aa ci nje nyi zhwe rekwi ne ko nje sa nying we̱.
Aha ko ngbe ne krre̱de̱ nje ana i níng dzio rehwie, ko nje bē aha ni we̱. Nje hu he nje i bē a ce̱ucwung, aha nje hu he a i níng dzio rehwie a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu.

Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ a ning bi we rekwi ne nje i níng te mi, ko aha ne ngu i níng dzio rehwie we̱, me̱di aha dzio ehwie nna i níng ci nyi si ywe̱. Aha nyi i dzio rehwie zhwe na ne Be̱ne̱ cé̱, aha ni ko nzhi i níng nyi yankya me̱nkye̱ we̱.
Aha zhwe ehwie dzio ne Be̱ne̱ cé̱ ana cwo mi ne se̱ ywe̱, ngbe we̱ ci nne re she kyia, ko shi re bra ki shi me̱nkye̱ wa we̱, me̱di ehwie dzio na ebe ngwie̱ e̱ cwo mi ne hu.

Ma nyi ri zhwe kya ne ehwie dzio na Be̱ne̱ cé̱ e̱ ngu níng be mi. Aa níng ci nyi ning bra tu rici ngbe ti he nyi brru. Aa níng cwuglu, aa níng ci nyi kú ucwua nje, aa níng ci nyi ngwa nci nyi, aa bra níng ci nyi ce̱ he ré na nne ne ngu ywe̱ ana uucwu. A ko zohu zhe, nyi ti rici nyi he ko nyi bi vini a kya ngu ci we̱.

Aha ni ko ngbe ne nje i níng wie krre̱de̱ ana, ko nje i wie aha nne nke ne ngu nyi kya ngu shi wie̱e̱ni, ka nne nke ne ngu ki nying we̱. Nje i níng wieng aha ngbe nyi we nci nyi nyi ri zhwe ngwa nci nyi re be nwie nzhi a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Aha ni kya ne nyi nyi e̱ níng shwe̱ rehwie we yang.
We̱sa ni, aa ci nzhi nyi rekwi we yang ne nzhi ho he nyi kla Titu ehwie, aha ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi ci ehwie ngu be be.

Aha nje i cwe zewe ne nyi a nyyi ngu, ko nyi bra ning ci nshwu we̱. Me̱di we shi ko nda ne nzhi níng ting nna shi ni cence, ga ngbe kya ne nje ning cwe zewe ne nyi a nyyi Titu a á she shi ni cence wa.
He̱rri aa ci Titu a ning bra níng ci hwie we yang, kundu ngu lú he ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi ning ho nka, ngbe ne zhwe se̱ ne nyi ki se̱ ne owu nwie ki ngwa grime̱.
Nje bi ehwie kla we yang aha a yarri ko nda ma n hung sa rie a nyi.
A zhe ne ne̱ re-gimbe, nzhi ce̱ he nyi hu re̱se̱ kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi aha ehwie rina ngu a yarri rekpri nné ce̱ nka a Makyidoniya.
Á ngwie yarri ya ge̱zhe̱ we yang nang mwa ri, gbengbe ni a yarri riywe̱ mbe, ehwie kla mbe e̱ zhwo we zhwo he̱rri aa we ci á ngwa we ngwa we ngwa ne ehwie zunzrru.
Nje níng ting he á i ngwa ye̱ye̱rri ne igbe̱ mbe, he̱rri ma aa wara kya ne mbe hung ngwang. Á ngwa ne ehwie zunzrru we mwa yi mbe,
he̱rri á cwé nva ne nzhi we cwe we cwe he nzhi we ngwa riwie̱ ngbe mbe shi tsi nné she nné Be̱ne̱ng ne mbe shi Urrushelima,
he̱rri kya ne mbe ngwa a wara kya ne nzhi i ning hwie yi, me̱di á i ke̱she ngwa Brrabe̱ nci mbe, wire mbe ngwa nci mbe nwie nzhi ye̱ye̱rr ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱.
A nyi aha ni ne nzhi shwé̱ Titu ehwie, ngu ne ngu i ke̱she ce̱ zhwe cwuo ne̱ a nwie nyi e̱, he re ning brru re ya níng shwe̱ rehwie ngbe nyi fro cwuo rina ne̱.

Me̱di tu ne nyi e̱ nyi ye yincwuee a yarri ko nda — a nkang sa rie, ngbe hung he nka, ngbe hu re̱se̱ng, ngbe a ngwa rici yarri ko nda, ngbe a ce̱ ne nyi níng ce̱ — nyi ci nkwile̱ ngbe nyi ye yincwuee a yarri cwuo rina nang ngwang ne̱ wa.
Ko nje he nka ne̱ he n níng ci ne ce we̱, me̱di he n níng ti kya kpi re-gimbe mbe nyi, ngbe nzhi hu cence he ka ce̱ ne nyi ce̱ kpi re-gimbe e̱ nyi te̱nte̱ng ye̱.

Aha nyi hu re̱se̱ ehwie rina Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi, he ko ngbe ne ko ngu i nyi riywe̱ yankya we̱, gbengbe ni a i hwie̱ yiriywe̱ aha nyi, ngbe aha ne ngu ci yiriywe̱, nyi e̱ nyi she dukyie̱e̱ na ankya Be̱ne̱.
Kya ne nje ce̱ níng ting ne ngu bi mpe̱ni re ne̱ e̱ nyi nke: a nrie ne ngu wara, nyi ke̱she ce̱ he nyi ngwa, he̱rri nyi ce̱ ngwang.
A zhe ne ne̱ nyi ngra fro kya ne nyi i ce̱ e̱. Ngbe we shi ne nyi i nyi te̱te̱ a ce̱ucwung ana, nyi nyi we ni he̱rri nyi ya fro ye̱ye̱rri ne igbe̱ nyi.
Kundu ne nyi fo a yarri hwie nyi he nyi ngwa, ne ngu bra shi ye̱ye̱rri ne igbe̱ nyi, Be̱ne̱ we̱ se̱ kya ne nyi ngwa a, me̱di ko cé̱ he re wara kya ne nyi bi we̱.
Ko nje hé nka ne̱ he yá ré srra we canca ngbe re bra níng hwie̱ nyi e̱ nkpe we̱, me̱di he re shi we ye̱nyye̱.
A zhe ne ne̱, ne nyi e̱ nyi bi piriri, nyi she nné mbiye ne mbe shi riywe̱ng, ngbe kundu nyi ri shi riywe̱ ne mbe e̱ mbe bi piriri ma, wé̱ níng sheng. Ngbe ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi shi ye̱nyye̱.
We shi ne e wie, he “Nne nke ne ngu tsu piriri, koo ki zhwo zhwo we̱, nne nke ma ne ngu tsu tsie̱nzhwu, koo ki re̱ re̱ ma we̱.”
Me̱di nje ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng, ne ngu ci we zhwe hwie nka ne nje bi aha n níng sheng a hwie Titu.
Ngu Titu a we rici ngu, ko nyi we shing ne ngu shî nka nzhi he ngu be nwie nyi e̱ we̱, me̱di ngu a we rici ngu a cé̱ he ngu rā ya níng dzie.
Nzhi shi ki te ngbe ne gimbe nzhi nke ne ngu ve lo a ncwuong brro Nka Rina a ga rekpri nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo.

We̱sa ni, rekpri nné ce̱ nka a á ki kyie he re cwo ngbe ne nzhi a ciee ne̱ ne nzhi shi ywa mi ne kya ne e tsu — kya ne nzhi nyi aha grime̱ Brrabe̱ ne ngu bra ti he nzhi ngwa nci nzhi aha nzhi she nné Be̱ne̱ng ne mbe shi Urrushelima.
Nzhi ce̱ ci nkwile̱ kishi á ri níng cwi ne rê ne nzhi shi ning cwo mi ne rigwe̱ kya ne e tsu ne̱.
Aha nzhi hwie he nzhi ce̱ nyi kya ne ngu shi tsantsa, ko se we a nyyi Brrabe̱ we̱, me̱di he̱rri ngbe a nyyi nneywí.
Aha ni nzhi shi we te ngbe ne yaka gimbe nzhi na ne e ki mwa a re-rê kanka kanka, á ki she a bi ngwa rici, aa bra ning bra ngwa rici a zhe ne ne̱ aha ne ngu bi sa rie we yang a nyi.
Ngu Titu a, a nyi rwincwuo nje ne nzhi mwe rici gbengbe a ncwuo ne̱ aha nyi. Mbe re-gimbe nzhi wehwie ana ma, á nyi nnenté na rekpri nné ce̱ nka, cwuo mbe e̱ shi ngwa Krristi grime̱.
Aha ni nyi ti he cence nyi we ce̱, ngbe ga rekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe we te e̱ ré ri kya ne nzhi ning cwe zewe a rici nyi e̱.
Ko se nje rā bra níng wieng wie a nka cwuong she nné Be̱ne̱ng ne mbe shi Urrushelima we̱.

Aha nje hu he nyi rwe he nyi shi we sheng, shi ne nje i ke̱nce̱ níng de a nyyi nné Makyidoniya, nwie he ne mbe he nyi nné Akaya nyi i ke̱nce̱ rweng tu rie he nyi shi ngwang; ngbe a zhe ne mbe ho koori nyi e̱ ni, jie̱ mbe e̱ deze he mbe shi ngwang ma.
A zhe ne ne̱, nje shi te re-gimbe ne̱ kishi nka ne nzhi i he a rici nyi e̱ ri ci shi nyi we nka shweni, aha ngbe nyi ke̱nce̱ srrante, shi ne nje i he nyi shi nying.

Kishi kundu ya nne Makyidoniya ri bra be ngbe ne nje, re ya she ko nyi nyi yankya we̱, ngbe nzhi e̱ shwe nshwu — kundu ne ko nje ce̱ he he nyi nyi e̱ ne nyi ri shwe nshwu we̱ — ne zhwe sa rie ne nzhi bi a rici nyi ne̱!

Aha ni nje ri aa mwa ye̱ye̱rr ngbe n lu re-gimbe ne̱ ré ke̱she nje ré be nwie nyi, aha ngbe ré ya tsu re-ankya ne nyi sa jeeng ngwang nna, aha nzhi ri ya she ne nyi tsu sa sa, shi ne nyi fo a rehwie nyi, ngbe de̱ ri bra shi shi á níng ci ne ce we̱.
Nyi lu he nne nke ne ngu kye̱ kaa we tsie̱nzhwu, a ri ca we e̱we̱ kya ne ngu kye̱; nne nke ma ne ngu kye̱ piriri, a ri ca piriri ma.
Ko nye̱ re ngwa we ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu rwe a hwie ngu, shi de̱ re nyi de̱nde̱nde̱ ka shi shi á ki ci ne ce we̱, aha Be̱ne̱ ce̱ nne ngwang ne ehwie kla.
Ngbe Be̱ne̱ we̱ hung ci ehwie rina zhwozhwo re zhwo we zhwo re be nwie ngwe̱, wire ko zohu zhe ngwe̱ e̱ bi ko nda ne ngwe̱ ce̱ he̱rri we̱ re be, ngbe ngwe̱ e̱ hu ning nyi ko zohu cwuo rina.
We shi ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he,
“Nne nke ne ngu ngwá yiriywé̱ we wang.
Wé̱ lu ne redziee ngu he̱rri tiya.”

Wire ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ngwá nné kaa zhwe yâ, ne ngu bra ngwá yâ ye, we̱ níng ngwa zhwe yâ, we̱ bra ci re ci piriri, ngbe we̱ bra ci kya ne nyi bi e̱ re ning bra ci piriri aha nyi ning nyi re-cwuo rina.
We̱ níng ngwa rishwe a ko zohu eme aha ngbe nyi hung ngwang we wang ne ehwie kla ko zohu zhe, ngbe kya ne nyi ngwa we wang ne ehwie kla a nva nzhi e̱ we̱ ci nneywí ré ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng.
Aha ngu cwuo rina ne nyi fo nwie nying ne̱, ko nyi we nné Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi we sheng we̱, me̱di a bra shi ci nneywí ré ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng we yang.

Ngbe aha cwuo ne nyi nyi e̱ ti he cence nyi nyi nné ce̱ nka, nneywí wé̱ ngwa Be̱ne̱ grime̱ aha zhwe ngwa nci nyi a Nka Rina Krristi, ngbe ne zhwe ngwang ne nyi we ngwa we wang ne ehwie kla, ngbe ga nné zhwozhwo ne nyi we ngwa.
Ngbe wé̱ níng ce̱ we yang nwie srra re ku Be̱ne̱ aha nyi aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu zhwo we zhwo re be nwie nyi.
Nde nzhi ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha kya na na ngu ne ko bi nti nka ré ning mwa yi we̱.

Nje Bulu a we rici nje, nje cwé nva ne nyi ne nywe̱ rici ngbe ehwie sheng na Krristi — nje ne e he he nje shi ranng kundu ne nje shi nyyi nyi, he me̱di nje hé nka ne igbe̱ kundu ne nje shi ze̱nze̱ ne nyi —
nje cwé nva ne nyi he kundu ne nje ri be, shi de̱ nyi ning ci ngbe n he nka ne igbe̱ shi ne nje hwie heng a rici nné mbiye ne mbe ri shi shi nzhi nyí cwuo ne̱ a yarri hwie nka na nneywi we̱.
Aha ko ngbe ne nzhi shi yarri ngwie̱, ko cwe nzhi e̱ nyi zhwe na nné ngwie̱ we̱.
Aha ankyang ko nzhi e̱ ko nyi zhwe na ebe ngwie̱ we̱, me̱di á nyi na igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ aha ré ning gywi ngbá rewie igbe̱ na Shetani,
ngbe ga ronu ce nneywí, ngbe ko nda ne ngu yó aha ngu ci de̱ nneywí ré hu Be̱ne̱ we̱, nzhi bra ning fó ko zohu zhwe hwie nka, nzhi e̱ ki ci re hwie̱ nang ho Krristi nka.
Wire kundu ne nzhi ri she nyi ho Krristi nka tsantsa fa, nzhi e̱ yo nzhi e̱ na ko nye̱ ne ngu ra ho nka uucwu.
Nyi ci riyii nyi ri kya ne ngu shi gbeng shi! Ka bi ya nyi ne ngu hwie he ngu nyi na Krristi e̱e̱? Nde re lu he ngu a we rici ngu ngu nyi na Krristi, we shi ne nzhi e̱ ma nzhi nyi na Krristi.

Ko ngbe ne nje rā cwe zewe he̱rri ngu zhwo zhwo aha de̱me̱ nzhi ne Brrabe̱ níng ngwa, aha ngbe nzhi ning ci sa rie nyi re ning bra ci igbe̱ ko aha nzhi ning ci sa rie nyi re ci shweni we̱, ko shi re ning nyi kya nshwu we̱.
Shi de̱ nyi fo he nje ce̱ níng ngwa owu ne re-krre̱de̱ nje ne̱ we̱.

Aha yá he, “Ne nti nka ngu a yarri re-krre̱de̱ ngu a mbe ruvo mbe bra bi igbe̱ shi nyi nda ho, me̱di kundu ngu nna shi he, ngwe̱ e̱ ri ko nka nna bi igbe̱ ni we̱, ngwe̱ e̱ she ko nyi ya nka ne ngu be yankya we̱.”
Nde zhwe nné ana ré hu re̱se̱ng he kya ne nzhi he a yarri re-krre̱de̱ nzhi a zhe ne nzhi shi ze̱nze̱, a nyi ngwiee ne nzhi ri nyi a zhe ne nzhi ri shi miimi ngbe ne nyi.

Nyi nzhi mbe nye̱, ngbe nzhi mwa nci nzhi ka nzhi yaa fo shi nzhi shi shi nné mbiye ne mbe yaa de we nci mbe. Me̱di á yaa mi yi we nci mbe nwie hwie he nne nke ne̱ nne nke we nci mbe a yarri riywe̱ hung.
Me̱di ko shi nzhi e̱ nzhi cwe zewe re hle ewie ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri re ya ning cwu we̱, se ka nzhi yo ye̱ye̱rri ne de̱me̱ ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa, ne ngu ya cwu he̱rri nwie nyi.
Aha ko cwe zewe nzhi e̱ zhwo zhwo we̱, tu ne nyi e̱ nyi shi yarri ewie ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa; aha a nyi nzhi ne nzhi i ke̱she be he̱rri nwie nyi ne Nka Rina Krristi.

Ko cwe zewe nzhi e̱ wara ewie ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri re ya ning cwu, shi a yarri ncwuo na yaká nné we̱, me̱di nzhi bi sa riyii he shi ne sa rie nyi e̱ cwo we ne ning bra ci igbe̱, mahu eyi ncwuo nzhi a nwie nyi e̱ cwo we ne ning bra kla.
Ngbe nzhi e̱ hung brro Nka Rina ne̱ a yaká re-ngwie̱ ne mbe shi ze̱nze̱ ne nyi, kishi nzhi ri cwe zewe a ya eyi ncwuo ne yaká nné mbe nyi.
Me̱di shi ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, “Nde ko nye̱ ne ngu shi cwe zewe, re cwe zewe ne kya Brrabe̱ nyi.”
Aha ko nyi nne nke ne ngu yaa dé we rici ngu ne Be̱ne̱ he aa nyi rina we̱, me̱di nyi nne nke ne Brrabe̱ we rici ngu ki dé.
Nje ce̱ he nyi rā fo ehwie sheng ne e̱we̱ nka rumwa nje ne̱ tsie̱, nyi ci nkwirin ne nje.
Nje bi ehwie shwo aha nyi, zhwe ehwie shwo na Be̱ne̱, nyi shi shi ya ewena ne nje kwe Krristing, aha ngbe nje ri níng ngwa a nva ngu ne nyi shi wiriri shi ewena ne e shi ki ngwa nto hwi.
Me̱di a ning bi owu shi shi á shi dzio zhwe te̱nte̱ ngwa rici nyi zhwozhwo a nwie Krristi a yarri re-hwie nka nyi, we shi ne nshe ngu i shwe̱li Hawa ne re-zentsi rabrra ngu.

Aha he̱rri ya nne be nwie nyi, aa ya níng brro yaka nka ne e he aa wru nwie Jesu, ne ngu shi ka ne kya ne nzhi i níng brrong; he̱rri á níng ngwa yaka yankya ne ko ngu nyi Nshe Wiri we̱; he̱rri nyi shî yaka nka rina ne e níng brrong ne ngu shi ka ne nke ne nzhi i níng brrong; he̱rri nyi se̱ zhwozhwo nyi ne̱ ne yaa yhwi mi.
Wire ma ko nje bra hwie he nné mbiye ne nyi we ye he “brrá nnenté” ana koó ning ne̱ ne yankya we̱.
Kabeya ko nje zhwo mie̱ hung he nka piri we̱, me̱di ko nje nyi riywe̱ hu re̱se̱ng we̱, nzhi níng ti ko nda we gbeng a ko zohu rê.
Ka nje brru ne nje yaa ci re̱ aha ngbe n níng fo nyi e̱ ze nwie níng brro Nka Rina Be̱ne̱ we̱sa ne nje se̱ yankya a nva nyi e̱e̱?
A zhe nje i shi ncwuo nwie nyi, nje i si ncwé̱ a nwie rekpri nné ce̱ nka a yaká re-ngwie̱ aha ngbe n níng nyi nyi e̱ cwuo.

Ngbe a zhe ne nje bra i shi ngbe ne nyi, ne nje kre yankya, ko nje i níng hwie̱ nkpe we̱, aha re-gimbe ne mbe i wru a Makyidoniya á i ning ngwa ko nda ne nje ce̱. Ko nje i ree níng hwie̱ nkpe we̱, ko nje bra shi ree níng hwie̱ nkpe a ya rê gung we̱.
We shi ne cence raywrra Krristi shi yarri hwie nje, nje níng ting he ko bi nne a ngwie̱ Akaya re ning ci n we ni cwe zewe a nka ne̱ we̱.
A nyi aha nda? Ka he aha ne ko nje níng ce̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Be̱ne̱ hu re̱se̱ng he nje níng ce̱!
Nje shi ke̱ we ne nyi kya ne nje shi nwie nying ne̱, aha ngbe n kpo riwie̱ nné mbiye ne mbe yaa kywo he mbe nyi cwuo we ye̱ye̱rr ne nzhi nyi, shi ne mbe cwé zewe nwie heng.
Aha zhwe nné ana á nyi we nnenté rabrra, á nyi nné nyi cwuo ne rabrra, ne mbe tiyi shi mbe nyi nnenté Krristi.
Wire re ning hwie̱ ma ko bra nyi kyang hwie̱ nga onu we̱, aha ko ngbe Shetani we rici ngu cí rici ngu shi ngu nyi ya njeli na ewie si.
Aha ni ko nyi kya hwi we̱, kundu ne nnencwuó ngu mbe tiyí shi shi mbe nyi nné nyi cwuo redziee. Á cwo a she lede zhwe cwuo ne mbe nyi a krrucing.
Nje bra he te̱nte̱ wa he, shi de̱ ya nne re hwie shi nje nyi rumwa we̱, me̱di ko ngbe ne nyi ri bra hwie ni, ma nyi ning se̱ a nu rumwa, aha ngbe n she e̱we̱ riwie̱ng cwe zewe.
A nkang cwe zewe ne nje he ne̱, ko shi n he nyi Brrabe̱ ngu ce̱ n he ni we̱, me̱di nje he a nu rumwa.
Tu ne jie̱ nné e̱ mbe cwe zewe ne ankya ngwie̱, nje shi cweng ma.
Nje he ka nyi nyi nné bi zentsi, me̱di nyi bra ho shwi srra ngbe mwá!

He̱rri nyi hung fo ehwie sheng ngbe ne nne nke ne ngu níng ci nyi hwie̱ shi nyi nyi hwié ngu, ko ngbe ne ngu shi níng ye iyhwe̱, ka ne ngu yé a rici nyi, ka ne ngu yaa kywo a zete nyi, ko ngbe ne ngu níng ta ne va a re-uushwo.
He̱rri ma a shi shi n he nyi kya nshwu ne nzhi e̱ nzhi i shi tuntu, he̱rri ko nzhi i hu níng nyi zhwe re-ankya ana we̱.
Me̱di kundu ya nne ri mahwie̱ he ngu cwe zewe, ma n we̱ ki ti cwe zewe, me̱di nyi we nka rumwa ne̱.
Mbe ana á nyi nné Ibrrani e̱e̱? Nje nyi ya ma. Á nyi nné Isrreela aa? Nje nyi ya ma. Á nyi rewe Ibrrahin e̱e̱? Nje nyi ya ma.

Á nyi nnencwuó Krristi e̱e̱? Shi shi nyi ya nka nne rici dzio ne nje shi mi wa, nje nyi re we ne̱. Nje yaa ta ncwuo re we ne̱ we yang, he̱rri nje ning srra gyiaa re we ne̱, a ri nyi nka re-cwe, á ning cwe we cwe we cwe, he̱rri nje ri hu ko zohu zhe.
Aa ci ce cwuoo ne nné Yahudi mbe ning kra we kra we kra ne frii he̱rri re re̱ we ce zrru ngbe re ya cwu nshwa weni.

Aa ci ce tsie̱ ne nné Rroma mbe ning cwe ne ngbo. Á ning ta ne rahwan ce zrru. Aa ci ce tsie̱ ne re-jirigi rishi mbe kprre ne nje shi yarring. He̱rri nje i ree kywe nje bra yeri a zete brra nzhwo rishi ce zrru wire ne e ning ti.

Nje nyi re-ciee ze̱nze̱ piriri, nje she rici nje yarri re-ge̱zhe̱ a brrá re-riywi, nje she rici nje a yarri re-ge̱zhe̱ a nva nné nywrra nné rê, nje she rici nje a yarri re-ge̱zhe̱ a nva nné nje nné Yahudi, ngbe a nva Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱, nje she rici nje yarri ge̱zhe̱ a yarri ngwie̱ ngbe a tsi yi, ngbe yarri brra nzhwo rishi, nje bra she rici nje a yarri ge̱zhe̱ a nva re-gimbe na rabrra.
Nje yaa ta ncwuo nje kra cî, nje srra we̱sa ne̱ ndzie, nje srra ne nzhwo ngbe ne̱ rishi, we̱sa ne yâ ye, nje srra yarri wu srru ngbe ne riywe̱ ankya ci rwe̱.
We̱sa ne kpi re-ankya kanka kanka, a bra bi nkpe nang ci nkwile̱ ne ga rekpri nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo ne ko zohu otu nje srra re bē aha mbe.
Nyi nye̱ ngu i shi brrubrru ne he̱rri nje we̱sa hong shi ngu aa? Nyi nye̱ ne i ki ci ngu kpe yarri e̱ngwie̱ ne nje we̱sa dzio ehwie e̱e̱?
Kundu ne nje shi cwe zewe, ma n cwe zewe aha re-ankya ne mbe ti brrubrru nje.
Be̱ne̱, Be̱ Brrabe̱ Jesu ne ngu be re ki de he̱rri tiya, a nyi ngu ne ngu hu re̱se̱ng he ko nje vé rabrra we̱.
A zhe ne nje i shi Damaska, goona ne ngu i shi tahwie Brra Nggwe̱ Arrita i ci ré cwo ngwie̱ nna zhwozhwo aha ngbe ré ning pie,
me̱di yá rwí nje ning ci a grre, mbe e̱ wro ne nje a wundo brra garru ngwie̱ nna, he̱rri nje to ki drre̱.
He̱rri ne cwu se n ke̱ we ne cwe zewe, ko ngbe ne ko bi mpe̱ni we̱. A zhe ne ne̱ nje shi he nka re-ankya ne Brrabe̱ ning ting ne nje di shi shi nyi yarri re-revi.

A bi ya nne a yarri Krristi ne i ki fo ze re nzhi gbong yarri zinye̱ na tsie̱ a nrie shwa ne otu weni ne ngu wara, ka á i ki fo ngbe ne rwe̱ ngu, ka á i ki fo we̱sa ne rwe̱ ngu, yooho ko nje hu ma we̱, me̱di Be̱ne̱ hu re̱se̱ng.
Ngu nne ne̱ á we̱ i ki fo ne rwe̱ ngu ka á i ki fo we̱sa ne rwe̱ ngu, ko nje hu ma we̱, me̱di Be̱ne̱ hu re̱se̱ng.
Á i ywa ne ngu yarri nhwie̱n Be̱ne̱, aa ya ho yá re-nka ne e he ne ko shi ré hung ting we̱, ne ko nneywi bi de̱me̱ng heng we̱.
Nje shi cwe zewe aha ngu nje nne nkya ana, me̱di ko shi n cwe zewe we aha rici nje we̱, se ka aha re̱ nje.

Ko ngbe ne nje rā bra ning cwe zewe e̱ ma ho, ko nje e̱ he nka rumwa we̱, aha we̱ nyi we nka raywrra ne nje he. Me̱di ko nje shi nyi ni we̱, kishi yá ri ne̱ ne ning ri shi nje wara kya ne mbe ri ne̱, ka kya ne mbe ho nje hé ne̱.

Ngbe aha kishi nje ri ne̱ ne yaa kywo aha ngbá re-ankya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ting we yang ne̱, á ning ngwa yankya shi nyi ze̱kye̱ a yarri rwe̱ nje, a nyi njeli Shetani aha re srra re ning ngwa cinci kishi nje ri kywo rici ze.
Nje cwe nva ne Brrabe̱ he̱rri ce tsie̱ he re ning ti ngge ne̱,
me̱di a he ne nje he, “Ehwie rina nje e̱ re be, aha á shi ri igbe̱ nje kaka a yarri re̱ ngwe̱.” Aha nii, nje shi ning bra cwe zewe aha ne nje re̱, aha ngbe igbe̱ Krristi re shi a nje.

Kya a nyi ngwiee ne aha Krristi, nje nyi we rekwi aha re̱ nje, ngbe cwi ne e ning cwi, ngbe re-cinci nje, ngbe ne re-ge̱zhe̱ ne nje shwe, ngbe ne ankya bi rwe̱ ne mbe ning she. Aha a zhe ne nje ri nje re̱, wire ma n bra bi igbe̱.
Mahu nje ci rumwa ne nje cwé zewe he ni ne̱, me̱di nyi nyi ne nyi ning ci, aha nyi nyi ne nyi rā ning de. Aha ko ngbe ne ko nje be yankya we̱, ko “brrá nnenté” nyi ana á ning ne̱ ne yankya gung we̱.
Cence, re-sheede ne mbe ti he nje nyi nnente e̱ á i ri a tsi nyi ne ko zohu zhwe yaa rwe nje, ngbe ne ngbá re-sheede, ngbe ngbá re-ankya ne nje i nyi ngbe re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu.

Ka bi yankya ne ko nje i níng nying shi ne nje nyi kpi rekpri nné ce̱ nka nna we̱ e̱e̱? Se ka he ko nje i níng hwie̱ nkpe he ngbe nyi ning ngwa yankya we̱. Ohooo, ma nyi fo ehwie sheng ne nje aha ni ho!

Nje shi nwie hwie nkang be nwie nyi, ngbe we̱ ci dzie na tsie̱ ne nje ya níng dzie. Gbengbe ni, ko nje cwo a níng hwie̱ nkpe we̱, aha ko nje kré yankya nyi we̱, me̱di a nyi nyi nna ne nje ce̱; aha ko nyi e̱we̱e̱ rewe mbe kré aha nné we bî we̱, me̱di nyi nné we bî ne mbe kré aha e̱we̱e̱ rewe mbe.

A ri ning bi ehwie kla ngbe n yhwe̱ ko nda ne nje bi aha nyi, he̱rri ngbe ne rici nje. Me̱di a shi shi kundu ne nje ning brá níng ce̱ we yang, ngbe ce̱ ne nyi e̱ nyi ning ce̱ e̱ we̱ bra cwo we ne vie sa.
Ee, nyi hu re̱se̱ng he ko nje i níng hwie̱ nkpe we̱, me̱di yá nyi bra he he nje i níng kwa ne zentsi zentsi he̱rri nje níng shwe̱li.
Rimi rimi nna? Ka nje i ye yankya a rici nyi ne le a nva nné ne nje i we te nwie nyi e̱e̱?

Nje i cwe nva ne Titu he re be nwie nyi, nje e̱ lu ya gimbe nzhi ngbe re ya ki pie. Ka ngu Titu a i ye ya nyi ne le e̱e̱? Ko ngu Titu ngbe nje e̱ nzhi bi we zhwe hwie nka zunzrru ngbe ne zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ zunzrru we̱ e̱e̱?

Ka nyi hwié he ge̱nce̱ ne̱ nyi koori rici nzhi ne nzhi shi mi he nzhi yaa kye̱ a nyyi nyi e̱e̱? Ko tsie̱! Nzhi shi nwie he nka ne̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱, nzhi nyi nnencwuó Krristi; ko nda ne nzhi bra nyi, nné ce̱ nje, nzhi nyi aha nzhi níng ci nyi ci igbe̱.

Aha nje tó kishi nje ri be, n bra ya she ko nyi shi shi ne nje hwié he nje rā ya she we̱, ka nyi e̱ ma nyi ya she nje shi ka ne kya nyi hwie he nje rā ning shî. Nje tó kishi nje ri ya she ne nyi shi re̱kwe̱, ngbe ehwie shwo, nwie yaa nye̱ ne ren, ngbe srra kanka, nwie yaa kwe fe̱li, ngbe brra onu, ngbe kywo rici ze, ngbe ne re̱kpe̱e̱ng srra cwucwu.

Nje bē he kishi nje ri be n bra ya shwe nshwu a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha nyi, ngbe re ning ci n bra dzio ehwie aha nné piriri ne mbe nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱sa ne si ywe̱ aha re̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ mbe, ka ecwue njè, ka re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè ne mbe nyi.
A nyi na tsie̱ ne̱ ne nje cwo be nwie nyi. “Ko zohu nka ne e be mi a rici ya nne, se re bi re-sheede wehwie ka wetsie̱” — shi ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ hé.

Nje i gara nné mbiye ne mbe i nyi e̱ngwie̱ ngbe re̱se̱ nné zhwozhwo nka, nje bra we gará nka wa a zhe ne ne̱ ne nje shi ze̱nze̱ ne̱ we shi ne nje i we garang a be nje na hwie, he kundu ne nje ri bra be wa, ko bi nne ne ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱ ne nje ri ki we we̱sa ki na uucwu we̱.
Nyi ri di ko zohu sheede he nyi Krristi ngu hé nka a yarri nje, shi ne nyi kre e̱. Ko ngu a re̱ re be nwie nyi we̱, me̱di aa ti igbe̱ ngu a nwie nyi.
Cence á i ki ci gasankwe a yarri re̱, me̱di a shi nce ne igbe̱ Be̱ne̱. We ni wa, nzhi e̱ ma nzhi re̱ a yarri ngu, me̱di a yarri igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ nzhi ri srra ngbe ne ngu nzhi níng nyi cwuo.
Nyi yaa mwa nyi ri, ka nyi ke̱ we ne shi yarri ce̱ nka. Nyi yaa mwa we nci nyi. Ka de̱ nyi hu re̱se̱ng we nci nyi he Krristi Jesu a shi yarri nyi we̱ e̱e̱? Se ka de̱ nyi ri yaa mwa rina rina we̱.
Me̱di kundu nyi ri yaa mwa rina, nje bi sa rie he nyi e̱ she he ko nzhi re̱ we̱.

Me̱di nzhi ku Be̱ne̱ he shi de̱ nyi bra nyi yankya wie̱e̱ni we̱, ko aha he nzhi ti he nzhi e̱ nzhi shi she drre̱ wiriri we̱, me̱di aha ngbe nyi nyi kya ne ngu shi tsantsa, ko ngbe ne ngu shi shi nzhi e̱ nzhi re̱.
Aha ko shi nzhi hung nyi yankya ne ngu shi ce̱trri raywrra we̱, se ka nzhi nyi kya ne ngu shi tsantsa ne raywrra.
Aha nzhi nyi rekwi kundu ne ngu shi shi nzhi e̱ nzhi re̱, ne ngu tí he nyi e̱ nyi ci igbe̱. Nzhi ku Be̱ne̱ he nyi ning bra hu kwe.

Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje níng wie re-ankya ne̱ ne nje ka shi ze̱nze̱, kishi kundu ne nje ri be n ya níng he nka ne igbe̱ yang ne de̱me̱ ne Brrabe̱ ning ngwa he ngbe n níng ci nyi ning bra ci igbe̱ ko aha n níng kro be we̱.

A ngrangrang re-gimbe nje, nje níng ci ywaho. Nyi kwe̱ he nyi shi tsantsa. Nyi sa uucwu a re-nka nje ne̱. Nyi bi onu zrru. Nyi yaa srra rina, ngbe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ce̱ ne ngu bra ngwá srra rina we̱ shi ngbe ne nyi.
Nyi yaa dzie nwie yaa nyi gbagba.
Ga nné Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo níng dzie.
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi, ngbe zhwe ce̱ na Be̱ne̱, ngbe mwe rici na Nshe Wiri ré shi ngbe ne nyi zhwozhwo.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie nje Bulu. Nje nyi nnente Jesu Krristi ngbe Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ne ngu ki deze nhu, ko nyi nneywí mbe ning ye we̱, ko bra nyi ya nne ngu ning ci nje hwie̱ nnente we̱.
Nje ngbe ga re-gimbe ne mbe shi ngbe nje zhwozhwo, nzhi dzie rekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe shi Galati.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ nzhi ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe nyi re bra níng ngwa srra rina ngu.
Ngu Jesu Krristi e̱ ngwa rici ngu aha ngu níng kyia ne re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi a zhwe zhe hwie̱ ne̱, ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ Be̱ nzhi.
Grime̱ nyi na Be̱ne̱ he̱rri tiya tiya! A shi ni.
Nje hwie̱ nga we onu ne nyi! We hwiehwie á ne̱ ne níng bra nyi we Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ye a yarri ehwie rina Krristi
Ko bi ko yaka Nka Rina gung we̱! A nyi we aha ne yá nné mbe shi níng kpe rehwie ngbe re níng ci zhizhi, aha ngbe mbe bra Nka Rina Krristi.
Me̱di ko ngbe ne ngu ra nyi nzhi, ka ya njeli ngu wru zinye̱ ngu níng brro yaka nka rina ne ngu shi ka ne Nka Rina ne nzhi i níng brrong, nde re ci shweni a ruvong ro!
We shi kya ne nzhi i he, nje bra níng heng wa he kundu ya nne ngu ning brro yaka nka rina ne ngu shi ka ne na ne nyi i ke̱she se̱, nde re ci shweni a ruvong ro.

Ma a zhe ne ne̱, nyi hwie he a nyi nneywí ne nje ce̱ we shwo ehwie ngbe ré ning de e̱e̱? Aawo, nje ce̱ kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie. Kundu nje ra ke̱ ne nyi aha he nneywí ré ning de, ko shi n hwie̱ hwie Krristi we̱.
Re-gimbe, nje ce̱ níng ting nyi hu he, Nka Rina ne nje brro a koo wru nwie nneywi we̱.
Ko nje i se̱ a nwie ya nne we̱, ko bra bi ko ya nne ngu i ning mie̱ng we̱. Me̱di Jesu Krristi we rici ngu i ning ting.
Nyi hu zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ nje a zhe ne nje i shi zhwe re-teede nzhi nné Yahudi, ngbe zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne nje i ngwa rekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ we yang ne nje i nyi koori he n we ci ré ci shweni.
Nje i zhwe re-teede Yahudi re ne̱ jie̱ ze̱ nje a Yahudi, nje i ning tu rici we yang nwie nyi ankya teede yó nzhi.
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ a yarri ehwie rina ngu a ning kyie tu ne rishi ning bî, ngbe ngu a ning ye he n ki nyi cwuo. A zhe ne ngu ki mwa ye̱ye̱rri,
ngu a ning kla riyii ngbe n hu Kowe ngu, aha n brro Nka Rina ngu a nwie nné nzhwe ngwie̱. Ko nje rin ya nneng wire we̱.
Ko nje bra ywa a Urrushelima a nwie nné mbiye ne mbe ke̱she nje hwie̱ nnenté we̱. Me̱di nje wre̱ ne ne̱ re nzhi Arrabiya, wire nje ya ning brru re be Damaska.
Nje ci re-rie wetsie̱ wire nje ya ywa a Urrushelima, nje ya dzie Pita
Ko nje sa ri ko ya a tsi nnenté we̱, se we Yakubu, gimbe Brrabe̱.
Nyi ri, kya ne nje níng wieng ne̱, Be̱ne̱ e̱ hu he ko nyi rabrra we̱!
Re be merin, nje ya ywa a yá re-nkla Sirriya ngbe Kyilikyia.
A zhe ana, koó i ma ne rekpri nné ce̱ nka Krristi a Yahudi e̱ mbe sa ning ri riyii ngbe riyii we̱.
Á i ho we ho he nne ne ngu i shi we ngwa ge̱zhe̱ ana, a zhe ne ne̱ aa bra ne̱ ne brro Nka Rina ne ngu i ce̱ cing re ci shweni, he nneywí ré se̱ nka Krristi.
Mbe e̱ ne̱ ne de Be̱ne̱ aha nje.
A zhe ne re-rie shwa ne otu weni wara, nje cwugu ngbe Barrnaba re nzhi Urrushelima wa, Titu a shi ngbe nzhi.

Nje i ywa ye̱ye̱rri shi kya ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ning ting. Nje ya mwe ngbe yá nnencwueé na ne e we hu, we nggaa nzhi, nje e̱ we ti kya ne nje shi brrong a tsi nné nzhwe ngwie̱, kishi re-cwuo ne nje nyi ne nying ngbe na ne nje shi nying ré hwie̱ kya shweni.
Me̱di ko ngbe Titu ne ngu i shi ngbe nje ne ngu nyi nne Heleni

Nkang cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó ne̱ i deze we aha yá nné ne mbe tiyi shi mbe nyi re-gimbe ne mbe ngwie yarri nzhi ranranng aha mbe dzio srra srra nci nzhi ne nzhi bi a yarri Krristi Jesu, ngbe mbe níng ci nzhi hwie̱ hwié.
Me̱di ko nzhi we shing we̱ ko tsie̱tsie̱, aha ngbe raywrra Nka Rina re hwie̱ ngbe nyi.

Me̱di ko ngbe nné mbiye ne e we hu he á nyi brrabrráng; a nwie nje, ko mbe ra shi rimi, koó shi ka ne kpi nneywí we̱, aha ko Be̱ne̱ to riyii ya nne we̱, ko ngbe mbe e̱ koó i ning bra ko yankya a zete kya ne nje i mié̱ we̱.
Mbe e̱ á srra á timi we ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ shî, he̱rri aa ning ngwa cwuong brro Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱
Aha ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu i nyi cwuo a yarri Pita ne ngu nyi nnente re nzhi nwie nné Yahudi nyi ngu wa ne ngu i nyi cwuo a yarri nje ne nje nyi nnente re nzhi nwie nné nzhwe ngwie̱.

A zhe ne mbe Yakubu, ngbe Pita, ngbe Yohana ne e we hu he á nyi brrá nnencwueé e̱ mbe ri zhwe ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re be nwie nje ni, mbe e̱ shwe va ngbe nje ngbe Barrnaba — sheede he mbe mwe rici ngbe nzhi. Nzhi e̱ shî zhwozhwo he nzhi e̱ nzhi shi ywa a nwie nné nzhwe ngwie̱, ngbe mbe e̱ wé̱ ywa a nwie nné Yahudi.
Kya zunzrru ne mbe he e̱ nyi nke he nzhi lu aha yiriywé̱, ne ngu bra nyi ya brra yankya ne nje i ning tu rici nwie nying.
Me̱di a zhe ne Pita ngu ya be a Antakyia, nje ki ti brru ngu we gbeng a nyyi ngu, aha ko i nyi kya ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱.
A ce̱ucwung, a i shi ye yâ ngbe ne nné nzhwe ngwie̱, me̱di a zhe ne nné ne Yakubu ngu we te mbe ya wre̱, ngu a yaa ti ka aha ngu to owu nné mbiye ne mbe ce̱ he se ré ca ko nye̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó.
Kpi re-gimbe ne mbe nyi nné Yahudi e̱ á ne̱ ne la nci mbe ma, he̱rri á ci Barrnaba a ne̱ ne brra zhwe onu ana ma.

Me̱di a zhe ne nje ri ne ko mbe shi cwo tsantsa ne raywrra Nka Rina we̱, nje e̱ he ne Pita a nyyi mbe zhwozhwo he, “Ngwe̱ ne̱ ngwe̱ nyi nne Yahudi, me̱di ge̱nce̱ ngwe̱ shi nwie srra shi ngwe̱ nyi nne nzhwe ngwie̱; ma a zhe ne ne̱ ngwe̱ bra ce̱ ning brru ngwe̱ ci nné nzhwe ngwie̱ e̱ ne ce he ré zhwe re-teede nné Yahudi e̱e̱?”
“Nzhi ne nzhi nyi bî Yahudi e̱ ko nzhi nyi ‘Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱’ we̱,

nzhi hu re̱se̱ng he ko nyi zhwe Nti Nka mbe ci nneywi re shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱, me̱di nyi sa rie a Jesu Krristi. Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nzhi e̱ nzhi sa rie a Krristi Jesu, aha ngbe nzhi shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ne sa rie a yarri Krristi, me̱di ko nyi aha zhwe Nti Nka we̱. Aha kundu ngu nyi we aha zhwe Nti Nka, ko bi nne re shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Ma kundu nzhi kre he ré níng ci nzhi shi tsantsa a yarri Krristi ne e bra timi nzhi nyi ‘nné e̱ngwie̱’ we nci nzhi, ma aa ci shi Krristi e̱ kre he ré nyi e̱ngwie̱ e̱e̱? Ko tsie̱tsie̱ ko shi ni we̱!
“Kundu nje bra ning brru ne̱ ne no ankya mbiye ne nje i gywi
Aha a nhwie̱ Nti Nka, nje i hwie̱ kweng a nwie Nti Nka, aha ngbe n srra we aha Be̱ne̱. Á ning ci gasankwe ngbe ne Krristi,
ko bra nyi nje ne nje shi nce ne̱ wo, nyi Krristi ngu srrá a yarri nje. Srra ne nje srra a ikpe rwe̱ a zhe ne ne̱, nje srra ne sa rie a Kowe Be̱ne̱, ne ngu ning ce̱ he̱rri ngu ngwa rici ngu aha nje.
Ko nje ra ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ we̱. Kundu nneywi i ra hung bi redziee a zhwe Nti Nka, maahu ko Krristi e̱ a hu we shweni wo oo?”
Kyei, nyi nné Galati ma! Ko nyi hwie nka we̱ e̱e̱? Á níng nyi rikye̱ rikye̱ gung aa? We ncwe riyii nyi á níng ti Jesu ne ngu hu a gasankwe!
Nje ce̱ níng rin we kya zunzrru: nyi she Nshe Be̱ne̱ e̱ aha ne nyi zhwe Nti Nka Musa ka aha ne nyi ning sa rie a kya ne nyi ho aa?
Á nyi ne̱ nyi nyí riywe̱ hwie nka ni e̱e̱? Nyi i ce̱ ne igbe̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱, a zhe ne ne̱ nyi hwie he nyi shi hung frong rina ne igbe̱ nci nyi e̱e̱?
Ga re-nzhwe cinci ne nyi shwe ana á ci we shweni e̱e̱? He̱rri a shi ci ni e̱ cence ee!
He̱rri Be̱ne̱ i ning ngwa Nshe ngu, á bra níng nyi re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu a aha ne nyi zhwe Nti Nka Musa aa, ka aha ne nyi sa rie a kya ne nyi ho aa?
Nyi lu ne Ibrrahin ne ngu i shî nka Be̱ne̱. “Aha sa rie ngu, Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki se̱ he nyi nne redziee.”
Aha nii, nyi hu re̱se̱ng he te̱nte̱ rewe Ibrrahin e̱ á nyi nné mbiye ne mbe bi sa rie.
Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ i ti he Be̱ne̱ ri ci Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ré ci nné redziee aha sa rie mbe a ngu. Aa ke̱she ngwa Ibrrahin Nka Rina he, “Aha ngwe̱, Be̱ne̱ ri ngwa nneywí a re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo rinang.”
Aha ni nné mbiye ne mbe bi sa rie e̱ á bi mwo rina shi shi Ibrrahin ne ngu i bi sa rie.
Ga nné mbiye ne mbe yo we nkang zhwe Nti Nka Musa, á shi ci shweni. Aha á wie he, “Ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu zhwe ko nda ne e wie a yarri krre̱de̱ Nti Nka Musa zhwozhwo we̱, we̱ shi ci shweni.”
A shi we gbeng he ko shi nneywi re hung hwie̱ nne redziee a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha zhwe Nti Nka we̱, aha krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he, “Nne redziee e̱ shi she drre̱ aha sa rie ngu.”
Nyi nda rishwe Nti Nka ngbe ne sa rie e̱e̱? Me̱di krre̱de̱ e̱ he, “Nne nkiye ne ngu zhwe ko nda ne e wie a yarri Nti Nka, we̱ she drre̱.”
Nzhi ra ci shweni a nkang zhwe Nti Nka, me̱di Krristi i ngwa rici ngu aha ngu ci shweni ngbe ngu níng se̱ kishi nzhi ri ci shweni, shi ne e wie he, “Nne nke ne e ki ria zekwe, aa ci shweni.”
Aa níng se̱ aha mwo rina ne i ci Ibrrahinng re be nwie nné nzhwe ngwie̱ aha Krristi Jesu, aha ngbe nzhi she Nshe Wiri ne i níng sa jee a yarri sa rie nzhi.
Re-gimbe, nde n ning mwa yi ne yankya ne nyi hu ho: kundu nné wehwie mbe yaa sa jee he̱rri mbe ning kpra va gbengbe mbe, ko bra bi ya mbe re ning bra yankya a zeteng ka re ti yankya a tsing we̱.

Be̱ne̱ i sa Ibrrahin re-jee ngbe ne zhwe ngu. Ko krre̱de̱ e̱ he “ngbe ne nzhwe ngwe̱” we̱, ne ngu ra shi shi a he ne nné piriri, me̱di a he “ngbe ne zhwe ngwe̱”, woto nyi we nne zunzrru, nyi ngu ngu nyi Krristi.

Cwu nka nje e̱ nyi nke, jee ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i nyi ne Ibrrahin ne ngu rwe he re shi ni e̱, ko shi Nti Nka Musa ne i wru mi re-rie nnywa weni ne nshwa wetsie̱ a merin re ki rwi be he̱rri re ci jee ana re ci shweni we̱.
Kundu ne e ra ma kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i níng ngwa a nyi aha zhwe Nti Nka, ma mpe̱ni jee ngu a a nyi nda aa? Me̱di kya ne Be̱ne̱ i ngwa Ibrrahin e̱ i nyi aha jee ne ngu ki sang.
Ma ngu kwili Nti Nka Musa i nyi nda aa? Á i ning brang a zete jee aha ngbe ré hu kya ne ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱, ré ning nyi cwuo mi he̱rri re be zheng be zhwe Ibrrahin
Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri re bi nne yo zetsi a jee nné wehwie, me̱di Be̱ne̱ shi zunzrru

Aha ni ma Nti Nka Musa a ce̱trri re-jee Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱? Ko shi ni wo ko tsie̱ tsie̱! Aha kundu ne e ra ma ne e ngwa ya Riti Nka ne ngu shi hung ngwa nneywí ce, maahu aa ra ci nneywí ré hwie̱ nné redziee a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he ko nye̱ a be ngwie̱ shi a tahwie ringgwe̱ e̱ngwie̱; aha ngbe jee ne i sa aha nné sa rie a Jesu Krristi re hwie̱ na nné mbiye ne mbe ce̱ nka.
A zhe ne ko sa rie e̱ be we̱, nzhi i shi shi nné gyiaa ne e níng hwie̱n a yarri Nti Nka, se zhe ne e ya níng ti sa rie.
Aha ni nzhi i shi tahwie ringgwe̱ Nti Nka Musa aha re níng kwa re be a zheng be Krristi, aha ngbe ré ya níng ci nzhi hwie̱ nné redziee a yarri sa rie.
Wire a zhe ne ne̱ ne zheng sa rie e̱ ngu be, ko nzhi bra shi tahwie Nti Nka Musa a wa wo.
Ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi hwie̱ rewe Be̱ne̱ aha ne nyi bi sa rie a Krristi Jesu.
Re̱se̱ nyi zhwozhwo ne e níng nyi batisma a yarri Krristi, nyi yaa ku ne e̱kpe̱e̱ Krristi.
Ko bra bi nka he nne nke nyi nne Yahudi, nne ngwi ncwi nyi nne Heleni
Kundu nyi nyí na Krristi, maahu nyi nyí nzhwe Ibrrahin, nyi bra shi ye gado ye̱ye̱rri ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i níng sa jee.
Kya ne nje ning shi nka a nyi nke: e̱we̱we ne ngu cwo a ye gado be̱ ngu a ko shi ka ne hwie we̱, ko ngbe ne ga re-ankya be̱ ngu a zhwozhwo nyi na ngu.
Me̱di a shi tahwie nné ne mbe ki bro ngbe nné ci nkwile̱ ne ankya nna he̱rri re be a zhe ne be̱ ngu a ngu sa.
A shi we ni ne nzhi ma, nzhi i nyi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne nzhi i shi tahwie ringgwe̱ ankya na ebe ngwie̱.
Me̱di ne zhe ngu ya cwu ye̱ye̱rri, Be̱ne̱ e̱ te Kowe ngu, ne mbrru etsi i bî, aa zhwe Nti Nka nné Yahudi,
aha ngbe re kyia nné mbe ne mbe shi tahwie Nti Nka, aha ngbe nzhi hwie̱ rewe Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di tu ne nyi nyí rewe ngu, Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci Nshe Kowe ngu re srra a yarri ronu rie nzhi, ne ngu níng cí nzhi kyie̱ he, “Abba,
Aha nii, ko nyi bra nyí hwié wa we̱, me̱di nyi nyí rewe. Ma kundu ne nyi nyí rewe ngu, Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ci nyi hwie̱ nné ye gado ngu.
Me̱di a zhe ne ko nyi i hu Be̱ne̱ we̱, nyi i nyi hwié yá re-ankya ne ko mbe bi e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ gung we̱.

Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ ne nyi hu Be̱ne̱ e̱ fa — ka n he, ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ ngu níng hu — rimi ne nyi bra ce̱ ning brru re nzhi tahwie ringgwe̱ re-ankya na ebe ngwie̱ e̱ ye̱? Re-ankya ana á shi brrubrru, á bra bi naana. Nyi bra ce̱ ning brru nyi hwie̱ hwié mbe te̱nte̱ wa ye̱?
Nyi cwó re-teede na rotu, ngbe nyhwe̱, ngbe re-zhe, ngbe re-rie gbagba gbagba.
Nje bē we yang aha nyi. Kyet! He̱rri a nyi we cinci shweni ne nje shwe aha nyi e̱e̱?
Re-gimbe, a nka Nti Nka Musa ana nje cwe nva ne nyi he nyi ci shi nje, aha nje i ci shi nyi ma. Ko nyi sa ning nyi yankya me̱nkye̱ we̱.
Nyi hu re̱se̱ng he a nyi riywe̱ gbingbi ngu i ning ci ne nje ya níng brro Nka Rina a ce̱ucwung.
Ko ngbe ne riywe̱ gbingbi nje e̱ i nyi mwa ri re be nwie nyi, gbengbe ni ko nyi ning dzie̱ ka nyi ning ra we̱, me̱di nyi ning se̱ shi shi nyi ya njeli Be̱ne̱ ka Krristi Jesu we rici ngu.
Rekwi ne nyi i nyi a zhe ana shi he? Nje hu cence he a zhe ana ko ngbe ncwe yi nyi kundu nyi i ra hung trrung nyi ning ngwa, nyi i ra trru.
Ma a zhe ne ne̱ nje bra hwie̱ rwinko nyi, aha ne nje níng ti nka raywrra aa?
Nné mbiye ana
Ee, a we̱ bi rina ngbe ré bi ngwa rici ni e̱, kundu kwiling nna nyi rinang, re bra shi ni ko zohu zhe, ko se we zhe ne nje i shi ngbe ne nyi we̱.
E̱we̱e̱ rewe nje, a zhe ne ne̱ nje bra shi cinci rwe̱ wie te̱nte̱ wa aha nyi shi shi mbrru bî ewe se Krristi ri ci riti a yarri nyi.
Kyet! Shi shi nje ra shi ngbe ne nyi a zhe ne ne̱, wire nje ra níng he nka ne̱ ne yaka cwue, aha nje bē we yang aha nyi.
Nyi ning ting, nyi ne nyi ce̱ shi a tahwie Nti Nka Musa a, ko nyi ho kya ne Nti Nka a he we̱ e̱e̱?
Aha á wie he Ibrrahin i bi rewerento wehwie, ya ne hwie, ya ne mbrru ngu ne ko nyi hwie we̱.
Ewe ngu na ne hwie ngu i bî e̱, á ki bî we shi ne ning bî rewe; me̱di ewe ngu na cwu mbrru ngu ngu bî e̱ á ki bî ye̱ye̱rri ne jee Be̱ne̱.
Re-ankya mbiye ana nje ce̱ ning mwa yi mi: mbrrú ne̱ á shi shi re-jee wehwie. Ya jee nna i wru a Brra Ngbra Sine,
Ngu Hajarra a yo a nu Brra Ngbra Sine ne ngu shi ngwie̱ Arrabiya, ne ngu shi shi ne ngwie̱ Urrushelima na zhe ne, aha ngu ngbe rewe ngu zhwozhwo á nyi hwié.
Me̱di ngu Urrushelima nke ne ngu nyi na zinye̱ e̱ ko nyi hwie we̱, a a nyi ngu ngu nyi de̱ nzhi;
aha á wie he,
“Nyi rekwi, ngwe̱ mbrru riywe̱ se̱ ehwie,
ne ko ngwe̱ bî rewe we̱;
kyie̱ onu nwie hrru ne ehwie kla,
ngwe̱ ne ko ngwe̱ ree ho rwe̱ wieng bî ewe we̱!
Rewe mbrru ne nto ngu ki we hwerri e̱ á shi piriri
re ne̱ na mbrru ne ngu bi nto.”
Aha ni nyi re-gimbe nje, nzhi nyi rewe Be̱ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne jee ngu shi shi Ishaku
A zhe ana ewe ne i bî we shi ne e ning bî rewe e̱ i ngwa na ne i bî ne igbe̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱ e̱ ge̱zhe̱; a bra shi we ni he̱rri ne cwu.
Ma Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he rimi? A he, “Yu mbrru nke ne ngu nyi hwie ana ngbe ne ewe ngu a, aha ko shi ré kye ewe mbrru ne ngu nyi hwie gado ngbe ne ewe cwu mbrru nne we̱.”
Aha ni, re-gimbe, ko nzhi nyi rewe mbrru ne ngu nyi hwie we̱, nzhi nyi rewe cwu mbrru.
Krristi e̱ níng trru a ringgwe̱ Nti Nka aha ngbe nzhi srra dengge! Aha nii, nyi yo gbe̱ngbe̱, shi de̱ nyi yaa we nyi bra hwie̱ hwié wa wo.
Nyi ri! Nje Bulu a nje níng ting he kundu nyi ri we he ré níng ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó, maahu ko Krristi e̱ bi mpe̱ni nwie nyi we̱ ko tsie̱tsie̱.
Nje bra níng ting wa he ko nye̱ ne ngu ngwa rici ngu a nkang ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó, maahu se ngu zhwe Nti Nka Musa zhwozhwo.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu kre he ngu hwie̱ nne redziee a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha zhwe Nti Nka, mahu aa yaa ka ka ne Krristi, aa bra teme ngwa ehwie rina Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di nzhi e̱ nzhi te we te ne sa rie he Be̱ne̱ shi níng ci nzhi hwie̱ nné redziee; ne igbe̱ Nshe ngu ne ngu níng sheng a yarri ce̱ nka.
Aha a yarri Krristi Jesu, nkang ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó ngbe riywe̱ cang nna koó shi nu yankya we̱. Me̱di kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri e̱ nyi sa rie a Krristi ne ngu níng ci nzhi yaa ce̱.
Nyi i shi nwie to ncii e̱ rina rina! Ma bra nyi nye̱ ngu ning ci nggrriisi a zhwe nka raywrra a wa? Rimi ne ngu níng zhwe̱ rehwie ni e̱e̱?
Zhwe zhwe̱ ehwie nke ana koo wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ye e̱ we̱.
Nje he ka e̱we̱ ntsi yisti tsie̱nzhwu cí ngba cwu brredi re hru ye̱ e̱e̱!
Nje níng hu wiriri he nyi shi yarri Brrabe̱, ko shi nyi fo ya hwie nka ne ngu shi ka we̱. Me̱di nne nke ne ngu shi cwu re-hwie nka nyi, ko ngu ra bra nyi nye̱, a shi shwe cinci a nva Be̱ne̱.

Re-gimbe, kundu ne nje ra ke̱ ne brro nkang ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó, wé̱ ce̱ rimi ré ke̱ ne ning ngwa ge̱zhe̱ e̱e̱? Kundu nje ra nyi ni, maahu ko brro nka nje aha gasankwe Krristi e̱ ra hwie̱ kyang grre̱ a nwie ya nne we̱.
Shi shi nné mbe ne mbe níng zhwe̱ he se nyi ca re-ikpe ntó ana ré wara ni he̱rri ré hwie̱ re-gbaru!

Re-gimbe, nyi e̱ á i níng ye aha nyi she srra srra nci nyi. Me̱di shi de̱ srra srra nci nyi e̱ re bra níng hwie̱ kwiling ne̱ ne nyi re-cwuo na ikpe rwe̱ we̱, me̱di re ci nyi yaa ce̱ nyi bra yaa sheng aha ni.
Aha, ga Nti Nka á mwe zhwozhwo á he we kya zunzrru, he, “Ce̱ nne dudu ne ngwe̱ shi rici ngwe̱.”
Me̱di kundu nyi ti ko a nci nyi nwie yaa srra hlahla hlahla, nyi nyí te̱nte̱ de̱e̱ ni wo, nyi e̱ yaa ci nyi ci shweni.
Me̱di nje he, nde Nshe Be̱ne̱ re cwo ne nyi, ngbe ko nyi e̱ zhwe re-ankya ecwue na ikpe rwe̱ we̱.

Aha kya ne ikpe rwe̱ ce̱ e̱ a shi ka ne kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ ce̱, kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ e̱ ce̱ a shi ka ne na ikpe rwe̱ ma. Mbe wehwie ne̱ á yaa ce̱trri; kya a nyi ngwiee ko shi ngwe̱ hung nyi kya ne ngwe̱ ce̱ nying we̱.
Me̱di kundu ngu nyi Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu cwo ne nyi, mahu ko shi nyi shi tahwie Nti Nka Musa we̱.
Re-cwuo na ikpe rwe̱ e̱ á shi we gbeng; a bi nyi njè, ngbe nyi ankya le̱le̱, ngbe nyi kyang nshwu;
ngbe ye kpanshwu mbè, ngbe nyi ankya rekpree, ngbe yaa ra, ngbe srra re ti ko, ngbe riyii ankya nné, ngbe ehwie dzio, ngbe ce̱ hwie̱ nne ncwuee a ko nda, ngbe yaa ti ka, ngbe yaa kye a rekpri rekpri,

ngbe riyii, ngbe shwe kya ne ngu shi re ci zhing, ngbe parang shwe ankyang dzio nci, he̱rri ngbe yá zhwe re-ankya ne̱. Nje ke̱nce̱ níng gara nka shi ne nje i ke̱she he, he nné ne mbe nyi zhwe re-ankya ana, koó ri ye gado ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.

Me̱di ankya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ ci nneywí ré nyi e̱ bi yaa ce̱, ngbe srra ne rekwi, ngbe srra rina, ngbe ehwie sheng, ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ng she nneywíng, ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ rina, ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ng ci nneywí ré hung sa rie a nne,
ngbe nywe̱ rici, ngbe he̱ling yaa rwe. Ko bi ré nyi nné bi zhwe re̱kpe̱e̱ ne̱ nka we̱.
Nné mbe ne mbe nyi na Krristi Jesu, á rwi e̱kpe̱e̱ na ikpe rwe̱ e̱ be he̱rri ngbe ne ecwue ngu ngbe ne re-ankya ce̱ ngu.
Tu ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ngwa ce, ma nde Nshe Be̱ne̱ re cwo ne nzhi a yarri srra nzhi.
Shi de̱ nzhi yaa kywo we dede, ka nzhi yaa dzio rehwie, ka nzhi bi riyii ankya yaka ya nne a nci nzhi we̱.

Re-gimbe, kundu ne e she ya nyi shi nyi e̱ngwie̱, nyi ne Nshe Wiri shi yarri nyi e̱ nyi ci ngu nne ana a rê ne ehwie sheng; me̱di ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ shi ki ci rê e̱, nyi te̱nte̱ ne rici ngwe̱, kishi ngwe̱ ri ngwie mwa ri ma.
Nyi yaa sheng a yarri re-cinci nyi, kundu nyi nyí ni wire nyi e̱ zhwe Nti Nka Krristi ye̱ye̱rri.
Aha nne nkiye ne ngu yaa kywo he ngu be nne, ne ko ngu bra be ko yankya we̱, a yaa brra we rici ngu.
Ko nye̱ re mwa re-ankya ngu ne ngu nyi re di ka á bi rina aa! Wire re hung cwe zewe he ngu be nne, we̱sa ne mwa rici ngu ne yaka nne.
Aha aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ko nye̱ re fo nkpe na rici ngu.
Ngu nne nke ne e ki mie̱ nka, nde re nyi nne nkiye ne ngu ki mie̱ng yankya rina.
Shi de̱ ré ning brra we̱, koó shwe̱li Be̱ne̱ we̱. Aha ko nda ne nneywi ngu kye̱, a ri ca ngge ngu.

Nne nke ne ngu nyi ankyang ho shwing na ikpe rwe̱, we shi nne kaa ne ngu ca yâ ngu, a ri ca we̱ she we ge̱zhe̱ ngbe hu; me̱di nne nkiye ma ne ngu nyí ankya ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nshe Wiri ki mie̱ng, a yarri Nshe Wiri a ri e̱ she ce na he̱rri tiya.
Shi de̱ nzhi rrwa nwie nyi ankya rina we̱; aha zhe cwo be ne nzhi cwo a she rinang, kundu de̱ nzhi ri hwrra a rê we̱.
Aha nii, ko zohu zhe ne nzhi she riwie̱, nzhi nyi kya rina re be nwie ko nye̱, shi shi re ngra nyi re-gimbe nyi nné ce̱ nka.
Nné mbiye ne mbe níng nyie̱ ne ce a nkang ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó ana á ce̱ we he mbe ti he mbe be nné. Á nyi ni e̱ nyi aha ne mbe to shi á ri we ngwa ge̱zhe̱ aha brro nka gasankwe Krristi.
Ko ngbe mbe ne mbe ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó ana koó zhwé Nti Nka Musa a we̱, gbengbe ni, á ce̱ he nyi e̱ nyi ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó a aha ngbe mbe she kyang cwe zewe a rici nyi he nyi mbe ne mbe níng ci nyi ca.
Me̱di nje e̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱ ko shi n cwe zewe we̱, se ka aha gasankwe Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi. Aha hu ngu, ebe ngwie̱ e̱ hwie̱ kweng a nwie nje, nje bra hwie̱ kweng a nwie ebe ngwie̱ ma.
Nkang ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó ngbe riywe̱ cang koó shi nu yankya we̱, ngba cwu kya a nyi nke he Be̱ne̱ re ci nneywi re ci hwing.
Nde srra rina ngbe naana Be̱ne̱ re be nwie ga nné ne mbe zhwé nka ne̱ zhwozhwo — nné mbiye ne mbe nyi te̱nte̱ Isrreela na Be̱ne̱.
A ngrangrang, shi de̱ ya nne re ning ci ya cinci wa we̱, aha nje e̱ nje bi ngbé̱ Jesu a rwe̱ nje
Re-gimbe, nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe ne nyi zhwozhwo. A shi ni.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Bulu ne ngu nyi nnente Krristi Jesu aha kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ nzhi ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe nyi, ngbe nyi bra she srra rina.
Nde nzhi de Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi! Aha ne ngu níng mwo rina we yang ne ga re-nzhwe mwo rina na Nshe Wiri a ringgwe̱ zinye̱ re be nwie nzhi aha ne nzhi shi yarri Krristi.

Gannyi tiya tiya ne e rishi nyi ebe ngwie̱, Be̱ne̱ i ke̱nce̱ níng kyie ngbe nzhi hwie̱ na ngu, aha ngbe nzhi shi yarri Krristi, ngbe nzhi srra wiri we̱sa ne ya vini a nyyi ngu. Aha ce̱ ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ce̱,
a i ke̱nce̱ rweng he ngbe ngu ya níng ko he nzhi hwie̱ rewe ngu aha kya ne Jesu Krristi ngu nyi ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ ngu ne ngu ki klá ehwie.
Nde nzhi de Be̱ne̱ aha grime̱ ehwie rina ngu, ne ngu níng ngwa we shweni aha Kowe ce̱ ngu.
A yarri ngu, nzhi she drre̱ aha roshwo ngu, nzhi she á níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi; aha rigwe̱ ehwie rina Be̱ne̱
ne ngu zhwo we zhwo re be nwie nzhi, aa níng ngwa a yarri zentsi ngu ngbe hu re̱se̱ng ngu.
He̱rri aa níng ci nzhi hu kya ce̱ ngu ne ngu shi la la ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu ki klá ehwie shi ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ rweng, ngbe Krristi e̱ ya ci re ci ni,
ne zhe ri he ngu ya ci ye̱ye̱rri, ngbe Be̱ne̱ we̱ mwe we̱ be ne ko nda a zinye̱ ngbe a be ngwie̱ a tahwie ringgwe̱ Krristi.

Be̱ne̱ i ke̱nce̱ níng kyie ngbe nzhi hwie̱ na ngu shi ne ngu níng ci nzhi shi yarri Krristi, a i ke̱nce̱ rweng ni ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu ce̱ nying. Aa nyi ko nda ni ngbe re shi ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu hwie nying ne ngu nyi kya ce̱ ngu.
Aa nyi ni aha ngbe nzhi ne nzhi i ke̱she sa riyii a Krristi e̱ nzhi srra re de grime̱ Be̱ne̱!

Nyi e̱ ma, á a ya be ne nyi a yarri Krristi a zhe ne nyi i ho nka raywrra ne ngu nyi Nka Rina ne ngu níng be ne she kyia. A zhe ne nyi i sa rie a Krristi, á a níng ngwa Nshe Wiri ne i níng sa jee. Nshe Wiri e̱ shi shi nyi ce̱e̱le̱ ne ngu tí he nyi nyi na Be̱ne̱.
A nyi sheede he cence nzhi ri she kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning sa nné ngu jee, aha ni nzhi e̱ hung hung cence he nzhi ne nzhi nyi na Be̱ne̱ e̱ nzhi ri she drre̱, aha ngbe nzhi srra re de grime̱ ngu.
A nyi aha ni ne tu nje i ho aha sa rie nyi a yarri Brrabe̱ Jesu ngbe ce̱ ne nyi ce̱ nné Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo,
ko nje kpo ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha nyi we̱. Nje lú aha nyi a yarri ku Be̱ne̱
nwie cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi, Be̱ bi grime̱, re níng ngwa Nshe Wiri ne ngu shi níng ngwa zentsi, re bra níng ti Be̱ne̱, aha ngbe nyi ning bra ki hu.
Nje ku he re tsie̱ nse̱ ngu a yarri ronu rie nyi aha ngbe nyi hu kya ne ngu níng ye he nzhi sa riyii a zeteng, ne ngu nyi re-mwo rina bi grime̱ we yang ne ngu ning sa nné ngu jee;
ngbe nyi bra hu zhwe grime̱ igbe̱ ngu, ne ko bi ré ning mwa yi we̱, ne ngu níng shéng nzhi ne nzhi sa rie a ngu. A nyi brra igbe̱ ngu ne̱ ne ngu nyi igbe̱ nke
ne ngu i ning deze Krristi nhu ngu ki ngwa ewieng srra a nwie ringgwe̱ a nva nyye ngu a zinye̱.

Krristi e̱ yé ringgwe̱ gbo miimi a zete ko zohu ringgwe̱, ngbe de̱me̱ ringgwe̱, ngbe igbe̱ na ringgwe̱, ngbe na kwa yincwuee. A bi lo na ngu né̱ ko zohu lo ringgwe̱ ne e hung cing ka re nyi a zhe ne ne̱ ka zhe ne ngu cwo be.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci ko nda tahwie Krristi, aa ki ci re hwie̱ rici ko nda aha ekpri nné ce̱ nka,
ngu ekpri nné ce̱ nka a nyi rwe̱ Krristi, ne Krristi e̱ shi yarri ngu zhwozhwo, we shi ne ngu shî ko he ne igbe̱ ngu.
A zhe gbangba, a i shi shi nyi nyi nkweng a nka ankya na Be̱ne̱ aha riywe̱ zhwe rê Be̱ne̱ ngbe re-e̱ngwie̱ ne nyi i nyi.
A zhe ana nyi i nyi ankya me̱nkye̱ shi nné tsi ngwie̱; nyi i zhwe nggwe̱ rewiencí zeteng, ne ngu nyi rewienci na ne ngu shi ncwuo yarri ronu rie nné mbe ne mbe ra zhwe nka Be̱ne̱.

Ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi i shi ni ma, nzhi i srra re zhwe ankya ecwue na ikpe rwe̱, nwie nyi we re-ankya na ne re-rwe̱ nzhi ngbe rehwie nzhi ce̱ he nzhi nyi. A yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ na nneywi ne nzhi i ning shi, á i ma ne nzhi tsio we ge̱zhe̱ nyi nka Be̱ne̱.
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ ne naana ngu ngu zhwo we zhwo, ngbe ce̱ ngu re be nwie nzhi ne ngu shi we yang,
a zhe ne nzhi i shi shi nzhi nyi nkweng aha riywe̱ zhwe nka Be̱ne̱, aa ning brru ne nzhi re be nce gbengbe ne Krristi. A nyi aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne á níng kyia.
Aa níng deze nce ngbe ne Krristi, aa bra níng ngwa ewieng srra na ringgwe̱ ngbe ne ngu a ngwie̱ zinye̱ aha ne nzhi shi yarri Krristi Jesu.

A i nyi ni aha re nzhi re-zhe ne mbe cwo be, ngu níng ti grime̱ ehwie rina ngu ne ko bi kya re ning mwa yi mi we̱, shi ne ngu níng ting a kya rina ne ngu nyi re be nwie nzhi ne nzhi shi yarri Krristi Jesu.
A nyi aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne á níng kyia, ne sa rie nyi. Ko nyi aha koori rici nyi we̱, a nyi kya na na Be̱ne̱.
Ko nyi aha cwuo ne nyi nyi we̱, kishi ya ri ne̱ ne ning cwe zewe.
Aha nzhi nyi cwuong va Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng nyi hwing a yarri Krristi Jesu aha nzhi nyi re-cwuo rina, ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ rweng ngu sa sa he ngbe nzhi nyi.

Aha nii, nyi lu he nné Yahudi ne mbe yaa ye he “nné ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó” a á i srra re níng ye nyi ne nyi nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ a ikpe rwe̱ e̱ he “nné tsi ngwie̱ riywe̱ ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó” — ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó ne ngu nyi we kya ne nneywí mbe yaa nying a ikpe rwe̱ e̱e̱?

Nyi lu he a zhe ana ko nyi i shi ngbe ne Krristi we̱. Ko nyi i shi tsi nné Isrreela ne Be̱ne̱ ngu kyie we̱, nyi i nyi nné ice ne jee Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne re-ankya ne ngu ning sa nné ngu jee. Ko nyi i bi sa riyiing she yankya we̱, ko nyi i hu Be̱ne̱ we̱ a be ngwie̱ ne̱.
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ nyi shi yarri Krristi Jesu; nyi ne nyi i shi ze̱nze̱ á be mi ne nyi dudu aha roshwo Krristi.
Krristi we rici ngu níng be mi ne srra rina, aa ci nné Yahudi ngbe Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ré ci zunzrru. Aa ci kya ne ngu i níng be ne srra kanka ngbe yaa ra ci shweni.
Aa rwi Nti Nka nné Yahudi be — Nti Nka ne mbe tí re-ankya na mbe mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré nyi ngbe na ré zhwe. Aa nyi ni aha ngu wru mi ne zhwe nné zunzrru a tsi nzhwe nné wehwie
Aa mwe ning brru mi ne nzhwe nné wehwie ne̱ gbengbe re be nwie Be̱ne̱ ne hu ngu a gasankwe, he̱rri aa yhwe̱ yaa ra ne ngu i shi yarri mbe.
Aha ni Krristi e̱ i be ya níng brro Nka Rina, aha nyi ne nyi i shi ze̱nze̱ ne Be̱ne̱ nyi she srra rina, ga ngbe nné mbe ne mbe i shi dudu ma ré she srra rina.
A nyi aha Krristi ne ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi she riwie̱ re nzhi nwie Be̱, aha nyi we ngu Nshe Be̱ne̱ zunzrru a ngu shi yarri nzhi zhwozhwo.
Aha ni, nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ko nyi bra nyi nné ice wa wo, ko nyi shi ci wa we̱! Me̱di nyi nyi nné ngwie̱ Be̱ne̱ nyi bra nyi nné ngu, nyi nyi nné ri Be̱ne̱.
Nyi she riti a zete nnenté ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ng ne Krristi Jesu we rici ngu nyi cwucwu zahwan na riti runo nna.
A nyi ngu Krristi ngu ci runo nna zhwozhwo ngu yo gbe̱ngbe̱ nwie cwo we ne ning bra ci brrang he̱rri nzhi hwie̱ brranyi wiri Brrabe̱.
A bra nyi a yarri ngu ne nyi e̱ ma á cwo we ne níng no gbengbe ngbe nyi hwie̱ ewieng srra Be̱ne̱ ne Nshe ngu ning srrá.
A nyi aha ni ne nje Bulu a nje hwie̱ nne gyiaa na Krristi Jesu aha nyi Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱.
Cence nyi ho he Be̱ne̱ a yarri ehwie rina ngu a ning ngwa cwuo ne̱ aha nyi.
Be̱ne̱ i ning ci nje hu kya ne ngu rwe nying ne ngu shi la la, shi ne nje i níng wieng tsie̱,
ne kundu nyi hwie, nyi e̱ hung she zhwe hu re̱se̱ng ne nje bi na ankya la la Krristi.
Nné tiya a koó i we ti kya la la ne̱ we̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, Be̱ne̱ ne Nshe Wiri ngu a ti nnenté wiri ngung ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ nka ngu ne mbe shi wiri.

Kya la la nna nyi nke he aha Nka Rina, Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ e̱ á ri mwe ré she re-mwo rina ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning sa nné Isrreela jee; á mwe á ci rwe̱ zunzrru, á bra ri mwe ré she kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning sa jee a yarri Krristi Jesu.
Nje hwie̱ nnencwuo brro Nka Rina ne̱ aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi kya na na re be nwie nje, ne ngu nyi cwuo igbe̱ ngu.

Nje ne nje re̱ kaka a tsi ga nné Be̱ne̱, gbengbe ni Be̱ne̱ ning ngwa rinang we yang, ne ngu nyi cwuong brro Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ Nka Rina na rigwe̱ ankya rina ne ko bi ré ning mwa yi we̱ ne nzhi she a yarri Krristi,
ngbe n bra ci ga nné zhwozhwo ré hu zhwe rê ne Be̱ne̱ shi ning nyi kya la la ne ngu i rwe sa. A nyi ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi ga ankya zhwozhwo ngu nyi ne sang a la la gannyi gbangba,
aha ngbe a zhe ne ne̱ ekpri nné ce̱ nka ré ci re-ringgwe̱ zinye̱ ngbe brrá ankya bi de̱me̱ ringgwe̱ zinye̱ ré hu re-nzhwe zentsi Be̱ne̱.
Be̱ne̱ nyi ni ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu rwe nying gannyi tiya tiya ne ngu ya fro a Krristi Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi.
Ngbe a yarri Krristi ngbe aha sa rie nzhi a Krristi, nzhi she riwie̱ng be nyyi Be̱ne̱ we dengge we̱sa ne owu.
Aha nii, nje cwe nva ne nyi he shi de̱ re níng cie̱ rwe̱ aha re-cinci ne nje shi shweng aha nyi we̱; a nyi kya rina a nwie nyi.
Aha ni nje hu be ne cwuhu a nyyi Be̱
ne ko zohu kya bi ce a zinye̱ ngbe a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ning she riti ngu.
Nje cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ he a yarri rigwe̱ grime̱ ngu re níng ngwa igbe̱ ne Nshe Wiri ngu, ngbe nyi ci igbe̱ a yarri rehwie nyi,
he ngbe Krristi re srra a yarri rehwie nyi aha sa rie nyi. Nje bra ku Be̱ne̱ he nyi ci riti nyi yo gbe̱ngbe̱ nwie yaa ce̱,
aha ngbe ga nyi ngbe ga nné Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo nyi she igbe̱ ngbe nyi hung hu re̱se̱ terere ngbe je̱je̱ ngbe gbong ngbe cwuncwuu ce̱ Krristi;
he ngbe nyi hu re̱se̱ zhwe ce̱ ngu — ne ko bi ré hung hung zhwozhwo we̱ — ngbe e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱ shi yarri nyi zhwozhwo.
Re nzhi nwie ngu ngwiee ne ngu bi igbe̱ng nying he̱rri re wara kya ne nzhi ki rinng, ka kya ne nzhi ning hwie yi, ye̱ye̱rri ne igbe̱ ngu ne ngu shi ncwuo yarri nzhi,
nde re nyi grime̱ a yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka ngu, ngbe a yarri Krristi Jesu a ga re-zhe zhwozhwo he̱rri tiya tiya! Nde re shi ni.
Aha nii, nje nne gyiaa aha Brrabe̱ e̱ nje cwe nva ne nyi he nyi srra zhwe srra na ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne ye ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i níng ye.
Ko zohu zhe nyi bi nywe̱ rici, nyi bi ehwie ranng, nyi bi ehwie sheng. Nyi yaa srra gbagba a nci nyi nwie yaa ce̱.
Nyi tu rici nwie mwe rici gbengbe shi ne Nshe Wiri níng mwe; nyi ci zunzrru nwie srra rina.
Nzhi nyi rwe̱ zunzrru, nzhi bra bi we Nshe Wiri zunzrru, we shi ne nyi we kya zunzrru ne nzhi ning sa riyii, ne nyi aha ni ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ye.
Nzhi bi we Brrabe̱ zunzrru, nzhi sa rie we kya zunzrru, batisma nzhi bra nyi we zunzrru.
Nzhi bi we Be̱ne̱ zunzrru ne ngu nyi Be̱ ko nye̱, ne ngu nyi Brrabe̱ ko nye̱, ne ngu nyi cwuo yarri ko nye̱, ne ngu bra shi yarri ko nye̱.
Á bra ngwa ko nye̱ a tsi nzhi beewa ye̱ye̱rri shi ne Krristi ngu níng kyeng.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he:
“A zhe ne ngu ngra gbong a zeteng,
aa kwa hwié ne ngu prre;
aa ngwa nneywí re-beewa kanka kanka.”
A zhe ne ne̱, nka he “aa ngra zeteng nna” nyi nda? A tí he a i ke̱she wro re be be ngwie̱ he, gbong rewie yarri be.
Aha ni, ngu ne ngu i wro re be be e̱ nyi we ngu ne ngu i ngra re nzhi zeteng wa, re nzhi gbong yarri yarri re-zinye̱, aha ngbe ngu shî zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo.
A a nyi ngu ne ngu ngwa yá re-beewa ré hwie̱ nnenté, yá ré hwie̱ nné ti re̱se̱ng, yá ré hwie̱ nné brro nka rina, yá ré hwie̱ nné cwo rekpri nné ce̱ nka ngbe nné mie̱ nka,
aha ngbe ngu ci nné Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo ré hwie̱ nnencwuó nyi kya ne Krristi ce̱ ré nyi, aha ngbe ré ci ekpri ne ngu nyi rwe̱ Krristi re ning bra ci brrang.

Ngbe ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi e̱ mwe gbengbe nzhi ci zunzrru a yarri sa rie ngbe hu re̱se̱ng na Kowe Be̱ne̱, nzhi ci brráng ngbe nzhi e̱ ya cwu we cwu ye̱ye̱rri shi ne e̱kpe̱e̱ Krristi zhwozhwo shi yarri nzhi.

Wire ko nzhi e̱ shi shi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ka nzhi shi shi konkro ne gu rishi ngbe wu gye̱ ne ngu we̱, ko shi nné rabrra ré níng brra ne ko zohu zhwe mie̱ nka ne mbe cí yá ré brru rê ne re-zentsi ngbe rabrra mbe we̱.
Me̱di a yarri he nka raywrra ne yaa ce̱, nzhi e̱ ci brráng a yarri ko nda re nzhi cwu tsantsa ne e̱kpe̱e̱ Krristi, ne ngu nyi ricing.
A ngu, ga rekpri rwe̱ nna zhwozhwo á mwe á yaa bro gbengbe ne ko zohu reci rwe̱ nna shi ncwuo ngu, á mwe zhwozhwo nwie ci brráng a yarri yaa ce̱ shi ne ko zohu ekpri rwe̱ nna shi ncwuo na ngu.
Aha ni a yarri lo Brrabe̱, nje he ne nyi nje bra níng shwe̱ rehwie he shi de̱ nyi ke̱ we ne srra shi nyi nyi nné tsi ngwie̱ ne re-hwie nka mbe nyi we shwening we̱.
Ronu rie mbe e̱ á shi we e̱ ywing ne riywe̱ hung. Á wi ce ne Be̱ne̱ ngwá, aha zhwe riywe̱ hung ne ngu shi mbe ngbe klo nci mbe.
Koó bra bi nshwu gung we̱ ko tsie̱; á ngwa nci mbe nwie nyi ga re-nzhwe ankya le̱le̱ ngbe ko zohu zhwe le̱le̱ njè re kre he mbe ke̱ we ne ning bra nying.
Ko nyi kya ne nyi mie̱ nwie Krristi nke ana we̱!
Cence nyi i ho nka ngu, á bra i níng mie̱ng ne nyi shi yarri ngu ye̱ye̱rri ne raywrra ne ngu shi yarri Jesu.
Aha ni nyi trru re̱kpe̱e̱ reni nyi ne mbe níng ci nyi srra shi shi nyi i ning shi gbangba — re̱kpe̱e̱ ne mbe i níng dzio aha ecwueng nyi re-ankya ne mbe i níng ci nyi brru rê.
Nde re-hwie nka a ronu rie nyi ré ci hwihwíng,
ngbe nyi bra ci re̱kpe̱e̱ hwi na ne i nyi a shî Be̱ne̱, ngbe ré ri te̱nte̱ redziee ngbe srra wiri a yarri srra nyi.
Aha ni nyi we ni he rabrra, nyi ri ma yaa he nka raywrra, aha ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi nyi rekpri na rwe̱ zunzrru.
Kundu ngwe̱ dzio ehwie, shi de̱ re re ci ngwe̱ nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱: shi de̱ ngwe̱ ke̱ we ne bro rimwi he̱rri ne̱ re ya kpe be we̱.
Shi de̱ nyi ngwa Shetani riwie̱ we̱.
Nne nke ne ngu nyí nca, shi de̱ re bra nyi nca wa we̱, me̱di re nyi cwuo, re nyi yankya ne va ngu aha re she kya ne ngu shi ning she yiriywé̱ng.

Shi de̱ ya nka ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni re wru a nu nyi we̱; kundu nyi shi he nka, nde re nyi nka ne ngu shi she ya nneng shi kya ne ngu ki mwa ye̱ye̱rri, aha ngbe kya ne nyi he e̱ re bi mpe̱ni a nwie nné hong.
Shi de̱ nyi dzio Nshe Wiri Be̱ne̱ ehwie we̱, a nyi ngu ngu nyi ce̱e̱le̱ a yarri nyi ne ngu ri ti he nyi nyi na Be̱ne̱ a Tu Krrucing.
Nyi we ni ehwie shwo, ngbe ehwie dzio, ngbe ren. Nyi we ni ti ko, ngbe yaa cwi, ngbe ko zohu zhwe ngwie̱ngwie̱.
Me̱di nyi yaa nyi rina nwie yaa nyi gbagba. Nyi ri ma yaa we e̱ngwie̱ shi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi ma aha Krristi.
Aha ni tu ne nyi nyi rewe ce̱ Be̱ne̱, nyi ki mie̱ ngu.
Nyi srra nwie yaa ce̱ shi Jesu ne ngu níng ce̱ he̱rri ngu ngwa ce ngu ngbe re hwie̱ teede bi shwe̱ rina a nwie Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi.
Tu ne nyi nyi nné Be̱ne̱, koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré she he a tsi nyi e̱ nyi bra nyi njè, ka ya zhwe le̱le̱ njè, ka nyi bi riyii we̱.
Ga ngbe ya nka riywe̱ nshwu, ka ya nka shweni ne riywe̱ rici shi de̱ re wru a nu nyi we̱. Me̱di nyi srra re ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng.

Nyi hu cence he a shi ni, he ko bi nne nyi njè, ka yankya le̱le̱, ka bi riyii (aha bi riyii e̱ nyi ye kpanshwu mbè), ko bi ko ya mbe ngu ri she yankya a ringgwe̱ Krristi ngbe Be̱ne̱ we̱ ko tsie̱nzhwu.
Shi de̱ ya nne re níng brra ne nka shweni we̱, a nyi aha zhwe re-ankya ne̱ ne ren Be̱ne̱ cwo be a rici nné mbe ne mbe ra ki ho nka.
Aha ni shi de̱ nyi mwe rici ngbe zhwe nné ana we̱.
Aha nyi i shi nwie ywing, me̱di nyi shi nwie si a zhe ne ne̱, ne nyi shi yarri Brrabe̱; aha ni nyi srra shi shi nné ne mbe shi nwie si.
Aha kundu ne nyi shi nwie si, nyi e̱ nyi ankya rina, nyi e̱ bi redziee, ngbe raywrra,
nyi e̱ bra mie̱ nyi kya ne ngu kla Brrabe̱ ehwie.
Shi de̱ re ning bi va nyi a re-cwuo shweni na ewie ywing we̱, me̱di nyi we kla we gbeng.
(Ré he we kya ne nné ra ho nka mbe nyi a la la ma, a nyi kya nshwu.)
Me̱di ko nda ne e ki kla a nwie si e̱, wé̱ ki ri krrankrra.
Aha ko nda ne e ki kla gbeng, we̱ tsie̱ nse̱. Kya a nyi ngwiee ne e he;
“Deze, ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ shi ndzie,
ngwe̱ bra deze nwie hu,
ngbe Krristi re tsie̱ nse̱ a ngwe̱.”
Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne zhwe srra ne nyi srra, shi de̱ nyi shi shi nné riywe̱ zentsi we̱, me̱di nyi shi shi nné bi zentsi.
Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ mpe̱ni ne ko zohu riwie̱ ne nyi she, aha a nyi rotu hwie̱.
Aha ni shi de̱ nyi ti mwa we̱, me̱di nyi hu kya ce̱ Brrabe̱.
Shi de̱ nyi dzio nci nwie shwe ankya ne mbe shi níng ci nyi ci shweni we̱; me̱di nyi shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri,
nwie yaa he nka a yarri nti nka re-ve krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe re-veng de Jesu, ngbe re-ve ne Nshe Wiri níng ngwa. Nyi ve re-nzhwe ve nwie de Brrabe̱ a yarri ronu rie nyi,
nwie ci Be̱ne̱ Be̱ kijie̱ng aha ko nda a yarri lo Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi.
Nyi srra re yaa ho nka aha ne nyi to owu Krristi.
Mbrrú, nyi ho nka ntó nyi shi nyi Brrabe̱ ne nyi ki hong.
Aha nto a nyi rici mbrru ngu, we shi Krristi ne ngu nyi rici ekpri nné ce̱ nka, ne ngu nyi rwe̱ ngu, a bra nyi Nnenkyia mbe.
We shi ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka ngwa rici ngu nwie Krristi, ko zohu mbrru nyrra re ngwa nto ngu rici ngu a yarri ko nda.
Ntó, nyi ce̱ mbrrú nyi we shi ne Krristi ngu ce̱ ekpri nné ce̱ nka he̱rri ngu ngwa rici ngu aha ngu
he ngbe ngu ki ci re hwie̱ na Be̱ne̱ ne nka ngu, a zhe ne ngu ki kyu wiriri ne rishi,
aha ekpri nné ce̱ nka ngbe rina ngu zhwozhwo re hwie̱ na ngu, ne ngu shi wiriri we̱sa ne ya ngbe̱ ka roru ka yankya ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni, me̱di ne ngu shi wiriri we̱sa ne ya vini.
Nde ko zohu nto re ce̱ mbrru ngu we shi ne ngu ce̱ rwe̱ na ngu. Nne nke ne ngu ce̱ mbrru ngu mahu a cé̱ rici ngu.
(Wire re bra ning hwie̱ ma ko ya nne sa ra rwe̱ ngu we̱, me̱di a ci nkwile̱ ne rwe̱ ngu nwie ki ngwa yâ, we shi ne Krristi ngu nyí ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka —
aha nzhi e̱ nzhi nyi rekpri rwe̱ ngu.)
“Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nne nto wé be̱ ngu ngbe de̱ ngu, ngbe we̱ mwe ngbe ne mbrru ngu, ngbe mbe wehwie e̱ gbengbe wé̱ ci rwe̱ zunzrru.”
A yarri nka ne̱ a ning bi ya ngba yankya ne ngu shi la la, me̱di nje hwie he a hé nka ne Krristi ngbe ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka ngu.
Me̱di a bra hé nka ne nyi wa, ko zohu nto re ce̱ mbrru ngu shi rici ngu, mbrru a ma re ho nto ngu nka.
E̱we̱e̱ rewe, nyi ho nka nné ne mbe níng bî aha Brrabe̱, kya ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi nyi e̱ nyi ngwiee.
“Ngwa be̱ ngwe̱ ngbe de̱ ngwe̱ grime̱.” Nyi nke ne̱ ngu nyi riti nka na ce̱ucwung ne e ning sa jee —
“aha ngbe ko nda re níng cwo rina rina, ngbe ce nyi we̱ ywa gbong a be ngwie̱.”
Re-be̱, shi de̱ nyi ci e̱we̱e̱ rewe nyi ré dzio rehwie we̱. Me̱di nyi we kwa nwie we yhwire re we mie̱ nka a rê Brrabe̱.
Hwié, nyi ho re-be̱ri nyi nka, nyi we to nwie we ngwa grime̱; nyi nyi ni ne ehwie zunzrru we shi nyi Krristi ne nyi ki nying.
Shi de̱ nyi we ho nka we zhe ne nyi shi nyyi mbe aha nyi we shwo rehwie we̱, me̱di nyi nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ehwie nyi zhwozhwo shi ne nyi nyi hwié Krristi.
Nyi nyi cwuo nyi e̱ ne ehwie nyi zhwozhwo shi shi nyi Brrabe̱ ne nyi ki nying, shi de̱ re shi shi nyi nneywí nyi we nying we̱.
Nyi lu he Brrabe̱ ri ngwa ko nye̱ lede aha cwuo ne ngu nyí, ka re nyi hwie ka re srra srra rici ngu.
Re-be̱ri, nyi nyi hwié nyi e̱ rina we ni ma, shi de̱ nyi we ngwa owu we̱. Nyi hu re̱se̱ng he ga nyi ngbe mbe zhwozhwo nyi nyi na Brrabe̱ ne ngu shi zinye̱, ko bra kyie nné kyie kyie we̱.
A ngrangrang, nyi ci igbe̱ a yarri Brrabe̱ ngbe a yarri brra igbe̱ ngu.
Nyi yaa sha ne ga ankyang ko na Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo aha ngbe nyi hung yo nyi kwe̱ ne re-zentsi Shetani.
Aha ko nzhi shi nko a ngbe nneywí
Aha ni nyi yaa sha ne ga ankyang ko na Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo, aha kundu ne otu hwie̱ ana ri be, nyi hung yo ne igbe̱, kundu nyi nyi ko nda yhwe̱ aha nyi hung yo.
Aha ni nyi yo gangga; nde raywrra re shi shi ta ne nyi ning rwe ti gangga; redziee re shi shi tagong ku zewe na kprincwe̱.
Nde ngwa rici brro Nka Rina nang srra rina re shi shi tamri ne ngu mwa nta nyi ye̱ye̱rri.
A zete re-nke ne̱ zhwozhwo, nde sa rie nyi re hwie̱ shi kleefi ne nyi shi ning kpo ga rakpang ro Shetani zhwozhwo.
Nde kyia ne e ning kyia re shi shi vo onggo, Nka Be̱ne̱ re bra shi shi ise̱nkeli Nshe Wiri a nva nyi.
Ko zohu zhe nyi srra re ku Be̱ne̱ ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri a yarri ko nda nwie cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ re níng sheng. Aha nii, nyi srrante nwie ku Be̱ne̱ we̱sa ne kpo aha ga nné Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo.
Nyi bra ku Be̱ne̱ aha nje ma, he ko zohu zhe ne nje ri ma nga onu, Be̱ne̱ re ning ngwa kya ne nje shi heng. Aha ngbe n ti re̱se̱ ankya la la na nka rina we dengge.
A nyi aha ni ne nje nyi nnente ko ngbe ne nje shi gyiaa. Nyi ku Be̱ne̱ he n brro nka we̱sa ne owu shi ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri n nyi.
Ngu Tikyiku, gimbe nzhi ne nzhi ki ce̱ ne ngu nyi nnencwuo a yarri Brrabe̱ na ré hung sa rie a ngu, a shi níng ti ko nda, aha ngbe nyi e̱ ma nyi hu ka nje shi rimi ye̱, ngbe kya ne nje shi nying.
A nyi aha ni ne nje ki te ne krre̱de̱ ne̱ re be nwie nyi, aha ngbe nyi hu ka nzhi shi rimi ye̱, ngbe re bra níng shwe̱ rehwie.
Re-gimbe, nde Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re níng ngwa srra rina ngbe yaa ce̱, re bra níng ngwa hung sa rie.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re shi ngbe ga nné ne mbe ce̱ Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi ne zhwe ce̱ ne ko ngu bi yhwe̱ we̱.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Bulu ngbe Timoti, hwié Krristi Jesu, re nzhi nwie ga nné wiri Krristi Jesu a Filibi,
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ nzhi ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe nyi ngbe nyi bra she srra rina.
Nje ci Be̱ne̱ nje kijie̱ng a ko zohu zhe ne nje lu aha nyi.
Nje srra re ku Be̱ne̱ aha nyi ko zohu zhe ne ehwie kla,
aha mwe rici nyi nwie ning sheng a ncwuong brro Nka Rina gannyi tu ce̱ucwung re be cwu zhe ne.
Aha ni nje hu he cence, ngu ne ngu ce̱ cwuo te̱nte̱ng a yarri nyi e̱, a shi nying re nzhi frong a Tu ne Jesu Krristi ri be.

A shi ye̱ye̱rr ne nje srra re hwie nka ni aha ga nyi zhwozhwo, aha ko zohu zhe, nyi shi yarri hwie nje. Aha ne nyi srra re mwe rici ngbe nje a yarri ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi zete nje a zhe ne nje shi gyiaa ngbe zhe ne nje yo nwie kye̱ kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri ne Nka Rina re brrong.
Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu hu he nje níng ce̱ zhwozhwo nyi we yang ne zhwe ce̱ na Krristi Jesu.
Nje bra ku Be̱ne̱ he ce̱ ne nyi yaa ce̱ e̱ re ning brang brang a yarri te̱nte̱ hu re̱se̱ng ngbe ko zohu zentsing hu kya ngu shi tsantsa,
aha ngbe nyi hung kyie kya ne ngu nyi te̱nte̱ng; wire nyi e̱ shi wiriri we̱sa ne ya vini he̱rri Tu ne Krristi ri ning be.
Wire a yarri srra nyi wa, nyi e̱ srra re nyi re-cwuo redziee na ne ngu wru nwie Jesu Krristi, ne ngu ci nneywí ré ngwa Be̱ne̱ grime̱ re ki de.
A zhe ne ne̱ re-gimbe, nje ce̱ nyi hu he kya ne ngu ning she e̱ ci ni aha ngbe Nka Rina re ning ywa ncwuee.
A nyi aha ni ne ga re-shezhi cwo eri nggwe̱ ngbe kpi nné a he ne̱ mbe hu he nje shi a uucwu gyiaa ne̱ aha Krristi.
Aha gyiaa ne nje ning shi ne̱ e̱ ning bra shwé̱ jie̱ re-gimbe a yarri Brrabe̱ e̱ rehwie ngbe ré ning bra ti nka Be̱ne̱ we gbeng we̱sa ne owu.
Ee, a shi ni cence, yá brro nka Krristi ne̱ ne ehwie shwo ngbe kwe̱ ruhu, me̱di yá brro ne te̱nte̱ ehwie rina.
Mbe ne̱ a brro nka ni aha ne mbe ning ce̱, aha ne mbe hu he nje nywe̱ a he ne̱ aha cwuong kye̱ Nka Rina.
Me̱di re-mbe ana á brro nka Krristi e̱ ne ce̱ rici, ko nyi a yarri raywrra we̱; á kre he mbe ning bra shwu ewie aha ngbe n ning bra shwe ge̱zhe̱ a gyiaa.
Wire a bra nyi nda wa! Ngba cwu kya ngu ning shi e̱ nyi nke he: ka aa ra nyi yarri ehwie me̱nkye̱ ka te̱nte̱ ehwie rina, á shi nwie brro nka Krristi. Aha ni a ning bi ehwie kla.
Ee, nje shi ke̱ ne nyi rekwi,
aha nje hu he aha re-ku Be̱ne̱ ne nyi shi kung ngbe Nshe Jesu Krristi ne ngu shi nwie ning sheng, kya ne ngu ning she ne̱ shi bra re hwie̱ riwie̱ng she drre̱ nje.

Ngba cwu kya ne nje kre ne nje bra ning sa riyii e̱ nyi nke he: ko nje bi shwe nshwu aha riywe̱ nyi cwuo Brrabe̱ we̱, me̱di he ko zohu zhe, shi ngra nyi a zhe ne ne̱ we̱, nje bi rwe rie we yang, aha ngbe n ngwa Krristi grime̱ ne rwe̱ nje zhwozhwo, ka n shi nce ka n bra hu.
Aha a nwie nje, kundu nje shi nce, we̱ nyi aha Krristi; nje ri bra hu, we̱ ning bi rina kaka.
Me̱di kundu srra nce nje e̱ shi ning ngwa de̱me̱ n ke̱ nyi re-cwuo rina, mahu ko nje hu ka n kyie zohu we̱.
Wehwie ne̱ á ning kye a zetsi: nje ce̱ he nje ra we ngwie̱ ne̱ re nzhi srra ngbe Krristi, ne ngu ning ne̱ ko nda we gbong;
me̱di a bra nyi canca n shi nce a ikpe rwe̱ ne̱ aha nyi.
Nje bra hu cence he shi ni, aha ni nje shi ning shi ngbe nyi zhwozhwo aha ngbe nyi ke̱ ne ning bra bi rehwie kla a yarri sa rie nyi,
aha ngbe ning brru nje re be nwie nyi e̱ we̱ ning bra níng hwie̱ kyang cwe zewe a yarri Krristi Jesu aha kya ngu ning nying.

Ngba cwu kya nna nyi nke he: a yarri srra nyi, nde re̱kpe̱e̱ nyi ré cwo ye̱ye̱rri ne Nka Rina Krristi. Aha ngbe ka n hung be n ya níng ri, ka de̱ n hung be we̱, a riywe̱ be nje e̱ n ho he nyi yo gangga ne ehwie zunzrru gbengbe nyi, nwie kwe̱ aha Nka Rina ne nzhi ning sa rie.
Shi de̱ nyi ci owu rwinkó we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱. Ngbe we̱ hwie̱ sheede a nwie mbe he á shi ci shweni, me̱di nyi e̱, Be̱ne̱ shi níng kyia.
Aha nyi e̱, ehwie rina ngu re be nwie nyi e̱ ko nyi we na nyi ning sa rie a Krristi we̱, me̱di ngbe na nyi ning shwe cinci aha ngu.
Aha nyi shi we ge̱zhe̱ shi ne nyi ri a nwie nje, ne nyi bra ho he nje shi mi we ni he̱rri ne cwu.
Kundu srra nyi a yarri Krristi e̱ ning bra níng shwe̱ rehwie, kundu ce̱ ngu a níng krrú rehwie, kundu nyi bi mwe rici a yarri Nshe Wiri, kundu ngu bi yaa ce̱ ngbe naana a yarri nyi,
ma nyi ci kya zunzrru ngbe nyi ning bra ning kla ehwie e̱ yang, nyi yaa ce̱ we te̱nte̱ ce̱ nwie yaa shî nka a yarri rehwie nyi.
Shi de̱ nyi nyi yankya ne ce̱ rici ka ne kywo rici ze we̱, me̱di nyi yaa ci re̱; ko nye̱ re ri kpi nné e̱ shi á ki ne̱.
Shi de̱ ya a tsi nyi re kre we kya ce̱ na rici ngu we̱, me̱di re ci nkwile̱ ne kya ce̱ kpi nné.
Nde hwie nka nyi re shi shi na Krristi:
Ne a shî ngu, a nyi Be̱ne̱,
me̱di koo fo shi ye̱ye̱rri ne Be̱ne̱
re ki hwie̱ kya ngu ning ria we̱,
me̱di aa yaa ci hwie̱ hwerri,
aa fo shî na hwie,
á ki bî a e̱kpe̱e̱ na rwe̱ nneywi.
A yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ na rwe̱ nneywi e̱,
aa yaa ci re̱ nwie ho nka
he̱rri re nzhi cwu nwie hu —
he̱rri hu na a zete gasankwe!
Aha ni Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki fo ze re nzhi
brra ewie na ngu ne̱ zhwozhwo gbong zeteng,
aa ki ngwa lo
aha ngbe kundu ne e tsie lo Jesu
ko nye̱ a zinye̱ ngbe a be ngwie̱
ngbe a tahwie ebe ngwie̱
re hu be ne ruhuu,
ngbe ko nye̱ re bra ti we gbeng
he Jesu Krristi nyi Brrabe̱,
nwie ngwa Be̱ne̱ Be̱ grime̱.

Aha ni, nné ce̱ nje, we shi ne nyi nyi ne ning ho nka, ko se we nyyi nje we̱, a bi rina nyi ke̱ we ne ning ho nka a zhe ne ne̱ ne nje shi ze̱nze̱ ne nyi. A zhe ne ne̱ ne nyi she kyia a, nyi ke̱ we ne nyi re-cwuo rina ne owu Be̱ne̱ ngbe ngwa rici,
aha nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu shi ncwuo a yarri rehwie nyi, ne ngu níng cí nyi shî ngbe nyi bra hung nyi kya ce̱ ngu.
Nyi nyi ko nda we̱sa ne krro nka ngbe yaa kwa be,

aha nyi srra we̱sa ne ya vini, nyi shi wiriri shi rewe Be̱ne̱. Shi de̱ nyi bi ya ngbe̱ na e̱ngwie̱ we̱, nyi tsie̱ nse̱ a yarri ebe ngwie̱ shi shi re̱nde̱ zinye̱. Aha ebe ngwie̱ e̱ shî ne nné hwie̱ ngbe nné hwie nka e̱ngwie̱.
Nyi we brro nkang she ce, aha ngbe nje ri she kyang cwe zewe a Tung be Krristi he ko nje i to ncii nje e̱ ngbe re-cwuo ne nje i nyi e̱ we shweni we̱.
Ee, sa rie nyi ngbe re-cwuo nyi e̱ á ning shi shi ya teede a nwie nje, ko ngbe ne nyi roshwo nje ne e shi ning wang a zeteng, ehwie nje we̱ kla, ma n nyi rekwi ngbe ne nyi zhwozhwo.
Nyi e̱ ma nyi bi rehwie kla, nyi bra nyi rekwi ngbe nje.
Nje sa riyii a Brrabe̱ Jesu he nje shi wre̱ ne te Timoti nwie nyi we hwiehwie, aha kundu nje ri ho re̱se̱ srra nyi e̱ we̱ ning bra ning shwe̱ ehwie.
Aha ko nje bi ko ya nne ne ngu srra re bē we yang aha nyi shi ngu we̱.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo á kre we ankya nci mbe, koó ci nkwile̱ ne na Jesu Krristi we̱.
Me̱di nyi e̱ nyi hu zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ rina Timoti, nyi hu he we shi ewe ngbe be̱ ngu, aa ngwa rici ncwuong brro Nka Rina ngbe nje.
Aha nii, nje sa riyii he nje shi ki te we hwiehwie we zhe ne nje ri hu kya ngu shi ci ne nje.
Nje e̱ ma nje bi sa rie he kundu Brrabe̱ ri shî, nje we rici nje e̱ nje cwo be we hwiehwie.
Nje bra hwie he aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe n te gimbe nje Epafrroditu, ne ngu nyi rwincwuo, ngu bra nyi ya shezhi a ncwuo, ngu bra nyi nnente nyi, ne nyi i ki te aha re ya ci nkwile̱ ne nje.
A kú ucwua nyi we yang, a bra bē we yang aha ne nyi i ho riywe̱ gbingbi ngu.
Cence, aa nyi rwe̱, he̱rri aa srra hu. Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ri naana ngu, ko ngu nggaa ngu we̱ he̱rri ngbe nje, de̱e̱ ni we̱ ehwie dzio nje e̱ ra zhwo we zhwo.
Kya a nyi ngwiee nje nyi we te̱te̱ he n ki te re be nwie nyi, aha kundu nyi ri ki ri wa, rehwie nyi wé̱ kla, ngbe ma n she cwu ma.
Nyi ki se̱ ne rekwi a yarri Brrabe̱, nyi ci zhwe nné shi ngu ana grime̱,
aha aa srra ning hu a ncwuo Krristi, aa rie̱ ce ngu aha ngu ning sheng a nu ne nyi ra ning sheng kundu nyi ra shi he.
A ngrangrang, re-gimbe nje, nyi nyi rekwi aha nyi shi yarri Brrabe̱. Ko wie re-nka ne̱ te̱nte̱ e̱ ning rru we̱, aha a nyi kya rina a nwie nyi.
Nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne nné nyi re-cwuo e̱ngwie̱ ana, á shi shi rovu; nyi nyi te̱nte̱ ne nné yo we nkang ca ikpe rwe̱ ana.
A nyi nzhi ne nzhi nyi re-te̱nte̱ nné Be̱ne̱, nzhi ne nzhi ye Be̱ne̱ mbè a yarri Nshe Wiri, ne nzhi nyi rekwi aha nzhi shi yarri Krristi Jesu, ko nzhi cwe zewe aha ca ikpe rwe̱ we̱.
