Me̱di nje we rici nje e̱ ma n hung cwe zewe aha zhwe ankya mbiye ana ma. Kundu ya nne hwie he ngu bi kyang cwe zewe na ikpe rwe̱, nje bi re ki ne̱.
Á i ning cie̱ ikpe rwe̱ ntó a tu na klanva, nje nyi nne Isrreela, nje nyi nne nkla Benjemi, nje nyi nne Ibrrani tsantsa. A bra ri nyi nkang zhwe Nti Nka Be̱ne̱, nje nyi nne Farisi.
A nkang ngwa rici ncwuo, nje i ngwa ekpri nné ce̱ nka ge̱zhe̱. A nka he nje bi redziee aha zhwe Nti Nka Be̱ne̱, koó sa ning she ne ya ywe̱ we̱.
Me̱di ga re-ankya ne nje i nyi re ning hwie yi he á shi ning ngwa kya ne nje kre e̱, a zhe ne ne̱ nje we di á nyi we ankya shweni aha Krristi.

Ee, aa wara ni, nje hwie he ga re-ankya ana zhwozhwo á nyi we ankya shweni aha kya ne ngu ning bi mpe̱ni re drre̱ e̱ nyi brra hu re̱se̱ng he Jesu Krristi nyi Brrabe̱ nje. A nyi aha ngu ne nje ci ga ankya mbiye ana mbe ci shweni. Nje we ri á nyi we ankya le̱le̱, aha ngbe Krristi re hwie̱ na nje,

ngbe n hwie̱ na ngu ma. A zhe ne ne̱ ko nje bra bi redziee na rici nje wa we̱ — redziee na ne e shé a zhwe Nti Nka. Me̱di nje bi redziee na ne e ngwá aha sa rie a yarri Krristi, ne ngu nyi redziee na ngu wrú a nwie Be̱ne̱ re be nwie nné ne mbe sa rie a Krristi.
Ngba kya ce̱ nje e̱ nyi nke: he n ning bra hu Krristi, ngbe igbe̱ ngu ne ngu ning deze nhu, ngbe n mwe rici ngbe ngu a yarri re-ge̱zhe̱ ngu, ngbe n ci shi ngu a yarri hu ngu,
ne sa riyii he nje ri ya she deze nhu re nzhi nce.
Ko nje he nje pie kya ne nje kre e̱ we̱, ko nje bra a ya cwu nwie ne nje hwie ya ning cwu a we̱. Me̱di nje ning brá nyia ta he ka n pie kya nna, aha Krristi Jesu ning ci nje hwie̱ na ngu.
Re-gimbe, ko nje hwie he nje pie kya nna we̱. Me̱di kya zunzrru ne nje nyi e̱ nyi nke: nje ning ci ga bru ne ko nda ngu wara, nje e̱ nyia ta be aha ankya na mbe shi ncwuee.
Aha ni nje to tsantsa aha n she lede ye ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ye re nzhi zinye̱ a yarri Krristi Jesu.
Aha ni ga nzhi ne nzhi ci brráng a yarri Brrabe̱, nde hwie nka nzhi re shi zunzrru. Me̱di kundu nyi ri bi re-hwie nka kanka, Be̱ne̱ ri níng ci nyi ning bra she hu re̱se̱ng.
Me̱di ngba cwu kya nna nyi nke he, ewie ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ya cwu ne nzhi, nzhi zhwe we ye̱ye̱rri ni.
Re-gimbe, nyi ci onu zrru nwie mie̱ ne nje; nyi ci riyii nyi ri nné mbe ne srra mbe shi shi kya ne nzhi i níng mie̱ng.
Aha we shi ne nje i srra re níng ting, ne he̱rri ne cwu nje níng ting ne reyii, nné piriri srra shi shi mbe nyi rwinkó kya ne Krristi ngu nyi gasankwe.
Gama mbe nyi ci shweni, be̱ne̱ mbe nyi kya ne rehwie mbe ce̱. Á cwé zewe we̱sa nshwu, hwie nka mbe e̱ bra shi we ankya ngwie̱.
Me̱di nzhi e̱ nzhi nyi nné na zinye̱, nzhi bra srra re té Nnenkyia nzhi ne ngu shi wru miimi, nyi ngu Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi.
A nyi brra igbe̱ ngu ne ngu ning cí ko nda tahwie ringgwe̱ ngu. Nyi we ne igbe̱ ngu ne̱ ne ngu cwo a bra re-rwe̱ brrubrru nzhi ne mbe wré ne̱, ngbe ré ci shi shi rwe̱ grime̱ na ngu.
Aha ni re-gimbe nje, nyi ne nje níng cé̱ ne nje bra kú ucwua nyi, nyi ning ngwá ehwie kla, nje bra cwé zewe ne nyi. Nyi brrá rwí nje, nyi yo gangga ni a yarri Brrabe̱.
Nje cwe nva ne mbrrú wehwie ne̱, Yudiya ngbe Sintikyi, he ré bi onu zunzrru shi re-gimbe a yarri Brrabe̱.

Ee, nje bra cwe nva ne ngwe̱, brra rwincwuo ne ngwe̱ bi raywrra a ncwuo, she mbrrú ne̱ng ngbe ré srra rina. Á i yaa ta ncwuo nwie brro Nka Rina ngbe nje ngbe ne Klementi he̱rri ngbe kpi rwincwuó zhwozhwo, ne re-lo mbe shi yarri krre̱de̱ nce.
Nyi nyi rekwi a yarri Brrabe̱ ko zohu zhe. Nje ning bra he wa he nyi nyi rekwi!
Nde rehwie sheng nyi ré shi gbeng a nyyi nné zhwozhwo. Brrabe̱ sa dudu ne be.
Shi de̱ nyi bē aha yankya we̱, me̱di nde a yarri ko nda nyi ti Be̱ne̱ kya nyi ce̱ a yarri ku Be̱ne̱ nwie cwe nva ne ngu re ki ci kijie̱ng.
Wire Be̱ne̱ we̱ níng ngwa srra rina na ngu wara ga re-hu re̱se̱ng na nneywí zhwozhwo, ngbe we̱ cwo ronu rie nyi ngbe rehwie nka nyi a yarri mwe rici nyi ngbe Krristi Jesu.

A ngrangrang re-gimbe, nde nyi sa hwie nka nyi e̱ a zete ko nda ne ngu nyi na raywrra, ngbe ko nda ne ngu be ré ki ngwa grime̱, ngbe ko nda ne ngu shi tsantsa, ngbe ko nda ne ngu shi wiri, ngbe ko nda ne ngu bi rina, ngbe ko nda ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri, ngbe ka re nyi nda ne ngu nyi kya na e̱kpe̱e̱ rina ngbe ko nda ne e hu ning de nneywi.
Ko nda ne nyi mie̱ nwie nje, ka ne nyi she nwie nje, ka ne nyi ho nwie nje, ka ne nyi ri nwie nje, nyi ning tu rici nwie nying. Ngbe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ngwá srra rina we̱ shi ngbe nyi.
Nje nyi rekwi we yang ne Brrabe̱ aha a ngrangrang nyi e̱ cinga ne ci nkwile̱ ne nje. Ko nje he nyi i we ni we̱, nje hu he ko nyi i she riwie̱ we̱.
Aawo, ko nje he he nje shi riywe̱ we̱, aha nje mie̱ yaa rwe ne ehwie kla a yarri ko nda ne nje ning she rici nje.

Nje hu kya ne e ki ye he riywe̱ e̱, nje bra hu kya ne e ki ye he rishwe e̱ wa. Nje mie̱ re-rêng srra: ka n shi rishwe, ka n shi nzhwo, ka n bi piriri ka de̱ n bra bi ko yankya we̱, ka re nyi he a ko zohu zhe n hu yaa rwe.
Nje hung nyi ko nda aha Krristi ning ngwá igbe̱ng nying.
Gbengbe ni, nyi i nyi ye̱ye̱rri ne nyi ning sheng a zhe ne nje shi ge̱zhe̱.
We̱sa ni, nyi nné Filibi e̱ nyi hu he a rotu ce̱ucwung ne nje i wru Makyidoniya nwie brro Nka Rina, ko bi ya ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe i ning citi a nkang ngwang ngbe se̱ng we̱, se we nyi.
Ko ngbe zhe ne nje i shi Tasalonika ne nje ya hwie̱ ne nva hwerri, nyi yaa ta we ta we ta nwie ning te mi ne ankya.
Ko nyi we aha nje kre he ré ning na nje e̱ yankya we̱, me̱di nje kré he lede ne nyi e̱ nyi shi sheng re ning brang brang.

Á ning ngwa kya nyi te mi e̱ zhwozhwo, aa bra ning be kpe̱kpe̱. Nje bi ko nda a zhe ne ne̱ ne Epafrroditu ngu ning be mi ne re-ankya nyi te mi e̱. Á shi shi nyi kya bi shwe̱ rina ne e ngwa Be̱ne̱, kya rina na ne ngu ki kla ehwie.
Be̱ne̱ nje e̱ shi níng ngwa ko nda ne nyi ce̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne rigwe̱ re-mwo rina bi grime̱ ngu aha nyi shi yarri Krristi Jesu.
Nde ga nné zhwozhwo ré ngwa Be̱ne̱ nzhi ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi e̱ grime̱ he̱rri tiya tiya. Nde re shi ni.
Nyi ning dzie ga nné wiri Krristi Jesu zhwozhwo. Re-gimbe ne mbe shi ngbe nje e̱ á níng dzie ma.
Ga nné wiri Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo níng dzie, shi ngra nyi nné mbiye ne mbe nyi nné ri Brra Nggwe̱ Rroma we̱.
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe nyi. Nde re shi ni.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Bulu, ne ngu nyi nnente Krristi Jesu ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe gimbe nzhi Timoti.
Nzhi wie re nzhi nwie nné wiri Be̱ne̱ ne mbe shi Kolosi, mbe ne mbe sa rie a ngu a yarri Krristi.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ nzhi ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe nyi, re bra níng ngwa srra rina.
Nzhi srra re ci Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi kijie̱ng, a ko zohu zhe ne nzhi ku Be̱ne̱ aha nyi.
Aha nzhi i ho sa rie nyi a yarri Krristi Jesu ngbe zhwe ce̱ ne nyi cé̱ nné wiri Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo.
Sa rie nyi ngbe ce̱ ne nyi ce̱ nné wiri Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi ni aha ne nyi i ho nka raywrra, ne ngu nyi Nka Rina, nyi e̱ sa riyii a zete ankya na ne e níng sang a zinye̱

a zhe ne Nka Rina i be nwie nyi. We ni wa, a nyia re nzhi cwu ko he a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo. A shi nwie ngwa re-mwo rina we shi kya ngu i ci a tsi nyi a zhe ne nyi i ke̱she ho raywrra nka ehwie rina Be̱ne̱.

A shi we shi ne nyi i mie̱ a nwie Epafrra, ne ngu nyi ya brra rwincwuo nzhi ngbe nne ce̱ nzhi, ne ngu i ke̱she níng be mi ne nka ehwie rina Be̱ne̱. Epafrra a nyi nne ne ngu shi tsantsa, a bra shi ncwuo Krristi nwie nyi ana a nu nzhi.
Nyi ngu ne ngu i níng ti zhwe ce̱ ne nyi ce̱ nné ce̱ nka shi ne Nshe Wiri níng mie̱ng.

Kya a nyi ngwiee ne gannyi ne nzhi i ho nka a rici nyi, ko nzhi sa kpo ku Be̱ne̱ aha nyi we̱. Nzhi cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ he re ci nyi ning bra hu kya ce̱ ngu ne ko zohu zhwe zentsi ngbe hu re̱se̱ng ne Nshe Wiri ngu ngwá.

Wire nyi e̱ hung srra zhwe srra ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri a nwie Brrabe̱, nyi e̱ ki kla ehwie a yarri ko nda ne nyi nyí. Ngbe nyi e̱ srra nwie nyi re-cwuo rina, he̱rri nyi e̱ ning bra ci brráng a yarri hu Be̱ne̱.
Nde nyi ning bra ci igbe̱ nwie yaa rwe ne igbe̱ na ngu wru nwie grime̱ igbe̱ Be̱ne̱; aha ngbe nyi hung ci nkwirin a yarri ko nda ne rekwi.
Nyi srra re ci Be̱ kijie̱ng ne ehwie kla ko zohu zhe, aha nyi ngu ne ngu níng ci nyi she kya ne ngu ning sa nné wiri ngu jee a ringgwe̱ ewie si.
Aha aa níng trru a yarri ringgwe̱ ewie ywing, aa be ne nzhi a ringgwe̱ Kowe ngu ne ngu cé̱.
A nyi aha ngu ne ngu níng ci nzhi she drre̱, ngbe we re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi ne e níng weng.
A nyi Krristi e̱ ngu nyi shî Be̱ne̱ na ne koó ri we̱. Nyi ngu ne ngu nyi ce̱ucwung gannyi ne e rishi nyi ga re-ankya zhwozhwo.

Aha Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi ko nda ne ngu shi zinye̱ ngbe be ngwie̱ ne ngu, ga re-ankya na ne koó rí we̱ ngbe re-na ne e rí zhwozhwo: brrá re-njeli zinye̱, ngbe re-na kwa yincwuee, ngbe re-na ye ringgwe̱, ngbe re-na ne mbe bi de̱me̱ng ye ringgwe̱. Ko nda ne e nyi e̱ á nyi ne ngu, á bra nyi aha ngu.
Krristi e̱ i ning shi we gbangba ne e rishi nyi ga re-ankya zhwozhwo, a bra nyi aha ngu ne ko nda hung yo rina.
A nyi ngu ngu nyi rici rwe̱, rwe̱ nna a nyi ekpri nné ce̱ nka ngu. A nyi ngu ngu nyi riti ko nda, a bra nyi ngu ngu nyi ce̱ucwu deze nhu, aha ngbe ngu a re shi a ncwuee ko nda.
Be̱ne̱ i bi ehwie kla ngbe ngu shi yarri ngu zhwozhwo.

Be̱ne̱ i nyi ni ne Kowe nna aha ngbe ngu ning brru mi ne ko nda re be nwie ngu, ka re nyi kya ne ngu shi be ngwie̱ ka re nyi kya ne ngu shi zinye̱. Be̱ne̱ e̱ be mi ne srra rina ne roshwo Kowe ngu ne e wa a zete gasankwe.
Me̱di nyi e̱, á i ma ne nyi shi ze̱nze̱ ne Be̱ne̱, nyi i nyi rwinkó ngu a yarri rehwie nyi aha re-cwuo e̱ngwie̱ ne nyi i nyi.
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, aa ning brru mi ne nyi re be nwie ngu ne hu Krristi a ikpe rwe̱. Aa níng ci nyi hwie̱ nné wiri a nyyi ngu we̱sa ne ya vini, ka yankya na ré hu níng ci nka.

Me̱di se nyi ke̱ we ne sa rie a ngu, nyi ci riti, nyi yo gangga. Shi de̱ nyi ree shwo nyi we ni sa riyii a kya ne e níng sa jee a Nka Rina ne nyi i ho we̱. A nyi aha Nka Rina ne i brro nka ko he a be ngwie̱ ne̱ ne nje Bulu ne̱ nje hwie̱ nnencwuo brro nka.

A zhe ne ne̱ nje nyi rekwi aha re-cinci ne nje shwe aha nyi, aha nyi ngu cinci ne̱ ne ngu ning ngwá de̱me̱ ngbe n fro kya ne ngu hwie̱ a re-cinci Krristi aha rwe̱ ngu, ne ngu nyi ekpri nné ce̱ nka ngu.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ ning ci nje hwie̱ hwie na ekpri nné ce̱ nka. Aa ning ngwa cwuo ne̱ aha ngbe n níng sheng, n brro nka Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo.
Nka ne nje níng ting ne̱ nyi kya ne ngu shi la la gannyi gbangba tiya tiya, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ Be̱ne̱ ti nné wiri ngung.

Kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu hwie nying nna nyi nke he: ga Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ré hu brra grime̱ kya la la ne̱, ne ngu sa aha nneywí zhwozhwo. Ngu kya nna nyi Krristi ne ngu shi yarri nyi, ne nyi e̱ ma nyi sa riyii he nyi bi srra ngbe ngu a yarri grime̱ ngu.
Kya a nyi ngwiee nzhi brro nka nwie gara nneywí nka re mie̱ ko nye̱ng ne ko zohu zhwe zentsi, aha ngbe nzhi ci ko nye̱ re ci tsantsa a yarri Krristi.
A bra nyi aha ni ne nje zhwé̱ nwie kwe̱ ne igbe̱ nje zhwozhwo — brra igbe̱ ne Krristi ngu ci re nyi cwuo a yarri nje.
Nje ce̱ nyi hu zhwe kwe̱ ne nje kwe̱ aha nyi ngbe nné Lawudikyia, ngbe re̱se̱ kpi nné ne ko mbe sa nyi ngbe nje we̱.
Nje nyí ni aha ngbe n we krru rehwie ngbe ré bra ci kya zunzrru nwie yaa ce̱. Ngbe aha ni wé̱ ning bra shwe rishwe ne hu re̱se̱ng, aha ngbe ré hu kya la la na Be̱ne̱, ne ngu nyi Krristi we rici ngu.
Á sa ga re-aata zentsi ngbe hu re̱se̱ng na Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo a yarri ngu.
Nje níng ti re-nke ne̱ kishi ya nne bi onu ce ri níng brra ne yá re-nka lie̱lie̱lie̱ ne mbe tiyi shi mbe bi rina.
Ko ngbe ne nje shi ze̱nze̱ ne nyi, onu rie nje e̱ shi ngbe ne nyi. A bra ning bi ehwie kla ne nje ho he nyi shi yo gbe̱ngbe̱ nwie srra rina rina a yarri sa rie nyi a Krristi.
Ma aha nii, we shi ne nyi se̱ Krristi Jesu ngu hwie̱ Brrabe̱ nyi, nyi srra we yarri ngu.
Nyi ci riti a yarri ngu, nyi ning bra ci brrang a ngu, ngbe nyi ning bra ci igbe̱ a yarri sa rie nyi, we shi ne i níng mie̱ng. Nyi srra re ki ci kijie̱ng.

Nyi ci nkwile̱ kishi ya nne ri níng kwa shi shi nyi nyi hwié ne re-nka zentsi shweni na ebe ngwie̱ ne riting nyi we zhwe re-teede na nneywí ngbe rewienci ye ringgwe̱ ebe ngwie̱, ne ko mbe wru nwie Krristi we̱.
Nje he ni aha ko nda ne ngu shi yarri Be̱ne̱ i shi yarri Krristi a zhe ne ngu srra a rwe̱ nneywi.
Ngbe nyi e̱ ma, tu ne nyi shi yarri Krristi ne ngu a ngu shi ncwuee ko zohu ringgwe̱ ngbe ko zohu igbe̱, mahu nyi bi ko nda.
A yarri Krristi e̱ á níng trru re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi we shi ne e cie̱ ewe ikpe rwe̱ ntó
Aha a zhe ne i níng nyi batisma, á i níng nyie̱ ngbe ne Krristi, á bra níng deze ngbe ne ngu aha sa rie nyi a igbe̱ Be̱ne̱, ne ngu ki deze nhu.
Nyi i ci shi nyi nyi nkweng a yarri re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi, aha ne nyi bra i nyi nné tsi ngwie̱ a ikpe rwe̱. Me̱di Be̱ne̱ níng deze nce ngbe Krristi. Aa níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi ne nzhi nyi zhwozhwo.
Aa yi sheede ne i wie a zete rici nzhi he ko nzhi zhwé nti nka ne mbe mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi zhwe we̱, ne mbe i níng ka ka ngbe Be̱ne̱; aa fo ne̱ mi zhwozhwo ya rwi a gasankwe.
Aa shwe igbe̱ ga re-ringgwe̱ ngbe ko zohu zhwe igbe̱ na ebe ngwie̱, aa we ci nshwu we gbeng a zhe ne ngu we drre̱ ne gasankwe.
Aha ni shi de̱ nyi sa uucwu ne ya nne ne ngu níng ci nka aha kya nyi yé ka nyi shwe we̱, ka a nka rotu teede, ka na Para Yhwe̱ Hwi, ka na Kotung Srra Cwu we̱.
Ga zhwe ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo á nyi we rowu ankya na ne mbe cwo a ci a ncwuee. A a nyi ngu Krristi ne ngu nyi cwucwu kyang nna.

Shi de̱ nyi sa uucwu ne ya nne ne ngu yaa yhwi nwie nywe̱ rici he ngu yé re-njeli mbè we̱, á cwe zewe he mbe rí yá re-ankya ne e we trrung a zhe revi. Me̱di a nyi we cwuo shweni, aha a nyi we ce̱ rici na hwie nka nneywi.

Mbe ana á nga nva á we Krristi ne ngu nyi rici ekpri nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo. Nné ce̱ nka a zhwozhwo á mwe ngbe ne Krristi shi shi rici ngu mwe ngbe rwe̱ ne re-hwon ngbe ne re-reci. Aha ni rekpri rwe̱ nna á ci brráng ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Be̱ne̱ cé̱ he ré ci.

Me̱di tu ne nyi hu ngbe ne Krristi, mahu ko nyi shi tahwie rewienci ye ringgwe̱ ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ we̱. Ma rimi nyi bra srra shi shi nyi nyi na ngwie̱ wa aa? Rimi nyi bra ke̱ we ne zhwe re-teede ngwie̱ e̱e̱?
Nyi tó re-teede nke ne e he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ re nke we̱! De̱ ngwe̱ ye nke ncwi we̱! De̱ ngwe̱ ning ci va a nke ncwi we̱!”
Ga re-nke ne̱ á nyi we re-teede na nneywí ngbe re-ankya ne mbe mie̱, á he nka we zete ankya na kundu ne e ning nyi cwuo ce zrru wé̱ dzio.

Zhwe re-teede ana á tiyi shi mbe bi rina, aha á ci nné zhweng nna ré nywe̱ rici nwie ye re-njeli mbè, me̱di á a bra ngwa re-rwe̱ mbe ge̱zhe̱, gbengbe ni ko we sheng ngbe ré hung yaa rwe ne ecwue kya ne re-rwe̱ mbe e̱ ce̱ we̱.
Tu ne e níng deze nce ngbe ne Krristi, nyi sa riyii a ankya na zinye̱, a nwie ne Krristi ngu shi ning srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ a nva nyye Be̱ne̱.
Nyi sa hwie nka nyi a ankya na zinye̱, shi de̱ nyi sa hwie nka nyi a ankya na ebe ngwie̱ we̱.
Aha a shi shi nyi ci nkweng, a zhe ne ne̱ re-ce nyi e̱ á shi la la a nwie Krristi a yarri Be̱ne̱.
A nyi Krristi ngu nyi riting ce nyi, á ri he zhe ne ngu ya wre̱, ngbe nyi e̱ ya wre̱ ngbe ne ngu ma a yarri grime̱ ngu.

Aha ni se nyi ci ko nda ne ngu nyi na ecwue ebe ngwie̱ a yarri nyi re ci kweng, shi shi nyi njè, ngbe ko zohu zhwe le̱le̱ njè, ngbe ecwue mbrrú ka ntó, ngbe e̱kpe̱e̱ ngwie̱ngwie̱, ngbe riyii (aha riyii e̱ nyi ye kpanshwu mbè).
Aha zhwe re-ankya ne̱, ren Be̱ne̱ e̱ cwo be a zete nné mbe ne mbe ra ho nka ngu.
Nyi e̱ nyi i bi zhwe re̱kpe̱e̱ ne̱, a zhe ne nyi i shi ciee a yarri re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi.
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, se nyi trru zhwe re̱kpe̱e̱ ne̱ a yarri nyi: shi shi ren, ngbe ehwie shwo, ngbe ra nne hwie, ngbe he nkang dzio ya nne, ngbe re-nkang cwi nné ne mbe wrru nu nyi.
Shi de̱ nyi yaa ca rabrra we̱, tu ne nyi i trru re̱kpe̱e̱ nyi na reni ngbe re-cwuo ngu,
ne he̱rri nyi bra a fo re̱kpe̱e̱ hwi. Nyi Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ngwa re̱kpe̱e̱ hwi nyi ne̱, a bra shi ke̱ we ne níng ci nyi ci hwihwíng shi ngu, aha ngbe nyi ning bra ki hu cwuncwuu.

Aha ni ko bi nka he nke nyi nne Heleni nke ncwi nyi nne Yahudi we̱, ka nke wru nzhwe nné ca ikpe rwe̱ ntó, nke ncwi a nwie nné riywe̱ cang we̱, ka nke nyi nne tsi ngwie̱, ka nne riywe̱ hung, ka hwie, ka srra srra rici ngu we̱, me̱di Krristi e̱ nyi ko nda, Krristi e̱ bra shi yarri ko nye̱.
Aha ni nyi nyi nné Be̱ne̱. A níng cé̱, aa bra níng kyie nyi hwie̱ nné wiri ngu. Aha ni nyi srra re bi naana kpi re-gimbe a nci nyi, nyi yaa nyi rina, nyi nywe̱ rici, nyi bi ehwie ranng nwie yaa rwe.
Nyi bi ehwie sheng ne nne nke ngu níng dzio ehwie. Kundu ngwe̱ bi nka a rici ya nne aha ngu re nyi yankya me̱nkye̱, ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu. Nyi we nné re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe we shi ne Brrabe̱ níng weng ma.
A zete ga re-mbe ne̱ zhwozhwo nyi ning bra e̱kpe̱e̱ yaa ce̱, nyi ngu ne̱ ngu níng mwé nyi ci zunzrru rina rina.
A nyi Krristi ngu níng ngwá srra rina, nde re níng kwa a yarri ronu rie nyi. A nyi aha srra rina ne̱ ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ci nyi ci rwe̱ zunzrru. Aha ngbe nyi srra re ki ci kijie̱ng.

Nde nka Krristi re srra yarri nyi we yang, shi ne nyi srra nwie yaa mie̱ng re yaa yhwire ne ko zohu zentsi. Nyi srra re ce̱ re-ve na krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe re-veng de Jesu, ngbe re-ve ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ níng ngwa, nyi ce̱ nwie ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng a yarri rehwie nyi.
Nde a yarri ko nda, ka re nyi nda ne nyi shi heng, ka re nyi nda ne nyi shi nying, re nyi a yarri lo Brrabe̱ Jesu, nwie ci Be̱ne̱ Be̱ kijie̱ng aha ngu.
Mbrrú nyrra, nyi ho nka ntó nyi shi ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri a yarri Brrabe̱.
Ntó, nyi ce̱ mbrrú nyi, shi de̱ nyi we yarra we̱.
E̱we̱e̱ rewe, nyi ho nka nné ne mbe níng bî ko zohu zhe, aha kya ngu klá Brrabe̱ ehwie e̱ nyi ngwiee ana.
Nyi ne nyi bi e̱we̱e̱ rewe, shi de̱ nyi ci rewe nyi e̱ ehwie shwo ko zohu zhe nwie we krro nka we̱, kishi a ri we cie̱ rwe̱.
Hwié, nyi ho nka re-be̱ri nyi a yarri ko nda, nyi we ho nka ko zohu zhe, ko se we nyyi mbe he aha ré níng de we̱, me̱di nyi nyi ne ehwie zunzrru ngbe ne owu Brrabe̱.
Ko nda ne nyi shi nying, nyi ning ci shwo riyii, aha nyi Brrabe̱ ne nyi ki nyíng, ko nyi nneywi we̱.
Nyi hu re̱se̱ng he Be̱ne̱ ri níng ngwa lede kya ne ngu níng sa jee, aha nyi Krristi ngu nyi Brra Be̱ri na ne nyi ki nyi cwuo.
Ngbe nné nyi ngwie̱ngwie̱ wé̱ she lede ngwie̱ngwie̱ mbe, aha ko Be̱ne̱ kyie nné kyie kyie we̱.
Nyi re-be̱ri e̱ ma, nyi bro hwié nyi e̱ rina rina. Nyi we ngwa kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré she. Nyi lu he nyi e̱ nyi bi Brra Be̱ri a zinye̱ ma.
Nyi ngwa nci nyi nwie ku Be̱ne̱, nyi srrante, nyi srra re ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng.
Nyi ku Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi ma, aha ngbe Be̱ne̱ re níng kla riwie̱ ngbe nzhi ning brro nka ngu, nka Krristi ne ngu i shi la la gannyi we gbangba, ne ngu bra nyi aha ni ne nje shi gyiaa ne̱.
Nyi ku Be̱ne̱ he ngbe n hung brro nka nna we gbeng shi ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri n brro.
Nné mbe ne ko mbe nyi nné ce̱ nka we̱, nyi we zhwe ne zentsi, nyi nyi mpe̱ni ne ko zohu riwie̱ ne nyi she.
Nde re-nka nyi e̱ ré bi rina, ré shi kpikpi shi shi á ning ci ncwua, aha ngbe ko nye̱ ne ngu níng rin nka, nyi hung ki shing rina rina.
Gimbe nzhi Tikyiku ne ngu nyi nne ce̱ nzhi e̱ cwo a níng ti ko nda a rici nje. Ngu a nyi brra rwincwuo nzhi ne ngu shi tsantsa a yarri Brrabe̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje ki te nwie nyi e̱, aha ngbe nyi hu ka nzhi shi rimi ye̱, ngbe re níng shwe̱ rehwie.
A cwo be ngbe Onesimo, nne ce̱ nzhi, ne ngu nyi nne tsantsa, ne ngu bra nyi nne nwie nyi. Á cwo a níng ti ko nda ne ngu shi nwie ci a he ne ne̱.
Arristaku ne ngu shi gyiaa ngbe nje e̱ níng dzie, ga ngbe Marrku gimbe Barrnaba a ning dzie ma. (A nyi ngu ne nje i ke̱she níng ting he a ri be nyi ki se̱ ne nva wehwie e̱.)
Joshwua ne e ki ye he Yustu níng dzie ma. Nyi we mbe nné wetsie̱ ne̱ ne mbe nyi nné Yahudi ne mbe shi ncwuo Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe nje. Á bra ning sheng we yang.

Epafrra ne ngu nyi nne nwie nyi, ne ngu bra nyi ya hwie Krristi Jesu a níng dzie ma. Ko zohu zhe a kwe̱ aha nyi a yarri ku Be̱ne̱ he ngbe Be̱ne̱ re níng ci nyi yo ne igbe̱ a zete kya ce̱ ngu shi nné ne mbe ci brráng a yarri ce̱ nka we̱sa ne nyi jinji.
Nje we rici nje e̱ nje níng ting cence he a shi we cinci aha ngu níng sheng, nyi ngbe nné Lawudikyia ngbe nné Hiyerrapoli.
Ga ngbe Luk, brra nne rikye̱, ne ngu nyi nne ce̱ nzhi, ngbe Dema, á níng dzie.
Nyi ning dzie re-gimbe a Lawudikyia zhwozhwo, ga ngbe Nimfa, gimbe nzhi ewerembrru, ngbe ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe mwe ta ri ngu.
Kundu nyi ri hwie krre̱de̱ ne̱, nyi e̱ te mi re nzhi nwie ekpri nné ce̱ nka na Lawudikyia ngbe ré hwie ma, ngbe nyi e̱ hwie krre̱de̱ na ngu wru a nwie nné Lawudikyia a ma.
Nyi he ne Akyipu he re ci nkwile̱ ngbe re fro cwuo ngu ne Brrabe̱ ki ngwa.
Nje wie nke ne̱ ne va nje:
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re shi ngbe nyi.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ wru nwie nje Bulu, ngbe Sila, ngbe ne Timoti,
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re shi ngbe ne nyi, ngbe nyi bi srra rina.
Nzhi cí Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha nyi zhwozhwo nwie ku Be̱ne̱ aha nyi ko zohu zhe,

re lu ne nyi a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi ngbe ne ga re-cwuo ne nyi nyi aha sa rie nyi a Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi, ngbe ne zhwe cwuo ne nyi shi mi aha ce̱ ne nyi ki ce̱, ngbe zhwe yaa rwe ne nyi bi aha ne nyi sa riyii a ngu.
Re-gimbe, Be̱ne̱ níng ce̱, nzhi hu he nyi ngu ne ngu níng kyie,

aha ko Nka Rina nzhi e̱ i be nwie nyi we yarri re-nka we̱, me̱di a yarri igbe̱ ngbe ne Nshe Wiri, aa níng ci nyi se̱ he shi ni cence we̱sa ne nyi jinji. Nyi hu zhwe srra ne nzhi i srra yarri nyi e̱, aha ngbe re níng sheng.
He̱rri nyi mie̱ a nwie nzhi ngbe a nwie Brrabe̱. Ko ngbe ne re-cinci ne nyi shwe aha ni, gbengbe ni nyi se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ ne ehwie kla ne Nshe Wiri níng ngwa.
Ngbe aha ni nyi e̱ hwie̱ kyang mwa yi a nwie nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo a Makyidoniya ngbe Akaya.
Aha nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ wru nwie nyi aa se̱ ngwie̱ yu, ko nyi we a Makyidoniya ngbe Akaya we̱, me̱di nka sa rie nyi a Be̱ne̱ e̱ ya cwu ko he, he̱rri ko se nzhi bra ti ya nneng we̱.
Aha ko nneywí e̱ á we ni ti zhwe se̱ ne nyi i níng se̱ we̱, ngbe zhwe rê ne nyi i ning bra re be nwie Be̱ne̱ nyi we re-kpanshwu aha ngbe nyi nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ bi ce ne nyi ngu ngu nyi Be̱ne̱ cence,
aha ngbe nyi bra te be Kowe ngu ne ngu shi wru zinye̱, Kowe ngu ne ngu ki deze nhu, Jesu ne ngu níng kyia ne ren Be̱ne̱ ne ngu cwo be.
Re-gimbe, nyi hu re̱se̱ng he ko be nzhi a nwie nyi e̱ i nyi cwuo shweni we̱.

Me̱di ko ngbe ne re-cinci ne nzhi i shwe ngbe ne re-yarra ne i níng yarra a Filibi e̱, shi ne nyi hu, Be̱ne̱ i níng ngwa yaa rwe ngbe nzhi níng brro re̱se̱ Nka Rina ngu we dengge ko ngbe ne á níng ce̱trri we yang.
Nka ne nzhi i níng brrong nna ko i ning bi rabrra a yarring, ka ya hwie nka ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni, ka nzhi níng shwe̱li we̱.
Me̱di we shi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu shî ngu níng ngwa cwuong brro Nka Rina, aha ni nzhi brró, ko aha nzhi shwo nneywí rehwie we̱, me̱di aha nzhi kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie, ngu ne ngu hu yaarri ronu rie nzhi.
Nyi bra hu he ko nzhi i be nwie níng be̱ lo we̱, ko nzhi bra i níng hwie̱n riyii aha ngbe nzhi níng shwe̱li aha ecwue yankya nyi we̱, Be̱ne̱ nyi sheede nzhi!

Ko nzhi bra i kre he nneywí ré níng ci grime̱ we̱, ka a nwie nyi, ka a nwie yaká nné. Ko ngbe ne kundu nzhi i ra ce̱ ni, nzhi i ra nyi mpe̱ni ne de̱me̱ nzhi na nnenté Krristi ngbe nzhi níng rin ko nda ne nzhi ce̱,
me̱di nzhi i nyi ranng a tsi nyi shi shi mbrrú cí nkwile̱ ne e̱we̱e̱ rewe.
Aha ce̱ ne nzhi níng ce̱ we yang, ko nzhi i kre he nzhi níng ti we Nka Rina Be̱ne̱ we̱, me̱di nzhi i kre he nzhi ngwa ngbe ne ce nzhi zhwozhwo aha nyi, aha nyi i níng ngwie hwie we yang.
Re-gimbe, nyi e̱ hung lu ne zhwe cwuo ne nzhi nyi ngbe ci ne nzhi kra nwie nyi cwuo te̱ne̱ ne totu, aha ngbe de̱ nzhi hwie̱ nkpe a nwie ya nyi we̱, he̱rri nzhi níng brro Nka Rina Be̱ne̱.
Nyi e̱ nyi nyi re-sheede nzhi, Be̱ne̱ nyi sheede nzhi ma ne zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ ne nzhi ning srra wiri, ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ redziee we̱sa ne ya vini a nwie ga nyi nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo.
Nyi bra hu wa he nzhi cwo ne ko nye̱ nyi shi be̱ ne ngu cwo ne rewe ngu,
nwie cwe nva ne nyi re níng shwe̱ ehwie, ne nzhi níng ting he nyi srra zhwe srra ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ye re be a ringgwe̱ ngu ngbe grime̱ ngu.

A bra nyi aha ni wa ne nzhi cí Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng we̱sa ne kpo, aha a zhe ne nyi i se̱ nka ngu ne nyi ho a nwie nzhi, ko nyi i se̱ shi shi nyi nka nneywí we̱. Nyi i se̱ we he nyi nka Be̱ne̱ ne nzhi níng heng, a a shi ni e̱ cence. A nyi nka ana ne ngu ke̱ we ne shi ncwuo a yarri nyi, nyi ne nyi bi sa rie a ngu.

Aha ne nyi re-gimbe e̱, nyi mie̱ a nwie rekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ a Yahudi ne mbe shi yarri Krristi Jesu, he̱rri nyi shwe cinci a nva nné ngwie̱ nyi, we shi ne mbe e̱ ma mbe i shwe cinci a nva nné Yahudi,
a nva nné ne mbe i yhwe̱ Brrabe̱ Jesu, ne mbe i yhwi nné ti re̱se̱ng, ne mbe bra níng yu. Koó kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie we̱, á bra hwie̱ rwinkó ga nné zhwozhwo.

He̱rri á kre rê ngbe mbe níng kpo de̱ nzhi brro Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ nka ne ngu shi we ci ré she kyia we̱. Nyi ni e̱ ci re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe e̱ nyia re nzhi cwu we krrucing, me̱di ren Be̱ne̱ e̱ ngra be a rici mbe.

Me̱di nzhi e̱ re-gimbe, tu zhe ne i níng ci nzhi ci kanka ngbe ne nyi na e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱ (a ikpe rwe̱, ko a hwie nka we̱), aha ucwua nyi ne nzhi ku we yang, nzhi nyi koori he nzhi be nzhi ya níng ri riyii ne riyii.
Aha ni nzhi i ce̱ be nwie nyi. Nje Bulu a nje kre we he n be, me̱di Shetani e̱ níng kpo.
Wire ma bra nyi nda ngu nyi kya ne nzhi ning sa riyii e̱ ma, ne ngu níng ngwá ehwie kla, ne ngu nyi lede nzhi ne nzhi ning cwe zewe aha zheng be Brrabe̱ Jesu a? Ko nyi nyi e̱ we̱ e̱e̱?
A nyi nyi ne nyi nyi kyang cwe zewe nzhi, ngbe ne kya ehwie kla nzhi.
Aha ni a zhe ne nzhi i ri ko nzhi shi hung ke̱ we ne yaa rwe we̱sa ne níng ri we̱, nzhi e̱ hwie he canca nzhi hwie̱ a Atina we nggaa nzhi.
Nzhi e̱ te gimbe nzhi Timoti ne ngu nyi rwi nzhi a ncwuo Be̱ne̱, cwuong brro Nka Rina Krristi, aha re níng ci nyi ci igbe̱ a yarri sa rie nyi, ngbe re srra re níng shwe̱ rehwie,
kishi yá nyi ri ning brru ne emerin aha zhwe re-ge̱zhe̱ ne̱. Nyi we nci nyi nyi hu re̱se̱ng he zhwe re-ge̱zhe̱ ne̱ nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi.
Aha ko ngbe zhe ne nzhi i shi ngbe ne nyi, nzhi i ke̱nce̱ níng ting he nzhi bi shwe ge̱zhe̱; we shi kya ne ngu ya ci, shi ne nyi hu re̱se̱ng.

Kya a nyi ngwiee a zhe ne nje i ri ko nje shi hung ke̱ we ne yaa rwe we̱, nje e̱ te re be nwie nyi aha ngbe n ho ka sa rie nyi e̱ shi rimi ye̱. Nje i to owu he ka Shetani e̱ níng mwa ri ngbe re ci cwuo ne nzhi nyi nwie nyi e̱ re ci we cwuo shweni.

Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ ne Timoti ngu ya ning brru nwie nyi re be nwie nzhi ne̱, aa níng be mi ne nka rina na sa rie nyi ngbe ne ce̱ ne nyi yaa ce̱, aa bra níng ting he ko zohu zhe nyi srra re lu aha nzhi ne ehwie rina, he nyi ku ucwua nzhi we shi ne nzhi srra re ku ucwua nyi ma.
A nyi aha ni re-gimbe, ne ko ngbe ne re-ge̱zhe̱ ngbe ne cinci ne nzhi shi shweng ne̱, sa rie ne nyi bi e̱ níng krru ehwie.
Aha a zhe ne ne̱ cence nzhi shi nce, tu ne nyi shi nwie yo gangga a yarri Brrabe̱.
Ma nyi zohu zhwe kijie̱ng nzhi bra ci Be̱ne̱ng aha nyi e̱ wa, ne zhwe rehwie kla ne nzhi bi a nyyi Be̱ne̱ nzhi aha nyi ne̱?
Nzhi ku Be̱ne̱ ne rehwie nzhi zhwozhwo totu ne te̱ne̱ aha ngbe nzhi she riwie̱ nzhi bra níng ri riyii ne riyii te̱nte̱ wa, aha ngbe nzhi níng ti kya ne ngu re̱ a sa rie nyi.
Nde Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi we rici ngu ngbe Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu re níng kla rê ngbe nzhi hung be nwie nyi!
Nde Brrabe̱ re ci ce̱ ne nyi yaa ce̱, ne nyi bra ce̱ ga nneywí zhwozhwo re ning brang we yang, we shi ne nzhi níng ce̱ nyi e̱ ma.

Nde re níng ngwa igbe̱ a yarri rehwie nyi, ngbe nyi shi wiri we̱sa ne yankya na ré hu níng cwi a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi, a zhe ne Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu ngbe ga nné wiri ngu zhwozhwo ri be. A shi ni.

A ngrangrang re-gimbe, nzhi i níng ting, nzhi bra cwé nva ne nyi aha nyi shi yarri Brrabe̱ Jesu, he we shi ne nyi i mie̱ nwie nzhi, nyi srra zhwe srra ne ngu klá Be̱ne̱ ehwie, we shi ne nyi shi mi ne̱; nde nyi bra nyi re ne̱ ni.
Nyi lu ne nka ne nzhi i níng garang a yarri lo Brrabe̱ Jesu.
Aha kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi nke: he nyi shi wiri, ngbe nyi to ze̱nze̱ ne e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ njè.
Ko nye̱ a tsi nyi ntó re hung ci nkwile̱ ne rwe̱ ngu a rê ne ngu shi wiri ne ngu bra bi grime̱.
Shi de̱ re nyi a yarri ecwue le̱le̱ njè shi ne nné tsi ngwie̱ ne mbe nyi riywe̱ hu Be̱ne̱ mbe nyí we̱.

A nka e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ nje ne̱, shi de̱ ya nne re dzio ya gimbe ehwie re ki nyi kya ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni we̱, aha Brrabe̱ ri trra ko nye̱ kya ne ngu nyi ne zhwe re-ankya ne̱, we shi ne nzhi ke̱nce̱ níng gara nka ni.
Aha ko Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ye ngbe nzhi bra bi e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ njè we̱, me̱di nzhi shi wiri.
Aha nii, nne nke ne ngu rá nka ne̱, ko nyi nneywi ne ngu ki rá we̱, a rá Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ngwa Nshe Wiri ngu.
A nka ce̱ re-gimbe, ko se ne e bra níng wie krre̱de̱ aha ni we̱, aha nyi we nci nyi Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng mie̱ng he nyi yaa ce̱.
Ee cence, nyi cé̱ re-gimbe zhwozhwo a Makyidoniya, me̱di gbengbe ni re-gimbe, nzhi he nyi ning brang re ne̱ ni.
Nde nyi kre he nyi bi e̱kpe̱e̱ ranng, ko nye̱ re ci nkwile̱ ne kya ne ngu shi ncwuee ngu, re nyi cwuo ne va ngu, shi ne nzhi i níng heng.
Aha ngbe re-he̱li nyi re ci nné mbiye ne ko mbe shi a yarri nyi we̱ ré níng ngwa grime̱, ngbe ko ya nyi we̱ rwe shwe a ya aha re ki ngwa yankya we̱.
Re-gimbe, ko nzhi ce̱ he nyi nyi riywe̱ hung we̱, a nka nné mbiye ne mbe kpi ndzie, kishi nyi ri srra re dzio rehwie shi re̱se̱ nné mbiye ne ko mbe bi sa riyiing ri Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Nzhi bi sa rie he Jesu i hu bra deze wa, aha ni nzhi bi sa rie he Be̱ne̱ ri ning brru be mi ne ga nné mbiye ne mbe kpi ndzie a yarri ngu ngbe ne ngu.
Nzhi níng he nka ye̱ye̱rri kya ne Brrabe̱ i he, he nzhi ne nzhi shi nce he̱rri zheng be Brrabe̱, ko nzhi ri ke̱she nné mbe ne mbe nyia ana deze we̱.

Aha Brrabe̱ we rici ngu ri wru zinye̱ re wro re be be ne brra riwie̱ng cwue, ngbe ne cwue brra njeli, ngbe we̱ ci ye ne rigbe Be̱ne̱, ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe kwi ne mbe shi yarri Krristi wé̱ ke̱she deze.
Wire nzhi ne e ning we nzhi shi nce e̱ wé̱ níng ko gbengbe ne mbe a inyie̱ re nzhi nyi ngbe ne Brrabe̱ a zeteng. Ngbe nzhi e̱ ri shi ngbe ne Brrabe̱ ko zohu zhe.
Aha ni nyi ri ma yaa krru rehwie ne re-nka ne̱.
A zhe ne ne̱ re-gimbe, a nka re-zhe ngbe rotu ne re-ankya ne̱ mbe ri ning ci, ko se nzhi bra níng wie krre̱de̱ aha ni we̱,
aha nyi we nci nyi nyi hu re̱se̱ng he Kotung be Brrabe̱ e̱ ri shi shi be nne nca a totu.
A zhe ne nneywí mbe ri shi nwie he, “Nzhi shi srra rina, ko bi nka owu we̱,” ngbe ge̱zhe̱ we̱ be a rici mbe we kpri shi nyi mbrru ku ehwie, ko shi ré to drre̱ we̱.
Me̱di re-gimbe, ko nyi shi nwie ywing ngbe Kotu ana re ya níng hwie̱ kyang nga onu shi shi nyi be nne nca we̱.
Aha ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi nyi na ewie si, na brra tsi te̱ne̱. Ko nzhi nyi nné na totu we̱, ko nzhi nyi nné nwie ywing we̱.
Aha nii, shi de̱ nzhi ke̱ we ne cwo ndzie shi kpi nneywí we̱. Nde nzhi ci nkwile̱, nzhi srrante.
Aha nné mbe ne mbe cwo ndzie ana á cwo ndzie e̱ a totu, nné mbe ma ne mbe dzió nci ne hwieen, á dzio nci mbe e̱ a totu ma.
Me̱di tu ne nzhi nyi na te̱ne̱, nde nzhi srrante, nde sa rie nzhi ngbe e̱kpe̱e̱ yaa ce̱ ré hwie̱ shi tago kprincwe̱ yaa ku, ngbe sa riyii a kyia ne nzhi bi re níng hwie̱ shi vo onggo.
Aha ko Be̱ne̱ i ning kyie he nzhi shwe cinci ren ngu we̱, me̱di he nzhi she kyia a nwie Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi,
ne ngu hu aha nzhi, aha ka nzhi kwi, ka nzhi shi nce, kundu ngu ri be, nzhi e̱ ri srra ngbe ne ngu.
Aha ni nyi yaa shwe̱ rehwie nwie yaa sheng we shi ne nyi shi mi ne̱.
Me̱di re-gimbe, nzhi cwe nva ne nyi he nyi ngwa nné ne mbe nyi nnencwueé nyi a ncwuo Brrabe̱ grime̱, mbe ne mbe níng ti kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi nyi.
Nyi we to nyi bra we ce̱ aha cwuo ne mbe nyí. Nyi yaa srra rina a nci nyi.
Re-gimbe, nzhi cwe nva ne nyi he nyi yhwire nné mbe ne mbe srrá we dede, nyi shwe̱ nné ranng rehwie, nyi she nné brrubrrung, nyi bi ehwie sheng ne ko nye̱.
Nyi ci nkwile̱ kishi ya nyi ri trra e̱ngwie̱ ne e̱ngwie̱, me̱di nyi tu rici nwie yaa nyi rina, nyi bra nyi ko nye̱ rina.
Nyi bi ehwie kla ko zohu zhe.
Nyi ku Be̱ne̱ we̱sa ne kpo.
Nyi ci kijie̱ng a yarri ko nda; kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi ngwiee ne nyi ne nyi shi a yarri Krristi Jesu.
Shi de̱ nyi ce̱trri cwuo Nshe Wiri we̱.
Shi de̱ nyi dzié̱ re-nka nné ti re̱se̱ng we̱,
me̱di nyi mwa ko nda, nyi e̱ bro na ne ngu nyi te̱nte̱ng.
Nyi to ze̱nze̱ ne ko zohu zhwe ngwie̱ngwie̱.

Nde Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ngwá srra rina re níng ci nyi shi wiri zhwozhwo, re bra kye̱ re-hwie nka nyi, ngbe re-ce nyi, ngbe re-rwe̱ nyi zhwozhwo ngbe de̱ nyi bi ko yankya ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni we̱ he̱rri zheng be Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi.
Ngu ne ngu níng ye e̱ bi redziee, a shi ci re ci ni.
Re-gimbe, nyi ku Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi.
Nyi dzie ga re-gimbe zhwozhwo nwie yaa nyi gbagba.
Nje cwe nva ne nyi he nyi hwie re-gimbe zhwozhwo krre̱de̱ ne̱.
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe ne nyi.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ wru nwie Bulu, ngbe Sila, ngbe ne Timoti,
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi ngbe ne Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe ne nyi, re bra níng ngwa srra rina.

Re-gimbe, a nwie nzhi aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi srra re ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha nyi ko zohu zhe. A shi ye̱ye̱rri nzhi nyi ni aha sa rie nyi e̱ cwo we ne ning brang, ngbe ce̱ ne nyi yaa ce̱ zhwozhwo nyi e̱ cwo we ne ning brang ma.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nzhi e̱ nzhi cwe zewe ne nyi a tsi rekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ aha yaa rwe nyi ngbe ne sa rie nyi a yarri re-ge̱zhe̱ ngbe ne re-cinci ne nyi shi nwie shweng.
Ga re-nke ne̱ nyi re-sheede he Be̱ne̱ nyí nka ngu ye̱ye̱rri, aha ni mahu cence nyi be ngbe nyi srra a Ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ne nyi shi nwie shwe re-cinci aha ni.
Tu ne cence Be̱ne̱ ri aa ki mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ngu trra nné ne mbe níng ngwá ge̱zhe̱ ne ge̱zhe̱,
he ngbe ngu bra níng ngwa nyi ne nyi shwe ge̱zhe̱ e̱ srra cwu ngbe ne nzhi, a zhe ne Brrabe̱ Jesu ri ya wre̱ ngbe ne lendo ne ngu wru zinye̱ ngbe ne brrá re-njeli ngu,
ne ngu ri ngwa nné ne ko mbe hu Be̱ne̱ we̱ ngbe nné ne mbe ra zhwe Nka Rina Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu cinci.
Á ri shwe cinci ré ci shweni he̱rri tiya, ne e ri we yu a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne brra igbe̱ ngu ze̱nze̱.
A zhe ne ngu ri be aha ngbe nné wiri ngu ré ki ngwa grime̱, ga nné ce̱ nka ngu zhwozhwo ri nye̱ we ronu ne ngu, nyi ri shi a tsi mbe aha nyi i shî kya ne nzhi níng ting.

Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nzhi srra re ku Be̱ne̱ aha nyi, he Be̱ne̱ nzhi re ci srra nyi re shi ye̱ye̱rri ne ye ne ngu níng ye, re bra níng ci nyi hung nyi ko zohu cwuo rina ne nyi hwie nying ne sa rie nyi a yarri igbe̱ ngu.
Ngbe lo Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu we̱ she grime̱ a yarri nyi, nyi e̱ she grime̱ a ngu ma, aha ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ nzhi, ngbe ne Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi.
Me̱di a nka be Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ngbe tsu ne nzhi ri tsu aha nzhi nyi ngbe ne ngu, nzhi cwe nva ne nyi re-gimbe,

he shi de̱ nyi ke̱nce̱ kpi roshwo hwie nwie bē ne re-nka ne e he he Kotu Brrabe̱ e̱ hle ana we̱, ka ré he nyi ya nka ne nzhi i he a yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri, ka ré he nyi we ya nka ne nzhi he, ka ré bra he nka nna a wru a ya krre̱de̱ ne nzhi wie.
Shi de̱ ya nne re níng brra we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱, ko shi Kotu ana re ci we̱ se zhe ne nneywí ri ke̱she nyi Be̱ne̱ gbanggrraa, ne nne hwie̱ ana ngu ya wre̱ wire, ngu ne Be̱ne̱ ri ki re ci shweni ana.
A ri ra ko nda ne e ki ye he be̱ne̱, ka kya ne e ki yé mbè, ngbe we̱ fo rici ngu ze a zete ko nda, he̱rri we̱ yaa cisa a Brranyi Be̱ne̱ nwie he nyi ngu ngu nyi Be̱ne̱.
Ko nyi lu he a zhe ne nje i shi ngbe ne nyi nje i níng ti re-ankya ne̱ oo?
Nyi bra hu kya ngu ci ne ko shi re be a zhe ne ne̱ we̱, aha ngbe á ri wru mi ne ngu ne zhe ngu ngu ci ye̱ye̱rri.
Aha ko we zhe ne ne̱ ma, igbe̱ nné hwie̱ nna shi ncwuo a la la, me̱di nne ne ngu ki kpo kishi ri wru a shi ke̱ we ne ki kpo, se ne e ri ki ti ngbe re ki we rê.

Wire nne hwie̱ nna we̱ ya wre̱ fa, me̱di kundu Brrabe̱ Jesu ri he ngu ya wre̱ a zheng be ngu, we̱ ki yhwa we yhwa ne nshe ne ngu kle he̱rri we̱ hu, we̱ ki ci re ci shweni we ne grime̱ ne ngu ning be.
Ngu nne hwie̱ nna ri be ye̱ye̱rri ne cwuo shetani ne ko zohu zhwe igbe̱ nwie nyi re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu, ngbe ngbá re-ankya na rabrra.
Ngbe we̱ brra nné mbe ne mbe cwo a ci shweni ne ko zohu zhwe rabrra hwie̱ hwie̱, aha ne mbe ra shî nka raywrra ngbe mbe she kyia.
A nyi aha ni Be̱ne̱ ri ci ré we brra we te̱nte̱ brra, he̱rri ré shî nka rabrra.
Aha ngbe ré nyi ga nné ra shî nka raywrra zhwozhwo nka, aha ne mbe ke̱ we ne ho shwi e̱ngwie̱.
Me̱di nzhi e̱ se nzhi srra re ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng ko zohu zhe aha nyi, re-gimbe, nyi ne Brrabe̱ níng ce̱. Aha Be̱ne̱ i níng kyie tu we ce̱ucwung he ngbe nyi
A nyi aha ni ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ye ne Nka Rina ne nzhi níng brrong, aha ngbe nyi she grime̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi.
Aha ni re-gimbe, nyi yo gangga, nyi bro nka raywrra ne nzhi i níng mie̱ng, ka ne nka nu, ka nzhi i níng wieng wie a krre̱de̱.

Nde Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi we rici ngu ngbe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi, ne ngu níng ce̱, ne ngu níng krru ehwie he̱rri tiya, ngu bra níng ngwa te̱nte̱ kya ngbe nzhi níng sa riyii aha ehwie rina ngu,
re níng shwe̱ rehwie, re bra níng ngwa igbe̱ ko zohu zhe a yarri ko zohu kya rina ne nyi shi nying, ka ne nyi shi heng.
A ngrangrang re-gimbe, nyi ku Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi aha ngbe nka Brrabe̱ re se̱ ngwie̱ yu we hwiehwie, ngbe re she grime̱ shi ne ngu i she a nwie nyi,
he ngbe Be̱ne̱ re bra níng kye̱ a nva nné hwie̱ ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱, aha ko nyi ko nye̱ ngu nyi nne ce̱ nka we̱.
Me̱di Brrabe̱ e̱ nyi Be̱ ré hung sa rie a ngu; a shi níng ci nyi ci igbe̱, we̱ bra níng cwo ne nne hwie̱ ana.
Nzhi cwe zewe ne nyi aha Brrabe̱, aha nyi shi nwie nyi re-ankya ne nzhi i he nyi nyi, nyi bra shi tu rici nwie nying.
Nde Brrabe̱ re níng kwa a yarri ronu rie nyi, ngbe nyi ning bra hu ce̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe ne zhwe rwe rie ne Krristi ngu ngwá.
Re-gimbe nzhi, nzhi níng ngwá nka a yarri lo Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi he nyi to ze̱nze̱ ne ko zohu nne ce̱ nka ne ngu bi rê, ne ko ngu nyi ye̱ye̱rri ne kya nzhi i níng mie̱ng we̱.
Nyi we nci nyi nyi hu re̱se̱ng he aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi mie̱ kya ne nzhi nyí. Ko nzhi i bi rê a zhe ne nzhi i shi ngbe ne nyi we̱.
Ko nzhi i ye yâ ya nyi shweni we̱sa ki trrang we̱. Me̱di nzhi i yaa ta nwie nyi cwuo te̱ne̱ ngbe totu, he ngbe de̱ nzhi ngwa ko ya nyi nkpe we̱.
Ko nzhi i nyi ni aha he nzhi nyi riywe̱ de̱me̱ ngbe nzhi níng rinng aha yankya we̱, me̱di aha ngbe nzhi we ya e̱kpe̱e̱ na ne nyi shi zhwe hwie̱ng.
Aha ko ngbe zhe ne nzhi i shi ngbe ne nyi, nzhi i níng ngwa nka he, “Nne nke ne ngu ra nyi cwuo, shi de̱ ré ki ngwa yâ we̱.”
Aha nzhi hó he a bi yá a tsi nyi ne mbe srra we shweni nwie gye̱ re sha ronu a ankya na kpi nné.
Zhwe nné ana nzhi we ngwá nka nzhi bra we shwé̱ ehwie a yarri lo Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi he ré yaa tarra ré nyi cwuo ngbe ré ning bro nci mbe.
Me̱di nyi e̱ re-gimbe, shi de̱ nyi rwe̱ ne nyi kya ngu shi tsantsa we̱.
Kundu a ri bi ya nyi ne ngu ra zhwe kya ne nzhi níng heng a krre̱de̱ ne̱, nyi ki sa riyii, shi de̱ yankya re níng mwe ngbe ne ngu we̱, aha ngbe nshwu re ki yhwe̱.
Shi de̱ nyi bra ki fo shi nyi rwinko we̱, me̱di nyi ki yhwire shi nyi gimbe.
Ma nde Brrabe̱ ne ngu bi srra rina we rici ngu re níng ngwa srra rina ko zohu zhe a yarri ko nda. Nde Brrabe̱ re shi ngbe ne nyi zhwozhwo.
Nje wie nke e̱ ne va nje:
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe ne nyi zhwozhwo.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie nje Bulu, nnente Krristi Jesu ye̱ye̱rri ne nka ne Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Nnenkyia nzhi ngu ngwa ngbe Krristi Jesu ne nzhi ning sa riyii.
Nje wie re nzhi nwie Timoti kowe bî nje a yarri ce̱ nka.
Nde ehwie rina ngbe naana Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ngbe Krristi Jesu ne ngu nyi Brrabe̱ nzhi re shi ngbe ne ngwe̱, re bra re ngwa srra rina.

Nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ hwie̱ srra a Afisa, we shi ne nje i he ne ngwe̱ a zhe ne nje i nyia re nzhi Makyidoniya, aha ngbe ngwe̱ ngwa yá nné ne mbe shi miimi e̱ ana nka ngbe ré we ni mie̱ re-nka ne mbe shi ka.
De̱ ré ning tu rici a re-nkaashwe ngbe nka re-lo brrá ho nné tiya dewedewe ana we̱. Zhwe re-nka ana cwo mi ne ronu ce ne ko mbe she nneywíng ré nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ ne ning sa rie we̱.
Kwili nka ne nzhi níng ngwa a nyi nke he nyi yaa ce̱, zhwe ce̱ nke ne ngu wru nu rie ne ngu shi wiriri, ngbe a ehwie ne ngu shi wang, ngbe ne te̱nte̱ sa rie.
Yá nneywí ne mbe we rê ne̱ á ne̱ ne he re-nka shweni.
Á ce̱ hwie̱ nné mie Nti Nka Be̱ne̱, me̱di koó hu re̱se̱ kya ne mbe hé we̱, wire re ning hwie̱ cwu kya ne mbe hé.
Nzhi hu re̱se̱ng he Nti Nka a bi rina kundu ne e ning nyi cwuo mi ye̱ye̱rri.

Nzhi bra hu re̱se̱ng he koó ngwá nti nka aha nné redziee we̱, me̱di aha nné riywe̱ redziee, ngbe nné ra ho nka, ngbe nné ra zhwe Be̱ne̱, ngbe nné e̱ngwie̱, ngbe nné mbe ne ko mbe shi wiri we̱, ngbe nné cwi Be̱ne̱, ngbe nné mbe ne mbe yhwi re-be̱ mbe ka dé̱ mbe, ka mbe yhwi nné,
ngbe nné nyi njè, ngbe re-gbaru, ngbe nné rie̱ nneywí, ngbe nné ca rabrra, ngbe nné ngwa sheede rabrra, ngbe nné nyi ko zohu kya ne ko ngu shi tsantsa ne nka raywrra we̱,
nka ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri ne Nka Rina bi grime̱ na Be̱ne̱ ne ngu be ré ki de, ne ngu ning ngwa n brro.
Nje ci kijie̱ng re nzhi nwie Krristi Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi ne ngu ning ngwa igbe̱ng nyi cwuo ne̱, shi ne ngu ning fo he nje be ngbe ngu ning kyie n nyi cwuo ngu.
Ko ngbe ne a rotu ncwuee, nje i he re-nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱, nje ngwa nné Be̱ne̱ cinci nwie cwi Be̱ne̱; me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ri naana nje aha ne nje i nyi a riywe̱ hung ne ko nje bi sa rie we̱.
Me̱di ehwie rina Brrabe̱ nzhi re be nwie nje e̱ i zhwo we zhwo, aa ning ngwa sa rie ngbe ce̱ na ngu wru yarri Krristi Jesu.
Cwu nka ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ko nye̱ re shî e̱ nyi nke: Krristi Jesu a be be ngwie̱ ne̱ aha ngu kyia nné e̱ngwie̱, ne nyi nje ne nje nyi nyrrukiking a tsi mbe.

Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ ri naana nje aha ni, he ngbe aha nje nyrrukiki nne e̱ngwie̱, Krristi Jesu re ti ehwie sheng ngu zhwozhwo aha re hwie̱ kyang mwa yi ne re̱se̱ nné ne mbe cwo a sa rie a ngu ré she ce he̱rri tiya.
Grime̱ ngbe de nyi na ngu he̱rri tiya tiya, ngu ne ngu nyi Nggwe̱ he̱rri tiya, ne ko ce ngu bi gama we̱, ne koó ki ri we̱, ne nyi we ngu nggaa ngu ngu nyi Be̱ne̱. Re shi ni.
Kowe nje Timoti, nje re ngwa nka ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne re-nka ne i ke̱she ti re̱se̱ng gbangba a rici ngwe̱. Nde ré re shwe̱ ehwie ngbe ngwe̱ kwe̱ te̱nte̱ cwe,
ngwe̱ ke̱ we ne bro sa rie ngwe̱ ngbe ne onu rie ne ngu shi wiriri. Yá nneywí e̱ á ci sa rie mbe e̱ ci shweni aha ne ko mbe zhwe kya ne ronu rie mbe we mie̱ng we̱.
A tsi mbe e̱ a bi Himenayu, ngbe Alezanda ne nje we ngwa a nva Shetani, ngbe ré mie̱ yankya de̱ ré dzie̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Aha ni, a ce̱ucwung, nje níng shwé̱ rehwie he nyi ku Be̱ne̱, nyi mwo rumwo, nyi cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱, nyi bra ki ci kijie̱ng aha ga nné zhwozhwo,
aha nggwé̱ ngbe ga brrá nné gonati zhwozhwo, aha ngbe nzhi srra rina rina a yarri owu Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ wiri a yarri ko nda.
Nyi ngwiee ngu bi rina ngu bra klá Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Nnenkyia nzhi ehwie.
A cé̱ nneywí zhwozhwo ré she kyia re bra hu re̱se̱ nka raywrra.
Aha a bi Be̱ne̱ we zunzrru, nne yó zetsi Be̱ne̱ ngbe nneywi e̱ bra shi we zunzrru wa, ngu nne ana nyi Krristi Jesu,
ne ngu ngwa rici ngu aha ngu se̱ ga nné zhwozhwo, á bra ngwa sheede nna a zheng ye̱ye̱rri.
A bra nyi aha ni ne e ning ci n hwie̱ nne brro nka ngbe nnenté re nzhi nwie Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱ ngbe n we mie̱ nka a yarri sa rie ngbe raywrra. A nyi nka raywrra ne nje hé ne̱, ko nyi rabrra we̱.
Aha ni nje ce̱ he nné ntó ko he ré kywo nva wiri mbe ze nwie ku Be̱ne̱ we̱sa ne rimwi ka ronu ce.

Nje bra ce̱ he mbrrú ré ci ankya na ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne ko ngu shi we ci nshwu we̱, shi de̱ ré nyi nci mbe re zhwo zhwo, ka ré nyi risa ne zinarriya, ka zunkya, ka ne ankya ci rwe̱ na ngu zhwo ncwe̱ we̱;
me̱di ré nyi re-cwuo rina shi ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ne mbrrú ne mbe yé Be̱ne̱ mbè.
Mbrru a re srra cereng ngbe re mie̱ a yarri nywe̱ rici zhwozhwo.
Ko nje shî he mbrrú re mie nka ka re bi de̱me̱ a zete nne nto we̱, me̱di re srra ranng.
Aha á i ke̱she nyi Domu wire ne e nyi Hawa.
Ko bra nyi Domu ne i ki brra we̱, a nyi ngu mbrru a ne i ki brra he̱rri ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Me̱di mbrru a shi she kyia a yarri bî rewe, kundu ne ngu ke̱ we ne bi sa rie, ngu ce̱ nné, ngu srra wiri nwie nyi kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri.
Nka ne̱ nyi cwu nka: ko nye̱ ne ngu cé̱ he ngu hwie̱ nne ci nkwile̱ ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka, a cé̱ te̱nte̱ cwuo.

Mahu aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe nne ne ngu cí nkwile̱ ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka re nyi nne ne ko ngu bi kya ré ki kwe fe̱li we̱, re bi we mbrru zunzrru, re ci nkwile̱ ne rici ngu; re cwo rici ngu rina, re bi grime̱ a nyyi nné, re nyi nne ne ngu si nné ice, re hung mie̱ nka.
Shi de̱ re nyi nne shwe hwieen we̱, de̱ re nyi nne kre ko we̱, me̱di re nyi nne nywe̱ rici, de̱ re nyi nne bi nka ngbe ya nne we̱, de̱ re bra nyi nne ne ngu cé̱ ncwé̱ yang we̱;
re nyi nne ne ngu hung cwo eri na ngu rina rina, ne ngu ci rewe ngu á ki ho nka nwie ki ngwa grime̱ a yarri ko nda.
Kundu de̱ nne e̱ hung cwo eri na ngu we̱, we̱ ce̱ rimi re hung cwo ekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ e̱e̱?
Shi de̱ re nyi nné ne ngu se̱ ywe̱ hwing we̱, kishi a ri ne̱ ne kywo rici ze he̱rri re ci shweni shi Shetani ne i ki nyi nka;
re bra nyi nne ne ngu bi grime̱ a nwie nné riywe̱ ce̱ nka, kishi á ri ki kwe fe̱li ngbe Shetani re ki ci nggrriisi re grre̱.
A shi we ni ma, nnencwuo a yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka re nyi nne ne e ki ngwá grime̱, de̱ re nyi nne bi ronu wehwie we̱, de̱ re nyi nne hwieen we̱, de̱ re nyi nne bi riyii ncwé̱ we̱;
re nyi nne ne ngu bró kya ne e níng ting aha sa rie nzhi a nu rie ne ngu shi wiriri.
Ré ke̱she ré we mwa ré ri wire, á ri she ne ko mbe nyi yankya wie̱e̱ni we̱ wire wé̱ we ci ré hwie̱ nnencwuó a yarri nné ce̱ nka.
A shi we ni ma ne mbrrúng, ré nyi mbrrú ne e we ngwa grime̱, shi de̱ ré nyi mbrrú brra ronu we̱; ré nyi mbrrú ci nkwile̱ ne nci mbe ne e hung sa rie a mbe a yarri ko nda.
Nnencwuo yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka re nyi nne bi we mbrru zunzrru, ne ngu ci nkwile̱ ne rewe ngu ngbe eri ngu zhwozhwo rina rina.
Nnencwuó nke ne mbe nyi cwuo mbe rina rina wé̱ she grime̱ a nyyi nné, he̱rri wé̱ hung he nka sa rie mbe a Krristi Jesu we dengge.
Shi ne nje wie krre̱de̱ ne̱ re be nwie nyi, nje hwie he nje rā wre̱ ne be nwie nyi,
me̱di kundu ne e ri shi ning dzio zhe, nje ce̱ nyi hu zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi bi a ri Be̱ne̱, ne ngu nyi ekpri nné ce̱ nka Be̱ne̱ bi ce, ne ngu nyi riti raywrra ngbe ne iitang.
Ko nyi kya ré rin rin ma gung we̱, sa rie nzhi e̱ shi a kya ne ngu shi cwuncwuu,
A i ya wre̱ yarri ikpe nneywi,
Nshe Wiri i ti he nyi nne raywrra,
re-njeli i ki ri.
Á i brro nka ngu a re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo,
á i sa rie a ngu ko he a be ngwie̱,
á bra i ki fo re nzhi zinye̱.
Nshe Wiri e̱ tí we gbeng he a rotu krrucing, yá ri we ni ce̱ nka ngbe wé̱ ne̱ ne zhwe rabrra yá re-nshe le̱le̱ ngbe yá re-nka ne e mie̱ ne ngu wru nwie rije.
Nné mié̱ zhwe re-nka ana á nyi nné rabrra ne mbe brrá ronu ne ronu rie mbe vi shi shi á we kpre ne kprincwe̱ ne ngu shwo a nro.
Á hé de̱ ré rwe nyrra we̱, he de̱ ré ye yá re-nzhwe yâ we̱. Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi yâ aha ngbe nné ne mbe sa rie a ngu ne mbe bra hu re̱se̱ng ré se̱ ne nva wehwie nwie ki ci kijie̱ng.
Aha ko nda ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi e̱ bi rina, shi de̱ ré ra ya we̱ kundu ne e se̱ ne nva wehwie ne ki ci kijie̱ng,
aha nka Be̱ne̱ ngbe rumwo ne e mwo a ki ci ci wiri.

Kundu ngwe̱ ngwá re-gimbe e̱ re-nka ne̱, ngwe̱ e̱ hwie̱ te̱nte̱ nnencwuo Krristi Jesu, shi ne ngwe̱ shwe rishwe ne nka ne nzhi ning sa rie ne ngu nyi nka te̱nte̱ng ne ngwe̱ mie̱ ne ngwe̱ bra shi nwie zhweng.
Me̱di to gbong ne re-nka shweni ngbe re-nkaashwe hó mbrrú, tu we rici nwie mie̱ng aha ngbe ngwe̱ bi e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱.
Na rwe̱ aha ning bra ci igbe̱ e̱ a bi e̱we̱ mpe̱ni tsie̱, me̱di tu rici yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ bi mpe̱ni a yarri ko nda, aha a cwo mi ne mwo rina a srra na zhe ne ngbe a zhe ne ngu cwo be.
Cwu nka ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ko nye̱ re shî e̱ nyi ngu ne̱.
A nyi aha ni ne nzhi yaa ta nwie kwe̱ re̱kwe̱, aha ne nzhi sa riyii a Be̱ne̱ bi ce, ne ngu nyi Nnenkyia ga nné zhwozhwo, shi ngra nyi nné ce̱ nka wo.
Ngwa nné ce̱ nka re-nka ne̱, ngwe̱ bra we mie̱ng.

Shi de ngwe̱ we ya nne re re dzie̱ he ngwe̱ nyi e̱we̱we we̱, me̱di nde ngwe̱ hwie̱ kyang mi yi a nwie nné ce̱ nka a yarri nka ngwe̱, ngbe srra ngwe̱, ngbe ce̱ ne ngwe̱ ce̱ nné, ngbe sa rie ngwe̱, ngbe e̱kpe̱e̱ wiri ngwe̱.
Tu rici nwie hwie nné ce̱ nka krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱, ngwe̱ we brro nka, ngwe̱ bra we mie̱ nka ne nje cwo be.
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ we we̱sa nyi cwuo ne beewa ne ngu shi yarri ngwe̱, ne i re ngwa a nka nné ti re̱se̱ng a zhe ne ekpri brra nné ce̱ nka mbe i re gara nva ana we̱.
Nyi ga re-ankya ne̱, ning tu rici a mbe, aha ngbe ko nye̱ re ri ye yincwuee ngwe̱.
Ci nkwile̱ ne rici ngwe̱ ngbe kya ne ngwe̱ mie̱ nnéng, aha kundu ngwe̱ nyi ni, ngwe̱ shi yaa kyia we rici ngwe̱ ngbe nné ne mbe re ho.
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ti brra nne ne ren we̱, me̱di ki he nka shi nyi be̱ ngwe̱. Cwo ne kpi ze̱ rewerento a shi á nyi re-gimbe ngwe̱.
Cwo ne brrá mbrrú a shi shi de̱ ngwe̱ ma, ngwe̱ bra cwo ne ze̱ rewerembrru a shi shi re-gimbe ngwe̱ ne ehwie wiri.
Ci nkwile̱ ne kpambrrú ne cence koó bi nné we sheng we̱.

Me̱di kundu kpambrru a bi rewe ka re-enve, nde ré ke̱she mie̱ nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ e̱ a yarri ri mbe nwie ci nkwile̱ ne nné mbe, ngbe ré we trra cwuo ne mbe i we nying. Kya ne ngu kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie nyi nke ne̱.
Kpambrru ne ngu shi we nggaa ngu, ne ko ngu bi nne ki sheng we̱, a sá riyii a Be̱ne̱ ne ngu srra re mwo rumwo re ku Be̱ne̱ totu ne te̱ne̱.
Me̱di kpambrru ne ngu yaa sa nwie ho shwing nna, aa ci kweng ko ngbe ne ngu ning shi nce.
We ngwa re-nka ne̱ kishi yá mbe ri she kya ne e shi we cwi.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ra ci nkwile̱ ne nné ngu, shi ngra nyi nné ri ngu we̱, mahu a ce̱trrí ce̱ nka he̱rri ma canca nne ra nka ne ngu.
Shi de̱ ré ci lo kpambrru a tsi kpambrrú we̱ se ne ngu cwu re-rie nshwa rritsie̱ wire, ne ngu bra i srra rina rina ne nto ngu;

re bra nyi mbrru ne e ki hu ne e̱kpe̱e̱ re-cwuo rina, ne ngu i mie̱ e̱we̱e̱ rewe ngu ciee rina, ne ngu si nné ice, ne ngu kyu nné wiri nta, ne ngu she nne ne mbe shi cincing, ne ngu bra ngwa rici nwie nyi re-cwuo rina a yarri ko nda.
Me̱di shi de̱ ngwe̱ wre̱ ne ning ci kpambrrú ne mbe nyi rana mbrrú we̱; aha kundu ecwue ri shwe rici mbe ne ko mbe hung ngwa rici nwie Krristi we̱, wé̱ ne̱ ne kre he mbe drro;
ngbe wé̱ yaa ci vini aha ne ko mbe bro jee ne mbe ke̱she sa we̱.

We̱sa ni, wé̱ ngwie ya e̱kpe̱e̱ng srra shweni nwie gye̱ re̱gye̱ a reri reri; he̱rri ko we̱ nyi we cwuong srra shweni e̱ we̱, me̱di wé̱ srra nwie brra ronu ne mbe grra ragrra re he re-nka ne ko ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré he we̱.
Aha ni, nje ri a mwa ye̱ye̱rri kpambrrú ne mbe nyi rana mbrrú a ré rwe nyrra, ré bî rewe ngbe ré ci nkwile̱ ne reri mbe, kishi rwinko nzhi ri she de̱me̱ng he kya ngu shi wie̱e̱ni a rici nzhi.
He̱rri ma yá kpambrrú a, á a klu nwie zhwe Shetani.
Me̱di kundu ya mbrru ce̱ nka ri bi kpambrrú a tari ngu, nde re we sheng, shi de̱ re we ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne nkpe nna we̱, aha ngbe ekpri nné ce̱ nka a re hung she kpambrrú na mbe shi we nggaa mbe.
Brrá nné na ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe nyi cwuo rina rina á be ré we ngwa grime̱ ré bra we sheng, shi ngra nyi nné mbiye ne mbe yaa ta nwie brro nka re mie̱ nné nka ana we̱.
Aha krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ rwe nzhimi onu a zhe ne ngu shi she nkya we̱.”
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ shî nka ne e he a rici ya brra nne na ekpri nné ce̱ nka we̱, se ka a bi re-sheede wehwie ka wetsie̱ wire.
Nné mbiye ne mbe ke̱ we ne nyi e̱ngwie̱, we ti brru mbe a nyyi ko nye̱ aha ngbe re̱se̱ nné e̱ zhwozhwo ré ci owu.
Nje re ti re-nka ne̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ngbe Krristi Jesu ngbe re-njeli ne e kyie kyie, he ngwe̱ ngwa re-nka ne̱ we̱sa ne ce̱ rici, he ngwe̱ bra nyi ko nda we̱sa ne kyie nné kyie kyie.
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ shi hooro nwie gara ya nne nva aha re nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ we̱, shi de̱ ngwe̱ bra ci rici ngwe̱ a e̱ngwie̱ ya nne we̱. Yaa ci ngwe̱ shi wiri.
Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ke̱ we ne shwe we rishi hwerri we̱, shwe e̱we̱ rishi ruto tsie̱ aha ehwie wie ngwe̱ ngbe ne riywe̱ gbingbi ne ngwe̱ srra re nying ana.
Re-e̱ngwie̱ yá nné e̱ á shi we gbeng, á nyia re nzhi ke̱she mbe ré ya cwu nwieng nyi nka, me̱di na yá á cwo a timi a ncwuee.
A shi we ni wa, re-cwuo rina a á shi we gbeng, ko ngbe ne de̱ mbe shi gbeng we̱, ko shi ré hwie̱ a la la we̱.
Nde re̱se̱ nné mbiye ne mbe nyi hwié ré ngwa re-be̱ri mbe grime̱ a yarri ko nda, kishi lo Be̱ne̱ ngbe nka ne nzhi mié̱ ri hwie̱ kya cwi.

Hwié mbiye ne re-be̱ri mbe nyi nné ce̱ nka shi de̱ ré we dzie̱ aha ne ga mbe zhwozhwo nyi re-gimbe we̱, me̱di ré ning bra tu rici nwie we nyi cwuo, aha nné ne mbe shi ye mpe̱ni cwuo nna nyi nné ce̱ nka ne mbe we ce̱.
We mie̱ re-nka ne̱ nwie cwe nva ne mbe ré nyi ni.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ri mie̱ yaka nka ne ngu shi ka, ne ko ngu shi tsantsa ne nti nka Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ngbe nka ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri ne na e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱,

mahu a kywó rici ze, koo bra hu ko yankya we̱. A bra bi ya e̱kpe̱e̱ng kre we he ré srra nwie yaa kwa be nwie yaa ti ronu ce ne re-nka ne mbe cwo mi ne ehwie shwo, ngbe re̱kwe̱, ngbe yaa cwi, ngbe hwie yi he ya nne bi vini hwie̱ hwie̱,
ngbe ne srra we nwie yaa nye̱ ngbe nné ne ronu rie mbe dzio, ne mbe hwie̱ hwerri we̱sa raywrra. A nwie mbe, zhwe Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi we ya rêng ci ncwe̱.
Me̱di rishwe a yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ng zhwe Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi bi kijie̱ng a kya ne ngwe̱ bi.
Aha ko nzhi i be a be ngwie̱ ne̱ ne yankya we̱, ko nzhi bra ri hung fo yankya a yarring we̱.
Aha ni kundu nzhi bi yâ ye ngbe ankya ci rwe̱, aa níng be.

Me̱di nné mbe ne mbe ce̱ he mbe ci ncwe̱ e̱ á kpi yarri mwa ri, ngbe re-ankyang grre̱, ngbe ga re-ankya ecwue rumwa rumwa ne ngu shwé rici mbe ngbe we̱ we dzio, he̱rri we̱ we ci wé̱ ciywi re nzhi ci shweni zhwozhwo.
Aha riyii ncwe̱ e̱ nyi riti ko zohu zhwe e̱ngwie̱. Yá nné e̱ aha kre ncwe̱, á we sa rie mbe, he̱rri á yaa dzio rehwie ne re-ge̱zhe̱ we yang.
Me̱di ngwe̱ nne Be̱ne̱ e̱, nyi ze̱nze̱ ne ga re-ankya ne̱ zhwozhwo, ngwe̱ kre we e̱kpe̱e̱ redziee, ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe ne sa rie, ngbe ce̱, ngbe yaa rwe, ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ ranng.
To te̱nte̱ ncii ne nzhi ning sa rie e̱ ho; bro ce na he̱rri tiya ne ngwe̱ bi e̱, ne ngu nyi kwili ye ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i re ye a zhe ne ngwe̱ i ngwa te̱nte̱ sheede a nyyi nneywí piriri.
Nje re ngwa nka a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ngwá ga re-ankya ce, ngbe a nyyi Krristi Jesu ne ngu i ngwa te̱nte̱ sheede a nyyi Buntu Bilatu a yarri nka ngu,
he ngwe̱ zhwe nti nka ne̱ tsantsa we̱sa ne ya vini he̱rri zhe ne Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ri ya wre̱,
ne zhe nna cwo a ci ye̱ye̱rri shi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning sang — ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu be ré ki de, ne nyi we ngu nggaa ngu ngu bi igbe̱ zhwozhwo, ne ngu nyi Nggwe̱ re-nggwe̱ ngbe Brrabe̱ na re-brrabe̱.
A nyi we ngu nggaa ngu ne ko ngu hú we̱; ne ngu srra yarri nse̱ ne ko bi ré hung ywa dudu we̱, ne ko bi nne ngu sa ki ri ka re hung ki ri we̱. Grime̱ ngbe ne igbe̱ nyi na ngu he̱rri tiya. A shi ni.

Ngwa nné bi va na re-ankya ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ nka he shi de̱ ré cwe zewe we̱, de̱ re bra sa riyii a re-dukyie̱e̱ we̱ aha koó fo zhe we̱, me̱di ré sa riyii a Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng ngwa ko nda ne ehwie zunzrru aha nzhi ning ho shwing.
Ré nyi rina, ré ning bra nyi re-cwuo rina, ré shi wang nwie ngwang, ré bra she kpi nnéng.
Kundu mbe nyi ni, wé̱ yaa tsu dukyie̱e̱ we rici mbe, te̱nte̱ dukyie̱e̱ aha zhe ne ngu cwo be, aha ngbe á ri she ce na ne ngu nyi te̱nte̱ ce.
Ngwe̱ Timoti e̱, ci nkwile̱ ne kya ne e re ngwa ngwe̱ nyi. Ti rici ngwe̱ a re-nka shweni na nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe ronu ce shweni ne yá fo he nyi “hu re̱se̱ng”, me̱di nyi rabrra.
Aha yá ne mbe zhwe zhwe re-nka ne e mie̱ ana á we sa rie mbe. Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re shi ngbe ne nyi.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie nje Bulu, nnente Krristi Jesu ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱, aha ngbe n ti re̱se̱ jee ngu aha ce ne e she a yarri Krristi Jesu.
Nje wie re nzhi nwie Timoti, kowe ce̱ nje.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ngbe Krristi Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi re shi ngbe ne ngwe̱, re ri naana ngwe̱, re bra re ngwa srra rina.
Nje cí Be̱ne̱ ne nje ki nyí cwuo kijie̱ng ne onu rie nje wang, we shi ne yó nje mbe i nyi, nje srra re lu ne ngwe̱ a yarri re-ku Be̱ne̱ nje totu ne te̱ne̱.
A zhe ne nje lú ne reyii ngwe̱, ma n kre he nje rā re ri, aha ngbe ehwie nje re shî ne rekwi.
Nje lú ne te̱nte̱ sa rie ngwe̱, ne ngu i ke̱she shi a yarri Lowe, yo ngwe̱ mbrru, ngbe yarri de̱ ngwe̱ Yunisi. Nje bra hu he cence a zhe ne ne̱, zhwe sa rie ana ke̱ we ne shi yarri ngwe̱ ma.
A nyi aha ni ne nje re lú he shi de̱ ngwe̱ we beewa ngwe̱ ne Be̱ne̱ i re ngwa a zhe ne nje i re gara va ana re ci nsharan we̱,
aha ko Nshe Wiri ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa a nyi nang to owu we̱, se ka nzhi bi igbe̱, nzhi yaa ce̱, nzhi bra hung ci nkwile̱ ne nci nzhi.

Aha ni shi de̱ ngwe̱ to nshwu ngwa sheede aha Brrabe̱ nzhi ka ngwe̱ to nshwu nje aha ne nje shi gyiaa aha ngu we̱, me̱di nde nzhi mwe gbengbe nzhi yaa rwe yarri shwe ge̱zhe̱ aha Nka Rina ne̱ ne igbe̱ Be̱ne̱.

Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng kyia, ngu a bra níng ye he nzhi ci nné wiri ngu, ko aha ya cwuo ne nzhi ki nying we̱, me̱di nyi we kya ne ngu rwe nying, ngbe ne ehwie rina ngu re be nwie nzhi a yarri Krristi Jesu tu we ce̱ucwu re-zhe.
A zhe ne ne̱ aa bra níng ti ko nda we gbeng a be ne Nnenkyia nzhi Krristi Jesu ngu be, ngu ya ci igbe̱ hu ci shweni, ngu a níng tsie̱ nse̱ a rêng she ce ngbe srra we̱sa hu ne Nka Rina.
A nyi aha Nka Rina ne̱ ne e ning ci nje hwie̱ nne brro nka, ngbe nnente, ngbe nne mie̱ nka.

Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje shwé ge̱zhe̱ shi ne nje shi mi ne̱. Gbengbe ni ma, ko ning bi nshwu we̱, aha nje hu nne ne nje sa rie a ngu, nje bra hu cence he aa hung cwo kya ne ngu ning ngwa n brro he̱rri re nzhi cwu Tung be ngu.
Nde nka ne ngwe̱ ho a nwie nje ne ngu shi tsantsa re hwie̱ kya ne ngwe̱ shi zhwe hwie̱ng, a yarri sa rie a Krristi Jesu ngbe ce̱ kpi re-gimbe.
Nde igbe̱ Nshe Wiri ne ngu shi yarri nzhi re re sheng ngbe ngwe̱ ci nkwile̱ ne kya ne e re ngwa ngwe̱ nyi.
Ngwe̱ hu he ga nné Asia á ning bra emerin, he̱rri ngbe ne Fijelu ngbe Hemojini.
Nde Brrabe̱ re ri naana nné ri Onesiforru, aha a i srra re ning shwe̱ ehwie ko zohu zhe, ko i to nshwu gyiaa nje we̱.
Ko zohu zhe ne ngu i shi ya wre̱ a Rroma, ngbe we̱ ning kre we kre we kre se ngu ning she.
Nde Brrabe̱ ri ri naana ngu a Tung be ngu. Ngwe̱ ma ngwe̱ hu zhwe re-rê kanka kanka ne ngu i ning sheng a Afisa.
Aha ni ngwe̱ e̱, kowe nje, yo ne igbe̱ a yarri ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi a yarri Krristi Jesu.
Fo re-nka ne ngwe̱ ho nje he a nyyi nneywí piriri ne mbe hwie̱ re-sheedeng, ngbe ngwe̱ mie̱ yá nné na ne e hung sa rie a mbe ne mbe shi hung mie̱ kpi nnéng ma.
Yaa rwe nwie shwe ge̱zhe̱ ngbe ne nzhi shi te̱nte̱ shezhi Krristi Jesu.
Ko bi shezhi ne ngu shi we ncwuo ngu re bra we re nzhi nyi yaka zhwe cwuo we̱, tu ne ngu kre he ngu kla be̱ri ngu ehwie.
We ni wa, nne nke ne ngu shi tsi nné to ncii e̱, ko bi re she ledeng nna we̱, se ne ngu zhwe re-ankya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri re nyi.
A bra nyi nne kaa nke ne ngu sa rici ncwuo ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri re she yâ na ne e ke̱she ca.
Hwie nka a zete kya ne nje he ne̱, aha Brrabe̱ shi re ngwa hu re̱se̱ng a yarri ko nda.
Lu ne Jesu Krristi ne i ki deze nhu, ngu ne ngu wru a nzhwe Dooda, we shi Nka Rina ne nje i brro.
A nyi aha brro Nka Rina ne̱ ne nje shi shwe ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu ya cwu na ne e ning ci re-gyiaa a nva shi nyi ya nne e̱ngwie̱ ne̱. Me̱di koó ci nka Be̱ne̱ a gyiaa we̱.
A nyi aha ni ne nje yaa rwe yarri ko nda aha nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu kyie, aha ngbe ré she kyia ne e she a yarri Krristi Jesu, ré bra she grime̱ he̱rri tiya.
Nka ne̱ nyi cwu nka, shi ne e wie he,
“Kundu nzhi hu ngbe ne ngu,
nzhi e̱ ri srra nce ngbe ne ngu wa.
Kundu nzhi ke̱ we ne yaa rwe,
nzhi e̱ ri ye ringgwe̱ ngbe ne ngu wa.
Me̱di kundu nzhi klo he ko nzhi nyi na ngu we̱,
we̱ ri klo ma he ko ngu nyi na nzhi we̱.
Kundu nzhi ki bra emerin,
ko shi re we we̱sa nyi kya ne ngu rwe nying we̱,
aha ko shi re bra e̱kpe̱e̱ ngu we̱.”
Srra re lu nneywí e̱ re-nka ne̱, ngwe̱ we ngwa nka a nyyi Be̱ne̱ he ré we ni kwe̱li re-nka, aha ko bi mpe̱ni we̱, se ka re dzio we nné hong nna.
Tu rici ngbe ngwe̱ ti rici ngwe̱ he ngwe̱ nyi te̱nte̱ nne a nyyi Be̱ne̱, nnencwuo ne ko bi riwie̱ ré ki ci nshwu we̱, ne ngu tí nneywí nka raywrra tsantsa.
Nyi ze̱nze̱ ne re-nka shweni nang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱, aha a kwá nneywí ngbe ré srra ya srra na riywe̱ e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱.
Zhwe mie̱ nka ana shi shi ya hwe ne ngu yé rwe̱. A tsi nné mie̱ zhwe nka ana a ning bi Himenayu ngbe Filetu,
ne mbe we rê raywrra, mbe ne̱ ne he he zheng vu nné kwi e̱ wara, he̱rri á ci kpi nné e̱ á we ni ce̱ nka.

Gbengbe ni, riti runo ne Be̱ne̱ ngu sa aa yo gbe̱ngbe̱, ne nti nka ne e ning wieng he, “Brrabe̱ hu nné mbiye ne mbe nyi na ngu.” We̱sa ni, “Nde ko nye̱ ne ngu he ngu nyí na Brrabe̱ re we ni re-cwuo e̱ngwie̱.”

A yarri brra eri e̱ ko nyi we re-nzhwe ankya ne e nyi ne zinarriya ngbe azrrufa we̱, me̱di a bi re-na ne e nyi ne rekwe ngbe na rwe̱; á nyi yá aha re-cwuo ne mbe bi grime̱, á a nyi yá aha re-cwuo dede.
Aha ni nne nke ne ngu yaa ci ci wiri ne ga re-ankya e̱ngwie̱ ne̱, we̱ hwie̱ kya ncwuo bi grime̱, ne e kyie, ne ngu bi mpe̱ni a ncwuo Be̱ri, ne e bra nyi sa sa aha ko zohu cwuo rina.
Nyi ze̱nze̱ ne ecwue ankya ze̱, tu rici nyi redziee, ngwe̱ bi sa rie, ngbe ce̱, ngbe srra rina gbengbe ne nné mbe ne mbe kyie̱ Brrabe̱ ne ehwie wiri.
Shi de̱ re bi onu ngwe̱ a yarri ronu ce shweni na riywe̱ hung we̱, tu ne ngwe̱ hu re̱se̱ng he á cwo mi ne ko.
Koo bra mwa ye̱ye̱rr ngbe hwie Brrabe̱ re bi nka ne ya nne we̱, me̱di re nyi ko nye̱ gbagba, re hung mie̱ nka, re hung yaa rwe,
re hung mie̱ nné ce̱trri nka ngung a yarri ehwie sheng nwie hwie he ka Be̱ne̱ re we cwu ehwie ngbe ré se̱ ywe̱, ré hu raywrra.
Wire wé̱ hu ning brru re be yarri nkwile̱ mbe, ngbe wé̱ to drre̱ eetsie ne Shetani ngu we sang, ne ngu we prre aha ré ki nyi cwuo.
Me̱di hu re̱se̱ng fang, he a ri bi ngwie̱ bi rwe̱ a rotu krrucing.
Nneywí ri ne̱ ne ce̱ we nci mbe ngbe ncwé̱ mbe. Á ri cwe zewe nwie yaa kywo. Á ri he re-nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱, á ri ra ho nné we bî nka, koó ri bi kijie̱ng we̱, koó ri to owu Be̱ne̱ we̱,
koó ri yaa ce̱ we̱, á ri yaa bro hwie, á ri yaa dzio lo, ko nné ri hung ci nkwile̱ ne nci mbe we̱, koó ri bi naana we̱, koó ri ce̱ kya ne ngu shi tsantsa we̱,
á ri tiyi shi mbe yaa ce̱ me̱di á yaa ti ruwu, á ri nyi ankya we̱sa ne hwie nka, á ri kywo nci ze, á ri ce̱ ho shwing re ne̱ ce̱ ne mbe ce̱ Be̱ne̱,
Á ri tiyi shi mbe bi e̱kpe̱e̱ng zhwe Be̱ne̱, me̱di nyi we rabrra. To ze̱nze̱ ne zhwe nné ana.
Aha yá mbe ngwi a reri reri nwie shwe̱li mbrrú ne mbe shi brrubrru ne mbe srra re hwie re-e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe nyi, ne ecwue ga re-nzhwe ankya ngwie̱ngwie̱ bra we kwa,
zhwe mbrrú ne mbe yaa sa nwie ho ko zohu nka hwi ne e be mi, me̱di gbengbe ni koó hung hu re̱se̱ raywrra we̱.
We shi shi Jenisi ngbe Jambrresi mbe i ra Musa nka,
Me̱di koó cwo a cwu gbong we̱ we shi shi nné mbiye ana, aha ko nye̱ cwo a ri riywe̱ zentsi mbe e̱ we prrita.

Me̱di ngwe̱ Timoti e̱, ngwe̱ zhwe re-ankya ne nje mié̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe zhwe srra nje, ngbe kya kre nje a srra, ngbe zhwe sa rie nje, ngbe zhwe ehwie sheng nje, ngbe zhwe ce̱ ne nje ce̱ nné, ngbe zhwe yaa rwe nje,
ngbe zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne nje shwe ngbe re-cinci. Ngwe̱ hu zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne nje i shwe a Antakyia, ngbe a Ikoniya ngbe a Listrra ne nje yaa rwe yarring, ngbe Brrabe̱ e̱ ning ti a yarri mbe zhwozhwo.
Cence, ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ srra ne e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ a yarri Krristi Jesu, we̱ shwe ge̱zhe̱.
Me̱di nné hwie̱ ngbe nné shwe̱li nné e̱ á shi ning bra dzio we dzio, nwie brra nné, ne e we brra mbe e̱ ma.
Me̱di ngwe̱ e̱, ke̱ we ne zhwe kya ne ngwe̱ mie̱, ne ngwe̱ bra hu cence he shî ni, aha ngwe̱ hu zhwe nné ne ngwe̱ mie̱ a nwie mbe,
ngwe̱ bra hu he tu ne ngwe̱ wru we e̱we̱we, ngwe̱ hu re̱se̱ Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ngu shi wiri, ne ngu hung re ngwa zentsing she kyia aha sa rie a Krristi Jesu.
Ga nti nka ne e wie yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo wru nwie Be̱ne̱, a bi mpe̱ni aha mie̱ nka, ngbe yhwire nné, ré bra ning ti nneywí brru mbe, ngbe ré bra ning mie̱ nneywí redziee,
aha ngbe ko zohu nne Be̱ne̱ re bi hu re̱se̱ ko nda aha ko zohu cwuo rina.
Nje re ngwa nka a nyyi Be̱ne̱ ngbe Krristi Jesu, ne ngu ri nyi nné nce ngbe nné kwi nka, aha ne ngu bra ri be wa ngbe re ye ringgwe̱.
Nje re ngwa nka he ngwe̱ brro Nka Be̱ne̱ e̱, ka re bi zhe ka de̱ re bi zhe we̱, ngwe̱ yaa rwe nwie ti nneywí brru mbe, ngwe̱ we yhwire, ngwe̱ we shwe̱ rehwie ko zohu zhe a yarri we mie̱ nka.
Aha zhe cwo be ne ko nneywí cwo a ce̱ ho nka raywrra we̱, ngbe wé̱ zhwe we kya ne rehwie mbe cé̱, he̱rri wé̱ yaa tsu nné we mie̱ kya ne re-uucwu mbe ce̱ hong.
Á ri ra ho nka raywrra, ngbe wé̱ ci nkwile̱ ne re-nkaashwe shweni.
Me̱di ngwe̱ e̱, sa rici ngwe̱ nwie zunzrru, yaa rwe ne ge̱zhe̱, nyi cwuong brro Nka Rina, fro cwuo ne Be̱ne̱ ngu re ngwa.
Aha nje e̱, shi shi ya teede, nje ngwa ce nje, zheng hu nje e̱ sa dudu.
Nje kwe̱ te̱nte̱ ko, nje fro ncii nje e̱, nje bro nka ne nzhi ning sa rie.

Kya ne ngu ce̱ a zhe ne ne̱, nje tsió we lede ncwuo redziee nje, ne Brrabe̱ ne ngu nyí nka tsantsa ngu ri ning ngwa a Tuuye, ko nyi we nje nggaa nje wo, me̱di ngbe ne ga nné zhwozhwo ne mbe tsió he mbe ri wre̱ ngu.
Nyi koori ngwe̱ be nwie nje we hwiehwie,
aha Dema a ci riyii ankya ngwie̱ ne̱, he̱rri aa to ning we, aa ne̱ re nzhi Tasalonika. Krrise fu Galati, Titu a fu Dalmati ma.
A nyi we Luka ngu hwie̱ ngbe nje. She Marrku ngwe̱ be ngbe ne ngu, aha a ning shéng we yang a ncwuo.
Nje te Tikyiku re nzhi Afisa.
A zhe ne ngwe̱ ri shi cwo be, ning fo kuntu nje ne nje i we a nwie Kapu a Tarruwasa, ngbe ne re-krre̱de̱ ana, shi ngra nyi tekpeng wie cwuo ana we̱.
Alezanda ne ngu cwú re-kprincwe̱ ana aa ning nyi kya ne ngu shi wie̱e̱ni. Be̱ne̱ shi ki trra kya ne ngu nyi.
Nyi te̱nte̱ ne ngu, aha a ra nka ne nzhi brro ne̱ kyememe.
A zhe ne nje i ke̱she yo aha ngbe n he nka a zete re-nka ne i ning cing, ko bi nne ngu i yo ngbe nje we̱, ko nye̱ i to ning we. Shi de̱ Be̱ne̱ re wie kya mbe i nyi ana sa we̱.
Me̱di Brrabe̱ i shi ngbe nje, aa ning ngwa igbe̱ ngbe n ning brro nka, aha ngbe ga nné re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ré ho, he̱rri aa ning ti a nu ze̱kyi.
Brrabe̱ shi ning kye̱ ne ko zohu zhwe hwie̱, ngbe we̱ ywa ne nje a ringgwe̱ ngu na zinye̱ rina rina. Grime̱ nyi na ngu he̱rri tiya tiya. A shi ni.
Ning dzie Prriska ngbe Akyila ngbe nné ri Onesiforru.
Errastu i hwie̱ a Korrinti, nje bra i we Trrofimu ne riywe̱ gbingbi a Miletu.
Nyi koori ngbe ngwe̱ ya wre̱ he ne ne zhe wu srru rishi ci. Yubulu, ngbe Pude, ngbe Linu, ngbe Klawudia, ngbe re-gimbe zhwozhwo re dzie.
Nde Brrabe̱ re shi ngbe ngwe̱.
Ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re shi ngbe nyi.

Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie nje Bulu hwie Be̱ne̱, ne nje nyi nnente Jesu Krristi, aha sa rie nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ we kyie re ning bra ci igbe̱, ngbe n bra we ci ré hu re̱se̱ nka raywrra ne ngu shi we ci ré srra zhwe srra ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱.
Ngbe wé̱ hung sa riyii a ce he̱rri tiya ne Be̱ne̱ ne ko ngu ve rabrra we̱ ngu i níng sa jee gannyi tiya ne ko á ce̱ hwie zhe we̱.
Ne zhe ngu he ngu ya ci ye̱ye̱rri, aa ti nka ngu a yarri nka ne e ning ci n brro, ne nje brro ne igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Nnenkyia nzhi.
Nje wie re nzhi nwie ngwe̱ Titu, te̱nte̱ ewe nje a yarri sa rie ne ga nzhi gbengbe nzhi bi.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ngbe Krristi Jesu Nnenkyia nzhi re shi ngbe ne ngwe̱, re bra re ngwa srra rina.
Nje i re we a Karrita aha ngbe ngwe̱ ngra fro cwuo ne ngu i hwie̱, ngbe ngwe̱ bra kyie brrá nné na ekpri nné ce̱ nka a ko zohu ngwie̱, we shi nka ne nje i re ngwa he:
Nde brra nne a ekpri nné ce̱ nka re shi we̱sa ne ya vini; re bi we mbrru zunzrru, ne rewe ngu a á nyi nné ce̱ nka we̱sa ne e we cwi he á nyi reweng wu, ka he á ra ho nka.

Tu ne nnencwuee ekpri nné ce̱ nka a nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ ne e ki ngwa, shi de̱ re bi ya vini we̱, de̱ re kywo rici ze we̱, de̱ re bi ehwie fufu we̱, de̱ re nyi nne dzio rici a shwe ankya we̱, de̱ re nyi nne kre ko we̱, de̱ re bra nyi nne bi riyii ncwé̱ we̱.
Nde re nyi nne ne ngu shi wang nwie si nné ice, ne ngu ce̱ kya ne ngu shi tsantsa, ne ngu ci nkwile̱ ne rici ngu, ne ngu shi tsantsa, ne ngu shi wiri, ne ngu bra cwo rici ngu.
Re nyi nne ne ngu yó we nka na ré hu ning sa rie shi ne i mie̱, aha ngbe re hung shwe̱ kpi nné rehwie ne te̱nte̱ nka ne i mie̱, re bra hung ti brru nné mbiye ne mbe ce̱trri te̱nte̱ nka.
Aha a bi nné klo nci we yang ne mbe he we re-nka shweni nwie brra nné, shi ngra nyi nné mbiye ne mbe i zhwe teede nné Yahudi ana we̱.
Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri se ngwe̱ we ci ré dzie̱ cereng, aha á cwú ga nneywí a reri reri zhwozhwo nwie we mie̱ kya ne ko ngu shi rêng we̱ we aha kre ncwé̱ we̱sa nshwu.
Ko we ya a tsi nné ti re̱se̱ng na mbe e̱ i he, “Nné Karrita á srra re ca we le, á shi shi nnyié̱ me̱nkye̱, á nyi re-kroozhwo bi rê.”
Nka ne̱ nyi cence. Aha ni, we yhwire ne ning rre yi, aha ngbe sa rie mbe e̱ re ci te̱nte̱ng,
ngbe ko wé̱ ning ci uucwu a re-nkaashwe nné Yahudi ngbe re-nti nka nné mbe ne mbe ce̱trri nka raywrra ana we̱.

Ko nda shi wiri a nwie nné mbe ne mbe shi wiri, me̱di nné mbiye ne mbe dzio a yarri rehwie mbe, ne ko mbe bi sa rie we̱, ko bi ko yankya ngu shi wiri nwie mbe we̱, aha rehwie mbe ngbe hwie nka mbe e̱ koó shi wiri we̱.
Á yaa fo he mbe hu Be̱ne̱, me̱di re-cwuo mbe e̱ tí we gbeng he koó ki hu we̱. Á ci kya le̱le̱, á ra ho nka, koó bra mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe ré nyi yankya rina ma gung we̱.
Me̱di ngwe̱, se ngwe̱ mie̱ nneywí kya ne ngu shi tsantsa ne nka raywrra.
Mie̱ brrá nnéng he ré cwo nci mbe, ré we ri á nyi nné ré we ngwa grime̱, ré ci nkwile̱ ne nci mbe; ré yo tsantsa a yarri ce̱ nka, ngbe yaa ce̱, ngbe a yarri yaa rwe.

Mie̱ brrá mbrrúng we ni wa he, ré srra zhwe srra ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri mbrrú ne mbe shi wiri ré srra. Shi de̱ ré he nné we̱, ka ré ngwa nci mbe nwie shwe ankyang dzio nci we̱, me̱di ré mie̱ kpi nné kya rina,
aha ngbe ré hung mie̱ rana mbrrúng ré ce̱ ntó mbe ngbe e̱we̱e̱ rewe mbe,

ré ci nkwile̱ ne nci mbe ngbe ré shi wiri, ré shi jenje ci nkwile̱ ne reri mbe, ré bi re̱kpe̱e̱ rina, ré bra ngwa ntó mbe nci mbe, aha ngbe de̱ ya nne re she riwie̱ng he yankya ngu shi wie̱e̱ni ne nka Be̱ne̱ we̱.
We ni wa, shwe̱ zrre̱we rehwie ré ci nkwile̱ ne nci mbe.
A yarri ko nda, nde ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ nyi ankya rina we rici ngwe̱ ngbe ré mie̱ a nwie ngwe̱. A yarri mie̱ nka ngwe̱, ning ci shwo riyii, kya ngwe̱ he e̱ re bra nyi cence.
Nde nka ngwe̱ e̱ re shi tsantsa de̱ re bi kya cwi we̱, aha ngbe nné ce̱trring ré shwe nshwu ne riywe̱ she kya me̱nkye̱ ne mbe shi heng a rici nzhi.
Mie̱ hwiéng he a yarri ko nda, ré ngwa nci mbe a nwie re-be̱ri mbe, ré we kla rehwie. Shi de̱ ré we ngrra nka we̱,
ka ré we nyi nca we̱. Me̱di ré ti he mbe nyi nné ré hung sa rie a mbe, aha ngbe ré ci a ko zohu zhe nneywí ré ri rina nka Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Nnenkyia nzhi.
Aha Be̱ne̱ e̱ ti ehwie rina ngu, ngbe ga nneywí zhwozhwo ré she kyia.

Ehwie rina ngu a níng mie̱ng he nzhi he “Aawo” ne srra ne e̱kpe̱e̱ e̱ngwie̱ ngbe ecwue ankya tsi ngwie̱, he ngbe nzhi srra re ci nkwile̱ ne nci nzhi, nzhi bi redziee, nzhi bra bi e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ a srra nzhi a be ngwie̱ ne̱,
shi ne nzhi srra re te kya ne nzhi ning sa riyii ne ehwie kla, ne ngu nyi grime̱ brra Be̱ne̱ nzhi ngbe Nnenkyia nzhi Jesu Krristi ne ngu cwo a wre̱.
Aa ngwa rici ngu aha nzhi, he ngbe ngu níng trru yarri ko zohu e̱ngwie̱, ngbe ngu níng ci nzhi ci wiri aha nzhi hwie̱ na ngu nggaa ngu, ngbe nzhi tu rici nwie nyi re-cwuo rina.
Re-ankya ne mbe mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngwe̱ mie̱ nneywíng nna nyi nke ne̱. We shwe̱ rehwie re we yhwire ne igbe̱ ngwe̱ zhwozhwo. Shi de̱ ngwe̱ we ya nne re re dzie̱ we̱.
Lu nné ngwe̱ng nna he ré ngwa nci mbe nwie ho nnencwueé ngbe nné ringgwe̱ nka, ré srrante aha ré nyi ko nda ne ngu bi rina.
Shi de̱ ré he nka e̱ngwie̱ a rici ya nne we̱, me̱di ré srra rina rina ne ehwie sheng, ré yaa ci re̱ nwie ko nye̱.

Aha nzhi e̱ we nci nzhi ma, nzhi i nyi mwa, nzhi i ra ho nka. Á i níng brra, nzhi hwie̱ hwié na ga re-nzhwe ankya ne nzhi kre ngbe ga re-nzhwe ecwue ngwie̱. Nzhi i srra yarri ngwie̱ngwie̱ ne rehwie rro; yá i níng ra, nzhi e̱ we ra ma.
Me̱di zhe ne Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Nnenkyia nzhi e̱ ya níng ti zhwe ehwie rina ngu ngbe ce̱ ne ngu níng ce̱,
aa níng kyia, ko aha he ka nzhi nyi ya cwuo redziee we̱, me̱di nyi aha naana ngu. Aa níng kyia ne Nshe Wiri ne ngu níng kyu wiriri, aa níng bî hwing, aa bra níng ngwa ce hwi.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ngwa igbe̱ Nshe Wiri ngu we̱sa vie sa aha Jesu Krristi Nnenkyia nzhi,
ngbe aha ehwie rina ngu nzhi ci tsantsa ne Be̱ne̱, ngbe ce na he̱rri tiya ne nzhi ning sa riyii e̱ re hwie̱ ngge nzhi.

Nka ne̱ nyi cwu nka. Nje ce̱ ngwe̱ ning bra he re-nka ne̱, aha ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe sa rie a Be̱ne̱ ré ci nkwile̱ re ngwa nci mbe nwie nyi re-cwuo rina, ne mbe bi rina mbe bra bi mpe̱ni nwie ko nye̱.
Me̱di nyi ze̱nze̱ ne ronu ce shweni, ngbe nka re-lo brrá ho nné tiya, ngbe ronu kanka, ngbe srra we nko aha Nti Nka, aha ga re-nke ne̱ á nyi we cwuo shweni, koó bi mpe̱ni we̱.
Nne nke ne ngu nyi kya ne ngu shi be ne srra kanka, ki gara nka na zrru; a ri nyi wa, ki gara nka na hwie; a ri nyi wa, shi de̱ yankya re níng mwe ngbe ne ngu we̱.
Ngwe̱ hu re̱se̱ng he zhwe nne ana a dzio, e̱ngwie̱ ngu a bra ti he aa brru kpe̱kpe̱.
A zhe ne nje ri te Arritema ka Tikyiku re be nwie ngwe̱, nyi koori ngwe̱ be nwie nje a Nikopoli, aha nje rwe he nje shi srra miimi he̱rri zhe nze ngbe wu srru re wara.
Nyi ko nda ne ngwe̱ ri hung nying aha ngwe̱ she Zenang ne ngu nyi loya, ngbe ne Apolo ne mbe shi pie ciee, ngwe̱ bra nyi koori ngbe de̱ ré nyi riywe̱ yankya we̱.
Nde ga nné nzhi e̱ ré ngwa nci mbe nwie nyi re-cwuo rina, aha ngbe ré hung she ko nda ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré bi, shi de̱ ré srra shweni we̱.
Ga nné ne mbe shi ngbe nje e̱ á re dzie. Dzie nné ce̱ nzhi a yarri ce̱ nka.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re shi ngbe nyi zhwozhwo.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Bulu ne ngu nyi nne gyiaa aha Krristi Jesu ngbe ne gimbe nzhi Timoti re nzhi nwie Filimo ne ngu nyi brra rwi nzhi, ngu bra nyi brra rwincwuo nzhi wa,
ngbe ne ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe mwé ta ri ngwe̱, ngbe ne ngu Afia gimbe nzhi ewerembrru, ngbe ne Akyipu ne ngu nyi ya shezhi a yarri Krristi shi nzhi.
Nde ehwie rina ngbe srra rina ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi ré shi ngbe ne nyi.
Gimbe nje Filimo, ko zohu zhe ne nje shi ku Be̱ne̱, nje cí Be̱ne̱ nje kijie̱ng aha ngwe̱,
aha ne nje hó zhwe ce̱ ne ngwe̱ ce̱ nné wiri Be̱ne̱ ngbe sa rie ne ngwe̱ bi a Brrabe̱ Jesu.
Nje bra ku he nde mwe rici nzhi ngbe ne ngwe̱ a yarri ce̱ nka re re ngwa hu re̱se̱ ko zohu kya rina ne nzhi bi a yarri Krristi cwuncwuu.
Gimbe nje, ce̱ ne ngwe̱ ce̱ nné ce̱ nka a ning ngwá ehwie kla we yang, a bra ning shwé̱ ehwie we yang! Aha ngwe̱ klá nné wiri Be̱ne̱ ehwie.
Aha nii, a yarri Krristi, nje hung re ci ngwe̱ nyi kya ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngwe̱ nyi we dengge.
Me̱di aha ne nje re ce̱, nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱, nje Bulu a rikwe nje ne̱, ne a zhe ne ne̱ nje bra hwie̱ nne gyiaa aha Krristi Jesu.
Nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ aha ewe nje Onesimo, ne nje hwie̱ be̱ a nwie ngu a yarri Krristi, we ne nje shi uucwu gyiaa ne̱.
A rotu ncwuee, a i hwie̱ nne shweni a nwie ngwe̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, a bi mpe̱ni
Nje ki ci re ning brru re be nwie ngwe̱, onu rie nje zhwozhwo shi a ngu.
Nje ce̱ he nje ra ki we re srra he ngbe nje, aha ngbe re ning sheng a nu ne ngwe̱ ra shi nwie ning sheng a gyiaa ne nje ning shi aha Nka Rina ne̱.
Me̱di ko nje e̱ bra ce̱ nyi yankya we̱sa ne ngwe̱ shî he re shi ni we̱; aha ngbe ko zohu kya rina ne ngwe̱ nyi e̱ re nyi he ngwe̱ nyi a mwa yi ngwe̱, de̱ re shi shi á re ci ne ce we̱.
De̱e̱nte̱ wo kya ngu ci ne Onesimo ngu i ci kanka ngbe ne ngwe̱ a e̱we̱ zhe e̱ nyi aha ngbe re bra ning brru srra ngbe ne ngwe̱ ga re-zhe zhwozhwo.

Ko ngwe̱ shi ki se̱ shi nyi hwie wa we̱, aa hle hwie; ki se̱ a nu gimbe ne ngwe̱ ce̱. Nje ki ce̱ we yang wire re yang hwie̱ ngwe̱. Ngwe̱ shi ki ce̱ re ne̱ ni, aha a nyi hwie ngwe̱ a bra nyi gimbe a yarri Brrabe̱!
Aha nii, kundu ngwe̱ ning fo a nu rwincwuo ngwe̱, ma ki se̱ we shi ne ngwe̱ hu ning se̱ nje.
Kundu ne e ri ma ngu bi ya vini a nwie ngwe̱, ka ngwe̱ ki zhwé ya tsie, ning zhwe nje.
Nje shi wie nke e̱ ne va nje: nje he
Aha nii, gimbe nje, nde n she rinang a nwie ngwe̱ aha Brrabe̱, n kla ehwie a nu gimbe a yarri Krristi.
Nje hu cence he ngwe̱ cwo a shî nka nje, kya a nyi ngwiee nje re wie krre̱de̱ ne̱, ne hu re̱se̱ng he ngwe̱ cwo a nyi re ne̱ ni.
He̱rri ne cwu wa, nje ce̱ ngwe̱ ning nyi ewie ne nje cwo a ning srra, aha nje sa rie he Be̱ne̱ shi ho re-rumwo nyi re ning brru mi ne nje re be nwie nyi.
Epafrra, ne ngu shi gyiaa ngbe ne nje aha Krristi Jesu a re dzié.
Ga ngbe Marrku, ngbe Arristaku, ngbe Dema, ngbe Luka ne mbe nyi rwincwuó nje e̱ á re dzie.
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi re shi ngbe nyi.
Gbangba tiya, Be̱ne̱ i he yó nzhi nka a re-zhe piriri a re-rê kanka kanka a nu nné ti re̱se̱ng.
Me̱di a rotu krrucing ne̱, aa he nka ne nzhi ne Kowe ngu. Be̱ne̱ i nyi ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo

A nyi ngu ngu nyi nse̱ na grime̱ Be̱ne̱, a bra nyi ngu ne ngu nyi cwu cwu shî Be̱ne̱ ne ngu bró ngwie̱ ne̱ zhwozhwo ne riti nka ngu ne ngu bi igbe̱. A zhe ne ngu níng yi re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi, aa ya srra zinye̱ a nva nyye Be̱ne̱ ne ngu bi brra grime̱.
Aha ni ngu Kowe e̱ she grime̱ re ne̱ re-njeli aha lo ne e ki ngwa a ne̱ re-na mbe.
Ka nyi zohu a tsi re-njeli e̱ ne Be̱ne̱ sa he ne ngu he,
“Ngwe̱ nyi Kowe nje;
a cwu ne̱ nje hwie̱ Be̱ ngwe̱”?
Ka re he ne ngu he,
“Nje cwo a hwie̱ Be̱ ngwe̱,
ngbe ngwe̱ e̱ bra hwie̱ Kowe nje” e̱e̱?
Me̱di zhe ne ngu shi ning brru be ne ce̱ucwu Kowe ngu a be ngwie̱, a he:
“Nde ga re-njeli Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo ré ki ye mbè.”
Me̱di ne re-njeli e̱, Be̱ne̱ he,
“Be̱ne̱ cí re-njeli ngu ré shi shi wu,
ngbe nnencwuó ngu a wé̱ shi shi le ndo.”
Ngbe ne Kowe e̱, Be̱ne̱ e̱ he,
“Be̱ne̱, ringgwe̱ ngwe̱ e̱ ri shi he̱rri tiya tiya,
ngbo ringgwe̱ ngwe̱ e̱
bra ri nyi ngbo na ncwuo redziee.
Ngwe̱ ce̱ redziee, ngwe̱ e̱ ra hwie̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ne̱ ngwe̱,
ngu re fo ze re ne̱ ga re-nda ngwe̱,
a zhe ne ngu re mia ne ehwie kla.”
A bra he wa he,
“Brrabe̱, tu ce̱ucwung,
nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ i sa riti ebe ngwie̱,
ga ngbe re-zinye̱ e̱ á nyi cwuo nva ngwe̱.
Á cwo a ci shweni,
me̱di ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ ning shi;
mbe e̱ á shi kre shi shi nyi ankya ci.
Ngwe̱ ri we krru shi shi nyi ya brra tago,
ngbe ga mbe zhwozhwo á ri
we cenja shi shi ankya ci.
Me̱di ko ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ bra we̱,
ko re-rie ngwe̱ bi krrucing we̱.”
A nyi zohu a tsi re-njeli e̱ ne Be̱ne̱ sa he ne ngu he,
“Srra a nva nyye nje,
se nje re ci ngwe̱ hle̱ rwinkó ngwe̱”?
Ko ga re-njeli e̱ zhwozhwo nyi nnencwuó Be̱ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Koó we ri we̱, me̱di nyi mbe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu we ci ré she nné mbe ne mbe ri she kyia.
Kya a nyi nke ngu ci aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ngbe nzhi ning bra bro kya ne nzhi i ho a gangga, kishi nzhi ri ning brru ne emerin.
Nka ne re-njeli mbe i he e̱ shi ni cence, á ri ngwa ko zohu nne e̱ngwie̱ ngbe nne ra ho nka ge̱zhe̱ aha kya ne mbe nyi.

He̱rri nzhi e̱ ri ce̱ rimi nzhi to kye̱, kundu ne nzhi ra ci nkwile̱ ne brra kyia ne e níng ngwa ne̱ ye̱? Brrabe̱ we rici ngu i ke̱she ti nka kyia ne̱, ngbe nné mbe ne mbe i ho a mbe e̱ ti cence he shi ni.

We̱sa a ni, Be̱ne̱ e̱ bra ning bra ya sheede a zeteng ne ngbá re-sheede, ngbe ngbá re-ankya ne ngu nyi, ngbe re-cwuong hwie̱ nga onu nzhwenzhweng, ngbe re-beewa Nshe Wiri ne ngu kye ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ ngu.
Ko nyi re-njeli ne Be̱ne̱ i we sa ré hwie̱ nné ye ringgwe̱ ngwie̱ hwi ne ngu cwo be we̱, ngu ngwie̱ ne nzhi ning shi nka ne̱.
Me̱di a bi ewie ne e ning wieng a yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he:
“Brrabe̱, nyi nda ngu nyi nneywi e̱,
ne he̱rri ngwe̱ lú aha ngu aa?
Nyi nda ngu nyi kowe nneywi e̱,
ne he̱rri ngwe̱ cí nkwile̱ ne ngu aa?
Ngwe̱ ki nyi aa re̱ tsie̱ re shi shi re-njeli a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu;
ngwe̱ ki fo ze ngwe̱ ki ngwa grime̱.
Ngwe̱ bra we ko nda a tahwie ringgwe̱ ngu.”
Be̱ne̱ ci ko nda re shi tahwie ringgwe̱ ngu, he̱rri ko bi ko yankya ne ngu we̱sa cing a tahwie ngu we̱. Gbengbe ni a zhe ne ne̱ ko nzhi ri ko nda a shi tahwie ngu we̱.

Me̱di nzhi ri Jesu ne a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu á i ki ci re re̱ tsie̱ ne re-njeli, ngbe aha a yarri ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re hu aha ko nye̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ á ki ci vo ringgwe̱, á ki fo ze á ki ngwa grime̱, aha ge̱zhe̱ hu ne ngu shwe.

A i mwa ye̱ye̱rri a nwie Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi ga ankya zhwozhwo, ne ga ankya zhwozhwo bra ning shi aha ngu, he ngbe ngu ci nne ne ngu we be ne kyia re fro cwuo ngu ye̱ye̱rri a yarri ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu shwe. Aa nyi ni aha ngu ci rewe ngu piriri ré she grime̱ ngu.
Ngu ne ngu ci ga nneywí ci wiriri, ngbe mbe ne e we ci mbe ci wiriri e̱ gbengbe á mwe á hwie̱ rewe Be̱ zunzrru. Kya a nyi ngwiee ko nyi kya nshwu we̱ a nwie Jesu ngbe ngu we ye he re-gimbe ngu.
A he ne Be̱ e̱ he,
“Nje ri ti re-gimbe nje lo ngwe̱,
nje ri ve ve nwie re de a yarri ekpri mbe.”
A he wa he, “Nje ri yaa nyenyi a Be̱ne̱.”
A bra he wa he,
“Nje e̱ nke ne, ngbe ne rewe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ngwa.”
Tu ne rewe nna mbe nyi rine̱ ne roshwo, aha ni a i ci shi mbe ma, ne ngu i fo shî nneywi; a i nyi ni ngbe aha hu ngu, ngu ci Nne Hwie̱ ana re ci shweni, ngu ne ngu bi igbe̱ng ci nneywí ré kwi e̱.
A nyi ni ne ngu ci nné mbe ne gannyi mbe i nyi hwié aha ne mbe to owu hu mbe she drre̱.
A shi we gbeng he ko nyi re-njeli ne Jesu a i be we sheng we̱, me̱di nyi nzhwe Ibrrahin.

A nyi aha ni ne i ki ci re hwie̱ we shi re-gimbe ngu a ko zohu eme, aha ngbe re hwie̱ brra prristi ne ngu bi naana, ne e bra hung sa rie a ngu a ncwuo Be̱ne̱, aha re nyi teedeng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nneywí.
Aha tu ne ngu we rici ngu ngu shwe ge̱zhe̱ re-mwa ri, mahu we̱ hung she nné mbe ne mbe shi she mwa ri ma.
Aha ni re-gimbe ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng kyie nzhi hwie̱ nné wiri ngu, nyi sa hwie nka nyi a Jesu ne ngu nyi nnente ngbe brra prristi ne nzhi sa rie a ngu shi ne nzhi tí we gbeng.
