A i nyi tsantsa ne kya ne Be̱ne̱ i ki ci re nyi, ye̱ye̱rri we shi Musa ne ngu i nyi tsantsa a ncwuo ngu a yarri eri Be̱ne̱ ma.
Jesu a ne̱ Musa ne grime̱ we yang we shi nne ne ngu no eri bi grime̱ we yang re ne̱ eri nna.
Ko zohu eri e̱ bi nne nong, me̱di nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu no ko nda.
Musa i nyi nnencwuo ne ngu shi tsantsa a yarri ncwuo eri Be̱ne̱, a i ke̱nce̱ ngwa sheede re-ankya ne Be̱ne̱ ri he a re-zhe na ncwuee.
Me̱di Krristi e̱ yo tsantsa a nu Kowe ne ngu bró eri Be̱ne̱. Nzhi e̱ nzhi nyi eri ngu, kundu ne nzhi yaa rwe, nzhi bra yo gangga a zete kya ne nzhi ning sa riyii.
Aha nii, we shi kya ne Nshe Wiri he:
“A cwu, kundu ne nyi ho cwue ngu,
shi de̱ nyi klo nci we̱,
kishi nyi ri nyi zhwe gbanggrraa yó nyi,
a zhe ne mbe i mwa Be̱ne̱ ri a tsi yi.
Be̱ne̱ he, a miimi e̱ á i ning mwa
he mbe ri ka nje shi rimi ye̱,
ko ngbe ne mbe i ri re-ankya
ne nje i nyi a re-rie nshwa weni.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne nje i dzio
ehwie ne nné mbe ana,
nje e̱ he,
‘Á we rê a yarri ronu rie mbe,
koó bra ce̱ hu re-rê nje we̱.’
Aha ni a yarri ehwie dzio, nje fo shí he:
‘Koó bi ngwie a ngwie̱ng srra cwu nje e̱ we̱.’ ”
Re-gimbe, nyi ci nkwile̱, shi de̱ e̱ngwie̱ ngbe riywe̱ shî nka a yarri onu rie ya nyi re ki ci re bra teme re ngwa Be̱ne̱ bi ce we̱.
Me̱di nyi yaa shwe̱ rehwie ko zohu otu; nyi ning tu rici ni a ko zohu otu ne e hung ki ye he, “A cwu ne̱”, kishi e̱ngwie̱ ri brra ya nyi he̱rri re ne̱ ne klo rici.
Kundu nzhi yo gangga ne sa rie nzhi he̱rri re nzhi cwu gamang shi ne nzhi i ce̱ a ce̱ucwung, nzhi e̱ ri mwe nzhi she ko nda ne Krristi ngu bi aha nzhi.
A shi we shi ne e he he,
“A cwu, kundu nyi ho cwue ngu,
shi de̱ nyi klo nci shi shi yó
nzhi mbe i nyi we̱,
shi a zhe ne mbe i nyi Be̱ne̱ gbanggrraa.”
Nyi mbe nye̱ ne mbe i ho cwue Be̱ne̱ gbengbe ni mbe ki nyi gbanggrraa a? Ko nyi ga nné mbe ne Musa i wru ne mbe a Masarr we̱ e̱e̱?
A nyi mbe nye̱ ne Be̱ne̱ i dzio ehwie ne mbe he̱rri re-rie nshwa weni e̱? Ko nyi nné mbe ne mbe i nyi e̱ngwie̱, ne he̱rri mbe kwi a tsi yi we̱ e̱e̱?
A bra nyi mbe nye̱ ne Be̱ne̱ i fo shí ne mbe he koó bi ngwie a ngwie̱ng she srra cwu ngu we̱ e̱? Ko nyi nné mbe ne mbe i ra ki ho nka we̱ e̱e̱?
Aha ni nzhi ri he koó i she ngwie we̱ aha ne ko mbe i bi sa rie we̱.
Aha nii, tu ne jeeng she ngwie a nwieng srra cwu a ke̱ we ne ning shi, nde nzhi nyi te̱nte̱ kishi ya nyi ri re̱, re we̱sa ya she ngwie a nwieng srra cwu ana.
Aha nzhi i ho Nka Rina ne e níng brrong we shi ne mbe ho ma; me̱di mbe e̱, ko nka nna we be ne yankya rina we̱, aha a zhe ne mbe i ho, koó se̱ ne ning sa rie we̱.
Aha a nyi we nzhi ne nzhi bi sa rie ne nzhi ri ngwie nwieng srra cwu, we shi ne Be̱ne̱ i he ne kpi nné he:
“Aha ni nje dzio ehwie ne mbe,
nje e̱ fo shí he,
‘Koó bi ngwie a nwieng she srra cwu nje ana we̱.’ ”
A i he nka ne̱ ko ngbe ne ngu fro ko nda a zhe ne ngu i nyi ebe ngwie̱ yhwe̱.
A ya ewie a yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ á he nka aha otu na natsie̱ he: “A otu na natsie̱, Be̱ne̱ srra cwu ne re-cwuo ngu zhwozhwo.”
Shi a nka ne̱ wa á bra ning brru he wa he, “Koó bi ngwie a nwieng srra cwu nje we̱.”
Tu ne e we he yá bi we ngwie a yarri srra cwu ana, nné mbe ne mbe i ke̱she ho Nka Rina ne e brro a koó she ngwie we̱, aha riywe̱ sa rie mbe,
aha ni Be̱ne̱ cinga sa yaka otu, ne ngu ki ye he “A cwu”. Re-rie piriri wara wire ngu ya he nka a yarri krre̱de̱ re-ve Dooda, shi ne e ke̱she he,
“A Cwu, kundu nyi ho cwue ngu,
shi de̱ nyi klo nci we̱.”
Kundu Joshwua i ra we ngwa srra cwu, ko Be̱ne̱ i ra cinga he nka aha yaka otu wa we̱.
Mahu gbengbe ni, a cwo a bi Otung Srra Cwu aha nné Be̱ne̱.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu ri she ngwie a srra cwu Be̱ne̱ ana, mahu a ri she srra cwu ne ga re-cwuo ngu, we shi ne Be̱ne̱ i srra cwu ma.
Aha ni nde nzhi tu rici aha ngbe nzhi hung ngwie a srra cwu ana, kishi ya nzhi ri grre̱ shi ne mbe i nyi aha riywe̱ sa rie mbe.

Aha nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ bi ce ngbe igbe̱, a yé re ne̱ ise̱nkeli bi reme wehwie pempempee. A ngwi he̱rri yarri yarring re nzhi cwu nu rie ngbe nshe, he̱rri re nzhi cwu yarri re-hwon ngbe brrugo. He̱rri aa hung hu ga re-hwie nka nzhi ngbe ankya ne rehwie nzhi ce̱.
Ko bi ko yankya ngu shi la la a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we̱. Ko nda shi gang we gbeng a nyyi ngu, ngu ne ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi ri yo nzhi he ga re-ankya ne nzhi nyi.
Aha nii, tu ne nzhi bi Brra Prristi brrabrrang, ne ngu nyi Jesu Kowe Be̱ne̱, ne ngu ywa he̱rri nyyi Be̱ne̱, nde nzhi yo gangga a kya ne nzhi ning sa rie ne nzhi he we gbeng.
Ko Brra Prristi nzhi e̱ nyi ya nne ngu we̱sa ri naana nzhi ne re̱ nzhi we̱. Me̱di Brra Prristi nzhi e̱ á i ki mwa ri a ko zohu rê we shi nzhi e̱ ma, gbengbe ni koo ree nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱.
Aha nii, nde nzhi yaa wa nzhi be nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ne ngu bi ehwie rina we dengge, ngbe re ri naana nzhi. Wire nzhi e̱ she ehwie rina ngu, we̱ bra níng sheng a zhe ne nzhi kre re níng sheng.
Á kyié ko zohu brra prristi a tsi kpi nné aha re nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ a nu mbe, aha ngbe re hwie̱ nne si re-ankya na na mbe re ngwa Be̱ne̱, re bra nyi re-teede aha re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe.
Aa hung kwa nné riywe̱ hung ngbe nné mbe ne mbe brru rê e̱ we sheng, aha ngu a we rici ngu ngu re̱ ma.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne ko nyi re-teede e̱ we aha re-e̱ngwie̱ na nneywí we̱, me̱di aha na ngu ma.
Ko ya nne kré grime̱ng hwie̱ brra prristi we rici ngu we̱, se ka nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu ki ye shi ne ngu i ye Arruna.
A shi ni wa, ko Krristi e̱ i kre grime̱ng hwie̱ Brra Prristi we rici ngu we̱. Me̱di Be̱ne̱ i he ne ngu he,
“Ngwe̱ nyi Kowe nje;
a cwu ne̱ nje hwie̱ Be̱ ngwe̱.”
Aa bra he a yaka ewie wa he,
“Ngwe̱ nyi Prristi he̱rri tiya,
ngwe̱ nyi prristi we shi Melkyizede.”

A zhe ne Jesu i srra a be ngwie̱, a i mwo rumwo nwie cwe nva ne brra riwie̱ng cwue, he̱rri ngbe ne reyii re nzhi nwie Be̱ne̱, ne ngu hung ki kye̱ ne hu. Be̱ne̱ i ki hong aha ne ngu yaa ci re̱, ngu bra ngwa rici.
Me̱di ko ngbe ne ngu nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱, aa mie̱ ho nka a yarri re-ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu i shwe.
A zhe ne ngu fro ko nda, ngu a hwie̱ rêng she ce na he̱rri tiya a nwie ga nné mbe ne mbe ki ho nka,
a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ i ki ci re hwie̱ brra prristi we shi Melkyizede.
Nzhi bi kya he we yang a nka ne̱, me̱di a bi rwe̱ ré níng ting he̱rri nyi pie aha ko nyi hung pie kya we hwiehwie we̱.

Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri a zhe ne ne̱ nyi ra hwie̱ nné mie̱ nka, me̱di he̱rri ne cwu se ka ré bra cinga níng mie̱ e̱we̱e̱ re-ankya na nka Be̱ne̱. Ko nyi ci ré níng ngwa cwu yâ we̱, se ka ré níng ngwa we madrra!
Aha nne nke ne ngu rishi ka shwe we madrra a, a ka nyi we e̱we̱we ne ko ngu hu shwong ka kye̱ng we̱, koo hu cwuo redziee ngbe kya ngu shi wie̱e̱ni we̱.
Me̱di cwu yâ a nyi na nné mbe ne mbe hu kwe, aha ne mbe mie̱ mbe hu re̱se̱ cwuo redziee ngbe me̱nkye̱ng, á bra hung kyie kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri.

Aha nii, nde nzhi hle ewie ne nzhi ning shi ne̱ re nzhi ncwuee, nzhi wara re-ankya Krristi nke ne nzhi i ke̱she mie̱ a ce̱ucwung ana ngbe nzhi ci brráng. Shi de̱ nzhi ke̱ we ne ning yo we zete nkang si ywe̱ ne re-cwuo shweni, ngbe ne sa rie a Be̱ne̱ we̱;
ga ngbe nkang nyi batisma, ne e garra nneywí nva we̱; ngbe nkang vu nné kwi, ngbe nyi nka ne e ri nyi he̱rri tiya we̱.
Nde nzhi ci brráng, kundu Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ngwa riwie̱! Kya ne nzhi shi nying nna nyi ngwiee.
Wé̱ ce̱ rimi ngbe nne nke ne i ki ci ngu hu raywrra Be̱ne̱ re bra se̱ ywe̱ te̱nte̱ wa ye̱? Ngu ne ngu ho shwi kya na na ne ngu wru zinye̱, ne he̱rri ngu i she igbe̱ Nshe Wiri,
ne ngu bra ree ho shwi rina nka Be̱ne̱, ngbe ne igbe̱
kundu ngu we rê, ko bi re bra ning brru re se̱ ywe̱ te̱nte̱ we̱, aha ne ngu we rici ngu a shi nwie ning brru ci Kowe Be̱ne̱ a gasankwe te̱nte̱ wa, nwie ki ci nshwu we gbeng.
Ebe ne ngu shé nze cwucwu nwie ning ci yâ kpe̱kpe̱ aha nné kye̱ng, Be̱ne̱ ki mwo rina.
Me̱di ebe nke ne ngu cí we re-ze̱kye̱ ngbe ne re-canci e̱ shi we dede, Be̱ne̱ ri ki ci re ci shweni, we̱ ning ci ro.
Nné ce̱ nje, me̱di ko ngbe ne nzhi he ni, nzhi hu cence he nyi bi ankya te̱nte̱ng ne ngu nyi na kyia.
Ko Be̱ne̱ nyi riywe̱ redziee we̱; kundu ga re ki bru ne re-cwuo nyi ngbe ce̱ ne nyi ti he nyi ki ce̱ we̱, shi ne nyi shé nné ngung, ne nyi bra fo he nyi shi ke̱ we ne we sheng.
Ngba cwu kya ne nzhi ce̱ e̱ nyi nke he, ko nye̱ a tsi nyi re ke̱ we ne ning tu rici ni he̱rri re nzhi cwu krrucing, aha ngbe nyi hung sa riyii tsantsa a kya ne nyi cwo a sheng.
Ko nzhi ce̱ nyi bi rê we̱, me̱di nyi shi shi nné mbiye ne mbe bi sa rie ngbe ehwie sheng, ne mbe she kya ne Be̱ne̱ i we sa jee aha ni.
A zhe ne Be̱ne̱ i sa Ibrrahin jee, tu ne ko bi nne ne ngu ne̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe re ning fo shí ne lo ngu we̱, aha ni Be̱ne̱ i fo shí e̱ ne lo na ngu we rici ngu.
A i he, “Cence, nje shi re mwo rina, n bra re ngwa nzhwe piriri.”
Ngbe Ibrrahin e̱ tsio ne ehwie sheng, he̱rri aa ya she kya ne Be̱ne̱ i ki sa jee e̱.
Nneywí e̱ á fo shí ne lo ya nne ne ngu we ne̱ mbe e̱, ngbe shí ana we̱ ci kya ne mbe he e̱ re yo, we̱sa ne ya nka yaa kwa be.
We ni wa, Be̱ne̱ i ce̱ ting he cence kya ne ngu rwe nying, ko shi ngu we we̱; aha ni a i fo shí ne nné mbe ne ngu we sa jee.

Aha ni a bi re-ankya wehwie ne̱: shí ne Be̱ne̱ ngu fo ngbe jee ne ngu sa, ne ko bi ré bra we̱; mbe ne̱ á ti he ko Be̱ne̱ vié rabrra we̱, á bra níng shwé̱ nzhi ne nzhi to nzhi ya she drre̱ a nwie ngu a rehwie we yang, ngbe nzhi ning bra sa riyii a kya ne ngu shi ncwuee nzhi.
Kya ne nzhi ning sa riyii ana cwó ce nzhi e̱ gbagba shi shi kprincwe̱ng bro jirigi ne ngu ki bro gangga. A bra ngwi yarri trro gbundu brranyi zinye̱ he̱rri re nzhi yarri yarring,
a nwie ne ngu Jesu a ngu i ke̱she nzhi ngu ya ning ngwie aha nzhi. Aa hwie̱ brra prristi he̱rri tiya shi shi Melkyizede.

Melkyizede e̱ i nyi nggwe̱ Salemi, aa bra i nyi prristi Be̱ne̱ Bi Grime̱ Zhwozhwo. A zhe ne Ibrrahin ngu i ya kwe̱ cwe ngbe ne nggwé̱ weni ngu we drre̱, Melkyizede e̱ ya nyi ne ngu, ngu a ki mwo rina.
Ngbe Ibrrahin e̱ ki ngwa zunzrru a tsi shwa na ko nda. Ce̱ucwung, maana lo Melkyizede e̱ nyi “Nggwe̱ Redziee”; na hwie, manna lo ngu he, “Nggwe̱ Salemi” e̱ nyi “Nggwe̱ Srra Rina”.
Ko Melkyizede e̱ bi be̱ ka de̱ we̱, ko bi nné nzhwe ngu we̱, ko bra bi ce̱ucwu rotu ngu ka krruci ce ngu we̱; we shi Kowe Be̱ne̱, a nyi prristi he̱rri tiya.
Ma ri zhwe brra grime̱ ngu a: he̱rri ga ngbe brra yo nzhi Ibrrahin e̱ ki ngwa zunzrru a tsi shwa na ko nda ne ngu i she a cwe!
Nné Levi ne mbe i nyi re-prristi e̱ á i si zunzrru a tsi shwa na ko nda a nwie re-gimbe mbe nné Isrreela ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka, ko ngbe ne mbe e̱ ma á wru a nzhwe Ibrrahin.
Me̱di ngu Melkyizede e̱ koo wru a nzhwe Levi we̱, gbengbe ni a a si zunzrru a tsi shwa na ko nda a nwie Ibrrahin, ngbe ngu a mwo Ibrrahin ne Be̱ne̱ ki sa jee e̱ rina.
Ko nye̱ hu re̱se̱ng he nyi nne nke ne ngu nyi brrang ne ngu mwo nne ne ngu nyi iishing rina.
A ya eme, a nyi nneywí ne mbe kwí ne mbe i si zunzrru a tsi shwa ana; me̱di a yaka eme, ngu Melkyizede ne ngu i se̱ e̱, a nyi nne ne ko ngu bi hu we̱, we shi ne krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ hé.
Mahu a nka ne̱, tu ne Ibrrahin e̱ i ngwa zunzrru a tsi shwa, maahu ga ngbe Levi, ne nyi nzhwe ngu mbe i si zunzrru a tsi shwa a, a i ngwa ma.
Aha a zhe ne Melkyizede ngu i nyi ne Ibrrahin e̱, á i ma ne koó bî Levi we̱.

Á i ngwa nné Levi e̱ cwuo prristi a zhe ne e shi ngwa nné Isrreela Nti Nka Musa. Kundu cwuo re-prristi na nné Levi ana i ra hung ci nneywí ré ci tsantsa, koo ra bi nka he yaka prristi re bra ya wre̱ shi shi Melkyizede wa we̱, we̱sa ne na nhwie̱ Arruna.
Aha tu ne e bra cwuo prristi e̱, mahu se ré bra Nti Nka nna wa.
Ngbe ngu Brrabe̱ ne e he nka ne̱ a rici ngu a bra i ya wre̱ a yaka kla, ne ko bra bi ko ya nne a nkla ana ne ngu sa nyi cwuo prristi we̱.
Aha ko nye̱ hu re̱se̱ng he á i bî Brrabe̱ nzhi e̱ a nkla Yahuda; ko Musa bra i ree tsie lo kla ana a zhe ne ngu i he nka cwuo re-prristi we̱.
Mahu nka nzhi e̱ cwo ning bra ci we gbeng, kundu nyi yaka prristi shi shi Melkyizede ngu i ya wre̱,
ngu ne ngu i hwie̱ prristi ko aha re-teede Nti Nka he ré zhwe nzhwe ya nne we̱, me̱di ne ngu i hwie̱ prristi aha ngu bi igbe̱ ngbe ce ne ko ngu bi cí shweni we̱.
Aha á wie he,
“Ngwe̱ nyi prristi he̱rri tiya,
ngwe̱ shi shi Melkyizede.”
Aha nii, á i rwi nti nka reni ne i ngwa aha cwuo prristi e̱ a be, aha a i shi brrubrru, a bra nyi cwuo shweni.
Aha ko Nti Nka Musa i hung ci yankya re shi tsantsa we̱, me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ngwa kya nzhi ning sa riyii ne ngu cwandrra nke ana, ne nyi aha ngu ne nzhi hung be dudu ne Be̱ne̱.
We̱sa ni, koó i nyi re-ankya ne̱ we̱sa ne shí ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i fo we̱, me̱di kpi re-prristi e̱ ko Be̱ne̱ i fo shí a zhe ne i we ci ré hwie̱ re-prristi we̱.
Me̱di Jesu a i hwie̱ prristi ne shí ne Be̱ne̱ i fo a zhe ne ngu i he ne ngu he,
“Brrabe̱ fo shí
kundu re bra we kya ngu fo hwie ngu we̱,
‘Ngwe̱ nyi prristi he̱rri tiya.’ ”
Mahu aha shí ne Be̱ne̱ ngu fo ne̱, ngu Jesu a hwie̱ sheede he cence jee nke ne̱ cwandrra na gbangba.
He̱rri ne cwu, mbe re-prristi na reni ana á i brri we brri, aha ne mbe i kwi, ko hu a i we we ré ke̱ we ne nyi cwuo mbe e̱ we̱.
Me̱di Jesu a shi nce he̱rri tiya, aha ni cwuo prristi na ngu a ko bi yhwe̱ we̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne a zhe ne ne̱ ngbe ko zohu zhe ngu hung kyia nné mbe ne ngu we ci ré hung be nwie Be̱ne̱ aha sa rie mbe a ngu, aha ne ngu shi nce he̱rri tiya nwie cwe nva ne Be̱ne̱ aha mbe.
Mahu ngu Jesu a nyi Brra Prristi na ne ngu hu níng sheng a yarri ko nda. A shi wiri we̱sa ne ya vini ka e̱ngwie̱ a yarri ngu; Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki ti ka ne nné e̱ngwie̱, aa ki fo ze re nzhi zete re-zinye̱.

Ko shi shi yá brrá re-prristi we̱; ko se he re srra re nyi re-teede ko zohu otu aha re-e̱ngwie̱ na rici ngu wire re nyi aha na nneywí we̱. Me̱di ngu a nyi teede e̱ aha re-e̱ngwie̱ nneywí ce zrru he̱rri tiya, a zhe ne ngu i ngwa rici ngu.
Nti Nka Musa a i ci nneywí ne mbe shi brrubrru á hwie̱ brrá re-prristi, me̱di jee ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i sa ne shí a merin Nti Nka nna i ci Kowe ngu re hwie̱ nne nyi kya ne ngu shi tsantsa he̱rri tiya.
Cwu nka nzhi ne nzhi ning shi nka a nyi nke: nzhi bi ya Brra Prristi ne ngu srrá a nva nyye ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ a zinye̱.
A nyi ngu ngu nyi cwuo Brra Prristi a yarri Ewie Wiri Kaka na te̱nte̱ Brranyi nke ne Brrabe̱ nyi, ko nyi cwuo nva nneywi we̱.
Á kyié ko zohu Brra Prristi aha re cwo mi ne ankya na na nneywí a nwie Be̱ne̱, re bra nyi re-teedeng shwi ankya rehwe aha mbe, mahu se ngu Brra Prristi na nzhi e̱ re bi kya ne ngu shi ngwang ma.
Kundu ngu i ra shi be ngwie̱, koo bra i ra nyi prristi ma gung we̱, tu ne ngu i bi nné ne mbe cwo ne ankya na na nneywí nwie Be̱ne̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne Nti Nka nné Yahudi.

Ewie wiri na ne mbe i ning nyi cwuo a srra shi shi na zinye̱, a nyi we rowung. Kya a nyi ngwiee ne Be̱ne̱ i ke̱nce̱ gara Musa nka a zhe ngu rikpa ki nyi Ndu Jee he, “Ci nkwile̱ ngbe ngwe̱ zhwe ye̱ye̱rri shi kya ne e re ting a zete ngbra.”

Me̱di cwuo prristi ne e ngwa Jesu a ne̱ na mbe e̱ ana, we shi jee ne i nyi, ne nyi ngu a ngu nyi nne yó zetsi nna a ne̱ jee na rening nna. Aha jee hwi ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng sang nna cwandrra rening nna ne ankya rina.
Kundu de̱ i ra bi kya ne jee na ce̱ucwung ana ngu i me̱nkye̱ng nying we̱, a i ra bi ya nka he ré sa yaka jee na hwie e̱e̱?
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ i she he nneywi e̱ ywe̱, ngu a he,
“Zhe cwo be, Brrabe̱ he ni,
á ri he zhe ana, nje ri sa ya jee hwi
ngbe ne nné Isrreela ngbe Yahudi.
Ko ri shi shi jee ne nje i sa yó mbeng we̱,
a zhe ne nje i we kwa ne va nje,
nje we trru a ngwie̱ Masarr.
Ko á i zhwe nti nka jee nna tsantsa we̱,
aha ni nje e̱ nga nva nje we we,
Brrabe̱ he ni.
Jee ne nje shi nying ngbe ne nné Isrreela
a zhe ne ngu cwo be e̱ nyi nke,
Brrabe̱ he ni:
Nje ri ci nti nka nje a rehwie mbe,
ma n wie a ronu rie mbe.
Nje ri hwie̱ Be̱ne̱ mbe,
ngbe wé̱ hwie̱ nné nje.
Ko ri bi nka he ya nne
re mie̱ ya nne ngwie̱ ngung we̱,
ka ya re he ne ya nne ngwie̱ ngung he,
‘Mie̱ ngbe ngwe̱ hu Brrabe̱.’
Aha ga mbe zhwozhwo á ri ning hu,
kya ngu pie a nyrru shishing
re nzhi brrabrrang.
Nje ri we we re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe,
ko ma n bra lu ne re-cwuo
hwie̱ mbe wa we̱.”
Shi ne ngu ye jee ne̱ he “hwing”, mahu aa ci na ce̱ucwung nna a hwie̱ rening; ko nda ne ngu bra ci rening, ne ngu kre, mahu ko shi fo zhe we̱, we̱ bru.
Cence, jee na ce̱ucwung ana i ti re-ankya ne mbe mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré nyi a zheng ye mbè, aa bra i he nka aha ewieng ye mbè na be ngwie̱ he.
Á i nyi Ndu; ngbe a zonggru na ce̱ucwung ne e ki ye he Ewie Wiri, a ning bi ngbong sa te̱le̱kyi, ngbe ne tebrru, ngbe ne brredi ne e ngwa Be̱ne̱ a tebrru nna.
Ngbe a a bi zonggru ne e ki ye he Ewie Wiri Kaka, ne ngu shi teme trro gbundu na hwie.

A yarring, a bi briing nyi teedeng shwi turraren ne e ki nyi ne zinarriya, a bra bi Kpaati Jee ne e ki nyrru zhwozhwo ne zinarriya. A yarri Kpaati nna, a ning bi ooshwu ne e nyi ne zinarriya ne ngu ning bi manna a yarring, ngbe ne ngbo Arruna ne ngu i trru rohun, ngbe rahwan na ne e ning wie Nti Nka Musa wehwie.
A zete Kpaati nna a bi re-kyerrubi na grime̱ Be̱ne̱ ne re-gahaa mbe mbe kla mbe ci rowu a nwieng we nneywí re-e̱ngwie̱. Me̱di ko shi nzhi hung he nka ne̱ cwuncwuu a zhe ne ne̱ we̱.
A zhe ne i fro re-ankya ne̱ yhwe̱: ngbe re-prristi mbe e̱ ngwí yarri zonggru na ce̱ucwung ko zohu otu nwie nyi re-teede mbe.

Me̱di nyi we Brra Prristi nggaa ngu ne ngu ngwi yarri zonggru na hwieng nna ce zrru a nrie. Ko ngwi we̱sa ne roshwo we̱; a nyi roshwo ana ne ngu ning nyí teedeng we re-e̱ngwie̱ na rici ngu, ngbe re-e̱ngwie̱ ne nneywí mbe nyi a riywe̱ hung.
Maahu Nshe Wiri e̱ níng ting we gbeng a yarri re-ankya ne̱ he ko á a kla rêng ngwie Nwie Wiri Kaka a we̱, tu ne Ndu na ce̱ucwung ana i ke̱ we ne ning shi.
Nke ne̱ nyi kyang mwa yi ne zhe ne, a níng tíng he ga re-ankya na na ne e ngwá Be̱ne̱, ngbe re-teedeng shwi ankya rehwe ne e nyí e̱, koó be ré ci onu rie nne be mi e̱ re ci tsantsa we̱,
tu ne ngu nyi we nka yâ, ngbe ankya shwe shwe, ngbe re-rêng yaa ci ci wiri — ga re-ankya ne̱ nyi we re-teede na ikpe rwe̱ ne mpe̱ni mbe cwo a yhwe̱ a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ cwo a wru mi ne hwihwing.
Aha ni Krristi e̱ i be shi Brra Prristi na re-ankya rina na mbe e be
Ko Krristi e̱ i ngwie ne roshwo vé, ka rewe re-izhimi we̱. Me̱di a i ngwie a Nwie Wiri Kaka ana ce zrru he̱rri tiya aha ko nye̱ we ne roshwo na ngu. Aa níng nyi rêng she kyia he̱rri tiya.
Roshwo vé, ngbe na re-izhimi, ngbe nto rewe nnywá ne e shwi, ne e kprre̱ nné bi le̱le̱ nyyi Be̱ne̱ ana a we cí ré ci wiri we a ikpe rwe̱.

Mahu tu ne ngu shi ni, ko roshwo Krristi we̱ hung nying re ne̱ ni we̱ e̱e̱? Ngu ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ning shi he̱rri tiya shi ngbe ne ngu, aa ngwa rici ngu he̱rri aa hwie̱ te̱nte̱ teede a nwie Be̱ne̱. Roshwo ngu a shi ci rehwie nzhi ré ci wiri ne re-teede shweni ana, aha ngbe nzhi ye Be̱ne̱ bi ce mbè.

A nyi aha ni ne Krristi e̱ nyi nne zetsi a jee hwi, aha ngbe nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ we ye ré she re-mwo rina na he̱rri tiya ne ngu níng sa jee. We̱ hung ci ni aha hu ne Krristi ngu hu aha ngbe ngu kyia nneywí ne re-ngwie̱ngwie̱ ne mbe i nyi a tahwie jee na ce̱ucwung.
A nka jee ne ya nne ngu nyi aha ankya ne ngu ri hu ngu we, se ne e she he cence aa hu wire krre̱de̱ jee ne ngu wie sa ana re bi mpe̱ni,
aha krre̱de̱ jee ana bi mpe̱ni we zhe ne nne wieng nna ngu hu; a zhe ne ngu shi nce e̱ ko krre̱de̱ nna bi mpe̱ni gung we̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee ne ko i wru mi ne jee na ce̱ucwung ne e sa we̱sa ne roshwo we̱.

Aha a zhe ne Musa i brro ga nné zhwozhwo Nti Nka Be̱ne̱, ngu a fo roshwo re-izhimi [ngbe na vé], aa ki krre ne rishi, ngbe ngu a kprre̱ a krre̱de̱ Nti Nka ngbe a zete ga nneywí zhwozhwo ne yá nva ekwe ne e ki ye he hiso ne e ki rwe ne wulu shwo.
Musa i he, “Nke ne̱ nyi roshwo na ne e ning sa jee, Be̱ne̱ níng ngwa nka he nyi zhwe nti nka nna.”
We ni wa, Musa i kprre̱ roshwo nna a Ndu Jee ngbe a ko nda ne e ning nyí cwuo a zheng ye mbè.
Cence, a yarri Nti Nka, a nyi roshwo ne e ning cí ko nda re ci wiri, ko bra bi ré we ya nne e̱ngwie̱ ngu we̱, se ne e wa roshwo.

Ngu Ndu ana ngbe ga re-ankyang ye mbè a yarring nna, ne mbe nyi we kyang mwa yi ne re-na zinye̱, a i mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré we ci ré ci wiri ne re-teede ne̱. Me̱di re-ankyang ye mbè na ngwie̱ zinye̱ se ka ré we ci ré ci wiri ne re-teede na ne mbe cwandrra re-nke ne̱.
Aha ko Krristi e̱ i ngwie a Nwie Wiri na ne nneywí mbe nyi ana we̱, ngu a srra shi shi te̱nte̱ng nna; me̱di a i ngwie he̱rri zinye̱, a nwie ne ngu ning shi a zhe ne ne̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi.

Koo bra i ngwie a zinye̱ aha ngbe ngu srra re cwo ngwa rici ngu ko zohu zhe shi shi Brra Prristi na nné Yahudi we̱. Na nné Yahudi e̱ ngwi a Nwie Wiri Kaka ko zohu rie ne roshwo ne ko ngu nyi na ngu we̱.

Aa ra shi ni, mahu se Krristi e̱ i ra srra re shwe ge̱zhe̱ ko zohu zhe, gannyi ne e nyi ebe ngwie̱. Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ ne zhe nyia re nzhi yhwe̱ ne̱, aa ya wre̱ we ce zrru tak aha ngbe ngu yi re-e̱ngwie̱ nneywí ne ngwa rici ngu ne ngu ngwa aha ngu hu aha nzhi.
Se nneywi re hu ce zrru, a merin nke we̱ te we nyi nka Be̱ne̱.

A shi ni, Krristi e̱ i ngwa rici ngu ce zrru aha ngbe ngu hwie̱ teedeng yi re-e̱ngwie̱ nneywí piriri. A bra ri ya wre̱ te̱nte̱ wa, ko aha ngu ya yi re-e̱ngwie̱ wa we̱, me̱di aha ngu ya kyia nné mbe ne mbe shi nwie srra re ki tsio.

Nti Nka nné Yahudi e̱ i nyi we rowu na ankya rina ne mbe cwo be, ko nyi ngu ana ngu nyi cwucwung we rici ngu we̱. A nyi aha ni ne, ko tsie̱ tsie̱, ko shi re-teede ne i srra re nying ko zohu rie we̱sa ne kpo ana ré ci nné ne mbe be ye Be̱ne̱ mbè ré shi tsantsa gung we̱.

Kundu ne re-teede zheng ye mbè ne̱ i ra hung yi re-e̱ngwie̱ nneywí, ko á i ra we ni nyi re-teede nna we̱ e̱e̱? Aha á i ra ci wiri he̱rri ko wé̱ ke̱ we ne hwie he mbe nyi nné e̱ngwie̱ wa we̱, ngbe wé̱ we ni nyi re-teede nna.
Me̱di re-teede ne i nyi ko zohu rie ana i srra ri we lu he mbe nyi nné e̱ngwie̱,
aha ko shi roshwo re-izhimi ngbe na vé ré yi e̱ngwie̱ gung we̱.
Kya a nyi ngwiee a zhe ne Krristi ngu hwra be a be ngwie̱, a i he ne Be̱ne̱ he,
“Ko nyi re-teedeng shwi ankya
rehwe ngbe ankya na na ne ngwe̱ ce̱ we̱,
me̱di ngwe̱ ning nyi rwe̱.
Ga re-teedeng shwi ankya rehwe
ngbe re-teede aha yi e̱ngwie̱,
ko ngwe̱ hó shwi mbe we̱.”
Krristi e̱ he,
“Ri, nje be — we shi ne e wie yarri tekpeng wie cwuo ne ngu bi Nti Nka —
aha ngbe n nyi kya ce̱ ngwe̱, Be̱ne̱.”

A i ke̱she he, “Ko ngwe̱ ce̱ re-teede ngbe ankya na na, ka ankya rehwe ne e shwi zhwozhwo ngbe re-teedeng yi e̱ngwie̱ we̱, ko ngwe̱ bra ho shwi mbe we̱.” A i he ni ko ngbe ne re-teede ana á shi ye̱ye̱rri ne kya Nti Nka a he re nyi.
Wire ngu a he, “Ri, nje be, aha ngbe n nyi kya ce̱ ngwe̱ Be̱ne̱.” Aha ni Be̱ne̱ we re-teede reni ana, ngu a be mi ne teede na Krristi.
Ngbe aha kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ ana, á níng ci nzhi ci wiri zhwozhwo nzhi ne teede na rwe̱ Jesu Krristi ce zrru he̱rri tiya.
Ko zohu prristi nné Yahudi e̱ nyi cwuo ngu nwie nyi re-teede ko zohu otu we̱sa ne kpo, me̱di ko re-teede ne̱ bra yi e̱ngwie̱ gung we̱.
Me̱di ngu Krristi e̱ nyi teede nang yi re-e̱ngwie̱ nneywí we ce zrru he̱rri tiya, ngbe ngu a ya srra a nva nyye Be̱ne̱.
Gannyi zhe ana, a shi tsio ngbe ré ci rwinkó ngu a tahwie ringgwe̱ ngu.
We ne teede zunzrru ana, aa ci nné mbiye ne e we ci mbe ci wiri ne e̱ngwie̱ á ci tsantsa he̱rri tiya.
Nshe Wiri e̱ bra níng ngwá sheede wa. Aa ke̱she he,
“Jee ne nje shi sang ne mbe
a rotu ngu cwo be e̱ nyi nke, Brrabe̱ he ni:
Nje ri ci nti nka nje a yarri ronu rie mbe
ngbe ma n wie a yarri rehwie mbe.”
Ngu a ning brang he, “Ko ma n bra lu ne re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe ngbe ne riywe̱ zhwe nti nka mbe wa we̱.”
Aha ni tu ne e we we ga re-ankya ne̱ mahu ko bi ya teede ne e bra shi cinga nying aha e̱ngwie̱ wa we̱.
Aha nii, re-gimbe, roshwo Jesu a níng ngwa riwie̱ng ngwie a Nwie Wiri Kaka we dengge.
Aa níng kla ya rê hwi, ne ngu shi nce, ne ngu cie̱ yarri brra trro gbundu, mahu nyi rwe̱ na ngu.
Nzhi bi Brra Prristi ne ngu cí nkwile̱ ne eri Be̱ne̱.

Aha ni nde nzhi shwo re be dudu ne Be̱ne̱ ne raywrra a yarri ronu rie nzhi ngbe ne sa rie a ngu we̱sa ne nyi jinji, ne ronu rie nzhi ne e níng kprre̱ roshwo Krristi aha ngbe nzhi ci wiriri ngbe nzhi hu he á níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi, ne ga ngbe re-rwe̱ nzhi ne e we kyu wiriri ne rishi cwancwaa.
Nde nzhi yo ne igbe̱ nwie ke̱ we ne sa riyii a kya ne nzhi brró, aha ngu Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng sa jee e̱ aa be nzhi hung sa rie a ngu.
Nde nzhi hwie re-rêng yaa shwe̱ rehwie a nci nzhi, ngbe nzhi yaa ce̱ nwie nyi re-cwuo rina.
Shi de̱ nzhi we ni mwe gbengbe we̱, shi yá ne mbe fo zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ ana; me̱di nzhi ning bra yaa shwe̱ rehwie — shi re ngra ning hwie̱ ne nzhi ri Otu Brrabe̱ ngu sa dudu ne̱.
Kundu nzhi ke̱ we ne nyi e̱ngwie̱ we igerri a zhe ne nzhi i she hu re̱se̱ nka raywrra, ko bra bi ya teedeng yi e̱ngwie̱ ne e ri bra nyi wa we̱,
se we srra ne owu nwie tsio nyi nka ngbe brra ro ne ngu ri ye nné mbe ne mbe nyi rwinkó Be̱ne̱.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu i ra zhwe Nti Nka Musa, á i ki yhwe̱ we̱sa ne naana, kundu ne e she nné wehwie ka wetsie̱ mbe ngwa sheede a rici ngu.

Ma nyi hwie he nné mbe ne mbe dzié̱ Kowe Be̱ne̱, ne ko mbe ri roshwo na jee ne ngu níng ci nzhi ci wiri e̱ a nu yankya we̱, ne mbe bra he nka shweni ne Nshe Wiri ne ngu níng be ne ehwie rina Be̱ne̱, ge̱zhe̱ ne e ri we ngwa a ri ngra shi rimi e̱e̱?
Aha nzhi hu he Be̱ne̱ he,
“Trrang nna nyi na nje, nje ri trra.”
Krre̱de̱ e̱ bra he wa he,
“Brrabe̱ ri nyi nné ngu nka.”
A nyi kya owu ngbe nne re ngwie nva Be̱ne̱ bi ce.
Nyi lu ne rotu ce̱ucwung ne nyi i she ewie si Be̱ne̱, ko ngbe ne nyi i shwe cinci, gbengbe ni nyi i yo ne igbe̱ nyi kwe̱.
A yá re-zhe á i níng trru ci we cwe nkyie nwie níng cwi re níng ngwa cinci. A yá re-zhe wa nyi i mwe rici ngbe nné mbe ne i we nyi ni.

Nyi i ngwa nci nwie mwe re shwe ge̱zhe̱ ngbe nné gyiaa, ko ngbe ne i si re-ankya nyi ne igbe̱, nyi i ngwa ne ehwie kla, aha ne nyi hu he nyi bi re-ankya na mbe cwandrra re-nke ana ne mbe bra nyi na nyi he̱rri tiya.
Aha nii, shi de̱ rwe̱ nyi cie̱ we̱, aha yaa rwe nyi e̱ shi níng be ne lede we yang.
Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi yaa rwe, aha kundu nyi nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱, nyi e̱ she kya ne ngu níng sa jee.
Aha koo hwie̱ gbong we̱,
“Ngu ne ngu cwo be e̱ shi ya wre̱ we̱sa ne dzio zhe.
Ngbe nné redziee nje e̱ ri she ce aha sa rie mbe.
Me̱di kundu ya mbe ning brru ne emerin,
ko ma n ho shwi ngu we̱.”
Me̱di ko nzhi nyi zhwe nné ne mbe shi ning brru ne emerin re ya ci shweni ana we̱. Nzhi nyi nné ne mbe bi sa rie, aha ni nzhi she kyia.
Sa rie e̱ nyi hu re̱se̱ng kpe̱kpe̱ he nzhi shi she kya ne nzhi ning sa riyii, a nyi kya ne nzhi hu he a shi ni ko ngbe ne ko nzhi ri ne riyii we̱.
A nyi aha sa rie ne Be̱ne̱ i de nné tiya.
A nyi aha sa rie ne nzhi hu he Be̱ne̱ i nyi ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ne riti nka ngu, mahu á i nyi kya ne nzhi ri ne̱ ne kya ne koó ri we̱.

A nyi aha sa rie ne Habila i nyi Be̱ne̱ te̱nte̱ teede re ne̱ na Kayinu. Aha sa rie ngu, Be̱ne̱ i ngwa sheede he a nyi nne redziee, aha Be̱ne̱ i ki de ne te̱nte̱ teede ngu. Aha sa rie e̱, Habila ke̱ we ne shi nwie he nka, ko ngbe ne ngu i hu.
A nyi aha sa rie ne Be̱ne̱ i fo Eno a nce ne ko ngu hu we̱. Koó i hu ewie ngu we̱, aha Be̱ne̱ ki fo. A zhe ne e rishi ki fo, á i ki de aha ne ngu kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie.
Aha we̱sa ne sa rie ko bi nne re hung kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie we̱; aha ko nye̱ ne ngu be nyyi Be̱ne̱, se re shî he a bi Be̱ne̱, re bra shî he a ngwá nné mbe ne mbe ki kre ne ning rre yi lede.

A nyi aha sa rie ne Nuhu, a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ i ki gara nka aha re-ankya ne mbe cwo a ci a ncwuee — re-ankya ne ko ngu ri ne riyii we̱, ngu a zhwe nka Be̱ne̱, ngu a no jirigi ne ngu ning she kyia ngbe ne nné nva ngu. Aha sa rie, aa ci á nyi nneywí a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo nkang ci shweni, ngu a hwie̱ nne redziee a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha sa rie ngu.
A nyi aha sa rie ne Ibrrahin, a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ i ki ye he re ywa a ya ewie ne ngu ki sa jee ngu ri ki ngwa, ngu a ho nka Be̱ne̱, ngu a ne̱ re nzhi, ko ngbe ne ko ngu i hu ewie nna we̱.
A nyi aha sa rie ne ngu i ya srra a ice a ngwie̱ ne Be̱ne̱ ki sa jee. A i srra a re-ndu we shi Ishaku ngbe Yakubu ne Be̱ne̱ i we sa jee ne̱ ma.
Aha Ibrrahin i srra miimi e̱ re tsio ngwie̱ ne riti runong nyi na he̱rri tiya, ne nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu rwe nong, ngu bra no.
A nyi aha sa rie ne Ibrrahin, ko ngbe ne re-rie ngu i hle (ko Sarra we rici ngu bra sé̱ ehwie we̱), á ki ci aa hwie̱ be̱, aha ne ngu i sa rie he Be̱ne̱ shi nyi kya ne ngu sa jee he ngu shi nying.

Aha ni a nwie ngu nne zunzrru ne̱, ne i ma ngu nyia re nzhi hwie̱ kweng, á ning she nzhwe nneywí ne mbe brri we brri shi re̱nde̱ zinye̱, ne ko bi re hwie we̱ shi shi nyi nzha a rekyi brra nzhwo rishi.

Ga nné mbe rre̱ zhwozhwo á i srra we yarri sa rie he̱rri zhe ne mbe ya kwi. Koó i she cwu kya ne e we sa jee e̱ we̱, me̱di á i ri we ze̱nze̱, mbe e̱ se̱ ne rekwi, he̱rri mbe e̱ shî he mbe nyi we nné ice ngbe nné ka srra srra a be ngwie̱.
Nné mbe ne mbe he zhwe nka ne̱, á ti he mbe kre yaka ngwie̱ na rici mbe.
Kundu mbe i ra ke̱ we ne hwie nka ngwie̱ na ne mbe i we, á i ra hung wre̱ ne ning brru.
Me̱di a nyi ya ngwie̱ te̱nte̱ng ne mbe i kre — ngwie̱ zinye̱. Aha ni ko i nyi kya nshwu a nwie Be̱ne̱ ngbe ré ki ye he Be̱ne̱ mbe we̱, aha aa nyi ya ngwie̱ aha mbe.

A nyi aha sa rie ne Ibrrahin, a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ i ki mwa, aa fo Ishaku he ngu shi ning nyi teede. Ibrrahin ne nyi ngu ne Be̱ne̱ i ki sa jee e̱, gbengbe ni a i hwie̱ tsie̱ re ning nyi teede ne kowe zunzrru ngu,
ko ngbe ne Be̱ne̱ i he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱ ri she nné nva ngwe̱ ne nje re sa jee e̱ a Ishaku.”
Aha Ibrrahin e̱ i hwie nka he Be̱ne̱ we̱ hung deze nne ne ngu hu re be nce, ngbe shi shi nyi ya nka zhwebe, aa she Ishaku a ning brru re be nce.
A nyi aha sa rie ne Ishaku a i sa Yakubu ngbe Isuwa jeeng she mwo rina re nzhi ncwuee.
A nyi aha sa rie ne Yakubu, a zhe ne ngu i shi hu, ngu a mwo rewe Usufu rina, wire ngu a yaa nyenyi a ngbong cwo ciee ngu, ngu a ye Be̱ne̱ mbè.
A nyi aha sa rie ne Usufu, a zhe ne ngu rikpa hu, ngu a he nka aha wru rewe Isrreela a ngwie̱ Masarr, ngu a we ti kya ne mbe ri nyi ne nku ngu.
A nyi aha sa rie ne de̱ Musa ngbe be̱ ngu i ki la he̱rri nyhwe̱ wetsie̱ a zhe ne e ki bî, aha ne mbe i ri he ewe nna bi rina kpe̱kpe̱, he̱rri koó ci owu nka ne nggwe̱ ngu ngwa we̱.
A nyi aha sa rie ne Musa, a zhe ne ngu i ci brrang, ko ngu shî ngbe re ki ye he ngu nyi ewe ewena Frrahona we̱.
Me̱di a i kyie he canca re ki yarra ngbe nné Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ho shwi e̱ngwie̱ a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu.
A i hwie he shwe nshwu aha Krristi bi mpe̱ni re ne̱ re-dukyie̱e̱ na ngwie̱ Masarr, aha ne ngu i sa riyii a lede ne ngu shi ncwuee.
A nyi aha sa rie ne ngu i we ngwie̱ Masarr we̱sa ne to owu ren nggwe̱. A i yaa rwe shi shi ngu rí Be̱ne̱ ne koó ki ri we̱ ne riyii ngu.
A nyi aha sa rie ne ngu i be ne Teede Paska ngu ci he ré kprre̱ roshwo a ronusinye, kishi njeli yhwi re-birina ri mwe re yhwi ngbe na nné Isrreela.
A nyi aha sa rie ne nné Isrreela i tsa Brra Nzhwo Shwo shi shi mbe cwo a be hwerri; me̱di zhe ne nné Masarr mbe ning ngwie ma, rishi we ko zhwozhwo mbe.
A nyi aha sa rie ne garru ngwie̱ Jerriko i gu a zhe ne nné Isrreela mbe i fo rotu natsie̱ nwie grrang.
A nyi aha sa rie ne ko i yhwe̱ Rraha ne ngu nyi ntsie̱wente ngbe ne nné ra ho nka we̱, aha ne ngu i se̱ nné ri ngwie̱ rina rina.
Ma nyi nda nje shi ning brang wa? Ko nje bi zhe ngbe n ning he nka Gidiyo, ngbe Barraki, ngbe Sanso, ngbe Jefta, ngbe Dooda, ngbe Samela, ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ng we̱.
A nyi aha sa rie ne mbe i kwe̱ ngbe ne re-ringgwe̱ mbe we ye a cwe, á nyi redziee, mbe e̱ she kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu we sa jee. Á i ku ronu re-ze̱kyi,

á i ci brra ro ne ngu ye ne ren ci nsharan, á i to á drre̱ koó we yhwi ne re-ise̱nkeli we̱. Á i shi brrubrru, me̱di á ci igbe̱; á i bi igbe̱ a cwe, he̱rri á drre̱ re-rotsu re-shezhi na yaká re-ngwie̱.
Mbrrú i she á we deze nné mbe ne mbe kwi re be nce.
Me̱di yá, á i we ngwa cinci he̱rri á we yhwi, aha ne mbe i ra de̱me̱ng srra srra rici mbe, aha ngbe mbe ri she te̱nte̱ deze nhu.
Yá, á i we kwa re-nka sha á we kra ne frii, yá ma á i we rrwe ne re-roonyo á we ci a uucwu gyiaa.
Á i we ta ne rahwan, á i we ca uuku uukung ne ceng ca nklankwe, á we yhwi ne re-ise̱nkeli. Yá i gye̱ we ne nkpe canvé ngbe na vé a rwe̱, koó i bi ko yankya we̱, á i we ngwa cinci nwie we yarra.
Ko ebe ngwie̱ e̱ be he ngbe zhwe mbe ana ré ning srra we̱. Á ya ne̱ ne gye̱ a re-eyi, ngbe ngbrá, ngbe a yarri re-rie, ngbe nvo a yarri be.
Ga mbe ne̱ zhwozhwo á i we de aha sa rie mbe, gbengbe ni ko bi ya mbe ne ngu i she cwu kya ne e ning sa jee e̱ we̱,
aha a bi kya te̱nte̱ng ne Be̱ne̱ ngu rwe sa aha nzhi, aha ngbe ngu ri níng mwe ga nzhi zhwozhwo ngbe ne mbe e̱ ngu níng ci nzhi hwie̱ kya ne ngu ce̱ ye̱ye̱rri.

Aha nii, tu ne nzhi bi ga re-sheede ne̱ ne mbe níng grra ni zhwozhwo, ma nde nzhi trru ga re-ankya ruvo ngbe e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu níng rrwe ne̱ nzhi wa, nde nzhi bra to zhwe ncii ne ngu shi ncwuee nzhi e̱ ne yaa rwe.

Nde nzhi sa riyii a Jesu, ne nyi ngu ngu nyi riti ce̱ nka nzhi he̱rri re nzhi cwu krrucing; ngu ne aha ehwie kla na kya ne ngu i shi ncwuee ngu, ngu shwe ge̱zhe̱ gasankwe, koo ci nkwile̱ ne nshwu ngu shi shweng we̱, ngu a ya srra a nva nyye ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱.
Nyi shwe̱ riyii nyi ri zhwe yaa rwe ne ngu i yaa rwe ne zhwe ra ne nné e̱ngwie̱ mbe i ki ra hwie, kishi nyi ri rrwa nyi bra ning ti rie.
Wire ma he̱rri ne cwu ko nyi kwe̱ ne e̱ngwie̱ ya cwu nkang ywe̱ roshwo nyi we̱.
Ka nyi ning ci ga bru ne nka Be̱ne̱ ne ngu níng shwé̱ ehwie aha nyi nyi rewe ngu aa? A he,
“Kowe nje, kundu Be̱ne̱ re yhwire,
shi de̱ ngwe̱ ning kwa hwie̱n we̱,
shi de̱ re bra re cie̱ rwe̱ kundu ngu re ti ne ren we̱,
Aha a nyi nne nke ne Brrabe̱ ce̱ ne ngu ki yhwire,
a bra nyi nne nke ne ngu ki fo he nyi ewe ngu ne ngu ki na uucwu.”
Nyi fo cinci ne nyi shwe e̱ a nu he nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu níng na uucwu, cinci ne nyi shi shweng nna tí he Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng fo nyi nyi rewe ngu. Ka nyi zohu ewe ne ko be̱ ngu a ki na uucwu we̱ e̱e̱?
Kundu de̱ ne e níng na uucwu we̱ (ne e bra shi nwie na kpi rewe e̱ zhwozhwo uucwu), mahu nyi nyi rewe ne ko mbe bi be̱ we̱, ko nyi nyi rewe ngu we̱.

He̱rri ne cwu, ko ngbe re-be̱ nzhi na be ngwie̱ he ne mbe níng na uucwu, ko nzhi we ngwa grime̱ aha ni we̱ e̱e̱? Ma nzhi e̱ shi ngra ngwa Be̱ nzhi a zinye̱ nci nzhi rimi, ngbe nzhi she ce he̱rri tiya a?
Re-be̱ nzhi na be ngwie̱ e̱ á níng na uucwu a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu, shi ne mbe ri aa we mwa ye̱ye̱rri, me̱di Be̱ne̱ níng na uucwu aha re níng sheng, aha ngbe nzhi ci wiri shi ngu.

A zhe ne e shi níng na uucwu, ko we̱ níng bi rina a zheng nna we̱, aha a wié. Me̱di a ncwuee, lede nna cwo a nyi srra rina ngbe e̱kpe̱e̱ redziee a nwie nné mbiye ne mbe mie̱ a zhe ne e shi we na uucwu.
Aha nii, nde nyi ne nyi shi brrubrru shi shi nva nyi ngbe re-ruhuu nyi á rrwa ana nyi ci igbe̱!
Nde ciee nyi re shi tsantsa, kishi nné mbiye ne mbe cwo shi shi mbe kyiekyie a tsi nyi ana á ri ngra kprre, ne na mbe ra ci gbingbi.
Nyi nyi ko nda ne nyi hung nying aha nyi srra rina ngbe ne ko nye̱, nyi bra shi wiri; aha ko bi nne ne ngu we̱sa shi wiri ne ngu ri ri Brrabe̱ we̱.
Nyi ci nkwile̱ ne ko nye̱ a tsi nyi kishi ya nyi ri wi ehwie rina Be̱ne̱. Shi de̱ ya nyi re bra hwie̱ shi shi rinyie ya ekwe rro rro ne ngu shi ci, re bra dzio re̱se̱ kpi nyi we̱.
Shi de̱ ya nyi re bi e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ njè ka re we̱sa ngwa Be̱ne̱ grime̱ shi shi Isuwa ngu i nyi we̱. Aha e̱we̱ enjie yâ, aa fo ngba rugu kya ngu cwo a hwie̱ na ngu aha ruho aa rie̱.
Re be merin, shi ne nyi hu, a zhe ne ngu i ce̱ he ngu she mwo rina be̱ ngu, á ning zhwumi ne ngu, aha ko i bi rê re hung bra kya ne ngu nyi we̱, ko ngbe ne ngu i kre mwo rina nna ne reyii.
Ko nyi be nwie Be̱ne̱ shi shi nné Isrreela ne mbe i be nwie brra ngbra ne e hung reng ne va ne ngu i ye lendo ana we̱, ewie i ci we̱e̱ ywing, ngbe ne ngba ncwu.
Ngbe anaa rigbe, ngbe ne ya cwue ne ngu i he nka ne he̱rri nné hong nna mbe i ne̱ ne cwe nva he shi de̱ re bra we he nka wa we̱,
aha koó i hung yaa rwe ne nka ne i we ngwa we̱, shi ne i he ne mbe he ko ngbe ngu ra bra nyi ya nnyie̱ ngu re ngbra nna, nde ré ki ta ne rahwan.
Kya ne mbe i ri e̱ i bi owu we yang, he̱rri Musa he, “Nje tsi rwe̱ ne owu.”
Me̱di nyi be a Ngbra Siyona, a Urrushelima na zinye̱ ne ngu nyi brra ngwie̱ Be̱ne̱ bi ce. Nyi be a nwie rotsu re-njeli ne mbe brri rigwe̱ rigwe̱ng nwie nyi rekwi.

Nyi be a nwie ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe nyi birina, ne e wie re-lo mbe a zinye̱. Nyi be a nwie Be̱ne̱ ne nyi ngu ne ngu ri nyi nneywí zhwozhwo nka. Nyi be a nwie nné redziee nke ne mbe i kwi ne e we ci mbe ci tsantsa.
Nyi be a nwie Jesu ne ngu nyi nne zetsi na jee hwi, ngbe a nwie roshwo nke ne e kprre̱ ne ngu hé nka re ne̱ na Habila.

Nyi nyi te̱nte̱, shi de̱ nyi ra ho nka ngu ne ngu níng heng we̱. Aha nné ne mbe i ra ho nka Be̱ne̱ ne i we heng a be ngwie̱ ne̱, koó i to á drre̱ we̱. Wé̱ ce̱ rimi he̱rri ngbe nzhi ri to drre̱, kundu nzhi bra emerin nzhi ki ngwa ngu ne ngu níng he nka a zinye̱ e̱e̱?
A zhe ana cwue ngu a i gbe̱ ebe ngwie̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ aa sa jee he, “Ce zrru wa, ko nje shi gbe̱ we ebe ngwie̱ we̱, me̱di he̱rri ngbe ne zinye̱.”
Nka ngu he “ce zrru wa” ana a tí he ga ankya ne e nyi e̱, á ri we gbe̱, ré we trru; aha ngbe ré we ankya nke ne ko bi ré we gbe̱ we̱.

Aha nii, tu ne nzhi shi she ringgwe̱ ne ko bi ré hung gbe̱ng we̱, nde nzhi ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng; kundu nzhi nyi ni, mahu nzhi ki ye mbè a rê ne ngu shi ki kla ehwie, nzhi ki ngwa grime̱, nzhi bra ki to,
aha Be̱ne̱ nzhi e̱ cence a shi shi lendo ne ngu yé.
Nyi ke̱ we ne yaa ce̱ shi re-gimbe.
Nyi lu nyi ri ma srra re si nné ice. Yá mbe i nyi ni he̱rri á si re-njeli we̱sa ne hu re̱se̱ng.
Nyi lu aha nné mbe ne mbe shi a uucwu gyiaa shi shi nyi ning shi ngbe mbe. Nyi lu aha nné mbe ma ne mbe shi shwe ge̱zhe̱, nde re shi shi nyi shi nwie shweng ngbe mbe.
Nyrra a nyi kya re ki ci grime̱, nto ngbe mbrru ré bra yaa nyi redziee; aha Be̱ne̱ cwo a nyi nné bi e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ njè ngbe nné nyi njè nka.
Shi de̱ ce̱ ncwé̱ re shwe rici nyi we̱, me̱di nyi ci kijie̱ng ne kya nyi bi. Aha Be̱ne̱ i he, “Ko shi n re we we̱, ko tsie̱tsie̱ ko shi n re we gung we̱.”
Aha ni nde nzhi he we dengge he,
“Nyi Brrabe̱ ngu ning shéng,
ko shi n ci owu we̱.
Nyi nda ya nne re hu ning nying?”
Nyi lu ne nnencwueé nyi, ne mbe i níng he nka Be̱ne̱. Nyi shwe̱ riyii cwuncwuu nyi ri zhwe srra ne mbe i srra, ngbe nyi mie̱ ne zhwe sa rie mbe.
Jesu Krristi shi we shi ne ngu i ning shi a rwi, ngbe cwu, ngbe he̱rri tiya.

Shi de̱ ré níng ci nyi brru rê ne yá re-nka ne e níng mie̱ng ne mbe shi ka we̱. A bi rina ngbe ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re níng ci nzhi ci igbe̱ a yarri ronu rie nzhi, de̱ re nyi nkang zhwe re-teede na yâ we̱; aha ko re-teede ana á bi mpe̱ni a nwie nné zhweng we̱.
Nzhi e̱ nzhi bi ya briing nyi teede na ne ko ngbe re-prristi ne mbe nyi cwuo a Ndu nné Yahudi koó bi de̱me̱ ré ye kya ne e ning nyi teede a zeteng we̱.
Ngu Brra Prristi e̱ fó roshwo re-ankya rehwe we̱ ngwie mi yarri Nwie Wiri Kaka ngbe we̱ ning nyi teede aha re-e̱ngwie̱, me̱di wé̱ ya shwi rine̱ nna gbong a teme ngwie̱.
A nyi aha ni ne Jesu ngu i shwe ge̱zhe̱ gbong a teme brra onusinye ngwie̱, aha ngbe ngu ci nneywí ré ci wiri ne roshwo na ngu.
Aha ni nde nzhi ywa nwie ngu a teme ngwie̱, ngbe nzhi shwe zhwe nshwu ne ngu i shwe e̱ ma.
Aha a be ngwie̱ ne̱ ko nzhi bi ngwie̱ na ngu shi ning shi he̱rri tiya we̱; me̱di nzhi sa riyii a ngwie̱ na ngu cwo be.
Aha ni nde nzhi tu rici nwie de Be̱ne̱ aha a nyi teede ne nzhi ki nying a yarri lo Jesu, a zhe ne nzhi tí we gbeng he nyi ngu ngu nyi Brrabe̱.
Shi de̱ ga re níng bru ne yaa nyi rina nwie yaa sheng we̱, aha a nyi mbe ne̱ ne mbe nyi teede na ngu kla Be̱ne̱ ehwie.

Nyi ho nnencwueé nyi nka nwie nyi re-ankya ne mbe he nyi nyi. A nyi mbe ne mbe ci nkwile̱ ne nyi we̱sa ne srra cwu, aha ne mbe ri yo nyyi Be̱ne̱ ré he re-ankya ne mbe nyi. Kundu nyi we ho nka, wé̱ nyi cwuo mbe e̱ ne ehwie kla. De̱ ni we̱, wé̱ nyi ne ehwie dzio ngbe ko we̱ bra níng she nying nna we̱.
Nyi tu rici nwie ku Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi. Nzhi hu kpe̱kpe̱ he a yarri re̱kpe̱e̱ nzhi e̱ nzhi shi wiri, nzhi bra ce̱ he nzhi srra re nyi kya ne ngu shi tsantsa a yarri ko nda.
Nje bra cwe nva ne nyi he nyi ning bra ku Be̱ne̱, aha ngbe Be̱ne̱ re ning brru ne nje re be nwie nyi we hwiehwie.
Nde Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ngwá srra rina, ne ngu deze Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu nhu, ngu ne ngu nyi Brra Nnecwo canvé Be̱ne̱ ne aha roshwo ngu ne e ning sa jee na he̱rri tiya,

re níng ngwa ko zohu kya rina ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi bi aha ngbe nyi ning nyi kya ce̱ ngu; nde re ci nyi nyi kya ne ngu ki kla ehwie ne Jesu Krristi níng sheng, ngu ne grime̱ nyi ngge ngu he̱rri tiya tiya. A shi ni.
Re-gimbe, nje cwe nva ne nyi he nyi ci nkwirin ne nti nka ne nje wie aha n níng shwe̱ rehwie ne̱, aha nje wie we kunggu.
Nje ce̱ nyi hu he á cire gimbe nzhi Timoti a uucwu gyiaa. Kundu nje ri she ngu ya wre̱ we hwiehwie, ma n be ngbe ne ngu a zhe ne nje ri cwo a níng ri.
Nyi ning dzie ga nnencwueé nyi zhwozhwo, ngbe ga nné wiri Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo. Re-gimbe a Italiya á níng dzie ma.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ re shi ngbe ne nyi zhwozhwo.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ wru nwie nje Yakubu, nnencwuo Be̱ne̱ ngbe Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi,
Re-gimbe nje, nyi ki fo we ne rehwie kla, kundu nyi ngwi yarri re-nzhwe mwa ri,
aha nyi hu re̱se̱ng he kundu ne e mwa sa rie nyi e̱ ni, we̱ níng ci nyi yaa rwe.
Nde yaa rwe nyi e̱ re fro cwuo na ngu ma, aha ngbe re níng ci nyi hu kwè tsantsa ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi níng shi, ngbe ko nyi e̱ re̱ a yankya we̱.
Kundu ya nyi nyi riywe̱ zentsi, nde re rin Be̱ne̱ng ne ngu ngwá ko nye̱ we wang we̱sa ne tsi ya nne, ngbe we̱ ki ngwa.
Me̱di re rin ne ning sa rie, we̱sa ne nyi jinji, aha nne nke ne ngu nyi jinji a rinng nna shi shi gu rishi a brra nzhwo rishi ne wu yhwá nwie yrrung re ning brru mi.
Shi de̱ zhwe nne ana re hwie he ngu a hung she yankya a nwie Brrabe̱ we̱,
aha ne ngu bi rehwie wehwie, koo hung sa rici ngu a nwie zunzrru we̱ a yarri ko nda ne ngu nyí.
Nde re-gimbe ne mbe shi riywe̱ ré cwe zewe aha Be̱ne̱ we ngwa grime̱,
me̱di nne ce̱ nka ne ngu bi va ma re cwe zewe aha Be̱ne̱ ki ci re̱, aha ne ngu bi shimi we shi vooshwo ntsi.
Aha ne̱ dezé ne ren we̱ ci ntsi re yomi, ngbe re-vooshwo nna wé̱ kpi be, he̱rri rina mbe e̱ we̱ ci shweni. A shi we ni ma, nne bi va a cwo a hwe we ni ma we ne ngu shi re-cieeng kre ncwe̱ ngu.
Mwo rina nyi na nne nke ne ngu yaa rwe a zheng mwa ri, aha ne ngu ti cence he ngu bi sa rie, a ri she lede na ce he̱rri tiya ne Be̱ne̱ i sa jee he ngu ri ngwa nné mbe ne mbe ki ce̱.
Shi de̱ ya nne ne mwa ri ki be re he he nyi Be̱ne̱ ngu shi nwie ki mwa ri we̱, aha ko Be̱ne̱ mwa ya nne ri we̱, ko bra bi nne re hung mwa Be̱ne̱ re ki ci nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ngwié mwa ri kundu ne ecwue na ngu we rici ngu ki kwa he̱rri ngu ki shwe̱li.
Ngbe a zhe ne ecwue ana ri he ngu ci riti a ngu, we̱ ki ci re nyi e̱ngwie̱, ngbe e̱ngwie̱ e̱ ri he ngu ci brrang ma fa, we̱ ki ci re hu.
Shi de̱ ré níng brra we̱, re-gimbe ce̱ nje.
Ko zohu te̱nte̱ kya na na ne ngu bi rina kpe̱kpe̱ wru zeteng a nwie Be̱ ne ngu nyi re-ankya tsie̱ nse̱ a zinye̱, ngu ne ko ngu bra we̱, ko bra shi shi rowu ne ngu bra we̱.
A nyi kya ce̱ ngu he ngu níng ci nzhi hwie̱ rewe ngu ne nka raywrra, aha ngbe nzhi hwie̱ shi nyi yá re-birina na ngu a tsi ga ankya ne ngu nyi.
Re-gimbe ce̱ nje, nde nyi hu re̱se̱ng he aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri ko nye̱ re shi jenje nwie hong, me̱di re shi de̱tiri nwie he nka ngbe ne dzio ehwie,
aha ko dzio ehwie nneywi e̱ cwo mi ne nyi re-cwuo redziee ne Be̱ne̱ cé̱ we̱.
Aha ni nyi trru ko zohu e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ ngbe hwie̱ ne ngu ke̱ we ne ning shi yarri nyi, ngbe a yarri nywe̱ rici, nyi se̱ riti nka Be̱ne̱, ne ngu ci yarri ronu rie nyi, ne ngu hu níng kyia.
Nyi hwie̱ nné ne mbe hó re ning nyi cwuo mi, shi de̱ nyi ho we ho nwie yaa brra we nci nyi we̱.
Aha ko nye̱ ne ngu hó nka Be̱ne̱ we ho, ne ko ngu ning nyí cwuo mi we̱, a shi shi nne ne ngu yaa ri a ngge̱ni,
ngbe a zhe ne ngu ri yaa ri yhwe̱, ne ngu ne̱ ne ciee ngu, we̱ wre̱ ne ning ci ga bru ka ngu shi rimi ye̱.

Me̱di nne nke ne ngu ning sa rici nwie hwie nti nka Be̱ne̱, nka ngu ne ngu shi tsantsa ne ngu níng cí nzhi she drre̱ ne e̱ngwie̱, ne ko ngu nyi we nne hong we ho re ning ci ga bru we̱, me̱di ne ngu ning nyi cwuo mi, we̱ she mwo rina a yarri ko nda ne ngu shi nying.
Kundu ya nyi yaa ri shi ngu bi e̱kpe̱e̱ng zhwe Be̱ne̱, ne he̱rri ne cwu ko ngu cwó le ngu we̱, mahu a yaa brra we rici ngu, zhwe Be̱ne̱ ngu a bra nyi we cwuo shweni.

E̱kpe̱e̱ng zhwe Be̱ne̱ nke ne ngu shi wiriri we̱sa ne e̱kpe̱e̱ le̱le̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱ Be̱ e̱ nyi nke: ré ci nkwile̱ ne re-iina ngbe kpambrrú a yarri re-cinci mbe, nne re bra cwo rici ngu ne yaa dzio ne ankya ngwie̱.
Re-gimbe nje, tu nyi bi sa rie a Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ne ngu bi grime̱, shi de̱ nyi kyie nné kyie kyie we̱.
Kundu ya nne ya wre̱ a tsi nyi a zhe ne nyi shi mwe ne ngu ci ewema na zinarriya ngbe brrá ankya, ngbe ya yiriywe̱ e̱ ya wre̱ ma ne igye̱ ankya ma,
kundu nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nne bi brrá ankya ana nyi he ne ngu he, “Ngwe̱, be ngwe̱ srra a te̱nte̱ ncwu ne,” me̱di nyi e̱ he ne yiriywe̱ nna he, “Ngwe̱, yo miimi, ka ngwe̱ srra a be hwerri ho.”
Ko nyi e̱ ne̱ ne ting a nci nyi e̱ he yá nneywí e̱ á shi ka, nwie yaa nyi nka a yarri hwie nka me̱nkye̱ wo ye̱?

Re-gimbe ce̱ nje, nyi ho: ko Be̱ne̱ e̱ kyie nné mbiye ne mbe nyi yiriywé̱ a be ngwie̱ ne̱ ngbe ré bi sa rie we yang, ngbe ré bra hwie̱ nné ne mbe cwo a she ringgwe̱ ne ngu ning sa jee aha nné ne mbe ki ce̱ wo ye̱?
Me̱di nyi e̱ nyi dzié̱ yiriywé̱. Ko nyi mbe nné bi va ne mbe níng ngwá cinci wo ye̱? Ko nyi mbe ne mbe níng kwa re nzhi re-zonggrung nyi nka wo ye̱?
Ko nyi mbe e̱ ne mbe he re-nkang dzie̱ lo Jesu Krristi, te̱nte̱ lo ne e níng hu mi wo ye̱?
Kundu nyi rā zhwe Nti Nka na Ringgwe̱ ne ngu shi a yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, “Ngwe̱ ce̱ nne dudu ne ngwe̱ shi rici ngwe̱,” mahu nyi e̱ nyi ye̱ye̱rri.
Me̱di kundu nyi kyie nné kyie kyie, mahu nyi nyi e̱ngwie̱, Nti Nka a bra tí we gbeng he nyi nyí nné e̱ngwie̱.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu zhwe ga Nti Nka zhwozhwo, me̱di ngu hle̱ we zunzrru, mahu aa ywe̱ ne ga Nti Nka ana zhwozhwo.
Aha ngu ne ngu he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi njè we̱,” a bra nyi ngu a ngu he wa he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ yhwe̱ nne we̱.” Kundu ne de̱ ngwe̱ nyi njè we̱, me̱di ngwe̱ bra yhwe̱ nne, mahu ngwe̱ hle̱ Nti Nka Be̱ne̱.
Aha ni nyi ri ma he nka nyi bra nyi ankya shi nné ne e ri we nyi nka ne Nti Nka ne ngu níng ci nzhi she drre̱ ne e̱ngwie̱.
Aha Be̱ne̱ ri nyi nné riywe̱ naana nka we̱sa ne naana. Naana a drré̱ nyi nka.
Re-gimbe nje, mpe̱ni he ngwe̱ bi sa rie me̱di ko ngwe̱ bra nyi re-cwuong nna we̱ e̱ nyi nda? He̱rri zhwe sa rie ana we̱ re kyia aa?
Kundu ya gimbe ewerento ka ewerembrru nyi riywe̱ kya ci rwe̱ ka yâng yeri,
ngbe ya nyi e̱ he ne ngu he, “Ywa, ngwe̱ ya ngwie rina, Be̱ne̱ re re ngwa kya ci ngbe kya ye,” ne ko ngu bra ki ngwa ko yankya ci rwe̱ ka kya ye we̱, mpe̱ni nna nyi nda?
Aha ni sa rie we nggaa ngu we̱sa ne re-cwuong nna, a nyi kweng.
Me̱di ya we̱ he, “Ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ bi sa rie, nje e̱ bi re-cwuong.” Ning ti sa rie ngwe̱ ne ko ngu bi re-cwuong nna we̱, ngbe ma n re ti sa rie na nje e̱ ngbe ne re-cwuo ne nje nyi e̱.
Ngwe̱ bi sa rie he Be̱ne̱ shi zunzrru. Ee, ngwe̱ nyi ye̱ye̱rri. Me̱di ga ngbe rewienci e̱ ma á bi sa rie he shi ni ma, he̱rri a ki tó ne tsi rwe̱.
Ngwe̱ nne riywe̱ zentsi, ngwe̱ ce̱ hung he sa rie we̱sa ne re-cwuong nna nyi we cwuo shweni e̱e̱?
Ko nyi aha kya ne brra yo nzhi Ibrrahin e̱ i nyi a zhe ne ngu i fo kowe ngu Ishaku ngu ngwa a briing nyi teede e̱ ne i ki fo he nyi nne redziee we̱ e̱e̱?
Ma ko ngwe̱ ri sa rie ngu a i shi gbengbe ne re-cwuong wo ye̱? Kya ne ngu i nyi e̱ ci ré hu he cence a bi sa rie.
Ngbe krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci rrurru shi ne e wie he, “Aha sa rie Ibrrahin e̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki se̱ he nyi nne redziee”; he̱rri á i ki ye he rwi Be̱ne̱.
Ma nyi ri, nneywi e̱ shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha re-cwuo ne ngu nyi, ko aha sa rie nggaa ngu we̱.
A shi we ni wa, ko Rraha ne ngu i nyi ntsie̱wente i ci tsantsa nyyi Be̱ne̱ aha kya ne ngu i nyi a zhe ne ngu i ngwa nné ri ngwie̱ ewieng srra ngu bra we cire a yaka rê we̱ e̱e̱?
Aha we shi ne rwe̱ we̱sa ne nshe a nyi kweng, we ni wa, sa rie we̱sa ne re-cwuong a nyi we kweng.
Re-gimbe nje, shi de̱ jie̱ nyi ré hwie̱ nné mie̱ nka we̱, aha nyi hu he nzhi ne nzhi mie̱ nka ne̱ á ri níng nyi nka kaka re ne̱.
Ga nzhi zhwozhwo nzhi brrú a re-rê we yang. Kundu bi nne ne ko ngu ywé̱ a kya ne ngu hé we̱, mahu a nyi nne ne ngu shi tsantsa, aa hung ci nkwile̱ ne rwe̱ ngu zhwozhwo.
Kundu nzhi ci ntsie̱ ru a nu aha ngbe re níng ho nka, nzhi e̱ hung kwa ntsie̱ nna zhwozhwo.
Ma ri re-jirigi rishi e̱ wa, ko ngbe ne mbe nyi brrabrráng ne ngba wu we yrru a yarri rishi, a nyi we ya uku ngbo ne nne tong nna ngu ning brrá jirigi nna re nzhi ko he ne ngu cé̱.
A shi we ni wa, le nneywi e̱ nyi ya e̱we̱ kya tsie̱nzhwu, me̱di a yaa kywo nwie he ngbá re-ankya.
E̱we̱ ro tsie̱nzhwu pié ngbe we̱ ye brra re̱ngwie̱ wiriri.
Le e̱ nyi ro; a nyi ya ebe ngwie̱ na hwie̱ a yarri re-rwe̱ nzhi ne ngu dzió nneywi e̱ zhwozhwo. Aa hung ci nneywi a srra ngu zhwozhwo a nro, ne nyi ro ne ngu wrú a ruvong ro ne ngu ki cwuá.
Nneywi e̱ hung cwo ga re-nzhwe ankya rehwe, ngbe re-nzhwe re̱mie̱, ngbe nzhwe ankya kwa rehwie be, ngbe ko zohu zhwe hwen ne ngu srra yarri brra nzhwo rishi, he̱rri ma a we cwó.
Me̱di ko bi nne re hung cwo le ngu we̱, a shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ ko bi ré hung cwong we̱, a shi shi ren nshe ne ngu cwo mi ne hu.
A nyi ngu ne nzhi ning de Brrabe̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ nzhi, a bra nyi ngu ne nzhi ning cwi nné — nné ne Be̱ne̱ ngu we nyi a shî ngu.
A nyi we ngu onu zunzrru ne̱ ne nzhi ning de Be̱ne̱, nzhi bra ning cwi nné. Kyet, re-gimbe nje, koo mwa ye̱ye̱rri re shi ni we̱.
He̱rri wé̱ ce̱ rimi ngbe rishi cwancwaa ngbe rishi rienrien ré mwe ré wrru a nshwa zunzrru a ye̱?
Re-gimbe nje, ko shi ekwe riyhwietsie re krro ngbre rihwie̱n, ka ekwe roshwo me̱nte̱ re krro ngbre riyhwietsie we̱; ko shi nshwa ne ngu wrru mi ne rishi rienrien re bra wru mi ne rishi cwancwaa we̱.
Nyi nye̱ ne ngu bi zentsi ngbe hu re̱se̱ng a tsi nyi e̱? Nde re ti zentsi ngu a ne e̱kpe̱e̱ rina nwie nyi re-cwuo rina ne nywe̱ rici na zentsi.
Me̱di kundu nyi bi rehwie rro ngbe ce̱ rici a yarri ronu rie nyi, shi de̱ nyi ning cwe zewe mi nwie ku raywrra ne rabrra we̱.
Ko zhwe zentsi ana a wrú zinye̱ we̱, a nyi na be he, a nyi na e̱kpe̱e̱ nneywi, aa wru nwie Shetani.
Aha ko zohu ewie ne ngu ning bi ehwie rro, ngbe ce̱ rici, we̱ ning bi re̱kwe̱ ngbe ko zohu zhwe hwie̱.

Me̱di zentsi na ne ngu wru zinye̱ e̱ ke̱she shi wiriri, wire a cé̱ srra rina, a bi ehwie sheng ne ko nye̱, a nywé̱ rici nwie ko nye̱, a rí naana nneywí, a nyí nneywí rina; ko kyie nné kyie kyie we̱, ko bra brrá onu we̱.
He̱rri nné mbe ne mbe kre he nneywí ré srra rina, aha kya ne mbe nyi a yarri srra rina, we̱ ci nneywí ré bi re̱kpe̱e̱ redziee.
Nyi nda ngu ci nyi ti ko we nci nyi e̱e̱? Nyi re̱kwe̱ nda ngu shi yarri nyi e̱e̱? Ko nyi aha re-nzhwe ecwue ne mbe shi re̱kwe̱ a yarri nyi we̱ e̱e̱?

Nyi kre kya me̱di ko nyi shi sheng we̱; aha ni he̱rri nyi e̱ yhwe̱ nne. Nyi bi riyii kya ya nne, me̱di ko nyi shi she kya ne nyi ce̱ we̱; aha ni nyi e̱ ning ci we ko nwie kwe̱ cwe we nci nyi. Ko nyi bi we̱, aha ne ko nyi rín we̱.
Ko ngbe ne nyi bra rin ma, ko shi nyi she we̱, aha kya ne nyi ning hwie yi e̱ ko nyi te̱nte̱ng we̱, me̱di we aha nyi ning ho shwi ankya shweni.

Nyi nné ne ko shi ré hung sa rie a nyi we̱, ko nyi ru he kundu nyi ve iirwi ngbe ne ebe ngwie̱ mahu nyi nyí rwinkó Be̱ne̱ we̱ e̱e̱? Aha ni ko nye̱ ne ngu kyie he ngu ve iirwi ngbe ne ebe ngwie̱, mahu aa hwie̱ rwinko Be̱ne̱.
Ka nyi hwie he nka ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he ne̱ shi we dede e̱e̱? A he, “Cence Be̱ne̱ cí nkwile̱ ne nshe ngu ne ngu ci re srra yarri nzhi e̱ we yang.”
Me̱di Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ngwa ehwie rina ngu we yang. Nyi ngwiee ne Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he, “Be̱ne̱ ra nne kywo rici ze, me̱di a nyi nne nke ne ngu nywe̱ rici rina.”
Aha ni nyi ngwa nci nyi nwie Be̱ne̱. Nyi kwe̱ ne Shetani, ngbe we̱ to nwie nyi.
Nyi be dudu ne Be̱ne̱, ngbe we̱ be dudu ne nyi ma. Nyi kyu nva nyi ne re-cwuo e̱ngwie̱, nyi nné e̱ngwie̱. Nyi ci ronu rie nyi ré shi wiri, nyi nné bi rehwie wehwie.
Nyi dzio rehwie, nyi ku rana nwie ywe̱ reyii. Nde rimrraa nyi re bra re ci anaa, rekwi nyi re bra re ci ehwie dzio.
Nyi yaa ci re̱ a nyyi Be̱ne̱, ngbe we̱ níng fo ze.

Re-gimbe, shi de̱ nyi ri ma yaa he nka e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Nne nke ne ngu he ya nka e̱ngwie̱ a rici ya gimbe, ka ngu ki kwe fe̱li, mahu aa cwi Nti Nka, a bra hé ko Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱. Ma kundu ne ngwe̱ hé ko Nti Nka Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱, mahu ko ngwe̱ zhwe Nti Nka nna we̱, ngwe̱ nyi nne ki nyi nka.

A nyi we Be̱ne̱ ngu ngwa Nti Nka, a bra nyi we ngu ngu bi igbe̱ng nyi nka. A nyi we ngu ngu bi igbe̱ng kyia nne ngbe ne igbe̱ng ci nne re ci shweni. Me̱di nyi ngwe̱ nye̱ ngwe̱ nyi ya gimbe ngwe̱ nka aa?
Ma nyi ho fa, nyi ne nyi he, “A cwu ne, ka encwe ho, nje ri ywa a nwie ke̱ze̱ ka a ngwie̱ ke̱ze̱ ngbe n ya ci rie zunzrru nwie nyi kaawe̱, ngbe ma n rie̱ ankya n ning she ncwe̱ we yang.”
Kyet, ma ko nyi bra hu ka encwe e̱ ri shi rimi we̱. He̱rri nyi hu re̱se̱ ce nyi e̱e̱? Nyi shi shi vie̱ ne ngu ya wré̱ a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu, ngbe we̱ bru.
Kya ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi he e̱ nyi nke: “Kundu a ri nyi kya ce̱ Brrabe̱ ne nzhi ya cwu, nzhi e̱ nyi kya ke̱ze̱ ne, ka kya ke̱ze̱ ncwi.”
Me̱di a zhe ne ne̱, nyi cwé zewe nwie yaa kywo, zhwe cwe zewe ana nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Aha nii, ko nye̱ ne ngu hu kya rina ne ngu rā nyi, me̱di ne ko ngu nyi we̱, aa nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Nné bi va, a zhe ne ne̱ nyi be nyi e̱ ho ma: nyi ku rana nwie cwe nku aha ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu cwo be rici nyi.
Dukyie̱e̱ nyi e̱ vi, he̱rri zhe ye ngbe brrá ankya ci rwe̱ nyi e̱.

Ga re-zinarriya nyi ngbe re-azrrufa nyi e̱ á rre yhwe̱, rre ne mbe rre ana nyi sheede a rici nyi, a nyi ngu ana ngu bra shi ning brru re ye ngbe ne re-rwe̱ nyi shi shi nyi ro. Nyi tsu dukyie̱e̱ nyi e̱ aha nyi nka na rotu krrucing.
Nyi ri, ga ngbe ncwé̱ nné ne mbe níng nyi cwuo a ebe ne nyi ra we trrang, á ti nku nwie ting. Anaa nné mbe ne mbe níng ca nyya a rebe nyi e̱ ya cwu a uucwu Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo.
Nyi srra a be ngwie̱ nwie ho shwi ko nda ne nyi bi. Nyi ci re-rwe̱ gugugu aha otu ne e cwo a níng ca.
Nyi cí nné redziee nka he̱rri nyi e̱ we yhwi, koó bra hé ya nka ne nyi we̱.

Aha ni re-gimbe, nyi yaa rwe he̱rri re nzhi cwu zheng be Brrabe̱. Nyi ri zhwe ehwie sheng ne nne kaa ngu fo a zhe ne ngu shi nwie te ebe yâ re ci riyii rina rina. A cí nkwirin nwie teng, kya ngu ce̱ we zhe kpebe re nzhi wre̱ tsitsi.
Nyi e̱ ma nyi fo ehwie sheng, nyi rwe rie aha be Brrabe̱ e̱ sa dudu.
Re-gimbe, shi de̱ nyi yaa krro nka a nci nyi we̱, de̱ ni wo á ri níng nyi nka. Nne nyi nka a nyi ngwiee ngu shi yo a nusinye!
Re-gimbe, nde nyi mie̱ yaa rwe a yarri ge̱zhe̱ a nwie nné ti re̱se̱ng ne mbe i he re-nka a yarri lo Brrabe̱.

Nje he ka nzhi he nné mbe ne mbe yaa rwe e̱ á nyi nné bi mwo rina. Nyi ho zhwe yaa rwe Ayuba, nyi bra ri kya ne Brrabe̱ ngu ya ki nying a gamang. Aha Brrabe̱ nzhi e̱ bi naana, naana ngu a zhwo we zhwo.

Re-gimbe nje, a ngrangrang zhwozhwo, shi de̱ nyi fo shí a zhe ne nyi sa jee we̱, ka re nyi ne zinye̱ ka ne ebe ngwie̱ ka yaka yankya. Me̱di nde “Ee” nyi re nyi ee, ngbe “Aawo” nyi re nyi aawo, de̱e̱ ni wo Be̱ne̱ ri níng nyi nka.
A bi ya nyi ne ngu shi ge̱zhe̱ e̱e̱? Nde re ku Be̱ne̱. Ka bi ya nyi ne ngu shi rekwi e̱e̱? Nde re ve re-veng de Brrabe̱.
A bi ya a tsi nyi ne ko ngu shi gbingbi we̱ e̱e̱? Nde re ye ekpri brrá nné na ekpri nné ce̱ nka re ya ki ku Be̱ne̱ nwie ki ywi remie a yarri lo Brrabe̱.
Ngbe ku Be̱ne̱ mbe ne mbe ku ne ning sa rie e̱ we̱ ci nne ruhu re ci gbingbi; Brrabe̱ we̱ ki deze. Kundu ne e ma ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱, wé̱ ki we e̱ngwie̱ ngu.
Aha nii, nyi ri ma yaa ti re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi ne nyi nyi, nyi bra yaa ku Be̱ne̱, aha ngbe nyi she ci gbingbi. Ku Be̱ne̱ nne redziee e̱ nyí cwuo ne igbe̱.
Iliya i nyi we nneywi shi nzhi, ne ku Be̱ne̱ ne ngu tu rici kung he de̱ nze re wie we̱, aa ci ni, ko nze e kpe be we̱ he̱rri re-rie wetsie̱ ne kpirring.
Aa bra i ning brru ku Be̱ne̱ wa, ngbe zinye̱ e̱ ne̱ ne ngwa nze, he̱rri re-ankya á ne̱ ne ta a rebe.
Re-gimbe nje, kundu ya a tsi nyi we rê raywrra ne ya nyi ning brru mi ne ngu,
nyi hu re̱se̱ng he nne nke ne ngu ning brru mi ne nne e̱ngwie̱ a yarri brru ngu, aa kyia ce ngu ne hu, aa ci á ki we re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu we yang.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Pita, nnente Jesu Krristi, re nzhi nwie nné ne Be̱ne̱ ngu kyie, ne mbe yaa se̱ mbe shi ice a yaká re-ngwie̱ — a Pontu, ngbe Galati, ngbe Kapadokyia, ngbe Asia ngbe Bitiniya.
Nyi ne Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ngu níng kyie ye̱ye̱rri shi ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ hu re̱se̱ng, ne Nshe Wiri níng ci nyi ci wiri, aha ngbe nyi zhwe nka Jesu Krristi ne ngu níng ci nyi ci wiri ne roshwo ngu.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ngbe srra rina re zhwo we zhwo a yarri nyi.
Nde nzhi de Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Be̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi! Aha a yarri brra naana ngu, aa níng ngwa ce hwi ne ngu deze Jesu Krristi nhu, aa ci nzhi hung sa riyii a ngu we̱sa ne kpo —
sa riyii a zete re-mwo rina ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng sa jee ne ko mbe bi ci shweni we̱, ka ré dzio, ka re krra we̱, ne ngu sa a zinye̱ aha nyi.
Á nyi na nyi, nyi ne Be̱ne̱ a yarri igbe̱ ngu ngu shi níng cwo aha sa rie nyi a ngu, aha ngbe nyi ri she kyia ne ngu rikpa ya wre̱ a zhe krruci ngwie̱.
Nyi nyi rekwi yang aha ni, ko ngbe ne a zhe ne ne̱, kabeya se nyi shwe cinci ne rehwie dzio a yarri re-nzhwe mwa ri kanka kanka a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱.

Re-ankya ne̱ á shi ci ni aha ngbe ré hu he sa rie nyi e̱ nyi te̱nte̱ng. Ko ngbe zinarriya ne ngu dzió a ma, á ki mwá ne ro. Me̱di sa rie nyi e̱ ne̱ zinarriya we gbong, aha ni se ne e mwa sa rie nyi e̱ ma, ngbe re yo ne igbe̱. Wire Be̱ne̱ we̱ ri níng de, we̱ níng ngwa grime̱ we yang a Tu ne Jesu Krristi ri be.
Ko ngbe ne ko nyi sa ki ri we̱, nyi ki ce̱; ko ngbe ne ko nyi bra ki rí a zhe ne ne̱ we̱, nyi sa rie a ngu. Kya a nyi ngwiee nyi bi ya zhwe ehwie kla ne ko bi ré ning mwa yi we̱,
aha re-ce nyi e̱ á shi nwie she kyia ne ngu nyí kwili sa rie nyi e̱.
A nyi aha nka kyia ne̱ ne nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe i yaa we we sheng mbe ci nkwile̱ nwie kreng, wire mbe ti re̱se̱ nka kya na na ne Be̱ne̱ shi níng ngwa.
Á i kre he mbe hu zhe ngbe zhwe rê ne kya ne Nshe Krristi ne ngu shi yarri mbe ngu he e̱ cwo a ci, shi ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ ti zhwe re-ge̱zhe̱ ne Krristi ri shwe ngbe ne re-grime̱ ne ngu ri she.

Be̱ne̱ i ti nné ti re̱se̱ng nna a zhe ne mbe i ngwa re-nka mbe he re-cwuo ne mbe nyi e̱, a nyi nyi ne mbe níng nying, ko i nyi aha nci mbe we̱. Nshe Wiri ne Be̱ne̱ ngu te mi a zinye̱ i ci nné brro Nka Rina ré níng ti ga re-ankya ne̱, re-ankya ne ga ngbe re-njeli mbe kre he mbe hu.
Aha nii, nyi yaa rwe a yarri rehwie nyi aha cwuo; nyi srrante, nyi bra sa riyii zhwozhwo a mwo rina ne e ri níng ngwa a zhe ne Jesu Krristi ri be.
We shi e̱we̱e̱ rewe ne mbe ho nka, shi de̱ nyi we ecwue e̱ngwie̱ ne nyi i bi a zhe ne nyi i srra yarri riywe̱ hung re níng kwa we̱.
Me̱di nyi shi wiri a yarri ko nda ne nyi nyí, we shi ngu ne ngu ning ye e̱ ngu shi wiri.
Aha á wie he, “Nyi shi wiri, aha nje shi wiri.”
Nyi ki yé he Be̱ a zhe ne nyi shi ku Be̱ne̱, a nyi ngu ne ngu nyí ko nye̱ nka we̱sa ne ce̱ rici, ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ne mbe nyi. Aha ni nyi srra shi nyi nyi nné ice a be ngwie̱ ne̱ ne to owu ngu.
Aha nyi hu re̱se̱ng he ko nyi ne re-ankya shi mbe azrrufa ngbe zinarriya ne mbe dzió ne i níng kyia ne re-teede ne nyi she nwie yó nyi na tiya we̱,
me̱di á i níng se̱ ne roshwo bi grime̱ na Krristi, ne ngu i hwie̱ shi kowe canveng nyi teede we̱sa ne ya ngbe̱ ka roru.
Be̱ne̱ i ki kyie tu ne e rishi nyi ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo, me̱di aa ya wre̱ a rotu krrucing ne̱ aha nyi.
A nyi aha ngu ne nyi sa rie a Be̱ne̱, ne ngu ki deze nhu ngu bra ki ngwa grime̱; aha ni sa rie nyi ngbe sa riyii nyi shi a Be̱ne̱.
A zhe ne ne̱ ne nyi yaa ci nyi ci wiri ne zhwe nka raywrra, he̱rri nyi ne̱ ne yaa ce̱ we te̱nte̱ ce̱ a tsi nyi re-gimbe, nyi tu rici nwie yaa ce̱ ne ronu rie nyi zhwozhwo.
Aha á níng bî hwing, ko ne ricii na nneywi ne ngu cí shweni we̱, me̱di ne ricii na ngu we̱sa ci shweni ne ngu nyi riti nka Be̱ne̱ ne ngu bi ce ne ngu ning shi he̱rri tiya.
Aha,
“Ga nneywí zhwozhwo shi shi ntsi,
ga risa mbe zhwozhwo shi shi nkpe̱ rekwe yi,
ntsi nna yomi, ngbe nkpe̱ rekwe e̱ ma wé̱ kpi be,
me̱di nka Brrabe̱ e̱ ning shi he̱rri tiya.”
Nyi nka ne i níng brrong nna nke ne̱.
Aha nii, nyi trru re̱kpe̱e̱ e̱ngwie̱ zhwozhwo, ngbe rabrra zhwozhwo, ngbe brra onu, ngbe ehwie shwo, ngbe ko zohu zhwe nkang dzio ya nne.
Nyi ci shi e̱we̱e̱ rewe shwo ne e bî hwing ne mbe kré shwe eme, nyi ma nyi kre nka Be̱ne̱ ni aha ngbe re níng ci nyi ci brráng he̱rri nyi ya she kyia.
Shi ne e wie he, “Nyi e̱ ma nyi ning lie̱ onu, nyi hu ehwie rina Brrabe̱.”
Nyi be nwie Brrabe̱ ne ngu nyi Zahwan nce, ne nneywí mbe ra he nyi kya shweni, me̱di ne Be̱ne̱ ngu kyie he nyi zunkya.

Ngbe nyi e̱ ma, shi nyi nyi rahwan nce, nde ré ning no brranyi Nshe Wiri ne nyi, a nwie ne nyi shi ning nyi cwuo shi nyi nyi ekpri re-prristi wiri, nwie nyi re-teede na Nshe Wiri, zhwe na ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱ aha Jesu Krristi.
Aha á wie yarri krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ he,
“Nyi ri, nje sa zahwan a Siyona,
a nyi te̱nte̱ zahwan runo
ko nye̱ ne ngu sa rie a ngu ko shi re shwe nshwu we̱.”
Ngu zahwan ne̱ nyi zunkya a nwie nyi, nyi ne nyi sa rie a ngu; me̱di nné mbiye ne mbe ra sa rie a ngu:
“Zahwan ne nné runo a mbe ra he ko bi mpe̱ni we̱,
aa bra hwie̱ te̱nte̱ng kaka re ne̱ zhwozhwo.”
We̱sa ni wa,
“Ngu zahwan ne̱ cí nneywí ré grre̱,
a bra nyi ngbaatsie ne ngu we ci ré kpi.”
Á grre̱ aha ne mbe ra shî nka Be̱ne̱; mahu kya ne e rwe a rici mbe e̱ nyi ngwiee.

Me̱di nyi e̱ nyi nyi nné ne e kyie, ekpri re-prristi na Brra Nggwe̱, nyi nyi nné wiri, nyi nyi nné na Be̱ne̱, aha ngbe nyi brro re̱se̱ ngbá re-cwuo Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ning ye nyi wrru yarri ewie ywing re be yarri brra nse̱ ngu ne ngu nyi kyang hwie̱ nga onu.
Ko i ma nyi nyi nné Be̱ne̱ we̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ nyi nyi nné ngu; ko nyi i bi hu re̱se̱ naana Be̱ne̱ we̱, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ nyi she naana ngu.
Nné ce̱ nje, shi ne nyi nyi nné ice ne nyi shi ka srra be ngwie̱ ne̱ ka ka, nje cwe nva ne nyi he shi de̱ nyi ngwa nci nyi yarri ecwue ankya ngwie̱ngwie̱ ne mbe shi cwe ne ce nyi we̱.
Nde re̱kpe̱e̱ nyi a tsi nné tsi ngwie̱ re bi rina, aha ko ngbe ne mbe níng cwí he nyi nyí ankya me̱nkye̱, wé̱ bi we ya hu re-cwuo rina nyi ngbe wé̱ ri ci Be̱ne̱ grime̱ a Tu ne ngu ri be.
Aha Brrabe̱, nyi ngwa nci nyi ne ko zohu ringgwe̱ ne nneywí mbe ci, ka re nyi nggwe̱ ne ngu bi de̱me̱ ringgwe̱ zhwozhwo,
ka re-goona, ne ngu we kyie ré na nné mbiye ne mbe brru uucwu, ré bra de nné mbiye ne mbe nyí rina.
Aha nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ he ne re-cwuo rina nyi, nyi ci nné hé re-nka shweni aha riywe̱ hung ana ré dzie̱ cereng.
Shi de̱ nyi srra shi nyi nyi hwié we̱; shi de̱ nyi bra fo srra srra rici nyi e̱ re níng hwie̱ riwie̱ng nyi e̱ngwie̱ a la la we̱, me̱di nyi srra shi nyi nyi hwié Be̱ne̱.
Nyi ngwa ko nye̱ grime̱, nyi ce̱ re-gimbe a yarri ce̱ nka, nyi to owu Be̱ne̱, nyi ngwa nggwe̱ grime̱.
Nyi hwié, nyi ngwa nci nyi a nwie re-be̱ri nyi zhwozhwo nwie we ngwa grime̱ ko zohu zhe — shi de̱ re nyi we re-be̱ri nke ne mbe níng nyi rina we̱, me̱di ngbe ne re-nke ne mbe níng nyi me̱nkye̱.
A nyi kya ré níng de, kundu nyi yaa rwe nwie shwe ge̱zhe̱ we̱sa ne kwiling, aha ne nyi sa hwie nka nyi a kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱.

Ma lede nna nyi nda, kundu ne nyi yaa rwe a ge̱zhe̱ cwe ne e níng cwe aha e̱ngwie̱ ne nyi nyi e̱e̱? Me̱di kundu ne nyi shwe ge̱zhe̱ aha cwuo rina ne nyi nyi ne nyi bra yaa rwe yarring, Be̱ne̱ we̱ níng de aha ni.
A nyi aha ni ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ye, aha Krristi we rici ngu shwe ge̱zhe̱ aha nyi, aa níng we ne kya ning mwa yi, aha ngbe nyi zhwe nyie nta ngu.
“Koo nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱, koó bra i she ya rabrra a nu ngu we̱.”
A zhe ne i ki cwi, ko i trra we̱; a zhe ne ngu i shi shwe ge̱zhe̱, ko he ngu ri trra we̱. Me̱di aa we ko nda a nva ngwiee ne ngu nyi nka tsantsa.
Ngu we rici ngu a fo re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi a rwe̱ ngu a zete gasankwe, aha ngbe nzhi hwie̱ nkweng a nwie e̱ngwie̱ ngbe nzhi srra nce aha redziee. A nyi aha ngbé̱ ngu ne nyi she ci gbingbi.
Nyi i shi shi canvé ne mbe bru, me̱di a zhe ne ne̱ nyi ning brru re be nwie Nnecwo ne ngu cí nkwile̱ ne ce nyi.
A shi ni, mbrrú, nyi ho ntó nyi nka, aha kundu a ri bi yá mbe ne ko mbe shî nka Be̱ne̱ we̱, aha e̱kpe̱e̱ rina nyi mbrrú mbe e̱, Be̱ne̱ we̱ we kwa we̱sa ne nyi we he ya nka,
aha ne mbe ri e̱kpe̱e̱ wiri ngbe owu Be̱ne̱ a yarri nyi.
Shi de̱ rina nyi re nyi risa ankya ci rwe̱, shi shi risa nkwerici ngbe nyi risa ne ankya ne e cwu ne zinarriya ngbe ne ankya bi ncwé̱ we̱.
Ne re shi ni, nde rina nyi re nyi na yarring, zhwe rina nke ne ko ngu dzio we̱, ne ngu nyi ehwie sheng ngbe ehwie ranng — nyi ngu ne ngu bi mpe̱ni a nyyi Be̱ne̱ we yang.
Mbrrú wiri a tiya ne mbe i sa riyii a Be̱ne̱ á i shi nyi risa mbe e̱ ni. Á i ho ntó mbe nka.
Sarra i nyi ni, a i ho Ibrrahin nka he̱rri kundu ngu shi ki ye we̱ he, “Be̱ri nje”. Nyi nyí rana ngu, kundu nyi nyi kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱sa ne owu.

Nyi ntó a, we ni ma, nyi srra ngbe ne mbrrú nyi ne hu re̱se̱ng he mbrru a shi brrubrru. Nyi we ngwa grime̱, aha nyi ri mwe gbengbe nyi she kya na na Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi ce. Nyi nyi aha ngbe de̱ re bi yankya ne ngu shi brri ku Be̱ne̱ nyi we̱.
A ngrangrang, zhwozhwo nyi, nyi yaa srra rina rina, nyi ri naana nneywí, nyi yaa ce̱ shi re-gimbe, nyi yaa sheng, nyi bra bi nywe̱ rici.
Shi de̱ nyi trra e̱ngwie̱ ne e̱ngwie̱ we̱, ka nyi cwi ya nne aha ngu níng cwi we̱, se ka nyi trra ne mwo rina; Be̱ne̱ i níng ye aha ni, aha ngbe nyi ri she mwo rina.
Aha
“Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ ho shwi srra nce,
ngbe ngu bra ri rotu rina,
shi de̱ re we le ngu re he kya ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ we̱,
de̱ re bra we onu ngu re he rabrra we̱.
Se re we ni hwie̱ re nyi re-cwuo rina;
re bra kre we srra rina ne ehwie ngu zhwozhwo.
Aha Brrabe̱ sa riyii a zete nné redziee,
re-uucwu ngu bra srra jennng nwie ho re-rumwo mbe,
me̱di ko riyii Brrabe̱ ce̱ nné nyi hwie̱ we̱.”
Nyi nye̱ re hu níng nyi yankya me̱nkye̱ kundu ne nyi ngwa nci nyi nwie nyi re-cwuo rina aa?
Gbengbe ni ma, kundu nyi shwe ge̱zhe̱ aha ne nyi nyi kya ne ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri, mahu nyi bi mwo rina. Shi de̱ nyi to owu nné ne mbe níng nyí hwie̱ we̱, de̱ nyi bē we̱.

Me̱di a yarri ronu rie nyi, nyi ngwa Krristi grime̱ aha nyi Brrabe̱. Nyi srrante ko zohu zhe aha nyi ti ko nye̱ng ne ngu níng rin nka aha kya ne nyi ning sa riyii, me̱di re nyi a yarri ehwie sheng, nyi bra ngwa ko nye̱ grime̱.
Nde rehwie nyi ré shi wang, aha ngbe nné ne mbe níng cwi aha re̱kpe̱e̱ rina nyi a yarri Krristi, ré shwe nshwu ne zhwe kya mbe he e̱.
Aha canca nyi shwe ge̱zhe̱ aha ne nyi nyi kya rina, ne ré he nyi nyi kya e̱ngwie̱, kundu ngu nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ he re shi ni.

Aha Krristi e̱ hu ce zrru he̱rri tiya aha re-e̱ngwie̱, ngu nne redziee e̱ hu aha nné riywe̱ redziee, aha ngbe ngu be ne nyi nwie Be̱ne̱. Á i ki yhwe̱ a ikpe rwe̱, me̱di á ki deze nce a yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri.
A nyi yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri ana ne ngu brro nka a nwie re-wu ne mbe shi gyiaa.

Re-wu ne̱ nyi na nné mbe ne mbe i ra ho nka gbangba tiya a zhe ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i tsio ne ehwie sheng a rotu ne Nuhu ngu i shi no jirigi rishi. A nyi nné tsie̱nzhwu — we nné klanva — ne mbe i she drre̱ a rishi nna.

Ngu rishi ne̱ nyi sheede ne ngu i ke̱nce̱ ti batisma ne ngu níng kyiá a zhe ne ne̱ ma. Ko nyi roru na ikpe rwe̱ ne ngu kyú we̱, me̱di nyi jee ne nyi fo a nwie Be̱ne̱ ne rehwie nyi we wang. A níng cí nyi she kyia aha deze Jesu Krristi nhu,
ne ngu ywa zinye̱, ngu bra shi nva nyye Be̱ne̱, ne ga re-njeli, ngbe re-ringgwe̱, ngbe nné bi igbe̱ zhwozhwo mbe shi tahwie ringgwe̱ ngu.
Aha ni, tu ne Krristi e̱ shwe ge̱zhe̱ a ikpe rwe̱ ni, nyi e̱ ma we nci nyi, nyi yaa sha ne zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ ana ma, aha nne nke ne ngu shwe ge̱zhe̱, we̱ kpo nyi e̱ngwie̱.
Ngbe he̱rri re nzhi ncwuee, ko shi re srra re̱se̱ srra ngu a be ngwie̱ a yarri ecwue na nneywi wa we̱, me̱di se we ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱.

Nyi i fo zhe we yang gbangba nwie nyi re-ankya ne nné tsi ngwie̱ mbe kyie mbe srra re nying, nwie nyi re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè, ngbe ecwue, ngbe shwe ankyang dzio nci, ngbe re-parang shwe ankyang dzio nci, ngbe re-bikying shwe ankya shwe shwe, ngbe le̱le̱ng ye re-kpanshwu mbè.
He̱rri á hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu ne ko nyi mwe nyi wrre ngbe mbe nwie srra re nyi re-ankya le̱le̱ ana we̱, nyi ngwiee mbe níng cwi.
Me̱di á bi we brro kya ne mbe nyi a nyyi Be̱ne̱, ne ngu shi srrante aha ngu nyi nné nce ngbe nné kwi zhwozhwo nka.
Kya ngu ci ne i brro Nka Rina he̱rri ngbe nwie nné ne mbe kwi e̱ nyi ngwiee, aha ko ngbe ne mbe kwi shi nneywí a ikpe rwe̱
Mahu krruci ga ankya zhwozhwo be dudu. Aha ni se nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nci nyi, nyi hung hwie nka tsantsa, aha ngbe nyi hung ku Be̱ne̱.
Kya ngu cwandrra ko nda a nyi nke: nyi yaa ce̱ we te̱nte̱ ce̱, aha ce̱ e̱ cí ré we nneywi rigwe̱ re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu.
Nyi ri ma si nné ice a nci nyi a reri nyi we̱sa ne krro nka.

Be̱ne̱ níng ngwa re-beewa kanka kanka, aha ni ko nye̱ a tsi nyi re nyi cwuo ne beewa ne e ki ngwa re ning she kpi re-gimbeng, aha nyi nyi nné bro ankya na na ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa a yarri ehwie rina ngu.

Nne nke ne beewa ngu nyi nang brro nka, nde re brro shi nyi Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu ngu he nka a yarri ngu; nne nke ne ngu bi beewa cwuong she nnéng, re nyi ne igbe̱ ne Be̱ne̱ ki ngwa, aha ngbe a yarri ko nda, nzhi de Be̱ne̱ aha nzhi nyi na Jesu Krristi. Grime̱ ngbe igbe̱ nyi na ngu he̱rri tiya tiya. A shi ni.
Nné ce̱ nje, shi de̱ re-ge̱zhe̱ ne nyi shi shweng aha ré níng mwa ri e̱ re níng hwie̱ kyang nga onu shi shi nyi yankya hwi ne ngu shi níng she we̱.
Me̱di nyi nyi rekwi aha nyi shi nwie shwe re-cinci we shi Krristi ngu i shwe ma, aha ngbe nyi ri nyi rekwi we yang a zhe ne ngu ri ya wre̱ a yarri grime̱ ngu.
Nyi bi mwo rina kundu ne e níng cwi aha lo Krristi, kundu ngu shi ni mahu Nshe Be̱ne̱ ne ngu bi grime̱ shi yarri nyi.
Shi de̱ ya nyi re shwe ge̱zhe̱ aha ne ngu yhwe̱ nne, ka ngu nyi nca, ka yaka yankya ne ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ ni, ka ne ngu sha onu a nka yaká nné we̱.
Me̱di kundu ya nyi shwe ge̱zhe̱ aha ngu nyi Krrista, shi de̱ re to nshwu we̱, me̱di re ci Be̱ne̱ kijie̱ng aha ne e ki ye he nne zhwe Krristi.
Zhe e̱ be ne e shi ce̱ nyi nneywí nka, á bra shi ce̱ng a rici nné ri Be̱ne̱; ma kundu ne e ce̱ a rici nzhi, we̱ ngra cwo a shi rimi ne nné mbiye ne mbe ra shî Nka Rina Be̱ne̱ e̱?
Shi ne e wie he,
“Kundu ngu bi rwe̱ ngbe nne redziee re she kyia,
we̱ ngra ri shi rimi ne nne riywe̱ to owu Be̱ne̱ ngbe nne e̱ngwie̱ e̱e̱?”
Aha nii, nné mbe ne mbe shi shwe cinci aha ne ngu nyi kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ he re shi ni ré ngwa nci mbe a nva Be̱ne̱ ne nyi ngu ngu we nyi, ré tu rici nwie nyi re-cwuo rina.
Ekpri brrá nné na ekpri nné ce̱ nka, nje cwe nva ne nyi, shi ne nje we rici nje nje nyi brra nne ngbe sheede na re-cinci Krristi, ne nje bra ri she grime̱ ngu a tung be ngu ma. Nje cwe nva ne nyi he,

nyi cwo ekpri nné Be̱ne̱ ne mbe shi nva nyi e̱ shi nyi nyi nné ne e we ngwa cwuong ci nkwile̱ ne mbe. Shi de̱ re shi shi á níng ci ne ce we̱, me̱di nyi fo a yarri rehwie nyi, ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱. Shi de̱ nyi nyi aha ncwé̱ we̱, me̱di aha ne nyi ngwa nci nyi ncwuo.
Shi de̱ nyi ti nné mbe ne mbe shi tahwie nyi igbe̱ we̱, me̱di nyi hwie̱ kyang mwa yi ne ekpri nné Be̱ne̱ mbe shi mie̱ng a nwie nyi.
Ngbe kundu ngu Brra Nnecwo a ri shi ya wre̱ fa, we̱ níng ngwa re-vo ringgwe̱ ne mbe bi grime̱ ne ko mbe bra krra we̱.
We ni ma, nyi ze̱ e̱ nyi ho nka brrá nné. Ga nyi zhwozhwo nyi yaa ci re̱ nwie yaa sheng, aha “Be̱ne̱ ce̱trri nné kywo rici ze, a a nyí nné yaa ci re̱ rina.”
Aha ni nyi yaa ci re̱ a nyyi brra igbe̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe zhe ri he ngu ya ki mwa ye̱ye̱rri we̱ níng ngwa grime̱.
Nyi ki kro ga rehwie nka nyi zhwozhwo, aha a nyi ngu ngu ci nkwile̱ ne nyi.
Nyi ci nkwile̱ ne nci nyi, nyi srrante. Shetani ne ngu nyi rwinko nyi e̱ a gye̱ nwie trru rugwrra shi shi ze̱kyi ne nzhwo ki wie nwie kre nne ne ngu shi ngwrrang.
Nyi yo gangga a yarri sa rie nyi, de̱ nyi ki ngwa riwie̱ we̱. Nyi lu he re-gimbe nyi nné ce̱ nka ko he a be ngwie̱ á shi nwie shwe zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne nyi shi mi ma.

Me̱di kundu nyi ri shwe ge̱zhe̱ a e̱we̱ zhe, ngbe Be̱ne̱ bi ehwie rina zhwozhwo, ne ngu níng ye re be nwie grime̱ ngu na he̱rri tiya a yarri Krristi Jesu, we̱ ci ko nda re níng ci rina, we̱ ci sa rie nyi re shi gbe̱ngbe̱, we̱ níng ngwa igbe̱, we̱ níng ci nyi ci riti.
Ringgwe̱ zhwozhwo nyi na ngu he̱rri tiya tiya. A shi ni.

A nyi Sila ngu ning sheng a zhe ne nje shi wie krre̱de̱ ne̱ re be nwie nyi, ngu ne nje he ne nyi he nyi gimbe ré hung sa rie a ngu. Nje wie e̱we̱e̱ re-nti nka ne̱ aha ngbe n níng shwe̱ rehwie, n bra níng ting he cence ewie ne nyi ning she rici nyi ne̱ nyi ehwie rina Be̱ne̱. Aha ni nyi yo gangga a yarri ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ne̱.
Ekpri nné ce̱ nka ne ngu shi Babila ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng kyie gbengbe nyi ngbe mbe á níng dzie; kowe nje Marrku níng dzie ma.
Nyi yaa dzie nwie yaa nyi gbagba a yarri yaa ce̱. Nde srra rina re shi ngbe ne ga nyi zhwozhwo ne nyi shi yarri Krristi.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ wru nwie Simiyo
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ ngbe srra rina re zhwo we zhwo a yarri nyi, aha ne nyi hu Be̱ne̱ ngbe Jesu Brrabe̱ nzhi.

Be̱ne̱ a yarri igbe̱ na ngu, aa níng ngwa ko nda ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi bi aha nzhi srra zhwe srra ne ngu ce̱. Aa ci ni aha ne nzhi ki hu, ngu ne ngu níng ye aha nzhi she grime̱ ngu ngbe ne e̱kpe̱e̱ rina.

A nyi aha ni ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ngwa ngbá re-ankya ne mbe bi rina we yang ne ngu níng sa jee, ne he̱rri ngu ci nzhi hung srra a yarri e̱kpe̱e̱ na Be̱ne̱, aha ngbe nzhi she drre̱ ne re-cwuo e̱ngwie̱ ne ecwue le̱le̱ na ebe ngwie̱ ngu cwo mi.
Aha nii, a zete sa rie nyi e̱, nyi tu rici nyi ning bra e̱kpe̱e̱ rina; a zete e̱kpe̱e̱ rina a, nyi ning bra hu re̱se̱ng;
a zete hu re̱se̱ng nna, nyi ning bra hung ci nkwile̱ ne nci nyi; a zete hung ci nkwile̱ ne nci nyi e̱, nyi ning bra e̱kpe̱e̱ yaa rwe; a zete e̱kpe̱e̱ yaa rwe e̱, nyi ning bra e̱kpe̱e̱ na Be̱ne̱;
a zete e̱kpe̱e̱ na Be̱ne̱, nyi ning bra e̱kpe̱e̱ng yaa nyi gbagba shi re-gimbe; a zete e̱kpe̱e̱ng yaa nyi gbagba shi re-gimbe e̱, nyi ning bra e̱kpe̱e̱ng yaa ce̱.
Kundu ne nyi bi zhwe re̱kpe̱e̱ ne̱ ne he̱rri mbe cwo ning brang brang a yarri nyi, wé̱ ci hu Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ne nyi ki hu ko we̱ shi we dede we̱sa ne nyi bi mpe̱ni we̱.
Aha ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu bi re̱kpe̱e̱ ne̱ we, mahu ko zhwo ri ewie we̱, a shi we ngba ncwue̱, he̱rri ga ki bru he á i ki kyu ne re-e̱ngwie̱ ne ngu i nyi.
Aha ni re-gimbe, nde nyi nyi te̱te̱ aha nyi ti he cence Be̱ne̱ níng ye aa bra níng kyie. Kundu nyi nyi ni, ko shi nyi grre̱ we̱ ko tsie̱.
A ni, wé̱ níng ngwa brra riwie̱ng ngwie yarri ringgwe̱ Brrabe̱ ngbe Nnenkyia nzhi Jesu Krristi ne ngu nyi na he̱rri tiya.
Aha ni nje shi srra re níng lu ne re-ankya ne̱ ko zohu zhe, ko ngbe ne nyi hu re̱se̱ng he̱rri nyi bra ci riti a yarri nka raywrra ne nyi bi a zhe ne ne̱.
Nje hwie he a shi ye̱ye̱rri, n srra re níng lu, kundu ne nje shi ke̱ we ne ning shi a yarri ikpe rwe̱ ne̱,
tu ne nje hu re̱se̱ng he rotu nje a be ngwie̱ ne̱ nyia re nzhi yhwe̱, shi ne Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ngu i ning ting.
Aha ni nje shi nyi koori ngbe n she he kundu nje ri ne̱, nyi srra re lu ne re-ankya ne̱ ko zohu zhe.
Aha re-nka ne nzhi i níng ting aha igbe̱ Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi ngbe be ngu, ko nyi yá re-nka ne e wu a zentsi zentsi ne nzhi i zhwe we̱, me̱di nzhi i ri brra grime̱ ngu ne riyii nzhi.
Aha a i she grime̱ ne brra nse̱ na grime̱ a nwie Be̱ne̱ Be̱, a zhe ne cwue i wru nwie Brra Igbe̱ Be̱ne̱ Bi Grime̱ ngu he, “Nke ne̱ nyi Kowe nje, na ce̱ nje, ne nje ho shwi ngu kpe̱kpe̱.”
Nzhi we nci nzhi, nzhi i ho cwue ne ngu wru zinye̱ nna a zhe ne nzhi i shi ngbe ne ngu a zete ngbra wiri ana.

Ngbe re-ankya ne̱ e̱ ci nzhi ning bra hu re̱se̱ng he re-nka nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe i he a tiya a nyi cence, aa bra mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi ning bra ci nkwile̱ ne nka ne̱, aha a shi shi nse̱ ne ngu si a yarri ewie ywing he̱rri re nzhi mincwe kla na Otu nke ne Krristi ne ngu nyi Brra E̱nde̱ Nyiencwe ngu ri tsie̱ nse̱ a yarri ronu rie nyi.
Kya na ce̱ucwung nna nyi nke, nyi ke̱she hu re̱se̱ng he ko bi ko ya nka ne nné ti re̱se̱ng mbe i he ne e wie yarri Krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ ne̱ ne ngu nyi nka na zentsi rici mbe we̱,
aha ko bi ko ya riti nka nné ti re̱se̱ng ne ngu i wru nwie ya mbe he aha nyi kya ce̱ ngu we̱, me̱di nyi Nshe Wiri ngu i we kwa ré he kya ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱.

Me̱di aa bra i bi yá nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra a tsi nné Be̱ne̱, we shi ne a shi bi nné mie̱ nka rabrra a tsi nyi ma. Á shi ngwi mi ne yá re-nka a la la ré ne̱ ne mie̱ nneywí rabrra ne ngu shi we dzio, he̱rri wé̱ ne̱ ne ce̱trri Brrabe̱ ne ngu we se̱, ngbe wé̱ yaa ci mbe wre̱ ne ci shweni we nci mbe.
Ngbe nneywí piriri wé̱ zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ mbe na re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè, he̱rri ngbe re-ankya ne mbe nyi e̱ wé̱ ci yá ré cwi te̱nte̱ rê ne ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri ré ning srra.
Aha ecwue, wé̱ níng shwe̱li ne re-nka rabrra ne mbe wu aha mbe ning ci ncwé̱ ne nyi. Mbe e̱ Be̱ne̱ i ke̱nce̱ we nyi nkang ci shweni we gbangba tiya, ko zheng ci shweni mbe e̱ shi we̱sa be we̱.
Tu ne ko Be̱ne̱ i we re-njeli a zhe ne mbe i nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱, me̱di ngu we zi ruvong ro, ngu we rrwe a cwuncwuu ewie ywing se zheng nyi nka;
ne ko ngu i we ebe ngwie̱ a tiya a zhe ne ngu i wru mi ne rigwe̱ rishi ngu ci nné riywe̱ to owu ngu mbe ci shweni we̱, me̱di ngu kyia Nuhu, nne brro nka redziee, ngbe nné nva ngu komo natsie̱;
ne he̱rri ngu i ci ngwie̱ Sodo ngbe ngwie̱ Gomorra mbe ci shweni, ngu we bra á hwie̱ re-rugu nto, he̱rri mbe hwie̱ kyang mwa yi re be nwie nné ne mbe shi nyi riywe̱ to owu Be̱ne̱;
ne ngu i kyia Lotu, ne ngu i nyi nne redziee, a zhe ne ngu i bē we yang aha e̱kpe̱e̱ re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè na nné e̱ngwie̱ a Sodo
(aha ngu nne redziee ne̱ i shwe cinci a yarri ehwie redziee ngu ko zohu otu nwie ring re ho re-nka re-cwuo e̱ngwie̱ nné ne ngu i srra yarri mbe).
Mahu Brrabe̱ e̱ hu rê ne ngu ning kyiá nné na ngu a yarri mwa ri, ngbe zhwe rê ne ngu ning cí nné riywe̱ redziee ré srra yarri ge̱zhe̱ he̱rri re nzhi cwu Tung nyi nka,
shi ngra nyi nné mbiye ne mbe zhwe we ecwue na ikpe rwe̱ e̱ngwie̱ we̱, ne mbe bra dzié̱ nné ringgwe̱ ngwie̱.
He̱rri nné mie̱ nka rabrra ne̱ á yaa kywo nwie cwi brrá ankya zinye̱ we dengge we̱sa ne owu;
ne ko ngbe re-njeli ne mbe bi igbe̱ re we ne̱ mbe e̱ we gbong koó sa ree he mbe we cwi a nyyi Brrabe̱ we̱.

Me̱di nné mbe rre e̱ á cwí ko nda ne ko mbe hu re̱se̱ng we̱. Á shi shi nnyié̱ yi ne ko mbe hwie nka we̱, nwie nyi we kya ne re-rwe̱ mbe ce̱, shi shi á we bî we aha ré we prre ré we yhwi. Á cwo a ci shweni we shi nnyié̱ yi.

Ge̱zhe̱ ri nyi lede mbe aha ge̱zhe̱ ne mbe ngwa nné. Á yaa fo he mbe srra re ho shwi ankya ecwue na le̱le̱ ko ngbe a tsi te̱ne̱. Á nyi kya nshwu, á shi shi ngbé̱ bi roru a tsi nyi a zhe ne mbe srra yarri nyi nwie ye yâ bikyi ngbe nyi.
Á sa re-riyii mbe we kre mbrrú, koó rwe̱ rwe̱ ne nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱. Á shwe̱li nné mbiye ne mbe shi brrubrru ré nyi e̱ngwie̱. Á hwie̱ re-shwa a nka riyii ankya nné. Á nyi rewe shweni.
Á we rê te̱nte̱ng, á brru rê, á ngwie zhwe zhwe rê na Balamu, ewe Beyo, ne ngu i ce̱ he ngu ci ncwé̱ ne ncwé̱ ne i shi ki trrang aha nyi kya ne ko ngu shi ye̱ye̱rri we̱.
Me̱di á ki yhwire aha brru ngu, he̱rri nze̱e̱kyi ne ko ngu hé nka we̱ aa he nka ne cwue nneywi aha ngu kpo nne ti re̱se̱ng ne̱ ne riywe̱ rici ngu.
Nné mbe rre e̱ á shi shi re-nshwa rishi ne mbe shi hwerri, á shi shi vie̱ ne wu ko re nyia mi. A nyi aha mbe ne e sa brra ewie ywing be̱mbe̱mbe̱.
Á nyé̱ ronu nwie he re-nkang kywo rici ze we shweni. Ne zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ mbe na le̱le̱ njè, á nyi koori nwie shwe̱li nné mbe ne mbe wru yarri nné e̱ngwie̱ ne ko mbe ci kpe we̱.
Á we sá jeeng she srra srra nci mbe, ne mbe we nci mbe mbe nyi hwié na ncwuo e̱ngwie̱; aha ko nda ne ngu drre̱ nneywi, mahu nneywi e̱ hwie̱ hwie ngu.

Aha kundu ne mbe wru yarri le̱le̱ e̱ngwie̱ na ebe ngwie̱ aha ne mbe hu Brrabe̱ nzhi ngbe Nnenkyia nzhi Jesu Krristi, ne he̱rri mbe bra ning brru ngwi yarri re-cwuo le̱le̱ ne̱ te̱nte̱ te̱nte̱, mahu krruci mbe e̱ dzio re ne̱ ce̱ucwung.
He̱rri ma canca ko á rā hu rê redziee nna ma gung we̱, ne na mbe hu re̱se̱ng mbe bra ning brru bra emerin mbe ngwa nti nka Be̱ne̱ ne i we ngwa.
Aa ci cence shi nka zhwebe ne e he, “Ovu ning brru re nzhi shwe rikwi ngu;” ngbe nke ne e he, “Lede ne e ki kyu wiriri ning brru yaa shwu a ruba.”
Nné ce̱ nje, nke ne̱ nyi krre̱de̱ na hwie ne nje wie re be nwie nyi, a yarri re-krre̱de̱ ne̱ zhwozhwo, nje wie aha n níng ci nyi hwie nka tsantsa kishi ga ri níng bru.
Nje ce̱ nyi lu ne re-nka ne nné ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ mbe i he tiya, ngbe nti nka Brrabe̱ ngbe Nnenkyia nzhi ne nnenté mbe i níng be mi.
Na ce̱ucwung, nyi hu re̱se̱ng he a rotu krrucing, nné he re-nka shweni á ri be nwie zhwe re-ankya na ecwue mbe, á ri níng mi.
Á ri he, “Aa sa jee he ngu cwo be, ma a shi he? Ge̱nce̱, re-be̱ nzhi e̱ á ma ya kwi. Ko nda shi we shi ne ngu nyi ne ning shi tu ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i nyi ebe ngwie̱.”
Á ning ci ga bru we igerri he Be̱ne̱ i nyi zinye̱ ne riti nka ngu gbangba tiya, ngbe ngu a wru mi ne ebe ngwie̱ a yarri rishi, ne rishi.
A bra nyi rishi ana ne ngu i ning wru mi ne rigwe̱ rishi, ngu ning ci ebe ngwie̱ ci shweni.
Me̱di zinye̱ ngbe ebe ngwie̱ ne ngu ning shi ne̱ a ning shi aha riti nka ngu wa, nwie tsio we ro, he̱rri se zheng nyi nka, ne e ri ci nné riywe̱ bi e̱kpe̱e̱ na Be̱ne̱ ré ci shweni.
Me̱di he̱n, nyi nné ce̱ nje e̱, shi de̱ ga re ning bru ne kya zunzrru ne̱ we̱: he a nwie Brrabe̱ kotu zunzrru a shi shi re-rie ci zunzrru, re-rie ci zunzrru a shi shi kotu zunzrru ma.

Ko Brrabe̱ e̱ shi de̱tiri a nkang nyi kya ne ngu ning sa jee he ngu shi nying nna we̱, shi ne yá mbe hwie he shi ni. A bi ehwie sheng ne nyi, aha ko ce̱ koo ya nne re ci shweni we̱, me̱di he ko nye̱ re se̱ ywe̱.
