Me̱di Kotu Brrabe̱ e̱ shi bi we be, a ri shi shi be nne nca we kpri. We kpri, re-zinye̱ e̱ ri rwi re̱zhe̱ ngbe wé̱ bru, ngbe ngbá ankya wé̱ bi mrretete a yarri ro, ngbe ebe ngwie̱ ngbe ko nda ne ngu shi yarring we̱ bru.
Tu ne ga re-ankya ne̱ á cwo a ci shweni ni, ma nyi zohu zhwe srra ngu mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi srra aa? Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nyi shi wiri nwie srra zhwe srra ne Be̱ne̱ ce̱,
nwie srra re te Kotung be Be̱ne̱ we te, nwie sa riyii re hwie he re wre̱ ne be. Aha nyi Kotu ana ne re-zinye̱ e̱ ri ye ro ré ci shweni, ngbe ngbá ankya wé̱ bi mrretete a yarri ro.
Me̱di ye̱ye̱rri ne jee ne ngu sa, nzhi shi nwie te zinye̱ hwi ngbe ebe ngwie̱ hwi ne nyi we nné redziee mbe ri ning srra.
Aha nii, nné ce̱ nje, tu ne nyi shi nwie srra re tsio re-ankya ne̱ ni, nyi tu rici ngbe á ri ning she nyi shi wiriri we̱sa ne ya vini, ne nyi bra shi srra rina rina.
Nyi lu he Brrabe̱ nzhi e̱ ke̱ we ne fo ehwie sheng aha ngbe nneywí ré she kyia, we shi ne Bulu, gimbe nzhi ne nzhi ki ce̱ e̱ ngu i wie ye̱ye̱rri ne zentsi ne Be̱ne̱ ki ngwa.

A i he re-nka ne̱ ni a yarri re-krre̱de̱ ngu zhwozhwo. A bi yá re-ankya a yarri re-krre̱de̱ ngu a ne mbe bi rwe̱ hu, ne nné riywe̱ hung ngbe nné ne mbe shi brrubrru mbe bra kya ne ngu hé, we shi ne mbe nyí ne kpi re-krre̱de̱ Be̱ne̱ wa. A nyi ni ne mbe cwo a ci shweni.
Aha nii, nné ce̱ nje, tu ne nyi hu ni, nyi nyi te̱nte̱ kishi nné mbe ne mbe ra zhwe rê Be̱ne̱ ana á ri níng kwa re nzhi zhwe brru mbe ne mbe brru ngbe nyi bra we ewie rina ne e ma nyi ning yo.
Me̱di nyi ke̱ we ne ci brrabrráng a yarri ehwie rina Brrabe̱ ngbe Nnenkyia nzhi Jesu Krristi, ngbe nyi bra ning bra ki hu. Grime̱ zhwozhwo nyi na ngu a zhe ne he̱rri tiya! A shi ni.
Kya ne ngu wru tu ce̱ucwung, ne nzhi ho, ne nzhi ri ne nyyi nzhi, ne nzhi ri he̱rri nzhi bra ria ne nva nzhi, nyi ngwiee ne nzhi níng brrong, ne ngu nyi Riti Nka nce.
Ce nna i ya wre̱, nzhi ri, nzhi bra ngwá sheede a zeteng, nzhi bra níng brro nka ce na he̱rri tiya, ne ngu i shi ngbe Be̱ we gbangba, ne ngu ya wre̱ nwie nzhi.
Kya ne nzhi ri, ne nzhi bra ho, nyi ngwiee ne nzhi níng brrong, aha ngbe nyi she mwe rici ngbe nzhi. Nzhi e̱ nzhi mwe rici nzhi ngbe Be̱ ngbe ne Kowe ngu, Jesu Krristi.
Nzhi níng wie nka ne̱ aha ngbe rekwi nzhi re zhwo we zhwo.
Kya ne nzhi ho a nwie ngu ne nzhi níng brrong nna nyi nke: he Be̱ne̱ nyi nse̱, ko bi ewie ywing a ngu we̱ ko tsie̱ tsie̱.
Kundu ne nzhi he nzhi mwé rici ngbe ngu, me̱di nzhi bra cwó a nwie ywing, mahu nzhi ve rabrra, ko nzhi zhwé nka raywrra we̱.
Me̱di kundu ne nzhi cwo a yarri nse̱, we shi shi ngu ne ngu shi a yarri nse̱, mahu nzhi bi mwe rici a nci nzhi; roshwo Jesu, Kowe ngu a níng kyu re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi zhwozhwo.
Kundu nzhi he ko nzhi nyí e̱ngwie̱ we̱, mahu nzhi yaa brrá we nci nzhi, ko raywrra shi a yarri nzhi we̱.
Me̱di kundu ne nzhi he re e̱ngwie̱ nzhi, ngu a a bi raywrra ngbe redziee, ngbe we̱ níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi, we̱ bra níng kyu re-riywe̱ redziee nzhi zhwozhwo.
Kundu nzhi he ko nzhi nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱, maahu nzhi ki ci rabrra, ko nka ngu a shi a yarri nzhi we̱.
A rewe nje, nje níng wie nka ne̱ kishi nyi ri nyi e̱ngwie̱. Me̱di kundu ya nyi nyi e̱ngwie̱, nzhi bi ya ne ngu cwué̱ nka aha nzhi a nwie Be̱ — nyi Jesu Krristi, Nne Redziee.
Nyi ngu ngu hwie̱ teede nang we re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi, ko nyi aha na nzhi we nggaa nzhi we̱, me̱di aha re-e̱ngwie̱ na ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo.
Kundu ne nzhi zhwé Nti Nka ngu, wire nzhi e̱ ti he cence nzhi ki hu.
Nne nke ne ngu he he, “Nje ki hu,” me̱di ko ngu nyí kya ne ngu he we̱, a nyi nne rabrra, ko raywrra shi a yarri ngu we̱.
Me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu zhwe nka ngu, maahu ce̱ Be̱ne̱ cence a shi yarri ngu zhwozhwo. A nyi ni ne nzhi hu he nzhi shi yarri ngu.
Nne nke ne ngu he he ngu shi a yarri ngu, se re cwo ciee e̱ shi ne Jesu ngu i cwo.
Nné ce̱ nje, ko nje shi nwie níng wie ya Riti Nka hwi we̱, a nyi we rening ne nyi i ho tu we ce̱ucwung. Ngu Riti Nka reni ne̱ nyi na ne nyi sa ho.
Gbengbe ni, nje shi níng wie ya Riti Nka hwi, aha á rí raywrra ngu a yarri Krristi ngbe a yarri nyi, aha ewie ywing shi nwie wara, ngbe nse̱ te̱nte̱ng nna a shi nwie si.
Nne nke ne ngu he ngu shi a nwie si, me̱di ngu bra ra gimbe ngu maahu a ke̱ shi nwie ywing he̱rri ne cwu.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ gimbe ngu mahu a srra a yarri ewie si, ko bra bi yankya a yarri ngu ngbe re ki ci re grre̱ we̱
Me̱di nne nke ne ngu ra gimbe ngu, a shi a yarri ewie ywing, a bra cwo a yarri ewie ywing, koo hu ewie ne ngu nyia re nzhi we̱, aha ewie ywing ki be̱ yi.
Nje níng wieng, nyi rewe nje, aha á níng we re-e̱ngwie̱ nyi aha lo ngu.
Nje níng wieng, nyi re-be̱,
aha nyi ki hu ngu ne ngu nyi tu we ce̱ucwung.
Nje níng wieng, nyi ze̱,
aha ne nyi drre̱ ngu Nne Hwie̱ e̱.
Nje níng wieng, nyi rewe nje,
aha ne nyi hu Be̱ e̱.
Nje níng wieng, nyi re-be̱,
aha ne nyi ki hu ngu ne ngu nyi tu we ce̱ucwung.
Nje níng wieng, nyi ze̱,
aha ne nyi bi igbe̱,
riti nka Be̱ne̱ bra srra a yarri nyi,
nyi bra drre̱ ngu Nne Hwie̱ e̱.
Shi de̱ nyi ce̱ ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ ka yankya ne ngu nyi na ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ we̱. Ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ maahu ko ce̱ Be̱ e̱ we̱.
Aha ko nda a be ngwie̱ ne̱ — re-ankya ne ikpe rwe̱ kre, ngbe ecwue na riyii, ngbe cwe zewe aha kya ne ngwe̱ bi ka ngwe̱ nyi — koó wrrú a nwie Be̱ we̱, me̱di a nyi ankya ngwie̱.
Ebe ngwie̱ ngbe re-ankya ecwue ngu shi nwie nyia, me̱di nne ne ngu nyí kya ce̱ Be̱ne̱ shi srra he̱rri tiya.
A rewe nje, zhe krruci ngwie̱ e̱ sa dudu! We shi ne nyi i ho he Nne Ra Krristi cwo be e̱, ko ngbe a zhe ne ne̱ nné ra Krristi piriri á a kpi ci. Kya a nyi ngwiee nzhi hu he zhe krruci ngwie̱ e̱ be.
Á i wrru a yarri nzhi, me̱di gannyi e̱ gung koó nyi na nzhi we̱. Aha kundu ne mbe ra nyi na nzhi, á ra hwie̱ ngbe nzhi; me̱di wrru mbe ne̱ e̱ ti he koó nyi na nzhi we̱.
Me̱di nyi e̱, Ngu Na Wiri e̱ níng mia, zhwozhwo nyi nyi bra hu raywrra nna
Ko nje níng wieng ne̱ he aha nyi nyi riywe̱ hu raywrra we̱; me̱di aha ne nyi hu, aha ko shi rabrra re bra wru a yarri raywrra we̱.
Ma nyi nye̱ ngu bi rabrra a? Nyi nne nke ne ngu klo he ko Jesu nyi Krristi we̱. Zhwe nne ana nyi ngu ngu nyi nne ra Krristi, a ra Be̱ ngbe Kowe.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ra Kowe ko shi re nyi na Be̱ e̱ we̱; me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu ti we gbeng he ngu nyi na Kowe maahu a nyi na Be̱.
Nde kya ne nyi ho tu ce̱ucwung nna re srra a yarri hwie nyi. Kundu ngu shi a yarri nyi, wire nyi e̱ bi mwe rici ngbe Kowe ngbe ne Be̱.
Jee ne ngu Kowe e̱ níng sang nna nyi ce na he̱rri tiya.
Nje níng wie re-ankya ne̱ a rici nné mbiye ne mbe shi kre rê mbe níng kwa re nzhi nkla ya.

Me̱di nyi e̱, Nshe Wiri ne Krristi i níng mia a shi yarri nyi, ko nyi bra kre yaka nne re níng mie̱ng wa we̱. Me̱di Nshe Wiri ngu a níng mié̱ ga re-ankya zhwozhwo, kya ne ngu níng mié̱ng nna nyi te̱nte̱ng, ko nyi kpe̱ng we̱. Aha ni we shi ne ngu níng mié̱ng, nyi srra a yarri ngu.
A zhe ne ne̱, rewe nje, nyi ning tu rici a ngu, aha kundu ngu ri ya wre̱, nzhi e̱ she igbe̱ng yo a nyyi ngu we̱sa ne nshwu a tung be ngu.
Tu ne nyi hu he a bi redziee, mahu nyi hu he ko nye̱ ne ngu nyi kya ngu shi tsantsa maahu nyi bî Be̱ne̱.
Nyi ri zhwe ce̱ ne Be̱ ngu ning ce̱ we yang ne̱! He̱rri á níng ye he rewe Be̱ne̱! Nzhi e̱ bra nyi rewe ngu a cence. Kya a nyi ngwiee ne ko ebe ngwie̱ e̱ níng hu we̱, aha koo hu Be̱ne̱ we̱.

Nné ce̱ nje, a zhe ne ne̱ nzhi nyi rewe Be̱ne̱, koó níng klang ngbe nzhi hu ka nzhi cwo a shi rimi we̱. Me̱di nzhi hu he a zhe ne Krristi ri ya wre̱, nzhi ri shi shi ngu, aha nzhi ri ki ri we shi ne ngu ning shî.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu sa riyii a Krristi, we̱ yaa ci srra we wiri we shi ne Krristi ngu shi wiri ma.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu nyi e̱ngwie̱ aa hle̱ Riti Nka Be̱ne̱. E̱ngwie̱ e̱ nyi riywe̱ zhwe nti nka.
Me̱di nyi hu he a i be aha ngu ya yi re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi, ko bi e̱ngwie̱ a yarri ngu we̱.
Ko shi nne nke ne ngu shi a yarri ngu re srra re nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱; me̱di nne nke ne ngu srra re nyi e̱ngwie̱ e̱ koo sa ki ri wire re ning hwie̱ ki hu we̱.
A rewe nje, shi de̱ nyi we ya nne re níng kwa re nzhi nkla ya we̱. Nne nkiye ne ngu nyi kya ngu shi tsantsa mahu a bi redziee, we shi ne Krristi ngu bi redziee ma.

Nne nke ne ngu nyi kya ne ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ e̱, a nyi na Shetani, aha Shetani i nyi ne bi e̱ngwie̱ tu we ce̱ucwung. Kya ngu ci ne Kowe Be̱ne̱ e̱ ya wre̱ e̱ a nyi aha ngu ci cwuo Shetani re ci shweni.
Ko shi nne ne ngu nyi ewe Be̱ne̱ re srra re nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱, aha e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ shi a yarri ngu; ko shi re srra re nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱ aha a nyi bî Be̱ne̱.

Nzhi e̱ ce̱ rimi nzhi hu nné mbe ne mbe nyi rewe na Be̱ne̱ ngbe nné mbiye ne mbe nyi rewe na Shetani e̱? Ko nye̱ ne ko ngu nyí re-cwuo rina we̱, ko nyi ewe Be̱ne̱ we̱; nne nke ma ne ko ngu cé̱ gimbe ngu we̱, ko nyi ewe Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Aha kya ne nyi i ho tu we ce̱ucwung nna nyi nke: nyi yaa ce̱.
Shi de̱ nyi shi shi Kayinu we̱ ne ngu i nyi na Nne Hwie̱ ngu yhwe̱ gimbe ngu. A i ki yhwe̱ aha nda? We aha re-cwuo na ngu a i shi ngwie̱ngwie̱, na gimbe ngu a nyi re-cwuo redziee.
Shi de̱ re níng hwie̱ kyang nga onu we̱, re-gimbe nje, kundu ne ebe ngwie̱ e̱ níng rá.
Nzhi e̱ nzhi hu he nzhi hle hu re nzhi nce, nzhi hu ni aha ne nzhi ce̱ re-gimbe nzhi. Ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu ce̱ re-gimbe we̱ mahu a shi tahwie ringgwe̱ hu.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ra gimbe ngu maahu a nyi nne yhwi nné, nyi bra hu re̱se̱ng he ko bi ya nne yhwi nné ngu bi ce na he̱rri tiya we̱.
Nzhi ce̱ rimi nzhi hu ce̱ e̱? Ce̱ e̱ shi he ni: Jesu Krristi i ngwa ce ngu aha nzhi; ngbe aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi e̱ nzhi ngwa ce nzhi aha re-gimbe nzhi ma.
Kundu ya bi kyang ho shwing srra a be ngwie̱ ne̱, ngu bra rí ya gimbe ngu ne ngu shi riywe̱, ne ko ngu bra rí naana ngu we̱, wé̱ ce rimi ré he he ce̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ shi a yarri hwie ngu a?
Rewe nje, shi de̱ ce̱ nzhi e̱ re shi we ikpe nu nwie heng he we̱, me̱di re nyi nying nyi ngbe a yarri raywrra.
A nyi ni ne nzhi hu he nzhi nyi raywrra, ngbe nzhi e̱ ning bra yaa shwe̱ rehwie a nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Kundu ronu rie nzhi níng ting he nzhi brru, a nyi aha ne Be̱ne̱ nyi brrang re ne̱ ronu rie nzhi, aa bra hu ko nda.
Nné ce̱ nje, kundu ne de̱ ronu rie nzhi níng ting he nzhi brru we̱, mahu nzhi e̱ hung yo gbeng a nyyi Be̱ne̱,
ngbe nzhi e̱ she ko nda ne nzhi ki rinng; aha ne nzhi zhwe nti nka ngu re bra nyi kya ne ngu ki kla ehwie.
Riti nka ngu a nyi nke: he nzhi sa rie a Kowe ngu Jesu Krristi, nzhi bra yaa ce̱ shi ne ngu he nzhi yaa ce̱.
Nné mbe ne mbe zhwe nti nka ngu a á srrá a yarri ngu, ngu a bra shi a yarri mbe ma. Kya ngu ci nzhi hu he shi a yarri nzhi e̱ nyi nke: nzhi hu aha Nshe Wiri ngu ne ngu níng ngwa.

Nné ce̱ nje, shi de̱ nyi shî nka ko nye̱ ne ngu he ngu bi Nshe Be̱ne̱ we̱, me̱di nyi mwa kya ne ko nye̱ he ngbe nyi ri ka á wru a nwie Nshe Be̱ne̱ ye̱, aha nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra we yang á kpi ci ko he a be ngwie̱.
Rê ne nyi shi ning hu Nshe na Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi nke: ko nye̱ ne ngu shî he Jesu Krristi i be ne rwe̱ nneywi, mahu a bi Nshe Be̱ne̱,
me̱di ko nye̱ ne ko ngu shî he Jesu be ne rwe̱ nneywi we̱, ko bi Nshe Be̱ne̱, se we na Nne Ra Krristi, ne nyi i ho he cwo be e̱, a zhe ne ne̱ aa a kpe ci a be ngwie̱.
Rewe nje, nyi e̱ nyi nyi na Be̱ne̱, nyi bra we drre̱, aha ngu ne ngu shi a yarri nyi e̱ a ne̱ nne nkiye ne ngu shi a yarri ngwie̱.
Nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra a á wru a yarri ngwie̱, aha ni re-nka mbe e̱ nyi we zhwe na ebe ngwie̱, ebe ngwie̱ e̱ bra we ho nka.
Nzhi e̱ nzhi
Nné ce̱ nje, nde nzhi yaa ce̱, aha ce̱ e̱ wru nwie Be̱ne̱. Kundu nzhi yaa ce̱ mahu nzhi nyi rewe Be̱ne̱, nzhi e̱ bra hu Be̱ne̱.
Kundu de̱ nzhi yaa ce̱ we̱, mahu ko nzhi hu Be̱ne̱ we̱, aha Be̱ne̱ nyi ce̱.
Rê ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ti ce̱ ngu a nyi nke: aa te ne Kowe ngu ne ngu ki bi we ze̱nggre̱ ngu a yarri ebe ngwie̱ ngbe nzhi she ce aha ngu.
Ce̱ e̱ nyi nke: ko nyi nzhi e̱ ne nzhi ce̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱, me̱di a i níng ce̱, he̱rri aa te Kowe ngu ngbe re hwie̱ teedeng yi re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi.
Nné ce̱ nje, tu ne Be̱ne̱ ngu níng ce̱ ni, aa ye ngbe nzhi yaa ce̱ ma.
Ko bi ya nne ngu sa ri Be̱ne̱ we̱, me̱di kundu nzhi yaa ce̱, mahu Be̱ne̱ shi a yarri nzhi ngbe ce̱ ngu a shi yarri nzhi zhwozhwo.
A nyi ni ne nzhi hu he nzhi srrá a yarri ngu, ngu a ma a shi yarri nzhi, aha aa níng ngwa Nshe Wiri ngu.
Nzhi ri, nzhi bra ngwá sheede he Be̱ e̱ te Kowe ngu ngbe re hwie̱ Nnenkyia ebe ngwie̱.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu shî he Jesu nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱, maahu Be̱ne̱ srrá a yarri ngu, ngu a shi a yarri Be̱ne̱ ma.
Aha ni nzhi hu re̱se̱ng, nzhi bra sa rie a ce̱ ne Be̱ ngu bi aha nzhi.
Be̱ne̱ nyi ce̱, kundu nzhi yaa cé̱, mahu nzhi srrá a yarri Be̱ne̱, Be̱ne̱ e̱ srrá a yarri nzhi ma.
A ni nzhi e̱ yaa ce̱ zhwozhwo aha ngbe nzhi ri hung yo we dengge a tung nyi nka, aha a be ngwie̱ ne̱ nzhi srra shi ngu.

Ko shi nzhi bi kyang to owu we̱, aha kundu nzhi yaa ce̱ zhwozhwo, ngu ce̱ ana we̱ ti owu a ci, aha ko shi nzhi to owu he Be̱ne̱ cwo a níng na uucwu we̱. Nne ne ngu to owu mahu ko ce̱ ngu a ya cwu we̱.
Nzhi yaa ce̱
Ko nye̱ ne ngu he, “Nje ce̱ Be̱ne̱,” me̱di ngu bra rá gimbe ngu, mahu a nyi nne rabrra. Aha ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu ce̱ gimbe ngu ne ngu ki ri we̱, ko shi re hung ce̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱ aha ko ri Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Riti nka ne Krristi i níng ngwa a nyi nke: ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ Be̱ne̱ se re ce̱ gimbe ngu wire.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu shî he Jesu nyi Krristi mahu a nyi bî Be̱ne̱; ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ be̱, we̱ ce̱ ewe ngu we ni ma.
Rêng hu he nzhi ce̱ rewe Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi nke: se ne nzhi ce̱ Be̱ne̱ ne nzhi bra zhwé nti nka ngu.
Ce̱ ne nzhi ce̱ Be̱ne̱ e̱ nyi nke he nzhi zhwe nti nka ngu. Ko nti nka ngu a á bi rwe̱ we̱,
aha ko nye̱ ne ngu nyi bî Be̱ne̱ e̱ drré̱ ebe ngwie̱; a nyi aha sa rie nzhi a yarri Krristi ne nzhi drré̱ ebe ngwie̱.
Nyi nye̱ ngu hung drre̱ ebe ngwie̱ e̱? Se we ngu nne nke ne ngu shî he Jesu nyi Kowe Be̱ne̱.
A nyi ngu Jesu Krristi ne ngu be ne sheede rishi ngbe roshwo. Koo be we ne rishi we̱, me̱di he̱rri ngbe roshwo. A a nyi Nshe Wiri ne ngu ngwá sheede ne̱, aha Nshe Wiri e̱ nyi raywrra.
A bi re-sheede komo wetsie̱:
a bi na Nshe Wiri, ngbe na rishi, ngbe na roshwo; mbe wetsie̱ ne̱ á ngwá we sheede zunzrru.
Nzhi shî sheede ne nneywi ngwá, me̱di sheede na Be̱ne̱ ne̱ kaka aha a nyi na Be̱ne̱, a nyi ngwiee ne ngu ngwa a rici Kowe ngu.

Ko nye̱ ne ngu sá rie a Kowe Be̱ne̱, a bi sheede ne̱ a nu rie ngu. Ko nye̱ ne de̱ ngu sá rie a Be̱ne̱ we̱, mahu a he he Be̱ne̱ e̱ bi rabrra, aha ne ko ngu sá rie a sheede ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ngwa a rici Kowe ngu we̱.
Sheede nna nyi nke: Be̱ne̱ e̱ níng ngwa ce he̱rri tiya, ce nna bra shi a Kowe ngu.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu bi Kowe nna a bi ce, nne nke ne de̱ ngu bi Kowe Be̱ne̱ we̱ maahu ko bi ce we̱.
Nje wie re-ankya ne̱ re be nwie nyi — nyi ne nyi sa rie a Kowe Be̱ne̱, aha ngbe nyi hu he nyi bi ce na he̱rri tiya.
Kya ngu ci nzhi hung be nyyi Be̱ne̱ we dengge e̱ nyi nke: aha kundu nzhi rin ko nda ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ce̱ ngu, we̱ níng hong.
Kundu ne nzhi bra hu he a ho ko nda ne nzhi rin e̱, mahu nzhi hu he nzhi she kya ne nzhi ki rinng nna.

Kundu ya a tsi nyi ri gimbe ngu shi nyi e̱ngwie̱ na ne ko ngu shi ki ci re hu we̱, nde re ki ku Be̱ne̱ ngbe Be̱ne̱ we̱ ki ngwa ce. Nje he nka ne nné mbe ne ko e̱ngwie̱ mbe e̱ nyi na ne ngu shi we ci ré kwi we̱. A bi e̱ngwie̱ na ne ngu ci nneywi re hu
Ko zohu zhwe riywe̱ redziee nyi e̱ngwie̱, me̱di a bi e̱ngwie̱ na ne ko ngu ci nneywi re hu we̱.
Nzhi hu he ko nye̱ ne ngu nyi bî Be̱ne̱ e̱ ko srrá nwie nyi e̱ngwie̱ we̱; aha ngu Kowe Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki kye̱, ko shi Nne Hwie̱ re ki re we̱.
Nzhi hu he nzhi e̱ nzhi nyi rewe Be̱ne̱, me̱di ebe ngwie̱ ne̱ zhwozhwo shi a nva Nne Hwie̱.

Nzhi bra hu he Kowe Be̱ne̱ e̱ be, aa níng ngwa hu re̱se̱ng, aha ngbe nzhi ki hu ngu ne ngu nyi raywrra. Nzhi e̱ shi a yarri ngu, ngu ne ngu nyi raywrra, nzhi shi a yarri Kowe ngu Jesu Krristi. A nyi ngu ne ngu nyi Be̱ne̱ cence ngbe ce na he̱rri tiya.
Rewe nje, nyi to gbong ne re-kpanshwu.
Nka ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Brra Nne,
Re nzhi nwie Brra De̱
aha raywrra ne ngu shi a yarri nzhi ne ngu bra shi shi yarri nzhi he̱rri tiya.
Nde ehwie rina Be̱ne̱ Be̱ ngbe Jesu Krristi ne ngu nyi Kowe Be̱, re shi ngbe ne nzhi, ngbe re ri naana nzhi ngbe re bra níng ngwa srra rina a yarri raywrra ngbe ce̱.
Aa ning ngwa ehwie kla we yang ne nje she he yá rewe ngwe̱ e̱ á shi ciee mbe a yarri raywrra, we shi riti nka ne nzhi she nwie Be̱.
A zhe ne ne̱, mbrru, ko nje re wie yaka riti nka we̱sa ne na nzhi i bi tu we ce̱ucwung we̱, nje cwe nva ne ngwe̱ he nzhi yaa ce̱.
Ce̱ e̱ nyi nke he nzhi nyi kya ne Be̱ne̱ he nzhi nyi. We shi ne nyi nyi ne hong tu we ce̱ucwung, cwu riti nka ngu a nyi nke: he nyi cwo a yarri yaa ce̱.
Nné he rabrra we yang, ne ko mbe shî he Jesu be a rwe̱ nneywi we̱, á kpi ci a ngwie̱. Ko zohu zhwe nne ana nyi nne brra nné a bra nyi Nne Ra Krristi.
Nyi ci nkwile̱ kishi nyi ri wi kya ne nyi yaa cwe nwie nying, me̱di he nyi ya she lede zhwozhwo.
Ko nye̱ ne ko ngu yó we kya ne Krristi ngu mie̱ we̱, me̱di ngu wara, mahu ko nne ana bi Be̱ne̱ we̱; ko nye̱ ne ngu yó a kya ne ngu mie̱, mahu a bi Be̱ e̱ ngbe Kowe nna gbengbe mbe.
Aha ni kundu ya nne be nwie níng mie̱ yaka nka we̱sa nka ne̱, shi de̱ nyi ki se̱ a reri nyi we̱, ko dzie shi de̱ nyi ki dzie we̱.
Ko nye̱ ne ngu ki se̱ mahu aa mwe rici ngbe ngu a yarri re-cwuo hwie̱ ngu ne ngu nyi.
A bi re-ankya piriri ne nje ce̱ níng heng, me̱di ko nje ce̱ níng wieng a krre̱de̱ ne̱ we̱. Nje hwie he nje cwo be ngbe n ya níng heng riyii ne riyii, aha ngbe nzhi nyi rekwi zhwozhwo nzhi.
Rewe gimbe nyi
Nka ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Brra Nne,
Re nzhi nwie brra rwi nje Gayu, ne nje ki ce̱ kpe̱kpe̱.
A brra rwi, nje mwo he ngwe̱ she ho shwing a rwe̱ ngwe̱, ngbe ko nda re bra re cwo we rina rina, we shi ne ngwe̱ shi gbingbi a ce̱ nka.
A i ning ngwa ehwie kla we yang ne yá re-gimbe mbe i be mbe ya ning ti zhwe e̱kpe̱e̱ raywrra ngwe̱, we shi ne ngwe̱ shi ciee a yarri raywrra.
Ko bi yankya ngu ning ngwá rekwi kaka re ne̱ n ho he rewe nje cwo a yarri raywrra we̱.
A rwi, ngwe̱ ning sa rici a kya ne ngwe̱ shi nying ne re-gimbe, ko ngbe ne mbe nyi nné ice a nwie ngwe̱.
Mbe e̱ á ngwa sheede zhwe ce̱ ne ngwe̱ we ce̱ a nyyi ekpri nné ce̱ nka na he e̱. A bi rina ngbe ngwe̱ we sheng a zhe ne mbe ri shi ne̱ a rê ne ngu klá Be̱ne̱ ehwie.
A nyi aha lo Jesu ne mbe kpi ci ne̱, koó se̱ ko yankya a nva nné tsi ngwie̱ we̱.
Aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri nzhi she zhwe nné anang, aha ngbe nzhi mwe rici ngbe mbe a yarri cwuo raywrra Be̱ne̱.
Nje i wie re be nwie ekpri nné ce̱ nka na nyi, me̱di Diyotrrefe ne ngu kre he ngu hwie̱ nnencwuee e̱ ra se̱ kya ne nje he e̱.

Kundu ne nje ri be, ma n he kya ne ngu shi nwie nying: aa yaa sa nwie he re-nka shweni ngbe re-rabrra ne ngu ca a rici nzhi. Ko ngwiee ana ki be we̱, a i ra se̱ re-gimbe ne mbe i be, aa kpo nné mbiye ne mbe i ce̱ we se̱, he̱rri aa we trru ci a yarri ekpri nné ce̱ nka.

A rwi, shi de̱ ngwe̱ mwa nyi kya ne ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ we̱, se ka kya ne ngu bi rina. Ko nye̱ ne ngu nyí kya rina, maahu nyi na Be̱ne̱, me̱di ko nye̱ ne ngu nyí kya ngu shi ngwie̱ngwie̱ mahu koo hu Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Ko nye̱ he nka rina a rici Demetrru, ko ngbe raywrra ngu a ma a shi we gbeng. Nzhi ne̱ ma nzhi he nka rina a rici ngu, nyi bra hu he sheede nzhi e̱ nyi cence.
Nje bi re-ankya piriri ne nje ce̱ re heng, me̱di ko nje ce̱ re wieng wie we̱.
Nje hwie he nje shi wre̱ ne be, ngbe nzhi e̱ he nka riyii ne riyii.
Nde srra rina re shi ngbe ne ngwe̱. Rwí a he e̱ á re dzie. Dzie ko zohu rwi nzhi ne ngu shi miimi ma zhwozhwo mbe.
Nka ne̱ e̱ wru nwie Yahuda, hwie Jesu Krristi, ne ngu nyi gimbe Yakubu,
Re nzhi nwie nné mbe ne Be̱ne̱ e̱ we ye, ne Be̱ne̱ Be̱ we cé̱, ne Jesu Krristi we kyé̱.
Nde naana Be̱ne̱, ngbe srra rina, ngbe zhwe ce̱ na ngu zhwozhwo ré shi ngbe ne nyi.

Nné ce̱ nje, nje i shi koori he n níng wie krre̱de̱ aha kyia ne nzhi she zhwozhwo nzhi, nje e̱ bra ri aa mwa ye̱ye̱rri n wre̱ ne níng wieng ngbe n níng shwe̱ rehwie aha ngbe nyi kwe̱ aha nka ne nzhi ning sa rie, shi ne Be̱ne̱ i ngwa nné wiri ngu ce zrru, ne ko bra bi ré ning brang we̱.
Aha a bi yá nné ne i wie nkang ci shweni mbe
Ko ngbe ne nyi hu ga re-ankya ne̱, nje ce̱ níng lu he Brrabe̱

Ga ngbe re-njeli na ne ko mbe i bro rewieng cwuo mbe rina rina we̱, ne mbe i nga nva a we rewieng srra mbe, á we rrwe ne ngbá re-roonyo na he̱rri tiya, á we sa a nwie ywing, aha brra Otu ne e ri we nyi nka.

We ni wa, nné Sodo ngbe nné Gomorra ngbe nné re-ngwie̱ ne mbe we grra, á i ngwa nci mbe a le̱le̱ njè ngbe ne yaká re-nzhwe e̱ngwie̱ njè, mbe e̱ shwe cinci brra lendo na he̱rri tiya aha ngbe re hwie̱ kya ne kpi nneywí ré ning mie̱ yankya.
We ye̱ye̱rri ni wa, nné mbe rre̱ ne re-revi mbe e̱ á nyí re-ankya le̱le̱ ne re-rwe̱ mbe; á rá ringgwe̱ Brrabe̱, á cwí re-njeli grime̱.

Ko ngbe Mikayilu ne ngu nyi nggwe̱ re-njeli, a zhe ne ngu i shi re̱kwe̱ ngbe ne Shetani, ne Shetani i ki ti onu ce aha kwe Musa, ko i yaa wa re ki he ya nka e̱ngwie̱ nwie ki cwi we̱; me̱di a i he, “Brrabe̱ shi re nyi nka!”
Me̱di nné mbe rre̱ á cwí ko nda ne ko mbe hu re̱se̱ng we̱; me̱di re-ankya nke ne mbe hu we shi hu re̱se̱ng na nnyie̱ yi we̱sa ne ning hwie nka cwuncwuu, nyi we mbe e̱ ana ne mbe bra dzió.
Wuhu ne mbe! Á fo we hwie̱ Kayinu; aha ecwue ncwé̱, á brru we shi Balamu ngu i brru; á ci shweni aha klo rici we shi mbe Korra.

Nné mbe rre̱ á srrá a rewie parang mwe rici nyi na yaa ce̱ nyi shi shi ngbé̱ bi roru; á srrá nwie yé yâ ngbe ne nyi we̱sa nshwu, á shi shi nné cwo ne mbe yaa kre we mbe nci mbe yâ. Á shi shi re-inyie̱ ne ko mbe wié nze we̱, ne wu we yhwa we dede. Á shi shi rekwe we̱sa ngbre he̱rri ngbe zhe tsitsi, ne e nye he̱rri á kwi ce hwie.
Á shi we shi gu rishi a brra nzhwo rishi ne mbe hrru prrumprruprru ne re-ankyang nshwu ne mbe nyi. Á shi shi re̱nde̱ gye̱ re̱gye̱,
Eno ne ngu i nyi na natsie̱ a nhwie̱ re-ze̱ (kya ngu ce̱ a Domu), a i ti re̱se̱ng a rici nné mbe rre̱ he, “Ri, Brrabe̱ cwo be ne rigwe̱ re-njeli wiri ngu ne mbe brri we brri,
ngbe re ya nyi ko nye̱ nka, re bra ya ti nné riywe̱ e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ re-e̱ngwie̱ mbe ne mbe nyi we gbeng, ngbe re-nka shweni ne mbe he a rici ngu.”
Nné mbe rre̱ á nyi we nné krro nka nwie ze̱ri nneywí, á zhwé we ankya ngwie̱ngwie̱ na mbe ne mbe kre; á yaa kywo we nci mbe nwie de yá re we shwo ehwie aha ngbe mbe she kya ce̱ mbe.
Me̱di, nyi nné ce̱ nje, nyi lu ne re-ankya ne nnenté Brrabe̱ nzhi Jesu Krristi mbe i níng trrung we gbangba.
Á i he ne nyi he, “Á ri he zhe krruci ngwie̱, a ri bi nné ne mbe ri ya níng kwa sha, á ri zhwe we ankya ce̱ mbe ne ko ngu nyi e̱kpe̱e̱ Be̱ne̱ we̱.”
A nyi nné mbe rre̱ mbe níng ci nyi yaa kyé kanka kanka, á zhwé we re-ankya ce̱ na ikpe rwe̱, koó bra bi Nshe Be̱ne̱ we̱.
Me̱di nyi e̱, nné ce̱ nje, nyi yaa sheng nwie yaa shwe̱ rehwie a yarri sa rie nyi, ngbe nyi srra wiri. Nyi srrá re ku Be̱ne̱ a yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri.
Nyi srra a yarri ce̱ Be̱ne̱, shi ne nyi srrá re te Brrabe̱ Jesu Krristi a yarri naana ngu re níng ngwa ce na he̱rri tiya.
Nyi ri naana nné mbiye ne mbe nyi jinji,
nyi kyia kpi mbe shi nyi we trru a yarri ro; kpi mbe wa, nyi ri naana mbe re ning krre owu, nyi to ankya mbe ne mbe dzio ne re-cwuo le̱le̱ ikpe rwe̱.
Re nzhi nwie ngu ne ngu hu níng kye̱ kishi nyi ri kpe, aha ngbe ré be ne nyi a nyyi grime̱ ngu we̱sa ne ya vini ngbe ne ehwie kla we yang —

re nzhi we nwie Be̱ne̱ ne ngu nyi Nnenkyia nzhi — nde re nyi grime̱, ngbe de, ngbe igbe̱, ngbe ringgwe̱, aha Jesu Krristi Brrabe̱ nzhi, shi gannyi tiya tiya, ngbe a zhe ne ne, ngbe he̱rri re nzhi cwu tiya tiya! A shi ni.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ nyi na re-ankya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu i ngwa Jesu Krristi re ti hwié ngung kya ne ngu shi wre̱ ne ci we̱sa ne dzio zhe. Krristi e̱ te njeli ngu re ya ci hwie ngu Yohana re hu,
ngbe Yohana a ti ko nda ne ngu ri zhwozhwo: nka ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ngbe kya ne Jesu Krristi ngu he.
Mwo rina nyi na nne nke ne ngu hwié re̱se̱ kya ne krre̱de̱ ne̱ tí, mwo rina nyi na nne nke ne ngu hó kya ne e wie yarri krre̱de̱ ngu sa hwie, aha zhe nna a sa dudu.
Krre̱de̱ ne̱ e̱ wru nwie nje Yohana, re nzhi nwie rekpri nné ce̱ nka natsie̱ a nva Asia.
Nde rinang ngbe srra rina ne ngu wru nwie Be̱ne̱ ne ngu ning shi zhe ne, ne ngu i ning shi tiya, ne ngu bra cwo be, ne ngu bra wru nwie Nshe Be̱ne̱ Natsie̱ ne mbe yó nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱,
ne ngu bra wru nwie Jesu Krristi, ne ngu nyi sheede ré hung sa rie a ngu, ne ngu nyi ce̱ucwung ne deze nhu, ne ngu bra nyi nne yé ringgwe̱ nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱, re shi ngbe ne nyi.
Re nzhi nwie nne nke ne ngu níng ce̱, ne ngu níng kyia yarri re-e̱ngwie̱ nzhi ne roshwo ngu,
he̱rri ngu níng ci nzhi hwie̱ nné ringgwe̱ ngbe re-prristi nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ ngu ngbe Be̱ ngu; re nzhi nwie ngu Jesu Krristi, nde re nyi grime̱ ngbe igbe̱ he̱rri tiya tiya! Nde re shi ni.
Ri, a cwo be a yarri re-inyie̱! Ko nye̱ ri ki ri ga ngbe nné ne mbe i ki cwu ne rikpe̱e̱. Ga nné be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ri ku rana riywe̱ aha ngu. Ee, a ri shi ni.
Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ e̱ he, “Nyi nje ne nje nyi Alfa ngbe Omega, ne nje ning shi a zhe ne, ne nje i ning shi tiya, ne nje bra cwo be, nje nyi Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo.”

Nje Yohana, ne nje nyi gimbe nyi ngbe rwi nyi a yarri cinci, ngbe ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe yaa rwe ne ehwie sheng a yarri Jesu, á i ning ti ne ce re nzhi Patimo, a ngwie̱ ne brra nzhwo rishi ki grra, aha nka Be̱ne̱ ngbe kya ne Jesu ngu he.
A i nyi Otu Brrabe̱ ne nje shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Be̱ne̱, ngbe nje e̱ ho ya brra riwie̱ng cwue ngu ku shi rigbe nwie he nka a merin nje.

A he, “Wie kya ne ngwe̱ ri a tekpeng wie cwuo ngwe̱ te mi re nzhi rekpri nné ce̱ nka ne mbe shi a re-ngwie̱ natsie̱: a Afisa, ngbe Simirrina, ngbe Pegamu, ngbe Tiyatirra, ngbe Sarridi, ngbe Filadefiya, ngbe ne Lodikyia.”
Nje bra he ngbe n ri ka nyi nye̱ ngu shi nka ne nje ye̱, nje e̱ timi ne ngbó zinarriya nang sa re-te̱le̱kyi komo natsie̱,
a zetsi mbe, a ning bi ya nne shi shi nyi kowe nneywi ne ngu ci brrá ankya re be kpe we be nta ngbe ne vishi na zinarriya ne ngu grra a zewe ngu.
Rici ngu ngbe nkwe rici ngu nyi kye̱kye̱ng zhanzhanzhaa shi shi wulu kye̱, ka riklaa ho, ngbe re-riyii ngu á a shi shi lendo.
Nta ngu shi shi kprincwe̱ shwo ne ngu si gelgel a yarri rong cwung, riwie̱ng cwue ngu a gwe̱ shi shi brra rishi ne ngu wru nce.
A bro re̱nde̱ komo natsie̱ a nva nyye ngu, ngbe ya ise̱nkeli bi reme wehwie pempempee ne ngu wru a nu ngu. Riyii ngu a tsie̱ nse̱ shi shi ne̱ a brra tsi te̱ne̱.
A zhe ne nje ki ri, nje e̱ kpe a nyyi ngu shi shi nje nyi kweng. Ngu a ning gara va nyye ngu, ngu a he ne nje he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ci owu we̱! Nyi nje ne nje nyi Na Ncwuee ngbe Na Merin.
Nyi nje ne nje nyi riting ce! Nje i hu, me̱di ri, nje shi nce he̱rri tiya tiya. Nje bra bi igbe̱ a zete hu ngbe ewieng srra nné kwi.
“Aha nii, wie ga re-ankya ne ngwe̱ ri, ngbe re-na zhe ne ne, ngbe re-na ne mbe shi ci a ncwuee.

Kya ngu shi la la a re̱nde̱ natsie̱ ne ngwe̱ ri a nva nyye nje, ngbe re-te̱le̱kyi zinarriya natsie̱ ana nyi nke: re̱nde̱ natsie̱ ana á nyi re-njeli na rekpri nné ce̱ nka natsie̱ ana, ngbe re-te̱le̱kyi natsie̱ nna mbe e̱ nyi rekpri nné ce̱ nka natsie̱ nna.
“Re nzhi nwie njeli na ekpri nné ce̱ nka a Afisa, wie he:
Nke ne̱ nyi nka ne ngu wru nwie nne nke ne ngu bro re̱nde̱ natsie̱ a nva nyye ngu, ne ngu bra cwo a zetsi ngbó zinarriya nang sa re-te̱le̱kyi komo natsie̱.

Nje hu zhwe re-ankya ne nyi nyí. Nje hu he nyi yaa rwe ncwuo ne ehwie sheng. Nje hu he ko nyi sá nné hwie̱ nta gung we̱, nyi mwa nné mbiye ne mbe yaa ye he mbe nyi nnenté, me̱di ne ko shi ni we̱, nyi she he á nyi we nné rabrra.
Nyi bi rehwie sheng, nyi yaa rwe yarri ge̱zhe̱ aha nje, gbengbe ni ko nyi rrwa we̱.
Me̱di nka ne nje bi a rici nyi e̱ nyi nke: ko nyi ning ce̱ a zhe ne ne̱ shi ce̱ucwung we̱.

Nyi lu ne zhwe ning brru ne emerin ne nyi ning brru! Nyi se̱ ywe̱, nyi ning brru nyi ne̱ ne nyi zhwe re-ankya ne nyi i nyi a ce̱ucwung. Kundu de̱ nyi ri we ni e̱ngwie̱ we̱, ma n be n ya ti ngbong sa te̱le̱kyi nyi a nwie nna.
Me̱di eme ne nje níng de e̱ nyi nke: nyi ra re-ankya ne nné Nikoleta mbe nyi we shi ne nje we ra ma.
Nne bi uucwung hong, nde re ho kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ he ne rekpri nné ce̱ nka!
Nné mbe ne mbe ri she drre̱. Ma n we ngwa de̱me̱ ré ye gbre ekweng ce, ne ngu shi a nhwie̱n Be̱ne̱.
“Re nzhi nwie njeli na ekpri nné ce̱ nka Simirrina, wie he:
Nke ne̱ nyi nka ne ngu wru nwie nne nke ne ngu nyi Ce̱ucwung ngbe Krrucing, ne ngu i hu ngu bra shi nce.

Nje hu ge̱zhe̱ nyi, nje bra hu he nyi nyi yiriywé̱, me̱di gbengbe ni nyi bi rishwe a nyyi Be̱ne̱! Nje hu re-nka me̱nkye̱ ne nné mbiye ana mbe he a rici nyi — mbe ne mbe yaa ye he nné Yahudi me̱di ne ko mbe nyi nné Yahudi we̱. Á nyi ekpri nné na zonggrung mwe Shetani!

Shi de̱ nyi ci owu ge̱zhe̱ ne nyi shi shweng we̱. Nje níng ting, Shetani e̱ shi ci yá nyi a uucwu gyiaa aha ngu níng mwa ri, he̱rri nyi shwe ge̱zhe̱ rotu shwa. Nyi ke̱ we ne sa rie a nje, ko ngbe nyi ri shi ning kwi, ngbe ma n ri níng ngwa ce ne ngu nyi lede nyi.
Nne bi uucwu hong, nde re ho kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ he ne rekpri nné ce̱ nka!
Nne nke ne ngu ri she drre̱, ko hu na hwie ri ki she we̱.
“Re-nzhi nwie njeli na ekpri nné ce̱ nka a Pegamu, wie he:
Nke ne̱ nyi nka ne ngu wru nwie nne nke ne ngu bi ise̱nkeli bi reme wehwie pempempee.

Nje hu ewie ne nyi ning srra, a nyi miimi ne ncwu ringgwe̱ Shetani ning shi. Gbengbe ni nyi pie lo nje gangga, ko nyi ti sa rie nyi a nje we̱ ga ngbe a rotu Antipa ne ngu i nyi nne ngwa sheede nje na ré hung sa rie a ngu, ne i ki yhwe̱ a yarri ngwie̱ nyi ne ngu nyi ewieng srra Shetani.

Gbengbe ni, nje bi e̱we̱ nka tsie̱ a rici nyi. A bi yá a tsi nyi ne mbe zhwe kya ne Balamu i mie̱ nnéng, ne ngu i mie̱ Balaki rê ne ngu ning kwa nné Isrreela re nzhi yarri e̱ngwie̱ng ye yâ teede kpanshwu ngbe e̱ngwie̱ le̱le̱ njè.
He̱rri ne cwu wa a bi nné a tsi nyi ne mbe zhwe nka ne nné Nikoleta mbe mie̱.
Aha ni nyi se̱ ywe̱! De̱e̱ ni we̱, ma n be we hwiehwie n ya kwe̱ ngbe nné mbe ana ne ise̱nkeli ne ngu wrru nu nje.
Nne bi uucwung hong, nde re ho kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ he ne rekpri nné ce̱ nka!
Nne nke ne ngu ri she drre̱, ma n ri ki ngwa manna nke ne ngu shi la la. Ma n bra ri ki ngwa zahwan kye̱ ne e ning wie lo hwi a zeteng, ne nyi we ngu nne se̱ng nna ngu hu.
“Re nzhi nwie njeli na ekpri nné ce̱ nka a Tiyatirra, wie he:
Nke ne̱ nyi nka ne ngu wru nwie Kowe Be̱ne̱, ne re-riyii ngu mbe shi shi lendo, ne nta ngu si shi kprincwe̱ shwo ne e ki hwie̱.

Nje hu zhwe re-ankya ne nyi nyí, nje hu he nyi ning ce̱ nyi bra ce̱ nné, nyi sa rie a nje, nyi nyí re-cwuo nje, nyi bra bi ehwie sheng. Nje hu he nyi shi nwie nying a zhe ne ne̱ kaka re ne̱ zhe ce̱ucwung.

Me̱di nka ne nje bi a rici nyi e̱ nyi nke: He̱rri nyi hung ci nkwirin ne mbrru ne e ki ye he Jezebe ana, ne ngu yaa ye he mbrru ti re̱se̱ng ana. Ne zhwe nka ne ngu mie̱ nnéng, aa kwa hwié nje re nzhi mi yarri le̱le̱ njè ngbe ye yâ teede kpanshwu.
Nje ki ngwa de̱me̱ng se̱ ywe̱ ne le̱le̱ njè ngu a, me̱di a ra.
Aha ni nje shi ki zhwu a gondo cinci, ngbe ma n ci ga nné ne mbe nyi njè ne ngu a ré shwe ge̱zhe̱ we yang, se ka mbe ri se̱ ywe̱ ne e̱ngwie̱ ne mbe nyi ne ngu wire.

Nje bra shi yhwi nné ki zhwe ngu, wire ga rekpri nné ce̱ nka zhwozhwo wé̱ hu he nyi nje ne nje hu ronu rie nneywí ngbe re-hwie nka mbe, he nje bra shi ngwa ko nye̱ a tsi nyi lede ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu nyi.

Me̱di ne kpi nyi ne nyi shi Tiyatirra, nyi ne ko nyi zhwe mie̱ nka ngu a we̱, ne ko nyi mie̱ re-ankya mbiye ne e we ye he ‘cwuncwuu ankya la la Shetani’ ana we̱, nje he ko nje shi ning bra ya nkpe wa we̱.
Nyi bro we kya ne nyi bi e̱ gangga se nje ri be.
Nné mbe ne mbe ri she drre̱, ne mbe nyi kya ce̱ nje he̱rri re nzhi cwu gamang, ma n ri we ngwa ringgwe̱ a zete re-ngwie̱,
we shi ne nje she de̱me̱ nwie Be̱ nje.
‘Á ri ye ringgwe̱ a mbe ne ngbó kprincwe̱;
á ri we hwin rrurru shi nyi rondrro.’
Nje bra ri we ngwa e̱nde̱ nyiencwe.
“Nne bi uucwung hong, nde re ho kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ ngu he ne rekpri nné ce̱ nka.
“Re nzhi nwie njeli na ekpri nné ce̱ nka Sarridi, wie he:
Nke ne̱ nyi nka ne ngu wru nwie nne nke ne ngu bro Nshe Be̱ne̱ natsie̱ ngbe re̱nde̱ natsie̱ ana. Nje hu zhwe re-ankya ne nyi nyí: nyi ve lo a nka he nyi bi ce, me̱di nyi nyi nkweng.
Aha ni nyi shwo ndzie ngbe nyi ning bra igbe̱ a e̱we̱ kya ne ngu hwie̱ e̱ ne ngu rishi ngra hu. Aha nje she ko re-cwuo nyi e̱ á shi tsantsa a nyyi Be̱ne̱ wire we̱.
Nyi lu ne kya ne i níng mie̱ng ne nyi bra ho, nyi zhwe ngbe nyi si ywe̱. Me̱di kundu de̱ nyi ri shwo ndzie we̱, ma n be shi nne nca, ne ko nyi hu zhe ne nje ning be nwie nyi e̱ we̱.
Gbengbe ni, a bi yá nyi tsie̱nzhwu a Sarridi e̱ ne ko mbe dzio ankya ci mbe ne roru we̱. Á ri ci ankya kye̱ ré cwo ngbe nje, aha á mwa ye̱ye̱rri.
Nné mbe ne mbe ri she drre̱, á ri ci ankya kye̱ ni. Ko shi n ree yi re-lo mbe a yarri krre̱de̱ nce we̱, me̱di nje ri ti we gbeng a nyyi Be̱ nje ngbe re-njeli ngu he á nyi na nje.
Nne bi uucwung hong, nde re ho kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ he ne rekpri nné ce̱ nka!
“Re nzhi nwie njeli na ekpri nné ce̱ nka Filadefiya, wie he:
Nke ne̱ nyi nka ne ngu wru nwie nne wiri ngbe raywrra, ne ngu bró ringgwe̱ Dooda.
Nje hu zhwe re-ankya ne nyi nyí. Nyi ri, nje níng kla onusinye ne ko bi nne re she̱ we̱. Nje hu he nyi bi e̱we̱ igbe̱ we tsie̱nzhwu, gbengbe ni nyi bro nka nje, ko nyi klo he nyi nyí na nje we̱.

Nyi ri, nje shi ci nné mbiye ne mbe nyi nné zonggrung mwe Shetani e̱ ana, ne mbe yaa ye he nné Yahudi Be̱ne̱ ana, me̱di koó shi ni we̱, nje shi we ci ré be ré ya hu be a nyyi nyi ré hu re̱se̱ng he nje níng ce̱.
Tu ne nyi yaa rwe nwie zhwe nti nka nje ne ehwie sheng, nje ri níng kye̱ a zhe ne ge̱zhe̱ ri be, ne e ri mwa nneywí a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ri.
Nje cwo be we hwiehwie. Nyi bro kya ne nyi bi e̱, kishi ya nne ri ci nyi wi lede koori nyi.

Nné mbiye ne mbe ri she drre̱, nje ri we ci ré hwie̱ re-iita runo a yarri brranyi Be̱ne̱ nje, ko shi ré ree we ewie ana we̱. Nje ri wie lo Be̱ne̱ nje ngbe lo ngwie̱ Be̱ne̱ nje a mbe, ngwie̱ Urrushelima hwi, ne ngu ri wru a zinye̱ a nwie Be̱ne̱ nje. Nje bra ri wie lo hwi nje a mbe.
Nne bi uucwung hong, nde re ho kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ he ne rekpri nné ce̱ nka!
“Re nzhi nwie njeli na ekpri nné ce̱ nka Lodikyia, wie he:
Nke ne̱ nyi nka ne ngu wru nwie nne nke ne e ki ye ‘A shi ni’
Nje hu zhwe re-ankya ne nyi nyí, nje hu he ko nyi shi canca we̱, ko nyi bra bi ro we̱. Nje ce̱ he canca nyi ra shi canca ka nyi bi ro!
Me̱di tu ne nyi shi we luuu, ko nyi bi ro we̱ ko nyi bra shi canca we̱ — nje ri kpa níng trru ci shi nyi rencwi nje trru be!
Nyi he, ‘Nje bi va; nje tsu dukyie̱e̱, ko nje bra kre yankya wenywa wa we̱.’ Me̱di ko nyi ru he nyi shi we dede, nyi bi naana, nyi nyi yiriywé̱, nyi bi cwue̱, nyi shi ngbe̱we̱ng we̱.

Nje ce̱ níng ti yankya, nyi se̱ zinarriya a nwie nje, ne ngu nyi na ne e ki ru a nro, aha ngbe nyi ci ncwé̱. Nyi bra si ankya kye̱ ngbe nyi ci nyi ning ku rwe̱ hwerri nyi. Nyi si rikye̱ riyii, nyi ci a re-riyii nyi ngbe nyi hung ri ewie.
A nyi nné mbiye ne nje we ce̱ ne nje we yhwire re we na uucwu. Aha ni nyi yaa rwe nyi si ywe̱.
Nyi ri! Nje yó a nusinye re cwe ewie. Nne nke ne ngu hó cwue nje ngu kla, ma n ngwie yarring, ma n ye ngbe ne ngu, ngu a ngbe nje ma.
Nné mbiye ne mbe ri she drre̱. Ma n ri we ngwa de̱me̱ng srra ngbe nje a ncwu ringgwe̱ nje, we shi ne nje i she drre̱, nje e̱ srra ngbe Be̱ nje a ncwu ringgwe̱ ngu.
Nne bi uucwung hong, nde re ho kya ne Nshe Be̱ne̱ he ne rekpri nné ce̱ nka!”

Wire nje e̱ rwi riyii, nje e̱ ri ya onusinye ngu yo gang a zinye̱. Ngbe cwue ne nje ri ke̱she ho a ce̱ucwung ne ngu he nka ne nje shi nyi rigbe e̱, ngu a he, “Cwugu re be he, ngbe ma n re ti re-ankya ne se mbe ci a merin re-nke ne̱.”
We zhe zunzrru, nje e̱ shî ne igbe̱ Nshe Wiri. Ngbe we a nyyi nje a miimi e̱, a a bi ncwu ringgwe̱ a zinye̱ ne ya nne shi ning srra.
Ngbe riyii nne ne ngu ning srra a zeteng nna a shi shi ngbatsie bi grime̱ shi jaspa ngbe kaneliya. Ngbe klii ne ngu si shi shi ngbaatsie emerra ngu a grra ncwu ringgwe̱ nna.

A a bra bi yá ncwú ringgwe̱ nna komo nshwa wehwie ne otu weni ne mbe grra ncwu ringgwe̱ nke ana, ne brrá nné komo nshwa wehwie ne otu weni mbe ning srra. Á ci ankya kye̱, á bra ci re-vo ringgwe̱ ne e nyi ne zinarriya.

Ngbe ewie e̱ tí mele ne ngu wrru a ncwu ringgwe̱ nna ngbe eeze ne ngu kpe ru nwie tsa. Ngbe a nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ nna, a a bi re-te̱le̱kyi natsie̱ ne mbe yé ro zinzi, ne nyi mbe ne mbe nyi Nshe Be̱ne̱ natsie̱.
He̱rri ne cwu wa a nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ nna a bi yankya shi shi nyi brra nzhwo rishi na glaasi, a shi krrankrrankrra shi nyi kprahwan glaasi.
A zetsing a nwie ncwu ringgwe̱ nna a bi yá re-kyerrubi komo weni ne mbe ki grra, re-rwe̱ mbe e̱ nyi we nyyi we e̱ rrewe ne mbe we hwie̱n a me ncwuee ngbe a merin.
Na ce̱ucwung nna shi shi ze̱kyi, na hwieng shi shi izhimi, na tsie̱ e̱ bi riyii shi nneywi, na ni e̱ shi shi nkyi ne ngu hru.
Ko zohu a tsi re-kyerrubi weni ana bi re-gahaan komo rritsie̱, nyyi i bra we ku wa a tahwieng ngbe zeteng zhwozhwo. Totu ne te̱ne̱ á srra re kyie̱ he,
“Na wiri, na wiri, na wiri,
a nyi Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo,
ne ngu i ning shi tiya, ngu ning shi zhe ne, ngu bra cwo be.”
Ko zohu zhe ne re-kyerrubi nna mbe shi nve nwie de nne srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ nna ne ngu shi nce he̱rri tiya tiya a nwie ki ngwa grime̱ re ki ci kijie̱ng,

ngbe brrá nné komo nshwa wehwie ne otu weni ana wé̱ kpi be a nyyi ngwiee ne ngu srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ nna nwie ki ye ngu ne ngu bi ce he̱rri tiya tiya mbè. Á trru re-vo ringgwe̱ mbe wé̱ zi be a nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ nna nwie he:
“Brrabe̱ nzhi ngbe Be̱ne̱ nzhi, nyi ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ be
ngbe ré re de, ré re ngwa grime̱, aha igbe̱ ngwe̱,
aha nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ nyi ga ankya zhwozhwo,
a bra nyi aha kya ce̱ ngwe̱ ne i we nyi
ne he̱rri mbe bra she srra.”
Wire nje e̱ ri a nva nyye nne nke ne ngu srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ ana ngu bro tekpeng wie cwuo ne e ning wie ankya a ga reme wehwie nna zhwozhwo á ki be̱ ne re-rika komo natsie̱.
Ngbe nje e̱ ri ya brra njeli ne ngu kyie̱ ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu be ngbe re nye̱ re-rika ne̱ re kla tekpeng wie cwuo nna aa?”
Me̱di ko bi nne a zinye̱, ka a be ngwie̱, ka a tahwie ebe ngwie̱ re hung kla tekpeng wie cwuo nna wire ning hwie̱ re ri yaarring we̱.
Nje e̱ ku we ku we ku aha koó she nne ne ngu be re kla tekpeng wie cwuo ana ngbe re ri yaarring we̱.
Ngbe ya brra nne nna a he ne nje he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ ku we̱! Ri, Ze̱kyi nné ngwie̱ Yahuda, ne ngu nyi Rinyie Dooda she drre̱. Aa hung kla tekpeng wie cwuo nna ga ngbe re-rika natsie̱ nna.”

Nje e̱ ri Kowe Canve shi shi á ree ki cie̱ ne ngu yo zetsing dudu ne ncwu ringgwe̱ nna, ne re-kyerrubi weni ngbe brrá nné ana mbe ki grra. A bi nte komo natsie̱ ngbe re-riyii natsie̱, ne mbe nyi Nshe Be̱ne̱ komo natsie̱ ne e we te ko he a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo.
Aa be ngu a ya se̱ tekpeng wie cwuo nna a nva nyye nne nke ne ngu srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ nna.

A zhe ne ngu se̱, ngbe re-kyerrubi weni ngbe brrá nné nshwa wehwie ne otu weni ana mbe e̱ kpi be a nyyi Kowe Canve nna. Ko nye̱ mbe bi grinye, á bra bró re-enjie zinarriya ne mbe shî ne turraren, ne ngu nyi re-rumwo nné Be̱ne̱.
Ngbe mbe e̱ ce̱ ya ve hwi he:
“Ngwe̱ be ngbe ngwe̱ fo tekpeng wie cwuo ne̱,
ngbe ngwe̱ bra hwin re-rika ngu ne̱.
Aha á i re yhwe̱, ngbe ngwe̱ e̱ si Be̱ne̱ nneywí
a ko zohu ngwie̱, ngbe nka, ngbe nné, ngbe ikpe.
Ngwe̱ we ci ré hwie̱ nné ringgwe̱ ngbe re-prristi nyi cwuo Be̱ne̱ nzhi,
á bra ri ye ringgwe̱ ebe ngwie̱.”
Nje e̱ rwi riyii wa, nje e̱ ho ncwue rigwe̱ re-njeli rigwe̱ rigwe̱ng ne wé̱ hung cwu re-nshwa ngba ci ce shwa ngba ci! Á grra ncwu ringgwe̱ nna ngbe re-kyerrubi ngbe ne brrá nné nna,
nwie ce̱ ve ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he:
“Nyi ngu Kowe Canve ne i cie̱ ne̱ ngu be,
ré ki ngwa igbe̱ ringgwe̱, ngbe dukyie̱e̱, ngbe zentsi, ngbe igbe̱ ncwuo,
ngbe grime̱, ngbe brra nse̱ na grime̱, ré bra ki de!”
Wire nje e̱ ho ko zohu kya bi ce a zinye̱, ngbe a be ngwie̱, ngbe tahwie ebe ngwie̱, ngbe a yarri brra nzhwo rishi — ga ankya bi ce zhwozhwo a ngwie̱ — ne mbe ce̱ ve he:
“De, ngbe grime̱, ngbe brra nse̱ grime̱, ngbe igbe̱,
nyi na nne nke ne ngu srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ ngbe ne Kowe Canve nna,
he̱rri tiya tiya!”
Ngbe re-kyerrubi weni ana wé̱ shî he, “A shi ni!” Ngbe brrá nné nna wé̱ kpi be nwie ki ye mbè.
Wire nje e̱ ri Kowe Canve nna ngu ho rika na ce̱ucwung a tsi natsie̱ ana. Ngbe nje e̱ ho ya a tsi re-kyerrubi weni ana ngu he ne brra riwie̱ng cwue shi nyi eeze ngu tsa he, “Be!”
Nje sa riyii, ngbe nje e̱ ri ya ntsie̱ kye̱ ne nne tong nna ngu bro e̱gwe̱, á a ki ngwa vo ringgwe̱, ngu a hu be ncii shi nne shé drre̱ a cwe ne ngu cwo a kwe̱ cwe ngu shi drre̱.
Ngbe Kowe Canve e̱ ho rika na hwie. Nje e̱ ho kyerrubi na hwie ngu he, “Be!”
Yaka ntsie̱ e̱ wru, a nyi shwoshwong shi shi lendo. Á a ngwa nne tong nna igbe̱ng be ne cwe a be ngwie̱ ngbe re ci nneywí ré ne̱ ne yaa yhwi. Á ki ngwa brra ise̱nkeli.
Ngbe Kowe Canve e̱ ho rika na tsie̱; nje e̱ ho kyerrubi na tsie̱ ngu he, “Be!” Nje sa riyii ngbe nje e̱ ri ntsie̱ ywi. Nne tong nna bro kyang mi ruvo ankya a nva ngu.

Nje e̱ ho yankya shi shi nyi cwue ngu wru nwie re-kyerrubi weni ana ngu he, “Kwrengyi alikama nyi ledeng yeri ncwuo, kwrengyi ntsi uru bale wetsie̱ e̱ nyi ledeng cwuo tozrru ma, me̱di shi de̱ ngwe̱ dzio remie rihwie̱n ngbe rishi ruto we̱!”
Ngbe Kowe Canve e̱ ho rika na ni; ngbe nje e̱ ho cwue kyerrubi na ni ngu he, “Be!”

Nje e̱ sa riyii, nje e̱ ri ya ntsie̱ shi nyi kya ywi ne ngu krra. Á ye nne tong nna he Hu; ewieng srra nné kwi e̱ bra ki zhwe we dudu a merin. Mbe wehwie ne̱ á we ngwa igbe̱ a zete kla zunzrru a tsi weni na ebe ngwie̱ he ngbe ré yhwi nné ne ise̱nkeli, ne nzhwo, ne ruhu, ngbe ne nnyié̱ yi na ebe ngwie̱.
Ngbe Kowe Canve e̱ ho rika na cwuoo; nje e̱ ri a tahwie briing nyi teede a bi re-wu na ga nné mbiye ne e we yhwi aha nka Be̱ne̱ ngbe ne brro nka ngu ne mbe i ning tu rici brrong.
Á kyie̱ ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo, ngwe̱ shi wiri ne raywrra, se rekpe wire ngwe̱ nyi nné be ngwie̱ ne̱ nka, ngwe̱ we na uucwu aha roshwo nzhi ne mbe ywe̱ e̱ ye̱?”
Á a ngwa ko nye̱ mbe brra tago kye̱, á a he ne mbe he ré ning bra te tsie̱ se ne ga rigbre rwincwuó mbe ngbe re-gimbe mbe nke ne e shi yhwing ngu ri ya cwu ye̱ye̱rri wire.
Nje e̱ sa riyii, nje e̱ ri ne ngu ho rika na rritsie̱. Ngbe ya brra ngwie̱gbe̱ e̱ deze, ne̱ e̱ bra ci ywiywing shi nyi trro ywi ne ngu shi caarra; yhwe̱ e̱ bra ci zhwuuzhwuuzhwuu shi nyi roshwo.
Re̱nde̱ zinye̱ e̱ kpi be shi nyi ngbre riyhwietsie na mbe rishi shwo mbe wrru a ekwe nna re kpi be a zhe ne ya ngba wu ya we gbe̱.
Zinye̱ e̱ bru shi nyi tekpeng wie cwuo ne e krru, ngbe á a shwo ko zohu ngbra ngbe re-ngwie̱ ne brra nzhwo rishi ngu we grra a rewie ne mbe ning shi.

Ngbe nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱, ngbe nné ye ringgwe̱, ngbe nggwé̱ re-shezhi, ngbe nné bi va, ngbe nné bi igbe̱, ngbe kpi nné zhwozhwo — hwié ngbe nné bi srra srra nci mbe, mbe e̱ ya la a yarri re-uugwoo ngbe re-hla a tahwie ngbatsie a ngbrá.
Á a ci ye re nzhi a ngbrá ngbe a re-kprahwan he, “Nyi kpi a nzhi, ngbe nyi níng la a nyyi nne srra ncwu ringgwe̱ ana ngbe ne ren Kowe Canve ana!
Aha brra otu ren mbe e̱ be, he̱rri nyi nye̱ ngu ri hung yo?”
A merin nke, nje e̱ ri re-njeli weni ne mbe yó a reme weni na ebe ngwie̱ nwie bro wu ne ngu wru a re-nwie weni ne̱ kishi ri yhwa a ebe ngwie̱, ka a brra nzhwo rishi, ka a ya ekwe.
Ngbe nje e̱ ri yaka njeli ne ngu wru nva ze ngu bi he̱timi Be̱ne̱ bi ce. Ngu a ci ye ne brra riwie̱ng cwue re nzhi nwie re-njeli weni ne e we ngwa igbe̱ng ci ebe ngbe brra nzhwo rishi ruhu.
Ngbe njeli nna a he, “Shi de̱ nyi ci ebe ka brra nzhwo rishi ka ya ekwe ruhu we̱, se ne nzhi ri ci hwié Be̱ne̱ nzhi ce̱e̱le̱ a re-teyii mbe wire.”
Wire nje e̱ ho he nné ne e we ci ce̱e̱le̱ Be̱ne̱ nna nyi nné ci nnywa zunzrru ne nshwa weni ne otu weni (144,000) a re-ngwie̱ nné Isrreela shwa ne otu wehwie.
A ngwie̱ Yahuda á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Rrube á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Ge̱di á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Asha á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Naftali á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Manase á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Simiyo á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Levi á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Isaka á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Zebulu á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Usufu á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna,
a ngwie̱ Benjemi á ci nné ci shwa zunzrru ne otu wehwie (12,000) ce̱e̱le̱ nna.

A merin nke, nje e̱ zrre̱ ya brra rigwe̱ nné ne ko bi nne re hung hwieng we̱, ne mbe wru a ko zohu ikpe, ngbe ngwie̱, ngbe nneywí, ngbe nka ne mbe yó a nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ ngbe ncwuee Kowe Canve nna. Á ci brra re-ankya kye̱ nwie bro nva rekwe iigle a nva mbe.
Á kyie̱ ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he:
“Kyia a wru nwie Be̱ne̱ nzhi,
ne ngu srrá ncwu ringgwe̱,
a nwie Kowe Canve.”
Ga re-njeli e̱ grra ncwu ringgwe̱ nna nwie yo yo ngbe brrá nné, ngbe re-kyerrubi weni nna. Ngbe mbe e̱ kpi be ne nyyi a be a nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ nna nwie ye Be̱ne̱ mbè,
re he, “A shi ni! De, ngbe brra nse̱ grime̱, ngbe zentsi, ngbe kijie̱ng, ngbe grime̱, ngbe igbe̱ ringgwe̱, ngbe igbe̱ng cwuo zhwozhwo nyi ngge Be̱ne̱ nzhi he̱rri tiya tiya! A shi ni!”
Ya a tsi brrá nné nna ngu a ning rinng he, “Re-nke ne mbe ci ankya kye̱ ne̱ á nyi mbe nye̱? Á wru he?”
Nje e̱ shî he, “Be̱ri, nyi ngwe̱ ngwe̱ hu.”
Ngu a he ne nje he, “Mbe ne̱ á nyi nné ne mbe wru yarri Brra Cinci. Á kyu re-ankya mbe e̱ ne roshwo Kowe Canve á ci kye̱kye̱ng.
Kya a nyi nke ngu ci mbe yó nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ nwie ki nyi cwuo totu ne te̱ne̱ a yarri brranyi ngu. Nne ngwiee ne ngu srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ ana shi kla ndu ngu ngbe re we ku.
Koó bra bi ho nzhwo we̱; koó bra bi ho ne̱ rishi we̱. Ko ro ne̱ shi bi we kpre ka ya ro re we shwi we̱,
aha Kowe Canve ne ngu shi zetsi ncwu ringgwe̱ ana ri hwie̱ nne we cwo. A ri we kwa re nzhi a nshwa rishi ne ngu ngwa ce. Be̱ne̱ ri bra we yi reyii a re-riyii mbe.”
A zhe ne Kowe Canve nna ngu ho rika na natsie̱, ewie e̱ dzie̱ cereng a zinye̱ he̱rri weje kpirri awa.
Ngbe nje e̱ ri re-njeli ne mbe yó nyyi Be̱ne̱ komo natsie̱. Á we ngwa re-rigbe natsie̱.

Ngbe yaka njeli ne ngu bro vite̱ zinarriya nang shwi turraren e̱ be ya yo a briing nyi teede. Á a ki ngwa turraren we yang ngbe re mwe ne re-rumwo nné Be̱ne̱ zhwozhwo, re shwi a briing nyi teede ne e nyi ne zinarriya ne ngu shi a ncwuee ncwu ringgwe̱ nna.
Ngbe ncwu turraren ne e shwi e̱ a wrru a nva njeli re nzhi zeteng ngbe ne re-rumwo nné Be̱ne̱ re nzhi a nyyi Be̱ne̱.

Ngbe njeli e̱ fo vite̱ng shwi turraren, ngu a ve ro a briing nyi teede, ngu a ning cing he̱rri aa shî, ngu a ki wro a be ngwie̱. Ewie e̱ ne̱ ne kpe ru ne eeze ngu tsa nwie ti mele mele ngbe ne ngwie̱gbe̱.
Ngbe re-njeli natsie̱ ne mbe bro re-rigbe natsie̱ mbe e̱ yo aha mbe yhwa.

Njeli na ce̱ucwung ngu a yhwa rigbe na ngu, riklaa ngbe ro ne ngu krre ngbe ne roshwo a wa a be ngwie̱. Kla zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na ebe ngwie̱ e̱ ye ro, zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na rekwe ngbe ga ntsi brrubrru zhwozhwo a ye ro.
Njeli na hwie e̱ yhwa rigbe na ngu, ngbe á a zhwu yankya shi nyi brra rugu ne ngu ye lendo a yarri brra nzhwo rishi. Ngbe kla zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na brra nzhwo rishi e̱ bra ci we uuku roshwo,
zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na ga re-ankya bi ce a yarri brra nzhwo rishi e̱ kwi, ngbe zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na re-jirigi rishi e̱ ci shweni.
Njeli na tsie̱ e̱ yhwa rigbe na ngu, ngbe ya ngba e̱nde̱ ne ngu ye ro shi ya brra te̱le̱kyi e̱ wru zinye̱ ya kpe a zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na re-yince ngbe re-nshwa rishi.
(Á ye lo e̱nde̱ nna he “Rroorro”.) Zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na re-rishi e̱ ne̱ ne rro, ngbe nneywí piriri e̱ kwi aha ne mbe shwe rishi rro.

Njeli na ni e̱ yhwa rigbe na ngu, á a rwi kla zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na ne̱ ngbe kla zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na yhwe̱ ngbe kla zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na re̱nde̱, aha ngbe kla zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na ga mbe zhwozhwo de̱ ré tsie̱ nse̱ we̱, ngbe ko a bi ewie si a yarri zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na te̱ne̱ we̱, ko a bra bi ewie si a yarri zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na totu ma we̱.

Nje e̱ sa riyii, nje e̱ ho ya nkyi ne ngu hru ngu to gbo zeteng ngu kyie̱ ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Wuhu! Wuhu! Wuhu ne nyi ne nyi shi be ngwie̱ a zhe ne re-njeli wetsie̱ na mbe rishi mbe ri yhwa re-rigbe na mbe!”
Njeli na cwuoo a yhwa rigbe na ngu, nje e̱ ri ya e̱nde̱ ne ngu wru zinye̱ ngu ya kpe be ngwie̱. Á ngwa ngu e̱nde̱ ana kyang kla ruvo we̱sa krrucing
Ngbe e̱nde̱ e̱ kla ruvo we̱sa krrucing, ya ncwu a ne̱ ne wrru shi shi nyi ncwu brra ewieng cwu re-kprincwe̱. Ne̱ ngbe zinye̱ e̱ mwe e ci be̱mbe̱mbe̱ aha ncwu ne ngu wrru a ruvo nna.
Re-iigye e̱ wrru yarri ncwu nna re be be ngwie̱, á a we ngwa igbe̱ shi na nnywá te nné a be ngwie̱.
Á a he ne mbe he shi de̱ ré re ko ya ntsi ka yaka yankya ne e tsi, ka ya ekwe we̱, se we nné mbe ne koó we ci ce̱e̱le̱ Be̱ne̱ a re-teyii mbe we̱.
Koó we we ré yhwi nné nna we̱, me̱di se ré we ngwa we cinci he̱rri nyhwe̱ wecwuoo. Zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne mbe shwe e̱ a wié shi shi na nnywa te nné.
A rotu ana nneywí ri kre he mbe kwi, me̱di koó ri she we̱. Á ri me̱ he mbe ce̱ hu, me̱di hu a ri we to.
Re-iigye nna á shi shi ntsié̱ ne mbe srrante aha cwe. Á bi yankyá a nci mbe shi shi nyi re-vo ringgwe̱ na zinarriya, nyyi mbe e̱ shi shi na nneywí.
Nkwe rici mbe shi shi na mbrrú; nnyi mbe e̱ shi shi na re-ze̱kyi.
Á bi re-tagong ku zewe shi shi nyi na kprincwe̱, re̱zhe̱ re-gahaan mbe shi shi rogyrru ntsie̱ piriri ngbe re-eekyie ntsie̱ ne mbe nyia rrutututu re nzhi kwe̱ cwe.
Á bi re-runcwo, á bra te nné shi shi nnywa te nné, á bi igbe̱ng ngwa nneywí cinci ne re-runcwo mbe he̱rri nyhwe̱ wecwuoo.
Á bi nggwe̱ na mbe ne ngu nyi njeli na ruvo we̱sa krrucing, ne e ye lo ngu a zhe Ibrrani he Abado, a zhe nka Heleni á ki ye he Apoliyo, woto he “Nne Yhwi Nné”.
Ge̱zhe̱ na ce̱ucwung ne̱ wara, aa hwie̱ re-ge̱zhe̱ wehwie ne mbe rishi be.
Ngbe njeli na rritsie̱ e̱ yhwa rigbe na ngu, nje e̱ ho ya cwue ngu wru a re-rite na kre briing nyi teede ne e nyi ne zinarriya ne ngu shi nyyi Be̱ne̱.
Cwue nna he ne njeli na rritsie̱ ne ngu bi rigbe e̱ he, “Wrru mi ne re-njeli weni ne e we rrwe a brra riywi Yuferreti ana!”
Ngbe á a wrru mi ne re-njeli weni ne e we sa srrante aha zhe ne ne̱, ngbe otu ne̱, a nyhwe̱ ne̱, ngbe a nrie ne̱, aha ngbe ré yhwi zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na nneywí zhwozhwo.
Nje e̱ ho he rigbre re-shezhi kwe̱ ne ntsié̱ nna á cwu ngba ci nnywa wehwie.

Ntsié̱ ngbe nné tong ne nje ri a kya ne Be̱ne̱ ngu ning ting nna shi he ni: re-tago kprincwe̱ng ku re-zewe mbe e̱ á shi zhwuuzhwuu shi lendo, yá shi brumbru riinriin, yá a nyi rishi kwini shi shi lendo kye̱. Nci ntsié̱ nna á shi shi na re-ze̱kyi; ngbe ro ngbe ncwu ngbe lendo kye̱ e̱ wrru a ronu mbe.
Ngbá re-ge̱zhe̱ wetsie̱ na ro, ngbe ncwu, ngbe lendo kye̱ ne mbe wrru a ronu mbe e̱ á yhwi zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na nneywí zhwozhwo.
Aha igbe̱ ntsié̱ nna shi a ronu mbe ngbe a re-runcwo mbe. Re-runcwo mbe e̱ á shi shi nyi nshé, he̱rri á bi nci ne mbe ning tsie̱ nneywí.

Gbengbe ni, re̱se̱ nné mbiye ne ko ngbá re-ge̱zhe̱ wetsie̱ ne̱ mbe we yhwi we̱ á ra si ywe̱ ne re-ankya ne mbe nyi ne nva mbe. Koó we ni ye rewienci mbè we̱, ga ngbe re-kpanshwu zinarriya, ngbe na azrrufa, ngbe na kprincwe̱ shwo, ngbe na rahwan ngbe rekwe — re-kpanshwu ne ko mbe ri ewie we̱, koó ho nka we̱, koó bra cwo ciee we̱.
Koó bra si ywe̱ ne yhwi nné, ngbe itsie, ngbe re-le̱le̱ njè, ngbe nyi nca ne mbe nyi we̱.
Wire nje e̱ ri ya brra njeli bi igbe̱ ngu wru zinye̱ ngu wró. Inyie̱ ki ku shi nyi ankya ci ne aakwrra nze a zete rici ngu. Riyii ngu a shi shi ne̱, nta ngu a shi shi re-iita runo ne mbe nyi lendo.
Ngu a bro ya e̱we̱ tekpeng wie cwuo ne e ki kla a nva ngu. Aa sa ta nyye ngu a zete brra nzhwo rishi, ngu a sa ta mie ngu a ebe.
Ngu a ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue shi shi nyi rugwrraa ze̱kyi. A zhe ne ngu ci ye, ngbe re-eeze natsie̱ e̱ ne̱ ne kpe ru nwie shing.
We ne mbe shî, nje e̱ ce̱ ne̱ ne wieng, me̱di nje e̱ bra ho ya cwue ne ngu wru zinye̱ he, “La kya ne re-eeze natsie̱ ana mbe he, shi de̱ ngwe̱ wie we̱!”
Ngbe njeli na ne nje ri ngu yó a zete brra nzhwo rishi ngbe a ebe ngu a gbi va nyye ze re nzhi zinye̱.

Ngu a fo shí ne ngwiee ne ngu nyi na bi ce gannyi tiya he̱rri tiya tiya a, ne ngu nyi zinye̱ ne ko nda ngu ning shi, ngbe ebe ngwie̱ ne ko nda ngu ning shi, ngbe brra nzhwo rishi ne ko nda ngu ning shi, ngu a he, “Ko bra shi bi dzio zhe wa we̱!
Me̱di rotu ne njeli na natsie̱ ri shi yhwa rigbe na ngu, kya la la Be̱ne̱ ri ci we shi ne ngu i ti hwié ngung, nné ti re̱se̱ng.”

Ngbe cwue ne ngu wru zinye̱ ne nje ho ngu he nka aa cinga ning he nka wa he: “Ywa ngwe̱ ya fo e̱we̱ tekpeng wie cwuo ne ngu shi gang ne ngu shi nva njeli ne ngu yo a zete brra nzhwo rishi ngbe a ebe ana.”

Nje e̱ ywa nwie njeli nna nje e̱ he re ning ngwa e̱we̱ tekpeng wie cwuo nna. Ngu a he ne nje he, “Fo ngwe̱ ye. A shi re ci serrerre a hwie ngwe̱, me̱di a nu ngwe̱ a shi bi ruto ywang shi rutong shwi.”
Nje e̱ fo e̱we̱ tekpeng wie cwuo nna a nva njeli nje e̱ ye. A bi ruto shi rutong shwi a nu nje, me̱di zhe ne ngu ywa yarri hwie nje, aa bra ci serrerre.
Ngbe á a he ne nje he, “Se ngwe̱ ti re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ te̱nte̱ a rici nneywí piriri, ngbe re-ngwie̱, ngbe re-nka, ngbe nggwé̱.”
Á a ning ngwa ya ngbong mi ankya shi nyi iica, á a he ne nje he, “Ywa ngwe̱ ya mwa brranyi Be̱ne̱ ngbe briing nyi teede nna, ngwe̱ bra hwie nné ne mbe shi ye mbè a miimi.
Me̱di shi de̱ ngwe̱ mwa agrraa na ci we̱, aha á ngwa Nné Nzhwe Ngwie̱. Á cwo a shi brra ngwie̱ wiri ne nta mbe he̱rri nyhwe̱ nshwa weni ne otu wehwie.
Nje ri ngwa re-sheede nje wehwie ne mbe yó ne re-igye̱ ankya ne̱ igbe̱ ngbe ré brro nka Be̱ne̱ rotu ci zunzrru ne nnywa wehwie ne nshwa rritsie̱.”
Re-sheede wehwie nna nyi rekwe rihwie̱n wehwie ngbe ngbong sa te̱le̱kyi wehwie ne mbe yó a nyyi Brrabe̱ ebe ngwie̱.
Kundu ya nne mwa hwie̱ he ngu we re, a bi ro ne ngu wrru a ronu mbe ne ngu yé rwinkó mbe. Aha ni ko nye̱ ne ngu shi we re, we̱ hu.

Nné wehwie ne̱ á bi igbe̱ng she̱ zinye̱, aha ngbe de̱ nze re wie a zhe ne mbe ri shi brro re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱ we̱. Á bra bi igbe̱ng bra re-rishi ré ci roshwo, ngbe re bra rwi ebe ngwie̱ ne ga re-nzhwe ge̱zhe̱ kanka kanka ko zohu zhe ne mbe ce̱.
A zhe ne mbe ri fro brro re̱se̱ nka Be̱ne̱, ngbe ya nnyie̱ ne ngu wrru a ruvo we̱sa krrucing we̱ be, we̱ ya kwe̱ ne mbe he̱rri we̱ we drre̱, we̱ we yhwi.
Nkwe mbe ri nywe̱ a brra rê a ngwie̱ ne e ki ye nhile̱ nhile̱ he Sodo ngbe Masarr, ne ngu nyi ewie ne i ning ci Brrabe̱ mbe a gasankwe.
Ga nneywí a ko zohu zhwe nné, ngbe ngwie̱, ngbe nka, ngbe ikpe, á ri ri nkwe nna he̱rri rotu wetsie̱ ne kpirring, me̱di wé̱ ra we nyie̱.
Nné srra be ngwie̱ ri nyi rekwi aha ne nné wehwie ne̱ mbe kwi. Á ri nyi re-para nwie yaa te mi ne re-ankya na na, aha zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne nné wehwie ne̱ mbe i be mi a nné srra be ngwie̱.
A zhe ne rotu wetsie̱ ne kpirring ne̱ ngu wara, ngbe Be̱ne̱ e̱ yhwa nshe na ce a yarri mbe, mbe e̱ deze nwie yo ne nta mbe, ngbe ya brra owu a prre ga nné ne mbe ri.
Ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ng wehwie nna mbe e̱ ho ya riwie̱ng cwue ne ngu wru zinye̱ ngu he ne mbe he, “Nyi ning be he!” Ngbe mbe e̱ ngra re nzhi zinye̱ a yarri inyie̱ ne ga rwinkó mbe mbe yo re rinng.

We zhe ana ngbe ya brra ngwie̱gbe̱ deze he̱rri kla zunzrru a tsi shwa na brra ngwie̱ nna ci shweni, he̱rri aa yhwi nné ci natsie̱. Ngbe kpi nné mbiye ne mbe drre̱ á ci rowu he̱rri á de Be̱ne̱ zinye̱.
Ge̱zhe̱ na hwie e̱ wara, me̱di aa hwie̱ na tsie̱ ne ngu shi wre̱ ne be!
Njeli na natsie̱ e̱ yhwa rigbe na ngu, ngbe yá brrá re-riwie̱ng cwue e̱ wru zinye̱ nwie he he,
“Igbe̱ng ye ringgwe̱ ebe ngwie̱ hwie̱ na Brrabe̱ nzhi ngbe Krristi ngu,
a bra shi ye ringgwe̱ he̱rri tiya tiya.”
Ngbe brrá nné nshwa wehwie ne otu weni ne mbe shi srra a ncwú ringgwe̱ mbe a nyyi Be̱ne̱, mbe e̱ kpi be ne re-riyii mbe a be nwie ye Be̱ne̱ mbè,
nwie he,
“Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo,
ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ning shi a zhe ne,
ngwe̱ bra i ning shi tiya!
Nzhi re ci kijie̱ng aha ngwe̱ fo brra igbe̱ ngwe̱,
ngwe̱ ne̱ ne ye ringgwe̱!
Nné tsi ngwie̱ e̱ á dzio rehwie,
aha zhe ne brra ren ngwe̱ shi ning be e̱ ci,
zhe ne ngwe̱ shi ning nyi nné kwi nka,
ngbe ngwe̱ ngwa hwié ngwe̱ re-lede mbe, nné ti re̱se̱ng,
ngbe ga nné ngwe̱ zhwozhwo,
ne mbe ngwá lo ngwe̱ grime̱ —
brrabrráng ngbe iishíng zhwozhwo.
Zhe e be ngbe nné mbiye
ne mbe ci ebe ngwie̱ ci shweni,
ngwe̱ we ci ré ci shweni ma!”

Ngbe á a kla brranyi Be̱ne̱ a zinye̱, á a timi ne Kpaati Jee Be̱ne̱ a yarri brranyi nna. Ngbe ewie e̱ ne̱ ne ti mele mele, ne eeze tsa nwie kpe ru, ngbe ne ngwie̱gbe̱, ngbe ngbá re-riklaa ne mbe kpi be.
Ngbe ya brra sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu a ya wre̱ zinye̱: ya mbrru ne ngu yaa ku ne ne̱, ne yhwe̱ shi tahwie nta ngu, ngbe ne vo ringgwe̱ bi re̱nde̱ shwa ne otu wehwie a rici ngu.
A bi ehwie he̱rri a shi nwie ku ehwie shi ngu ri kpa bî ewe.
Ngbe yaka sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu a wre̱ a zinye̱ wa: ya nnyie̱ shi shi brra ca ngu nyi shwoshwong ngu bra bi nci komo natsie̱ ngbe nte komo shwa ngbe ne vo ringgwe̱ a ko zohu rici ngu.
Ngbe runcwo ngu a ywrru zunzrru a tsi wetsie̱ na re̱nde̱ zhwozhwo ne mbe shi zinye̱ aa kro be ngwie̱. Ngbe ngu a ya yo a nyyi mbrru ne ngu ri kpa bî ewe ana, aha ngbe ngu ye ewe nna we ne e ri ki bî.
Ngu a bî ewerento, ne ngu ri ye ringgwe̱ ga re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ne ngbo ncwe̱ na ringgwe̱. Ngbe á a kara ewe nna re nzhi nwie Be̱ne̱ ngbe ncwu ringgwe̱ ngu.
Mbrru nna a to re nzhi tsi yi a nwie ne Be̱ne̱ ngu nyi aha ngu, ne ngu nyi ewie ne e shi ci nkwile̱ ne ngu he̱rri rotu ci zunzrru ne nnywa wehwie ne nshwa rritsie̱.
Ngbe á a ce̱ kwe̱ cwe a zinye̱. Mikayilu ngbe re-njeli ngu a kwe̱ cwe ne nnyie̱ ngu shi shi brra ca ana, ne ngu brra nnyie̱ nna ngbe re-njeli ngu mbe kwe̱ ne mbe ma.
Me̱di igbe̱ brra nnyie̱ nna ngbe re-njeli ngu a re̱, he̱rri á we yu nwie mbe a zinye̱.
Á a zhwu brra nnyie̱ nna a be, a nyi ngu ngu nyi nshe na tiya ne e ki ye he Nne Hwie̱, ka Shetani, ne ngu brra ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo. Á ki zhwu re be be ngwie̱ ngbe re-njeli ngu zhwozhwo.
Ngbe nje e̱ ho ya brra riwie̱ng cwue ngu wru zinye̱ he:
“A zhe ne ne̱ kyia Be̱ne̱ be!
Be̱ne̱ nzhi ti igbe̱ ngu ngbe ringgwe̱ ngu,
ngbe ne igbe̱ ringgwe̱ Krristi ngu.
Aha ngu nne ne ngu yo nyyi Be̱ne̱ nzhi a zinye̱
nwie ci re-gimbe nzhi nka totu ne te̱ne̱ ana,
á ki wro a ci re be be.
Re-gimbe nzhi e̱ á ki drre̱ ne roshwo Kowe Canve
ngbe ne nka raywrra ne mbe ngwa sheedeng;
koó ce̱ cwo ce mbe he̱rri ré to owu hu we̱.
Aha ni nyi nyi rekwi, nyi re-zinye̱
ngbe nyi ne nyi srra miimi!
Me̱di wuhu ne ebe ngwie̱ ngbe brra nzhwo rishi,
aha Nne Hwie̱ e̱ cwucwu re be a nyi!
Aa shî ne ehwie dzio,
aha ngu hu he zhe ngu a hwie̱ we tsie̱nzhwu.”
A zhe ne nnyie̱ shi brra ca ana ri ne e ki zhwu be ngwie̱, ngu a ne̱ ne yu mbrru ne ngu bî ewerento ana.

Á a ngwa mbrru nna re-gahaan wehwie na ya brra nkyi, aha re hung hru re nzhi nwie ne e ki nying a tsi yi, a nwie ne e shi ci nkwile̱ ne ngu a ya zhe, ngbe re-zhe, ngbe kpirri zhe, ko bi he brra nnyie̱ nna re hung ya cwu nwie ngu we̱.
Ngbe brra nnyie̱ nna a ne̱ ne ywe̱ mbrru nna rishi ne ngu wrru a nu ngu shi nyi rishi ngu wru brra riywi aha ngbe re ne̱ mi ne mbrru nna.
Me̱di ebe e̱ she mbrru nnang, ne ngu nga onu ngu ning ngwrra rigwe̱ rishi ne ngu wrru a nu brra nnyie̱ nna.
Ngbe ehwie brra nnyie̱ nna a ya furu ne mbrru nna, ngu a ya deze fufufu he ngu kwe̱ ngbe ga nné nva mbrru nna — ne ngu nyi nné mbiye ne mbe zhwe nti nka Be̱ne̱, mbe bra bro nka Jesu ne ning sa rie.
Ngbe nnyie̱ shi brra ca nna a yo a rekyi brra nzhwo rishi.

Nje e̱ ri ya nnyie̱ ngu shi nwie wru yarri brra nzhwo rishi. A bi nte komo shwa, ngbe nci komo natsie̱, ngbe re-vo ringgwe̱ komo shwa a ko zohu rite ngu; a bra bi long dzie̱ Be̱ne̱ a ko zohu rici ngu.
Nnyie̱ nna a srra shi shi cieve, me̱di nta ngu a á shi shi na biya,
Ya rici nnyie̱ nna shi shi á i ki ci ruhu nang hu, me̱di ngbe̱ nna a dzie. Ngbe ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo a hwie̱ nga we onu, á ne̱ ne zhwe nnyie̱ nna.
Nneywí ne̱ ye nnyie̱ ne ngu shi shi brra ca nna mbè, aha ne ngu ngwa nnyie̱ nke ana igbe̱ ngu. Á bra yé nnyie̱ nna mbè wa nwie he, “Nyi nye̱ ngu shi shi nnyie̱ ne̱? Nyi nye̱ re hung kwe̱ ne ngu aa?”
Á a ngwa nnyie̱ nna onung he re-nkang kywo rici ze ngbe re-nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱; ngbe re bra nyi cwuo ne de̱me̱ ngu he̱rri nyhwe̱ nshwa weni ne otu wehwie.
Aa nga onu ngu nwie he re-nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱, ngbe lo ngu, ngbe ewieng srra ngu, ngbe ga nné mbiye ne mbe srrá zinye̱.
Á a ki ngwa igbe̱ng kwe̱ cwe ne nné Be̱ne̱ he̱rri re we drre̱. Á a bra ki ngwa igbe̱ a zete ko zohu ngwie̱, ngbe nneywí, ngbe nka, ngbe ikpe.
Ga nné srra be ngwie̱ shi ki ye mbè, ga nné mbiye ne gannyi ne i ning sa riti ebe ngwie̱ koó wie re-lo mbe a yarri krre̱de̱ nce na Kowe Canve ne i cie̱ we̱.
“Nde nne bi uucwung hong re ho.
Ko nye̱ ne i ke̱nce̱ rweng he ri ya srra shi nné gyiaa,
ko ri we̱sa ya srra shi nné gyiaa we̱;
ko nye̱ ne i ke̱nce̱ rweng he á ri ki yhwe̱ ne ise̱nkeli,
koó ri we̱sa ki yhwe̱ ne ise̱nkeli we̱.
Nke ne̱ nyi ye re nzhi nwie nné Be̱ne̱ he ré ning bra yaa rwe, ré bra bi sa rie.”
Wire nje e̱ ri yaka nnyie̱ ngu shi nwie wru a yarri be. A bi nte wehwie shi shi na canve, me̱di a bra he nka shi nnyie̱ ne ngu shi shi brra ca ana.
Aa nyi cwuo ne de̱me̱ brra nnyie̱ na ce̱ucwung ana a nyyi ngu. Aa ci ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ngbe nneywí ré ye nnyie̱ na ce̱ucwung ana mbè, nke ne ngbe̱ ruhung hu ngu ana ngu dzie.
Nnyie̱ na hwie ne̱ e̱ nyi ngbá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu, he̱rri aa ci ro re wru zinye̱ re be be ngwie̱ a nyyi ko nye̱.

Aha ngbá re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ne e ki ngwa igbe̱ re ning nying a nyyi nnyie̱ na ce̱ucwung ana, aa brra nné srra be ngwie̱. Aa we ci re nyi ya kpanshwu aha ré ning de nnyie̱ na ne i ki ci ruhu ne ise̱nkeli gbengbe ni ngu ning shi nce ana.
Ngbe á a ngwa nnyie̱ na hwie nna igbe̱ re hung ci kpanshwu na nnyie̱ ce̱ucwung nna re ne̱ ne she nshe, aa ne̱ ne he nka he̱rri aa ci ré yhwi nné mbe ne mbe ra ye kpanshwu nna mbè.
Aa ci ko nye̱ ne ce, iishíng ngbe brrabrráng, nné bi va ngbe yiriywé̱, nné srra srra nci mbe ngbe hwié, he se ko nye̱ re se̱ lamba a nva nyye ngu, ka a teyii ngu.
He̱rri aha ni ko bi nne re hung se̱ yankya, ka re rie̱ yankya we̱ se ne ngu bi lamba ana wire, lamba nna nyi lo nnyie̱ nna ka lamba lo ngu.
Nke ne̱ se ko nye̱ re ci zentsi. Nne nke ngu ri bi hu re̱se̱ng, we̱ hung wru mi ne cwu kya ngu ning shi a yarri lamba nnyie̱ ne̱, a nyi lamba nneywi. Lamba ngu a nyi 666.

Nje e̱ rwi riyii, nje e̱ ri Kowe Canve nna a zete Rugu Siyona; a bra bi nné ci nnywa zunzrru ne nshwa weni ne otu weni (144,000) ne mbe shi ngbe ne ngu ne e we wie lo ngu ngbe lo Be̱ ngu a re-teyii mbe.
Ngbe nje e̱ ho ya cwue ngu wru zinye̱ ngu gwe̱ shi rishi ngu wru brra riywi, ngu bra shi shi eeze ne ngu kpe ru we yang. A bra shi nyi anaa grinye ne nné cwe re-grinye mbe shi nwie cweng.

Á a ce̱ ya ve hwi a nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ ngbe re-kyerrubi weni ngbe brrá nné nna. Ko bi nne ngu hung mie̱ ve nna we̱ se we nné ci nnywa zunzrru ne nshwa weni ne otu weni ne mbe she kyia a be ngwie̱ nna we nggaa mbe.

A nyi mbe ana ne ko mbe yaa dzio ne mbrrú we̱, koó ree hu mbrru we̱. Á zhwe Kowe Canve e̱ ko he ne ngu ning ywa. A nyi mbe ne i we kyia a tsi kpi nneywí he̱rri mbe hwie̱ na ce̱ucwung ne e ngwa Be̱ne̱ ngbe Kowe Canve.
Koó sa we ho mbe he rabrra we̱, koó bi vini we̱.
Ngbe nje e̱ ri ya njeli ngu hru nwie to a zeteng, a bi Nka Rina na he̱rri tiya ne ngu shi brro nné mbe ne mbe shi be ngwie̱ng a ko zohu ikpe, ngbe ngwie̱, ngbe nka, ngbe nné.

A he ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Nyi to owu Be̱ne̱, nyi bra ki ngwa grime̱, aha zheng nyi nka ngu be. Nyi ki ye mbè, ngu ne ngu nyi re-zinye̱, ngbe ebe ngwie̱, ngbe brra nzhwo rishi, ngbe re-nshwa rishi ta be!”
Njeli na hwie e̱ ning zhweng nwie he, “Aa ywa be! Brra ngwie̱ Babila a ywa be! Aa ci ga nné re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo á shwe rishi ruto na ngu, ne ngu nyi re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè!”
Njeli na tsie̱ e̱ zhwe wehwie mbiye ana, nwie he ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Ko nye̱ ne ngu ye brra nnyie̱ ana mbè ngbe kpanshwu ngu, he̱rri ngu bra ci lamba ngu a teyii ka a nva,
mahu a shi shwe rishi ruto na ren Be̱ne̱ ne ngu kro ne igbe̱ zhwozhwo a yarri kwrreshi cinci na ren ngu. A shi shwe ge̱zhe̱ a nro ngbe ne lendo kye̱ a nyyi re-njeli wiri ngbe Kowe Canve.

Ncwu ro ne ngu ri we ngwa ge̱zhe̱ e̱ ri ke̱ we ne deze he̱rri tiya. Ko bi srra cwu gung we̱ totu ne te̱ne̱ a nwie nné mbiye ne mbe ye brra nnyie̱ ana ngbe kpanshwu ngu mbè, ga ngbe ne ko nye̱ ne ngu ci lamba na lo ngu.”
Nke ne̱ nyi ye re nzhi nwie nné Be̱ne̱ he ré ning bra yaa rwe, nné mbiye ne mbe zhwe nti nka Be̱ne̱ ne mbe bra bi sa rie a Jesu.
Wire nje e̱ ho ya cwue ngu wru zinye̱ he, “Wie nke ne̱: mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne mbe kwi a yarri ncwuo Brrabe̱ kya ngu pie zhe ne re nzhi ncwuee.”
Nshe Wiri he, “Ee, á shi srra cwu ne re-cwuo mbe, aha re-cwuo mbe e̱ shi we zhwe.”
Nje e̱ rwi riyii, nje e̱ ri ya inyie̱ kye̱ ne ya nne ning srra zeteng “shi nyi kowe nneywi”; aa ci vo ringgwe̱ na zinarriya a rici ngu, a bra bró ya rije̱e̱ ne ngu ye pempempee a nva ngu.

Ngbe yaka njeli e̱ wru yarri brranyi nwie kyie̱ nne nke ne ngu srra zete inyie̱ ana ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Fo rije̱e̱ ngwe̱ e̱ ngwe̱ ning ca yâ, aha zheng ca yâ nna a ci, aha yâ ebe ngwie̱ e̱ ci ca!”
Ngbe nne srra zete inyie̱ e̱ zhi rije̱e̱ ngu a be ngwie̱, á a ca yâ ebe ngwie̱.
Yaka njeli e̱ wru brranyi a zinye̱ nwie bro ya rije̱e̱ ne ngu ye pempempee ma.

Ngbe yaka njeli ne nyi ngu ngu nyi nne ci nkwile̱ ne ro a wru a nwie briing nyi teede nwie kyie̱ nne bro rije̱e̱ ne ngu ye pempempe ana ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he, “Fo rije̱e̱ ngwe̱ ne ngu ye pempempee ana ngwe̱ ning tsu nshwe ngbre inebi ebe ngwie̱, aha ngbre ngu a ci kpi!”
Ngbe njeli e̱ zhi rije̱e̱ ngu a be ngwie̱, ngu a tsu ngbre inebi nna ngu a kro a brra ewieng yhwi ngbre inebi na ren Be̱ne̱.
Á we shi ne nta a nwieng yhwi ngbre inebi a teme brra ngwie̱, he̱rri roshwo ne ngu to a nwie nna shi dede shi ntsie̱, gbong ewie ne ngu ya ning cwu a cwu re-kyilomita nnywa wetsie̱.
Nje e̱ ri yaka brra sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu a zinye̱: re-njeli natsie̱ ne mbe bi re-ge̱zhe̱ natsie̱ ne mbe nyi na gamang, á nyi na gamang aha nyi mbe ne mbe nyi krruci ren Be̱ne̱.

Ngbe nje e̱ ri yankya ne ngu shi shi brra nzhwo rishi na glaasi ne e ki krre ne ro; a a bra bi nné mbe ne mbe she drre̱ brra nnyie̱ ana ngbe kpanshwu ngu, ngbe ne lamba lo ngu a ne mbe yo a rekyi nzhwo glaasi nna. Á bró re-grinye ne Be̱ne̱ ngu we ngwa,
nwie ce̱ ve Musa, hwie Be̱ne̱, ngbe na Kowe Canve he,
“Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo,
ngbá re-ankya ne ngwe̱ nyi e̱
á nyi ankyang hwie̱ nga onu!
Nggwe̱ ga re-ngwie̱,
re-rê ngwe̱ e̱ á shi tsantsa á bra shi ye̱ye̱rri!
Brrabe̱, he̱rri nyi nye̱ re we̱sa to owu ngwe̱?
He̱rri nyi nye̱ re we̱sa de grime̱ ngwe̱?
Aha nyi we ngwe̱ nggaa ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ shi wiri.
Ga re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ri be,
ngbe ré ya re ye mbè a nyyi ngwe̱,
aha ga nné zhwozhwo á ri re-cwuo redziee ngwe̱.”
A merin nke, nje e̱ ri brranyi, nke ne ngu nyi Ndu na Sheede a zinye̱, shi gang.
Ngbe re-njeli natsie̱ ne mbe bró re-ge̱zhe̱ natsie̱ mbe e̱ wrru a yarri brranyi. Á ci ankya lili wiriri ne mbe si gelgelgel ngbe ne vishi na zinarriya ne mbe grra a re-zewe mbe.
Ya a tsi re-kyerrubi weni ana a ngwa re-njeli natsie̱ nna re-enjie zinarriya natsie̱ ne mbe shî we ne uuku ren Be̱ne̱ bi ce he̱rri tiya tiya.
Ngbe brranyi e̱ shî ne ncwu ne ngu wrru a grime̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe igbe̱ ngu, he̱rri ko bi nne re hung ngwie brranyi nna we̱, se ne re-ge̱zhe̱ natsie̱ na re-njeli natsie̱ nna mbe yhwe̱ wire.
Wire nje e̱ ho ya brra riwie̱ng cwue ne ngu wru brranyi ngu he ne re-njeli natsie̱ nna he, “Nyi ywa nyi ya kro re-enjie ren Be̱ne̱ komo natsie̱ ana a be ngwie̱!”

Njeli na ce̱ucwung a ywa ngu a ya kro enjie na ngu a be ngwie̱, ngbe yá re-nhwe bi owu ne mbe wie we yang mbe e̱ wrru a re-rwe̱ nné mbe ne mbe bi lamba na brra nnyie̱ nna ne mbe bra ye kpanshwu ngu mbè.
Njeli na hwie e̱ kro enjie na ngu a brra nzhwo rishi. Rishi e̱ bra ci shi nyi roshwo kwe nne, ngbe ko zohu kya bi ce a yarri brra nzhwo rishi e̱ hu.
Njeli na tsie̱ e̱ kro enjie na ngu a re-yince ngbe re-nshwa rishi, mbe e̱ bra ci roshwo.
Nje e̱ ho njeli na re-rishi ngu he,
“Ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ ning shi zhe ne,
ne ngwe̱ bra i ning shi tiya,
Ngwe̱ Ne Ngwe̱ Shi Wiri,
ngwe̱ nyi ye̱ye̱rri,
ne ngwe̱ nyi nka a zete re-ankya ne̱!
Aha á i wa roshwo nné Be̱ne̱ ngbe ga nné ti re̱se̱ng,
aha ni ngwe̱ we ngwa roshwo ré shwe shi ne ngu we mwa ye̱ye̱rri.”
Nje e̱ ho ya cwue a nwieng nyi teede he,
“A shi ni, Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo!
Nyi nka ne ngwe̱ nyi ne̱ shi ye̱ye̱rri a bra shi tsantsa.”
Njeli na ni e̱ kro enjie na ngu a ne̱, ngbe á a ngwa ne̱ igbe̱ re ning kpre nné ne ro.
Ngbe ro ne̱ e̱ we kpre we kpre we kpre, he̱rri á ne̱ ne cwi Be̱ne̱ ne ngu bi igbe̱ a zete ga re-ge̱zhe̱ ne̱. Me̱di koó shî mbe si ywe̱ ngbe mbe ngwa Be̱ne̱ grime̱ we̱.
Njeli na cwuoo a kro enjie na ngu a zete ncwu ringgwe̱ brra nnyie̱ nna, ngbe ringgwe̱ ngu zhwozhwo a ci we e̱ ywing. Nneywí e̱ ne̱ ne yaa rwin re-le mbe aha ge̱zhe̱
nwie cwi Be̱ne̱ zinye̱ aha ne mbe ho wieng ne nhwe mbe. Gbengbe ni á ra si ywe̱ ne re-ankya mbe nyi.
Njeli na rritsie̱ e̱ kro enjie na ngu a brra riywi Yuferreti, ngbe ga re-rishi e̱ hwe aha ré we rê aha nggwé̱ Nvaze.
Ngbe nje e̱ ri yá rewienci komo wetsie̱ ne mbe shi shi nvie̱to; á wrru a nu nnyie̱ ne ngu shi shi brra ca ana, ngbe a nu brra nnyie̱ nna, ngbe a nu nne ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra.
Á nyi re-rije nyi re-sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu, á bra cwo nwie nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo ngbe mbe we tsu gbengbe aha kwe̱ cwe na Kotu Be̱ne̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo.
“Nyi ri, nje cwo be shi shi nne nca! Mwo rina nyi na nne nke ne ngu shi srrante re cwo ankya ci rwe̱ ngu kishi ngu ri hwie̱ ngbe̱we̱ng ré bra ki ci nshwu we gbeng.”
Ngbe mbe e̱ tsu nggwé̱ gbengbe a nwie ne e ki ye a zhe Ibrrani he Amagedo.
Ngbe njeli na natsie̱ e̱ kro enjie na ngu a yarri wu, ngbe ya brra riwie̱ng cwue e̱ wru a nwie ncwu ringgwe̱ a brranyi he, “Áa yhwe̱ fa!”

Ngbe ewie e̱ ne̱ ne ti mele mele ne nse̱ kprre̱kye̱kye̱ ne eeze ngu kpe ru ngbe ya ngwie̱gbe̱ ne ngu bi ren. Ko bi ngwie̱gbe̱ ngu sa shi ni we̱ gannyi ne nneywi shi be ngwie̱, ngwie̱gbe̱ nna ngra rici.
Ngbe brra ngwie̱ nna a hla ci ga wetsie̱, ga re-ngwie̱ a be ngwie̱ zhwozhwo a gywi. Be̱ne̱ e̱ lu ne re-e̱ngwie̱ Brra Babila, aa ki ci re shwe kwrreshi rishi ruto na ge̱zhe̱ ren ngu.
Ngbe ga re-ngwie̱ ne brra nzhwo rishi we grra á a ciywi, brrá re-rugu a bru.

Ngbá ngbre riklaa ne ruvo mbe we̱ hung cwu re-kilo nshwa wecwuoo á a ne̱ ne wrru zeteng ne mbe wrre re kpi nneywí, gbengbe ni nneywí e̱ ke̱ we ne he re-nkang dzie̱ Be̱ne̱ aha ge̱zhe̱ ngbre riklaa nna a zhwo we zhwo.
Ngbe ya a tsi re-njeli natsie̱ ne mbe bro re-enjie natsie̱ nna a be ngu a he ne nje he, “Be, nje shi re ti ge̱zhe̱ na brra ntsie̱wente ana, ngu ngwie̱ ne ngu srra zete re-rishi piriri ana.
Ga nggwé̱ re-ngwie̱ e̱ á nyi njè ne ngu, ga nné srra be ngwie̱ bra dzio nci ne re-rishi ruto na re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè ne mbe nyi ne ngu.”

Wire njeli e̱ ning fo a yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri re nzhi tsi yi. Nyi miimi ne nje ya ri ya mbrru ne ngu srra a zete brra nnyie̱ shwo zhwuuzhwuuzhwuu ne e ki ku ne re-long dzie̱ Be̱ne̱, a bi nci natsie̱ ngbe nte shwa.

Mbrru nna ci ankya shwo ne ngu shi brumbrumbru ngbe shwoshwo zhwuuzhwuuzhwuu, a si gelgelgel ne uuku zinarriya, ngbe rahwan bi grime̱ ne zunkya. A bró kwrreshi zinarriya ne ngu shî ne nyrrukiki ankya le̱le̱ na re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè ngu.
Á wie ya lo a teyii ngu ne ngu ning bi yankya ne ngu shi la la he,
BRRA NGWIE̱ BABILA
DE̱ NTSIE̱WENTÉ ZHWOZHWO
NGBE NYRRUKIKI ANKYA LE̱LE̱ EBE NGWIE̱
Ngbe nje e̱ ri mbrru nna ngu bugu ne roshwo nné Be̱ne̱, ngbe ne roshwo nné mbiye ne e we yhwi aha sheede ne mbe ngwa aha Jesu.
A zhe ne nje ki ri, nje e̱ hwie̱ nga we onu.
Njeli e̱ he ne nje he, “Aha nda ngwe̱ hwie̱ nga we onu ni e̱? Nje shi re ti kya la la ne ngu shi yarri mbrru ne̱ ngbe brra nnyie̱ ne ngu shi tong, ne ngu bi nci natsie̱ ngbe nte shwa ana.

Ngu brra nnyie̱ ne ngwe̱ ri ana i ning shi, me̱di ko ning shi zhe ne̱ we̱; a shi wru a yarri ruvo we̱sa krrucing re nzhi ci shweni. Ga nné srra be ngwie̱ ne koó wie re-lo mbe a yarri krre̱de̱ng ce we̱ gannyi ne e nyi ebe ngwie̱, á ri hwie̱ nye̱ we ronu a zhe ne mbe ri ri brra nnyie̱ nna, aha a i ning shi, ko a ning shi zhe ne̱ we̱, gbengbe ni a bra cwo be.
“Nke ne̱ se ko nye̱ re ci zentsi re bra bi hu re̱se̱ng. Nci natsie̱ ana á nyi re-rugu natsie̱ ne mbrru nna ngu srrá a zeteng, á bra nyi nggwé̱ natsie̱ wa.
Wecwuoo a tsi mbe á a kwi, ya a ning shi, ya a rishi ya wre̱, me̱di kundu ngu ri be, we̱ ye ringgwe̱ a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu.
Ngbe ngu brra nnyie̱ ne ngu i ning shi e̱, ne ko ngu bra ning shi a zhe ne wa we̱ we rici ngu a nyi na klanvang. A nyi ya a tsi natsie̱ ana, a bra nyia re nzhi ci shweni.
“Nte komo shwa ne ngwe̱ ri ana á nyi nggwé̱ komo shwa ne mbe rishi she ringgwe̱, me̱di á cwo a we ngwa de̱me̱ ré ning ye ringgwe̱ na awa zunzrru ngbe ne brra nnyie̱ nna.
Ga mbe zhwozhwo bi onu zunzrru, á bra ri fo igbe̱ mbe ngbe de̱me̱ ringgwe̱ mbe ré ngwa brra nnyie̱ nna.

Á ri kwe̱ cwe ngbe ne Kowe Canve nna, me̱di ngu Kowe Canve e̱ ri we drre̱, aha nyi ngu ngu nyi Brrabe̱ re-brrabe̱ ngbe Nggwe̱ re-nggwe̱, a ri shi ngbe ne nné ne ngu we ye, ne ngu we kyie, ne mbe bra ki zhwé ne ning sa rie.”
Ngbe njeli e̱ he ne nje he, “Re-rishi ne ngwe̱ ri ne ntsie̱wente ning srra ana nyi rigwe̱ re-ngwie̱, ngbe nneywí, ngbe re-ikpe, ngbe re-nka.
Brra nnyie̱ ne nte shwa ne ngwe̱ ri ana, a ri ce̱trri ntsie̱wente nna; ngbe wé̱ se̱ ko nda ne ngu bi zhwozhwo wé̱ ki we ngbe̱we̱ng, he̱rri wé̱ ye rine̱ rwe̱ ngu wé̱ ki shwi ne ro.
Aha Be̱ne̱ e̱ ci yarri rehwie mbe ngbe ré nyi kya ne ngu rwe, he ré ci zunzrru ré ngwa brra nnyie̱ nna igbe̱ ringgwe̱ mbe, se ne nka Be̱ne̱ ngu ci rrurru wire.
“Mbrru ne ngwe̱ ri ana nyi brra ngwie̱ bi ringgwe̱ a zete nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱.”
A merin re-nke, nje e̱ ri ya njeli ngu wru zinye̱ ngu wro re be be. A bi igbe̱ we yang, he̱rri ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo tsie̱ nse̱ we aha grime̱ ngu.
Ngu a ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue he,
“Aa ywa be, Brra ngwie̱ Babila a ywa be,
he̱rri aa hwie̱ ering srra rewienci,
ngbe ewieng srra re-rije,
ngbe ko zohu zhwe e̱mie̱ bi le̱le̱.
Aha ga re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo shwe rishi ruto na ngu,
ne ngu nyi re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè.
Nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱ nyi njè ngbe ne ngu,
shwá nyi kaawe̱ a be ngwie̱
á tsu dukyie̱e̱ aha zhwe ecwue le̱le̱ ngu.”
Ngbe nje e̱ ho ya cwue ngu wru zinye̱ he,
“Nné nje, nyi wrru yarri ngu!
Kishi nyi ri nyi zhwe re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu,
kishi zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu shi ki she e̱ re níng she ma!
Aha re-e̱ngwie̱ ngu a á tsú dedede he̱rri ya cwu zinye̱,
Be̱ne̱ e̱ bra lu ne re-cwuo me̱nkye̱ ngu.
Nyi ki nying we ye̱ye̱rri ne ngu níng nying;
nyi ki nyi kya ne ngu nyi e̱ he̱rri ce hwie.
Nyi ki krre rishi ruto na ngu cwandrra zhwe na ngu ana
he̱rri ce hwie a yarri kwrreshi na ngu.
Nyi ki ci re shwe ge̱zhe̱ ngbe ne ehwie dzio
we ye̱ye̱rri ne grime̱ ngbe ho shwing ne ngu ngwa rici ngu.
A cwé zewe a yarri hwie ngu he,
‘Nje e̱ nke ne nje srra ne̱, nje nyi mbrru ringgwe̱,
ko nje nyi kpambrru we̱.
Ko nje bra bi she ehwie dzio we̱!’
Aha nii a tozrru cinci cwo a shwe rici ngu —
a ri nyi ruhu ngbe ehwie dzio ngbe brra nzhwo.
Ro bra ri ki ye,
aha Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ne ngu ki nyi nka a bi igbe̱ kpe̱kpe̱.
“A zhe ne nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱ ne mbe nyi njè ngbe ne ngu, ne mbe bra bi zhwe ecwue le̱le̱ ngu a, á ri ri ncwu ro ne ngu ki yé, wé̱ ku rana nwie dzio rehwie aha ngu.
Owu ri we yhwe̱ aha zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu shi shweng, ngbe wé̱ yo gbong re ku rana nwie he,
‘Kat! Kat! Ngwe̱ brra ngwie̱ e̱e̱!
Ngwe̱ ngwie̱ Babila — brra ngwie̱ bi igbe̱ e̱?
We yarri awa zunzrru á re na uucwu ne brra cinci!’
“Shwá nyi kaawe̱ a be ngwie̱ ri ku rana ne rehwie dzio aha ngu, aha ko bi nné si re-ankya mbe wa we̱.

Ko bi nné si ga re-zinarriya, ngbe azrrufa, ngbe rahwan bi grime̱ ngbe re-zunkya mbe e̱ we̱, ga ngbe ankya ci rwe̱ na lili, ngbe re-na bi rishi shwo brumbrumbru, ngbe re-trro trro, ngbe re-trro bi rishi shwo zhwuuzhwuuzhwuu; ga ngbe nzhwe nkla nkwe bi shwe̱ rina, ngbe nzhwe ankya ne e nyi ne rite nzhwe ngbe rekwe bi ncwé̱, ngbe kprincwe̱ shwo, ngbe kprincwe̱ ywi, ngbe rahwan bi rina;

ga ngbe rekwe bi shwe̱ rina mbe ne e ki ye he sinamo, ngbe turraren na rohun rohun, ngbe ntsi turraren, ngbe re-remie turraren nke ne e ye he murru ngbe libanu; ngbe re-rishi ruto, ngbe remie rihwie̱n, ngbe na ntsi alikama, ngbe cwe alikama; ngbe nnywá ngbe canvé, ngbe ntsié̱, ngbe re-eekyie ntsié̱, ngbe hwié, he̱rri ngbe re-ce nneywí.
“Á ri he, ‘Ga re-ankya rina ne ngwe̱ nyi ne kreng nna, á ne̱ yhwe̱ wiriri ii! Ga dukyie̱e̱ ngwe̱ ngbe grime̱ ngwe̱ aa yhwe̱, ko ngwe̱ bra bi kying wa we̱ e̱e̱!’
Ngbe shwá nyi kaawe̱ ne mbe i rie̱ re-ankya ne̱ he̱rri mbe ning she dukyie̱e̱ a nwie ngu, wé̱ yo gbong aha ne mbe to owu zhwe ge̱zhe̱ ne ngu shi shweng. Wé̱ kyie̱ rana ne ehwie dzio
re he,
‘Kat! Kat! Ngwe̱ brra ngwie̱ e̱e̱!
Ngwe̱ ne ngwe̱ i yaa sha ne ankya lili,
ngbe re-trro shwo brumbrumbru
ngbe shwoshwong zhwuuzhwuuzhwuu,
ne ngu ye ro gelgelgel ne zinarriya
ngbe rahwan bi grime̱ ngbe re-zunkya aa!
We yarri awa zunzrru ga zhwe brra
dukyie̱e̱ ana a ci shweni zhwozhwo aa?’
“Ga nné to re-jirigi rishi, ngbe nné nyi ciee a yarri jirigi rishi, ngbe nnencwuó a jirigi rishi, ngbe ga nné ne mbe nyi cwuo nwie she kyang srra a brra nzhwo rishi, á ri yo ze̱nze̱.
A zhe ne mbe ri ri ncwu ro ne ngu ki ye, wé̱ kro nku nwie he, ‘He̱rri á sa she ya ngwie̱ shi ngwie̱ ne̱ e̱e̱?’
Ngbe wé̱ ko ruvu mbè nwie yaa krrong a rici nwie ku rana riywe̱ ne ehwie dzio re he,
‘Kat! Kat! Ngwe̱ brra ngwie̱ e̱e̱!
Ewie ne ga nné bi re-jirigi rishi a brra nzhwo rishi
mbe ning ci ncwe̱ aha dukyie̱e̱ ngu!
We yarri awa zunzrru á ki rwi be!’
Nyi ne nyi shi zinye̱,
nyi nyi rekwi aha ngwie̱ ana ci shweni!
Nyi nné Be̱ne̱ ngbe nnenté ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ng,
nyi nyi rekwi!
Aha Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki nyi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu níng nying.”
Ngbe ya brra njeli e̱ gbi ya ngba ngbaatsie shi nyi ya brra itsieng hwie nkya, ngu a zhwu yarri brra nzhwo rishi, ngu a he,
“Á shi zhwu brra ngwie̱ Babila ne ren enren he ni,
koó bra shi bi ki ri wa we̱.
Ga re-ve nné cwe grinye
ngbe ncwue nneywí ne mbe shi nve,
ngbe nné tsie̱ uuzhwu ngbe re-rigbe,
koó bra bi hong wa we̱.
Koó bra bi she ya nne bi cwuo nva a ngwe̱ wa we̱.
Koó bra bi ho ne e shi hwie nkya a yarri ngwe̱ wa we̱.
Koó bra bi ri ro fitile̱ ngu si a yarri ngwe̱ wa we̱.
Koó bra bi ho cwue mbrru hwi ngbe nto hwi a yarri ngwe̱ wa we̱.
Shwá nyi kaawe̱ ngwe̱ i nyi nné ne e ho ne mbe a be ngwie̱.
Ne re-cwuo rekpree ngwe̱ ga re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo á brru rê.
A yarri ngu á ning ywe̱ roshwo nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe nné Be̱ne̱,
ngbe ga nné ne e we yhwi a be ngwie̱.”
A merin nke, nje e̱ ho yankya ngu ku shi nyi rigwe̱ nné a zinye̱ ne mbe kro nku nwie he:
“De Be̱ne̱!
Kyia ngbe grime̱ ngbe igbe̱ nyi ngge Be̱ne̱ nzhi,
aha nyi nka ngu a shi ye̱ye̱rri, a bra shi tsantsa.
Aa rwe he ngu shi na ntsie̱wente ne ngu dzio ebe ngwie̱
ne re-nzhwe le̱le̱ njè ana uucwu ne ge̱zhe̱.
Be̱ne̱ e̱ ki trra le̱e̱kyi roshwo hwié ngu.”
Mbe e̱ kro nku te̱nte̱ wa nwie he,
“De Be̱ne̱!
Ncwu ro ne ngu dezé a yarri ngu a ngrra zeteng he̱rri tiya tiya.”
Ngbe brrá nné nshwa wehwie ne otu weni ngbe re-kyerrubi weni ana mbe e̱ hu be nwie ye Be̱ne̱ mbè, ne nyi ngu ngu srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ nwie he,
“Nde re shi ni! De Be̱ne̱!”
Ngbe ya cwue e̱ wru a ncwu ringgwe̱ nna he,
“Nzhi de Be̱ne̱ nzhi, ga nyi hwié ngu zhwozhwo,
nyi ne nyi to owu ngu iishíng ngbe brrabrráng!”
Nje e̱ ho yankya ngu gwe̱ shi nyi ya brra rigwe̱ nné, a gwe̱ shi nyi ya rigwe̱ rishi ne ngu wru a brra nce, a shi shi eeze ne ngu kpe ru. Nje e̱ ho he,
“De Be̱ne̱!
Aha Be̱ne̱ nzhi, Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo shi ringgwe̱.
Nde nzhi nyi rekwi ne ehwie kla
nzhi ki ngwa grime̱!
Aha zhe nyrra Kowe Canve ngbe mbrru hwi ngu a ci,
mbrru hwi ngu a yaa sha aha ni.
Á ki ngwa ankya lili ne ngu shi wiriri re ci.” (Ngu lili ana yo a nu re-cwuo rina nné Be̱ne̱.)
Ngbe njeli e̱ he ne nje he, “Wie nke ne̱: ‘Mwo rina nyi na nné mbe ne e we ye a bikyi nyrra na Kowe Canve!’ ” Ngu a ning brang he, “Nke ne̱ nyi nka raywrra Be̱ne̱.”

Ngbe nje e̱ hu be a nyyi ngu he nje shi ki ye mbè. Me̱di a he ne nje he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi ni we̱! Nje nyi we ya rwincwuo ngbe ne ngwe̱ ngbe re-gimbe ne mbe sa rie a nka Jesu. Nyi ye Be̱ne̱ mbè! Aha sheede ne Jesu ngwá a nyi ngu ngu nyi igbe̱ nné ti re̱se̱ng.”
Ngbe nje e̱ ri zinye̱ shi gang ne ya ntsie̱ kye̱ ngu yo miimi, á ye nne tong nna he Sa rie ngbe Raywrra. A nyí nka ngbe cwe ngu tsantsa.
Re-riyii ngu á shi shi lendo ne ngu ye, a bi re-vo ringgwe̱ piriri ne ngu ci a rici ngu. A bi ya lo ne e wie a zeteng ne ko bi nne ngu hu we̱ se we ngu nggaa ngu.
Aa ci ankya ne e tala yarri roshwo. Á ye lo ngu he “Nka Be̱ne̱”.
Ga re-shezhi zinye̱ á ki zhwe nwie to a zete ntsié̱ kye̱, á ci ankya lili ne mbe nyi kye̱kye̱ng wiririri.

Ngbe ya ise̱nkeli ne ngu ye pempempee a wrru a nu ngu. A nyi ise̱nkeli ne̱ ne ngu shi ning ye re-ngwie̱ a cwe. “A shi ye ringgwe̱ mbe ne ngbo ncwe̱.” A ri we shi ne nta shi nyi ngbre inebi a nwieng yhwi rishi rutong, ne ngu ri we shi ne brra ren Be̱ne̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo.
Á wie lo a brra tago ngu ngbe a rishwe nta ngu he,
Nggwe̱ re-nggwe̱ ngbe
Ngbe nje e̱ ri ya njeli ngu yo a ne̱. Aa ci onu ne brra riwie̱ng cwue nwie ye ga re̱mie̱ zhwozhwo ne mbe hrru re nzhi gbong zeteng he, “Nyi be, nyi yaa tsu gbengbe aha brra para Be̱ne̱!
