Nyi be nyi ye rine̱ re-rwe̱ nggwé̱, ngbe na nggwé̱ re-shezhi, ngbe na brrá re-shezhi, ngbe na ntsié̱ ngbe nné ning ngrra, ngbe rine̱ re-rwe̱ ga nneywí zhwozhwo, nné bi srra srra nci mbe, ngbe hwié, ngbe iishí nné ngbe brráng.”
Ngbe nje e̱ ri brra nnyie̱ ana ngbe nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱ ngbe rotsu re-shezhi mbe zhwozhwo ne mbe ya tsu gbengbe aha mbe kwe̱ ne nne ngu shi to ntsie̱ ana ngbe re-shezhi ngu.

Ngbe mbe e̱ pie brra nnyie̱ nna ngbe nne ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra ne ngu shi ngbe ngu, ne ngu nyi re-sheedeng hwie̱ nga onu aha ngu. (A nyi ne re-ankyang hwie̱ nga onu ana ne ngu ning brra nné ne mbe se̱ lamba brra nnyie̱ nna, mbe bra ye kpanshwu ngu mbè.) Á a we mwe mbe ne wehwie ana á we zi cerring a brra nzhwo na ro ne ngu ye lendo kye̱.
Á a yhwi ga re-shezhi mbe ne ise̱nkeli ne ngu wrru a nu nne to ntsie̱ ana; ngbe ga nzhwe re̱mie̱ zhwozhwo á ya ye re-rine̱ rwe̱ mbe.
Nje e̱ ri ya njeli ne ngu wru zinye̱ ngu wro re be be, a bro kyang kla ruvo we̱sa krrucing, a bra bro ya ngba roonyo a nva ngu.
Aa pie nnyie̱ shi brra ca ana, ngu brra nshe tiya ana, ne nyi ngu ngu nyi Nne Hwie̱ ka Shetani hoo, aa ki rrwe he̱rri re-rie ci zunzrru.

Aa ki zhwu yarri ruvo we̱sa krrucing, ngu a ki she̱, wire ngu a be̱ onu ruvo nna, kishi a ri brra nneywí a re-ngwie̱ wa, se ne re-rie ci zunzrru ana ri yhwe̱ wire. Kundu zhe nna ri wara wire wé̱ ki kla re wru a e̱we̱ zhe tsie̱nzhwu.

Ngbe nje e̱ ri ncwú ringgwe̱ ne nné mbe srra zeteng nna á we ngwa de̱me̱ng nyi nka. Nje e̱ ri re-wu nné mbe ne i we trru nci aha ne mbe brro nka raywrra ne Jesu ngu he ngbe nka Be̱ne̱. Koó ree ye brra nnyie̱ ana ka kpanshwu ngu mbè we̱, koó bra se̱ lamba ngu a re-teyii mbe ka a nva mbe we̱. Á deze nce, mbe e̱ ye ringgwe̱ ngbe Krristi re-rie ci zunzrru.
(Re̱se̱ kpi nkwe nné nna koó deze nce we̱ se ne re-rie ci zunzrru ana a ya cwu gamang.) Nke ne̱ nyi deze nhu na ce̱ucwung.

Nné ne mbe ri deze nhu na ce̱ucwung ne̱ á bi mwo rina á shi wiri. Ko hu na hwie bi igbe̱ a zete mbe we̱, me̱di á ri hwie̱ re-prristi Be̱ne̱ ngbe na Krristi wé̱ ye ringgwe̱ ngbe ne ngu he̱rri re-rie ci zunzrru.
Se ne re-rie ci zunzrru ana wara, wire á a wru ne Shetani a gyiaa ngu,

ngbe ngu a wru re nzhi brra nneywí a re-ngwie̱ zhwozhwo a ga reme weni na ebe ngwie̱ zhwozhwo — Gog ngbe Magog — ngu a we tsu bererere aha kwe̱ cwe, ngbe mbe e̱ brri we brri shi shi nzha rekyi brra nzhwo rishi.
Mbe e̱ yaa hla a be ngwie̱ terere a ciee, á grra ngwie̱ ne Be̱ne̱ cé̱, ne ngu nyi ewieng srra nné Be̱ne̱. Me̱di ro a wru zinye̱, aa be ya we te̱ zhwozhwo.

Ngbe á a zhwu Shetani, ne ngu we brra a brra nzhwo ro ne ngu ye ngbe ne lendo kye̱, a nwie ne i ning zhwu brra nnyie̱ ngbe nné ti re̱se̱ng na rabrra ana. Á shi srra re shwe cinci a miimi totu ne te̱ne̱ he̱rri tiya tiya.
Ngbe nje e̱ ri ya brra ncwu ringgwe̱ ne ngu nyi kye̱kye̱ng ngbe nne ne ngu ning srra a zeteng. Ngbe ebe ngwie̱ ngbe zinye̱ e̱ bru a nyyi ngu, ko bra bi ré we ri wa we̱.

Wire nje e̱ ri nné kwi, brrabrráng ngbe iishíng ne mbe yo a nyyi ncwu ringgwe̱ nna, á a kla re-krre̱de̱. Á a bra kla yaka krre̱de̱ wa, ne ngu nyi krre̱de̱ nné bi ce. Ngbe á a nyi nné kwi nka ye̱ye̱rri ne kya mbe nyi, shi ne e wie yarri re-krre̱de̱ nna.
Ngbe brra nzhwo rishi e̱ ngwa nné kwi na ngu. Hu ngbe ewieng srra nné kwi e̱ ngwa nné kwi ne mbe shi yarri mbe ma, á a nyi ko nye̱ nka ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu nyi.
Wire á a zhwu hu ngbe ewieng srra nné kwi a yarri brra nzhwo ro. (Ngu brra nzhwo ro ne̱ nyi hu na hwie.)
Ko nye̱ ne e she ko á wie lo ngu a yarri krre̱de̱ nné bi ce we̱, wé̱ ki zhwu yarri brra nzhwo ro nna.
Ngbe nje e̱ ri ya zinye̱ hwi ngbe ebe ngwie̱ hwi, aha zinye̱ na ce̱ucwung ngbe ebe ngwie̱ na ce̱ucwung nna á bru, ko bra bi brra nzhwo rishi wa we̱.
Nje e̱ ri Brra Ngwie̱ Wiri, Urrushelima hwi ne ngu wru zinye̱ nwie Be̱ne̱ ngu wro re be be, á ki nyi risa shi nyi mbrru hwi ne ngu cwo a nyi ne nto ngu.

Ngbe nje e̱ ho ya brra riwie̱ng cwue ngu wru nwie ncwu ringgwe̱ nna he, “A zhe ne ne̱ ewieng srra Be̱ne̱ shi ngbe nneywí! A shi srra ngbe mbe. Á shi hwie̱ nné ngu, Be̱ne̱ we rici ngu shi srra ngbe mbe, a shi hwie̱ Be̱ne̱ mbe.
A shi we yi reyii a nyyi mbe. Ko bra bi nka hu wa we̱, ka ehwie dzio, ka anaa, ka rwe̱ wie, aha ga re-ankya reni ana á wara.”
Ngbe nne nke ne ngu shi srra a ncwu ringgwe̱ ngu a he, “Ri, nje ci ko nda re ci hwing!” Ngu a he wa he, “Wie nka ne̱, aha a nyi nka re ning sa rie, a nyi nka raywrra.”
Ngu a he ne nje he, “Aa yhwe̱ fa. Nyi nje ne nje nyi Alfa ngbe Omega, Ce̱ucwung ngbe Krrucing. Nne nke ne ne̱ rishi ki hwe, nje shi ki ngwa rishi a nshwa rishing ce we shweni.
Nne nke ne ngu ri she drre̱, ngbe ga re-ankya ne nje i ning sa jee wé̱ hwie̱ ngge ngu, ma n hwie̱ Be̱ne̱ ngu, ngbe we̱ hwie̱ ewe nje ma.

Me̱di nné ne mbe nyi jinji ne yo a yarri ce̱ nka, ngbe nné ra nka, ngbe nné nyi cwuo le̱le̱, ngbe nné yhwi nné, ngbe nné nyi njè, ngbe nné nyi re-cwuo rekpree, ngbe nné ye kpanshwu mbè, ngbe ga nné ca rabrra zhwozhwo — ewie mbe ri shi a yarri brra nzhwo ro ne ngu ye lendo kye̱. Nyi nke ne̱ ngu nyi hu na hwie.”

Ya a tsi re-njeli natsie̱ ne mbe bro re-enjie natsie̱ ne mbe shî ne re-ge̱zhe̱ng frong komo natsie̱ e̱ be nwie nje, ngu a he ne nje he, “Be, nje shi re ti mbrru hwi nna, ne ngu nyi mbrru Kowe Canve nna.”
Ngu a ning fo a yarri igbe̱ Nshe Wiri re nzhi ya brra rugu ne ngu shi dede, ngu a ning ti Brra Ngwie̱ Wiri, Urrushelima, ne ngu wru zinye̱ nwie Be̱ne̱ ngu wro re be be.
A si ne grime̱ Be̱ne̱. Nse̱ ngwie̱ nna si shi ngbaatsie bi grime̱, shi shi ngbaatsie jaspa, a bra shi krrankrrankrra shi glaasi.
A bi brra garru dedede ne brrá ronusinye komo shwa ne otu wehwie, ne re-njeli shwa ne otu wehwie mbe ci nkwile̱ ne brrá ronusinye nna. Á ning wie re-lo re-ngwie̱ nné Isrreela komo shwa ne otu wehwie.
A ko zohu eme, a ning bi brrá ronusinye wetsie̱: wetsie̱ a nva ze, wetsie̱ a nva arewa, wetsie̱ a nva kudu, wetsie̱ a nva ta.
Á ke̱she sa re-riti runo komo shwa ne otu wehwie wire ne e ning no garru nna. A ko zohu riti runo nna á ning wie lo nnenté Kowe Canve nna shwa ne otu wehwie.
Njeli ne ngu he nka ne nje e̱ bi ngbo zinarriya nang mi rewie aha ngu ning mwa brra ngwie̱ nna, ngbe brrá ronusinye nna, ga ngbe garru nna.

Ga reme ngwie̱ nna á shi we ye̱nyye̱ a terere ngbe je̱je̱. Njeli e̱ mwa ngwie̱ nna ne ngbong mi ankya nna, ngu a she je̱je̱ng ngbe terereng ngbe dedeng nna zhwozhwo nyi re-kyilomita ci wehwie ne nnywa weni (2,400).
Aa mwa dede
Á no garru nna ne jaspa, á a no ngwie̱ nna we ne uuku zinarriya na ne ngu shi wiriri shi glaasi.
Á nyi riti runo na garru brra ngwie̱ nna risa ne ko zohu zhwe zahwan bi grime̱. Riti runo na ce̱ucwung nyi jaspa, na hwie nyi safaya, na tsie̱ e̱ nyi agati, na ni e̱ nyi emerra,

na cwuoo nyi oni, na rritsie̱ nyi kaneliya, na natsie̱ nyi krrisola, na klanva nyi berrili, na krruvaya nyi topa, na shwa nyi krrisoprre, na shwa ne otu zunzrru nyi jasinti, na shwa ne otu wehwie nyi ameti.

Brrá ronusinye komo shwa ne otu wehwie ana á we nyi ne re-zunkya komo shwa ne otu wehwie, ko zohu brra onusinye á ki nyi ne zunkya zunzrru. Brra rê na ngwie̱ nna á ki nyi ne uuku zinarriya ne ngu shi krrankrrankrra shi shi glaasi.
Ko nje ri ya brranyi a yarri ngwie̱ nna we̱, aha Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ Bi Igbe̱ Zhwozhwo ngbe ne ngu Kowe Canve nna á nyi brranyi na ngwie̱ nna.
Ko bi nka he ne̱ ka yhwe̱ re si a ngwie̱ nna we̱, aha grime̱ Be̱ne̱ nyi nse̱ ne ngu si a ngwie̱ nna, Kowe Canve nna a nyi fitile̱ ngu.
Nné ngwie̱ nna á ri cwo a yarri nse̱ na ngwie̱ nna, nggwé̱ ebe ngwie̱ ri be ne re-dukyie̱e̱ mbe a ngwie̱ nna.
Ko bi nkang she̱ brrá ronusinye nna gung we̱ ko zohu otu, aha ko ri bi totu a miimi gung we̱.
Á ri be ne ga re-dukyie̱e̱ ngbe re-grime̱ re-ngwie̱ a ngwie̱ nna.
Ko bi ko yankya le̱le̱ ne ngu ri ngwie yarri ngwie̱ nna we̱, ka ya nne nyi kya nshwu, ka nné brra nné, se we nné mbe ne e wie re-lo mbe a yarri krre̱de̱ng ce na Kowe Canve nna.
Ngbe njeli e̱ ning ti brra yince na rishing ce, rishi nna shi cwancwancwaa, ne ngu wrre a ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe na Kowe Canve nna

nwie to a zetsi brra rê na ngwie̱ nna. A ko zohu eme brra yince nna a bi ekweng ce, ne ngu krro ngbre ce shwa ne otu wehwie a nrie, ce zrru a ko zohu yhwe̱. Rohun ekwe nna nyi rikye̱ ne ngu kyia nné ga re-ngwie̱.
Ko ri bi yankya ne Be̱ne̱ i ki sa onu a ngwie̱ nna we̱.
Ncwu ringgwe̱ Be̱ne̱ ngbe na Kowe Canve nna ri shi a yarri ngwie̱ nna, hwié ngu ri ki ye mbè.
Á ri zrre̱ riyii ngu, lo ngu bra ri shi a re-teyii mbe.
Ko bra ri bi totu wa we̱. Koó bra ri kre ro fitile̱ ka nse̱ ne̱ we̱, aha Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱ ri we ngwa ewie si. Á ri ye ringgwe̱ he̱rri tiya tiya.

Ngbe njeli e̱ he ne nje he, “Re-nka ne̱ nyi nka ré ning sa rie, a nyi raywrra. Be̱ne̱ Brrabe̱, ne ngu ngwa nné ti re̱se̱ng Nshe ngu a te njeli ngu ngbe re ti hwié ngung re-ankya ne mbe shi ci we̱sa ne dzio zhe.”
“Ri, nje cwo be we hwiehwie! Mwo rina nyi na nne nke ne ngu zhwe nti nka ne e ti re̱se̱ng a yarri krre̱de̱ ne̱.”
Nje Yohana, a nyi nje ne nje ho, nje bra ri ga re-ankya ne̱. A zhe ne nje ho, ne nje bra ri ni, nje e̱ hu be he nje shi ye ngu njeli ne ngu ning ti re-ankya ne̱ mbè.
Me̱di a he ne nje he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ nyi ni we̱! Nje nyi rwincwuo ngwe̱ ngbe re-gimbe ngwe̱ ne mbe nyi nné ti re̱se̱ng ngbe ga mbe zhwozhwo ne mbe zhwe nti nka a yarri krre̱de̱ ne̱. Ye Be̱ne̱ mbè!”
Ngu a he ne nje he, “Shi de̱ ngwe̱ la nti nka ne e ti re̱se̱ng a yarri krre̱de̱ ne̱ we̱, aha zhe sa dudu ne re-ankya ne̱ mbe cwo a ning ci.

Nde nne hwie̱ re ke̱ we ne nyi hwie̱ ngu, nne nyi ankya le̱le̱ re ke̱ we ne nyi ankya le̱le̱ ngu ma; nde nne nyi re-cwuo rina re tu rici nyi re-cwuo rina ma, nne nke ne ngu shi wiri re ke̱ we ne shi wiri.”
Jesu a he, “Ri, nje cwo be we hwiehwie! Nje bi lede ne nje shi ngwa ko nye̱ ye̱ye̱rri ne kya ngu nyi.
Nyi nje ne nje nyi Alfa ngbe ne Omega, Na Ncwuee ngbe Na Merin, Ce̱ucwung ngbe Krrucing.
“Mwo rina nyi na nné ne mbe ne mbe kyu ankya mbe aha ngbe mbe she de̱me̱ng ye gbre ekweng ce, mbe bra she ngwie a brrá ronusinye ngwie̱ nna.

Me̱di nné mbe ne e we we ci e̱ á shi shi rovu, ngbe nné nyi ankya rekpree, ngbe nné nyi le̱le̱ njè, ngbe nné yhwi nné, ngbe nné ye kpanshwu mbè, ngbe nné bi e̱kpe̱e̱ rabrra a yarri re-nka ne mbe he ngbe re-ankya ne mbe nyi.
“Nje Jesu a nje te njeli nje ngbe re ya níng ngwa sheede ne̱ a yarri rekpri nné ce̱ nka. Nje nyi Rinyie Dooda nje bra wru nzhwe ngu, nyi nje ne nje nyi E̱nde̱ Nyiencwe ne ngu si.”
Nshe Be̱ne̱ mwe gbengbe ne mbrru hwi e̱ á he, “Be!”
Nde ko nye̱ ne ngu ho nka ne̱ re he ma he, “Be!”
Nde ko nye̱ ne ngu ho ne̱ rishi re be, ko nye̱ ne ngu ce̱ re be re ya she rishing ce ne ngu nyi kya na na we shweni.
Nje gara ko nye̱ ne ngu ho nti nka ne e ti re̱se̱ng a yarri krre̱de̱ ne̱ nka he: ko nye̱ ne ngu ning bra yankya a zeteng, Be̱ne̱ ri ki bra cinci a zete re-ge̱zhe̱ ne e wie a yarri krre̱de̱ ne̱.
Ko nye̱ ma ne ngu vie yankya sa a yarri nti nka ne krre̱de̱ ne̱ ti re̱se̱ng, Be̱ne̱ ri ti ga na ngu a tsi lede na gbre ekweng ce ngbe na ngwie̱ wiri nna, shi ne e he a yarri krre̱de̱ ne̱.
Nne nke ne ngu ngwa sheede re-ankya ne̱ he, “Cence, nje cwo be we hwiehwie!”
Nde re shi ni. Be, Brrabe̱ Jesu!
Nde ehwie rina Brrabe̱ Jesu re shi ngbe ne ga nyi zhwozhwo. Re shi ni.
